NM_1,1.1.0–1,1.2.0	maṅgala ācaraṇam namaḥ śāśvatika ānanda jñāna aiśvarya maya ātmane saṅkalpa saphala brahma stamba ārambhāya śambhave namāmi yāminī nātha lekhā alaṅkṛta kuntalām bhavānīm bhava santāpa nirvāpaṇa sudhā nadīm sura asura śiraḥ ratna marīci khacita aṅghraye vighna andhakāra sūryāya gaṇādhipataye namaḥ jayanti purajit datta sādhuvādapavitritāḥ nidānam nyāya ratnānām akṣa pāda muneḥ giraḥ grantha avataraṇam akṣa pāda mata ambhodhi parimarṣa rasa utsukām vigāhantām imām santaḥ prasarantīm sarasvatīm nānā guṇa rasa āsvāda khinnā api viduṣām matiḥ āloka mātrakeṇa imam anugṛhṇātu naḥ śramam 
NM_1,1.3.0	 nyāya oṣadhi vanebhyaḥ ayam āhṛtaḥ paramaḥ rasaḥ idam ān vīkṣakī kṣīrāt navanītam iva uddhṛtam kutas vā nūtanam vastu vayam utprekṣitum kṣamāḥ vacaḥ vinyāsa vaicitrya mātram atra vicāryatām taiḥ eva kusumaiḥ pūrvam asakṛt kṛta śekharāḥ apūrva racane dāmni dadhati eva kutūhalam yat vā nirguṇam api artham abhinandanti sādhavaḥ praṇayi prārthanā bhaṅga saṃvidhānam aśikṣitāḥ tat iyam vāc maya udyāna līlā viharaṇa udyataiḥ vidagdhaiḥ kriyatām karṇe cirāya nyāya mañjarī akṣa pāda praṇītaḥ hi vitataḥ nyāya pādapaḥ sāndra amṛta rasa syanda phala sandarbha nirbharaḥ 
NM_1,1.4.0	 vayam mṛdu parispandāḥ tad ārohaṇa paṅgavaḥ na tad vibhūti prāgbhāram ālokayitum api alam tad eka deśa leśe tu kṛtaḥ ayam vivṛti śramaḥ tam eva ca anugṛhṇantu santaḥ praṇaya vatsalāḥ asaṅkhyaiḥ api na ātmīyaiḥ alpaiḥ api para sthitaiḥ guṇaissantaḥ prahṛṣyanti citram eṣām viceṣṭitam parama artha m āvana ākrama samunmiṣat pulaka lāñchita kapolam sva kṛtīḥ prakāśayantaḥ paśyanti satām mukham dhanyāḥ śāstrāṇām avaśya ādhyeya tvam 
NM_1,1.4.1	 iha prekṣā pūrva kāriṇaḥ puruṣa artha saṃpadam abhivāñchantaḥ tad sādhana adhigama upāyam antareṇa tad avāptim amanyamānāḥ tad upāya avagama nimittam eva prathamam anveṣante dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa bhedena ca dvividhaḥ puruṣa arthasya panthāḥ tatra dṛṣṭe viṣaye su cira prarūḍha vṛddha vyavahāra siddha anvaya vyatireka adhigata sādhana bhāve bhojana ādau= anapekṣita śāstrasya eva bhavati pravṛttiḥ na hi malinaḥ snāyāt bubhukṣitaḥ vā aśrīyāt iti śāstram upayujyate adṛṣṭe tu svarga apavarga mātre naisargika moha andhatamasa vilupta ālokasya lokasya śāstram eva prakāśaḥ tat eva sakala sat upāya darśanedivyam cakṣuḥ asmad ādeḥ na yoginām iva yoga samādhi ja jñāna ādi upāya antaram api iti tasmāt asmad ādeḥ śāstram eva adhigantavyam 
NM_1,1.5.0–1,1.5.2	 vidyā sthānāni tat ca caturdaśavidham yāni vidvāṃsaḥ caturdaśa vidyā sthānāni ācakṣate vedāḥ tatra vedāḥ catvāraḥ prathamaḥ atharvavedaḥ dvitīyaḥ ṛgvedaḥ tṛtīyaḥ yajurvedaḥ caturthaḥ sāmavedaḥ ete catvāraḥ vedāḥ sākṣāt eva puruṣa artha sādhana upadeśa svabhāvāḥ agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ ātmā jñātavyaḥ ityādi śruteḥ dharma śāstrāṇi 
NM_1,1.5.3–1,1.6.1	 smṛti śāstram api manu ādi upanibaddham aṣṭakā śikhā karma prapā pravartana ādi puruṣa artha sādhana upadeśyā iva dṛśyate aśrūyamāṇa phalānām apikarmaṇām phalavat tā vidhi vṛtta parīkṣāyām vakṣyate sarvaḥ hi śāstra arthaḥ puruṣa artha paryavasāyī na svarūpa niṣṭhaḥ iti purāṇa itihāsau itihāsa purāṇābhyām api upākhyāna ādi varṇanena vaidikaḥ eva arthaḥ prāyaḥ pratanyate yathā uktam itihāsa purāṇābhyām vedam samupabṛṃhayet vibheti alpa śrutāt vedaḥ mām ayam pratariṣyati iti 
NM_1,1.6.2–1,1.7.1	 tat evam veda purāṇa dharma śāstrāṇām svatas eva puruṣa artha sādhana upadeśa svabhāva tvāt vidyā sthāna tvam aṅgāni aṅgāni vyākaraṇa kalpa jyoti śiśakṣā chandaḥ niruktāni veda artha upayogi pad a ādi vyutpādana dvāreṇa vidyā sthāna tvam pratipadyante teṣām aṅga samākhyā eva tad anugāmitām prakaṭyati mīmāṃsā vicāram antareṇa avyavasthita veda vākya arthān avadhāraṇāt mīmāṃsā veda vākya artha vicāra ātmikā veda ākarasya iti kartavya tā rūpam anubhavantī vidyā sthāna tām pratipadyate tathā ca bhaṭṭaḥ dharme pramīyamāṇe tu vedena karaḥ ātmanā itikartavya tā bhāgam mīmāṃsā pūrayiṣyati iti atas eva saptamam aṅgam iti na gaṇyate mīmāṃsā pratyāsanna tvena veda eka deśa bhūta tvāt vicāra sahāyaḥ hi śabdaḥ sva artham nirākāṅkṣaṃprabodhayitum kṣamaḥ nyāya vistaraḥ 
NM_1,1.7.2	 nyāya vistaraḥ tu mūla stambha bhūtaḥ sarva vidyānām veda prāmāṇya rakṣā hetu tvāt vedeṣu hi dustārkika ra cita kutarka viplāvita prāmāṇya iṣu śithilita āsthāḥ katham iva bahu vitta vyaya āyāsa ādi sādhyam veda artha anuṣṭhānam ādriyeran sādhavaḥ kim vā svāmini parimlāne tad anuyāyinā mīmāṃsā ādi vidyā sthāna parijanena kṛtyam iti tasmāt aśeṣa duṣṭa tārkikā upamarda dvāraka dṛḍhatara veda prāmāṇya pratyaya ādhāyi nyāya upadeśaḥ kṣamam akṣapāda upadiṣṭam idam nyāya vistara ākhyam śāstram śāstra pratiṣṭhāna nibandhanam iti dhuryam vidyā sthānam kim nāma vidyā sthāna tvam 
NM_1,1.7.3–1,1.8.1	 vidyā sthāna tvam nāma caturdaśānām śāstrāṇām puruṣa artha sādhana jñāna upāya tvam eva ucyate vedanam vidyā tat ca na ghaṭa ādi vedanam api tu puruṣa artha sādhana vedanam vidyāyāḥ sthānam āśrayaḥ upāyaḥ iti arthaḥ tat ca puruṣa artha sādhana parijñāna upāya tvam kasyacid sākṣāt kasyacid upāya dvāreṇa tāni imāni caturdaśa vidyā sthānāni iti ācakṣate yathā uktam purāṇa tarka mīmāṃsā dharma śāstra aṅga miśritāḥ vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānām dharmasya ca caturdaśaḥ iti 
NM_1,1.8.2–1,1.8.3	 anyatra api uktam aṅgāni vedāḥ catvāraḥ mīmāṃsā nyāya viṃstaraḥ purāṇam dharma śāstram ca vidyāḥ hi etāḥ caturdaśaḥ iti gautama praṇīta nyāya śāstram eva vidyā sthāna gaṇa parigaṇitam pūrvatra tarka śabdena upāttam uttaratra ca nyāya vistara śabdena etat eva śāstram ucyate nyāyaḥ tarkaḥ anumānam saḥ asmin= eva śāstrevyutpādyate 
NM_1,1.8.4–1,1.8.5	 yatas sāṅkhya arhatānām tāvat kṣapaṇakānām kīdṛśam anumāna upadeśa kauśalam kiyat eva tad tarkeṇa veda prāmāṇyam rakṣyate itinā asau= iha gaṇanā arhaḥ bauddhāḥ tu yadi api anumāna mārga avagāhana naipuṇa uddhurām kandharām udvahanti tathā api veda viruddha tvāt tad tarkasya katham veda ādi vidyā sthāna madhye pāṭhaḥ anumāna kauśalam api kīdṛśam śākyānām iti padepade darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
NM_1,1.9.2–1,1.9.4	 cārvākāḥ tu varākāḥ pratikṣeptavyāḥ eva kaḥ kṣudratarkasyatadīyasya iha gaṇanā avasaraḥ vaiśeṣikāḥ punar asmad anuyāyinaḥ eva iti evam asyām janatāsu prasiddhāyām api ṣaṭtarkyām idam eva tarka nyāya vistara śabdābhyām śāstram uktam iyam eva ānvīkṣikī catasṝṇām vidyānām madhye nyāya vidyā gaṇyate ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍanītiḥ ca śāśvatī iti ānvīkṣikī śabda vyutpattiḥ 
NM_1,1.9.5–1,1.10.0	 pratyakṣa āgamābhyām īkṣitasya anvīkṣaṇam anvīkṣā anumānam iti arthaḥ tat vyutpādakam śāstram ānvīkṣikī nanu catasraḥ ced vidyāḥ tat katham caturdaśa darśitāḥ na eṣa virodhaḥ vārtā daṇḍa nītyoḥ dṛṣṭa eka prayojana tvena sarva puruṣa artha upadeśi vidyā varge gaṇanā narha tvāt trayyān vīkṣikyoḥ ca tatra nirdeśāt caturdaśa eva vidyāḥ mīmāṃsā śāstreṇa na idam śāstram caritārtham 
NM_1,1.10.1	 nanu veda prāmāṇya nirṇaya prayojanaḥ ced nyāya vistaraḥ kṛtam anena mīmāṃsāte eva tad siddheḥ tatra hi artha vicāra vat prāmāṇya vicāraḥ api kṛtaḥ eva satyam satva ānuṣaṅgikaḥ tatra mukhyaḥ tu artha vicāraḥ eva pṛthak prasthānāḥ hi imāḥ vidyāḥ sā ca vākya artha vidyā na pramāṇa vidyā iti na ca mīmāṃsakāḥ samyak veda prāmāṇya rakṣaṇa kṣamām saraṇim avalokayitum kuśalāḥ ku tarka kaṇṭaka nikara niruddha sañcāra mārga ābhāsa paribhrāntāḥ khalu te iti vakṣyāmaḥ na hi pramāṇa antara saṃvāda dārḍhyam antareṇa pratyakṣa ādīni api pramāṇa bhāvam bhajante kim uta tad adhīna vṛttiḥ eṣa śabdaḥ śabdasya hi samaya upakṛtasya bodhaka tva mātram svādhīnam artha tathā tva itara tva pariniścaye tu puruṣa mukha prekṣi tvam asya aparihāryam 
NM_1,1.11.1–1,1.11.2	 tasmāt āpta ukta tvāt eva śabdaḥ pramāṇībhavati na anyathā iti etat ca asmin= evaśāstre vyutpādayiṣya te nanu akṣapādāt pūrvam kutas veda prāmāṇya niścayaḥ āsīt atyalpam idam ucyate jaimineḥ pūrvam kena veda arthaḥ vyākhyātaḥ pāṇineḥ pūrvam kena padāni vyutpāditāni piṅgalāt pūrvam kena chanda aṃsi racitāni ādi sargāt prabhṛti veda vat imāḥ vidyāḥ pravṛttāḥ saṃkṣepa vistara vivakṣayā tu tān= tān tatra tatra kartṝn ācakṣate śāstra adhikāriṇaḥ 
NM_1,1.11.3	 nanu veda prāmāṇyam nirvicāra siddham eva sādhavaḥ manyante itikim atra vicāra yatnena na saṃśaya viparyāsa nirāsa artha tvāt yasyahi veda prāmāṇye saṃśayānā viparyastā vā matiḥ tam prati śāstra ārambhaḥ na hi vidita veda artham prati mīmāṃsā prastūyate tat uktam na anyatas veda vidbhyaḥ ca sūtravṛtti kriyā iṣyate iti 
NM_1,1.12.1–1,1.12.2	 bhavati ca catuṣprakāraḥ puruṣaḥ ajñaḥ sandigdhaḥ viparyastaḥ niścita matiḥ ca iti tatra niścita matiḥ eṣa muniḥ amunā śāstreṇaa jñasya jñānam upajanayati saṃśayān asya saṃśayam upahanti viparyasyataḥ viparyāsam vyudasyati iti tān prati yuktaḥ śāstra ārambhaḥ kutas punar asya muneḥ niścitam ati tvam jātam ucyate bhavati tāvat eṣa niścita matiḥ sa tu tapaḥ prabhāvāt vā devatā ārādhanāt vāśāstra antara abhyāsāt vā bhavatu kim anena 
NM_1,1.12.3	 tatra etat syāt tatas eva śāstra antarāt asmad ādeḥ api tattva adhigamaḥ bhaviṣyati iti kim akṣa pāda praṇītena śāstreṇa  parihṛtam etat saṅkṣepa vistara vivakṣayā śāstra praṇayanasya sāphalyāt vicitra cetasaḥ ca bhavanti puruṣāḥ iti uktam yeṣām itas eva ajñāna saṃśaya viparyayāḥ vinivartante tān pratyetat praṇayanam saphalam iti idaṃpraṇītavān ācāryaḥ 
NM_1,1.12.4–1,1.13.2	 tatra idam ādimam sūtram pramāṇa prameya saṃśaya prayojana dṛṣṭānta siddhānta avayavaḥ tarka nirṇaya vāda jalpa vitaṇḍā hetvābhāsa= chala jā tinigraha sthānānām tattva jñānāt niśreyasa adhigamaḥ śāstra ārambhe amidheya prayojana kathanam āvaśyakam nanu kimarthaḥ ayam ādi vākya ārambhaḥ kaḥ ayam praśnaḥ śāstram ced ārambhaṇīyam krama vṛtti tvāt vācaḥ prathamam avaśyam kim api vākyam prayoktavyam na hi ādi vākyam akṛtvā advitīya ādi vākya praṇayanam upapadyate iti grantha karaṇam eva āghaṭamānam syāt 
NM_1,1.13.3–1,1.13.4	 āha na khalu evam na jāne ! kintu yat eva śāstre vyutpādya tvena sthitam tat eva vyutpādyatām kim ādau tad abhidheya prayojana kīrtanena ucyate ādi vākyam prayoktavyam abhidheya prayojane pratipādayitum śrotṛ pravāha utsāha siddhaye abhidheya phala jñāna viraha astamita udyamāḥ śrotum alpam api grantham ādriyeran na sūrayaḥ 
NM_1,1.13.5–1,1.13.6	 kaḥ hi nāma vidvān avidita viṣaye niṣprayojane ca karmaṇi pravarteta āha ca bhaṭṭaḥ sarvasya eva hi śāstrasya karmaṇaḥ vā api kasyacid yāvat prayojanam na uktam tāvat tat kena gṛhyate iti prayojana parijñāna saṃbhava ākṣepa parihārau nanu prayojana parijñānam ādau śrotṝṇām kutastyam iti cintyam kim asmāt eva vākyāt uta yuktitaḥ 
NM_1,1.14.1–1,1.14.3	 vākyam tāvat aniścita prāmāṇyam katham prayojana niścayāya prabhavati saṃśayāt vā pravṛttau veda arthe api tathā eva syāt iti śāstram anārabdha vyaṃsyāt yuktitaḥ prayojana avagamaḥ śāstre sarvasmin= adhīte sati sambhavati na itarathā iti tad avagama pūrvikāyām pravṛttau itaretara āśrayaḥ śāstra adhigamāt prayojana parijñānam prayojana parijñānāt ca śāstra śravaṇe pravṛttiḥ ucyate ādi vākyāt eva śrotuḥ śāstra prayojana parijñānam artha saṃśayāt ca śravaṇe pravṛttiḥ vede hi asiddha prāmāṇye mahā kleśeṣu karmasu na anartha śaṅkayā yuktam anuṣṭhāna pravartanam 
NM_1,1.15.0	 bahu vitta vyaya āyāsa viyoga sugame adhvani pravṛtti ḥ ucita udāra phale laghu pariśrame śṛṇvante eva jānanti santaḥ katipayaiḥ dinaiḥ kim etat saphalam śāstram uta manda prayojanam sūkṣma īkṣikā tu yadi atra kriyate prathama udyame asau sakala kartavya vipralopāya kalpate ārtaḥ hi bhiṣajam pṛṣṭvā tat uktam anutiṣṭhate tasmin sa vicikitsaḥ tu vyādheḥ ādhikyam āpnuyāt tena ādi vākyāt vijñāya sa abhidheyam prayojanam tad sambhāvanayā kāryaḥ tad śāstra śravaṇa ādaraḥ upādeya tā jñāna janakam ādima vākyam iti pakṣaḥ 
NM_1,1.15.1–1,1.16.1	 yaiḥ api ādi vākyam ittham vyākhyāyate kila ananvita padārtha kaṃvākyam anupādeyam daśa dāḍima ādi vākya vat anvita padārthakam api niṣprayojanam anupādeyam eva sat asat vāyasa daśana vimarśa vākyam iva tat iha upādeya tā vyāpaka prayojana ādi anupalambhāt anādaraṇīyam iti vyāpaka anupalabdhyā pratyavatiṣṭhamānaḥ paraḥ prayojana ādi abhidhāyinā ādi vākyena nivṛtta āśaṅkaḥ kriyate iti taiḥ api prayojana pratipādanam eva ādi vākyasya arthaḥ iti uktam bhavati tad pratipādanena eva vyāpaka anupalabdhi parihārāt āśaṅkā nivāritā bhavati iti artha saṃśāyaka tayā pravartaka tvam ādi vākyasya iti pakṣa antaram 
NM_1,1.16.2	 yat api pravṛtti hetoḥ artha saṃśayasya tarka apara nāmnaḥ aucityasya vā sam utpāda nam ādi vākyena kriyate iti kecid ācakṣate tat api prayojana abhidhāna dvārakam eva prayojana viṣayaḥ hi saṃśayaḥ vā saṃbhāvanā pratyayaḥ vā pravṛtti aṅga bhūtaḥ tena utpādanīya iti tad utpattau prayojana abhidhānam eva ādi vākyasya vyāpāraḥ saṃśayaḥ tu vastu vṛtta upanataḥ eva puruṣa vacasām dvaividhya darśanāt śauca samācāra sādhu tā ādinā tutasmin sambhāvanā pratyayaḥ api lokasya bhavati iti tasmāt prayojana pratipādana artham eva ādi vākyam iti sūktam 
NM_1,1.17.0–1,1.17.2	 yat ca śrotṛ pravṛtti aṅgam tat vaktum yuktam āditas na ca prayojana jñānāt anyat asti pravartakam abhidheya kathanam api tad sādhya prayojana upapādanāya śrotṛ buddhi samādhānāya ca kartavyam eva artha ākṣiptaḥ tu sambandhaḥ phala śāstra abhidheya gaḥ tad nirdeśena siddha tvāt na sva kaṇṭhena kathyate abhidheyasya śāstrasya ca vācya vācaka bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ śāstra arthasya niḥśreyasasya ca sādhya sādhana bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ tad āśraya nirdeśāt eva siddhaḥ ṣoḍaśa padārtha uddeśaḥ 
NM_1,1.17.3–1,1.18.4	 abhidheyāḥ tu pramāṇa ādayaḥ nigraha sthāna paryantāḥ ṣoḍaśa padārthāḥ prathama sūtre nirdiṣṭāḥ teṣām svarūpam upariṣṭāt vakṣyate artha paricchitti sādhanāni pratyakṣa ādīni pramāṇāni tat paricchedyam ātma ādi prameyam nānā artha avamarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ hita ahita prāpti parihārau tad sādhanam ca prayojanam hetoḥ pratibandha avadhāraṇam dṛṣṭāntaḥ 
NM_1,1.18.5–1,1.19.0	 pramāṇataḥ abhyupagabhyamānaḥ sāmānya viśeṣavān arthaḥ siddhāntaḥ para artha anumāna vākya eka deśa bhūtāḥ pratijña ādayaḥ avayavāḥ sandigdhe arthe anyatara pakṣa anukūla kāraṇa darśanāt tasmin sambhāvanā pratyayaḥ tarkaḥ sādhana upalambha janmā tattva avabodhaḥ nirṇayaḥ vīta rāga kathā vastu nirṇaya phalāḥ vādaḥ vijigīṣu kathā tu puruṣa śakti parīkṣaṇa phalāḥ jalpaḥ tad viśeṣaḥ vitaṇḍā ahetavaḥ hetu vat ābhāsamānāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ artha vikalpaiḥ vacana vighātaḥ chalam hetu pratibimbana prāyam pratyavasthānam jātiḥ satya vastu apratibhāsaḥ viparīta pratibhāsaḥ ca nigraha sthānam sautra samāsa kathanam 
NM_1,1.19.1	 tatra vakṣyamāṇa lakṣaṇa sūtra nirdeśa anusāreṇa kānicid eka vacana antāni kānicid vahu vacana antāni padāni vigṛhītavyāni pramāṇa avayava hetvābhāsānām bahuvacanena vigrahaḥ darśayitavyaḥ śeṣāṇām eka vacanena lakṣaṇa sūtreṣu tathā nirdeśāt evañca uddeśa lakṣaṇayoḥ eka viṣaya tā nitarām darśitā bhavati itaretara yogedvandvassamāsaḥ pramāṇa ādīnām tattvam iti sambandha mātre ṣaṣṭhī tattvasya jñānam niḥśreyasasya adhigamaḥ iti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyau tattvasyajñāyamāna tvena niḥśreyasasya ca adhigamyamāna tvena karma tvāt sūtre samāsāsambhava āśaṅkā 
NM_1,1.19.2–1,1.20.1	 nanu evam vyākhyāyamāne tattva padasya pramāṇa ādi padasā apekṣa tvena asamartha tvāt asamāsaḥ prāpnoti sa apekṣam asamartham bhavati iti āhuḥ na ca idam pradhānam sa apekṣam yena bhavati vai pradhānasya sa apekṣasya api samāsaḥ iti rāja puruṣaḥ śobhanaḥ iti vat samasyate uttara padārtha pradhāna tvāt ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣasya jñānam eva atra pradhānam tattvam upasarjanam atas ca ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ itivat asamāsaḥ eva yuktaḥ 
NM_1,1.20.2–1,1.20.3	 nanu jñānam api pramāṇa ādi sāpekṣam bhavati eva tad viṣayam hi tat iti na tattva padena asya nirākāṅkṣīkṛta tvāt  tattvasya jñānam iti tat idānīm tattvam eva sa apekṣam vartate kasya tattvam iti tasmāt tattvasya upasarjanasya sataḥ sa apekṣa tvāt asamāsaḥ eva atra keṣāñcid samādhānam tad dūṣaṇam ca iti evam abhiśaṅkamānāḥ kecana tattvam ca tat jñānam ca itikarma dhārayam vyācacakṣire tat punar ayuktam jñānasya svatas tattva atattva vibhāga abhāvāt viṣaya kṛtaḥ hi jñānānām tathā abhāvaḥ atathā abhāva uvā tat etat tattva viṣaya jñānam bhavati na svatas tattva svabhāvam sva matarītyā samāsa samarthanam 
NM_1,1.20.4–1,1.21.1	 kim punar idam tattvam nāma sataḥ asataḥ vā vastunaḥ pramāṇa pariniścita svarūpam śabda pravṛtti nimittam tat iti ucyate tasyabhāvaḥ tattvam iti tat ca jñānena niścīyate tat paricchindyat jñānam tattva jñānam iti ucyate jñānasya api tad rūpam jñāna antara paricchedyam evabhavati nirṇīta tattvāḥ ca pramāṇa ādayaḥ iti vyatireka nirdeśaḥ eva yuktaḥ na ca asamāsa prasaṅga mātrāt anyathā varṇanam ucitam īdṛśānām samāsānām sāmarthya an apāyena bahuśas dṛṣṭa tvāt devadattasya guru kulam iti upasarjanam na upasarjanam iti na kāraṇam etat samāse vigraha vākya samāna artha tayā samāsaḥ bhavati sā ca iha vidyate eva vaiyyākaraṇāḥ api īdṛṃśi padāni samasyanti eva atha śabda anuśāsanam keṣām śabdānām laukikānām vaidikānām ca iti tasmāt yathābhāṣyam eva ṣaṣṭhī traya vyākhyānam anavadyam 
NM_1,1.22.0–1,1.22.2	 ṣoḍaśa padārtha tattva jñānāt niḥśreyasa adhigama upapādanam nanu ṣoḍaśa padārtha tattva jñānasya katham niśreyasa adhigama hetu tvam iti vaktavyam veda prāmāṇya siddhi artham ca idam śāstram iti tāvat mātram eva vyutpādya tām kim ṣoḍaśa padārtha kanthā granthanena ucyate ātma apavarga paryanta dvādaśavidha prameya jñānam tāvat anya jñāna anaupayikam eva sākṣāt apavarga sādhanam iti vakṣyāmaḥ tattva jñānāt mithyājñāna nirāse sati tad mūlaḥ saṃsāraḥ nivartate iti prameyaṃtāvat avaśya upādeyam 
NM_1,1.22.3–1,1.22.4	 tasya tu prameyasya ātma ādeḥ apavarga sādhanatva adhigamaḥ āgama eka nibandhanaḥ tasya prāmāṇya nirṇītiḥ anumāna nibandhanā āpta ukta tvam ca tad liṅgam avinābhāvi vakṣyate pratibandha grahe tasya pratyakṣam upayujyate kaḥ anyassantaraṇe hetuḥ anavasthā mahodadheḥ āyurveda ādi vākyeṣu dṛṣṭvā pratyakṣataḥ phalam vacaḥ pramāṇam āpta uktam iti nirṇīyate yatas upamānam tu kvacid karmaṇi sa upayogam iti evam catuṣprakāram apipramāṇam prameya vat upadeṣṭavyam 
NM_1,1.23.1	 saṃśaya ādayaḥ tu padārthāḥ yathāsambhavam pramāṇeṣu prameyeṣu ca antarbhavantaḥ api nyāya pravṛtti hetu tvāt pṛthak upadiśyante nyāyaḥ ca veda prāmāṇya pratiṣṭhāpana pūrvaka tvena puruṣa artha upayogi tvam upayāti iti darśitam tatra na anupalabdhe arthe na nirṇīte pravartate kintu saṃśayite nyāyaḥ tad aṅgam tena saṃśayaḥ prayojanam anuddiśya na ca nyāyam prayuñjate dṛṣṭāntaḥ punar etasya sambandha grahaṇa āspadam 
NM_1,1.23.2–1,1.23.3	 siddhāntaḥ api dharmi prāpaṇena āśraya asiddhi tām apa uddharat nyāyaṃpravartayati nanu saṃśaya padena nyāya viṣayam sandigdham dharmiṇam abhidadhatāa āśraya asiddhiḥ apa uddhṛtā eva satyam kvacid tu viṣaye saṃśayam antareṇa apinyāya pravṛttiḥ darśayiṣyate iti saṃśayita eka viṣaya nyāya niyama abhāvāt siddhāntaḥ api vaktavyaḥ nyāya abhidhāne avayavāḥ param pratyupayoginaḥ para artham anumānam ca tad āhuḥ nyāya vādinaḥ 
NM_1,1.24.1	 nanu pratijñā udāharaṇābhyām tad abhidheyau siddhānta dṛṣṭāntau gamyeteeva kim pṛthak upādānena  na yadi evam hetu ākhyena avayavena tad abhidheya siddheḥ anumānam api pṛthak na vaktavyam syāt evam bhavatu kiṃnaḥ chinnam mā evam abhidheye nyāye nirūpaṇīye tad abhidhāyinām avayavānām avasaraḥ iti tad arthaḥ pṛthak pratipādana arhaḥ bhavati itaratha aava yava mātra upadeśaḥ eva śāstram samāpyeta 
NM_1,1.24.2–1,1.25.2	 tarkaḥ saṃśaya vijñāna viṣayī kṛta tulya kalpa pakṣa dvaye anyatara pakṣa śaithilya samutpādanena tad itara pakṣa viṣayam pramāṇam akleśa saṃpadyamāna pratipakṣa vyudāsam anugṛhṇāti mārga śuddhim ādadhānaḥ iti pṛthak upadiśyate sa ca āśaya śuddhim upadarśayitum vāde prayokṣyate anyatara adhikaraṇa nirṇayam antareṇa na paryavasyati nyāyaḥ iti nyāya uparama kāraṇa tvena tasya pravartakaḥ nirṇayaḥ itarathā niravasānam anāsādita phalam kaḥ nāma nyāyam ārabheta tattva jñāna padena na nirṇaya lābhaḥ 
NM_1,1.25.3–1,1.26.0	 nanu tattva jñāna padena gata artha tvāt na pṛthak vaktavyaḥ nirṇayaḥ nirṇayaḥ hi tattva jñānam eva asti etat kintu ṣoḍaśa padārtha tattva jñānam pramāṇa antara karaṇakam api bhavati na tasya nyāya uparama hetu tvam eṣa tu sādhana dūṣaṇa saraṇikṣoda janmā nirṇayaḥ tad uparama hetuḥ pṛthak upādānam antareṇa na labhyate anumāna padena api na nirṇaya lābhaḥ 
NM_1,1.26.1	 nanu anumāna padāt eṣa tarhi yathā abhilaṣitaḥ lapsyate nirṇayaḥ pratibaddhāt liṅgāt liṅgini jñānam anumānam saḥ eva ca nirṇayaḥ tat ayuktam anumāna phalam nirṇayaḥ na anumānam karaṇasya pramāṇa tvāt nirṇaya upādānam antareṇa tad anumānam aphalam aparyavasitam syāt tattva jñāna anumāna padābhyām api na nirṇaya lābhaḥ 
NM_1,1.26.2–1,1.26.3	 ubhābhyām tarhi tattva jñāna anumāna padābhyām ayam ākṣepsyatenirṇayaḥ anumānasya tattva jñāna anta tvāt na nirṇaya upādānāt vināta danta tva asiddheḥ liṅga ābhāsa samuttha tattva jñāna ābhāsa sambhavāt tattva jñāna anumāna saṃśaya padaiḥ api na nirṇaya lābhaḥ nanu saṃśaya pūrvaka tvāt anumānasya sāmarthyāt nirṇaya antatā eva bhaviṣyati iti saṃśaya anumāna tattva jñāna padaiḥ gata arthaḥ nirṇayaḥ mā evam saṃśaya pūrvaka tve api anumānasya tad ābhāsa upajanita nirṇaya ābhāsa sambhavāt 
NM_1,1.26.4–1,1.27.1	 na eṣa niyamaḥ saṃśaya pūrvakam anumānam iti tasmāt anumānasya viśiṣṭa nirṇaya avasāna tva lābhāya nirṇaya padam upādeyam iti alam prasaṅgena vāde tu vicāryamāṇaḥ nyāyaḥ saṃśaya= chedanena adhya vasita avabodham adhyavasita abhyanujñām ca vidadhat tattva pariśuddhim ādadhārti iti vīta rāgaiḥ śipya sabrahmacāribhiḥ saha vādaḥ prayoktavyaḥ 
NM_1,1.27.2–1,1.27.3	 jalpa vitaṇḍe tu duṣṭa tārkikā upara cita kapaṭa dūṣaṇa āḍambara santrāsya māna saralam ati samāśvāsanena tad hṛdaya stha tattva jñāna saṃrakṣaṇāya kvacid avasare vīta rāgasya api upayujyete iti vakṣyāmaḥ hetvābhāsāḥ samyak nyāya praviveka upakāra dvāreṇa tad upayoginaḥ hetvābhāsa svarūpa avadhāraṇe hi sati tad vilakṣaṇa tayā hetavassukham avagamyante 
NM_1,1.27.4–1,1.27.5	 nanu atra viparyayaḥ dṛśyate hetu avagame sati tad itara hetvābhāsa vyavasthāpanāt satyam evam tathā api prayoktum parihartum ca dvayam apijñeyam hetavaḥ prayujyante hetvābhāsāḥ ca parihriyante iti yat ca nigraha sthāna parigaṇitāḥ api hetvābhāsāḥ punar upadiśyante tat vāde codanīyāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti āśayena 
NM_1,1.28.1	 chala ja ati nigraha sthānāni jalpa vitaṇḍa upakaraṇāni teṣām avadhṛta svarūpāṇām sva vākye parivarjanam kvacid avasare prayogaḥ para prayuktānām ca pratisamādhānam ityādi śakya kriyam atas tāni apijalpa vitaṇḍa aṅga tvāt jñātavyāni iti pṛthak upadiśyante duśśikṣita kutarka aṃśa leśa vācālita ānanāḥ śakyāḥ kim anyathā jetum vitaṇḍa āṭopa paṇḍitāḥ gatānugatikaḥ lokaḥ ku mārgam tad pratāritaḥ mā gāt iti chala ādīni prāha kāruṇikaḥ muniḥ tat evam upadeṣṭavyāḥ padārthāḥ saṃśaya ādayaḥ tad mūla nyāya nirṇeya veda prāmāṇya siddhaye tena āgama pramāṇa tva dvārā akhila phala pradā iyam ānvīkṣikī vidyā vidyā sthāneṣu gaṇyate āha ca bhāṣya kāraḥ pradīpaḥ sarva vidyānām upāyaḥ sarva karmaṇām āśraya ssarva dharmāṇām vidyā uddeśe parīkṣitāḥ 
NM_1,1.29.0–1,1.29.1	 iti eṣa ṣoḍaśa padārtha nibandhanena niḥśreyasasya muninā niradeśi panthāḥ anyaḥ tu san= api padārtha gaṇaḥ apavarga mārga upayoga virahāt iha na upadiṣṭaḥ iti uddeśa sūtra vivaraṇam tredhā śāstram pravartate trividhā ca asya śāstrasya pravṛttiḥ uddeśaḥ lakṣaṇam parīkṣā ca iti nāmadheyena padārtha abhidhānam uddeśaḥ uddiṣṭasya tattva vyavasthāpakaḥ dharmaḥ lakṣaṇam lakṣitasya tat lakṣaṇam upapadyate na vā iti vicāraḥ parīkṣā caturthaḥ api prakāraḥ atra eva antarbhavati 
NM_1,1.29.2–1,1.30.0	 nanu ca vibhāga lakṣaṇā caturthī api pravṛttiḥ asti eva bheda vat su pramāṇa siddhānta= chala ādiṣu tathā vyavahārāt satyam prathama sūtra uddiṣṭe bhedavati padārthe bhavati eva vibhāgaḥ uddeśa rūpa anapāyāt tu uddeśa eva asau sāmānya saṃjñayā kīrtanam uddeśaḥ prakāra bheda saṃjñayā kīrtanaṃvibhāgaḥ iti tathā ca uddeśa tayā eva tatra tatra bhāṣya kāraḥ vyavaharatia yathārthaḥ pramāṇa uddeśaḥ iti ākṣepe tasmāt yathārthaḥ eva pramāṇa uddeśaḥ iti samādhānam abhidadhānaḥ tasmāt trividhā eva pravṛttiḥ uddeśa ādīnām kramaḥ 
NM_1,1.30.1	 tatra uddeśaḥ prathamam avaśyam kartavyaḥ anuddiṣṭasya lakṣaṇa parīkṣā anupapatteḥ sāmānya viśeṣa lakṣaṇayoḥ api paurvāparya niyamaḥ asti eva alakṣite sāmānye viśeṣa lakṣaṇa avasara abhāvāt parīkṣā tulakṣaṇa uttara kāla bhāvinī iti tad svarūpa nirūpaṇāt eva gamyate vibhāga sāmānya lakṣaṇayoḥ tu na asti paurvāparya niyamaḥ pūrvam vā sāmānya lakṣaṇam tatas vibhāgaḥ pūrvam vā vibhāgaḥ tatassāmānya lakṣaṇam ucyatā eti tat iha uddeśaḥ tāvat vyākhyātaḥ asmābhiḥ tu lakṣaṇa sūtrāṇi eva vyākhyāsyante parīkṣā sūtra sūcitam tu vastu sa upayoga lakṣaṇa varṇanāvasaraḥ eva yathābuddhi darśayiṣyate na pṛthak parīkṣā sūtra vivaraṇa śramaḥ kariṣyate atas eva prathama sūtra anantaram duḥkha janma iti ādi dvitīya sūtram lakṣaṇa anaupayika tvāt na iha vivṛtam apavarga parīkṣā aśeṣa bhūta tvāt tu tad avasaraḥ eva nirṇayiṣyate 
NM_1,1.31.1–1,1.31.3	 pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇa vibhāga sūtram tu avasara prāpta tvāt idānīm eva vivriyate pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabdāḥ pramāṇāni pramāṇa sāmānya svarūpa lakṣaṇa ākṣepaḥ atra idam tāvat vicāryate kim pramāṇam nāma kim asya sva rūpam kim vā lakṣaṇam iti tatas sūtram yojayiṣyate pramāṇa svarūpa lakṣaṇa kathanam tat ucyate avyabhicāriṇīm asan digdhām artha upalabdhim vidadhatī bodha ābodha svabhāvā sāmagrī pramāṇam bodhā bodha svabhāvā sāmagrīhi tasya sva rūpam avyabhicāra ādi viśeṣaṇa artha upalabdhi sādhana tvaṃlakṣaṇam sāmagrayāḥ pramāṇa tva ākṣepaḥ 
NM_1,1.31.4–1,1.32.1	 nanu ca pramīyate yena tat pramāṇam iti karaṇa sādhanaḥ ayaṃpramāṇa śabdaḥ karaṇam ca sādhakatamam tam abarthaḥ ca atiśayaḥ sa cāpekṣikaḥ sādhaka antara saṃbhave hi tad apekṣayā atiśaya yogāt kiñcid sādhakatamam ucyate sāmagryāḥ ca eka tvāt tad atirikta sādhaka antara anupalambhāt kim apekṣam asyāḥ atiśayam brūmaḥ api ca kasmin viṣaye sāmagryāḥ pramāṇa tvam pramīyamāṇohi karma bhūtaḥ viṣayaḥ sāmagrī antarbhūta tvāt sāmagrī eva iti karaṇa tām evayāyāt nirālambanāḥ ca idānīm sarva pramitayaḥ bhaveyuḥ ālambana kārakasya cakṣuḥ ādi vat pramāṇa antar pāti tvāt 
NM_1,1.32.2	 kaḥ ca sāmagryā prameyam pramimīte pramātā api tasyām eva līnaḥ evañca yat ucyate pramātā pramāṇam prameyam pramitiḥ iti catasṛṣu vidhāsu tattvam parisamāpyate iti tat vyāhanyate na ca lokopi sāmagryāḥ karaṇa bhāvam anumanyate tasyām karaṇa vibhaktim aprayuñjānaḥ na hi evam vaktārobhavanti laukikāḥ sāmagryā paśyāmaḥ iti kintu dīpena paśyāmaḥ cakṣuṣā nirīkṣāmahe iti ācakṣate tasmāt na sāmagrī kāraṇam akāraṇa tvāt ca na pramāṇam iti na idam sādhu pramāṇa svarūpam sāmagryāḥ karaṇa tva siddhāntaḥ 
NM_1,1.32.3–1,1.33.2	 atra ucyate yatas eva sādhakatamam karaṇam karaṇa sādhanaḥ ca pramāṇa śabdaḥ tatas eva sāmagryāḥ pramāṇa tvam yuktam tad vyatirekeṇa kāraka antare kvacid api tam abartha saṃsparśa anupapatteḥ aneka kāraka sannidhāne kāryam ghaṭamānam anyatara vyapagame ca vighaṭamānam kasmai atiśayaṃprathacchet na ca atiśayaḥ kārya janmani kasyacid avadhāryate sarveṣāṃ tatra vyāpriyamāṇa tvāt sannipatti ajanaka tvam atiśayaḥ iti ced na ārāt upakārakāṇām apikāraka tvān apāyāt jñāne ca janye kim asannipatya janakam sarveṣām indriya manaḥ artha ādīnām itaretara saṃsarge sati jñāna niṣpatteḥ 
NM_1,1.33.3–1,1.34.1	 atha sahasā eva kārya jananam atiśayaḥ saḥ api kasyāñcit avasthāya aṃkaraṇasya iva karmaṇaḥ api śakyate vaktum yathā avirala jala dhara dhārā prabandha baddha andhakāra nivahe bahula niśīthe sahasā eva sphuratā vidyut latā aalokena kāminī jñānam ādadhānena tad janmani sa atiśaya tvam avāpyate evam itara kāraka kadamba sannidhāne sati api sīmantinīm antareṇa tad darśanaṃ na saṃpadyate āgata mātrāyām eva tasyām bhavati iti tat api karma kārakam atiśaya yogi tvāt karaṇam syāt tasmāt phala utpāda avinābhāvi svabhāva tvam avaśya tayā kārya janaka tvam atiśayaḥ sa ca sāmagrī antargatasya na kasyacid ekasya kārakasya kathayitum pāryate sāmagryāḥ tu saḥ atiśayaḥ su vacaḥ sannihitā ced sāmagrī saṃpannam eva phalam iti sā eva atiśayavatī pramātṛ prameyayoḥ sādhakatama tva abhāvāt na karaṇa tvam 
NM_1,1.34.2	 nanu mukhyayoḥ pramātṛ prameyayoḥ api tad avinābhāvi tvam atiśayaḥ asti eva pramiti sambandham antareṇa tayoḥ tathā tva abhāvāt pramiṇoti iti pramātā bhavati pramīyate iti ca prameyam satyam etat kintu sākalya prasāda labdha pramiti sambandha nibandhanaḥ pramātṛ prameyayoḥ mukhya svarūpa lābhaḥ sākalyā apacaye pramiti abhāvāt gauṇe pramātṛ prameyesaṃpadyete evañca sākalyam antareṇa yadi pramitiḥ avakalpeta bhavet vyabhicāraḥ na tu asau tathā dṛśyate iti pramiti avyabhicārāt sākalyam evasā atiśayam iti tam avartha yogāt tat eva karaṇam 
NM_1,1.35.0–1,1.35.2	 sāmagryāḥ sādhakatama tva upapādanam yat tu kim apekṣam sāmagryāḥ karaṇa tvam iti tat antargata kāraka apekṣam iti brūmaḥ kārakāṇām dharmaḥ sāmagrī na svarūpa hānāya teṣāṃ kalpate sākalyadaśāyām api tad svarūpa pratyabhijñānāt pratyeka apekṣayā sāmagrī bhinnā uta abhinnā nanu samagrebhyaḥ sāmagrī bhinnā ced katham pṛthak na upalabhyate abhede tu sarva kārakāṇi karaṇībhūtāni eva iti kartṛ karma vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ mā evam samagra sannidhāna ākhya dharmasya pratyakṣam upalambhāt 
NM_1,1.36.1	 pṛthak avasthiteṣu hi sthālī jala jvalana taṇḍula ādiṣu na samagra tā pratyayaḥ samuditeṣu tu bhavati iti atas tantu paṭala parighaṭita paṭa ādi a vayavi vat kāraka kalāpa niṣpādya dravya antara abhāve a pi samudāya ātmikā sāmagrī vidyate eva iti samudāyi apekṣayā karaṇa tām pratipadyate tasmāt na paricodanīyam idam kasmin karmaṇi sāmagrī karaṇam iti samudāyinām sāmagrī avasthāyām api svarūpa anapāyāt samudāyi viśeṣekarmaṇi sāmagrī karaṇam atas eva pramiteḥ na nirālambana tvam 
NM_1,1.36.2–1,1.37.1	 etena pramātṛ ādiḥ pṛthak upadarśitaḥ iti vidhā catuṣṭayam apisamāhitam yat tu abhyadhāyi sāmagryāḥ karaṇa vibhakti nirdeśaḥ na dṛśyate iti tatra ucyate sāmagrī hi saṃhatiḥ sā hi saṃhanyamāna vyatirekeṇana vyavahāra padavīm avatarati tena sāmagryā paśyāmi iti na vyapadeśaḥ keṣāñcid eva karaṇa tva vyavahāre hetuḥ yaḥ tu dīpa indriyāṇām tṛtīyā nirdeśaḥ sa phala upajananā vinābhāvi svabhāva tva ākhya sāmagrī sarūpa samāropaṇa nibandhanaḥ anyatra apica tad rūpa samāropeṇa sthālyā pacati iti vyapadeśaḥ dṛśyate eva tasmāt antargata kāraka apekṣayā labdha karaṇa bhāvā sāmagrī pramāṇam prakāra antareṇa karaṇa svarūpa nirūpaṇam 
NM_1,1.37.2–1,1.37.3	 apare punar ācakṣate sāmagrī nāma samuditāni kārakāṇi teṣām dvairūpyam ahṛdayaṅgamam atha ca tāni eva pṛthak avasthita anikarma ādi bhāvam bhajante atha ca tāni eva samuditāni karaṇī bhavanti itikaḥ ayam nayaḥ tasmāt kartṛ karma vyatiriktam avyabhicāra ādi viśeṣaṇaka artha pramājanakam kārakam karaṇam ucyate tat eva tṛtīyayā vyapadiśanti dīpena paśyāmi cakṣuṣā nirīkṣe liṅgena buddhye śabdena jānāmi manasā niścinomi iti nanu trīṇi eva kārakāṇi asmin pakṣe bhaveyuḥ jñāna kriyāyāṃtāvat evam eva etat yathā bhavān āha pāka ādi kriyāsu kriyā āśraya dhāraṇa ādi upakāra bheda paryālocanayā bhavatu adhikaraṇa ādi kāraka antara vyavahāraḥ pramitau tu manaḥ dīpa cakṣuḥ ādeḥ na lakṣyate viśeṣaḥ iti tat sarvam karaṇa tvena sammatam 
NM_1,1.38.2	 kaḥ teṣu tam avarthaḥ iti ced asti kaścid yat ayam lokaḥ aham mayā jānāmi ghaṭena ghaṭam jānāmi iti na kartṛ karmaṇī vismṛtyā api karaṇa tvena vyapadiśati nayana manaḥ dīpa śabda liṅgāni tutathā vyapadiśati saḥ ayam eṣām paśyati kartṛ karma vailakṣaṇyam cakṣuḥ ādīnām tad vailakṣaṇyam eva ca teṣām atiśayaḥ iti tat ayam iha pramāṇam pramātā prameyam pramitiḥ iti caturvargaḥ eva vyavahāraḥ parisamāpyate tasmāt kartṛ karma vilakṣaṇā saṃśaya viparyaya rahita artha bodha vidhāyinī bodha ābodha svabhāvā sāmagrī pramāṇam iti yuktam bauddha sammata pramāṇa svarūpa nirākaraṇam 
NM_1,1.38.3–1,1.39.1	 ye tu bodhasya eva pramāṇa tvam ācakṣate na sūkṣma darśinaḥ te bodhaḥ khalu pramāṇasya phalam na sākṣāt pramāṇam karaṇa artha abhidhānaḥ hipramāṇa śabdaḥ pramīyate anena iti pramāṇam pramīyate iti kaḥ arthaḥ pramā janyate iti pramāṇāt avagacchāmaḥ iti vadantaḥ laukikāḥ karaṇasya eva prāmāṇyam anumanyante yaḥ tu pramā pramāṇam iti pramāṇa śabdaḥ sa pramāṇa phale draṣṭavyaḥ tathā ca saṃśaya viparyaya ātmakam apramāṇa phalam api jñānam ātma manaḥ anumāne tad viśeṣaṇa artha paricchede vā viśiṣṭa pramā jananāt pramāṇa tām pratipadyate avyabhicāra ādi viśeṣaṇa upapannam api jñānam aphala janakam apramāṇam eva kevala pramā svabhāvam pramāṇāt vibhinnam phalam iti pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe vakṣyāmaḥ 
NM_1,1.39.2	 atha vyatirikta phala janakam api bodha rūpam eva pramāṇam ucyate tat ayuktam sakala jagat vidita bodha itara svabhāva śabda liṅga dīpa indriya ādi parihāra prasaṅgāt tasmāt sāmagrī anupraviṣṭaḥ bodhaḥ viśeṣaṇa jñānam iva kvacid pratyakṣe liṅga jñānam iva liṅgi pramitau sārūpya darśanam iva upamāne śabda śravaṇam iva tad artha jñāne pramāṇa tām pratipadyate atas eva bodhā bodha svabhāvā sāmagrī pramāṇam iti uktam bauddha eka deśi mata nirākaraṇam 
NM_1,1.40.2	 anye tu tulya sāmagrī adhīnayoḥ jñāna arthayoḥ grāhya gāhaka bhāvaṃvat antaḥ bodham pramāṇam abhyupāgaman kṣaṇa bhaṅgiṣu padārtheṣu saha kārī upādāna kāraṇa apekṣa kṣaṇa antara santati jananena ca lokayātrām udvahat su jñāna janmani jñānam upādāna kāraṇam arthaḥ sahakāri kāraṇam artha janmani ca arthaḥ upādānakāraṇam jñānam ca sahakāri kāraṇam iti jñānaṃca jñāna artha janyam arthaḥ ca artha jñāna janyaḥ bhavati iti evam ekasāmagrī adhīna tayā tam artham avyabhicarataḥ jñānasya tatra prāmāṇyam iti 
NM_1,1.40.3–1,1.40.4	 tat idam anupapannam aphala janakasya pramāṇa tva anupapatteḥ iti ukta tvāt api ca karmaṇi jñānam pramāṇam iṣyate yathā uktam sa vyāpāram iva ābhāti vyāpāreṇa sva karmaṇi iti sa ca ayam artha kṣaṇaḥ jñāna sama kālaḥ tatas pūrvābhyām jñāna artha lakṣaṇābhyām upajanitaḥ iti tad karma tām pratipadyatām na punar sva samāna kāla prasūta jñāna kṣaṇa karma tām iti 
NM_1,1.40.5–1,1.41.1	 nanu ca tulya sāmagrī adhīna tayā samāna kāla tayā ca tat avyabhicāra siddhau satyām kva karma tvam upayujyate hanta tarhi saha utpannayoḥ samāna sāmagrīkayoḥ grāhya grāhaka niyamaḥ kiṃkṛtaḥ iti vaktavyam jñānam sva prakāśa svabhāvam iti grāham arthaḥ jaḍa ātmā iti grāhyam iti ced ayam api viśeṣaḥ tulya kālayoḥ kutastyaḥ upādāna sahakāri kāraṇa bhedāt iti ced na tasya kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt bauddha eka deśi mata antara nirākaraṇam 
NM_1,1.41.2	 ye api nirākārasya bodha svarūpasya nīla pīta ādi aneka viṣaya sādhāraṇa tvāt janakatvasya ca cakṣuḥ ādau= api bhāvena atiprasaṅgāt tad ākāra tva kṛtam eva jñāna karma niyamam avagacchantaḥ sa ākāram jñānaṃpramāṇam iti pratipedire te api vijñāna advaitasiṣā dhayiṣayā evam abhidadhānāḥ tad nirāsa prasaṅgaḥ eva nirasiṣyante na hi ekam eva sa ākāraṃjñānam grāhyam grāhakam ca bhavitum arhati iti vakṣyate 
NM_1,1.41.3–1,1.42.1	 arthaḥ tu sa ākāra jñāna vādinaḥ na samasti eva sa hi anumeyaḥ vāsyāt pratyakṣaḥ vā na anumeyaḥ sambandha grahaṇa abhāvāt arthe hi sati sa ākāram nirākāram tat atyaye nitya anumeya bāhya artha vādī jñānam kva dṛṣṭavān na api pratyakṣaḥ arthaḥ ākāra dvaya anupalambhāt abhyupagameca anavasthā prasaṅgāt artha ākāraḥ hi nirākāra jñāna gamyaḥ na bhavati iti jñānena ākāravatā gṛhyate saḥ ayam idānīm jñāna ākāraḥ api grāhya tva ātanyena ākāravatā gṛhyate saḥ api anyena iti 
NM_1,1.42.2	 atha vai arthaḥ nirākāra jñāna grāhya tām na upayāti iti sva grāha kejñāna ātmani samarpita ātmā bhavati iti sa ākāram jñānam eva idam saṃpannamiti punar arthaḥ anyaḥ kalpanīyaḥ saḥ api grāhya tvāt sva grāhakasya sa ākāra tva siddhaye tatra eva līyate iti sa ākāram jñānam eva avaśiṣyate iti punar anyaḥ arthaḥ iti ittham anavasthā pratikarma vyavasthā tu janakatva nibandhanā bhaviṣyati vastu svabhāvasya aparyanuyojya tvāt sa ākāra pakṣe api paryanuyoga sāmyam ityādi sarvam upariṣṭāt sa vistaram abhidhāsyate sa ākāra pakṣe api ca na pramāṇāt vyatiriktaṃphalam upadarśitam iti asat pakṣaḥ eva ayam prākaṭya liṅgena jñānam anumīyate 
NM_1,1.42.3–1,1.43.1	 śāvarāḥ tu bruvate yaḥ ete bodha prāmāṇya vādinaḥ vijñānāt abhinnam eva phalam abhidadhati te bāḍham nirasanīyāḥ bhavanti eva vayam tu vijñānāt bhinnam eva phalam dṛṣṭatā ākhyam abhyupagacchāmaḥ tena eva tat anumīyate jñānam hi nāma kriyā ātmakam kriyā ca phala anumeyāḥ jñātṛ vyāpāram antareṇa phala aniṣpatteḥ 
NM_1,1.43.2^1	 saṃsargaḥ api kārakāṇām kriyā garbhaḥ eva bhavati tad anabhyupagamekim adhikṛtya kārakāṇi saṃsṛjyeran na ca asaṃsṛṣṭāni tāni phalavanti kriyā veśavaśāt ca kārakam kārakam bhavati aparathā hi tat vastu svarūpa mātram eva syāt na kārakam tatas ca na phala arthibhiḥ upādīyeta iti vyavahāra vilopaḥ tasmāt yathā hi kārakāṇi taṇḍula salila anala sthālya ādīni siddha svabhāvāni sādhyam dhātu artham ekam pāka lakṣaṇa murarīkṛtya saṃsṛjyante saṃsṛṣṭāni ca kriyām utpādayanti tathā aatma indriya manaḥ artha sannikarṣe sati jñāna ākhyaḥ vyāpāraḥ upajāyate 
NM_1,1.43.2^2	 sa ca na pratyakṣaḥ arthasya eva bahis deśa sambaddhasya grahaṇāt ākāra dvaya pratibhāsā bhāvāt agṛhītasya api tasya cakṣuḥ ādi vat upāya tvāt parokṣaḥ api ca asau viṣaya prakāśa tā lakṣaṇena phalena kalpyate tat āha bhāṣya kāraḥ na hi ajñāte arthe kaścid buddhim upalabhate jñātetu anumānāt avagacchati iti vārtika kṛtā api uktam na anyathā hi artha sadbhāvaḥ dṛṣṭa ssan= upapadyate jñānam ced na iti atas paścāta pramāṇam upakalpyate iti tat eṣa phala anumeyaḥ jñātṛ vyāpāraḥ jñāna ādi śabda vācyaḥ pramāṇam indriya ādīnām tu tad utpādaka tayā indriya vyāpāre jñānam upacarati na sākṣāt iti jñānasya nitya parokṣa tva nirāsaḥ 
NM_1,1.44.2–1,1.45.2	 atra pratividhīyate aho bata ime kebhyaḥ bibhyataḥ śrotriyāḥ param kim api vaiklavyam upāgatāḥ ! na khalu nityam parokṣam jñānam bhavitum arhati jñātaḥ arthaḥ iti kvacid tad dvi śiṣṭa artha pratyavamarśa darśanāt viśeṣaṇa agrahaṇe śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti vat viśiṣṭa pratīteḥ anutpādāt kaḥ ca ayam iyān saṃtrāsaḥ ! viṣaya grahaṇa kāle vijñāna agrahaṇa mātrakeṇa bāhya artha nihnava vādinaḥ śākyāḥ śakyāḥ śamayitum jñānam na kriyā rūpam 
NM_1,1.45.3–1,1.45.4	 yat tu kriyā svabhāva tvāt tasya parokṣa tvam tat ayuktam na hikriyā svabhāvam jñānam api tu phala svabhāvam eva kriyā rūpam api jñānam na nitya parokṣam api ca kriyā api pratyakṣa dravya vartinī pratyakṣā eva bhāṭṭānāṃpratyakṣaḥ ca ātmā tat kim anena aparāddham yat etat īya kriyāyāḥ apratyakṣa tvam ucyate na ca utkṣepaṇa ādi bheda bhinna parispanda ātmaka vyāpāra vyatirekeṇa bāhya kārakeṣu api sūkṣmā nāma kācid asti kriyā sā hi yadi nityāḥ jāti vat atha anityāḥ rūpavat vastu dharmaḥ iṣyeta 
NM_1,1.46.1–1,1.46.2	 tatra yadi nityāḥ tarhi sarvadā vastunaḥ kriyā yogāt sarvadā phala niṣpatti prasaṅgaḥ atha kāraka nirvartyā kriyā sā api idānīṃkārya tvāt sa vyāpāra kāraka kāryā bhavet iti anavasthā niṣkriya kāraka kārya tve tu kriyām iva phalam api niṣkriyāṇi eva kārakāṇikuryuḥ iti kim kriyayā nanu karoti iti kārakam kriyā aaveśam antareṇa ca kāraka tva anupapattiḥ satyam karoti iti kārakam tat tu phalam eva karoti na kriyām 
NM_1,1.46.3	 nanu karoti iti yat brūṣe seya muktā eva kriyā bhavati caitraḥ kaṭaṃkaroti iti caitrasya iva kaṭasya iva karoti arthasya apratyākhyeya tvāt tad kṛtam eva caitra ādīnām kāraka tvam ucyate na ati indriya kriyā yoga nibandhanaḥ kāraka bhāvaḥ kriyāyāḥ atīndriya tvena tad yoga kṛta kāraka tvān adhigame vyavahāra vipralopa prasaṅgāt kriyā aaveśa kṛtam hitat kāraka tvam anavagacchantaḥ katham phala arthinaḥ tad upādadīran 
NM_1,1.47.0	 mad pakṣe kāraka tvam hi na asti kiñcid ati indriyam kāraka tvam svarūpasya saha kārya ādi sannidhiḥ tāvat eva viniścitya tat upādīyate arthibhiḥ tat eva upādadānaiḥ ca phalam api adhigamyate nirvyāpārasya sattvasya kaḥ guṇaḥ saha kāribhiḥ sa vya apārasya sattvasya kaḥ guṇaḥ saha kāribhiḥ atha vyāpāraḥ eva eṣa sarvaissambhūya sādhyate kim phalena aparāddham vaḥ tat hi sambhūya sādhyatām bhautika kriyā eva karoti arthaḥ 
NM_1,1.47.1	 yat tu karoti arthasya apratyākhyeya tvāt iti uktam tatra ucyate parispandaḥ eva bhautikaḥ vyāpāraḥ karoti arthaḥ na hi vayam parispanda ātma kaṃparidṛśyamānam vyāpāram apahnumahe pratikārakam vicitrasya jvalana ādeḥ vyāpārasya pratyakṣam upalambhāt atīndriyaḥ tu vyāpāraḥ na asti itibrūmahe bhautika kriyā atirikta kriyā asadbhāva tadabhāvau 
NM_1,1.47.2–1,1.48.1	 nanu pākaḥ nāma dhātu arthaḥ paridṛśyamāna jvalana ādi vyāpāra vyatiriktaḥ eṣitavyaḥ eva tam antareṇa phala niṣpatteḥ abhāvāt asati ca tasmin kim adhikṛtya kārakāṇi saṃsṛjyeran= iti uktam tat ayuktam yam tam ekam dhātu artham sādhyam budhyase sa kim samudita sakala kāraka sampādyaḥ ekaika kāraka nirvartyaḥ vā tatra ādya pakṣaḥ ekaikam bhavet kārakam akriyam ekaika niṣkriya tve ca sākalye api kutas kriyā 
NM_1,1.48.2	 uttarasmin pakṣe pratyekam api pāka kriyā yogāt kāraka antara nirapekṣāt ekasmāt kārakāt phala niṣpatti prasaṅgaḥ na ca tathāvidha dhātu artha purassaraḥ kārakāṇām saṃsargaḥ kriyā nimitta saṃsarga vādinaḥ hi dvayī gatiḥ satyām kriyāyām sambandhaḥ sambandhe sati vā kriyā melanāt pūrva siddhāyām kriyāyām melanena kim tathā ca janyeta phalam vibhaktaiḥ api kārakaiḥ 
NM_1,1.49.0–1,1.49.1	 melanāt tu kriyā siddhau punar ekaikam akriyam tathā sati na kāṣṭhāni jvaleyuḥ piṭharāt vinā nanu piṭharāt vinā kāṣṭhāni jvalanti na tu pacanti mā evam sati api piṭhare jvalanti eva kāṣṭhāni na anyat kurvanti dṛśyante tasmāt kriyā antara abhāvāt phalam eva urarīkṛtya kārakāṇi saṃsṛjyante phalam anyat kriyā ca anyā 
NM_1,1.49.2–1,1.50.1	 nanu phalam api siddham ced kaḥ sarveṣām siddha svabhāvānām sambandhaḥ phalam siddham kārakāṇi siddhāni iti sambandha abhāvaḥ sādhyam ced phalam sā eva kriyā parispanda vyatiriktā iti mā evam vocaḥ phalasya kriyā tva anupapatteḥ odanam hi phalam na kriyā kriyā nāmni tu kriyamāṇe na vivadāmahe pacati ityādau pāka śabda arthaḥ 
NM_1,1.50.2	 nanu pākaḥ idānīm kaḥ na ca paceḥ vāci aśūnyatā eva yuktāḥ ucyate samudita devadatta ādi sakala kāraka nikara parispandaḥ eva viśiṣṭa phala avacchinnaḥ pākaḥ iti ucyate saḥ eva hi paceḥ arthaḥ tāeva kāṣṭha piṭhara ādi kriyāḥ jvalana bharaṇa ādi svabhāvāḥ pṛthaktayā avyavasthitaḥ tathā tvena eva avabhāsante samuditāḥ tu satyaḥ phala antara avacchedāt rūpa antareṇa pāka ādinā parisphuranti vyapadiśyanta ica tathā ca devadattaḥ pacati iti vat kāṣṭhāni pacanti sthālī 
NM_1,1.51.1–1,1.51.2	 pacati iti vyapadeśaḥ dṛśyate devadattasya api darvī vighaṭṭana ādiḥ eva paridṛśyamānaḥ tatra vyāpāraḥ na tatas anyaḥ sūkṣmaḥ ātmanaḥ na kriyā nanu devadatta ādeḥ bhautikaḥ vyāpāraḥ ātma vyāpāra pūrvakaḥ bhavitum arhati na etat evam na hi ātmanaḥ vyāpāraḥ kaścid asti icchā dveṣa pūrvaka prayatna vaśāt eva sa bhautika vyāpāra karaṇa tām pratipadyate tasmāt kāraka cakreṇa calatā janyate phalam na punar calanāt anyaḥ vyāpāraḥ upalabhyate calantaḥ devadatta ādyāḥ tad anantara modanaḥ etāvart duśyate tu atra na tu anyā kācana kriyā 
NM_1,1.52.0–1,1.52.1	 bhāvanā api na puruṣa vyāpāraḥ etena bhāvanā ākhyaḥ karoti arthaḥ puruṣa vyāpāraḥ vākya arthaḥ itiyaḥ abhyupagataḥ saḥ api pratyuktaḥ veditavyaḥ na hi puruṣa vyāpāraḥ kaścid upalabhyate viśiṣṭa guṇa samavāyaḥ eva asya kartṛ tvam na cajñāna ādayaḥ guṇāḥ eva vyāpāra saṃjñā vācyāḥ siddha svabhāva tvāt jñānam na kriyā rūpam 
NM_1,1.52.2–1,1.52.3	 nanu kriyā vacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti jānāteḥ api kriyā eva vācyā syāt sā ca kriyā jñāna ātmā puruṣa vyāpāraḥ na ayam niyamaḥ kriyā vacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti gaḍi vadana eka deśe iti api darśanāt api ca ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti atra bhavataḥ kim pratibhāsate ghaṭam iti tāvat viṣayaḥ aham iti ātmā jānāmi iti tu cintyam krimatra prakāśate iti na vyāpāraḥ parokṣa tvāt phalam yat yatra prakāśate tat eva tarhi dhātu vācyam abhyupagatam bhavati tasmāt na kriyā ātmakam jñānam 
NM_1,1.53.1	 yadi ca kriyā ātmakam jñānam abhaviṣyat na bhāṣya kāraḥ kriyātaḥ pṛthak enam niradekṣyata nirdiśati ca buddhi karmaṇī api hi pratyabhijñāyete te api nitye prāpnutaḥ iti tasmāt anyat jñānam anyā cakriyā iti na kriyā svabhāva tvāt nityam parokṣam jñānam nitya parokṣasya jñānasya anumeya tvam api na saṃbhavati 
NM_1,1.53.2–1,1.53.5	 yadi ca nitya parokṣaḥ jñātṛ vyāpāraḥ sa tarhi pratibandha agrahaṇāt anumātum api na śakyaḥ kriyā viśiṣṭa vāhya kāraka siddhāntasya nirasta tvāt ātma ādi anumāne kā vārtā iti ced na tatra sāmānyatovyāpti grahaṇasya saṃbhavāt iti vakṣyāmaḥ iha tu bāhya kārakeṣu api na tat pūrvakam phalam dṛṣṭam iti uktam na ca arthāpattiḥ api jñātṛ vyāpāra kalpanāya eva prabhavati indriya artha sannikarṣa vaśāt eva artha dṛṣṭa tāyāḥ ghaṭamāna tvāt prākaṭya svarūpa pariśīlanam kā ca iyam arthasya dṛṣṭa tā nāma kim darśana karmatā kim vā aprakāśa svabhāva tā iti tatra darśanasya parokṣa tvāt katham tat karma tā arthasya dṛṣṭa tā gṛhyeta viśeṣaṇa agrahaṇe viśiṣṭa pratīteḥ anutpādāt artha prakāśa tāyāḥ tu sarvān pratyaviśeṣāt sarve sarvajñāḥ syuḥ 
NM_1,1.54.1	 na syuḥ sambandhitaya utpādāt iti ced akāraṇam etat arthasya eva hi prakāśa tvam atiśayaḥ dīpa ādeḥ iva na puruṣa niyamena vyavatiṣṭhate na ca dvi tva ādinā sāmyam tasmin niyama darśanāt prakāśe tu na dīpa ādau sambandha niyamaḥ kvacid yad apekṣā dhiyāḥ jātaṃdvi tvam tasya eva tad grahaḥ saṃvedanam api prājñaiḥ kasya atiśayaḥ ucyate jñātuḥ ced antarā anyena vyāpāreṇa asya kaḥ guṇaḥ nanu na eva kriyā śūnyam kārakam phala siddhaye uktam atra kriyā hi eṣā yathādarśanam iṣyatām jñānam saṃvedanam ca iti vidmaḥ paryāya śabda tām saṃvedanam tu jñānasya phala tvena na manmahe artha atiśaya pakṣe ca sarva sarvajña tā punar 
NM_1,1.55.0	 bhaṭṭapakṣāt viśeṣaḥ ca na kaścid kathitaḥ bhavet na ubhayā atiśayaḥ api eṣaḥ doṣa dvitaya sambhavāt saṃvedanam ca tat kena grāhyam jñāna anumāpakam anavasthā bhavet asya jñāne saṃvedana antarāt sva saṃvedyā ca saṃvittiḥ upariṣṭāt niṣetsyate smṛti pramoṣa vāde ca rajata smaraṇa ātmikā katham te phala saṃvittiḥ sva prakāśā bhaviṣyati na ābhāti smṛti rūpeṇa na ca api anubhava ātmanā na tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ asti tat katham sā prakāśatām na ca kvacid anākārā saṃvittiḥ anubhūyate iyam saṃvid ayam ca arthaḥ iti na asti hi bheda dhīḥ artha ākāra anuraktā tu yadi saṃvid prakāśate 
NM_1,1.56.0–1,1.56.1	 vāhya artha nihnavaḥ tarhi tvayā saugata vat kṛtaḥ sva prakāśa mate yuktam na phalam saṃvid ātmakam tasmāt phala anumeyasya vyāpārasya na mānatā gṛhīta grahaṇe api prāmāṇyam vartate eva yat api pramāṇa viśeṣaṇam anadhigata artha grāhi tvam abhidhīyate paraiḥ tat api na sāṃpratam pramāṇasya gṛhīta tad itara viṣaya pravṛttasya prāmāṇye viśeṣa abhāvāt 
NM_1,1.56.2	 nanu gṛhīta viṣaye pravṛttam pramāṇam kim kuryāt agṛhīte apikim kuryāt pramām iti ced gṛhīte api tām eva vidhattām kṛtāyām karaṇa ayogāt iti ced na pramā antara karaṇāt pramā antara karaṇe kim phalam iti ced pramā antara karaṇam eva phalam na caphalasya phalam mṛgyam na ca prayojana anuvarti pramāṇam bhavati 
NM_1,1.57.1	 kasya ca eṣa paryanuyogaḥ na pramāṇasya acetana tvāt puṃsaḥ tu sannihite viṣaye karaṇe ca saṃbhavanti jñānāni iti saḥ api kim anuyojya tām ! kim akṣiṇī nimīlya na āsse kasmāt dṛṣṭaṃviṣayam paśyasi iti pramāṇasya tu na kiñcid bādham paśyāmaḥ yena tadapramāṇam iti vyavasthāpayāmaḥ na ca sarva ātmanā vaiphalyam heyea hi kaṇṭaka vṛka makara viṣa dhara ādau viṣaye punar punar upalabhyamāne manassantāpāt sa tvaram tad apahānāya pravṛttiḥ upādeye api candana ghana sāra hāra mahilā ādau paridṛśyamāne prīti atiśayaḥ sva saṃvedyaḥ eva bhavati dhārāvāhi vijñānāni samāna viṣayāṇi eva 
NM_1,1.57.2–1,1.58.1	 yat ca idam ucyate yatra api syāt paricchedaḥ pramāṇaiḥ uttaraiḥ punar nūnam tatra api pūrveṇa saḥ arthaḥ na avadhṛtaḥ tathā iti tat api na hṛdayaṅgamam yatas na eva adhika paricchedaḥ pramāṇaiḥ uttaraiḥ dhruvam dhārāvāhika bodheṣu kaḥ adhikaḥ arthaḥ prakāśate na hi sva haste śata kṛtvas api paridṛśyamāne kecana viśeṣāḥ parisphuranti 
NM_1,1.58.2–1,1.58.3	 nanu gṛhīte api viṣaye pravartamānam pramāṇam kadā viramet na hitasya viratau kañcit avadhim adhigacchāmaḥ pramā utpādaḥ tu avadhiḥ anena laṅghitaḥ eva ucyate viṣaya antara samparkāt vā āśramāt vā upāya saṅkṣayāt vā virāmaḥ bhaviṣyati anavasthā api ca iyam na mūla ghātinī na hi uttarottara vijñāna upajananam vinā prathama jñāna utpādaḥ vihanyate mūla kṣati karīm āhuḥ anavasthām hi dūṣaṇam mūla siddhau tu arucyā api na anavasthā nivāryate yadi ca anupalabdha artha grāhi mānam upeyate tat ayam pratyabhijñāyāḥ spaṣṭaḥ eva jala añjaliḥ 
NM_1,1.59.0	 yaḥ ca id ānīnta na astitva prameya ādhikya lipsayā tasyāḥ pramāṇa tām āha saḥ api vañcayati iva naḥ āvināśaka sadbhāvāt astitvam pūrvayā dhiyā spaṣṭam eva tathā ca āha cira sthāyi iti gṛhyate tasmāt anupalabdha artha grāhi tve tyajyatām grahaḥ smṛteḥ prāmāṇya vāraṇam nanu etasmin parityakte prāmāṇyam syāt smṛteḥ api na smṛteḥ apramāṇa tvam gṛhīta grāhita akṛtam api tu anartha janya tvam tad aprāmāṇya kāraṇam smṛteḥ anartha jatvā upapādanam 
NM_1,1.59.1–1,1.60.0	 nanu katham anartha jā smṛtiḥ tad ārūḍhasya vastunaḥ tadānīm asattvāt katham tarhi bhūta vṛṣṭi anumānam na anartha jam tatra dharmiṇaḥ anumeya tvāt tasya ca jñāna janakasya tatra bhāvāt nadī ākhyaḥ eva dharmī vṛṣṭi mat u paritana deśa saṃsarga lakṣaṇena dharmeṇa tat vā an anumīyate viśiṣṭa salila pūra yogi tvāt sa ca anumāna grāhyaḥ dharmī vidyataeva iti na anartha jam anu mānam prātibham jñānam artha janyam eva 
NM_1,1.60.1	 katham tarhi prātibham anāgata artha grāhi śvas me bhrātā aagantāiti pratyakṣam arthajam iṣyate bhavadbhiḥ tatra deśa antare vartamānasya bhrātuḥ śvobhāvya āgamana viśeṣitasya eva tathā eva grahaṇam tena ca rūpeṇa gṛhyamāṇasya sataḥ tasya jñāna janaka tvam iti artha jam eva prātibham smaraṇam tu nirdagdha pitṛ ādi viṣayam anapekṣita artham eva jāyamānam dṛṣṭam itianyatra deśa antara sthita artha smaraṇe tad artha sattvam akāraṇam eva tasmāt anartha ja tvena smṛti prāmāṇya vāraṇāt agṛhīta artha gantṛ tvam na pramāṇa viśeṣaṇam 
NM_1,1.61.0–1,1.61.1	 anadhigata artha gantṛ tvam prāmāṇya svarūpam na jaimini sammatam śabdasya anupalabdhe arthe prāmāṇyam ca āha jaiminiḥ sarva pramāṇa viṣayam bhavadbhiḥ varṇyate katham dharma kīrti ukta pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇa pariṣkaraṇam apare punar avisaṃvādaka tvam pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇam ācakṣate tat uktam pramāṇam avisaṃvādi jñānam iti 
NM_1,1.61.2	 avisaṃvādaka tvam ca prāpaka tvam ucyate jñānasya prāpaka tvam sukha duḥkha sādhana samartha padārtha prāpti parihāra hetu bhūtāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ nimitta pradarśaka tvam eva jñāna pradarśite hi viṣaye pravṛttau satyām prāptiḥ bhavati iti prāptim prati pramāṇasya pradarśaka tvam eva vyāpāraḥ pradarśayatāhi tena saḥ arthaḥ prāpitaḥ bhavati yathā hantavyam prati rājñām ājñā dānam eva hantṛ tvam tat uktam prāpaṇa śaktiḥ prāmāṇyam iti loke api ca pradarśitam vastu prāpayataḥ pramāṇa tva vyavahāraḥ 
NM_1,1.62.2–1,1.62.3	 tat ca prāpaka tvam pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ ubhayoḥ api asti iti pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇam tatra pratyakṣasya vastu sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya tvāt tasya ca kṣaṇika tvena prāpti asambhave a pi tad santāna prāpteḥ santāna adhyavasāya jananam eva prāpaka tvam anumānasya tu āropita artha viṣaya tve api mūla bhūta vaḥ tu kṣaṇa pāramparya prabhava tvāt maṇi prabhā maṇi buddhi vat tad prāptyā prāpaka tvam 
NM_1,1.63.1	 tad ida madhya vasita prāpaka tvam prāmāṇyam adhyavasitasya avastu tve apitat mūla vastu prāptyā nirvahati yathā adhyavasita prāpakam ca pramāṇam iti matam atas ca pīta śaṅkha ādi grāhiṇām śaṅkha ādi mātra prāptau satyām apina prāmāṇyam yathā adhyavasitasya aprāpteḥ avagataḥ hi pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ prāpyate ca śvetaḥ iti tasmāt yathā avagata artha prāpaka tvam avisaṃvādaka tvam prāmāṇyam iti dharma kīrti ukta pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇa dūṣaṇam 
NM_1,1.63.2–1,1.63.4	 tat etat anupapannam idam eva tāvat bhavān vyācaṣṭām ! kiṃpradarśita prāpakam pramāṇam uta adhya vasita prāpakam tatra anumāne pradarśanam eva na asti kā kathā tad prāpaṇasya !pratyakṣe tu bāḍham pradarśanam asti na tu pradarśitam prāpyate kṣaṇika tvena atikrānta tvāt adhyavasita prāpaka tvam api durghaṭam adhyavasāyasi abhavat mate vastu viṣaya tva abhāvāt avastunaḥ ca prāptum aśakyatvāt tat uktam bhavadbhiḥ yathā adhyavasāyam atattva tvāt yathātattvam ca anadhyavasāyāt iti 
NM_1,1.63.5–1,1.64.2	 mūla bhūta vastu prāptiḥ tu kākatālīyam na tu tad anyatareṇa apipramāṇena api spṛṣṭam yat gatvā prāpyate santāna prāptyā tad prāptiḥ iti api na yuktam santānasya bheda abheda vikalpābhyām anupapanna tvāt etat ca sa vistaram kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge nirūpayiṣyate pramāṇasya sāṃvṛta satya tva nirāsaḥ nanu kālpanike api santāne sati saṃvṛttyā pramāṇa lakṣaṇam idaṃnirvakṣyate yathā uktam sāṃvyavahārikasya etat pramāṇasya lakṣaṇam 
NM_1,1.65.1–1,1.65.3	 vastu tas tu anādya vidyā vāsanā aaropita grāhya grāhaka ādi bheda prapañcam jñāna mātram eva idam iti kim prāpyate kaḥ vā prāpayati iti saḥ ayam palāyana prakāraḥ iva prastūyate kā iyam saṃvṛtiḥ nāma sā api satī asatī vā iti vikalpyamānā na eva vyavahāra hetuḥ bhavati avidyā vāsanā kṛtaḥ ca na bheda vyavahāraḥ kintu pāramārthika eva iti sādhayiṣyate 
NM_1,1.65.4–1,1.65.5	 sāṃvṛta santāna kalpa nāmām vā jātya vayavi prabhṛtayaḥ api sāṃvṛtāḥkim iti na iṣyante vṛtti vikalpa ādi bādhaka upahata tvāt iti ced santāne api samānaḥ panthāḥ iti kadāśa ālambanam etat tasmāt asambhavi darśita prāpaka tvam iti alakṣaṇam etat avyāptam ca dharma kīrti uktam pramāṇa lakṣaṇam avyāpakam ca idam lakṣaṇam upekṣaṇīya viṣaya bodhasya avyabhicāra ādi viśeṣaṇa yogena labdha pramāṇa bhāvasya api anena asaṅgrahāt 
NM_1,1.66.1	 nanu kaḥ ayam upekṣaṇīyaḥ nāma viṣayaḥ sa hi upekṣaṇīya tvāt evana upādīyate ced sa tarhi heyaḥ eva anupādeya tvāt iti na etat yuktam upekṣaṇīya viṣayasya sva saṃvedya tvena apratyākhyeya tvāt heya upādeyayoḥ asti duḥkha prīti nimitta tā yatnena hāna upādāne bhavataḥ tatra dehinām yatna sādhya dvaya abhāvāt ubhayasya api asādhanāt tābhyām visadṛśam vastu sva saṃviditam asti naḥ upādeye ca viṣaye dṛṣṭe rāgaḥ pravartate itaratra tu vidveṣaḥ tatra ubhau= api durlabhau anupādeya tva mātrāt na heya tvam 
NM_1,1.66.2–1,1.67.0	 yat tu anupādeya tvāt heyaḥ eva iti tad aprayojakam na hi evam bhavati yat etat napuṃsakam sa pumān astrī tvāt strī vā anapuṃsakam apuṃstvāt iti strī puṃbhyām anyat eva napuṃsakam tathā upalambhāt evam upekṣaṇīyaḥ api viṣayaḥ heya upādeyābhyām artha antaram tathā upalambhāt iti yat etat tṛṇa parṇa ādi cakāsti pathi gacchataḥ na dhīḥ chatra ādi vat tatra na ca kākodara ādi vat 
NM_1,1.67.1–1,1.68.0	 tasmāt upekṣaṇīya jñānasya tam aprāpayataḥ api prāmāṇya darśanāt na prāpaka tvaṃ tad lakṣaṇam artha pradarśaka tva mātra paryavasitam artha prāpaka tvam tu jñānasya vyabhicaritam nanu yāvān pramāṇasya vyāpāraḥ prāpaṇam prati tāvān upekṣaṇīye api viṣaye tena sādhitaḥ uktam hi rājñām ādeṣṭṛ tvam eva hantṛ tvam pradarśaka tvam eva jñānasya prāpaka tvam iti mā evam evam pradarśaka tvam syāt kevalam tasya lakṣaṇam tat ca pracalat arka aṃśu jala jñāne api dṛśyate antatas sva lakṣaṇa jñānasya api prāmāṇyam durupapādam 
NM_1,1.68.1	 nanu tatra viparīta adhyavasāya jana nāda prāmāṇyam darśanam himarīci svalakṣaṇa viṣayam eva salila adhyavasāyam tu janayat apramāṇībhavati tathā hi ekam eva darśanam anukūla itara vikalpa upajanana tad anutpāda bhedāt tridhā kathyate pramāṇam apramāṇam pramāṇam ca na bhavati iti nīla jñānam hi nīlam prati pramāṇam nīlam id abhiti anukūla vikalpa upajananāt nīla avyatireki kṣaṇika tvam api tena gṛhītam eva tatra tu pramāṇam na bhavati anukūla itara vikalpa anutpādāt sthairye tutada pramāṇam viparīta adhyavasāya kaluṣita tvāt iti 
NM_1,1.68.2	 yadi evam asmin prakrame sutarām idam pramāṇa lakṣaṇam dusstham santāna adhyavasāyaḥ prāpaṇam prati pramāṇasya vyāpāraḥ iti ca varṇitavān asi atas ca yathā marīci sva lakṣaṇa darśanam udaka adhyavasāya jana nāda pramāṇam evam sva lakṣaṇa darśanam api tad viparīta santāna adhyavasāya jana nāda pramāṇībhavet iti santāne ca kālpanike vyavasita īdṛśya abhimukhaḥ kim iti pravartate 
NM_1,1.69.0–1,1.70.0	 dṛśya vikalpyau= arthau= ekīkṛtya pravartate yadi vā avivekāt prāptiḥ syāt pramāṇam api dūratas tasyāḥ tasmāt na prāpakam pramāṇam bauddha abhimata pramāṇa lakṣaṇa dūṣaṇa upasaṃhāraḥ api ca prāpti aprāptī puruṣa icchā mātra hetuke bhavataḥ artha pratītiḥ eva pramāṇa kāryā avadhāryate tasmāt mānasya lakṣaṇam atas kathayadbhiḥ tad viśeṣaṇam vācyam na punar prāpaṇa śaktiḥ prāmāṇyam kathayitum yuktam sāṅkhya abhimata pramāṇa lakṣaṇam sāṅkhyāḥ tu buddhi vṛttiḥ pramāṇam iti pratipannāḥ viṣaya ākāra pariṇata indriya ādi vṛtti anupātinī buddhi vṛttiḥ eva puruṣam uparañjayantī pramāṇam tad uparaktaḥ hi puruṣaḥ pratiniyata viṣaya draṣṭā saṃpadyate tad nirāsaḥ 
NM_1,1.70.1	 tat etat ahṛdayaṅgamam yaḥ hi jānāti budhyate adhyavasyati na tasya tad phalam artha darśanam acetana tvāt mahataḥ yasya ca artha darśanam na sa jānāti na budhyate na adhyavasyati iti bhinna adhikaraṇa tvam pramāṇa phalayoḥ jñāna ādi dharma yogaḥ pramāṇam puṃsi na vidyate tad phalam artha darśanaṃbuddhau na asti iti atha svaccha tayā puṃsaḥ buddhi vṛtti anupātinaḥ buddheḥ vā cetana ākāra saṃsparśaḥ iva lakṣyate evam sati sva vācā eva mithyātvam kathitam bhavet cit dharmaḥ hi mṛṣā buddhau buddhi dharmaḥ citau mṛṣā sa ākāra jñāna vādāt ca na atīva eṣa viśiṣyate tvad pakṣaḥ iti atas amuṣya tad niṣedhāt niṣedhanam nirasiṣyate ca sakalaḥ kapila muni prakriyā prapañcaḥ ayam tasmāt na tad mate api pramāṇam avakalpate kiñcid 
NM_1,1.71.0–1,1.71.2	 pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇa parīkṣā upasaṃhāraḥ tīrtha antara abhihita rūpam atas pramāṇaṃna eva apavāda rahitam pratitarkayāmaḥ tena amala pramiti sādhanam indriya ādi sākalyam eva niravadyam uśanti mānam iti pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇa parīkṣā pramāṇa vibhāgaḥ tat caturvidham pramāṇam tat āha sūtrakāraḥ pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabdāḥ pramāṇāni 
NM_1,1.71.3	 iha hi bhedavataḥ prathama sūtra uddiṣṭasya trayam vaktavyam sāmānya lakṣaṇam vibhāgaḥ viśeṣa lakṣaṇam ca tatra viśeṣa lakṣaṇa pratipādakā nicatvāri sūtrāṇi bhaviṣyanti indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam ityādīni iha tu vibhāga sāmānya lakṣaṇe pratipādyete ekena anena sūtreṇa dvayam ca āha mahā muniḥ pramāṇeṣu catussaṅkhyam tathā sāmānya lakṣaṇam pramāṇeyatta anirṇayaḥ 
NM_1,1.71.4–1,1.72.2	 pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabda sannidhāne pramāṇa śrutiḥ uccarantī catvāri eva pramāṇāni iti darśayati nanu na catvāri pramāṇāni iti saṅkhyā vacanaḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate na api pratyakṣa ādīni eva iti avadhāraṇa śrutiḥ asti tad kutas iyattā niyama avagamaḥ śabda śakti svabhāvāt iti brūmaḥ gargān bhojaya yajñadatta devadattau= ānayaḥ iti vinā saṅkhyā śabdam eka vāram ca bhavati eva dvi tva ādi niyama avagamaḥ evam iha api pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabdāḥ pramāṇāniiti ukte sāmarthyāt nyūna adhika saṅkhyā vyavacchedaḥ avadhāryate iti evaṃtā vat vibhāga avagamaḥ 
NM_1,1.72.3–1,1.72.5	 sāmānya lakṣaṇantu pramāṇa padāt eva samākhyā nirvacana sāmarthya sahitāt avagamyate pramīyate yena tat pramāṇam iti karaṇa artha abhidhāyinaḥ pramāṇa śabdāt pramākaraṇam pramāṇam iti avagamyate tat ca prāk eva darśitam prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam iti ca madhyesādhya sādhana grahaṇam upādadānaḥ sūtrakāraḥ sarva pramāṇa sādhāraṇam rūpam idaṃparibhāṣate yad sādhya sādhanasya pramākaraṇasya pramāṇa tvam iti 
NM_1,1.73.1	 aśuddha pramiti vidhāyinaḥ tu prāmāṇyam prasajyate iti smṛti saṃśaya viparyaya janaka vyavacchedāya pratyakṣa sūtrāt artha utpannam iti avyabhicāri iti vyavasāya ātmakam iti ca pada trayam ākṛṣyate tat hi pramāṇa catuṣṭaya sādhāraṇam artha utpanna padena phala viśeṣaṇena smṛti janakam avyabhicāri padena viparyaya ādhāyi vyavasāya ātmaka padena saṃśaya jana kaṃpramāṇam vyudasyate 
NM_1,1.73.2–1,1.73.3	 atas ca evam uktam bhavati artha viṣayam asandigdham avyabhicāri cajñānam yena janyate tat pramāṇam iti evam ekasmāt eva sūtrāt sāmānya lakṣaṇam vibhāgaḥ ca avagamyate ekasya eva sūtrasya vibhāga sāmānya lakṣaṇa para tvam yujyate eva nanu ! ekasya sūtrasya vibhāga sāmānya lakṣaṇa paratvena vākya medaḥ artha eka tvāt ca ekam vākyam yuktam 
NM_1,1.73.4–1,1.74.1	 ucyate śruti artha dvāraka aneka vastu sūcana śāliṣu sūtreṣu aneka artha vidheḥ vākya bhedaḥ na dūṣaṇam pramāṇa antara saṃsparśa śūnye śabda eka gocare prameye vākya bheda ādi dūṣaṇam kila dūṣaṇam artha dvaya vidhānam hi tatra ekasya na yujyate sūtre vākya bheda doṣa abhāva upapādanam rājā svārājya kāmaḥ vājapeyena yajeta iti guṇa vidhi pakṣe svārājyam prati yāgaḥ vidhātavyaḥ yāgam prati ca vājapeya guṇaḥ vidhātavyaḥ iti ekasya vākyasya paraspara viruddha vidhi anuvāda ādi rūpa āpatteḥ artha dvaya vidhānam ati durghaṭam 
NM_1,1.74.2	 iha punar pramāṇa antara pariniścita artha sūcana cāturya mahā argheṣu sūtra iṣu nānā artha vidhānam bhūṣaṇam bhavati na dūṣaṇam aneka artha sūcanā deva sūtram ucyate etat eva sūtra kārāṇām param kauśalam yat ekena eva vākyena svalpaiḥ eva akṣaraiḥ aneka vastu samarpaṇam adhyāhāreṇa vā tantreṇa vāāvṛttyā vā tam artham pratyāyayiṣyati sūtram idam iti na doṣaḥ vibhāga sāmānya lakṣaṇayoḥ kathane na paurvāparya niyamaḥ 
NM_1,1.74.3–1,1.75.1	 vibhāga sāmānya lakṣaṇayoḥ vidhāne paurvāparya niyamaḥ viśeṣa lakṣaṇa vat na asti iti tantreṇa yugapad ubhaya abhidhānam api na viruddhyate viśeṣa lakṣaṇam anukte sāmānya lakṣaṇe vaktum ayuktam iti tatra eṣa niyamaḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇa vibhāgayoḥ tu yathāruci pratipādanam ādau vibhāgaḥ tatas sāmānya lakṣaṇam ādau vā sāmānya lakṣaṇam tatas vibhāgaḥ siddhānta= chala vat ubhayam vā yugapad eva pratipādyate iti tantreṇaāvṛttyā vā tad upapādane na kaścid doṣaḥ iti pramāṇa saṅkhyā viṣaya vipratipattiḥ āstām tāvat idam sūtre tantra āvṛtti ādi cintanam catussaṅkhyā pramāṇeṣu nanu na kṣamyate paraiḥ 
NM_1,1.75.2	 nyūna adhika saṅkhyā pratiṣedhena hi catvāri pramāṇāni pratiṣṭhāpyeran sa ca durupapādaḥ tathā hi pratyakṣam eva ekam pramāṇa miti cārvākāḥ pratyakṣa anumāne dve eva iti bauddhāḥ pratyakṣam anumānam āpta vacanam ca iti trīṇi pramāṇāni iti sāṅkhyāḥ ādhikyam api pramāṇānāṃmī māṃsaka prabhṛtayaḥ pratipannavantaḥ tat katham catvāri eva pramāṇa ani iti vibhāga niyamaḥ samādhānam 
NM_1,1.75.3–1,1.76.1	 ucyate anumāna prāmāṇyam varṇayantaḥ bārhaspatyam tāvat upariṣṭāt pratikṣepsyāmaḥ śabdasya ca anumāna vailakṣaṇyam tad lakṣaṇa avasaraḥ eva vakṣyate iti śākya pathaḥ api na yuktaḥ atra bauddhānām ākṣepaḥ pramāṇa dvaividhya nidānam nanu etat bhikṣavaḥ na kṣamante te hi prameya dvaividhyāt pramāṇam dvividham jaguḥ na anyaḥ pramāṇa bhedasya hetuḥ viṣaya bhedataḥ 
NM_1,1.76.2–1,1.76.3	 viṣayaḥ ca pratyakṣa parokṣa bhedena sva lakṣaṇa sāmānya bhedena vādvividhaḥ eva paraspara parihāra vyavasthita ātmasu padārtheṣu tṛtīya rāśī anupraveśa abhāvāt tṛtīya viṣaya asattva paricchedaḥ eva kutasya iti ced pratyakṣa mahimnaḥ eva iti brūmaḥ nīle pravartamānam pratyakṣam nīlam nīla tayā aparicchinatti iti tāvat avivādaḥ eva tat eva pratyakṣam anīlam api vyavacchinatti nīla saṃvidi tasya apratibhāsāt nīla jñāna pratibhāsyaṃhi nīlam iti tad itarada nīlam eva bhavati 
NM_1,1.76.4–1,1.77.2	 tṛtīyam api rāśim atas eva tat apākaroti saḥ api hi rāśiḥ nīla saṃvidi bhāti na vā bhāti ced nīlam eva syāt na prakāra antaram tu tat no ced tathā api anīlam syāt na prakāra antaram hi tat idam eva hi nīla ānīlayoḥ lakṣaṇam yat nīla jñāna avabhāsya tva anavabhāsya tve nāma evam ca pratyakṣam sva viṣaye pravṛttam tam pratyakṣa tayā vyavasthāpayati tatra apratibhāsamānam parokṣa tayā tṛtīyam api prakāram pūrvavat eva pratikṣipati iti 
NM_1,1.77.3	 evam sva lakṣaṇa sāmānya vyatirikta viṣaya niṣedhe api eṣaḥ eva mārgaḥ anugantavyaḥ evam hi pratyakṣeṇa sva viṣayaḥ pariniścitaḥ bhavati tat uktam tat paricchinatti anyat vyavacchinatti tṛtīya prakāra abhāvam ca sūcayati iti eka pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ iti anyathā viṣayasya eva svarūpa apariniścayāt kva upādāna parityāgau kuryuḥ artha kriyā arthinaḥ 
NM_1,1.77.4–1,1.78.1	 tat uktam anala arthi analam paśyan= api na tiṣṭhet na pratiṣṭheta iti nirvikalpasya tri mukha tva abhāve api na doṣaḥ yadi api nirvikalpakam pratyakṣam puras avasthita vastu sva lakṣaṇa pradarśana mātra niṣṭhita vyāpāram avicārakam eva tathā api tad pṛṣṭha bhāvināṃvikalpānām eva ca darśana viṣaye kṛta pariccheda taditara viṣaya vyavaccheda tṛtīya prakāra abhāva vyavasthāpana paryanta vyāpāra pāṭavam avagantavyam itarathāḥ vyavahāra abhāvāt ukta arthe anumāna upanyāsaḥ 
NM_1,1.78.2	 evam ca paraspara parihāra vyavasthita svarūpa padārtha vyavacchedi pratyakṣa prabhāva avagata virodhi tvāt pratyakṣa itara viṣayayoḥ tṛtīya viṣaya asattva pariniścaye anumānam api pravartitum utsahate viruddhayoḥ ekatara pariccheda samayedvitīya nirasanam avaśyam bhāti viruddha tvāt eva śīta uṣṇa vat tṛtīya viṣayaḥ api tad viruddhaḥ eva tad buddhau= apratibhāsamāna tvāt 
NM_1,1.79.0–1,1.79.2	 tattva tad anya tvābhyām tṛtīyaḥ rāśiḥ na asti eva nanu na tvam dvitīyam iva tṛtīyam kadācid api viṣayam agrahīḥ grahaṇe hi viṣaya dvaya vat tasya api sattvam syāt agṛhītasya ca virodham avirodham vā katham niścetum arhasi iti bhoḥ sādho ! na atra pṛthak grahaṇam upayujyate tad buddhi anavabhāsa mātreṇa eva tad virodha siddheḥ viruddham hi tat ucyate yat tasmin gṛhyamāṇe na gṛhyate tat idam agrahaṇam eva virodhāvaham iti na pṛthak grahaṇam anveṣaṇīyam 
NM_1,1.79.3–1,1.80.0	 evam itaretara parihāra vyavasthitānām arthānām na tṛtīyaḥ rāśiḥ asti iti sarvathā siddham viṣaya dvaividhyam evam eva sat asat nitya anitya krama yaugapadi a ādiṣu prakāra antara parākaraṇam avagantavyam tatra pratyakṣe sva lakṣaṇa ātmani viṣaye pratyakṣam pravartate parokṣe tusāmāni a ākāre anumānam iti pramāṇa dvaya siddhe ca viṣaya dvaya vedane vada kasya anurodhena tṛtīyam mānam iṣyatām parokṣe śabda ādīnām na avakāśaḥ 
NM_1,1.80.1–1,1.80.2	 na ca asmin= eva parokṣe sāmānya ātmani viṣaye anumānam iva śabda ādi api pramāṇa antaram pravartate iti vaktum yuktam ekasmin viṣayevirodha viphala tvābhyām aneka pramāṇa pravṛtti anupapatteḥ pūrva pramāṇa avagata rūpa yogi tayā tasmin vastuni punar paricchidyamāne pramāṇam uttaram aphalam eva syāt evam hi āhuḥ adhigatam artham adhigamayatā pramāṇena piṣṭam piṣṭam syāt iti anya rūpa tayā tu tad grahaṇam uttara pramāṇena duśśakam ādya pramāṇa viruddha tvāt iti atas eva na saṃplavam abhyupagacchanti nīti vidaḥ ekasmin viṣaye aneka pramāṇa pravṛttiḥ saṃplavaḥ sa ca tathāvidha viṣaya nirāsāt eva nirastaḥ na ca pratyakṣa anumāne parasparam api saṃplavete sva lakṣaṇe anumānasya sāmānye pratyakṣasya ca pravṛtti abhāvāt 
NM_1,1.81.0	 sambandha grahaṇa apekṣam anumānam sva lakṣaṇe sajātīya vijātīya vyāvṛtte vartatām katham pratyakṣam api sat vastu saṃsparśa niyata vratam vikalpa āropita ākāra sāmānya grāhakam katham yat ca śabda upamāna ādi pramāṇa antaram iṣyate tat evam sati kutra aṃśe pratiṣṭhām adhigacchatu vastu sva lakṣaṇam tāvat pratyakṣeṇa eva mudritam tatas anyat anumānena sambandha apekṣa vṛttinā nānā pramāṇa gamyaḥ ca viṣayaḥ na asti vāstavaḥ tat vā anavayavī jātiḥ iti vārta ekabhadrikā 
NM_1,1.81.1–1,1.82.0	 yadi ca pratyakṣa viṣaye śabda anumānayoḥ api vṛttiḥ ipyate tarhi pratyakṣa saṃvid sadṛśīm eva te api buddhim vidadhātām na ca evam asti tad āhuḥ samāna viṣaya tve ca jāyate sadṛśī matiḥ na ca adhyakṣa viyā sāmyam eti śabda anumāna dhīḥ tejaḥ anyat eva nakṣatra śaśāṅka śakala ādiṣu uddhāṭita jagat kośam anyat eva raveḥ mahaḥ 
NM_1,1.82.1–1,1.82.3	 āha ca anya deva indriya grāhyam anyaḥ śabdasya gocaraḥ śabdāt pratyeti bhinna akṣaḥ na tu pratyakṣam īkṣate api ca anyathā eva agni sambandhāt dāham dagdhaḥ abhimanyate anyathā dāha śabdena dāha arthaḥ saṃpratīyate tasmāt uktena vartmanā viṣaya dvaividhya niścayāt na tṛtīyam pramāṇam asti na ca saṃplavaḥ iti 
NM_1,1.83.0–1,1.83.1	 siddhāntaḥ atra abhidhīyate yat tāvat idam ākhyāyi rāśi antara nirākṛtau pratyakṣasya eva sāmarthyam iti etat na upapadyate pūrva apara anusandhāna sāmarthya rahita ātmanā bhāraḥ katham ayam boḍhum avikalpena pāryate vikalpāḥ punar utprekṣā mātra niṣṭhita śaktayaḥ tebhyaḥ vastu vyavasthāyāḥ kā kathā bhavatām mate 
NM_1,1.83.2	 athavā bhavatu nāma nīlāt ābuktena prakāreṇa rāśi antara nirākaraṇam pratyakṣa parokṣa bhāva nirṇaye tu na eṣa prakāra yojayitum śakyate viṣaye hi pravṛttam pratyakṣam viṣaya svarūpam eva paricchinatti na punar tasya pratyakṣatām api nīlam idam iti hi saṃvedyate na punar pratyakṣam idam iti tathā hi kim idam viṣayasya pratyakṣa tvam nāma kim akṣa viṣaya tvam uta akṣaja jñāna viṣaya tvam iti tatra akṣa viṣaya tvam tāvat anvaya vi atireka samadhigamyam eva na pratyakṣa gamyam tathā aaha bhaṭṭaḥ 
NM_1,1.84.0–1,1.84.1	 na hi śrāvaṇatā nāma pratyakṣeṇa avagamyate sā anvaya vyatirekābhyām jñāyate badhira ādiṣu iti akṣaja jñāna karma tvam api pratyakṣa tvam tadānīm paricchettam aśakyam eva viṣaya pratibhāsa kāle tad pratibhāsasya apratibhāsāt tad grahaṇam antareṇa ca tad karma tā grahaṇa asaṃbhavāt viṣaya bhāna daśāyām jñānam na bhāti 
NM_1,1.84.2–1,1.84.3	 katham punar viṣaya grahaṇa kāle tad pratibhāsasya apratibhāsaḥ na eva yuga pada ākāra dvitayam pratibhāsate idam jñānam ayam ca arthaḥ iti bheda anupagrahāt ekaḥ ca ayam ākāraḥ pratibhāsyamānaḥ grāhyasya eva bhavitum arhati na grāhakasya iti vakṣyate jñāna apratibhāse api viṣaya pratibhāsaḥ yujyate eva nanu ca na agṛhītam jñānam artha prakāśana kuśalam bhavati āhuḥ apratyakṣa upalaṃbhasya na artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasiddhi ati iti 
NM_1,1.85.1–1,1.85.2	 tat ayuktam apratyakṣa upalaṃbhasya eva artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasiddhyati pratyakṣa upalambhasya tu na artha dṛṣṭiḥ upalambhe eva pratyakṣaḥ iti dvitīya ākāra anavabhāsāt kutas artha dṛṣṭiḥ yadi ca gṛhītam jñānam artham prakāśayet na dvayīm gatim ativarteta tat hi jñānam jñāna antara grāhyam vā bhavet sva prakāśam vā jñāna antara grāhya tve tu anavasthā mūla kṣati karī ca iyam iti andhamū kaṃjagṛt syāt upalambha pratyakṣatā pūrvaka artha pratyakṣa vādinaḥ na api sva prakāśam jñānam jñeya tvāt nīla pīta ādi vat vistarataḥ tu sva prakāśaṃvijñānam vijñāna vādi nirākaraṇe nirākariṣyāmaḥ 
NM_1,1.85.3	 na ca jñānasya apratyakṣatāyām tad utpāda an utpādayoḥ aviśeṣāt ajña tvaṃsarvajña tvam vā pariśaṅkanīyam vijñāna utpāda mātreṇa jñātuḥ jñātṛ tva siddheḥ viṣaya prakāśana svabhāvam eva jñānam utpadyate iti katham utpannam anutpanna anna viśiṣyate yathā ca nīla ādi viṣaya jñāna utpattyā asya jñātṛ tvaṃtathā sukha ādi viṣaya jñāna utpattyā bhoktṛ tvam iti tatra api na ati prasaṅgaḥ 
NM_1,1.86.1	 tasmāt viṣaya vijñāna kāle tad vijñāna agrahaṇāt na tad karma tva kṛtaṃviṣaya pratyakṣa tvam avabhāsate tad apratibhāse ca na parokṣa vyavacchedaḥ na catṛtīya prakāra asattva sūcanam iti katham pratyakṣam viṣaya dvi tva siddhau pramāṇam viṣaya dvaividhya sādhaka anumāna dūṣaṇamyat ca anumānam api uktam viṣaya dvaya siddhaye tat pratyakṣa paricchinna tad virodha nibandhanam virodha bodha sāmarthyam pratyakṣasya ca dūṣitam tad agrahe ca tad mūlam anumānam na siddhyati evañca viṣaya dvi tva sādhana anupapattitaḥ tad kṛtaḥ tyajyatām eṣa pramāṇa dvi tva doha daḥ viṣaya dvaividhyam api na pramāṇa dvaividhya niyāmakam 
NM_1,1.86.2–1,1.87.1	 atha vā sati api viṣaya dvaividhye sāmagrī bhedāt phala bhedāt ca pramāṇa bhedaḥ bhavan katham apākriyate! anye eva hi sāmagrī phale pratyakṣa liṅgayoḥ anye eva ca sāmagrī phale śabda upamānayoḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ tena tad bhedāt api pramāṇa bheda siddheḥ na dve eva pramāṇe sāṅkhya sammata pramāṇa tritva nirāsaḥ etena trīṇi pramāṇāni iti sāṅkhya vyākhyātā api tad saṅkhyā pratyākhyātāḥ sāmagrī phala bhedena upamānasya caturtha pramāṇasya pratipādayiṣyamāṇa tvāt pramāṇa saṃplavaḥ na doṣaḥ 
NM_1,1.87.2	 yat punar ekasmin viṣaye aneka pramāṇa prasaram nirasyatā saugatena saṃplava parākaraṇam akāri tat api mati moha vilasitam asati saṃplavea numāna prāmāṇya pratiṣṭhāpana anupapatteḥ na hi avijñāta sambandham liṅgam gamakam iṣyate sambandha dhīḥ ca sambandhi dvaya avagati pūrvikā sāmānya ātmaka sambandhi grahaṇam ca anumānataḥ tasmāt eva yadīṣyeta vyaktam anyonya saṃśrayam anumāna antara adhīnā sambandhi graha pūrvikā sambandha adhigatiḥ na syāt manvantara śataiḥ api tena dūre api sambandha grāhakam liṅga liṅginoḥ pratyakṣam upagantavyam tathā ca sati saṃplavaḥ 
NM_1,1.88.0–1,1.88.2	 bauddha mate anumāna upapatti varṇanam tad nirākaraṇam ca tatra etat syāt avidita saugata kṛta antānām etat ca udyam te hi vikalpa viṣaye vṛttim āhuḥ śabda anumānayoḥ tebhyaḥ saṃbandha siddhau ca na anavasthā na saṃplavaḥ tathā hi darśana samanantara utpatti avāpta darśana= chāyā aturajyamāna vapuṣaḥ vikalpāḥ pratyakṣāyante tad ullikhita ka alpa nikata ditara parāvṛtta svabhāva sāmānya ākāra pratiṣṭaḥ ayam anumāna vyavahāraḥ pāramparyeṇa maṇi prabhā maṇi buddhi vat tad mūlaḥ iti tad prāptaya avakalpate na punar pratyakṣa eka samadhigamyam vastu spṛśati iti kutas saṃplava kutas vā anavasthā 
NM_1,1.88.3–1,1.89.1	 tat etat vañcanā mātram yaḥ hi tādātmya tad utpatti svabhāva pratibandhaḥ iṣyate sa kim vastu dharmaḥ vikalpa āropita ākāra dharmaḥ vā tatra nāyam āropita dharmaḥ bhavitum arhati vastu vastunā janyate vastu ca vastu svabhāvam bhavet tasmāt vastu dharmaḥ pratibandhaḥ vikalpaiḥ cavastu na spṛśyate tad pratibandhaḥ ca niścīyate iti citram 
NM_1,1.89.2	 idam ca su bhāṣitam ! vastunoḥ pratibandhaḥ tādātmya ādiḥ gamya gamaka tvam ca vikalpa āra upitayoḥ apohayoḥ tat evam anyatra pratibandhaḥ anyatra tad grahaṇa upāyaḥ anyatra pratītiḥ anyatra pravṛtti prāptī iti sarvam kaitavam na ca dṛśya saṃsparśa śūnya ātmanām vikalpānām darśana= chāyā kācana saṃbhavati idantā grāhi tva saṃspaṣṭa tva ādi api vastu saṃsparśa rahitam akiñcitkaram apramāṇa tva anapāyāt apramāṇa paricchinnaḥ pratibandhaḥ ca tattvataḥ na paricchinnaḥ eva iti tatas mithyā anumeya dhīḥ atha abhimatam eva idam buddhi ārūḍha tva varṇanāt hanta ! tāttvika saṃbandha sādhana vyasanena kim  
NM_1,1.90.0–1,1.90.1	 anumāne pramāṇa saṃplavaḥ sarvathā durvāraḥ yathā ca sāmānya viṣaye pratyakṣa abhyupagamam antareṇa sambandha grahaṇam aghaṭamānam iti visaṃṣṭhulam anumānam evam avagata saṃmbandhasya dvitīya liṅga darśanam api durupapādam iti tatas api saṃplavā palāpinām anumānam utsīdet na hi asādhāraṇa aṃśasya liṅga tvam upapadyate vinā na ca anumānena sāmānyam avagamyate sā eva anavasthā tatra api saḥ eva anyaḥ anya saṃśrayaḥ saḥ eva ca vikalpānām sāmarthya śamana kramaḥ atas sambandha vijñāna liṅga grahaṇa pūrvakam anumānam anihnutya katham saṃplava nihnavaḥ viṣaya dvaividhya aṅgīkāre api pramāṇa saṃplavaḥ durvāraḥ 
NM_1,1.90.2–1,1.91.0	 api ca viṣaya dvaividhya siddhau= api pratyakṣa anumāne eva parasparam api saṃplaveyātām yatas pratyakṣa tvam parokṣaḥ api pratyakṣaḥ api parokṣatām deśa kāla ādi bhedena viṣayaḥ pratipadyate kṣaṇa bhaṅgam niṣetsyāmaḥ santānaḥ yaḥ ca kalpitaḥ darśita prāpti siddhi ādau saṃplave api sa tādṛśaḥ jāti a vayavi prabhṛtīnām sthirāṇām sattvāt pramāṇa saṃplavaḥ durvāraḥ 
NM_1,1.91.1–1,1.91.2	 yat api jāti ādi viṣaya niṣedha manorathaiḥ saṃplava parākaraṇa madhya vasitam tatra jāti ādi samarthanam eva uttarīkariṣyati tāvakaiḥ dūṣaṇa gaṇaiḥ kāluṣyam apanīyate tat vā anavayavī jātiḥ iti vārtā eva bhadrikā gṛhīta grāhi tve api na aprāmāṇyam yat api virodha vaiphalyābhyām na saṃplavaḥ iti uktam tatra vaiphalyam anadhigata artha gantṛ tva viśeṣaṇa nivāraṇena eva pratisamāhitam virodhaḥ api na asti pūrva jñāna upamardenana idam rajatam itivat uttara vijñāna anutpādāt aneka dharma visara viśeṣita vapuṣi dharmiṇikadācid kenacid kaścid niścīyate dharma viśeṣaḥ iti kaḥ virodha arthaḥ 
NM_1,1.92.0–1,1.92.2	 samāna viṣaya tve api śabda liṅgayoḥ vilakṣaṇa pratīti janaka tvam yat api pratyakṣasya śabda liṅgayoḥ ca samāna viṣaya tve sati sadṛśa pratīti janaka tvam āśaṅkitam tatra kecid ācakṣate viṣaya sāmye api upāya bhedāt pratīti bhedaḥ bhavati eva dūra avidūra deśa vyavasthita padārtha pratīti vat anye tu manyante na upāya bhedāt pratīti bhedaḥ bhavati api tuviṣaya bhedāt eva sannikṛṣṭa viprakṛṣṭa grahaṇe api viṣayau bhidyete dūrāt sāmānya dharma mātra viśiṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ grahaṇam adūrāt tu sakala tadgata viśeṣa sākṣāt karaṇam tat imāḥ pratyakṣa anumāna śabda pramitayaḥ prameya bhedāt bhidyante viśeṣa dharma saṃbaddham vastu spṛśati netra dhīḥ vyāpti bodha anusāreṇa tadvat mātram tu laiṅgikī śabdāt tad tad avacchinnā vācye san jāyate matiḥ śabda anuvedha śūnyā hi na śabda arthe matiḥ bhavet 
NM_1,1.93.0–1,1.93.2	 pratyakṣa ādīnām viṣaya vailakṣaṇye api saṃplavaḥ api asti eva katham tarhi teṣām saṃplavaḥ sarvatra viṣaya bhedasya darśita tvāt satyam dharmī abhiprāyeṇa saṃplavaḥ kathyate imau tu pakṣau pratyakṣa lakṣaṇevistaraśaḥ vicārayiṣyete sarvathā tāvat asti pramāṇānām saṃplava eti siddham bhāṣya ukta pramāṇa saṃplava udāharaṇam tad udāharaṇam tu bhāṣya kāraḥ pradarśitavān agniḥ āpta upadeśāt pratīyate amutra iti pratyāsīdatā dhūma darśanena anumīyate pratyāsannatareṇa upalabhyate ityādi bhāṣya ukta pramāṇa vyavasthā udāharaṇam 
NM_1,1.93.3	 kvacid tu vyavasthā dṛśyate yathā agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti asmad ādeḥ āgamāt eva jñānam na pratyakṣa anumānābhyām stanayitnu śabda śravaṇāt tad hetu parijñānam anumānāt eva na pratyakṣa āgamābhyām sva hasta ādau pratyakṣāt eva pratītiḥ na śabda anumānābhyām iti tasmāt sthitam etat prāyeṇa pramāṇāni prameyam abhisaṃplavante kvacid tu prameye vyavatiṣṭhante api iti pramāṇa saṃplava upasaṃhāraḥ iti uddhṛta akhila para udita doṣa jāta saṃpāta bhītiḥ iha saṃplavaḥ eṣa siddhaḥ sarvāḥ ca saugata manassu viraprarūḍhāḥ bhagnāḥ pramāṇa viṣaya dvaya siddhi vāñchāḥ 
NM_1,1.94.0–1,1.94.5	 pramāṇa saṃkhyā ādhikya parīkṣā evam tāvat nyūna tvam saṅkhyāyāḥ parīkṣitam ādhikyam idānīṃ parīkṣyate tatra arthāpattyā saha pratyakṣa ādīni pañca pramāṇāni iti prābhākaraḥ abhāvena saha ṣaṣ iti bhāṭṭaḥ saṃbhava aitihyābhyām aṣṭau= iti kecid aśakyaḥ eva pramāṇa saṅkhyā niyamaḥ iti su śikṣita cārvākāḥ arthāpatteḥ atirikta pramāṇa tvam 
NM_1,1.94.6	 tatra bhāṭṭāḥ tāvat ittham arthāpattim ācakṣate dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā arthaḥ anyathā na upapadyate iti artha antara kalpanā arthāpattiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ śrutaḥ iti kutaścana laukikāt vaidikāt vā śabdāt avagataḥ arthaḥ tatas anyathā anupapadyamāna artha antara kalpanā arthāpattiḥ iti evam ṣaṣ pramāṇa prabhava tvena ṣaḍvidhā asau bhavati iti 
NM_1,1.95.0–1,1.95.2	 śruta arthāpatteḥ vailakṣaṇyam dṛṣṭa vacanena upalabdhi vācinā gata artha tve api śruta artha āpatteḥ pṛthak abhidhānam pramāṇa eka deśa viṣaya tvena prameya viṣaya artha āpatti pañcaka vilakṣaṇa tvāt pramāṇa ṣaṭka pūrvikāḥ ṣaṣ artha āpattayaḥ tatra pratyakṣa pūrvikā tāvat arthāpattiḥ pratyakṣa avagata dahana saṃsarga udgata dāha ākhya kāryānyathā anupapattyā vahneḥ dāha śakti kalpanā 
NM_1,1.95.3–1,1.96.1	 anumāna pūrvikā deśa antara prāpti liṅga anumitam arīci māli gati anyathā anupapattyā tasya gamana śakti kalpanā upamāna pūrvikā upamāna jñāna avagata gopiṇḍa ādi sārūpya viśiṣṭa gavaya ādi prameyā anyathā anupapattyā tasya tat jñāna grāhya tva śakti kalpanā iti tat imāḥ tāvat atīndriya śakti viṣaya tvāt artha āpattayaḥ pramāṇa antaram śakteḥ pratyakṣa paricchedya tvā anupapatteḥ tad adhīna pratibandha adhigama vaidhuryeṇa anumāna viṣaya tva ayogāt anvaya vyatirekau hi dravya rūpa anuvartinau śaktiḥ tu tad gatā sūkṣmā na tābhyām avagamyate 
NM_1,1.96.2–1,1.97.0	 śabda upamānayoḥ tu atra saṃbhāvanā eva na asti iti arthāpatteḥ eva eṣa viṣayaḥ arthāpatti pūrvikā yathā śabda karaṇikā artha prati iti anyathā anupapattyā śabdasya vāvaka śaktim avagatya tat anyathā anupapattyā tasya nitya tva kalpanā sā ca iyam śabda parīkṣāyām vakṣyate abhāva pūrvikā tu bhāṣya kāreṇa udāhṛtāḥ jīvataḥ caitrasya gṛha abhāvam avasāya tat anyathā anupapattyā bahis bhāva kalpanā iti arthāpattiḥ na anumānam 
NM_1,1.97.1	 nanu dṛṣṭena adṛṣṭa siddheḥ anumānam eva idam syāt na anumānam sāmagrya bhāvāt pakṣa dharma tā ādi sāmagryā yat jñānam utpadyate tad anumānam iti tārkika sthitiḥ sā ca iha na asti bahirbhāva viśiṣṭe caitre caitra viśiṣṭe bahis bhāve vā anumeye kasya liṅga tvam iti cintyam gṛha abhāva viśiṣṭasya vā caitrasya caitra abhāva viśiṣṭasya vā gṛhasya gṛhe caitrābhāvasya vā tatra caitra adarśanasya vā na ca eṣām anyatamasya api pakṣa dharma tvam asti na hi gṛham vā caitraḥ vā tad abhāvaḥ vā tad adarśanam vā caitrasya dharmaḥ tat vahiḥ bhāvasya veti apakṣa dharma tvāt anyatamasya api na liṅga tvam prameya anupraveśāt ca arthāpattiḥ na anumānam 
NM_1,1.97.2–1,1.98.1	 api ca prameya anupraveśa prasaṅgāt api na idam anumānam tathā hi āgama avagata jīvanasya gṛha abhāvena caitrasya bahirbhāvaḥ parikalpyate itarathā mṛtena anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ syāt abhāvaḥ ca gṛhītaḥ san bahis bhāvam avagamayati na agṛhītaḥ dhūma vat abhāva grahaṇam ca sakala sat upalambhaka pramāṇa pratyasta maya pūrvakam iha tu sat upalambhakam asti eva jīvana grāhi pramāṇam jīvanam hi kvacid astitvam ucyate apratyasta mite tu sat upalambhake pramāṇe katham abhāvaḥ pravarteta iti pravartamānaḥ eva asau sat upalambhakam pramāṇam pṛthak viṣayam upasthāpayati bahis asya bhāvaḥ gṛhe tu abhāvaḥ iti tena jīvataḥ bahis bhāva vyavasthāpana pūrvaka gṛha abhāva grahaṇa upapatteḥ prameya anupraveśaḥ 
NM_1,1.98.2–1,1.99.1	 anumāne tu dhūma ādi liṅga grahaṇa samaye na manāk api tad anumeya dahana liṅgī anupraveśa sparśaḥ vidyate iti nanu artha āpattau= api kim prameya anupraveśaḥ na doṣaḥ  na doṣaḥ itibrūmaḥ pramāṇa dvaya samarpita eka vastu viṣaya abhāva bhāva samarthana artham arthāpattiḥ pravartamānā prameya dvayam parāmṛśati eva anyathā tad haṭanā yogāt atas ca yā iyam āgamāt aniyata deśa tayā kvacid asti iti saṃvittiḥ abhūt sā eva iyam gṛha abhāve gṛhīte bahis asti iti saṃvittiḥ adhunā saṃvṛttāḥ tat atas vailakṣaṇyāt na anumānam arthāpattiḥ arthāpatti sthale vyāpti grahaṇam api na saṃbhavati
