NM_1,1.99.2–1,1.99.3	 atas ca evam sambandha grahaṇa abhāvāt bhāva abhāvau hi na ekena yugapad vahni dhūma vat pratibaddha tayā boddhum śakyau gṛha bahis sthitau anyathā anupapattyā ca prathamam pratibandha dhīḥ paścāt yadi anumāna tvam ucyate kāmam ucyatām nanu asti eva gṛha dvāre vartinaḥ saṅgatigrahaḥ bhāvena abhāva siddhau tu katham eṣa bhaviṣyati yatra gṛhe caitrasya bhāvam avagamya tat anyathā anupapattyā tad anya deśa iṣuna astitvam avagamyate tatra deśānām ānantyāt duradhigamaḥ pratibandhaḥ 
NM_1,1.100.1	 anagni vyatirekasya niścaye dhūmasya kā vārtā iti ced ucyate tatra dhūma jvalanayoḥ anvaya grahaṇa saṃbhavāt na vyatireka grahaṇam ādriyeran bhūyas darśana sulabha niyama jñāna saṃpādyamāna sādhya adhigama nirvṛtta manasā aṃkim anagni vyatireka niścayena iha punar anvaya avasāya samayaḥ eva gamya dharmasya duravagam a tvam uktam ananta deśa vṛtti tvāt 
NM_1,1.100.2	 anupalabdhyā tad niścayaḥ iti ced na mandira vyatirikta sakala bhuvana tala gata tad abhāva niścayasya niyata deśayā anupalabdhyā kartum aśakyatvāt teṣu teṣu deśa antareṣu paribhraman anupalabdhyā tad abhāvaṃniśceṣyāmi iti ced mā evam gatvā gatvā api tān deśāt na asya jānāmi na astitām kauśāmbyāḥ tvayi niṣkrānte tad praveśa ādi śaṅkayā tasmāt abhūmiḥ iyam asarva jñānām iti artha āpattyā eva tat niścayaḥ 
NM_1,1.100.3	 nanu ittham amumartham anumānāt niśceṣyāmaḥ deśa antarāṇi caitra śūnyāni caitra adhiṣṭhita deśa vyatirikta tvāt tad samīpa deśa vat iti na pratyanumāna upahata tvāt deśa antarāṇi caitrāvyatiriktāni tad samīpa deśa vyatirikta tvāt caitra adhiṣṭhita deśa vat iti tasmāt niyata deśa upalabhyamāna paribhita parimāṇa puruṣa śarīrānyathā a nupapattyā eva tadita rasakala deśanā astitva ābadhāraṇam tasya iti siddham 
NM_1,1.101.0–1,1.101.1	 śruta arthāpattiḥpīnaḥ divā ca na atti iti sākāṅkṣa vacana śruteḥ tat eka deśa vijñānam śruta arthāpattiḥ ucyate iha evaṃvidha sākāṅkṣa vacana śravaṇe sati samupajāyamānam rajanī bhojana vijñānam pramāṇa antara karaṇakam bhavitum arhati pratyakṣa ādeḥ asannidhānāt na pratyakṣam kṣapā bhakṣaṇa pratīti kṣamam parokṣa tvāt na anumānam anavagata sambandhasya api tad pratīteḥ upamāna ādeḥ tu śaṅkā eva na udeti tasmāt śābdaḥ eva rātri bhojana pratyayaḥ 
NM_1,1.101.2–1,1.102.0	 śabdaḥ ca na śrūyamāṇaḥ imam artham abhivaditum alam ekasya vākyasya vidhi niṣedha rūpa artha dvaya samarthana śūnya tvāt atra carātri ādi padānām aśravaṇāt apadārthasya vākya artha tva anupapatteḥ na ca vibhāvarī bhojana lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ divā vākya padārthānām bhedaḥ saṃsargaḥ vā yena ayam apadārthaḥ api pratīyet tasmāt kalpya āgama kṛtam naktamatti iti vedanam tad vākya kalpanāyām ca pramāṇam paricintyatām nā adhyakṣam anabhivyakta śabda grahaṇa śaktimat na liṅgam agṛhītvā api vyāptim tad avadhāraṇāt kvacid nitya parokṣa tvāt vyāpti bodhaḥ api durghaṭaḥ viniyoktrī śrutiḥ yatra kalpyā prakaraṇa ādibhiḥ 
NM_1,1.102.1–1,1.102.2	 viniyoktrī hi śrutiḥ sarvatra prakaraṇa ādau vākya vidbhiḥ abhyupagamyate yathā uktam viniyoktrī śrutiḥ tāvat sarveṣu eteṣu sammatāḥ iti tasyāḥ ca nitya parokṣa tvāt duradhigamaḥ tatra liṅgasya pratibandhaḥ na ca niśāpada vacanasya sattā anumātum api śakyāḥ tasyām sādhyāyām bhāva abhāva ubhaya dharmakasya hetoḥ asiddha viruddha anaikāntika tvena ahetu tvāt na ca atra dharmaḥ kaścid upalabhyate yaḥ tena tadvān parvataḥ iva agnimān anumīyate 
NM_1,1.103.1–1,1.104.0	 na ca divā vākyam tad arthaḥ vā niśā vacana anumāne liṅga tāṃpratipattum arhati aśrute hi niśā vākye katham tad dharma tā grahaḥ śrute tu tasmin tad dharma grahaṇe kim prayojanam  divā vākya padārthānām tiṣṭhatu liṅga tvam anupapadyamāna tayā api na niśā vākya pratyāyaka tvam avakalpate padārthānām hi sāmānya ātmaka tvāt viśeṣam antareṇa anupapattiḥ syāt na vākya antaram antareṇa tasmāt śrūyamāṇam vākyam eva tat eka deśam antareṇa nirākāṅkṣa pratyaya utpādaka sva vyāpāra nirvahaṇa sandhim anadhigacchat tat eka deśam ākṣipati itiseyam pramāṇa eka deśa viṣayā śruta arthāpattiḥ śruta arthāpatti sthale artha anumānam api na saṃbhavati 
NM_1,1.104.1	 nanu ! arthāt eva katham artha antaram na kalpyate pīvara tvam hi nāma bhojana kāryam upalabhyamānam sva kāraṇam bhojanam analam iva dhūmaḥ samupasthāpayatu tat ca vacasā kāla viśeṣe niṣiddham tad itara kāla viśeṣa viṣayam bhaviṣyati iti kim vacana anumānena vacanam api na adṛṣṭa artham api tu artha gati artham eva tat asya sākṣāt arthasya eva kalpyam ānasyakaḥ doṣaḥ yat vyavadhānam āśrīyate ucyate śabda pramāṇa mārge asmin anabhijñaḥ asi vālakaḥ pramāṇa tā eva na hi asya sa ākāṅkṣa jñāna kāriṇaḥ puras avasthita vastu aṃśa darśana prāpti nirvṛti pratyakṣa ādi yathā mānam na tathā śābdam iṣyate vākya arthe hi samagra aṅga paripūraṇa su sthite avidhāya dhiyam na asya vyāpāraḥ paryavasyati tāvantam bodham ādhāya prāmāṇyam labhate vacaḥ tad artha vācaka tvāt ca tat vākyam vākyam iṣyate 
NM_1,1.105.0	 śabda eka deśa śrutyā atas tad aṃśa paripūraṇam kalpyam prathamam arthasya kutas tena vinā gatiḥ  prāyas śruta artha āpattyā ca vedaḥ kāryeṣu pūryate tatra arthaḥ kalpyamānaḥ tu na bhavet eva vaidikaḥ yaḥ mantraiḥ aṣṭakā liṅgaiḥ tad vidhiḥ parikalpyate śrutiḥ liṅga ādibhiḥ yā ca kalpyate viniyojikā viśvajiti adhikāraḥ ca yāga kartavya tā śruteḥ utpatti vākyam saurya ādau= adhikāra vidhi śruteḥ 
NM_1,1.106.0	 aindra agna ādi vikāreṣu kārya mātra upadeśataḥ yaḥ ca prakṛti vat bhāvaḥ vidhyantaḥ upapādyate tat evamādau sambandha grahaṇa anupapattitaḥ śruta artha āpattiḥ eva eṣā nissapatnam vijṛmbhate tayā śrutyā eka deśaḥ ca sarvatra parikalpyate artha kalpana pakṣe tu na syāt veda eka gamya tā iti arthāpattiḥ uktā eṣā ṣaṣ pramāṇa samudbhavā arthāpattiḥ na pramāṇa antaram kintu anumānam evaeṣā vicāryamāṇā tu bhidyate na anumānataḥ pratibandhāt vinā vastu na vastu antara bodhakam yam kañcid artham ālokya na yaḥ kaścid pratīyate pratibandhaḥ api na ajñātaḥ prayāti mati hetu tām na sadyojāta bāla ādeḥ udbhavanti tathā dhiyaḥ 
NM_1,1.107.0–1,1.107.1	 na viśeṣa ātmanā yatra saṃbandha jñāna saṃbhavaḥ tatra api asti eva sāmānya rūpeṇa tad upagrahaḥ api ca tena vinā na upapadyate iti kalpanam arthāpattiḥ tena vinā na upapadyate iti ca vyatireka bhaṇitiḥ iyam vyatirekaḥ ca pratītaḥ tasmin sati upapadyate iti anvayam ākṣipati anvaya vyatirekau ca gamakasya liṅgasya dharmaḥ iti katham arthāpattiḥ na anumānam kevala vyatirekī hetuḥ anvaya mūlaḥ eva gamakaḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ śakti kalpaka artha āpatti nirākaraṇam 
NM_1,1.107.2–1,1.107.3	 yāḥ ca pratyakṣa ādi pūrvikāḥ śakti kalpanāyām artha āpattayaḥ udāhṛtāḥtāḥ ca śakteḥ atīndriyāyāḥ abhāvāt nirviṣayāḥ eva svarūpāt udbhavat kāryam saha kārī upavṛhmitāt na hi kalpayitum śaktam śaktim anyām atīndriyām atirikta śakti sādhanam nanu śaktim antareṇa kārakam kārakam eva na bhavet yathāpādapam chettu manasā paraśuḥ udyamyate tathā pādukā ādi api udyamyeta 
NM_1,1.108.1	 śakteḥ anabhyupagame hi dravya svarūpā viśeṣāt sarvasmāt sarvadā sarva kārya udaya prasaṅgaḥ tathā hi viṣa dahanayoḥ māraṇe dāhe ca śakta a= aniṣyamāṇāyām mantra pratibaddhāyām svarūpa pratyabhijñāyām satyām api sva kārya audāsīnyam yat dṛśyate tatra kā yuktiḥ na hi mantreṇa svarūpa sahakāri sānnidhyam pratibadhyate tasya pratyabhijñāyamāna tvāt śaktiḥ tu pratibadhyataiti sati api svarūpe satsu api sahakāriṣu kārya anutpādaḥ yuktaḥ 
NM_1,1.108.2–1,1.108.3	 kiñca sevā adhyayana ādi sāmye api phala vaicitrya darśana ātatīndriyam kim api kāraṇam kalpitam eva dharma ādi bhavadbhiḥ atas śaktiḥ atīndriyā tathā abhyupagamyatām iti śakteḥ atirikta tva nirākaraṇam tat etat anupapannam yat tāvat upādāna niyamāt iti uktam tatra ucyate na hi vayam adya kiñcid abhinavam bhāvānām kārya kāraṇa bhāvam utthāpayitum 
NM_1,1.109.1–1,1.109.2	 śaknumaḥ kintu yathāpravṛttam anusarantaḥ vyavaharāmaḥ na hi asmad icchayā āpaḥ śītam śamayanti kṛśānuḥ vā pipāsām tatra chedana ādau= anvaya vyatirekābhyām vā vṛddha vyavahārāt vā aparaśvadhādeḥ eva kāraṇa tvam adhyavagacchāmaḥ iti tat eva tad arthinaḥ upādadmahe na pādukā ādi iti sarvasmāt sarvadā sarva utpatti prasaṅga vāraṇam 
NM_1,1.109.3–1,1.109.4	 na ca paraśvadha ādeḥ svarūpa sannidhāne sati api sarvadā kārya udayaḥ svarūpa vat sahakāriṇām api apekṣaṇīya tvāt sahakāri sannidhānasyasarvadā anupapatteḥ sahakāri varge ca dharma ādikam api nipatati tad apekṣekārya utpāde katham sarvadā tad saṃbhavaḥ dharma adharmayoḥ ca jagat vaicitrya kārya valena kalpanam aparihāryam tayoḥ ca na śakti tvāt atīndriya tvam api tu sva rūpa mahimnā eva manaḥ paramāṇu ādi vat 
NM_1,1.110.1–1,1.110.3	 yat api viṣa dahana sannidhāne sati api mantra prayogāt tad kārya adarśanam  tat api na śakti pratibandhana nibandhanam api tu sāmagrī antara anupraveśa hetukam nanu mantreṇa praviśatā tatra kim kṛtam na kiñcid kṛtam sāmagryantaram tu saṃpāditam kācid hi sāmagrī kasyacid kāryasya hetuḥ svarūpam tad avastham eva iti ced yadi evam abhakṣitam api viṣam katham nahanyāt 
NM_1,1.110.4–1,1.111.1	 tatrā aasi asaṃyoga ādi apekṣaṇīyam asti iti ced mantra abhāvaḥ api apekṣya tām divya karaṇa kāle dharmaḥ iva mantraḥ api anupraviṣṭaḥ kāryaṃpratihanti śakti pakṣe api vā mantrasya kaḥ vyāpāraḥ mantreṇa hi śakteḥ nāśaḥ vā kriyate pratibandhaḥ vā na tāvat nāśaḥ mantra apagame punar tad kārya darśanāt pratibandhaḥ tu svarūpasya eva śakteḥ iva astu 
NM_1,1.111.2–1,1.111.4	 svarūpasya kim jātam śakteḥ api kim jātam kārya audāsīnyam iti ced tat itaratra api samānam svarūpam asti eva dṛśyamāna tvāt iti ced śaktiḥ api asti eva punar kārya darśanena anumīyamāna tvāt iti śakteḥ nitya tva anitya tva vikalpanena dūṣaṇam kiñca śaktiḥ abhyupagamyamānā padārtha svarūpa vat nityāḥ abhyupagamyeta kāryā vā nitya tve sarvadā kārya udaya prasaṅgaḥ sahakārī apekṣāyām tusvarūpasya eva tad apekṣā astu kim śaktyā kāryatve tu śakteḥ padārtha svarūpa mātra kārya tvam vā syāt sahakārya ādi sāmagrī kārya tvam vā 
NM_1,1.112.1–1,1.112.2	 sva rūpa mātra kārya tve punar api sarvadā kārya utpāda prasaṅgaḥ sarvadā śakteḥ utpādāt sāmagrī kārya tve tukāryam eva sāmagrī kāryam astu kim antarāla vartinyā śaktyā atirikta śakti aṅgīkāre anavasthā api aparihāryā aśaktāt kārakāt kāryam na niṣpadyate iti ced śaktiḥ api kāryam tad utpattau= api evam śakti antara kalpanāda navasthā anavasthā parihāra śaṅkā 
NM_1,1.112.3–1,1.112.4	 āha dṛṣṭa siddhaye hi adṛṣṭam kalpyate na tu dṛṣṭa vighātāya śakti antara kalpanāyām śakti śreṇī nirmāṇaḥ eva kṣīṇa tvāt kārakāṇāṃkārya vighātaḥ syāt iti ekā eva śaktiḥ kalpyate tat kutas anavasthā evam api śaktiḥ anyathā asiddhā eva atra ucyate yadi adṛṣṭam antareṇa dṛṣṭam na siddhyati kāmam adṛṣṭaṃkalpyatām anyathā api tad upapattau kim tad upakalpanena darśitāca anyathā api upapattiḥ 
NM_1,1.113.1–1,1.113.3	 kalpyamānam api ca adṛṣṭam tat kalpyatām yat anavasthāṃnauvaheta dharma ādi vat api ca vyāpāraḥ api atīndriyaḥ śakti vat iṣyate bhavadbhiḥ anyatara kalpanayā eva kārya upapatteḥ kim ubhaya kalpanā gauraveṇa śakti anaṅgīkāre api kārakāṇām kāraka tvam nirbahati eva śaktam avyāpriyamāṇam na kārakam kārakam iti ced tad śakta miti tadā katham jānāmi 
NM_1,1.113.4–1,1.114.1	 kārya darśanāt jñāsyāmi iti ced vyāpārāt eva kāryam setsyati pādukā ādeḥ vyāpriyamāṇāt api na pādapa= chedaḥ dṛśyate iti ced pratyakṣaḥ tarhi vyāpāraḥ na atīndriyaḥ yatas kārya darśanāt pūrvam api vyāpriyamāṇa tvam jñātam āyuṣmatā kārya anumeyaḥ hi vyāpāraḥ kāryaṃvinā na jñāyeta eva kāryam tu anyatarasmāt api ghaṭamānam na ubhayam kalpayituṃprabhavati iti alam prasaṅgena 
NM_1,1.114.2–1,1.114.3	 prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ tasmāt atīndriyāyāḥ śakteḥ abhāvāt nirviṣayāḥ yathā udāhṛtāḥ tāḥ artha āpattayaḥ bhavanti siddhi anti api śaktiḥ anumānena eva na tu artha āpattyā api vā śaktiḥ atīndriyāḥ anumānasya eva viṣayaḥ kāryasya kāraṇa pūrvaka tvena vyāpti grahaṇāt sva rūpa mātrasya ca kāraṇa tva anirvahaṇa ātadhikam kim api anumāsyate sā śaktiḥ iti śabda nitya tva siddhau tu yā arthāpattiḥ udāhṛtā tasyāḥ śabda parīkṣāyām samādhiḥ abhidhāsyate abhāva pūrvikāyāḥ arthāpatteḥ api anumāna antarbhāvaḥ 
NM_1,1.114.4–1,1.115.4	 abhāva pūrvikā api arthāpattiḥ anumānam eva jīvataḥ gṛha abhāvena liṅga bhūtena bahirbhāva avagamāt caitrasya gṛha abhāvaḥ dharmī bahis bhāvena tadvān iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ jīvan manuṣya gṛha abhāva tvāt pūrva upalabdhā evaṃvidha gṛha abhāva vat yathā dhūmaḥ dharmī vahnimān iti sādhyodharmaḥ dhūma tvāt pūrva upalabdha dhūma vat iti atas ca gṛha ādīnām liṅga tva āśaṅkanam apākaraṇam ca āḍambara mātram prameya anupraveśa doṣa parihāraḥ yat punar prameya anupraveśa dūṣaṇam abhyadhāyi tat api na sāṃpratam kim prameyam abhimatam atrabhavatām kim sattā mātram uta bahis deśa viśeṣitam sattvam 
NM_1,1.115.5	 sattā mātram tāvat āgamāt eva avagatam iti na pramāṇa antara prameya tām avalambate bahis deśa viśeṣitam tu sattvam bhavati prameyam tasya tutadānīm anupraveśaḥ kutastyaḥ gṛha abhāva grāhakam hi pramāṇam gṛhe eva sat upalambhaka pramāṇa avakāśam apākaroti na bahissaṃdasattva cintā aṃprastauti mṛtasya jīvataḥ dūre tiṣṭhataḥ prāṅgaṇe api vā gṛha abhāva paricchede na viśeṣaḥ asti kaścana 
NM_1,1.116.1–1,1.116.2	 jīvana viśiṣṭaḥ tu asau gṛhyamāṇaḥ liṅga tām aśnute vyabhicāra nirāsāt na ca viśeṣaṇa grahaṇam eva prameya grahaṇam jīvanam anyat anyat ca bahirbhāva ākhyam prameyam jīvanam anyat anyaḥ ca bahirbhāvaḥ nanu jīvana viśiṣṭa gṛha abhāva pratītiḥ eva bahirbhāva pratītiḥ na etat evam jīvana viśiṣṭa gṛha abhāva pratīteḥ bahirbhāvasya pratītiḥ natat pratītiḥ eva bahirbhāva pratītiḥ na hi dahana adhikaraṇe dhūma pratītiḥ eva dahana pratītiḥ 
NM_1,1.116.3–1,1.116.5	 nanu dhūmāt anyaḥ eva dahanaḥ iha api gṛha abhāva jīvanābhyām anyaā iva bahirbhāvaḥ parvata hutavahayoḥ siddha tvāt mattu artha mātram tatra apūrvam anumeyam evam iha api bahis deśa yoga mātram apūrvam anumeyam yadi tu tat adhikam prameyam iha na iṣyate tadā gṛha abhāva jīvanayoḥ sva pramāṇābhyām avadhāraṇāt ānarthakyam arthāpatteḥ tasmāt prameya antara sadbhāvāt tasya ca tadānīm ananupraveśāt na prameya anupraveśaḥ doṣaḥ 
NM_1,1.117.1	 artha āpattau= api ca tulyaḥ eva ayam doṣaḥ tatra api arthāt artha antara kalpanā abhyupagamāt dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā arthaḥ anyathā na upapadyateiti artha kalpanā iti evaṃgrantha upanibandhāt tasya tasmāt pratītiḥ iti yatra vyavahāraḥ tatra avaśyam tad pratītau tad anupraveśaḥ doṣaḥ eva svabhāva hetau= iva tat buddhi siddhyā tad siddheḥ pramāṇa antara vaiphalyāt iti prabhākara uktaḥ arthāpatteḥ atirikta tva sādhana prakāraḥ 
NM_1,1.117.2–1,1.118.1	 prabhākarāḥ tu prakāra antareṇa anumānāt bhedam atra ācakṣate anumānegamaka viśeṣaṇam anyathā anupapannam analam vinā dhūmaḥ hi na upapadyate iha tu viparyayaḥ gamyaḥ gamakena vinā na upapadyate gamyaḥ bahirbhāvaḥ sa jīvataḥ gṛha abhāvam vinā na upapadyate gṛhāt nirgatojīvan bahirbhavati iti bhāṣya papi evam yojayanti dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā arthaḥ artha kalpanā artha antaram kalpayati iti arthaḥ yatas sā kalpanā prameya dvārikā anyathā papadyate iti arthaḥ evam gamya gamakayoḥ anupapadyamāna tva viparyayāt mānāt pramāṇa antaram iyam arthāpattiḥ iti bahirbhāvaḥ anyathānopapadyate sa ca gamyaḥ iti prabhākara pakṣa pratikṣepaḥ 
NM_1,1.118.2–1,1.119.1	 etat api grantha vaiṣamya upapādana mātram na tu nūtana viśeṣa utprekṣaṇam gamye tāvat agṛhīte sati tad gatam anupapadyamāna tvam katham avadhāryeta gṛhīte tu gamye kim tad gata anupapadyamāna tva grahaṇena sādhyasya siddha tvāt purā tad gatam anyathā anupapadyamāna tvam gṛhītam āsīt iti ced aho ! mahān anu mānāt viśeṣaḥ idam hi pūrvam pratibandha grahaṇam uktaṃsyāt api ca bahirbhāvasya gṛha abhāvam vinā anupapattiḥ iti ukte tasmin sati tasya upapattiḥ vaktavyā sā ca kā kim utpattiḥ jñaptiḥ vā 
NM_1,1.119.2	 yadi jñaptiḥ sā ca anumāne api gamyam gamakam vinā na asti tasmin sati asti iti samānaḥ panthāḥ utpattiḥ tu gṛha abhāvāt bahirbhāvasya durbhaṇāḥ prāc siddhe hi gṛha abhāve tad utpādaḥ kṣaṇa antare kāraṇam pūrva siddham hi kārya utpādāya kalpate tena ekatra kṣaṇe jīvan na gṛhe na bahis bhavet tasmāt yat kiñcid etat artha āpattau hetoḥ kāraka tvam api iti pakṣa antara nirākaraṇam 
NM_1,1.119.3–1,1.120.0	 evañca yat eke jñapti utpatti kṛtam iha vailakṣaṇyam utprekṣitavantaḥ dhūmena agniḥ gamyate eva gṛha abhāvena bahirbhāvaḥ janyate api iti tat api pratyuktam bhavati arthāpatti sthale vyāpti upapādanam yat tu sambandha grahaṇa abhāvāt iti uktam tat api na sundaram mandira dvāra vartinaḥ tad utpatteḥ etat ca svayam āśaṅkya na taiḥ pratisamāhitam udāharaṇam anyat tu vyatyayena pradarśitam 
NM_1,1.120.1	 gṛha bhāvena bahirabhāva kalpanam iti tatra etat eva vaktavyam iyam abhāva pūrvikā na bhavati eva arthāpattiḥ ṣaṣ arthāpattīḥ pratijñāyaimām abhāva pūrvikām arthāpattim uktvā upanaiyyāyika kesari kaṭākṣa pāta bhītām iha gahane hariṇīm iva yat upekṣya gamyate tat atyantam atrabhava tām ana artha jana ucitam ceṣṭitam tvad eka śaraṇām bālām imām utsṛjya gacchataḥ katham te tarkayiṣyanti mukham anyāḥ api striyaḥ ! 
NM_1,1.120.2–1,1.120.3	 bhāvena abhāva kalpanā tu pratyakṣa pūrvikā eva artha āpattiḥ tasyāḥ api cana duravagamaḥ sambandhaḥ asarva gatasya dravyasya niyata deśa vṛtteḥ akleśena taditara deśa nāstitva avadhāraṇāt anagni vyatireka niścaye ca dhūmasyabhavatām kā gatiḥ yā tatra vārtā sā eva iha api naḥ bhaviṣyati na ca bhūyas darśanau= agamyamāna anvaya mātra eka śaraṇa tayā 
NM_1,1.121.0–1,1.121.2	 yasya vastu antara abhāvaḥ gamyaḥ tasya eva duṣyati mama tu adṛṣṭi mātreṇa gamakāḥ sahacāriṇaḥ iti kathayitum ucitam aniścita vyatirekasya sādhya niścaya abhāvāt iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ pakṣa dharma anvaya vat vyatirekaḥ api na agṛhītaḥ anumāna aṅgam bahirbhāva siddhau ca anumāna prayogaḥ saḥ eva yaḥ tvayā darśitaḥ tasyatu pratiprayogaḥ pratyakṣa ādi viruddha tvāt hetvābhāse eva iti alam prasaṅgena śruta arthāpattiḥ api anumānam eva 
NM_1,1.121.3	 śruta arthāpattiḥ api varākī na anumānāt bhidyate vacana eka deśa kalpanāyāḥ anupapanna tvāt arthasya ca kārya liṅga gamyasya sattvāt yathā kṣitidhara kandhara adhikaraṇam dhūmam avalokya tad kāraṇam analam anuminoti bhavān evam āgamāt pīna tva ākhyam kāryam avadhārya tad kāraṇam api bhojanam anuminotu kaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ tad kārya tayā bhūyas darśana taḥ pratipanna tvāt liṅgasya tu kvacid pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam kvacid vacanataḥ pratipattiḥ iti na eṣa mahān bhedaḥ 
NM_1,1.122.0–1,1.122.3	 śruta arthāpatteḥ āvaśyaka tva ākṣepa parihārau nanu vacanam aparipūrṇam iti pratītim eva yathocitām janayitum asamartham kim pīnaḥ devadattaḥ divā na bhuṅkte iti atas na bhavati tad pīnatā pratītiḥ na na bhavati sa ākāṅkṣā tu bhavati na ca sa ākāṅkṣa pratīti kāriṇaḥ tasya prāmāṇyam iti tat eva tāvat pūrayitum yuktam 
NM_1,1.122.4–1,1.122.7	 tat asat kasya atra sā kāṅkṣa tvam kim śabdasya kim vātadarthasya uta svid tadava gamasya iti śabdasya tāvat artha nirapekṣasya na kācid ākāṅkṣā anabhivyakta śabda vat arthaḥ tu sā ākāṅkṣassan artha antaram upakalpayatu kaḥ avasaraḥ vacana kalpanāyāḥ avagamaḥ api artha viṣayaḥ eva sa ākāṅkṣaḥ bhavati na śabda viṣayaḥ śrotra karaṇakaḥ tasmāt avagamanaiḥ ākāṅkṣya siddhaye tad artha kalpanam eva 
NM_1,1.123.1–1,1.123.2	 yuktam vacana eka deśa kalpanam api artha avagati siddhi artham eva iti tad kalpanam eva astu kim sopāna antareṇa śruta artha āpatteḥ anumāna tve api tad gamya arthānām na avaidika tvam yat tu kalpyamānasya arthasya avaidika tvam prāpnoti iti tatra vacana kalpanā pakṣe suta rāma vaidikaḥ saḥ arthaḥ syāt kalpyamānasya vacanasya vedāt anya tvāt 
NM_1,1.123.3–1,1.124.0	 śrutaḥ anumita dvividhaḥ sa vedaḥ eva iti ced śrauta arthaḥ śrauta artha anumitaḥ dvividhaḥ sa veda arthaḥ eva bhaviṣyati iti kim vacana sopāna antara kalpanayā tena śrūyamāṇa veda vacana pratipādya artha sāmarthya labhya tvāt eva tasya veda artha tā bhaviṣyati sarvathā na vacana eka deśa viṣayā śruta arthāpattiḥ śreyasī śruti eka deśa kalpanā pakṣa pratikṣepāt ca arthasya atīndriya tve api vyāpti grahaḥ saṃbhavati eva tad atīndriya tayā sambandha grahaṇam aghaṭamānam iti yat uktam tat api pratyuktam arthe tu sāmānyena sambandha grahaṇam api sūpa pādam tatra tatra yaji ādeḥ arthasya adhikāra ādi artha antara sambaddhasya dṛṣṭa tvāt iti prābhākara ukta śruta artha āpatti nirākaraṇa prakāraḥ 
NM_1,1.124.1	 prābhākarāḥ tu dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā itibhāṣyam laukikam abhidhāna antaram eva idam upalabdhi vacanam iti varṇayantaḥ śruta arthāpattiṃpratyācakṣate śrūyamāṇasya eva śabdasya tāvatī arthe sāmarthyam upagacchantaḥtam artham śābdam eva pratijānate vākyasya dūra avidūra vyavasthita guṇa aguṇa kriyā ādi aneka kāraka kalāpa uparakta kārya ātmaka vākya artha pratītau iṣoḥ iva dīrgha dīrghaḥ vyāpāraḥ avirata vyāpāre ca śabde sā pratītiḥ udeti tad vyāpāra viratau na udeti tad utpādaka kāraka abhāvāt vṛddha vyavahārataḥ ca śabdeṣu vyutpadyamānaḥ lokaḥ tathābhūta vākya vyavahāriṇaḥ vṛddhān paśyan vākyasya eva tādṛśa vākya arthe sāmarthyam avadhārayati tad anuvartīni tu padāni tasmin naimittike nimittāni bhavanti 
NM_1,1.125.1–1,1.125.4	 naimittika ānukūlya paryālocanayā kvacid aśrūyamāṇāni api tāni nimitta tām bhajante viśva jit ādau svarga kāma ādi pada vat kvacid śrūyamāṇāni api tad ananukūla tvāt parityajyante yasya ubhayam haviḥ ārtim ārcchet iti vat kvacid anyathā sthitāni tat anurodhāt anyathā eva sthāpyante prayāja śeṣeṇa havīṃṣi abhighārayati iti vat tasmāt prathama avagata eka ghana ākāra vākya artha anusāreṇa sa tām asatāṃvā padānām nimitta bhāva vyavasthāpanāt aśrūyamāṇa tathāvidha eka deśāt api vākyāt tad artha avagati saṃbhavāt kim śruta artha āpattyā atas eva nasā upāta vyavahitam tasya arthasya śābda tvam sākṣāt eva tad siddheḥ pada aśravaṇe api artha upasthiti upapādanam 
NM_1,1.125.5	 nanu aśrūyamāṇeṣu nimitteṣu kutas tad artham avagacchāmaḥ anavagacchantaḥ ca kīdṛśam naimittikam avakalpayāmaḥ  ucyate śruteṣu apipadeṣu teṣām nimitta bhāvaḥ na sva mahimnā avaphalpate kintu naimittika anusāra dvārakaḥ iti uktam evam aśruteṣi api bhaviṣyati na yajaukaraṇa vibhaktim śṛṇumaḥ na svarge karma vibhaktim na agnacit ādiṣukvip pratyayam na adhunā ādiṣu prakṛtim na samāsa tad hiteṣu yathocitāṃvibhaktim api ca pratīmaḥ eva tad artham 
NM_1,1.126.2–1,1.127.0	 evam viśva jit ādau= api yajeta iti naimittika balā deva svarga kāma ādi padārtham pratyeṣyāmaḥ niyoga garbha tvāt ca viniyogasya liṅga ādīni śruti kalpanām antareṇa api niyoga vyāpāram parigṛhya tena vastuni viniyojaka tām pratipatsyante etat mate mukhya gauṇa ādi vyavahāra nirvāhaḥnanu evam sati sarvatra śabda vyāpāra saṃbhavāt mukhyasya api bhavet sāmyam gauṇala akṣaṇikā ādibhiḥ śruti liṅga ādi mānānām virodhe yat ca varṇyate pūrva pūrva balīyaḥ tvam tat katham vā bhaviṣyati  
NM_1,1.127.1	 ucyate sati api sarvatra śabda vyāpāre tad prakāra bheda upapatteḥ eṣa na doṣaḥ na hi padānām sarva ātmanā nimitta bhāvam apahāya eva naimittika pratītiḥ upaplavate tad aparityāgāt ca tad svarūpa vaicitryam anuvartate eva anyathā siṃha śabdena matiḥ kesariṇī sute anyathā devadatta ādau pratītiḥ upajanyate gaṅgāyām majjati iti atra gaṅgā śabdaḥ nimitta tām upayāti yathā na evam ghoṣa ādi vasatau tathā 
NM_1,1.127.2–1,1.128.0	 śruti liṅga vākya prakaraṇa sthāna samākhyānām api artha sannikarṣa viprakarṣa kṛtaḥ asti eva viśeṣaḥ iti tatra api na viniyoga sāmyam śruti liṅga ādibhiḥ yaḥ api kalpayet viniyojikām tasya api tasyāḥ tulya tvāt bādhya bādhaka tā katham  atha tad kalpane teṣām vidūra antika vṛtti tā saḥ eva artha gataḥ nyāyaḥ iti tad kalpanena kim  
NM_1,1.128.1–1,1.128.2	 aindra agna ādiṣu vaikṛteṣu karmasu na prākṛta vidhi anta vacana anumānam api tu ca udaka vyāpāreṇa tasya eva prāptiḥ vaikṛtasya vidheḥ kācid ākāṅkṣā ca udakaḥ iti ucyate artha adhyāhāre api upadeśa atideśayoḥ vailakṣaṇyam nanu evam ubhayatra tad avagama aviśeṣāt upadeśa atideśayoḥ koviśeṣaḥ na niyoga avagame kaścid viśeṣaḥ kintu upadeśe yathā upadeśaṃkāryam atideśe tu yathākāryam upadeśaḥ iti etayoḥ viśeṣaḥ 
NM_1,1.128.3	 nanu yathākāryam upadeśe anupayujyamāna kṛṣṇala carvavaghāta ādeḥ prāptiḥ eva na bhavet iti kaḥ bādha arthaḥ  na akhaṇḍa maṇḍala vidhi anta kāṇḍa prāpteḥ na hi aṃśa aṃśikayā ca udakaḥ pravartate iti alam anayā prasakta anuprasakti āgata śāstra antara garbha kathā vistara prastāvanayā evam śruta arthāpatti pratikṣeptṛ prabhā ākara pakṣa upasaṃhāraḥ iti prasaṅgāt vyākhyātam leśataḥ vākya vid matam etasya yuktā yukta tva paricchede tu ke vayam ! śruta arthāpattiḥ asmākam dūṣaṇīya tayā sthitā tad dūṣaṇam ca pūrva ukta vīthyā anena pathā astu vā ālaṅkārika pakṣa pratikṣepaḥ etena śabda sāmarthya mahimnā saḥ api vāritaḥ yam anyaḥ paṇḍitaṃmanyaḥ prapede kaṃcana dhvanim vidheḥ niṣedha avagatiḥ vidhi buddhiḥ niṣedhataḥ 
NM_1,1.129.2–1,1.130.0	 yathā bhava dhammiya vīsatthaḥ mā sma pān tha ! gṛham viśaḥ māna antara paricchedya vastu rūpa upadeśinām śabdānām eva sāmarthyam tatra tatra tathā tathā athavā na īdṛśī carcā kavibhiḥ saha śobhate vidvāṃsaḥ api vimuhyanti vākya artha gahane adhvani tat alam anayā goṣṭhyā vidvat jana ucitayā ciraṃparama gahanaḥ tarka jñānām abhūmiḥ ayam nayaḥ prakṛtam adhunā tasmāt brūmaḥ na bhāti anumānataḥtanuḥ api satām artha āpatteḥ viśeṣaḥ iti sthitam anupalabdheḥ pramāṇa antara tva ākṣepaḥ 
NM_1,1.130.1–1,1.131.3	 āha abhāvaḥ tarhi pramāṇa antaram astuḥ sat paricchedakam yatra na pramāṇam pravartate tad abhāva mitau mānam pramāṇa abhāvaḥ ucyate iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti ghaṭam prati sat upalambhaka pramāṇa pravṛttiḥ na asti iti asau pramāṇa abhāvaḥ ghaṭa abhāvam paricchinatti tatra ca ghaṭa viṣaya jñātṛvyāpārān utpādaḥ eva dṛśya adarśana vācyaḥ pramāṇam na asti iti buddhiḥ phalam atha vā ghaṭa abhāva grāhī grahītṛ vyāpāra sat upalambhaka pramāṇa abhāva janitaḥ na asti iti pratyaya svabhāvaḥ pramāṇam phalam tu hāna ādi jñānam bhaviṣyati tat uktam pratyakṣa ādeḥ anutpattiḥ pramāṇa abhāvaḥ ucyate sā aatma apariṇāmaḥ vā vijñānam vā anya vastuni iti anya vastu śabdana ghaṭa abhāvaḥ eva uktaḥ 
NM_1,1.132.1	 tatra tāvat idam na asti iti jñānam na pratyakṣa janitam indriya artha sannikarṣa abhāvāt sannikarṣaḥ hi saṃyoga samavāya svabhāvaḥ tad prabhava bhedaḥ vā saṃyukta samavāya ādiḥ iha na asti eva saṃyuktaṃviśeṣaṇa bhāvaḥ api na saṃbhavati kumbha abhāvasya bhū pradeśa viśeṣaṇa tva abhāvāt na hi asaṃyuktam asamavetam vā kiñcid viśeṣaṇam bhavati saṃyuktasya daṇḍa ādeḥ samavetasya śukla guṇa ādeḥ tathā abhāva darśanāt abhāvaḥ ca na kenacid saṃyujyate adravya bhāvāt na kvacid samavaiti guṇa ādi vailakṣaṇyāt iti 
NM_1,1.132.2–1,1.133.1	 yadi ca saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa bhāva sannikarṣa upakṛtam cakṣuḥ abhāvaṃgṛhṇāti tarhi tad aviśeṣāt saṃyukta dravya vṛttīn rasa ādīn apigṛhṇīyāt ayogya tvāt na gṛhṇāti iti ced tad abhāvam api mā grahīt ayogya tva aviśeṣāt yogya ayogya tva kṛta grahaṇa agrahaṇa niyama vāde vā yogya tā eva sannikarṣaḥ bhavatu kim ṣaṭka ghoṣeṇa tasmāt na ghaṭa abhāva jñānam cākṣuṣam abhāvasya aindriyaka tva nirāsaḥ 
NM_1,1.133.2–1,1.133.3	 nanu bhū pradeśam ca ghaṭa abhāvam ca viṣphārite cakṣuṣi nirīkṣāmahe nimīlite tu tasmin= tayoḥ anyataram api na paśyāmaḥ tatra samāne catad bhāva bhāvi tve bhū pradeśa jñānam cākṣuṣam abhāva jñānam tu na cākṣuṣam iti kutas viśeṣam avagacchāmaḥ bāḍham avagacchāmaḥ sannikarṣa abhāvāt eva na hi asannikṛṣṭaṃcakṣuḥ avagati janmane prabhavati 
NM_1,1.133.4	 tad bhāva bhāvi tvam tu idam anyathā siddham vidūra deśa vyavasthita sthūla jvālā āvalī jaṭila jvalana gata bhāsvara rūpa upalambha anuvarti tad gata uṣṇa sparśa jñāna vat tatra yathā rūpa anumīyamāna sparśa vedane nayana anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam anyathā siddham evam iha api bhū predeśa upalambhāvinā bhāvini kumbha abhāva grahaṇe tad kṛtam indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam iti na cākṣuṣaḥ ghaṭa abhāva pratibhāsaḥ tat uktam gṛhītvā vastu sadbhāvam smṛtvā ca pratiyoginam mānasam na astita ajñānam jāyate akṣa an apekṣayā iti 
NM_1,1.134.1–1,1.134.2	 atas ca eva asannihitasya api kvacid grahaṇam sva rūpa mātrakeṇa gaura mūlakaḥ palabdhavataḥ tatas deśa antaram gatasya tatra kenacid gargaḥ asti vā na asti vā iti pṛṣṭasya sata sva rūpa mātram gṛhītam gauramūlakam anusmarataḥ tad ānīm asat nikṛṣṭaṃ api gargasya bhāve tadā eva tasya jñānam udeti tatra indriya kathā api na asti iti na tasya pratyakṣa tvam abhāvasya anumāna agamya tvam na ca anumāna gamyaḥ ayam abhāvaḥ bhū pradeśasya tad gata ghaṭa adarśanasya vā āliṅga tva anupapattaḥ na bhū pradeśaḥ liṅgam agṛhīta sambandhasya api tat pratīteḥ anaikāntika tvāt apakṣa dharma tvāt tad adhikaraṇa abhā= a ānantyena sambandha grahaṇa asaṃbhavāt ca na api ghaṭādarśanam liṅgam 
NM_1,1.135.1	 apakṣa dharma tvāt ghaṭādarśanam ghaṭasya dharmaḥ na tad abhāvasya ghaṭa abhāva pratītim prati vyāpriyamāṇa tvāt tad dharma tvam asya iti ced na itaretara āśraya prasaṅgāt tad dharma tve sati liṅga pratīti janaka tvam pratīti janmani sati tad dharma tvam iti asiddhāyām ca ghaṭa abhāva pratīta autat dharma tā jñānam adarśanasya durghaṭam eva siddhāyām tu kim pakṣa dharma tā jñānena sādhya pratīteḥ siddha tvāt 
NM_1,1.135.2–1,1.135.3	 api ca idam adarśana ākhyam liṅgam avidita vyāpti katham abhāvasya anumāpakam bhavet vyāpti grahaṇam ca dhūma agni vat ubhaya dharmi grahaṇa pūrvakam tatra vyāpti grahaṇa velāyām eva tāvat kutastyam abhāva ākhya dharmi grahaṇam iti cintyam tatas eva anumānāt iti yadi ucyate tad itaretara āśrayam anumāna antara nibandhane tu tad grahaṇe anavasthā 
NM_1,1.136.1–1,1.136.2	 adarśana ākhyam liṅgam api darśana abhāva svabhāvam iti tad svarūpa pariccheda cintāyām api ayam eva panthāḥ atas dūram api gatvā tad avagama siddhaye pramāṇa antaram abhāva pariccheda nipuṇam avagantavyam iti tatas eva tadavagama siddheḥ na tasya anumeya tvam na ca idam iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti jñānam śabda upamāna artha apatti anyatama nimittam āśaṅkitum api yuktam iti sat upalambhaka pramāṇa atīta tvāt abhāvasya eva bhūmiḥ abhāvaḥ iti yuktam 
NM_1,1.136.3–1,1.137.1	 api ca prameyam anurūpeṇa pramāṇena pramātum uvitam bhāva ātmake prameye hi na abhāvasya pramāṇatā abhāve api prameye syāt na bhāvasya pramāṇatā na prameyam abhāva ākhyam nihnutam bauddha vat tvayā pramāṇam api tena idam abhāva ātmakam iṣyatām abhāva ākhyāti rikta pramāṇa nirākaraṇam atra abhidhīyate satyam abhāvaḥ prameyam abhyupagamyate pratyakṣa ādi avasīyamāna svarūpa tvāt tu na pramāṇa antaram ātma paricchittaye mṛgayate adūra medinī deśa vartinaḥ tasya cakṣuṣā paricchedaḥ parokṣasya kvacid māna antaraiḥ api tathā ca iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti jñānam ekam eva idam iha kuṇḍet adhi iti jñāna vat ubhaya ālambanam anuparata nayana vyāpārasya bhavati tatra bhū pradeśa mātre eva nayana jam jñānam itaratra pramāṇa antara janitam itikutastyaḥ ayam vibhāgaḥ 
NM_1,1.137.2	 atra agniḥ iti yuktaḥ ayam anakṣajaḥ pratibhāsaḥ dhūma grahaṇa anantaraṃavinā abhāva smaraṇa ādi buddhi antara vyavadhāna saṃbhavāt iha tu tathā ana asti eva avyavahitā eva hi bhū pradeśa vat ghaṭana astitā avagatiḥ avicchedena anubhūyate na ca kṣitidhara adhikaraṇa parokṣa āśu śukṣaṇi vat anīkṣaṇa viṣaya tā bhavati abhāvasya tad vyāpāra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt tad pratīteḥ tatra hi vyāpṛta akṣaḥ api na parvata vartinam analam avalokayitum utsahate iha tu ghaṭa abhāvam aparimlāna nayana vyāpāraḥ eva paśyati iticākṣuṣam abhāva jñānam tad bhāva bhāvitva anuvidhānāt 
NM_1,1.138.1–1,1.138.2	 na ca dūra sthita hutavaha rūpa darśana pūrvaka sparśa anumāna vat idam anyathā siddham tad bhāva bhāvi tvam tatra hi bahuśas sparśa darśana kauśala śūnya tvam avadhāritam cakṣuṣaḥ sparśa paricchedi ca kāraṇa antaram tvac indriyam avagatam avinā bhāvitā ca purā tathāvidhayaḥ rūpa sparśayoḥ upalabdhā iti anumeya eva asau sparśaḥ iti yuktam tatra anyathā siddha tvam cakṣuḥ vyāpārasya 
NM_1,1.138.3–1,1.138.5	 prakṛte tu na īdṛśaḥ prakāraḥ samasti na ca ekatra tad bhāva bhāvi tvam anyathā siddham iti sarvatra tathā kalpyate evam hi rūpam api cākṣupatām avajahyāt vaibhavena abhāvasya cākṣuṣa tva samarthanam nanu nīrūpasya asaṃbaddhasya ca cākṣuṣa tvam abhāvasya katham abhidhīyate cakṣuḥ janita jñānavat tvāt hi cākṣuṣa tvam na rūpavat tvena rūpavatām api paramāṇūnām acākṣuṣa tvāt nīrūpasya api rūpasya cākṣuṣa tvāt ca 
NM_1,1.138.6–1,1.139.2	 saṃbaddham api na sarvam cākṣuṣam ākāśasya tathā tve api tadabhāvāt nanu asambaddhasya cakṣuṣā grahaṇe dūra vyavahitasya vibhīṣaṇa ādeḥ apicākṣuṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ ucyate bhāve khalu ayam niyamaḥ yat asambaddhasya cakṣuṣā agrahaṇam abhāvaḥ tu asambaddhaḥ api cakṣuṣā gṛhīṣyate ṣaṣ prakāra sannikarṣa varṇanam api bhāva abhiprāyam eva sambaddha hi yat gṛhyate tat ṣaṇṇām sannikarṣaṇām anyatamena sannikarṣeṇa iti 
NM_1,1.139.3–1,1.139.4	 prāpya kāri tvam api indriyāṇām vastu abhiprāyam eva ucyate tasmāt avastu tvāt abhāvasya tena sannikarṣam alabhamānam api nayanam upajanayati tad viṣayam avagamam iti na doṣaḥ na ca asambaddhatva aviśeṣāt deśa antara ādiṣu sarva abhāva grahaṇam āśaṅkanīyam āśraya grahaṇa sāpekṣa tvāt abhāva pratītaḥ āśrayasya ca sannihitasya eva pratyakṣa tvāt sva pakṣena abhāvasya pratyakṣa tvā upapādanam 
NM_1,1.139.5–1,1.140.1	 athavā saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa bhāva ākhya sannikarṣa upakṛtam cakṣuḥ abhāvaṃgrahīṣyati yathā samavāya pratyakṣa tva vādinām pakṣe samavāyāmati saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa tā sannikarṣasya āvaśyaka tvam nanu tat idam asiddham asiddhasya dṛṣṭāntīkriyate mā evam bhavatā api dravya guṇayoḥ vṛtteḥ aparihārya tvāt bheda buddhyā siddha bhedayoḥasambaddhayoḥ ca dravya guṇayoḥ adarśanāt avaśyam kācid vṛttiḥ eṣita vyā iti alam artha antara cintanena abhāvasya sambandha upapādanam 
NM_1,1.140.2–1,1.140.3	 yat tu uktam saṃyoga samavāyayoḥ abhāvāt abhāvaḥ na bhū pradeśasyaviśeṣaṇam iti tat api asādhu saṃyoga samavāyābhyām anyasya eva viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva nāmnaḥ sambandhasya adūraḥ eva pratīti balena darśayiṣyamāṇa tvāt saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa tāyāḥ sannikarṣa tve ukta atiprasaṅga parihāraḥ yaḥ tu saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa bhāve sannikarṣe rasa ādibhiḥ ati prasaṅga audbhāvitaḥ saḥ ayam saṃyukta samavāya ākhye cakṣū rūpa sannikarṣe api samānodoṣaḥ 
NM_1,1.140.4–1,1.141.1	 saṃyukta samavāyaḥ api tarhi mā bhūt sannikarṣaḥ kim naḥ chinnam tat kim asambaddham eva rūpam gṛhṇātu cakṣuḥ ! na hi saṃyukta samavāyāt anyaḥ cakṣu ūrūpayoḥ sambandhaḥ sannikarṣāṇām āvaśyaka tā nanu ! artha grahaṇa ātmakaḥ vyāpāraḥ eva cakṣuṣaḥ sannikarṣaḥ yogyatāvā tad vaśāt eva rūpasya tat grāhakam upeyate na ca saṃyukta samavāya ādinā iti sa tarhi vyāpāraḥ sā vā yogya tā katham abhāvam api pratitasya na syāt prāpya kārīṇi ca indriyāṇi kāraka tvāt iṣyante sannikarṣaḥ ca nihnūyate iti vipratiṣiddham 
NM_1,1.141.2	 tasmāt ṣaṣ prakārā sannikarṣa anugāminī yogya tā vaktavyā na yogya tā mātraḥ eva viśramya sthātavyam yatra yogyatā tatra sannikarṣaḥ api asti na tu yatra sannikarṣaḥ tatra avaśyam yogyatā iti evam abhyupagacchatām na rasa ādi ati prasaṅga codanāḥ dhunoti manaḥ rasa ādeḥ sati api sannikarṣe yogya tva abhāvāt agrahaṇam yogya tā mātra vāde api na abhau= asya astyayogya tā bhavadbhiḥ vastu dharmaḥ asya kaḥ vā na abhyupagamyate  sarva upākhya viyukta tvāt na asti eva iti eṣa vā ucyatām abhāvaḥ cākṣuṣa jñāna viṣayaḥ vā abhyupeyatām 
NM_1,1.142.0–1,1.142.1	 abhāvasya apratyakṣa tve pūrva ukta yukti nirākaraṇam yat api sva rūpa mātram dṛṣṭvā api paścāt kiñcid smaran= api tatra āmyanāstitām pṛṣṭaḥ tadā eva pratipadyate iti uktam tat api na yuktam vastu antara vivikta gaura mūlaka svarūpa grahaṇa samayaḥ eva tatra asat nihita sakala padārtha abhāva grahaṇasya mecaka buddhyā asiddha tvāt idānīm tad gata gargā bhāva smaraṇam na tasya parokṣasya anubhavaḥ 
NM_1,1.142.2–1,1.142.3	 tathā hi tadānīm gargaḥ tatra na āsīt iti evam asau smṛtvā asatya vādī vadati idānīm astitvanāstitve prati saṃśetaḥ eva asau gargasya kutaścid āgatasya idānīm tatra astitva saṃbhavāt nanu ! na pūrvam sarva abhāva grahaṇam anubhūtavān asau gaura mūlake iti ced ananubhūyamānam api tat asya balāt kalpyate abhyasta viṣaye avinā abhāva smaraṇa vat tathā hi tena tena anuyuktaḥ tasya tasya abhāvaṃsmṛtvā uttaram asau sarvebhyaḥ ācaṣṭe 
NM_1,1.143.1	 nanu ! mecaka buddhyā sakala abhāva grahaṇe sahasā eva sakala abhāva smṛtiḥ upajāyeta mā evam yatra eva praśna ādi smaraṇa kāraṇam asya bhavati tat eva smarati na sarvam avidyamāna smaraṇa nimittam krama upalabdheṣu apivarṇeṣu yugapadanti avarṇa anubhava samanantaram smaraṇam anyatra tu yugapad upalabdhe api krameṇa smaraṇam bhaviṣyati iti na mecaka buddhau= ayam doṣaḥ 
NM_1,1.143.2–1,1.143.3	 kiñca svarūpa mātram dṛṣṭam iti vadatā bhavatā api mecaka jñānam abhyupagatam eva mātra grahaṇena tad anya abhāva grahaṇa siddheḥ evam hi bhavān eva abhyadhāt ayam eva iti yaḥ hi eṣa bhāve bhavati nirṇayaḥ na eṣa vastu antara abhāva saṃvitti anugamāt ṛte iti tasmāt gaura mūlaka avagama samayaḥ eva tatra asat nihitasya garga ādeḥ abhāva grahaṇāt na idānīm parokṣa abhāva grahaṇam abhāva kāraṇakam abhyupagantavyam iti pratyakṣa gamyaḥ eva ayam abhāvaḥ 
NM_1,1.144.0–1,1.144.2	 abhāvasya anumeya tva abhāvaḥ kutracid sammataḥ eva yat punar ananumeya tvam iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti prakṛta abhāva viṣayam abhyadhāyi tat asmākam abhimatam eva kaścid punar asannikṛṣṭa deśa vṛttiḥ anumeyaḥ api bhavati abhāvaḥ yathāsantamase salila dhārā visara sikta sasya mūlam abhivarṣati deve ghana pavana saṃyoga abhāvaḥ anumīyate yathā vā arthāpattau= udāhṛtam gṛha abhāvena caitrasya bāheḥ abhāva kalpanam iti āgamāt api abhāvasya kvacid bhavati niścayaḥ cora ādinā astita ajñānam adhvagānām iva āptataḥ pramāṇa prameyayoḥ ānurūpyam na niyatam 
NM_1,1.144.3	 yat punar anurūpeṇa pramāṇena prameyam pramīyate prameya tvāt bhāva ātmaka prameya vat iti etat api aprayojakam sādhanam abhāvaḥ paṭala ādīnām pratyakṣasya prapadyate vipakṣa vṛtti abhāvaḥ ca liṅgasya sahakāritām puruṣoktiṣu doṣāṇām abhāvaḥ ca upayujyate sāmagrī antargatāt tasmāt abhāvāt api bhāva dhīḥ 
NM_1,1.145.0–1,1.145.1	 abhāvaḥ ca kvacid liṅgam iṣyate bhāva saṃvidaḥ vṛṣṭyabhāvaḥ api vāyu abhra saṃyogasya anumāpakaḥ tasmāt yuktam abhāvasya na abhāvena eva vedanam na nāma yādṛśaḥ yakṣaḥ valiḥ api asya tādṛśaḥ iti abhāva ākhya pramāṇa nirasanambauddha ukta abhāva nirākaraṇa prakāraḥ atra rakta paṭāḥ prāhuḥ prameye sati cintanam yuktam nāma pramāṇasya tat eva tu ati durlabham 
NM_1,1.145.2	 abhāvaḥ nāma pratīyamānaḥ na tu atantra tayā ghaṭa ādi bhāva svarūpa vat anubhūyate api tu deśa kāla pratiyogi viśiṣṭa tvena tathā hi evam pratītiḥ idam idānīm iha na asti iti sa ca ittham avagamyamānaḥ api yadi taiḥ sambaddhaḥ eva bhavet abhāvaḥ kaḥ enam dviṣyāt na tu asau tad saṃbaddhaḥ na hi deśena kālena pratiyoginā saha āsyakaścid sambandhaḥ saṃyoga samavāya ādeḥ anupapatteḥ na ca sambandha rahitam eva viśeṣaṇam bhavati viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvasya sambandha tva nirākaraṇam 
NM_1,1.145.3–1,1.146.3	 nanu ! viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ eva sambandhaḥ kim sambandha antara apekṣayā  mā evam sambandha antara mūlaka tvena tad avagamāt saṃyuktam samaveta vā viśaṣaṇa bhavati daṇḍī devadattaḥ nīlam utpalam iti atas ca na vāstavaḥ svatantraḥ eva viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ puruṣa icchayā viparyasyantam api enam paśyāmaḥ viśeṣaṇam apiviśeṣyībhavati viśeṣyam api viśeṣaṇībhavati iti kālpanikaḥ eva ayaṃsambandhaḥ na vastu dharmaḥ abhāva pratiyoginoḥ pratiyogi tvam na sambandhaḥ pratiyoginā saha nata rāma bhāvasya sambandhaḥ asamāna kāla tvāt yadā hi ghaṭaḥ na tadā tad abhāvaḥ yadā vā tad abhāvaḥ na tadā ghaṭaḥ iti 
NM_1,1.146.4	 virodha ākhyaḥ sambandhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced kaḥ virodha arthaḥ yadi hi prāk siddhaḥ ghaṭa abhāvaḥ āgatya ghaṭam virundhyāt bhavet api tat virodhī ghaṭa mudgarayoḥ iva na tu evam asti tayoḥ asamāna kāla tvāt abhyupagame vā ghaṭa tada bhāvayoḥ ghaṭa mudgarayoḥ iva vadhya ghātukayoḥ sāhacaryam anubhūyeta ghaṭa abhāvaḥ kim kurvan ghaṭam virundhyāt akiñcitkarasya virodhi tve ati prasaktiḥ abhāva antara karaṇetu anavasthā mudgara ādayaḥ ghaṭa abhāvasya hetavaḥ na bhavitum arhanti bhāvasya svatas eva bhaṅgura tvena vināśa hetu anapekṣa tvāt 
NM_1,1.147.0–1,1.147.1	 bhāvaḥ vinaśvara ātmā ced kṛtam pralaya hetubhiḥ atha api anaśvara ātmā ced kṛtam pralaya hetubhiḥ tasmāt vijātīya kapāla ādi santati jananaḥ eva mudgara ādi kāraka vyāpāraḥ sāmagrī antara anupraveśe sati santati antara utpādaḥ na punar abhāvasya tatas niṣpattiḥ sa hi ghaṭāt vastu antaram ced kim āyātam yat asau na pūrvavat upalabhyate tad virodhi tvāt iti ced pratyuktam etat anartha antara tve tu ghaṭasya eva mudgara kārya tvam syāt pariṇāmavādyukta abhāva svarūpa nirākaraṇam 
NM_1,1.147.2–1,1.148.1	 nanu ! yāni mudgareṇa kapālāni janyante saḥ eva ghaṭa abhāvaḥ hanta tarhi kapāla āsphoṭane sati ghaṭa abhāvasya vinaṣṭa tvāt ghaṭasya unmajjanam prāpnoti kiñca akiñcitkarāṇi kapālāni ghaṭasya abhāvaḥ iti yadi ucyate paṭasya api tathā ūcyeran kiñcid kāraka tvam teṣām pūrvavat pratikṣeptavyam abhāva svarūpa anupapattiḥ api ca ayam abhāvaḥ bhavana dharmā vā syāt abhavana dharmāḥ vā bhavana dharma tve bhāvaḥ asau bhavet ghaṭa ādi vat abhavana dharmā tuyadya bhāvaḥ asti sa nityaḥ eva asau tarhi bhavet abhāvasya sa pratiyogika tva nirāsaḥ 
NM_1,1.148.2	 sa ca ayam eka padārtha sambandhī vā syāt sarva padārtha sambandhī ivāḥ tatra eka bhāva sambandhi tve na tasya niyama kāraṇam utpaśyāmaḥ sarva bhāva sambandhi tve tu sarva padārtha pratikṛlasya abhāvasya nitya tvāt nitya sannihita tvāt sakṛt eva trailokya lopa prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt na nityaḥ anityaḥ vā kaścid abhāvaḥ nāma asti abhāva anabhyupagame api na sāṅkaryam 
NM_1,1.148.3–1,1.149.1	 nanu ! abhāva anabhyupagame bhāvānām itaretara saṅkarāt akhila vyavahāra viplavaḥ prāpnoti yat āha kṣīre dadhi bhavet evam dadhni kṣīram ghaṭe paṭaḥ śaśe śṛṅgam pṛthivī ādau caitanyam mūrtiḥ ātmani iti abhāva abhyupagame tu bhāvānām iṃtaretara abhāvāt asaṅkīrṇa tā setsyati tat etat asādhu svatas eva bhāvānām asaṅkīrṇa svabhāva tvāt 
NM_1,1.149.2–1,1.149.3	 abhāva kāraṇaka saṅkara parihāra kathane tu sutarām viplavaḥ bhāvaḥ bhāvāt iva anyasmāt abhāva aṃśāt api dhruvam asaṅkīrṇaḥ abhyupetavyaḥ sa katham vā bhaviṣyati  anyonyam api abhāvānām yadi asaṅkīrṇa tā svatas bhāvaiḥ kim aparāddham vaḥ paratas ced kutas nu sā  bhāvebhyaḥ yadi upeyeta bhavet anyonya saṃśrayam abhāva antara janyā ced anavasthā duruttarā abhāva svabhāva tāyāḥ ca sarvān pratyaviśeṣāt pratiṣedhya nibandhana ā iva tad bhedaḥ pratiṣedhyāḥ ca bhāvāḥ paraspareṇa bhidyamānāstaṃbhindanti iti pratyuta bhāva adhīnam abhāvānām asāṅkaryam vaktum ucitam na tuviparyayaḥ yuktaḥ tat akhila padārtha vyavasya avisaṃṣṭhulī bhāva bhayāt apinā abhāva abhyupagamaḥ yuktaḥ 
NM_1,1.150.0	 atirikta abhāva anabhyupagama pakṣe nañarthaḥ nanvabhāva pratikṣepe nañaḥ kim vācyam ucyatām na eva śabda anusāreṇa vācya sthitiḥ upeyate bauddhāḥ khalu vayam loke sarvatra khyāta kīrtayaḥ vikalpa mātra śabda artha parikalpana paṇḍitāḥ kvacid nāma pada prāpta vṛttinā janyate nañā niṣedha paryudasta ani aviṣaya ullekhinī matiḥ kvacid tva ākhyāta sambandham upetya vidadhāti asau tad upātta kriyā aaraṃbha nivṛtti ullekha mātrakam abhāva anabhyupagame api ekādaśavidha anupalabdhi nirvāhaḥ nanu ! ca anena mārgeṇa yadi abhāvaḥ nirasyate ekādaśa prakāra eṣā anupalabdhiḥ kva gacchatu 
NM_1,1.150.1–1,1.151.4	 svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ yathā na iha ghaṭaḥ anupalabdheḥ iti kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ yathā na atra dhūmaḥ dahana anupalabdheḥ iti vyāpaka an upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra śiṃśapā vṛkṣa anupalabdheḥ iti kārya anupalabdhiḥ yathā na atra nirapavādāḥ dhūma hetavaḥ santi dhūma anupalabdheḥ iti svabhāva viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra śīta sparśaḥ pāvaka upalabdheḥ iti 
NM_1,1.151.5–1,1.151.8	 svabhāva viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra śīta sparśaḥ dhūma upalabdheḥ iti viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ yathā na dhruva bhāvī bhūtasya api bhāvasya vināśaḥ hetu antara apekṣaṇāt iti kārya viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra śīta kāraṇam apratibaddha sāmarthyam asti jvalana upalabdheḥ iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra tuhina sparśaḥ kṛśa anu darśanāt iti 
NM_1,1.152.1–1,1.152.2	 kāraṇa viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā naitasya roma harṣa danta vīṇā ādi viśeṣāḥ santi sannihita hutavaha viśeṣāt iti kāraṇa viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ yathā pravṛtta danta vīṇā ādi viśeṣa puruṣa adhiṣṭhitaḥ eṣa deśaḥ na bhavati dhūmavat tvāt iti satyam ekādaśavidhā anupalabdhiḥ iha iṣyate sā tu asat vyavahārasya hetuḥ na abhāva saṃvidaḥ anupalabdheḥ svabhāva hetau= antarbhāvaḥ yujyate 
NM_1,1.152.3	 nanu ! anupalabdheḥ svabhāva hetau= antarbhāvaḥ uktaḥ svabhāva hetau casādhya sādhanayoḥ avyatirekaḥ iṣyate asat vyavahāraḥ ca jñāna abhidhāna ātmaka tvāt tatas eva pṛtham iti katham tat viṣaya tām yāyāt satyam evam kintu na asat vyavahāraḥ tayā sādhyate api tu tad yogya tā yogya tā cana tatas artha antaram iti na svabhāva hetu tva hāniḥ 
NM_1,1.153.1–1,1.153.2	 nanu ! yogyatā bhāva ātmikā anupalabdhiḥ tu abhāva svabhāva itikatham anartha antara tvam  na etat evam na hi upalabdhi pratiṣedha ātmikām abhāva svabhāvām anupalabdhim anupalabdhi vidaḥ vadanti kintu pratiṣedha paryudaḥ ta vaḥ tu antara upalabdhim eva artha abhāva svabhāvām iti atas eva idam api na ca udyam anupalabdheḥ abhāva ātmaka tvāt anupalabdhi antara paricchedya tvāt anavasthā iti yasmāt vastu antara upalaṃbha ātmikā anupalabdhiḥ sva saṃvedyā eva iti anupalaṃbha mātrāt na atīndriyāṇām abhāva vyavahāraḥ siddhyet 
NM_1,1.153.3	 nanu ! anupalabdheḥ asat vyavahāra siddhau adṛśyasya api tathā tvaṃsiddhyet na dṛśya tva viśeṣaṇa upādānāt upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdheḥ asat vyavahāraḥ na yasya kasya cit iti tatra ghaṭa ādeḥ pūrva dṛṣṭasya dṛśya tva pariniścayāt asattva vyavahāraḥ hi siddhi ati anupalabdhitaḥ ekānta anupalabdheṣu vihāyaḥ kusuma ādiṣu dṛśya tva yogya tā yogāt asattva pariniścayaḥ 
NM_1,1.154.0	 piśāca ādeḥ tu dṛśya tva niścayaḥ anavadhāraṇāt na śakyaḥ anupalambhena kartum na astitva niścayaḥ tatra api tu api śācaḥ ayam caitraḥ iti evamādiṣu tādātmya pratiṣedheṣu dṛśya tvam na upayujyate piśāca itara rūpaḥ hi caitraḥ pratyakṣa gācaraḥ tādrūpya niścaye tasya kim phalam tad viśeṣaṇam iti asat vyavahārasya siddheḥ anupalabdhitaḥ na bhāva vat abhāva ākhyam prameyam avakalpate bauddha mata pratikṣepaḥ 
NM_1,1.154.1–1,1.155.0	 atra abhidhīyate idam tāvat sakala prāṇi sākṣikam saṃvedana dvayam upajāyamānam dṛṣṭam iha ghaṭaḥ asti iha na asti iti tatra vikalpa mātra saṃvedanam anālambanam ātma aṃśa ābalambanam vā ityādiyat abhilapyate tat na astita jñānaḥ iva astita ajñāne api samānam atas dvayoḥ api prāmāṇyam bhavatu ! dvayoḥ api vā mā bhūt ! yat tu asti iti jñānam pramāṇam itarattva pramāṇam iti kathyate tad icchā mātram asti iti jñāna samāna yogakṣema tve ca na asti iti jñānasya viṣayaḥ cintanīyaḥ na bhū tala mātram abhāvaḥ 
NM_1,1.155.1	 nanu ! ghaṭa vivikta bhū tala upalambha bhāve ghaṭa anupalambhaḥ iti uktam tat ayuktam kā iyam ghaṭa vivikta tā sā bhū pradeśāt abhinnā bhinnā vā abhede bhū pradeśa aviśeṣāt ghaṭa sannidhāne api ghaṭaḥ na asti iti pratipattiḥ jāyeta bhede api nāmni vivādaḥ syāt bheda abhedena cintyā ca ghaṭāt api viviktatā abhede ghaṭaḥ eva syāt bhede ca abhāvaḥ eva sā 
NM_1,1.155.2	 tat iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti ghaṭa vivikta bhū tala ālamba natāyām asyāḥ saṃvidaḥ iha iti tāvat asmin saṃvid aṃśe deśaḥ ālambanam iti avivādaḥ eva iha ghaṭaḥ asti iti bhāva pratīti samaye apitatra tad avabhāsa abhyupagamāt ghaṭaḥ na asti iti atra tu yat avabhāsate tat na bhū tala mātram eva bhāva pratīti samaya vat tad atirikta pratibhāsasya avaśya bhāvi tvāt tat atiriktam tu pratibhāsamānam ghaṭa vivikta tā itivā kathyatām ghaṭa abhāvaḥ iti vā ! na atra vastuni viśeṣaḥ abhāva pratītiḥ na mithyā 
NM_1,1.156.2–1,1.156.3	 nanu ! ghaṭaḥ na asti iti vikalpa mātram etat na darśana anantara pravṛtta tvena vidhi vikalpa tulya tvāt yathā anubhavam utpattum arhanti kila kalpanāḥ pratiṣedha vikalpaḥ tu na vidhi anubhava ucitaḥ abhāva vikalpāḥ bhāva vikalpa tulyāḥ eva nanu ! na eva vikalpānām vayam prāmāṇya vādinaḥ kāmam vidhi vikalpānām api mā bhūt pramāṇatā prāmāṇyam darśanānām ced tu adhi kalpa anusārataḥ vastu prāptyā vidhi vikalpānām pramāṇa vyavahāraḥ iti ced iha api tad prāptyā eva niṣedha vikalpānām astu prāmāṇya vyavahāraḥ kim atra vastu prāpyata iti ced tatra api kim prāpyate nīlam iti ced ! 
NM_1,1.157.1	 sā iyam abhāvasya api prāptiḥ bhavati eva nīlam hi prāpyamāṇam tad abhāva avinābhūta pīta ādi vyavacchinna rūpam prāpyate sā ca iyam tathābhūta nīla prāptiḥ bhavantī itara abhāva prāptiḥ api bhavati anyathā hi nīlayāptiḥ eva nasyāt iti etat ca lākṣaṇikam virodham ācakṣa arṇarbhavadbhiḥ eva upagatam sukha duḥkha samutpattiḥ abhāve śatru mitrayoḥ kaṇṭaka abhāvam ālakṣya padam pathi nidhīyate prāk utpatteḥ ghaṭa abhāvam buddhvā tad kāraṇa ādaraḥ vyādhi abhāva paricchedāt bhaiṣajya vinivartanam iha abhāva pratiṣṭhāna vyavahāra paramparām paśyan abhāvam kaḥ nāma vihnuvīta sa cetanaḥ abhāvaḥ na nirupākhyaḥ 
NM_1,1.157.2–1,1.158.1	 nanu ! na ajanakam ālambanam bhavati jñānasya abhāvaḥ tu sakala upa ākhya vinirmukta svarūpaḥ iti na jñāna janana paṭuḥ atas katham tad ālambanam ucyate saugatānām tāvat na kiñcid janakam vastu pratibhāsate dvi tri kṣaṇa avasthiti prasaṅgena kṣaṇa bhaṅga vrata vilopa prasaṅgāt utpadyate ca artha jñānam ca janayati jātena tena gṛhyate ca iti āsāṃkriyāṇām eka kāla tva abhāvāt tasmāt akārakaḥ eva bhāvaḥ pratibhāsate 
NM_1,1.158.2–1,1.158.3	 ākāra arpaṇa pakṣam ca pratikṣepsyāmaḥ evam bhāva vat abhāvaḥ api ajanakaḥ pratibhāsatām asmābhiḥ tu bhāva vat abhāvaḥ api jñāna janana samarthaḥ ipyate na hiniśśeṣa sāmarthya rahita tvam abhāva lakṣaṇam api tu na asti iti jñāna gamya tvam sat pratyaya gamyaḥ hi bhāvaḥ ipyate asat pratyaya gamyaḥ tu abhāva eti tat idam uktam sat asatī tattvam iti bhāva abhāvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ 
NM_1,1.158.4	 nanu ! bhāva vat eṣa jñāna janakassan abhāvaḥ na bhāvāt viśiṣyate aho nipuṇa darśī devānāṃpriyaḥ ! pratīti bhedaḥ ca asti na ca pratīyamānau bhāva abhāvau bhidyete iti katham evam bhavet api re mūḍhaḥ !jñāna janakatva aviśeṣe api rūpa rasau katham bhidyete pratīti bheda āditi ced bhāva abhāvau= api janakatva dharma sāmānye api pratīti bhedāt evabhidyeyātām na hi pratibhā āsi a bhedam antareṇa pratibhāsa bhedaḥ bhavati itibhavatā api abhyupagatam yathā uktam 
NM_1,1.159.0–1,1.159.2	 prāmāṇyam vastu viṣayam dvayoḥ artha bhidām jagau pratibhāsasya citra tvāt ekasmin= tad ayogataḥ iti tasmāt asti iti pratīteḥ iva bhāvaḥ na asti iti pratīteḥ abhāvaḥ bhūmiḥ iti abhyupagamyatām athavā vijñāna vādaḥ eva sumpaṣṭam āsthīyatām antarā avasthānaṃtu na sāṃpratam artha kriyā sāmarthyam api tasya darśitam eva sva jñāna ākhya kriyā śaktiḥ amuṣya durapahnavā artha kriyā anya janyā tu na bhāvena api janyate evam ca sati yaḥ pūrvam śaktivādaḥ atra varṇitaḥ sa pratyakṣa viruddha tvāt kaṇṭha śoṣāya kevalam abhāvasya sambandha upapādanam 
NM_1,1.159.3–1,1.160.1	 tathā sambandha abhāvāt iti yat uktam tatra deśena saha tāvata bhāvasya viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ sa tu sambandha antara mūlā eti bhāve ayam niyamaḥ na abhāve yat vā bhāve api eṣa na niyamaḥ na hi evam bhavati yad sambaddham tat viśeṣaṇam eva pāda pīḍite śirasi vā dhāryamāṇedaṇḍe daṇḍī iti pratyaya anutpādāt na api evam yat viśeṣaṇaṃtat sambanddham eva iti samavāyasya sati api viśeṣaṇa tve sambandha antara abhāvāt tasmāt sambandha antara rahitaḥ api pratibandhaḥ iva vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ iva viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ svatantraḥ eva sambandhaḥ tathā pratīteḥ avadhāryate 
NM_1,1.160.2–1,1.160.3	 ubhayoḥ ubhaya ātmaka tvāt kadācid kasyacid tathā pratibhāsāt puruṣa icchā anuvartanena vyatyaya pratyaya sattve api na doṣaḥ tasmāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ eva sambandhaḥ deśena bhū tala ādinā saha abhāvasya evam kālena api saha saḥ eva veditavyaḥ kriyayā kartṛsthayā vā āgamana ādikayā karma sthayā vā bhedana ādikayā saha saṃyoga ādi a bhāve api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ eva sambandhaḥ tadvat abhāvasya api bhaviṣyati iti 
NM_1,1.160.4–1,1.161.1	 pratiyoginā tu saha virodhaḥ asya sambandhaḥ ayam eva ca virodha arthaḥ yat ekatra ubhaya uḥ asamāveśaḥ atas ca eka vināśe na sarva vināśaḥ ghaṭa abhāvasya ghaṭa eka pratiyogika tvāt bhavana dharmā eva abhāvaḥ yat tu bhavana dharmāḥ abhavana dharmāḥ vā iti vikalpitam tatrabhavana dharmā eva abhāvaḥ abhyupagamyate bhavana dharma tve api ca abhāvaḥ na bhāvānnabhidyate pratibhāsa bhedasya rūpa rasa ādiṣu upadarśita tvāt bhavana dharma tvaṃca asya hetu anvaya vyatireki tvāt bhavati ghaṭaḥ hi mṛd piṇḍa daṇḍa ādīn iva janmani vināśe api mudgara ādīn anuvartate hetūn 
NM_1,1.161.2	 vijātīya santati janana pakṣe api sadṛśa santāna janikāyāḥ śakteḥ abhāvaḥ kriyate eva anyathā mudgara ādi upanipāte api vijātīyevasa jātīya santatiḥ api jāyeta sajātīya vijātīya ubhaya santati janana śakti yuktaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti ced mudgara ādi yogāt pūrvam api kapāla santati jananam tad yoge api vā sati ghaṭa santati jana nam aniyamena dṛśyeta iti vijātī ya kṣaṇa utpādana svabhāve ca ghaṭe mudgara ādi vaiyyarthyam eva syāt 
NM_1,1.162.0–1,1.162.1	 tad utpāda svabhāve hi na kiñcid mudgara ādinā atad utpādaka tve api na kiñcid mudgara ādinā mudgara upanipātāt ca yadi utpannam kṣaṇa antaram ghaṭa kṣaṇasya kim vṛttam yena na ābhāti pūrvavat nanu asya abhavanam vṛttam saḥ eva arthaḥ ayam ucyate ghañā kim aparādhe vaḥ kim vā api upakṛtam lyuṭāḥ nanu ! uktam na tasya kiñcid bhavati na bhavati eva kevalam iti tat ayuktam yat asau na bhavati saḥ eva asya abhāvaḥ 
NM_1,1.162.2–1,1.163.0	 nanu ! sa na na tu tasya abhāvaḥ mā evam sa na iti śabdayoḥ jñānayoḥ ca viṣaya bhedāt saḥ iti jñānasya smaryamāṇaḥ ghaṭa ādiḥ viṣayaḥ na iti tu jñānasya abhāvaḥ bhūmiḥ iti alam alīka vidagdha viracita viphala vakra vacana vimardena bauddha mata nirāsa upasaṃhāraḥ tasmāt ittham abhāvasya prameya tva upapādanāt na hi asat vyavahārāya kalpante anupalabdhayaḥ na svabhāva anumāne ca tad antarbhāva sambhavaḥ meyam pṛthak abhāva ākhyam amūṣām upapāditam kāraṇa anupalabdhi ādeḥ bāḍham astu anumāna tā svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ tu pratyakṣam iti sādhitam 
NM_1,1.163.1	 yā ca iyam ekādaśa anupalabdhi vadhū śuddhānta madhye viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ udāhṛtā na dhruva bhāvī bhūtasya api bhāvasya vināśaḥ hetu antara apekṣaṇāt iti sā iyam idānīm eva sādhvī dūṣitā vistaraḥ tu kṣaṇa bhaṅga pakṣe dūṣayiṣyate prābhākara mata pariśīla namyaiḥ tu mīmāṃsakaiḥ sadbhiḥ abhāvaḥ na abhyupeyate pramādena amunā teṣām vayam api adya lajjitāḥ 
NM_1,1.163.2	 ghaṭaḥ hi na pratīyate na tu tad abhāvaḥ pratīyate iti evaṃvadadbhiḥ ebhiḥ darśana adarśane eva padārthānām sat asat tve iti kathitam syāt etat ca ayuktam darśana adarśanābhyām hi sat asat tve niścīyete na tu darśana adarśaneeva sat asat tve na ca apratīti mātreṇa tad abhāva nibandhanāḥ vyavahārāḥ prakalpante mṛd antarita toya vat khapuṣpasya piśācasya mṛd antarita vāriṇaḥ na khalu anupalabhya tve viśeṣaḥ pratibhāti naḥ sarvadā anupalambhaḥ hi kurvat nāstitva niścayam viśiṣyate mṛdanta sstha salila anupalabdhitaḥ āgamāt yuktitaḥ ca api sattva saṃbhāvanām gataḥ sarvadā anupalabdhaḥ api na piśācaḥ kha puṣpa vat anupalabdheḥ svatassiddha tva nirākaraṇam 
NM_1,1.164.2–1,1.165.0	 atas ca yat ucyate anupalabdheḥ punar anupalabdhiḥ eva anupalabdhiḥ iti tad bhaṇiti mātram kha puṣpa ādeḥ tu sa viśeṣaṇa tayā anupalabdhyā abhāvaḥ eva niścīyate na tasya anupalabdhi mātram abhāva anabhyupagame bādhakam aniṣyamāṇe ca abhāve bhāvānām pratiyogini nitya tā eṣām prasajyeta na hi ete kṣaṇikāḥ tava mudgara ādeḥ ca kim kāryam kapāla paṭalī iti ced ghaṭaḥ tarhi avinaṣṭa tvāt sva kāryam na karoti kim  
NM_1,1.165.1	 adarśanāt iti ced tadānīm eva dṛṣṭasya sthirasya amuṣya kim kṛtam sarva indriya ādi sāmagrī sannidhāne api adarśanam tasmāt tad abhāva kṛtam eva tadānīm tasya adarśanam sva prakāśā ca na asti iti saṃvittiḥ bhavatām mate na nirālambanā ca iyam asti iti pratipatti vat vikalpa viṣayāḥ śabdāḥ yathā śauddhodaneḥ gṛhe gīyante bhavatā na evam iti nañvācyam ucyatām 
NM_1,1.166.0–1,1.166.4	 prasiddhiḥ ca parityaktā na ca abhāvaḥ parākṛtaḥ upekṣitaḥ ca bhāṣya arthaḥ iti aho naya naipuṇam alam ca bahunā uktena vimardaḥ atra na śobhate mahātmanām pramādaḥ api marṣaṇīyaḥ hi mādṛśaiḥ tasmāt na asti iti pratyaya gamyaḥ abhāvaḥ iti siddham abhāva prabhedāḥ sa ca dvividhaḥ prāc abhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsa abhāvaḥ ca iti caturvidhā eti anye itaretarābhāvaḥ atyanta abhāvaḥ tau ca dvau= iti ṣaṣ prakāraḥ iti anye apekṣā bhāvaḥ sāmarthya abhāvaḥ te ca catvāra eti prāc abhāva ādīnām svarūpāṇi tatra ca prāc ātma lābhāt nāstitvam prāgabhāvaḥ abhidhīyate utpannasya ātma hānam tu pradhvaṃsaḥ iti kathyate na prāc abhāvāt anye tu bhidyante paramārthataḥ sa hi vastu antara upādhiḥ anyaḥ anya abhāvaḥ ucyate 
NM_1,1.167.0	 saḥ eva avadhi śūnya tvāt atyanta abhāva tām gataḥ apekṣā bhāva tā tasya deśa upādhi nibandhanā sāmarthyam pūrva siddham ced pradhvaṃse tad abhāva dhīḥ no ced tarhi viśeṣaḥ asya durlabhaḥ prāgabhāvataḥ utpannasya vināśaḥ vā tad anutpādaḥ eva vā abhāvaḥ tattvataḥ anye tu bhedāḥ tu aupādhikāḥ matāḥ tasmāt abhāva ākhyam idam prameyam tasya indriyeṇa grahaṇam ca siddham atas pramāṇeṣu jagāda yuktam catuṣṭam eṣām muniḥ akṣapādaḥ saṃbhava aitihye pramāṇa antare 
NM_1,1.167.1–1,1.168.1	 nanu ! na adya api catuṣṭvam eṣām avatiṣṭhate saṃbhava aitihye iti dvayoḥ pramāṇa antara bhāvāt saṃbhavaḥ nāma samudāyena samudāyinaḥ avagamaḥ saṃbhavati khāryāṃdroṇaḥ saṃbhavati śate sahasram iti anirdiṣṭa pravaktṛka pravāda paraṃparā ca aitihyam iha vaṭe yakṣaḥ prativasati iti na ca ayam āgamaḥ āptasya upadeṣṭuraniścayāt iti saṃbhava aitihye anumāna rūpe eva 
NM_1,1.168.2–1,1.168.4	 tat idam anupapannam bhinnaḥ saṃbhavaḥ eṣa na hi anubhiteḥ ākhyāyi khāryām khalu droṇaḥ saṃbhavati iti sā iyam avinā abhāvāt matiḥ laiṅgikī aitihyam tu na satyam atra hi vaṭe yakṣaḥ asti vā na iti vākaḥ jānāti kadā kva kena kalitam yakṣasya kīdṛś vapuḥ  satyam api ca āgamāt pṛthak naitihyam upadeśa rūpa tvāt āpta grahaṇam sūtre na lakṣaṇāya iti vakṣyāmaḥ pramāṇa saṅkhyā viṣaye cārvāka matam cārvāka dhūrtaḥ tu atha atas tattvam vyākhyāsyāmaḥ iti pratijñāya pramāṇa prameya saṅkhyā lakṣaṇa niyama aśakya karaṇīya tvam eva tattvaṃ vyākhyātavān pramāṇa saṅkhyā niyama aśakya karaṇīya tva siddhaye capramiti bhedān pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa anupajanyānīdṛśān upādarśayat 
NM_1,1.169.0	 vakrāṅgaliḥ pravirala aṅguliḥ eṣa pāṇi ḥisi asti dhīḥ tamasi mīlita cakṣuṣaḥ vā na iyam tvac indriya kṛtā na hi tad kara sthaṃtatra eva hi pramitim indriyam ādadhāti dūrāt karoti niśi dīpa śikhā ca dṛṣṭa aparyanta deśa visṛtāsu matim prabhāsu dhatte dhiyam pavana kampita puṇḍarīka ṣaṇḍe anuvāta bhuvi dūra gate api gandhe saḥ evaṃprāya saṃvitti samutprekṣaṇa paṇḍitaḥ rūpam tapasvī jānāti na pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ 
NM_1,1.170.0–1,1.170.1	 cārvāka mata nirāsaḥ pratyakṣāt virala kara aṅgula pratītiḥ vyāpi tvāt akuśalam indriyam na tasyām ānābheḥ tuhina jalam janaiḥ pibadbhiḥ tat sparśaḥ śiśirataraḥ anubhūyate antar saṃyoga buddhiḥ ca yathā tad utthā tathā eva tad jā tad abhāva buddhiḥ kriyā viśeṣa grahaṇāt ca tasmāt ākuñcita tva avagamaḥ aṅgulīnām padma āmoda vidūra dīpaka vibhā buddhiḥ punar laiṅgikī vyāpti jñāna kṛtā iti kā khalu matiḥ māna antara apekṣiṇī saṅkhyāyāḥ niyamaḥ pramāṇa viṣaye na asti iti atas nāstikaiḥ tad sāmarthya viveka śūnya matibhiḥ mithyā eva visphūrjitam iyat tvam avilakṣaṇam niyatam asti māneṣu naḥprameyam api lakṣaṇa ādi niyama anvitam vakṣyate aśakya karaṇīyatām kathayatā tu tattvam satāṃsam akṣam amunā aatmanaḥ jaḍam ati tvam uktam bhavet iti jayanta bhaṭṭa kṛtau nyāyamañjaryā prathamam āhnikam 
NM_2,1.171.0–2,1.171.1	 pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam evam pramāṇānām sāmānya lakṣaṇe vibhāge ca nirṇīte sati adhunā viśeṣa lakṣaṇa varṇa bhāva saraḥ iti sakala pramāṇa mūla bhūta tvena pūrva paṭhita tvena jyaiṣṭhyāt prathamam pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam pratipādayitum āha indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam pratyakṣam 
NM_2,1.171.2–2,1.171.3	 pratyakṣam iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ itarat lakṣaṇam samāna asamāna jātīya vyavacchedaḥ lakṣaṇa arthaḥ samāna jātīyam pramāṇa tayā anumāna ādi vijātīyam prameya ādi tatas vyavacchinnam pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam anena sūtreṇa upapādyate sūtrasya ayukta tā aakṣepaḥ atra codayanti indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tva ādi viśeṣaṇaiḥ svarūpaṃvā viśeṣyate sāmagrī vā phalam vā 
NM_2,1.172.1	 tatra sva rūpa viśeṣaṇa pakṣe yat evaṃsvarūpam jñānam tat pratyakṣa miti tad svarūpasya viśeṣita tvāt phala viśeṣaṇa anupādānāt ca lakṣaṇam avyāpti ati vyāptibhyām upahṛtam syāt avyāptiḥ tāvat atathāvidha svarūpasya bodhasya indriya ādeḥ ca nirmala phala janakatayā labdha pramāṇa bhāvasya api prāmāṇyam na uktam bhavet ativyāptiḥ ca tathāvidha svarūpasya api jñānasya ākārakasya vā saṃskāra kāriṇaḥ vā smṛtim janayataḥ vā asaṃśayam ādadhānasya vā viparyayam utpādayataḥ vā pramāṇa tvam prāpnoti phalasya aviśeṣita tvāt 
NM_2,1.172.2–2,1.172.3	 tad viśeṣaṇa abhidhāne punar aśruta sūtra antara adhyāhāra prasaktiḥ avyāptiḥ ca tad avasthā iti na sva rūpa viśeṣaṇa pakṣaḥ na api sāmagrī viśeṣaṇa pakṣaḥ tatra hi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam sāmagryam iti vyākhyātavyam jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam iti ca tad janaka tvāt upacāreṇa tathā sākalyam varṇanīyam iti kliṣṭa kalpanā 
NM_2,1.173.1	 phala viśeṣaṇa pakṣaḥ api na saṅgacchate jñāna pratyakṣa śabdayoḥ phala karaṇa vācinoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya prasaṅgāt asamāna adhikaraṇa pramāṇa lakṣaṇa prastāvāt pratyakṣam pramāṇam ucyate tat ca karaṇam iti varṇitam jñānam tu tad upajanitam phalam iti katham aikādhikaraṇyam tasmāt pakṣa trayasya api ayukta tvāt pakṣa antarasya api asaṃbhavāt ayuktam sūtram iti sūtra artha samarthanam 
NM_2,1.173.2	 atra ucyate sva rūpa sāmagrī viśeṣaṇa pakṣau tāvat yathā ukta doṣa upahata tvāt na abhyupagamyete phala viśeṣaṇa pakṣam eva saṃmanyāmahe tatra ca yat vaiyyadhikaraṇyam coditam tat yatas śabda adhyāhāreṇa parihariṣyāmaḥ yatas evaṃvidha viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭam jñāna ākhyam phalam bhavati tat pratyakṣam iti sūtra arthaḥ ittham ca na kvacid avyāptiḥ ati vyāptiḥ vā nakācid kliṣṭa kalpanā yatas śabda adhyāhāra mātreṇa niravadya lakṣaṇa upavarṇana samartha sūtra pada saṅgati saṃbhavāt 
NM_2,1.174.0–2,1.174.2	 sva vyākhyāne bījavarṇanam nanu samāna adhikaraṇe eva jñāna pratyakṣa pade katham na vyākhyāyete kim yatas śabda adhyāhāreṇa uktam atra karaṇasya pramāṇa tvāt jñānasya ca tad phala tvāt phala karaṇayoḥ ca svarūpa bhedasya siddha tvāt tat atra pramāṇa tāyām sāmagryāḥ tat jñānam phalam iṣyate tasya pramāṇa bhāve tu phalam hāna ādi buddhayaḥ pratyakṣasya pravṛtti nivṛtti hetu tva ākṣepaḥ 
NM_2,1.174.3	 nanu smṛti ādi aneka buddhi vyavadhāna saṃbhavāt katham indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam ālocana ajñānam hāna ādi phalam bhavet tathā hi kapittha ādi jātīyam artham indriya ādi sannikarṣa ādi sāmagrītaḥ upalabhya tad gatam sukha sādhana tvam anusmarati evaṃjātīyakena mama pūrvam sukham upajanitam abhūt iti tatas smṛti anantaram parāmarśa jñānam asya upajāyate ayam sa kapittha jātīyaḥ iti tatas upādeya tā jñānam utpadyate yatas eṣa sukha sādhanam kapittha ādi jātīyaḥ padārthaḥ tasmāt upādeyaḥ iti atra antare prathamasya indriya sannikarṣa janmanaḥ kapittha ālocanā jñānasya nāma api na avaśiṣyate iti katham asya tad phala tvam iti 
NM_2,1.175.0–2,1.175.1	 pratyakṣasya pravṛtti hetu tve vācaspati matam atra ācāryāḥ tāvat ācakṣate sādhu coditam satyam īdṛśa ā iva ayam jñānānām kramaḥ na vayam prathamam ālocana ajñānasya upādānāt iṣu pramāṇa tām brūmaḥ tathā hi prathamam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam ālocanā jñānam indriya artha sannikarṣa ādi sāmagrī svabhāvasya pratyakṣasya pramāṇasya phalam eva na tu svayam pramāṇa tām pratilabhate smṛti janaka tvāt tad anantaram hi sukha sādhanatva anusmṛtiḥ bhavati iti sā iyam anusmṛtiḥ apramāṇa phalam api satī pratyakṣam pramāṇam saṃpadyate tathā ayam kapittha ādi jātīya ḥiti indriya viṣaya parāmarśa utpattau indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa saha vyāpriyamāṇa tvāt 
NM_2,1.175.2–2,1.176.2	 sa punar parāmarśa pratyayaḥ pratyakṣa janitaḥ dhūma jñāna vat anumānaṃpramāṇam ucyate parokṣasya agneḥ iva sukha sādhana sāmarthyasya tatas avagateḥ yadi api na kācid atīndriyā śaktiḥ asmat mate vidyate tathā api svarūpa saha kārya ādi dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa kāraṇa samūha sannidhāna svabhāvam api sāmarthyam atīndriyam eva tasmāt eṣa kapittha ādi jātīyaḥ arthaḥ sukha sādhanam iti vahnimat parvata pratīti vat tad jātīya liṅgakamānumānikam idam jñānam tat idam anumāna phalam api sukha sādhana tva niścaya ātmakam jñānam indriya viṣaye kapittha ādau= upādeya jñānam indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa saha janayat pratyakṣam pramāṇam bhavati tat eva ca hṛdi vyavasthāpya bhāṣya kṛt vabhāṣe yadā jñānam vṛttiḥtadā hāna upādāna upekṣā buddhayaḥ pramitiḥ iti ālocana ajñānam mukhyam pramāṇam eva 
NM_2,1.176.3–2,1.177.1	 vyākhyātāraḥ tu bruvate na ayam īdṛśaḥ jñānānām kramaḥ ādyam ālocanā jñānam sukha sādhanatva anusmṛtim upajanayati iti satyam smṛtyā ca tasya vinaśyattā vinaśyat avastham ca indriya viṣaye kapitthādausukha sādhana tva niścayam ādadhāti sukha sādhana tva jñānam eva ca upādeya tā jñānam ucyate na anyat parāmarśaḥ tu na kaścid antarāle saṃvedyate tat eva sādhyam darśitam indriya artha sannikarṣa janitam upādeya tā jñāna phalakam avakalpate iti kim asaṃvedyamāna jñāna kanthā kalpanena iti 
NM_2,1.177.2	 nanu ! parāmarśaḥ anubhūyate eva na tu kalpyate dhūma jñāna anantaram avinā bhāvam yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti anusmṛtya parābhṛśati tathā ca ayaṃdhūmaḥ iti asati tu parāmarśe na liṅga jñānam liṅgini pramāṇa tāṃpratipadyeta smaraṇa janakam hi tat na ca smṛti janakam pramāṇam iṣyate smaraṇa anantaram ca liṅga pratītiḥ bhavantī na upalabhya anuvādena bhavet ayam agnimān iti 
NM_2,1.177.3–2,1.178.1	 api ca tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti yat upanaya vacanam avayaveṣu paṭhyate tasya kim vācyam bhaviṣyati parāmarśā palāpa vādinām sva pratipatti vat ca para pratipattiḥ avayavaiḥ janyate iti vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt apratyākhyeyaḥ parāmarśaḥ iti parāmarśasya anapekṣatā atra vadanti na tāvat antarā kaścid parāmarśaḥ anubhūyate anumeya miteḥ pūrvam ūrdhvam ca niyama smṛteḥ atas eva artham ālokya vinā eva hi davīyasā vilambena vyavasyanti grahaṇa ādiṣu laukikāḥ 
NM_2,1.178.2–2,1.178.3	 liṅga jñānam ca vinaśyat avastham anumeya pratītau vyāpriyamāṇaṃpramāṇa tām pratipatsyate tad kṛtā eva upalabhya anuvādena liṅga buddhiḥ bhaviṣyati tasmāt kapittha ādi padārtha darśanasya parāmarśa sopānam anārohataḥ eva upādeya jñāna phala tā vaktum yuktā iti api ca anumeya viṣaye vahni ādau sukha sādhanatva anusmṛti kṛtam upādeya tā jñānam tava na samasti eva tatas ca tatra api tathā ca ayaṃjvalana jātīyaḥ iti parāmarśaḥ bhavatā abhyupeyaḥ eva sa cakiṃkaraṇakaḥ iti nirūpaṇīyam na tāvat indriya dvārakaḥ pāvakasya parokṣa tvāt śabda upamāne tu āśaṅkitum api tatra na yukte 
NM_2,1.179.1	 dhūma ākhyāt liṅgāt eva saḥ utpadyate iti ced na liṅgasya parāmarśa aviṣayīkṛtasya anumeya miti janana naipuṇya anabhyupagamāt dhūma avamarśasyatadānīm atikrānta tvāt tathā hi prathamam liṅga jñānam tatas vyāpti smaraṇam tatas dhūma parāmarśaḥ tatas vahni jñānam tena dhūma parāmarśasya vinaśyattā tatas agnau sukha sādhanatva anusmaraṇam tadā ca dhūma parāmarśasya vināśaḥ eva iti tasmin vinaṣṭe na kevalaḥ dhūmaḥ tadānīm anala parāmarśam janayitum utsahate 
NM_2,1.179.2–2,1.180.0	 agnau sukha sādhanatva anusmaraṇa anantaram punar dhūma jñānam indriyāt utpadyate iti ced mā evam ananubhavāt bhavatu vā dhūma jñānam tathā api dhūma jñāna anantaram punar vyāpti smṛtiḥ punar dhūma parāmarśaḥ ca avaśyaṃbhavet iti atra antare hutabhuji sukha sādhanatva anusmṛtiḥ atikrāntā iti tad sahāya parāmarśa janya sukha sādhana tva niścaya utpādaḥ na syāt sukha sādhanatva anusmaraṇena hi vinaśyat avasthena janyamānaḥ pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ asau dṛṣṭaḥ iti parāmarśasya avasaraḥ api na asti 
NM_2,1.180.1	 atha manyase na tadānīm punar dhūma jñāna vyāpti smaraṇa tatparāmarśa utpāda ādi jñāna śṛṅkhalā abhyupeyate kintu prāktanaḥ eva dhūma parāmarśaḥ kṛśānau sukha sādhanatva anusmaraṇa anantaram smariṣyate tena smṛti viṣaya vartinā satā tathā ca ayam agni jātīyaḥ iti jvalana parām arśaḥ janayiṣyate iti etat api ayuktam agni jñāna anantaram yugapad smaraṇa dvaya udaya prasaṅgāt tadā eva sukha sādhana tā anusmṛtiḥ tadā eva dhūma parāmarśa smṛtiḥ iti na hi krama utpāde kiñcid kāraṇam asti jñāna yaugapadyam ca śāstre pratiṣiddham parāmarśasya durghaṭa tā 
NM_2,1.180.2	 bhavatu vā krama utpādaḥ tathā api smaraṇa dvaya samanantaram upajāyamānaḥ pāvaka parāmarśaḥ na upalabhya anuvādena jāyate krama pakṣe api ca vahni jñāna anantaram tad gata sukha sādhanatva anusmaraṇam eva pūrvam bhavet tatas dhūma parāmarśa smaraṇam tena tasya vinaśyattā tatas agnau tad jātīya tva parāmarśaḥ tena sukha sādhana tva smṛteḥ vināśaḥ eva iti punar api sā vinaṣṭā 
NM_2,1.181.1–2,1.181.2	 satī sukha sādhana tva niścaya janmani na vyāpriyeta iti na ca dhūma liṅga anumita vahni jñāna anantaram dhūma smaraṇam ucitam analam upalabhya hitadgata sukha sādhana tvam anusmarati lokaḥ na dhūmam iti tena anumāna viṣaye parāmarśaḥ ati durghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa viṣaye api evam kim anena śikhaṇḍinā  upanaya vākyasya sārthakyam yat punar upanaya vacanam abhidheya rahitam aprayojyam prasajyate iti paricoditam tat avayavi prasaṅgaḥ eva nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ tasmāt antarāvartinaḥ parāmarśa jñānasya abhāvāt ādyam ālocanā jñānam eva heya ādi jñāna phalam yathā ukta rītyā bhaviṣyati iti sukha sādhana tva niścayaḥ pratyakṣa rūpaḥ api bhavati eva 
NM_2,1.181.3	 nanu ca ! pratyakṣa phalam iha mīmāṃsyam vartate sa ca ayam sukha sādhana tvāt liṅgāt udgamyamānaḥ ānumānikaḥ iti na pratyakṣa phala tām avalambate satyam etat kintu sambandha grahaṇa samaye sukha sādhana tva niścayaḥ pratyakṣa janitaḥ api samasti yatas anumānam pravartate mahānasa ādau dhūma agni darśana vat atas sambandha grahaṇa kāla bhāvinam sukha sādhana tva niścayaṃcetasi vidhāya bhāṣya kāraḥ tad phala tvaṃpratyakṣa jñānasya varṇitavān iti pratyakṣeṇa sukha sādhana tva niścaya ākṣepaḥ samādhānam ca 
NM_2,1.182.2	 nanu ! sambandha grahaṇa kāle api sukha sādhana tva śakteḥ atīndriya tvāt katham pratyakṣa gamyatā tad jātīya tvāt liṅgāt eva tadā api tad grahaṇa īiṣyamāṇe tatas punar sambandha grahaṇāt anavasthā sukhāt eva kāryāt tadā tad avagamaḥ iti ced tadā api na ajñāta sambandham avagati janana samartham iti tad saṃbandha grahaṇa velāyām api śakti grahaṇe pratyakṣasya akṣama tvāt anumāna antara apekṣāyām anavasthā tad avasthā ucyate na khalu ati indriyā śaktiḥ asmābhiḥ upagamyate yayā saha na kāryasya sambandha jñāna saṃbhavaḥ svarūpa sahakāri sannidhānam eva śaktiḥ sā ca sugama eva siddhānte śakteḥ aindriyika tva saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_2,1.182.3	 nanu ! sahakāriṇām madhye adṛṣṭam api anupraviṣṭam na ca tad pratyakṣa gamyam atīndriya tvāt dharmasya iti sā api na sugamā śaktiḥ na etat na dharma ādi śakti tvāt atīndriyam api tu tat naisargikam eva jagat vaicitryeṇa tad anumānam vakṣyāmaḥ tat evam tad itara sahakāri svarūpa sannidhāna ātmikāyāḥ śakteḥ pratyakṣa grāhya tva saṃbhavāt upapannam tad jātīya tva liṅgasya saṃbandha grahaṇam mānasa pratyakṣeṇa sukha sādhana tva niścaya saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_2,1.183.2	 nanu ! kapittha ādi kāryasya sukhasya idānīm na cakṣuḥ grāhya tvamititad sambandhi grahaṇa abhāvāt katham cākṣuṣa pratyaya gamyaḥ sambandhaḥ nacākṣuṣa gamyaḥ sambandhaḥ kintu mānasa pratyakṣa gamyaḥ sukha ādi manasā budhdvā kapittha ādi ca cakṣuṣā tasya kāraṇa tā tatra manasā eva avagamyate manasā sukha sādhana tva grahaṇe ati prasaṅga parihāraḥ 
NM_2,1.183.3–2,1.184.0	 nanu ca ! manasā kapittha ādeḥ sukha sādhana tva grahaṇa abhyupagamebāhya viṣaya pramitiṣu manaḥ eva niraṅkuśam karaṇam idānīm saṃvṛttam iti kṛtaṃcakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ atas ca na kaścid andhaḥ vā badhiraḥ vā syāt na eṣa doṣaḥ prathama pravṛtta samanaskavāhya indriya janita vijñāna viṣayīkṛta vapuṣaḥ vāhyasya vastunaḥ manaḥ grāhya tva abhyupagamāt tasya eva niyāmaka tvāt na ucchṛṅkhalam antaḥkaraṇam bāhya viṣaye pravartate sarvatra sukha sādhana tvam na mānasam bhavitum arhati 
NM_2,1.184.1	 nanu ca ! sambandha grahaṇa kāle yadi mānasena pratyakṣeṇa sukha sādhanatva avadhāraṇam tarhi tad kāle iva vyavahāra kāle api mānasa pratyakṣaḥ eva sukha sādhana tva niścayaḥ astu kim tad jātīya tva liṅga apekṣaṇena iti mā evam śabda liṅga indriya ādi uparatau kevalam antaḥkaraṇam karaṇam kalpyate paridṛśyamānāyāḥ pratīteḥ apahnotum aśakya tvāt liṅga ādi upāya antara saṃbhave tu yadi manaḥ eva kevalam kāraṇam ucyate tat mānasam eva ekam pramāṇaṃsyāt na catvāri pramāṇāni bhaveyuḥ iti alam prasaṅgena 
NM_2,1.184.2–2,1.184.3	 tasmāt sambandha grahaṇa kāle yat tat kapittha ādi viṣayam akṣa jam jñānaṃtat upādeya ādi jñāna phalam iti bhāṣya kṛtaḥ cetasi sthitam sukha sādhana tva jñānam eva upādeya ādi jñānam iti uktam pramāṇa phalayoḥ abheda vādi matam āha kimartham ayam īdṛśaḥ kleśaḥ āśrīyate pramāṇāt abhinnam eva phalam astu ! tat eva cakṣuḥ ādi janitam kapittha ādi padārtha darśanam viṣaya prakāśena vyāpriyamāṇam iva abhāti iti karaṇam ucyatām tat eva viṣaya anubhava svabhāva tvāt phalam iti kathyatām ittham ca pramāṇa phale na bhinna avikaraṇe bhaviṣyataḥ anyatra pramāṇam anyatra phalam iti tat uktam 
NM_2,1.184.4–2,1.185.1	 sa vyāpāra pratīti tvāt pramāṇam phalam eva sat iti tat idam anupapannam pramāṇasya sva rūpa hāni prasaṅgāt karaṇam hipramāṇam ucyate pramīyate ca anena iti na ca kriyā eva kvacid karaṇaṃbhavati kriyāyām sādhyāyām kārakam kim api karaṇam ucyate tatra yathādātreṇa caitraḥ śāli stambam lunāti iti kartṛ karma karaṇāni kriyā ataḥ bhinnāni upalabhyante tathā iha api cakṣuṣā ghaṭam paśyati iti darśana kriyā ataḥ pṛthak bhāvaḥ eva teṣām yuktaḥ na darśanam karaṇam eva iti pramā pramāṇam iti tu phale pramāṇa śabdasya sādhu tva ākhyāna mātram kṛtiḥ karaṇam iti vat pramāṇa phalayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam nāma kim 
NM_2,1.185.2	 yat tu na bhinna adhikaraṇe pramāṇa phale ittham bhaviṣyataḥ iti sā iyam apūrva vācaḥ yuktiḥ kim atra adhikaraṇam vivakṣitam yadi tāvat viṣayaḥ tat asti eva eka viṣaya tvam yat viṣayam hi darśanam saḥ eva cakṣuḥ ādeḥ karaṇasya viṣayaḥ āśrayaḥ astu adhikaraṇam iti bauddha gṛheta avat avācakaḥ granthaḥ kṣaṇika tvena sarva kāryāṇām nirādhāra tvāt 
NM_2,1.186.2	 asmat pakṣe tu bhinna āśrayayoḥ api phala karaṇa bhāvaḥ pāka kāṣṭhayoḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tathā cakṣuḥ jñānayoḥ api bhaviṣyati iti kvacid tu bhinnayoḥ apijñānayoḥ phala karaṇa tvena sthitayoḥ liṅga liṅgi jñānayoḥ iva viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya jñānayoḥ iva ca aikātmya āśrava tvam asti na ttu anena samāna āśraya tvena prayojanam cakṣuḥ ādau= anirvahaṇāt 
NM_2,1.186.3–2,1.186.4	 atha eka phala niṣpattau vyāpāra samāna āśraya tvam ucyate tat apibhavatu kāraka antarāṇām na tu phala svabhāvasya jñānasya phala niṣpattauvyāpāraḥ saṃbhavati yat api sa vyāpāra pratīti tvāt iti ucyate tat api pramāṇa phalayoḥ bhinnatām eva sūcayati na hi svarūpa niṣpattau savyāpāra tvam upapadyate api tu pṛthak bhūta phala nirvṛttau= eva iti 
NM_2,1.187.0–2,1.187.2	 pramāṇa phalayoḥ abhedaḥ anubhava viruddhaḥ nanu ! vastu sthityā phalam eva jñānam phalam api tu bhavat viṣaya anubhavam prati vyāpṛtam iti ayi mugdha buddhe ! viṣaya anubhavaḥ eva jñānam ucyate na tu viṣaya anubhavaḥ viṣaya anubhave sa vyāpāraḥ bhavati atha manuṣe viṣaya adhigama abhimānaḥ tasmin sati bhavati iti kaḥ ayam abhimānaḥ nāma viṣaya anubhavāt bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ vā abhede sati tasmin sati bhavati iti asaṅga tā vācaḥ yuktiḥ bhedetu asmad matā anupraveśaḥ 
NM_2,1.187.3	 api ca jñānam viṣaya adhigame vyāpṛtam iti kṛtvā viṣaya adhigama abhimānam upajanayati uta viṣaya adhigama svabhāva tvāt eva iti vicāre viṣaya adhigamāt pṛthak bhūtasya tatra vyāpriyamāṇasya anupalaṃbhāt viṣaya adhigama svabhāvam eva jñānam avadhāryate tad kṛtaḥ ca abhimānaḥ iti phalam eva jñānam avakalpate na karaṇam iti tathā ca loka phala tvam eva jñānasya anumanyate na karaṇa tvam tathā hi evam vadati cakṣuṣā apaśyāmi liṅgena jānāmi iti na tu jñānena jānāmi iti vyapadiśan kaścid dṛśyate 
NM_2,1.188.1	 nanu ! satsu api cakṣuḥ ādiṣu viṣaya jñānam anupajanayatsu nakaraṇa m vyapadiśati lokaḥ janayatsu ca vyapadiśati iti loke karaṇa utpādaka tvāt eva teṣām karaṇa tva vyapadeśaḥ na sākṣāt karaṇa tvāt iti tat ayuktam cakṣuḥ ādi eva karaṇam na tu tena anyat karaṇam upajanyate kim hi tat anyat karaṇam jñānam iti ced kasyām kriyāyām tat karaṇam iti parīkṣyatām etat na hi ātmani eva kiñcid karaṇam karaṇaṃbhavati iti 
NM_2,1.188.2–2,1.189.0	 yat tu jñānam anupajanayati cakṣuḥ ādau na karaṇa tām ācaṣṭe lokaḥ tat yuktam eva na hi kriyā utpattau= avyāpriyamāṇam karaṇam kārakam bhavati tena cakṣuḥ ādeḥ jñāna kriyām upajanayataḥ karaṇa tvam jñānasya tu phala tvam eva iti yuktaḥ tathā vyapadeśaḥ pramāṇasya pramāṇa tvam tasmāt abhyupagacchatām bhinnam phalam upetavyam eka tve tad asaṃbhavāt pramāṇa prameya pramitīnām abheda nirāsaḥ 
NM_2,1.189.1	 yaḥ tu mūḍhataraḥ pramāṇa prameya phala vyavahāram ekatra eva jñāna ātma ninirvāhayitum udyacchati yadābhāsam prameyam tat pramāṇa phalate punar grāhaka ākāra saṃvittyoḥ trayam na atas pṛthak kṛtam iti tam apavarga āhnike jñānāt vaitat alana prasaṅgena durācāram nirbhartsayiṣyāmahe iti alam vistareṇa tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam yadā jñānam pramāṇam tadā hāna ādi buddhayaḥ phalam iti pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa parīkṣā upasaṃhāraḥ 
NM_2,1.189.2–2,1.189.3	 tat evam phala viśeṣaṇa pakṣe yatas śabda adhyāhāreṇa vācakam sūtram yatas indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tva ādi viśeṣaṇa viśeṣitam jñāna ākhyaṃphalam bhavati tat pratyakṣam iti indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti padasya prayojanam tatra indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padam artha anapekṣa janmanaḥ smṛti ādi jñānasya artha janitasya api ca parokṣa viṣayasya anumāna ādi jñānatti avyavaccheda artham atas tad janakasya na pratyakṣatā prasajyate 
NM_2,1.189.4–2,1.190.1	 nanu indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam indriya gati anumānam api asti tat hi indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa liṅga bhūtena janyate deśa antara prāpti eva tapana gamana anumānam iti katham anena padena anumānam apākriyate na etat evam indriyeṇa sva viṣaya sannikṛṣṭena satā tatra eva yat vijñānam utpadyate tat indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iha brūmahe na ca īdṛśam indriya gati anumānam 
NM_2,1.190.2	 kutas viśeṣa pratilambhaḥ iti ced utpanna grahaṇāt iti brūmaḥ utpanna grahaṇena hi sannikarṣamya kāraka tvam khyāpyate tat ca api indriya viṣaye arthe jñānam utpādayataḥ nirvahati indriya gati anumāne tu na sannikarṣam kārakam āhuḥ api tu jñāpakam atas eva sva grahaṇa sāpekṣaḥ tad anumāne a vyāpriyate na rūpa ādi pramitau= iva tad nirapekṣaḥ iti indriya artha pada vivaraṇam 
NM_2,1.190.3–2,1.191.1	 indriyāṇi ghrāṇa rasana nayana sparśana śrotrāṇi pṛthivī ādi bhūta pañcaka prakṛtīni vakṣyante arthāḥ tu gandha rūpa rasa sparśa śabdāḥ gandha tva ādi sva jāti avacchinnāḥ tad adhikaraṇāni pṛthivī ap tejāṃsi dravyāṇi tad adhiṣṭhānāḥ saṅkhī ā ādayaḥ guṇāḥ utkṣepaṇa ādīni karmāṇi tad vṛttīni sāmānyāni yeṣām sparśanena cakṣuṣā grahaṇam kaṇa vrata mate nirūpitaṃte arthāḥ prāk uktaḥ ca abhāvaḥ api arthaḥ eva vicārya gamyamāna tvāt sannikarṣa bhedaḥ 
NM_2,1.191.2	 sannikarṣaḥ tu indriyāṇām arthaiḥ saha ṣaṣ prakāraḥ tatra dravyaṃcakṣuṣā tvac indriyeṇa vā saṃyogāt gṛhyate tad gataḥ rūpa ādiḥ guṇaḥ saṃyukta samavāyāt rūpa tva ādi sāmānyāni saṃyukta samaveta samavāyāt gṛhyante cakṣuṣā saṃyuktam dravyam tatra samavetam rūpam rūpe casamavetam rūpa tvam iti samavāyāt śabdaḥ gṛhyate śrotram ākāśa dravyam tatra samavetaḥ śabdaḥ śabda tvam samaveta samavāyāt gṛhyate śrotra ākāśa samavete śabde tat hi samavetam iti saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa bhāvāt abhāva grahaṇam vyākhyātam iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti cakṣuṣā saṃyuktaḥ bhū pradeśaḥ tad viśeṣaṇībhūtaḥ ca abhāvaḥ iti sannikarṣa sattve pramāṇam 
NM_2,1.191.3–2,1.191.4	 nanu ! sannikarṣa avagame kim pramāṇam vyavahita anupalabdhiḥ iti brūmaḥ yadi hi asat nikṛṣṭam api cakṣuḥ ādi indriyam artham gṛhṇīyāt vyavahitaḥ api tatas arthaḥ upalabhyeta na ca upalabhyate tasmāt asti sannikarṣaḥ avyavadhāna mātram na pratyakṣa prayojakam nanu ! avyavadhānam eva astu kim sannikarṣeṇa  mā evam 
NM_2,1.192.1–2,1.192.2	 indriyāṇām kāraka tvena prāpya kāri tvāt saṃsṛṣṭam ca kārakam phalāya kalpate iti kalpanīyaḥ saṃsargaḥ etat ca indriya parīkṣāyām nipuṇam nirṇeṣyate iti na iha vivicyate rasa sparśanayoḥ ca spaṣṭam prāpya kāri tvam upalabhyate iti tad sāmānyāt indriya antareṣu api kalpanīyam iti nanu ! evam satyartha ākṣiptaḥ kāraka tvāt eva sannikarṣaḥ iti sva kaṇṭhenakasmāt ucyate ṣaḍvidha tva jñāpana artham iti uktam 
NM_2,1.192.3–2,1.192.5	 utpanna grahaṇena indriya arthayoḥ jñāna janaka tvam darśayati tatra aindriyam karaṇa tvena janakam arthaḥ tu karma tvena nanu ! arthasya jñāna janaka tvam kutas avagamyate tad viṣaya jñāna utpādāt eva svatassa ākāra tvasya nirākṛta tvāt prakāra antareṇa pratikarma vyavasthāyāḥ asiddheḥ nanu ! prayojanam etat pramāṇam pṛṣṭaḥ asi tat brūhi ucyate etat eva pramāṇam anyasya api vīraṇa ādeḥ karma kārakasya kaṭa ādi kārya utpattau pratyakṣa anupalaṃbha pratipannābhyām anvaya vyatirekābhyām yathā 
NM_2,1.193.1	 kāraṇa tvam avadhāryate tathā arthasya api jñāna utpattau yathā hi devadatta arthī kaścid gṛham gataḥ tatra asat nihitam na paśyati devadattam kṣaṇa antare ca enam āyāntam paśyati tatra anvaya vyatirekābhyām devadatta sada sattva anuvartinau jñāna utpāda an utpādau= avadhārya mānasena pratyakṣeṇa candana sukha vat asya tad kāraṇa tām pratipadyate 
NM_2,1.193.2	 nanu ! vīraṇa kaṭayoḥ pṛthak upalaṃbhāt yuktaḥ eṣa nyāyaḥ arthaḥ tu jñānāt pṛthak na kadācid upalabhyate iti duradhigamau tatra anvaya vyatirekau ucyate ayam eva pṛthak upalaṃbhaḥ yat asat nihite arthe na tat viṣayam abādhitam jñānam utpadyate iti tat alam asmin= avasare jñāna vāda garbha codya udvibhāvayiṣayā bhaviṣyati etat avasare iti utpanna pada prayojanam
