NM_2,1.193.3–2,1.194.1	 yathā ca indriyāṇām karaṇānām anvaya vyatirekābhyām jñāna kāraṇa tvam evam arthasya karmaṇaḥ api iti utpanna grahaṇena darśitam sukha ādayaḥ api mānasa pratyakṣa viṣayāḥ nanu ! indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena sukha ādi viṣayam pratyakṣam na saṅgṛhītam na na saṅgṛhītam manasaḥ indriya tvāt sukha ādeḥ arthasya tad grāhya tvāt bhautika ghrāṇa ādi indriya dharma vailakṣaṇyāt tu manasaḥ tad varga īparigaṇanam na kṛtam iti sannikarṣāṇām upayoga prakāraḥ 
NM_2,1.194.2	 tat ca idam pratyakṣam catuṣṭaya traya dvaya sannikarṣāt pravartate tatra bāhyerūpa ādau viṣaye catuṣṭaya sannikarṣāt jñānam utpadyate ātmā manasā asaṃyujyate manaḥ indriyeṇa indriyam arthena iti sukha ādau tu traya sannikarṣāt jñānam utpadyate tatra cakṣuḥ ādi vyāpāra abhāvāt ātmani tuyoginaḥ dvayoḥ ātma manasoḥ eva saṃyogāt jñānam upajāyate tṛtīyasya grāhyasya grāhakasya vā tatra abhāvāt tasmāt sukha ādi jñāna saṅgrahāt indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti yuktam uktam ātma manasoḥ tusat api jñāna janaka tvam iha na sūtritam sarva pramāṇa sādhāraṇa tvāt jñāna pada prayojanam 
NM_2,1.194.3–2,1.195.0	 jñāna grahaṇam viśeṣya nirdeśa artham tasya hi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tva ādīni viśeṣaṇāni tāni asati viśeṣye kasya viśeṣaṇāni syuḥ iti athavā sukha ādi vyāvṛtti artham jñāna padam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannaṃhi sukham api bhavati tatra tad janakam kāraka cakram pramāṇam mā bhūt jñāna janakam eva pramāṇam yathā syāt iti jñāna grahaṇam sukha ādīnām jñāna rūpa tva ākṣepaḥ 
NM_2,1.195.1	 atra śākyāḥ codayanti na jñāna padena sukha ādi vyavacchedaḥ kartuṃyuktaḥ śakyaḥ vā sukha ādīnām api jñāna svabhāva tvāt jñānasya eva āmībhedāḥ sukham duḥkham icchā dveṣaḥ prayatnaḥ iti kāraṇa adhīnaḥ hibhāvānām bhedaḥ bhavitum arhati samāna kāraṇānām api tu bhede abhidhīyamāne na kāraṇa kṛtam padārthānām niyatam rūpam iti tad ākasmika tva prasaṅgaḥ tat uktam tat atad rūpiṇaḥ bhāvāḥ tad atad rūpa hetu jāḥ tad sukha ādi kim ajñānam vijñāna abhinna hetu jam iti tasmāt jñāna rūpāḥ sukha ādayaḥ tad abhinna hetu ja tvāt iti sukha ādīnām jñāna rūpa tva nirākaraṇam 
NM_2,1.195.2–2,1.196.1	 tat idam anupapannam pratyakṣa viruddha tvāt hetoḥ sukha ādi saṃvedyamānam ānanda ādi rūpa tayā anubhūyate jñānam viṣaya anubhava svabhāva tayā iti pratyakṣa siddha bheda tvāt katham abhede anumānam kramate atas eva idam api na vacanīyam ekam eva idam saṃvid rūpam harṣa viṣāda ādi aneka ākāra vivartam paśyāmaḥ tatra yatheṣṭam saṃjñāḥ kriyantām iti saṃvidaḥ viṣaya anubhava svabhāva tayā eva pratibhāsāt sukha ādeḥ ca viṣaya anubhava svabhāvasya anusyūtasya apratibhāsāt jñānam eva viṣaya grahaṇa rūpaṃprakāśate na sukham duḥkham vā 
NM_2,1.196.2	 yaḥ tu sukha jñānam duḥkha jñānam iti pratibhāsaḥ saḥ jñāna svabhāva meda kṛtaḥ eva saṃśaya jñānam viparyaya jñānam itivat uktam atra saṃśaya viparyaya ādau viṣaya anubhava svabhāva tvam anusyūtam avabhāti saṃśayaḥ hi viṣaya grahaṇa ātmakaḥ anubhūyate aniścitam tu viṣayam gṛhṇāti viparyayaḥ api viṣaya grahaṇa ātmakaḥ eva viparītam asantam vā viṣayam gṛhṇāti na tu viṣaya grahaṇa svabhāvam sukham duḥkham ca anubhūyate atas anyaḥ eva ayaṃgrāhya eka svabhāvaḥ āntaraḥ dharmaḥ sukha duḥkha ādiḥ iti ghaṭa jñāna vat viṣaya tayā eva jñānam bhinatti na svabhāva bhedena saṃśaya jñāna vat iti jñāna sukha ādayaḥ na sva prakāśāḥ 
NM_2,1.196.3–2,1.197.1	 tatra etat syāt sva prakāśa tvāt sukha ādeḥ na grāhya eka svabhāva tvam atas ca grāhya grahaṇa ubhaya svabhāva tvāt jñānam eva tat iti mā evaṃvocaḥ sva prakāśa tvam jñāne api pratikṣiptam pratikṣepsyate ca tat kutas sukha ādau bhaviṣyati na hi grahaṇa svabhāvam kaścid sukham anubhavati jñāna vat iti sukha ādayaḥ jñānena eva gṛhyante nanu ! asya prakāśa tva anabhyupagame sukha ādeḥ utpāda anutpādayoḥ aviśeṣāt sarvadā sukhi tvam na kadācid vā syāt iti 
NM_2,1.197.2–2,1.197.4	 na etat evam utpannam eva sapadi sukham gṛhyate jñānena iti katham anutpannāt na viśiṣyate pratyuta sva prakāśa sukha vādinām eṣa doṣaḥ sva prakāśa sukha utpādāt tena eva sva prakāśena sukhena anyaḥ api sukhī syāt sva prakāśasya dīpa ādeḥ sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭa tvāt kvacid santāne sva prakāśa sukha utpādāt tena eva sva prakāśena anyaḥ api sukhī syāt yasya api sukham na utpannam iti kiñca kim ekam eva jñānam sarva sukha duḥkha ādi aśeṣa ākāra bhūṣitam iṣyate uta kiñcid sukha ātmakam kiñcid duḥkha ātmakam iti ādye pakṣe sarva ākāra khacita jñāna upajananāt ekasmin= eva kṣaṇeparaspara viruddha sukha duḥkha ādi dharma prabandha saṃvedana prasaṅgaḥ 
NM_2,1.197.5	 uttarasmin= tu kiñcid sukha jñānam kiñcid duḥkha jñānam iti yat kiñcit asukha duḥkha khacitam viṣaya anubhava svabhāvam api jñānam anubhūyamānam eṣitavyam eva tat ca na svaccham api tu kenacid haṭa ādinā viṣayeṇa uparaktam anvaya vyatirekābhyām ca ghaṭa ādi upajanana apāye api bodha svabhāvam anuvartamānam pratīyate tat idānīm sukha jñānam api anubhūyamānam sukhena viṣaya bhāva juṣā ghaṭa ādinā iva uparajyate iti gamyate na sva rūpeṇa eva sukha ātmakam tatas bhinna rūpasya bodha mātra svabhāvasya jñānasya anyadā adṛṣṭa tvāt iti tasmāt na bodha rūpāḥ sukha ādayaḥ jñāna sukhayoḥ sajātīya kāraṇa janya tvam na asti eva 
NM_2,1.198.2–2,1.198.3	 abhinna hetu ja tvāt iti ca ayam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ samavāyi kāraṇasya ātmanaḥ asamavāyi karaṇasya ca ātma mana ssaṃyogasya ca abhede api nimitta kāraṇasya sukha tva jñāna tva ādeḥ bhinna tvāt nanu sukha utpādāt pūrvam anāśrayam sukha tva sāmānyam katham tatrasyāt kaḥ ca asya sukha hetubhiḥ kārakaiḥ saṃsargaḥ asaṃsṛṣṭam vā kathaṃkārakam syāt  ucyate sarva gatāni sāmānyāni sādhayiṣyante iti santi tatra api sukha tva ādīni yogya tā lakṣaṇaḥ eva ca eṣā aṃsukha hetubhiḥ kārakaiḥ saṃsargaḥ dharma adharma vat dharma adharmau hi sarvasya prāṇinām sukha duḥkha hetoḥ jāyamānasya śāli ādeḥ kāryasya kāraṇam 
NM_2,1.199.1	 tayoḥ ca tad kāraṇaiḥ bīja kṣiti jala ādibhiḥ saha yogya tā eva saṃsargaḥ evam sukha tva ādīnām api syāt tasmāt nimitta kāraṇa bhedāt bhinnāni jñāna sukha ādīni kāryāṇi nimitta kāraṇa anya tvam api kāryasya bhedakam vilakṣaṇāḥ hi dṛśyante ghaṭa ādau pāka jāḥ guṇāḥ api ca jñānam icchanti na sarve jñāna pūrvakam sukha duḥkha ādi sarvam tu viṣaya jñāna pūrvakam viṣaya anubhava utpādyāḥ yatra api na sukha ādayaḥ tatra api teṣām utpattau kāraṇam viṣaya smṛtiḥ 
NM_2,1.199.2–2,1.200.1	 kvacid tu saṅkalpaḥ api sukhasya kāraṇa tām pratipadyate tasmāt sarvam sukha ādi jñāna pūrvakam eva jñānam api jñāna pūrvakam eva iti ced na upariṣṭāt nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt na hi garbha ādau mada mūrchā ādi anantaram vā jñānam upajāyamānaṃjñāna antara pūrvakam bhavati iti vakṣyāmaḥ tena jñāna sukha ādīnām vailakṣaṇya upapādanāt sukha ādi nivṛtti artham jñāna grahaṇam arthavat avyabhicāri padena na jñāna pada vaiyyarthyam 
NM_2,1.200.2	 nanu ! evam api na jñāna grahaṇena kṛtyam avyabhicāri padā deva sukha ādi vyavacchedasya siddha tvāt vyabhicāra avi abhicārau hi jñānasya dharmau na sukha ādeḥ atas tad upādānāt tad dharma yogi jñānam labhyataā iva kim jñāna grahaṇena na etat evam sukhasya api savyabhicārasyadṛṣṭa tvāt kim punassukham vyabhicāra vat dṛṣṭam yat etat para dāra abhimarśa ādi niṣiddha ācaraṇa saṃbhavam sukham tad vyabhicāri jñāna vat sukham api vyabhicaritam asti eva 
NM_2,1.200.3–2,1.200.6	 nanu ! sukhasya kīdṛśaḥ vyabhicāraḥ jñānasya api kīdṛśaḥ vyabhicāraḥ atasmin= tathā abhāvaḥ sukhasya api atasmin= tathā abhāvaḥ eva kim para purandhrī pariraṃbha saṃbhavam sukham sukham na bhavati kim śuktikāyām rajata jñānam jñānam na bhavati jñānam bhavati kintu mithyā idam api sukham bhavati kintu mithyā 
NM_2,1.201.1–2,1.201.3	 nanu ! na sukham mithyā tat api hi ānanda svabhāvam eva yadi evam śuktikāyām rajata jñānam api na mithyā tat api hi viṣaya anubhava svabhāvam eva nanu ! viṣaya anubhava svabhāvam api tat jñānam viṣayam vyabhicarati sukham api tarhi idam ānanda svabhāvam api sva hetum viṣayam vyabhicarati eva kim asukha sādhanena tat janitam jñānam api kim ajñāna sādhanena janitam 
NM_2,1.201.4–2,1.201.6	 nanu ! jñānam jñāna sādhanena janitam asatyena pratyakṣa bādhitena rajata ādinā sukham api sukha sādhanena janitam asatyena tu śāstra bādhitena para vanitā ādinā kim para vanitā ādi na satyam tatra api jñāna janakam na satyam asatyam pratyakṣa bādhita tvāt para vanitā ādi api sukha sādhanam asatyam śāstra bādhita tvāt 
NM_2,1.201.7–2,1.201.9	 nanu ! śāstreṇa kim atra bādhyate jñāne api pratyakṣeṇa kim bādhyate viṣayaḥ mithyā iti khyāpyate śāstreṇa api sukhasya hetuḥ bhithyā iti khyāpyate kim sa viṣaya ssukha hetuḥ na bhavati yathā tu eṣa viṣayaḥ kaluṣasya jñānasya hetuḥ tathā saḥ api kaluṣasya kaṭu vipākasya sukhasya hetuḥ iti tathāvidham sukham api vyabhicāri bhavati eva iti alam ati kelinā 
NM_2,1.201.10–2,1.202.2	 tasmāt samāna nyāya tvāt sukhe vyabhicāritā asti iti avyabhicāri padāt jñānam na labhyate vyavasāya ātmakam iti padena sukha ādi vyāvṛtti śaṅkā aparaḥ āha kim anena ḍimbha kalahena mā bhūt avi abhicāri padāt sya lābhaḥ ! tathā api vyavasāya ātmaka padāt labhyate eva jñānam na hi sukha duḥkha ādayaḥ vyavasāya ātmakāḥ bhavanti kintu jñānam evatathāvidham iti saṃśaya vyavaccheda artham tat padam iti ced satyam sukha ādi vyavacchedam api kartum alam eva bhavati vyavasāya ātmaka tvasya sukha ādiṣu asaṃbhavāt iti jñāna pada prayojana nigamanam 
NM_2,1.202.3–2,1.203.0	 tat evam siddhe api sukha ādi vyavacchede kartavyam eva jñāna grahaṇam viśeṣya nirdeśa artha tvāt tasya hi sarvāṇi amūni viśeṣaṇāni upāttāni tad anupādāne nirālambanāni bhaveyuḥ śrotuḥ ca buddhiḥ na samādhīyeta iti tena balāt gamyamānam eva kartavyam eva jñāna grahaṇam artha ākṣiptasya avacanepratyakṣam pratyakṣam iti etāvat mātram abhidheyam syāt anyat arthāt labhyate eva tasmāt dharmi nirdeśa artham yuktam jñāna padam avyapadeśya pada prayojanam śabdānām artha saṃsparśi tvam śākya mata nirāsena sādhayiṣyate iti śabda anupraveśa vaśena vyapadeśyam nāma jñānam upapadyatā eti tad vyavaccheda artham avyapadeśya padam bhāṣya uktam avyapadeśya pada prayojanam 
NM_2,1.203.1	 tatra vṛddha naiyāyikāḥ tāvat ācakṣate vyapadiśyate iti vyapadeśyam śabda karmatā āpannam jñānam ucyate yat indriya artha sannikarṣāt utpannaṃsat viṣaya nāmadheyena vyapadiśyate rūpa jñānam rasa jñānam iti tatvyapadeśyam jñānam pratyakṣa phalam pratyakṣam mā bhūt iti avyapadeśya grahaṇam tat idam anupapannam na hi nāmadheya vyapadeśya tvam aprāmāṇya kāraṇam bhavati yadi hi tat rūpa jñānam rasa jñānam ca viṣaya avyabhicāri nissaṃśayam catat katham apramāṇa phalam ucyate vyabhicāra ādi doṣa yoge vā pada antareṇa tad pratikṣepāt kim avyapadeśya padena 
NM_2,1.203.2–2,1.204.0	 pramāṇa phalam ca tat vijñānam idānīm kiṃpramāṇa prabhavam bhavatu na pratyakṣa phalam etat pada pratikṣipta tvāt na anumāna ādi janyam tad vailakṣaṇyāt na asti kiñcid pañcamam pramāṇam asaṅgrahaḥ asi alakṣyasya lakṣaṇena iti prajñā pramādaḥ tasmāt apavyākhyānam etat avyapadeśya padasya mata antareṇa prayojana varṇanam 
NM_2,1.204.1	 vyavacchedya antaram avpadeśya padasya varṇayāñcakruḥ ācāryāḥ śabda artheṣu sthaviravya bahāravaḥ vyutpadyamānaḥ janaḥ saṃśaya avagama samayesaṃjñā upadeśaka ādayam panasa ucyate iti vṛddha udīritāt vākyāt purovasthita śākhā ādimantam artham panasa śabda vācya tayā jānāti tat asya jñānam indriya jam api na kevala indriya karaṇakam bhavitum ucitam asati saṃjñā upadeśini śabde tad anutpādāt tena śabda indriyābhyām saṃbhūya janita tvāt ubhaya jam idam jñānam vyapadeśāt jātam iti vyapadeśyam ucyate tat avyapadeśya padena vyudasyate 
NM_2,1.204.2–2,1.205.1	 na ca idam pañcamam pramāṇam avatarati kintu śābdam iva etat anumanyatelokaḥ tathā ca katham punar jānīte bhavān panasaḥ ayam iti iti pṛṣṭaḥ prativakti mama devadattena ākhyātam panasaḥ ayam iti iti na punar evaṃvismṛtyā api vravi iti cakṣuṣā mayā pratipannam panasaḥ ayam ucyate iti iti tat indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāne sati api śabdaḥ eva atra karaṇam 
NM_2,1.205.2–2,1.205.3	 atas eva sūtra kṛtā śabda lakṣaṇam varṇayatā na indriya anupraveśa pratiṣedhāya kim api viśeṣaṇam uparacitam upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti etāvat eva lakṣaṇam abhihitam atas ca indriya anupraveśe api śābda tām asya manyatesūtra kāraḥ iha punar avyapadeśya viśeṣaṇa padoṣa ādānena śabda anupraveśa pratiṣedhāt na pratyakṣam etat jñānam tasmāt evaṃvidha vyapadeśya vajñāna vyavaccheda artham avyapadeśya padam iti uktam atanirākaraṇam 
NM_2,1.205.4	 tat etat vyākhyātāraḥ na anumanyante yadi ubhaya jam jñānam avyapadeśya padena vyudasyate tat api na apramāṇam apramāṇa lakṣaṇa atīta tvāt iti pramāṇam bhavat kasmin anuviśatām iti cintyam nanu ! śābdam idam jñānam tad bhāva anuvidhānataḥ bhavatu akṣajam api etat tad bhāva anuvidhānataḥ śābdam ca ubhaya jam ca iti viruddham abhidhīyate pramāṇa antaram eva syāt ittham tat api pūrvavat 
NM_2,1.206.1	 nanu ! lokaḥ śābda tām asya vyapadiśati devadattena ākhyātaṃpanasaḥ ayam iti iti vyavahārāt iti uktam aho ! loka vatsalaḥ śraddadhānaḥ mahā anubhāvaḥ ! na khalu lokasya vyapadeśa eka śaraṇāḥ vastu sthitayaḥ bhavanti lokaḥ hi yathāruci vyapadiśati nānā muni jana sādhāraṇam api tīrtham nandikuṇḍam iti kim na śrutavān bhavān 
NM_2,1.206.2	 hanta ! tarhi sūtrakārāśayam anusarantaḥ śābdam idam jñānam pratipadyāmahe yat ayam sūtrakāraḥ pratyakṣe śabda anupraveśa vyavacchedāya viśeṣaṇam idam upadiśati śabde tu na indriya vyudāsāya kiñcid viśeṣaṇam upādatte sa paśyati kāraṇa antara anupraveśe api śābdam etat jñānam iti ucyate manu vat sūtra kāraḥ api na dharmasya upadeśakaḥ yena etat anurodhena tasya brūyāma śābda tām 
NM_2,1.206.3–2,1.206.4	 vastu sthityā tu nirūpyamāṇam indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt idam vijñānam na pratyakṣa phala tām ativartate tatas ca vyudasyamānaṃpramāṇa antara tām eva spṛśet sva matena avyapadeśya pada prayojana kathanam tasmāt ubhaya jajñāna vyudāsa anupapattitaḥ vyākhyā bhaṅgi antareṇa asya padasya iyam vidhīyate asambhava doṣa vyavaccheda artham avyapadeśya pada upādānam evam hiparaḥ manyate sati lakṣye lakṣaṇa varṇanam ucitam iha tu 
NM_2,1.207.1	 lakṣyamāṇam pratyakṣam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam nāma na kiñcid asti gauḥ ityādi jñānānām śabda avacchinna vācya viṣaya tvena śābda tvāt iha hi viṣaya vyatirekeṇa jñānānām atiśayaḥ durupapādaḥ bodha svabhāvasya sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭa tvāt tatra yathā daṇḍī iti śukla eti vā pratyayaḥ viśeṣaṇa avacchinna viśeṣya viṣaya tayā sa atiśaya tvam aśnute tathā gauḥ iti ādi pratyayaḥ api vācaka avacchinna vācya viṣaya tvāt sa atiśaya tvam bhajate śabda avacchinna vācya viṣaya tvāt ca śābdaḥ eṣa pratyayaḥ tad vyatirikta karaṇa kāryatva anupapatteḥ 
NM_2,1.207.2–2,1.208.1	 na hi indriya karaṇakam idam jñānam bhavitum arhati cakṣuṣaḥ viśeṣaṇā viṣaya tvāt viśeṣye ca śrotrasya asāmarthyāt na ca yugapad indriya dvaya dvārakam ekam utpadyamānam jñānam kvacid dṛṣṭam tatra etat syāt mānasam idam jñānam sugandhibandhūka bodha vat bhaviṣyati uktam atra śabda liṅga ādi karaṇa antara vyāpāra viratau kāryam upajāyamānaṃkevala manaḥ karaṇam iti kalpyate na tad saṃbhave api tathā hi sati mānasam eva ekam pramāṇam syāt iti asti ca atra śabdaḥ eva karaṇam sa hi sahasra kiraṇa vat ātmānam ca viṣayam ca prakāśayati iti tasmāt indriya viṣaye api gauḥ ityādi jñānam utpadyamānam śābdam eva iti avadhāryate atītaḥ api śabdaḥ jñāna gocaraḥ bhavet eva 
NM_2,1.208.2	 nanu ! saṅketa avagama samaye gauḥ iti ādi śabdaḥ śrutaḥ āsīt saidānīm atikrāntaḥ iti katham tad kṛtaḥ eṣa pratyayaḥ syāt ucyate tadānīm aśrūyamāṇasya śabdasya smṛti ārūḍhasya tad pratyaya hetu tvāt tad śrutau= api kim sarve varṇāḥ pratyakṣa gocarāḥ viśeṣaḥ kaḥ antya varṇena gṛhītena smṛtena vā tat evam smṛti viṣayī kṛta śabda janitaḥ eṣa pratyayaḥ iti abhyupetavyaḥ yathā parokṣe api śabdaḥ uccaritaḥ ātmānam prakāśayati artham ca tathā pratyakṣe viṣaye saḥ eva smaryamāṇaḥ ātmānam artham ca prakāśa yati itivācaka avacchinna vācya pratibhāsaḥ ca evaṃvidhāsu buddhiṣu nūnam eṣitavyaḥ yathā aaha bhaṭṭaḥ saṃjñi tvam kevalam param iti 
NM_2,1.208.3–2,1.209.2	 saṃjñi tvam iti mattu arthīya pratyaya antāt utpannaḥ bhāva pratyayaḥ saṃbandham ācaṣṭe saṃjñā saṃjñi saṃbandhaḥ saṃjñi tvam iti kṛt taddhita samāseṣu sambandha abhidhānam bhāva pratyayena iti ābhiyukta smaraṇāt saṃjñā ca śabdaḥ saḥ ayam śabda viśiṣṭa artha pratibhāsaḥ uktaḥ bhavati na ca śabda anusandhāna rahitaḥ kaścid pratyayaḥ dṛśyate anullikhita śabdakeṣu api pratyayeṣu antatas sāmānya śabda samunmeṣa saṃbhavāt tad ullekha vyatirekeṇa prakāśa ātmikāyāḥ pratīteḥ anutpādāt tathā aaha bhartṛ hariḥ na saḥ asti pratyayaḥ loke yaḥ śabda anugamāt ṛte anuviddham iva jñānam sarvam śabdena gṛhyate iti tasmāt pratyakṣasya lakṣyasya abhāvāt kasya idam lakṣaṇam upakrāntam iti asaṃbhava doṣam āśaṅkya āha sūtrakāraḥ avyapadeśyam iti avyapadeśya padena śabda anuvedha pakṣa nirāsa prakāraḥ 
NM_2,1.209.3–2,1.210.1	 yat idam avidita pada padārtha sambandhasya jñānam utpadyate vidita sambandhasya api vā yat prathama akṣa sannipāta samayaḥ eva jñānam anullikhita śabdakam śabda anusmaraṇe hetu bhūtam upajāyate tat aśabdam aśabda avacchinna viṣayam avyapadeśyam indriya artha sannikarṣa eka karaṇam avikalpam pratyakṣam na ca śabda kṛtā buddhīnām prakāśa svabhāva tā svatas eva tāsām evaṃrūpa tvāt na ca nirvikalpaka samaye yat kiñcid idam iti ādi sāmānya śabda ullekhaḥ kaḥ api kaiścid anubhūyate tasmāt gauḥ ityādi jñānānām śābda tve api tathāvidhasya jñānasya lakṣyasi asadbhāvāt na vyartham lakṣaṇam iti evam asaṃbhava doṣa nirākaraṇa artham avyapadeśya padam iti gauḥ ityādi jñānānām na śābda tvam 
NM_2,1.210.2	 tat etat ācāryāḥ na kṣamante na gauḥ iti ādi jñānam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam api idam śābdam iti vaktum yuktam na ca atra śabda avacchinna arthaḥ prakāśate tathāvidha artha grahaṇe kāraṇa abhāvāt viśeṣya artha pramitau tāvat śabdaḥ karaṇam viśeṣaṇībhūtasya tuśabdasya grahaṇe kim karaṇam iti nirūpyatām na śrotram viramya vyāpārā saṃvedanāt sambandha grahaṇāt ūrdhvam ca smaryamāṇa śabda yojanayā jāyamāne gauḥ iti ādi jñāne śrotram karaṇam āśaṅkitum api na yuktam na api manaḥ bāhya karaṇa nirapekṣam bāhye viṣaye dhiyam ādhātum alam andhādya bhāva prasaṅgāt 
NM_2,1.210.3–2,1.211.1	 nanu śabdaḥ eva karaṇam iti uktam tat kim apara karaṇa āśaṅkanena mā evam ekasya kārakasya ekasyām eva kriyāyām karma karaṇa bhāva anupapatteḥ savitṛ prakāśa vat iti ced na kriyā bhedāt yatra asau karaṇam na tatra karma yatra vā karma na tatra karaṇam iti ghaṭa ādi viṣaya pramiti janmani karaṇam eva taraṇi prakāśaḥ na karma tad grahaṇa kāle tu karma eva asau na karaṇam 
NM_2,1.211.2	 kim tarhi tatra karaṇam iti ced kevalam eva cakṣuḥ iti brūmaḥ āloka grahaṇe cakṣuṣaḥ prakāśa antara nirapekṣa tvāt katham evam iti ced aparyanuyojyā hi vastu śaktiḥ ghaṭa ādi grahaṇe cakṣuḥ udyotam apekṣate na udyota grahaṇaḥ iti kam anuyuñjmahe saḥ ayam sūrya prakāśaḥ prakāśa antara nirapekṣa cakṣuḥ indriya prathama gṛhītaḥ ciram avatiṣṭhamānaḥ tad indriya grāhyaḥ eva viṣaye gṛhyamāṇe karaṇa tām upayāti iti yuktam 
NM_2,1.211.3	 śabdaḥ tu kṣaṇikaḥ śrotra indriya grāhyaḥ tad itara paricchedye viṣayetat avagama kriyāyām karaṇībhūya bhūyas tasyām eva kriyāyām katham ivakarma bhāvam anubhavet śabdaḥ hi dhūma ādi vat upāyaḥ eva na upeyaḥ saḥ upāya tvāt prathamam gṛhyatām nāma na upeya grahaṇa kāle punar grahaṇam arhati dhūma vat eva iti evam smaryamāṇaḥ api śabdaḥ yatra artha pratīti kāraṇaṃtatrā api prathamam śabda smaraṇam tatas śabda artha sampratyayaḥ bhavati na tarāṃtatra artha pratīti velāyām śabda grahaṇam saṃbhāvyate tasmāt nāstivācaka viśeṣita vācya pratibhāsaḥ 
NM_2,1.212.1–2,1.212.2	 api ca gauḥ ityādi jñānam indriya artha sannikarṣa anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi prasabham tat katham śābdam iti ucyate śabda smaraṇa sāpekṣam yasya utpādakam indriyam tat eva yadi te śābdam aho naiyāyikaḥ bhavān ! aindriyika pratyakṣe api śabda bhāna saṃbhavaḥ nanu ! śabda avacchinnam artham na cakṣuḥ śrotrayoḥ anyatarat api karaṇaṃgrahī tum alam iti uktam bhoḥ sādho ! cakṣuḥ eva enam grahīṣyati iti katham na brūṣe nanu ! na aviṣaye yuktam indriyasya pravartanam tena śabda viśiṣṭa artha jñānam na indriya jam bruve marīciṣu jala jñānam katham indriya jam tava tatra api hi na toyena sannikarṣaḥ asti cakṣuṣaḥ nanu ! ca smṛti upārūḍham udakam tatra gṛhyate iha api smṛti upārūḍhaḥ śabdaḥ kasmāt na gṛhyate ! nanu ! śabdaḥ na netrasya kadācid api gocaraḥ 
NM_2,1.213.0–2,1.213.2	 asannihitam api ambu kim vā bhavati gocaraḥ  nanu ! eka indriya vādaḥ syāt cakṣuṣā śabda vedane atra api sarva bodhaḥ syāt asannihita vedane pratyakṣam indriya āsannikṛṣṭa vastu viṣayakam api bhavati nanu ca ! marīci jala jñānam bhrāntam iti katham iha dṛṣṭāntīkriyate katham asya bhrānta tvam kim anindriya ja tvāt uta vyabhicāri tvāt tatra anindriya ja tvena asya bhrānta tāyām indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena eva nirāsāt avyabhicāri padam anupādeyam iti tad upādānāt vyabhicāri tvena asya bhrānta tvam iti nūnam idam indriya jam asat nihita salila jñānam abhyupagantavyam yathā ca aviṣaye tasmin nīre nayana jā matiḥ tathā vācaka saṃspṛṣṭe vācye kim iti na iṣyate  yathā ca tava kāla ādi nīrūpam api cākṣuṣam tathā śabda anuraktaḥ api kim iti arthaḥ na cākṣuṣaḥ  evam hi indriya vyatireka anuvidhānam atra na bādhitam bhaviṣyati nanu ! cākṣuṣa tām śabde na jīvan vaktum utsahe tyaja enam vācaka upeta vācya avagama durgraham 
NM_2,1.214.0	 gauḥ ayam ityādi jñānānām śābda tva asaṃbhavaḥ api ca amuṣya śābda tve sambandha grahaṇam katham na ca agṛhīta sambandhaḥ śabdaḥ bhavati vācakaḥ nirvikalpaka vi jñāna viṣaye na ca tad grahaḥ śābda pakṣe tu nikṣiptam bhavatā sa vikalpakam sambandhaḥ śakyate boddhum na ca māna antarāt vinā śābda jñānena tad bodhe bhavet anyonya saṃśrayaḥ na ca śabda uparakte arthe sambandham buddhyate janaḥ go śabda vācyaḥ go śabdaḥ iti hi grahaṇam bhavet 
NM_2,1.214.1–2,1.215.0	 vācyasya hi gavā ādeḥ go śabda viśeṣitasya vācya tvāt vācyaḥ arthā eva go śabdaḥ api vācya tām avalambate yadi ca sva anurāgeṇa vācakāt vācya vedanam liṅgāt api bhavet buddhiḥ sva avacchedena liṅgini atha dhūma anvita tvena na vahniḥ avagamyate iha api śabda yogena gavādiḥ na eva gamyate na ca asti vastunaḥ dharmaḥ vā acya tā nāma kaścana yadi syāt nirvikalpe api pratibhāseta rūpavat artha asaṃsparśinaḥ śabdān kathayan duṣṭa saugataḥ pratyakṣa astreṇa bhettavyaḥ sa katham hanyate tvayā pratyakṣa viṣaye vṛttiḥ śabdānām bhavataḥ kutas teṣām yat viṣaye vṛttiḥ tat hi śābdīkṛtam tvayā sarvatra vācaka bhāna aṅgīkāre śabda vivartavāda avatāraḥ syāt 
NM_2,1.215.1–2,1.216.0	 api ca viṣaya bhedena pratibhāsa bhedaḥ bhavati iti durāśayā śabda viśiṣṭam artham nirvikalpāt sa vikalpasya viṣayam adhikam paśyati bhavān ! anena eva ca vartmanā avataran param śabda adhyāsam na paśyati itikaḥ ayam vyāmohaḥ sa tvam vacanīyaḥ asi saṃvṛttaḥ madhu paśyasi durbuddhe ! prapātam na eva paśyasi iti tasmāt gauḥ iti vijñānam pratyakṣam avadhāryatām śabda smaraṇa sāpekṣa cakṣuḥ indriya nirmitam mānasa tvam tu yadi asya na iṣyate yuktam eva tat tad bhāva anuvidhāyi tvāt bāhya indriya jam eva tat sa vikalpake śabda anuvedha abhāve nirvikalpa kāda vaila kṣaṇya āpādanam 
NM_2,1.216.1	 atra punar pravarāḥ prāhuḥ nanu ! evam gauḥ iti ādi bodheṣu vācaka avacchinna vācya pratibhāse sarva prakāram apākriyamāṇe prathama akṣa sannipāta samaya samāsādita sadbhāva nirvikalpaka vedana vailakṣaṇyam katham eṣām bhavet na hi viṣaya atiśayam antareṇa pratibhāsā atiśayaḥ bhavitum arhati daṇḍī iti daṇḍa viśiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ pratibhāsate itarathā na kevala puruṣa pratīteḥ eṣā pratītiḥ viśiṣyate ubhaya pratibhāse api na daṇḍa puruṣau= iti pratīteḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvasya niyāmaka tvāt pūrva apara cira kṣipra krama ādi avagameṣu api diś kāla ādi viśiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ sphurati atiśaya grahāt pratyakṣaḥ kim sa kāla ādiḥ pratītim pṛccha kim mayā gṛhyate tad viśiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ sa ca na iti etat adbhutam 
NM_2,1.217.0–2,1.217.2	 kāla vat samavāyaḥ api pratyakṣaḥ etena samavāye api pratyakṣa tvam prakāsitam iha iti tantu sambanddha paṭa pratyaya darśanāt ayam paṭaḥ iti pratyayāt iha tantuṣu paṭaḥ iti vilakṣaṇaḥ eṣa pratyayaḥ tantu paṭa sambandhasya viśeṣaṇasya apratyakṣatāyām na kevala paṭa pratyayāt viśiṣyeta iti sāmagrī bheda mātrāt na pratīti bhedaḥ atha matam upāya bhedāt pratīti bhedaḥ bhavati dūra avidūra deśa vyavasthita sthāṇu ādi padārtha pratīti vat saṃskṛta āsaṃskṛta akṣa karaṇa viṣaya bodha vat vā iti tat asāṃpratam upāya bhede api tad bheda asiddheḥ upāyaḥ buddhau= atiśayam ādadhāti na viṣaye 
NM_2,1.217.3	 viṣaya avagati samaye ca na buddhiḥ avabhāti iti naiyāyikāḥ tat ayam atiśayaḥ yat adhikaraṇaḥ sā na pratibhāsate buddhiḥ yat catadānīm avabhāsate viṣayaḥ tatra atiśayaḥ na asti dṛśyate ca atiśaya saṃvedanam iti saṅkaṭaḥ panthāḥ na ca dūra avidūra deśa vartini padārthepratītiḥ upāya bhedāt bhidyate sā api hi viṣaya bhedāt eva bhidyate 
NM_2,1.218.0–2,1.218.2	 dūrāt hi vastu sāmānyam dharma mātra upalakṣitam adūrataḥ tu vispaṣṭa viśeṣam avasīyate yathā mādhena varṇitam cayaḥ tviṣām iti avadhāritam purā ātatas śarīrī iti vibhāvita ākṛtim vibhuḥ vibhakta avayavam pumān itikramāt amum nāradaḥ iti abodhi saḥ iti kriyā antarāṇām vaicitrye yat vā tat vā astu kāraṇam bhedaḥ jñāna kriyāyāḥ tu karma bheda nibandhanaḥ upāya bhedāt eva nirvikalpaka sa vikalpaka vaila kṣaṇyam tat etat ācāryāḥ pratisamādadhate na viṣaya bhedāt eva pratibhāsa bhedaḥ kintu upāya bhedāt bhavati eva 
NM_2,1.218.3–2,1.219.1	 yat ca coditam viṣaya pratibhāsa kāle tad pratibhāsā pratibhāsā tatiśaya vacane saṅkaṭaḥ panthāḥ iti tad avidita naiyāyika darśanasya eva codyam jñāna utpādaḥ eva viṣayasya pratyakṣata iti naḥ darśanam na jñāna grahaṇam iti tatra yathā puruṣaḥ iti niratiśaya jñāna mātra utpādetāvat mātra viṣaya pratyakṣa tā bhavati na tatra jñānam prakāśate agṛhyamāṇe api jñāne viṣayaḥ eva pratibhāsate evam daṇḍī iti śukla vāsāḥ iti viśeṣaṇa jñāna abhyupāya vaśāt sa atiśaya pratyaya janane tad agrahaṇesaḥ eva viṣayaḥ a vabhāsate iti kiyān eṣa saṅkaṭaḥ panthāḥ ! tathā ca daṇḍī iti puruṣa pravaṇā eva matiḥ kaḥ daṇḍī puruṣaḥ kaḥ puruṣaḥ daṇḍī iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena nissandigdhasya puṃsaḥ eva pratibhāsāt evam daṇḍinam bhojaya daṇḍine dehi iti bhojana ādi kārya yogi tvam na daṇḍedṛśyate api tu puṃsi eva viśiṣṭa buddheḥ viśeṣya pravaṇa tvam 
NM_2,1.219.2	 nanu ! daṇḍī parvatam ārohati iti daṇḍe api kārya anvayaḥ dṛśyateloke vede api daṇḍī maitrāvaruṇaḥ praiṣān anvāhaḥ iti praiṣa anuvaṃcanasya vacana antarataḥ prāpteḥ daṇḍa vidhāna artham etat vākyam bhavati yathā lohita uṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti śyena ādau ṛtvijām prakṛti vat bhāvena prāptānām lohita uṣṇīṣa vidhāna mātram etat bhavati ucyate bhavatu evam kintu daṇḍam abalambya puruṣaḥ parvatamāḥ hati na daṇḍa ūniścetanaḥ vede api daṇḍa pāṇiḥ puruṣaḥ preṣān anubhāṣata na daṇḍaḥ na lohitāḥ uṣṇīṣāḥ caranti kintu anya padārthībhūtāḥ ṛtvijaḥ eva iti sarvatra viśeṣya pravaṇā eva matiḥ ubhaya pratipādane tu daṇḍa puruṣau= itisyāt na daṇḍī iti 
NM_2,1.219.3–2,1.219.4	 viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvasya niyāmaka tvāt iti ced sā iyam viśeṣya pravaṇāḥ matiḥ uktā eva bhavati viśeṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇa tvena eva upasarjana tvāt daṇḍaḥ asya asti iti puruṣaḥ eva ucyate na daṇḍa puruṣau evam pūrva apara ādi pratyayāḥ cira kṣipra ādi pratyayāḥ iha tantuṣu paṭa etyādi pratyayāḥ ca diś kāla samavāya grāhiṇaḥ te ime diś kāla samavāyāḥ sāmagrī antargatāssantaḥ pratyaya atiśayam ādadhati na tad viṣayī bhavanti paṭa ādi dravya vat 
NM_2,1.220.1–2,1.220.2	 evam patana ādi anumeya guru tva ādi kāraṇa bheda janitāḥ guruḥ pāṣāṇaḥ iti ādi pratyayāḥ parokṣa viśeṣaṇam viśaṣyam avalambante iti alam vistareṇa tasmāt gauḥ ityādi jñānam na vācaka avacchinna vācya viṣayam atas ca na śābdam tat api tu su spaṣṭam pratyakṣam eva tasmin= ca lakṣyesati lakṣaṇa vaiyarthya śaṅkā karaṇa abhāvāt na asaṃbhava doṣa nirākaraṇa artham avyapadeśya padam sva matena avyapadeśya pada prayojana varṇanam 
NM_2,1.220.3–2,1.220.4	 kimartham tarhi idamaḥ tu uktam ācārvaiḥ ubhaya ja jñāna vyavaccheda artham iti vācaka avacchinna vācya viṣayakam jñānam śābdam eva nanu ! tat api pratyakṣam eva iti anapohyam uktam purovasthita gava ādi padārtha svarūpa mātra grahaṇa niṣṭhita sāmarthyam atra pratyakṣam go śabda vācya tāyām tu saṃjñā karma upadeśī śabdaḥ eva pramāṇam 
NM_2,1.220.5–2,1.221.1	 yadi api śabda artha sambandha paricchede gati antaram api saṃbhavati tathā apiyatra tāvat saṃjñinam nirdiśya saṃjñā vṛddhaiḥ upadiśyate go śabda vācyaḥ ayam panasa śabda vācyaḥ ayam iti tatra tat vācya tā paricchede saḥ eva karaṇam atas eva ca lokaḥ api śābda tvam iha manyate śabda uparacitā pūrva jñāna atiśaya toṣitaḥ tat śabda vācya tā ājñaptiḥ vinā saṃjñā upadeśinaḥ śabdāt na iti saḥ eva atra sati api akṣe prakarṣa bhāj atas sūtra kṛtā api atra śabda atiśaya darśinā vyadhāyi tad vyavacchedaḥ na tu dharma upadeśinā tasmāt ubhayaja jñāna vyavaccheda artham eva idam padam iti bhāṣya uktasya avyapadeśya pada prayojanasya samarthanam 
NM_2,1.221.2–2,1.222.1	 anye tu manyante yadi saṅketa grahaṇa kāle bhāvinaḥ saṃjñā upadeśaka vacana janitasya ubhaya ja jñānasya vyavacchedakam idam varṇyate padam tadā tad vyavahāra kāle api yat ayam gauḥ iti saṅketa grahaṇa kāla anubhūta devadatta ādi udīrita saṃjñā upadeśaka vacana smaraṇa pūrvakam vijñānam utpadyate tat api ubhaya jam eva iti katham anena na vyudasyate nanu ! tatra śabda smaraṇam kāraṇam na śabdaḥ saṅketa kāle api śabda smaraṇam eva kāraṇam na hi krama bhāvinaḥ varṇāḥ yugapad anubhavitum pāryante antya varṇe tu gṛhyamāṇe smaryamāṇe vā kim śabda vyāpāraḥ viśiṣyate 
NM_2,1.222.2	 nanu ! vyavahāra kāle gavā ādi nāmadheya pada mātram eva smaryamāṇam indriyeṇa saha sa vikalpa pratyaya udaye vyāpriyate saṅketa kāle tu saṃjñā upadeśi vṛddha vākyam iti ced mā evam vyavahāra kāle api saṃjñā upadeśakam vṛddha vākyam eva smaryate tat asmaraṇe tad śabda vācya tā anavagamāt asya gauḥ iti nāma devadattena upadiṣṭam āsīt iti evam anusmṛtya go śabda vācya tayā evam vyavaharati iti vākya smaraṇa jam eva idaṃjñānam tasmāt asya api tat vākyam saṃjñā karma upadeśakam hetu tām upayāti iti śābdam etat apīpyatām evam astu iti ced śāntam evam sati tapasvinām naiyāyikānām utpannam pratyakṣam sa vikalpakam yatra mārga antareṇa api saṅketa jñāna saṃbhavaḥ tatra api anena nyāyena śābda tā na nivartate naiyāyikānām ca sa vikalpa pratyakṣa mayāḥ prāṇāḥ tasmāt na ubhaya jasya śābda tvam jñānasya vaktavyam 
NM_2,1.223.1	 sambandha adhigamaḥ tu nānā pramāṇakaḥ tatra sve sve viṣayetat tad pramāṇam pravartate yathā aaham bhaṭṭaḥ sambandhaḥ tri pramāṇakaḥ iti tasmāt na ekasya śabdasya bhāraḥ āropaṇīyaḥ pratyakṣam tu saṅketa grahaṇa kāle api sva viṣaya grāhaka mitinā ubhaya ja jñāna vyavaccheda paṃkṣaḥ niravadyaḥ tasmāt varam jarat naiyāyika kathita śabda karmatā āpanna jñāna vyavaccheda pakṣaḥ iti saḥ eva aśrīyatām tatra tāvat karmaṇi kṛtye kṛte vyapadeśya śabdaḥ yathārthataraḥ bhavati śabda indriya ja jñānasya na pañcama pramāṇa tvam 
NM_2,1.223.2–2,1.224.1	 nanu ! tatra coditam na tādṛśam jñānam apramāṇam na pañcamam pramāṇam iti satyam ayantu teṣām āśayaḥ rūpa ādi viṣaya grahaṇa abhimukham hi tat akṣa jam jñānam pramāṇam phalam vā ucyate yadā tu tat eva śabdena ucyaterūpa jñānam rasa jñānam iti tadā rūpa ādi jñāna viṣaya grahaṇa vyāpāra labhyāṃ pramāṇa tām apahāya śabda karmatā āpatti kṛtām prameya tām eva avalambataḥ iti natasyām daśāyām tad pramāṇam iti kutas pañcama pramāṇa prasaṅgaḥ iti mata antareṇa avyapadeśya pada prayoḥ jana varṇanam 
NM_2,1.224.2	 aparaḥ āha sa vikalpakasya śabda saṅkalpakasya śabda saṃsarga sāpekṣa janmanaḥ pratyakṣa jñānasya śābda tām pūrvavat āśaṅkya tasya evaśābda tāṃdarśayati avyapadeśya padena sūtrakāraḥ pratyakṣam eva tat jñānam indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt avyapadeśyam aśābdam iti arthaḥ spaṣṭa tvāt vācaka abhāvāt indriya anuvidhānataḥ lokasya sammata tvāt ca pratyakṣam idam iṣyate śabda anusmṛti ja tve api na śābdam jñānam īdṛśam śabda smṛtiḥ sahāyaḥ syāt indriyasya pradīpa vat nirvikalpakasya sūtra ārūḍha tva upapādanam nanu evam sa vikalpasya pratyakṣa tve prasādhite na idānīm saṅgṛhītam syāt pratyakṣam nirvikalpakam yaḥ tu śabda anuvedhena śābda tvam sa vikalpake kaścid āśaṅkate tasya pratiśabdaḥ ayam ucyate yatra śabda anuvedhe api pratyakṣam jñānam iṣyate tatra tad sparśa śūnyasya tathā tve kā vicāraṇā nirvikalpaka vat tasmāt pratyakṣam sa vikalpakam samagrahīt ca tat idaṃpadena anena sūtra kṛt 
NM_2,1.225.0–2,1.225.1	 iti ācārya matāni iha darśitāni yathā aagamam yadebhyaḥ satyam ābhāti sabhyāḥ tad avalambyatām avyabhicāri pada prayojanam avyabhicāri grahaṇam vyabhicāri jñāna vyavaccheda artham yathā grīṣme tapati lalāṭantape tapane tad marīciṣu caturam ūṣara bhuvam abhihatya samutphaliteṣu taraṅga ākāra dhāriṣu yat vāri jñānam tat atasmin= tad iti grahaṇāt vyabhicāri bhavati tat anena padena vyavacchidyate na tat pratyakṣam iti 
NM_2,1.225.2–2,1.226.1	 tatra nirvikalpakam api prathama nayana sannipāta jam jñānam udaka sa vikalpaka jñāna janakam udaka grāhyā iva na yathā tathā tathāgatāḥ kathayanti marīci viṣayam avikalpakam jñānam udaka vikalpaka jana nāta pramāṇam iti nirvikalpa avasthāyām avicārayataḥ eva prathama unmīlita cakṣuṣaḥ jhaṭiti salila pratibhāsāt athavā vācaka ullekha pūrvikāḥ api saṃvidaḥ na eva indriya artha janya tvaṃjahati iti upapāditam tasmāt sa vikalpakam avikalpakam vā yatatasmin= tat iti jñānam utpadyate tat vyabhicāri tat ca iha vyāvartyam iti indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena eva bhrama vyāvṛtti śaṅkā samādhānam ca 
NM_2,1.226.2	 nanu ! marīciṣu jala jñānam avidyamāna salila avabhāsitva ātatindriya artha sannikarṣa jam atas ca indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena tad vyudāsa siddheḥ kim avyabhicāri padena na etat evam tasya indriya artha janya tvam siddham tad bhāva bhāvataḥ na hi anunmīlita akṣasya marau salila vedanam arthaḥ api janakaḥ tasya vidyate na asataḥ prathā bhrama sthale viṣaya bhāna prakāra cintā tad ālambana cintām tu tridhā aacāryāḥ pracakrire kaiścid ālambanam tasmin uktam sūrya marīcayaḥ nigūhita nija ākārāḥ salila ākāra dhāriṇaḥ 
NM_2,1.227.1	 tatra taraṅga ādi sāmānya dharma grahaṇe sati na sthāṇu puruṣavatu bhaya viśeṣāḥ smaraṇa patham avataranti na ca sannihita marīci viśeṣāḥ smaraṇa patham avataranti kintu pūrva upalabdha viruddha salila vartinaḥ viśeṣāḥ tad smaraṇāt ca sthagiteṣu sva viśeṣeṣu marīcayaḥ svarūpam upadarśayitum aśaknuvantaḥ toya rūpeṇa avabhāsante mata antareṇa bhrama upapādanam anye tu ālambanam prāhuḥ puras avasthita dharmiṇaḥ sādṛśya darśana udbhūta smṛti upasthāpitam payaḥ 
NM_2,1.227.2	 yatra kila jñāne yat rūpam upaplavate tat tasya ālambanam ucyate na sat nihitam bhū pradeśasya tad āraṃbhakāṇām ca paramāṇūnām tad ālambana tva prasaṅgāt idam ca salila avabhāsi vijñānam atas tat eva asya ālambanam tat ca na iha sannihitam na ca ekānta asataḥ kha puṣpa ādeḥkhyātiḥ avakalpate iti deśa antara ādau vidyamānam eva salilam sadṛśa darśana prabuddha saṃskāra upajanita smaraṇa upārūḍham iha avalambanībhavati 
NM_2,1.228.0–2,1.228.2	 tatra eva pakṣa antara upapādanam anyat ālambanam ca anyat pratibhāti iti kecana ālambanam dīdhitayaḥ toyam ca pratibhāsate kartṛ karaṇa vyatiriktam jñāna janakam ālambanam ucyate iti na paramāṇu ādau prasaktiḥ iti tat idam pakṣa trayam api upariṣṭāt nipuṇataram nirūpayiṣyate tat evam bāhya indriya artha anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinām vibhramāṇām indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena nirasitum aśakya tvāt yuktam avyabhicāri pada upādānam mānasa vibhramāḥ 
NM_2,1.228.3–2,1.228.4	 ye tu mānasāḥ vibhramāḥ bāhya indriya anapekṣa janmānaḥ teṣām iṣyate eva indriya artha sannikarṣa padena paryudasanam iti na tad artham avyabhicāri pada upādānam tat yathā viraha uddīpita uddāma kāma ākulita dṛṣṭayaḥ dūra sthām api paśyanti kāntām antika vartinīm mānasa vibhrama hetavaḥ nanu ! evaṃprāyeṣu nirālambaneṣu vibhrameṣu kutastyaḥ ākāraḥ pratibhāti ucyate 
NM_2,1.229.0	 ākāraḥ smṛti upārūḍhaḥ prāyeṇa sphurati bhrame smṛteḥ tu kāraṇam kiñcid kadācid bhavati kvacid kvacid sadṛśa vijñānam kāma śoka ādayaḥ kvacid kvacid tu darśana abhyāsaḥ timiram cakṣuṣaḥ kvacid kvacid nidrā kvacid cintā dhātūnām vikṛtiḥ kvacid alakṣyamāṇe tad hetau adṛṣṭam smṛti kāraṇam bālasya indu dvaya jñānam asti na asti iti vetti kaḥ astitve api smṛtau hetum adṛṣṭam tasya manvate nūnam niyama siddhi artham janakasya avabhāsanam na ca ekānta asataḥ dṛṣṭā jñāna utpādana yogya tā na ca sannihitam vastu tatra asti vanitā ādikam tena idam smṛti upārūḍham avabhāti iti manvate tatra ādyena padena etāḥ sva antaḥkaraṇa saṃbhavāḥ nirastāḥ bhrāntayaḥ akṣa ādi saṃsarga rahita udayāḥ yāḥ punar pīta śaṅkha ādi maru nīḥ a ādi buddhayaḥ akṣa jāḥ tat vyudāsāya sūtre padam idam kṛtam 
NM_2,1.230.0–2,1.230.1	 vyavasāya ātmaka dala prayojanam dūrāt sthāṇu puruṣa sādhāraṇam dharmam āroha pariṇāha rūpam upalabhamānasya tayoḥ anyataratra vartamānān vakra koṭara ādīn kara caraṇa ādīn vā aviśeṣān apaśyataḥ samāna dharma prabuddha saṃskāra tayā ca ubhaya vartinaḥ api viśeṣān anusmarataḥ puras avasthita artha viṣayam sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ veti saṃśaya jñānam upajāyate tat indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tva ādi viśeṣaṇa yuktam api na pratyakṣa phalam atas tat vyavacchedāya vyavasāya ātmaka grahaṇam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena na saṃśaya vyudāsa saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_2,1.230.2	 nanu ! mānasa tvāt saṃśaya jñānasya indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna grahaṇena nirāsaḥ siddhi ati eva kim pada antareṇa tathā ca bhāṣya kāraḥ smṛti anumāna āgama saṃśaya pratibhāsvapna jñāna ūha sukha ādi pratyakṣam icchā ādayaḥ ca manasaḥ liṅgāni iti vakṣyati mā evam sthāṇu ādi saṃśayasya bāhya indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt kaścid hi mānasaḥ saṃśayaḥ samasti eva yathā daiśikasya jyotiḥ gaṇaka ādeḥ ekadā anyadā ca asamyak ādiśyatṛtīye pade punar ādiśataḥ saṃśayaḥ bhavati kim ayam asmad ādeśaḥ saṃvadet uta visaṃvadet iti sa bhāṣya kṛtaḥ cetasi 
NM_2,1.231.1–2,1.231.2	 kevala manaḥ karaṇaḥ iti sthitaḥ yaḥ tu viṣphārita akṣasya sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā ityādiḥ saṃpadyate saṃśayaḥ tam anindriya artha sannikarṣa jaṃkaḥ nāma ācakṣīta! avyabhicāri padena api na saṃśaya vyudāsa saṃbhavaḥ nanu ! atasmin= tat iti jñānam vyabhicāri vyākhyātam eka rūpaṃca puras avasthitam artham aneka rūpa tayā spṛśati saṃśayaḥ sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti saḥ ayam atasmin= tathā abhāvāt viparyayaḥ eva iti pūrva pada vyudasta tvāt na pada antara vyavacchedya tām arhati iti na etat evam svarūpa bhedāt kāraṇa bhedāt ca ekam eva viruddham ākāram ullikhan viparyayaḥ jāyate sthāṇau puruṣaḥ iti puṃsi vā sthāṇuḥ iti aniyata ākāra dvaya ullkhī tu saṃśayaḥ bhavati sthāṇuḥ vā syāt puruṣaḥ vā iti saḥ ayam svarūpa bhedaḥ pratyātma saṃvedyaḥ 
NM_2,1.231.3–2,1.232.2	 kāraṇa bhedaḥ ca viruddha viśeṣa smaraṇa prabhavaḥ viparyayaḥ śuktikāyām sannihitāyām rajata viśeṣān marīciṣu sannihiteṣu salila gata viśeṣān anusmarataḥ viparyayaḥ bhavati ubhaya viśeṣa smaraṇa janmā tusaṃśayaḥ iti pada antara nirasanīyaḥ eva ayam avyapadeśya padena eva vyavasāya ātmaka padam na caritārtham nanu ! saṃśaya viparyayayoḥ api nirvikalpayoḥ asaṃbhavāt avyapadeśya padena eva pravara pakṣe pratikṣepaḥ siddhyet puras avasthita sthāṇu ādi dharmi darśana mātram eva nirvikalpakam indriya vyāpāra jam ananta rantuu bhaya anyatara viśeṣaṇa smaraṇa janmanorullikhita śabdayoḥ eva saṃśaya viparyayayoḥ utpādaḥ tatra viśeṣasmṛtyā eva śabda anuvedhasya ākṣepāt atas pada dvayam api tat vyudāsāya na kartavyam atra etat eva tāvat vaktavyam pravara pakṣaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ eva yatas śabda anuvedha jātam api pratyakṣam upapāditam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena api na saṃśaya viparyaya vyudāsa saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_2,1.232.3	 nanu ! bhavatu pravara pakṣaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ sadṛśa darśana niṣṭhite tunayana vyāpāre viśeṣa smṛteḥ ūrdhvam upajāyamānau saṃśaya viparyayau na indriya jau= iti prathama padena eva nirastau bhavataḥ tat asat smṛteḥ ūrdhvam api indriya vyāpāra anuvṛtteḥ iti ukta tvāt etat ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām avagamyate nimīlita cakṣuṣaḥ tad anutpādāt na ca tadānīm antar saṅkalpa rūpeṇa api śabda ullekhaḥ utpanne tu saṃśaye viparyaye ca vācaka smaraṇam bhaviṣyati iti samyak jñāna vat saṃśaya viparyayau= api śabda ullekha śūnyau saṃvedyete viśeṣa smṛtiḥ tu viśeṣa viṣaya tvāt tān eva ākṣipatu śabdasya kim vartate vācaka śabda smṛtiḥ tu śabdam upasthāpayati sā ca na tāvat utpannā iti samyak pratyaya vat tasmāt vācaka ullekha varjitau akṣa vyāpāra jau na staḥ na saṃśaya viparyayau īdṛśayoḥ katham anayoḥ ādya pada vyudasanīya tā tasmāt tad apākṛtaye yuktam pada dvayasya api upādānam pratyakṣam iti pada vyākhyānam 
NM_2,1.233.2–2,1.234.1	 evam lakṣaṇa padāni lakṣya padam tu pratyakṣam iti jñāna viśeṣeḥ ūḍhyā eva pravartate yogasya vyabhicārāt prati gatam akṣam pratyakṣam iti akṣara arthaḥ sa ca ayam sukha ādau= api saṃbhavati iti rūḍhiḥ eva sādhīyasī sūtre pratyakṣa padam yaugikam api syāt athavā jñāna padasya sūtre nirdeśāt yoga pakṣaḥ api astu na ca asaudṛśyamānaḥ nihnotum yuktaḥ yogarūḍhiḥ tu nāma na sammatā eva viduṣām yatra api hi dvayam dṛśyate tatra api śabda pravṛttau prayojakam evabhavati 
NM_2,1.234.2–2,1.234.3	 katham punar akṣam prati gatam jñānam iṣyate na saṃyogi tvena añjana ādeḥ pratyakṣa prasaṅgāt na samavāyi tvena akṣa vartinām rūpa ādīnāṃtathātva prasaṅgāt na janakatvena akṣa āraṃbhakāṇām paramāṇūnām apitathā bhāva prasakteḥ tasmāt janya tvena eva jñānam akṣam prati gatam iti vyākhyeyam avyayī vavya ākhyānam tu na yuktam pratyakṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pratyakṣa astrī ityādi vyavahāra darśanāt iti alam ati prasaṅgena 
NM_2,1.235.0–2,1.235.1	 tena indriya artha ja tvādi viśeṣaṇa gaṇa anvitam yatas bhavati vijñānam tat pratyakṣam iti sthitam iti vigata kalaṅkam asya dhīmān akuruta lakṣaṇam etat akṣapādaḥ na tu para racitāni lakṣaṇānikṣaṇam api sūkṣma dṛśām viśanti cetaḥ iti pratyakṣa sūtra vyākhyāna prakaraṇampara sammata pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa parīkṣā tatra dharma kīrti ukta pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa vicāraḥyat tāvat kalpanā apoḍham abhra antam iti lakṣaṇam pratyakṣasya jagau bhikṣuḥ tat atyantam asāṃpratam śabda saṃsarga yogya artha pratītiḥ kila kalpanā asyāḥ ca kena doṣeṇa prāmāṇyam na viṣahyate 
NM_2,1.236.0–2,1.236.1	 vikalpānām aprāmāṇya upapādanam nanu ! abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsa tvāt api kam anyam doṣaṃmṛgayate bhavān ! asat artha viṣaya tvam eva idam uktam bhavati śabda arthasyavāstavasya abhāvāt sva lakṣaṇasya sajātīya itara vyāvṛtta ātmanaḥ sambandha adhigama savyapekṣa pravṛttinā śabdena viṣayīkartum aśakyatvāt tad vyatiriktasya vastunaḥ anupalambhāt 
NM_2,1.237.1	 na ca indriya artha sannikarṣa anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinī kalpanā buddhiḥ tam antareṇa api bhāvāt tasmin sati api ca pūrva anubhūta vācaka śabda yojanam vinā anutpādāt yadi ca indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ tat janakobhavet prathamam eva tathāvidhām dhiyam janayet na ca janayati tat ayaṃśabda smṛteḥ ūrdhvam api na janakaḥ iti manyāmahe 
NM_2,1.237.2–2,1.238.0	 tat uktam yaḥ prāc ajanakaḥ buddheḥ upayoga aviśeṣataḥ sa paścāt api tena syāt artha apāye api netra dhīḥ iti api ca sati api indriya artha saṃsarge smṛti apekṣāyām saḥ arthaḥ tayā eva vyavahitaḥ syāt āha ca artha upayoge api punar smārtam śabda anuyojanam akṣadhīrya di apekṣeta saḥ arthaḥ vyavahitaḥ bhavet iti vikalpānām anindriya ja tvam 
NM_2,1.238.1–2,1.239.1	 saṅketa smaraṇa sahakāri savyapekṣam akṣam īdṛśīm buddhim janayati iti ced na vyatirikta avyatirikta upakāra ādi vikalpaiḥ sahakāriṇaḥ nirasta tvāt kiñca daṇḍī ityādi vikalpa vijñānam na indriya āpāta velāyām eva jāyate kintu bahu prakriyā apekṣam yat āha viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyam ca saṃbandham laukikīm sthitim gṛhītvā sakalam ca etat tathā pratyeti na anyathā iti na ceyatīm prakriyām prathama nayana upanipāta jātam avikalpakam jñānam udvoḍhum kṣamam iti āha saṅketa smaraṇa upāyam dṛṣṭa saṅkalana ātmakam pūrva apara parāmarśa śūnye tat cākṣuṣe katham iti vikalpa dvaividhyam 
NM_2,1.239.2	 tatra etat syāt dvividhāḥ vikalpāḥ chātra manoratha viracitāḥ idantā grāhiṇaḥ ca nīlam ityādayaḥ tatra pūrve mā bhūvan pramāṇam kaḥ teṣu artha nirapekṣa janmasu prāmāṇye abhiniviśeta ! idantāgrāhiṇa aṃtu arthāvinābhūta tvāt katham na prāmāṇyam iti ucyate sarvaeva amī vikalpāḥ paramārthataḥ artham na spṛśanti eva sa hi nirvikalpakena eva sarva ātmanā paricchinnaḥ tat uktam ekasya artha svabhāvasya pratyakṣasya sataḥ svayam kaḥ anyaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ bhāgaḥ syāt yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate iti 
NM_2,1.240.0–2,1.240.1	 kalpanānām artha asaṃsparśi tvam yat tu keṣa aṃñcid vikalpā nāmidantā grāhi tva spaṣṭa tva ādi rūpam tatarthāvinābhā vi nirvikalpaka darśana pṛṣṭha bhāvi tva avāpta tad chāyā saṃsarga jaḥ nitam na tu teṣām artha sparśaḥ kaścid asti artha ātmanaḥ nirvikalpena eva mudrita tvāt tasmāt atāttvika ākāra samullekha purassarāḥ na yathāvastu jāyante kadācid api kalpanāḥ kalpanā bhedāḥ 
NM_2,1.240.2–2,1.240.3	 pañca ca ete kalpanāḥ bhavanti jāti kalpanā guṇa kalpanā kriyā kalpanā nāma kalpanā dravya kalpanā ca iti tāḥ ca kvacid abhede api bheda kalpanāt kvacid ca bhede api abheda kalpanāt kalpanāḥ ucyante jāti jāti matoḥ bhedaḥ na kaścid paramārthataḥ bheda āropaṇa rūpā ca jāyate jāti kalpanā idam asya goḥ go tvam iti na hi kaścid bhedam paśyati tena abheda ibheda kalpanā eva etayā sadṛśa nyāyāt mantavyā guṇa kalpanā tatra api abhinnayoḥ bhedaḥ kalpyate guṇa tadvatoḥ 
NM_2,1.240.4–2,1.241.1	 tathā ca āhuḥ eṣa guṇī rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antara tvena na ātma ānaṃnaḥ darśayati tebhyaḥ ca vyatirekam vāñchasi iti citram bheda āropaṇa rūpā eva guṇavat karma kalpanā tad svarūpa atiriktā hi na kriyā nāma kācana gacchati devadattaḥ iti devadattasya eva anyūna an atiriktasya pratibhāsāt vibhinnayoḥ tu abhedena pravṛttā nāma kalpanā caitraḥ ayam iti abhedena niścayaḥ nāma nāminoḥ 
NM_2,1.241.2–2,1.241.3	 caitraḥ iti ayam śabdaḥ ayam iti arthaḥ kīdṛśam anayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam evam daṇḍī ayam iti ādiḥ mantavyā dravya kalpanā sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhedinoḥ grahaṇāt tayoḥ viparyayaḥ iva bādhaka pratyaya abhāve api kalpanānām mithyātvam nanu ! yadi abhede bhedam bhede ca abhedam āropayantyaḥ kalpanāḥ pravartante tat katham āsu bādhakaḥ pratyayaḥ na jāyate śuktikā ra jata buddhi vat ucyate yatra vastu vastu antarātmanā avabhāsate tatra 
NM_2,1.242.1	 bādhakaḥ bhavati marīciṣu iva jala buddhau iha tu na jāti ādi vastu antaram asti yatas vastu antarātmanā asya grahaḥ bhavet vyakti viṣayāḥ eva ete sāmānya ādi vikalpāḥ tasmāt vastu antara anava bhāsiṣu eṣu na bādhakaḥ pratyayaḥ jāyate tasmāt na viparyaya ātmānaḥ vikalpāḥ viparyayāt vailakṣaṇye api vikalpānām aprāmāṇyam eva 
NM_2,1.242.2	 na ca ete pramāṇam etat ullikhyamānasya jāti ādeḥ apāram ārthika tvāt atas eva pramāṇa viparyaya abhyām ayam anyaḥ eva vikalpā eti ācakṣate iti alam vistareṇa evam etāḥ pravartante vāsanā mātra nirmitāḥ kalpita alīka bheda ādi prapañcāḥ pañca kalpanāḥ evam ca paśyatā tāsām prāmāṇya āmoda manda tām bhikṣuṇā lakṣaṇa granthe tad apoḍha padam kṛtam 
NM_2,1.243.0–2,1.243.2	 dharma kīrti ukta pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa nirākaraṇam sa vikalpakānām prāmāṇya sādhanam atra pratividhīyate tat idam saṃkīrṇa prāyam atibahu vilapata abhavatā na niyatam kim api vikalpānām aprāmāṇya kāraṇam iti spaṣṭam āveditam tat ucyatām kim śabda artha avabhāsi tva garbhīkṛtam asat artha vāci tvam tad aprāmāṇya kāraṇam abhimatam 
NM_2,1.243.3–2,1.243.7	 uta saṃṅketa smṛti apekṣā upanatam anindriya artha sannikarṣa ja tvam uta viśeṣa grahaṇa ādi apekṣā avāptam bahu prayāsa sādhya tvam uta pūrva apara parāmarśa śūnya cākṣuṣa vailakṣaṇya vācaḥ yukti samarpitaṃvicāraka tvam uta nirvikalpaka paricchinna vastu grāhitā nibandhanam adhigata adhigantṛ tvam uta bheda abheda samāropa bhaṇitam atasmin= tad iti grāhi tvam 
NM_2,1.243.8–2,1.244.2	 uta vṛtti vikalpa ādi vādhita sāmānya grahaṇa sūcitam bādhya tvam eva iti vikalpā prāmāṇya āpādaka prathama hetu nirāsaḥ tatra tāvat na śabda saṃsarga yogya artha grahaṇa dvāra kamasat artha grāhi tvam eṣām aprāmāṇya kāraṇam abhidhātum yuktam śabda arthasya vāstavasya samarthayiṣyamāṇa tvāt kaḥ punar asau= iti ced yaḥ eva nirvikalpake pratibhāsate 
NM_2,1.244.3–2,1.244.4	 kim nirvikalpake sāmānya ādikam avabhāsate bāḍham avabhāsa ta eti vakṣyāmaḥ atas eva vā adhya tvam api na prāmāṇya apahāra kāraṇam eṣām vaktavyam vṛtti vikalpa ādeḥ bādhakasya parihariṣyamāṇa tvāt bādhaka antarasya ca na idam iti pratyayasya śuktikāra jata jñāna ādi vat bhavatā eva anabhyupagamāt tatra eva dvitīya kalpa nirāsaḥ 
NM_2,1.244.5–2,1.245.1	 na apya nindriya artha sannikarṣa janya tvam saṅketa grahaṇa kāla anubhūta śabda smaraṇa apekṣaṇāt asya vaktavyam sahakārī apekṣāyām api tad vyāpārā virateḥ yaḥ prāc ajanakaḥ buddheḥ sa labdhvā sahakāriṇam kāla antareṇa tām buddhim vidadhat kena vāryate  vyatirikta avyatirikta upakāra karaṇa ādi vikalpāḥ tu kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge nirākariṣyante 
NM_2,1.245.2	 rūpa grahaṇe ca cakṣuṣaḥ pradīpa ādi apekṣāyām duṣparihārāḥ tevi kalpāḥ na vai kiñcid ekam janakam iti bhavantaḥ api paṭhanti !iti bhavat pakṣe api tulyāḥ te yadi ubhayoḥ doṣaḥ na tena ekaḥ ca udyaḥ bhavati tasmāt upayoga aviśeṣataḥ iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ ayam eva upayoga viśeṣaḥ yat indriya āloka manaskāra viṣaya vat vācaka smaraṇam apisāmagryantaram etat pratyaya janmani vyāpriyate iti na vācaka smaraṇa janita tvena smārta tvāt apramāṇam vikalpaḥ rūpa smṛti ākhya samanantara pratyayatiḥ mitasya nirvikalpasya rūpa jñānasya api tathā tva prasaṅgāt 
NM_2,1.246.0–2,1.246.1	 indriya sannikarṣasya phalena avyavadhāna upapādanam yat ca idam ucyate saḥ arthaḥ vyavahitaḥ bhavet iti tat na vidmaḥ kīdṛśam vyavadhānam arthasya iti na hi dīpena vā manasā vā vijñāna hetunā kadācid arthaḥ vyavadhīyate manaḥ vat ca vācaka smṛtiḥ api sāmagrī antargatā satī tad pratītau vyāpriyate iti katham artham vyavadadhīta 
NM_2,1.246.2–2,1.246.3	 smṛti viṣayīkṛtaḥ śabdaḥ tam artham vyavadhatte iti ced na śabdasya tad prakāśaka tvena jñāna vat dīpa vat vā vyavadhāyaka tva abhāvāt na ca indriya vyāpāra tirodhānam vyavadhānam tasya adhunā api anuvartamāna tvāt yathā tad bhāva bhāvi tvāt ādyam vijñānam akṣa jam tathā tad bhāva bhāvi tvāt uttaram jñānam akṣa jam na hi vācaka smaraṇa antaram akṣiṇī nimīlya vikalpayati paṭaḥ ayam iti 
NM_2,1.246.4–2,1.247.1	 atha yāvat vācaka vijñānam hṛdaya patham avatarati tāvat saḥ arthaḥ kṣaṇika tvāt atikrāntaḥ iti vyavahitaḥ ucyate tat api durāśā mātram kṣaṇa bhaṅgasya upariṣṭāt nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt api ca pradarśita prāpti ādi vyavahāra vat santāna dvārakam iha api tat grahaṇam bhaviṣyati iti sarvathā na vyavadhānam tat evam samaya smaraṇa sāpekṣa tve api na indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tām ativartate sa vikalpa kaṃvijñānam iti katham apratyakṣam tṛtīya vikalpa nirāsaḥ 
NM_2,1.247.2	 yat punar viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya grahaṇa ādi sāmagrī apekṣa tvena bahu prayāsa sādhya tvam aprāmāṇyakāraṇam abhidhīyate tat atīva su bhāpitam ! na hibahu kleśa sādhya tvam nāma prāmāṇyam upahanti uktam ca na higiri śṛṅgam āruhya yat gṛhyate tat apratyakṣam iti rasa ādi jñāna apekṣayā carūpa ādi jñānasya dīpa ādi āloka āharaṇa prayāsa sādhya tvāt aprāmāṇyam syāt caturtha vikalpa nirāsaḥ 
NM_2,1.247.3	 yat api pūrva apara parāmarśa rahita cākṣuṣa vijñāna vaiparītyena vikalpa jñānānām vicāraka tvāt aprāmāṇyam ucyate tat api na samyak sarvatra jñānasya vicāraka tva anupapatteḥ vicārakaḥ hi pramātā sa hipaśyati smarati anusandhatte vicārayati icchati dveṣṭi yatate gṛhṇāti jahāti sukham anubhavati iti vakṣyāmaḥ artham ca spṛśataḥ vijñānasya vicārayataḥ api katham aprāmāṇyam syāt 
NM_2,1.248.0–2,1.248.1	 pañcama vikalpa nirāsaḥ atha asya nirvikalpena eva sarva ātmanā spṛṣṭa tvāt piṣṭa peṣaṇam ayuktam iti sa vikalpam adhigata artha grāhi tvāda pramāṇam iti manyase tat api nasādhu pūrvam eva parihṛta tvāt na hi anadhigata adhigantṛ tvaṃprāmāṇyam iti uktam gṛhīta grahaṇe api pramāṇasya pramāṇa tva anativṛtteḥ ṣaṣṭha vikalpa nirāsaḥ 
NM_2,1.248.2	 yat tu abhyadhāyi bhinneṣu abhedam abhinneṣu ca bhedam kalpayantyaḥ kalpanāḥ atasmin= tad grahaṇe prāmāṇyam avahajati iti tat yuktam atasmin= tad grahaḥ bhavati apramāṇa tva kāraṇam tat tu iha na asti tasyahi bādhaka pratyaya upasannipātāt niścayaḥ na ca bhavat upavarṇitā su pañcasu api jāti ādi kalpanāsu bādhakam kiñcid asti iti na atasmin= tad grāhiṇyaḥ kalpanāḥ bhavanti jātiḥ jātimataḥ bhinnā guṇī guṇa gaṇāt pṛthak tathā eva tad pratīteḥ ca kalpanā uktiḥ aba adhikāḥ etat ca upariṣṭāt nirṇeṣyate 
NM_2,1.248.3–2,1.248.4	 dravya nāmnaḥ atu bhinnayoḥ bhedena eva pratītiḥ nābheda kalpanā na hidevadatta śabdaḥ ayam iti evam tad vācyaḥ pratīyate nanu devadattaḥ ayam iti saṃjñā saṃjñya bheda vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate eva iti ced na śabda viśiṣṭa tad vācyauvagatiḥ eṣā na śabdaḥ asyām artha ārūḍhaḥ avabhāsate na śabda vivarta rūpeṇa arthaḥ parisphurati kim tarhi 
NM_2,1.249.0–2,1.249.1	 śabda smṛti ākhya sāmagrya sāmarthya atiśaya udbhavaḥ pratyaya atiśayaḥ saḥ ayam iti evam prāk prasādhitam daṇḍī ayam iti dravya abheda kalpanā tu manda matibhiḥ eva udāhṛtāḥ na hi daṇḍaḥ ayam iti devadatte pratītiḥ api tu daṇḍī iti tatra caprakṛti pratyayau pṛthak eva upalabhyete daṇḍaḥ asya asti iti daṇḍī iti tat iha yathā eva vastu tathā eva tad avasāyaḥ iti nābhedāropaḥ 
NM_2,1.249.2	 karmaṇi tu dvayam api na asti na abhinne bheda kalpanā na ca bhinne api abheda kalpanā kriyā hi tadvataḥ bhinnā bhedena eva ca gṛhyate calati ityādi bodheṣu tad svarūpa avabhāsanāt tena kriyā guṇa dravya nāma jāti uparañjitam viṣayam darśayan= aiti vikalpaḥ na apramāṇa tām viparyayāt samuttīrṇaḥ iti sādhu sahāmahe pramāṇāt tu bahis bhūtam vikalpam na kṣamāmahe kvacid vādhaka yogena yadi tasya apramāṇa tā nirvikalpe api tulyā asau dvi candra ādi avabhāsini 
NM_2,1.250.0–2,1.250.1	 manorājya vikalpānām kāma mastu apramāṇa tā yathāvastu pravṛttānām na tu asau= akṣa janmanām vikalpāḥ api svatantrāḥ na ca nirvikalpa pṛṣṭha bhāvi tva kṛtam eṣām etat rūpam viṣaya saṃsparśam antareṇa svatassvaccha rūpāṇām jñānānām evam ākāra tva anupapatteḥ kiṃnirvikalpa pṛṣṭha bhāvitā kariṣyati tad anantara bhāvinī hi smṛtiḥ api kvacit duśyataḥ eva na ca sā tad śāyāvatī iti durāśā mātram etat 
NM_2,1.250.2–2,1.250.3	 nanu nirvikalpakena eva vastu sarva svam gṛhītam ekasya artha svabhāvasya iti varṇitam prativihitam etat gṛhīta grahaṇe api prāmāṇya anapāyāt nirvikalpa viṣaya vastuni vipratipattayaḥ kiñca kim nirvikalpakena gṛhyate iti etat eva na jānīmaḥ bhavantaḥ nirvikalpasya viṣayam saṃpracakṣate sajātīya vijātīya parāvṛttam sva lakṣaṇam 
NM_2,1.251.0–2,1.252.0	 mahāsāmānyam anye tu sattām tad viṣayam viduḥ vāc rūpam apare tattvam prameyam tasya manvate kecid guṇa kriyā dravya jāti bheda ādi rūṣitam śabalam vastu manyante nirvikalpaka gocaram pratyakṣa viṣaye api etāḥ citram vipratipattayaḥ parokṣa arthe hi vimatiḥ pratyakṣeṇa upaśāmyati pratyakṣe hi samutpannā vimatiḥ kena śāmyati idam bhāti na bhāti iti saṃvid vipratipattiṣu para pratyāyane puṃsām śaraṇam śapatha uktayaḥ 
NM_2,1.253.1–2,1.253.2	 na tu śapatha śaraṇāḥ eva nirudyamam āsmahe mārga antareṇa api tat prameyam niścinumaḥ nirvikalpa anusāreṇa sa vikalpaka saṃbhavāt grāhyam tadā anuguṇyena nirvikalpasya manmahe sva lakṣaṇa mātram na nirvikalpa viṣayaḥ tatra na tāvat sakala sajātīya vyāvṛttam sva lakṣaṇam pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ gṛhīte nirvikalpena vyāvṛtte hi sva lakṣaṇe akasmāt eva sāmānya vikalpa ullasanam katham  
NM_2,1.253.3–2,1.254.0	 nirvikalpa anusāreṇa hi vikalpāḥ prādurbhavitum arhanti api ca vijātīya parāvṛtta viṣayā yadi kalpanā vyāvṛtti rūpam sāmānyam gṛhītam hanta ! darśanaiḥ vyāvṛttān nanu na eva anyā vyāvṛttiḥ paramārthataḥ vyāvṛtta grahaṇena eva sutarām tad grahaḥ bhavet sāmānya grahaṇe api evam tad vyāpāra avakalpanāt sva lakṣaṇa pariccheda niṣṭham tat na avatiṣṭhate na api sat mātram nirvikalpasya viṣayaḥ 
NM_2,1.254.1	 na api sattā dvaita va ādi sammata satta ākhyaḥ nirvikalpasya viṣayaḥ yuktaḥ sattā grahaṇa pakṣe api viśeṣa avagatiḥ kutas sā bhāti bheda spṛṣṭā ced siddham advaita darśanam na ca bhedam vinā sattā gṛhītum api śakyate na avidyā mātram eva idam iti ca sthāpayiṣyate nirvikalpe sūkṣma śabda anuvedhaḥ api ayuktaḥvāc tattva pratibhāsaḥ api pratikṣiptaḥ anayā diśā 
NM_2,1.255.0	 katham ca cākṣuṣe jñāne vāc tattvam avabhāsate agṛhīte tu sambandhe gṛhīte vā api vismṛte aprabuddhe api saṃskāre vācaka avagatiḥ kutas  jāti ādi śa balitam api na nirvikalpasya viṣayaḥ citra tā api pṛthak bhūtaiḥ dharmaiḥ tad samavāyibhiḥ jāti ādibhiḥ yadīṣyeta dharmiṇaḥ kāmam astu sā tad ātma tā tu na ekasya nityam tattva anupagrahāt aṃśa niṣkarṣa pakṣe tu dharma bhedaḥ balāt bhavet 
NM_2,1.256.0	 yatra yatra yadā udbhūtiḥ jighṛkṣā ca iti kathyate tad ātmaka tvam dharmāṇām ucyate ca iti asaṅgatam deśa bhedaḥ tu dharmāṇām asmābhiḥ api na iṣyate dharmī hi teṣām ādhāraḥ na punar sa tad ātmakaḥ nirvikalpaka vicāra upasaṃhāraḥ tasmāt yaḥ eva vastu ātmā sa vikalpasya gocaraḥ saḥ eva nirvikalpasya śabda ullekha vivarjitaḥ 
NM_2,1.257.0	 kimātmakaḥ asau= iti ced yat yadā pratibhāsate vastu pramitayaḥ ca eva praṣṭavyāḥ na tu vādinaḥ kvacid jātiḥ kvacid dūvyam kvacid karma kvacid guṇaḥ yat eva sa vikalpena tat eva anena gṛhyate iha śabda anusandhāna mātram abhyadhikam param viṣaye na tu bhedaḥ asti sa vikalpa avikalpayoḥ atas śabda anusandhānavandhyam tad anubandhi vā jāti ādi viṣaya grāhi sarvam pratyakṣam iṣyate tasmāt yat kalpanā apoḍha padam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe bhikṣuṇā paṭhitam tasya vyavacchedyam na vidyate abhrānta pada prayojana dūṣaṇam 
NM_2,1.257.1–2,1.258.1	 abhrānta padasya api vyāvartyam na kiṃcana tad mate paśyāmaḥ nanu ! timira āśu bhra maṇa nauyāna saṃkṣobha ādya āhita vibhramam dvi candra alāta cakra calat pādapa ādi darśanam apohyam asya paraiḥ uktam satyam uktam ayuktam tu kalpanā apoḍha padena eva tad vyudāsa siddheḥ tatra api nirvikalpakam jñānam eka candra ādi viṣayam eva vikalpāḥ tu viparīta ākāra grāhiṇaḥ bhavanti yathā marīci grāhiṇi nirvikalpake salila avasāyī vikalpaḥ iti abhrānta pada prayojana samarthanam tad nirākaraṇam ca 
NM_2,1.258.2–2,1.258.3	 nanu ! timireṇa dvidhā akṛtam cakṣuḥ ekatayā na śaknoti śaśitaṃgrahītum iti nirvikalpakam api dvi candra ādi jñānam yadi evam tarala taraṅga ādi sādṛśya rūṣitam ūṣare marīci cakram cakṣuṣā paricchettum aśakyam iti tatra api nirvikalpakam udaka grāhi vijñānam kim iti na iṣyate abhyupagame vā sat asat kalpana utpāta ādi kṛtaḥ pramāṇa itara vyavahārona syāt jñānānām bhramatu a nidānam api ca na bādhaka upanipātam antareṇa bhrānta tā avakalpatejñānānām na ca kṣaṇika vādi mate vādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ buddhīnām upapadyatā aiti alam vimardena 
NM_2,1.259.0	 iti su nipuṇa buddhiḥ lakṣaṇam vaktu kāmaḥ pada yugalam api idam nirmame na anavadyam bhavatu mati mahimnaḥ ceṣṭitam dṛṣṭam etat jagat abhibhava dhīram dhīmataḥ dharma kīrteḥ sāṃkhya ukta pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa dūṣaṇamśrotra ādi vṛttiḥ aparaiḥ avikalpa keti pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam avarṇi tat api apāstam sāmya at nayasya na ca siddhyati buddhi vṛttyāt raṣṭṛ tvam ātmanaḥ iti pratipāditam prāk jaiminī ukta pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa dūṣaṇam 
NM_2,1.259.1	 sat saṃprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma tad pratyakṣam animittaṃvidyamāna upalaṃbhana tvāt iti etat sūtram jaiminīyaiḥ sākṣāt pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa paratvena na vyākhyātam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti prakṛta pratijñā saṅgatya bhāvāt api tu dharmam prati pratyakṣam animittam evaṃlakṣaṇaka tvāt iti anuvāda bhaṅgyā lakṣaṇe yojitam yathā uktam evam sati anuvāda tvam lakṣaṇasya api saṃbhavet iti tad etad lakṣaṇa varṇane sūtra yojanam asamīcīnam ati vyāpti doṣān ativṛtteḥ tathā hi indriyāṇām sati saṃprayoge puruṣasya jāyamānā buddhiḥ pratyakṣam iti sūtra arthaḥ tathā ca ativyāptiḥ saṃśaya viparyaya buddhyoḥ apiindriya saṃyoga ja tvena pratyakṣa tva prasaṅgāt 
NM_2,1.261.1–2,1.261.2	 atha sat saṃprayogaḥ iti satām saṃprayogaḥ iti vyākhyāsyate tathā api nirālambana vibhramāḥ eva artha nirapekṣa janmānaḥ nirastāḥ bhaveyuḥ na sa ālambanau saṃśaya viparyayau atha sati saṃprayogaḥ iti saptamī pakṣaḥ eva na tyajyate saṃśaya viparyaya= chedī ca saṃprayogaḥ iti upasargaḥ varṇyate yathā uktam samyak arthe ca saṃśabdaḥ duṣprayoga nivāraṇaḥ duṣṭa tvāt śuktikā yogaḥ vāryatāmakṣaja īkṣaṇāt iti 
NM_2,1.261.3–2,1.262.2	 tathā api prayoga samyaktvasya atīndriya tvena pratyakṣa anavagamya tvāt kāryataḥ avagatiḥ vaktavyā kāryam ca jñānam na ca tat aviśeṣitam eva prayogasya samyak tām avagamayati na ca tad viśeṣaṇa param iha padam api akṣaram api mātrām api vā sūtre paśyāmaḥ satām saṃprayogaḥ iti capadam nirālambana jñāna nivṛttaye varṇitam sati iti tu sati saptamya eva gata artha tvāt anarthakam lokataḥ eva kārya viśeṣa avagamāt prayoga samyak tvam avagamiṣyāmaḥ iti ced lokataḥ eva pratyakṣasya siddha tvāt kim tad lakṣaṇe sūtra sāmarthya yojanā kleśena upavarṣa ukta pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa varṇanam 
NM_2,1.262.3	 yat api atra bhagavān vṛtti kāraḥ prāha yat pratyakṣam na tat vyabhicarati yat vyabhicāri na tat pratyakṣam kim tarhi pratyakṣam tad saṃprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma sat pratyakṣam yat viṣayaṃjñānam tena eva saṃprayoge indriyāṇām puruṣasya buddhi janma sat pratyakṣam yat anya viṣayakam jñānam anya saṃprayoge bhavati na tat pratyakṣam iti iti evam tad satoḥ vyatyayena lakṣaṇam anapavādam avakalpate iti tat apivṛthā aṭāṭyā mātram saṃśaya jñānena vyabhicāra anativṛtteḥ tatra hiyat viṣayam jñānam tena saṃprayogaḥ indriyāṇām asti eva 
NM_2,1.263.0–2,1.263.1	 saṃśayasya indriya janya tva upapādanam nanu ! ubhaya viṣayam jñānam na ca ubhābhyām saṃprayuktam indriyam mā evam na hi dhava khadira vat dvau= api saṃśaya saṃvidi pratibhāsete kiṃtu sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti anirdhārita ekatara padārtha tattva avamarśī saṃśayaḥ jāyate nūnam ca tayoḥ anyatareṇa indriyam saṃprayuktam eva iti ubhaya avamarśi tvāt ca saṃśayasya yena saṃprayuktam cakṣuḥ tad viṣayam api tat jñānaṃbhavati eva iti na ati vyāptiḥ parihṛtā bhavati sūtrasya anuvādakatva upapādanam paraiḥ 
NM_2,1.263.2	 atha brūyuḥ kim anena parikleśena na lakṣaṇa varṇanam asmākam abhimatam anuvāda pakṣa nikṣipta tvāt api tu loka prasiddha pratyakṣa anuvādena dharmam pratyanimitta tvam eva vidhīyate ! na dharmam prati pramāṇaṃpratyakṣam vidyamāna upalaṃbhana tvāt vidyamāna artha grāhi tvāt iti arthaḥ dharmaḥ ca na vartamānaḥ tri kālān avacchinnasya tasya yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt ityādi śabdebhyaḥ pratīteḥ 
NM_2,1.263.3–2,1.264.1	 tarhi sat saṃprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma tat pratyakṣam iti kimarthaḥ granthaḥ iti ced na vidyamāna upalaṃbhana samarthana artha tvāt yadi vidyamāna upalaṃbhana tvam asiddham iti paraḥ brūyāt sa vaktavyaḥ vidyamāna upalaṃbhanam pratyakṣam sat saṃprayoga ja tvāt iti pratyakṣa grahaṇam api hetu nirdeśa artham eva sat saṃprayogasya asiddha tāṃbruvan= anena pratyākhyāyate sat saṃprayoga jam pratyakṣam pratyakṣa tvāt iti tat uktam pratyakṣa tvam adohetuḥ śeṣam hetu prasiddhaye iti 
NM_2,1.264.2–2,1.264.3	 svātantryeṇa api pratyakṣa tvam dharma grāhaka tva niṣedhāya vaktavyam na dharma grāhi pratyakṣam pratyakṣa tvāt asmad ādi pratyakṣa vat iti evam anyatra eva sūtra tātparyāt na ati vyāpti ādi doṣa avasaraḥ iha iti anuvādaka tve api sūtrasya doṣa kathanam tat etat api na prāmāṇika manaḥ anukūlam katarasya pratyakṣasyadharmam pratyanimitta tvam pratipādyate kim asmad ādi pratyakṣasya yogi pratyakṣasya vā tatra asmad ādi pratyakṣasya tathātve sarveṣām avivāda eva iti kim tatra iya tā śrameṇa ! yogi pratyakṣasya tu bhavatām asiddha tvāt kasya dharmam pratyanimitta tva pratipādanam 
NM_2,1.265.0–2,1.265.1	 evam ca dharmiṇaḥ abhāvāt āśraya asiddha tām spṛśet vidyamāna upalaṃbha tva pratyakṣa tva ādi sādhanam para prasiddhyā tad siddhiḥ iti ced kā iyam prasiddhiḥ nāma pramāṇa mūlāḥ tad viparītāḥ vā ādye pakṣe pramāṇasya apakṣa pāti tvāt parasya iva tava api siddhiḥ bhavatu apramāṇa mūla tve tuna kasyacid aṣya sauprasiddhiḥ yogi jñānam pareṣām yat siddham tad anubhāṣaṇe pratijñāpadayoḥ eva vyāghātaḥ te prasajyate 
NM_2,1.265.2–2,1.266.0	 paraiḥ hi dharma grāhi yogi jñānam abhyupagatam atas tad anubhāṣaṇedharma grāhakam na dharma grāhakam iti uktam syāt para saṃsiddha mūlam ca na anumānam prakalpate uktam bhavadbhiḥ eva idam nirālambana dūṣaṇe sādhya siddhiḥ yathā na asti para siddhena hetunā tathā eva dharmi siddha tvam para siddhyā na yujyate sūtrasya tarka rūpa tva upapādanam tad nirākaraṇañca 
NM_2,1.266.1–2,1.266.3	 tatra etat syāt prasaṅga sādhanam idam prasaṅgaḥ ca nāma para siddhena parasya aniṣṭa āpādanam ucyate parasya ca vidyamāna upalaṃbhanam sat saṃprayoga janyam ca pratyakṣam siddham atas tena eva hetunā dharma animitta tvaṃtasya upapādyate iti kaḥ doṣaḥ  na etat evam prasaṅga sādhanam nāma na asti eva paramārthataḥ tat hi kuḍyam vinā tatra citrakarmā iva lakṣyate na hi nabhaḥ kusumasya saurabhā saurabha vicāraḥ yuktaḥ atha api kim na etena ! bhavatu evam prasaṅga sādhanam tat api tuvyāpti mūlam bhavati na ca saṃbhavati vyāpti pratītiḥ iha mādṛśām na dharma grāhi sarveṣām pratyakṣam iti vetti kaḥ  
NM_2,1.267.1–2,1.268.0	 mad pratyakṣam akṣamam dharma grahaṇaḥ iti bhavān na jānīte tvad pratyakṣam apina dharma grāhi iti na aham jāne anyasya pratyakṣam īdṛśam eva iti ubhau= api āvāṃna jānīvahe tvayā tu yadi sarveṣām pratyakṣam jñātam īdṛśam tarhi tvam eva yogī iti yoginaḥ dvekṣi kim vṛthā  prāmāṇika sthitim tasmāt ittham śrotriya ! budhyase! parokte atīndriye hi arthe mā vādīḥ dūṣaṇam punar pramāṇa siddhe hata śakti dūṣaṇaṃpramāṇa śūnye api vṛthā tad uktayaḥ nirasya codya vyasanam tu mṛgyatāṃati indriye vastuni sādhanam punar sa ced paryanuyuktaḥ san vaktum śaknoti sādhanam om iti pratipattavyam no ced na asti eva tasya tat yogi pratyakṣe pramāṇam 
NM_2,1.268.1	 āha śikṣitāḥ smaḥ prāmāṇika vṛttam na dūṣaṇam brūmaḥ bhavantam eva anuyuñjmahe tat ā itarhi kathyatām dharma adhigama nipuṇa yogi pratyakṣa siddhau kim pramāṇam iti idam ucyate darśana atiśayaḥ eva pramāṇam tathā hi asmad ādiḥ apekṣitālokaḥ avalokayati nikaṭa sthitam artha bṛndam unduru vairiṇaḥ tu sāndratama tamaḥ paṅka paṭala vilipta deśa patitam api saṃpaśyanti saṃpāti nāmā ca gṛdhra rājaḥ yojana śata vyavahitām api daśaratha nandana sundarīm dadarśa iti śrūyate rāmāyaṇe saḥ ayam darśana atiśayaḥ śukla ādi guṇa atiśayaḥ iva tāratamya samanvitaḥ iti gamayati paramapiniratiśayam atiśayam atas ca yatra asya paraḥ prakarṣaḥ te yoginogīyante darśanasya ca paraḥ atiśayaḥ sūkṣma vyavahita viprakṛṣṭa bhūta bhaviṣyat ādi viṣaya tvam 
NM_2,1.269.0–2,1.269.2	 dharma ādayaḥ api yogi pratyakṣa viṣayāḥ nanu ! sva viṣaya anatikrameṇa bhavatu tad atiśaya kalpanā dharmaḥ tu cakṣuṣaḥ na viṣayaḥ eva tat uktam yatra api atiśayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sa sva artha an atilaṅghanāt dūra sūkṣma ādi dṛṣṭau syāt na rūpe śrotra vṛtti tā api ca ye api ca atiśayāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ prajñā medhā balaiḥ nṛṇām stoka stoka antara tvena na tu ati indriya darśanāt iti 
NM_2,1.269.3–2,1.270.1	 etat ayuktam yatas yadi api na asmad ādi nayana viṣayaḥ dharmaḥ tathā api yogi indriya gamyaḥ bhaviṣyati tathā hi yojana śata vyavahitam andhakāra antaritam vā na asmad ādi locana gocara tām upayāti saṃpāti pṛṣa d aṃśa dṛśoḥ tu viṣayaḥ bhavati eva cakṣuṣā eva yoginām dharma grahaṇam nanu evam aviṣaye pravṛttam yoginām cakṣuḥ gandha rasa ādīn api gṛhṇīyāt yathā uktam ekena tu pramāṇena sarvajñaḥ yena kalpyate nūnam sa cakṣuṣā sarvān rasa ādīn pratipadyate iti na etat evam rasa ādi grāhīṇi api yoginām indriyāṇi cakṣuḥ vat atiśayavanti eva iti na rasa ādiṣu cakṣuḥ vyāpāraḥ parikalpyate dharme api na tarhi kalpanīyaḥ iti ced na tasya rasa ādi vat tad aviṣaya tva abhāvāt 
NM_2,1.270.2	 api ca yogi indriya aviṣaya tvam dharmasya katham avagatavān bhavān aviṣaya tvam tad bhāve api tad anavagamāt avagamyate yathā nayana sadbhāve api śabda aśravaṇāt tad aviṣaya tā śabdasya avasīyate na ca evam yogi cakṣuṣi sati api dharmasya agrahaṇam avagantum śaknoti bhavān ubhayasya api bhavataḥ parokṣa tvāt iti aviṣayassa tasya iti na te vaktuṃyuktam iti dharmaḥ yogi pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ eva nanu ! kartavyatā rūpaḥ tri kāla sparśa varjitaḥ cakṣuḥ viṣaya tām eti dharmaḥ iti ati sāhasam 
NM_2,1.271.0–2,1.271.1	 satyam sāhasam etat te mama vā carmacakṣuṣaḥ na tu eṣa durgamaḥ panthāḥ yoginām sarva darśinām tri kālān avacchinnaḥ api dharmaḥ pratyakṣaḥ eva yat ca tri kālān avacchinno yajeta iti ādiliṅā ādi yukta śabda eka śaraṇa avagamaḥ dharmaḥ katham tatas anyena pramāṇena paricchidyatām iti ucyate tat api prakriyā mātram kim iva hi tri kāla sparśa asparśābhyām kṛtyam yathā vayam gamana ādi kriyāṇām deśa antara prāpti ādi prayojana tāṃjānīmaḥ tathā agnihotra ādi kriyāṇām svarga ādi phala tām jñāsyanti yoginaḥ iti kim atra sāhasam antatas dharma ādayaḥ manasā vā gṛhyante eva bhāvanā bala ja pratyakṣa vat 
NM_2,1.271.2–2,1.271.3	 yadi hi bāhya indriyeṣu amarṣaḥ na teṣu atiśayaḥ viṣahyate tat alam anubandhena manaḥ karaṇakam jñānam bhāvanā abhyāsa saṃbhavam bhavati dhyāyatām dharme kāntā ādau= iva kāminām manaḥ hi sarva viṣayam na tasya aviṣayaḥ kaścid asti abhyāsa vaśāt ca atīndriyeṣu api artheṣu parisphuṭāḥ pratibhāsāḥ prādurbhavanta udṛśyante yathā aahuḥ kāma śoka āmaya unmāda cora svaprādi upadrutāḥ abhūtān api paśyanti puratas avasthitān iva 
NM_2,1.272.0–2,1.272.1	 bhāvanā bala ja pratyakṣa dharma pratyakṣe dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhavati eva nanu ! eteṣām mithyājñāna tvāt na yogi vijñāne dṛṣṭānta tvaṃyuktam na sphuṭa ābabhāsa mātra tayā dṛṣṭānta tva upapatteḥ na hi śabda ghaṭayoḥ api sarva ātmanā atulya tvam tatra kāma śoka ādi bhāvanā abhyāsa bhuvām pratibhāsānām bādhaka vaidhuryāt aprāmāṇyam bhaviṣyati na itareṣām tad abhāvāt sphuṭa ābhāsa tvam tu ubhayatra api tulyam pati akṣasya atiśaḥ atīndriya artha viṣaya tva rūpaḥ yuktaḥ eva 
NM_2,1.272.2	 nanu ! abhyāsaḥ api kriyamāṇaḥ na atyantam apūrvam atiśayam āvahati laṅghana abhyāsa vat yaḥ api hi pratidinam ananya karmā laṅghanam abhyasyatisaḥ api katipaya pada parimitam avani talam abhilaṅghayati na tu parvatam ambudhim vā iti ucyate laṅghanam deha dharma tvāt kapha jāḍya ādi saṃbhavāt mā gāt prakarṣam jñāne tu tasya kaḥ pratibandhakaḥ laṅghana ādau tu pūrvedyus prayatna samupārjitaḥ na dehe atiśayaḥ kaścid anyedyus avatiṣṭhate tatra kevalam abhyāsāt prakṣaye kapha medasoḥ śarīra lāghavam labdhvā laṅghayanti yathocitam 
NM_2,1.273.0	 iha vijñāna janyaḥ tu saṃskāraḥ vyavatiṣṭhate krama upacīyamānaḥ asau para atiśaya kāraṇam yathā anuvāka grahaṇe saṃsthā abhyasana kalpitaḥ sthiraḥ karoti saṃskāraḥ pāṭha smṛti ādi pāṭavam yathā vā puṭapākena śodhyamānam śanaiśśanais hema niṣpratikāśam tat yāti kalyāṇa tām parām tathā eva bhāvanā abhyāsāt yoginām api mānasam jñānam sakala vijñeya sākṣātkāra kṣamam bhavet asmad ādeḥ ca rāga ādi mala āvaraṇa dhūsaram manaḥ na labhate jñāna prakarṣa padavīm parām pratyaham bhāvanā abhyāsa kṣapita aśeṣa kalmaṣam yoginām tu manaḥ śuddham kam iva artham na paśyati yathā ca teṣām rāga ādi prahāṇam avakalpate tathā apavarga cintāyām vistareṇa abhidhāsyate tat evam kṣīṇa doṣāṇām dhyāna avahita cetasām nirmalam sarva viṣayam jñānam bhavati yoginām 
NM_2,1.274.0–2,1.274.1	 asti eva asmad ādīnām api bhaviṣyat viṣayam prātibham jñānam api ca anāgata jñānam asmad ādeḥ api kvacid pramāṇam prātibham śvas me bhrātā aagantā iti dṛśyate na anartha jam na sandigdham na bādha vidhurīkṛtam na duṣṭa kāraṇam ca iti pramāṇam idam iṣyatām kvacid vādhaka yogaḥ ced astu tasya apramāṇa tā yatra aparedyus abhyeti bhrātā tatra kim ucyatām kākatālīyam iti ced na pramāṇa pradarśitam vastu tad kākatālīyam iti śaṅkitum arhati prātibham jñānam pramāṇam eva nanu ! anartha jam idam jñānam bhrātuḥ tad janakasya tadānīm asattvāt syāt etat evam yadi tadā astitvena bhrātaram gṛhṇīyāt kintu bhāvinam enam gṛhṇāti bhāvi tvam ca tadā asya asti eva iti katham anartha jaṃtat jñānam 
NM_2,1.275.1	 nanu ! bhāvitayā grahaṇam aghaṭamānam bhāvi tvam hi nāma sa avadhiḥ prāgabhāvaḥ abhāvasya ca bhāvena bhrātrā saha kaḥ sambandhaḥ vastu avastunoḥ virodhāt tat etat asamyak tad deśa sambandhasya tatraprāgabhāvaḥ na tu dharmiṇaḥ sa hi vidyate eva prāc avagataḥ sa cakutaścid bhojana utkaṇṭha ādeḥ kāraṇāt smaraṇa padavīm upārūḍhaḥ śvas tana āgamana viśiṣṭa tvena pratibhāti iti prātibhasya saḥ eva janakaḥ iti tasmāt anartha jatvā abhāvāt pramāṇam prātibham pramāṇam ca sat pratyakṣam eva na pramāṇa antaram śabda liṅga sārūpya nimitta anapekṣa tvāt prātibham pratyakṣam eva 
NM_2,1.275.2–2,1.276.1	 nanu ! pratyakṣam api mā bhūt indriya anapekṣa tvāt mā evam manasaā iva tatra indriya tvāt pūrva utpanna cākṣuṣa vijñāna viśeṣaṇasya bāhyasya vastunaḥ manaḥ grāhakam iti na andhādya bhāvaḥ iti uktam śabda ādi upāya antara viratau ca jāyamānam anavadyam jñānam mānasam pratyakṣam bhavati surabhi ketaka kusumam madhurā śarkarā iti jñāna vat iti api uktam ataā iva na aniyata nimittakam jñānam pratibhā iti vaktavyam pratyakṣa nimitta tvāt ārṣa jñānam anyat anyā ca pratibhā 
NM_2,1.276.2–2,1.277.2	 na ca ārṣam nāma jñānam pratibhā pratyakṣa atiriktasya ārṣa nāmnaḥ pratyayasya abhāvāt ṛṣīṇām api yat jñānam tat api āgama pūrvakam iti hi vadanti āgama grahaṇam ca nidarśana artham anupāyasya jñānasyateṣām asattvāt siddha darśanam api na pratibhā na ca siddha darśanam pratibhā asmad ādeḥ api bhāvāt tasmāt na pramāṇa antaram prātibham api tu pratyakṣam eva pratyakṣam api kāla traya viṣayakam asti eva 
NM_2,1.277.3–2,1.277.5	 nanu ! pratyakṣam api na idam bhavati tat hi vartamāna eka viṣayam yathā uktam saṃbaddham vartamānam ca gṛhyate cakṣuḥ ādinā iti tathā eṣa pratyakṣa dharmaḥ ca vartamāna artha tā eva yat iti ca mā evam anāgata grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya pradeśa antare svayam eva ukta tvāt rajatam gṛhyamāṇam hi cira sthāyi iti gṛhyata iiti ca bhavān eva avocat tasmāt pratyakṣam anāgata grāhi śvas me bhrātā aagantāiti siddham 
NM_2,1.277.6–2,1.277.8	 evañca asmad ādīnām iva anāgate bhrātari yoginām bhaviṣyati dharmepratyakṣam pravartsyati iti tasmāt yat sarvajña niṣadhāya kathyate yat jātīyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ tu yat jātīya artha darśanam bhavet idānīm lokasya tathā kāla antare api abhūt iti tad apāstam bhavati yoginām sarvajña tva saṃbhava ākṣepa parihārau tatra etat syāt sarvajña tā yoginām kim ekena jñānena bahubhiḥ vā 
NM_2,1.278.1–2,1.278.2	 na tāvat ekena na hi ekasmin jñāne paraspara virodhinaḥ arthāḥ śīta uṣṇa vat avabhāsante na api bahubhi tāni hi krameṇa vā bhaveyuḥ yugapad vā na yugapad jñānāni saṃbhavanti sūkṣma antaḥkaraṇa sāpekṣa tvāt krama bhāvibhiḥ tu jñānaiḥ aśeṣa tribhuvana kuhara nihita nikhila padārtha sārtha sākṣāt karaṇam eṣām manvantara koṭibhiḥ api durghaṭam iti katham sarva jñāḥ yoginaḥ 
NM_2,1.278.3	 ucyate yugapad ekayā eva buddhyā sarvatra sarvān arthān drakṣyanti yoginaḥ yat tu viruddha tvāt iti tad aprayojakam viruddhānām api nīla pīta ādīnām ekatra citra pratyaye avabhāsanāt ekatra ca mecaka pratyaye sannihita padārtha vyatirikta sakala vastu abhāva grahaṇasya pūrvam darśita tvāt śīta uṣṇayoḥ api kvacid avasare bhavati yugapad upalaṃbhaḥ tat yathā pratapati hutavaha visphuliṅga nikara anukāri kiraṇe taruṇa ūṣmaṇi grīṣmehima śakala śiśira payasi sarasi nimagne bhidaghna dehasya puṃsaḥ yugapa d eva saras salila sūrya ātapa vartinau śīta uṣṇa sparśau= anubhava patham avatarataḥ 
NM_2,1.279.0–2,1.279.1	 yoginām sarvajña tve api īśvarāt viśeṣaḥ nanu ! ekena jñānena sarvān arthān bhūta bhāvinaḥ parokṣān apipaśyantaḥ yoginaḥ katham akhila trailokya vṛttānta darśinaḥ sakala jagadguroḥ īśvarāt viśiṣyeran asti viśeṣaḥ īśvarasya tathāvidham nityam eva jñānam yoginām tu yoga bhāvanā abhyāsa prabhavam iti apūrvam api vastu bhāvanā vaśāt yogi pratyakṣa viṣayaḥnanu ! na adṛṣṭa pūrve arthe kvacid bhavati bhāvanā āgamāt tu paricchinne dharme bhāvanayā api kim  
NM_2,1.279.2–2,1.280.1	 codanā eva dharme pramāṇam iti sa avadhāraṇa pratijñā arthaḥ prathamam āgamāt avagata dharma svarūpeṣu satsu api yogiṣu na viplavataḥ eva iti ucyate yogiṣu asti eva ayam prakāraḥ paścāt api pravartamāne dharma grāhiṇi pratyakṣeca udanā eva iti avadhāraṇam śithilībhavati eva api ca īśvara jñānam sāṃsiddhikam eva dharma viṣayam vedasya kāraṇa bhūtam vakṣyāmaḥ tasmin= api sati na codanā eva iti avadhāraṇa artha siddhiḥ jaimini sūtra nirākaraṇa upasaṃhāraḥ 
NM_2,1.280.2	 tasmāt na dharma grāhakam yogi pratyakṣam vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt sat saṃprayoga ja tvāt ityādi sādhanam aprayojakam pramāṇa antara vijñāta prameya pratipādakaḥ dharma upadeśakaḥ śabdaḥ śabda tvāt ghaṭa śabda vat pratyakṣaḥ kasyacid dharmaḥ prameya tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat ityādayaḥ ca sulabhāḥ santi eva pratihetavaḥ tena niṣpratigha yukti sādhitām yoga buddhim akhila artha darśinīm kim viḍambayitum ucyate mudhā duṣṭa hetu nikurumba śambaram 
NM_2,1.280.3–2,1.280.4	 tat ittham api jaiminīyam sūtram asaṅgatā artham lakṣaṇa paratvam tu asyanirastam eva vaiśeṣika sammata pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa nirāsaḥ yat api kaiścid pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam uktam ātma indriya manaḥ artha sannikarṣāt yat utpadyate jñānam tad anyat anumāna ādibhyaḥ pratyakṣam iti tad api traya dvaya sannikarṣa janmanām sukha ātma ādi jñānānām avyāpakam ati vyāpakaṃca vyabhicārya ādi bodhānām iti upekṣaṇīyam 
NM_2,1.281.0–2,1.281.2	 sāṅkhya abhimata pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa dūṣaṇam īśvara kṛṣṇaḥ tu prativiṣaya adhyavasāyaḥ dṛṣṭam iti pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam avocat tat api na manojñam anumāna ādi jñānānām apiviṣaya adhyavasāya svabhāva tvena ati vyāpteḥ yukti dīpikā ākāra pradarśita vyākhyānāsām añjasyam yat tu rājā vyākhyātavān pratirābhi mukhye vartate tena ābhimukhyena viṣaya adhyavasāyaḥ pratyakṣam iti tat api anumāna ādau= asti eva ghaṭaḥ ayam iti vat agnimān parvataḥ iti ābhimukhyena eva pratīteḥ spaṣṭa tātu sarva saṃvidām sva viṣaye vidyate evam indriya sannikarṣa janya tvam antarā na anyat pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam 
NM_2,1.281.3	 atha manyase ! sāmānya vihitasya viśeṣeṇa bādhāt anumāna ādi vyāvṛttiḥ setsyati sāmānyena adhyavasāyaḥ utsṛṣṭaḥ sa liṅga śabdābhyāṃviśeṣitaḥ iti tad itaraḥ adhyavasāyaḥ pratyakṣam iti sthāsyati yadi evaṃpratyakṣa lakṣaṇam idānīm avyākaraṇīyam eva śabda liṅga grahaṇe varṇite sati tadvailakṣaṇyāt eva pratyakṣam jñāsyate iti tasmāt indriya artha sannikarṣa pada upādānam antareṇa na anumāna ādi vyavacchedaḥ upapadyate iti idam api na pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam anavadyam 
NM_2,1.282.0–2,1.282.1	 alam ati vistareṇa para darśana gītam atas vigata kalaṅkam asti na hi lakṣaṇam akṣa dhiyaḥ tad alam akṣa pāda muninā eva nibaddham idaṃharati manāṃsi lakṣaṇam udāra dhiyām iti pratyakṣam atha anumānam tad pūrvakam ca trividham anumānam pūrvavat śeṣavat sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam ca evam pramāṇa jyeṣṭhe asmin pratyakṣe lakṣite sati kathyate avasara prāptam anumānasya lakṣaṇam 
NM_2,1.282.2–2,1.282.3	 tatra anumāna svarūpam brūmahe tatas tatra sūtram yojayiṣyāmaḥ pañca lakṣaṇa kāt liṅgāt gṛhītān niyama smṛteḥ parokṣe liṅgini jñānam anumānam pracakṣate atra api liṅga viṣayam jñānam jñāna viṣayīkṛtam vā liṅgam pratibandha smaraṇa sahitam pramāṇam liṅgi jñānam phalam liṅgi jñānasya vā apramāṇa tāyām pūrvavat upādānādi jñānam phalam upavarṇanīyam karaṇasya hipramāṇa tvam iti sthitam eva etat 
NM_2,1.283.0–2,1.283.2	 liṅga śabda nirvacanam tasya pañca lakṣaṇa tvam ca tatra parokṣaḥ arthaḥ liṅgyate gamyate anena iti liṅgam tat ca pañca lakṣaṇam kāni punar pañca lakṣaṇāni pakṣa dharma tvam sa pakṣa dharma tvam vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ avādhita viṣaya tvam asat pratipakṣa tvaṃ ca iti siṣā dhayiṣita dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī pakṣaḥ tad dharma tvam tad āśrita tvam iti arthaḥ 
NM_2,1.283.3–2,1.283.7	 sādhya dharma yogena nirjñātam dharmi antaram sa pakṣaḥ tatra astitvam sādhya saṃsparśa śūnyaḥ dharmī vipakṣaḥ tatas vyāvṛttiḥ anumeyasya arthasya pratyakṣeṇā aagamena vā anapaharaṇam avādhita viṣaya tvam saṃśaya bīja bhūtena arthena pratyanumāna tayā prayujyamānena anupahata tvam asat pratipakṣa tvam etaiḥ pañcabhiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ upapannam liṅgam anumāpakam bhavati hetu doṣāḥ 
NM_2,1.283.8–2,1.284.3	 eteṣām eva lakṣaṇānām ekaika apāyāt pañca hetvābhāsāḥ vakṣyante yasya pakṣa dharma tā na asti asau= asiddhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt sādhya viparyaya vyāptaḥ tu viruddhaḥ sa yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ākāśa vat vipakṣe asattvam yasya na asti saḥ anaikāntikaḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tvāt iti 
NM_2,1.284.4–2,1.284.5	 yasya ābādhita viṣaya tvam na asti sa kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ yathā anuṣṇaḥ tejaḥ avayavī kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti yasya niṣpratipakṣatā na asti sa prakaraṇa samaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya dharma anupalabdheḥ ghaṭa vat nityaḥ śabdaḥ anitya dharma anupalabdheḥ ākāśa vat iti saḥ ayam eteṣu pañca su lakṣaṇeṣu avinābhāvaḥ liṅgasya parisamāpyate abādhita tvasya pṛthak hetu lakṣaṇa tā aakṣepaḥ 
NM_2,1.284.6–2,1.285.1	 nanu ! tri lakṣaṇake hetau= a vinābhāvaḥ parisamāpyate na catathāvidhe bādhā saṃbhavati bādhāvinā bhāvayoḥ virodhāt bādhita tvam pakṣasya eva na hetoḥ yat ca idam agni anuṣṇa tva sādhane kṛtaka tvam tri lakṣaṇam api bādhaka vidhurita viṣayam iti udāhṛtam tat asamīkṣita abhidhānam atra trailakṣaṇya anupapatteḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ eva tāvat ayam na bhavati pratyakṣa ādi anirākṛtaḥ hi pakṣaḥ ucyate na ca ayam īdṛśaḥ iti apakṣaḥ eva tad dharmaḥ hetuḥ katham pakṣa dharmaḥ syāt 
NM_2,1.285.2–2,1.286.1	 na api ayam anvayī hetuḥ anvaya grahaṇa samayaḥ eva tad viplava avadhāraṇāt anvayaḥ hi gṛhyamāṇaḥ sarva ākṣepeṇa yat yat kṛtakam tat tad anuṣṇam iti evam gṛhyate tatas ca tad grahaṇa samayaḥ eva ayam uṣṇaḥ api kṛtakaḥ iti hṛdaya patham avatarati tanūnapāt iti katham anvaya grahaṇam yadi tu analam utsṛjya ghaṭa ādau= anvaya grahaḥ na antar vyāptiḥ gṛhītā syāt sādhya sādhana dharmayoḥ tatas ca īvaṃvidhāt hetoḥ sva sādhya niyama ujjhitāt sādhya abhilāṣaḥ iti evam ṣaṇḍa anunaya doha daḥ anvaya pūrvaka tvāt ca vyatireka grahaṇasya tad nirākaraṇe tad apākaraṇam avagantavyam
