NM_2,1.286.2–2,1.287.0	 api ca siṣādhayita dharma vaiparītyena vahneḥ pratyakṣato niścayāt vastu vṛtta na saḥ eva vipakṣaḥ iti na tatas vyatirekaḥ kṛtaka tvasya iti tasmāt trelakṣaṇya apāyāt eva hetvābhāsaḥ ayam iti na rūpa antaram abādhita viṣaya tvam apekṣate hetoḥ abādhita tvam api duradhi gamamkatham ca idam abādhita tvam niścīyate na hi adarśana mātreṇa bādhā viraha niḥ cayaḥ sarva ātmanā hi nāstitvam vidyuḥ katham ayoginaḥ aniścite tad aṅge ca na hetoḥ hetu tāḥ bhavet yathā eva pakṣa dharma ādi rūpāṇām anupagrahe tasmāt abādhita tvam rūpa antaram avacanīyam iti abādhita tvam hetu aṅgam eva 
NM_2,1.287.1	 atra abhidhīyate yat uktam anvaya grahaṇam sarva ākṣepeṇa iti tad grahaṇa velāyām eva siṣā dhayiṣita dharma viparyaya adhyāsita hutavaha svarūpa parisphuraṇāt anvaya śūnyaḥ ayam hetuḥ iti tad ahṛdayaṅgamam anvayaḥ satyaṃsarva ākṣepeṇa gṛhyate na punar eka eka dharmi samullekhena evam hi tat ā ānantyā tanvayaḥ gṛhītum eva na śakyeta anumānasya ca vaiphalyam ittham bhavet agnimatām dhūmavatām sarva dharmāṇām anvaya avagama kāle eva gṛhīta tvāt dhūmaḥ hi yatra yatra iti sāmānyena eva gṛhyate na punar parvate araṇye gṛhe vā iti evam iṣyate evañca satya ākṣepa vācaḥ yuktiḥ upapannā bhaviṣyati na ca evam sati vaktavyam ṣaṇḍa anunaya mārgaṇam na hi tat varjam iti evam vyāpti grahaṇam iṣyate 
NM_2,1.288.1	 sāmānyena ca vyāptiḥ gṛhītā satī siṣā dhayiṣita dharmī apekṣayāsā eva antar vyāptiḥ ucyate yā eva ca naga lagna agni anumāna samaye tad vyatirikta kāntāra ādi pradeśa vartinī bahis vyāptiḥ abhūt sā eva kāla antare kāntāra vartini vahnau= anumīyamāne antar vyāptiḥ avatiṣṭhate tat iha api yat kṛta kaṃtat an uṣṇam iti sāmānyatas paricchedāt na tadānīm anala unmeṣaḥ iti siddhaḥ anvayaḥ 
NM_2,1.288.2–2,1.289.1	 vyatirekaḥ api kārye tejaḥ avayavini pakṣīkṛte kṛtaka tvasya tejaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ vidhu tāraka paramāṇu anabhyupagame tu vipakṣaḥ eva na asti iti tad abhāvāt sutarām tatra āvṛttiḥ bhavati iti na hi sa pakṣaḥ iva vipakṣe vṛttiḥ iṣyate yena yatnatas tad siddhaye yateta agniḥ eva vipakṣaḥ iti ced mā evam na hi pakṣaḥ eva vipakṣaḥ bhavitum arhati pakṣaḥ iti kaścana na asti eva iti ākṣepaḥ 
NM_2,1.289.2–2,1.290.1	 nanu ! vastūnāmat virūpa tvāt pakṣaḥ nāma paramārthataḥ na asti eva sādhya dharma adhikaraṇa bhūtaḥ ced saḥ arthaḥ tat sapakṣaḥ eva viparyaye tuna vipakṣatām ativartate na ca krama dvaya yogi tvam rūpa dvaya rahita tvaṃvā vastunaḥ samasti iti pakṣaḥ kaścid asti eva tat ayuktam anumāna uccheda prasaṅgāt advirūpa tve api vastūnāṃni sarga viṣayīkṛtaḥ arthaḥ kaścid pakṣaḥ eṣitavyaḥ tad abhau= etat apekṣa svarūpayoḥ sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ api abhāvaḥ syāt tat asya pakṣasyasataḥ vipakṣa tvam āropya yat tena vyabhicāra codanam tena agni anumānam apiviplaveta parvate vahni anumānasya vahni anuṣṇa tva anumānasya ca vailakṣaṇya śaṅkā parihārau 
NM_2,1.290.2–2,1.291.1	 nanu ! parvata ādiḥ dharmī na jvalana ākhya sādhya dharma śūnya tayā tatra niścitaḥ tejaḥ avayavī tu anuṣṇa tva vaiparītyena pratyakṣataḥ niścitā eti tat kim idānīm parvata ādiḥ agni mat tayā niścitaḥ tathā abhyupagamā ivā kim anumānena pakṣa anaṅgīkāre anumāna ucchedaḥ syāt nanu ! na parvataḥ agni mattayā niścitaḥ na api tad vaiparītyena kintu sandigdhaḥ eva āste yadi evam sandigdhe api vipakṣe vartamānaḥ dhūmādiḥ ahetuḥ eva syāt niścita vipakṣa vṛtti vat sandigdha vipakṣa vṛtteḥ api ahetu tvāt sarvam anumānam utsīdet tasmāt pakṣeṇa vyabhicāra codanam anucitam iti vyatirekavān eva ayam hetuḥ bādhaḥ na pakṣa mātra doṣaḥ kintu hetoḥ api 
NM_2,1.291.2–2,1.292.0	 yat punar abhihitam anirākṛta pakṣa vṛtti tvam asya na asti iti tat satyam vayam api amum pakṣam adhyakṣa vādhitam icchāmaḥ eva sa tuna pakṣa mātra paryavasitaḥ bādhaḥ kintu hetum api spṛśati na hetu nirapekṣa ātmā pakṣaḥ nāma asti kaścana prasādhayitum iṣṭaḥ hi hetunā pakṣaḥ ucyate sa na sādhayitum śakyaḥ pratyakṣe pratiyogini sādhya apahāra dvāreṇa hetuḥ bhavati bādhitaḥ abādhita anumeya tvam atas eva asya lakṣaṇam na tu hetuḥ asiddhaḥ ayam jvalane vṛtti saṃbhavāt abādhita tvam na duravagam amyat tvabādhita tā jñātum śakyā na iti vikalpitam pakṣasya api mahābhāga ! katham tām pratipatsyase prayatne kriyamāṇe api yadi bādhā na dṛśyate na asti eva iti avagantavyam vyavahāraḥ hi na anyathā 
NM_2,1.292.1–2,1.293.2	 atas tri lakṣaṇe api hetau bādha saṃbhavāt abādhita tvam rūpa antaraṃvaktavyam evañca yat ucyate bādhāvinā bhāvayoḥ virodhāt iti tat kathañcid yuktam kathañcid ayuktam pañca lakṣaṇake liṅge yaḥ parisamāptaḥ avinā bhāvaḥ tatra na asti eva bādhaḥ iti evam yuktam etat tri lakṣaṇa kaliṅga abhiprāyeṇa tva yuktam iti āgama bādhitaḥ hetuḥ evam āgama bādhitaḥ api hetuḥ draṣṭavyaḥ yathā brāhmaṇena surā peyāḥ aduṣṭa tvāt kṣīra vat iti anumānena anumānasya virodha asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_2,1.293.3	 nanu ! pratyakṣa āgama viruddha vat anu māna viruddham anumānam kasmāt na udāhriyate asambhavāt iti brūmaḥ na hi anumāna viruddham anumānam avakalpate anumānayoḥ hi tulya balayoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ atulya balayoḥ vā tatra tulya balayoḥ tulya bala tvāt eva na bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ samāne hi vīryekim kasya bādhakam bādhyam vā atulya bala tva pakṣe api yat kṛtam alpa bala tvam anyatarasya tatas eva tad aprāmāṇya siddheḥ kim anumāna bādhayā tasmāt na anumāna viruddham anumānam buddhyāmahe 
NM_2,1.293.4–2,1.294.1	 atas eva anumāna viruddham anumānam apaśyatā bhāṣya kāreṇa uktam yat punar anumānam pratyakṣa āgama viruddham nyāya ābhāsassaḥ iti asat pratipakṣa tvam api hetu aṅgam eva yatra tu tulya bale dve anumāne nipatataḥ sa sat pratipakṣasya viṣayaḥ iti asat pratipakṣa tvam pañcamam liṅga lakṣaṇam upadiśyate paraspara viruddha hetu dvaya samāveśaḥ bhavati eva 
NM_2,1.294.2	 nanu ! vastūnā dvi rūpa tvāt katham ekatra dharmiṇi paraspara viruddha dharma dvaya ākṣepi prayojaka hetu dvaya sannipātaḥ bhavet atas eva viruddhā avyabhicārī nāma na hetvābhāse iha iṣyate tad ati durlabhaḥ sat pratipakṣaḥ hetuḥ iti kam apahartum pañcamam idam hetu lakṣaṇam upadiśyate iti satyam evam kintu saṃśaya bījam yat viśeṣa agrahaṇam tad anyatara nirṇayāya bhrāntyā prayujyamānam sat pratipadyate sthāṇuḥ ayam puruṣa dharma anupalabdheḥ puruṣaḥ ayam sthāṇu dharma anupalabdheḥ iti anyatara viṣaya anupalaṃbhaḥ eva ayam 
NM_2,1.295.1	 saṃśaya ādhāyī pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatireka upapatti bhrameṇa hetuḥ iti prayujyamānaḥ sat pratipakṣaḥ bhavati iti prakaraṇa sama hetvābhāsa cintāyām vistareṇa nirūpayiṣyate puruṣa prajñā pramāda mūla tvāt ca vastunaḥ dvi ātmaka tvam ititatra eva vakṣyate lakṣaṇa antaram atas kathanīyam prati aneka vikala tvam avaśyam tena liṅgam anumāna patha jñāḥ pañca lakṣaṇakam abhyupajagmuḥ pañca lakṣaṇa kāt liṅgāt iti padya stha gṛhīta atitipada vyākhyānam 
NM_2,1.295.2	 pañca lakṣakāt liṅgāt iti vyākhyātam vyāpti grahaṇa samaya samadhigata svarūpasya api liṅgasya punar dharmiṇi kvacid anavadhṛta vapuṣā ūnāsya adhyavasāya sādhana tvam iti dvitīyam liṅga darśanam eva apekṣaṇīyam iti gṛhītāt iti uktam liṅgam hi jñāpakam na cakṣuḥ ādi vat kārakam jñāpakasya ca ayam svabhāvaḥ yat jñātam anu jñāpayati iti vyāpti grahaṇa kāla gṛhītam eva vyāpti vat smaryamāṇa tathā eva liṅgam liṅginam gamayiṣyati iti ced na grahaṇam antareṇa vyāpti smṛteḥ api abhāvāt iti alam prasaṅgena 
NM_2,1.296.0–2,1.296.4	 niyama smṛteḥ iti asya vyākhyānam niyama smṛteḥ iti vivriyatām ! kaḥ ayam niyamaḥ nāma vyāptiḥ avinābhāvaḥ nitya sāhacaryam iti arthaḥ niyamaḥ nāma kaḥ āha na etāvatī eva virantum ucitam tasya tad avinābhāvi tvam iti atra hi nimittam anveṣaṇīyam tārkikaiḥ tādātmya tad utpattibhyām vyāpti nirūpaṇam tat ca tādātmya tad utpatti rūpam īkṣitavantaḥ bhikṣavaḥ yaḥ hiyadātmā bhāvaḥ sa katham tam utsṛjati vṛkṣa ātmikā eva hi śiṃśapā tenavṛkṣa tvam anumāpayati saḥ ayam svabhāva hetuḥ ucyate vṛkṣaḥ ayam śiṃśapā tvāt iti tatra tādātmyam pratibandhaḥ 
NM_2,1.297.1–2,1.297.2	 kāryam nāma kāraṇa adhīna ātma lābham eva bhavati na kāraṇa anapekṣam iti tat upalabhyamānam tat anumāpayati agniḥ atra dhūmāt iti kārya hetau tad utpattiḥ pratibandhaḥ evam hi dvividham pratibandham anumeya avyabhicāra nibandhanam anuktvā kevala sāhacarya niyama mātra varṇanam yat pāda prasārikā sā eva iti ucyate pāda prasārikā eva sādhīyasī sthūla dṛṣṭibhiḥ avalambita avaram na sūkṣma dṛṣṭibhiḥ utprekṣitāḥ tādātmya ādi pratibandhāḥ 
NM_2,1.297.3	 tādātmye tāvat gamaka aṅge hetu sādhyayoḥ avyatireke gamya gamaka bhāvaā iva durupapādaḥ na khalu a gṛhītam liṅgam liṅgi pratītim ādhātum arhati tatra liṅga buddhau liṅgī pratibhāsate na vā apratibhāse tad vuddhyātat agrahaṇāt katham tasya tad ātmaka tvam pratibhāse tu liṅga vat pratyakṣaā iva saḥ arthaḥ iti kim anumānena 
NM_2,1.297.4–2,1.298.2	 viparīta samāropa vyavaccheda artham anumānam iti ced tad svarūpa grahaṇe viparīta āropaṇa avasara abhāvāt na hi śiraḥ pāṇi ādi viśeṣa darśane sati sthāṇu samāropaḥ pravartate tatra tad bhedāt upapadyeta api na hi śiraḥ pāṇi ādayaḥ eva puruṣaḥ iti tad grahaṇe api apuruṣa āropaḥ kāmaṃbhavet iha vṛkṣa tva śiṃśapā tvayoḥ abhedāt śiṃśapātu agrahaṇe sati kākathā vṛkṣa itara samāropasya ! api ca vṛkṣa tva grahaṇe sati sāmānya dharma grahaṇāt viśeṣa an adhyavasāyāt kadācid aśiṃśapa āropaḥ syāt na tu śiṃśapātu agrahaṇe satia vṛkṣa tva samāropaḥ yuktaḥ pramātuḥ śiṃśapā tvam hi yasya pratyakṣa gocaraḥ parokṣam tasya vṛkṣa tvam iti na atīva laukikam 
NM_2,1.298.3	 kiñca sādhya sādhanayoḥ avyatirekāt yathā śiṃśapā tve ca vṛkṣa tvam anumīyate tathā vṛkṣa tvena api śiṃśapā tvam anumīyeta tādātmya aviśeṣāt tathā ca prayatna anantarīyaka tvena anitya tvam sādhyate tadvat anitya tvena api tat sādhyeta tatas ca sa pakṣa vyāpti avyāptibhyām kṛtaka tva prayatna ānantarīyaka tvayoḥ yaḥ bhedaḥ uktaḥ sa hīyeta vyāpteḥ adviṣṭha tvam tādātmyasya niyame paryavasānam ca 
NM_2,1.299.2	 nanu ca ! anyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ anyaḥ ca pratibandhaḥ dviṣṭhaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pratibandhaḥ tu parāyat tatva lakṣaṇaḥ tatra śiṃśapā tvam vṛkṣa tve pratibaddham na vṛkṣa tvam śiṃśapā tve prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam api anitya tve niyatam na tu anitya tvam tatra iti tathā dhūmasya agnau pratibandhaḥ na tu agneḥ dhūme satyam evam kintu evam ucyamāne niyamaḥ eva aṅgīkṛtaḥ bhavet na tādātmyam tādātmye hi yathā śiṃśapā śiṃśapām vinā nadṛśyate tathā vṛkṣa tvam api śiṃśapā rahitam nadṛśyeta dṛśyate ca khadirā dauśiṃśa pā rahitam vṛkṣa tvam vidyut ādau ca prayatna ānantarīyaka tva rahitam anitya tvam upalabhyate iti katham abhedaḥ 
NM_2,1.300.0–2,1.300.1	 vinā sādhana dharmeṇa sādhya dharmaḥ ayam asti hi dṛṣṭaḥ tad vyatirekeṇa tad ātmā ca iti kaitavam atha vidyut ādya nitya tvāt anyat eva ghaṭa ādi anitya tvam yat prayatna ānantarīyaka tva abhinnam ucyate tarhi dharmi bhedena dharmāṇām bhede anvaya grahaṇa anupapatteḥ sarvam anumānam utsīdet dhūma agnyoḥ tu kārya kāraṇayoḥ bhedāt yuktam vaktum dhūmasya agnau pratibandhaḥ na tu agneḥ dhūme iha tusādhya sādhanayoḥ avyatirekāt na tathā śakyate vaktum tathā abhidhānā ivā na avyatirekaḥ sarvathā tādātmyam vā tyajyatām vṛkṣa tva anitya tvābhyām śiṃśapātu aprayatna anantarīyaka tve vai anumīyatām na antarā avasthātum śakyate svabhāva hetuka anumāna antara nirākaraṇam 
NM_2,1.300.2–2,1.301.1	 yaḥ ca ayam anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti svabhāva hetuḥ udāhṛtaḥ sa katham svabhāva hetuḥ idam hi cintyatām anitya tvam nāma kim ucyate kim ca kṛtaka tvam iti tatra anitya tvam vināśa yogaḥ utpatti yogaḥ ca kṛtaka tvam utpannasya ca bhāvasya vināśaḥ natu utpādaḥ eva vināśaḥ iti katham sādhya sādhanayoḥ avyatirekaḥ paraiḥ svabhāva hetuka anumāna saṃbhava samarthanam 
NM_2,1.301.2–2,1.301.3	 atra codayanti vināśa yoge hi anitya tve vināśī śabdaḥ iti buddhiḥ syāt na anityaḥ iti eṣyā ca sā mithyā buddhiḥ śikhariṇā eva kṛśa anu viśeṣitasya vināśavataḥ śabdasya gṛhītum aśakyatvāt abhāvena hi dharmeṇa tadvat tā dharmiṇaḥ katham abhāva graha velāyām dharmiṇaḥ anupalambhanāt anitya tvam iti ca bhāva pratyayaḥ katham abhāve bhavet viruddha tvāt tasmāt ubhayānta paricchinnā vastu sattā anitya tvam ucyatām kṛtaka tvam api sattā eva kāraṇa utpāditā dhārā satī kathyate iti evañcasattā eva sādhyam sādhanam ca iti siddham svabhāva hetu tvam siddhāntinā tad nirākaraṇam 
NM_2,1.301.4–2,1.302.1	 tat idam anupapannam sādhya sādhanayoḥ tathā tvena anavabhāsanāt evam hi ucyamāne śabdaḥ sattāvān sattāvat tvāt iti pratītiḥ syāt na ca evam dṛśyate api tu anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti atha ubhaya anta paricchinnā sattā sādhyāḥ kāraṇa nirvartyā aaśraya samavāyinī ca sādhanam ucyate tat etat aghaṭamānam vināśa rūpasya antasya tadānīmavidyamāna tvena sattā paricchedaka tva abhāvāt buddhi sthena atha tena asyāḥ paricchedaḥ abhyupeyate śabdasya eva paricchedaḥ vināśena astu tādṛśāḥ dharmaḥ samāna kālaḥ api buddhyā eva viṣayīkṛtaḥ tad viśeṣaṇa tām yāti tathā bhāvi api yāsyati 
NM_2,1.302.2–2,1.302.3	 tat evam vināśī śabdaḥ iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva siddheḥ kiṃsatta asādhya kalpanayā abhāva padāt api bhāva pratyayaḥ yujyate eva yat punar abhihitam abhāve bhāva pratyayaḥ tu atalādiḥ na syāt iti tad atyanta anabhijñasya ca udyam śabda pravṛtti nimittasya tatra bhāva pratyayena abhidhānāt tasya guṇasya hi bhāvāt dravye tad śabda niveśa eti abhāve api abhāva tvam iti darśanāt tasmāt buddhi stha vināśa yogaḥ eva anitya tvam 
NM_2,1.303.2–2,1.304.1	 kṛtaka tvam api utpatti yogaḥ eva na sattā kāraṇa utpādita āśraya avacchede tu tasyāḥ iṣyamāṇe dharmiṇaḥ eva tad avacchedaḥ bhavatu iti kiṃsopāna antareṇa vastu bhedena dharmāḥ api midyantaḥ eva iti ākṣepaḥ nanu utpāda vināśa ākhyam na dharma dvayam anvayi yat haṭe na asti tad śabde yat ca śabde na tad haṭe atha ekaḥ eva dharmaḥ sarva bhāva saṃbandhī iṣyeta tarhi eka bhāva samutpāde sarva utpādaḥ prasajyate eka pralaya kāle ca sakala pralayaḥ bhavet tasmāt sattā pakṣaḥ eva varam dharmi bhede api dharmāṇām anugata tvam yuktam 
NM_2,1.304.2–2,1.304.3	 na etat evam dharmi bhede api dharmāṇām tulya rūpāṇām avabhāsāt na ghaṭa ādi svarūpam hi nāśaḥ iti avakalpate yena ananvaya doṣaḥ syāt tad bheda upanibandhanaḥ eka tvam api dharmasya na asti sarveṣu dharmiṣu yena eka dhvaṃsa samaye sakala dhvaṃsa saṅkaraḥ bhinna tve api ca dharmāṇām samāna rūpa tvena avabhāsamāna tvātanvaya grahaṇa ādi kārya avirodhaḥ atas eva sāmānyam antareṇa api 
NM_2,1.305.1	 samāna dharma mūla anvaya ādi vyavahāra upapatteḥ tatra na sūtrakāreṇa sāmānya grahaṇam kṛtam api tu sādharmya grahaṇam upāttam udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam iti tena vināśa utpāda dharmayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvāt tayoḥ ca bhedāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti na svabhāva hetuḥ iti siddham kārya anumānam api na saṃbhavati 
NM_2,1.305.2–2,1.305.3	 kārya hetuḥ api na saṃbhavati bhavatām hi pakṣe kṣaṇayoḥ vā kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ bhavet santānayoḥ vā kṣaṇayoḥ na iti vakṣyāmaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga nirākṛtau saṃbhavan= api durlakṣaḥ sūkṣma tvāt ca tayoḥ asau dhūma agni santānayoḥ tu avāstava tvāt eva na asti kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ artha kriyā kāritvam eva vastu tvam yadi dhūmaḥ kārya tvāt analam anumāpayet kaṭu malina gagana gāmi tva ādi dharmaiḥ api tasya gamakaḥ bhavet 
NM_2,1.306.1–2,1.307.0	 na ca kathañcid tad kārya tvam kathañcid atad kārya tvam ca dhūmasya upapannam sarva ātmakasya tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāci prabhava tvāt atha sarva ātmanā api tad kārya tve dhūma tva mātram eva agni sahacārī iti manyase sahacāri tvam eva astu tad utpatti kathā vṛthā siddhānte kārya liṅgaka anumānam upapadyate eva nanu bhavadbhiḥ api kārya anumānam aṅgīkṛtam eva yathā śeṣavatiti vyākhyāsyate yathā aaha kaṇa vrataḥ kāryam kāraṇam saṃyogi samavāyi virodhi ca iti laiṅgikam iti na sāhacarya upalakṣaṇa artha tvāt dhūma agnyoḥ nadī pūrayoḥ vā na kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt gamaka tvam yathā ukta nyāyena api tu nitya sāhacaryāt niyamāt eva iti kaṇāda sūtra samarthanam 
NM_2,1.307.1	 virodhinoḥ katham sāhacaryam iti ced sat asatoḥ gamya gamaka bhāvāt virodhinoḥ ekatara darśanāt anyatarasya abhāvaḥ anumīyate bhāva abhāvayoḥ ca sāhacaryam tayoḥ asti eva kaṇāda sūtre kārya ādi grahaṇaṃcopa lakṣaṇam anyeṣām api hetūnām bhūmnām jagati darśanāt sūrya astamayam ālokya kalpyate tāraka udayaḥ pūrṇa candra udayāt vṛddhiḥ ambudheḥ avagamyate uditena anumīyante saritaḥ kumbhayoninā śuṣyat pulina paryanta viśrānta khaga paṅktayaḥ pipīlika aṇḍa sañcāra ceṣṭā anumita vṛṣṭayaḥ bhavanti pathikāḥ parṇa kuṭīra karaṇa udyatāḥ anye api saugata udgīta pratibandha dvaya ujjhitāḥ kiyantaḥ bata ! gaṇyante hetavaḥ sādhya bodhakāḥ loka prasiddhāḥ tādātmya tad utpatti avadhīraṇāt ḍimbha hevāka sadṛśam sva matyā tad samarthanam 
NM_2,1.307.2–2,1.308.2	 atas ca tad svabhāvaḥ tad kāryam ityādi vyasana mātrakam bauddha mate sarvathā vyāpti grahaḥ na saṃbhavati api ca vyāvṛttyoḥ liṅga liṅgi tvam pratibandhaḥ ca vastunoḥ vikalpaiḥ grahaṇam tasya katham saṅgacchatām idam  uktam ca etat prathamaḥ eva āhnike iti alam prasaṅgena tasmāt anumiti hetuḥ sambandhaḥ sāhacaryam iti siddham na tuśauddhodaniśiṣya parikalpitam ubhayam api etat sāhacaryam tu sahajam evayat tu abhyadhīyata paraiḥ kim adhīnam asyatad sāhacaryam iti tatra vidhiḥ pramāṇam tādātmya tad jananayoḥ api ca eṣa teṣāṃ tulyaḥ anuyogaḥ iti kim viphalaiḥ pralāpaiḥ anumiti kāle vyāpteḥ smaraṇam eva na tu anubhavaḥ 
NM_2,1.308.3–2,1.309.0	 niyamaḥ vyākhyātaḥ smṛteḥ iti kaḥ arthaḥ ucyate niyamaḥ hi gṛhītaḥ aṅgam anumeya pramām prati na nārikela dvīpa sthaḥ dhūmāt agnim prapadyate sādhya anumiti velāyām na ca asti niyama grahaḥ niyama graha kāle ca na sādhyam anumīyate tena pūrva gṛhītassan idānīm smṛti gocaraḥ niyamaḥ pratipatti aṅgam tathā avagati darśanāt 
NM_2,1.309.1–2,1.309.3	 dvitīya liṅga darśane sati api niyama smaraṇam antareṇa sādhya pramiteram utpādāt yatra api viṣaye abhyaste na eva sañcetyate smṛtiḥ tatra api anena nyāyena balāt sā parikalpyate anumitiḥ smṛti rūpā iti pakṣaḥ atas eva kecana pratyutpanna kāraṇa janyām smṛtim eva anumānam uktavantaḥ parokṣe liṅgi nīti pada prayojanam pratyutpannam ca kāraṇam kutracid dharmiṇi dharma antara sahacarita liṅga darśanam iti parokṣe liṅginī iti uktam sādhya viśiṣṭa pakṣe eva anumeyaḥ na sādhya mātram 
NM_2,1.309.4–2,1.310.1	 tatra liṅgī tāvat ucyate dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī sādhyaḥ saḥ eva liṅgī iti na dharmi mātram sādhyam parvata ādi dharmiṇaḥ siddha tvāt na dharma mātram agneḥ api yatra tatra siddha tvāt na ca dvayossādhya tvam svatantrayoḥ tayoḥ api siddha tvāt eva tasmāt ekasya dvayoḥ vā svātantryeṇa anumeya tā na avakalpate iti avaśyam anyatara viśiṣṭaḥ anyataraḥ sādhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ pakṣa viśeṣyaka anumitiḥ eva svārasikī 
NM_2,1.310.2	 tatra api tu dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī sādhyaḥ yuktaḥ na dharmi viśiṣṭa udharmaḥ tathā hi deśa viśiṣṭe vahnau sādhye ṣoḍaśa vikalpāḥ saṃbhaveyuḥ sarve eva agniḥ sarva deśa viśiṣṭaḥ anirdhārita deśa viśeṣa viśiṣṭaḥ pūrva anubhūta mahānasa ādi deśa viśiṣṭaḥ saṃprati upalabhyamāna parvata ādi deśa viśiṣṭaḥ vā anumeyaḥ syāt 
NM_2,1.310.3–2,1.310.5	 anirdhārita viśeṣaḥ vā kaścid agniḥ sarva deśa viśiṣṭaḥ anirdhārita deśa viśiṣṭaḥ pūrva anubhūta deśa viśiṣṭaḥ paridṛśyamāna deśa viśiṣṭaḥ vā anumeyaḥ syāt pūrva anubhūtaḥ vā agniḥ sarva deśa viśiṣṭaḥ anirdhārita deśa viśiṣṭaḥ prāc dṛṣṭa deśa viśiṣṭaḥ upalabhyamāna deśa viśiṣṭaḥ anumeyaḥ syāt evam siṣā dhayiṣitaḥ vā agniḥ sarva deśa viśiṣṭaḥ prāk anubhūta deśa viśiṣṭaḥ idānī nubhūyamāna deśa viśiṣṭaḥ vā anumeyaḥ iti 
NM_2,1.310.6–2,1.311.1	 tatra ete pañcadaśa pakṣāḥ pratyakṣa virodha siddha sādhana tva ādi doṣa upahata aityanāt araṇīyāḥ eva yaḥ ca ṣoḍaśaḥ pakṣaḥ etad deśa viśiṣṭaḥ eṣaḥ agniḥ iti tatra apideśa viśeṣa avacchedam antareṇa eva vahniḥ iti gṛhītum eva na śakyataḥ eva iti prathamam deśaḥ eva gamyate tasya ca pūrva pratipanna tvāt idānīm anavagata dahana viśiṣṭasya anumātum yogya tvāt saḥ eva sādhyaḥ yuktaḥ 
NM_2,1.311.2	 api ca agneḥ sādhyatāyām anupalabdha tad dharmaḥ katham anumāpakaḥsyāt anupalabdhe tu jvalane na tad dharma tayā dhūmaḥ gṛhītum pāryate upalabdhe tu hutabhuji bhavat api niṣphalam eva dhūmasya tad dharmatā grahaṇam anumeyasya tadānīm abhāvāt tasmāt agni viśiṣṭaḥ paridṛśyamānaḥ deśaḥ eva sādhyaḥ sa ca svarūpataḥ pratyakṣaḥ api parokṣa dharma viśiṣṭa tayā anumeyaḥ iti dhūma dharma yogāt agni dharmavān saḥ eva anumīyate saḥ anumānasya viṣayaḥ liṅgī iti ucyate parokṣa grahaṇam ca etat abhiprāyam eva parokṣe iti viśeṣaṇam āvaśyakam 
NM_2,1.311.3	 kvacid tu vyāpti smaraṇa samanantaram eva pratyāsīdataḥ pramātuḥ jhaṭiti samunmiṣan= akasmāt eva pratyakṣībhavati vibhāvasuḥ iti na tad viśiṣṭa tayā api dharmiṇaḥ parokṣa tvam avakalpate iti tad vyāvṛttaye parokṣa grahaṇam nitya parokṣasya api ca īśvara adṛṣṭa indriya ādeḥ anumeya tām vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt yathocitāt liṅgāt yathā ukta niyama smṛteḥ yathā ukta liṅgi vijñānam anumānam iti sthitam anumāna prāmāṇyākṣepaḥ nanu ! satya numānasya prāmāṇye lakṣaṇa āśrayaḥ kāryaḥ vicāraḥ na punar prāmāṇyam tasya yujyate 
NM_2,1.312.2–2,1.313.2	 tathā ca āhuḥ prāmāṇyasya agauṇa tvāt anumānāt artha niścaya udurlabhaḥ pakṣa dharma ādi rūpam hi liṅgasya balāt gauṇyāḥ vṛttyā darśayitavyam dharme hi sādhye na hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam agni dharma tvāt dhūmasya dharmiṇi sādhye hetoḥ ananvayitvam na hi yatra dhūmaḥ tatra parvataḥ iti anvayaḥ dvaye tu sādhye dvayam api na asti na hi dahana mahīdhrayoḥ dhūmaḥ dharmaḥ na api evam anvayaḥ yatra dhūmaḥ tatra parvata agnī iti dharma viśiṣṭedharmiṇi sādhye tat ubhayam aghaṭa mānam eva na api agni viśiṣṭa dharādhara dharma tayā dhūmaḥ prathamam upalabdhum śakyate 
NM_2,1.313.3–2,1.313.4	 na ca api evam anvayaḥ yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agnimān parvataḥ iti tasmāt avaśyam pakṣa dharma tva anvaya vyavahāra siddhaye dharma viśiṣṭe dharmiṇi rūḍhaḥ pakṣa śabdaḥ tad eka deśe dharmiṇi gauṇyāḥ vṛttyā varṇanīyaḥ anvaya pradarśana samaye ca tad eka deśe tathā eva yojane a tigauṇa lakṣaṇa tvāt indriya artha sannikarṣa ja tvā ādi vat agauṇa lakṣaṇa tva abhāvāt anumānam apramāṇam vyāptiḥ api durgrahāḥ api ca viśeṣe anugama abhāvāt sāmānye siddha sādhanāt tadvataḥ anupapanna tvāt anumāna kathā kutas  sāhacaryam api na vyāpti grāhakamsāhacarye ca sambandhe visrambhaḥ iti mugdha tā śata kṛtvas api tad dṛṣṭau vyabhicārasya saṃbhavāt 
NM_2,1.314.0	 deśa kāla daśā bheda vicitra ātmasu vastuṣu avinā abhau= a niyamaḥ na śakyaḥ vaktum āha ca avasthā deśa kāla ādi bhedāt bhinnāsu śaktiṣu bhāvānām anumānena prasiddhiḥ ati durlabhā vyāptiḥ asarva jñaiḥ na gṛhītum śakyā bhavan= api avinābhāvaḥ paricchettum na śakyate jagattraya gata aśeṣa padārtha ālocanāt vinā na pratyakṣīkṛtāḥ yāvat dhūma agni vyaktayaḥ akhilāḥ tāvat syāt api dhūmaḥ asau yaḥ anagneḥ iti śaṅkyate sarvajñānām tu na anumāna apekṣāye tu pratyakṣatas viśvam paśyanti hi bhavādṛśāḥ kim divya cakṣuṣām eṣām anumāna prayojanam sāmānya dvārā api na vyāpti graha saṃbhavaḥ sāmānya dvārakaḥ api asti nāvinā abhā= a niścayaḥ vāstavam hi na sāmānyam nāma kiñcana vidyate 
NM_2,1.315.0	 bhūyas darśanena api na vyāpti niścayaḥ bhūyas darśana gamyā api na vyāptiḥ avakalpate sahasraśas api tad dṛṣṭau vyabhicāra avadhāraṇāt bahu kṛtvas api vastu ātmā tathā iti pariniścitaḥ deśa kāla ādi bhedena dṛśyate punar anyathā bhūyas dṛṣṭyā ca dhūmaḥ agni sahacārī iti gamyatām anagnau tu sa na asti iti na bhūyas darśanāt gatiḥ sāhacarya niyamaḥ api durgrahaḥna ca api dṛṣṭi mātreṇa gamakāḥ sahacāriṇaḥ tatra eva niyata tvam hi tad anya abhāva pūrvakam niyamaḥ ca anumāna aṅgam gṛhītaḥ pratipadyate grahaṇam ca asya na anyatra na astitā niścayam vinā 
NM_2,1.316.0	 darśana adarśanābhyām hi niyama grahaṇam yadi tat api asat anagnau hi dhūmasya iṣṭam adarśanam anagniḥ ca kiyān sarvam jagat jvalana varjitam tatra dhūmasya nāstitvam na eva paśyanti ayoginaḥ tat evam niyama abhāvāt sati vā jñapti asaṃbhavāt anumāna pramāṇa tva durāśā parimucyatām anumānānām prāmāṇyam durnirūpam evaanumāna virodhaḥ api yadi ca iṣṭa vighāta kṛt viruddha avi abhicāraḥ vā sarvatra sulabha udayaḥ atas eva anumānānām apaśyantaḥ pramāṇa tām tad visraṃbha niṣedha artham idam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ hasta sparśa ādinā andhena viṣame pathi dhāvatā anumāna pradhānena vinipātaḥ na durlabhaḥ 
NM_2,1.316.1–2,1.317.2	 api ca yatnena anumitaḥ api arthaḥ kuśalaiḥ anumātṛbhiḥ abhiyuktataraiḥ anyaiḥ anyathā eva upapādyate anumāna prāmāṇya samarthanam atra abhidhīyate kim ayam anumāna svarūpākṣepaḥ eva kriyate uta tad tad tārkikā upalakṣita tad lakṣaṇa ākṣepaḥ iti tatra anumāna svarūpam ca aśakya nihnavam eva sarva loka prasiddha tvāt abalā bāla gopālahālika pramukhāḥ api buddhi ante niyatāt arthāt artha antaram asaṃśayam anumāna apalāpe tu pratyakṣāt api durlabhā lokayātrā iti lokāḥ syuḥ likhitāḥ iva niścalāḥ pratyakṣa dṛṣṭam api padārtha jātam tad jātīya tva liṅga vyāpāreṇa sukha sādhanam itara kāraṇam iti vā niścitya tat upādadate jahati vālaukikāḥ anumāna lakṣaṇa ākṣepa samādhānam 
NM_2,1.317.3	 atha avicārita ramaṇīya tā eva tattvam na tu lakṣaṇa niyamaḥ śakya kriyaḥ tasya iti lakṣaṇa ākṣepaḥ ayam ucyate saḥ api ayuktaḥ yatas yam kañcid artham ālokya yaḥ kaścid na avagamyate kañcid eva akṣipati artham arthaḥ kaścid iti sthitiḥ tatra vastu svabhāvaḥ ayam iti pāda prasārikā dṛśyate hi avinābhūtāt arthāt artha antare matiḥ atas yad darśanāt yatra pratītiḥ upajāyate tayoḥ asti arthayoḥ kaścid sambandhaḥ iti manmahe tad ātma tā tad utpattī na śraddadhati tad vidaḥ sāhacaryam tu sambandhaḥ iti naḥ hṛdayaṅgamam 
NM_2,1.318.0	 tasmin sati eva bhavanam na vinā bhavanam tatas ayam eva avinābhāvaḥ niyamaḥ sahacāritāḥ kiṃkṛtaḥ niyamaḥ asya asmin= iti ced evam uttaram tad ātma tā ādi pakṣe api na eṣa praśnaḥ nivartate jvalanāt jāyate dhūmaḥ na jalāt iti kā gatiḥ evam eva etat iti ced sāhacarye api tad samam tarkasya yāvān viṣayaḥ sa tāvati nirūpyate vastu svabhāva bhede tu na tasya prabhaviṣṇu tā ayam ca viṣayaḥ yukteḥ yat uktam niyamāt vinā na arthāt artha antare jñānam atas tasya prakalpanam 
NM_2,1.318.1–2,1.319.1	 tatas param tu niyamaḥ api eṣa kiṃkṛtaḥ iti na yuktiḥ prabhavati tādātmya tad utpattyoḥ anupapanna tvāt atas niyamaḥ eva viramyate na ca pratibhā mātram ānumānikī pramitiḥ iti vaktum yuktam niyatāt kutaścid eva vastuni pratīti darśanāt iti ukta tvāt niyamaḥ cayadya gṛhītaḥ eva prati iti aṅgam bhavet nārikela dvīpa vāsibhiḥ api dhūma darśanāt kṛśānuḥ anumīyeta na ca evam asti iti niyama grahaṇam apekṣaṇīyam mānasam vyāpti avadhāraṇam 
NM_2,1.319.2–2,1.320.0	 yat ca vikalpitam aśakyam tat grahaṇam iti tatra kecid ācakṣate mānasam pratyakṣam pratibandha grāhi iti pratyakṣa anupalaṃbhābhyām anala sahacaritam anagneḥ ca vyāvartamānam dhūmam upalabhya vibhāvasau niyata udhūmaḥ iti manasā pratipadyate manaḥ ca sarva viṣayam kena vā na abhyupeyate asat nihitam api artham avadhārayitum kṣamam sāmānya dvārā vyāptiḥ na ca sakala tribhuvana vivara niruddha dhūma agni vyakti sārtha sākṣāt karaṇam upayujyate jvalana tva ādi sāmānya purassara tayā vyāpti grahaṇāt yat tu uktam sāmānyam vāstavam na asti iti tat śabda artha cintā prasaṅgepratisamādhāsyate yauktika pratyakṣāt vyāpta yava dhāraṇa rūpa pakṣaḥ 
NM_2,1.320.1	 apare punar yogi pratyakṣa kalpam yauktikam sambandha grāhi pratyakṣaṃpratipedire kila dhūma tva agni tva sāmānya puraskāreṇa vyāpya vyāpakayoḥ anvayaḥ nāma gṛhyatām vyatirekaḥ tu anagnibhyaḥ dhūmasya grahītavyaḥ anagnayaḥ ca ativitatāḥ na ca teṣu anagni tvam nāma sāmānyam asti tena samasta trailokya antargata agni anagni gata anvaya vyatireka grāhi pratyakṣa vyatirekeṇa na pratibandhaḥ avadhṛtaḥ bhavet anavadhṛtaḥ ca na pramā aṅgam asti ca pramā iti yukti balāt pratibandha grāhakam ekasmin kṣaṇe pratyakṣam idam aśeṣa vyakti viṣayam asaṃvedyamānam api kalpitam iti yauktikam ucyate vyatireka sahacāra niścayam vinā api vyāptiḥ nirṇīyate 
NM_2,1.320.2–2,1.321.2	 anye punar atas eva tad kalpanā bhayāt bhūyas darśana paricchinna sāmānya purassara anvayam anapekṣita vyatireka niścayam eva liṅgam gamakam abhyupāgaman yathā uktam mama tu adṛṣṭi mātreṇa gamakāḥ sahacāriṇaḥ iti ayam āśayaḥ bhūyas darśanataḥ tāvat udeti matiḥ īdṛśī niyataḥ ayam anena iti sakala prāṇi sākṣikāḥ tāvatā ca gamaka tvam autsargikam siddhyati mīmāṃsakānām tuvipakṣe darśanam bādhakaḥ pratyayaḥ na ca saḥ asti na adya yāvat anagnaudhūmaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ anutpanne api bādhake tad āśaṅkanam ayuktam iti uktam taiḥ doṣa jñāne tu anutpanne na śaṅkyāḥ niṣpramāṇa tā iti vyatireka niścayaḥ āvaśyakaḥ 
NM_2,1.321.3	 etat tu na cāru vyatireka niścayam antareṇa pratibandha grahaṇa anupapatteḥ iti ukta tvāt jñāpaka tvāt hi niyamaḥ sva grahaṇam apekṣate niyamaḥ ca ayam ucyate yat tasmin sati bhavanam tatas vinā na bhavanam iti bhūyas darśanataḥ ca tasmin sati bhavanam iti anvaya mātra paricchedāt ardha gṛhītaḥ niyamaḥ syāt tatas vinā na bhavanam iti asya arthasya aparicchedāt iti 
NM_2,1.322.0–2,1.322.1	 vyatirekaḥ api gṛhītum śakyataḥ eva apare punar anagni tva sāmānyam antareṇa api yogi pratyakṣa kalpanām akurvante eva mānasa pratyakṣa gamyam anvaya vyatirekam āhuḥ dhūma agni sāmānye tāvat sahacarite upalabdhe tadvat tad abhāvau= api sahacaritau= upalabhyete eva dhūma tva sāmānyasya anagnau jalādau= adarśanāt sarva gata tve api sāmānyānām vṛtti bhedaḥ niyāmakaḥ iti vakṣyate 
NM_2,1.322.2–2,1.323.0	 yadi api ca anagni tva ādi abhāva sāmānyam na asti tathā api pratiṣedhya agni tva sāmānya anugama siddhyā eva tad abhāva anugama grahaṇam siddhyati sva pakṣeṇa vyāpti graha samartha namsakala vyakti vijñānam anaṅgam vyāpti niścaye bhāva sāmānyayoḥ yadvat tathā eva tad abhāvayoḥ bhāvayoḥ sāhacaryam yat anvayam tat pracakṣate vyatirekam tu manyante sāhityam tad abhāvayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ tu bhavet yatra api abhāvayoḥ tayoḥ eva anvayaḥ tatra vyatirekaḥ tu bhāvayoḥ 
NM_2,1.323.1–2,1.324.0	 tat evam abhāva anvaya vat bhāva vyatirekaḥ api pratyakṣa gamyaḥ bhavati eva iyāna iva viśeṣaḥ tu bhāvayoḥ yādṛśī yayoḥ vyāpya vyāpaka tā sā eva vyatyastā tad abhāvayoḥ abhāvayoḥ tu gamya gamaka bhāve bhāvayoḥ vyāpti vyatyayaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ evañca pratiṣedhya anugama pūrvaka sāmānya abhāva dvaya anugama pratyaya upapatteḥ anvaya vyatireka niścaye api na yogi pratyakṣam upayujyate bhāva abhāva sāhacaryam avadhārya manasā niyama jñāna siddheḥ iti alam nirvandhena tasmāt niyama vat tad grahaṇa upāyaḥ api asti iti siddham pakṣa dharma tā jñānasya āvaśyaka tvam 
NM_2,1.324.1	 gṛhīte niyame yāvat punar kvacid dharmiṇi dhūma ādeḥ liṅgasya grahaṇaṃ na vṛttam tāvat na bhavati liṅginaḥ avagatiḥ iti sambandha grahaṇa kāla apekṣayā advitīyam tad liṅga darśanam apekṣitavyam sā eva iyam pakṣa dharmatā ucyate pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatireka niścaye sati api pratyakṣa āgama virodhena pratipakṣa upanipātena vā na gamaka tvam iti tat aparam lakṣaṇa dvayam upadiṣṭam abādhita viṣaya tvam asat pratipakṣa tvam ca iti tat evam anubhava siddha tva ātanu māna svarūpam iva tasya lakṣaṇam api tāntrika kathitam apratyākhyeyam 
NM_2,1.324.2–2,1.324.3	 api ca yadi tāntrika viracitam avācakam lakṣaṇam tat svayam anavadyam āvedyatām na tu tad dveṣeṇa lakṣyam api anumānam nihnotum yuktam pakṣapadasya gauṇa tve api pramāṇasya na gauṇa tvam yat punar abhāṇi pramāṇasya agauṇa tvāt anumānāt artha niścayaḥ durlabhaḥ iti tat na buddhyāmahe na hi pramāṇasya kiñcid gauṇa tvam iha paśyāmaḥ pakṣa dharma ādi padāni yadi nāma vyākhyātṛbhiḥ gauṇāni prayuktāni kim etāvatā pramāṇam gauṇībhavet ! 
NM_2,1.324.4–2,1.325.2	 śabda antareṇa hi tad lakṣaṇa abhidhāne na kaścid gauṇa tā ādi pramādaḥ anumāna prāmāṇya dūṣaṇa prativacanam yat api avādi viśeṣe anugama abhāvāt sāmānyesiddha sādhanāt iti tat api asādhu sādhyasya mattu arthasya darśita tvāt yat api avasthā deśa kāla ādi bhedāt iti abhyadhāyi tat api na bhaya āvaham samyak avadhṛtāyām vyāptau viplava abhāvāt pramātuḥ eva tatra tatra aparādhaḥ na anumānasya iti 
NM_2,1.325.3	 yat api vyāhāri viruddha anumāna virodhayoḥ sarvatra saṃbhavāt kutracid ca viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ iṣṭa vighāta kṛtaḥ ca sulabha tvāt iti tat api āla jālam prayojaka hetau prayukte sati evaṃprāyāṇām anavakāśa tvāt sa dvitīya prayogāḥ tu na bhavanti prayojakāḥ utprekṣā mātra mūla tvāt hetu ābhāsāḥ bhavanti te iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
NM_2,1.326.0	 viruddha avyabhicārī na sarvatra sulabhaḥna viśeṣa viruddhaḥ ca na ca asti iṣṭa vighāta kṛt hetau su pratibaddhe hi na etāḥ santi viḍambanāḥ tādṛśā ca anumānena puṃsaḥ artham adhigacchataḥ na andhena tulya tā hasta sparśa anumita vartmanā yatnena anumitaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ kuśalaiḥ anumātṛbhiḥ abhiyoga śatena api saḥ anyathā na upapādyate mata antareṇa anumāna dvaividhya varṇanam 
NM_2,1.326.1–2,1.327.0	 su śikṣitatarāḥ prāhuḥ dvividham anumānam kiñcid utpanna prati iti kiñcid utpādya prati iti īśvara ādi anumānam tu utpādya prati iti tatra dhūma anumāna ādeḥ prāmāṇyam kena na iṣyate atas hi sādhyam buddhi ante tārkikaiḥ akṣatāḥ api yat tva ātma īśvara sarvajña para loka ādi gocaram anumānam na tasya iṣṭam prāmāṇyam tattva darśibhiḥ ṛjūnām jāyate tasmāt na tāvat anumeya dhīḥ yāvat kuṭilitam cetaḥ na teṣām viṭa tārkikaiḥ ukta pakṣa nirākaraṇam evam tu kathayadbhiḥ taiḥ param nāstikyam ātmanaḥ khyāpyate sma jaḍa tvam vā na anumāna apramāṇa tā 
NM_2,1.327.1	 na hi sambandha grahaṇa upāya vaicitryāt apramāṇa tā bhavitum arhati āgamena anumānena tarka vyutpādanena vā pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītaḥ vā sambandhaḥ na viśiṣyate īśvara ādi anumānānām tad prasaṅge sa vistaram draḍhimānam ca vakṣyāmaḥ iti alam bahu bhāṣitaiḥ pramāṇam upagamyatām tad anumānam evaṃvidhaiḥ avipluta parākramam bhavat udīritaiḥ dūṣaṇaiḥ anabhyupagame punar vigata ceṣṭitāḥ prāṇinaḥ bhaveyuḥ upala upamā iti hi pūrvam āveditam anumāna lakṣaṇa para sūtra vyākhyānam 
NM_2,1.327.2–2,1.328.1	 atha idānīm sūtram anusarāmaḥ tat pūrvakam ityādi anumānam iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ tat pūrvakam iti lakṣaṇam tat iti sarva nāmnā prakrāntaṃpratyakṣam avamṛśyate tat pūrvam kāraṇam yasya tat tad pūrvakam etāvatī ucyamāne nirṇaya upamāna ādau tad pūrvake prasaṅgaḥ na vyāvartata eti tad vyāvṛttaye dvivacana antena vigrahaḥ pradarśayitavyaḥ te dve pratyakṣepūrvam yasya iti yat ekam avinābhā vi pratyakṣam vyākhyātam yat ca dvitīyaṃliṅga darśanam te dve pratyakṣe anumānasya eva kāraṇam na upamāna ādeḥ tatra pratibandha grāhi pratyakṣam smaraṇa dvāreṇa tad kāraṇam liṅga darśanam tusvataḥ eva 
NM_2,1.328.2	 nanu ! pratyakṣa mātrasya prakṛta tvāt prakṛta avamarśi tvāt ca sarva nāmnaḥ kutaḥ ayam viśeṣa pratilābhaḥ ucyate udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti vakṣyate hetuḥ eva ca anumānam yat iha lakṣyam nirdiṣṭam na ca agṛhītam udāharaṇa sādharmyam tat vaidharmyam vā sādhya sādhanam bhavati iti tad grahaṇa upāyaḥ apekṣitavyaḥ pratyakṣa vyatirikta tad avagama upāya parikalpa neca anavasthā dūṣaṇam asakṛt abhihitam iti pratyakṣasya eva tad upāya tvam atas anumāna kāraṇa bhūta pratyakṣa apekṣayā pratyakṣa mātra prakrame api sarva nāmnā tad viśeṣa ākṣipyate yat pratibandha grāhi pratyakṣam yat cadvitīyam liṅga darśanam iti na idam lakṣaṇam ati vyāptam 
NM_2,1.328.3–2,1.329.1	 nanu ! pratyakṣa viśeṣa dvaya pūrvaka tvam anumāna ābhāseṣu api savyabhicāra viruddha ādiṣu saṃbhavati iti ativyāptiḥ mā evam hetu lakṣaṇesādhya sādhana grahaṇena tad pratikṣepāt pratibandha svarūpam hi tatra eva nipuṇam abhidhāsyate iha tu tad grahaṇa upāya mātram ucyate samyak pravṛtte ca pratibandha grāhiṇi pratyakṣe vyāpti viplava abhāva at na anumāna ābhāsa prasaṅgaḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇa anuvādena ca viśeṣa lakṣaṇe varṇyamāne tatas eva pramāṇa ābhāsa vyudāsa siddheḥ kevalam idānīm samāna jātīya upamāna ādi vyavaccheda uvracanīyaḥ iti saḥ eva tad pūrvaka padena upāttaḥ artha utpannam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam iti phala viśeṣaṇānām sarva pramāṇeṣu anuvṛtteḥ yugapad ca kvacid na asti vyāpāraḥ śabda liṅgayoḥ atas na avyapadeśya tva viśeṣaṇam iha arthavat 
NM_2,1.329.2–2,1.330.1	 dvayoḥ api ca śabda liṅgayoḥ jñāpaka tvena svarūpa grahaṇa apekṣa tvāt jñāna ayaugapadyena ca yugapad grahaṇa asaṃbhavāt na api avyāptam idam lakṣaṇam nanu ! evam nirasyatām ativyāptiḥ avyāptiḥ tu katham nirasiṣyate āgama ādi pūrvakāṇām anumānānām asaṅgrahāt teṣu api mūla bhūtam pratyakṣam eva kāraṇam iti kecid āhuḥ yathā uktam yatra api anumitāt liṅgāt liṅgini grahaṇam bhavet tatra api maulikam liṅgam pratyakṣāt eva gamyate iti 
NM_2,1.330.2–2,1.330.4	 yat vā prādhānya abhiprāyeṇa pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvam ucyate na niyama artham iti na avyāptiḥ pratyakṣa anumāna āgama pūrva kāṇi api anumānāni santi tāni iti vā punar tāvat avabodhāya vigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ tāni pratyakṣa ādīni pūrvam yasya iti yadi api pratyakṣam eva lakṣya tvena prastutam tathā api vyavacchedya tayā anumāna ādīnām api prakṛta tvam na vāryate tad pūrvaka padārtha śodhanam atra codayanti tat iti karaṇa avamarśaḥ vā syāt phala avam arśaḥ vā karaṇa avamarśe indriya ādi karaṇa pūrvakam jñānam tat phalam tat pūrva kaṃca anumānam iti pūrva śabdasya dvis pāṭhaḥ syāt sa ca aśrutaḥ 
NM_2,1.331.1	 kalpanīyaḥ phala avamarśe tu pratyakṣa phala pūrvakam anumāna phalam bhavet na anumānam iti tad pūrvaka śabdasya phala vacanasya anumāna śabdena karaṇa vācinā saha sāmānādhikaraṇyam na syāt tad pūrvakam anumānam iti pratyakṣa phalena hi liṅga darśanena parokṣa artha pratipattiḥ upajanyate sāca anumāna phalam na anumānam iti ucyate ubhayathā api na doṣaḥ karaṇa avamarśe tāvat indriya ādi karaṇa pūrvakam tat phalam liṅga darśanam yat tat eva parokṣa artha pratipattau karaṇam anumānam iti na dvis pūrvaka śabdasya pāṭhaḥ upayujyate phale api avamṛśyamāne pratyakṣa phala liṅga darśana pūrva kaṃyat avinā abhāva smaraṇam tad anumānam karaṇam eva tatas parokṣa artha pratipatteḥ 
NM_2,1.331.2–2,1.332.1	 yat uktam pratyutpanna kāraṇa janyā smṛtiḥ anumānam iti tatra spaṣṭam eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam sautram anumāna padam anumiti param vā phale vā anumāna śabdam varṇayiṣyāmaḥ anumitiḥ anumānam iti yatas śabdam vā adhyāhariṣyāmaḥ pratyakṣa phala pūrvakam parokṣa artha pratipatti rūpam phalam yatas bhavati tad anumānam iti tad pūrvakam iti etāvat eva lakṣaṇa param 
NM_2,1.332.2	 atra hi prathamam liṅga darśanam tatas pratibandha smaraṇam tatas keṣāñcit mate parāmarśa jñānam tatas sādhya artha pratītiḥ tatas pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa avasara varṇitena krameṇa heya ādi jñānam itīyati pratīti kalāpe yathā upapatti kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti evam tat pūrvaka padam eva kevalam anumāna lakṣaṇa kṣamam iti guravaḥ varṇayāñcakruḥ sarvam sūtram lakṣaṇa param iti anye 
NM_2,1.332.3–2,1.333.0	 anye punar upamānāt yati vyāpti vyudāsāya trividha grahaṇaṃvi ākhyāta bantaḥ tad pūrvakam anumānam iti ucyamāne sati upamāna ādau prasaṅgaḥ iti trividha grahaṇam liṅgam vakṣyamāṇa kārya ādi bhedāt vā trividham pakṣa dharma ādi rūpa traya yogāt vā trirūpam trividham ucyate liṅge ca trividhe sati tad ālamba naṃjñānam upacārāt trividham abhidhīyate tena pratyakṣa pūrvakam trividha liṅga ālambana jñānam anumānam iti ukte sati na ati vyāptiḥ sūtrāt eva hetosnividha tva lābhaḥ 
NM_2,1.333.1	 nanu ! pūrvavat ādibhiḥ śabdaiḥ kārya ādi bheda varṇanam jñāsyāmaḥ pakṣa dharma ādi rūpa trayam tu katham ebhiḥ śabdaiḥ pratipādyate iti atra āhuḥ vāda ādi kathā traye api pūrvam upādīyamāna tvāt pakṣaḥ pūrva śabdena ucyate saḥ asya asti āśraya tvena iti pūrvavat liṅgam iti evam anena padena pakṣa dharma tvam uktam bhavati pakṣe upayukte sati śeṣaḥ sa pakṣaḥ bhavati saḥ asya asti āśraya tvena iti śeṣavat evam anena sa pakṣe vṛttiḥ uktā bhavati sāmānyatodṛṣṭam iti anena vipakṣāt vyāvṛttam liṅgam ucyate katham akāra praśleṣāt sāmānyatas adṛṣṭam iti tiṣṭhatu tāvat viśeṣaḥ sāmānyatas api na dṛṣṭam kva iti pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ vṛtteḥ ukta tvāt pariśeṣāt vipakṣe sāmānyatas api na dṛṣṭam iti avatiṣṭhate ittham trirūpam liṅgaṃebhiḥ śabdaiḥ uktam bhavati tad ālambanam jñānam anumānam sūtrasya sarvasya api lakṣaṇa paratvam na yuktam tat evam lakṣaṇe kaścid sarvam sūtram ayojayat evam tu khyāpitam na syāt sūtrakārasya kauśalam 
NM_2,1.333.2–2,1.334.0	 kiñca pañca lakṣaṇam iha śāstre abhyupagamyate iti trirūpe tasmin varṇya māne kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa prakaraṇa samayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ na vyāvartate iti tasmāt tad pūrvaka padam eva lakṣaṇa pratipādana artham anavadyam trividha grahaṇam tasya vibhāga pratipādakam bhedāḥ pūrvavat ityādi granthena kathitāḥ trayaḥ tad pūrvaka pada udgīta nirmala nyāya lakṣaṇaḥ parimlāna ādaraḥ anyatra sūtra kṛt vākya lāghave 
NM_2,1.335.0–2,1.335.2	 vibhāga vacanāt siddham traividhyam sva girā bhavet tathā ca śabda siddhānta= chaleṣu evam adīdṛśat pūrvavat anumānam pūrvavat iti yatra kāraṇena kāryam anumīyate yathā jaladhara unnatyābhaviṣyati vṛṣṭiḥ iti pūrvavat padasya kāraṇa paratvākṣepaḥ atra codayati pūrvam hi kāraṇam ucyate pūrvam asya asti iti pūrvavat kāryam vaktum yuktam tena kāryāt kāraṇa anumānam iha udāhartavyam na kāraṇāt kārya anumānam kāraṇena kāryam anumātum api aśakyam 
NM_2,1.335.3–2,1.336.1	 na ca kāraṇena kāryam anumātum api pāryate kāryasya tāvat pakṣa tvam ayuktam siddhi asiddhi vikalpa anuvṛtteḥ siddhe hi kārī ekim anyat anumeyam ! asiddhe kha puṣpa vat na pakṣa tvam api ca asti kāryam kāraṇasya astitvāt iti vyadhi karaṇaḥ hetuḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ kākasya kārṣṇyāt iti vat sattāyām ca sādhyāyām bhāva dharmasya hetoḥ asiddha tvam abhāva dharmasya viruddha tvam ubhaya dharmasya anaikāntika tvam iti katham sādhayituṃśakyate tat uktam na asiddhe bhāva dharmaḥ asti vyabhicāryu bhaya āśrayaḥ dharmaḥ viruddhaḥ abhāvasya sā sattā sādhyate katham iti 
NM_2,1.336.2	 na ca kāraṇa mātrasya hetu tvam yuktam vinā ca pratibandha ādinā avyabhicāra sambhavāt kāraṇa viśeṣaḥ ca na kaścid vipaścitā api niścetum śakyaḥ calat acala vipula vapuṣām utpala dala malīm asatviṣām apipa yomu cāma mukta payasām uparama darśanāt yadi tu antyadaśāvarti kāraṇam liṅgam iṣyate vyāpti smaraṇa velāyām kārya pratyakṣa tā bhavet saugata mate kāraṇāt kārya anumāna saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_2,1.336.3–2,1.337.2	 nanu ! saugataiḥ api kāraṇāt kārya anumānam aṅgīkṛtam eva hetunā yaḥ samagreṇa kārya utpādaḥ anumīyate artha antara anapekṣi tvāt sa svabhāvaḥ anuvarṇitaḥ iti agrantha jñaḥ devānām priyaḥ ! utpādyate asmāt iti utpādaḥ yogyatā akathyate sā ca atra anumeyāḥ atas eva tasyāḥ vastunaḥ ananya tvāt svabhāva anumānam idam iṣyate sa svabhāvaḥ anuvarṇitaḥ iti siddhānte kāraṇāt kārya anumāna samarthanam atra āhuḥ sarvam idam avidita anumāna prayoga kramasya durmateḥ ca udyam na kāryam atra pakṣīkriyate na sattā sādhyate na vyadhikaraṇaḥ hetuḥ prayujyate api tu payodharāḥ eva dharmiṇaḥ adūra kāla bhāvinyāḥ vṛṣṭyā atadvantaḥ sādhyante viśiṣṭa unnati rūpa dharma ādi yogena iti na pūrva kathita doṣa avasaraḥ 
NM_2,1.337.3–2,1.338.0	 yathā agni mānayam dhūmaḥ bahula pāṇḍutā ādi dharma yogi tvāt mahān asa avadhṛta dhūma vat iti dhūmaḥ eva agnimattayā anumīyate evam samanantara utpādita vṛṣṭayaḥ amī jīmūtāḥ sa atiśaya unnati ādi dharma yogi tvāt pūrva upalabdha parjanya vat iti jaladharāḥ eva bhaviṣyat vṛṣṭimat tayā anumīyante yathā aaha bhaṭṭaḥ tasmāt dharma viśiṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ syāt prameya tā sā deśasya agni yuktasya dhūmasya anyaiḥ ca kalpitāḥ iti kāraṇāt kārya anumāna upapādanam 
NM_2,1.338.1–2,1.339.2	 yat tu pūrvam kāraṇam ucyate iti tat satyam pūrvam asya asti iti pūrvavat kāraṇa gatam unnata tva ādi dharma jātam ucyate tat eva liṅgam iti grantha doṣaḥ api na kaścid na ca kāraṇa mātrasya hetu tvam brūmaḥ yena āsya vidhugpratyaya upanipāta ādi kṛtaḥ vyabhicāraḥ syāt api ca viśiṣṭam eva kāraṇam hetuḥ na ca kāraṇa viśeṣaḥ duravagamaḥ gambhīra garjita ārambha nirbhinna giri gahvarāḥ rolamba ga bala vyāla tamāla malina tviṣaḥ tuṅgat taṭit latā saṅga piśaṅga uttuṅga vigrahāḥ vṛṣṭim vyabhicaranti iha na evaṃprāyāḥ payomucaḥ anabhyupagame ca evam anumānasya jīvitam na syāt dhūma viśeṣāṇām api boddhum aśaktitaḥ anumeyasya parokṣa tvam yat api kārya pratyakṣa tvam āśaṅkitam tat api ayuktam na hi vṛṣṭi anumāna samayaḥ eva śirasi salila kaṇāḥ patantaḥ payoda muktā dṛśyante parokṣe liṅgini jñānam anumānam iti ca viśeṣaṇa upādānātyatra tatra na tadānīm eva vṛṣṭiḥ pratyakṣībhavati tad udāharaṇam bhaviṣyati 
NM_2,1.339.3	 api ca anupajāta avayava kriyatayā anāśaṅkyamāna vināśe antyatantau jātayā kriyayā paṭa niṣpatti anumāne kriyamāṇe na paṭa pratyakṣa tā kāla vyavadhāna sambhavāt tathā hi ekatas tāvat antyatantau kriyā darśanam avinā abhāva smaraṇam parāmarśa jñānam anumeya pratītiriti tricatvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ anyatas tu kriyā kriyātaḥ vibhāgaḥ vibhāgāt pūrva saṃyoga nivṛttiḥ tatas uttara saṃyoga utpādaḥ tatas paṭa niṣpattiḥ niṣpanne paṭe kṣaṇa antare rūpa ādi guṇa āraṃbhaḥ rūpa ādi janma nipaṭasya samavāyi kāraṇa tvāt kāraṇasya kāryāt avaśyam pūrva kāla bhāvi tvam atas niṣpannaḥ api nūnam ekasmin kṣaṇe nīrūpaḥ paṭobhavati iti na tadā eva pratyakṣaḥ tatas kṣaṇa antare rūpa utpādāt rūpavat dravyam indriya sannikarṣāt pratyakṣam bhaviṣyati iti ati vahavaḥ ete kṣaṇāḥ atas na kārya pratyakṣa tvam 
NM_2,1.341.1–2,1.341.2	 na api vidhura pratyaya ādinā kārya anutpattiḥ anutpanna avayava kriyatva viśeṣaṇa upādānena tad vināśa āśaṅkanāt kriyātaḥ ca uttarottara kāryāṇām avarśya bhāvi tvāt kāraṇāt yogya tā anumānam na sādhu yat api hetunā yaḥ samagreṇa ityādinā yogya tā anumānaṃ vyākhyātam tat api asādhu svabhāva anumānasya nirasta tvāt lokaḥ ca kāraṇāt avikalāt kāryam eva kalpayati na yogyatām iti alaṃprasaṅgena śeṣavat pada vyākhyānam 
NM_2,1.341.3	 śeṣavat iti yatra kāryeṇa kāraṇam anumīyate yathā nadī pūreṇa uparitane deśe vṛṣṭiḥ iti atra api vṛṣṭi mat u paritana deśa saṃsarga lakṣaṇaḥ nadī dharmaḥ tad dharmeṇa eva viśiṣṭena pūrṇa tā ādinā anumīyate vṛṣṭimat pṛṣṭha deśa saṃsṛṣṭā iyam nadī phenila kaluṣa tva ādi viśiṣṭa ṣūra upeta tvāt pūrva upalabdhā evaṃvidhadhunī vat 
NM_2,1.341.4–2,1.343.0	 ayam deśaḥ vā vṛṣṭi viśiṣṭa deśa antara saṃsṛṣṭaḥ viśiṣṭa nadī pūravat tvena anumīyata iti prāktana vaiyadhikaraṇyādi codya cakrasya iha api na asti prasaraḥ phala tattu iyam vācaḥ yuktiḥ kāryeṇa kāraṇam anumīyate kāraṇena kāryam anumīyate iti paramārthataḥ tu dharmīm dharmavat tvena dharmavān anumīyatā eti sthitiḥ yat āha bhaṭṭaḥ saḥ eva ca ubhayā ātmā ayam gamyaḥ gamakaḥ eva ca asiddhena eka deśena gamyaḥ siddhena bodhakaḥ iti kārya anumāne doṣa uddhāraḥ 
NM_2,1.343.1	 yat tu setu bhaṅga hima vilaya nādinā api nadī pūra upapattiḥ dṛṣṭā iti tatra api ucyate āvarta vartanāśa ali viśāla kaluṣa udakaḥ kallola vikaṭa āsphāla sphurat pheṭa= chaṭā añcitaḥ vahat bahala śaivāla vanaśāt bala saṅkulaḥ nadī pūra viśeṣaḥ api śakyeta na na veditum pramātuḥ aparādhaḥ ayam viśeṣam yaḥ na paśyati na anumānasya doṣaḥ asti prameya avyabhicāriṇaḥ rodha upaghāta sādṛśya vyabhicāra nibandhanam anumāna apramāṇa tvam atas vaktum asāṃpratam pāraṃparyeṇa vṛṣṭiḥ ca nadī pūrasya kāraṇam patat dhana payaḥ bindu sandoha syandana kramāt 
NM_2,1.344.0–2,1.344.2	 sāmānyatodṛṣṭa pada vyākhyānam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam tu yat akārya kāraṇa bhūtāt liṅgāt tādṛśasya eva liṅginaḥ anumānam yathā kapittha ādau rūpeṇa rasa anumānam rūpa rasayoḥ samavāyi kāraṇam ekam kapittha ādi dravyam na tu tayoḥ anyonyaṃkārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ śākya dṛṣṭyā api vartamānayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ itaretara kārya kāraṇa tāna sambhavati eva 
NM_2,1.344.3–2,1.345.1	 dharmiṇaḥ ca rūpavat tvena rasavat tā anumānāt asiddhi ādi codyānāṃ pūrva vat anavakāśaḥ vaktavyaḥ bhāṣya pradarśita sāmānyatodṛṣṭa anumāna vimarśaḥ yat punar bhāṣya kāreṇa bhāskarasya deśa antara prāpti āgati anumānam udāhṛtam tat ayuktam deśa antara prāpteḥ gati kārya tvāt kāryeṇa kāraṇa anumānam śeṣavat eva idam syāt api ca deśa antara prāptiḥ deśa antara saṃyogaḥ na ca daśa śata aṃśoḥ deśa antareṇa śailādinā saṃyogaḥ saṃbhavati nabhasā tu bhavan= api diśāvā durlakṣyaḥ pratyakṣa itara vṛtti tvāt pavana vanaspati saṃyoga vat mātṛ garbha saṃyoga vat vā 
NM_2,1.345.2–2,1.345.3	 atha deśa antare taraṇi darśanam hetuḥ ucyate tasya api gati kārya tāpa āramparyeṇa vidyate eva gatyā prāptiḥ prāptyā ca tatra darśanam iti atha deśa antare tapana darśanam pakṣīkṛtya darśana tvena ca darśana śabda vācya tvena vā tasya gati pūrvaka tvam anumīyate deśa antare divākara darśanam gati pūrvakam deśa antara darśana tvāt tad śabda vācya tvāt vā devadatta deśa antara darśana vat iti tathā api pāramparyeṇa gati kārya tā nanivartate eva na hi darśana tvam go tva ādi vat sāmānyam asti kintu bhāva pratyayena atra darśana utpādikā śaktiḥ ucyate sā ca na atīndriyā 
NM_2,1.346.1–2,1.346.2	 nityā kācid api tu svarūpa sahakāri svabhāvā eva iti dṛśyamānaṃsvarūpam api śakti varge patati dṛśyamānam ca deśa antara prāpti ātmakam iti gati kāryam evam darśana śabda vācya tve api hetūkṛte vaktavyam gatyā deśa antara prāptiḥ janyate tayā tatra darśanam tena śabda prayogaḥ saḥ eva vācya tvam iti bhāva pratyayena uktaḥ tasmāt sarvathā gati kārya tvānapāyāt śeṣa vat eva idam anumānam tat etat bhāṣya kārīyam udāharaṇam īdṛśam rūpāt rasa anumānam tu tasmāt yuktam udāhṛtam akārya kāraṇa prāya hetūnām ca pradarśitaḥ bhadanta kalahe asmābhiḥ udāharaṇa vistaraḥ prakāra antareṇa sūtra vyākhyānam 
NM_2,1.346.3–2,1.347.1	 evam tāvat matu bvyākhyayā traividhyam anumānasya varṇitam etat tu phalgu prāyam iva manyante niyama ātmaka sambandha balāt eva liṅgasya gamaka tvam uktam na kārya ādi svarūpeṇa tat kim īdṛśa traividhyena darśitena itivati pratyayam āśritya anyathā vyācakṣate pūrvavat iti atra sambandha grahaṇa kāle liṅga liṅginoḥ pratyakṣatas svarūpam avadhārya punar tādṛśā eva liṅgena tādṛś eva liṅgī gamyate tat pūrveṇa tulyam vartate iti pūrvavat anumānam yathā mahānase dhūma agnī sahacaritau dṛṣṭvā punar parvate dhūma agni anumānam pūrvavat iti atra vati pratyaya upapādanam 
NM_2,1.347.2–2,1.348.0	 nanu ! pratyakṣa pratītyā viṣaya gata sakala viśeṣa sākṣāt karaṇa kṣamayā tulyā na anumānikī matiḥ iti katham kriyā tulya tvam tad abhāvāt kathaṃvatiḥ satyam evam tathā api vahneḥ eva tādṛśasya vailakṣaṇya āpādaka viśeṣa avacchinnasya liṅgena grahaṇāt adūra vipra karṣeṇa kriyā tulya tvam upapatsyate śeṣavat pada vyākhyānam 
NM_2,1.348.1	 śeṣa vat nām pariśeṣaḥ sa ca prasakta pratiṣedhe anyatra aprasaṅgāt śiṣyamāṇe saṃpratyayaḥ yathā kvacid pradeśe dhūmena agni mātre anumite kim indhanaḥ ayam agniḥ iti vimarśe prasaktānām tṛṇa parṇa kāṣṭha ādīnāṃaprasaṅgāt ca gomaya indhanaḥ agniḥ parikalpyate yathā vā śabde dravya karma tva pratiṣedhāt sāmānyādau= aprasaṅgāt ca guṇa tva anumānam vakṣyate sāmānyatodṛṣṭa pada vyākhyānam 
NM_2,1.348.2	 sāmānyatodṛṣṭam tu yatra sambandha kāle api liṅgi svarūpam apratyakṣam nitya parokṣam eva sāmānyatas vyāpti grahaṇāt anumīyate yathā śabda ādi upalabdhyā śrotra ādi karaṇam indriyāṇām atīndriya tvāt nakadācid pratyakṣa gamya tvam atha ca chedana ādi kriyāṇām paraśvadha ādi karaṇa pūrvaka tvena vyāpti grahaṇāt śabda ādi upalabdhi kriyāṇām karaṇa pūrvaka tvam anumīyate anumānānām pratyakṣa pūrvaka tve api trividha tva upapādanam 
NM_2,1.348.3–2,1.349.1	 atra vati vyākhyāne codayanti pūrvavat evam ekam anumānam uktam syāt na trividham yatas na tāvat anavagata vyāptikam liṅgam gamakam bhavati viśeṣāṇām ananta tvena ca tad anvaya vyatirekayoḥ duravagama tvāt sarvatra sāmānyena eva vyāpti grahaṇam yat ca ittham vyāpti jñānam tad tulyaṃtritaye api atas sarvam pūrvavat eva syāt vateḥ sarvatra saṃbhavāt 
NM_2,1.349.2–2,1.349.3	 tat etat ayuktam avāntara viśeṣasya su spaṣṭasya bhāvāt vyāpti pūrvakam anumānam iti etāvatā yadi ekavidham ucyate tat satyam evaṃprakāram eva idam tasmin sati api tu sāmye bheda antara saṃbhavāt traividhyam asya pratipādyate tathā hi dhūma jvalanayoḥ pūrvam pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇāt idānīm tena eva dhūmena saḥ eva agniḥ anumīyate iti pūrvavat idam anumānam ucyate yad pratyakṣa pūrvakam iti prasiddham 
NM_2,1.350.1–2,1.350.2	 nanu ! dhūma antareṇa vahni antara anumānam kim na pratyakṣa pūrvakam kaekam āha na pūrvavat iti ! katham tarhi idam ucyate tena eva dhūmena iti jāti abhiprāyam etat ucyate na vyakti abhiprāyam nanu ! sāmānyatas tarhi tad paricchedāt sāmānyatodṛṣṭam eva īdaṃsyāt na sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya nitya parokṣa anumeya eka viṣaya tvāt 
NM_2,1.350.3–2,1.350.4	 prasakta pratiṣedha ādinā ca niyata sādhya pariccheda hetuḥ pariśeṣa anumānam ucyate yathā gomaya indhana dahana anumānam udāhṛtam śabde vā aguṇa tva kalpanam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam tu nitya parokṣa viṣayam udāhṛtam eva śrotra ādi anumānam tat evam bheda saṃbhavāt trividham anumānam iti yuktam ekasmin= api viṣaye trividha anumāna saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_2,1.350.5	 āstām vai udāharaṇa bhedaḥ ekatra api udāharaṇe traividhyam abhidhātuṃśakyate yathā icchā ādi kāryam āśritam kāryatvāt ghaṭa vat iti āśraya mātre sādhye pūrvavat anumānam prasakta śarīra indriya ādi āśraya pratiṣedhena viśiṣṭa āśraya kalpane tat eva pariśeṣa anumānam anumeyasya nitya parokṣa tvāt tat eva sāmānyatodṛṣṭam ca 
NM_2,1.351.2	 tarhi pariśeṣa anumānasya sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya ca kaḥ viśeṣaḥ ucyate pariśeṣa anumāna pravṛttau= anyaḥ panthāḥ sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya anyaḥ icchā ādi kāryam deha ādi vilakṣaṇa āśrayam śarīra ādiṣu bādhaka pramāṇa upapattau satyām kāryatvāt iti sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya kramaḥ pariśeṣa anumānasya tu ittham pravṛttiḥ icchā ādeḥ āśraya tvena prasaktāni śarīra indriya manāṃsi niṣidhyante diś kāla ādau ca tad prasaṅgaḥ na asti tad pāriśeṣyāt ātmā eva tad āśrayaḥ iti pariśeṣa anumāne ca sarvatra na eṣa niyamaḥ sādhyasya ati parokṣa tvam iti  gomaya agni kalpanā ādi darśanāt sāmānyatodṛṣṭam tu nitya parokṣa viṣayam eva iti sūktam traividhyam prabhākara ukta sāmānyatodṛṣṭa anumānam 
NM_2,1.351.3–2,1.352.2	 apare punar adṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam śakti kriyā anumānam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam udāharanti devadatta ādau= api kriyāyāḥ parokṣa tvāt calati iti pratyaye hi na devadatta svarūpa atirikta kriyā tattva pratibhāsaḥ yaḥ eva devadatta ātmā tiṣṭhat pratyaya gocaraḥ calati iti api saṃvittau saḥ eva pratibhāsate avirala samullasat saṃyoga vibhāga prabandha viṣaya tvāt cala ti iti pratyayasya na sarvadā tad utpādaḥ 
NM_2,1.352.3–2,1.353.1	 katham tarhi nitya parokṣe kriyāsu alakṣaṇe anumānam kramatas iti ced kāryasya kādācid ka tvena kāraṇa pūrvaka tvāt paridṛśyamānasya dravya svarūpasya kāraṇa tve sarvadā kārya utpādana prasaṅgāt sarvadā tad svarūpa sadbhāvāt na ca sarvadā kāryam utpadyate iti tad atirikta kriyā anumānam evam śaktau= api draṣṭavyam kriyā śakti svarūpasya ca nitya parokṣa tvāt tad adṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam anumānam ucyate na tu viśeṣa viṣayam viśeṣa vyāpti grahaṇasya asaṃbhavāt iti kriyāyāḥ pratyakṣa tvam 
NM_2,1.353.2–2,1.354.1	 tat idam anupapannam parispanda rūpasya utkṣepaṇa ādi bhedavataḥ karmaṇaḥ calati ādi pratītau prakāśamāna tvena pratyakṣa tvāt na tasya nitya anumeya tvam saṃyoga vibhāga ālambana tve tu saṃyujyate vibhajyate iti pratītiḥ syāt na calati iti yathā viṣayam pratyaya utpādāt saṃvedana anusāriṇī ca viṣaya vyavasthā anyathā ghaṭa pratyaye api paṭasya ālambanatā syāt saṃyoga vibhāga ālambana tve sati tiṣṭhati apicalat pratyayaḥ prāpnoti tatra api saṃyoga vibhāga saṃbhavāt sthāṇau caśyena saṃyoga vibhāgavati calati iti pratibhāsaḥ bhavet avirala tad upajanana prabandhe api bhūta bhāvinoḥ saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ parokṣa tvāt vartamānayoḥ grahaṇam tau ca calitvā api sthite devadatte staḥ ititatra api katham na calati iti pratyayaḥ nirantaram ca saṃyoga vibhāga śreṇi darśanāt bhūmau= api bhavet buddhiḥ calati iti manuṣya vat kriyā na saṃyoga vibhāga rūpā 
NM_2,1.354.2	 atha manuṣe yad kriyā janya tvam saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ tatra eva calati ityādi buddhiḥ na anyatra devadatta kriyayā ca tau janyete na niṣkriyayā bhūmyā iti na tasyām tathā pratyayaḥ yadi evam kriyā anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt kriyā ālambanaḥ eva ayam pratyayaḥ na saṃyoga vibhāga ālambanaḥ tad ālambana tve hi tayoḥ dvaya vṛtti tva aviśeṣāt viśeṣe kāraṇam vācyam yena puruṣaḥ eva ayam pratyayaḥ na bhūmau= iti devadatta kriyā janya tvena tu na viśeṣaḥ yatas kriyāyāḥ parokṣa tve sati tat eva na vidmaḥ kim asaudevadatta āśrayā kriyā kim vā bhūmi āśritā iti saṃyoga vibhāga kārya anumānasya ubhayatra api tulya tvāt na ca devadatte gacchati bhūmau anavarata vahat vahala saṃyoga vibhāgavatī api vā taraṅgiṇī tīra pāṣāṇe 
NM_2,1.355.1–2,1.355.3	 calati iti pratyayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt kriyā viṣayaḥ eva calati iti pratyayaḥ na saṃyoga vibhāga ālambanaḥ saṃyoga vibhāga agrahaṇe api ca nirālambe vihāyasi viharati vihaṅgame calati iti saṃvedanam dṛśyate na ca gagana saṃyogaḥ pratyakṣaḥ pratyakṣa itara vṛtti tvāt gandha vaha mahīruha saṃyoga vat vitata āloka avaya vi ākāśaḥ tad saṃyogaḥ ca patriṇaḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti ced na etat evam tamāla nīla jīmūta samūha pihita ambare niśīthe sa andhakāre api calat khadyota darśanāt 
NM_2,1.355.4–2,1.356.2	 na tatra āloka avayavī kaścana timira avayavī vā vidyate itikena saṃyogaḥ gṛhyate vibhāgaḥ vā bhūkampa utpāte ca jāte calati vasumatī iti matiḥ asti na tatra saṃyoga vibhāgau gṛhyete bahula niśīthe ca na tarām tasmāt na saṃyoga ādi ālambanā calati iti matiḥ api tu kriyā ālambanā eva iti na ca nitya parokṣā kriyā anumātum api śakyāḥ kāryasya kāraṇa pūrvaka tvena bhavat mate sambandha grahaṇa anupapatteḥ na hi te dravya svarūpaṃkāraṇam api tu kriyā viśiṣṭam kriyāyāḥ ca parokṣa tvāt na tad āviṣṭa dravya grahaṇam su ghaṭam iti kāraṇatva agrahaṇāt ghaṭa ādau= api durghaṭa avyāpti pratītiḥ 
NM_2,1.356.3–2,1.356.4	 ātmā anumāne tu na ayam doṣaḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ kāryasya āśritasya pratyakṣam upalambhāt tasmāt na kārya anumeyā kriyā saṃyogena api kriyā na anumātum śakyā na ca saṃyoga anumeyāḥ saṃyoga antam karma iti nyāyāt vartamānāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ tena anumātum aśakyatvāt kriyā anumāna vādaḥ ca sāmānya lakṣaṇe vistareṇa nirastaḥ atīndriya śakti anumānam api na samīcīnam 
NM_2,1.357.2–2,1.359.0	 etena śakti anumānam api vyudastam veditavyam purā casa vistaram atīndriya śakti nirākaraṇam kṛtam eva tena adṛṣṭa kriyā śakti svalakṣaṇam iti kṣamam na idam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam iti pūrva uktam eva sat iti matupi vatau vā pratyaye varṇyamānetrividham idam iha uktam yuktam eva anumānam para kavi racitānām lakṣaṇānām tu amuṣmin sati na bhavati śobhā bhāsvatī iva indu bhāsām bauddha ukta pratibandha dūṣaṇa diśā tad lakṣaṇam dūṣitambhūya udṛṣṭa mita anvaya eka śaraṇam śocyam punar śābaram sāṅkhyānām tu kutas anumāna ghaṭana upādāna rūpā yatas teṣām jātiḥ asau ca tad vikṛti vat bhinnā iti duḥsthaḥ anvayaḥ anumānam kāla traya viṣayam 
NM_2,1.359.1	 idam idānīm cintyate yat etat indriya ādi sannikarṣa ja tvā ādinā lakṣitam asmad ādi pratyakṣam tat kila prāyaśas vartamāna kāla viśiṣṭa vastu viṣayam evam idam anumānam api kim tat gocaram eva kim vā akāla antara paricchede api kṣamam iti tat ucyate tri kāla viṣayam anumānam iti kasmāt traikālya grahaṇāt tri kāla yuktāḥ artha aanu mānena gṛhyante bhūtāḥ nadīpūreṇa vṛṣṭiḥ anumīyate sā eva bhaviṣyantī megha unnatyā dhūmena vartamānaḥ agniḥ iti 
NM_2,1.359.2–2,1.360.0	 atas ca yat mīmāṃsakaiḥ ucyate codanā hi bhūtam bhavantam bhaviṣyantaṃsūkṣmam vyavahitam viprakṛṣṭam iti evaṃjātīyakam artham śaknoti avagamayitum na anyat kiñca iti tat ayuktam codanā vat pramāṇa antarasya api evaṃjātīyaka viṣaya tva upapatteḥ pratyakṣam api yoginām tri kāla viṣayam uktam asmad ādīnām api kvacid iti kāla sadbhāva ākṣepaḥ 
NM_2,1.360.1	 atra codayanti kāle sati traikālya grahaṇam cintyam saḥ evatu durupapādaḥ tad abhāve kasya vartamāna ādi vibhāgaḥ nirupyate na tāvat gṛhyate kālaḥ pratyakṣeṇa ghaṭa ādi vat cira kṣipra ādi bodhaḥ api kārya mātrā balambanaḥ na ca amunā eva liṅgena kālasya parikalpanā pratibandhaḥ hi dṛṣṭaḥ atra na dhūma jvalana ādi vat pratibhāsā atirekaḥ tu kathañcid upapatsyate pracitām kāñcid āśritya kriyā akṣaṇa paramparām na ca eṣa graha nakṣatra parispanda svabhāvakaḥ kālaḥ kalpayitum yuktaḥ kriyātaḥ na aparaḥ hi asau 
NM_2,1.361.0–2,1.361.1	 muhūrtayāmāhorātra m āsaṛtu ayana vatsaraiḥ loke kālpanikaiḥ eva vyavahāraḥ bhaviṣyati yadi tu ekaḥ vibhuḥ nityaḥ kālaḥ dravya ātmakaḥ mataḥ atīta vartamāna ādi bheda vyavahṛtiḥ kutas  kālaḥ pratyakṣa gamyaḥ iti pakṣaḥ evam ākṣipte sati pratyakṣa gamya tām eva kecid kālasya manvate viśeṣaṇa tayā kārya pratyaye pratibhāsanāt krameṇa yugapad kṣipram cirāt kṛtam iti īdṛśāḥ pratyayāḥ na avakalpante kārya mātra avalambanāḥ 
NM_2,1.361.2–2,1.362.1	 na hi viṣaya atiśayam antareṇa pratibhāsā atiśayaḥ avakalpate arūpasya api kālasya pratyakṣa tvam arūpaḥ nanu ayam kālaḥ katham gṛhyeta cakṣuṣā rūpam eva tava arūpam katham gṛhyeta cakṣuṣā  katham vā rūpavantaḥ api parokṣāḥ paramāṇavaḥ tasmāt pratītiḥ anveṣyā kim nimitta parīkṣayā  nanu ! dravye ayam niyamaḥ na rūpa ādau dravye api na ayam niyamaḥ yat rūpavat tat pratyakṣam iti yena paramāṇūnām tathā abhāvaḥ syāt kintu yat pratyakṣam tat rūpavat iti tat uktam trayāṇām pratyakṣa tva rūpavat tva drava tva ādīni iti 
NM_2,1.362.2–2,1.363.0	 na idam daivikam vacanam yat anatikramaṇīyam na ca vacanena pratyakṣa tvam apratyakṣa tvam vā vyavasthāpyate pratyakṣa tvam hi aindriyika pratīti viṣaya tvam ucyate tat ced asti kālasya nīrūpasya api pratyakṣa tākena vāryate ! rūpavat tvam tad dravyāṇām astu tathā darśanāt na ca anuddhāṭita akṣasya kṣipra ādi pratyaya udayaḥ tad bhāva anuvidhānena tasmāt kālaḥ tu cākṣuṣaḥ 
NM_2,1.363.1–2,1.363.2	 svatantraḥ eva tarhi ghaṭa ādi vat kasmāt na gṛhyate kālaḥ iti ced vastu svabhāvaḥ eṣa na paryanuyoga arhaḥ rūpi dravya viśeṣaṇa tām gatasyatasya grahaṇam na daṇḍa ādi vat svatantrasya api iti gagana ādeḥ tu anya viśeṣaṇa tayā api na grahaṇam asti iti tasya apratyakṣa tvam na tu arūpa tvāt pratyakṣe rūpam aprayojakam atha vadet viśeṣaṇasya api rūpavataḥ eva daṇḍa ādeḥ cakṣuṣā grahaṇam na kāla ādeḥ iti tat ayuktam arūpasya api sāmānya ādeḥ viśeṣaṇasya cakṣuṣā grahaṇāt dravye niyamaḥ iti ced uktam atra yat eva nayana karaṇaka avagama gocare saṃcarati tat eva cākṣuṣam rūpavat a rūpaṃvā dravyam adravyam vā iti 
NM_2,1.364.1–2,1.365.0	 evam guru dravyam iti kārtasvara ādau pratibhāsāt guru tvam apipratyakṣam na patana anumeyam eva tasmāt svatantra bhāvena viśeṣaṇa tayā api vā cākṣuṣa jñāna gamyam yat tat pratyakṣam upeya tām atas eva pratyakṣaḥ kālaḥ evam samāna nyāya tvāt pūrva apara ādi pratyaya gamyā diś api pratyakṣā veditavyā iti kālasya anumeya tva pakṣaḥ anye manyante daṇḍī devadattaḥ nīlam utpalam itivat viṣaya atirekasya agrahaṇāt pratyaya atiśayasya ca parokṣa kāla pakṣe api tad kāraṇakasya upapatteḥ anumeyaḥ eva kālaḥ apratyakṣa tva mātreṇa na ca kālasya na astitāḥ yuktā pṛthivī adhobhāga candramaḥ para bhāga vat 
NM_2,1.365.1–2,1.366.0	 apratibhāsamānaḥ api kālaḥ saṃskāraḥ iva indriya sahacaritaḥ pratyabhijñām kṣipra ādi pratītim janayiṣyati kṛtaḥ ca pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe mahān kaliḥ kim viṣaya bhedāt eva pratibhāsa bhedaḥ uta upāya bhedāt api iti tat alam punar tad vimardena kālasya atirikta tva sādha nampramāṇam iti nirṇītam pratyakṣam sa vikalpakam tasmāt na kalpanā mātram cira kṣipra ādi saṃvidaḥ na ca āsām paridṛśyamāna kāraṇa vinirmita tvam upapadyate kriyamāṇasya paṭa ādeḥ kāryasya tad utpādakasya ca tantu turī vema śalākā kuvinda ādi kāraṇa bṛndasya sāmye api kvacid tūrṇam kṛtam kvacid cireṇa kṛtam iti pratibhāsa bheda darśanāt nimitta antaram cintanīyam na deva datta ādi kriyā ālambanāḥ calati ityādi pratyayāḥ 
NM_2,1.366.1	 nanu ! parispanda ādi kriyā bhedaḥ eva atra nimittam kaścid parispandaḥ caturaḥ kaścid mantharaḥ iti kvacid kṣipra buddhiḥ kvacid cira buddhiḥ iti na etat cāru parispanda gatayoḥ api cāturya māntharyayoḥ nimitta antara kārya tvāt parispande api cireṇa gacchati śīghram dhāvati iti cira kṣipra ādi pratītiḥ dṛśyate na sūrya ādi parispanda ālambanāḥ calati ityādi pratyayāḥ 
NM_2,1.366.2	 āha na deva datta ādi parispanda nibandhanāḥ krama ākrama ādi pratyayāḥ kintu graha nakṣatra ādi parispanda nibandhanāḥ saḥ eva ca graha tārā ādi parispandaḥ kālaḥ iti ucyate tad kṛtaḥ eva ayam yāma ahorātra māsa ādi vyavahāraḥ tasya svatas eva bhedāt aupādhika bheda kalpanā kleśaḥ na bhaviṣyati bheda paricchede nālikā prahara ādiḥ upāyaḥ iyatī nālikā iyat muhūrtam iyān praharaḥ iti tatra ekasmin muhūrte prahare vā nirvarttyamāneṣu bahuṣu kāryeṣu yugapad iti bhavati matiḥ muhūrta antara apekṣā iṣu krameṇa iti tasmāt graha ādi parispandaḥ eva taiḥ taiḥ nimittaiḥ upalakṣyamāṇa pramāṇaḥ kālaḥ iti kāla vidaḥ ca jyotiḥ gaṇakāḥ te eva enam budhyante 
NM_2,1.367.2	 tat asāṃpratam candra ādi graha paricchede api krama ādi pratīti darśanāt cireṇa astam gataḥ bhānuḥ śītāṃśuḥ śīghram udgataḥ uditau= iva dṛśyete yugapad bhauma bhārgavau iti dṛśyate pratibhāsaḥ na ca graha antara parispanda kāraṇakaḥ eṣa śakyate vaktum anavasthā prasaṅgāt tasmāt na graha ādi parispandaḥ kālaḥ kintu vastu antaram yat kṛtaḥ ayam krama ākrama ādi vyavahāraḥ kālaḥ sva para nirvāhakaḥ 
NM_2,1.367.3–2,1.368.1	 nanu ! bhavat kalpitaḥ api kālaḥ kim svatas eva krama ākrama svabhāvaḥ hetu antarāt vā svatas tasya tad svabhāva tve kāryasya eva paṭa ādeḥ paridṛśyamānasya tat svābhāvyam bhavatu ! kim kālena hetu antara pakṣe tu anavasthā tasya api hetu antara apekṣa tvāt iti tat etat bāliśa codyam śukla guṇa ādau= api evam vaktum śakya tvāt guṇasya svatas śukla svabhāva tve dravyasya eva tat bhavatu ! kim guṇena guṇa antara kalpane tu anavasthā iti 
NM_2,1.368.2–2,1.368.3	 atha tatra tathā darśanāt na idam ca udyam tat iha api samānam kāryeṣu paṭa ādiṣu nimitta antara kṛtaḥ krama ādi vyavahāraḥ nimitta antare nimitta antaram na mṛgyam iti tasmāt asti yugapad a ādi vyavahāra hetuḥ kālaḥ atas ca evam dṛṣṭaḥ parāparatvasya dikkṛtasya viparyayaḥ yuvasthavirayoḥ saḥ api vinā kālam na siddhyati 
NM_2,1.368.4–2,1.369.0	 dūratara diś avacchinnaḥ devadatta ādiḥ paraḥ iti pratibhāsate nikaṭa diś ava= chinnaḥ tu aparaḥ iti te ete dikkṛte paratva aparatve viparivartamāne dṛśyete dūra sthaḥ hi yuvā aparaḥ iti ucyate nikaṭa sthaḥ api sthaviraḥ paraḥ iti tat atra na kāla vyatiriktam kāraṇam upapadyateiti atas anumīyate kālaḥ kālaḥ ekaḥ eva 
NM_2,1.369.1–2,1.369.3	 sa ca ayam ākāśa vat sarvatra ekaḥ kālaḥ yathā aakāśa liṅgasya śabdasya sarvatra aviśeṣāt viśeṣa liṅga abhāvāt ca ekaḥ tathā sarvatra tad vyavahārāt vibhuḥ avayava āśraya anupalaṃbhāt niravayavaḥ anāśritaḥ ca anāśrita tvāt eva dravyam atas eva avayava vibhāga ādi nāśa kāraṇa anupapatteḥ nityaḥ iti ekasya api kālasya vartamāna ādi bheda upapattiḥ nanu ! evañca eka tvāt kālasya kutas vartamāna ādi vibhāgaḥ tad abhāvāt katham tri kāla viṣayam anumānam ucyate  ucyate natāt tvikaḥ kālasya bhedaḥ vartamāna ādiḥ kintvasan= api asau vyavahāra siddhaye kenacid upādhinā kalpyate kāla upādhiḥ 
NM_2,1.369.4	 kaḥ punar asau= upādhiḥ kriyā iti brūmaḥ nanu tasyāḥ api na svatas vartamāna ādi bhedaḥ tad bhāve vā sā eva tathā bhavatu ! kim kālena  mā evam utpatti sthiti nirodha yogi phala avacchedena nānā akṣaṇa paramparā ātmikā kriyā iti ucyate sā vartamāna ādi bhedavatī ca tathā hi sthālī adhiśrayaṇāt prabhṛti ātadavataraṇāt utpadyamāna odana ākhya phala avacchedāt kriyā vartamāna ucyate pacati iti tad avacchedāt ghaṭa ākāśa vat kālaḥ api tāvān vartamānaḥ iti ucyate abhinirvṛtta phala avaccheda ātmā parispanda santatiḥ atītā bhavati apākṣīt iti tad avacchedāt kālaḥ api atītaḥ ucyate anārabdha phala avacchedāt bhaviṣyantī kriyā ucyate pakṣyati iti tathā kālaḥ api iti evam aupādhikaḥ kāle vartamāna ādi traya vyavahāraḥ vartamāna kāla samarthanam 
NM_2,1.370.2–2,1.371.1	 atas ca yat ucyate vṛkṣāt patataḥ parṇasya bhūta bhaviṣyanta ābadhvān audṛśyete na vartamānaḥ tasmāt vartamānaḥ kālaḥ na asti iti tad asambaddham adhva vyaṅgya tva abhāvāt kālasya na hi adhva vyaṅgyaḥ kāla bhedaḥ kintu yathā ukta krameṇa kriyā vyaṅgyaḥ eva iti kriyā parikalpita bheda nibandhanaḥ ca ayam kṣaṇa lava kāṣṭhā kalā nālikā muhūrtayāmāhorātra m āsartu ayana saṃvatsara yuga manvantara kalpa vyavahāraḥ iti alam prasaṅgena kāla bheda parijñānasya prayojanam tithi ādi bheda avadhāraṇam ca vaidika karma prayoga aṅgam paurṇamāsyāṃpaurṇamāsyām yajeta amāvāsyāyām amāvāsyāyām ca iti evaṃvasantādyutu bhedaḥ api tad aṅgam vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agnīnāt adhīta grīṣme rājanyaḥ śaradi vaiśyaḥ varṣāsu rathakāraḥ iti ṛtvā ādi bhedaḥ 
NM_2,1.371.2	 sa ca ayam ṛtu tithyādi vibhāgaḥ kriyayā eva jyotiḥ śāstra upadiṣṭa viśiṣṭa rāśi saṃsṛṣṭa candra ādi graha gatayā lakṣyate laukikena ca lakṣmaṇātena tena iti tat yathā cañcu agra cumbita ātāmra cūta aṅkura kadambakaiḥ kathyate kokilaiḥ eva madhuḥ madhura kūjitaiḥ divākara kara alātapāta nirdagdha vīrudhaḥ mārgāssa mallikā modāḥ bhavanti grīṣmaśaṃsinaḥ śikhaṇḍi maṇḍala ārabdha caṇḍa tāṇḍava ḍambaraiḥ prāvṛṣ ākhyāyate megha meduraiḥ medinīdharaiḥ mauktika ākāra vistāri tārā nikara citritam śarad piśuna tām yāti yamunā ambhaḥ nibham nabhaḥ āyāma yāminī bhoga saphala ābhoga vibhramāḥ hemantam abhinandanti sa ūṣmāṇaḥ taruṇī stanāḥ 
NM_2,1.372.0–2,1.372.1	 āskandana dalat kunda kalikā utkara danturāḥ vadanti śiśiram vātāḥ tuṣāra kaṇa karkaśāḥ tasmāt ekaḥ api ayam kālaḥ kriyā bhedāt vibhidyate etena sadṛśa nyāyāt mantavyā diś samarthitā diśaḥ atirikta tvam pūrva paścimā ādi pratyayānām kevala vṛkṣa ādi pratyaya vailakṣaṇyena kāraṇa antara anumānāt diś liṅga aviśeṣāt eka tve api diśaḥ daśavidhāḥ pradakṣiṇa āvarta parivartamāna mārtaṇḍa maṇḍala marīci nicaya cumbyamāna kāñcana acala kaṭaka saṃyoga upādhi kṛtaḥ pūrva paścimā ādi bhedaḥ kalpyate pūrvā pūrva dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇa paścimā paścimā paścima uttarā uttarā uttara pūrvā adhastanī ūrdhvā ca iti devatā parigraha vaśāt ca punar eṣā eva dika daśadhā ucyate aindrī āgneyī yāmyāḥ nairṛtī vāruṇī vāyavyāḥ kauberī aiśānī nāgīyāḥ brāhmī ca iti dikkālayoḥ eka tve pramāṇam 
NM_2,1.372.2–2,1.372.3	 nanu ca ! yena eva pratyayena pratyakṣeṇa liṅgena vā satā dikkālau= avagamyete tena eva tayoḥ bheda grahaṇāt katham eka tvam tad avagama samayaḥ eva tathā bheda pratibhāsāt uktam atra sarvatra tad pratyaya aviśeṣāt iti vyatyaya darśanāt ca yā eva ekatra pūrvā diś sā eva anyatra dakṣiṇā itigṛhyate prāc bhāgaḥ yaḥ surāṣṭrāṇām mālavānām sa dakṣiṇaḥ iti 
NM_2,1.372.4–2,1.373.3	 kāle api cira kṣipra ādi vibhāgaḥ ca avyavasthitaḥ eva dṛśyate yohi anāgataḥ iti parisphurati kālaḥ saḥ eva vartamānaḥ bhavati bhūtaḥ bhavati ca tatha ca ciram api śīghrībhavati śīghram api cirībhavati tasmāt tad bhedaḥ api aupādhikaḥ iti siddham samāna tantre diś kālau vaitatyena vicintitau tat na iha likhyate loke dveṣyāḥ hi bahu bhāṣiṇaḥ siddhaḥ kālaḥ cākṣuṣaḥ laiṅgikaḥ vātat nānā tvam siddham aupādhikam ca tasmāt yuktam niścikāya tri kāla grāhi iti evam sūtrakāraḥ anumānam iti anumāna parīkṣā aatha upamānam upamāna lakṣaṇam anumāna anantaram upamānam vibhāga sūtre paṭhitam iti tad krameṇa tasya lakṣaṇam ucyate prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam 
NM_2,1.374.1	 atra vṛddha naiyāyikāḥ tāvat evam upamāna svarūpam ācakṣate saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratīti phalam prasiddhā itarayoḥ sārūpya pratipādakam atideśa vākyam eva upamānam gavaya arthī hi nāgarikaḥ anavagata gavaya svarūpaḥ tad abhijñam āraṇyakam pṛcchati kīdṛś gavayaḥ iti sa tam āhayādṛśaḥ gauḥ tādṛśaḥ gavayaḥ iti tat etat vākyam aprasiddhasyaprasiddhena gavā sādṛśyam abhidadhat tat dvāra kama prasiddhasya gavaya saṃjñā abhidheya tvam jñāpayati iti upamānam ucyate upamānasya śabda pramāṇa atirikta tvam 
NM_2,1.374.2–2,1.375.1	 nanu ! śabda svabhāva tvāt asya āpta upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti anena gata artha tvāt na idam pramāṇa antaram bhavet na ca saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pariccheda phala tvena pramāṇa antara tā vaktavyā phala vaicitryeṇa pramāṇa ānantya prasaṅgāt laukikāni hi vacanāni vaidikāni ca vidhi niṣedha bodhakāni nānā phalāni api bhavanti na śabda tām atikrāmanti ucyate yatra śabda pratyayāt eva tad praṇetṛ puruṣa pratyayāt eva vāartha tathā tvam upāya antara anapekṣam avagamyate saḥ āgamaḥ eva tatas eva tad artha pratīteḥ yatra tu puruṣaḥ prati iti upāyam aparam upadiśati tatra tataeva upāyāt tad artha avadhāraṇam upāya mātra avagame tu śabda vyāpāraḥ 
NM_2,1.375.2	 yathā para artha anumāne agni mān ayam parvataḥ dhūmavat tvāt mahānasa vat iti atra hi na puruṣa upadeśa viśvāsāt eva śailasya kṛśa anumattām pratipattā nimitta antara nirapekṣaḥ pratipadyate api tutad avabodhaka dhūma ākhya liṅga sāmarthyāt eva tat iha yadi āṭavikaḥ nāgarikāya gavaya arthine tad avagama upāyam prasiddha sādharmyam na abhyadhāsyat tarhi tad upadeśaḥ āgamaḥ eva antarabhaviṣyat tad upadeśāt tu tatas eva tad artha avagamaḥ iti sati api śabda svabhāva tve pramāṇa antaram eva idam pratipattā api nāgarikaḥ na araṇyaka vākyāt eva tam prāṇinam gavaya śabda vācya tayā buddhyate kintu sārūpyam prasiddhena gavā tasya paśyati 
NM_2,1.375.3–2,1.376.0	 kim āraṇyaka vākyena na saṃpratyayaḥ nāgarakasya na brūmaḥ na saṃpratyayaḥ iti kintu sārūpyam upāya antaram tad avagatau= asau= upadiṣṭavān iti tatas avagatiḥ bhavantī na nihnotum śakyate iti na śābdī sa apratītiḥ api tu aupamānikī iti vacanam api bhavat idam upamā naṃpramāṇa antaram iti yuktam bhāṣya akṣarāṇi api ca etat pakṣa sākṣya= chāyām iva vadanti lakṣyante tāni tu grantha gaurava bhayāt na yojyante iti alaṃprasaṅgena upamāna svarūpe vārtikapakṣaḥ 
NM_2,1.376.1	 adyatanāḥ tu vyācakṣate śruta atideśa vākyasya pramātuḥ aprasiddha īpiṇḍe prasiddha piṇḍa sārūpya jñānam indriya jam saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratipatti phalam upamānam tat hīndriya janitam api dhūma jñānam iva tad agocara prameya pramiti sādhanāt pramāṇa antaram śruta atideśa vākyohi nāgarakaḥ kānane paribhraman go sadṛśam prāṇinam avagacchati tatas vanecara puruṣa kathitam yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ iti vacanam anusmarati smṛtvā ca pratipadyate ayam gavaya śabda vācyaḥ iti tat etat saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha jñānam tat janyam iti upamāna phalam iti ucyate pratyakṣam tāvat etasmin viṣaye na kṛta śramam vana stha gavaya ākāra pariccheda phalam hi tat anumānam punar na atra śaṅkām api adhirohati kva liṅga liṅgi sambandhaḥ kva saṃjñā saṃjñitā matiḥ āgamāt api tad siddhiḥ na vanecara bhāṣitāt tad kālam saṃjñinaḥ na asti gavayasya hi darśanam 
NM_2,1.377.1–2,1.377.2	 saṃjñā saṃjñinoḥ ca paricchede sati tad sambandhaḥ suśakaḥ bhavatinā anyathā atas eva pratyakṣa pūrvakam saṃjñā karmā iti ācakṣate upamāna viṣaye diṅnāga ādi bauddhānām ākṣepaḥ etat ākṣipati nanu ! nāgaraka praśnam anurudhya vanecaraḥ brūte atideśakam vākyam yathā gauḥ gavayaḥ tathā asya ayam arthaḥ yasya tvam go sādṛśyam nirīkṣase tam eva gavayam vidyāḥ sa ca ayam saṃjñinaḥ grahaḥ sambandha karaṇam ca iha viśeṣeṣu na yujyate ānantyāt kintu sāmānye tat cattham avadhāritam pratyakṣa pūrvakam saṃjñā akarmā iti na hi vaidikī codanā kim tu avacchedaḥ saṃjñinaḥ atra vivakṣitaḥ 
NM_2,1.378.0	 sa tu pratyakṣataḥ vā astu pramāṇa antarataḥ api vā smaryamāṇe api ca arthe asti saṅketakaraṇam kvacid yaḥ asau tatra tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ prāṇī sa ruruḥ ucyate kvacid tu kaiścid nirdiśya parokṣam upalakṣaṇaiḥ saṃjñinam vyahartāraḥ tatra saṃjñām niyuñjate danturaḥ romaśaḥ śyāmaḥ vāmanaḥ pṛthu locanaḥ yaḥ tatra cipiṭa grīvaḥ tam caitram avadhārayeḥ evam atra api gopiṇḍa sārūpyeṇa upalakṣite vācye vācaka sambandha bodhanam na eva durghaṭam atha sa upaplavā vākyāt buddhiḥ iti abhidhīyate upaplavaḥ api sambandhe na kaścid anubhūyate yaḥ tu asti gavaya ākāram prati kīdṛś asau= iti saḥ api pratyakṣatas dṛṣṭe gavaye vinivartate pratyakṣa āgama siddhe arthe tasmāt māna antareṇa kim  
NM_2,1.379.0–2,1.379.1	 ukta ākṣepa samādhānam upamānasya śabda atirikta tvam ca atra āhuḥ nāṭavikaraṭitāt vākyāt vispaṣṭaḥ saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratyayaḥ bhavitum arhati saṃjñinaḥ tadānīma pratyakṣa tvāt yadi api gosārūpya viśiṣṭa tayā tad avagamaḥ upapāditaḥ tathā api sa upaplavā evabhavati tadānīm buddhiḥ na nirākāṅkṣatā buddhiḥ tadānīm upajāyate tad utpādana paryantaḥ śabda vyāpāraḥ iṣyate na ca asau nirvahati atra vācya saṃvitti apekṣaṇāt śabdena tad anirvāhāt na sva kāryam kṛtam bhavet sambandha pratipattiḥ ca sāmānye yadi api iṣyate tat api avidita vyakti na samyak avadhāritam gavaya ākāra vṛttiḥ ca tadānīm buddhi upaplavaḥ sambandhe api dvi adhiṣṭhāne dadhāti śyāmalām dhiyam 
NM_2,1.380.0–2,1.380.2	 pratyakṣa pūrvakam tasmāt saṃjñā akarmā iti gīyate kvacid tat eva pratyakṣam smṛti dvāreṇa kāraṇam pūrva dṛṣṭe kuraṅga ādau sambandhaḥ darśitaḥ yathā caitre pratyakṣa vat siddhiḥ dantura ādi viśeṣaṇaiḥ iha punar atideśa vacana samaye go sādṛśya mātra upadeśye sati apisaṃjñini na nivartate eva upaplavaḥ pramāṇa antara paricchedasa apekṣaka saṃjñi rūpa upadeśāt upamānasya pratyakṣāt vailakṣaṇyam yatra go sādṛśyam paśyasi iti pratyakṣāt eva tarhi saḥ upaplavoviraṃsyati iti ced na pratyakṣasya indriya sannikarṣa ādi svabhāvasya saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha bodha karaṇa asamartha tvāt pratyakṣa phalam etat tu samartham satyam iṣyate tasya eva ca vayam brūmaḥ upamāna pramāṇa tām 
NM_2,1.380.3	 yathā pratyakṣa phalam api dharaṇidhara kuhara bhuvi dhūma darśanam anindriya viṣaya vibhāvasu bodha sādhana tvāt anumānam evam go sārūpya viśeṣita vipina gata gavaya piṇḍa darśanam adhyakṣa phalam api tad anavagata saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha bodha vidhānāt upamānam ucyate yathā ca tatra pūrva avagata dhūma agni pratibandha smaraṇam sahakāritām upaiti tathā iha api pūrva śruta āraṇyaka vākya artha smaraṇam yathā ca tatra vyāpti velāyām anālīḍha viśeṣa abuddhiḥ adhunā pakṣa dharma tā balāt viśeṣe vyavatiṣṭhate atra agniḥ iti tathā atra api anavagata vācya viśeṣāt vākyāt buddhiḥ idānīm vācya viśeṣe dṛṣṭeniḥ upaplavā jāyate ayam sa gavaya śabda abhidheyaḥ iti upamānasya anumānāt vailakṣaṇyam 
NM_2,1.381.2–2,1.382.0	 na etāvatā anumānam eva idam iti āśaṅkanīyam anapekṣita pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatireka ādi sāmagrīkasya tad pratyaya utpādāt tasmāt ayam sa gavayaḥ nāma iti evaṃvidhā matiḥ upamāna eka janyā eva na pramāṇa antara udbhavā na ca eṣā na asti sandigdhā bādhyate kalpanā mātram vā iti sarvathā etasyāḥ pramiteḥ sādhanam upamānam pramāṇam iti siddham tat idam āha prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam sūtra artha varṇanam 
NM_2,1.382.1	 prasiddha sādharmyāt iti karmadhārayaḥ tṛtīyā samāsaḥ bahu brīhiḥ vā prasiddham ca tat sādharmyam prasiddhena gavā vā sādharmyam gavayasya prasiddham vā sādharmyam yasya saḥ prasiddha sādharmyaḥ gavayaḥ tasmāt prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam sādhyaḥ saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhaḥ tasya sādhanam bodhanam saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha jñānam vā sādhyam tasya sādhanam jananam iti arthaḥ evam prasiddha sādharmya jñānam upamānam phalam saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha jñānam iti uktam bhavati sādhya sādhana śabdena karaṇasya pramāṇa tām bravīti etat ca mantavyam sarvatra paribhāṣitam 
NM_2,1.382.2–2,1.383.1	 atas eva madhye likhitam idam yat ubhayatas pramāṇa lakṣaṇān ivyāpsyati iti atyanta prāya sādharmya vikalpa ādi nibandhanaḥ kṣiptaḥ sūtra kṛtā sākṣāt upamānasya viplavaḥ yena sadṛśa pratītiḥ janyate tad sādṛśyam iti kim atyanta sādṛśya ādi vikalpaiḥ sāmānyam eva na sādṛśyam abhinna pratyaye hetuḥ yathā sāmānyam ucyate sadṛśa pratyaye hetuḥ tathā sādṛśyam ucyate upamāna pramāṇa prayojana ākṣepaḥ 
NM_2,1.383.2–2,1.384.1	 nanu ! upamāna lakṣaṇam asmin mokṣa śāstre kva upayujyate āgamāt tāvat ātma jñānam mokṣa sādhanam sa iti kartavya tākam avagamyate anumānāt āgama prāmāṇya niścayaḥ pratyakṣāt anumānasya vyāpti pariccheda eti trayam eva upadeṣṭavyam upamāna pramāṇa prayojanam satyam evam upamānam api kvacid gavaya ālambha ādi codanā artha anuṣṭhāne sa upayogam anavagata gavaya svarūpe tad ālambha abhāvāt yathā mudga stambhaḥ tathā mudgaparṇī iti mudgaparṇī ādyauṣadhi parijñāne api tad upayogi bhavati sarva anugraha buddhyā ca karuṇā ārdra matiḥ muniḥ mokṣa upayoga abhāve api tasya lakṣaṇam uktavān 
NM_2,1.384.2–2,1.384.3	 nanu ! evam sati yāga auṣadha ādi upayogi anyat api bahu upadeṣṭa vyaṃsyāt na pramāṇa śāstra tvāt asya pramāṇam eva artha paricchitti sādhanam iha upadiśyate tat caturvidham eva na nyūnam adhikam vā iti nirṇītam prameyam tu mokṣa aṅgam eva upadiśyate iti alam prasaṅgena mīmāṃsaka sammata upamāna svarūpam jaiminīyāḥ tu anyathā upamāna svarūpam varṇayanti yat aśruta atideśa vākyasya vane gavaya piṇḍa darśana anantaram nagaram gatam go piṇḍam anusmarate etena sadṛśaḥ gauḥ iti jñānam tad upamānam tasya viṣayaḥ saṃprati avagamyamāna gavaya sādṛśya viśiṣṭaḥ parokṣaḥ gauḥ tad vṛtti vā 
NM_2,1.385.1–2,1.385.2	 gavaya sādṛśyam atas eva na tat jñānam pratyakṣa janyam parokṣa gopiṇḍa viṣaya tvāt aśrutā atideśa vākyasya bhāvāt na śābdam na ca smaraṇam eva idam prameya ādhikya saṃbhavāt gavayena hi sādṛśyam na pūrvam avadhāritam bhūyas avayava sāmānya yogaḥ yadi api mad mate sādṛśyam tasya tu jñaptiḥ gṛhīte pratiyogine upamānam na anumānam na ca anumānikam idam jñānam anapekṣita pakṣa ādi dharmakasyabhāvāt na ca gavaya gatam sārūpyam tatra liṅgam apakṣa dharma tvāt 
NM_2,1.386.1	 na api go gatam asiddha tvāt pratijñā artha eka deśa tvāt ca viṣāṇa ādi avayava jātam api na go gatam liṅgam idānīm vana sthasya tad grahaṇa abhāvāt agṛhītasya ca liṅga tva anupapatteḥ gavaya gatam api tad aliṅga megha pūrvavat apakṣa dharma tvāt tasmāt gavaya sādṛśya viśeṣita nagara gata parokṣa gopiṇḍa jñānam kānana vartinaḥ pramātuḥ pramāṇa antaram bhavati itiabhyupagantavyam mīmāṃsaka sammata upamāna pariśīlanam tat idam anupapannam evaṃvidha pratīti abhāvāt prasiddhena hi sādṛśyam aprasiddhasya gamyate gavā gavaya piṇḍasya na tu yuktaḥ viparyayaḥ 
NM_2,1.386.2–2,1.387.2	 tathā hi aśrutā atideśakaḥ nāgarakaḥ kānane paribhramenna dṛṣṭa pūrvaṃgo sadṛśam prāṇinam upalabhamānaḥ evam buddhyate bravīti ca aho nu gavā sadṛśaḥ eṣa kaścana prāṇī iti na tu anena sadṛśaḥ gauriti jñānam abhidhānam vā kasya cit asti iti atas pramiteḥ eva abhāvāt kiṃpramāṇa cintayā bhavatu vā eṣā buddhiḥ anena sadṛśaḥ gauḥ iti tathā api smṛti tvāt na pramāṇa phalam mīmāṃsaka sammatam upamānam smaraṇa rūpam eva 
NM_2,1.387.3–2,1.387.5	 nanu ! gopiṇḍa mātre satyam smṛtiḥ eva eṣā saṃprati avagata gavaya sādṛśya viśiṣṭa tvam tu tasya pūrvam anupalabdha madhunā eva gamyate iti natasmin= eṣā smṛtiḥ mā evam gavaya sādṛśyasya api tatra pūrvam grahaṇāt nanu ! anavagata gavayena gavi gavaya sādṛśyam avagata miti citram na citram vyakti tiraskṛtasya grahaṇāt nanu ! idam api citrataram gṛhītam ca vyakti tiraskṛtam ca iti vyaktiḥ hi grahaṇam eva tad tiraskāre ca na asti eva grahaṇam ucyate
