NM_2,1.388.1	 na etat api citrataram tathā hi vane gavayam ālokya nāgarikaḥ nakareṇum anusmarati na karabham na turaṅgam api tu viśiṣṭam eva piṇḍam na ca nirnibandhanam eva idam viśiṣṭa viṣaya smaraṇam utpattum arhati tasmāt yatra eva paridṛśyamāna piṇḍa sādṛśyam pūrvam avagatam saḥ eva piṇḍaḥ asmin dṛśyamāne smaraṇa patham avatarati na itaraḥ iti sādṛśya graṇam asaṃvedyamānam api abhyasta viṣaya avinā abhāva smṛti vat balāt parikalpyate pūrvam ca gavaya grahaṇāt vinā gavaya sadṛśī iyam gauḥ iti grāmīṇasya anubhavaḥ na bhavati iti vyakti tiraskṛtam tad sādṛśya grahaṇam ucyate iti na kiñcid citram tasmāt smṛtiḥ eva iyam tathā hi pratītiḥ anena sadṛśaḥ gauḥ mayā nagare dṛṣṭaḥ iti na tu adya etat sadṛśaḥ gauḥ dṛśyate iti buddhiḥ pratiyogi agrahaṇe api sādṛśya grahaṇa saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_2,1.388.2–2,1.389.1	 nanu ! pratiyogi grahaṇāt vinā katham grāmyasya sādṛśya grahaṇam atra bhavatā eva ātmanaḥ pratikūlam abhihitam sāmānya vat ca sādṛśyam eka ekatra samāpyate pratiyogini adṛṣṭe api tasmāt tat upalabhyate sa ca bhūyas avayava sāmānya yogaḥ agṛhītagavayavena api nāgarakeṇa grahītum śakyate atha tadā tad grahaṇe api sati na tasya sadṛśa pratyayaḥ na tarhi bhūyas avayava sāmānya yogaḥ sādṛśyam kintu sadṛśa pratyaya hetuḥ sādṛśyam yathā uktam sādṛśyam sadṛśa pratyaya hetu tvam eva bhūyas avayava sāmānya yoge ca tad lakṣaṇe citra ādau= avyāptiḥ ativyāptiḥ ca prāṇi antareṣu visadṛśeṣu api tad avayava sāmānyānām khura ādīnāṃbhāvāt bhūyas tvam tu kiyat teṣām iti na vidmaḥ yāvatā sādṛśya pratyaya utpattiḥ iti ced tarhi sadṛśa pratyaya hetu tvam eva sādṛśyam astu iti yuktam tasmāt gavaya darśanāt pūrvam api gavyanabhi vyakta sādṛśya grahaṇa upapatteḥ smṛtiḥ eva iyam mīmāṃsaka sammata upamānasya phala abhāvaḥ 
NM_2,1.389.2–2,1.389.3	 atha matam yathā naiyāyikānām atideśa vākya velāyām sa upaplavā saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha buddhiḥ upamānāt nirupaplavībhavati evam iyam api yaḥ asau pūrvam vyakti tiraskṛtā gavi gavaya sādṛśya buddhiḥ abhūt sā idānīm upamānāt vyaktībhaviṣyati iti na etat asti gavaya grāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa eva tad spaṣṭa tā siddheḥ yathā abhavadbhiḥ naiyāyikāḥ uktāḥ atha tu adhika tā kācid pratyakṣāt eva sā bhavet iti 
NM_2,1.389.4–2,1.390.2	 tathā naiyāyikāḥ api yuṣmān vakṣyanti nanu ! vanastha pramātuḥ gavaya viṣayam pratyakṣam katham grāma vartini gavisādṛśya buddheḥ spaṣṭa tām ādadhīta kim kurmaḥ tad darśana anantaram su spaṣṭa tad sādṛśya viśiṣṭa gopiṇḍa smaraṇāt mīmāṃsaka ukta upamānasya pramāṇa antara tva asaṃbhavaḥ nanu ! atas eva idam upamānam pramāṇa antaram ucyate pratyakṣasya sannihita gavaya sva rūpa mātra niṣṭha tvāt parokṣe ca gavi gavaya sādṛśya pratyayasya vispaṣṭasya anyatas asiddheḥ iti uktam atra smṛtiḥ eva iyam tathā avabhāsanāt anadhigata artha grāhi ca pramāṇam upagacchanti bhavantaḥ mīmāṃsaka uktam upamānam antatas anumānam eva 
NM_2,1.390.3	 bhavatu vā smṛti vilakṣaṇā iyam pratītiḥ tathā api anumāna janya tvāt na pramāṇa antaram āviśati smaryamāṇaḥ gauḥ dharmī etat sadṛśā eti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ etad avayava sāmānya yogi tvāt sannihita dvitīya gavaya piṇḍa vat tad asannidhāne sāmānyena vyāptiḥ darśayitavyā yatra yat avayava sāmānya yogi tvam tatra tad sādṛśyam yathā yamayoḥ iti viśiṣṭasya tad yogasya hetu tva at na anaikāntika tvam sāmānya yogaḥ anyaḥ 
NM_2,1.391.1–2,1.392.0	 anyat ca sādṛśyam iti ukta tvāt na pratijñā artha eka deśaḥ hetuḥ avyutpannasya nārikela dvīpa vāsinaḥ bālasya vā tad pratyaya anutpādāt na vyāptinaiḥ apekṣyeṇa sā pratītiḥ iti vaktavyam tasmāt ittham anumāna janya tvāt smṛti tvāt vā pūrva uktāt asaṃbhavāt eva vā na iyam avagatiḥ upamāna kārya iti siddham mīmāṃsaka uktasya upamāna prayojanasya anuvādaḥ kaḥ ca asya bhavat upamānasya svatantra upayogaḥ evam hi āhuḥ bhavantaḥ aparīkṣā āmiṣeṇa api lakṣaṇāni vadan= ayam na svatantra upayogi tva nirapekṣāṇi jalpati mīmāṃsaka ukta prayojana varṇanam 
NM_2,1.392.1	 nanu ! uktaḥ eva upayogaḥ saurye carau dravya devatā sā rūpyāt āgneya vidhi anta lābhaḥ āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ iti upadiṣṭa dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa iti kartavyatā kalāpatayā nirākāṅkṣaḥ vidhiḥ sauryam carum nirvapet brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ iti atra pradhāna mātra upadeśāt vidhi ādiḥ asti na tuvidhyantaḥ itikartavya tā abhidhānam na ca aniti kartavya tākam karma prayoga yogyam atas kim iyam itikartavyatā jātam iha gṛhyatām iti apekṣāyām caru puroḍāśayoḥ brīhi ādi auṣadha sādhya tvena dravya sādṛśyāt sūrya agnyoḥ ca tejasvitayā devatayoḥ sārūpyāt āgneya iti kartavyatā sauryekriyate iti upamānāt gamyate 
NM_2,1.392.2	 api ca kvacid codita dravya ādau= alabhyamāne pratinidhi upādānena karma samāpanāt pratinidhi mātra upādāne prāpte brīhi sadṛśa nī vāra upādānam upamānāt pratīyate iti tat āha bhinna anumānāt upameya muktā saurya ādi vākyaiḥ na sahāyi dṛṣṭam sādṛśyataḥ agni ādi yutam katham nupratyāyayet iti upayujyate naḥ pratinidhiḥ api ca evam brīhi sādṛśya yogāt bhavati tad apacāre yatra nīvāra jātau tat api phalam abhīṣṭam lakṣaṇasya upamāyāḥ prakṛtiḥ api ca gauṇaiḥ bādhyate yatra ca anyaiḥ mīmāṃsaka ukta upamāna prayojana parākaraṇam 
NM_2,1.393.2–2,1.394.1	 tat etat asamañjasam prasiddhena aprasiddhasya sādṛśyam avagamyateiti eṣa bhavadbhiḥ utsṛṣṭaḥ panthāḥ viparyayaḥ tu āśritaḥ yat api adṛṣṭena nūtanena aprasiddhena gavayena vākya siddhasya goḥ sādṛśyam upamānāt pratīyate iti tat iha api nirjñāta iti kartavya tākena go vat prasiddhena āgneyena sauryasya gavaya vat aprasiddhasya sādṛśyam avagamyate na tu gavayena goḥ sauryeṇa āgneyasya tat iha yasya vidhi anta arthitā na tatra upamānāt sādṛśya avagamaḥ yatra vā tad avagamaḥ na tatra iti kartavyatā arthi tvam antatas mīmāṃsaka uktam upamānam smṛtiḥ eva 
NM_2,1.394.2	 nanu ! saurye vidhyanta arthini pratīyamāne dravya devatā sārūpya ādeḥ āgneyaḥ smaraṇa patham avatarati iti tatas eva asau vidhyantam adhigacchati iti  evam api smaraṇa mātrāt siddhe arthe kim upamānena āgneya smaraṇa adevataditi kartavyatā saurye upādāsyate smṛti viśeṣaḥ eva viṣaya ādhikyāt upamānam ucyate iti ced prativihitam etat iti alam prasaṅgena mīmāṃsaka sammata upamānasya vaiyarthī am kiñca upamāna pratipādita arthaḥ na codanā lakṣaṇa tām bibharti tasmāt na yujyeta tatas adhigantuṃ ā āgneya vidhi anta viśeṣa lābhaḥ pratinidhiḥ api ca evam na asti nīvāra jāteḥ na hi bhavat upamānāt brīhi sādṛśya buddhiḥ 
NM_2,1.395.0	 bhavati tu matiḥ eṣā brīhayaḥ tad sadṛkṣāḥ iti na ca phalam asyāḥ kiñcid asti pratīteḥ sva m ata upa saṃhāraḥ bhavati aṅgam yāge kvacana gavaya ālambha namatas tad ākāra jñāne pratinidhi viveke ca kṛtinām upāya tvam yuṣmad kathitam upamānam na bhajate parigrāhyam tasmāt pravara muni gītam sumatibhiḥ iti upamānam iti dvitīyam āhnikam 
NM_3,1.396.0–3,1.396.2	 śabda lakṣaṇam upamāna anantaram śabdasya vibhāga sūtre nirdeśāt tasya lakṣaṇam pratipādayitum āha āpta upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti ucyamāne paryāya mātra uccāraṇāt akārakeśabda mātre pramāṇyaprasaktiḥ iti tad vinivṛttaye pūrva sūtrāt sādhya sādhana padam ākṛṣyate tathā api śabda antara janake prasaktiḥ iti pratyakṣa sūtrāt jñāna padasya smṛti janakasya vyavaccheda artham ca artha grahaṇasya saṃśaya viparyaya janaka nirākaraṇāya ca vyavasāya ātmaka avyabhicāri padayoḥ anuvṛttiḥ iti evam avyabhicāra ādi viśeṣaṇa artha pratīti janakaḥ upadeśaḥ śabdaiti uktam bhavati 
NM_3,1.396.3–3,1.397.0	 tat evaṃparyāyam eva upadeśa śabdam śabda lakṣaṇam apekṣita pūrva sūtra upātta viśeṣaṇa padam kecid vyācakṣate āpta grahaṇam ca lakṣaṇa niścaya artham āhuḥ ghrāṇa rasana tvac cakṣuḥ śrotrāṇi indriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ iti atra bhūta grahaṇaṃvakṣyate evam hi aitihyasya na pramāṇa antara tā bhaviṣyati upadeśa rūpa tva aviśeṣāt iti sūtra yojanāyām pakṣa antaram 
NM_3,1.397.1	 anye tu bruvate yuktam upadeśa padam eva śabda lakṣaṇam yuktaṃca tad niścaya artham āpta grahaṇam pūrva sūtra upātta viśeṣaṇa pada anuvṛtti ḥ tunā upayujyate sāmānya lakṣaṇa anantaram viśeṣa lakṣaṇa prakramāt sāmānya lakṣaṇena ca smṛti ādi janaka sakala pramāṇa ābhāsa vyudāse kṛte sajātīya pratyakṣa ādi vyadacchedaḥ eva kevalam idānīm vaktavyaḥ tatra ca paryāyatayā paryāptam upadeśa padam eva buddhi ādi pada vat iti kim viśeṣaṇa anuvṛtti kleśena iti āpta padam api lakṣaṇa ghaṭakam iti pakṣaḥ 
NM_3,1.397.2–3,1.398.1	 aparaḥ āha anavalambita sāmānya lakṣaṇa anusaraṇa dainyam anadhyā hṛta prāktana viśeṣaṇa padam āpta upadeśaḥ śabda lakṣaṇam na ca ākārakeṇa śabda antara kāriṇā vā smṛti janakena vā saṃśaya ādhāyinā vā śabdena kiñcit upadiśyate iti nirvacana savyapekṣāt upadeśa grahaṇā deva tad nivṛttiḥ siddhāḥ mithyā upadeśe tu rathyā puruṣa ādi vacasi viparīta pratīti kāriṇi prasaṅgaḥ na nivartate iti tad pratikṣepa artham āpta grahaṇam aitihye yathārtha pratīti hetau= āpta anumānāt na pramāṇa antara tvam iti tasmāt yathāśrutam eva sūtram śabda lakṣaṇa artham yuktam upadeśa padasya artha anupapattiḥ bhavatu evam ! upadiśyate iti kaḥ arthaḥ abhidhāna kriyā kriyate kā iyam abhidhāna kriyā nāma pratītiḥ iti ced cakṣuḥ ādeḥ api tad karaṇa tvāt upadeśa tva prasaṅgaḥ 
NM_3,1.398.2	 sva avagati pūrvikā pratītiḥ iti ced dhūma ādeḥ api upadeśatā prasaṅgaḥ cakṣuḥ ādeḥ api tad karaṇa tvāt upadeśa tva prasaṅgaḥ sva sādṛśyena pratītiḥ iti ced bimbasya api pāda ādi anumitau= upadeśa tva prasaṅgaḥ śabde ca tad abhāvāt anupadeśa tvam syāt śabda avacchinnā pratītiḥ iti ced śrotrasya tad janaka tvāt upadeśa tva prasaṅgaḥ śabdasya ca sva avacchedena pratīti janakatva niṣedhāt anupadeśa tvaṃbhavet na api śabda karaṇikā pratītiḥ abhidhāna kriyā vivakṣāyām ākāśa anumāne vā tasya upadeśa tva prasaṅgāt iti abhidhāna kriyā svarūpā niścayāt na tasyāḥ karaṇam upadeśaḥ 
NM_3,1.399.0–3,1.399.1	 upadeśa padasya arthaḥ ucyate śrotra grāhya vastu karaṇikā tad artha pratītiḥ abhidhāna kriyā ittham loke vyavahārāt uktaḥ abhihitaḥ ca saḥ eva arthaḥ lokevyapadiśyate yaḥ tu tathāvidha pratīti viṣaya tām pratipannaḥ śrotra grāhyasya varṇa rāśeḥ eva artha pratīti karaṇa tvāt na tu śrotra pratyaya viṣayaḥ sphoṭa tmā śabdaḥ śrotra grahaṇe hi arthe śabda śabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ varṇāḥ eva caśrotra grahaṇāḥ yatas artha pratītiḥ sa śabdaḥ iti tu ucyamāne dhūma ādiḥ api śabdaḥ syāt agṛhīta sambandhaḥ ca śabdaḥ śabda tvam jahyāt artha pratipatteḥ akaraṇāt kā iyam abhidhāna kriyā nāma 
NM_3,1.399.2	 nanu ! pratīteḥ saṃvid ātmaka tvāt na abhidhānakriyā nāma kācid apūrvā saṃvid anyā vidyate tad karaṇasya ca upadeśa tāyām atiprasaṅga aiti uktam satyam saṃvid ātmā eva sarvatra pratītiḥ sā cakṣuḥ ādi karaṇikā pratyakṣa phalam liṅga karaṇikā anumāna phalam śrotra grāhya karaṇikā śabda phalam na hi dṛśyate anumīyate abhidhīyata eti paryāya śabdāḥ tad pratīti viśeṣa janane ca śabdasya upadeśa tvam ucyate ākāśa anumāna vivakṣa ādau tu tasya liṅga tvam eva iti alaṃprasaṅgena āpta svarūpam 
NM_3,1.399.3–3,1.400.1	 āptaḥ bhāṣya kṛtā vyākhyātaḥ āptaḥ khalu sākṣātkṛta dharma ayatha adṛṣṭasya arthasya cikhyā payiṣā prayuktaḥ upadeṣṭā ca iti dharmaḥ iti upadeṣṭavyaḥ kaścid arthaḥ vivakṣitaḥ sākṣātkaraṇam etasya yathārtham upalambhanam na tu pratyakṣeṇa eva grahaṇam iti niyamaḥ anumāna ādi niścita artha upadeśinaḥ api āpta tvānapāyāt cikhya apayiṣayā yuktaḥ iti uktā vīta rāga tā upadeṣṭa iti anena uktam pratipādana kauśalam 
NM_3,1.400.2	 vīta rāgaḥ api mūka ādiḥ upadeṣṭum aśaktaḥ kim kuryāt vaktum śaktaḥ api sākṣāt kṛta dharmā api avīta rāgaḥ na vakti tūṣṇīm āste iti tasya ca pratipādye arthe vīta rāga tvam iṣyate sarvathā vīta rāgaḥ tu puruṣaḥ kutra labhyate ṛṣyāri alma iccha sāmānyam vaktavyam ca āpta lakṣaṇam evam hi loke api āpta uktyā vyavahāraḥ na naṅkṣyati doṣa kṣayaḥ āpta tvam iti pakṣa vimarśaḥ 
NM_3,1.400.3–3,1.401.2	 ye api āptim doṣa kṣayam ācakṣate taiḥ api doṣa kṣayaḥ pratipādya artheṣu eva varṇanīyaḥ anyathā līke dṛśyamānasya āptokti nibandhanasya vyavahārasya nihnavaḥ syāt athavā veda prāmāṇya siddhi artha tvāt śāstrasya tad praṇetuḥ āptasya īśvarasya yathāśrutam eva idam lakṣaṇam sa sākṣātkṛta dharmā eva dharmasya īśvara pratyakṣa gocara tvāt kṛpayā eva bhagavatā vedānām upadeśaḥ cikhyā payiṣā prayuktaḥ iti kāruṇikaḥ eva bhagavān iti vakṣyate upadeṣṭā ca veda ādi āgamānām tad praṇīta tvasya samarthayiṣyamāṇa tvāt śabdasya anumāne antarbhāva āśaṅkā 
NM_3,1.401.3	 āha āstām tāvat etat ! idam tu cintyatām ! kimartham idam punar śabdasya pṛthak lakṣaṇam upadiśyate śabdasya khalu paśyāmaḥ na anumānāt vibhinnatām atas tad lakṣaṇa ākṣepāt na vācyam lakṣaṇa antaram parokṣa viṣaya tvam hi tulyam tāvat dvayoḥ api sāmānya viṣaya tvam ca sambandha apekṣaṇāt dvayoḥ agṛhīte api sambandhe na ekasya api pravartanam sambandhaḥ ca viśeṣāṇām ānantyāt ati durgamaḥ 
NM_3,1.402.0	 yathā pratyakṣatas dhūmam dṛṣṭvā agniḥ anumīyate tathā eva śabdam ākarṇya tad arthaḥ api avagamyate anvaya vyatirekau ca bhavataḥ atra api liṅga vat yaḥ yatra dṛśyate śabdaḥ sa tasya arthasya vācakaḥ pakṣa dharma tvam api asti śabdaḥ eva yatas arthavān prakalpayiṣyate pakṣaḥ dhūmaḥ dahanavān iva tatra dhūma tva sāmānyam yathā vahati hetu tām go tva ādi śabda sāmāni aṃtadvat atra apivakṣyati evam viṣaya sāmagrīsābhyāt eka tva niścaye na vilakṣaṇa tā mātram kiñcid anya tva kāraṇam pūrva varṇa krama udbhūta saṃskāra sahakāritā puruṣa apekṣa vṛtti tvam vivakṣā anusṛti kramaḥ ityādinā viśeṣeṇa na pramāṇa antaram bhavet kārya kāraṇa dharma ādi viśeṣaḥ atra api na asti kim  yathā iṣṭa viniyojya tvam api na anyatva kāraṇam hasta saṃjñā ādi liṅge api tathā abhāvasya darśanāt 
NM_3,1.403.0	 dṛṣṭānta nirapekṣat tvam abhyaste viṣaye samam anabhyaste tu sambandha smṛti sāpekṣa tā dvayoḥ aneka pratibhā utpatti hetu tvam api vidyate aspaṣṭa liṅge kasmiṃścid aśvaḥ ityādi śabda vat sphuṭa artha an avasāyāḥ ca pramāṇa ābhāsataḥ yathā liṅge tathā eva śabde api nānā artha bhrama kāriṇi api ca pratibhā mātre śabdāt jāte api kutracid āpta vāda tva liṅgena janyate niścitā matiḥ śabdasya anumāna rūpa tā samāna tantra anumatāatas eva hi manyante śabdasya api vipaścitaḥ āpta vāda avisaṃvāda sāmānyāt anumāna tām 
NM_3,1.404.0–3,1.404.1	 śabdasya anumāna antarbhāve yukti antaramkiñca śabdaḥ vivakṣāyām eva prāmāṇyam aśnute na bāhyeḥ vyabhicāri tvāt tasyām ca etasya liṅgatā śabdasya atirikta pramāṇa tva sādhanam tatra abhidhīyate dvividhaḥ śabdaḥ pada ātmā vākya ātmā ca iti tatra vākyam anavagata sambandham eva vākya artham avagamayitum alam abhinava viracita śloka śravaṇe sati pada saṃskṛta matīnām tad artha avagama darśanāt atas sambadha adhigama mūla pravṛttinā anumānena tasya katham sāmya saṃbhāvanā 
NM_3,1.404.2	 padasya tu sambandha adhigama sāpekṣa tve sati api sāmagrī bhedāt viṣaya bhedāt ca anumānāt bhinnat tvam viṣayaḥ tāvat visadṛśaḥ eva pada liṅgayoḥ tadvat mātram padasya arthaḥ iti ca sthāpayiṣyate anumānam tu vākya artha viṣayam atra agniḥ agnimān parvataḥ iti tatas pratipatteḥ uktam ca tatra dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī sādhyaḥ iti 
NM_3,1.405.0–3,1.405.2	 padānām anvaya bodhaka tva vicāraḥ nanu padāni api vākya artha vṛttīni santi gomān aupagavaḥ kumbhakāraḥ iti satyam kintu teṣu api sā kāṅkṣatā asti eva pada antaram antareṇa nirākāṅkṣa pratyaya anutpādāt gomān kaḥ iti ākāṅkṣāyāḥ anivṛtteḥ api ca parvata ādi viśeṣya pratipatti pūrvikā pāvaka ādi viśeṣaṇa avagatiḥ liṅgāt udeti padāt tu viśeṣaṇa avagati pūrvikā viśeṣya avagatiḥ iti viṣaya bhedaḥ śabdaḥ hetuḥ eva na pakṣaḥ 
NM_3,1.405.3–3,1.406.1	 nanu ! uktam yathā anumāne dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī sādhyaḥ evam iha artha viśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ sādhyaḥ bhavatu mā evam śabdasya hetu tvāt na ca hetuḥ eva pakṣaḥ bhavitum arhati iti śabdasya hetu tve api anumāna asaṃbhavaḥ nanu ! yathā agni mānayam dhūmaḥ dhūma tvāt mahān asa dhūma vat iti uktam sā deśasya agni yuktasya dhūmasya anyaiḥ ca kalpitāḥ iti evam go śabdaḥ eva arthavat tvena sādhya tām ! go śabda tvāt ityādi sāmānyam ca hetūkriyatām ! iti etat api durghaṭam śabdasya dharmiṇaḥ kim artha viśiṣṭa tvam vā sādhyate pratyāyana śakti viśiṣṭa tvaṃvā artha pratīti viśiṣṭa tvam vā 
NM_3,1.406.2–3,1.406.3	 na tāvat artha viśiṣṭa tvam sādhyam śaila jvalanayoḥ iva śabda arthayoḥ dharma dharmi bhāva abhāvāt atha artha viṣaya tvāt śabdasya artha viśiṣṭa tā iti ucyate tat api ayuktam tad pratīti jananam antareṇa tad viṣaya tva anupapatteḥ pratītau tu siddhāyāṃkim tad viṣaya tva dvārakeṇa tad dharma tvena yadi tu tad viṣaya tva mūlā tad dharma tva pūrvikā artha pratītiḥ artha pratīti mūlam tat viṣaya tvam tad itaretara āśrayam tasmāt na artha viśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ sādhyaḥ 
NM_3,1.406.4–3,1.407.1	 na api artha pratyāyana śakti viśiṣṭaḥ tad arthi tayā śabda prayoga abhāvāt na śakti siddhaye śabdaḥ kathyate śrūyate api vā artha gati artham eva amum śṛṇvanti ca vadanti ca na api artha pratīti viśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ pakṣatām anubhavitum arhati siddhi asiddhi vikalpa anupapatteḥ asiddhayā api tadvat tvam śabdasya artha dhiyā katham siddhāyām tad pratītau vā kim anyat anumīyate jvalana ādau= api tulyaḥ vikalpaḥ iti ced na hi tatra agniḥ dhūmena janyate api tu gamyate iyam tu arthapratītiḥ janyate śabdena iti asyām eva siddha asiddhatva vikalpa avasaraḥ tasmāt tridhā api na śabdasya pakṣa tvam śabdasya pakṣa tvam asambhavi ca 
NM_3,1.407.2	 api ca go śabde dharmiṇi gatvā ādi sāmānya ātmakasya hetoḥ grahaṇam tatas vyāpti smaraṇam tatas parāmarśaḥ tatas artha pratipattiḥ iti kāla drāghīyaḥ tvāt dharmī tirohitaḥ bhavet na parvata vat avasthitiḥ tasya api tu uccarita pradhvaṃsi tvam śabdasya na ca śabdam arthavat tvena lokaḥ pratipadyate kintu śabdāt pṛthak eva artham iti na sarvathā śabdaḥ pakṣaḥ atas dharma viśiṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ sādhyasya īt vā asaṃbhavāt śabda liṅgayoḥ mahān viṣaya bhedaḥ śabda anumānayoḥ sāmagrī bhedāt api vailakṣaṇyam 
NM_3,1.407.3–3,1.408.1	 sāmagrī bhedaḥ khalu api pakṣa dharma anvaya ādi rūpa sāpekṣam anumānaṃ vyākhyātam śabde tu na tāni santi rūpāṇi tathā ca śabdasya pakṣatva pratikṣepāt na tad dharma tayā gatvā ādi sāmānyasya liṅgatā naca arthasya dharmi tvam siddhi asiddhi vikalpa anupapatteḥ na ca tad dharma tvaṃśabdasya śakyate vaktum tatra vṛtti abhāvāt pratīti janaka tvena tad dharma tāyām ucyamānāyām pūrvavat itaretara āśrayaḥ pakṣa dharma ādi valena pratītiḥ pratītau ca satyām pakṣa dharma ādi rūpa lābhaḥ śabdaḥ na sarvathā artha dharmaḥ 
NM_3,1.408.2–3,1.408.3	 api ca yadi artha dharma tayā śabdasya pakṣa dharma tvam bhavet tadā anavagata dhūma agni sambandhaḥ api yathā dhūmasya parvata dharma tām gṛhṇāti eva tathā anavagata śabda artha sambandhaḥ api artha dharma tām śabdasya gṛhṇīyāt na ca gṛhṇāti iti atas na asti pakṣa dharma tvam śabdasya iti anumāna sāmagrī rūpa tvam api durvacam anvaya vyatirekau= api tasya durupapādau deśe kāle ca śabda arthayoḥ anugama abhāvāt na hi yatra deśe śabdaḥ tatra arthaḥ yathā uktaṃśrotriyaiḥ mukhe hi śabdam upalabhāmahe bhūmau= artham iti vayam tukarṇa ākāśe śrotram upalabhāmahe iti āḥ tām etat 
NM_3,1.408.4–3,1.409.1	 na api yatra kāle śabdaḥ tatra arthaḥ idānīm yudhiṣṭhira artha abhāve api yudhiṣṭhira śabda sadbhāvāt artha śabda arthayoḥ anvaya abhāve api tat buddhyoḥ anvayaḥ grahīṣyate iti ucyate tarhi vaktavyam kim artha buddhau= utpannāyām anvayaḥ gṛhyate anutpannāyām vā anutpannāyām tāvat sva rūpa asattvāt kutas anvaya grahaṇam utpannāyām tu artha buddhau kimanvaya grahaṇena iti naiṣphalyam tad pūrvaka tve tu pūrvavat itaretara āśrayam etena vyatireka grahaṇam api vyākhyātam śabda arthayoḥ anvaya vyatireka samarthanam tad dūṣaṇam ca 
NM_3,1.409.2–3,1.410.0	 nanu ! āvāpa udvāpa dvāreṇa śabda artha sambandhe niścīyamāneupayujyete eva anvaya vyatirekau yathā uktam yatra yaḥ anveti yam śabdam arthaḥ tasya bhavet asau iti satyam etat kintu samaya balena siddhāyām artha buddhau samaya niyama artha ābanvaya vyatirekau śabde na anvaya vyatireka kṛtā ca dhūma ādeḥ iva agneḥ tatas artha buddhiḥ api ca dhūma ādibhyaḥ pratītiḥ ca na eva avagati pūrvikā iha avagati pūrvā eva śabdāt utpadyate matiḥ sthavira vyavahāre hi bālaḥ śabdāt kutaścana dṛṣṭvā artham avagacchan tam svayam api avagacchati 
NM_3,1.410.1–3,1.411.2	 yatra api evam samayaḥ kriyate etasmāt śabdāt ayam arthaḥ tvayā pratipattavyaḥ iti tatra api pratītiḥ eva kāraṇa tvena nirdiṣṭā draṣṭavyā tasmāt anyaḥ liṅga liṅginā uḥ avinābhāvaḥ nāma sambandhaḥ anyaḥ ca śabda arthayoḥ samayā apara nāmā vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ prati iti aṅgam evaṃvidha viṣaya bhedāt sāmagrī bhedāt ca pratyakṣa vat anumānāt anyaḥ śabdaḥ iti siddham śabda anumānayoḥ na availakṣaṇyam yat tu pūrva varṇa krama apekṣaṇa ādi vailakṣaṇyam āśaṅkya dūrṣitam kaḥ tatra phalgu prāye nirbandhaḥ śabda anumānayoḥ viṣaya bhedāt api bhedaḥ yat punar abhihitam āpta vāda avisaṃvāda sāmānyāt anumāna tā 
NM_3,1.411.3–3,1.412.0	 iti tat atīva su bhāṣitam ! viṣaya bhedāt āpta vāda tva hetunāhi śabda artha buddheḥ prāmāṇyam sādhyate na tu sā eva janyate yadā ahaan yat eva hi satya tvam āpta vāda tva hetukam vākya arthaḥ ca anyaḥ eva iha jñātaḥ pūrvataram ca saḥ tatas ced āpta vādena satya tvam anumīyate vākya artha pratyayasya atra katham syāt anumāna tā janma tulyam hi buddhīnām āpta an āpta girām śrutau janma adhika upayogī ca na anumāyām tri lakṣaṇaḥ iti na ca prāmāṇya niścayāt vinā pratibhā mātram tat iti vaktavyam śabda artha saṃpratyayasya anubhava siddha tvāt śabdaḥ na vivakṣā mātra anumāpakaḥ 
NM_3,1.412.1	 etena vivakṣā viṣaya tvam api pratyuktam na hi vivakṣā nāma śabdasya vācyaḥ viṣayaḥ kintu arthaḥ eva tathā vivakṣāyām hi śabdasya liṅga tvam iha dṛśyate ākāśaḥ iva kāryatvāt na vācaka tayā punar śabdāt uccaritāt ca vācya viṣayā tāvat samutpadyatesaṃvittiḥ tad anantaram tu gamayet kāmam vivakṣām asau artha upagraha varjitāt tu niyamāt siddhā evam ājīva tā tat vācyā artha viśeṣitā tu avidite na eṣā tad arthe bhavet śabda prāmāṇyākṣepaḥ nanu ! siddhe pramāṇat tve bheda abheda parīkṣaṇam kriyate na tu śabdasya prāmāṇyam avakalpate śabdānām artha asaṃsparśi tvam artha pratīti janakam pramāṇam iti varṇitam vikalpa mātra mūla tvāt na artham śabdāḥ spṛśanti amī 
NM_3,1.413.0	 jāti ādīnām śabda artha tva anupapattiḥ arthaḥ nirūpyamāṇaḥ ca kaḥ vā śabdasya śakyate vaktum na jātiḥ na vyaktiḥ na tadvān nāma kaścana śabda arthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ api durvacaḥ sambandhaḥ api asya na arthena nityaḥ asti samayaḥ astha vā śakyaḥ san= api vā boddhum arthe katham atīndriye  vākyānām artha pratyāyayaka tvam durvacam vākya arthaḥ api na nirṇetum pāryate pāramārthikaḥ niyoga bhāva nābheda saṃsarga ādi svabhāvakaḥ tad prati iti abhyupāyaḥ ca kim padārthaḥ padāni vā vākyam vā vyatiṣakta artham sphoṭaḥ vā iti na lakṣyate siddhāyām api tad buddhau tasyāḥ draḍhima kāraṇam nitya tvam āpta ukta tvam vā na samyak avatiṣṭhate 
NM_3,1.414.0	 vedānām āpta ukta tva kṛtam prāmāṇyam api durvacampade nitye api vaidikyaḥ racanāḥ kartṛ pūrvikāḥ nityāḥ vā kṛtaka tve api kṛtāḥ kena iti durgamam kartā asti sa ca nirdvandvaḥ sa ca ekaḥ sa ca sarva vid sa ca kāruṇikaḥ vā iti pratipattum na śakyate vyāghāta ādibhiḥ na vedāḥ pramāṇamparaspara viruddhāḥ ca santi bhṛyāṃsaḥ āgamāḥ teṣām kasya īśvaraḥ kartā kasya na iti na manmahe vede doṣāḥ ca vidyante vyāghātaḥ punar ukta tā phalasya anupalaṃbhaḥ ca tathā phala viparyayaḥ kīdṛśaḥ ca artha vādānām viruddha artha abhidhāyinām mantrāṇām nāmadheya ādi padānām vā samanvayaḥ vede vyutpattiḥ api dussthita asiddha kārya upadeśāt ca vede saṃśerate janāḥ kim asya kārye prāmāṇyam siddhe arthe vā ubhayatra vā  tena veda pramāṇa tvam viṣame pathi vartate jīvikā upāya buddhyā vā śraddhayā vā abhyupeyatām 
NM_3,1.415.0–3,1.415.2	 veda prāmāṇya sthāpanam atra āmidhīyate sarve eva ete doṣāḥ yathākramam parihariṣyanta eti alabha samāśvāsena su pratiṣṭham eva veda prāmāṇyam avagacchatu āyuṣmān śabda sāmānyasya api arthājanya tvam svabhāvaḥ nanu ! artha asaṃsparśi tvam eva tāvat katham parihriyate na hibāhye arthe śabdāḥ pratītim ādadhati te hi durlabha vastu saṃparka vikalpa mātra adhīna janmānaḥ sva mahimānam anuvartamānāḥ tiraskṛta vāhya artha samanvayān vikalpa prāyān pratyayān utpādayantaḥ dṛśyante aṅguli agrehaḥ tiyūtha śatam āḥ te iti iti svabhāvaḥ eva śabdānām artha asaṃsparśi tvam śabdasya cakṣuḥ ādi vailakṣaṇyam 
NM_3,1.415.3–3,1.416.0	 cakṣuḥ ādīnām api alīka kacakūrcaka ādi pratīti kāraṇa tvam asti na ca teṣām artha asaṃsparśi tvam iti ced na teṣāṃhi timira ādi doṣa kaluṣita vapuṣām tathāvidha vibhrama kāraṇa tvam na tu sva mahimnā eva iha api puruṣa doṣāṇām eṣa mahimā na śabdānām iti ced mā evam doṣavataḥ api puruṣasya mūka ādeḥ anuccārita śabdasya īdṛśa viplava utpādana pāṭava abhāvāt asati api ca puruṣa hṛdaya kāluṣye yathā prayujyamānāni aṅgulī agra ādi vākyāni viplavam āvahanti eva iti śabdānām eva eṣa svabhāvaḥ na vaktṛ doṣāṇām bādhaka jñāne sati api śabdaḥ pravartate 
NM_3,1.416.1	 api ca na cakṣuḥ ādi bādhaka jñāna udaye sati na viramati viparīta vedana janmanaḥ śuktikāra jata ādi buddhiṣu vibhramasya apāya darśanāt śabdaḥ tu śata kṛtvas api bādhyamānaḥ yathā eva uccaritaḥ karaśākhā śikhareka reṇu śatam āste iti tathā eva tathābhūtam bhūyas a pi vikalpam ayathārtham utpādayati eva iti vikalpa adhīna janma tvāt śabdānām eva idam rūpam yat artha asaṃsparśi tvam nāma iti tat uktam vikalpa yonayaḥ śabdāḥ vikalpāḥ śabda yonayaḥ teṣām anyonya sambandhe na artham śabdāḥ spṛśanti amī iti śabdānām artha asaṃsparśi tvam na svabhāvaḥ iti siddhāntaḥ 
NM_3,1.416.2–3,1.417.0	 atra abhidhīyate bhavet etat evam yadi na kadācid api yathārthaṃśabdaḥ pratyayam upajanayet artha asaṃsparśi tvam eva asya svabhāvaḥ itigamyeta bhavati tu guṇavat puruṣa bhāṣitāt nadyāḥ tīre phalānisanti iti vākyāt atiraskṛta bāhya arthaḥ yathārthaḥ pratyayaḥ tatas pravṛttasya tad artha prāpteḥ na ca iyam artha prāptiḥ artha sparśa śūnyāt api śabda vikalpāt pāraṃparyeṇa maṇi prabhā maṇi buddhi vat avakalpate iti upariṣṭāt vakṣyāmaḥ nanu ! guṇavat vaktṛkāt aṅgulī ādi vākyāt dṛṣṭaḥ eva asamīcīnaḥ pratyayaḥ maitram guṇavatām evaṃvidha vākya uccāraṇa capala abhāvāt apramāṇa vākya anuvādaka vākyam na apramāṇam 
NM_3,1.417.1–3,1.417.2	 yat tu āptaḥ api kam cit anuśāsti mā bhavān abhūta artham vākyaṃva ādīḥ aṅguli koṭau kari ghaṭā śatam āste iti iti tatra iti karaṇa avacchinnasya dṛṣṭānta tayā śabda paratvena upādānāt pratiṣedha eka vākya tayā ayathārtham eva artha paratve tu niṣedhaka vākya tā eva na syāt iti tasmāt āpta vākyānām ayathārtha tva abhāvāt na svatas artha asaṃspārśinaḥ śabdāḥ puruṣa doṣa anuṣaṅga kṛtaḥ eva āyām viplavaḥ vaktṛ guṇa doṣau= eva śabdasya artha saṃsparśa tada bhāvayoḥ mūlam nanu ! āptaiḥ evaṃvidha vākya aprayoge api sandigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ kim śabdānām tad ṛśa svabhāva abhāvāt ayathārtha pratyaya anutpādaḥ uta vaktṛ doṣa abhāvāt iti na etat evam anuccarita śabdaḥ api puruṣaḥ vipralaṃbhakaḥ hasta saṃjñā ādi upāyena janayati eva viplavam ceṣṭayā śabda anumāna asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.417.3	 na ca hasta saṃjñā ādinā śabda anumānam tad kṛtaḥ ca viplavaḥ iti vaktavyam ittham apratīteḥ utpanne ca kvacid nadyādi vākyāt vijñānetaraṅgiṇī tīram anusaran= ana āsādita phalaḥ pravṛtta bādhaka pratyayaḥ puruṣam evāṣikṣipati dhik ! hā ! tena durātmanā vipralabdhaḥ asmi iti na śabdam prāptaphalaḥ ca pumāṃsam eva ślāghate sādhu sādhunā tena upadiṣṭam iti atas puruṣa doṣa anvaya anuvidhānāt puruṣa doṣa kṛtaḥ eva śabdāt viplavaḥ na svarūpa nibandhanaḥ tad abhāva kṛtaḥ eva āpteṣu tūṣṇī mātīneṣu vibhramānutpādaḥ iti na sandigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ artha asaṃsparśaḥ na api aprāmāṇyasādhakaḥ 
NM_3,1.418.2–3,1.419.1	 nanu ! puruṣa doṣāḥ tatra kim kuryuḥ ! puruṣasya hi guṇavataḥ doṣavataḥ vā śabda uccāraṇa mātraḥ eva vyāpāraḥ tatas param tu kāryaṃśabda āyattam eva iti tad svarūpa kṛtaḥ eva ayam vibhramaḥ hanta ! tarhi vaktari guṇavati sati saritaḥ tīre phalāni santi iti samyak pratyaye api śabdasya eva vyāpārāt puruṣasya uccāraṇa mātrecarita artha tvāt na ekāḥ tatas śabdasya artha asaṃsparśi tvam eva svabhāvaḥ yuktaṃca etat eva yat dīpa vat prakāśa tva mātram eva śabdasya svarūpam na yathārtha tvam ayathārtha tvam vā viparīte api arthe dīpasya prakāśa tva anativṛtteḥ ayaṃtu viśeṣaḥ pradīpe vyutpatti nirapekṣam eva prakāśa tvam śabdasya tuvi utpatti apekṣam iti prakāśa ātmanaḥ tu śabdasya vaktṛ guṇa doṣa adhīne yathārtha itara tve atas eva aṅguli śikhara adhikaraṇa kareṇu śata vacasi bādhite api punar punar uccāryamāṇe bhavati vibhramaḥ prakāśa tva rūpānapāyāt na tu eṣa śabdasya doṣaḥ padārthānām tu saṃsargam asamīkṣya prajalpataḥ vaktuḥ eva pramādaḥ ayam na śabdaḥ atra aparādhyati 
NM_3,1.419.2	 tat uktam pramāṇa antara darśanam atra bādhyate na punar hasti yūtha śatam iti śābdaḥ anvayaḥ puruṣaḥ hi sva darśanam śabdena pareṣāṃ prakāśayati tatra tad darśanam ce dduṣṭam duṣṭaḥ śābda pratyayaḥ aduṣṭaṃced aduṣṭaḥ iti guṇavataḥ puruṣasya aduṣṭam darśanam bhavati doṣavatā uduṣṭam iti adṛṣṭvā api vastu yat upadiśyate saḥ api buddhi doṣaḥ eva tasmāt puruṣa gata guṇa doṣa anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt tad kṛte eva śabda yathārtha tva ayatha artha tve tat uktam tattvam api bhavati vitatham apibhavati iti upasaṃhāraḥ tena abhidhātṛ daurātmya kṛtā iyam ayathārtha tā pratyayasya iti śabdānām na artha asaṃsparśitā svatas yā tu jāti ādi śabda artha parākaraṇa vartmanā artha asaṃsparśitā proktā sā purastāt niṣetsyate prāmāṇyasvataḥ tu aparataḥ tu avicāra upakṣepaḥ pramāṇa tvam tu śabdasya katham iti atra vastuni jaiminīyaiḥ ayam tāvat pīṭha bandhaḥ vidhīyate prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam vā sarva vijñāna gocaraḥ svatas vā paratas vā iti prathamam pradhivicyatām 
NM_3,1.420.0–3,1.420.1	 prāmāṇya vicāra prasaṅga samarthanam tatra pakṣa bhedāḥ ca nanu ! śabda prāmāṇya cintā avasare sakala pramāṇa prāmāṇī avicārasyakaḥ prasaṅgaḥ na svātantryeṇa parīkṣaṇam api tu tad artham eva samāna mārga tvāt yathā anyeṣām svatas paratas vā prāmāṇyam tathā aśabdasya api bhaviṣyati iti na hi tasya svarūpam iva prāmāṇyam apita d visadṛśam iti 
NM_3,1.420.2–3,1.420.3	 tat ucyate kim vijñānānām prāmāṇya prāmāṇyam ca iti dvayam apisvataḥ uta tat ubhayam api paratas āhosvit aprāmāṇyam svatas prāmāṇyam tu paratas uta svid prāmāṇyam svatas aprāmāṇyam tu paratas iti tatra sāṃkhyam atadūṣaṇam tatra dvayam api svatas iti tāvat asāṃpratam pravṛttasya visaṃvāda darśanāt yadi hi prāmāṇyam itarat vā svatas eva jñānasya gamyeta tarhi śuktau rajata jñānam pramāṇa tayā vā pratipannam anyathā vā 
NM_3,1.421.0–3,1.421.1	 pramāṇa tva paricchitta auviṣaṃvadati tat katham aprāmāṇya gṛhītauvā tasmin kasmāt pravartate  tatra bauddha matadūṣaṇam etena tṛtīyaḥ api pakṣaḥ pratyuktaḥ yat apramāṇyam svatas prāmāṇyaṃtu paratas iti svatas hi aprāmāṇye niścite pravṛttiḥ na prāpnoti iti kiñca aprāmāṇyam utpattau karaṇa doṣa apekṣam niścaye bādhaka jñāna apekṣam tat katham svatobhavitum arhati āprāmāṇi asya avastu tva nirāsaḥ 
NM_3,1.421.2–3,1.421.3	 yat ca aprāmāṇyam avastu tvāt na syāt kāraṇa doṣataḥ iti kaiścid ucyate tat api yat kiñcit saṃśaya viparyaya ātmanaḥ apramāṇasya vastu tvāt tad gatam aprāmāṇyam api vastu eva iti paratas tu prāmāṇyam yathā na avakalpate tathā vistareṇa ucyate prāmāṇya aprāmāṇyayoḥ paratas tvā asaṃbhavākṣepaḥ evañcāyam dvayam api paratas iti dvitīya pakṣa pratikṣepaḥ apibhaviṣyati artha tathā tva prakāśakam hi pramāṇam iti uktam tasyasu aprameya avyabhicāri tvam nāma prāmāṇyam atas ca para apekṣāyām satyāṃhi paratas iti kathayitum ucitam na ca asya para apekṣā kvacid vidyate 
NM_3,1.421.4–3,1.422.1	 sā hi bhavantī utpattau vā syāt sva kārya karaṇā ivā prāmāṇya niścaye vā utpattau kāraka svarūpa mātra apekṣā tad atirikta tad gata guṇa apekṣā vā kāraka svarūpa mātra apekṣāyām siddha sādhya tvam asatsu kārakeṣu kāryasya jñānasya ātma lābha abhāvāt kasya prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam vā cintyate guṇānām sadbhāve na kiñcid pramāṇam 
NM_3,1.422.2	 kāraka atirikta tad adhikaraṇa guṇa apekṣaṇam tu durghaṭam aprāmāṇika tvena kāraṇa guṇānām ākāśa kuśeśaya sadṛśa vapuṣām apekṣaṇīya tva abhāvāt na kāraṇa guṇa grāhi pratyakṣam upapadyate cakṣuḥ ādeḥ parokṣa tvāt pratyakṣāḥ tad guṇāḥ katham  liṅgam ca adṛṣṭa sambandham na teṣām anumāpakam yathā artha buddhi siddhiḥ tu nirdoṣāt eva kārakāt jñāna sāmānya sāmagryāḥ anyatara rūpa tvam avarjanīyam 
NM_3,1.422.3	 yadi hi yathā artha tva āyathā artha tva rūpa dvaya rahitam kiñcitupalabdhi ākhyam kāryam bhavet tatas kārya traividhyāt kāraṇa traividhyam avaśyam avasīyeta yathā artha upalabdheḥ guṇavat kārakam kārakam ayathā artha upalabdheḥ doṣa kaluṣam kārakam kārakam ubhaya rahitāyāḥ tu tasyāḥ svarūpa avasthitam eva kārakam kārakam iti na tu evam asti dvividhā eva khalu iyam upalabdhiḥ yathā artha tvayathā artha tva bhedena 
NM_3,1.423.0–3,1.423.1	 prāmāṇyasya svatas tvam aprāmāṇyasya paratas tva catatra āyathā artha upalabdhiḥ tāvat duṣṭa kāraka kāryā eva dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭaḥ kuṭila kumbha ādi saṃbhavaḥ duṣṭa kāraṇāt tathā māna antara jñātāt timira ādeḥ dvi candra dhīḥ ayathā artha upalabdhau ca duṣṭa kāraka kārya tvena siddhāyām idānīṃtṛtīya kārya abhāvāt yathā a rtha upalabdhiḥ svarūpa avasthitebhyaḥ eva kārakebhyaḥ avakalpate iti na guṇa kalpanāyai prabhavati 
NM_3,1.423.2–3,1.423.3	 anumāne ca yā eva pakṣa dharma anvaya ādi sāmagrī jñānasya janikā sā eva prāmāṇya kāraṇa tvena dṛṣṭāḥ na ca svarūpa sthitāni kāraṇāni kārya janmani udāsate eva yena yathā artha upalabdhi janena teṣām guṇa kāri tākalpyeta iti atas na santi kāraṇa guṇāḥ doṣa abhāvaḥ na kāraka koṭauniviṣṭaḥ nairmalya vyapadeśaḥ tu locana ādeḥ kāca kāmalā ādi doṣa apāya nibandhana ā iva na svarūpa atirikta guṇa kutas añjana ādi upayogaḥ api doṣa nirharaṇāya eva na guṇa janmane tasmāt avitathā saṃvid svarūpa sthita hetu jāḥ doṣa adhikaiḥ tu taiḥ eva janyate viparīta dhīḥ 
NM_3,1.424.0–3,1.424.2	 atas eva apramāṇa tvam paratas abhyupagamyate janmani apekṣate doṣān bādhakam ca sva niścaye tasmāt na utpattau guṇa apekṣam pramāṇam pramā kārye api na kāraka antara apekṣā na api sva kārya karaṇe kiñcid apekṣate artha prakāśana svabhāvasya evatasya sva hetoḥ utpādāt artha prakāśanam eva ca pramāṇa kāryam pravṛtti ādeḥ puruṣa icchā nibandhana tvāt na eva vā jāyate jñānam jāyate vā prakāśakam artha prakāśane kiñcid na tu utpannam apekṣate tathā ca uktam mṛd daṇḍa cakra sūtra ādi ghaṭaḥ janmani apekṣate udaka āharaṇe tu asya tad apekṣā na vidyate iti 
NM_3,1.424.3–3,1.425.3	 athavā sa apekṣa tvam ghaṭasya api salila āharaṇam prati yat kiñcid asti na tu evam pramāṇasya upapadyate na ca sva grahaṇa apekṣam jñānam artha prakāśakam tasmin= anavabuddhe api tad siddheḥ cakṣuḥ ādi vat uktam ca na hi ajñāte arthe kaścid vuddhim upalabhate jñāte tu anumānāt avagacchati iti tasmāt sva kārya karaṇe apina sva grahaṇa apekṣam pramāṇam prāmāṇya niścayaḥ na sva rūpa sāmagrī atirikta kāraṇa adhīnaḥ na api prāmāṇya niścaye kiñcid apekṣate apekṣaṇīya abhāvāt tathā hi asya kāraṇa guṇa jñānāt vā prāmāṇya niścayaḥ bhavet bādhaka abhāva jñānāt vā saṃvādāt vā na tāvat kāraṇa guṇa jñānāt kāraṇa guṇānām idānīm eva nirasta tvāt guṇa jñānasya asaṃbhāvaḥ 
NM_3,1.425.4	 api ca na kāraṇa guṇa jñānam indriya karaṇakam atīndriya kāraka adhikaraṇa tvena parokṣa tvāt guṇānām apitu upalabdhi ā ākhya kārya pariśuddhi samadhigamyam guṇa svarūpam apravṛttasya ca pramātuḥ na kārya pariśuddhiḥ bhavati tat na idānīm prāmāṇya niścaya pūrvikā pravṛttiḥ bhavet anyathā vā aniścita prāmāṇyāt eva jñānāt pravṛtti siddhau kim paścāt tad niścayena prayojanam niścita prāmāṇyāt tu pravṛttau duratikramaḥ cakra kakrakaca pātaḥ pravṛttau satyām kārya pariśuddhi grahaṇam kārya pariśuddhi grahaṇāt kāraṇa guṇa avagatiḥ kāraṇa guṇa avagateḥ prāmāṇya niścayaḥ prāmāṇya niścayāt pravṛttiḥ iti 
NM_3,1.426.0–3,1.426.4	 bādhaka abhāva jñānam tu asaṃbhavi na api bādhaka abhāva paricchedāt prāmāṇya niścayaḥ sa hitāt kālikaḥ vā syāt kāla antara bhāvī vā tātkālikaḥ na paryāptaḥ prāmāṇya pariniścaye kūṭa kārṣa āpaṇa ādau kiñcid kālam anutpanna bādhake api kāla antaretad utpāda darśanāt sarvadā tad abhāvaḥ tu na asarvajñasya gocaraḥ saṃvādāt api na prāmāṇya niścayaḥ atha saṃvādāt prāmāṇya niścayaḥ ucyate tarhi ucyatām kaḥ ayaṃsaṃvādaḥ nāma kim uttaram tat viṣayam jñāna mātram uta artha antara jñānam āho svid artha kriyā jñānam iti 
NM_3,1.426.5–3,1.427.0	 ādye pakṣe kaḥ pūrva uttara jñānayoḥ viśeṣaḥ yat uttara jñāna saṃvādāt pūrvam pūrvam jñānam prāmāṇyam aśnuvīta yatra kutra vā prāmāṇyam svatas iti āstheyam evaapi ca uttara saṃvādāt pūrva pūrva pramāṇa tām vadantaḥ na adhigaccheyuḥ antam yuga śataiḥ api su dūram api gatvā tu prāmāṇyam yadi kasya cit svatas eva abhidhīyet kaḥ dveṣaḥ prathamam prati yat āha kasya cittu yadīṣyeta svatas eva pramāṇatā prathamasya tathā abhāve vidveṣaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ iti samāna viṣayasya eva saṃvādaka tvam atha anya viṣaya jñānam anyasya saṃvādaḥ ucyate tat ayuktam adaśanāt na hi stambha jñānam kumbha jñānasya saṃvādaḥ saṃvādaḥ duradhigamaḥ ca 
NM_3,1.427.1	 atha artha kriyā jñāna saṃvādāt prathamasya pravartakasya jñānasya prāmāṇyam iṣyate tat api hi anavasita prāmāṇyam katham ādimasya prāmāṇyam avagamayet kaḥ ca artha kriyā jñānasya pūrvasmāt viśeṣaḥ yat etat āyattaḥ tasya prāmāṇya adhigamaḥ artha kriyā ajñāna tvam eva viśeṣaḥ iti ced kila salila jñānam ādyam avidyamāne api payasi pūṣa dīdhitiṣu pravartakaṃdṛṣṭam iti na bhavati visraṃbha bhūmiḥ apramāyāḥ api pravartaka tva ādi samam 
NM_3,1.427.2–3,1.427.3	 idam punar artha kriyā saṃvedanam ambu madhya vartinaḥ pāna avagāhana ādi viṣayam udeti iti anavadhārita vyabhicāritayā tad prāmāṇya niścayāya kalpate iti tat asat svapne pāna avagāhanasya api vyabhicāra upalabdheḥ apramāyāḥ api artha kriyā kāritvam dṛśyate kiñca carama dhātu visargaḥ api svapne sīmantinīm antareṇa bhavati iti m ahān eṣa vyabhicāraḥ 
NM_3,1.427.4–3,1.428.0	 atha rāga udreka nimitta tvena pitta ādi dhātu vikṛti nibandhana tvenavā tad visargasya na sva sādhana vyabhicāraḥ iti ucyate tat asamañjasam asakṛt anubhūta yuvati pariraṃbha ādi anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvena tad kāryatva avadhāraṇāt tasmāt artha kriyā jñāna vyabhicāra avadhāraṇāt tad prāmāṇya parīkṣāyām anavasthā na śāmyati prāmāṇya niścayaḥ me pravṛtti aṅgam athavā aapta phala tvena kim tad prāmāṇya cintayā prathame api pravṛtta tvāt kim tad prāmāṇya cintayā  
NM_3,1.428.1–3,1.428.2	 na ca idam artha kriyā jñānam apravṛttasya puṃsassamudbhavati tatra prāmāṇya avadhāraṇa pūrvikāyām pravṛttau kāraṇa guṇa niśceya prāmāṇya carcā baddha cakra kakra kaca codya prasaṅgaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva aniścita prāmāṇyasya tu pravṛttau paścāt tad nirṇayaḥ bhavan= api kṛta kṣaurasya nakṣatra parīkṣā vat aphalaḥ eva iti uktam prāmāṇya niścayasya ādya pravṛttau aṅga tva ākṣepaḥ 
NM_3,1.428.3–3,1.429.0	 tata etat syāt dvividhā hi pravṛttiḥ ādyā ca ābhyāsikīca tatra ādyāḥ yathā vinihita salila avasikta masṛṇa mṛdi śarāveśālī ādi bīja śakti parīkṣaṇāya katipaya bīja kaṇā āvāpa rūpā tatas tatra teṣām aṅkara karaṇa kauśalam avikalam avalokayantaḥ kīvāśā niśśaṅkaṃkedāreṣu tāni bījāni āvapanti iti sā iyam ābhyāsikī pravṛttiḥ evam iha api prathama parīkṣita pramāṇa bhāvāt eva jñānāt kutaścid kaścid vipaścit api vyavaharan= tad vyavahāra paraḥ tad tad phala jñāne tasya prāmāṇi abhava gacchan punar tathāvidhe jāte sati sukham eva pravṛtti ādikam vyavahāra bha śaṅkita kāluṣyaḥ kariṣyati iti na sarva ātmanā vaiyarthyam iti ādya pravṛttau= api prāmāṇya niścayaḥ na aṅgam 
NM_3,1.429.1	 ucyate viṣamaḥ ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ tad jātīya tayā bījam śakyate yadi veditum tatra tad niścaya ādi uktam nirviśaṅkam pravartanam jñāne tathāvidha tvam tu bodha rūpā viśeṣataḥ kāryāt vā kāraṇāt vā api jñātavyam na svarūpataḥ  iti prāmāṇya niścayasya pramāṇa antareṇa dussaṃpāda tvam kāraṇānām parokṣa tvāt na tad dvārā tadāgatiḥ kāryam tu na apravṛttasya bhavati iti upavarṇitam tasmāt vaiyarthya codyasya na ayam parihṛti kramaḥ evam ca artha kriyā jñānāt kīdṛś prāmāṇya niścayaḥ samartha kāraṇa jñānasya api na prāmāṇya niścāyaka tvam samartha kāraṇa jñānāt yaḥ api prāmāṇya niścayam brūte saḥ api kṛta udvāhaḥ tatra lagnam parīkṣate 
NM_3,1.429.2–3,1.430.0	 kila ati vikasita kusuma makaranda pāna mudita madhukara kule kasmiṃścid udyāne vādyamānāyām vīṇāyām nirantara latā santāna antaritava puṣi vidūrāt anavalokyamāne vādake vīṇā dhvani saṃvidi rolambanāt a sandeha dūṣitāyām tad abhimukham eva pratiṣṭhamānaḥ śrotā parivādake darśana patham avatīrṇe svara anukūla kāraṇa niścayāt tad pratītau saṃśaya nivṛtteḥ prāmāṇyaṃniścinoti iti eṣa samartha kāraṇa jñāna kṛtaḥ prāmāṇya niścayaḥ tatra api na apravṛttasya hetu sāmarthya darśanam evam eva pravṛttau tu niścitena api tena kim tad niścayāt pravṛttau vā punar anyonya saṃśraṭam tad niścayāt pravṛttiḥ syāt pravṛtteḥ tad viniścayaḥ prāmāṇyasvataḥ tva upasaṃhāraḥ 
NM_3,1.430.1	 tat evam na kutaścid api prāmāṇya niścayaḥ cakra ka itaretara āśraya anavasthā vaiyarthya ādi dūṣaṇa atīta sthitiḥ asti iti atas prāmāṇya niścaye api na kiñcid apekṣate pramāṇam atas ca utpattau sva kārya karaṇe sva prāmāṇya niścaye ca nirapekṣa tvāt apekṣā traya rahita tvāt svatas prāmāṇyam iti siddham tat uktam svatas sarva pramāṇānām prāmāṇyam iti gṛhyatām na hi svatas asatī śaktiḥ kartum anyena pāryate aprāmāṇi aparataḥ tva upasaṃhāraḥ 
NM_3,1.430.2–3,1.431.1	 aprāmāṇyam tu utpattau doṣa apekṣa tvāt sva niścaye bādhaka pratyaya ādi sāpekṣa tvāt ubhayatra api paratas iti uktam eva tasmāt pakṣa trayasyāyanupapatteḥ caturthaḥ eva ayam pakṣaḥ śreyān prāmāṇyam svatas aprāmāṇi aṃparate iti prāmāṇya aprāmāṇyayoḥ paratas tu aśaṅkān anu ! ca utpatti velāyām na viśeṣaḥ avadhāryate pramāṇa itarayoḥ tena balāt bhavati saṃśayaḥ paricchitti mātram pramāṇa kāryam tat ca yathā artha itara pramiti sādhāraṇam rūpam sādhāraṇa dharma grahaṇam ca saṃśaya kāraṇa miti prasiddhaḥ panthāḥ evam sthite ca pramāṇa antara saṃvāda visaṃvādau vinā katham pramāṇa itara nirṇītiḥ atas ca paratas dvayam prāmāṇya aprāmāṇyayoḥ paratas tu a asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.431.2	 tat etat acaturasram satyam paricchittiḥ eva pramāṇa kāryam sā punar upajāyamānā eva na sandeha ādi dūṣita tanuḥ upalabhyate iti autsargi kaṃprāmāṇyam eva sā bhajate artha paricchedāt ca pravartamānaḥ pramātā pramāṇena eva pravartitaḥ bhavati na saṃśayāt pravṛttaḥ sthite ca evam autsargikeprāmāṇye yatra tasya apavādaḥ kvacid bhavati tatra aprāmāṇyam aprāmāṇya hetuḥ 
NM_3,1.431.3–3,1.432.0	 apramāṇye ca avaśyaṃbhāvi a pavādaḥ dvividhaḥ eva apavādaḥ vādhaka pratyayaḥ kāraṇa doṣa jñānam ca tat uktam bhāṣya kṛtāḥ yatra duṣṭam karaṇam yatra ca mithyā iti pratyayaḥ saḥ eva asamīcīnaḥ pratyayaḥ na anyaḥ iti vārtikakāraḥ api āha tasmāt bodha ātmaka tvena prāptā buddheḥ pramāṇa tā arthānyathātva hetu uttha doṣa jñānāt apodyate iti tatra bādhaka jñānam pūrva jñāna upamarda dvāreṇa eva tasmin viṣaye jāyatiti samāna viṣaya tvāt spaṣṭam eva bādhakam asamāna viṣaya tve api karaṇa doṣa jñānatya bādhaka tvam 
NM_3,1.432.1	 karaṇa doṣa jñānam tu bhinna viṣayam api kārya aikyāt vā adhaka tām pratipadyate yathā camasena apaḥ praṇayati iti darśa pūrṇamāsa aṅga tvāt kratu arthaḥ camasaḥ go dohanena paśu kāmasya praṇayet iti kāmyamāna paśu nirdeśāt puruṣa arthaḥ go dohanam iti evam kratu artha puruṣa artha tayā bhinna viṣaya tve apicamasa go dohanayoḥ praṇayana ākhya kāryam ekam iti go dohanena nirvṛttetasmin= camasaḥ nivartate evam iha kāraṇa doṣa jñānam doṣa viṣayam api doṣāṇām ayathā artha jñāna janana svabhāvat tvāt tasya jñānasya prāmāṇyam bādhate tat uktam duṣṭa kāraṇa bodhe tu jāte api viṣaya antare arthāt tulya artha tām prāpya bādhaḥ go dohana ādi vat iti bādhaka abhāva mātram eva prāmāṇya avadhāraṇe alam 
NM_3,1.432.2–3,1.433.0	 yatra punar idam apavāda dvayam api na dṛśyate tatra tad autsargi kaṃprāmāṇyam anapoditam āste iti na mithyātva āśaṅkāyām nimittam kiñcid yat āha doṣañcāne tu anutpanne na āśaṅkyā niṣpramāṇa tā iti tathā hi kaścid utpannaḥ eva iha sva saṃvedyaḥ asti saṃśayaḥ sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti kaḥ nāma apahnuvīta tam haṭhāt utpādyamānaḥ tu hinasti sakalāḥ kriyāḥ sva bhāryā pariraṃbhe api bhavet mātari saṃśayaḥ vināśī saṃśaya ātmā iti pārāśaryaḥ api abhāṣata na ayam lokaḥ asti kaunteya ! na paraḥ saṃśaya ātmanaḥ iti sthala viśeṣe saṃśaya utpattau= api na prāmāṇyasvataḥ tu ahāniḥ 
NM_3,1.433.1	 yatra api ca kvacid bādhaka pratyaye saṃśayaḥ jāyate tatra api tṛtīya jñāna apekṣaṇāt na anavasthā na ca tāvatā svatas prāmāṇya hāniḥ yatra prathama vijñāna saṃvādi tṛtīya jñānam utpadyate tatra prathamasya prāmāṇyam autsargikam sthitam eva dvitīya vijñāna āropita alīka kāluṣya śaṅkā nirākaraṇam tu atya tṛtīyena kriyate na tu asya saṃvādāt prāmāṇyam 
NM_3,1.434.1	 yadi tu dvitīya jñāna saṃvādi tṛtīyam jñānam tadā prathamasya aprāmāṇyam tat ca paratas iṣṭam eva dvitīyasya tu jñānasya na tṛtīya saṃvāda kṛtaṃprāmāṇyam api tu saṃkalpyamāna kuśaṅkā aacamana mātre tasya vyāpāraḥ uktam ca evam tri catur ajñāna janmanaḥ na adhikā matiḥ prārthyate tāvatā eva ekam svatas prāmāṇyam aśnute iti śabdasya api svatas prāmāṇyam 
NM_3,1.434.2–3,1.434.3	 tat evam sarva pramāṇānām svatas prāmāṇye siddhe samāna nyāya tayā śabdasya api tathā eva prāmāṇyam bhavati na ca naisargikam artha asaṃsparśi tvam eva śabdasya svarūpam iti parīkṣitam etat kintu artha bodha janaka tvāt tasya naisargike prāmāṇye sati puruṣa doṣa anupraveśa kāritaḥ kvacid hi viplavaḥ tat uktam śabde doṣa udbhavaḥ tāvat vaktra dhīnaḥ iti sthitam iti laukika vaidika śabdānām sarveṣām svatas prāmāṇyam tatra paureṣeye vacasi guṇavati vaktari tad guṇa apasārita doṣa tayā tat prāmāṇyam autsargikam anapoditam bhavati na tu guṇa kṛtam tat prāmāṇyam anaṅga tvāt prāmāṇye guṇānām bodhaka tva nibandhanam eva tat iti uktam 
NM_3,1.435.1	 vede tu praṇetuḥ puruṣasya abhāvāt doṣa āśaṅkā eva na pravartate vaktra dhīna tvāt doṣāṇām na ca bādhaka pratyayaḥ adya yāvat veda arthe kasya cit utpanna eti nirapavādam veda prāmāṇyam āha ca tatra apavāda nirmuktiḥ vaktra bhāvāt ladhīyasī vede tena apramāṇa tvam na śaṅkām adhigacchati iti tat idam uktam tad pramāṇam bādarāyaṇasya anapekṣa tvāt iti doṣa abhāva mātram prāmāṇya prayojakam na guṇaḥ api girām mithyātva hetūnām doṣāṇām puruṣa āśrayāt apauruṣeyam satya artham iti yuktam pracakṣate girām satya tva hetūnām guṇānām puruṣa āśrayāt pauruṣeyam tu satya artham iti ayuktam tu manvate na hi puruṣa guṇānām satya tā sādhana tvaṃvacasi khalu nisargāt eva satya tva siddhiḥ guṇam api nara vācām vipla va ādhāyi doṣa praśamana caritārtham saṅgirante guṇa jñāḥ  paratas prāmāṇya sādhana upakramaḥ vede prāmāṇya niścayasya āvaśyaka tā 
NM_3,1.435.2–3,1.436.1	 atra abhidhīyate pratyakṣa ādiṣu dṛṣṭa artheṣu pramāṇeṣu prāmāṇya niścayam antareṇa eva vyavahāra siddheḥ tatra kim svatas prāmāṇyam uta paratas iti vicāreṇa na naḥ prayojanam anirṇayaḥ eva tatra śreyān adṛṣṭe tu viṣaye vaidikeṣu agaṇita draviṇa vitaraṇa ādi kleśa sādhyeṣu karma su tad prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam antareṇa prekṣāvatām pravartanam anucitam iti tasya prāmāṇya niścayaḥ avaśya kartavyaḥ tatra paratas eva vedasya prāmāṇyam itivakṣyāmaḥ pratyakṣa ādau= api svatas prāmāṇyam kim utpattau uta jñaptau 
NM_3,1.436.2–3,1.436.3	 yat ced amiyatā vistareṇa svatas prāmāṇyam upapāditam tat vyākhyeyam svatas prāmāṇyam iti kaḥ arthaḥ kim svatas eva pramāṇasya prāmāṇyam bhavati uta svayam eva tat pramāṇam ātmanaḥ prāmāṇyaṃgṛhṇāti iti jñāptau prāmāṇyasya svatas tvam na saṃbhavati na tāvat svayam eva prāmāṇya grahaṇam upapannam aprāmāṇika tvāt tathā hi yat etat nīla prakāśane pravṛttam pratyakṣam tat nīlam prati tāvat pratyakṣam pramāṇam tāvat indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti jānīmaḥ eva etat kim atra vicāryate 
NM_3,1.436.4–3,1.437.1	 prāmāṇya paricchede tu kim tat pramāṇam iti cintyatām pratyakṣam anumānam vā pramāṇa antarāṇām anāśaṅkanīya tvāt pratyakṣeṇa sva gata prāmāṇya grahaṇa asaṃbhavaḥ na tāvat sva prāmāṇya paricchede tad pratyakṣam pramāṇam tat hi jñānasyavā prāmāṇyam gṛhṇīyāt tad phalasya vā tatra jñātṛ vyāpāra ātmanā ujñānasya bhavat mate nitya parokṣa tvāt pratyakṣasya svatas pariccheda anupapattau tad prāmāṇyasya api katham pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam 
NM_3,1.437.2–3,1.437.3	 phalasya api artha prakāśana ākhyasya saṃvedana ātmanaḥ na indra saṃsarga yogya tā avidyate yena tad gatam api yathā artha tva lakṣaṇam prāmāṇyam indriya vyāpāra labdha janmanā pratyakṣeṇa paricchidyeta na ca mānasam api pratyakṣam phala gata yathā artha tāvasāya samartham itikathanīyam tadānīm ananubhūyamāna tvāt na hi nīla saṃvid prasava samanantaram yathā arthā iyam nīla saṃvittiḥ iti saṃvedana antaram utpadyamānam anubhūyate anubhave vā tatas dvitīyāt prathama utpanna nīla jñāna yātha arthya grahaṇāt na svatas prāmāṇya niścayaḥ syāt tasmāt na pratyakṣasya eṣa viṣayaḥ anumānena sva gata prāmāṇya grahaṇa asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.437.4	 anumānena api kasya prāmāṇyam niścīyate jñānasya phalasyavā iti pūrvavat vācyam phalasya tāvat tad niścaye liṅga tvam eva tāvat na kasyacid paśyāmaḥ jñātṛ vyāpara ātmanaḥ jñānasya tu sva kāryaṃbhavet api liṅgam phalasya kriyā mātra vyāpti grahaṇāt svarūpa sattā mātram anumāpayitum utsahate na yathā artha tva lakṣaṇam prāmāṇyam tat hi phalaṃnirviśeṣaṇam vā sva kāraṇasya jñātṛ vyāpārasya prāmāṇi anumāpayet yathārtha tva viśiṣṭam vā ādye pakṣe yatas kutaścana phalāt tad prāmāṇya anumāne nedānim kiñcid apramāṇam bhavet uttaraḥ api nāsti pakṣaḥ phala gata yāthā arthya pariccheda upāya abhāvāt iti uktam pramāṇi asya svatas tve yathā artha ayatha artha jñānayoḥ aviśeṣa āpattiḥ 
NM_3,1.438.2–3,1.438.3	 nanu ! sva anubhavaḥ eva atra upāyaḥ tat hi nīla saṃvedana tayā phalaṃsvataḥ eva prakāśate nīla saṃvedana tvam eva ca asya yathā artha tvam na anyat yadi evam śuktikāyām api rajata saṃvedane samānaḥ nyāyaḥ na hi rajata saṃvedanāt anyā yathā artha tva saṃvittiḥ iti prāmāṇya grahasya autsargika tvam na yuktam nanu ! tatra bādhaka pratyaya upanipātena āyathā artha tvam upanīyate nūnam ca asya mithyā darśaneṣu deśa antare vā śuktikāra jata ādi jñāne kāla antare kūṭa kārṣa āpaṇa ādi pratītau puruṣa antare vā jāta taimiriket vicandra pratītau avasthā antare pīta śaṅkha ādi pratibhāse bhavati bādhaka pratyayaḥ tat asattve na tad śaṅkā yuktimatī iti uktam eva 
NM_3,1.439.1–3,1.439.2	 satyam uktam ayuktam tu evam hi vadatā bādhaka abhāva jñāna adhīnaṃprāmāṇyam abhihitam bhavati tat ca tātkālikam kāla antara bhāvī vā iti kalpyamānam na upapadyate iti darśitam tasmāt utpadyamānam eva pramāṇam ātmanaḥ prāmāṇyam niścinoti iti na yuktam etat prāmāṇya saṃśayāt eva pravṛttiḥ yujyate yadi tu prasava samayaḥ eva jñānasya prāmāṇyam niścinuyāmaḥ tarhitatas pravartamānā na kvacid api vipralabhyemahi vipralabhyāmahe tu tena manyāmahe na niścitam tat prāmāṇyam saṃśayāt eva vyavaharāmaḥ iti prāthamika jñānam ekatara koṭika saṃśaya rūpam eva 
NM_3,1.439.3–3,1.439.4	 nanu ! saṃśayaḥ api tadā na anubhūyate eva kim idam rajatam uta na rajatam iti api tu rajatam iti eva pratītiḥ na hi saṃśayānāḥ pravartante laukikāḥ kintu niścinvantaḥ eva viṣayam iti kim ananubhūyamānaḥ eva āropyate saṃśayaḥ ekatara grāhī apyayam pratyayaḥ tad niścaya upāya virahāt saṃśaya koṭi patitaḥ eva balāt bhavati yathā asti kūpe jalam iti bhikṣavaḥ 
NM_3,1.440.1	 manyante iti evam rajatam idam iti eka pakṣa grāhī api tadānīm pratibhāsaḥ vastu vṛttena saṃśayaḥ eva yadi hi pramāṇa tayā asau gṛhyeta kathaṃkvacit visaṃvadet apramāṇa tayā tu gṛhyamāṇaḥ katham pumāṃsam pravartayet ubhābhyām api rūpābhyām atha tasya anupagrahaḥ saḥ ayam saṃśayaḥ eva syāt iti kim naḥ prakupyasi  prāthamika jñānasya saṃśaya ātmakā paryavasānam 
NM_3,1.440.2	 yat tu na anubhūyate saṃśayaḥ iti satyam ananubhūyamānaḥ api nyāyāt abhyaste viṣaye avinā abhāva smaraṇāt sa parikalpyate niścaya nimittasya tadānīm avidyamāna tvāt saṃśaya janana hetoḥ ca sāmagryāḥ sannihita tvāt tathā hi yathā artha itara artha sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ bodha rūpa tvam ūrdhva tva ādi vat tadā prakāśataḥ eva na ca prāmāṇya avinābhāvī viśeṣaḥ kaścana tadānīm avabhāti tad agrahaṇe ca samāna dharma adhigama prabodhyamāna vāsanā adhīnā tad sahacarita paryāya anubhūta viśeṣa smṛtiḥ api saṃbhavati eva itīyati iyam sā saṃśaya jananī sāmagrī sannihitā eva iti kathaṃtat janyaḥ saṃśayaḥ na syāt prāthamika jñāne tad kāle tatra viśeṣa grahaṇa asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.440.3–3,1.441.1	 nanu ! pramāṇa bhūte pratyaye jāyamānaḥ eva tad gataḥ viśeṣaḥ parisphurati iti katham viśeṣa agrahaṇam ucyate bho mahātman ! kathyatām saḥ viśeṣaḥ na hi tam vayam anupadiṣṭaṃkṛśa matayaḥ jānīmaḥ yadi tāvat spaṣṭa tā viśeṣaḥ śuktikāyām apirajata avabhāsaḥ spaṣṭaḥ eva ! na hi tatra anadhyavasāya kāluṣyam kiñcid asti 
NM_3,1.441.2–3,1.441.4	 atha niṣkampa tā śuktikāyām api rajata avabhāsaḥ niṣkampaā iva na hi asau jāyamānaḥ eva aṅguṃlī agrādi vākya karaṇa bodha vat kampamānaḥ jāyate atha nirvicikitsatā śuktikāyām api rajata avabhāsaḥ nirvicikitsaḥ eva kiṃsvid iti koṭi dvaya an avamarśāt atha yasmin sati bādhā na dṛśyate saḥ asya viśeṣaḥ iti nanu etat eva pṛcchāmi kasmin sati bādhā na dṛśyate iti sarva avasthasya bādha darśanāt na ca asau ciram api cintayitvā aviśeṣaḥ darśayitum śakyaḥ 
NM_3,1.441.5–3,1.442.0	 atha sva viṣaya avyabhicāri tvam eva viśeṣaḥ sa tadānīṃna avabhāsate iti uktam api ca yadi tathāvidhaḥ api viśeṣaḥ samasti tarhi yatra jñāne asau na dṛśyate tatas kim itipravartate tad viśeṣa darśī vā pravartamānaḥ katham vipralabhyeta iti uktam prāthamika jñānasya anirṇaya ātmaka tve api na pravṛtti ādi virodhaḥ yat ayam sthāṇu puruṣa saṃśaya vat asaṃvedyamānaḥ api tadānīm asti eva bodhe yathā artha itara tva saṃśayaḥ na ca asau kalpyamānaḥ api vyavahārasya lopakaḥ tena eva vyavahārasya siddha tvāt sarva dehinām atas ca saṃśayāt eva vyavahāram vitanvatām laukikānām prayoktavyāḥ na abhi śāpa paraṃmparāḥ prāthamika jñānam anavadhāraṇa rūpam 
NM_3,1.442.1	 na ca sarvathā saṃśaya samarthane asmākam abhiniveśaḥ prāmāṇyaṃtu jñāna utpatti kāle gṛhītum aśakyam iti naḥ pakṣaḥ prāmāṇya agrahaṇam eva anadhyavasāya svabhāvam saṃśaya śabdena iha vyapadekṣyāmaḥ prāmāṇya agrahaṇam ca pradarśitam pratyakṣeṇa anumānena vā satā pramāṇena ātmanaḥ pramāṇa tva paricchedā yogāt tasmāt svayam prāmāṇyam gṛhyate iti eṣa durghaṭaḥ pakṣaḥ prāmāṇyam svatas utpadyate iti pakṣaḥ api na yuktaḥ 
NM_3,1.442.2–3,1.442.3	 atha svatas prāmāṇyam bhavati iti eṣa pakṣaḥ āśrīyate saḥ api ayuktaḥ kāryāṇām kāraṇa adhīna janma tvāt prāmāṇyasya ca kāryatvāt asti ca prāmāṇyam vastu ca tat na ca nityam itikāryam eva tat kāryam ca kārya tvāt eva na svatas bhavitum arhati iti pramāṇa jñānam na jñāna sāmānya sāmagrī janyam atha utpattau sva kāraka atirikta guṇa anapekṣi tvam eva prāmāṇyasyasvatobhavanam ucyate na punar akārya tvam eva iti tat api asamyak samyak rūpasya kāryasya guṇavatkāraka vyatirekeṇa aniṣpatteḥ dvividham kāryam 
NM_3,1.443.1–3,1.443.2	 bhavati samyak asamyak vā tatra guṇavatā kāraṇena samyak kāryam utpadyate doṣavatā tu asamyak iti sāmānya sāmagrī janyam tu kāryam kutra api na bhavati nirdoṣam nirguṇam vā api na samasti eva kāraṇam atas eva tṛtīyasya na kāryasya asti saṃbhavaḥ samyat jñāna utpādakam kārakam dharmi svarūpa atirikta svagata dharma sāpekṣam kārya nirvartakam iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ kāraka tvāt mithyājñāna utpādaka kāraka vat samyat jñānam vā dharmi svarūpa atirikta dharma sambaddha kāraka niṣpādyam iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ kāryatvāt mithyājñāna vat pramā hetoḥ guṇasya sadbhāve pramāṇam 
NM_3,1.443.3–3,1.444.1	 āyurveda āgamāt ca indriya guṇān pratipadyāmahe yat amī vaidyāḥ svastha vṛtteḥ auṣadha upayogam upadiśanti tat guṇa upayogāya eva na doṣa śāntaye dṛśyate ca tad upadiṣṭa auṣadha upayogāt indriya atiśayaḥ tad viṣayaḥ eva ca loke nairmalya vyapadeśaḥ na doṣa abhāva mātra pratiṣṭhaḥ iti alam vimardena tasmāt utpattau guṇa anapekṣa tvāt svatas prāmāṇyam iti yat uktam tat ayuktam kevalasya pramāṇasya sva kārye na para anapekṣa tvam 
NM_3,1.444.2–3,1.444.4	 yat api ca sva kārya karaṇe pramāṇasya para anapekṣa tvam ucyate tat api vyākhyeyam kim pramāṇam sva kārya karaṇe nirapekṣam sāmagrī vā tat eka deśaḥ vā tat janyam vā jñānam iti tatra sāmagryāḥ satyam sva kārya janmani nairapekṣyam asti na tu tāvatā asu atas prāmāṇyam tad paricchedasya parāyatta tvāt sāmagrī antargata kārakasya sva kārye para apekṣa tvam aparihāryam ekasmāt kārakāt kārya nirvṛtti abhāvāt 
NM_3,1.444.5–3,1.444.6	 jñānam phalam eva na pramāṇam iti uktam na ca phala ātmanaḥ tasya sva kāryam kiñcid asti yatra sa apekṣa tvam anapekṣa tvam vā asi acintyeta puruṣa pravṛtti ādau tu tad icchā ādi apekṣa tvam vidyate eva iti yat kiñcid etat prāmāṇya niścayasya para adhīna tvam yat api prāmāṇya niśraye nairapekṣyam abhyadhāyi tat apina sāṃpratam prāmāṇya niścayasya hi dvayī gatiḥ nāstitvam kāraṇa apekṣitāḥ vā na punar asti ca prāmāṇya niścayaḥ kāraṇa anapekṣaḥ ca iti 
NM_3,1.445.1	 śakyate vaktum tatra prathama pravartaka pratibhāsa prasava samaye tāvat na asti eva prāmāṇya niścayaḥ iti uktam na hi nīla grāhiṇā pramāṇena nīla svarūpam iva sva prāmāṇyam api tadānīm niścetum śakyate iti kāla antare tad prāmāṇya niścayaḥ satyam asti na tu tatra nairapekṣyam pravṛtti sāmarthya adhīna tvāt tad niścayasya jñānānām asthira tve api prāmāṇyam paratograhītum śakyam 
NM_3,1.445.2	 nanu kṣaṇika tvāt kāla antare jñānam eva na asti kasya prāmāṇyaṃniścinumaḥ śiśu codyam etat aprāmāṇyam api bādhaka pratyaya ādinā kāla antare kasya niścinumaḥ kṣaṇika tvena jñānasya atīta tvāt atikrāntasya api smaryamāṇasya jñānasya tad utpādakasya vā āvartamānasya kāraka cakrasya iti ced prāmāṇya niścaye api samānaḥ ayaṃpanthāḥ prāmāṇyasya paratas grahaṇe api na anyonya āśraya ādiḥ 
NM_3,1.445.3	 yat punar kāla antare tad niścaya karaṇe dūṣaṇam itaretara āśraya tvaṃvā muṇḍita śiraḥ nakṣatra anveṣaṇa vat vaiyarthyam vā iti varṇitam tatra adṛṣṭe viṣaye prāmāṇya niścaya pūrvikāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ abhyupagamāt na itaretara āśrayam cakrakam vā dṛṣṭe viṣaye hi anirṇīta prāmāṇya eva artha saṃśayāt pravṛtti rūpam anartha saṃśayāt ca nivṛtti ātmakam vyavahāram ārabhamāṇa udṛśyate lokaḥ etat eva yuktam iti uktam na prāmāṇya niścaya purassaram pravartanam iti kutas ita retāra śrayam 
NM_3,1.446.1	 vaiyarthyam tu dṛṣṭe viṣaye satyam iṣyate kintu tatra pravṛtti sāmarthyena prāmāṇyam niścinvan āpta ukta tvasya hetoḥ prāmāṇyena vyāptim avagacchati iti adṛṣṭa viṣaya upayogi veda ādi pramāṇa prāmāṇya paricchede pāraṃparyeṇa upāya tvāt sva viṣaye vyarthaḥ api asau tatra sārthaka tām avalamba taitya doṣaḥ pravṛtti sāmarthyam nāma artha kriyā jñānam eva 
NM_3,1.446.2	 kim punar idam pravṛtti sāmarthyam nāma yatas prāmāṇya niścayam ācakṣatenaiyyāyikāḥ ucyate pūrva pratyaya apekṣā uttarā saṃvid pravṛtti sāmarthyam viśeṣa darśanam vā iti pūrva ācāryaiḥ tad svarūpam uktam tat punar nātīva hṛdayaṅgamam iti bhāṣya kṛtā eva samīhā pravṛttiḥ iti ucyate sāmarthyaṃpunar asyāḥ phalena abhisambandhaḥ iti vadatā artha kriyā ākhya phala jñānam eva pravṛtti sāmarthyam iti nirṇītam artha kriyā jñāne prāmāṇya gaveṣaṇam anapekṣitam 
NM_3,1.446.3–3,1.447.1	 yat punar artha kriyā jñānasya api pūrvasmāt kaḥ viśeṣaḥ tasya apicā anyatas prāmāṇya niścaya apekṣāyām anavasthā iti uktam tat api sakala prāṇabhṛt pratīti sākṣika vyavahāra virodhi tvāt asambaddha abhi dhānam aparīkṣaṇīya prāmāṇya tvāt artha kriyā jñānasya pravartakaṃ na sarva jñānam pravṛtti siddhaye parīkṣaṇīya prāmāṇyam vartate phala jñāne tusiddha prayojana tvāt prāmāṇya parīkṣā apekṣā eva na asti iti kutas anavasthā artha kriyā jñānasya sākṣāt anubhava rūpa tvena prāmāṇya niścaya anapekṣa tvam 
NM_3,1.447.2	 saṃśaya abhāvāt vā tad prāmāṇya vicāra abhāvaḥ pravartakam hi prathamam udaka jñānam avidyamāne api nīre mihira marīciṣu dṛṣṭam iti tatrasaṃśerate janāḥ artha kriyā jñānam tu salila madhyartinām bhavat tadavinābhūtam eva bhavati iti na tatra saṃśayaḥ tad abhāvāt na tatra prāmāṇya vicāraḥ vicārasya saṃśaya pūrvaka tvāt artha kriyā jñānam viśeṣa darśana rūpam ca 
NM_3,1.447.3	 viśeṣa darśanāt vā phala jñāne prāmāṇya niścayaḥ kaḥ punar ayam viśeṣa eti ced yaḥ ayam śauca ācamana majjana amara pitṛ tarpaṇa paṭa kṣālana śrama tāpa nodana vinodana ādi aneka prakāra nīra parya ālocana prabandhaḥ na hi ayam iyān kārya kalāpaḥ mithyājñānāt pravṛttasya kvacid api dṛṣṭaḥ svāpnikā artha kriyā jñānāt jāgrat artha kriyā jñānam vilakṣaṇam 
NM_3,1.447.4–3,1.448.1	 svapne api asya prabandhasya darśanam asti iti ced na svapna daśā visadṛśa vispaṣṭa jāgrat avasthā pratyayasya saṃvedya tvāt eṣaḥ asmi jāgarmi na svapimi iti svapna vilakṣaṇam anidrāyamāṇa mānasaḥ pratyakṣam eva jāgrat samayam sakalaḥ janaḥ cetayate na ca tasmin= avasaresalilam antareṇa etāḥ kriyāḥ pravartamānāḥ dṛśyante iti tad viśeṣa darśanāt su jñānam artha kriyā jñāna prāmāṇyam kāraṇa doṣa abhāvāt ca artha kriyā jñāne prāmāṇyam 
NM_3,1.448.2	 kāraṇa parīkṣātaḥ vā tasmin prāmāṇyam niśceṣyāmaḥ yathā uktaṃbhavadbhiḥ eva prayatnena anvicchantaḥ na ced doṣam avagacchema tad pramāṇa abhāvāt aduṣṭam iti manyemahi iti tathā hi viṣayasya cala tva sādṛśya ādi doṣa virahaḥ ālokasya malīm asatva ādi kāraṇa vaikalyam antaḥkaraṇasya nidrā ādya dūṣita tvam ātmanaḥ kṣudh prakopa ādi anākula tvam īkṣaṇa yugalasya timira paṭala ādi vikala tvam ityādi svayam ca kārya dvāreṇa para upadeśena ca sarvam su jñānam atas niravadya kāraṇa janya tvāt pramāṇam artha kriyā jñānam iti vidmaḥ prāthamika jñāne api kāraṇa doṣa abhāva niścaye prāmāṇyam gṛhyeta eva 
NM_3,1.448.3–3,1.449.1	 yadi evam prathame pravartakaḥ eva pratyaye kasmāt kāraṇa parīkṣā eva iyam nakriyate kimartham kriyā jñāne na āyuṣman ! ādye api jñānekāraṇa parīkṣāyām kriyamāṇāyām kaḥ pramādaḥ kim evam sati svatas prāmāṇyam siddhyati tava mama vā paratas prāmāṇyam apahīyate kintu lokaḥ pravartaka jñāna anantaram phala prāptim prati yathā sa udyamaḥ dṛśyate na tathā tad kāraṇa parīkṣām prati phala jñānam eva ittham parīkṣyate ādyasyahi jñānasya phala jñānāt eva prāmāṇya siddhiḥ kaḥ ca nāma nikaṭam upāyam upekṣya dūram gacchet iti! prakāra antareṇa prāthamika jñāne prāmāṇya niścaya upapādanam 
NM_3,1.449.2	 atha vā saṃśaya utpatti sāmarthyāt eva yathārtha itaratva niścayaḥ phala jñānena lapsyate saṃśayaḥ hi nāma dvaividhya darśanāt vinā na bhavati eva na hi sthāṇu puruṣa sāhacaryam ūrdhvata ākhyasya dharmasya yaḥ na jānāti sa tam dṛṣṭvā sthāṇuḥ vā syāt puruṣaḥ vā iti saṃśete evam ūrdhva tva vat vodha rūpa tvasya vyabhicāri tvā avyabhicāri tvābhyām saha darśanam avaśyam āśrayaṇīyam anyathā tad viṣaya saṃśaya anutpādāt atas pūrvam avyabhicāritva darśane siddhe yaḥ tadā tad pariccheda upāyaḥ sa paścāt apibhaviṣyati iti sarvathā siddhi atyavyabhicāri tva niścayaḥ 
NM_3,1.450.0–3,1.450.2	 aniścita prāmāṇyam api phala jñānam ādya jñāne prāmāṇya niścāyakam aniścita prāmāṇyāt api vā phala jñānāt pravartakasya prāmāṇya niścayaḥ yuktaḥ na tu svatas utpattau pramāṇa tad ābhāsayoḥ viśeṣa agrahaṇāt phala jñāne ca tad viśeṣa pratibhāsāt paratas prāmāṇye anavasthā doṣa parihāraḥ yat tu viśeṣa jñānam niścita prāmāṇyam aniścita prāmāṇyam vā iti vikalpya anavasthā pādanam apratipatti prahata tā kathanam vā tat dṛṣṭa viruddha tvāt pralāpa mātram iti alamalīkā ukta vikalpa kalāpa nirmathana udita durāma uda āsvādanena prāmāṇya aprāmāṇyayoḥ paratas tva upasaṃhāraḥ 
NM_3,1.450.3–3,1.450.4	 sthitam etat artha kriyā jñānāt prāmāṇya niścayaḥ iti tat idam uktam pramāṇataḥ artha pratipattau pravṛtti sāmarthyāt arthavat pramāṇam iti tasmāt aprāmāṇya vat prāmāṇyam api para apekṣam iti atas dvayam api paratas iti eṣa eva pakṣaḥ śreyān prāmāṇya grahaṇa viṣaye jaina mata pratikṣepaḥ yat tu kaścid prājña mānī vadati abhyaste viṣaye svatas prāmāṇyam anabhyaste tu paratas iti saḥ ayam abhyaste viṣaye iti ca bravīti 
NM_3,1.451.1	 svatas ca prāmāṇyam manyate iti svayam eva ātmānam vañcyamānam na cetayate abhyāsaḥ hi nāma punar punar prayogaḥ kriyāyāḥ abhyāvṛttiḥ viṣaya syaca abhyasta tā bhūyas bhūyas pravṛttiḥ atas ca sva śarīra grahe nija gṛha kuḍya stambha ādi pratibhāse vā sahasra kṛtvas pravṛtta saṃvāda jñāna janmanā prāmāṇya niścayaḥ uktaḥ bhavati svatas abhyasta tvam ca anyathā nabhavet iti yat kiñcid etat tasmāt paratas prāmāṇyam iti siddham prāmāṇya vicārasya anupayukta tva nirāsaḥ 
NM_3,1.451.2–3,1.451.5	 yat punar kaiścid codyate pramāṇānām na parīkṣaṇam upapadyate tat hi pramāṇaiḥ kriyeta apramāṇaiḥ vā pramāṇaiḥ api parīkṣitaiḥ aparīkṣitaiḥ vā tatra na nāma apramāṇaiḥ pramāṇa parīkṣaṇam śakya kriyam pramāṇaiḥ api aparīkṣitaiḥ tad karaṇe varam vyavahāraḥ eva tādṛśaiḥ kriyatām ! kim parīkṣaṇena parīkṣitaiḥ tu tad parīkṣā karaṇam aparyavasitam anavasthā prasaṅgāt ityādi 
NM_3,1.451.6–3,1.451.7	 tat api uktena nyāyena parihṛtam bhavati dṛṣṭe viṣaye pramāṇa parīkṣāṃvinā eva vyavahārāt adṛṣṭe tu parīkṣāyāḥ avaśya kartavya tvāt upapatteḥ ca iti tasmāt adṛṣṭa puruṣa artha pada upadeśi mānam manīṣi bhiḥ avaśya parīkṣaṇīyam prāmāṇyam asya paratas niraṇāyi ceti cetaḥ pramāthibhiḥ alam kuvikalpa jālaiḥ akhyāti sādhana upakramaḥ su śikṣitāḥ tu ācakṣate yuktam yat amī mīmāṃsaka pāśāḥ kāśa kusuma ra āśayaḥ iva śaradi marudbhiḥ ati dūrāt samutsāryante duṣṭa tārkikaiḥ 
NM_3,1.452.1	 ye hi kila abhyupayanti ca viparīta khyāti vādam akṛta astrāḥ prāmāṇyaṃca svatas iti ca vadanti teṣām kutas kauśalam viparīta khyātau= abhyupagamyamānāyām bādhya bodha sandarbha subhikṣe sati tat sādharmyāt anutpanna bādhake api bodhe duṣpariharaḥ saṃśayaḥ saṃśaye ca saṃvāda ādi anveṣaṇam api dhruvam avatarati iti paratas prāmāṇyam anivāryam bādhyasya jñānasya eva anaṅgīkāre tu prāmāṇyam svatas eva syāt 
NM_3,1.452.2–3,1.452.3	 yadā tu na bādhyaḥ nāma jagati kaścid api bodhaḥ tadā kiṃsādharmyāt saṃśeratām pramātāraḥ asaṃśayānāḥ ca kim iti param apekṣantām anapekṣamāṇāḥ katham paratas prāmāṇyam pratipadyantām iti niścalam svatas eva prāmāṇyam avatiṣṭhate katham punar bādhyaḥ nāma na asti bodhaḥ śukikā ādau rajata ādi pratyayāḥ prācuryeṇa bādhyamānāḥ dṛśyante anabhijñaḥ bhavān bādhasya na hi tebādhyāḥ pratyayāḥ bādha padārthaḥ 
NM_3,1.452.4–3,1.453.2	 idam hi nirūpapyatām kaḥ iva uttara jñānena pūrva jñānasya bādhaḥ bādha artham eva na vidmaḥ yadi tāvat nāśaḥ eva bādhaḥ sa na teṣām eva buddheḥ buddhi antarāt virodhaḥ iti sakala bodha sādhāraṇa tvāt atha saha anavasthānam tat api samānam abādhitānām apijñānānām saha avasthāna asaṃbhavāt atha saṃskāra ucchedaḥ bādhaḥ saḥ api tādṛś eva saṃyak pratyaya upajanita saṃskārasya api uccheda darśanāt kaścid bhavat abhimata bādhya bodhā ahitaḥ api saṃskāraḥ sati api bādhaka pratyaye na ucchedam upagacchati kāla antare tad kāraṇaka tad viṣaya smaraṇa darśanāt 
NM_3,1.453.3–3,1.453.4	 atha viṣaya apahāraḥ bādhaḥ saḥ api durghaṭaḥ pratibhāta tvena viṣayasya apahartum aśakyatvāt na hi bādhakam jñānam ittham uttiṣṭhati yat pratibhātam tat na pratibhātam iti atha tad abhāva grahaḥ bādhaḥ sa tātkālikaḥ kāla antara bhāvī vā kāla antara bhāvi tadabhāva grahaṇasya bādhaka tve prāc avagata mudgara dalita ghaṭa abhāva grāhiṇaḥ api vijñānasya tad bādhaka tva prasaṅgaḥ tadā eva tu tad abhāva grahaṇe pratyaya dvaya samarpita rūpa dvitaya yogāt ubhaya ātmakam eva tat astuvaḥ tu ! kim kasya bādhyam bādhakam vā 
NM_3,1.453.5–3,1.453.6	 atha phala apahāraḥ bādhaḥ saḥ api na saṃbhavati saṃvidaḥ pramāṇa phalasya utpanna tvena anapaharaṇīya tvāt na hi yat utpannam tat anutpannam itivadati bādhakaḥ atha hāna ādi phalā apahāraḥ bādhaḥ na tasya pramāṇa phala tva abhāvāt hāna ādi vyavahāraḥ hi puruṣa icchā nibandhanaḥ na tena apahṛtena api pramāṇam bādhitam bhavet 
NM_3,1.453.7–3,1.454.1	 tasmāt na bādhaḥ nāma kaścid prakāra antareṇa api bādhya jñāna asaṃbhava upapādanam itas ca na asti sa hi samāna viṣayayoḥ vā jñānayoḥ iṣyate bhinna viṣayayoḥ vā na samāna viṣayayoḥ dhārāvāhi jñāneṣu adṛṣṭa tvāt na api bhinna viṣayayoḥ stambha kumbha upalambhayoḥ tad anupalambhāt yadica uttareṇa jñānena pūrva jñāna gṛhītāt arthāt arthaḥ anyaḥ idānīm gṛhītaḥ tat pūrva jñānam kim iti bādhitam ucyate 
NM_3,1.454.2–3,1.454.3	 api ca pūrvasmin pratyaye prāpta pratiṣṭhe sati āgantuḥ uttaraḥ pratyayaḥ bādhitum yuktaḥ na pūrvaḥ na ca evam dṛśyate tasmāt na bādhyam nāma vijñānam asti tad abhāvāt na tad sādharmya nibandhanaḥ saṃśayaḥ tad abhāvāt saṃvāda ādi ananveṣaṇāt na paratas prāmāṇyam akhyāti avatāraḥ nanu ! evam bādhe nirākriyamāṇe kim amī śuktikāra jata ādi grāhiṇaḥ viparīta pratyayāḥ abādhitāḥ eva asatām  āḥ kumate !nāmī viparīta pratyayāḥ na hi īdṛśānām viparyayāṇām utpattau kim apikāraṇam utpaśyāmaḥ 
NM_3,1.455.1–3,1.455.2	 na tāvat indriyam evaṃvidha bodha vidhāyi bhavitum arhati sarvadā tad utpāda prasaṅgāt na api doṣa kaluṣitam duṣṭam hi kāraṇam sva kārya karaṇaḥ eva kuṇṭhita śakti jātam iti tat eva mā jījanat viparīta kārya karaṇasya kiṃvartate na hi duṣṭāni śāli bījāni yava aṅkura karaṇa kauśala bhava lamberan tasmāt kāraṇa abhāvāt api na viparīta pratyayāḥ te bhrama sthale jñāna dvayam eva na ekam jñānam 
NM_3,1.455.3	 tat kim samyak pratyayaḥ eva śuktikāyām rajata pratibhāsaḥ  ayimūḍhaḥ ! na ayam ekaḥ pratyayaḥ idam rajatam iti kintu dve ete grahaṇa smaraṇe idam iti puras avasthita bhāsvara ākāra dharmi pratibhāsaḥ rajatam iti tu bhāsvara rūpa darśana prabodhyamāna saṃskāra kāraṇakam tad sāhacaryāt avagata rajata smaraṇam bhrama sthale dharma jñānasya smṛti rūpa tve yuktiḥ 
NM_3,1.455.4–3,1.456.1	 atas ca idam smaraṇam yatas prāk anavagata rajatasya na jāyate vidita rajatasya api rajanyām anyadā vā sādṛśya darśanāt vinā na bhavati iti dharma smaraṇasya smṛti tvena khyātiḥ na asti smaraṇam api bhavat idam ātmānam tathā na prakaṭayati iti pramuṣitam ucyate sva rūpeṇa ca apratibhāsamānāyām smṛtau= anubhava smaraṇayoḥ vivekaḥ na gṛhītaḥ bhavati iti agrahaṇam akhyātiḥ ucyate bhrama sthale vādi vipratipattayaḥ tathā hi bhrānta bodheṣu prasphurat vastu saṃbhavāt catuṣprakārāḥ vimatiḥ udapadyata vādinām 
NM_3,1.456.2–3,1.456.3	 viparīta khyātiḥ asat khyātiḥ ātma khyātiḥ akhyātiḥ iti anyathā ākhyāteḥ asat khyātau= eva paryavasāna upapādana upakramaḥ tatra viparīta khyātiḥ tāvat kāraṇa abhāvāt eva nirastāḥ api ca viparīta khyātau trayī gatiḥ rajatam vā anya deśa kālam atra ālambanam śuktikā vā nigūhita nija ākārā satī parigṛhīta rajata ākārā ca athavā anyat ālambanam anyat ca pratibhāti śukti rajata jñānam na rajata viṣayakam 
NM_3,1.456.4–3,1.457.1	 tatra yadi rajatam ālambanam tat iyam asat khyātiḥ eva na viparīta khyātiḥ asataḥ tatra rajatasya pratibhāsāt atha anya deśa kālam tat asti eva iti abhidhīyate iha asat nihitasya asya tena sattvena kaḥ guṇaḥ  api ca deśa kālau= api kim santau pratibhāsete uta āsantau iti yadi santau tarhi tad deśa kālam eva idam rajatam avabhātam iti na bhrāntiḥ eṣā syāt asantau tu ubhau= api rajata vat na ālambanam bhavitum arhataḥ smṛti ākhya sannikarṣeṇa eva rajata bhānam tu na saṃbhavati 
NM_3,1.457.2	 atha smṛti ārūḍham rajatam asyām pratītau parisphurati iti ucyate tarhi smṛti upārūḍham iti kaḥ arthaḥ smaraṇam api jñānam eva tat api katham asat artha viṣayam syāt smṛteḥ anartha ja tvam eva svarūpam iti ced astu kāmam ! tad sāmānyāt atra api evam prayogaḥ iti etat api tāvat na brūmaḥ tathā tu anartha janyayā smṛtyā saḥ arthaḥ katham iha sannidhāpayitum pāryate sā hi na spṛśati evā artham tasmāt asat nihita rajata ālambanā viparīta khyātiḥ asat khyāteḥ na viśiṣyate eva śukti rajata jñānam na śukti viṣayakam 
NM_3,1.457.3	 atha sthagita nija vapuḥ uṣa gṛhīta rajata rūpā śuktikā atra prakāśa tā eti na iyam asat khyātiḥ ucyate tat idam apūrvam kim api nāṭakam iyam asmin kṛtyā sītā pravṛttā iti tathā hi kim atra śuktiḥ iti pratītiḥ uta rajatam iti śuktikā pratītau tu śuktau śuktiḥ eva pratīyate na rajatam iti bhrama arthaḥkaḥ rajata pratītau tu śuktiḥ asau= iti atra kim 
NM_3,1.458.1	 pramāṇam bādhaka pratyayāt evam avagatam iti ced mā evam na hijñāna antareṇa asyāḥ pratīteḥ viṣayaḥ vyavasthāpayitum yuktaḥ bādhakena hijñānena pūrva jñāna gṛhītasya vastunaḥ asattvam nāma khyāpyatām na tu tasya viṣayaḥ nirūpyate anarthi tvāt vā kadācid apravṛttasya puṃsaḥ bādhaka anutpattau vā kaḥ asyāḥ pratīteḥ viṣayam vyavasthāpayiṣyati tasmāt yat eva asyām cakāsti tat eva rajatam asyāḥ viṣayaḥ iti yuktam vaktum śuktiḥ tu nigūhita nija vapuḥ iti durvidagdha vācaḥ yuktiḥ iyam śuktiḥ viṣayaḥ rajatasya pratītiḥ iti tu upahāsyamye tu ālambana tām śukteḥ rajatasya avabhāsanam vadanti asmin bhrama jñāne teṣām atitarām bhramaḥ na hi ālambanatā yuktā sannidhāna nibandhanāḥ tatra eva bhū pradeśasya tathā abhāva prasaṅgataḥ tat eva ālambanam buddheḥ yat asyām avabhāsate anyat ālambanam ca anyat bhāti iti bhaṇitiḥ na vā  atas rajatam eva etat buddhi grāhyam asat ca tat evam viparyaya khyātiḥ asat khyāteḥ na bhidyate asat khyāti nirāsaḥ 
NM_3,1.458.2–3,1.459.1	 tat kim asat khyātiḥ eva sādhīyasī tām eva abhyupagacchāmaḥ  mā evam sā api na upapadyate eva asat khyātiḥ iti kaḥ arthaḥ kim ekānta asataḥ eva arthasya prathamam atha deśa antara ādau vidyamānasya iti uttarasmin pakṣe viparīta khyātiḥ eva eṣā paraiḥ api tatra rajatasya satvān abhyu pagamāt deśa antara ādau tu tad sattāyāḥ tvayā api pratipanna tvāt ekānta asataḥ tu asya khyātiḥ iti na peśalam ākāśa nalinī pallava ādeḥ apratibhāsanāt vāsanā abhyāsāt asatām api pratibhāsā bhaviṣyanti iti ced na artham antareṇa vāsanāyāḥ api anupapatteḥ artha anubhava samāhitaḥ hi saṃskāraḥ vāsanā kathyate sā katham asat artha pratibhāsa hetuḥ syāt 
NM_3,1.459.2–3,1.460.1	 bhavatu anyā vā bhavat abhimatā kācana vāsanā sā api tu asattva aviśeṣe kim iti rajata matim upajanayati na gagana nalina pratītim iti kutastyaḥ niyamaḥ tad alam anayā! na atyantam asataḥ arthasya sāmarthyam avakalpate vyavahāra dhuram vā udumiyatīm anupaplutām api ca sattvena pratibhāti iti asat khyātiḥ api na viparīta khyātim ativartate ātma khyāti upapādanam tasmāt varam ātma khyātiḥ astu vijñānam eva khalu etat gṛhṇāti ātmānam ātmanā bahis nirūpyamāṇasya grāhyasya anupapattitaḥ buddhiḥ prakāśamānā ca tena tena ātmanā bahis udvahati artha śūnyāṃpi lokayātrām iha īdṛśīm ātma khyāti nirāsaḥ 
NM_3,1.460.2	 ucyate na ātma khyātiḥ api yuktimatī vijñāna ātmanaḥ hi pratibhāsā iaham rajatam iti pratītiḥ syāt na idam rajatam iti kiñca yad antar jñeya rūpam hi vahiḥ vat avabhāsate iti abhyupagamāt iyam api viparīta khyātiḥ eva syāt asat khyātiḥ api ca iyaṃbhavati eva bahis buddheḥ asattvāt buddhiḥ asti eva iti ced bahiṣṭvam tarhi cintyam sat asat vā iti na tāvat sat buddheḥ bāhya tva abhāvāt asattve tu asat khyātiḥ iti uktam tasmāt khyāti traye api asmin anyaḥ anya anupraveśini yuktyā virudhyamāne ca śreyasya khyātiḥ eva sā akhyātiḥ sarvaiḥ vādibhiḥ apratyākhyeyā 
NM_3,1.460.3–3,1.462.0	 khyāti traya vādibhiḥ api ca iyam apratyākhyeyā nūnam akhyātiḥ ātma khyātau tāvat ātma tayā vijñānasya khyātiḥ na asti viccheda pratibhāsāt iti ukta tvāt asat khyātau= api asattvam arthasya na eva pratibhāsate pravṛtti ādi vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt viparīta khyātau= api rajatasya sannihitasya jñāna janaka tvam ajanakasya ca pratibhāsaḥ neṣyate eva atas tatra rajata smṛti upasthāpitam rajatam avagati janakam upagatam atas ca rajata smṛtiḥ aparihāryā sā ca rajata smṛtiḥ na tadā svena rūpeṇa prakāśate smarāmi iti pratyaya abhāvāt tasmāt pramuṣitām enām smṛtim icchanti tārkikāḥ abhyaste viṣaye liṅga pratibandha smṛtim yathā saḥ ayam smṛti pramoṣaḥ tattva agrahaṇam akhyātiḥ ucyate evam satīyam akhyātiḥ iṣyate sarva vādimiḥ tathā prakaṭayadbhiḥ tu pītam prābhākaraiḥ yaśaḥ akhyāti padārthaḥ 
NM_3,1.462.1	 nanu ! rajatam iti smṛteḥ svarūpa ullekhaḥ mā bhūt ! idam iti atra puraḥ avasthita dharmi pratibhāsāt katham akhyātiḥ ucyate napuraḥ avasthita dharmaḥ śuktikā iyam iti spaṣṭa tayā gṛhyate tathā ca abhyupagamebhrama abhāva prasaṅgāt kintu tejasvita ādi viparītam dharmi mātram avabhāsate dharma sārūpyāt ca tadānīm rajatam smaryate te ete grahaṇa smaraṇevivikte api vivikta tayā na gṛhyete iti viveka agrahaṇa makhyātiḥ na tu sarveṇa sarva ātmanā apratipattiḥ eva vyadhikaraṇayoḥ ca grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ vaiyadhi karaṇyam ced na gṛhītam kim anyat astu sāmānādhikaraṇyam  na tu yat eva idam tat eva rajatam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena grahaṇam asti sā hi viparīta khyātiḥ eva syāt vaiyyadhi karaṇyā anupagrahādeva pramātuḥ pravṛttiḥ avivekāt sādhāraṇya abhimānena pravṛttiḥ iti phalataiyam vācoyuktiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyena kecid tad pṛṣṭha bhāvinam parāmarśam api icchanti tat na śraddadhmahe vayam akhyāti pakṣaḥ evam hi hīyeta eka tva vedanāt vakraiḥ ca vitatha ākhyātiḥ akṣaraiḥ kathitā bhavet 
NM_3,1.463.0–3,1.463.1	 akhyāti pakṣe bādhaka jñāna kṛtyam nanu ! evam akhyāti pakṣe pratiṣṭhāpyamāne na idam rajatam iti pūrva avagata rajata pratiṣedha bodhī bādhaka pratyayaḥ dṛśyamānaḥ katham samarthayiṣyate apratīti jñaḥ devānām priyaḥ na hi anena rajata niṣedhaḥ vidhīyate kintu prāgagṛhītaḥ vivekaḥ prakhyāpyate na idam rajatam yat eva idam tat eva rajatam iti etat na idam idam rajatam iti 
NM_3,1.463.2–3,1.463.5	 etat uktam bhavati idam anyat rajatam anyat iti saḥ ayam vivekaḥ khyāpitaḥ bhavati svāpna anubhavasya api grahaṇa smaraṇa ātmaka tvam nanu ! evam idam rajatam ityādau smaraṇa anubhavayoḥ bhavatu viveka agrahaṇam svapne tu katham etat bhaviṣyati bhīraḥ ! kim jātam svapne vivekena na gṛhyete smaraṇa anubhavau kvacid svapne tu smṛtiḥ eva ekā tathātvena na gṛhyate sadṛśa darśanāt vinā smṛtiḥ eva kutastyeti ced na nānā kāraṇaka tvāt smaraṇasya nidrā kaṣāyitam api antaḥkaraṇam smaraṇa kāraṇam bhavati eva dvi candra bhrama ādīnām api akhyāti rūpa tvam yadi evam dvi candra tikta śarkarā ādi pratyayeṣu katham smṛti pramoṣaḥ āḥ kuṇḍaśekharaḥ ! katham asakṛt abhihitam api na budhyase 
NM_3,1.464.0	 na sarvatra smṛteḥ eva pramoṣaḥ abhyupagamyate kintva khyātiḥ atas ca asau kathañcitkasya cit kvacid bhavati anubhava smṛtyoḥ viveka agrahaṇam kvacid kvacid tu smaryamāṇasya tathā tvena anupagrahaḥ dvidhā kṛtā kvacid vṛttiḥ netrasya timira ādinā na hi grahītum aikyena śaknoti śiśira tviṣam kvacid rasana saṃpṛkte pitte tikta tva vedanāt paricchettum na śaknoti mādhuryam śarkarā gatam gṛhṇāti yat tu tikta tvam vastutas pitta varti tat tathā tu na vijānāti nigiran= eṣa śarkarām 
NM_3,1.464.1–3,1.465.0	 etena pīta śaṅkha ādi khyātayaḥ api vyākhyātāḥ akhyāti vāda upasaṃhāraḥ tad prayojana kathanenata devam sati sarvatra samyak agrahaṇam bhramaḥ na mithyā pratyayaḥ kaścid asti śaṅkā nibandhanam ajāta mithyā āśaṅkaḥ ca na saṃvādam apekṣate tasmāt na kaścid paratas prāmāṇyam adhigacchati evam svatas pramāṇa tve siddhe vede api sā gatiḥ aṃpavāda dvaya abhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ ca atra pūrvavat akhyāti nirākaraṇam śukti rajata jñānam na jñāna dvaya rūpam 
NM_3,1.465.1	 atra pratividhīyate yat uktam idam rajata miti smaraṇa anubhava svabhāve vivekena āgṛhyamāṇe dve ete jñāne iti tat asāṃpratam pratyabhijñāvat eka tvena eva saṃvedyamāna tvāt yat eva idam puras avasthitaṃbhāsvara rūpa ādi adhikaraṇam dharmi sāmānyam tat eva rajatam iti viśeṣataḥ pratipādyate yat idam agratas sthitam tat rajatam iti satya rajata pratīti vat anubhūta tayā hi na rajatam atra prakāśate kintu anubhūyamāna tayā anubhūta tā grahaṇam ca smaraṇam ucyate na anubhūyamāna tā grahaṇam akhyātiḥ api viparīta khyātau paryavasyati 
NM_3,1.465.2–3,1.465.3	 sva prakāśā ca saṃvittiḥ iti bhavatām darśanam tatra eṣām rajata saṃvittiḥ kena rūpeṇa prakāśa tām iti cintyam yadi smaraṇa ātmanā kaḥ pramoṣa arthaḥ atha anubhava ātmanā tat iyam viparīta khyātiḥ eva smṛteḥ anubhava tvena śukteḥ iva rajata tvena pratibhāsāt akhyātiḥ durupapādā ca atha saṃvid mātra tayā eva prakāśate tat api na yuktam rajata viṣaya ullekhāt smaraṇa anubhava viśeṣa rahitāyāḥ ca viṣaya saṃvitteḥ anupapatteḥ na ca iyam apratipattiḥ eva iti vaktum ucitam mada mūrchā ādi daśa avisadṛśa sva prakāśa saṃvedana anubhavāt yathā idam iti aṃśe sva prakāśaṃsaṃvedanam tathā eva rajatam iti atra api idam aṃśasya pratyakṣa tvam rajata aṃśasya smṛti tvam ca durvacam 
NM_3,1.466.2	 api ca dvayoḥ ca aṃśayoḥ samāne saṃvedane tatra ekam pratyakṣa labdham aparam smaraṇa phalam iti kutastyaḥ vibhāgaḥ idam iti atra ca kim avabhāsate iti nirūpyatām yadi śuktikā śakalam sakala svagata viśeṣa khacitam avabhāti tadā tad darśane sati rajata smaraṇasyakaḥ avasaraḥ bhavat api vā sādṛśya kṛtam smaraṇam na tad avivekāya kalpate devadatta darśana anantara udgata tad sadṛśa puruṣa antara smaraṇa vat 
NM_3,1.466.3	 atha dharmi mātram idam iti pratyaye pratibhāti na śukti śakalam tat vāḍham iṣyate tat eva ca idam sāmānya dharma grahaṇa vaśa viruddha saṃskāra upanibandhana viruddha viśeṣa smaraṇa kāraṇakam idam rajatam iti sāmānya upakrameviśeṣa paryavasānam jñānam yat idam tat rajatam iti sāmānādhikaraṇya avamarśāt rajata anubhava abhimānena eva ca rajata arthī tatra pravartate akhyātivādaḥ bauddha matamūlakaḥ 
NM_3,1.466.4–3,1.467.1	 nanu ! smaraṇa anubhavayoḥ vivekam apratipadyamānaḥ pravartate iti uktam śrutam idam yat atra bhavadbhiḥ dharma kīrti gṛhāt āhṛtam dṛśya vikalpau= arthau= ekīkṛtya pravartate iti kiñca cauryam api idam na kathañcana sva artham puṣṇāti yāvat hidṛśyam gṛhītam iti na jātaḥ pratyayaḥ tāvat katham dṛśya arthinaḥ tatrapravṛttiḥ evam iha api yāvat rajatam gṛhītam iti na jātaḥ pratyayaḥ tāvat kutas tad arthinām pravṛttiḥ tasmāt asti rajata grahaṇam na tu tad smaraṇa pramoṣa mātram rajata smaraṇam ca rajata tayā grahaṇa artham apekṣitam 
NM_3,1.467.2	 nanu ! rajata smaraṇam viparīta khyāti vādibhiḥ api aṅgīkṛtam iti uktam satyam rajata gata viśeṣa smaraṇam abhyupagatam yathā hi puras avasthitedharmiṇī ūrdhva tva ādi sādhāraṇa dharma grahaṇāt sthāṇu puruṣa gata viśeṣa agrahaṇāt ubhaya viśeṣa smṛteḥ saṃśayaḥ bhavati evam iha api tejasvi ta ādi sāmānya dharma grahaṇāt viśeṣa agrahaṇāt rajata gata viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca tasmin dharmiṇi rajata pratyayaḥ bhavati viparyaya ātmakaḥ saṃśaye hi ubhaya viśeṣa smaraṇam kāraṇam iha tu anyatara viśeṣa smaraṇam iti viśeṣaḥ atas eva ca agṛhīta rajatasya idam jñānam na utpadyate sadṛśa agrahaṇe vā niśītha ādau= iti rajata smaraṇa mātrāt na śukti rajata pratītiḥ
