NM_3,1.467.3–3,1.468.2	 na tu etāvatā smaraṇa mātram eva idam itīyati sthātavyam smaraṇa janyasya viparyaya pratyayasya api saṃvedanāt atas eva tad pṛṣṭha bhā vi parāmarśa vādinaḥ varam satya vācaḥ te hi pratibhāsam na nihnuvate anyathā ākhyātau kāraṇa upapādanam yat tu viparyaya avagateḥ kāraṇam vikalpitam tatra uktam eva prāmāṇikaiḥ kāryam ced avagamyeta kim kāraṇa parīkṣayā kāryam ced na avagamyeta kim kāraṇa parīkṣayā iti kārya akasmika tā anupapatteḥ ca kalpyatām kāraṇam ! tat ca kptam eva doṣa sahitam indriyam yathā saṃskāra sahakāri pratyabhijñāyām iti duṣṭam indriyam eva bhrama kāraṇam suvate śālayaḥ duṣṭā na yadi api yava aṅkuram śāli kāryam tu apūpa ādi janayanti eva kalmaṣam 
NM_3,1.468.3–3,1.469.0	 tasmāt doṣa kalitāt indriyāt puras avasthita dharmi gata trikoṇa tva ādi viśeṣa avamarśa kauśala śūnyāt sāmānya dharma sahacarita padārtha antara gata viśeṣa smaraṇa upakṛtāt bhavati viparīta pratyayaḥ samyat jñāna apekṣayā āca tat duṣṭam ucyate sva kārye tu viparyaya jñāne tad kāraṇam eva na duṣṭam tasmāt rajatam iti anubhavaḥ eva na pramuṣita smṛtiḥ bādha svarūpa paryālocanayā śukti rajata bhrame rajata bhānā upapādanam 
NM_3,1.469.1	 api ca na idam rajatam iti bādhaka jñānam pūrva anubhava viṣayīkṛta rajata niṣedham adhigamayat utpadyate na idam rajatam iti yat aham adrākṣam tat rajataṃna bhavati iti prasaktasya ca ayam niṣedhaḥ ananubhūtam tu aprasaktam api pratiṣidhyamānam rajatam iva kanakam api kim iti na pratiṣidhyate akhyātavādyuktasya bādha jñāna kṛtyasya nirasanam 
NM_3,1.469.2	 yat tu vyākhyātam prāc anavagata smaraṇa anubhava viveka pratipādakam bādhaka jñānam iti tat vyākhyāna mātram eva tathā ananubhavāt na hi evam bādhakam utpadyateyat aviviktam tat viviktam iti atas yat kiñcid etat tasmāt na rajata smaraṇam rajate vā kadācid anubhavaḥ abhūt iti smaraṇam abhidhīyamānam na atyantam alaukikam svapna anubhavasya akhyāti rūpa tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.469.3–3,1.469.4	 svapne tu sva śira= cheda ādeḥ atyantān anubhūtasya smṛtiḥ iti kathyamānam eva trapākaram janma antare nijam asta kalavanam anubhūtam anena iti ced idam api subhāṣitataram yat janma antara anubhūtam smaryate tatra ca kutastyaḥ eṣa niyamaḥ yat kadācid eva smaryate na sarvadā sarvam iti svapnaḥ api na asat viṣayakaḥ nanu ! bhavatā api asat khyātim nirasyatā svapna jñāneṣu tādṛkṣukim vaktam yat vaktavyam tat tatra eva śroṣyasi asanna pratibhātī iti ucyate na tu ananubhūtam iti 
NM_3,1.470.0–3,1.470.1	 svena ananubhūtasya api vastunaḥ sattvam yuktam eva nanu ! ananubhūtam sat katham jānīṣe sat iti ced jñānam tad anubhūtam iti mā evam mayā tat na anubhūtam anyena anubhaviṣyate para anubhūtam ca sat iti śakyate vaktum para anubhūte tu smaraṇam aghaṭamānam itināvayoḥ atra vastuni samāna yogakṣema tvam svapnasya viparīta khyāti rūpa tvam anivāryam 
NM_3,1.470.2	 api ca bhavat mate svapna smṛteḥ smṛti tvena agrahaṇe kena rūpeṇa grahaṇam iti cintyam rūpa antareṇa grahaṇe viparīta khyātiḥ sarva ātmanā tu agrahaṇe svapna suṣuptyoḥ avi śeṣa prasaṅgaḥ anubhava pratyayaḥ ca svapne saṃvedyate na smaraṇa anullekha mātram iti durabhi niveśaḥ eva smṛti pramoṣa samarthanam nāma iti dvi candra jñāna ādīnām akhyāti rūpa tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.470.3–3,1.470.5	 dvi candra ādi pratyayeṣu katham akhyātiḥ nanu ! uktam timira sīmanti tā nayana vṛttiḥ eka tvena gṛhītum na śaknoti śaśāṅkam iti bhoḥ śrotriya ! tādṛśī dṛśaḥ vṛttiḥ eka tvam indoḥ mā grahīt dvi tva anubhavam tu bhāntam kva pracchādayāmaḥ nanu cakṣuḥ vṛttau tad dvi tvam tad gata tvena tu yat tasya agrahaṇam saḥ eva bhramaḥ na etat evam netra vṛtteḥ sarvatra parokṣa tvāt kim eka candra bodhe api vṛtti eka tvam pratīyate iyam hi agṛhyamāṇā eva cakṣuḥ vṛttiḥ prakāśikāḥ 
NM_3,1.471.1–3,1.471.2	 evam ucyamāne ca eka candra grahaṇe api vṛtti ekatva agrahaṇāt akhyātiḥ eva bhavet tikta śarkarā pratyayasya api akhyāti rūpa tva asaṃbhavaḥ yat api tiktaśarkarā ādi pratyayeṣu akhyāti samarthana ka dā āśayā pitta vṛtteḥ tikta tvasya saṃvedyamānasya tad sthatvena agrahaṇam upavarṇitam tad api kuśa kāśa avalambana prāyam mohāt pitta gata tvena tikta tā ced na gṛhyate mā grāhi śarkarāyām tu kiṃkṛtā tikta tā matiḥ  
NM_3,1.471.3	 sāmānādhikaraṇyena hi tiktā śarkarā iti tad adhikaraṇa atikta tā pratītiḥ upajāyate pittam tu indriya stham timira vat agṛhyamāṇam api bhramam upajanayati śarīra stham iva jvaram śiraḥ arti ādi rogam iti alam prasaṅgena akhyāti sādhana mātreṇa na svatas prāmāṇya siddhiḥ evam sarvatra na akhyātiḥ nirvahanti iva lakṣyate na ca etayā api paratas prāmāṇyam upahanyate rajate anubhavaḥ kim syāt uta pramuṣitā matiḥ dvaividhya darśanāt evam bhavet tatra api saṃśayaḥ 
NM_3,1.472.0	 saṃśayānaḥ ca saṃvādam nūnam anveṣate janaḥ tad apekṣā akṛtam tasmāt prāmāṇyam paratas dhruvam śūnya vāda nirāsāya sarveṣām jñānānām yathārtha tvam na vaktavyam na ca eṣa śūnya vādasya pratīkāra kriyā kramaḥ anartha jā hi nirdagdha pitṛ ādau bhavati smṛtiḥ dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya tām eva śūnya vādī samutthitaḥ bhrama apahnava mātreṇa pratihantum na śakyate evam paratas prāmāṇya khaṇḍanena śūnya vādi nirāsaḥ na bhavatiatha asti kācid paratas prāmāṇyasya niṣedhikāḥ śūnya vādasya yā yuktiḥ sā eva vācyā kim etayā  tasmāt yathārtham asyāḥ saṃśrayaṇam tat na niṣiddham akhyāteḥ saṃvid virodhaḥ eva prakaṭitaḥ iti dhik pramādi tvam 
NM_3,1.472.1–3,1.472.2	 tat uktam kṛtaḥ ca śīla vidhvaṃsaḥ na ca anaṅgaḥ ca saṅgataḥ ātmā ca lāghavam nītaḥ tat ca kāryam na sādhitam iti anyathā ākhyāteḥ asat khyātau= aparyavasānam yat punar viparīta khyātau pakṣa trayam āśaṅkya dūṣitam tat api na yuktam astu tāvat ayam eva ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ rajatam ālambanam tat eva ca asyām pratītau parisphurati iti 
NM_3,1.473.1	 nanu ! atra coditam asat khyātiḥ eva sā bhavet iti na etat sādhu deśa antara ādau rajatasya vidyamāna tvāt asat khyāti pakṣe hi ekānta asataḥ arthasya pratibhānam aṅgīkriyate iha tu deśa antara ādau vidyamānasya iti mahān bhedaḥ nanu ! tatra asataḥ arthasya kim deśa antara cintayā kim kurmaḥ tādṛśasya eva vastunaḥ khyāti darśanāt yaḥ tu deśa antare api arthaḥ na asti kāla antare api vā na tasya grahaṇam dṛṣṭam gagana indīvara ādi vat 
NM_3,1.473.2–3,1.473.4	 ayam eva ca dvayoḥ asattvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ yat ekasya grahaṇam dṛṣṭam itarasya na dṛṣṭam iti tatra asataḥ api bhāna saṃbhava upapādanam nanu ! uktam tatra asataḥ arthasya katham jñāna janaka tvam ajanakasya vā katham pratibhāsaḥ uktam atra sadṛśa padārtha darśana udbhūta smṛti upasthāpitasya rajatasya atra pratibhāsanam iti na ca asya upasthāpanam paśoḥ iva rajvā saṃyamya ḍhaukanam api tu hṛdaye parisphurataḥ arthasya bahis avabhāsanam na ca etāvatā iyam ātma khyātiḥ asat khyātiḥ vā iti vaktavyam vijñāna ātu iccheda pratīteḥ atyanta asad artha pratibhāsā bhāvāt ca iti śukti rajata bhrame śukteḥ ālambana tve api na kṣatiḥ 
NM_3,1.473.5–3,1.474.1	 athavā pihita sva ākārā parigṛhīta parākārā śuktikā eva atra pratibhāti iti bhavatu dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ nanu ! uktam kṛtyā sītā vat kim idam veśa bhāṣā parivartanam katham ca rajata jñāne śuktikā avabhāsitum arhati iti śrutam idam nāṭakam na tu vayam atra upahāsa pātram śuktikā iti vastu sthitiḥ eṣā kathyate puras avasthitam dharmi mātram bhāsvara rūpa ādi sādṛśya upajanita rajata viśeṣa smaraṇam atra pratibhāti iti brūmaḥ yat etat puraḥkim api vartate tat rajatam iti anubhavāt vastu sthityā tu śuktiḥ evasā trikoṇa tva ādi viśeṣa grahaṇa abhāvāt ca nigūhita nija ākārā iti ucyate rajata viśeṣa smaraṇāt ca parigṛhīta rajata ākāra iti bhramat vaividhyam 
NM_3,1.474.2	 etat ca viṣaya indriya ādi doṣa prabhaveṣu śuktikā rajata avabhāsa bhāskara kiraṇa jala avagama jalada gandharvanagara nirvarṇana rajju bhujaga grahaṇa rohiṇī ramaṇa dvaya darśana śaṅkha śarkarā pīta tikta tāvasāya keśa kūrcaka ālokana ādi vibhrameṣu abhyupagamyate manaḥ doṣa nibandhaneṣu tu mithyā pratyaya iṣu nirālambaneṣu smṛti ullikhitaḥ eva ākāraḥ prakāśate iti śuktiḥ ālambanam bhānam tu rajatasya iti pakṣe api na doṣaḥ 
NM_3,1.474.3–3,1.474.4	 yaḥ tu tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ anyat ālambanam anyaḥ ca pratibhāti iti kaiścid āśritaḥ tatra api na sannihitasya ālambana tvam ucyate yena bhū pradeśasya api tathā atvam āśaṅkyeta na api janakasya ālambana tvam yat cakṣuḥ ādau= api prasajyeta kintu idam iti aṅgulyā nirdiśyamānam karma tayā yat jñānasya janakam tad ālambanam iti ucyamāne na kaścid doṣaḥ deśa kūrca ādi bhrameṣu ālambana kathanam 
NM_3,1.474.5–3,1.475.1	 nanu ! keśoṇḍraka jñāne kim ālambana kāraṇam kiñcid tu timiraṃroma rājiḥ iva nayana dhāmnaḥ madhye eva āste tena dvidhā kṛtā nayana vṛttiḥ dvi tvena candramasam gṛhṇāti kiñcid tu timiram tatra vivara vat antarā antarā atiṣṭhati cakṣuṣaḥ tena virala prasṛtāḥ nayana raśmayaḥ sūkṣmāḥ sūrya aṃśubhiḥ upahanyamānāḥ keśa kūrcaka ākārāḥ bhavanti iti tat eva ālambanam anudite astamite vā savitari keśoṇḍraka pratyayasya anutpādāt gandharvanagara jñāne jaladāḥ pāṇḍura tviṣaḥ ālambanam gṛha aṭṭala prakāra ākāra dhāriṇaḥ 
NM_3,1.475.2–3,1.475.3	 tasmāt viparīta khyātau pakṣa trayam api niravadyam khyāti sāṅkarya parihāraḥ yaḥ punar itaretara saṅkaraḥ khyātīnām udāhāri tatraa ātma khyāti akhyātī apavarga āhnike vayam api vijñānāt vaitam apākariṣyantaḥ parākariṣyāmaḥ iti kim tad cintayā viparīta khyātautu tat sāṅkaryam parihṛtam akhyāteḥ viparīta khyāti hetu tvam 
NM_3,1.475.4–3,1.476.0	 yat punar avādi sarva vādibhiḥ smṛti pramoṣaḥ abhyupagataḥ eva prābhākaraiḥ tuyaśaḥ pītam iti tatra vādi antarāṇi tāvatyathāḥ bhavanti tathā bhavantu vayam tu smṛti upārūḍha rajata ādi ākāra pratibhāsam abhivadantaḥ bāḍham smṛti pramopam abhyupagatavantaḥ kintu natāvati eva viśrāmyati matiḥ api tu rajata ādi anubhavaḥ api saṃvedyate itina smṛti pramoṣa mātraḥ eva virantavyam atas viparīta khyāti pakṣaḥ eva niravadyaḥ iti sthitam viṣaya apahārasya eva bādha rūpa tvam 
NM_3,1.476.1	 yaḥ tu bādha prakāraḥ prāc vikalpitaḥ tatra saha anavasthāna saṃskāra uccheda ādi pakṣāḥ anabhyupagamena eva nirastāḥ iti asthāne kaṇṭha śoṣa ā āyuṣmatā anubhūtaḥ viṣaya apahāraḥ tāvat astu bādhaḥ viṣayasya cana pratibhāta tvam apahriyate kintu pratibhātasya asattvam khyāpyate iti apahāra arthaḥ asattvam api na idānīm upanatasya khyāpyate yena pūrva dṛṣṭa draghaṇa bhagna kumbha abhāva pratibhāsa vat a bādhaḥ syāt na ca tadānīm api abhāva grahaṇe vastunaḥ dvi ātmaka tvam āśaṅkanīyam pūrva avagata ākāra upamarda dvāreṇa bādhaka pratyaya utpādāt yat mayā tadā rajatam iti gṛhītaṃtad rajatam na bhavati anyat eva tat vastu iti pratītayaḥ na vartamāna mātra viṣayiṇyaḥ 
NM_3,1.476.2	 nanu ! sva kāla niyata tvāt jñānānām katham uttarasya jñānasya pūrva jñāna utpāda kāla avacchinna tad viṣaya abhāva grahaṇa sāmarthyam  kim kurmaḥ tathā pratyaya utpādāt na bhagna ghaṭa vat idānīm tat na astitāḥ gṛhyate api tu tadā eva tat asat iti pratītiḥ yathā ca na vartamāna eka niṣṭhāḥ eva viṣaya pratītayaḥ tathā kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge vakṣyāmaḥ phala apahārasya bādha tva pakṣaḥ api yuktaḥ 
NM_3,1.476.3–3,1.477.0	 athavā phala apahāraḥ bhavatu bādhaḥ pramāṇa phala tvam ca hāna ādi buddhīnām pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe varṇitam iti tad apaharaṇāt pramāṇaṃbādhitam bhavati eva kiṃkurvatā bādhakena pramāṇa phalam apahṛtam iti ced gāyatā nṛtyatā vā api japatā juhvatā api vā tat ced kāryam kṛtam tena kim avāntara karmaṇā  tad abhyupagame vā api tat kim vidadhatā kṛtam tat ca kim kurvata iti evam avadhiḥ kaḥ bhaviṣyati  
NM_3,1.477.1–3,1.477.3	 tad alam amunā avāntara praśnena sarvathā bādhaka pratyaya upajananesati hāna ādi rūpam pūrva pramāṇa phalam nivartate iti tena tat bādhitam ucyate bādhaka jñānasya viṣaya kathanam samāna asamāna viṣaya vikalpaḥ api na peśalaḥ ekasmin viṣaye viruddha ākāra grāhiṇoḥ jñānayoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāva abhyupagamāt citra ādi pratyaye katham na bādhaḥ iti ced pūrva jñāna upamardena uttara vijñāna anutpādāt atas eva ekatra api dharmiṇi bahūnām dharmāṇām itaretarān upamardena vedyamānānām asti eva samāveśaḥ pūrva jñānena uttara jñānasya na bādha saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.477.4	 pūrva upamardena uttara vijñāna janmataḥ ca etat api pratyuktam bhavati yat uktam pūrvasmin pratyaye prāpta pratiṣṭhe satya āgantu jñānam uttaraṃbādhyatām iti yatas pūrva upamardena eva tad uttaram jñānam udeti viṣaya sahāya tvāt pramāṇa antara anugṛhyamāṇa tvāt ca uttaram eva jñānam bādhakam iti yuktam tasmāt asti jñānānām bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ sa ca ayaṃbādha vyavahāraḥ viparīta khyāti pakṣaḥ eva sāmarthyam askhalitam dadhāti itisaḥ eva jyāyān bhrame alaukika rajata ādi bhāna pakṣaḥ 
NM_3,1.478.2	 ajñaḥ kaḥ api nāma mīmāṃsakaḥ tu āha yā iyam śuktikāyām rajata pratītiḥ viparīta khyātiḥ iti tad vādinām abhimatā sā tathā na bhavati iti satya rajata pratīti vat atra api avabhāsya rajata sadbhāvāt laukika alaukika tve tu viśeṣaḥ rajata jñāna avabhāsyam hi rajatam ucyate tat cakiñcid vyavahāra pravartakam kiñcinnā iti tatra vyavahāra pravartakam laukikam ucyate tatas anyat alaukikam iti yat ca śuktikā śakalam itibhavantaḥ badanti tat alaukikam rajatam rajata jñāna avabhāsya tvātra jatam tat vyavahāra apravṛtteḥ alaukikam iti bhrame alaukika rajata bhāna pakṣa nirāsaḥ 
NM_3,1.478.3–3,1.478.4	 tat etat aparāmṛṣṭa saṃvedana iti vṛttasya abhinava padārtha sarga prajāpateḥ abhidhānam bādhaka pratyayena tatra rajata abhāvasya khyāpanāt na idaṃrajatam iti hi rajatam pratiṣedhati eṣa pratyayaḥ na vidyamāna rajatasya alaukika tvam avadyotayati iti atha na idam laukikam iti vyākhyāyate hanta ! vākya śeṣaḥ kriyatām saṃyajatraiḥ aṅgāni iti vat saḥ ayam śrotriyaḥ sva śāstra vartanīm iha api na tām tyajati na tu tasyāḥ ayam avasaraḥ agṛhyamāṇe turajata ākhye anya dharmiṇi katham tad dharma tvena laukika tvam gṛhyate rajata abhāva grahaṇe tu eṣa na doṣaḥ bhāva tad abhāvayoḥ dharma dharmi bhāva abhāvāt smaryamāṇa pratiyogi avacchinnaḥ hi abhāvaḥ gṛhyate eva tasmāt atramāsti eva rajatam na punar ala ekikam tat asti laukika alaukika rajata sāmānyam na prāmāṇikam 
NM_3,1.479.2–3,1.479.3	 na ca rajata jñāna avabhāsya tva mātram rajata lakṣaṇam api tua bādhita rejata jñāna gamya tvam vastuni laukika alaukika vibhāgaḥ api aprāmāṇikaḥ api ca laukika alaukika pravibhāgaḥ pratibhāsa nibandhanaḥ vāsyāt vyavahāra sat asadbhāva nibandhanaḥ vā na tāvat pratibhāsa nibandhanaḥ tathā pratīti abhāvāt kvacid hi rajatam kvacid ca tad abhāvaḥ pratīyate na tu laukika tvam alaukika tvam vā 
NM_3,1.479.4–3,1.480.2	 atha vyavahāra pravṛtti apravṛttibhyām laukika alaukika tve vyavasthā apyete tat vaktavyam kaḥ ayam vyavahāraḥ nāma iti jñāna abhidhāna svabhāvohi vyavahāraḥ sa ca tad viṣayaḥ na asti iti uktam tad artha kriyā nirvartanam vyavahāraḥ iti ced tarhi svapne parirabhyamāṇāyāḥ yoṣitaḥ kūṭa kārṣa āpaṇasya ca laukika tvam prāpnoti utpadya naṣṭe ghaṭa iartha kriyāyāḥ nivṛtteḥ alaukika tvam syāt api ca yaḥ śuktikāyām rajata vyavahāram na karoti sa rajata abhāvam eva budhdvā na rajatasya sataḥ tasya alaukika tām alaukika rajata bhāna mate api anyathā ākhyātiḥ avarjanīyā 
NM_3,1.480.3	 yadi ca idam alaukikam rajatam tat kimartham iha tad artha kriyā arthaṃpravartate alaukikam laukika tvena gṛhītvā iti ced sā eva iyam tapasvinī viparīta khyātiḥ āyātāḥ tasmāt viparīta khyāti dveṣeṇa kṛtam īdṛśāḥ atra api loka siddhā eva pratītiḥ anugamyatām svatas prāmāṇya sādhanāya ākhyāti vādaḥ na paryāptaḥna vā mīmāṃsakāḥ ete sva bhāryām api veśmataḥ nissārayitum icchanti svatas prāmāṇya tṛṣṇayā na ca evam api tad siddhiḥ buddhi dvaividhya darśanāt saṃśaye sati saṃvādasa apekṣa tvam tathā eva tat kleśena tad amunā api sva arthaḥ teṣām prasiddhyati na kaścid yat bhavati daiva gatyā rāja pathena eva tat bhavatu 
NM_3,1.481.0	 khyāti vāda upasaṃhāraḥ na ātma khyātiḥ bāhya tayā artha pratibhāsa atna asat khyātiḥ na hi asatām dhī viṣaya tvam uktaḥ akhyātau dūṣaṇa mārgaḥ viparīta khyātiḥ tasmāt āśrayaṇīyā matimadbhiḥ vedānām prāmāṇyam paratas eva sthite ca tasmin viparīta vedanetadīya sādharmya kṛtaḥ asti saṃśayaḥ tadā ca saṃvāda mukha pratīkṣaṇāt bhajanti bodhāḥ paratas pramāṇa tām pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇānām tat yathā astu tathā astu vā śabdasya hi pramāṇa tvam paratas mukta saṃśayam vede prāmāṇya niścayam antarā tad vihiteṣu na pravṛtti saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.481.1	 dṛṣṭe hi viṣaye prāmāṇya niścayam antareṇa eva laghu pariśrameṣu karma su pravṛttiḥ iti tad upayogi pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa prāmāṇya niścaye durupapād ekaḥ abhiniveśaḥ śabde punar adṛṣṭa puruṣa artha patha upadeśini prāmāṇyam aniniścatya mahā prayatna nirvartyāni jyotiṣṭoma ādīni na prekṣā pūrva kāriṇā uya jvānaḥ prayuñjīran= iti avaśyam niścetavyam tatra prāmāṇyam tat ca parataeva iti brūmaḥ śabdānām paratas prāmāṇye hetuḥ 
NM_3,1.481.2	 śabdasya vṛddha vyavahāra adhigata sambandha upakṛtasya sataḥ pratīti janaka tvam nāma rūpam avadhṛtam tat tu naisargika śakti ātmaka sambandha mahimnā vā puruṣa ghaṭita samaya sambandha valena vā iti vicārayiṣyāmaḥ prakāśaka tva mātram tu dīpa ādeḥ iva tasya rūpam yathā hi dīpaḥ prakāśamānaḥ śucim aśucim vā yathāsannitahitam artham avadyotayati tathā śabdaḥ api puruṣeṇa prayojyamānaḥ śravaṇa patham upagataḥ satye anṛte avā samanvite asamanvite vā sa phale niṣphale vā siddhe kārye vā arthe pramitim upajanayati iti tāvat eva asya rūpam ayaṃtu dīpāt śabdasya viśeṣaḥ yat eṣa sambandha vyutpattim apekṣamāṇaḥ pramām utpādayati iti dīpaḥ tu tad nirapekṣaḥ iti vaktṛ guṇa doṣa adhīne eva śabda prāmāṇya aprāmāṇye 
NM_3,1.482.2	 tasyāḥ śabda janitāyāḥ pramiteḥ yathārtha itara tvam puruṣa darśana adhīnam samyak darśini śucau puruṣe sati satya arthā sā bhavati pratītiḥ itarathā tu tad viparītā iti tatra yathā naisargikam artha saṃsparśi tvaṃśabdasya rūpam iti samarthitam evam asya svābhāvikam satya artha tvam apina rūpam evam abhyupagamyamāne vipralambha kavacā asi visaṃvāda darśanaṃ na bhavet tasmāt puruṣa guṇa doṣa adhīnau= eva śābde pratyaye saṃvāda visaṃvādau śabde guṇa doṣayoḥ saulabhyam 
NM_3,1.482.3–3,1.483.0	 na ca indriya ādau= iva tatra durbhaṇāḥ guṇāḥ rāga ādayaḥ doṣāḥ karuṇā ādayaḥ guṇāḥ puruṣāṇām atiprasiddhāḥ eva puruṣa guṇāḥ eva śabdasya guṇāḥ na sva śarīra saṃsthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādeḥ iva iti tatra yadi puruṣa guṇānām prāmāṇya kāraṇa tā na iṣyate doṣāṇām api viplava hetu tāḥ mā bhūt guṇa jñānam doṣa abhāva niścayāya eva iti api ayuktam 
NM_3,1.483.1	 yat tu doṣa praśamana caritārthāḥ eva puruṣa guṇāḥ prāmāṇya hetavaḥ tu nabhavanti iti atra śapatha śaraṇāḥ eva śrotriyāḥ na ca bādha anutpatti mātreṇa vaidikyāḥ pratīteḥ prāmāṇyam bhavitum arhati pakṣmalākṣī lakṣam abhiramayet vidyādhara pada kāmaḥ iti ādau= api prāmāṇya prasaṅgāt uktam ca kena cit yathā hi svapna dṛṣṭaḥ arthaḥ kaścid vīpa antara ādiṣu asaṃbhavat visaṃvādaḥ śraddhātum na eva śakyate tathā ca udanayā api artham bodhyamānam atīndriyam asaṃbhavat visaṃvādam na śraddadhati ke canaḥ iti 
NM_3,1.483.2	 tatra svapna jñāne hetuḥ nidrā ādi doṣaḥ asti iti duṣṭa kāraṇa jñānāt aprāmāṇyam iti ced lola akṣī lakṣa vākye kim vakṣyasi prabhavaḥ tasyana jñāyate iti ced na tarāmasau vede api tvad mate jñāyate iti koviśeṣaḥ mahā jana ādi parigrahaḥ asya na asti iti ced anveṣaṇīyaṃtarhi prāmāṇya kāraṇam na buddhi utpādaka tvāt eva autsargikam prāmāṇyam iti yuktam sākṣāt draṣṭṛ nara ukta tvam śabde yāvat na niścitam bādhā anutpatti mātreṇa na tāvat tad pramāṇa tā apauruṣeya tvāt vedasya doṣa abhāva prāptyā svatas prāmāṇyam iti api na 
NM_3,1.483.3–3,1.484.0	 yat api vede kāraṇa doṣa nirākaraṇāya kathyate yat vā vaktuḥ abhāvena na syuḥ doṣāḥ nirāśrayāḥ iti tat api asāṃpratam asati vaktari prāmāṇya hetūnām guṇānām api abhāvena tad prāmāṇyasya api abhāvāt na ca vede vaktuḥ abhāvaḥ su vacaḥ tathā hi etat eva tāvat vicārayāmaḥ kim vede vaktā vidyate nava iti vedānām parameśvara praṇīta tvam 
NM_3,1.484.1	 nanu vede pramāṇa antara saṃsparśa rahita vicitra karma phala gata sādhya sādhana bhāva upadeśini katham tad artha sākṣāt darśī puruṣaḥ upadeṣṭā bhavet ucyate vedasya puruṣaḥ kartā na hi yādṛśa tādṛśaḥ kintu trailokya nirmāṇa nipuṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ sa devaḥ paramaḥ jñātā nitya ānandaḥ kṛpā anvitaḥ kleśa karma vipāka ādi parāmarśa vivarjitaḥ īśvara sadbhāva ākṣepaḥ 
NM_3,1.484.2	 atra āha kim brūṣe trailokya nirmāṇa nipuṇa matiḥ iti ! aho tava saralam ati tvam ! na hi tathāvidha puruṣa sadbhāve kiñcana pramāṇam asti īśvaraḥ na pratyakṣaḥ tathā hi īśvara sadbhāvaḥ na pratyakṣa pramāṇakaḥ na hi asau= akṣa vijñāne rūpa ādiḥ iva bhāsate na ca mānasa vijñāna saṃvedyaḥ ayam sukha ādi vat yogi nām aprasiddha tvāt na tad pratyakṣa gocaraḥ īśvaraḥ na anumānikaḥ pratyakṣa pratiṣedhena tad pūrvakam apākṛtam anumānam anirjñāte tasmin vyāpti anupagrahāt 
NM_3,1.485.0	 ghaṭa ādi dṛṣṭāntena jagataḥ sa kartṛka tvam na anumātum śakyam na ca sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam liṅgam asya asti kiñcana kṣiti ādīnām tu kārya tvam asiddham sudhiyaḥ prati śaila ādi sanniveśaḥ api na eṣa kartṛ anumāpakaḥ kartṛ pūrvaka kumbha ādi sanniveśa vilakṣaṇaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kartṛ avinābhāvī sanniveśaḥ hi yādṛśaḥ tādṛś naga ādau na asti iti kāryatva vat asiddha tā sa kartṛka tva sādhaka kāryatva hetuḥ tṛṇa ādau vyabhicaritaḥ siddha tve api na hetu tvam anaikāntyāt tṛṇādimiḥ akṛṣṭa jātaiḥ kartāram antareṇa āpta janmabhiḥ teṣām utpatti samaya pratyakṣa tvena labhyate kartuḥ dṛśya tvam api evam abhāvaḥ anupalabdhitaḥ dṛṣṭa atiriktam kāraṇam kutra api kalpayitum na śakyam na ca kṣiti jala prāya dṛṣṭa hetu atirekiṇaḥ kasya api kalpanam teṣu yujyate ati prasaṅgataḥ 
NM_3,1.486.0	 tena kartuḥ abhāve api sanniveśa ādi darśanāt anaikāntika tā hetoḥ vipra tve puruṣa tva vat ghaṭa ādi dṛṣṭāntena kulāla tulyaḥ eva īśvaraḥ syāt kiñca vyāpti anusāreṇa kalpyamānaḥ prasiddhyati kulāla tulyaḥ kartā iti syāt viśeṣa viruddha tā vyāpāra vān a sarva jñaḥ śarīrī kleśa saṃkulaḥ ghaṭasya yādṛśaḥ kartā tādṛś eva bhavet bhuvaḥ viśeṣa sādhyatāyām vā sādhya hīnam nidarśanam kartṛ sāmānya siddhau tu viśeṣa avagatiḥ kutas  īśvaraḥ sa śarīraḥ uta aśarīraḥ 
NM_3,1.486.1–3,1.487.1	 api ca sa śarīraḥ vā jaganti racayet īśvaraḥ śarīra rahitā uvā śarīram api ca tadīyam kāryam nityam vā bhavet sarvathā anupapattiḥ aśarīrasya kartṛ tvam dṛśyate na hi kasya cit dehaḥ api utpatti mānasya deha tvāt caitra deha vat kāryam api īśvara śarīram tat kartṛkam vā syāt īśvara antara kartṛ kaṃvā tatra svayam nija śarīrasya nirmāṇam iti sāhasam kartṛ antara kṛte tasmin= īśvara ānantyam āpatet 
NM_3,1.487.2–3,1.487.3	 bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced pramāṇa abhāvaḥ eva doṣaḥ ekasya api tāvat īśvasya sādhane paryākula tām gatāḥ kim punar anantānām īśvaraḥ sa vyāpāraḥ uta nirvyāpāraḥ kiñca vyāpāreṇa vā kulāla ādiḥ iva kāryāṇi sṛjet īśvaraḥ icchā mātreṇa vā dvayam api durghaṭam vyāpāreṇa jagat sṛṣṭiḥ kutas yuga śataiḥ api tad icchām ca anuvartante na jaḍāḥ paramāṇavaḥ īśvaraḥ prayojanam uddiśya jagat sṛjati uta anuddiśya 
NM_3,1.487.4–3,1.488.0	 api ca kim kim api prayojanam anusandhāya jagat sarge pravartateprajāpatiḥ evam eva vā niṣprayojanāyām pravṛttau= aprekṣā pūrva kāri tvāt unmatta tulyaḥ asau bhavet pūrvaḥ api na asti pakṣaḥ avāpta sarva ānandasya rāga ādi rahita ātmanaḥ jagat ārabhamāṇasya na vidmaḥ kim prayojanam dayayā jagat sṛjati īśvaraḥ iti api ayuktam 
NM_3,1.488.1–3,1.488.2	 anukampayā pravartate iti ced mā evam sargāt pūrvam hi niśśeṣa kleśa saṃsparśa varjitāḥ na asya muktāḥ iva ātmānaḥ bhavanti karuṇā āspadam parama kāruṇikānām api dussaha duḥkha dahana dandahyamāna manasaḥ jantūn abalokayatām udeti dayā na punar apavarga daśā vat aśeṣa duḥkha śūnyān iti karuṇā amṛta saṃsikta hṛdayaḥ vā jagat sṛjan katham sṛjati durvāra duḥkha prāgbhāra dāruṇam  sarvajñasya sarva śaktasya īśvarasya karuṇayā sukham aya jagat sṛṣṭiḥ eva yuktā 
NM_3,1.488.3–3,1.488.4	 atha kevalam sukha upabhoga prāyam jagat sraṣṭum eva na jānāti sṛṣṭam apivā na ciram avatiṣṭhate iti ucyate tat api acāru niratiśaya svātantrya si imani vartamānasya sva icchā anuvarti sakala padārtha sthiteḥ parameśvarasya krima sādhyam nāma bhavet karmaṇām vaiṣamya ādi kāraṇa tve īśvaraḥ eva mā astu nānā ātma gata śubha aśubha karma kalā pa apekṣaḥ sraṣṭā prajāpatiḥ iti ced karmāṇi eva hi tarhi sṛjantu jaganti kim prajāpatinā! karma preraṇa artham api na īśvara apekṣā 
NM_3,1.488.5–3,1.489.1	 atha acetanānām cetanā anadhiṣṭhitānām sraṣṭṛ tvam aghaṭa mānam ititeṣām adhiṣṭhātā cetanaḥ kalpyate iti ced na tad āśrayāṇām ātmanām eva cetana tvāt te eva adhiṣṭhātāraḥ bhaviṣyanti kim adhiṣṭhā tṛ antareṇa īśvareṇa jīva karma anurodhena eva jagat sṛṣṭau īśvarasya svātantrya bhaṅgaḥ tasya api tādṛśā parakīya karma antara apekṣā saṅkocita svātantryeṇa kim aiśvaryeṇa kāryam rājyam iva mantri para vaśam aiśvaryam kva upayujya teta adṛś yatra apara nirapekṣam rucyā eva na racyate abhimatam anyena api uktam kim īśvaratayā īśvaraḥ yadi na vartate svecchayāna hi prabhavatām kriyā vidhiṣu hetuḥ anviṣyate iti līlayā jagat sṛjati īśvaraḥ iti na tarām a yuktam 
NM_3,1.489.2	 atha krīḍā arthāḥ jagat sarge bhagavataḥ pravṛttiḥ īdṛśā ca śubha aśubha rūpeṇa jagatā sṛṣṭena krīḍati parameśvaraḥ iti ucyate tarhi krīḍā sādhya sukha rahita tvena sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvam avāpta sakala ānanda tvam nāma tasya rūpam apahīyeta na ca krīḍā api niśśeṣa jana tā aataṅka kāriṇī āyāsa bahulā ca iyam kartum yuktāḥ mahātmanaḥ 
NM_3,1.489.3–3,1.490.0	 tasmāt na jagatām nāthaḥ īśvaraḥ sraṣṭā saṃhartā api bhavati īśvarasya jagat saṃhartṛ tvam api na ghaṭatena hi asya dhriyamāṇeṣu pūryate jantu karmasu sakṛt samasta trailokya nirmūlana manorathaḥ karma uparama pakṣe tu punar sṛṣṭiḥ na yujyate na karma nirapekṣaḥ hi sarga vaicitrya saṃbhavaḥ sṛṣṭi pralayayoḥ īśvara kṛta tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.490.1	 atha brāhmeṇa mānena saṃvatsara śata niṣṭhām adhitiṣṭhati parameṣṭhini maheśvarasya saṃjihīrṣā jāyate tayā tirohita sva phala ārambha śaktī nikarmāṇi saṃbhavanti iti saṃpadyate sakala bhuvana pralayaḥ punar ca tāvatī eva rātri prāye kāle vyatīte sisṛkṣā bhavati bhagavataḥ tayā abhivyakta śaktīni karmāṇi kāryam āranbhate iti tat api ayuktam udbhava abhibhavau teṣām syātām ced īśvara icchayā tarhi sā eva astu jagatām sarga saṃhāra kāraṇam 
NM_3,1.490.2	 kim karmabhiḥ evam astu iti ced na īśvara icchā vaśi tva pakṣa ihi trayaḥ duratikramāḥ doṣāḥ tasya eva tāvat mahātmanaḥ niṣkaruṇa tvam akāraṇam eva dāruṇa sarga kāriṇaḥ tathā vaidikīnām vidhi niṣedha codanānām ānarthakyam īśvara icchātaḥ eva śubha aśubha phala upabhoga saṃbhavāt anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ ca muktāḥ api pralaya samayaḥ iva jīvāḥ punar īśvara icchayā saṃsareyuḥ tasmāt na īśvara adhīnaḥ jagatām sargaḥ saṃhāraḥ vā upamānam tu na īśvara sādhakam iti anantara gītena nayena īśvara sādhane na anumānasya sāmarthyam upamāne tu kā kathā  
NM_3,1.491.0	 vedaḥ api īśvara sadbhāvam bodhayitum na alam agamasya api nityasya tat paratvam asāṃpratam tad praṇīte tu visraṃbhaḥ katham bhavatu mādṛśām  kiñca āgamasya prāmāṇyam tad praṇīta tva hetukam tad prāmāṇyāt ca tad siddhiḥ iti anyonya āśrayam bhavet anyathā anupapattyā tu na śakyaḥ labdhum īśvaraḥ na hi tat dṛśyate kāryam tam vinā yat na siddhyati 
NM_3,1.491.1	 tasmāt sarva sat viṣaya pramāṇa an avagamyamāna svarūpa tvāt abhāvaeva īśvarasya iti siddham loka vyavahāra mātrāt na īśvara siddhiḥ na ca prasiddhi mātreṇa yuktam etasya kalpanam nirmūla tvāt tathā ca uktam prasiddhiḥ vaṭa yakṣa vat atas eva nirīkṣya durghaṭaṃjagataḥ janma vināśa ḍambaram na kadācid anīdṛśam jagat kathitam nīti rahasya vedibhiḥ  īśvare pramāṇa upapādanam anumānam eva īśvare pramāṇam 
NM_3,1.491.2–3,1.492.3	 atra vadāmaḥ yat tāvat idamagādi naga ādi nirmāṇa nipuṇa puruṣa pariccheda dakṣam pratyakṣam na bhavati iti tat evam eva pratyakṣa pūrvakam anumānam api tena eva pathā pratiṣṭhitam iti tat api āstām sāmānyatodṛṣṭam tuliṅgam īśvara sattāyām idam brūmahe pṛthivī ādi kāryam dharmi tad utpatti prakāra prayojana ādi abhijña kartṛ pūrvakam iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ kāryatvāt ghaṭa ādi vat pṛthivī ādīnām kāryatvam durapahnavam nanu ! kāryatvam asiddham iti uktam kaḥ evam ācaṣṭe cārvākaḥ śākyaḥ mīmāṃsakaḥ vā cārvākaḥ tāvat veda racanāyāḥ racanā antara vilakṣaṇāyāḥ api kāryatvam abhyupagacchati yaḥ sa katham pṛthvī ādi racanāyāḥ kārya tvam apahnuvīta 
NM_3,1.492.4	 mīmāṃsakaḥ api na kāryatvam apahnotum arhati yatas evam āha yeṣām api anavagata utpattīnām rūpam upalabhyate tantu vyatiṣakta janitaḥ ayaṃpaṭaḥ tad vyatiṣaṅga vimocanāt tantu vināśāt vā naṅkṣyati iti kalpyata iiti evam avayava saṃyoga nirvartyamāna vapuṣaḥ kṣitidhara ādeḥ api nāśa saṃpratyayaḥ saṃbhavati eva dṛśyate ca kvacid vināśa pratītiḥ prāvṛṣeṇya jala dhara dhārā sāra nirluṭhitaḥ eva parvata eka deśe parvatasya khaṇḍaḥ patitaḥ iti vastu gatayoḥ ca kāryatva vināśi tvayoḥ samavyāptika tā vārtika kṛtā api uktā eva tena yatra api ubhau dharmau vyāpya vyāpaka sammatau tatra api vyāpya tā eva syāt aṅgam na vyāpita amatiḥ 
NM_3,1.492.5–3,1.493.1	 iti vadatā tasmāt vināśi tvena api kāryatva anumānāt tad mate apina kārya tvam asiddham śākyaḥ api kāryatvasya katham asiddha tām abhidadhīta yena nityaḥ nāma padārthaḥ praṇaya keliṣu api na viṣahyate tasmāt sarva vādibhiḥa praṇodyam pṛthivī ādeḥ kāryatvam sanniveśa viśeṣavat tvāt vā pṛthivī ādīnām kāryatvam athavā sanniveśa viśiṣṭa tvam eva hetum abhidadhmahe yasmin pratyakṣataḥ upalabhyamāne sarva apalāpa lampaṭāḥ api na kecana vipratipattum utsahante tasmāt na asiddhaḥ hetuḥ ghaṭa bhūdharayoḥ sanniveśa bhedāt tena kāryatva anumāna ākṣepaḥ 
NM_3,1.493.2	 nanu ! kartṛ avinābhāvitayā yathāvidhasya sanniveśasya śarāvāt iṣu darśanam tādaśam eva sanniveśam upalabhya kvacid anupalabhyamāna kartṛ keka laśa ādau kartṛ anumānam iti yuktam ayam tu anyaḥ eva kalaśa ādi sanniveśāt parvata ādi sanniveśaḥ na atra sanniveśa sāmānyam kiñcid upalabhante laukikāḥ sanniveśa śabdam eva sādhāraṇam prayuñjate na cavastunoḥ atyanta bhede sati śabda sādhāraṇa tā mātreṇa tad anumānam upapadyate na hi pāṇḍu tā mātra sādhāraṇa tvena dhūmāt iva kakkola rajaḥ rāśeḥ api kṛśa anuḥ anumātum śakyate iti tat uktam siddham yādṛś adhiṣṭhātṛ bhāva abhāva anuvṛttimat sanniveśa ādi tat tasmāt yuktam yat anumīyate vastu bhede prasiddhasya śabda sāmyāt abhedinaḥ na yuktā anumitiḥ pāṇḍu dravyāt iva hutāśane iti 
NM_3,1.494.0–3,1.494.1	 ghaṭa bhūdharayoḥ sanniveśa gatam sāmānyam asti eva ucyate yādṛś iti na buddhyāmahe dhūmaḥ hi mahānase kumbha dāsī phūtkāra māruta sandhukṣyamāṇa manda jvalana janmā kṛśa prāya prakṛtiḥ upalabdhaḥ sa yadi parvate pravala samīraṇa ullasita hutavaha pluṣyamāṇa mahā mahīruha skandha indhana prabhavaḥ bahula bahulaḥ kha maṇḍalam akhilam ākrāman upalabhyate tat kim idānīm anala pramitim mā kārṣīt hetau vidyamāna viśeṣa akāraṇām na gamaka aṅga tvam 
NM_3,1.494.2–3,1.494.3	 atha viśeṣa rahitam dhūma mātram agni mātreṇa vyāptam avagata mititataḥ tad anumānam iha api sanniveśa mātram kartṛ mātreṇa vyāptam iti tatas apitat anumīyatām ghaṭa bhūdhara sanniveśayoḥ na śabda sāmya mātram nanu ! sanniveśa śabda mātra sādha araṇyam atra na vastu sāmāni aṃkiñcid asti bhikṣaḥ ! dhūmaḥ api bhavat darśane kim vastu sāmānyam asti 
NM_3,1.494.4–3,1.495.1	 mā bhūt vastu sāmānyam ākāśa kāla ādi vyāvṛtti rūpam tu saṃvyavahāra kāraṇam asti eva hanta ! tarhi prakṛte api asanniveśa vyāvṛtti rūpam bhavatu sāmānyam ākāśa kāla ādi vilakṣaṇa rūpa tvāt pṛthivī ādeḥ dhūma tva ādi vat sanniveśa tva sāmānyam api asti eva nanu ! tatra dhūmaḥ dhūma iti anuvṛtta vikalpa balena kalpitam apoha svabhāvam sāmānyam abhyupagatam iha api sanniveśa vikalpa anuvṛtteḥ tvat prakalpitam apoha rūpam eva sāmānyam iṣya tām! gopura ādiṣu ghaṭa dṛṣṭāntena sa kartṛka tva sādhaka sanniveśa tvam sarva sammatam 
NM_3,1.495.2–3,1.495.3	 api ca sa kartṛka tva abhimateṣu api saṃsthāneṣu na sarva ātmanā tulya tvaṃpratīyate na hi ghaṭa saṃsthānam catur śāla saṃsthānam ca su sadṛśam iti saṃsthāna sāmānyam tu parvata ādau= api vidyate eva iti sarvathāyādṛś iti a vācakaḥ granthaḥ tṛṇa ādikam api sa kartṛkam eva yat api vyabhicāra udbhāvanam akṛṣṭa jātaiḥ sthāvara ādibhiḥ akāri tat api na cāru teṣām pakṣīkṛta tvāt pakṣeṇa ca vyabhicāra codanāyām sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgaḥ tṛṇa ādīnām sa kartṛka tvam anupalabdhi hatam iti ākṣepaḥ 
NM_3,1.495.4–3,1.496.0	 nanu ca pṛthivī ādeḥ utpatti kālasya parokṣa tvāt kartā na dṛśyatā eti tad anupalabdhyā tad asattva niścaya anupapatteḥ kāmaṃsaṃśayaḥ astu ! vanaspati prabhṛtīnām tu prasava kāla madya tvena vayam evapaśyāmaḥ na ca yatnataḥ api anveṣamāṇāḥ kartāram eṣām upalabhāmahe tasmāt asau dṛśya anupalabdheḥ na asti eva iti avagacchāmaḥ tṛṇa ādīnām pakṣa koṭi praveśanam api ayuktam api ca yena yena vayam vyabhicāram udbhāvayiṣyāmaḥ tam tam ced pakṣīkariṣyati bhavān sutarām anumāna ucchedaḥ savyabhicārāṇām api evam anumāna tvānapāyāt yogyā anupalabdhi abhāvāt tṛṇa ādīnām sa kartṛka tva abhāvaḥ na sidhyati 
NM_3,1.496.1	 ucyate sthāvarāṇām utpatti kāla pratyakṣa tve api kartuḥ adṛśya tvam eva aśarīra tva niścayāt aśarīrasya tarhi tad utpattau= avyāpriyamāṇa tvāt kartṛ tvam api katham iti ced etat agratas nirṇeṣyate adṛśyasya ca kartuḥ anupalabdhitaḥ na astitva niścaya anupapatteḥna ākṛṣṭa jāta banaspatīnām akartṛka tvam iti na vipakṣatā dṛṣṭa kāraṇaiḥ eva tṛṇa ādi utpatti asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.496.2–3,1.496.3	 yat tu uktam paridṛśyamāna kṣiti salila ādi kāraṇa kārya tvāt sthāvarāṇām kim adṛśyamāna kartṛ kalpanayā iti tad apeśalam para loka vādibhiḥ adṛśyamānānām karmaṇām api kāraṇa tva abhyupagamāt bārhaspatyānām tutad samarthanam eva samādhiḥ karmaṇām adhiṣṭhātṛ tayā īśvara siddhiḥ atha jagat vaicitryam karma vyatirekeṇa na ghaṭataḥ iti karmaṇām adṛśyamānānām api kāraṇa tvam kalpyate tatra yadi evam acetanebhyaḥ kārakebhyaḥ cetana anadhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ kārya utpāda anupapatteḥ kartā api cetanaḥ teṣām adhiṣṭhāta akalpyatām tasmāt sthāvarāṇām akartṛka tva abhāvāt na vipakṣa tetina taiḥ vyabhicāraḥ tṛṇa ādīnām pakṣatva aṅgīkāre na anumāna ucchedaḥ 
NM_3,1.496.4–3,1.497.1	 yat api uktam yena yena vyabhicāraḥ udbhāvyate sa ced pakṣe antar bhāvayiṣyate kaḥ idānīm anumānasya niyamaḥ iti etat api na sādhu yadi hi bhavān niścite vipakṣe vṛttim upadarśayet kaḥ tam pakṣe antar bhāvayet na hi vipra tve puṃstvasya nityatāyām vā prameya tvasya vyabhicāre codyamāne vedhasā api vipakṣaḥ pakṣīkartum śakyaḥ vādī icchayā vastu vyavasthāyāḥ abhāvāt iha tu sthāvara ādau kartṛ abhāva niścayaḥ na asti iti uktam prasaṅgāt sa pakṣa vipakṣa atiriktasya pakṣasya āvaśyaka tva kathanam 
NM_3,1.497.2	 nanu ! sthāvareṣu pakṣīkṛteṣu api vyabhicāraḥ na nivartate eva na hi sa pakṣa vipakṣa vyatirekeṇa tāttvikaḥ pakṣaḥ nāma kaścid asti vastunaḥ dvairūpya anupapatteḥ vastu sthityā sa kartṛkāḥ ced vanaspati prabhṛtayaḥ sa pakṣāḥ eva te no ced tarhi vipakṣāḥ eva na rāśi antaram samasti iti ucyate pakṣa abhāve sa pakṣa vipakṣa vācaḥ yuktiḥ eva tāvat kim apekṣā pakṣa anukūlaḥ hi sa pakṣaḥ ucyate tad pratikūlaḥ ca vipakṣaḥ iti pakṣa sa pakṣa vipakṣāṇām svarūpam 
NM_3,1.497.3	 yadi evam vaktavyam tarhi kaḥ ayam pakṣaḥ nāma iti sādhya dharma anvita tvena dvābhyām api avadhāritaḥ sa pakṣaḥ tad abhāvena niścitasya vipakṣatā vimataḥ yatra tu tayoḥ tam pakṣam saṃpracakṣmahe vastunaḥ dvi ātmaka tvam tu na anumanyāmahe vayam vādi buddhi anusāreṇa sthitiḥ pakṣasya yadi api tathā api vyavahāraḥ asti vastutas tad nibandhanaḥ 
NM_3,1.498.1	 sandigdhe hi nyāyaḥ pravartate na anupalabdhe na nirṇītaḥ iti uktam etat sandihyamānaḥ eva ca arthaḥ pakṣaḥ ucyate kiñcid kālam tasya pakṣa tvam yāvat nirṇayaḥ na utpannaḥ tad utpāde tu nūnam sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ anyataratra anupravekṣyati asau atas ca pakṣa avasthāyām tena vyabhicāra udbhāvanam asamīcīnam vyabhicāra saṃśayasya adoṣa tvam 
NM_3,1.498.2	 nanu ! niścita vipakṣa vṛttiḥ iva sandigdha vipakṣa vṛttiḥ api na hetuḥ eva tat evam vīrudha ādiṣu sandigdhe api kartari sanniveśasya darśanāt ahetutvam na etat sāram sat asat pāvaka tayā parvate sandigdhe vipakṣevartamānasya dhūmasya ahetu tva prasaṅgāt sarve eva ca sādhya aṃśa saṃśayāt vipakṣāḥ eva jātāḥ iti pakṣa vṛttayaḥ hetavaḥ idānīm vipakṣa gāminā ubha veyuḥ iti anumāna ucchedaḥ sa pakṣe vyāpti niścayaḥ eva anumāna aṅgam 
NM_3,1.498.3–3,1.498.4	 atha pakṣīkṛte api dharmiṇi sat asat sādhyadheḥ matayā sandigdhe apivartamānaḥ dhūma ādiḥ anyatra vyāpti niścayāt gamakaḥ iṣyate tarhi sadasat kartṛka tayā sandigdhe api vasundharā vanaspati ādau vartamānam kāryatvam anyatra vyāpti niścayāt gamakam iṣyatām viśeṣaḥ vā vaktavyaḥ bhūdhara ādīnām akartṛka tvam vyāpti grahaṇa velāyām eva siddham iti ākṣepaḥ anye manyante kim akṛṣṭa jāta sthāvara ādi vyabhicāra sthāna anveṣaṇena pṛthivī ādibhiḥ eva atra vyabhicāraḥ asya vyāpti grahaṇasya pratighātāt 
NM_3,1.499.1	 vyāptiḥ hi gṛhyamāṇā sakala sapakṣa vipakṣa kroḍīkāreṇa gṛhyate ittham catasyām gṛhyamāṇāyām eva yat yat sanniveśa viśiṣṭam tat tad buddhimat kartṛkaṃ iti asmin= eva avasare sanniveśavantaḥ api kartṛ śūnya tayā śaila ādayaḥ cetasi sphuranti yathā kṛtaka tvena bahneḥ anuṣṇa tā anumāne yat yat kṛta kaṃtat tad anuṣṇam iti vyāpti pariccheda velāyām eva vahniḥ uṣṇaḥ api kṛta kaiti hṛdaya patham avatarati tat varjam tu vyāptau gṛhyamāṇāyām tatas hetoḥ ṣaṇḍāt iva putra jana nam aghaṭa mānam eva sādhya anumānam iti vyāpti grahaṇe adhikaraṇa viśeṣa bhāna anapekṣaṇāt ukta ākṣepa nirāsaḥ 
NM_3,1.499.2–3,1.499.3	 tat etat anupapannam viśeṣa ullekha rahita sāmānya mātra pratiṣṭhitasya vyāpti paricchedasya anumāna lakṣaṇe nirṇīta tvāt agni anuṣṇa tā anumāne hi na vyāpti grahaṇa pratīghātāt aprāmāṇyam api tupratyakṣa virodhāt iti uktam etat pṛthivī ādīnām sa kartṛka tvam yadi na anumātum śakyam tarhi indriyāṇām api asiddhiḥ api ca ayam pṛthivī ādau kartṛ anumāna nirāsa prakāraḥ śabda ādi upalabdhayaḥ karaṇa pūrvikāḥ kriyā tvāt chidi kriyā vat iti atra śrotra ādi karaṇa anumāne api samānaḥ pratibandha avadhāraṇa velāyām eva karaṇa śūnyānām śabda ādi upalabdhi kriyāṇām avadhāraṇāt tābhiḥ eva vyabhicārāt pakṣeṇa ca pṛthivī ādinā vyabhicāra codanam atyantam alaukikam kartṛ anumānam karaṇa anumāna tulyam eva 
NM_3,1.499.4–3,1.500.4	 nanu ! vastu sthityā parvata ādayaḥ api vipakṣāḥ eva tvayā tuteṣām pakṣaḥ iti nāma kṛtam na ca tvad icchayā vastu sthitiḥ viparivartate nanu evam śabda ādi upalabdhayaḥ api vastu sthityā vipakṣāḥ eva tāsām api pakṣaḥ iti nāmakaraṇam eva syāt na tāsām karaṇa abhāva niścaya anutpādāt na vipakṣa tvam parvata ādau= api kartṛ abhāva niścaya anutpādāt na vipakṣa tvam teṣu kartā na upalabhyate iti ced śabda ādi upalabdhika mapinā upalabhyate eva karaṇam adṛśyamāna tvāt eva na upalabhyate na nāstitvāt iti ced kartā api adṛśya tvāt eva na upalabhyate na nāstitvāt 
NM_3,1.500.5	 anumānāt karaṇam upalabhyate tad vyatirekeṇa kriyā anupapatteḥ iti ced kartā api anumānāt upalapsyate kartāram antareṇa kārya anupapatteḥ pṛthvī ādeḥ sa kartṛkatva anumānam dhūmāt vahni anumāna tulyam tena anumāna gamya tvāt na kartuḥ na astita āgrahaḥ tad abhāvāt vipakṣa tvam kṣiti ādeḥ api durbhaṇam liṅgāt pūrvam tu sandehaḥ dahane api na vāryate tathā sati prapadyeta dhūmaḥ api ananumāna tām atha asya liṅga ābhāsa tvam kṣiti ādau kartṛ adarśanāt dhūme api liṅga ābhāsa tvam tatra deśe agni adarśanāt nanu tam deśam āsādya gṛhyate dhūma lāñchanaḥ anayā eva dhiyā sādho ! vardhasva śaradām śatam yat paścāt darśanam tena kim liṅgasya pramāṇatā anarthi tvāt adṛṣṭe vā kṛśānau kim kariṣyasi  
NM_3,1.500.6–3,1.501.1	 tasmāt sarvathā na ayam anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ viśeṣa viruddha tvasya hetvābhāsa tva abhāvaḥ yat api viśeṣa viruddha tvam asya pratipāḥ  tad api asamīkṣita abhidhānam viśeṣa viruddhasya hetvābhāsasya abhāvāt abhyupagame vā sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgāt śrotra ādi anumāne api yathā udāhṛte śakyam evam abhidhātum yādṛś eva lavana kriyāyām dātṛ ādi karaṇam kāṭhinya ādi dharmakam avagatam tādṛś eva śrotra ādi syāt tad vilakṣaṇa karaṇa sādhyatāyām tu sādhya vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ chedana ādi kriyāṇām atīndriya karaṇa kārya tva adarśanāt iti yāvat virodham eva viśeṣāṇām anugamaḥ 
NM_3,1.501.2	 atha kriyā mātram karaṇa mātreṇa vyāptam avagatam iti tāvat mātram anumāpayati tat iha api sanniveśa mātram adhiṣṭhātṛ mātreṇa vyāptam upalabdham iti tāvat mātram eva anumāpayatu viśeṣāṇām tu na tat liṅgam astiyatra bādhakam anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti ayam api śrāvaṇa tva ādi śabdasya viśeṣa jātam bādhataḥ eva dhūmaḥ api parvata agni viśeṣān kāṃścid mahāna sa agnau= adṛṣṭān apahanti eva tasmāt yathā nirdiṣṭa sādhya viparyaya sādhanam eva viruddhaḥ hetuḥ na hi viśeṣa viparyaya āvahaḥ prakṛta hetuḥ ca sādhya viparyayasya akartṛ pūrvaka tvasya na sādhakaḥ aśvaḥ ayam viṣāṇi tvāt iti vat tasmāt na viruddhaḥ bhū bhūdhara ādi sakartṛkatva anumānasya bādhā bhāvaḥ 
NM_3,1.501.3–3,1.502.1	 na api kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ bādhakayoḥ adarśanāt pratyuta āgamam anugrāhakam iha udāhariṣyāmaḥ bhū bhūdhara ādi sakartṛkatva anumāne sat pratipakṣa tva abhāvaḥ na api sat pratipakṣaḥ ayam hetuḥ saṃśaya bījasya viśeṣa agrahaṇa ādeḥ iha hetu tvena anupādānāt na api idam anumānam pratitarka parāhatam na api ayama prayojakaḥ hetuḥ yathā paramāṇūnām anitya tve sati mūrta tvam abhidhāsyate na hi mūrta tva prayuktam anitya tvam iha tu kāryatva prayuktam eva sa kartṛka tvam tatra tatra upalabdham iti atas eva anumāna virodhasya iṣṭa vighāta kṛtaḥ ca na kaścid iha avasaraḥ prayojake hetau prayukte tathāvidha pāṃsu prakṣepa prayoga anavakāśāt tasmāt para udīrita aśeṣa doṣa vikala kārya anumāna mahimnā nūnam īśvaraḥ kalpanīyaḥ 
NM_3,1.502.2–3,1.502.3	 sakala loka sākṣikam api ca anumāna prāmāṇyam api īkṣaṇīyam anumāna prāmāṇya rakṣaṇe ca kṛtaḥ eva parikara bandhaḥ prāk iti siddhaḥ eva īśvaraḥ īśvara sādhaka anumāna antare anyat api tad anumānam anyaiḥ uktam mahābhūta ādi vyaktam cetanā adhiṣṭhitam sat sukha duḥkhe janayati rūpa ādimat tvāt tūrya ādi vat tathā pṛthivī ādīni bhūtāni cetanā adhiṣṭhitāni santi dhāraṇa ādi kriyāṃkurvanti yugi ādi vat iti atra api doṣāḥ pūrvavat eva parihartavyāḥ āgamāt eva jagat sraṣṭu itara cetana vailakṣaṇya siddhiḥ 
NM_3,1.502.4–3,1.502.5	 yat punar avādi kartṛ sāmānya siddhau vā viśeṣa avagatiḥ kutas iti tatra kecid āgamāt viśeṣa pratipattim āhuḥ viśvatas cakṣuḥ uta viśvatomukhaḥ viśvatas bāhuḥ uta viśvataspād saṃbāhubhyām dhamati saṃpatatraiḥdyāvābhūmī janayan devaḥ ekaḥ iti tathā aa pāṇi pādaḥ javanaḥ gṛhītā paśyati acakṣuḥ sa śṛṇoti akarṇaḥ sa vetti sarvam na hi tasya vettā tam āhuḥ agryam puruṣam mahāntam iti śrutau paṭhyate tatas sarvasya kartā sarvajñaḥ īśvaraḥ jñāpyate 
NM_3,1.503.0–3,1.503.2	 siddhe api vastuni vedānām prāmāṇyam na ca kāryaḥ eva arthe vedāḥ pramāṇam iti mantra arthavādānām atatparatvam abhidhātum ucitam kāryaḥ iva siddhe api arthe veda prāmāṇyasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt na ca itaretara āśrayam āgama eka śaraṇa tva abhāvāt īśvara siddheḥ pariśeṣa anumānāt īśvarasya itara cetana vailakṣaṇya siddhiḥ anye tu anvaya vyatireki hetu mūla kevala vyatireki balena viśeṣa siddhim abhidadhati deha ādi vyatirikta ātma kalpanam iva sukha duḥkha ādi gatena kārya tvena varṇayiṣyate pṛthivī ādi kāryam asmad ādi vilakṣaṇa sarvajña eka kartṛkam asmad ādiṣu bādhaka utpattau satyām kārya tvāt iti pakṣa dharma tā balāt tad anuguṇa viśeṣāḥ īśvare svayam sidhyanti 
NM_3,1.503.3–3,1.503.4	 apare pakṣa dharma tā balāt eva viśeṣa lābham abhyupagacchanti na hi īdṛśam paridṛśyamānam aneka rūpam aparimitam ananta prāṇi gata vicitra sukha duḥkha sādhanam bhuvana ādi kāryam anatiśayena puṃsā kartum śakyam iti yathā candana dhūmam itara dhūma visadṛśam avalokya candanaḥ eva vahniḥ anumīyate tathā vilakṣaṇāt kāryāt vilakṣaṇaḥ eva kartā anumāsyate 
NM_3,1.504.1	 yathā prāvarakebhyaḥ iva tat kuśalaḥ kuvindaḥ yathā ca kulālaḥ sakala kalaśa ādi kārya kalāpa utpatti saṃvidhāna prayojana ādi abhijñaḥ bhavan= tasya kārya cakrasya kartā tathā iyatas trailokyasya niravadhi prāṇi sukha duḥkha sādhanasya sṛṣṭi saṃhāra saṃvidhānam sa prayojanam bahu śākham jānan= eva sraṣṭā bhavitum arhati maheśvaraḥ tasmāt sarvajñaḥ paramātmanaḥ sarvajña tvam svatassiddham 
NM_3,1.504.2	 api ca yathā niyata viṣaya vṛttīnām cakṣuḥ ādi indriyāṇām adhiṣṭhāta akṣetrajñaḥ tad apekṣayā sarvajñaḥ evam sakala kṣetrajña karma viniyoga iṣu prabhavan= īśvaraḥ tad apekṣayā sarvajñaḥ tathā ca āha vyāsaḥ dvau= imau puruṣau loke kṣaraḥ ca akṣaraḥ eva ca kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni kūṭasthaḥ akṣaraḥ ucyate uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ tu anyaḥ paramātmā iti udāhṛtaḥ yaḥ lokatrayam āviśya vibharti avyayaḥ īśvaraḥ 
NM_3,1.504.3–3,1.505.0	 mantraḥ ca tad artha anuvādī paṭhyate dvā suparṇā sa yujā sakhāyā samānam vṛkṣam pariṣasvajāte tayoḥ anyaḥ pippalam svādu atti anaśnan= anyaḥ abhicākaśīti iti atas ca sarvajñaḥ īśvaraḥ jīvānām ajña tve paramātmanaḥ sarvajña tve ca nidānam puṃsām a sarva vid tvam hi rāga ādi mala bandhanam na ca rāga ādibhiḥ spṛṣṭaḥ bhagavān iti sarva vid iṣṭa aniṣṭa artha saṃbhoga prabhavāḥ khalu dehinām rāga ādayaḥ katham te syuḥ niti ānanda ātmake śive 
NM_3,1.505.1–3,1.505.2	 mithyājñāna mūlāḥ ca rāga ādayaḥ doṣāḥ te katham nitya nirmala jñānavatī īśvare bhaveyuḥ īśvarasya nitya sarvajña tvam nityam tat jñānam katham iti ced tasmin kṣaṇam api ajñātari sati tadicchā preryamāṇa karma adhīna nānā prakāra vyavahāra virama prasaṅgāt pralaya velāyām tarhi kutas tad nitya tva kalpanā iti ced mā evam āpralayāt siddhenitya tve tadā vināśa kāraṇa abhāvāt asya ātmanaḥ iva tat jñānasya nitya tvam setsyati punar ca sarga kāle tad utpatti kāraṇa abhāvāt api nityaṃjñānam īśvara jñānasya eka tve pramāṇam 
NM_3,1.505.3–3,1.506.1	 evañca tad atīta anāgata sūkṣma vyavahita ādi samasta vastu viṣayam na bhinnam krama yaugapadya vikalpa anupapatteḥ krama āśrayaṇe kvacid ajñātṛ tvaṃsyāt iti vyavahāra lopaḥ yaugapadyena sarvajñātṛ tve kutastyaḥ jñāna bhedaḥ īśvara jñānasya indriya ajanya tve api pratyakṣa tvam pratyakṣa sādharmyāt ca tat jñānam pratyakṣam ucyate na punar indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tvam asya asti ajanakānām eva arthānām savitṛ prakāśenevatena grahaṇāt īśvara guṇānām sarveṣām nitya tvam 
NM_3,1.506.2	 jñāna vat anye api ātma guṇāḥ ye asya santi te nityāḥ eva manassaṃyoga an apekṣa janma tvāt duḥkha dveṣāḥ tasya tāvat na santi eva bhāvanā ākhyena saṃskāreṇa api na prayojanam sarvadā sarva artha darśi tvena smṛti abhāvāt atas eva na tasya anumānikam jñānam iṣyate dharma stu bhūta anugrahavataḥ vastu svābhāvyāt bhavat na vāryate tasya ca phalam para artha niṣpattiḥ eva sukham tu asya nityam eva nitya ānanda tvena āgamāt pratīteḥ asukhitasya ca evaṃvidha kārya ārambha yogya tā abhāvāt īśvara icchāyā nitya tve api sṛṣṭi pralaya ādi upapattiḥ 
NM_3,1.506.3–3,1.507.1	 nanu jñāna ānanda vat icchā api nityā ced īśvarasya tarhi sarvadā atad icchā sambhavāt sarvadā jagat utpattiḥ iti jagat ānanti aprasaṅgaḥ sarga icchā nitya tvāt ca saṃhāraḥ na prāpnoti saṃhāra icchāyāḥ api nitya tva abhyupagamena naktaṃdinam pralaya prabandhaḥ na viramet eva jagatām iti na eṣa doṣaḥ anātma mana ssaṃyoga ja tvāt icchā sva rūpa mātreṇa nityā api kadācid sargeṇa kadācid saṃhāreṇa vā viṣayeṇa anurajyate sarga saṃhārayoḥ antarāle tu jagataḥ sthiti avasthāyām asmāt karmaṇaḥ idam asya saṃpadyatām iti icchā bhavati prajāpateḥ 
NM_3,1.507.2–3,1.507.3	 prayatnaḥ tasya sa kalpa viśeṣa ātmakaḥ eva tathā ca āgamaḥ satyakāmaḥ satya saṅkalpaḥ iti kāmaḥ iti icchā ucyate saṃkalpaḥ iti prayatnaḥ īśvarasya ātma viśeṣa rūpa tvam tat evam navabhyaḥ ātma guṇebhyaḥ pañca jñāna sukha icchā prayatna dharmāḥ santi īśvare catvāraḥ tu duḥkha dveṣa adharma saṃskārāḥ na santi iti ātma viśeṣaā eva īśvaraḥ na dravya antaram āha ca patañjaliḥ klaśa karma vipāka āśayaiḥ aparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣa viśeṣaḥ īśvaraḥ iti saḥ ayam āgamāt anumānāt pakṣa dharmataḥ vā viśeṣa lābhaḥ iti sthitam aśarīraḥ eva īśvaraḥ 
NM_3,1.507.4–3,1.507.5	 yat punar vikalpitam sa śarīraḥ īśvaraḥ sṛjati jagat aśarīraḥ vā iti tatra aśarīrasya eva sraṣṭṛ tvam abhyupagacchāmaḥ aśarīrasya api īśvarasya kartṛ tvam yujyate nanu ! kriyā aaveśa nibandhanam kartṛ tvam na pāribhāṣikam tata śarīrasya kriyā virahāt katham bhavet kasya ca kutra aśarīrasya kartṛ tvam dṛṣṭam iti ucyate jñāna cikīrṣā prayatna yogi tvam kartṛ tvam ā 
NM_3,1.508.1–3,1.508.3	 cakṣate tat ca īśvare vidyate eva iti uktam etat sva śarīra preraṇe ca dṛṣṭam aśarīrasya api ātmanaḥ kartṛ tvam jagat sarge īśvarasya kleśa abhāvaḥ icchā mātreṇa ca tasya kartṛ tvāt aneka vyāpāra nirvartana upātta durvaha kleśa kāluṣya vikalpaḥ api pratyuktaḥ aśīrasya api īśvarasya paramāṇu preraṇam saṅgacchate nanu ! atra uktam kulāla vat ca na etasya vyāpāraḥ yadi kalpyate acetanaḥ katham bhāvaḥ tad icchām anuvartate iti 
NM_3,1.508.4–3,1.508.5	 asmābhiḥ api uktam eva yathā hi acetanaḥ kāyaḥ ātmā icchām anuvartate tad icchām anuvartsyante tathā eva paramāṇavaḥ sva prayojanam vinā api īśvarasya sraṣṭṛ tvam yaḥ tu prayojana vikalpaḥ kimartham sṛjati jaganti bhagavān iti saḥ api na peśalaḥ svabhāvaḥ eva eṣa bhagavataḥ yat kadācid sṛjati kadācid ca saṃharati viśvam iti 
NM_3,1.508.6–3,1.509.0	 katham punar niyata kāle eṣaḥ asya svabhāvaḥ iti ced ādityaṃpaśyatu devānāṃpriyaḥ ! yaḥ niyata kālam udetyaḥ tam eti ca prāṇi karma sāpekṣam etat vivasvataḥ rūpam iti ced īśvare api tulyaḥ samādhiḥ līlayā api jagat sṛṣṭiḥ upapadyatekrīḍā arthe api jagat sarge na hīyeta kṛtārtha tā pravartamānāḥ dṛśyante na hi krīḍāsu duḥkhitāḥ dayayā eva vā jagat sṛṣṭiḥ 
NM_3,1.509.1–3,1.509.2	 athavā anukampayā eva sarga saṃhārau= ārabhatām īśvaraḥ dayayā jagat sarge api sukha duḥkha ādi vaiṣamya upapattiḥ nanu atra coditam na tathāvidhāḥ prāṇinaḥ anukampya abhavanti kevala sukha svabhāvā vā sṛṣṭiḥ anukampāvatā kriyeta iti satyam coditam anupapannam tu anādi tvāt saṃsārasya sṛṣṭi saṃhārayoḥ paramam phalam 
NM_3,1.509.3	 śubha aśubha saṃskāra anuviddhāḥ eva ātmānaḥ te ca dharma adharma nigaḍa saṃyata tvāt apavarga pura dvāra praveśam alabhamānāḥ katham na anukampyāḥ anupabhukta phalānām karmaṇām na prakṣayaḥ sargam antareṇa ca tad phala upabhoga asaṃbhavaḥ iti śubha phala upabhogāya svarga ādi sargam aśubha phala upabhogāya naraka ādi sṛṣṭim ārabhate dayāluḥ eva bhagavān upabhoga prabandhena pariśrāntānām antarā antarā viśrāntaye jantūnām bhuvana upasaṃhāram apikaroti iti sarvam etat kṛpā nibandhanam eva 
NM_3,1.510.0–3,1.510.2	 sṛṣṭi pralaya upapattiḥ nanu ca yugapad eva sakala jagat pralaya karaṇam anupapannam avināśināṃkarmaṇām phala upabhoga pratibandha asaṃbhavāt iti coditam na yuktam etat īśvara icchā pratibaddhānām karmaṇām stimita śaktīnām avasthānāt tad icchā preritāni karmāṇi phalam ādadhati tad icchā pratibaddhāni ca tatra udāsate kasmāt evam iti ced acetanānāṃcetana anadhiṣṭhitānām sva kārya karaṇa anupalabdheḥ jīvānām karma adhiṣṭhātṛ tva asaṃbhavaḥ nanu ! teṣām eva karmaṇām kartāraḥ ātmānaḥ cetanāḥ adhiṣṭhātāraḥ bhaviṣyanti yathā āha bhaṭṭaḥ karmabhiḥ sarva jīvānām tad siddheḥ siddha sādhanam iti 
NM_3,1.510.3	 na etat evam na ete adhiṣṭhātāraḥ bhavitum arhanti bahu tvāt viruddha abhiprāya tvāt ca tathā hi ekaḥ eva kaścid sthāvara ādi viśeṣa urāja ādi viśeṣaḥ vā prāṇi koṭīnām anekavidha sukha duḥkha upabhogasya hetuḥ sa taiḥ bahubhiḥ avyavasthita abhiprāyaiḥ katham ārabheta teṣām ekatra saṃmāna abhāvāt maṭha pariṣadaḥ api kvacid eva sakala sādhāraṇa upakāriṇi kāryā ibhavatyaikamatyam na sarvatra mahā prāsāda ādi a āraṃbhe bahūnām takṣa ādīnām ekasthapati āśaya anuvarti tvam dṛśyate pipīlikānām api mṛd kūṭa karaṇetulyaḥ kaścid upakāraḥ pravartakaḥ sthapati vat ekāśaya anuvarti tvam vā akalpyam iha tu tad sthāvaram śarīram keṣāñcit upakāra kāraṇam itareṣām api bhūyasā ām apakāra kāraṇam iti katham taiḥ saṃbhūya sṛjyate anadhiṣṭhitānān tva cetanānām ārambhaka tvam ayuktam eva tasmāt avaśyam ekaḥ teṣāṃkarmaṇām adhiṣṭhātā kalpanīyaḥ yat icchām antareṇa bhavanti api karmāṇina phala janmane prabhavanti īśvarasya eka tvam 
NM_3,1.511.2	 atas eva ekaḥ īśvaraḥ iṣyate na dvau bahavaḥ vā bhinna abhiprāya tayā āloka anugraha upaghāta vaiśasa prasaṅgāt icchā visaṃvāda saṃbhavena ca tatas kasya cit saṅkalpa vighāta dvārakān aiśvarya prasaṅgāt iti ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ tad icchayā karmāṇi kāryeṣu pravartante iti upapannaḥ sargaḥ tad icchā pratibandhāt stimita śaktīni karmāṇi udāsate iti upapannaḥ pralayaḥ sarga pralaya sadbhāvaḥ 
NM_3,1.511.3–3,1.511.4	 evañca yat uktam tasmāt adyavat eva atra sarga pralaya kalpanā samasta kṣaya janmabhyām na siddhi atyapramāṇikā iti etat api asāṃpratam sṛṣṭi pralaya abhāve api sthiteḥ api īśvara āyattatvam tiṣṭhatu vā sarga pralaya kālaḥ ! adyatve api yathā ukta nayena tad icchām antareṇa prāṇinām karma vipāka anupapatteḥ avaśyam īśvaraḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ itarathā sarva vyavahāra vipralopaḥ tat uktam ajñaḥ jantuḥ anīśaḥ ayam ātmanaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ īśvara preritaḥ gacchet svargam vā śvabhram eva vā iti 
NM_3,1.512.0–3,1.512.1	 karmaṇām āvaśyaka tvam nanu ! evam tarhi īśvara icchā eva bhavatu kartrī saṃhartrī ca kiṃkarmabhiḥ ! mā evam karmabhiḥ vinā jagat vaicitrya anupapatteḥ karma nairapekṣya pakṣe api trayaḥ doṣāḥ darśitāḥ eva īśvarasya nirdaya tvam karma codanā narthakyam anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ ca iti tasmāt karmaṇām eva niyojane svātantryam īśvarasya na tad nirapekṣam karma anuguṇam jagat sarjane api īśvarasya na svātantrya hāniḥ 
NM_3,1.512.2	 kim tādṛś a aiśvaryeṇa prayojanam iti ced na na prayojana anuvarti pramāṇam bhavitum arhati kim vā bhagavataḥ karma apekṣiṇaḥ api na prabhu tvam iti alam kutarka lava lipta mukha nāsti ka ālāpa parimardena! īśvara vāda upasaṃhāraḥ tasmāt kutārkikā udgīta dūṣaṇa ābhāsa vāraṇāt siddhaḥ trailokya nirmāṇa nipuṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ nirīśvara vādi saṃbhāṣaṇasya api pāpa tvamye tu īśvaram nirapavāda dṛḍha pramāṇa siddha svarūpam api na abhyupayanti mūḍhāḥ pāpāya taiḥ saha kathā api vitanyamānā jāyeta nūnam iti yuktam atas virantum yasya icchayā eva bhuvanāni samudbhavantitiṣṭhanti yānti ca punar vilayam yuga ante tasmai samasta phala bhoga nibandhanāya nityaprabuddha muditāya namaḥ śivāya 
NM_3,1.513.0	 veda pauruṣeya tva sādhana prakaraṇam īśvarasya jagat sraṣṭṛ tve api vedānām tad kṛta tva ākṣepaḥ nanu ! trailokya nirmāṇa nipuṇe parameśvare siddhe api tad praṇīta tvam na vedasya avakalpate pade śabda artha sambandhe vedasya racanāsu vā kartṛ tvam asya āśaṅkyeta tat ca sarvatra durvacam varṇa rāśiḥ krama vyaktaḥ padam iti abhidhīyate varṇānām ca avināśi tvāt katham īśvara kārya tā sambandhaḥ api na tad kāryaḥ sa hi śakti svabhāvakaḥ śabde vācaka śaktiḥ ca nitya eva agnau= iva uṣṇa tā racanāḥ api vaidikyaḥ na etāḥ puruṣa nirmitāḥ kavi praṇīta kāvya ādi racanābhyaḥ vilakṣaṇāḥ evam ca vede svātantryam īśvarasya na kutracid kāmam tu parvatān eṣa vidadhātu bhinattu vā svatas prāmāṇya siddhau tu vede vaktṛ a napekṣa tām vadāmaḥ na tu sarvatra puruṣa dveṣiṇaḥ vayam anapekṣa tvam eva atas veda prāmāṇya kāraṇam yuktam vaktā api vedasya kurvan= api karotu kim  śabdasya anitya tve pramāṇa abhāvaḥ nitya tve ca pramāṇam katham punar amī varṇāḥ śruta mātra tirohitāḥ nityāḥ bhavantu kaḥ ayam vā śabda svātantrya doha daḥ  
NM_3,1.514.1–3,1.514.2	 ucyate śabdasya na hi anitya tve yuktiḥ sphurati kācana pratyakṣam arthāpattiḥ ca nityatām tu adhigacchataḥ śabdasya anitya tva sādhana anuvādaḥ tathā hi anitya tva hetavaḥ ime kila kathyante prayatna anantaram upalabdheḥ kāryaḥ śabdaḥ iti kāryatva anitya tvayoḥ paraspara avinābhāvātekatara siddhau= anyatara siddhiḥ bhavati eva iti kvacid kiñcid sādhanam ucyateprayatna prerita kauṣṭhya māruta saṃyoga vibhāga anantaram upalabhyamānaḥ śabdaḥ tad kāryaḥ eva iti gamyate uccāraṇāt ūrdhvam anupalabdheḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ na hi enam uccaritam muhūrtam api upalabhāmahe tasmāt vinaṣṭaḥ iti avagacchāmaḥ vyavahārāt api śabdaḥ anityaḥ 
NM_3,1.514.3–3,1.514.4	 karoti śabda vyapadeśāt ca kāryaḥ bdaḥ śabdam kuru śabdaṃmā kārṣīḥ iti vyavahartāraḥ prayuñjate te nūnam avagacchanti kāryaḥ śabdaḥ iti aneka deśeṣu upalambhāt śabdasya nānātva anitya tve nānā deśeṣu ca yugapad upalambhāt teṣu teṣu deśeṣu śabdena vyavahārāt sarvatra yugapad upalabhyate śabdaḥ tat ekasya nityasyasataḥ anupapannam kāryatve tu bahūnām nānā deśeṣu kriyamāṇānām upapadyate aneka deśa sambandhaḥ iti 
NM_3,1.515.0–3,1.515.2	 vikāri tvāt ca anityaḥ śabdaḥ śabda antara vikārya tvāt ca anityaḥ śabdaḥ dadhi atra iti ikāraḥ evaya kārībhavati iti sādṛśyāt smṛteḥ ca avagamyate vikārya tvāt ca drākṣā ikṣu rasa ādi vat anitya tvam asya iti vṛddhi hāsa bhāj tvāt ca anityaḥ śabdaḥ kāraṇa vṛddhyā ca vardhamāna tvāt bahubhiḥ mahā prayatnaiḥ uccāryamāṇaḥ mahān go śabdaḥ upalabhyate alpaiḥ alpa prayatnaiḥ uccāryamāṇaḥ alpaḥ iti etat catantu vṛddhyā vardhamānaḥ paṭaḥ iva śabdaḥ api hetu vṛddhyā vardhamānaḥ kāryaḥ bhavitum arhati iti śabda anitya tva hetūnām asādhaka tvam 
NM_3,1.515.3–3,1.516.0	 te ete sarve eva aprayojakāḥ hetavaḥ tathā hi prāti abhijñātaḥsiddhe nitya tve prayatna anantaram upalaṃbhāt abhivyaktiḥ prayatna kāryā śabdasya na utpattiḥ iti gamyate tat evam vyaṅgye api prayatna anantaram upalambha saṃbhavāt anaikāntika tvam abhivyañjakānām ca pavana saṃyoga vibhāgānām acira sthāyi tvāt na ciram uccāraṇāt ūrdhvam upalabhyate śabdaḥ prayoga abhiprāyaḥ ca karoti śabda vyapadeśaḥ asya bhaviṣyati gomayāni kuru kāṣṭhāni kuru iti vat tasmāt saḥ api na aikāntikaḥ nānā deśeṣu yugapad upalambhanam ekasya sthirasya api śabdasya vivasvataḥ iva setsyati varṇānām avikāri tvam 
NM_3,1.516.1	 vikārya tvam tu asiddham eva śabda antara tvāt dadhi śabdaḥ ikāra antar saṃhitā vyatirikta viṣaya vṛttiḥ yakāraḥ tu ayam anyaḥ eva aci paratas saṃhitā viṣaye prayujyamānaḥ na punar ikāraḥ eva ayam yakārībhūtaḥ kṣīram iva dadhi bhūtam upalabhyate na hi icu yaśāḥ tālavyāḥ iti sthāna sādṛśya mātreṇa tad vikāra tva varṇanam ucitam aprakṛti vikārayoḥ apinayana utpala pallavayoḥ sādṛśya darśanāt ikaḥ yaṇaci iti pāṇinismṛteḥ api na ayam arthaḥ ikāraḥ yakārībhavati kṣīram iva dadhībhavati iti kintvā asmin viṣaye ayam varṇaḥ prayoktavyaḥ asmin= aya miti sūtra arthaḥ siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca tat śāstram pravṛttam iti 
NM_3,1.516.2–3,1.516.3	 api ca kṣīram dadhi tvam upaiti na tu dadhi kṣīra tām iha tuyakāraḥ api kvacid ikāra tām upaiti vidhyati iti saṃprasāraṇe sati tasmāt asiddhaḥ eva varṇānām prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ vṛddhi hāsa bhāktvam api śabdasya na asti na api kāraṇa vṛddhyā vardhate śabdaḥ balavatā api uccāryamāṇāni bahubhiḥ ca tāvanti eva akṣarāṇi dhvanayaḥ eva tathā tatra pravṛddhāḥ upalabhyante na varṇāḥ iti 
NM_3,1.517.0	 śabda nitya tvam tasmāt anitya tā asiddhiḥ na evam prāyairasādhanaiḥ śabdasya nityatāyām tu sā eṣā artha āpattiḥ iṣyate śabdasya uccāraṇam tāvat artha gati artham iṣyate na ca uccārita naṣṭaḥ ayam artham gamayitum kṣamaḥ sarveṣām avivādaḥ atra śabda artha vyavahāriṇām yat avijñāta sambandhaḥ śabdaḥ na arthasya vācakaḥ vedyamānaḥ sa sambandhaḥ sthavira vyavahārataḥ drāghīyasā na kālena vinā śakyeta veditum vṛddha vyavahārāt śabda artha sambandha avadhāraṇa kramaḥ 
NM_3,1.517.1	 tathā hi gām śuklām ānayaḥ iti eka vṛddha prayukta śabda śravaṇe sati ceṣṭa mānam itaram vṛddham avalokayan bālaḥ taṭa sthaḥ tasya artha pratītim tāvat kalpayati ātmani tad pūrvikāyāḥ ceṣṭāyāḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt pramāṇa antara asannidhānāt etat vṛddha prayukta śabda samanantaram ca pravṛtteḥ tatas eva śabdāt kim api anena pratipannam iti manyate tatas kṣaṇa antare tam artham tena vṛddhena ānīyamānam upalabhamānaḥ evam buddhyate ayam arthaḥ amutas śabdāt anena avagataḥ iti sa ca arthaḥ aneka guṇa kriyā jāti vyakti ādi rūpa saṃkula aupalabhyate śabdaḥ api aneka pada kadambaka ātmā śrutaḥ tad katamasya vākya aṃśasya katamaḥ artha aṃśaḥ vācyaḥ iti āvāpa udvāpa yogena bahu kṛtvas 
NM_3,1.518.1–3,1.518.2	 śṛṇvan guṇa kriyā ādi parihāreṇa go tva sāmānyam asmad mate tvad mate vāta dvat mātram go śabdasya abhidheyam nirdhārayati iti evam dīrgha adhvasāpekṣa sambandha adhigama avadhi śabdasya jīvitam siddham iti na āśu vināśitā śabda nitya tva abhāve śābda bodhaḥ eva na ghaṭeta bhavatu vā vinaśvarasya api śabdasya sambandha grahaṇam tathā apitasmin gṛhīta sambandhe śabde vinaṣṭe sati katham anavagata sambandhāt abhinavāt idānīm anyasmāt śabdāt artha pratipattiḥ anyasmin jñāta sambandhe yadi anyaḥ vācakaḥ bhavet vācakāḥ sarva śabdāḥ syuḥ ekasmin jñāta saṅgatau 
NM_3,1.518.3–3,1.518.4	 na ca vaktā vyavaharamāṇaḥ tadā eva śabdam ca uccārayati sambandhaṃkaroti ca evam ca vyutpādayati param ca vyavahārayati iti na hiyugapadimāḥ kriyā bhavitum arhanti evam adarśanāt sarveṣu śabdeṣu sājātyāt na śakti grahaṇa saṃbhavaḥ atha ādau sambandha grahaṇe vṛtte tasmin vinaṣṭe api go śabde tad sadṛśam abhinava kṛtam api śabdam upaśrutya artham pratipatsyante vyavahartāraiti ucyate tat api na caturaśram sādṛśyasya agrahaṇāt na higo śabdaḥ iva ayam iti pratītiḥ dṛṣṭā api tu go śabdaḥ eva iti na ca 
NM_3,1.519.1–3,1.519.2	 bhūyas avayava sāmānya yoga rūpam sādṛśyam varṇānām anavayavānām upapadyate abhinavasya śabdasya svayam arthavat tva anavadhāraṇāt katham ayam amutas śrotā pratipadyeta iti śaṅkamānaḥ vaktā katham prayogam kuryāt sādṛśya mūlaka śakti grahaṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ ca atha saḥ api arthavat sadṛśam eva prayuṅkte na arthavantam tarhi yat sadṛśam asau prayuṅkte tasya api anya sādṛśyāt eva arthavat tā iti jagat sarga kāla kṛtasya mūla bhūtasya arthavataḥ śabdasya smaraṇam syāt tad mūla tvāt vyavahārasya na ca evam asti na ca tatas prabhṛti adyayāvat sādṛśyam anuvartate tad sādṛśya kalpanāyām mūla sādṛśya vināśāt viśeṣataḥ tu śabdānām varṇeṣu sādṛśyam eva atiprasaktambhinnaiḥ vaktṛ mukha sthāna prayatna karaṇa ādibhiḥ na nirvahati sādṛśyam śabdānām dūra vartinām 
NM_3,1.520.0–3,1.520.2	 sādṛśya janita tve ca mithyā eva artha gatiḥ bhavet dhūma anukāri nī hāra janya jvalana buddhi vat tasmāt sādṛśya nibandhana artha prati iti anupapatteḥ go śabdaḥ eva sthāyi iti abhyupagamanīyam gakāra ādi anugatam go śabda tva ādi sāmānyam tu na asti eva nanu ! yathā dhūma vyakti bhede a pi dhūma tva matim abalambya sambandha grahaṇa ādivya bahāra nivaha nirvahaṇam evam iha gakāra ādi varṇa vyakti bhede api sāmānya nibandhanaḥ tad nirvāhaḥ kariṣyate iti mā evam tatra hi dhūma tva sāmānyam vidyate dhruvam śabda tvam vyabhicāryatra go śabda tvam tu durghaṭam bhinnaiḥ ayugapad kālaiḥ asaṃsṛṣṭaiḥ vinaśvaraiḥ varṇaiḥ ghaṭayitum śakyaḥ go śabda avayavī katham  anārabdhe ca go śabde go śabda tvam kva vartatām paṭa tvam nāma sāmānyam na hi tantuṣu vartate gatvā ādi jāti nirāsaḥ 
NM_3,1.520.3	 nanu ! mā bhūt go śabda tvam sāmānyam bhinna ākāra gakāra ādi vyakti vṛttibhiḥ eva vā gatvā ādi jātibhiḥ kāryam pūrva uktam upapadyate etat apinā asti gatvā ādi jātīnām anupapatteḥ bheda abheda pratyaya pratiṣṭhaḥ hivyakti jāti pravibhāga vyavahāraḥ iha ca ayam abheda pratyayaḥ varṇa aikya nibandhanaḥ eva na jāti kṛtaḥ bheda pratibhāsaḥ tu vyañjaka bheda adhīnā eti kutas jāti vyakti vyavahāraḥ go tva jāteḥ gatvā ādeḥ ca vailakṣaṇyam 
NM_3,1.521.2	 go tva ādi jāti nirākaraṇe api eṣa prakāraḥ samānaḥ iti ced na vyakti bhedasya su spaṣṭa siddha tvena vyañjaka ādi upādhi nibandhanatva anupapatteḥ paraspara vibhakta svarūpa tayā hi śābaleya bāhuleya piṇḍāḥ pratyakṣam upalabhyante sthite ca vyakti bhede sarvatra gauḥ iti tad abheda pratyayasya ananya viṣaya tvāt iṣyate eva go tva jātiḥ iha punar gakāra vyaktayaḥ bhinnāḥ śābaleya ādi piṇḍa vat kva nāma bhavatā dṛṣṭāḥ yena āsām jātim icchasi  śiśau paṭhati vṛddhe vā strī jane vā śuke api vā vaktṛ bhedam prapadyante na varṇa vyakti bhinna tām 
NM_3,1.521.3	 tathā ca gargaḥ paṭhati māṭharaḥ paṭhati iti uccārayitṛ bhedaḥ eva pratīyate amum gaviśeṣam eṣa paṭhati iti na uccāryamāṇa bhedaḥ eka vaktṛ prayoge api tasya eva uccāraṇam punar gaṅgā gagana gargā ādau na rūpa antara darśanam druta ādi bheda bodhaḥ api nāda bheda nibandhanaḥ na vyakti bheda janitaḥ śābaleya ādi bodha vat gatvaja ati aṅgīkartṛbhiḥ api dguta ādi bhedāt na gādi bhedaḥ vaktum śakyaḥ 
NM_3,1.521.4–3,1.522.1	 abhyupagate api gatva sāmānye tasya druta ādi bheda pratibhāsesati api na bhinna tvam eṣitavyam aupādhikaḥ eva tasmin bheda pratibhāsaḥ varṇanīyaḥ saḥ ayam gakāra vyaktau= eva katham na varṇyate tasyāḥ eva eka tvāt eka pratyayaḥ bheda bhramaḥ tu vyañjaka adhīnaḥ iti evam hi kalpanā laghīyasī bhavati tasmāt na nānāgakāra vṛtti gatva sāmānyam nāma kiñcid asti vyañjanānām hrasva dīrgha rūpāṇām svara upādhika bheda vat svara bhedaḥ api aupādhikaḥ eva 
NM_3,1.522.2–3,1.522.3	 api ca go guru geha ādau bhinna ājupa śleṣa kāritaḥ eva vyañjana iṣu buddhi bhedaḥ para upādhiḥ avadhāryate saḥ ayam akṣu api para upādhiḥ eva bhavitum arhati varṇa āśrita tvāt vyañjaka bheda pratyaya vat iti tasmāt gatvavata tva sāmānyam api na asti aṣṭādaśavidha svara bhedāḥ aupādhikāḥ eva yat punar aṣṭādaśa bhedam avarṇa kulam ucyate tadaupādhikam eva hrasva dīrgha pluta saṃvṛta vivṛta ādi buddhīnām dhvani bheda anuvidhāyi tvāt vivṛtaḥ saṃvṛtāt anyaḥ na gakārāt vakāra vat api tu akāraḥ eva asau pratibhāti yathā tathā 
NM_3,1.523.0–3,1.523.1	 akārayoḥ dhvani bhedāt eva artha bhedaḥ katham tarhi śabda bheda abhāve bhinne artha pratipattī araṇyam āraṇyam iti dhvani kṛte eva te bhaviṣyataḥ aśabda dharmasya dīrgha tvāt ekatham artha prati iti aṅga tvam iti ced turaga vegavat bhaviṣyati yathā turaga deha sthaḥ vegaḥ puṃsaḥ artha siddhaye para dharmaḥ api dīrgha ādiḥ evam tasya upakārakaḥ atva ādi jāti nirāsaḥ 
NM_3,1.523.2	 itas ca etat akāra sāmānyam anupapannam atvam hi na dīrgha plutayoḥ anugatam bhavati ātvam na hrasva plutayoḥ ātvam na hrasva dīrghayoḥ iti tasmāt ekatvāt varṇānām nāvā antara jātayaḥ saṃbhavanti śabda tvam tuniyata artha pratipattau vyabhicāri iti atas na atra dhūma ādi nyāyaḥ śabdāt artha bodhā anyathā anupapattyā śabda nitya tva sādhanamtena artha pratyayaḥ śabdāt anyathā na upapadyate na ced nitya tvam iti asmin arthāpatteḥ pramāṇa tā arthāpatteḥ anumāna rūpa tve anumānena śabda nitya tva siddhiḥanumānāt anyathātgham artha āpatteḥ na dṛśyate tena anumānam api etat prayoktum na na śakyate 
NM_3,1.524.1	 tat idam ucyate śabdaḥ dharmī nityaḥ iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ sambandha grahaṇa sāpekṣa artha pratipādaka tvāt dhūma ādi jāti vat tat idam uktaṃnitya tvam tu syāt darśanasya para artha tvāt iti evam sambandha grahaṇāt prabhṛti ārtha pratipatteḥ avasthitasya vināśa hetu abhāvāt ātma ādi vat nitya tvam niravayava tvāt śabdaḥ na naśyati 
NM_3,1.524.2–3,1.525.1	 na hi ayam avayava vināśāt naśyati śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt tat eva katham iti ced ucyate su alpena api prayatnena yadi varṇaḥ prayujyate yadi vā na anubhūyeta śakalaḥ na anubhūyate sa avayave hi vastuni dvidhā avayavāḥ dṛśyante ārabdha kāryāḥ ca anārabdha kāryāḥ ca iti iha punar ārabdha kāryāḥ anārabdha kāryāḥ vā paṭe tantu ādayaḥ iva varṇe na kvacid avayavāḥ upalabhyante na ca anumīyante liṅga abhāvāt aśraya vināśāt śabda vināśa asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.525.2	 na api aśraya vināśāt vināśaḥ śabdasya ātma ādi vat ana āśrita tvāt ākāśa āśrita pakṣe vā tad nitya tvāt na ca anyaḥ kaścana śabda nāśasya hetuḥ asti kṣayaḥ yathā upabhogena śastra ādi= chedanena vā saṃbhāvyate paṭa ādīnām na evam śabdasya karhi cit tasmāt tirohitaḥ api āste yadi śabdaḥ kṣaṇa antaram mṛtyoḥ mukhāt apakrāntaḥ punar kena eṣa hanyate  saṅkhyā bhāvāt ca śabdaḥ nityaḥ 
NM_3,1.525.3–3,1.526.0	 itas ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ saṅkhyā bhāvāt aṣṭa kṛtvas go śabdaḥ uccāritaḥ iti vadanti na tu aṣṭau go śabdāḥ iti tena ekatvam avagamyate yaḥ ayam kriyā abhyāvṛtti gaṇane vihitaḥ kṛtvasucpratyayaḥ sa kriyāvatām abhede bhavati tena uccāraṇa āvṛtti mātram tat uktam kriyāvatām abhede hi kriyā aavṛttiṣu kṛtvasuc tad prayogāt dhruvam tasya śabdasya āvartate kriyāḥ iti kriyā abhyāvṛtti sattāyām abhede ca kriyāvatām saṃkhyā abhidhācinaḥ śabdāt kṛtvasucpratyayam viduḥ pratyabhijñā balāt api śabda nitya tva siddhiḥ tat anena prakāreṇa pratyabhijñānam ucyate pramāṇam śabda nitya tve sakala śrotṛ sākṣikam tathā hi asti saḥ eva ayam go śabdaḥ iti vedanam śrautram karaṇa kāluṣya bādha sandeha varjitam saḥ ayam gakāraḥ ityādi pratyabhijñāyāḥ ananyathā siddha tvam 
NM_3,1.526.1	 śrotra indriya vyāpāra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt śrautram idam vijñānam na ca etat janakasya karaṇasya kim api daurbalyam upalabhyate na ca kiṃsvid iti koṭi dvaya saṃsparśitayā idam vijñānam upajāyate na ca na etat evam iti pratyaya antaram asmin bādhakam utpaśyāmaḥ idānīṃtana astitva prameya ādhikya grahaṇāt ca idam anadhigata artha grāhī api bhavitum arhati bhavat mate ca gṛhīta grāhi tve api pratyabhijñāyāḥ prāmāṇyam iṣyate na hi tad aprāmāṇyaṃvaktum śakyate śākyaiḥ iva bhavadbhiḥ kṣaṇika padārtha anabhyupagamāt saḥ ayam gakāraḥ iti pratyabhijñā na sājātya mūlāna sādṛśya nimitta tvam vaktum tasyāḥ ca yujyate sāmānya viṣaya tvam vā dvayasya api niṣedhanāt kaiścid tirohite bhāva āditya prāmāṇyam ucyate tat asat tat pratītya eva tirodhāna niṣedhanāt 
NM_3,1.527.0–3,1.527.2	 jīvati tvad mate api eṣa śabdaḥ tricaturān kṣaṇān pratyabhijñā ca kālena tāvatā na na siddhyati ekakṣaṇa āyuṣi tu asmin pratītiḥ ati durlabhā na khalva janakam kiñcid vastu jñānena gṛhyate iti kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge vakṣyate grahaṇāt pūrvam api śabdāḥ vartante eva api ca yathā niśīthe rolamba śyāmala ambuda ḍambare pratyabhijñāyate kiñcid acira dyuti dhāmabhiḥ tathā avirata saṃyoga vibhāga krama janmabhiḥ pratyabhijñāyate śabdaḥ kṣaṇikaiḥ api mārutaiḥ śabda nitya tve tasya grahaṇa niyama asaṃbhava ākṣepaḥ 
NM_3,1.527.3–3,1.528.1	 atra āha mārutaiḥ iti upoddhātena sādhu smṛtam tiṣṭhatu tāvat pratyabhijñānam ! prathamam eva śabdasya yat niyata grahaṇam tad abhivyakti pakṣe durghaṭam nitya tvāt vyāpaka tvāt ca sarve savatra sarvadā śabdāḥ santi iti bhedena grahaṇe kim niyāmakam  dhvanayaḥ hi nāma saṃyoga vibhāga viśeṣitāḥ vāyavaḥ vāyu vṛttayaḥ vā saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ te hi śabdasya vyañjakāḥ iṣyante taiḥ ca karaṇam vā saṃskriyate karma vā dvayam vā sarvathā ca pramādaḥ abhivyañjaka sāmagryā śrotra saṃskāra asaṃbhavaḥ karaṇe saṃskṛte tāvat sarva śabda śrutiḥ bhavet gakārāya eva saṃskāraḥ iti eṣa niyamaḥ kutas  
NM_3,1.528.2–3,1.529.0	 api ca stimita samīraṇa apasaraṇam eva karaṇasya saṃskāraḥ sa cāyam tad deśa vyavasthita sakala tad viṣaya sādhāraṇaḥ eva yathā javanikā prāya prāpta prasaram īkṣaṇam raṅga bhūmiṣu tad deśam aśeṣam vastu paśyati tathā prasara saṃrodhi samīra utsāraṇe sati śrotram tad deśa niḥśeṣa śabda grāhi bhaviṣyati śrotra saṃskāra pakṣe śrotra niyamaḥ ca durvacaḥ ākāśam ca śrotram ācakṣate bhavantaḥ tat ca vibhu niravayavam ca iti kvacid eva tasmin saṃskṛte sati sarve ca tadā eva saṃskṛta karaṇāḥ saṃpannā iti sarve eva śṛṇuyuḥ iti badhira itara vyavasthā dusthitā śabda saṃskāra pakṣasya api ayukta tā 
NM_3,1.529.1	 viṣaye tu saṃskriyamāṇe tasya anavayavasya vyāpinaḥ ca saṃskṛta tvāt sarvatra śravaṇam iti madreṣu abhivyaktaḥ go śabdaḥ kaśmīreṣu api śrūyeta na hi tasya ādhāra dvārakaḥ saṃskāraḥ ākāśa vat ana āśrita tvāt ākāśa āśrita tva pakṣe api tad eka tvāt na api bhāgaśas saṃskriya tego śabdaḥ tasya niravaya tvāt uktam hi alpīyasā prayatnena śabdem uccaritam matiḥ yadi vā na eva gṛhṇāti varṇam vā sakalam sphuṭam iti śrotra śabda saṃskāra pakṣasya api asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.529.2–3,1.529.3	 ubhaya saṃskāra pakṣe tu doṣa dvayasya api anativṛttiḥ sarveṣām grahaṇam sarvatra śravaṇam iti na ca samāna deśānām samāna indriya grāhyāṇām ca bhāvānām pratiniyata vyañjaka vyaṅgya tvam upalabdham gṛhe dadhi ghaṭīm draṣṭum ānītaḥ gṛhamedhinā apūpān api tad deśān prakāśayati dīpakaḥ tasmāt kṛtaka pakṣaḥ eva niyata deśam śabdasya grahaṇam parikalpate na abhi vyakti pakṣaḥ iti śabda nitya tva pakṣe tīvra manda vibhāga ādi asaṃbhavaḥ ca 
NM_3,1.529.4–3,1.530.1	 api ca abhivyakti pakṣe tīvra manda vibhāgaḥ abhibhavaḥ ca śabdasya śabda antareṇa na prāpnoti na hi śabdaḥ tīvraḥ mandaḥ vākaścid svatas tasya bheda abhāvāt saṃskārasya ca tad abhivyakti hetoḥ na kācana tīvra tā manda tā vā yad anusāreṇa viṣaye tathā abuddhiḥ syāt tīvra tva manda tva ādeḥ vāyu dharma tva asaṃbhavaḥ pavana dharmaḥ vā tīvra ādiḥ bhavan katham śrotreṇa gṛhyeta sa avayave hivaḥ tuni sakala viśeṣa grahaṇa agrahaṇa saṃbhavāt tad apekṣayā pratīti bhedaḥ bhavet iha tu niravayave śabde na tathā upapadyate iti tasmāt kṛtaka pakṣaḥ eva śreyām iti śabda nitya tve api śrotra saṃskāra pakṣaḥ yuktaḥ eva 
NM_3,1.530.2	 atra ucyate karaṇa saṃskāra pakṣaḥ eva tāvat astu tat ca karaṇaṃkiñcideva marudbhiḥ upāhita saṃskāram kañcid eva śabdam gṛhṇāti yathā tālu ādi saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ bhavatām mate utpādaka tayā iṣyante kecid varṇasya kasyacid tathā tad vāyu saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ kecid eva naḥ kasyacid grahaṇe śaktāḥ śrotram kurvanti saṃskṛtam yathā ca teṣām utpattau sāmarthya niyamaḥ tava tathā eva eṣām abhivyaktau sāmarthya niyamaḥ mama 
NM_3,1.530.3–3,1.531.0	 vyañjakānām niyamaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ iti ced kaḥ evam āha sahasrākṣaḥ tathā hi pṛthivyām eva vartamānaḥ gandhaḥ samāna deśaḥ bhavati samāna indriya grāhyaḥ ca ghrāṇa eka viṣaya tvāt tasya ca niyata vyañjaka vyaṅgya tā dṛśyate eva kvacid pāvaka saṃparkāt arka aṃśu sparśataḥ kvacid kvacid salila saṃsekāt gandhaḥ abhivyajyate bhuvaḥ 
NM_3,1.531.1–3,1.531.2	 na ca stimita pavana apanodana mātram karaṇasya saṃskāraḥ iṣyate yaḥ sarva sādhāraṇaḥ syāt kintu anyaḥ eva niyataḥ prativiṣayaṃyogya tā lakṣaṇaḥ śrotrasya ākāśa rūpa tve api grahaṇa niyamaḥ yat punar abhyadhāyi nabhasi śrotre abhyupagamyamāne sarva prāṇinām ekam eva śrotram bhavet iti tat api asādhu dharma adharmayoḥ niyāmaka tvāt ākāśasya api ghaṭa ākāśa vat anyā avat cheda upapatteḥ dharma adharma nibandhanaḥ eva badhira itara vibhāgaḥ mīmāṃsakānām ākāśaḥ eva na śrotram 
NM_3,1.531.3–3,1.532.0	 api ca bhavatām eva eṣa doṣaḥ yeṣām ākāśam eva śrotram iti abhyupagama niyamaḥ mīmāṃsakānām tu na avaśyam ākāśam eva śrotram kārya artha āpatti kalpitam tu kim api karaṇa mātram prati puruṣa niyatam śrotra mitinā ati prasaṅgaḥ tathā ca bhartṛ mitraḥ pavana janita saṃskāram eva śrotraṃmanyate śabda saṃskāra pakṣaḥ api sādhīyān 
NM_3,1.532.1	 atha vā viṣaya saṃskāra pakṣaḥ bhavatu tathā api na ati prasaṅgaḥ niyata deśasya eva tatra saṃskārāt na ca asya bhāgaśas saṃskāraḥ niravayava tvāt tathā api jāti vat asya grahaṇa niyamaḥ bhaviṣyati tathā ca bhavatām eva pakṣe yathā sarva gatā jātiḥ piṇḍa deśā eva gṛhyate na ca kārtsnya gṛhītā api piṇḍe anyatra na dṛśyate tathā sarva gataḥ śabdaḥ nāda deśeṣu gṛhyate kārtsnyena ca gṛhītaḥ api punar anyatra gṛhyate piṇḍaḥ abhivyañjakaḥ jāteḥ śabdasya vyañjakaḥ dhvaniḥ āśrita anāśrita tva ādi viśeṣaḥ kva upayujyate tīvra tva manda tva ādayaḥ dhvani dharmāḥ na śabda dharmāḥ 
NM_3,1.532.2–3,1.533.0	 sarva gata tva niravaya tva aviśeṣāt tīvra manda tva ādayaḥ ca dhvani dharma aapi bhavantaḥ śabda vṛtti tayā avabhānti yathā sthūla tva kṛśa tvādayaḥ piṇḍa dharmāḥ api jāti vṛtti tvena kvacid gṛhyantaḥ dṛśyante agṛhīta śābaleya ādi viśeṣasya kṛśāḥ gāvaḥ ityādi pratibhāsa darśanāt tīvra tva manda tva ādayaḥ buddhi kalpitāḥ eva vāyat vā na tīvra manda ādeḥ varṇa dharma tayā grahaḥ buddhiḥ eva tathā udeti vyañjaka anuvidhāyinī tāvantaḥ eva te varṇāḥ pracaya apacaya spṛśaḥ evam ca abhibhavaḥ api eṣām svatas na asti parasparam marudbhiḥ abhibhūyante mārutāḥ iva durbalāḥ tejobhiḥ iva dīpta aṃśoḥ divā dīpa prabhā ādayaḥ śrotra śabda saṃskāra pakṣaḥ api aduṣṭaḥ 
NM_3,1.533.1–3,1.534.0	 dvaya saṃskāra pakṣaḥ api evam samāhitaḥ bhavati ubhayeṣām api doṣāṇām utsāraṇāt tasmāt pratyabhijñā pratyaya prabhāva siddha nitya tvasya śabdasya abhivyaktiḥ eva sādhīyasī śabda nitya tva anitya tva pakṣayoḥ gaurava lāghava vimarśaḥidam ca ālocya tām āryāḥ ! kārya abhivyaṅgya pakṣayoḥ śabdasya grahaṇe gurvī laghvī vā kutra kalpanā  tathā hi bhavantaḥ vaiśeṣikāḥ sāṃkhyāḥ jaināḥ saugatāḥ ca kārya śabda vādinaḥ cārvākāḥ tu varākāḥ kasya evaṃvidhāsu goṣṭhīṣu smṛti patham upayānti ! naiyyāyika vaiśeṣika matayoḥ śabda grahaṇa prakāra anuvādaḥ 
NM_3,1.534.1	 tatra bhavatām vaiśeṣikāṇām ca śabdasya śravaṇe tāvat eṣā tulyā eva kalpanā saṃyogāt vā vibhāgāt vā śabdaḥ upajāyate jātaḥ ca asautiḥ yak ūrdhvam adhas ca sarvatodikkāni kadamba golaka ākāreṇa sajātīya nikaṭa deśāni śabda antarāṇi ārabhate tāni api tathā iti evam vīcī santāna vṛtti ārambha prabandha prāptaḥ antyaḥ śrotra ākāśa janmā śabdaḥ tad samavetaḥ tena eva gṛhyate iti vīcī taraṅga nyāyena śabdāt śabda antara utpattiḥ iti asya nirāsaḥ 
NM_3,1.534.2	 tat iyam tāvat ati ghargharā kalpanā śabdaḥ śabda antaram sūtaḥ iti tāvat alaukikam kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ hi na dṛṣṭaḥ teṣu buddhi vat janyante anantare deśe śabdāḥ sva sadṛśāḥ ca te tiryak ūrdhvam adhas ca iti kā iyam vaḥ śraddadhāna tā  śabda antarāṇi kurvantaḥ katham ca viramanti te na hi vega kṣayaḥ teṣām marutām iva kalpyate kuḍya ādi vyavadhāne ca śabdasya akaraṇam katham vyomnaḥ sarva gata tvāt hi kuḍya madhye vyavasthitiḥ 
NM_3,1.535.1	 atha āvaraṇa ātmaka kuḍya ādi dravya saṃyoga rahitam ākāśam śabda janma ni samavāyi kāraṇam iṣyate tat atra pramāṇam viśeṣe vaktavyam tulya ārambhe ca tīvreṇa mandasya jananam katham śrūyate ca antikāt tīvraḥ śabdaḥ mandaḥ tu dūratas vīcī santāna tulya tvam api śabdeṣu durvacam mūrtimat tva kriyā yoga vega ādi rahita ātmasu śabdaḥ dravyam eva na guṇaḥ 
NM_3,1.535.2–3,1.536.0	 yat api ucyate sajātīya janakaḥ śabdaḥ guṇa tvāt rūpa ādi vat iti tat idam asiddham asiddhena sādhyam guṇa tvasya asiddha tvāt na śabdaḥ pāratantryeṇa kadācid upalabhyate dravya sthaḥ iva rūpa ādiḥ atas asya guṇatā kutas  api ca na śabda antara ārambhakaḥ śabdaḥ guṇa tvāt rūpavat śabdam na ārabhateśabdaḥ śabda tvāt śrotra śabda vat na saṃyoga vibhāgau śabdasya janakau saṃyoga vibhāga tvāt anya saṃyoga vibhāga vat iti ādayaḥ pratihetavaḥ api atra sulabhāḥ iti yat kiñcid etat sa aṅkhya ukta śabda grahaṇa prakāra dūṣaṇam 
NM_3,1.536.1	 kāpilāḥ tu bruvate śrotra vṛttiḥ śabda deśam gacchati sā śabdena vikriyate iti tatra śrotrasya vyāmiśra tvāt nikaṭa deśena eva śabdena tad vṛttiḥ vikriyate na dūra deśena iti atra kaḥ niyamaḥ niyama abhāvāt cakānyakubja prayuktaḥ go śabdaḥ gauramūlake api śrūyeta amūrtā caśrotra vṛttiḥ prasarantī na mūrtaiḥ kuḍya ādibhiḥ abhihantum śakyataḥ iti vyavahitasya api śabdasya śravaṇam syāt vāyau śabda anukūle ca na tasya śravaṇam bhavet gacchantyāḥ pratikūlaḥ hi śrotra vṛtteḥ sa mārutaḥ 
NM_3,1.536.2–3,1.536.3	 dūre api anuvātam śabdasya śravaṇam yat dṛṣṭam prativātam ca nikaṭe api yat aśravaṇam tat asmin pakṣe viparītam syāt vṛtti vṛttimatoḥ bhedaḥ na asti iti indriya vat bhavet vyāpikā vṛttiḥ iti evam katham sarvatra na śrutiḥ jaina ukta śabda grahaṇa prakāra dūṣaṇam ārhatāḥ tvāduḥ sūkṣmaiḥ śabda pudgalaiḥ ārabdha śarīraḥ śabdaḥ sva prabhava bhūmeḥ niṣkramya prati puruṣam karṇa mūlam upasarpati iti tat etat ati su bhāṣitam varṇasya avayavāḥ sūkṣmāḥ santi kecana pudgalāḥ taiḥ varṇaḥ avayavī nāma janyate paśya kautukam teṣām adṛśyamānānām kīdṛśaḥ racanā kramaḥ kena tad sanniveśena kaḥ śabdaḥ upajāyatām  
NM_3,1.537.0	 laghavaḥ avayavāḥ ca ete nibaddhā na ca kenacid na ca enam kaṭhinam kartum varṇa avayavinam kṣamāḥ kṛśaḥ ca gacchan sa katham na vikṣipyeta mārutaiḥ dalaśas vā na bhajyeta vṛkṣa ādi abhihataḥ katham  prayāṇaka avadhiḥ kaḥ ca gacchataḥ asya tapasvinaḥ eka śrotra praviṣṭaḥ vā sa śrūyeta aparaiḥ katham  niṣkamya karṇāt ekasmāt praveśaḥ śravaṇa antare yadīṣyeta katham tasya yugapad bahubhiḥ śrutiḥ śrotṛ saṃkhyā anusāreṇa na nānā varṇa saṃbhavaḥ vaktuḥ tulya prayatna tvāt śrotṛ bheda tad aikyayoḥ tat alam parihāsasya mahataḥ hetu bhūtayā nagna kṣapaṇaka ācārya prajñā cāturya carcayā bauddha ukta śabda grahaṇa prakāra dūṣaṇam 
NM_3,1.537.1–3,1.537.2	 śākya prāyāḥ tu ācakṣate aprāptaḥ eva śabdaḥ śrotra śaktyā gṛhyataiti tat etat ativyāmūḍha bhāṣitam aprāpti tulya tāyām dūra vyavahita ādīnām aśravaṇa kāraṇa abhāvāt prāpya kārita ākhya karma dharma aprasaṅgāt ca na ca cārvāka vat aparīkṣitaḥ eva ayam arthaḥ upekṣitum yuktaḥ iti kāryatva pakṣe amūḥ śrutāḥ tārkika kalpanāḥ atha abhivyakti pakṣe asya śṛṇu śrotriya kalpanām śabda nitya tva pakṣe lāghava varṇanam vivakṣā pūrvaka prayatna preryamāṇaḥ tāvat vegavat tayā kriyāvat tayā cakauṣṭhyaḥ bahis nissarati samīraṇaḥ iti su spaṣṭam etat pratyakṣa nikaṭa pavana vādinām pakṣe pavana samaye vaktṛ vadana nikaṭa nihita hasta sparśena eva 
NM_3,1.538.1	 saḥ upalabhyate anumeya māruta pakṣe api tadā ānīm āsya samīpa sannidhāpita tūlaka karmaṇā saḥ anumīyate sa gacchan sarva todikkaḥ stimita anila nodanam karoti karṇa ākāśe ca prayāti śruti yogyatām sa ca prayatna tīvra tva manda tvena tad ātmakaḥ śabde tathāvidha jñapti hetu tām avalambate sa ca eṣa gacchan= uddāma vega yoga āhita kriyaḥ śaravat vega śāntyā eva na dūram gantum arhati sa mūrtaḥ prasarat mūrtaiḥ aparaiḥ pratibadhyate kuḍya ādibhiḥ atas na asya śrutiḥ vyavahita ātmanaḥ sa vega gati yogi tvāt āgacchati yatas yatas śrotā tatas tatas śabdam āyāntam abhimanyate sa tu śaṅkha ādi saṃyoga preryamāṇaḥ samīraṇaḥ śabdasya avarṇa rūpasya bhavati vyakti kāraṇam śabdaḥ yadi api varṇa ātmā śrotra grāhyaḥ na vidyate tathā api tatra śabda tvam śravaṇena grahīṣyate 
NM_3,1.538.2–3,1.539.1	 tat iha na kadācid asmābhiḥ adhikā kalpanā kṛtā māruta gateḥ asyāḥ sarva loka prasiddha tvāt karṇa ākāśa saṃskāra mātram adṛṣṭam kalpitam tat api kārya arthāpatti gamya tvāt na apūrvam iti apakṣapātinaḥ sabhyāḥ satyam utpatti apekṣayā śabdasya kalpanām āhuḥ abhivyaktau laghīyasīm tat evam abhivyakti pakṣe niyata grahaṇa upapatteḥ pratyabhijñā pratyaya prāmāṇyāt nitya tvam eva upagantavyam saḥ ayaṃga kāraḥ ityādi pratyabhijñāyāḥ ananyathā asiddha tvamyā tu anaikāntika tva uktiḥ dhī karma pratyabhijñayā pratyakṣe codyamānā asau darśayati ati mūḍha tām
