NM_3,1.540.0	 tena anumāna doṣeṇa pratyakṣam na hi dūṣyate siddhānta antara cintā tu bhavet bhṛśam asaṅga tā nirbādham pratyabhijñānam asti ced buddhi karmaṇoḥ tayoḥ api astu nitya tvam no ced kā śabda tulya tā tasmāt nityaḥ pratyabhijñā prabhāvāt siddhaḥ śabdaḥ paśyatām tārkikāṇām arthāpattiḥ pūrvam uktā ca tasmin a sthāyi tve yuktayaḥ ca vyudastāḥ asti ca vede vacanam siddhām anuvadati yat dhruvām vācam tad liṅga darśanāt api nityaḥ śabdaḥ abhimantavyaḥ śikṣā vidaḥ tu pavana ātmakam eva śabdaṃāca kṣaṃte tad asamañja sam a pratīteḥ arhan mata prathita pudgala paryudāsanītyā ca vāyu avayavāḥ api vāraṇīyāḥ ye api sthūla vināśa darśana vaśāt brūyuḥ kṣaṇa dhvaṃsinaḥ bhāvān= te api na śaknuvanti gaditum śabdasya vidhvaṃsitām ante hi kṣaya darśanāt kila tathā teṣām bhramaḥ asmin punar śabde na anta parikṣayau= iti katham kumbha ādi vat bhaṅgitā  
NM_3,1.541.0–3,1.541.2	 śabda anitya tva siddhāntaḥ śabda nitya tve pratyakṣa artha āpattyoḥ apramāṇa tva pratijñāḥ atra brūmahe na khalu bhavat abhihitamet pramāṇa dvayam api śabda nityatām prasādhayitum arhati arthāpattyā śabda nitya tva siddhi dūṣaṇam yāvatā yad artha āpattiḥ avādi darśanasya para artha tvāt iti sā kṣīṇā eva artha pratīteḥ anyathā api upapanna tvāt gatvā ādi jāti dvārā eva śakti grahaḥ bodhaḥ ca 
NM_3,1.541.3	 tatra sādṛśyam api anabhyupagatam eva dūṣita mityasthānekliṣṭāḥ bhavantaḥ gatvā ādi jātīḥ a āśritya sambabdha grahaṇa ādikaḥ artha avagati paryantaḥ vyavahāraḥ prasetsyati gatvā ādi jāti siddhi asiddhi adhīna tvam śabda anitya tva nitya tvayoḥnanu gatvam pratikṣiptam etat eva parīkṣyatām asmin samāpyate vādaḥ marma sthānam idam ca naḥ pratikṣipte ca gatvā ādau na artha saṃpratyayaḥ anyathā pratyabhijñāna bhūmiḥ ca na anyā asti iti vayam jitāḥ siddhe tu gatva sāmānye tatas eva artha vedanam tat eva pratyabhijñeyam iti yūyam parājitāḥ 
NM_3,1.542.0–3,1.542.3	 tena anyat sarvam utsṛjya vāda sthāna kaḍambaram gatvā ādi jāti siddhi artham atha atas prayatāmahe gatvasya jāti tva sādhane upoddhāta racanam tatra idam vicāryatām yaḥ eṣa gakāra bheda pratibhāsaḥ sa kiṃvyañjaka bheda kṛtaḥ uta varṇa bheda viṣayaḥ iti vyañjaka bheda kṛte tasmin eka tvāt gakārasya kiṃvṛtti gatva sāmānyaṃsyāt varṇa bheda viṣaya tve tu tad bheda siddheḥ abheda pratyayasya viṣayaḥ mṛgya eti tad grāhyam aparihāryam gatvasāmānyam gakāra ādi bheda pratibhāsaḥ na vyañjaka bheda kṛtaḥ 
NM_3,1.542.4	 tat ucyate na ayam vyañjaka bheda kṛtaḥ gakāra bheda pratyayaḥ yadi hi vi añjaka bheda adhīnaḥ eṣa bheda pratibhāsaḥ tarhi yara lava ādi varṇa bheda pratyayaḥ api tad kṛtaḥ eva kim iti na bhavati tatas ca sakala varṇa vikalpa atītam ekam anavayavam śabdabrahma vaiyākaraṇa vat abhyupagantavyam yara lava ādi bheda vat gakārāṇām api uccāraṇa bhedāt bhedaḥ eva 
NM_3,1.542.5	 atha manuṣe yara lava ādīnām itaretara vibhakta svarūpa paricchedāt viṣaya bheda kṛtaḥ eva bheda pratyayaḥ na upādhi nibandhanaḥ iti tarhigaṅgā gagana gargā ādau gakāra bheda pratibhāsaḥ api eṣa na vyañjaka bheda adhīna ubhavitum arhati tatra api paraspara vibhinna gakāra svarūpa pratibhāsāt śuka sārikā manuṣyeṣu hi vaktṛ bhede sati vyañjaka nānātva saṃbhāvanayā 
NM_3,1.543.1–3,1.543.2	 varṇa bheda pratyayasya tad kṛta tvam kāmam āśaṅkyeta api vaktṛ eka tve tu gagana āt aukutaḥ tad kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ gakārāṇām uccāraṇa bheda aupādhikaḥ bhedaḥ iti api na yuktam nanu ! tatra api marutaḥ bhinnāḥ eva vyañjakāḥ mukham tu ekam bhavatu !kim tena tat api vā bhinnam iti eke ucyate sa tarhi marutām bhedaḥ yara lava ādiṣu api tulyaḥ iti mā bhūt teṣām api bhedaḥ yara lava ādi bheda abhāve api gakāra dvaya bhedaḥ ghaṭa dvaya bheda vat pratyakṣa siddhaḥ 
NM_3,1.543.3–3,1.544.0	 nanu ! yara lavānām viśeṣa pratītiḥ asti gakāre tu sā na asti iti uktam uccāraṇasya eva tatra bhedaḥ na uccāryasya iti na etat sāram mā bhūt eṣa viśeṣaḥ iti pratītiḥ bheda buddhiḥ tu vidyate eva anyā ca viśeṣa buddhiḥ ucyate anyā ca bheda buddhiḥ iti viśeṣa apratibhāse apikvacit viccheda pratīti viśeṣāt jātya aikye api vyakti bhedaḥ gṛhyate eva nanu ! atra ucyate dṛśyate śābaleya ādi vyakti antara vilakṣaṇāḥ bāhuleya ādi go vyaktiḥ tena bhedaḥ asti vāstavaḥ na tu druta ādi bhedena niṣpannā saṃpratīyate gavyakti antara vicchinnā gavyaktiḥ aparā sphuṭāḥ 
NM_3,1.544.1	 iti na etat yuktam śābalaiyādau prativyakti sāsnā ākhura kakudādi avayava vartinaḥ viśeṣāḥ pratibhāsante te ca sthūla tvāt sugama abhavanti yatra tu tila taṇḍula kulattha ādau pratisiktham viśeṣāḥ na pratibhāsante tatra viśeṣa pratīti abhāve api viccheda pratibhāsaḥ vidyate eva sikthāt sikthā antara tvena pratibhāsāt evam iha api eṣa gakāra viśeṣaḥ iti pratibhāsā bhāve api viccheda grahaṇāt gakāra nānā tvam vyakti bheda grahaṇe asādhāraṇa ākāra apekṣā api na asti 
NM_3,1.544.2	 nanu ! taṇḍula ādau= api sikthāt siktha antare viśeṣāḥ pratibhāsantaḥ eva tad apratibhāse bhedasya api grahītum aśakyatvāt mā evaṃvādīḥ yatne sati caturaśratri koṇa vartula tva ādi viśeṣāḥ api amutra pratibhāsiṣyante evam gakāreṣu api prayatnam vinā api tu prathama akṣa nipātaḥ eva viccheda buddhiḥ utpadyate iti tayā eva nānātva siddhiḥ asādha araṇya grahaṇa abhāve api bheda grahaṇa upapattiḥ 
NM_3,1.544.3–3,1.545.1	 nanu ! na eva anadhigata viśeṣasya viccheda buddhiḥ utpattum arha ti iti viśeṣa buddhiḥ eva viccheda buddhiḥ na etat evam bhramaṇa ādi karma kṣaṇānāṃsūkṣma viśeṣa apratibhāse api viccheda pratibhāsāt tad vyakti tva rūpa viśeṣaḥ tu gakāra dvaye api asti eva nanu ! tatra api viśeṣa grahaṇam kalpyate anyathā viccheda pratīti anupapatteḥ yadi evam varṇeṣu api gagana ādau viccheda pratīti darśanāt kalpyatām viśeṣa grahaṇam gakāra dvaya gata tad vyakti tvasya anaupādhika tvam 
NM_3,1.545.2	 nanu ! asti eva tat kintvaupādhikam sphaṭike rakta tā pratyaya vat viṣamaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ sphaṭikasya śuddhasya dṛṣṭa tvāt lākṣā ādi upādhi nimittakaḥ bhavatu rakta tā pratyayaḥ varṇānām tu nityam eva udātta ādi viśeṣavatām pratibhāsāt tad rahitānām anupalabdheḥ ca naisargikaḥ eva ayaṃbhedaḥ tat yathā buddhīnām ghaṭa paṭa ādi viṣaya viśeṣa śūnyānām asaṃvedanāt prativiṣayam nānātvam tathā varṇānām api pratyudātta ādi viśeṣam nānātvam na ca buddhiḥ ekā eva nityā ca viṣaya bheda upādhi nibandhanaḥ tad bhedaḥ itisāmpratam svayam eva buddhi janma pratyakṣam iti abhidhānāt asmābhiḥ ca buddhi nityatāyāḥ upariṣṭāt nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt 
NM_3,1.545.3–3,1.546.1	 viṣaya bhedāt ca tad bheda abhidhāne viṣayasya api kutas idānīm bhedaḥ buddhi bhedāt iti ced itaretara āśraya prasaṅgaḥ tat imāḥ svatas eva bhedavatyaḥ buddhayaḥ viṣayāṇām api svatas eva bhedaḥ bhavati sa tubuddhibhiḥ jñāyate iti alam artha antara gamanena śukla ādi guṇa bheda vat gakāra ādi bhedaḥ yathā ca śukla guṇasya bhāsvara dhūsara ādi bhedavataḥ nānātvam tathā avarṇasya api udātta ādi bhedavataḥ śukla guṇaḥ api ekaḥ eva āśraya bhedāt tu tad bhedaḥ iti ced aho rasa samārūḍhaḥ bhaṭṭaḥ! karma ekam buddhiḥ api ekā jagati ekaḥ sitaḥ guṇaḥ tat ca etat nityam iti etāḥ strī gṛhe kāmuka uktayaḥ gakāra bheda abhāve ātma bhedaḥ api na syāt 
NM_3,1.546.2–3,1.546.4	 api ca eka ātmavādaḥ api evam eva avataret sukhi duḥkhya ādi bhedasya śarīra bhedena api upapatteḥ advaitasya ca na ati davīyān eṣa panthāḥ iti alam alīka vikatthanena tasmāt buddhi ādi vat sarvadā sa viśeṣāṇām eva varṇānām grahaṇāt nānātvam gaganapada ādiṣu ajupaśleṣa bheda adhīnaḥ gakāra bhedaḥ na vaktum śakyaḥ tatra etat syāt gaganāda avakāra upaśleṣa kṛtaḥ eva bheda pratyayaḥ na svarūpa bhedaḥ iti tat ayuktam akārasya api bhavat mate 
NM_3,1.547.1	 bheda abhāvāt avidyamāne ca tad upaśleṣe digajaḥ diggajaḥ iti bhedena pratibhāsaḥ bhavati eva tathā ca sa madaḥ sammadaḥ paṭaḥ paṭṭaḥ āsanam āsannam malaḥ mallaḥ avikaḥ avikkaḥ patiḥ pattiḥ patanam pattanam iti ādau= api varṇa bheda pratītiḥ artha pratīti bhedaḥ api diś aja diggaja ādau śabda antara nimittakaḥ bhavitum arhati na dvis uccāraṇa kṛtaḥ grantha ādhikyāt artha ādhikyam na uccāraṇa bhedāt śata kṛtvas api prayuktego śabde sāsnādi mad artha vyatirikta vācya saṃpratyaya abhāvāt tathā ca diggajaḥ iti dviga kārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ iti ācakṣate śabda vidaḥ na dvis gakāra auccāritaḥ iti gakāra ādi bhedasya aupādhika tve ghaṭa ādi bhedasya api aupādhika tva āpattiḥ 
NM_3,1.547.2	 nanu ! go guru giri geha āda avajbhede api gakāra pratyaya anuvṛtteḥ ekaeva ayam gakāraḥ mā evam vocaḥ eṣaḥ eva hi bheda pratyayaḥ asmābhiḥ upadarśitaḥ vinā api ca ajupaśleṣam diggaja ādau bheda pratyayaḥ varṇitaḥ na ca vayam abheda pratyayam apahnumahe kintu bheda pratyayasya api abādhitasya bhāvāt ananyathā siddha tvāt ca gavā ādi vat sāmānya viśeṣa rūpa tāṃbrūmaḥ vyañjaka bheda nibandhana tvam tu yaslava ādau= api vaktum śakyam iti uktam eva 
NM_3,1.548.1–3,1.548.3	 api ca śāvaleya ādi bheda pratyayasya api vyañjaka bheda nibandhana tvātekaḥ eva asau syāt go tva ga tvajātyoḥ a viśeṣaḥ nanu ! tatra kaḥ vyañjakaḥ yad bheda kṛtaḥ piṇḍa bheda pratyayaḥ iṣyate āha ca na piṇḍa vyatirekeṇa vyañjakaḥ atra dhvaniḥ yathā piṇḍa vyaṅgyā eva go tva ādi jātiḥ nityam pratīyate iti tat ayuktam go tva jāteḥ gatva vat idānīm avivāda āspadībhūta tvāt piṇḍa bheda pratyayasya cakṣuḥ vyāpāra bhedāt api upapatteḥ gakāra ādi bheda pratīteḥ gavā ādi bheda pratītyaviśeṣaḥ 
NM_3,1.548.4–3,1.548.5	 nanu ! sakṛt api vyāpṛta locanasya paraspara vibhakta piṇḍa pratibhāsobhavati mā evam tadānīm go mātra pratītiḥ eṣa śābaleyaḥ eṣa bāhuleyaḥ iti tu viśeṣa grahaṇe cakṣuḥ vyāpāra bhedaḥ aparihāryaḥ pratyakṣeṇa eva gavi gakāra ādau ca viśeṣasya grahaṇam yadi ca ādya gopiṇḍa bhede prathama akṣa sannipāta jā buddhiḥ subhaga tāṃgatā gakāra bhede tarhi kim kṛtam asyāḥ daurbhāgyam tatra api prathama śrotra vyāpāra velāyām anavagata vyañjaka vibhāgasya api gagana gaṅgā daugakāra bhedaḥ pratibhāsate eva iti alam prasaṅgena 
NM_3,1.549.0–3,1.549.2	 go tva ādi vat gatvā ādi sāmānya sādhana upasaṃhāraḥ tat ayam vastu saṃkṣepaḥ upekṣyatām vā sarvatra sāmānya viśeṣa vyavahāraḥ ! iṣyatām vā go tva ādi vat gakāra bheda vṛtti gatvasāmānyam atva ādikam api gatvā ādi vat jātiḥ eva atvam api gatva vat apratyākhyeyam itaretara vilakṣaṇānām akārāṇāṃhra sva dīrgha pluta ādi bhedena pratibhāsāt yaḥ punar ākāre api akāra pratyabhijñānam brūyāt tasya īkāra ukāra pratītiṣu api akārasya eva grahaṇa prasaktiḥ actvā aviśeṣāt 
NM_3,1.549.3–3,1.550.1	 atha tad aviśeṣe api avarṇāt iva ṛṇasya bhedaḥ iṣyate sa tarhi ākārasya na nihrotavyaḥ evañca sati araṇya araṇya śabdābhyām bhinna artha pratītiḥ upapatsyate udātta anudātta svarita saṃvṛta vivṛta ādi bhedaḥ api śabda vidām pratyakṣaā iva gīta jñānām iva svara grāma bhāṣā vibhāgaḥ tasmāt aṣṭādaśa bhedam akāram ācakṣate atvam ca tad sāmānyam avarṇa kula śabdena vyavaharanti iti hrasva dīrgha tva ādayaḥ varṇa dharmāḥ eva na dhvani dharmāḥ 
NM_3,1.550.2–3,1.550.3	 yat tu dhvani dharmasya api dīrgha ādeḥ artha pratipatti aṅga tvam turaga vega vat uktam tat api ahṛdayaṅgamam śabdāt artham pratipadyantelokāḥ na marudbhyaḥ atha marutām api tathā vyutpatteḥ artha pratīti hetu tvam tarhi vyutpattiḥ eva pramāṇam syāt na śabdaḥ vyutpatteḥ avyabhicārāt śabdasya ca vyabhicārāt iti āḥ tām etat tasmāt gatvā ādi sāmānyaiḥ artha saṃpratyaya ātmanaḥ kāryasya pariniṣpatteḥ na varṇa vyakti nitya tā śabda tva jātya siddhi śaṅkā 
NM_3,1.550.4–3,1.551.0	 aparaḥ āha tiṣṭhatu tāvat dūratas eva gatvā ādya para sāmānyam mahāsāmānyam api śabda tvam varṇeṣu na upapadyate vyakti antara anusandhānam yatra eka vyakti darśane tatra eka rūpa sāmānyam iṣyate tad kṛtam ca tat gakāra śruti velāyām na vakāra avamarśanam bāhuleya parāmarśaḥ śābaleya grahe yathā śabdaḥ śabdaḥ ayam iti evam pratītiḥ tu aprayojikā eṣā hi śrotra gamya tvam upādhim anurudhyate śabda tva jāti siddhiḥ 
NM_3,1.551.1	 tat etat niranusandhānasya abhidhānam anusandhāna pratyayasya sāmānya siddhau= aprayojaka tvāt anusandhānam hi sārūpyāt vijātīyeṣu apibhavati gavaya grahaṇa samaye gopiṇḍa anusandhāna vat tasmāt abādhita eka rūpa pratyaya pratiṣṭhaḥ eva sāmānya vyavahāraḥ samāna buddhi grāhye api sāmānye avasthite kvacid bhavati anya anusandhānam kvacid vā na bhavati api tat asti khaṇḍa muṇḍa ādau piṇḍa sārūpya kāritam gakāra ādiṣu varṇeṣu tad abhāvāt tu na asti tat  na tu sāmānya abhāvāt sāmānyam na sārūpya mātram 
NM_3,1.551.2–3,1.551.3	 na ca sārūpyam eva sāmānyam sāṅkhya vat abhidhātum yuktam vijātīyeṣu api gogavaya ādiṣu tasya dṛṣṭa tvāt yadi ca śabdaḥ śabdaḥ iti anuvṛtta buddheḥ śrotra gamya tva upādhi kṛta tvam ucyate tarhi gavā ādau= api ekabuddheḥ vāha doha ādi eka artha kriyā kāri tva nibandhana tvāt go tva ādi jāti nihnavaḥ bauddhavat mantavyaḥ na ca etat evam tat go tva vat śabda tvam api na pratyākhyeyam brāhmaṇa tva ādi jātīnām pratyakṣa gamya tvam 
NM_3,1.552.2	 etena brāhmaṇa tva ādi sāmānyam api samarthitam veditavyam upadeśa sahāya pratyakṣa gamya tvāt na ca upadeśa apekṣaṇāt apratyakṣa tvam tasyabhavituḥ mahati go tva ādi pratyayasya api sambandha grahaṇa kāle tad apekṣa tva darśanāt uktam ca na hi yat giri śṛṅgam āruhya gṛhyate tata pratyakṣam iti brāhmaṇa tva ādikam na aupādhikam 
NM_3,1.552.3–3,1.552.5	 na ca aupādhikaḥ paiṭhīna sipaippala ādi prabhṛtiṣu brāhmaṇa pratyayaḥ upādheḥ agrahaṇāt aupādhika tvasya go tva ādau= api vaktum śakya tvāt api ca upadeśa nirapekṣam api cakṣuḥ kṣatriya ādi vilakṣaṇām saumya ākṛtim brāhmaṇa jātim avagacchati iti eke tat alam anayā kathayā śabda anitya tve api artha bodha upapattiḥ prakṛtam ucyate gatvā ādibhiḥ jātibhiḥ eva artha saṃpratyaya upapatteḥ yat uktam darśanasya para artha tvāt iti etat ayuktam 
NM_3,1.552.6–3,1.553.1	 etena sarvatra yaugapadyāt iti etat api pratyuktam sambandha niyamasya ga tva ādibhyaḥ eva siddheḥ śabda bheda pratītiḥ naḥ uccāraṇa bheda ābalambanā yat api saṅkhyā bhāvāt kṛtu a sucprayoga darśanam udagrāhi tat api vyabhicāri kṛtam kāntasya tanu aṅgyā tris apāṅga vilokanam catur āliṅganam gāḍham aṣṭa kṛtvas ca cumbanam iti tad bhede api darśanāt 
NM_3,1.553.2	 atha tatra strīpuṃsayoḥ abhede cumbana ādi kriyā mātra bhedaḥ eva iti ucyate tathā api apūrveṣu brāhmaṇeṣu bhuktavatsu pañca kṛtvas brāhmaṇāḥ bhukta bantaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate śabda bhedasya pratyakṣa siddha tvam evam śabde api tad saṅkhyā vyavahāraḥ hi dṛśyate kavinā sat anuprāse nibaddhe akṣara ḍambare gakāraḥ bahavaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ iti vyavaharanti hi yat api pratyabhijñānam tat dvārakam udāhṛtam tasya api siddhe prāmāṇye jāti ālambanatā bhavet nṛtta abhinaya ceṣṭā ādi pratyabhijñānataḥ vayam na śabda pratyabhijñānam uttārayitum īśmahe viśeṣam pratyabhijñāne na paśyāmaḥ manāk api 
NM_3,1.554.0–3,1.554.1	 stambha ādi pratyabhijñāsu na tadā eva vināśa dhīḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga pratīkāram tena tāḥ kartum īśate śabdasya pratyabhijñāna velāyām eva dṛśyate śabda rūpasya vidhvaṃsaḥ iti tat nitya tā kutas stambha ādi pratyabhijñāyāḥ śabda pratyabhijñāyāḥ ca viśeṣaḥ yadi api kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge pratyabhijñā prāmāṇyam asmābhiḥ api samarthayiṣyate tathā api stambha ādi pratyabhijñāyāḥ śabda pratyabhijñāyāḥ eṣaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat atra dhvastaḥ śabdaḥ iti tadā eva pratyayaḥ jāyate ataeva tirohite api bhāvāt iyam apramāṇam pratyabhijñā iti āhuḥ śabda pratyabhijñāyāḥ vastu aikya ālambanatva asaṃbhavaḥ yadi api dhriyate asmākam śabdaḥ dvitrān api kṣaṇān pratyabhijñā tu kālena tāvatā na avakalpate 
NM_3,1.554.2–3,1.555.1	 tathā hi śabdaḥ utpadyate tāvat tatas sva viṣayam jñānam janayati ajanakasya pratibhāsā yogāt tatas tena jñānena śabdaḥ gṛhyate tatas saṃskāra bodhaḥ tatas pūrva jñāta śabda smaraṇam tatas tat saci vaṃśrotram manaḥ vā śabda pratyabhijñānam janayiṣyati tadā śabdaḥ grahīṣyate iti iyat kutas asya dīrgham āyuḥ pratyabhijñā prāmāṇyāt eva tāvat āyuḥ tasya kalpyate iti ced satyam kalpyeta yadi vināśa pratyayaḥ tadā evana syāt 
NM_3,1.555.2–3,1.555.3	 api ca go śabdaḥ ayam aśva śabdaḥ ayam iti tad abhidhāna viśeṣa ullekhāt nānā anusmaraṇam tasya tadā eva avaśyam āpatet vijñāna ayaugapadyāt ca kālaḥ dīrghataraḥ bhavet grahaṇāt pūrvam śabda sthiti asaṃbhavaḥ yat api udita muhāma megha śyāmāsu rātriṣu sāmyam saudāminī dhāma janyayā pratyabhijñayā tat asat kāla dairghyeṇa tad avasthiti asaṃbhavāt vidyut dṛṣṭe ca vṛkṣa ādau nāśa saṃvitti a saṃbhavāt pratyabhijñāyāḥ aindriyaka tva pakṣaḥ pratyabhijñā nāma smaryamāṇa anubhūyamāna sāmānādhikaraṇya grāhiṇī saṃskāra saciva indriya janyā pratītiḥ iti kecid pratyabhijñāyāḥ kevala māna satva pakṣaḥ 
NM_3,1.555.4	 anye manyante smaryamāṇa pūrva jñāna viśeṣita artha grāhi tvāt pratyabhijñāyāḥ tad viśeṣaṇasya ca arthasya bāhya indriya grāhya tva anupapatteḥ stambha ādau= api mānasī pratyabhijñā iti nirbandhaḥ tu iha na asmākam sā yathā astu tathā astu vā śabde vināśa jñānāt tu na sā nitya tva sādhikāḥ aikya pratyabhijñā apekṣayā vināśa pratyakṣam prabalambādhya bādhaka bhāve tu niyamaḥ nanu kiṃkṛtaḥ śabdasya pratyabhijñāna vināśa pratibhāsayoḥ ucyate pratyabhijñānam anyathā api upapadyate gatvā ādi jāti viṣayam yat vā sādṛśya hetukam śabda vināśa pratyakṣasya anyathā siddha tva asaṃbhavaḥ nanu abhivyañjaka dhvaṃsāt nāśadhīḥ api setsyati tad asau= api bādhyā astu yat vā bhavatu saṃśayaḥ mā evam vināśitā buddhiḥ bheda budhi upabṛṃhitāḥ sā ca iyam ca anyathā siddhe iti vaktum asāṃpratam 
NM_3,1.557.0–3,1.557.2	 pratyabhijñā ca sa apekṣā nirapekṣā tu abhāva dhīḥ tena evamādau viṣaye pratyabhijñā eva bādhyate śabda abhāvasya jhagiti grahaṇāt tat pratyabhijñāyāḥ ca pūrva anusandhāna ādi savyapekṣa tvāt pratyabhijñāyai anyathā siddhiḥ eva autsargikī api ca pratyabhijñā vyabhicarantī karma ādiṣu gṛhyate tena asya aṃśabde api abhāva pratyaya upahata vapuṣi kaḥ samāśvāsaḥ na ca idam pratyakṣe apianaikāntika tva udbhāvanam api tu vināśaka pratyaya pratihata prabhāva apratyabhijñāḥ nitya tvam karma ādiṣu iva śabde api na sādhayitum prabhavati iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ eṣa pradarśyate pratyakṣa sthale api dṛṣṭānta apekṣā 
NM_3,1.557.3–3,1.557.4	 nanu pratyakṣe api dṛṣṭāntasya kaḥ avasaraḥ satyam grāhaka astubhavādṛśāḥ svayam anavabudhyamānāḥ evam budhyante buddhi karmaṇoḥ sarvathā nitya tva asaṃbhavaḥ yat tu pravṛddha rabhasa tayā buddhi karma ādau= api nitya tva samarthanam tat atyantam alaukikam iti uktam kim nāma śabda nitya tva samarthana tṛṣā aaturaḥ jaṅgamam sthāvaram ca eva sakalam pātum icchasi 
NM_3,1.557.5–3,1.558.1	 tasmāt ala mati rabhasa pravṛttābhiḥ buddhi karma ādi nitya tva samarthana kathābhiḥ śabda nitya tve niyata grahaṇa samarthanam na yuktimat yat punar abhivyakti pakṣe śabdasya grahaṇe niyama abhāvam āśaṅkya śrotra saṃskāreṇa viṣaya saṃskāreṇa ubhaya saṃskāreṇa vā niyataṃgrahaṇam upavarṇitam tad vañcanā mātram samāna deśānāṃsamāna indriya grāhyāṇām pratiniyata vyañjaka vyaṅgya tva adarśanāt śabda nitya tve grahaṇa niyama asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.558.2	 ye punar atra gandhāḥ udāhṛtāḥ te samāna indriya grāhya abhavanti na samāna deśāḥ eka bhūmi āśrita tvena tulya deśa tva kalpane bhavet samāna deśa tvam himavat vindhyayoḥ api ekatve api bhuvaḥ bhānti padārthāḥ pārthivāḥ pṛthak vyajyante tad adhiṣṭhānāḥ gandhāḥ taiḥ taiḥ nibandhanaiḥ bhavantu anāśritāḥ śabdāḥ yadi vā aakāśa saṃśritāḥ sarvathā bhinna deśa tvam eṣām vaktum na śakyate aupādhika ākāśa bhedāt api grahaṇa niyama asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.558.3	 nanu yathā ekatve api nabhasaḥ tad bhāga kalpanayā prati puruṣam śrotra indriya bhedaḥ evam tad bhāga kalpanayā eva śabdānām api asamāna deśa tvāt niyata vyañjaka vyaṅgyatā bhaviṣyati na evam upapadyate yatra eva vaktṛ mukha ākāśa deśe śrotṛ śrotra ākāśa deśe vā go śabdaḥ upalabdhaḥ tatra eva aśva śabdaḥ idānīm upalabhyate na punar atimukta kusume yaḥ upalabdhaḥ gandhaḥ sa bandhūke madhūka ivā kadācid upalabhyate iti tasmāt samāna deśa tvāt na vyaktau niyamaḥ bhavet utpattau tu vyavasthāyām tad bhedaḥ upapadyate 
NM_3,1.559.0–3,1.559.1	 nādaiḥ saṃskriyatām śabdaḥ śrotram vā dvayam eva vā sarvathā niyamaḥ na asti vyañjakeṣu iti niścayaḥ vyavasthā vyañjakānām ced ucyate adṛṣṭa kāritā utpattau dṛśyamānāyām dṛṣṭam api avirodhakam śrotra saṃskāra pakṣaḥ na yuktaḥ na ca stimita māruta apanayana vyatiriktaḥ kaścana śrotra saṃskāra uvidyate tatra ca atiprasaṅgaḥ uktaḥ etad atirikta saṃskāra kalpanāyāṃtu adṛṣṭa kalpanā sthire ca śabda saṃskāra grāhiṇi sati punar abhivyaktasya api go śabdasya śravaṇam syāt tad grahaṇa hetoḥ saṃskārasya sthira tvāt tad kṣaṇika tve tu śabda kṣaṇika tā eva sādhvī pratīyamāna tvāt śrotra indriyasya saṃskāra rūpa tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.559.2–3,1.560.1	 yat tu bhartṛ mitraḥ tam eva saṃskāram śrotra indriyam abhyupaiti tat idam apūvikam kim api pāṇḍityam indriyasya hi saṃskāryasyasaṃskāraḥ na saṃskāraḥ eva indriyam loka āgama viruddha tvāt prati puruṣam yāvat śabdam bhinnasya kṣaṇikasya ca indriyasya kalpanam anupapannam anaśvara tve tu śaśvat eva śabda kolāhala prasaṅgaḥ iti yat kiñcid etat bhaṭṭena eva sa upahāsam eṣa dūṣitaḥ pakṣaḥ iti kim atra vimardena! bhaṭṭā uktā bhartṛ mitra nirākaraṇa prakriyā na sādhīyasī yat api bhaṭṭaḥ āha yadi tu avaśyam vaktavyaḥ tārkikā ukti viparyayaḥ tatas veda anusāreṇa kāryā diś śrotra tā matiḥ iti tat api asāṃpratam diśām kārya antara ākṣepāt āgamāni aparatvataḥ āhopuruṣikā mātram diś dravya śrotra kalpanam 
NM_3,1.560.2	 indriyāṇām bhautika tvasya sādhayiṣyamāṇa tvāt diśaḥ caa mūrta tvāt na indriya prakṛti tvam vyāpaka tva aviśeṣe vā kāla ātmanoḥ api tathā abhāva prasaṅgaḥ tayoḥ anyatra vyāpāraka tvāt na indriya prakṛti tvam iti ced diś dravye api tulyam etat āgamaḥ tu anya paraḥ eva yathā hi sūryam cakṣuḥ gamayatāt diśaḥ śrotram itipaṭhyate evam antarikṣam asum iti ca paṭhyate eva na ca āsavaḥ antarikṣa prakṛtikāḥ pavana ātmaka tvāt tasmāt kṛtaṃdiśāḥ ākāśa deśaḥ eva karṇa śaṣkulī avacchinnaḥ śabda nimitta upabhoga prāpaka dharma adharma upanibaddhaḥ śrotram iti uktam nitya śabda abhivyakti vyavasthā na dharma adharma adhīnā yuktā 
NM_3,1.560.3	 nanu ! dharma adharma kṛta śrotra niyama vat abhivyakti niyamaḥ api śabdasyatad kṛtaḥ eva bhaviṣyati kim iti tad aniyamaḥ nitya tva pakṣe ca udyata eti na etat yuktam cakṣuḥ ādi indriyāṇām vaikalyam adṛṣṭa nibandhanaṃandhakāra prabhṛtiṣu dṛśyate na punar padārtha sthitiḥ adṛṣṭa vaśāt viparivartate vyañjaka dharma atikrame hi himam api śaityam svadharmam atikrāmet vyañjakeṣu niyamaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ iti uktam dṛṣṭe ca varṇa bhede niyata upalabdhi hetau saṃbhavati sati kim ayam adṛṣṭa mastake bhāraḥ āropyate 
NM_3,1.561.0–3,1.561.1	 śabda nitya tve tīvra manda ādi vibhāgaḥ durnirbahaḥ katham ca abhivyakti pakṣe tīvra manda vibhāgaḥ  tīvra tā ādayaḥ hi varṇa dharmāḥ vā syuḥ dhvani dharmā vā varṇa dharma tve tīvra ātgakārāt anya tvam mandasya iti asmad mata anupraveśaḥ dhvani dharma tva pakṣe tu śrotreṇa grahaṇam katham na hi vāyu gataḥ vegaḥ śravaṇena upalabhyate tīvra tva manda tva ādeḥ dhvani dharma tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.561.2–3,1.561.3	 yat tu vyakti dharmāḥ kṛśa tva sthūla tva ādayaḥ jāta abupalabhyante iti darśitam tat kāmam upapadyeta api jāteḥ vyakteḥ tad dharmāṇām ca samāna indriya grāhya tvāt iha tu sparśana grāhyaḥ pavanaḥ atīndriyaḥ atha vā tad dharmāḥ śravaṇe śabde gṛhyante iti vismayaḥ tīvra tva manda tva ādeḥ buddhi dharma tva abhāvaḥ yat tu buddhiḥ eva tīvra mandavatī iti tat atīva subhāṣitam asati viṣaya bhede buddhi bheda anupapatteḥ kiñca nitya parokṣā te buddhiḥ evam ca nāda vat tad agrahe na tīvra ādi tad dharma graha saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.562.0	 aho tīvra ādayaḥ tīvre prapāte patitā amī yaḥ gṛhyate na tad dharmā yat dharmā sa na gṛhyate śabda nitya tve tīvreṇa mandasya abhibhavaḥ api durnirūpaḥyaḥ ca abhibhava vṛttāntaḥ tvad mate marutām asau anile ca abhibhūte api śabdaḥ na śrūyate katham  dīpe abhibhūte raviṇā na hi rūpam na gṛhyate niyata vyañjaka tvam tu pratikṣiptam adarśanāt dhvanau vāyu guṇe śabda tva grahaṇā saṃbhavaḥyat tu śaṅkha ādi śabdānām śrotra grāhya tva siddhaye śabda tvam tatra tat grāhyam iti avādi tat api asat satyam vadata dṛṣṭam vā śrutam vā kvacid īdṛśam āśrayasya parokṣa tve tad sāmānya upalambhanam śabdaḥ na te asti avarṇa ātmā na śaṅkhaḥ varṇa sambhavaḥ na nāda vṛtti śabda tvam iti tad grahaṇam katham  
NM_3,1.563.0–3,1.563.1	 śabda nitya tva pakṣe lāghava upapāda nam aprayojakam eva yat punar saṃpradhāritam vyaṅgya kārya pakṣayoḥ kva śabda grahaṇe gurvī kalpanā bhavati kva vā laghvī iti tat api maula pramāṇa vicāra sāpekṣa tvāt aprayojakam yadi maula pramāṇena sādhitā nitya śabda tā tvad uktā kalpanā sādhvī mad uktā tu viparyaye śabda nitya tva pakṣe śabdasya sarva dikṣu grahaṇa asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_3,1.563.2	 kauṣṭhyena bahis prasaratā samīraṇena sarvatas stimita māruta apasaraṇaṃkriyate iti etat eva tāvat alaukikam kalpitam agneḥ ūrdhva jvalanam vāyoḥ tiryak gamanam aṇu manasoḥ ca ādyam karma iti adṛṣṭa kāritāni iti marutām tiryak gamana svabhāva tvāt ūrdhvam adhas ca śabda śravaṇam na bhavet yāvat na veginā anyena preritaḥ mātariśvanāḥ tāvat naisargikaḥ vāyuḥ na tiryak gatim ujjhati adhomukha prayuktaḥ api śabdaḥ ūrdhvam pratīyate uttāna vadana uktaḥ api na adhas na śrūyate ca saḥ kadamba golaka ākāra śabda ārambhaḥ hi saṃbhavet na punar dṛśyate loke tādṛśī marutām gatiḥ ākaṇṭha ānaddha nī randhra carma āvṛta mukha uditaḥ śabdaḥ yaḥ śrūyate tatra na kauṣṭhya anila sarpaṇam 
NM_3,1.564.1–3,1.564.2	 kuḍya ādi pratibandhena bāyoḥ aprasaraṇam bhavadbhiḥ api kathitam eva nirvivara carma puṭa uparuddhaḥ api asau na prasaret kauṣṭhya mārutasya śabda abhivyañjaka tva asaṃbhavaḥ api ca sarvatas niruddha sarva dvārasya api jaṭhare gura gurā śabdaḥ manda agneḥ śrūyate atra kutas vyañjakānām kauṣṭhī a pavanānām nissṛtiḥ romakūpa nissṛtānām api sūkṣma tayā stimita bāhya vāyu apasaraṇa sāmarthya abhāvaḥ kauṣṭhya mārutasya bāhya vāyu apasaraṇe śaktiḥ api na bhavati 
NM_3,1.564.3–3,1.564.4	 kiñca manāk api bahis vāyau vāti na śabda śravaṇam syāt iti durbalaḥ api bāhyaḥ pavanaḥ prabalāt api kauṣṭhyavāyoḥ balīyān bhavati iti katham tena apasāryeta prasiddha bāhya vāyu apekṣayā vilakṣaṇāḥ śabdāvāraka vāyavaḥ na santi eva anyaḥ eva sūkṣmāḥ vāyavaḥ śabda āvaraṇa kāriṇaḥ na punar eteparidṛśyamānāḥ śyāmā kala tālā asya upadeśinaḥ mātariśvānaḥ iti ced na viśeṣe pramāṇa abhāvāt yam ca sūkṣmāḥ api vāyavaḥtirodadhati tam sutarām balīyāṃsaḥ api vivṛṇuyuḥ iti yat kiñcid etat siddhānta ukta śabda grahaṇa prakāraḥ eva sādhīyān 
NM_3,1.564.5	 tasmāt sajātīya śabda santāna ārambha pakṣaḥ eva yukti anuguṇaḥ tathā hi sajātīya guṇa ārambhiṇaḥ guṇāḥ tāvat dṛśyante eva rūpa ādayaḥ amūrtā api ca buddhiḥ buddhi antaram ārabhamāṇā dṛśyate deśa antare apisā eva kāryam ārabhate pathi gacchataḥ devadatta ādeḥ ekasmāt ātma pradeśāt pradeśa antare buddhi utpāda darśanāt kārya ārambha viratiḥ api bhavati adṛṣṭa adhīna saṃsargāṇām sahakāriṇām anavasthānāt 
NM_3,1.565.0–3,1.565.1	 tīvreṇa api śanais evam atīvra ārambha sambhavaḥ sīdat saciva sāmarthya sāpekṣa kṣīṇa vṛttinā vīcī santāna dṛṣṭāntaḥ kiñcid sāmyāt udāhṛtaḥ na tu vega ādi sāmarthyam śabdānām asti apām iva nirāvaraṇa meba ākāśam śabda utpatti kāraṇam yat tu kuḍya ādi vyavadhāne kim iti viramati śabda santāna ārambhā eti na eṣa doṣaḥ nirāvaraṇasya hi vyomnaḥ śabda ārambhesamavāyi kāraṇa tvam tathā adarśanāt kalpyate na ākāśa mātrasya iti śabdasya āśrita tvāt guṇa tva sādhana pakṣaḥ tad nirākaraṇam ca 
NM_3,1.565.2–3,1.565.3	 yat api guṇa tvam asiddham śabdasya iti tatra kecita śrita tvāt guṇa tvam ācakṣate tat ayuktam āśrita tvam guṇa tve hi na prayojakam iṣyate ṣaṇṇām api padārthānām āśrita tvasya saṃbhavāt diś kāla paramāṇu ādi niti a dravya atirekiṇaḥ āśritāḥ ṣaṭ apīṣyante padārthāḥ kaṇa bhojinā na ca vyoma āśrita tvam api śabdasya pratyakṣam apratyakṣe nabhasitad āśrita tvasya api apratyakṣa tvāt ākāśa apratyakṣa tve api śabda pratyakṣa tvam upapadyatekatham ādhāra pārokṣye śabda pratyakṣata iti ced yathā evā aatma parokṣa tve buddhi ādeḥ upalambhanam 
NM_3,1.565.4–3,1.566.2	 etat eva asiddham iti ced alam bāda antara gamanena upariṣṭāt nirṇeṣyamāṇa tvāt kim etarhi śabdasya guṇa tve pramāṇam pariśeṣa anumānam itibrūmaḥ prasaktayoḥ dravya karmaṇoḥ pratiṣedhe sāmānyādau= aprasaṅgāt ca guṇa ā iva avaśiṣyate śabdaḥ śabdasya adravya tvam katham punar na dravyam śabdaḥ eka dravya tvāt adravyam vā bhavati dravyam ākāśa paramāṇu ādi aneka dravyam vā dvaṇuka ādi kārya dravyam eka dravyam tu śabdaḥ eka ākāśa āśrita tvāt tasmāt na dravyam śabdasya karma ādi bhinna tvam 
NM_3,1.566.3–3,1.566.5	 na api śabdaḥ karma śabda antara janaka tvāt karmaṇaḥ hi samāna jāti ārambhaka tvam na asti sattā śabda tva ādi sāmānya sambandhāt ca sāmānya ādi traya prasaṅgaḥ asi anāsti iti pāriśeṣyāt guṇaḥ eva śabdaḥ śabdasya guṇa tva sādhanam nanu ! guṇa tva siddhau satyām ākāśa āśrita tvam śabdasya bhaviṣyati guṇasya dravyān āśritasya adarśanāt pṛthivī ādīnām ca śabda āśraya tva anupapatteḥ tatas ca guṇa tve sati eka dravya tvam eka dravya tve sati guṇa tvam iti itaretara āśraya tvam 
NM_3,1.566.6–3,1.567.1	 tathā ca samāna jātīya ārambhaka tvam api guṇa tva siddhi mūlam eva guṇa tve sati śabdasya ākāśa āśrita tvāt tad ātmakena śrotreṇa grahaṇam tat ca deśa antara gata saṃyoga vibhāga prabhavasya śabdasya santānam antareṇa śrotra deśa prāpti abhāvāt na sidhyati iti guṇa tva siddhi mūlā santāna kalpanā santāna kalpanāyām ca samāna jāti ārambhaka tvāt karma vyavacchede sati guṇa tva siddhiḥ iti ita retara āśraya tvam eva 
NM_3,1.567.2	 ucyate na ubhayatra api eṣa doṣaḥ śrotra grāhya tvāt eva śabdasya ākāśa āśrita tvam kalpyate samāna jātīya ārambhaka tvam ca guṇa tvāt ākāśa eka deśaḥ hi śrotram iti prasādhitam etat prāpya kāri tvaṃca indriyāṇām vakṣyate na ca ākāśānāśrita tve śabdasya śrotreṇa prāptiḥ bhavati na ca aprāptasya grahaṇam iti tad āśrita tvam kalpyate 
NM_3,1.567.3–3,1.567.5	 evam samāna jātīya ārambhaka tvam api tatas eva śrāvaṇa tvāt dūra vartinaḥ śabdasya śravaṇe sati kalpyate na tu guṇa tvāt itinā itaretara āśrayam śabdasya kārya tvāt api ākāśa āśrita tvam sādhayitum śakyam kārya tvāt ākāśa āśrita tvam kalpyate iti eke nanu ! kārya tvāt api ākāśa āśrita tva kalpanāyām tad avastham eva itaretara āśrayam kārya tvāt ākāśa āśrita tvam ākāśa āśrita tve sati niyata grahaṇa pūrvam pūrva rītyā kāryatvam iti na etat evam bheda vināśa pratibhāsābhyām eva kāryatva siddheḥ 
NM_3,1.567.6–3,1.567.7	 kimarthaḥ tarhi niyata grahaṇa samarthanāya ayam iyān prayāsaḥ kriyate niyata grahaṇam api kārya pakṣa anuguṇam iti darśayitum na punar eṣa eva kārya tve yuktiḥ iti alam sūkṣma īkṣikayā śabdasya karma bhinna tvam pratyakṣa siddham iti pakṣaḥ aparaḥ āha parispanda vilakṣaṇa tvasya pratyakṣa tvāt akarma tvaṃśabdasya sādhyate na samāna jāti ārambhaka tvāt iti itaretara āśraya sparśaḥ api na asti iti tasmāt sarvathā pariśeṣa anumānāt śabdasyaguṇa tva siddhiḥ 
NM_3,1.568.0–3,1.568.2	 śabdasya guṇa tve api mahān alpaḥ iti ādivyabahāraḥ na ayuktaḥ katham tarhi asya mahat tva ādi yogaḥ nirguṇāḥ guṇāḥ iti hikāṇādāḥ asti hi pratītiḥ mahān śabdaḥ iti samāna jātīya guṇa abhiprāyam tat kaṇāda vacanam iti na doṣaḥ tasmāt ākāśaguṇaḥ śabdaḥ api ca yathā aatma guṇa tā hi icchā dveṣa ādeḥ upapatsyate śabdaḥ nayena tena eva bhaviṣyati nabhaḥ guṇaḥ śabdasya śabda antara janaka tvam yuktam eva 
NM_3,1.568.3	 ye tu samāna jātīya śabda ārambhaka tva niṣedha hetavaḥ śabda tvātitya ādayaḥ paraiḥ upanyaḥ tāḥ teṣām aprayojaka tvāt na sādhana tvam ittham santāna vṛttyā ca śabda grahaṇa sambhave kalpanā alpatarā asmākam na śabda vyakti vādinām śākyakāpila nirgrantha grathita prakriyām prati yat tu dūṣaṇam ākhyātam asmākam priyam eva tat 
NM_3,1.569.1–3,1.569.3	 tasmāt kārya pakṣe niyata grahaṇa upapatteḥ abhivyakti pakṣe catad abhāvāt kāryaḥ eva śabdaḥ iti sthitam tat idam uktam sūtra kṛtā ādimattvā t aindriyaka tvāt kṛtaka vat upacārāt ca anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti ādima tvāt iti saṃyoga vibhāga ādīnām śabde kāraka tvam na vyañjaka tvam iti darśitam atas ca na prayatna ānantarīyaka tvaṃ ana ekāntikam 
NM_3,1.569.4–3,1.569.5	 aindriyaka tvāt iti kārya pakṣaḥ eva śabdasya niyatam grahaṇam iti uktam prati puruṣam pratyuccāraṇam ca śabda bhedasya aindriyaka tvāt itivā hetu arthaḥ tena pratyabhijñā durāśā śrotriyāṇām apākṛtā bhavati kṛtaka vat upacārāt iti tīvra manda vibhāga abhibhava ādi vyavahāra adarśanāt sukha duḥkha ādi vat anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti darśitam 
NM_3,1.569.6–3,1.569.7	 tathā prāk ūrdhvam uccāraṇāt anupalabdheḥ āvaraṇa anupalabdheḥ ca iti anena sūtreṇa śabda abhāva kṛtam eva tat agrahaṇam iti uktam na histimitāḥ vāyavaḥ śabdam āvarītum arhanti mūrtam hi mūrtena vyavadhīyate na amūrtam ākāśa ādi vat na ca prakṛtyā eva ākāśa ādi vat ati indriyaḥ śabdaḥ tasmāt kṣaṇika pratīteḥ tad kālam eva śabdasya avasthāna m itia sthāna hetoḥ api na anyathā siddha tvam 
NM_3,1.570.0–3,1.570.2	 vārtika ukta śabda anitya tva sādhana prakāraḥ vārtika kṛtā śabda anitya tve sādhanam abhihitam anityaḥ śabdaḥ jātimat tve satya smad ādi bāhya karaṇa pratyakṣa tvāt ghaṭa vat iti kumārila ukta vārtika dūṣaṇasya uddhāraḥ yat tu atra jātīnām api jātimat tvāt anaikāntika tvam udbhāvitam eka artha samavāyena jātiḥ jātimatī yatas iti tat atyantam anupapannam nissāmānyā nisāmānya ādīni iti su prasiddha tvāt na hi ghaṭe ghaṭa tva pārthiva tve staḥiti ghaṭa tva sāmānye api pārthiva tva sāmānyam asti iti śakyate vaktum atas niravadya eva ayam hetuḥ 
NM_3,1.571.1–3,1.571.2	 tena yat ucyate jātimattva aindriya tva ādi vastu sanmātra bandhanam śabda anitya tva sidhi artham kaḥ vadet yaḥ na tārkikaḥ iti tad avidita tārkika parispandasya vyāhṛtam mīmāṃsaka ukta śabda nitya tva hetūnām eva aprayojaka tvam iha tu aprayojakāḥ hetavaḥ bhavanti hyastana uccāritaḥ tasmāt go śabdaḥ adya api vartate go śabda jñāna gamya tvāt yathā uktaḥ adya eṣa gauḥ iti vijñāna grāhya tā nāma vastu svābhāvya bandhanā nitya tve kṛtaka tve vā na khalu eṣā prayojikā aprayojaka tā ca evaṃprāyāṇām ca evam ucyate svayam ca ete prayujyante hetu tvena iti kim nu idam śabda anitya tva vicāra nigamanam evam nitya tve durbalaḥ yukti mārgaḥ tasmāt mantavyaḥ kāryaḥ eva iti śabdaḥ vācaḥ yukti tve vaidikaḥ yaḥ anuvādaḥ nyāye pratyukte kiṃphalaḥ tad prayogaḥ 
NM_3,1.572.0–3,1.572.1	 śabdasya asthira tva upasaṃhāraḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅgi bhāvasya abhāvāt api śabdasya kṣaṇika tām na vaktum alam sthūla vināśa bhāvāt iti yat uktam tat api anṛtam sṛkṣma vināśa apekṣī nāśaḥ sthūla sthirasya kumbha ādeḥ prakṛti taralasya nāśaḥ śabdasya saḥ eva hi sthūlaḥ sattvāt yadi kṣaṇika tām kathayet purā vā śabdaḥ tadā eṣa katham akṣaṇikaḥ abhidheyaḥ yukti antarāt yadi tat eva hi tarhi cintyam kim prauḍhi vāda bahu māna parigraheṇa alam ativitata uktyā tyajyatām nitya vādaḥ kṛtakaḥ iti naya jñaiḥ gṛhyatām eṣa śabdaḥ sati ca kṛtaka bhāve tasya kartā purāṇaḥ kavi raviḥ ala śaktiḥ yuktaḥ eva indu mauliḥ iti śrī jayanta bhaṭṭa kṛtau nyāyamañjaryām tṛtīyam āhnikam 
NM_4,1.573.0–4,1.573.2	 vedānām pauruṣeya tva anumānam evam kṛtaka tve varṇānām sādhite sati varṇa ātmanaḥ padāt prabhṛti sarvatra puruṣasya svātantryam siddham bhavati pada nitya tva pakṣe api vākye tat racana ātmake kartṛ tva saṃbhavāt puṃsaḥ vedaḥ katham akṛtrimaḥ tathā ca vaidikyaḥ racanāḥ kartṛ pūrvikāḥ racanā tvāt laukika racanā vat eṣa ca pañca lakṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ prayojakaḥ ca iti gamakaḥ eva na hetvābhāsaḥ veda pauruṣeyatva anumāne dūṣaṇa uddhāraḥ 
NM_4,1.573.3–4,1.574.2	 na tāvat ayam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ śannaḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye ityādiṣu veda vākya sandarbheṣu pada racanāyāḥ svara krama ādi viśeṣavatyāḥ pratyakṣa tvena pakṣe hetoḥ vartamāna tvāt na api viruddhaḥ kartṛ pūrvakatvavati sa pakṣe kumāra sambhavā dauracanā tvasya vidyamāna tvāt na api anaikāntikaḥ kartṛ rahiteṣu gagana ādiṣu gagana kusuma ādiṣuvā racanāyāḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt na api kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣeṇa āgamena vā vede vaktra bhāva niścaya anutpādāt na api sat pratipakṣaḥ prakaraṇa cintā hetoḥ sthāṇu puruṣa viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ iva hetu tvena anabhidhānāt 
NM_4,1.574.3	 na api paramāṇu anitya tāyām iva mūrta tvam aprayojakam idam sādhanam racanā vyāpārāṇām kartṛ vyā pāra sādhya tva avadhāraṇāt yathādhūmasya jvalana adhīnaḥ ātma lābhaḥ jñaptiḥ tu dhūmāt agneḥ tathā kartṛ adhīnā racanānām abhinirvṛttiḥ pratītiḥ tu tābhyaḥ kartuḥ iti tasmāt prayojakaḥ eva ayam hetuḥ veda pauruṣeyatva anumānasya sa sat pratipakṣa tva āśaṅkā nirāsaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.4–4,1.574.6	 nanu ! sat pratipakṣa tve vivadante tathā ca mīmāṃsakaiḥ pratihetuḥ iha gīyate vedasya adhyayanam sarvam guru adhyayana pūrvakam veda adhyayana vācya tvāt adhunā adhyayanam yathā iti na etat yuktam evaṃprāyāṇām prayogāṇām aprayojaka tvāt na hi tad śabda vācya tva kṛtam anādi tvam upapadyate anaikāntikaḥ ca ayam hetuḥ bhārate api evam abhidhātum śakya tvāt bhārata adhyayanam sarvam guru adhyayana pūrvakam bhārata adhyayana vācya tvāt idānīṃtana bhāra ta adhyayana vat iti vedasya apauruṣeya tve bhārata ādeḥ api apauruṣeya tva prasaṅgaḥ nanu ! bhārate kartṛ smṛtiḥ avigītā vidyate yadi evam vede api prajāpatiḥ kartā smaryate eva 
NM_4,1.574.7	 atha vaidika mantra artha vāda mūlā iyam prajāpati kartṛ tva smṛtiḥ prajāpatinā catvāraḥ vedāḥ asṛjyanta catvāraḥ varṇāḥ catvāraa āśramāḥ iti tatra pāṭhāt iti ucyate hanta tarhi bhārate apitatratya vacana mūlā eva pārāśarya smṛtiḥ iti śakyate vaktum pauruṣeya tva apauruṣeya tvayoḥ veda bhāratayoḥ taulyam yathā prajāpatiḥ vede tatra tatra praśasyate bhārate api tathā vyāsaḥ tatra tatra praśasyate atha praṇetā vedasya na dṛṣṭaḥ kenacid kvacid dvaipāyanaḥ api kim dṛṣṭaḥ bhavat pitṛ pitāmahaiḥ sarveṣām avigītā ced smṛtiḥ satyavatī sute prajāpatiḥ api sraṣṭā loke sarvatra gīyate veda pauruṣeya tva asaṃbhava pūrva pakṣaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.8–4,1.574.9^1	 āha kim iti sat asat viveka vikala śā kaṭikā ādi pravāda vipralabdhaḥ evam bhrāmyasi kila svalpam api karma pitrā mātrā vā upadiśyamānaṃtad vacana pratyayāt anuṣṭhīyate tat ayam iyān aneka kleśa vitta vyayā ādi nirvartyaḥ vaidikaḥ karma kalāpaḥ evam eva tad upadeśinam āptam saṃsmṛtvā evakriyate iti mahān pramādaḥ evañca sati uccāvacaka viracita jarat pusta kalikhitaka avyavata smaryamāṇa kartṛkeṇa vedena vyavahāra anupapatteḥ avaśya smaraṇīyaḥ tatra kartā syāt na ca kadācana vedeṣu vyavahāra vicchedaḥ saṃbhāvyate yena tat kṛtam jaratkūpa ārām a ādiṣu iva teṣu kartṛ asmaraṇam syāt tasmāt avaśyam smaryeta kartā na ca saṃsmaryate smartum śakyate vā smṛtiḥ hibhavantī tad anubhava mūlā bhavati na ca mūle api kartṛ anubhavaḥ kasyacid jātaḥ sarga ādeḥ abhāvāt bhāve vā kartuḥ aśarīra tvena darśana yogyatva abhāvāt vedānām pauruṣeya tve api anādi tvam avarjanīyamsa śarīra tva pakṣe vā puruṣaḥ kaḥ api tādṛśaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.9^2	 tadānīm dṛśyamānaḥ api vedam kurvan na dṛśyate adhīyamāne dṛṣṭe asmin tadā saṃśerate janāḥ kim eṣa racayet vedam uta vā anya kṛtam paṭhet  yat kṛtam vā paṭhet eṣaḥ tasmin= api hi saṃśayaḥ bhaṅgyā ca idam anādi tvam unmīlat iva dṛśyate asatya ādi pramāṇe ca kartṛ tā anubhavam prati smṛtiḥ prabandha siddhā api spṛśati andha paramparām yogibhiḥ grahaṇam kartuḥ iti etat api durvacam kartṛ tā hṛdi durbodhā katham gṛhyeta taiḥ api  yogibhiḥ sā gṛhītā iti vayam etat na manmahe amanvānāḥ ca gacchema visrabdhāḥ tat patham katham  vedāt kartṛ avabodhe tu spaṣṭam anyonya saṃśrayam tatas veda pramāṇa tvam vedāt kartuḥ ca niścayaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.10	 tasmāt paurvāparya paryālocanā rahita yathā śruta mantra artha vāda mūla abhra antiḥ eṣā na punar paramārthataḥ kaścid kañcid vedasya kartāraṃsmarati tasmāt akṛtakāḥ vedāḥ avaśya smaraṇīyasya api kartuḥ asmaraṇāt na ca vyadhikaraṇaḥ hetuḥ asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvāt iti evam sādhana prayogāt asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvāt na vedān ādi tva siddhiḥ 
NM_4,1.574.11–4,1.574.14	 atra ucyate api tat guru adhyayana pūrvaka tvam sādhanam upekṣitaṃyājñikaiḥ ! ayam abhinavaḥ hetuḥ asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvāt iti prayuktaḥ ! tasmāt astu nāma ! na enān hetbantara upanyāsinaḥ nigṛhṇīmaḥ akṣuda kathā iyam prastutā ayam api asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvāt iti hetuḥ kim svatantraeva akartṛka tva siddhaye prayujyate uta asmad uparacita racanā tu a pratighātāya iti anumānasya anumānena bādhā saṃbhavaḥ tatra na tāvat anumānam anumāna antara paripanthi kathayitum ucitam pratyakṣa āgama vat anumānasya api anumāna bādhaka tva anupapatteḥ na hi tulya balayoḥ anumānayoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ tulya bala tvāt eva atulya bala tve tu yat kṛtam anyatarasya daurbalyam tatas eva tad aprāmāṇya siddheḥ kim anu māna bādhayā 
NM_4,1.574.15	 tad viḍambana artham tat abhidhānam iti ced tat api ayuktam ekatra dharmiṇi yugapad ita retara virodhi dharma dvaya prayojaka hetu dvaya upanipāta ayogāt na hi dvi ātmakāni vastūni bhavitum arhanti iti avaśyam anyataraḥ tatra aprayojaka hetuḥ aprayojaka tvāt eva tasya āgamaka tve kiṃviḍambana arthena hetu antareṇa prayuktena viruddha avyabhicārī api nāma nakaścid hetvābhāsaḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ sat pratipakṣa sthale api na anumānena anumānasya bādhaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.16	 prakaraṇa samaḥ api na yaḥ kaścid sat pratipakṣaḥ hetuḥ iṣyate api tu saṃśaya bīja bhūtaḥ anyatara viśeṣa anupalambhaḥ bhrāntyā hetu tvena prayujyamānaḥ tathā ucyate iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ tasmāt para udīritam hetum nirācikīrṣatā vādinā tad gata pakṣa vṛtti ta ādi dharma parīkṣaṇe manaḥ khedanīyam na hi pratihetu anveṣiṇā vṛthā aṭāṭyākartavyā racanā tu a hetuka anumānasya aprayojaka tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.17	 nanu ! katarat anayoḥ sādhanayoḥ aprayojakam racanā tvāt asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvāt iti ca ucyate racanā tvam eva prayojakam na hi puruṣam antareṇa kvacid akṣara vinyāsaḥ iṣṭavyaḥ bho bhagavantaḥ sabhyāḥ ! kva idam dṛṣṭam kva vā śrutam loke yad vākyeṣu padānām racanā naisargikī bhavati yadi svābhāvikī vede padānām racanā bhavet paṭe hi hanta tantūnām katham naisargikī na sā  
NM_4,1.574.18–4,1.574.19	 śannaḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya asti uttarasyām diśi devatā ātmā iti tulye racanā tve kvacid kartṛ pūrvaka tvam aparatra tad viparyayaḥ iti mahān vyāmohaḥ evam hi dhūmaḥ api kaścid anannikaḥ iti apisyāt vedasya pauruṣeya tve api na laukikaka avya ādyavailakṣaṇyam kim idānīm kumāra saṃbhava tulyaḥ asau vedaḥ saṃpannaḥ aho! sarva astika dhuryeṇa veda prāmāṇyam sādhitam naiyāyikena ! 
NM_4,1.574.20	 alam upahāsena ! racanā mātram eva tulyam vedasya kumāra saṃbhavena na anyat na ceyata upahasitum yuktam kim asya śabda tva sāmānyam śaṅkha śabda sādhāraṇam na asti sattā sāmānyam vā sarva sādhāraṇam iti vedasya pauruṣeya tva asaṃbhava śaṅkā n anu ! yāḥ kāli dāsa ādi racanāḥ kartṛ pūrvikāḥ tābhyaḥ vilakṣaṇā eva iyam racanā bhāti vaidikī iha adhyayana velāyām rūpāt eva pratīyate akṛtrima tvam vedasya bhedaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ ananya gaiḥ nāma ākhyāta upasarga ādi prayoga gatayaḥ navāḥ stuti nindā purā kalpa parakṛti ādi gītayaḥ śākhā antara ukta sāpekṣa vikṣipta artha upavarṇanā ityādayaḥ na dṛśyante laukike sannibandhane tena adhyetṛ gaṇāḥ sarve rūpāt vedam akṛtrimam manyante eva loke tu pītam mīmāṃsakaiḥ yaśaḥ vedāḥ na paṭhitāḥ yaiḥ tu tvādṛśaiḥ kuṇṭha buddhibhiḥ kāryatvam bruvate te asya racanā sāmya mohitāḥ vedānām pauruṣeya tvam durapahnavam 
NM_4,1.574.21–4,1.574.22	 ucyate mīmāṃsakāḥ yaśaḥ pibantu ! payaḥ vā pibantu !buddhi jāḍya apanayanāya brāhmī ghṛtam vā pibantu ! vedaḥ tu puruṣa praṇīta eva na atra bhrāntiḥ yathā ghaṭa ādi saṃsthānāt bhinnam api acala ādiṣu saṃsthānam kartṛmat siddham vede api racanā tathā yat ca atra kiñcid vaktavyam tat pūrvam eva sa vistaram uktam vedānām racanā vailakṣaṇyāt tad kartā api vilakṣaṇaḥ eva 
NM_4,1.574.23–4,1.574.24	 api ca yat vilakṣaṇā iyam racanā tad vilakṣaṇaḥ eva kartā anumīyatām !na punar tad apalāpaḥ yuktaḥ iti api uktam yāḥ ca etāḥ nirvivāda sidva kartṛkāḥ kāli dāsa ādi racanāḥ camatkāriṇyaḥ tāsām anyonya visadṛśam rūpam upalabhyate eva amṛtena iva saṃsiktāḥ candanena iva carcitāḥ candra aṃśubhiḥ iva unmṛṣṭāḥ kāli dāsasya sūktayaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.25–4,1.574.26	 prakaṭa rasa anuguṇa vikaṭa akṣara racanā camat kārita sakalaka vikulāḥ bāṇasya vācaḥ pratikāvyam ca tāni tāni vaicitryāṇi dṛśyanta ā iva nāma ākhyāta ādi vaicitrya mātreṇa kartṛ abhāvaḥ vede rūpāt eva pratīyatā eti nūtaneyam vācoyuktiḥ anitya vastu saṃyogāt api vedāḥ na nityāḥ api ca yadi rūpe samāśvasiti bhavataḥ manaḥ tadā ādimad artha abhidhānam api vedasya rūpam katham na parīkṣase babaraḥ prāvāhaṇiḥ akāmayata kusura binda auddālakiḥ akāmayata purūravaḥ mā prapataḥ iti pratisargam vedānām bhinna tvam smṛti uktam 
NM_4,1.574.27–4,1.574.28	 pratisargam punar teṣām bhāvāt anādi tvam iti ced pratisargaṃtarhi veda anyatvam api bhaviṣyati yathā uktam pratimanvantaram ca eṣā śrutiḥ anyā abhidhīyate iti rūpāt akṛtrimat tve ca kalpanā kalpitā eva sā ādimat vastu buddhiḥ tu vācakaiḥ akṣaraiḥ sphuṭaiḥ teṣām anyathā vyākhyānam tu vyākhyānam eva paṭhantaḥ eva tu adhyetāraḥ tatas ādim ataḥ arthān bahūn avagacchanti iti nānādirvedaḥ tasmāt na racanā tvam aprayojakam vede katraismaraṇam asiddham eva 
NM_4,1.574.29	 kartṛ asmaraṇam eva tu aprayojakam asiddha tvāt siddham api vā avede kartṛ asmaraṇam anyathā siddham veda karaṇa kālasya ati davīyaḥ tvāt tad praṇetuḥ ca puṃsaḥ sakala puruṣa vilakṣaṇa tvāt niyata śarīra parigraha abhāvāt idantayā asya pāṇi nipiṅgala ādi vat smaraṇam na asti na tusa na asti eva anumāna āgamābhyām tad avagamāt katham pakṣa dharma tayā grahītuṃśakyate kartṛ asmaraṇam 
NM_4,1.574.30	 tat hi eka puruṣa sambandhi vyabhicarati sarva puruṣa sambandhi tu duravagamam sarve pumāṃsaḥ kartāram vedasya na smaranti iti kathaṃjānāti bhavān na hi tava sakala loka hṛdayāni pratyakṣāṇi sarvajña tva prasaṅgāt na ca yat tvam na jānāsi tat anyaḥ api na jānāti iti yuktam atiprasaṅgāt tasmāt asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvaṃduḥ bodham eva vede kartṛ smaraṇam antarā prāmāṇyam eva na niścīyeta 
NM_4,1.574.31	 api ca kartuḥ asmaraṇe sati sutarām veda artha anuṣṭhānam prekṣāvata aṃśithilībhavet na hi akartṛkaḥ eva upadeśaḥ saṃbhavati saṃbhavan= apivā prāmāṇya niścaya nimitta abhāvāt katham visraṃbha bhūmiḥ asau bhavet bādhaka abhāva mātrāt ca na prāmāṇya niścayaḥ vacasām iti uktam prāk tasmāt āpta pratyayāt eva nirvicikitsam veda artha anuṣṭhānam sa pratiṣṭhānaṃsaṃbhavati na anyathā iti tasmāt na kartṛ asmaraṇasya racanā tu apratipakṣa tayā upanyāsaḥ upapannaḥ kartṛ asmaraṇa mātrāt na vedasya akartṛka tva siddhiḥ 
NM_4,1.574.32–4,1.574.33	 na api svatantram eva idam kartṛ abhāva sādhanam bhavitum arhati anupalabdhiḥ iyam anena prakāreṇa kila ucyate sā anupapannāḥ anumānena kartuḥ upalambhāt anumānena api yat upalabdham tad upalabdham eva bhavati vedasa kartṛka tva anumānasya ābādhita tvam nanu kartṛ abhāva smaraṇa bādhita tvāt anumānam idam ayuktam itaretara āśraya prasaṅgāt anupalabdhau siddhāyām anumāna nirāsaḥ anumāna nirāse ca sati anupalabdhi siddhiḥ 
NM_4,1.574.34–4,1.574.35	 anumāna prāmāṇye api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced na tasya pratibandha mahimnā prāmāṇya siddheḥ na hi tasya anupalabdhi nirāsa apekṣaṃprāmāṇyam sa kartṛkatva anumānena kartṛ asmaraṇam bādhyataḥ eva tatra etat syāt na vayam kartṛ abhāve prāmāṇyam brūmaḥ sakala loka padārtha vyavahāriṇaḥ hi mīmāṃsakāḥ param tu vedasya pauruṣeya tā aṃbruvāṇam pramāṇam pṛcchāmaḥ tat ca asya na asti iti balāt anupalabdhyā tat abhāva niścayaḥ vyavatiṣṭhate iti syāt etat evam yadi anumānam nasyāt uktam ca racanā tvāt iti anumānam racanātu ahetoḥ sa kartṛ tva sādhane paryāpta tva varṇanam 
NM_4,1.574.36	 yat punar avādi vedeṣu puruṣasya kartṛ tvam aśakyam grahītum iti tat api asādhu parokṣasya kuvinda ādeḥ abhinava prāvaraka paṭa ādau kārye katham kartṛtā avagamyate paṭa ādi racanām dṛṣṭvā tasya ced sā anumīyate vede api racanām dṛṣṭvā kartṛ tvam tasya gamyatām īśvarasya sa śarīrasya veda upadeṣṭṛ tve api na kā api hāniḥ 
NM_4,1.574.37	 śarīra parigraham antareṇa prāṇinām upadeśasya kartum aśakyatvāt kadācid īśvaraḥ śarīram api gṛhṇīyāt iti kalpyate niyata śarīra parigraha abhāvāt ca vyāsa ādi vat asau na smaryate tatas ca adya sadyas kaviḥ kāvye yathā kartā iti mīyate tathā tad kāla jaiḥ puṃbhiḥ saḥ api kartā iti māsyate yathā para kṛtā śaṅkā tasmin kāvye vyapaiti te vede api anya kṛtā śaṅkā tathā teṣām vyapaiṣyati parokṣam anumānena yat ca budhyāmahe vayam pratyakṣam yoginām tat ca iti uktam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe pratyakṣam anumānam ca tat evam kartṛ tāmitau mūla pramāṇam asti iti smṛtau na andha paraṃparāḥ mantra artha vāda mūla tvam tatas eva na tad smṛteḥ yathā udita anumāna ādi pramāṇa antara saṃbhavāt īśvarasya anumānika tvena na anyonya āśraya ādiḥ 
NM_4,1.574.38	 yat api itaretara āśrayam abhāṣi puruṣa ukte vedeprāmāṇyam veda prāmāṇyāt puruṣa siddhiḥ iti tat api na samyak pūrvam parihṛta tvāt anumānāt prasiddhe kartari veda vākyaiḥ tat pratīteḥ upodbalanam iṣyate na tu āgama eka śaraṇaḥ eva kartṛ avagamaḥ uktam capūrvam api pṛthivī ādinā kāryeṇa kartuḥ anumānam jagatkartuḥ eva veda upadeṣṭṛ tvam 
NM_4,1.574.39	 kim yena eva kartrā pṛthivī ādi kāryam nirmitam tena eva vaidikyaḥ racanā nirmitāḥ iti ced om iti ucyate kim atra pramāṇam iti ced ucyate tarhi sarvajñaḥ sraṣṭum prabhavati īdṛśam vicitram prāṇibhṛt karma phala bhoga āśrayam jagat tad karma phala sambandha vidā tad upadeśinaḥ tena eva vedāḥ racitāḥ iti na anyasya kalpanā ekena eva ca siddhe arthe dvitīyam kalpayema kim aneka kalpanā bījam na hi kiñcana vidyate veda upadeṣṭhraḥ eka tvam 
NM_4,1.574.40	 jagat sarge tāvat ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ iṣyate na dvau bahavaḥ vā bhinna abhinna āśaya kalpane ekatra vaiyarthyāt itaratra vyabahāra vaiśasa prasaṅgena tatas ekasya īśvara tva vighātāt tathā hi aneka īśvara vādaḥ hi na atīva hṛdayaṅgamaḥ te ced sadṛśa saṅkalpāḥ kaḥ arthaḥ bahubhiḥ īśvaraiḥ  saṃkalpayati yat ekaḥ śubham aśubham vā api satya saṅkalpaḥ tat sidhyati tad vibhavāt iti aparaḥ tatra kim kuryāt bhinna abhiprāyatāyām tu kārya vipratiṣedhataḥ nūnam ekaḥ sva saṅkalpa vihatyā anīśvaraḥ bhavet ekasya kila saṅkalpaḥ rājā ayam kriyatām iti hanyatām iti ca anyasya tau samāviśataḥ katham rājya saṅkalpa sāphalye vihatāḥ badha kāmanā tasyāḥ sa phala tāyām vā rājya saṅkalpa viplavaḥ tena citra jagat kārya saṃvāha anuguṇa āśayaḥ ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ sraṣṭā jagatām iti sādhitam 
NM_4,1.574.41–4,1.574.43	 evam jagat sarga vat saḥ eva vedānām api ekaḥ praṇetā bhavitum arhati nānā tva kalpanāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt kalpanā gaurava prasaṅgāt ca tena yat ucyate nanu ekaḥ sarva śākhānām kartā iti avagatam kutas bahavaḥ bahubhiḥ granthāḥ katham na racitāḥ ime  iti tat parihṛtam bhavati vedānām eka kartṛka tve pramāṇa antaram 
NM_4,1.574.44	 atas ca eka kartṛkāḥ vedāḥ yatas paraspara vyatiṣakta artha upadeśina udṛśyante ekam eva hi karma veda catuṣṭaya upadiṣṭaiḥ pṛthak bhūtaiḥ api ekārtha sama vāyibhiḥ aṅgaiḥ anvitam prayujyate tatra hi hautram ṛgvedena yajurvedena adhvaryavam audgātram sāmavedena brahma tvam atharvavedena ca kriyate paippala ādi śākhā bheda upadiṣṭam ca tad tad aṅga jātam tatra tatra apekṣyate tatra sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam karma iti āhuḥ etat ca adūraḥ eva agre nirṇeṣyate eka abhiprāya baddha tvam tena sarvatra gamyate bhavet bhinnāśayānām hi katham eka artha mīlanam  samasya āpūraṇa ādau= api kartṛ ā aikyam eva 
NM_4,1.574.45–4,1.574.46	 kāvya samasya āpūraṇe kā vārtā iti ced tatra api prathamasya eva kaveḥ tad vastu darśanāt tad abhiprāya vedī tu saḥ anyastam anuvartate anyathā ananvitam kāvyam syāt viśva vasu kāvya vat anvita tve tu sā nūnam ādyasya eva kaveḥ matiḥ iha api ekāśaya abhijña dvitīya īśvara kalpane eka abhiprāya tā eva syāt kim ca tad kalpane phalam  tasmāt ekaḥ eva kartā sarva śākhānām kāṭhaka ādi vyapadeśaḥ tu prakṛṣṭa adhyayana nibandhanaḥ bhaviṣyati iti bhavadbhiḥ api uktam sarva śākhā pratyaya nyāyasya yukta tva kathanam 
NM_4,1.574.47	 api ca yathā taroḥ vikṣiptāḥ śākhāḥ bhavanti na ca kṛtsnam puṣpa phala patram ekasyām śākhāyām sannihitam bhavati kintu kasyāñcitkasyāñcid evam vedasya api śākhāḥ pṛthak aṅga karma upadeśinyaḥ vikṣiptāḥ ca tāsām ca vṛkṣa śākhānām ekasmāt janma bījataḥ tathā eva sarva śākhānām ekasmāt puruṣottamāt vedāḥ īśvara upadeśa rūpāḥkartā yaḥ eva jagatām akhilātma vṛtti karma prapañca paripāka vicitra tājñaḥ viśva ātmanā tad upadeśa parāḥ praṇītāḥtena eva veda racanā iti yuktam etat āptam tam eva bhagavantam anādim īśaṃāśritya viśvasiti veda vacassu lokaḥ teṣām akartṛka tayā na hi kaścid evaṃvisrambham eti matimān iti varṇitam prāk 
NM_4,1.574.48–4,1.574.49	 evañca pada vākya racanā ādau tāvat vedeṣu puruṣa apekṣi tvam upapāditam śabda artha saṃketa karaṇa artham īśvara apekṣā asti eva yat api sambandha karaṇe puruṣa anapekṣa tvam ucyate citra bhānoḥ iva dahana śaktiḥ śabdasya naisargikī vācaka śaktiḥ vyutpattiḥ tu vṛddhebhyaeva vyavaharamāṇebhyaḥ upalabhyate iti kim atra puruṣaḥ kariṣyati iti tat api aghaṭamānam puruṣa parighaṭita samaya sambandha vyatirekeṇa śabdāt artha pratyaya anupapatteḥ prasaṅgāt śabda arthayoḥ sambandha ākṣepaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.50–4,1.574.51	 nanu ! na eva śabdasya arthena sambandhaḥ kaścid asti kasya īdaṃpuruṣa sāpekṣa tvam vā nirapekṣa tvam vā cintyate na hi śabda arthayoḥ kuḍya badarayoḥ iva saṃyoga svabhāvaḥ tantu paṭayoḥ iva samavāya ātmā vā sambandhaḥ pratyakṣaḥ upalabhyate tad mūla tvāt casambandha antarāṇi api na santi tat uktam mukhe śabdam upalabhāmahe bhūmau= artham iti 
NM_4,1.574.52	 na api anumīyate śabdasya arthena sambandhaḥ kṣurama udaka śabda uccāraṇemukhasya pāṭana pūraṇa anupalambhāt na ca śabda deśe arthaḥ saṃbhavati naca artha deśe śabdaḥ sthāna karaṇa prayatnānām tad hetūnām ghaṭa ādi artha pradeśe anupalambhāt vyāpaka tvam tu śabdasya pratiṣiddham eva śabda arthayossambandhe vikalpāḥ 
NM_4,1.574.53–4,1.574.55	 ucyate na saṃśleṣa lakṣaṇaḥ śabda artha sambandhaḥ asmābhiḥ abhyupagamyate tat kim kārya kāraṇa nimitta naimittika āśraya āśrayi bhāva ādayaḥ śabdasya arthena sambandhāḥ ete api na tarām na tarhi tasya kaścid arthena sambandhaḥ na na asti śabdasya arthena sambandhaḥ pratyaya nimitta hetu tvāt dhūma ādi vat tat kim śabda arthayoḥ avinā bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ saḥ api na asti evam hi śabdaḥ anumānam eva syāt 
NM_4,1.574.56–4,1.574.59	 kaḥ tarhi samayaḥ iti brūmaḥ samaya ākhya śabda artha sambandha svarūpa śodhanam kaḥ ayam samayaḥ nāma abhidhāna abhidheya niyama niyogaḥ samayaucyate yadi evam kim anā śaṅkanīya saṃśleṣa paricodanena tad dūṣaṇena ca  ucyate śabda artha abheda vādinām hi vaiyākaraṇānām eṣa saṃśleṣa rūpaḥ sambandhaḥ balāt āpatati iti te eva pratikṣepyante śabda arthayoḥ avinā abhāvaḥ eva sambandhaḥ iti ākṣepaḥ āha yadi vaiyākaraṇa varṇitaḥ na saṃśleṣaḥ upapattimān samayaḥ ayam anupapannaḥ eva sa hi puruṣa kṛtaḥ saṅketaḥ na ca puruṣa icchayā vastu niyamaḥ avakalpate tad icchāyāḥ avyāhata prasara tvāt 
NM_4,1.574.60	 arthaḥ api kim iti vācakaḥ na bhavati śabdaḥ ca vācyaḥ naca evam asti dahanam anicchan= api puruṣaḥ dhūmāt na tam pratyeti jalam vātatas icchan= api pratipadyate tatra yathā dhūma agnyoḥ naisargikaḥ eva avinābhāvaḥ nāma sambandhaḥ jñaptaye tu bhūyas darśana ādi nimittam āśrīyateevam śabda arthayoḥ sāṃsiddhikaḥ eva śakti ātmā sambandhaḥ tad vyutpattaye tuvṛddha vyavahāra prasiddhi samāśrayaṇam śabdasya jñātasya sataḥ artha bodha janaka tvam 
NM_4,1.574.61	 svābhāvike sambandhe sati dīpa ādi vat kim tad vyutpatti apekṣaṇena iti ced na śabdasya jñāpaka tvāt jñāpakasya dhūma ādeḥ etat rūpam yat sambandha grahaṇa apekṣam sva jñāpyajñāpaka tvam udyota ādayaḥ tu pratyakṣa sāmagrī antargata tvāt na vyutpatti apekṣyāḥ bhavanti śaktiḥ tu naisargikī yathā rūpa prakāśinī dīpa ādeḥ tathā śabdasya artha pratipādane tasmāt na samaya mātrāt artha pratipattiḥ samayasya artha niṣṭha tva abhāvena śabda artha sambandha tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.62–4,1.574.64	 api ca abhidhāna abhidheya niyama niyoga rūpaḥ samayaḥ jñānam eva na tatas artha antaram jñānam ca ātmani vartate na ca śabda arthayoḥ itina tayoḥ sambandhaḥ syāt samayena śābda bodha nirvāha asaṃbhavaḥ kiñca samayaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ pratyuccāraṇam vā kriyate prati puruṣaṃvā sarga ādau vā sakṛt īśvareṇa iti pratyuccāraṇam prāktanaḥ eva kriyate nūtanaḥ vā 
NM_4,1.574.65–4,1.574.67	 navasya tāvat kriyamāṇasya katham artha pratyāyana sāmarthyam avagamyate tad avagatau vā kim tad karaṇena pūrva kṛtasya tu kṛta tvāt eva punaḥkaraṇam anupapannam ekasya vastunaḥ jñaptiḥ asakṛt āvartate na utpattiḥ prati puruṣam api sambandhaḥ bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ vā kriyate bheda pakṣe katham eka artha saṃjñānam go śabdasya sa asrādimānarthaḥ kesara ādimān aśva śabdasya iti 
NM_4,1.574.68–4,1.574.69	 abhede api tathā eva kṛtasya karaṇa ayogāt jñānam eva sambandhasya karaṇam sarga ādau= api sakṛt sambandha karaṇam ayuktam tathāvidha kāla asambhavāt eva na hi śabda artha vyavahāra rahitaḥ kaścid kāle upapadyate tasmāt nityasya eva sambandhasya lokataḥ vyutpattiḥ na punar karaṇam śabda arthayoḥ svābhāvika sambandha pakṣasya nirduṣṭa tvam 
NM_4,1.574.70	 vyutpatti pakṣam ca na karaṇa pakṣa abhihitāḥ doṣāḥ spṛśanti pratyakṣa siddha tvāt pratyakṣam hi idam upalabhyate vṛddhānām hi sva arthe vyavaharamāṇānām upaśṛṇvantaḥ bālāḥ tatas tatas śabdāt tam tam artham pratiyanti te api vṛddhāḥ yadā bālāḥ āsan tadā anyebhyaḥ vṛddhebhyaḥ tathā eva pratipanna bantaḥ te api anyebhyaḥ iti na asti ādissaṃsārasyati samaya pakṣe api śabda arthayossambandhasya svābhāvika tvam avarjanīyam 
NM_4,1.574.71	 api ca samaya mātra śaraṇaḥ śakti śūnyaḥ śabdaḥ katham akṣi nikoca hasta saṃjñā ādibhyaḥ midyeta sa hi tadānīm kaśā aṅkuśa pratoda abhighāta sthānīyaḥ eva bhavet tathā ca śabdāt artham pratipadyāmahaḥ iti laukikaḥ vyapadeśaḥ bādhyeta samayāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti syāt samaya pakṣe ca yadṛcchā śabda tulya tvam sarva śabdānām prāpnoti tena gavāśvādi śabdānām niyata viṣaya tvam na syāt deśa bhedena artha bhedaḥ na samaya adhīnaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.72	 yat punar ucyate jāti viśeṣe ca aniyamāt samaya rūpaḥ sambandhaḥ iti jāti śabdena atra deśaḥ vivakṣitaḥ kilakvacid deśe kaścid śabdaḥ deśa antara prasiddham artham utsṛjya tatas artha antar evartate yathā cora śabdaḥ taskara vacanaḥ odane dākṣiṇātyaiḥ prayujyate etat ca samaya pakṣe yujyate nitye tu sambandhe katham tad artha vyabhicāraḥ iti tat api ayuktam sarva śabdānām sarva artha pratyāyana śakti yukta tvāt kvacid deśe kenacid arthena vyabahāraḥ 
NM_4,1.574.73–4,1.574.75	 atas eva ca anavagata sambandhe śrute sati sandehaḥ bhavati kam arthaṃpratyāyayitum anena ayam śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ syāt iti asatyām hi śaktaua kṛta samaye nirālambanā pratyāyaka tvā aaśaṅkā iti ārya prasiddha arthasya eva grahaṇam yuktam athavā ārya deśa prasiddhaḥ eva śabdānām arthaḥ itaraḥ tu mleccha jana sammataḥ anādaraṇīyaḥ eva tasmāt samaya pakṣasya ati daurbalyāt akṛtrimaā iva śabda arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti na tatra puruṣasya prabhaviṣṇu tā śabda arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ samayā atiriktaḥ vaktum na śakyaḥ iti siddhāntaḥ atra ucyate na nityaḥ sambandhaḥ upapadyate śabda vat arthavat catṛtīyasya tasya pratyakṣa ādinā pramāṇena apratīyamāna tvāt śakteḥ śabda artha sambandha rūpa tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.76	 nanu ! śakti rūpaḥ sambandhaḥ iti uktam śaktiḥ ca tad āśritā iti katham dharmyantara vat pṛthaktayā pratīyeta  na etat sāṃpratam svarūpa sahakāri vyatiriktāyāḥ śakteḥ sūkṣmāyāḥ prāk eva vistarataḥ pratikṣipta tvāt na ca śaktiḥ pratyakṣa gamyā dravya svarūpa vat anupalambhāt na anumeyāḥ kāryāṇām anyathā api ghaṭamāna tvāt kalpayitvā āca śaktim aparihāryaḥ samayaḥ samayam antareṇa artha pratipatteḥ asiddheḥ siddhe ca samaye tatas eva artha siddheḥ kim nitya sambandha āśrayaṇena samayasya samyandhatve avyavasthā parihāraḥ 
NM_4,1.574.77	 yat tu uktam samayasya puruṣa icchā adhīna tvāt tasyāḥ ca avyāhata prasara tvāt vācya vācaka vyatyayaḥ syāt iti tat ayuktam śakti abhāve śabdasya eva vācaka tve yogya tvāt kā punar śakti abhāve yogyatā asya iti ced yaḥ ayam gatvā ādi jāti yogaḥ krama viśeṣa upakṛtaḥ gatvā autu a ādi sāmānya sambandhaḥ hi yasya bhavati sa vācaka tve yogyaḥ iti itaraḥ tu vācya tve yathā dravya tva ādi aviśeṣe api vīraṇa tva ādi sāmānyavatām kaṭa niṣpattau tantu tva ādi sāmānyavatām ca paṭa niṣpattau na ca tatra śaktiḥ asti iti uktam na ca kāraṇekāryam sat iti sāṅkhyaiḥ iva bhavadbhiḥ iṣyate tasyām asatyām api śaktausāmānya viśeṣa sambandhasya niyāmaka tvāt na vācya vācakayoḥ vyatyayaiti na śakti rūpaḥ śabda arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ śabda arthayoḥ sambandhasya avinā bhāva rūpa tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.78–4,1.574.79	 na ca tayoḥ avinā abhāvaḥ dhūma agnyoḥ iva sambandhaḥ tatra hisambandhaḥ pratīyamānaḥ evam pratīyate dhūmaḥ agnim vinā na bhavati iti iha punar ayam asmāt pratīyate iti etāvatī eva vyutpatti paryavasānam atas eva avagati pūrvikā eva avagatiḥ iha iti anumānāt śabdasya bhedaḥ uktaḥ prakāśaka tvam api śabdasya samaya prasāda upanatam eva na svābhāvikam sāṃsiddhike hi tathā tve bhramitvā ādi prayuktāt anyatas vāyataḥ kutaścid abhinavāt api dīpāt iva śabdāt artha pratītiḥ syāt śabda artha sambandhasya vyāpti ākhya sambandhāt vilakṣaṇa tvam 
NM_4,1.574.80	 yat tu naisargike api prakāśaka tve śabdasya dhūma ādeḥ iva jñāpaka tvāt sambandha grahaṇa sāpekṣa tvam uktam saḥ eṣa viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ na hi dhūma ādeḥ pratyāyaka tvam svābhāvikam analāvinā bhāvi tvam tu tasyanijam balam tatra ca agṛhyate tasmin pratītiḥ eva na jāyate iti yuktaṃtad grahaṇam prati iti artham iha tu pratīti śaktiḥ eva svābhāvikī bhavatā abhyupagamyate sā ced svābhāvikī kim vyutpatti apekṣaṇena iti śabda artha sambandhasya arthāt samaya rūpa tve paryavasānam 
NM_4,1.574.81–4,1.574.82	 yadi ca ucyate pratyāyakaḥ iti pratyayam dṛṣṭvā avagacchāmaḥ na prathama śravaṇaḥ iti yāvat kṛtvas śrutena iyam saṃjñā ayam saṃjñī iti avagamyate tāvat kṛtvas śrutāt artha avagamaḥ iti saḥ ayam samaya upayoga ā iva kathitaḥ bhavati saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhaḥ hi samayaḥ eva ucyate tad upayogam antareṇa pratyāyaka tvānavagamāt na svābhāvikī śaktiḥ samayasya viṣaya niṣṭhatvā upapattiḥ yat tu abhyadhāyi samayasya jñāna ātmaka tvāt ātmani vṛttiḥ na śabda arthayoḥ iti etat api acaturaśram tad āśraya tva abhāve api jñānasya tad viṣaya tva upapatteḥ śābda bodhasya samaya adhīna tve api śabdasya eva tatra hetu tvam 
NM_4,1.574.83–4,1.574.85	 yat api abhāṣaṇe samaya mātra śaraṇe sṛṇi pratoda nodana nirviśeṣe śabdeśabdāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti vyapadeśaḥ na syāt iti tat apiyat kiñcit naisargika śakti pakṣe api śakteḥ artham pratipadyāmahe na śabdāt iti vyapadeśaḥ syāt avinā abhāvāt agnim pratipadyāmahe na dhūmāt iti syāt tad aṅga tvāt avinā abhāva ādeḥ na tathā vyapadeśa eti ced tat itaratra api samānam dhūme hi vyāpti pūrva tvam śabde samaya pūrva tā na anayoḥ tad apekṣāyām karaṇa tvam vihanyate samayasya śabda artha sambandha tve lokavyabahāraḥ api pramāṇam api ca laukikaḥ vyapadeśaḥ samaya pakṣa sākṣitām eva bhajate devadattā iva uktam amutas śabdāt amum artham pratipadyasva iti iti evam hivi apadiśati lokaḥ tasmāt samayaḥ eva atas ca evam deśa antare saṅketa vaśena tatas eva śabdāt artha antara pratipattiḥ sarva śabdānām sarva artha pratyāyanaśa ktamat tvam na ghaṭate 
NM_4,1.574.86	 nanu ! atra uktam sarve śabdāḥ sarva artha pratyāyana śakti yuktāḥ itikenacid arthena kvacid vyavahāraḥ iti tat etat ayuktam śaktīnāṃbheda abheda vikalpa anupapatteḥ na śabda svarūpāt bhinnāḥ śaktayaḥ tathā anavabhāsāt avyatireke ca ekasmāt śabdāt ananya tvāt parasparam avyatirekaḥ tāsām syāt na ca bhinna kārya anumeyāḥ bhinnāḥ śaktayaḥ kārya bhedasya anyathā api upapatteḥ sarva śakti yoge ca sarva artha pratyaya prasaṅgaḥ samaya upayogaḥ niyāmakaḥ iti ced saḥ eva astu kiṃśaktibhiḥ sādṛśyam eva artha saṃdeha kāraṇam na tu padānām sarva śaktimat tvam 
NM_4,1.574.87	 yat api agādi śabda śravaṇe sati sarva artha viṣaya sandeha darśanāt sarvatra tasya śaktiḥ kalpyate iti tat api asāram na hi śakti kṛtaḥ sandehaḥ kintu gatvā ādi varṇa sāmānya nibandhanaḥ tathā cagatvā ādi jātimatām varṇānām arthe vācaka tvam avagatam amī tad jāti yoginaḥ varṇāḥ kasya arthasya vācakāḥ syuḥ iti bhavati sandehaḥ mleccha jana prasiddha arthasya api kutracid grahaṇam mīmāṃsaka sammatam 
NM_4,1.574.88–4,1.574.89	 yat punar avādi saḥ eva śabdasya arthaḥ yatra enam āryāḥ prayuñjata namleccha jana prasiddhaḥ iti tat etat katham iva śapatham antareṇa pratipadyemahi na hi mleccha deśe api tad artha pratyayaḥ na jāyate bādhyatā ivā sandigdhaḥ vā iti katham na śabda arthaḥ ārya prasiddhiḥ bādhikā iti ced ārya prasiddheḥ api mleccha prasiddhiḥ katham na bādhikāḥ akṣa ādi vat ca vikalpyamāna artha upapatteḥ vyavasthita viṣayaḥ eva vikalpaḥ bhaviṣyati 
NM_4,1.574.90–4,1.574.91	 pika nema tāmarasa ādi śabdānām ca bhavadbhiḥ mleccha prayoga ātartha niścayaḥ āśritaḥ eva aveṣṭi adhikaraṇe rāja śabdaṃāndhra prasiddhe arthe varṇitavantaḥ bhavantaḥ iti alam avāntara cintanena tasmāt samayaḥ eva sambandhaḥ iti yuktam tat uktam jāti viśeṣeca aniyamāt iti sarga ādau sakṛt eva śabdānām samaya karaṇam atha yat uktam samayaḥ pratyuccāraṇam prati puruṣam sarga ādau sakṛt kriyate iti pratyuccāraṇam prati puruṣam ca tad karaṇam anabhyupagatam eva dūṣitam sarga ādau sakṛt eva samaya karaṇam iti naḥ pakṣaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.92–4,1.574.93	 atas eva na sarva śabdānām yadṛcchā tulya tvam keṣāñcideva śabdānām asmad ādibhiḥ adya tve saṅketakaraṇāt tatas eva yadṛcchā śabdāu cyante sarga ādiḥ ca samarthitaḥ eva īśvara siddhau= api avikalam anumānam upanyastam pūrva pakṣi siddhāntinoḥ viśeṣaḥ eṣaḥ eva ca āvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ yat eṣa śabda artha sambandha vyabahāraḥ tava anādiḥ mama tu jagat sargāt prabhṛti pravṛttaḥ iti adya tve tu śabda artha sambandha vyutpattau tulyaḥ eva āvayoḥ panthāḥ tatra api tu ayam viśeṣaḥ yat tava śakti paryantā vyutpattiḥ mama tu tad varjam iti śakteḥ śabda artha sambandha tve loka anubhava virodhaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.94–4,1.574.95	 tathā ca iyam iyatī vyutpattiḥ loke dṛśyate yat ayamasi a vācyaḥ ayam asya vācakaḥ iti na punar śakti paryantā vyutpattiṃrasti tathā hi yatra śṛṅga grāhikayā śabdam artham ca nirdiśya sambandhaḥ kriyate tatra iyantam eva enam kriyamāṇam paśyāmaḥ ayam asya vācyaḥ ayam asya vācakaḥ iti yatra api ca vṛddhebhyaḥ vyavaharamāṇebhyaḥ vyutpadyate tatra apīya devā saujānāti ayam arthaḥ amutas śabdāt anena pratipannaḥ iti na tu anyā asya kācid śaktiḥ asti iti iyatyā eva ca vyutpattyā śabdāt artha pratyaya upapatteḥ asyāḥ ca aparihārya tvāt adhika kalpanā bīja abhāvāt cana nityaḥ śabda artha sambandhaḥ sambandha grahaṇa viṣaye siddhāntasya mīmāṃsaka matāt viśeṣaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.96–4,1.574.97	 atas eva ca sambandhaḥ tri pramāṇakaḥ iti yat tvayā ucyate tat asmābhiḥ na mṛṣyate śabda vṛddha abhidheyān= ca pratyakṣeṇa atra paśyati iti satyam śrotuḥ ca pratipanna tvaṃanumānena ceṣṭayā iti etat api satyam anyathā anupapattyā tuva itti śaktim dvaya ātmikām iti etat tu na satyam anyathā api upapatteḥ iti ukta tvāt tasmāt dvi pramāṇakaḥ sambandha niścayaḥ na tri pramāṇakaḥ tat evam śabdasya naisargika śakti ātmaka sambandha abhāvāt īśvara viracita samaya nibandhanaḥ śabda artha vyavahāraḥ nānā ādiḥ śabda arthayossambandhasya anitya tve anavasthā parihāraḥ 
NM_4,1.574.98–4,1.574.99	 nanu ! īśvaraḥ api sambandham kurvan avaśyam kenacid śabdenakaroti tasya kena kṛtaḥ sambandhaḥ śabda antareṇa ced tasyāpikena kṛtaḥ tasya api kena iti na kaścid avadhiḥ tasmāt avaśyam anena sambandham kurvatā vṛddha vyavahāra siddhāḥ kecid akṛta sambandhāā iva śabdāḥ abhyupagantavyāḥ asti ced vyavahāra siddhiḥ kim īśvareṇa kim vā tad kṛtena samayena iti anādi pakṣaḥ eva śreyān ucyate astram āyuṣmatā jñātam viṣayaḥ tu na lakṣitaḥ asmad ādiṣu doṣaḥ ayam īśvare tu na yujyate nānā karma phala sthānam icchayā eva īdṛśam jagat sraṣṭum prabhavataḥ tasya kauśalam kaḥ vikalpayet 
NM_4,1.574.100	 icchā mātreṇa pṛthivī ādeḥ iyataḥ kāryasya karaṇam asmad ādīnāṃyat manoratha padavīm api na adhirohati tat api yatas saṃpadyate tasyakiyā nayam prayāsaḥ tad atra īśvara sadbhāve param vipratipattayaḥ tasmin= tu siddhe kaḥ evam vikalpānām avasaraḥ uktam ca tad siddhau nirapavādam anumānam vayam tu na kartāraḥ eva sambandhasya yatas evam anuyujyemahi aṅgusi agreṇa nirdiśya kañcid artham puras sthitam vyutpādayantaḥ dṛśyante bālān asmadvidhāḥ api 
NM_4,1.574.101–4,1.574.102	 tasmāt īśvara viracita sambandha adhigama upāya bhūta vṛddha vyavahāra labdha tad vyutpatti sāpekṣaḥ śabdaḥ artham avagamayati iti siddham śabda arthayoḥ sambandhasya anitya tve api na śabdānām artha asaṃsparśi tvam na ca nitya sambandha abhāve api śabdasya artha asaṃsparśi tvam samaya balena artha pratyayasya ābādhitasya siddheḥ iti ukta tvāt iti alam vistareṇa tasmāt pade ca vākye ca sambandhe ca svatantra tā puruṣasya upapannā iti vedānām tad praṇīta tā tasmāt āpta ukta tvāt eva vedāḥ pramāṇam na nitya tvāt vedānām āpta ukta tva niścaya asaṃbhava śaṅkā 
NM_4,1.574.103–4,1.574.104	 nanu ! āpta ukta tvasya hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam katham avagamyate na pratyakṣeṇa kṣoṇīdhara dharma tvam iva dhūmasya vedānām āpta praṇīta tvam avagamyate śravaṇa yugala bala labdha janmani pratyaye veda ākhya śabda rāśeḥ eva pratibhāsāt na ca udātta ādi vat varṇa dharma tvena āpta ukta tvam gṛhyate na api anumānam asmin= arthe liṅga abhāvāt prāmāṇye hi vedasya ā āpta ukta tvam liṅgam āpta ukta tva anumitau tu na liṅga antaram upalabhāmahā eti kutastyaḥ pakṣa dharma tva niścayaḥ anumānāt eva vedānām āpta ukta tva niścayaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.105	 ucyate alam sarasvatī kṣodena ! uktaḥ eva pakṣa dharma tva niścaya upāyaḥ tathā hi śabdasya sādhitam tāvat anitya tvam sa vistaram racanāḥ kartṛmatyaḥ ca racanā tvāt iti sthitam kartā sarvasya sarvajñaḥ puruṣaḥ asti iti sādhitam kāryeṇa anuguṇam kalpyam nimittam iti ca sthitam pratyakṣa ādi visaṃvādaḥ vede parihariṣyate vyāghāta paunarukti ādi doṣāḥ ca vacana antare vidhi artha vāda mantrāṇām upayogaḥ ca vakṣyate na mātrā mātram api asti vede khiñcid apārthakam śabdabrahma vivartā ādi kalpanāḥ ca purā uditāḥ sarvāḥ parihariṣyante kāryatvasya virodhikāḥ 
NM_4,1.574.106–4,1.574.107	 ittham ca sthite kim anyat avaśiṣṭam vedeṣu āpta ukta tā niścayasya saḥ ayam sakala śāstra artha sthitau satyām pakṣa dharma tva niścayaḥ hetoḥāpta ukta tvasya gīyate yat tu pratyakṣam anumānam vā tad niścaya animittam iti vikalpitam tatra pratyakṣam āstām ! anumāna ādīni ca yāni racanā tu ādīni uktāni yāni ca para darśana dviṃṣi vakṣyante tāni sarvāṇi āpta uktatāyāḥ pakṣa dharmatā siddhi aupayikāni iti alam vistareṇa vede āpta ukta tva hetoḥ vyāpti grahaṇa prakāraḥ 
NM_4,1.574.108	 vyāptiḥ punar asya hetoḥ āyurveda ādi vākyeṣu niścīyate pippalī paṭola mūla ādeḥ api auṣadhasya ittham upayogāt idam abhimatam āsādyate asya ca kṣīra cukra ādi virodhi aśanasya parihārāt idam aniṣṭam upaśāmyati iti ādiṣu āyurveda śāstreṣu pratyakṣeṇa tasya arthasya tathā niścaya ātartha avisaṃvādi tvam nāma prāmāṇyam pratipannam tad ca idam āpta vāda prayuktam atas yatra āptavāda tvam tatra prāmāṇyam iti vyāptiḥ gṛhyate 
NM_4,1.574.109	 tathā mantrāṇām prayoge vṛścika bhujaga t aṣṭasya bhakṣita viṣasya vā aniḥ viṣa tvam apasmāra piśāca rūpikā gṛhītasya tat unmocanam ati rabhasā ujjihāneṣu duṣṭa megheṣu sasya rakṣaṇam iti evam upalabdham atas teṣāṃviṣa bhūta aśani śamana kuśalānām āptāḥ upadeṣṭāraḥ iti tatra api tathā eva vyāpti niścayaḥ āyurveda ādīnām prāmāṇyam āpta ukta tva mūlam eva 
NM_4,1.574.110	 nanu ! āyurveda ādau prāmāṇyam pratyakṣa ādi saṃvādāt pratipannam na āpta prāmāṇyāt atas katham āpta ukta tvasya tatra vyāpti grahaṇam na etat evam pratyakṣa ādi saṃvādāt tat niścīyatām nāma prāmāṇyam ! utthitam tu tat āpta ukta tvāt pratyakṣa ādau= api artha kriyā jñāna saṃvādāt prāmāṇyasya jñaptiḥ utpattiḥ tu guṇavat kāraka kṛtyā iti uktam 
NM_4,1.574.111	 nadī ādi vākyāni ca vipralambhaka puruṣa bhāṣitāni visaṃvadanti loke dṛśyante tena āpta praṇīta tvam eva teṣām prāmāṇya kāraṇam kāraṇa śuddhim antareṇa samyak pratyaya anutpādāt niścaya upāvastu pratyakṣaṃbhavatu na tu tat kṛtam eva prāmāṇyam atas yuktam āpta ukta tāyāḥ āyurveda ādau vyāpti grahaṇam āyurveda ādau saṃvādāt eva prāmāṇyam iti āśaṅkā 
NM_4,1.574.112	 nanu ! evam api na yuktam āpta ukta tvasya tatra paricchettum aśakyatvāt anvaya vyatireka mūlam eva āyurveda vākyānām prāmāṇyam na āpta kṛtam anvaya vyatirekau ca yāvatī eva dṛśyete tāvatī eva artha īprāmāṇyam yathā harītakī ādi vākya arthe yatra tu tayoḥ adarśanaṃtatra aprāmāṇyam yathā somarājī upayoge samāḥ sahasram jīvyata iiti āpte tu kalpyamāne argha jaratīyam syāt ardhe tasya āpta tvam ardhe ca katham anāpta tvam iti āyurveda ādau saṃvādasya duradhigama tva nirūpaṇam 
NM_4,1.574.113^1	 tat idam anupapannam anvaya vyatirekayoḥ grahītum aśakyatvāt tau hi sva ātmani vā grahītum śakyete vyaktayantare vā vyakti antare api sarvatra kvacid eva vā vyakti viśeṣe sarvathā saṃkaṭaḥ ayam panthāḥ vyādhīnām tad nidānānām tad upacaya apacayānāṃtad upaśama upāyānām auṣadhānām tad saṃyoga viyoga viśeṣāṇām tad parimāṇānām tad rasa vīrya vipākānām deśa kāla puruṣa daśā bhedena śakti bhedasyaekena janmanā grahītum aśakyatvāt janma antara anubhūtānām ca bhāvānāna smaraṇāt janaḥ anantaḥ tāvat nirabadhiḥ iha vyādhi nivahaḥna saṃkhyātum śakyāḥ bahu guṇa rasa dravya gatayaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.113^2	 vicitrāḥ saṃyogāḥ pariṇatiḥ apūrvā iti ca kutas cikitsāyāḥ pāram tarati yuga lakṣaiḥ api naraḥ yat eva dravyam ekasya dhātoḥ bhavati śāntaye yoga antarāt tat eva asya punar kopāya kalpate yā dravya śaktiḥ ekatra puṃsi na asau nara antare harītakyā api na udbhūta vāta kuṣṭhe virecyate śaradi udrikta pittasya jvarāya dadhi kalpate tat eva bhuktam varṣāsu jvaram hanti daśa antare na ca upalakṣaṇam kiñcid asti tad śakti vedane yena ekatra gṛhītā asau sarvatra avagatā bhavet yaḥ vā jñātum prabhavati puruṣaḥ tad sāmarthyam niravadhi viṣayam syāt sarvajñaḥ saḥ iti na vimatiḥ tasmin kāryā sva vacana kathite anādi paramparā siddha tva mātrāt na āyurveda ādi prāmāṇyanirṇayaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.114	 atha ucyeta anādiḥ eva eṣā cikitsaka smṛtiḥ vyākaraṇa ādi smṛti vat saṃkṣepa vistara vivakṣayā eva caraka ādayaḥ kartāraḥ na tu tesarva darśinaḥ na ca smṛtau= andha paraṃparā doṣaḥ sa mūla tvāt yathā vyākaraṇa smṛteḥ śiṣṭa prayogaḥ mūlam evam iha anvaya vyatirekau śiṣṭa virodhe sati yathā mūla virodhinī pāṇini ādi smṛtiḥ apramāṇam tathā ca āhuḥ iha na bhavati anabhidhānāt iti evam vaidya smṛtiḥ api anvaya vyatireka viruddhāḥ na pramāṇam iti tat etat ayuktam anvaya vyatirekayoḥ yathā ukta nayena pariccheda asambhavena tad mūla tva anupapatteḥ kvācid ka saṃbādāt sarva aṃśe prāmāṇyam na nirṇetum śakyam 
NM_4,1.574.115	 yadi hi anvaya vyatirekābhyām aśeṣa dravya śaktīḥ niścitya caraka ādibhiḥ viracitam śāstram iti īdṛśam anvaya vyatireki tvam ucyate tat api ayākṛtam adya tve yāvantau= anvaya vyatirekau vayam upalabdhum śaknumaḥ tāvadbhyām tābhyām eka deśa saṃvādāt prāmāṇya kalpanāt tatra pravartatām na tu tau tāvantau śāstrasya mūlam bhavitum arhataḥ sarvaiḥ asmad ādibhiḥ tādṛśa śāstra praṇayana prasaṅgāt āyurveda ādīnām veda vat nānā ādi tvam 
NM_4,1.574.116	 anādi tvam api śāstrāṇām veda vat anupapannam caraka ādi kartṛ smṛteḥ kāli dāsa ādi smṛti vat avigīta tvāt na ca cikitsā smaraṇa prabandha ā iva ayam anādiḥ tathā tve andha paraṃparā kāraṇa anavadhāraṇāt na catat uktam unmūlam bhavitum arhati vyudasta tvāt tasmāt sarvajña praṇītaḥ eva āyurvedaḥ āyurveda ādi kartṝṇām tad upayogi arthaṃdarśanam pratyakṣam eva 
NM_4,1.574.117	 nanu aviduṣām upadeśaḥ na avakalpate iti vidvāṃsaḥ caraka ādayaḥ kalpyantām te tu pratyakṣeṇa eva sarvam vidita bante iti atra kim mānam ucyate anvaya vyatirekayoḥ nirāsāt na anumānasya eṣa viṣayaḥ veda mūla tvam api manu ādi smṛti vat ayuktam kalpayitum kartṛ sāmānya asaṃbhavāt iti varṇa viṣyāmaḥ puruṣa antara upadeśa pūrvaka tvecarakeṇava kim aparāddham upamāna m anāśaṅkanīyam eva asmin= arthe arthāpattiḥ tum na pramāṇa antaram aprāmāṇyam tu na asti bahu kṛtvas saṃvāda darśanāt atas pariśeṣāt pratyakṣīkṛta deśa kāla puruṣa daśā bheda anusāri samasta vyastapadārtha sārtha śakti niścayāḥ caraka ādayaḥ iti yuktaṃkalpayitum āyurveda ādi ukta phaleṣu vyabhicāra ādya prasaktiḥ 
NM_4,1.574.118–4,1.574.119	 yadi evam katham tarhi somarājya ādi vākyeṣu vyabhicāraḥ vyabhicāreca ardha jaratīyam iti uktam na eṣa doṣaḥ karma kartṛ sādhana vaiguṇyāt eṣu vyabhicāraḥ bhaviṣyati vaidikeṣu ca karmasu mīmāṃsakasya samānaḥ guṇaḥ kārīrya ādau kā te vārtā yasyām na syāt iṣṭau vṛṣṭiḥ vaiguṇyam ced kartṛ ādīnām atra api evam śakyam vaktum yadi vidhuram abhuktam karma śāstrī iyam anyat phala vighaṭana hetuḥ kalpyate saḥ api tulyaḥ kvacid atha phala saṃpad dṛśyate tad prayogetat iha dṛḍha śarīrāḥ santi dīrgha āyuṣaḥ ca āyurvedaḥ tasmāt āpta kṛtaḥ na anya mūlaḥ iti siddham evaṃphala veda ādau prakāśam āpta praṇīta tvam tasmāt āpta ukta tvasya siddham āyurveda ādau vyāpti grahaṇam vyāpti pradarśanāya eva sūtra kṛtā sa dvividhaḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa artha tvāt 
NM_4,1.574.120	 iti uktam dṛṣṭa artha śabde gṛhīta avinābhāvam āpta ukta tvaṃadṛṣṭa arthe api prāmāṇyam sādhayati iti atas eva uktam mantra āyurveda prāmāṇya vat ca tad prāmāṇyam āpta prāmāṇyāt iti āyurveda ādi kartṝṇām atīta tve api vyāpti graha saṃbhavaḥ nanu atra api na vaidyakam viracayan dṛṣṭaḥ muniḥ sarva vid tad vyāpti grahaṇam jane yadi vṛthā aayurveda saṃkīrtanam satyam kintu dṛḍhā tathā api caraka ādi āpta smṛtiḥ vaidyakena asau ca anya nibandhanā iti kathitā tasya iha dṛṣṭānta tā iti āyurveda vākya prabhṛtiṣu bhavati vyāptiḥ āpta ukta tāyāḥ pūrva uktena krameṇa sphuṭam akathi tathā pakṣa dharma tvam asyāḥ na pratyakṣa āgamābhyām apahṛta viṣayā na anumāna antareṇa vyādhūtā vā iti sā eṣā bhajati gamaka tām pañca rūpa upapatteḥ anapekṣa tayā na veda vācām ghaṭate niṣpratimaḥ pramāṇa bhāvaḥ kva girām ayathārtha tā nivṛttiḥ puruṣa pratyayam antareṇa dṛṣṭāḥ tad pratyayāt bahutara draviṇa vyaya ādi sādhyeṣu karmasu tapassu ca vaidikeṣu yuktam pravarta nam abādhanakena na evatad siddhiḥ iti alam asammataḥ eṣa mārgaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.121–4,1.574.123	 tasmāt āpta ukta tvāt eva vedāḥ pramāṇam iti siddham mīmāṃsaka mate veda prāmāṇya varṇana prakāraḥ anye tu anyathā veda prāmāṇyam varṇayanti tasya hi prāmāṇya iabhyupagata para lokaḥ anabhyupagata para lokaḥ vā paraḥ vipratipadyate tatra anabhyupagata para lokam prati tāvat ātma nitya tā ādi nyāya pūrva kaṃpara loka samarthanam eva vidheyam 
NM_4,1.574.124	 para loka vādinām tu mate yat etat sukhi duḥkhya ādi bhedena jagataḥ vaicitryam dṛśyate tat avaśyam karma vaicitrya nibandhanam eva karmāṇi cān anuṣṭhitāni na ātmānam labhante alabdha ātmanām ca nabhaḥ kusuma nibhānām kutas vicitra sukha duḥkha ādi phala sādhana tvam tasmāt anuṣṭhānam eṣām eṣitavyam anuṣṭhānam ca na avidita svarūpāṇāṃkarmaṇām upapannam ajānan puruṣaḥ tapasvī kim anutiṣṭhet tat avaśyaṃjñātvā anuṣṭheyāni karmāṇi 
NM_4,1.574.125–4,1.574.128	 tat idānīm teṣām parijñāne kaḥ abhyupāyaḥ na pratyakṣam asmad ādīnām svarga ādi adṛṣṭa puruṣa artha sādhanāni karma aṇidarśayitum prabhavati na api anumānam anvaya vyatirekābhyām tṛpti bhojanayoḥ iva svarga yāgayoḥ sādhya sādhana sambandha an abadhāraṇāt na api arthāpattiḥ jagat vaicitryānyathā anupapattyā tu vicitram kāraṇa mātram anumīyate na ca tāvatā anuṣṭhāna siddhiḥ uktam ca adharme dharma rūpe vā api avibhakte phalam prati kim api asti iti vijñānam narāṇām kva upayujyate iti 
NM_4,1.574.129–4,1.574.130	 upamānam tu atra śaṅkyamānam api na śobhate na api parasparam upadiśantaḥ laukikāḥ karmāṇi para loka phalānijānīyuḥ iti vaktum yuktam ajñātvā upapādayatām āpta tva ayogāt jñānam tu laukikānām durghaṭam pramāṇa abhāvāt iti ukta tvāt evam evahi puruṣa upadeśa paraṃparākalpanāyām andha paraṃpara anyāyaḥ syāt tasmāt avaśyam abhyupagata para lokaiḥ para loka phalāni karmāṇi kurvadbhiḥ śāstrāt karma avabodhaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ śāstram ca vedāḥ eva iti siddhaṃtad prāmāṇyam loka prasiddhayā dharma adharma svarūpa avagamaḥ na saṃbhavet 
NM_4,1.574.131	 nanu ! loka prasiddhitaḥ eva dharma adharma sādhanāni karmāṇi śāsyante kim śāstreṇa upakāra apakārau hi dharma adharmayoḥ lakṣaṇam iti prasiddham eva etat tathā aaha vyāsaḥ idam puṇyam idam pāpam iti etasmin pada dvaye ācaṇḍālam manuṣyāṇām alpam śāstra prayojanam iti na etat yuktam loka prasiddheḥ nirmūlāyāḥ pramāṇa tva ācupapatteḥ lokaprasiddhiḥ nāma laukikānām avicchinnā smṛtiḥ smṛtit ca prabhabantī pramāṇa antara mūlā bhavati na svatantrā iti avagryam asyāḥ mūlam anveṣaṇīyam tat ca pratyakṣa ādi na upapadyate iti nūnam śāstra mūlā eva loka prasiddhiḥ viruddha aneka prakāra tvāt ca loka prasiddheḥ na tasyāṃsvatantrāyām samāśvasiti lokaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.132–4,1.574.133	 na ca upakāra apakāraka mātra lakṣaṇau= eva dharma adharmau vaktum yujyete japa śīdhu pāna ādau tad abhāvāt guru dāra gamana ādau ca viparyaya āditya caśyam śāstra śaraṇau= eva tau= eṣitavyau vaidika dharma adharma nirṇayaḥ na lokataḥ bhavitum śakyaḥ api ca idam iṣṭi mantra ādikam evaṃphalam ayam asmin adhikṛtā eti iyam iti kartavya tā eṣa deśaḥ eṣa kālaḥ ime ṛtvijaḥ ityādi kim loka prasiddheḥ adhigantum śakyate tasmāt avaśyam śāstra adhīnaā iva viśiṣṭa karma avabodhaḥ eṣitavyaḥ śāstram ca vedaḥ eva iti uktam atas tasya nirvivāda siddham eva prāmāṇyam iti siddhānti ukta veda prāmāṇya prakriyā eva yuktatarā 
NM_4,1.574.134–4,1.574.135	 evam tu varṇyamāne saṃsāra anādi tvam tāvat uktam syāt vedasya anādi tvam karma jñānānādi tvāt tatas ca mīmāṃsaka vartmanā eva pramāṇatā sidhyati na āpta vādāt tasmāt yathā udāhṛtaḥ eva mārgaḥ pramāṇa tāyām anuvartanīyaḥ vedānām anādi tvam pravāhate eva na svarūpataḥ athavā vayam api na na śiṣmaḥ anādi saṃsāra pakṣaṃyugapad akhila sarga dhvaṃsa vāde tu bhedaḥ akathi ca racanānām kārya tā tena sargāt prabhṛti bhagavatā idam veda śāstram praṇītam anādiḥ eva īśvara kartṛkaḥ api sadā eva sarga pralaya prabandhaḥ sarga antareṣu eva ca karma bodhaḥ veda antarebhyaḥ api janasya sidhyet anya tve kim pramāṇam nanu tava sumate ! kim tad aikye pramāṇam
