NM_4,1.574.136	 dhvastam tāvat samastam bhuvanam iti tadā veda nāśaḥ api avaśyam ekaḥ tu īśaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ sa ca racayati vā prāktanam saṃsmaret bāvede svātantryam asmin niyatam ubhayathā api asti candra ardha mauleḥ ekasya tasya manasi pratibhāsamānaḥ vedaḥ tadā hi kṛtakān na viśiṣyate asau pratyakṣa sarva viṣayasya tu na īśvarasya yuktā smṛtiḥ karaṇam eva tatas anavadyam tena āpta nirmitat tayā eva niratyaya artha saṃpratyaya upajananāya janasya vede śāstram su vistara kṣapāstaku tarka mūla moha prapañcam akarot muniḥ akṣapādaḥ atharvavedasya caturtha veda tva ākṣepaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.137–4,1.574.138	 atra kaścid āha yuktam itaretara vyatiṣakta artha upadeśi tvena eka kartṛkatva anumāna dvārakam tri vedyāḥ prāmāṇyam atharvavedasya tu trayī āmnāta dharma upayoga anupalabdheḥ trayī bāhya tvena na tad samāna yogakṣema tvam atharvavedasya svatantra pramāṇa tva asaṃbhavaḥ anapekṣa tva lakṣaṇa prāmāṇya pakṣe api vikṣipta śāstra antara upadiṣṭa viśiṣṭa jyotiṣṭoma ādi aneka karma anupraviṣṭa hautra adhvarya vādi vyāpāra vyatiṣaṅga darśanāt tad arthā trayyā iva yathā pramāṇa bhāva bhāginī bhavitum arhati na tathā pṛthak vyavahārāḥ ātharvaṇa śrutiḥ vedānām tri tvam eva śruti sammatam 
NM_4,1.574.139	 tathā ca loke catasraḥ imāḥ vidyāḥ prāṇinām anugrahāya pravṛttāḥ ānvīkṣakī trayī vārtā daṇḍanītiḥ iti prasiddhiḥ śruti smṛtī api tad anuguṇa arthe eva dṛśyete śrutiḥ tāvat ṛgbhiḥ prātar dividevaḥ īyate yajurvedena tiṣṭhati madhye ahnaḥ sāmavedena astam eti vedaiḥ aśūn yaḥ tribhiḥ eti sūryaḥ iti tathā prajāpatiḥ akāmayata bahusyām prajāyeya iti sa tapaḥ atapyata sa tapaḥ taptvā imān lokān asṛjata pṛthivīm antarikṣam divam iti tān lokān abhyatapat tebhyaḥ trīṇi jyortīṣyajāyanta agniḥ eva pṛthivyāḥ ajāyata vāyuḥ antarikṣāt divaḥ ādityaḥ iti tāni jyortīṣi abhyatapat 
NM_4,1.574.140–4,1.574.141	 tebhyaḥ trayaḥ vedāḥ ajāyanta agneḥ ṛgvedaḥ vāyoḥ yajurvedaḥ ādityāt sāma vedaḥ tathā sā eṣā vidyā trayītapati iti smṛtiṣu api vedānām tri tvam eva kīrtyate smṛtiḥ api mānavī prativedam dvādaśa vārṣika brahmacarya upadeśinī dṛśyate ṣaṭtriṃśat vārṣikam caryam gurau traivedikam vratam iti śrāddha prakaraṇe api yatnena bhojayet śrāddhe bahu ṛcam vedapāragam śākhā anta gam athā adhvaryum chandogam vā samāpti gam iti tri vedapāragān eva śrāddha bhujaḥ brāhmaṇān darśayati nātharvavedā dhyāyinaḥ pratyuta niṣedhaḥ kvacid upadiśyate tasmāt ātharvaṇaṃna pravṛñjayāt iti atharvaṇaḥ veda tvam bhaṭṭam atarītvā 
NM_4,1.574.142–4,1.574.143	 evam ākṣepe sati kecid ācakṣate yadi yajña upayogi tvam na iha asti ātharvaṇa śruteḥ artha antare pramāṇa tvam kena asyāḥ pratihanyate śānti puṣṭi abhicāra arthāḥ eka brahma ṛtvij āśritāḥ kriyāḥ tayā pramīyante trayī vā ātmīya gocaraḥ iti sva pakṣeṇa atharvaṇaḥ veda tva samarthanam etat tu sarvam na sādhu abhidhīyate tathā hi tad pramāṇaṃbādarāyaṇasya anapekṣa tvāt iti yaḥ eṣa veda prāmāṇya adhigatau jaimininā niradeśi panthāḥ yaḥ vai akṣapādena kaṇā ādena caprakaṭitaḥ tad vacanāt āmnāya prāmāṇyam iti mantra āyurveda prāmāṇya vat ca tad prāmāṇyam āpta prāmāṇyāt iti sa caturṣu api vedeṣu tulyaḥ tatra viśeṣa tuṣaḥ api na kaścid atiprayatnena anviṣyamāṇaḥ prāpyate na hi mīmāṃsaka pakṣe evam vaktum śakyate trayī eva anādimatī nātharva śrutiḥ tasyām kartṛ smaraṇa saṃbhavāt iti 
NM_4,1.574.144–4,1.574.145	 na api naiyāyika pakṣe evam vaktum śakyam āpta praṇītāḥ trayovedāḥ caturthaḥ tu na āpta praṇītaḥ iti tena prāmāṇya adhigama upāya aviśeṣāt samāna yoga kṣema tayā catvāraḥ api vedāḥ pramāṇam vyabahāraḥ hi sarveṣām sāretara vicāra catura cetasām caturbhiḥ api vedaiḥ caturṇām varṇānām āśramāṇām catasṛṣu dikṣu catur abdhi mekhalāyām avanau prasiddhaḥ iti kaḥ ayam atra anyathātva bhramaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.146	 śruti smṛti mūlaḥ ca āryāvarta nivāsinām bhavati vyavahāraḥ te caśruti smṛtī caturaḥ api vedān samāna kakṣyān abhivadataḥ ṛc yajussāma vedeṣu api atharvaveda āśaṃsīni bhūyāṃsi vacāṃsi bhavanti tat yathā śatapathe atha tṛtīye ahan iti upakramyaaśvamedhe pāriplava ākhyāne saḥ ayam ātharvaṇaḥ vedaḥ iti śrūyate chānda ugya upaniṣadi ca ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ sāmavedaḥ ātharvaṇaḥ caturthaḥ iti paṭhyate atharvavedasya itihāsa purāṇa tulya tva nirāsaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.147–4,1.574.149	 nanu ! itihāsa purāṇaḥ pañcamaḥ iti tatra paṭhyate eva kiñca atas kim iyatā atharvaṇaḥ caturthaḥ na bhavati vedaḥ caturtha śabda upādānāt itihāsa ādi tulyaḥ asau na veda samāna kakṣyaḥ iti ced kā iyam kalpanā caturtha śabda upādānāt aprādhānyetrayaḥ vedāḥ asṛjyante ityādau tritva saṃkhyā upādānāt te api na pradhāna tām adhigaccheyuḥ itihāsa ādibhiḥ vā saha parigaṇanam aprādhānya kāraṇam yat ucyate tat api sarva vedasādhāraṇam itiyat kiñcid etat atharvavedasya veda tve śruti sammatiḥ 
NM_4,1.574.150–4,1.574.152	 tathā śata adhyayane api ṛcaḥ vai brahmaṇaḥ prāṇāḥ iti abhyupakramyaa ātharvaṇaḥ vai brahmaṇaḥ samānaḥ iti paṭhyate tathā ye asya prāñcaḥ raśmayaḥ tāḥ eva asya prācyaḥ madhunāḍyaḥ ṛcaḥ eva puṣpam iti upakramya paṭhita atha ye asya udañcaḥ raśmayaḥ tāḥ eva asya udīcyaḥ madhunāḍyaḥ atharva aṅgirasaḥ eva madhukṛtaḥ iti tathā taittarīye tasmāt vā etasmāt prāṇa mayāt anyaḥ antaraa ātmā manaḥ mayaḥ iti prastutya tasya yajuḥ eva śiraḥ ṛc dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ sāma uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ ādeśaḥ ātmā atharva aṅgirasaḥ puccham pratiṣṭhā iti paṭhyate 
NM_4,1.574.153–4,1.574.154	 tathā anyatra ṛcām prācī mahatī diś ucyate dakṣiṇām āhuḥ yajuṣām sāmnām uttarām atharvaṇām aṅgirasām pratīcī mahatī diś ucyate iti śatapathe brahma yajña vidhi prakrame madhyame payaḥ āhutayaḥ ha vai etā devānām yat ṛcaḥ iti upakramya medaḥ āhutayoha vai etāḥ devānām yat atharva aṅgirasaḥ sa yaḥ evam vidvān atharvā aṅgirasaḥ aharahar svādhyāyam adhīte medaḥ āhutibhiḥ eva tad devān sa tarpayati te enaṃtṛptāḥ tarpayanti iti mantra varṇaḥ api atharvaṇaḥ veda tva gamakaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.155–4,1.574.156	 mantrāḥ api tad artha prakāśana parāḥ anuśrūyante tvām agne puṣkarāt adhi atharvā niramanthate ityādayaḥ na ca eṣām atharvā nāma kaścid ṛṣiḥ iti evaṃprakāram vyākhyānam yuktam anyatra api asamāśvāsa prasaṅgāt iti evan jātīyakāḥ tāvat udāhṛtāḥ śruti vācaḥ atharvaṇaḥ veda tve smṛti vākyāni smṛti vākyāni khalu api manuḥ tāvat śrutīratharva āṅgirasīḥ kuryāt iti avicārayan iti śruti śabdena trayī vat iha vyavaharati 
NM_4,1.574.157–4,1.574.158	 yājñavalkyaḥ caturdaśa vidyā sthānāni gaṇayan purāṇa tarka mīmāṃsā dharma śāstra aṅga miśritāḥ vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānām dharmasya ca caturdaśa eti caturaḥ eva vedān āvedayate na anyathā hi caturdaśa saṃkhyā āpūryate smṛti antare ca spaṣṭam eva uktam aṅgāni vedāḥ catvāraḥ mīmāṃsā nyāya vistaraḥ purāṇam dharma śāstram ca vidyāḥ hi etāḥ caturdaśaḥ iti anyatra api uktam purāṇam dharma śāstram mīmāṃsā nyāyaḥ catvārovedāḥ ṣaṣ aṅgāni iti caturdaśa vidyā sthānāni iti 
NM_4,1.574.159–4,1.574.161	 śātātapaḥ api āha ṛc sāma yajuḥ aṅgānām atharva aṅgirasām api aṇoḥ api asya vijñānāt yaḥ anūcānaḥ sa naḥ mahān iti tathā anyatra catvāraḥ caturṇām vedānām pāragāḥ dharma jñāḥ pariṣatiti uktam śaṅkha likhitau ca ṛc yajussāma atharva vidaḥ ṣaḍaṅga vid dharma vid vākya vid naiyāyikaḥ naiṣṭhikaḥ brahmacārī pañca agniḥ iti daśa avarā pariṣat iti ūcatuḥ 
NM_4,1.574.162–4,1.574.164	 prācetase catvāraḥ veda vidaḥ dharma śāstra vid iti pañca avarā pariṣat iti uktam tathā ca paṅkti pāvana prastāve catur veda ṣaḍaṅga vid jyeṣṭha sāma gaḥ atharva aṅgirasaḥ api ete paṅkti pāvanāḥ gaṇyante tat ayam evam ādi veda catuṣṭaya pratiṣṭhā praguṇaḥ eva prācuryeṇa dharma śāstra kārāṇām vyavahāraḥ atharvaṇaḥ veda tvam śāstra kārāṇām api sammatam anye api śāstra kārāḥ tathā eva vyavaharantaḥ dṛśyante tathā ca mahā bhāṣya kāraḥ bhagavān patañjaliḥ atharvavedam eva prathamam udāhṛtavān śannaḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye iti 
NM_4,1.574.165	 mīmāṃsā bhāṣya kāreṇa api veda adhikaraṇe kāṭhakam kālāpam maudgalaṃpaippalādakam iti yajurveda ādi vat atharvavede apipaippalādakam udā jahne sarva śākhā adhikaraṇe api veda antara śāsvāntara vat maudgala paippalādaka ākhye atharva śākhe api udāhṛtya vicāraḥ kṛtaḥ tathā ca prathama yajñaḥ nāma caturṣu na kaścid astiiti adhikaraṇa antaḥ eva likhitam evam śruti smṛti viśiṣṭa ācāra vyavahāra vidām atra vipratipatti saṃbhāvanā eva na asti trayyām atharvaṇaḥ agaṇanam tasya na āveda tvam gamayet 
NM_4,1.574.166	 āha na brūmaḥ atharvavedaḥ na pramāṇam iti kintu trayī bāhya eti ucyate trayī api iyam atharvaveda bāhyā eva na kevalam evam trayyām api paraspara bāhya tvam asti eva ṛc sāma bāhyāni yajūṃṣi yaju ssāma bāhya aṛcaḥ ṛc yajuḥ bāhyāni sāmāni iti kiyānayam doṣaḥ sarva bhāvānām itaretarasāṅkarya sahita tvāt ye hi śabda ātmānaḥ grantha sandarbha svabhāvāḥ ye ca tad abhidheyāḥ artha svabhāvāḥ te sarve anyonya saṃmiśrita ātmāna ā iva na ca pareṇa ātmānam saṃmiśrayantaḥ api te svarūpam apahārayanti iti sarva śākhā pratyaya nyāyaḥ atharvavedam api kroḍīkaroti eva 
NM_4,1.574.167	 atha ucyeta na īdṛśam trayī bāhya tvam atharvavede vivakṣitam api tuyat eva na trayī pratyayam karma upadiśati na tad sambaddham kiṃcid iti tat asya trayī bāhya tvam iti etat api na sādhu upadiṣṭam iṣṭi paśu eka ahā hīna satra ādi karmaṇām tatra upadeśa darśanāt sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam karma iti nyāyāt trayī upadiṣṭe api karmaṇi sambaddham atharvavedāt kim apilamyatas eva atharvaveda apekṣa tvam trayyā asti eva 
NM_4,1.574.168^1	 nanu ! bhavati sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam karma tat punar tri vedī sambaddha sarva śākhā pratyayam eva nātharva śākhā pratyayam yatas soma yāga ādi karmaṇā aṃṛgvedena hautram yajurvedena adhvaryavam samāvedena audgātram kiyate nātharvavedena kiñcid iti tat ayuktam atharvavedena brahma tvasya karaṇāt tathā ca gopatha brāhmaṇam prajāpatissomena yakṣyamāṇaḥ vedān uvāca 
NM_4,1.574.168^2	 kam vaḥ hotāram vṛṇīyam iti iti prakramya tasmāt ṛgu idam eva hotāram vṛṇīṣva sa hi hautram veda yajurvidam eva adhvaryuṃvṛṇīṣva sa hi ādhvaryavam veda sāmavidam eva udgātāram vṛṇīṣva sa hia udgātram veda atharva aṅgiraḥ vidam eva brahmāṇam vṛṇīṣva sa hi brahma tvaṃvedaḥ iti abhidhāya punar āha atha ced na evaṃvidham hotāraṃadhvaryu mudgātāram brahmāṇam vā vṛṇute purastāt eva vā eṣām yajñaḥ ricyatā eti tasmāt ṛgu idam eva hotāram kuryāt yajurvidam eva adhvaryum sāmavidam eva udgātāram atharva aṅgiraḥ vidam eva brahmāṇam iti tathā yat ūnam ca viriṣṭam ca yātayāmam ca karoti tad atharvaṇām tejasā apratyāpyāyayet iti na ṛte bhṛgu aṅgirobhyaḥsomaḥ pātavyaḥ iti atharvavedasya trayī rūpa tvam 
NM_4,1.574.169	 nanu etāḥ śrutīḥ atharvāṇaḥ eva ādhīyate na anye trayī vidaḥ te tu evam paṭhanti yadṛcā hautram kriyate yajuṣā aadhvaryavam sāmnā āaudgātram atha kena brahma tvam kriyate iti trayyā vidyayā iti brūyāt iti tathā ca yadṛcā eva hautram akurvata yajuṣā aadhvaryavam sāmnā audgātraṃyat eva trayyai vidyāyai śukram tena brahma tvam iti ucyate vayam api evamādīni vākyāni na na adhīmahi kim tu eṣām ayam eva arthaḥ atharva aṅgiraḥ vid eva brahma iti katham yatas na trayī nāmakim api vastu antaram api tu trayāṇām vedānām samāhāraḥ iti samāhāraḥ ca samāhriyamāṇa niṣṭhaḥ bhavati samāhriyamāṇāḥ ca ṛgveda ādayaḥ trayaḥ hautra ādi paratvena caritārthāḥ na punar tatra bhedam arhanti ekaikaśas caritārthānām samudāyaḥ api caritārthaḥ eva samudāya buddhau hi vibhajyamānāyām samudāyinaḥ eva sphuranti na avaya vivat artha antaram te ca anyatra vyāpṛtāḥ ṛgveda ādi adhyetṛṇām brahma tve anadhikāraḥ 
NM_4,1.574.170	 kim nu khalu ṛgveda ādīnām brahma tvam kurvatām atibhāraḥ bhavati na brūmaḥ atibhāraḥ iti kintu tri ātmaka tvena brahma tva kartavyatā upadiśyate tri ātmakaḥ ca anyatamaḥ api tebhyaḥ na bhavati vedaḥ atharvavedaḥ tu tri ātmakaḥ eva tatra hi ṛcaḥ yajūṃṣi sāmāni iti trīṇi apisanti tena brahma tvam kriyamāṇam trayyā kṛtam bhavati 
NM_4,1.574.171–4,1.574.172	 nanu ! yaḥ trīn vedān adhīte tena ced brahma tvam kriyeta tat kiṃtrayyā na kṛtam bhavati bāḍham iti ucyate saḥ api ekasmai vā akāmāyā anye yajña kratavaḥ samādhīyante sarvebhyaḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ sarvebhyaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau iti śrutau= api yoga siddhi adhikaraṇa nyāyena asyatamam eva buddha ābādhāya vidadhyāt na samudāyaṃbuddhau= āropayitum śaknuyāt iti ekena eva tat kṛtam bhavati na trayyā iti atharva śākhinām itara śākhi tulya tvam nanu ! anye api tri ātmakāḥ vedāḥ yadi evam sutarām atharvavedaḥ na pṛthakkaraṇīyaḥ sarveṣām rūpa aviśeṣāt teṣām pṛthak pratiṣṭhaiḥ svaiḥ svaiḥṛk ādibhiḥ eva vyapadeśaḥ iti na te samudāya śabda vyapadeśyāḥ atharvavedasya trayīsāra tvam 
NM_4,1.574.173	 yat tu vākya antare trayyai vidyāyai śukram tena brahma tvam iti tatra iyam caturthī ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāne prayuktāḥ śukram iti sāram ācakṣate tena trayī vidyāyāḥ sāreṇa brahma tvam kriyate iti uktam bhavati na catrayyā iva trayyāḥ śukram bhavati na ca atyantam tatas artha antaram eva tena idam atharvaveda ātmakam eva trayyāḥ śukram iti manyāmahe tri ātmaka tvāt iti manyāmahe tri ātmaka tvāt iti śukram iti ca guhyam āhuḥ atharva śabdaḥ api rahasya vacanaḥ yajña atharvāṇam vaidikasyāḥ iṣṭayaḥ iti tena trayī śukra rūpeṇa atharvavedena brahma tvam iti ittham atharvavedasya na trayī bāhya tvam ittham sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam karma iti atra na sarva śabdaḥ saṅkā ucitaḥ bhavati atharvavedaḥ brahma vedaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.174	 atas eva brahma vedaḥ atharvavedaḥ iti pūrva uttara brāhmaṇe paṭhyate ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ sāmavedaḥ brahma vedaḥ iti tathā ca kāṭhaka śata adhyayane brāhmaṇe brahmaudane śrūyate brahma vādinaḥ vadanti purodhāḥ auddālakirāruṇim uvāca brahmaṇe tvā prāṇāya juṣṭam nirvapāmi brahmaṇe tvā vyānāya juṣṭam nirvapāmi iti upakramya ātharvaṇau vaibrahmaṇaḥ samānaḥ atharvaṇam eva etat juṣṭam nirvapati catur śarāvaḥ bhavati catvārohi ime vedāḥ tān eva bhāginaḥ karoti mūlam vai brahmaṇaḥ vedāḥ vedānām etat mūlaṃyat ṛtvijaḥ prāśnanti tad drahmaudanasya brahmaudana tvam iti 
NM_4,1.574.175	 tathā sāmavede pṛṣṭhyasya caturthe ahanyārbhave pavamāne atharvaṇesāmnaḥ gānam yat tad vidhāne śrūyate caturvidham ātharvaṇam bhavati catūrātrasya vṛt tvai catuṣpada āmānuṣṭubhā anuṣṭubham eva etat aharyaḥ caturtham bheṣajam vā atharvaṇaṃtat hi bhaiṣajyam eva tad karoti ātharvaṇāni yāga bheṣajāni iti etat ālambanā iyam stutiḥ atas eva prāk uktam yajñe yat ūnam ca viriṣṭam ca yātayāmam ca karoti tad atharvaṇām tejasā aapyāyayati iti tasmāt ātharvaṇaḥ eva brahma iti etat ca śāstra antare vistareṇa abhiyuktaiḥ yuktibhiḥ upapāditam iti na iha atyantāya pratāyate ātharvaṇaḥ apariharaṇīya tvam 
NM_4,1.574.176	 yat tu na ātharvaṇena pravṛñjyāt iti tat kalpa sūtra vākya tva atveda viruddham iti anādṛtam atha api śrautam idam vākyam tadā api prakaraṇa adhītam ced tatra eva kvacid karmaṇi nivekṣyate anārabhyavāda pakṣe api pūrva ukta vākya visadṛśa artha tvāt atharvavedasya ca trayya bāhya tvena saṃparka parihāra an ardda tvāt niyata viṣayam eva vyākhyāsyate uccais tva ādayaḥ mantra dharmāḥ na veda dharmāḥ 
NM_4,1.574.177	 yat api ucyate uccais ṛcā kriyate uccaissāmnā upāṃśu yajuṣāiti vat atharvadharmaḥ api na kaścid āmnātaḥ iti tat api asāram maṃtra dharmaḥ hi ayam upadiśyate na veda dharmaḥ mantra brāhmaṇa samudāya svabhāvāhi catvāraḥ ime veda granthāḥ mantrāḥ tu vastutas gadya padya bhedāt dvividhāḥ eva gadya bandhaḥ yajuḥ ucyate padyabandhaḥ ṛc iti gīti nibandhanam tu bheda antaram sāma iti atas eva jaimininā mantra vibhāgam prastutya teṣām ṛgī atra artha vaśena pāda vyavasthā gītiṣu sāma ākhyā śeṣe yajuḥ śabdaḥ ittham eva teṣām traividhyam upapāditam teṣām eva ca ayam uccais tva ādi dharmaḥ naveda śabda vācyānām mantra brāhmaṇa samudāya ātmanām granthānām atharvavede api iyam trividhā eva mantra jātiḥ iti tatra api idam dharma jātam upadiṣṭam bhavati 
NM_4,1.574.178–4,1.574.179	 mantra vibhāga kṛtaḥ eva ayam trayī vyapadeśaḥ iti atas ca sā eṣā trayī vidyā tapati ityādi api na virotsyate evam ṛc yajussāma samudāya ātmaka mantra upabandhāt trayī antargataḥ ca atharbavedaḥ pṛthak vyavasthita grantha sandarbha svabhāva tvāt ca bhinnaḥ saḥ iti siddham atharvaṇaḥ ṛgveda tva pakṣaḥ anye punar ṛc pracura tvāt pravirala yajuḥ vākya tvāt agīyamāna sāma mantra tā vaśāt ca ṛgvedam eva atharvavedam ācakṣate ayam apipakṣaḥ astu na kaścid virodhaḥ atharvaṇaḥ veda tvena vyavahāre vipratipatti abhāvaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.180	 yat punar abhidhīyate veda śabdaḥ trayāṇām eva vācakaḥ na caturthasya iti saḥ ayamati utkaṭaḥ dveṣaḥ vṛddha vyavahāraḥ hi atra pramāṇam vedaḥ ayam brāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti tatra tatra veda śabde uccārite catvāraḥ api pratīyante vedaḥ mayā adhītaḥ iti vadantam pṛcchanti vyavahartāraḥ katamaḥ tvayā adhītaḥ vedaḥ iti saḥ āha atharvavedaḥ iti na tam evam ākṣipanti na asau vedaḥ yaḥ tvayā paṭhitaḥ iti sa upapadaḥ atharvavede veda śabdaḥ iti ced veda antareṣu api tulyam etat ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ sāmavedaḥ iti nirupapadaḥ api teṣu veda śabdaḥ prayujyate iti ced tat itaratra api samānam iti uktam catur veda adhyāyībharadvājaḥ iti ca prasiddham eva sarvathā tu sa upapadaḥ eva āyurveda āt iṣu veda śabdaḥ iti na tad tulya kakṣya tā adhikṣepa kṣetra tām atharvavedaḥ netavyaḥ brahma yajñe atharvaveda viniyogaḥ sarva sammataḥ 
NM_4,1.574.181–4,1.574.182	 brahma yajña vidhiḥ ca śrautaḥ caturṣu api aviśiṣṭaḥ iti uktam smārtaḥ api tathāvidhaḥ eva asti yathā aaha yājñavalkyaḥ bhedasā tarpayet devān atharva aṅgirasaḥ paṭhan pitṝn= ca madhu sarpirbhyām anvaham śaktitaḥ dvijaḥ iti sāṃpradāyikam adhyāpana adhyayana ādi sarvam abhinnam eva iti alaṃprasaṅgena tena pramāṇa tāyām veda svādhyāya śabda vācya tve puruṣa artha sādhana vidhau= api catvāraḥ samāḥ vedāḥ atharvavedasya eva itara veda apekṣayā śraiṣṭhyam 
NM_4,1.574.183	 yadi punar auttarādharyeṇa vinā na parituṣyate tat atharvavedaā iva prathamaḥ tatas paramasya maṃtrasya brahmaṇaḥ praṇavasya abhivyakteḥ tathā ca śrutiḥ brahma ha vā idam agre āsīt iti upakramya ātharvaṇam vedam abhyaśrāmyat abhyatapat samatapat tasmāt śāntāt taptāt santaptāt om iti manaḥ eva ūrdhvam akṣaram udakrāmat ityādi tathā mahāvyāhṛtīnām śākhā antara prasiddhānām aprasiddhānāṃca bṛhat iti ādīnām tat eva utthānam atharvaveda adhyayanasya pratyeka upanayana ādhikārika tvam 
NM_4,1.574.184	 atharvaveda kṛta upanayana saṃskārasya veda antara adhyayanam aviruddham anya veda upanīyamānasya tu na atharvaṇa upanayana saṃskāram aprāpitasya atharvaveda adhyayane adhikāraḥ tat uktam bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ vidā saṃskṛtaḥ anyān vedān adhīyīta na anyatra saṃskṛtaḥ bhṛgu aṅgirasaḥ adhīyīta iti trayī eka śaraṇaiḥ api ca etat avaśya āśrayaṇīyam atharvaveda vihitaṃsva karma bhraṃśe prāyaścittam ācaradbhiḥ iti atharvavedaḥ eva jyāyān atharvaṇaḥ veda tve smṛtayaḥ na pratikūlāḥ 
NM_4,1.574.185	 yat tu mānavam vākyam udāhṛtam ṣaṭtriṃśat ābdikam tat tri veda adhyayana viṣayam vaikalpikam vedān adhītya vedau vā vedam vā api yathākramam iti ekasmin vede dvādaśa varṣāṇi vratam dvayoḥ caturviṃśatiḥ trayāṇām ṣaṭtriṃśat iti yaḥ tu caturaḥ vedān adhīte tasya aṣṭacatvāriṃśat varṣam veda brahmacaryam upāsītaḥ iti smṛti antaram asti na ca tad ā āryaiḥ na ādṛtam tatra tri vedā dhyāyinām eva prativarṣam ṣoḍaśa varṣāṇi vratam caret iti vyākhyānam asaṅgatam upakrama virodhāt anupayogāt ca tena veda antara adhyayana kṛtaḥ eva ayam vikalpa vidhiḥ na dvādaśa ṣoḍaśa varṣa apekṣaḥ iti anādaraḥ api asyām smṛtau kṛṣṇa keśaḥ agnīnāt adhītaḥ iti śruti virodha kṛtaḥ nātharvaveda adhyayana niṣedha garbhaḥ iti 
NM_4,1.574.186–4,1.574.187	 traivedika brahmacarya smṛtiḥ api ca iyam atharvaveda adhyayana paryudāsam eva viṣayīkaroti na ca veda antara adhyayana niṣedham iti atra api na viśeṣa hetuḥ asti triṣu vedeṣu idam vratam na punar eṣu eva triṣu iti niyāma kaṃvacanam asti atharvavidaḥ śrāddha bhojane adhikāraḥ asti eva yat api śrāddha prakaraṇe yatnena bhojayet iti tri vedī pāraga parikīrtanam tat vedapāragam iti śākhā antagam iti samāpti gam iti viśeṣaṇa pada paryālocanayā ṛgveda ādi eka deśa adhyāyinām anadhikāram eva śrāddhe sūcayati atharvaṇaḥ tu atharvaśiraḥ adhyayana mātra labdha paṅkti pāvana bhāvasya eka deśa pāṭhinaḥ api tatra adhikāraḥ upapadyate darśitam ca atharva śiraḥ dhyayana mātrāt api paṅkti pāvana tvam paṅkti pāvanaḥ caśrāddha bhojane anadhikṛtaḥ iti vipratiṣiddham itaraveda eka deśa adhyāyinaḥ śrāddha bhojane anadhikāraḥ 
NM_4,1.574.188–4,1.574.189	 yaḥ tu jyeṣṭha sāma gaḥ trimadhuḥ trisuparṇikaḥ iti veda antara eka deśa adhyāyinām api śrāddha bhojana abhyanujñānam tat anukalpa rūpam iva bhāti prathama kalpena samagra veda adhyayana upadeśāt iti tasmāt nātharva niṣedha artham etat vākyam iti atharva prāmāṇye kumārila uktam na hṛdayaṅgamam tat evam avasthite yat vārtikakāreṇa bhayāt iva dveṣāt iva mohāt iva sa anukampam iva vā idam ucyate yadi yajña upayogi tvam ityādi tad ahṛdayaṅgamam atharvavede pūrva uttara brāhmaṇe vispaṣṭam iṣṭi paśvāhā hīna satrāṇām upadeśāt veda antareṣu tad codanā bhāvāt kim atharvavede tad upadeśena iti ced su bhāpitam idam evam api hivaktum śakyam atharvavede tad codanāyāḥ darśanāt kim veda antareṣu tad upadeśena iti 
NM_4,1.574.190	 na ca jāne kasya epa paryanuyogaḥ kim nityasya vedasya kim vā atad praṇetuḥ īśvarasya iti dvau= api tau= apari anuyojyau= iti uktam artha antara śānti puṣṭi abhicāra ādi veda antareṣu api na na dṛśyate śyenaḥ hisām avedaḥ utpannaḥ adbhuta śāntyādayaḥ ca yajurvedaḥ iti tat api samānam eka brahma āśrita tvam ātharvaṇa karmaṇām iti na kṣoda kṣamam 
NM_4,1.574.191	 eka brahma ṛtvij āśritāḥ iti etat api na satyam yatas evam tatrapaṭhyate dve yajña vṛttī bhavataḥ vaihārikī ca pākayajña vṛttiḥ ca iti tatravaihārikī nāma aneka ṛtvij āśritānām eka kriyāṇām upadeśaḥ śrutau eka brahma ṛtvij āśritāḥ tu śānti ādi kriyāḥ smṛtau= iti abhūmi jñoktiḥ eṣā veda catuṣṭaye api vaidikānām abhimānaḥ sama naḥ 
NM_4,1.574.192	 trayī ā iva ātmīya gocara iti etat api parama mādhyasthyam na hi ātmīyaḥ parakīyaḥ vā kaścid asti veda arthaḥ sarva śākhā pratyaya tvāt ekasya karmaṇaḥ tasmāt samāna yogakṣema tvāt sarva vedānām ekasya tatas pṛthak karaṇaṃveda nindā prāyaścitta nirbhaya dhiyām eva cetasi parisphurati na sādhūnām iti uparamyate atharvaveda prāmāṇya upasaṃhāraḥ iti tulya prabhāva ṛddhi vardhamāna ucita stavāḥ vividha abhimata sphīta phala saṃpādana udyatāḥ catvāraḥ api parākṣepa parihāra sthira sthitim bhajanti vedāḥ prāmāṇya lakṣmīm haribhujāḥ iva catusskandha upetaḥ prathita pṛthak aryaiḥ avayavaiḥ kṛta anyonya śleṣaiḥ upacita vapuḥ veda viṭapī pratiskandham śākhā phala kusuma sandarbha subhagāḥ prakāśante tasya dvija mukha nipīta uttama rasāḥ āgama prāmāṇyākṣepa vikalpaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.193–4,1.574.194	 āha kim etat ittham prāmāṇyam vedānām eva sādhyate uta āgama antarāṇām vā sarveṣa abhiyam ā iva diś kiñca atas ādye pakṣe pareṣi evam bruvāṇeṣu kim uttaram uttaratra tu mithyā syuḥ sarve anyonya virodhinaḥ āgamat vaividhyam kāni punar āgama antarāṇi cetasi vidhāya evam vatsaḥ pṛcchati purāṇa itihāsa dharma śāstrāṇi vā śaivapāśupatapañcarātra bāddhā arhata prabhṛti iti vā manu ādya āgamānām veda mūla tvāt prāmāṇyam 
NM_4,1.574.195–4,1.574.196	 tatra śaiva ādīni tāvat nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ manu ādi praṇītāni dharma śāstrāṇi veda vat tad artha anupraviṣṭa viśiṣṭa karma upadeśīni pramāṇam eva kaḥ teṣu vicāraḥ teṣām tu pramāṇa tvam veda mūla tvena eva kecid ācakṣate tathā hi na tāvat manu ādi deśanāḥ bhrānti mūlāḥ saṃbhāvyante bādhaka abhāvāt adyayāvat aparimlāna ādaraiḥ veda vidbhiḥ tad artha anuṣṭhānāt 
NM_4,1.574.197–4,1.574.198	 na api anubhava mūlāḥ pratyakṣasya tri kāla an avacchinna kārya rūpa dharma pariccheda daśā sāmarthyā saṃbhavāt na ca puruṣa antara upadeśa mūlāḥ puruṣa antarasya api tad avagama īpramāṇa abhāvāt bhāve vā manunā kim aparāddham asati hi mūla pramāṇepuruṣa vacana paraṃparāyām eva kalpyamānāyām andha paraṃpara asmaraṇa tulya tvaṃduḥ nivāram 
NM_4,1.574.199–4,1.574.200	 na ca vipralambhakāḥ eva bhavantaḥ manu ādayaḥ evam upadiśeyuḥ iti yuktā kalpanā bādhaka abhāvāt sādhu jana parigrahāt ca iti uktam tasmāt pāriśeṣyāt veda ākhya kāraṇa mūlāḥ eva bhavitum arhantim anu ādi deśanāḥ tat hi anuguṇam samartham ca kāraṇam iti tat āha bhaṭṭaḥ bhrānteḥ anubhavāt vā api puṃvākyāt vipralaṃbhakāt dṛṣṭa anuguṇya sāmarthyāt codanā eva laghīyasī iti manu ādya āgamānām veda mūlaka tve pakṣa bhedāḥ 
NM_4,1.574.201–4,1.574.202	 tatra kecid paridṛśyamāna mantra artha vāda bala unnīta vidhi mūla tvaṃmanyante anye viprakīrṇa śākhā mūla tvam apare punar utsanna śākhā mūla tvam iti anena ca viśeṣa vivaraṇena na naḥ prayojanam sarvathā yathopapatti vedaḥ eva tatra mūlam prakalpyatām na mūla antaram apramāṇaka tvāt veda mūla tva pakṣe api ca iyam akhila jagat viditā smṛti samākhyā anugṛhītā bhaviṣyati pratyakṣa mūla tve hi veda vat atra api kaḥ smṛti śabda arthaḥ śruti smṛti virodhe śruteḥ prābalyam 
NM_4,1.574.203	 kiñca veda mūla tve sati smṛteḥ śruti virodhe sati tad atulya kakṣya tvāt bādhya tvam su vacam bhavati kptam ekatra mūlam itaratra kalpyam yāvat eva bhavān smṛteḥ śrutim kalpayitum vyavasyati tāvat etat virodhinī pratyakṣa śrutā śrutiḥ avatarati hṛdaya patham iti kathaṃtadā mūla kalpanāyai smṛtiḥ prabhavet tat āha saḥ ayam ābhāṇakaḥ loke yat aśvena hṛtam purā tad paścāt gardabhaḥ prāptum kena upāyena śaknuyāt iti śruti smṛtyoḥ sāmyam iti pakṣa antaram 
NM_4,1.574.204–4,1.574.205	 aparaḥ āha vikalpaḥ eva atra yuktaḥ kila dvividhaḥ vedaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ anumīyamānaḥ ca śrūyamāṇaḥ ca śrutiḥ iti ucyate anumīyamānaḥ ca smṛtiḥ iti dvau= api ca etau= anādī iti kim kena bādhyate vyakta avyaktaḥ hi vedaḥ eva asau atas eva na mantra artha vāda ādi mūlaka tva kalpanam yuktam smaryamāṇasya vedasya anādi tvāt manu ādi smṛti bāhya smṛtyoḥ vailakṣaṇyam nanu ! evam veda mūla tvena prāmāṇye varṇyamāne bāhya smṛtīnām apiprāmāṇyam vadantaḥ pravādukāḥ katham prativaktavyāḥ ucyate pratyuktāeva te tapasvinaḥ uktam hi bhagavatā jaimininā api vā kartṛ sāmānyāt pramāṇa manumānam syāt iti 
NM_4,1.574.206	 kartṛ sāmānyāt iti kaḥ arthaḥ eka adhikāra avagamāt iti yaḥ eva veda artha anuṣṭhāne adhikṛtāḥ kartāraḥ te eva smṛti artha anuṣṭhāne ācamana ādi smārta padārtha saṃbalita tayā eva vedistaraṇa ādi vaidika padārtha prayoga darśanāt na tu evam eka adhikāra avagamaḥ bāhya smṛtiṣu vidyate tasmāt manu ādi smṛtayaḥ eva pramāṇam na bāhya smṛtayaḥ siddhānte tu manu ādi smṛtīnām pratyakṣa mūlaka tvāt eva prāmāṇyam 
NM_4,1.574.207	 nanu ! manu ādi smṛtayaḥ api veda mūla tvāt pramāṇam na anyatas iti atra ucyate tat etat vat amūla tayā prāmāṇyam yogi pratyakṣam dharma grāhakam amṛṣyamāṇāḥ kila ācakṣate bhavantaḥ etat ca na yuktam yathā hibhagavān īśvaraḥ sarvasya kartā sarvasya īśitāḥ sarva darśī sarva anukampī ca vedānām praṇetā samarthitaḥ tathā yogi pratyakṣam api dharma grahaṇe nipuṇam asmad ādi pratyakṣa vilakṣaṇam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe samarthitam eva tasmāt tad mūlāḥ eva manu ādi deśanāḥ bhavantu dharmasya api pratyakṣa tu a saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.208	 yat tu tri kālān avacchinnaḥ katham pratyakṣa gamyaḥ dharmaḥ syāt iti codanā eva tatra pramāṇam ucyate prativihitam tat īśvara pratyakṣa samarthanena sādhya sādhana sambandhasya svarga agni ddotra ādi gatasya yathāgrāhakam īśvara pratyakṣam evam aṣṭaka ādi gatasya tasya grāhakam manu ādi pratyakṣam bhaviṣyati iti kim atra tri kālān avacchedena avacchedenavā kṛtyam vedānām smṛtīnām ca vailakṣaṇyam 
NM_4,1.574.209	 yadi evam aṣṭaka ādi karmaṇām dharma tva agrahaṇāt asarva jñaḥ īśvaraḥ syāt jñātvā vā anupadiśat akāruṇikaḥ bhavet na eṣa doṣaḥ sarvam jānāti eva bhagavān kiñcid svayam upadiśati kiñcitparān upadeśayati te hi sya anugrāhyāḥ bhagavataḥ teṣām ca tad anugraha kṛtā iva tathāvidha jñāna prāptiḥ manyādīnām pratyakṣaḥ dharmaḥ iti vede api paṭhyate śruti smṛtyoḥ pratyakṣa mūlaka tva aviśeṣāt na kutra api tayoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.210–4,1.574.211	 nanu ! evam pratyakṣa mūla tva aviśeṣāt śruti smṛtyoḥ virodhe vikalpaḥ prāpnoti bṛhat rathantara bidhyoḥ iva na bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ na hi īśvara pratyakṣasya yogi pratyakṣasya ca prāmāṇye kaścid viśeṣaḥ naisargika āhārya kṛtaḥ tu bhaviṣyati kim tena ucyate bhavatu vikalpaḥ kaḥ doṣaḥ veda mūla tva vādibhiḥ apikaścid vikalpaḥ vyākhyātaḥ eva viṣaya vibhāgena vā vikalpaḥ vyākhyāsyate na ca śruti smṛti virodha udāharaṇam kiñci d asti iti svādhyāya abhiyuktāḥ tasmāt āpta pratyakṣa mūla tvena vedānām ivadharma śāstrāṇām api prāmāṇyam itihāsa purāṇānām api sākṣāt eva prāmāṇya upapādanam 
NM_4,1.574.212–4,1.574.213	 etena itihāsa purāṇa prāmāṇyam api nirṇītam veditavyam itihāsa purāṇam hi pañcamam vedam āhuḥ uktam ca itihāsa purāṇābhyām vedam samupabṛṃhayet bibheti alpa śrutāt vedaḥ mām ayam pratariṣyati iti sarva smṛtīnām veda mūlaka tvena eva prāmāṇyam iti pakṣaḥ athavā kim asmākam durabhi niveśena veda mūla tvāt smṛtīnām smṛti vat purāṇānām api bhavatu prāmāṇyam prāmāṇye tāvat avivādaḥ sat ācārasya api anupanibaddhasya veda mūla tvāt eva bhavatu prāmāṇyam vidyā sthāneṣu ṣaṇṇām prādhānyam itareṣām aṅga tvam 
NM_4,1.574.214	 sarvathā tāvat vedāḥ catvāraḥ purāṇam smṛtiḥ iti ṣaṣ imānividyā sthānāni sākṣāt puruṣa artha sādhana upadeśīni pūrva uktarītyā apramāṇam vyākaraṇa ādīni tu ṣaṣ aṅgāni aṅga tvena eva tad upayogīni na sākṣāt dharma upadeśīni kalpa sūtreṣu api vikṣipta karma krama niyama saṃgraha mātram na apūrva upadeśaḥ mīmāṃsā veda vākya vicāra ātmikā veda prāmāṇya niścaya hetuḥ ca nyāya vistaraḥ iti āmukhaḥ eva uktam tat imāni caturdaśa vidyā sthānāni pramāṇam kānicid sākṣāt upadeśīni kānicid tad upayogīni iti siddham āgamat vaividhyam 
NM_4,1.574.215–4,1.574.216	 yāni punar āgama antarāṇi paridṛśyante tāni api dvividhāni kānicid sarva ātmanā veda virodhena eva pravartante bauddha ādi vat kānicid tad avirodhena eva kalpita vrata antara upadeśīni śaiva ādi vat śaiva āgamānām prāmāṇyam tatra śaiva āgamānām tāvat prāmāṇyam brūmahe tad upajanitāyāḥ pratīteḥ sandeha bādha kāraṇa kāluṣya kalāpasya anupalambhāt īśvara kartṛ tvasya tatra api smṛti anumānābhyām siddha tvāt mūla antarasya lobha moha ādeḥ kalpayitum aśakyatvāt na hi tatra idaṃprathama tā āsmaryate veda vat eka deśa saṃvādāḥ ca bhūmnāḥ dṛśyante iti kutas mūla antara kalpanā avakāśaḥ śaiva āgamāḥ api vaidika dharma pratipādakāḥ eva 
NM_4,1.574.217	 na ca veda pratipakṣa tayā teṣām avasthānam veda prasiddha cāturvarṇya ādi vyavahāra aparityāgāt manu ādi codanā nyāyaḥ sa yadi api na vidyate śaiva āgame tathā api asya na na yuktā apramāṇa tā sarva upanipadām arthāḥ niḥśreyasa pada spṛśaḥ vivicyamānāḥ dṛśyante te hi tatra pade pade ye ca veda vidām agryāḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyana ādayaḥ pramāṇam anumanyante te api śaiva ādi darśanam pañca rātra prāmāṇyampañcarātre api tena eva prāmāṇyam upavarṇitam aprāmāṇya nirmittam hi na asti tatra api kiñcana 
NM_4,1.574.218–4,1.574.219	 tatra ca bhagavān viṣṇuḥ praṇetā kathyate sa ca īśvaraḥ eva śaiva vaiṣṇava kalahasya nirmūla tvam ekasya kasyacid aśeṣa jagat prasūti hetoḥ anādi puruṣasya mahā vibhūteḥ sṛṣṭi sthiti pralaya kārya vibhāga yogāt brahma iti viṣṇuḥ iti rudraḥ iti pratītiḥ śaiva pañcarātra ukta dharmāṇām vaidikam vede ca pade pade ekaḥ eva rudraḥ avatasthe na dvitīyaḥ idam viṣṇuḥ vicakrame iti rudraḥ viṣṇuḥ ca paṭhyate tad yogāḥ ca tad ārādhana upāyāḥ vede api coditāā iva śaivapañcarātrayoḥ tu tad yogāḥ eva anyathā upadiśyante na ca eṣaā iva veda virodhaḥ vaikalpika tvāt upāyānām atas āpta praṇīta tvāt veda aviruddha tvāt ca na tayoḥ aprāmāṇyam bauddha āgamānām aprāmāṇyam 
NM_4,1.574.220	 ye tu saugata saṃsāra mocaka āgamāḥ pāpaka ācāra upadeśinaḥ kaḥ teṣu prāmāṇyam āryaḥ anumodate buddha śāstre hi vispaṣṭā dṛśyate veda bāhya tā jāti dharma ucita ācāra parihāra āba dhāraṇāt saṃsāra mocakāḥ pāpāḥ prāṇi hiṃsā parāyaṇāḥ moha pravṛttāḥ eva iti na pramāṇam tad āgamaḥ niṣiddha sevana prāyam yatra karma upadiśyate prāmāṇya kathane tasya kasya jihvā pravartate  tatas yadi api siddhiḥ syāt kadācid kasyacid kvacid brahmahatyā arjita grāmya bhoga vat narakāya sā niṣiddha ācaraṇa upāttam duṣkṛtam kena śāmyati atas kāla antareṇa api narake patanam punar bauddha vaidika āgamayoḥ vailakṣaṇyam 
NM_4,1.574.221–4,1.574.222	 yat tu atra coditam pareṣu pūrva ukta krameṇa buddha ādi āpta kalpanām kurvatsu kim pratividheyam iti tatra ucyate mahā jana prasiddhi anugrahe hi sati su vacam āpta ukta tvam bhavati na anyathā vaidika āgamānām mahā jana parigrahāt prāmāṇyam mahājanaḥ ca vedānām veda artha anugāminām ca purāṇa dharma śāstrāṇām veda avirodhinām ca keṣāṃcid āgamānām prāmāṇyam anumanyate na veda viruddhānām bauddha ādi a āgamānām iti kutas teṣām āpta praṇīta tvam mūla antaraṃhi tatra suvacam ajñāna lobha ādi iti evam abhidhāya veda spardhinaḥ bauddha ādayaḥ niṣeddhavyāḥ kaḥ ayam mahājanaḥ nāma 
NM_4,1.574.223–4,1.574.225	 āha kaḥ ayam mahājanaḥ nāma kimākāraḥ kim āspadaḥ kiṃsaṃkhyaḥ kiṃsamācāraḥ iti vyākhyātum arhasi api ca bauddha ādayaḥ buddha ādīn āptān sva āgama prāmāṇya siddhayā ivadanti te mahājanam api nijam tad siddhaye bandaka ādikam vadeyuḥ eva kaḥ tatra pratīkāraḥ ucyate cāturvarṇyam cāturāśramyam ca yat etat ārya deśa prasiddham sa mahājanaḥ ucyate ākāraḥ tu tasya kīdṛśam pāṇi pādam kīdṛśam śiraḥ grīvam vā kiyatī tasya saṃkhyā iti puruṣa lakṣaṇa ādīni gaṇayitum na jānīmaḥ cāturvarṇya cāturāśramya rūpaḥ ca eṣa mahājanaḥ veda patha pravṛttaḥ āgama antara vādibhiḥ apratyākhyeyaḥ eva tathā ca ete bauddha ādayaḥ api durātmānaḥ veda prāmāṇya niyamitāḥ eva caṇḍāla ādi sparśam pariharanti niraste hi jāti vāda ābalepe kaḥ caṇḍāla ādi sparśe doṣaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.226	 ye api anye kecid aśuci bhakṣaṇa agamyā gamana ādi nirvikalpa dīkṣā prakāram akāryam anutiṣṭhanti te api cāturvarṇya mahā jana bhītāḥ tad karma rahasi kurvanti na prakāśam nirviśaṅke hi tad śāstra pratyayekim iti caurya vat tad artha anuṣṭhānam atas eva na nijaḥ mahā janaḥ utthāpayitum śakyate vandaka ādiḥ kim tu ayam eva cāturvarṇyādiḥ mahājanaḥ sa ca eṣa mahājanaḥ veda viruddham āgamam pariharati eva na anumodate saṃsāra mocakam spṛṣṭvā śiṣṭāḥ snānti sa vāsasaḥ bauddhaiḥ api saha eteṣām vyavahāraḥ na kaścana veda dharma anuvartī ca prāyeṇa sakalaḥ janaḥ veda vāhyaḥ tu yaḥ kaścid āgamaḥ vañcanā eva sā veda bāhyāḥ api vaidika ābhāsāḥ eva 
NM_4,1.574.227–4,1.574.228	 īdṛśaḥ ca ayam ananya sāmānya vibhavaḥ mahābhāgaḥ veda nāmā grantha rāśiḥ yat anye bāhya āgama vādinaḥ evam eva spardhante te hi sva āgama prāmāṇyam abhivadantaḥ veda rītyā abhidadhati vede yathā tathā praveṣṭum īhante vaidikān arthān antarā antarā sva āgameṣu nibadhnanti veda sparśa pūtam iva ātmānam manyante teṣām api antar hṛdaye jvalati eva veda prāmāṇyam atas evaṃvidhāyāḥ mahā jana prasiddheḥ āgama antareṣu adarśanāt nateṣām āpta praṇīta tvam mahā jana parigrahāt veda prāmāṇye api nyāya śāstrasya āvaśyaka tā 
NM_4,1.574.229–4,1.574.231	 āha mahājana prasiddhyā eva veda prāmāṇya niścayāt kimarthaḥ kaṇṭha śoṣaḥ ayam iyāna āryeṇa saṃśritaḥ  veda prāmāṇya siddhi artham hi idam śāstram ārabdham iti gīyate veda prāmāṇyasya ca mahājana prasiddhyā eva siddha tvāt kim śāstreṇa alam kṣudracodyaiḥ īdṛśaiḥ! mahā jana prasiddhim hi kecid viplāvayanti api atas tad upaghātāya śāstra mantram prayujyate 
NM_4,1.574.232	 tasmāt pūrva uktānām eva prāmāṇyam āgamānām na veda bāhyānām iti sthitam sarva āgama prāmāṇya pakṣaḥ anye sarva āgamānām tu prāmāṇyam pratipedire sarvatra bādhasan deha rahita pratyaya udayāt savatra veda vat kartuḥ āptasya parikalpanā dṛṣṭa artheṣu eka deśeṣu prāyas saṃvāda darśanāt āgamānām na parasparam virodhaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.233	 yat punar atra uktam sarve eva āgamāḥ paraspara viruddha artha upadeśi tvāt apramāṇam syuḥ iti tatra ucyate āpta praṇīta tvena tulya kakṣya tva ātanyatama daurbalī atimittān upalambhāt ca na kaścid āgamaḥ kiñcid bādhate virodha mātram tu akiñcitkaram pramāṇa tva abhimateṣu veda vākyeṣu api paraspara virodha darśanāt puruṣa śīrṣa sparśana surā graha gava ālambha ādi codanāsu vacana antara viruddham artha jātam upadiṣṭam eva adhikāri bhedena sarva āgamānām yathākathañcid śreyassādhana tvam 
NM_4,1.574.234–4,1.574.235	 kiñca ānamānām virodhaḥ api na atīva vidyate pramāṇe puruṣa arthā ivā sarveṣām avivādāt nānāvidheḥ āgama mārga bhedaiḥ ādiśyamānāḥ bahavaḥ abhyupāyāḥ ekatra te śreyasi saṃpatanti sindhau prabāhāḥ iva jāhnavīyāḥ upāya upeya viṣaye sarva āgamānām a eka kaṇṭhyam tathā hi apavargaḥ upeṣaḥ sarva śāsveṣu nirdiśyate tad upāyaḥ sarvatra jñānam upadiśyate jñāna viṣaye tu vivadante tatra api prāyaśaḥa ātma viṣaya tāyām bahūnām avipratipattiḥ 
NM_4,1.574.236–4,1.574.238	 prakṛti puruṣa viveka jñāna pakṣe tu prakṛteḥ vivikta tayā puruṣaḥ eva jñeyaḥ nairātmya vādinaḥ tu ātma śaithilya jananāya tathā upadiśanti svaccham tu jñāna tattvam yaktaiḥ iṣyate tat svātantryāt anāśrita tvāta ātma kalpam eva kūṭasyanityace pravāha nitya tve ca viśeṣaḥ kriyāsu anaika kaṇṭyam na doṣāya evam pradhānayoḥ tāvat upāya upeyayoḥ avivādaḥ kriyā tu vicitrā pratyāgamam bhavatu nāma bhasma jaṭā parigrahaḥ vā daṇḍa kamaṇḍalu grahaṇaṃvā rakta paṭa dhāraṇam vā digambaratā vā abalambyatām ! kaḥ atra virodhaḥ vede api kim alpīyāṃsaḥ pṛthak iti kartavyatā kalā apakhacitāḥ svarga upāyāḥ coditāḥ tasmāt paraspara virodhe api na prāmāṇya virodhaḥ āgama pravaktṝnām sarvajña tvam samānam 
NM_4,1.574.239	 atas ca yat ucyate kapilaḥ yadi sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ na iti kā pramā atha ubhau= api sarva jñau mata bhedaḥ tayoḥ katham iti tad apāstam bhavati pradhāne sati bheda abhāvāt kvacid ca tad bhāve prāmāṇya āviroghāt na ca hṛdaya krośana hetu karma upadeśātā āgama antarāṇām aprāmāṇyam tasya aprāmāṇyatāyām aprayojaka tvāt vicikitsā hi nṛ śiraḥ kapālāt i aśaneṣu yā sā api anya darśana abhyāsa bhāvanā upanibandhanā tathā ca śānta cittānām sarva bhūta dayāvatām vaidikīṣu api hiṃsāsu vicikitsā pravartate hiṃsā upadeśa mātrāt na aprāmāṇyam 
NM_4,1.574.240–4,1.574.241	 abhicāra ādi hiṃsāyām vaidikyām api bhavatu hṛdaya utkampaḥ karaṇa aṃśa upanipātinī hiṃsā iti lipsā ataḥ tasyām pravṛttiḥ yā tu agniṣomīya ādi paśu hiṃsā itikartavya tā aṃśa sthāḥ yasya aṃkratvarthaḥ hi śāstrāt avagamyate iti vaidhī pravṛttiḥ tasyām apikā aruṇikaḥ lokaḥ sa vicikitsaḥ bhavati vadati ca yatra prāṇi vadhaḥ dharmaḥ tu adharmaḥ tatra kīdṛśaḥ iti na ca etāvatā vedasya aprāmāṇyam evam āgama antareṣu api bhaviṣyati vidhi niṣedha ādikam tad tad āgama pratiniyatam 
NM_4,1.574.242	 yat tu āgama antarebhyaḥ kaula ādibhyaḥ khecaratā ādi artha siddhau= apiniṣiddha ācaraṇa kṛtaḥ kāla antare pratyavāyaḥ avaśyaṃbhāvi iti uktam tat apina yuktam tasya arthasya tad āgama niṣiddha tva abhāvāt āgama antara niṣiddha tve api vaikalpika tva kalpana upapatteḥ puruṣa artha prāpti upāya tvāt catasya tasmin siddhe kutas pratyavāḥ ḥ niṣiddha karma upadeśa mātram na aprāmāṇya hetuḥ 
NM_4,1.574.243	 bhavatu vā kāla antare tatas pratyavāyaḥ ! tathā api adhikāri bhedena tatphale karmaṇi codyamāne śyena ādau= iva na āgama prāmāṇyam atra hīyate śyenena abhicaran yajeta iti atra abhicaran iti śatā laṅghita niṣedham adhikāriṇam ācaṣṭe tasya ca śyena yāgaḥ coditaḥ sa catad prayogāt kṛta badhas pratyavaiti eva na ca vedasya aprāmāṇyam uktam ca aubhayam iha codanayā lakṣyate arthaḥ anarthaḥ ca iti adhikāra bhedāt ca vicitra karma codanā na anupapannāḥ maraṇa kāmasya sarva svāraḥ coditaḥ āyuṣkāmasya kṛṣṇala caruḥ tasmāt etat apinā prāmāṇya nimittam bauddha āgamasya varṇa āśrama dharma niṣedhe na tātparyam 
NM_4,1.574.244	 yat api bauddha āgame jāti vāda nirākaraṇam tat api sarva anugraha pravaṇa karuṇa atiśaya praśaṃsā param na ca yathāśrutam avagantavyam tathā catatra etat paṭhyate na jāti kārya duṣṭān pravrājayet iti tasmāt sarveṣām āgamānām āptaiḥ kapila sugata arhat prabhṛtibhiḥ praṇītānām prāmāṇyam iti yuktam sarva āgamānām api īśvara kṛta tva pañcaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.245	 anye manyante sarva āgamānām īśvaraḥ eva bhagavān praṇetā iti sa hi sakala prāṇinām karma vipākam aneka prakāram abalokayan karuṇa yātān anugrahītum apavarga prāpti mārgam bahuvidham utpaśyan āśaya anusāreṇa keṣāṃcid kvacid karmaṇi yogyatām avagamya tam tam upāyam upadiśyati sva vibhūti mahimnā ca nānā śarīra parigrahāt saḥ eva saṃjñā bhedān upagacchati arhan= iti kapilaḥ iti sugataḥ iti saḥ eva ucyatebhagavān nānā sarvajña kalpanāyām yatna gaurava prasaṅgāt buddhasya bhagavat avatāra tvam 
NM_4,1.574.246–4,1.574.247	 nanu ! buddhaḥ śuddhodanasya rājñaḥ apatyam sa katham īśvaraḥ bhavet parihṛtam etat bhagavatā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanena yadā yadā hi dharmasya glāniḥ bhavati bhārata abhyutthānam adharmasya tadā aatmānam sṛjāmi aham iti śarīram eva śuddhodanasya apatye na ātmā atas pratiyugam viṣṇuḥ eva bhagavān dharma rūpeṇa avatarati iti āgama vidaḥ pratipannāḥ vaidika bauddha ādi āgamayoḥ viśeṣaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.248–4,1.574.249	 nanu ! veda samāna kartṛkeṣu āgama antareṣu katham tādṛśaḥ mahā jana saṃpratyayaḥ na asti evam na asti tena vartmanā bhagavatā ākatipaye prāṇinaḥ anugṛhītāḥ yeṣām tādṛśaḥ āśayaḥ lakṣitaḥ vaidikenatu vartmanā nissaṃkhyākāḥ prāṇinaḥ amugṛhītāḥ iti tatra mahān ādaraḥ āgama antareṣu kṛśaḥ iti eka kartṛke paraspara virodhaḥ katham iti ced vedaiḥ eva atra varṇitaḥ samādhiḥ teṣu api bhūmnaḥ paraspara virodhasya darśanāt iti uktam tasmāt īśvara praṇīta tvāt eva sarva āgamānām prāmāṇyam sarva āgamānām veda mūla tvāt prāmāṇyam iti pakṣaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.250–4,1.574.251	 apare punar veda mūla tvena sarva āgama prāmāṇyam abhyupāgaman yohi manu ādi deśanānām veda mūla tāyām nyoyaḥ uktaḥ bhrānteḥ anubhavāt vā api puṃvākyāt vipralambhakāt dṛṣṭa anuguṇya sāmarthyāt codanā eva laghīyasī iti sa sarva āgameṣu samānaḥ na ca manu ādi smṛtīnām mūla mūtā śrutiḥ upalabhyate anumānena tu tad kalpanam āgama antareṣu api tulyam bauddha āgamānām api veda mūlaka tva saṃbhavaḥ nanu ca ! uktam api vā kartṛ sāmānyāt pramāṇam anumānaṃsyāt iti tat ca iha na asti iti katham thuti anumānam na eṣa doṣaḥ eka adhikāra avagamaḥ na prāmāṇye prayojakaḥ miśra anuṣṭhāna siddhau tu kāmam bhavatu kāraṇam 
NM_4,1.574.252	 na ca pṛthak anuṣṭhīyamānam api karma na pramāṇa mūlam bhavati rṇa āśrama bheda anuṣṭheya karma vat kartṛ sāmānya śūnya tvāt atha mūla antara udayaḥ tat asat bādhaka abhāvāt bhrānti ādi pratiṣedhanāt pratyakṣa mūla tāyā tu gurvī bhavati kalpanā vedaḥ tu ananta śākha tvāt mūlam tatra su saṃgatam sarva āgamānām api śruti mūla tvam nanu atra veda mūla tve dveṣaḥ veda vidām katham gatvā te eva pṛcchayantām sa akṣaryam yadi vidyate go vadhe vā katham teṣām dveṣaḥ su spaṣṭa vaidike pratyuktam ca viruddha tvam śākhā ānantyāt ca durgamam kim iyat veda sarvasvam yāvat asmad mukhe sthitam śākhā antarāt vā saṃvādaḥ na labhyeta iti kā pramā  
NM_4,1.574.253–4,1.574.254	 tathā ca sāṃkhya śāstra prasiddha triguṇa ātmaka prakṛti sūcana param ajām ekām lohita śukla kṛṣṇām iti vaidikaṃliṅgam upalabhyate nirgrantha kathita tapassaciva tattva jñāna śaṃsī ca ayam anuvāda udṛśyate munayaḥ vāta raśanāḥ iti evam rakta paṭa parigraha bhasma kapāla dhāraṇa ādi mūlam api abhiyuktāḥ labhantaḥ eva manu ādi smṛti vat kartṛ sāmyasya asaṃbhave api atas pramāṇam veda mūla tvāt vācyā sarva āgama smṛtiḥ 
NM_4,1.574.255–4,1.574.256	 tatas ca yaḥ kaścid kasyacid dharmaḥ manunā parikīrtitaḥ sa sarvaḥ abhihitaḥ vede sarva jñāna mayaḥ hi saḥiti atra yathā manu grahaṇam gautamayama apastamba saṃvartaka ādi smṛti kāra upalakṣaṇam evam arhat kapila su gata ādi upalakṣaṇa param api vyākhyeyam lokāyata matasya anupādeva tvam nanu ca ! lokāyata ādi āgame api evam prāmāṇyam prāpnoti vijñāna ghanaḥ eva etebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāni eva anuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñā asti iti veda mūla darśanāt tatas ca lokāyata darśane pramāṇībhūte sati svasti sarva āgamebhyaḥ ! ucyate na hi lokāyate kiñcid kartavyam upadiśyate vaitaṇḍika kathā eva asau na punar kaścid āgamaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.257	 nanu ca ! yāvajjīvam sukham jīvet iti tatra upadiśyate evaṃna svabhāva siddha tveta atra upadeśa vaiphalyāt dharmaḥ na kāryaḥ tad upadeśeṣu na pratyetavyam iti evam vā yat upadiśyate tat pratibihitam eva pūrva pakṣa vacana mūla tvāt lokāyata darbhanasya tathā ca tatra auttara brāhmaṇam bhavati na vai are aham moham bravīmi avināśī vāare apramātmā mātrā saṃsargaḥ tu asya bhavati iti tat evam pūrva pakṣa vacana mūla tvāt lokāyata śāstram api na svatantram uttara vākya pratihata tvāt tu tat nādaraṇīyam bauddha ādi a āgama vārvāka matayoḥ vailakṣaṇyam 
NM_4,1.574.258	 śāstra antarāṇām tu pūrva pakṣa vākya mūla tva kalpanam ayuktam samanantaram eva tad pratipakṣa vacana anupalabdheḥ iti atas veda mūla tvāt sarva āgamāḥ pramāṇam prācīnāgamānām kalpita āgamānām ca vailakṣaṇyam sarva āgama pramāṇa tve nanu evam upapādite aham api adya yat kiñcit āgamam racayāmi ced tasya api hi pramāṇa tvam dinaiḥ katipayaiḥ bhavet tasmin= api na pūrva ukta nyāyaḥ bhavati durvacaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.259	 jagtpusta kalikhitam yat api tat api kiñcid idānīm kena api dhūrtena prakhyāpyate maha nayam āgamaḥ iti tatra api āptaḥ eva praṇetā kalpyatām ! yādṛśam tādṛśam vaidikam vacanam ucyatām mūla bhūtam iti na etat asti avigītām ye prasiddhim prāpuḥ āgamāḥ kṛtaḥ ca bahubhiḥ yeṣām śiṣṭaiḥ iha parigrahaḥ adya pravartamānāḥ ca na apūrvāḥ iva bhānti ye yeṣām na mūlam lobha ādi yebhyaḥ na udvijate janaḥ teṣām eva pramāṇa tvam āgamānām iha iṣyate na mṛṣyate tu yat kiñcit pramāṇam kuṭṭanī matam 
NM_4,1.574.260	 tathā hi amita eka paṭa nivīta aniyata strīpuṃsa vihita bahu ceṣṭam nīla ambara vratam idam kila kalpitam āsīt viṭeḥ kaiścid tad apūrvam iti viditvā nivārayāmāsa dharma tattva jñaḥ rājā śaṅkaravarmā na punar jainādi matam evam veda āgama prāmāṇya upasaṃhāraḥ iti āpta ukta tva hetoḥ parimuṣita para udīrita aśeṣa doṣa ateṣām veda āgamānām su dṛḍham upagate māna bhāve praroham unmūla tvāt tathātvam puruṣa vacanataḥ vā astu śāstra antarāṇāṃtad dvāreṇa api vaktum na khalu kalupatā śakyate veda vācām anṛta vyāghāta ādibhiḥ veda prāmāṇyākṣepaḥ nanu ! na adya api vedasya prāmāṇyam su vyavasthitam sva deha saṃbhavaiḥ eva doṣaiḥ anṛvata ādibhiḥ 
NM_4,1.574.261–4,1.574.262	 citrayā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ putra kāmaḥ putra iṣṭyā yajeta itithūyate na ca iṣṭi anantaram putra paśu ādi phalam upalabhyate tasmāt asatyāḥ citra ādi codanāḥ citra ādi karmaṇām phala vyabhicāra samarthanam nanu ca ! yaḥ paśu kāmaḥ saḥ iṣṭim kuryāt iti iyān eva vākya arthaḥ tatra yāgāt paśavaḥ bhavanti iti etat eva durupapādam te ca bhavantaḥ api anantaram eva bhavanti iti etat durupapādataram atas katham nasatya artha tvam citra ādi codanānām ucyate yāvajjīvam yajeta yāvajjīvam juhuyāt iti jīvana vat asādhyamāna paśu kāma naivana adhika ari viśeṣaṇam bhavitum arhati paśūnām tatas karmaṇaḥ siddhim anavabudhyamānasya tatra adhikāraḥ eva na saṃpravartate iti nirṇeṣyate etat 
NM_4,1.574.263–4,1.574.264	 ānantaryam api karma svabhāva paryālocanena eva gamyate samanantara phala tvena karmaṇām dṛṣṭa tvāt āha ca yadā tāvat iyam vidyamānā aasīt tadā phalam na dattavatī yadā phalam utpadyate tadā asau na asti asatī katham phalam dāsyati iti api ca kāla antare phalasya anyat pratyakṣam kāraṇam upalabhyate sevā ādi tasmin= ca kāraṇe dṛṣṭe sati kaḥ nāma sṛkṣma dṛṣṭiḥ adṛṣṭaṃcitra ādi kāraṇam kalpayet tasmāt asatyāḥ citra ādi codanāḥ pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa pariccheda yogya artha upadeśi tve sati api tad saṃvāda śūnya tvāt evaṃvidha vipralaṃbhaka vākya vat citra ādi dṛṣṭāntena agnihotra ādīnām api aphala tvam sidhyati citra ādi vacasām evam apacārasya darśanāt anāśvāsaḥ agnihotra ādi codanāsu api jāyate 
NM_4,1.574.265–4,1.574.267	 agnihotra codanā mithyā veda eka deśa tvāt citra ādi codanā vat tat atra tāvat asaṃvādāt aprāmāṇyam evam putra kāmaḥ putra iṣṭyā yajeta iti evamādau= api asaṃvāda udraṣṭavyaḥ kutracid visaṃvādaḥ ca visaṃvādaḥ api kvacid dṛśyate pramīte yajamāne pātra cayana ākhyaṃkarma upadiśya evam ādideśa vedaḥ saḥ eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamānaḥ añjasā svargam lokam eti iti tatra eṣaḥ iti tāvat ātmanaḥ nirdeśaḥ kliṣṭa ā iva parokṣa tvāt sphya kapāla ādi yajña āyudha saṃbandha abhāvāt ca kāyaḥ tu eṣa nirdiśyate sa na svargam lokam yāti iti tad viparīta bhasmībhāva upalaṃbhāt iti visaṃvādaḥ evañca asaṃvāda visaṃvādābhyām apramāṇam vedaḥ veda vākyeṣu paraspara vyāhatiḥ ca 
NM_4,1.574.268	 vyāghātāt ca udite hotavyam anudite hotavyam samaya adhyuṣite hotavyam iti homa kāla trayam api vidhāya nindā artha vādaiḥ tat eva niṣedhati śyāmaḥ vai asya āhutim abhyavaharati yaḥ uditejuhoti śabalaḥ vai asya āhutim abhyavaharati yaḥ anudite juhoti śyāma śabalau= asya āhutim abhyavaharataḥ yaḥ samaya adhyuṣite juhoti 
NM_4,1.574.269–4,1.574.270	 na ca arthavāda mātram etat iti vaktavyam yatas vidhānam kalpyate stutyā nindayā ca niṣedhanam vidhi stutyoḥ samā vṛttiḥ tathā nindā niṣedhayoḥ na hi nindā ninditum upādīyate kintu ninditāt itarat praśaṃsitum iti avam api prakāraḥ atra na saṃbhavati kāla trayasya api atra niṣedhāt kasya anyasya tat nindayā praśaṃsā vidhīyate tasmāt paraspara viruddha artha upadeśa lakṣaṇāt vyāghātāt apramāṇam vedaḥ paunaruktyam ca vede dṛśyate 
NM_4,1.574.271	 paunaruktyāt ca tris prathamām anvāha tris uttamām iti abhyāsa codanāyām prathama uttamayoḥ sāmidhenyoḥ virvacanāt paunaruktyam sakṛt anuvacanena tad prayojana saṃpatteḥ anarthakam tris vacanam tasmāt ittham amṛta vyāghāta punarukta doṣa kaluṣita tvāt apramāṇam vedaḥ tadā aha sūtra kāraḥ tad aprāmāṇyam anṛta vyāghāta punarukta doṣebhyaḥ putra kāmeṣṭi havanāmpāseṣu iti veda prāmāṇya virodhi doṣa parihāraḥ 
NM_4,1.574.272–4,1.574.274	 atra samādhim āha na karma kartṛ sāvana vaiguṇyāt iti ayam āśayaḥ aprāmāṇya sādhanam anṛta tvam paraiḥ uktam anṛta tveca sādhanam phala adarśanam etat ca anaikāntikam anyathā api phala adarśana upapatteḥ kim vedasya asatya artha tvāt atra phala adarśanam uta kartṛ ādi vaiguṇyāt iti na viśeṣa hetuḥ asti karīḥ vādau pratyakṣāt eva phala niścayaḥ nanu ! na kadācid api karma samanantaram eva phalam upalabdham iti tad adarśanam eva tad anṛta tva kāraṇam na kāraṇa vaiguṇyam iti tat ayuktam bhaviguṇāyām kārīryām prayuktāyām sadyas eva vṛṣṭeḥ darśanāt na ca tad kākatālīyam āgamena anvaya vyatirekābhyām ca tad kāraṇa tva darśanāt 
NM_4,1.574.275	 putra ādiḥ tu aihikam api phalam vastu svabhāva paryālocanayā eva na sadyas bhavitum arhati na hi nabhasaḥ tadānīm eva vṛṣṭiḥ iva nipatati putraḥ strī pusa saṃyoga kāraṇa antara savyapekṣa tvāt tad upatteḥ paśu ādi prāptiḥ tu kasyacid adūra kāle api dṛśyate pratigraha ādinā tathā smad pitāmahaḥ eva grāma kāmaḥ sāṃgrahaṇīm kṛtavān saḥ iṣṭi samāpti samanantaram eva gauramūlakam grāmam avāpa yāga janya phalasya dṛṣṭa kāraṇaka tvam na vaktum śakyam 
NM_4,1.574.276	 nanu ! evam tarhi pratiprahādya iva dṛṣṭam kāraṇam astu paśu ādeḥ putrasya ca strīpuṃsa yogaḥ kim iṣṭeḥ kāraṇa tva kalpanayā iti mā evam vocaḥ satsu api ca dṛṣṭeṣu kāraṇeṣu tad adarśanāt iṣṭi prayoga anantaram ca etad darśanāt iṣṭi kṛtam strīpuṃsa yoga ādi kāraṇa tvam iti niścīyate kiñca sevā adhyayana kṛṣi ādi sāmye api phala bhedataḥ vaktum na yuktā tad prātiḥ dṛṣṭa kāraṇa mātra jāḥ bhūta svabhāva vāda ādi purastāt pratiṣidhyate tasmāt nūnam upetavyam atra anyat api kāraṇam 
NM_4,1.574.277–4,1.574.279	 tat uktam tat ca eva hi tatra kāraṇam śabdaḥ ca iti phala adarśana sthale pratibandhakam uhyate yatra punar aviguṇe api karmaṇi prayujyamāne kāla antare api putra paśu ādi phalam na dṛśyate tatra tīvram kim api prāktanam karma pratibandhakaṃkalpanīyam yathā uktam phalati yadi na sarvam tat kadācid tadeva dhruvam aparama bhuktam karma śāstrīyam āste iti karma ādi vaiguṇya grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa artham ṛṣiṇā prayuktam na tuvedasyā prāmāṇya kalpanā sādhvī sādguṇye karmaṇaḥ prācuryeṇa phala darśanāt 
NM_4,1.574.280	 api ca vitrātaḥ paśavaḥ bhavanti iti etāvān eva śāstra arthaḥ ānantarye tu na kiñcid pramāṇam asti tat ayam pratyakṣa ādi visaṃvādaḥ ānantarya viṣayaḥ citra ādi codanā tu anirdiṣṭa kāla viśeṣa viṣaya iti viṣaya bhedāt na sā tena bādhyate tat āha bhaṭṭaḥ ānantarya visaṃvādaḥ na aviśeṣa pravartinīm codanām bādhitum śaktaḥ sphuṭāt viṣaya bhedataḥ iti kriyā phala vidhi phalayoḥ viśeṣaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.281–4,1.574.282	 yat tu karma svabhāva paryālocanayā citra ādeḥ anantara phala tvam uktam yad kālam hi mardavam tad kālam mardana sukham iti tat etat atyantam anabhijñasya abhighānam vidhi phalānām kriyā phala tulya tva anupapatteḥ iha kiñcitvidhi phalam bhavati kiñcid kriyā phalam kṛṣi ādau tu bhūmi pāṭana ādi kriyā phalam sasya sampattiḥ tu vidhi phalam kaḥ punar kṛṣi ādau vidhiḥ asti vārtā vidyāyām vṛddha upadeśaḥ vākaścid bidhiḥ anvayanyatirekau vā tatra vidhi sthānīyau bhaviṣyataḥ 
NM_4,1.574.283	 loke api vetana kāmaḥ pavati ityādau pāka kriyā phalam odanaḥ vidhi phalam tu vetanam tatra kriyā phalānām eva epa niyamaḥ yat kriyā anantara bhāvi tvam vidhi phalānām tu vetana ādīnām na asti kāla niyamaḥ iṣṭau= api havirṣikāra ādi kriyā phalam sadyas bhavati eva paśu puvādi tuvidhi phalam anavacchinna kālam atas eva mardana sukham kriyā phalamiti sadyas bhavati mṛd gataḥ tu puṃsaḥ sevā phalam aniyata kālam grāma kāmaḥ mahīpālam seveta iti evamādiṣu laukikeṣu vidhiṣu asti na kāla niyamaḥ phale 
NM_4,1.574.284–4,1.574.285	 āyurveda upadiṣṭānām api aupadha vidhīnām na kriyāvat sadyas eva phala darśanam api tu kāla apekṣam eva iti na phala ānantarye kiñcid pramāṇam puruṣa icchā anuguṇā phala siddhinam bhavati yat tu paśu viraha kṛtaka daśana ādidodūyamāna adhikāri svarūpa paryālocanayā sadyaḥphala tvam ucyate tat api na sāṃpratam puruṣa icchā mātram etat na pramāṇa vṛttam aihikānām api phalānām na kriyā samanantara bhāvi tva niyamaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.286	 api ca aihika tvam phalasya tāvatā setsyati na punar kriyā phala vat sadyas tvam santi ca aihika phalāni api kāla antara savyapekṣāṇi karmāṇi yathā brahmavarvasa kāmasya kāryam viprasya pañcame iti na tatra pañcama varṣe upanīta mātraḥ eva māṇavakaḥ brahmavarcasa saṃpannā ubhavati kāla antare tu bhavati iti evam vīrya kāma ādiṣī api draṣṭavyam tasmāt vidhi phalānām ānantarya niyama abhāvāt na tad visaṃvādaḥ doṣāya kāla antare api yatra phala adarśanam tatra kriyā vaiguṇya karma antara pratibandha ādi kāraṇam iti uktam mīmāṃsaka ukta anṛta tva parihāra kramaḥanye kartṛ ādi vaiguṇya kalpanā ananumodinaḥ iha aphalasya citra ādeḥ phalam āmutrikam jaguḥ 
NM_4,1.574.287–4,1.574.288	 sarva aṅga upasaṃhāreṇa kāmya karma prayogāt kaḥ avasaraḥ karma vaiguṇya kalpanāyām janma antare tu tat phalam iti yuktā kalpanā phala kāla bhedāt karmaṇām trividha tvam tathā ca trividham karma kiñci daihika phalam eva kiñci d āmuṣmika phalam eva kiñcid aniyata phalam eva iha amutra vā tad phala pradam iti kalpanā 
NM_4,1.574.289	 tatra kārīryādi tāvat aihika phalam eva tat hi sakala janapada santāpa kāriṇi mahati avagrahe prastūyate vṛṣṭi lakṣaṇam ca tad phalaṃsvabhāvataḥ eva sakala loka sādhāraṇam āsanna tayā eva tad abhilaṣaṇīyam iti sadyas eva bhavitum arhati vacanāni ca tatra tādṛṃśya ivadṛśyante yadi varṣet tāvatī eva iṣṭim samāpayet yadi na varṣet śvobhūte juhuyāt iti 
NM_4,1.574.290–4,1.574.291	 āmuṣmika phalam tu karma jyotiṣṭoma ādi phala svabhāva mahimnā eva pāralaukikam bhavati svargaḥ nirupamā prītiḥ deśaḥ vā tad viśeṣaṇaḥ bhoktum na ubhayathā api eṣaḥ dehena anena śakyate citra ādi tu aniyata phalam karma tad phalasya paśu ādeḥ iha vā paratravā loke sambhavāt citra ādīnām janma antarīya paśu ādi phalaka tvam yuktam eva 
NM_4,1.574.292	 avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam tathā hi akṛta citrā yāgānām api iha janmani paśavaḥ dṛśyante te paridṛśyamāna sevā pratigraha ādi kāraṇakāeva iti kathyamāne karma nimitta tva hāneḥ bṛhaspati mata anupraveśa prasaṅgaḥ karma nimittaka tve tu teṣām paśūnām upapādakam kim karma iti nirūpaṇīyam na hi brahmavarcasa ādi phalāt karmaṇaḥ paśavaḥ niṣpadyante citrā capaśu phalāḥ iha janmani taiḥ na kṛtā eva pūrva janma kṛtā tu tasmin= eva janma niphalam dattavatī iti niyata aihika phala abhyupagamāt iti kutas paśu saṃpad jyotiṣṭoma ādi karma śeṣa phala tvam aihika paśu a ādīnām na yuktam 
NM_4,1.574.293	 nanu ! gautama vacana prāmāṇyāt pūrva kṛta bhukta śiṣṭa jyotiṣṭoma ādi karma nimittakaḥ sa paśu lābhaḥ bhaviṣyati yathā uktam varṇāa āśramāḥ ca sva karma niṣṭhāḥ pretya karma phalam anubhūya patantaḥ tatas śeṣeṇa viśiṣṭa deśa śruta vṛtta vitta ādi yuktam janma pratipadyante na etat yathāśrutam boddhum yuktam na hi anya phalakam karma dātum īṣṭe phala antaram sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ hi niyataḥ phala karmaṇām 
NM_4,1.574.294	 tasmāt samūha apekṣā śeṣa vācaḥ yuktiḥ vyākhyeyāḥ bahūni hikarmāṇi varṇāḥ āśramāḥ ca kṛtavantaḥ tatas karma samūhāt jyotiṣṭoma ādi phalam pretya anubhūyate tatas śeṣeṇa citra ādinā karmaṇā viśiṣṭaṃjanma pratipadyante iti arthaḥ tasmāt pūrva janma kṛta citra ādi nibandhanaḥ iha janmani paśu lābhaḥ na akarma nimittakaḥ na anya karma nimittakaḥ iti evam aniyata phala tvāt citra ādeḥ iha janmani phala adarśane api na anṛta tvaṃtad codanānām janma antare hi tāḥ iṣṭayaḥ phalam dāsyanti iti pūrva ukta karma traividhyā saṃbhava siddhāntaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.295–4,1.574.296	 atra ucyate kim vā ācanikam etat karmaṇām traividhyam uta puruṣa icchā adhīnam iti tatra vacanam tāvat trividha vibhāga pratipādakam na asti kārīrīm nirvaṣet vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta citrayā paśu kāmaḥ iti etāvat mātra śravaṇam na hi atra aihika tvam pāralaukika tvam aniyata tvam vā kvacid phalasya paṭhitam 
NM_4,1.574.297	 vidhi vṛttam api iyat eva yat sapratyaya pravartanam nāma tatra edam evaṃkāmena kartavyam iti etāvān liṅarthaḥ apuruṣa artha rūpe tuvya apāre pravartaka tva lakṣaṇa sva vyāpāra nirvahaṇam anadhigacchan vidhiḥadhikāri viśeṣaṇasya kāmasya kāmyamānasya svarga ādeḥ bhāva arthasya ca yāga ādeḥ sādhya sādhana sambandham eva avabodhayati na kāmyamānasya sadyas kāla antare vā niṣpattim ākṣipati iti 
NM_4,1.574.298–4,1.574.300	 phala svarūpa paryālocanayā tu satyam svargasya pāralaukika tvam avagamyate na tu paśu ādeḥ aniyamaḥ puruṣa icchā tu puruṣa icchā eva na tayā śāstra arthaḥ vyavasthāpayituṃśakyaḥ tasmāt niṣpramāṇakam traividhyam citrāyāḥ phala kāla aniyame kārīryāḥ api tathā eva syāt yaḥ tu citra ādīnām aniyata phala tve nyāyaḥ uktaḥ citra ādīnām phalam tāvat kṣīṇam tatra eva janma niityādiḥ sa kārīryām api niścita aihika phalāyām yojayitum śakyaḥ adya akṛtāyām kārīryāḥ na hi devaḥ na varṣati janma antara kṛtā tatra kārīrī kim na kāraṇam  
NM_4,1.574.301–4,1.574.303	 tasmāt sā api aniyata phalā bhavatu citrā kārīryoḥ na kaścana viśeṣaḥ atha sasya saṃpad saṃpādya sukha saṃbhoga sādhana bhūta adṛṣṭa nimitta āvṛṣṭiḥ adya akṛtāyām api kārīryām iti manyase tarhi dadhi kṣīra ādi bhakṣaṇa sukha ākṣepi karma nimittakaḥ paśu lābhaḥ bhaviṣyati akṛta citrā yāgānām kārīri adhīnaḥ odanaḥ citra adhīnam dadhi iti dadhi odana bhojana sukha sādhana adṛṣṭa kāritā paśu vṛṣṭi sṛṣṭiḥ bhavatu citrā kārīryoḥ vailakṣaṇya śaṅkā samādhānam ca atha śṛṅga grāhikayā paśuphalā citreṣṭiḥ upadiśyate tena na sukha sāmāni ākṣepaka karma nibandhanaḥ paśu lābhaḥ evam tarhi vṛṣṭau= api śṛṅga grāhikayā kārīrī paṭhyatas eva iti vṛṣṭiḥ api sāmānya adṛṣṭa nibandhanāḥ mā bhūt kārīri iṣṭeḥ niyata kāla tve api sarveṣām tathā na vaktum śakyam 
NM_4,1.574.304–4,1.574.305	 atha na yadi varṣet śvobhūte juhuyāt ityādi vacana paryālocanayā tasyāmaihika phala tvam ucyate yadi evam yatra tādṛśam vacanaṃna asti yaḥ vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ sa saubhareṇa stuvīta yadikāmayeta varṣukaḥ parjanyaḥ syāt iti nīcais sadaḥ minuyāt ityādau tatra pāralaukika phala tvam syāt yadica śvobhūte juhuyāt iti vacana mahimnā eva phale sadyas tva mātram adhikam bhavatu na tu tādṛśa vacana rahitānām karmaṇām vispaṣṭa siddham api aihika phala tvam nivartate bahu sādhāraṇa tvam api vṛṣṭi paśvoḥ samānam yat punar bahu sādhāraṇa tvena vṛṣṭeḥ aihika tvam ucyate tat api paśu ādausamānam na hi ātmambhariḥ eva yajamānaḥ bhavati tasya api svavāsinī kumāra atithi bhṛtya ādi bhojana pūrvaka sva bhojana niyama upadeśāt bahutara upakāraka tvam tu vṛṣṭeḥ iti alam tulayā pratyāsanna tvam api phala dvayasya samānam 
NM_4,1.574.306	 yat api pratyāsanna tvena kāmyamāna tvāt vṛṣṭeḥ aihika tvam kathyate tat api tādṛś eva paśu ādeḥ api tathā eva kāmyamāna tvāt tatra avagraha vihita santāpa tayā pratyāsanna tvena vṛṣṭiḥ abhilaṣyate iha api daurgatya udvegāt āsanna tayā eva paśavaḥ kāmyante tasmāt vāridaḥ tṛptim āpnoti sukhaṃma kṣayam anna daḥ ityādi vacana upadiṣṭa sāmānya sukha sādhana adṛṣṭa nibandha naiva iyam iha akṛta karmaṇām vṛṣṭi paśu ādi saṃpattiḥ iti na bṛhaspati matavata karma nimittam phalam na api karma phala sādhya sādhana bhāva niyama vyabahāra ullaṅghanam iti kārīryāḥ api aniyata kāla phalaka tvam eva 
NM_4,1.574.307–4,1.574.308	 yat ca kārīryāḥ kvacid phala visaṃvāde samādhānam uktam phalati yadi na sarvam tat kadācid tadeva dhruvam aparama bhuktam karma śāstrīyam āste iti tena sā api aniyata phalā eva syāt na hi tad karma antaraṃāsaṃsāram pratibandhakam bhavati phala upabhogāt hi tasya avaśyam kṣayeṇa bhavitavyam pratibandhake ca kṣīṇe kārīryā sva phalam tadā dātavyam eva sā api adatta phalā na kṣīyate eva iti evam janma antare tad phala saṃbhavāt tasya aapi aniyata phala tvam 
NM_4,1.574.309–4,1.574.310	 anena ca prakāreṇa citra ādeḥ api aniyata phala tvam asmābhiḥ iṣyate eva yatra samyak prayuktāyām api iṣṭau karma antara pratibandhāt eva paśūnām anupalambhaḥ kalpyate sarvathā sadyaḥphala tva mātra varjam samāna yogakṣemā kārīrya acitreṣṭiḥ aihika phalānām sarveṣām api aniyata kāla phalaka tvam eva etena brahmavarcasa vīryān nādya grāma ādi kāma iṣṭayaḥ api vyākhyātāḥ tasmāt yathāśrutam gautamam boddhavyam samagra aṅga upasaṃhāre api karmaṇām vaiguṇya saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.311	 yat api abhyadhāyi samagra aṅga upasaṃhāreṇa kāmya karma prayogāt kutas karmaṇaḥ vaiguṇya avasaraḥ iti tat api asāram sarva aṅga upasaṃhāreṇa pravṛttau= api pramādāt asaṃvedya māna vaiguṇya saṃbhavāt sa ca vicitraḥ bhāṣya kāreṇa pradarśitaḥ tasmāt pūrva uktaḥ eva pratisamādhāna mārgaḥ śreyān siddhānte dharma adharma svarūpa nirṇayaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.312	 yat punar pūrva pākṣikeṇa kathitam kāla antare karma abhāvāt kutas phalam iti tat api na samyak yadi api āphala niṣpatteḥ karmaṇaḥ na asti avasthitiḥ tathā api asti eva saṃskāraḥ puruṣasya tadā ahitaḥ karma janyaḥ hi saṃskāraḥ puṃsaḥ buddhi ādi vat guṇaḥ tasya ca aphala saṃyogāt avasthitiḥ upeyate yathā indriya ādi saṃyogāt ātmanaḥ buddhi saṃbhavaḥ tathā yāga ādi karmabhyaḥ tasya saṃskāra saṃbhavaḥ buddhiḥ tu bhaṅgurā tasya saṃskāraḥ tu phala avadhiḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ hi na anyathā phala karmaṇoḥ smṛti bījam tu saṃskāraḥ tasya anyaiḥ api mṛṣyate tathā eva phala saṃyoga bījam saḥ asya bhaviṣyati sa yāga dāna homa ādi janyaḥ dharmagirā ucyate brahmahatyā ādi janyaḥ tu saḥ adharmaḥ iti kathyate itara dārśa nikarītyā dharma adharma svarūpam 
NM_4,1.574.313	 kāpilāḥ tu antaḥkaraṇasya buddheḥ vṛtti viśeṣam dharmam āhuḥ ārhatāḥ puṇya pudgalān dharma tvena vyapadiśanti śākya bhikṣavaḥ citta vāsanām dharmam ācakṣate vṛddhamīmāṃsakāḥ yāga ādi karma nirvarti aṃa pūrvam nāma dharmam abhivadanti yāga ādi karma eva śābarāḥ bruvate vākya arthaḥ eva niyoga ātmā apūrva śabda vācyaḥ dharma śabdena ca saevā ucyate iti prābhākarāḥ kathayanti pudgala ādi vādānām asāmañjasyam 
NM_4,1.574.314–4,1.574.316	 tatra puṇya pudgala vṛtti pakṣayoḥ kapila arhat grantha kathitayoḥ tad mata nirāsāt eva nirāsaḥ ātmanaḥ ca samarthayiṣyamāṇa tvāt tasya eva vāsanā na cetasā eti saugata pakṣaḥ api ayuktaḥ svarga yāga antarāla vartinaḥ casthirasya nirādhārasya apūrvasya niṣpramāṇaka tvāt jarat jaiminīya pravādaḥ api apeśalaḥ api ca phalasyavā kācid utpatsyamāna daśā yāgasya vā śaktiḥ apūrva śabdena ucyate 
NM_4,1.574.317–4,1.574.318	 na ca niyogaḥ vākya arthaḥ eva apūrva śabda vācyaḥ tasya upariṣṭāt apākariṣyamāṇa tvāt na api yaḥ yāgam anutiṣṭhati tam dhārmikaḥ iti ācakṣate itiyāga ādi sāmāna adhikaraṇyena prayogāt saḥ eva dharma śabda vācyaḥ iti yuktam vaktum tasya kṣaṇika tvena kāla antare phala dātṛ tva anupapatteḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya prayogaḥ api ca ekāntataḥ na asti eva yāga dāna ādinā dharmaḥ bhavati iti api laukikāḥ prayogāḥ santi te ca amī saṃskriyā pakṣa sākṣiṇaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.319	 evam yajñena yajñam ayajanta devāḥ tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan iti vaidikaḥ api prayogaḥ tad viṣayaḥ eva vyākhyeyaḥ tasya sthāyi tvena kāla antare phala dāna yogya ta upapatteḥ saṃskāraḥ nṛ guṇaḥ sthāyī tasmāt dharmaḥ iti sthitam tasmāt ca phala niṣpatteḥ na citra ādau mṛṣārtha tā yajña āyudhi vākye visaṃvāda parihāraḥ 
NM_4,1.574.320	 yat api yajña āyudhi vākye pratyakṣa viruddha tvam upapādyate sma bhasmībhāva upalambhāt kāyasya iti tad api asamīcīnam eṣaḥ iti śarīra abheda upacāreṇa ātmanaḥ eva nirdeśāt tasya ca svarga gamanaṃbhavati eva gamanam ca tad upabhogaḥ eva tasya ucyate yathā śarīra ādi yoga viyogau janma maraṇe iti na tu vyāpinaḥ parispanda ātmaka kriyā yogaḥ upapadyate jñāna cikīrṣā prayatna samavāyaḥ ca tasya kartṛ tvam iti varṇayiṣyate yajñāyudha sambandhaḥ api sva svāmi bhāva ādiḥtasya eva vyāpaka tva aviśeṣe api vyavasthayā upapadyate iti na kaścid atra virodhaḥ tasmāt sarvatra niravakāśam anṛta tva ādi dūṣaṇam havana vākya virodha parihāraḥ 
NM_4,1.574.321	 yaḥ api havana kāla vidhau vyāghāta doṣaḥ darśitaḥ saḥ api na doṣaḥ eva tatra anuṣṭhāna bhedena kāla tritaya codanā yaḥ yasya coditaḥ kālaḥ laṅghanīyaḥ na tena saḥ tatas ca anyatamam kālam abhyupetya enam ujjhataḥ nindā iti na virodhaḥ atra kaścid vidhi niṣedhayoḥ punarukta doṣa parihāraḥ abhyāse paunaruktyam ca kārya artha tvāt adūṣaṇam saṃpādyam pāñcadaśyam hi sāmidhenīṣu coditam 
NM_4,1.574.322	 imam aham pañcadaśa āreṇa vajreṇa apabādhe yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam ca vayaṃdviṣmaḥ iti śrūyate ekādaśa sāmidhenyaḥ ṛcaḥ tu paṭhyante tatra abhyāsam antareṇa pāñcadaśyam na avakalpate iti evam avaśya kartavyaḥ abhyāsaḥ sa ca ayam aniyamena prāptaḥ vacanena niyamyate prathama uttame ṛcautriḥ uccāraṇīye iti tasmāt tad prayojana artha tvāt na punarukta tā doṣaḥ abhyāse phala rahite hi paunaruj ti aṃdoṣaḥ syāt iha tu na tasya niṣphala tvam vyāghāta anṛta punarukta tā ādi tasmāt vedasya ślathayati na pramāṇa bhāvam iyam ca vākya artha vicāraṇā api prāmāṇya sidhyaupayikī iti matvā cakre sva śāstre muninā iha veda prāmāṇya nirvāhaṇa dīkṣitena arthavāda vākyānām aprāmāṇi ākṣepaḥ nanu ! na adya api vedasya bhavadbhiḥ nipuṇaiḥ api sva deha saṃbhavāḥ doṣāḥ nikhilāḥ paripiñjitāḥ 
NM_4,1.574.323	 tathā hi saḥ arodīt yat arodīt tad rudrasya rudra tvam prajāpatiḥ ātmanaḥ vapām udakkhidat tām agnau prāgṛhṇāt tatas ajastu uparaḥ udagāt devāḥ vai deva yajana madhyavasāya diśaḥ na prājānan iti evamādīnām arthavādānāṃkim yathāśruta vastu paratvam uta tebhyaḥ kārya rūpa artha upadeśa parikalpanam uta liṅā ādi yukta vākya antara pratipādyamāna kārya rūpa artha aupayika tvam iti cintyam artha vādānām sva arthe prāmāṇya asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.324–4,1.574.325	 sarvathā ca pramādaḥ svarūpa paratve tāvat pramāṇa antara viruddha artha upadeśāt aprāmāṇyam eva avatarati rodana vapa utkhedana diś moha ādeḥ arthasya tathātve niścaya abhāvāt artha vādānām viruddha artha pratipādaka tvāt aprāmāṇyam kiñca stenam manaḥ anṛta vādinī vāc iti evan jātīyakānām artha vāda vākyānām vispaṣṭam eva pramāṇa antara viruddha artha pratipādaka tvam na hi nisargataḥ eva sarva prāṇinām anṛta vādinī vāc bhavati stenam vā manaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.326–4,1.574.329	 api cadhūmaḥ eva agneḥ divā dadṛśe na arciḥ tasmāt arciḥ eva agneḥ naktam dṛśyate na dhūmaḥ iti pratyakṣa viruddham abhidhīyate naktam dinam dvayoḥ api indriya artha sannikarṣe sati grahaṇāt kiñca etat na vidmaḥ yadi brāhmaṇāḥ smas abrāhmaṇāḥ vā iti brāhmaṇa jāteḥ upadeśa sahāya pratyakṣa gamya tvāt tad viruddhaḥ eṣaḥ artha vādaḥ śāstra virodhaḥ api asti kaḥ hi tadvada yadi amuṣmin= loke asti vāna vā iti śāstre svarga ādi phalānām jyotiṣṭoma ādi karmaṇām upadeśāt kā iyam anavakptiḥ api ca garga tri rātra brāhmaṇam adhikṛtya śrūyate śobhate asya mukham yaḥ evam vedaḥ iti na hi kasyacitevaṃvid ataḥ mukham śobhate iti pratyakṣa virodhaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.330	 anya karma anartha kī aśaṃsī ca kaścid artha vādaḥ bhavati pūrṇāhuti ā sarvān kāmān avāpnoti paśu bandha yājī sarvān lokān abhijayati tarati mṛtyum tarati pāpmānam tarati brahma hatyām yaḥ aśvamedhena yajateyaḥ ca evam vedaḥ iti yadi pūrṇāhutyā eva sarva kāma avāptiḥ paśu bandha yāgena eva sarva loka jayaḥ aśvamedha vedanena eva tad phala avāptiḥ tat kim artham anya karma upadeśaḥ upadiṣṭāni api tāni bahu kleśa sādhyāni karmāṇi vyarthāni bhaveyuḥ anena eva laghunā upāyena tad phala prāpteḥ darśanāt 
NM_4,1.574.331–4,1.574.332	 api ca na pṛthivyām agniḥ cetavyaḥ na antarikṣe na divi iti vede cayana niṣedhaḥ eva atra bhaṅgyā bhavet divica antarikṣe ca tāvat cayana prayogaḥ eva na asti kim tad niṣedhena pṛthivī cayana niṣedha artham ca yat vākyam tat cayana pratiṣedha artham eva bhavet apṛthivī adhikaraṇakasya cayanasya anupapatteḥ api ca yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ ādityaḥ yūpaḥ iti evaṃjātīyakānām pratyakṣa viruddha artha abhidhāyināṃartha vādānām kā pariniṣṭhā iti tasmāt na svarūpa paratvam teṣām upapadyate artha vādebhyaḥ eva vidhi kalpanam api na saṃbhavati 
NM_4,1.574.333	 na api tebhyaḥ eva kārya rūpa artha parikalpanam upapannam aśakya tvāt saḥ arodīt yat arodīt tad rudrasya rudra tvam iti atra kāryam kalpyamānam evam kalpyeta rudraḥ kila ruroda atas anyena api roditavyam iti tat ca aśakyam priya viprayoga janita santāpa vaśena hibāṣpamocanam rodanam ucyate na tat codana upadeśāt kartum śakyate 
NM_4,1.574.334–4,1.574.336	 prajāpatiḥ ātmanaḥ vapām uccikheda tasmāt anyaḥ api evam utkhidet a ātmanaḥ vapām iti duranuṣṭhānaḥ ayam arthaḥ kaḥ hi nāma ātmanaḥ vapām utkhidet kasya vā vapā home sati samanantaram eva huta bhujaḥ paśuḥ tu uparaḥ udgacchet iti devāḥ diśaḥ na ājñāsiṣuḥ atas anyaḥ api na jānīyāt itiaśakya upadeśaḥ na hi diś mohaḥ nāma upadeśāt kartum śakyaḥ na ca sarvasmāt artha vādāt vidhiḥ kalpayitum śakyaḥ itim adhyamaḥ api na sat pakṣaḥ artha vādānām vidhi śeṣa tayā prāmāṇyam api na 
NM_4,1.574.337	 na api tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ saṃbhavati vākya antara vihita kārya rūpa artha aupayika tvam hi tad upayogi dravya devatā ādi vidhāna dvārakam bhavati yathāagnihotram juhoti iti atra dadhnā juhoti payasā ājuhoti iti dravya viniyoga vidheḥ yat agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃjuhoti iti devatā vidheḥ vā na ca ayam artha vādeṣu prakāraḥ saṃbhavati na ca ebhiḥ brīhīn avahanti brīhīn prokṣati iti vat dṛṣṭā adṛṣṭā vā kācid itikartavyatā upadiśyate tasmāt na teṣāntat aupayika tvam pravṛtti uttaṃbhana rūpa phalam api artha vādānām na samasti 
NM_4,1.574.338–4,1.574.339	 nanu ! prekṣāvatām prarocana atiśaya karaṇena pravṛtti utsāham ābahantaḥ artha vādāḥ tad upayoginaḥ bhaviṣyanti na etat api samyak pravṛtti utsāha ūhi keṣāṃcid mate nirapekṣa śabda pratyayāt eva sidhyati asmad mate tu tad praṇetṛ puruṣa pratyayāt iti kim prarocanayā evaṃkāmaḥ idam kuryāt iti ukte yaḥ tatra na pravartate sa prarocanayā api na pravarteta eva itiyat kiñcid etat tat evam prakāra trayeṇa api arthavāda padānām ananvayāt eka deśa ākṣepeṇa sarva ākṣepaḥ eva kriyate iti apramāṇam vedaḥ arthavādānām aprāmāṇye tad dṛṣṭāntena veda sāmānyā prāmāṇya siddhiḥ 
NM_4,1.574.340	 nanu ! yāvatī eva pramāṇa antara viruddha tvam upalabhyate tāvatī eva aprāmāṇyam astu sarvatra tu kutastyā tad āśaṅkā iti mā evam tad sāmānyāt anyatra api anāśvāsaḥ mīmāṃsaka pakṣe hi arthavāda rahita kevala veda grantha anupalambhāt tad anuṣaṅgeṇa sarvatra sa apekṣa tvam avatarati naiyāyika mate tu veda praṇetuḥ īśvarasya kvacid vitatha vādi tve dṛśyamāne katham anyatra satya vāditāyām dṛḍhaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavet iti aprāmāṇyaṃsarvatra iti artha vādānām vidhi eka vākya tvāt prāmāṇya sthāpanam 
NM_4,1.574.341	 atra abhidhīyate vidhi eka vākya tayā eva bhūmnā tāvat arthavāda padānipaṭhyante vāyavyam śvetam ālabheta bhūti kāmaḥ vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyum eva svena bhāgadheyena upadhāvati saḥ eva enam bhūtim gamayati iti teṣām tad eka vākya tvāt eva prāmāṇyam vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā iti atas yadi api kriyā na avagamyate na api tad sambaddhaḥ kaścid arthaḥ tathā api vidhi uddeśena eka vākya tvam tasya pratīyate bhūti kāmaḥ iti evam antaḥ vidhi uddeśaḥ tena eka vākya bhūtaḥ vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhāḥ iti evamādeḥ artha vādānām stuti rūpa tvam 
NM_4,1.574.342–4,1.574.344	 katham eka vākya bhāvaḥ padānām sa ākāṅkṣa tvāt nanu ! bhūti kāmaḥ iti evam antena vākyena vidheyam vihitam utpāditam pratipattuḥ anākāṅkṣa tvam kṛtañca śabda kartavyam iti kim anyena kṣepiṣṭha aitya ādinā prayojanam  tad arthasya eva stutiḥ iti brūmaḥ sārtha vāda vidheḥ eva preraka tvam nanu ! stutyā api kim prayojanam stutaḥ astutaḥ catāvān evasaḥ arthaḥ mā evam sa stuti pade hi vākye stuti pada sahitam vidhāyakaṃvidhāyakam bhavati 
NM_4,1.574.345	 kim idānīm kevalam liṅa ādi yuktam vākyam na vidhāyakam ucyate yadi stuti padāni na śrūyante tat bāḍham bhavati vidhāyakam eteṣu casatsu tad sahitam tad vidhāyakam bhavati na kevalam tathā pratīteḥ stuti pada sambandhe sati bhinna vākyatā mā bhūt iti vidhi padena stuti padena ca saṃbhūya arthaḥ vidhīyate tathā avagamāt anyathā hi pratīyamānaḥ padārtha anvayaḥ tyajyeta vākya bhedaḥ vā kalpyeta tasmāt na stuti padānām ānarthakyam arthavāda vākya prayojana ākṣepaḥ samādhānam ca 
NM_4,1.574.346–4,1.574.347	 nanu ! kevalasya api vidhi vākyasya sāmarthyāt kim artham stuti padāni prayuñjate iti ucyate aparyanuyojyaḥ jaiminīyānām mateśabdaḥ asmākam ca bhagavān īśvaraḥ ukte sati pratipatta āraḥ vayam vedasya na kartāraḥ pratipattau ca kramaḥ darśitaḥ dravya devatā ādya samarpaka tve api artha vādānām na ānarthakyam evañca yadi api dravya devatā iti kartavyatā vidhāna dvārakam aṅga vidhivat artha vāda vākyānām kārya aupayika tvam na asti tathā api prati iti aṅga tvaṃ na nivāryate arthavādānām āvaśyaka tā 
NM_4,1.574.348	 atas eva pramāṇa upayogi tvam eṣām ācakṣate na prameya upayogi tvam kevala vidhi pada śravaṇe hi na tadā ādriyante yajvānaḥ tatra vidhi vibhaktiḥ avasīdati tām nimajjantīm iva artha vāda janita karma prāśastya pratyayaḥ uttabhrāti sarva jitā yajeta iti atas natathāvidhaḥ śraddhā atiśayaḥ bhavati yathāvidhaḥ sarva jitā vai devāḥ sarvam ajayan sarvasya āptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam eva etena sarvam jayati iti arthavāda padebhyaḥ loke api iyam gauḥ kretavyāityataḥ na tathā kretāraḥ pravartante yathā eṣā bahu snigdha kṣīra asu ślīlā sa apatyāḥ anagha prajā ca iti evamādibhyaḥ stutibhyaḥ sva anubhava sākṣikaḥ ayam arthaḥ arthavāda aśravaṇa sthale api arthavāda kalpanam 
NM_4,1.574.349–4,1.574.351	 atas eva kecid aśruta artha vādake api vidhi vākye tad kalpanām icchanti yathā kvacid artha vādāt vidhi kalpanam iti yathā uktam vidhi stutyoḥ sadā vṛttiḥ samāna viṣaya iṣyateiti anadhigamyamāna vidhi sambandhāt ca artha vādāt vidhiḥ unnīyate nagamyamāna sambandhāt artha vādaiḥ stuti prāpti prakāraḥ atas eva ca saḥ arodīt iti evamādibhyaḥ na roditavyam iti ādi vidhi kalpanam iṣyate mudhā eva pūrva pakṣiṇā tad āśaṅkitam vidhi antareṇa eka vākya tvam hi pratyakṣam iha upadiśyate barhiṣi rajataṃna deyam iti asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ ayam saḥ arodītiti a ādiḥ rudraḥ ruroda tasya yat aśru aśīryata tat rajatam abhavat yohi barhiṣi rajatam dadāti purā asya saṃvatsarāt gṛhe rodanam bhavati iti tasmāt varhiṣi rajatam na deyam iti 
NM_4,1.574.352–4,1.574.353	 prājāpatyam ajam tu uparama ālabheta iti asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ prajāpatiḥ ātmanaḥ vapām udakkhidat iti vapā homa māhātmya pradarśana artham ucyate agnau vai pragṛhīta mātrāyām vapāyām ajastu uparaḥ udagāt iti ādityaḥ prāyaṇīyaḥ caruḥ iti asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ ayam devāḥ vai deva yajana madhyavasāya diśaḥ na prājānan iti vyāmohānām ādityaḥ caruḥ nāśayitā yathā diś mohasya iti evaṃtatra tatra vidhi śeṣa tvam artha vādānām veditavyam artha vādānām asatya arthaka tva nirāsaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.354	 katham punar idam asatyam eva ucyate rudra ruditāt rajatam ajāyata prajāpati homa samiddhāt agneḥ ajastu uparaḥ udagāt iti ucyate na idam asatyam yat asya vākyasya pratipādyam tatra satya artham eva idam naca asya yathā taḥ arthaḥ pratipādyaḥ kintu vidheyaḥ niṣedhyaḥ vā kaścid arthaḥ iha anvākhyāne dvayam āpatati yat ca vṛttānta jñānam yat cakasmin= cid arthe prarocanā dveṣaḥ vā tatra vṛttānta jñānam na pravartakam na nivartakam iti prayojana abhāvāt anarthakam anādaraṇīyam prarocanāt veṣau pravṛtti nivṛtti aṅga tvāt tad arthau gṛhītvā prarocanāyāḥ pravarteta dveṣāt nivarteta iti tatra tad pratipādya satya arthaḥ eva artha vādaḥ arthavādānām artha virodhe gauṇa arthaka tvam 
NM_4,1.574.355–4,1.574.357	 yat tu arudati rudre katham tat rodana vacanam arodana prabhave vārajate katham tat udbhavatā abhidhānam iti guṇavāda mātram gauṇaḥ eṣavādaḥ śveta varṇa sārūpya ādinā rodana prabhavam rajatam ninditum ucyate evam paśu yāge vapā homa praśaṃsāyai prajāpatiḥ ātmanaḥ vapām udakkhidat iti vṛttānta ākhyānam yojanīyam āditya caru praśaṃsāyai devāḥ vai deva yajana madhyavasāya diśaḥ na prājānan iti siddhānte artha vādānām yathāśruta artha tve na virodhaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.358	 athavā naiyāyikānām aneka prakāra puruṣa atiśaya vādinām yathāśrute api arthe na atyantam asaṃbhavaḥ rudrasya ruditāt rajata janma prajāpateḥ vapa utkhedaḥ tad homāt tu upara paśu udgamaḥ devānām devayajana adhyavasānedij mohaḥ iti evaṃjātīyakam api satyam astu ! kaḥ doṣaḥ tad sarvathāna artha vādāḥ na pramāṇam artha vādeṣu pratyakṣa ādi virodha parihāraḥ 
NM_4,1.574.359–4,1.574.361	 evam stenam manaḥ anṛta vādinī vāc iti gauṇaḥ eṣa vādaḥ pracchanna tayā stenam manaḥ ucyate bāhulya abhiprāyeṇa ca anṛta vādinī vāc iti dhūmaḥ eva agneḥ divā dadṛśe na arciḥ arcira eva agneḥ naktam dadṛśe na dhūmaḥ iti dūra bhūyaḥ tva abhiprāyeṇa kasmaicid prayojana āyasāyaṃprātar homa devatā stutaye kathyate na ca etat vidmaḥ yadi brāhmaṇāḥ smaḥ abrāhmaṇāḥ vā iti pravara anumantraṇa praśaṃsāyai saṃśayaḥ iva darśitaḥ abrāhmaṇaḥ api yajamānaḥ pravara anumantraṇena brāhmaṇaḥ syāt iti 
NM_4,1.574.362–4,1.574.365	 kaḥ hi vai tat vedaḥ yat amuṣmin= loke asti vā na vā iti adṛṣṭa phalam kim api karma stotum ucyate śobhate asya mukham yaḥ evam vedaḥ iti vidyā praśaṃsā eṣā śobhate iti śiṣyaiḥ udvīkṣyamāṇasya mukham iti sarvān kāmān āpnoti iti sarva tvam prakṛtā apekṣam stuti arthaṃca aśvamedha adhyayane tad phala vacanam hiraṇyam nidhāya cetavyam iti stuti artha tayā divyantarikṣepṛthivyām ca cayanam pratiṣidhyate anupahita hiraṇyāyām pṛthivyāṃagniḥ na cetavyaḥ na punar na cetavyaḥ eva tasyām iti 
NM_4,1.574.366–4,1.574.368	 ādityaḥ yūpaḥ iti añjane sati tejasvitayā yūpasya āditya rūpa tā stutaye kathyate tad kārya kāri tvāt ca yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ ucyate na hi mukhyayā eva vṛttyā loke śabdāḥ pravartante gauṇyā api vṛttyā tad vyavahāra darśanāt evam vede api teṣām tathā prayogaḥ bhaviṣyati itthaṃca mantreṣu api aindryāḥ gārhapatya upasthānam aviruddham para kṛti purā kalpa rūpa artha vādānām api prāmāṇyam evam stuti nindā svarūpāḥ tāvat artha vādāḥ vidhi eka vākya tvena pramāṇam para kṛti purā kalpa svarūpāḥ api tathā eva yojyāḥ kutracid artha vādaiḥ vidhi kalpanam api dṛśyate 
NM_4,1.574.369	 kvacid punar arthavādena eva kaścid aṃśaḥ pūryate iti na tu prati iti aṅga tvam eva tasya kārya aṅga tvam api bhavati yathā pratitiṣṭhanti ha vā yaḥ etārātrīḥ upāsate iti aśrūyamāṇa adhikārasya rātri satra vidheḥ adhikāra aṃśaḥ artha vādāt eva labhyate yathā uktam phalam ātreyaḥ nirdeśāt iti tatra hi pratiṣṭhā kāmāḥ satram āsīran iti artha vāda vaśāt gamyate vākya arthaḥ kvacid artha vādānām saṃśaya nivartaka tvam 
NM_4,1.574.370	 kvacid vidhi vākyasya artha sandehe arthavāda ātmakāt vākya śeṣāt tad niścayaḥ bhavati yathā aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhāti iti añjana dravye ghṛta naila vasā ādi bhedena saṃdihyamānetejaḥ vai ghṛtam iti artha vādāt ghṛtena aktāḥ śarkarā upadheyāḥ iti gamyate arthavāda vicāra upasaṃhāraḥ iti artha vādāḥ vidhi nā aikya bhāvāt tadvat pramāṇa tvam amī bhajante asti prati iti anvayitā hi teṣāṃ kvacit ca kārya anvayitā tu dṛṣṭā yat vā svarūpa para tām api saṃspṛśanta prāmāṇyavartma te ime na parityajanti naiyāyikāḥ hi puruṣa atiśayam vadantaḥ vṛttānta varṇanam api iha yathārtham āhuḥ āditya yūpa vacana ādiṣu tu svarūpayāthārthyam ittham upapādayitum na śakyam gauṇīm tu vṛttim abalambya kṛtā tad artha vyākhyā iti teṣu api na vipla vana avakāśaḥ mantra vākya vicāraḥ 
NM_4,1.574.371–4,1.574.372	 atha idānīm mantrāḥ vicāryante kim artha prakāśana dvāreṇa vidhi artha upayogi tā teṣām uta uccāraṇa mātreṇa iti mantra vākya vicārasya aprakṛta tva śaṅkā samādhānañca nanu ! ubhayathā api prāmāṇya aviśeṣāt kim tad vicāreṇa na hīdaṃśa astram vedasya artha vicārāya mīmāṃsā vat pravṛttam api tu prāmāṇya nirṇayāya eva iti satyam prāmāṇya nirṇayāya eva idam śāstram pravṛttam avivakṣita artha tve tu mantrāṇām apratipādaka tva lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam eva bhavet sāmānyāt veda brāhmaṇa vākyānām api tathā abhāva prasaṅgaḥ iti vedasya karma avabodha artha tvam hīyeta na ca saṃśaya viparyaya jananam eva aprāmāṇyam ajñāna janaka tvam api aprāmāṇyam eva uccāraṇa mātrāt eva sārthakyam mantrāṇām iti pūrva pakṣaḥ 
NM_4,1.574.373	 tat ucyate uccāraṇa mātra upakāriṇaḥ mantrāḥ kutas tathā viniyoga upadeśāt uru prathā uru prathasvaḥ iti puroḍāśam prathayati iti yadi artha prakāśana upakāriṇaḥ mantrāḥ sāmarthyāt eva prathana upayogī maṃtraḥ ayam iti kim artham prathane viniyujyante vacanena yathāsākṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pareṇa ced nīyate nūnam akṣibhyām na paśyati iti gamyate 
NM_4,1.574.374–4,1.574.375	 agnīt agnīn viharaḥ iti ca karoti eva asau ṛtvij agni viharaṇam kim vacanena uccāraṇa mātra upakāriṇi mantre tad uccāraṇāt eva adṛṣṭam kiñcid upakāra jātam kalpyate vākya krama niyamāt ca avivakṣita arthān mantrān avagacchāmaḥ niyata pada kramāḥ hi mantrāḥ paṭhyante yadi artha pratipādanena upakuryuḥ niyata krama āśrayaṇam anarthakam syāt krama antareṇa api tad artha avagama saṃpatteḥ mantrāṇām artha vivakṣā api kvacid na saṃbhavati 
NM_4,1.574.376	 itas ca avivakṣita arthāḥ mantrāḥ avidyamāna artha prakāśinaḥ hikecid dṛśyante yathā catvāri śṛṅgāḥ trayaḥ asya pādāḥ dve śīrṣesapta hastāsaḥ asya tridhā baddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti mahaḥ devaḥ martyān āviveśaḥ iti na hi catur śṛṅgam tri pādaṃdviśiraskam sapta hastam kiñcid yajña sādhanam asti yat anena prakāśyeta acetane cetana vat vyavahāraḥ viruddhaḥ
