NM_5,2.3.176–5,2.3.177	 nanu ! daṇḍi śabdāt iva viśeṣaṇam ca jātim viśeṣyām ca vyaktiṃgo śabdāt eva pratipatsyāmahe kaḥ asya ati bhāraḥ viṣamaḥ ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ tatra hi prakṛti pratyaya vibhāgena dvaya pratītiḥ avakalpate daṇḍa śabdaḥ prakṛtiḥ viśeṣaṇam abhivadati matu arthīya pratyayaḥ ca viśeṣyam iti go śabde tu na eṣa nyāyaḥ saṃbhavati tatra na viśeṣaṇedaṇḍi śabdaḥ vartate na ca viśeṣye daṇḍa śabdaḥ iha tu go śabdaḥ ekaḥ eva viśeṣaṇe viśeṣye vā vartate viśeṣye vartamānaḥ viśeṣaṇe pramāṇa antaram apekṣate viśeṣaṇe tu vartamānaḥ tat avagamayya viśeṣyam api ākṣipati iti nakaścid doṣaḥ śabdāt vyakti bodha anubhavaḥ anyathā asiddhaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.178	 tat idam ātma pratyakṣam yat śabde uccarite vyaktiḥ avagamyate iti sā kim śabdāt uta jāteḥ iti vivekaḥ na pratyakṣaḥ sa yuktyā avagamyate śabdasya dvaya abhidhāne yatna gauravāt viramya vyāpārasya ca asaṃvedānāt antareṇa api ca śabdaṃjāti avagame vyakti pratīti darśanāt jātita eva eṣā vyakti pratītiḥ jāti pratītiḥ ca śabdāt iti niścīyate bhavadbhiḥ api ca viśeṣaṇa jñāna pūrvikā viśeṣya avagaratiraṅgīkṛtā eva yathā aahakaṇa vrataḥ samavāyinaḥ śvaitya at śavaitya buddheḥ ca śvete buddhiḥ te kārya kāraṇa bhūte iti śabdāt vyakti bodha naiyatyam na asti 
NM_5,2.3.179–5,2.3.180	 yat punar abhihitam ālaṃbhana viśasana prokṣaṇa ādi kriyā yogāt vyaktiḥ śabda arthaḥ iti tat api anaikāntikam jātau= api kvacid kriyā yoga darśanāt śyena citam cinvītaḥ iti vyakteḥ kutracid kriyā anvayā yogaḥ nanu ! atra api vyakteḥ eva kārya aṅga tā na amūrtāyāḥ jāteḥ mā evam na hi atra śyenaḥ sādhana tvena nirdiśyate paśunā yajeta eti vat karmaṇi agni ākhyāyām iti tu abhiyukta smaraṇāt cayana nirvartyaḥ śyenaḥ iti śabda arthaḥ avagamyate na ca yena vyaktiḥ cayanena nirvartayitum pāryate agni ākhyāyām iti hi smaryate na hi iṣṭakā nicayena patatrī abhinirvartate tad ākāraḥ tu agniḥ abhinirvartyatā eti atra jāteḥ kriyā aṅga tvam na vyakteḥ sādṛśyam jāti mūlakam eva na vyakti mūlakam 
NM_5,2.3.181–5,2.3.182	 nanu ! vyaktyā sādṛśyam saṃpādayiṣyate na śakyate saṃpādayitum vyakti antara vaisādṛśyasya api saṃbhavāt yaḥ hi ekayā vyaktyā sadṛśaḥ saḥ anyaiḥ visadśaḥ api bhavati amūrtānām api sādhana tva saṃbhavaḥ yat tu amūrtāyāḥ jāteḥ nam kriyā aṅga tvam iti na eṣa doṣaḥ amūrtānām apigaṇa karmaṇām sādhana bhāva upapatteḥ aruṇayā krīṇāti abhikrāmam juhoti iti vyakti ākṣepa dvāreṇa ca alaṃbhana viśasana proyoga codanāsu sādhana tvam jāteḥ upapatsyate lakṣita vyakti sādhyam tu tat sādhyam kāryam iṣyate yathā bhūta indriya utpādyam ātma kartṛkam ucyate 
NM_5,2.3.183	 ātmā tāvat sarva karmasu adhikṛtaḥ kartā ca sa ca amūrta tvāt deha indriya dvāreṇa audumbarī saṃmārjana ājya avekṣaṇa ādīni kāryāṇi nirvartayan kartāteṣu bhavati evam jātiḥ api vyakti vartmanā tat nirvartayantī sādhana tānlapsyate jāti ādīnām kriyā aṅga tvam sa dvārakam atas ca jātiḥ eva aṅgam iti mīmāṃsakāḥ jaguḥ tasyāḥ ca idam kriyā aṅtvam anya dvārakam ātma vat 
NM_5,2.3.184–5,2.3.186	 evam ṣaṣ deyāḥ iti anyam tad varṇam ālabheta iti catadvārakam eva yojyam etena upacaya apacaya saṃghāta ādi api vyākhyātam sambandha grahaṇa ādi kāryam ca jāti pakṣaḥ eva sūpa pādam ānantya vyabhicāra ādi codyāna vakāśāt pratyakṣasya vyakti viṣayaka tve api na tatra śabda śaktyā avaśyaka tā yat punar abhyadhāyi pratyakṣa viṣaye padam vartate na ca pratyakṣasya sāmānya mātram viṣayaḥ iti parihṛtam tat vārtika kṛtā pratyakṣasya hicitra ātmakam vastu viṣayaḥ na ca tat tādṛśam kiṃcid śabdaḥ śaknoti bhāṣitum sāmānya aṃśānapa uddhṛtya padam sarvam pravartate 
NM_5,2.3.187–5,2.3.189	 iti na hi nānā dharma nicaya khacita citra ākāra vastu samarpaṇa nipuṇam ekaṃkim api padam upapadyate na ca tatra sambandha grahaṇam sukaram iti sāmānya aṃśa niṣṭham eva padam yuktam tasmāt jātiḥ eva śabda arthaḥ iti vyakteḥ śabda vācya tva siddhāntaḥ atra abhidhīyate na jātiḥ padasya arthaḥ bhavitum arhati padam hivibhakti antaḥ varṇa samudāyaḥ na prātipadika mātram tatra ca prakṛti pratyayau= itara itara anvitam artham abhidadhāte iti sthitam dvitīya ādiḥ ca vibhaktiḥ prātipadikāt uccarantī prātipadikā artha gata tvena sva artham ācaṣṭe yugapad ca tritayam vibhakti arthaḥ kārakam liṅgam saṅkhyā ca na ca etat tritayaṃprātipadikā arthe jātau= anvā iti na jātiḥ kārakam na ca jāteḥ strī puṃnapuṃsaka vibhāgaḥ na ca asyāḥ dvi tva ādi yogaḥ iti lakṣaṇayā na vyakti bodha nirvāhaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.190–5,2.3.192	 nanu ! vyakti lakṣaṇayā sarvam upapatsyate iti uktam na ca yuktam uktam sakṛt prayuktam padam aṃśena kaṃcid artham abhivadati tatas artha antaram lakṣayati tad gata tvena punar liṅga saṅkhī ā ādi abhidhatte iti na prātītikaḥ ayam kramaḥ sākṣāt tad anvita tvena kathyamānam tu asaṅgatam tat bhavet agninā siṃcet ityādi vidhi sannibham pratyaya arthasya sa dvāraka anvaya nirāsaḥ nanu ! puṃsī iva sāmānye kāraka tvam bhaviṣyati kakṣyā antaritam iti eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vaibhaktikaḥ anvayaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.193	 prātipadikā artha sāmānya gata tvena eva vibhaktyā sva arthaḥ abhidhīyate na lakṣita vyakti vṛtti tvena yatas abhidhāna vaiṣamyam syāt sa tu vibhakti arthaḥ jātau sākṣāt asaṃbhavat kakṣyā antaritaḥ bhaviṣyati na etat ātmanā ujñāna prayatna ādi yogi tvena kārakatva upapatteḥ jāteḥ tu sākṣāt na manāk api vyāpāra leśa saṃsparśaḥ iti svatas durlabham tasyāḥ kāraka tvam atas katham tatra vibhakti artha anvayaḥ saṃkhyā ādeḥ vyakti gata tvena eva loka anubhavaḥ yat anvitam ca saṅkhī ā ādi tad stha tvena na kathyate kathyate yat gata tvena na tat tena samanvitam na ca vyavahita vyakti pratītim manyate janaḥ na anyathā anupapattyā api krama saṃvedanam kvacid janayantīm ca paśyāmaḥ vyaktim jāti anuraṃjitām saṅkhyā ādi yoginīm ca iti sā vai dhatte padartha tām ākṛteḥ api śabda vācya tvam jāteḥ kārya anvayaḥ śyena citam iti abhyadhāyi yat tatra saṃsthāna nirdeśāt na jāteḥ kācid aṅga tā 
NM_5,2.3.194	 śyena vyaktyā ced sādṛśyam iṣṭakā kūṭasya na asti vyakti antareṇa vyabhicārāt na tarāma mūrtayā jātyā sādṛśyam ākāśenevatasya avakalpate iti spardhā udāharaṇa mātram etat jāti āśraya vyakteḥ pada vācya tva varṇanam anyeṣu tu prayogeṣu gām dehi iti evamādiṣu tadvataḥ artha kriyā yogāt tasya eva āhuḥ padārtha tām padam tadvantam eva artham āṃjasyena abhijalpati na ca vyavahitā buddhiḥ na ca bhārasya gauravam sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi vyavahāraḥ api mukhyayā vṛttyā upapādyamānaḥ san na anyathā yojayiṣyate 
NM_5,2.3.195–5,2.3.197	 tasmāt tadvān eva padārthaḥ jāti āśraya nirūpaṇam nanu ! kaḥ ayam tadvān nāma tat asya asti iti tadvān iti viśeṣaḥ eva sāmānyavān ucyate viśeṣa vācya tve ca ānantya vyabhicārau tad avasthau sāmānyam tu śabdena anucyamānam na upalakṣyamāṇam bhavati ubhaya abhidhāne ca śabdasya ati bhāraiti uktam ucyate na īdanta anirdiśyamānaḥ śābaleya ādi viśeṣaḥ tadvān na ca sarvaḥ trailokya vartī vyakti vrātaḥ tadvān kintu sāmānya āśrayaḥ kaścid anullikhita śābaleya ādi viśeṣaḥ tat vāniti ucyate sāmānya āśraya tvāt cana ānanti avyabhicārayoḥ tatra avasaraḥ vyakti vācaka tve api gaurava abhāvaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.198–5,2.3.199	 na ca viśeṣaṇam anabhidhāya viśeṣyam abhidadhāti śabdaḥ iti abhyupagacchāmaḥ yena enam ati bhāreṇa pīḍayemahi sāmānya āśraya mātre saṅketa grahaṇāt tāvat mātram vadataḥ śabdasya kaḥ ati bhāraḥ evam tadvataḥ na asvatantra tvāt ityādi dūṣaṇam parihṛtam bhavati kiṃca pratyakṣam na hi niṣkṛṣṭa jāti aṃśa pariveṣṭitam tad gocara pravṛttaḥ ca śabdaḥ tam kathayet katham 
NM_5,2.3.200	 tasmāt pratyakṣa viṣaye pravartamānam tad samāna viṣayam eva bhavitum arhati padam na sāmānya mātra niṣṭham sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ yugapad grahaṇa ākṣepaḥ yugapad nanu saṃvittiḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ pratyakṣe api na dṛṣṭā eva na ca yuṣmābhiḥ iṣyate kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ hi tat hiyoḥ bhavatām mate tasmāt viśeṣaṇe jātau pūrvam indriya jā matiḥ padāt api tad āyatta sambandha jñapti apekṣiṇaḥ tatra eva buddhiḥ iti eva na vyakteḥ api vācya tā pratyakṣasya iva śabdasya api viśiṣṭa niṣṭha tvam 
NM_5,2.3.201	 ucyate pratyakṣe tāvat dvayoḥ api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ indriya viṣaya tvam sāmānye api saṃyukta samavāyāt indriyam pravartamānam viśeṣaṇavat viśeṣyam api viṣayīkaroti na hi sāmānyam pratyakṣam viśeṣaḥ anumeyā eti vyavahāraḥ evam guṇa mātra grāhiṇī indriye guṇinaḥ anumeya tvaṃsyāt na ca evam asti tasmāt viśeṣya paryantam pratyakṣam tathā padam api tad tulya viṣayam na tu sāmānya mātra niṣṭham iti yuktam vyakti vācaka tve ānantyādi parihāraḥ 
NM_5,2.3.202–5,2.3.203	 yat tu sāmānya aṃśānapa uddhṛtya padam sarvam pravartate iti tat kevala vyakti abhidhāne sati ānantya vyabhicāra bhayāt ucyate tadvat abhidhāne tu tat bhayam na asti iti na śuddha jāti abhidhāyitayā śabdaḥ saṃkocanīyaḥ śabda pratyakṣayoḥ vailakṣaṇya upapādanam nanu ! na sarva ātmanā pratyakṣa tulya viṣayaḥ śabdaḥ pratipatti sāmya prasaṅgāt na ca śabdāt indriyāt ca tulye pratipattī bhavataḥ tat uktam 
NM_5,2.3.204–5,2.3.207	 anyathā eva agni sambandhāt dāham dagdhaḥ abhimanyate pra sam ityādi ucyate pūrvam eva etat parihṛtam sakala viśeṣa grahaṇa agrahaṇābhyāṃ pratipatti viśeṣa siddheḥ dharmī abhiprāyeṇa ca saṃplavasya ukta tvāt na etāvatā sāmānya mātre niṣṭhaḥ śabdaḥ bhavati śabdasya jāti mātra vācaka tva anupapattiḥ api ca niṣkṛṣṭa sāmānya aṃśa vacana tve padasya iṣyamāṇe go śabdāt go tva śabdāt ca tulye pratipattī syātām gauḥ śuklaḥ itivat ca go tvam śuklaṃ iti buddhiḥ syāt cāturvarṇya ādi vat ca sva artham eva go śabdāt bhāva pratyayaḥtva tala ādiḥ syāt atha manyethāḥ ākṣipta vyaktikām jātim go śabdaḥ vakti bhāva pratyaya antaḥ tu niṣkṛṣṭa svarūpa mātra niṣṭhām iti tad anupapannam anākṣipta vyaktikāyāḥ jāteḥ kadācid api adarśanāt gaḥ go tva padayoḥ vailakṣaṇyam 
NM_5,2.3.208	 atha go śabda śravaṇa velāyām vyakti saṃsparśavatī jātiḥ avagamyate bhāva pratyaya ante tu go śabde śrute tat śūnyā asau pratīyate iti yadyavaṃāgataḥ asi madīyam panthānam āśrayavatī ced jātiḥ ucyate śabdena jāti āśrayaḥ uktaḥ eva bhavati na anyathā hi sa āśrayavatī uktā syāt tad āśraya parihāreṇa āśrayi sāmānya mātra vivakṣāyām tu atala ādayaḥ prayujyante tathā ca āhuḥ yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāt dravye śabda niveśaḥ tad abhidhāne tu atala ādayaḥ iti guṇasya hi bhāvāt dravye śabda niveśaḥ iti tadvat vācya tva pakṣa sākṣīṇi akṣarāṇi sāmānādhikaraṇyam catatra eva upapadyate iti uktam etat tasmāt yathā vidhyanta paryantaḥ vākya vyāpāraḥ iṣyate tathā eva vyakti paryantaḥ śabda vyāpāraḥ iṣyatām 
NM_5,2.3.209	 anuparata vyāpāre śabde tad avagamāt anvita abhidhāna vāde vyakti bodha āvaśyaka tāyena anvita abhidhānam ca padānām abhyupeyate sutarām tena vaktavyā vyakti antā padataḥ matiḥ na hi vyakti anapekṣāṇām jātīnām itaretaram anvayaḥ ananvitānām ca na abhidhānam iti sthitiḥ gaṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ ityādau yathā sāmīpya lakṣaṇā na evam gauḥ śuklaḥ iti ādau gamyate vyakti lakṣaṇā prayoga pratipattibhyām vṛddhebhyaḥ adhyavasīyate tasmāt gavā ādi śabdānām tat vā anarthaḥ iti sthitam jāti ākṛti vyaktiṣu śaktivāda upasaṃhāraḥ 
NM_5,2.3.210	 tat idam uktam sūtra kṛtā vyākti a ākṛti jātayaḥ tu padārthaḥ iti tuśabdaḥ viśeṣaṇa arthaḥ kim viśeṣyate guṇa pradhāna bhāvasya aniyamena śabda artha tvam sthite api tadvataḥ vācya tve kvacid prayoge jāteḥ prādhānyam vyakteḥ aṅga bhāvaḥ yathā gauḥ na padā spraṣṭavyāḥ iti sarva gavīṣu pratiṣedhaḥ avagamyate kvacid vyakteḥ prādhānyam jāteḥ aṅga bhāvaḥ yathā āgām muṃca gām badhānaḥ iti niyatām kāṃcivt yaktim uddiśya prayujyate kyacid ākṛteḥ prādhānyam vyakteḥ aṅga bhāvaḥ jātiḥ na asti eva yathā piṣṭa mayyaḥ gāvaḥ kriyantām iti sanniveśa cikīrṣayā prayogaḥ iti sarva sarva gata tve api jāteḥ na mṛda gava ādau viśiṣṭā vṛttiḥ iti uktam tat evam gavāśvādi śabdānām tāvat tat vā anarthaḥ iti siddham jāti rahita padārtha sthale gati pradarśanam yeṣām artheṣu sāmānyam na saṃbhavati taiḥ punar ucyate kevalāḥ vyaktiḥ ākāśa ādi padaiḥ iva evam ḍittha ādi śabdānām saṃjñā tva vidita ātmanām abhidheyasya sāmānya śūnya tvāt vyakti vācitā 
NM_5,2.3.211–5,2.3.212	 eva hi dravya śabdāḥ iti ucyante ye punar kalpita aneka bheda vṛttim pracakṣate vācyam tatra api sāmānyam atīva grāhikāḥ tu te na hi ḍittha tva sāmānyam dṛśyate gagana tva vat kalpanāyāḥ tu naḥ bhūmiḥ kācid asti vipaścitām guṇa vāci śabdeṣu viśeṣaḥ guṇa śabdāḥ tu kecid sva jāti avacchinnam guṇam abhidhāya tāvatī eva viramanti kecid tu guṇam abhidhāya dravyam api ākṣipanti tad sāmāna adhikaraṇya prayoga darśanāt guṇa eka niyatāḥ tāvat gandha rūpa rasa ādayaḥ gandha tva ādi vyavacchinna gandha ādi guṇa vācinaḥ teṣām na dravya paryantā vṛttiḥ kvacana dṛśyate na gandhaḥ padmam iti asti sāmānādhikaraṇya dhīḥ 
NM_5,2.3.213–5,2.3.214	 na hi evam vaktāraḥ bhavanti candanam gandhaḥ āmram rasaḥ iti guṇam śukla ādi śabdāḥ tu kathayantaḥ tad āśrayam dravyam api ākṣipanti eva śukloṃ aśuḥ iti darśanāt śukla ādayaḥ api śabdāḥ guṇa pada upabandha saṃkocita śaktayaḥ bhāva pratyaya anta pada vat guṇa mātra abhidhānaḥ eva paryavasyanti śuklaḥ guṇaḥ aśvaḥ śauklyam aśvaḥ iti sāmānādhikaṇya prayoga adarśanāt kriyā vāci śabdānām śakti prakāraḥ 
NM_5,2.3.215–5,2.3.216	 kriyā śabdāḥ ca dvividhāḥ bhavanti kecid kartari karmaṇi karaṇe vā aprayujyante kecid bhāva mātra vacanāḥ eva kartṛ ādi vācinaḥ tāvat nimittī kṛtya kāṃcana kriyām tad yogi dravye vartante pācaka ādayaḥ yatra api tad kriyā yogaḥ tadānīm na upalabhyate tatra api yopyatām dṛṣṭavā śabdam tad jñāḥ prayuṃjate na hi pācakaḥ lāvakaḥ iti pravṛtta kriyaḥ eva ucyate anyadā api tathā tathā vyavahārāt anye pūrva aparībhūta svabhāva parihārataḥ siddha rūpa tayā prāhuḥ śabdāḥ pāka ādayaḥ kriyām 
NM_5,2.3.217–5,2.3.218	 tat uktam kṛt abhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravya vat bhavati kriyāvat ca iti na ca ekāntena parihṛta sādhyamāna avasthā eva taiḥ kriyā ucyate yatas āhakriyā vat ca iti pravṛtti nimitta abhidheyayoḥ bhedaḥ anyat pravṛttau śabdasya nimittam avagamyate abhidheyam tu tasya anyat iti ayam prathamaḥ kramaḥ pācaka ādi bśa dānām hi pravṛttau nimittam kriyā abhidheya astu kartṛ a ādayaḥ kvacid punar yat eva asya syāt pravṛtti nibandhanam tasya eva vācya tā bhāva pratyaya anta padeṣu iva iti evam leśataḥ tāvat nāmnām vṛttiḥ udāhṛtā ākhyātānām tu vācyaḥ arthaḥ purastāt carcayiṣyate upasarga ādīnām vācya artha nirṇayaḥ upasarga anipātānām nāmnām iva vibhāgataḥ prayoga pratipattibhyām aneka arthaḥ avagamyate 
NM_5,2.3.219–5,2.3.221	 upasargāḥ prācuryeṇa kriyā yoge vartante upasargāḥ kriyā yoge iti smāraṇāt kecid tu nāmabhiḥ abhisambadhyate yathā īṣat artha vācinaḥ āpiṅgaḥ iti ādayaḥ anye kriyā garbha tayā nāmnā sambadhyante yathā pragatam vayaḥyasya saḥ pravayāḥ iti anye dhātoḥ vicitra artha tām āpādayantaḥ tad viśeśaṇa tvena sambadhyante yathā uktam upasarga vaśāt dhātuḥ artha antara vilāsa kṛt prahāra āhāra saṃhāra vihāra parihāra vat upasargāṇām kvacid viruddha artha abhidhāyi tvam 
NM_5,2.3.222–5,2.3.224	 nanu ca ! kvacid upasargaḥ dhātu artham eva bādhamānaḥ dṛśyate yathāprasthitaḥ iti gati nivṛtti vācī dhātuḥ pravṛtta gati vacana tām nītaḥ praśabdena na ca īdṛśam viśeṣaṇam bhavitum arhati yena sva artha avirodhena viśeṣaḥ upajanyate viśeṣaṇam tat eva iṣṭam na tu yat sva artha nāśanam iti na eṣa doṣaḥ artha antara abhidhāna sāmarthya āpādanam eva dhātoḥ vidadhat upasargaḥ viśeṣaṇam bhavitum arhati aneka artha āmidhāna śaktiḥ ca dhātuḥ upasargeṇa niyate arthe avasthāpyate iti tasya tad viśeṣaṇa tā upasargāṇām vācaka tvam uta dyotaka tvam upasargāḥ kimarthasya vācakāḥ dyotakāḥ iti prakṛta anupayogi tvāt iha etat na vicāryate anvaya vyatirekābhyām tad arthaḥ hi avadhāryate tad āgame tad pratīteḥ tad abhāve tad agrahāt te tu kim vācakāssantaḥ tat avagatim upadadhati kim vā dyotakāḥ iti kim anena 
NM_5,2.3.225	 evam samuccaya ādi vācinām ca ādinipātānām vṛkṣam prati dyotate iti karma pravacanīyānām ca arthaḥ prayoga pratipattibhyām avadhāraṇīyaḥ iti alaṃprasaṅgena pada śakti vicāra upasaṃhāraḥayam asya padasya arthaḥ iti kim cintiteta vā yaḥ arthaḥ pratīyate yasmāt sa tasya arthaḥ iti sthitiḥ spaṣṭām api tu ye buddhim nirūpayitum akṣamāḥ tān bodhayitum asmābhiḥ diś mātram upadarśitam iti pramāṇa tva samartha nāya śabdasya kiṃcid vayam uktavantaḥ pada abhidheya artha nirūpaṇam tuśāstra antare vistarataḥ praṇītam tad kṣodanena na naḥ prayojanam atidrādhīyasī sā hi bhūḥanyām eva diśam parīkṣitum ataḥ asmābhiḥ gṛhītaḥ kṣaṇaḥ jāti ādi artha samarthanena kathitā bāhya artha saṃsparśitā śabdānām iyatā eva nanu avasare amuṣmin kṛtārthāḥ vayam vākya artha vicāra upakṣepaḥ evam padārthe nirṇīte vākya arthaḥ cintyate adhunā tatra vipratipattiḥ ca bahu rūpāḥ vipaścitām 
NM_5,2.3.226–5,2.3.229	 kecid ācakṣate bāhyasya vākya arthasya asaṃbhavāt padārtha saṃsarga nirbhāsaṃjñānam eva vākya arthaḥ iti anye tu vāstavaḥ padārthānām paraspara saṃsargaḥ bāhyaḥ eva vākya artha eti āhuḥ anya vyavacchedaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti apare śukla ādi pada antara uccāraṇa īkṛṣṇa ādi nivṛtteḥ avagamāt apare saṃgirante saṃsargasya durapahnava tvāt tasya ca guṇa pradhāna bhāva garbha tvāt guṇībhūta kāraka nikara nirvartyā pradhāna bhūtā kriyā vākya arthaḥ iti 
NM_5,2.3.230–5,2.3.231	 anye manyante bhāvya niṣṭhaḥ puruṣa vyāpāraḥ karoti arthaḥ bhāvanā śabda vācyaḥ vākya arthaḥ liṅā ādi śabda vyāpāra vācyaḥ tu śabda bhāvana ākhyaḥ puruṣasya artha bhāvanā anuṣṭhāne pravartakaḥ sa vidhiḥ ucyate iti anye bruvate dvaya abhidhāne liḍā ādeḥ pratyayasya bhāra gauravat vidhiḥ eva vākya arthaḥ saḥ eva anuṣṭheyaḥ pravartakaḥ ca iti 
NM_5,2.3.232–5,2.3.234	 tatra api dvayī vimatiḥ kaiścid preṣaṇa ātmaka tvam śabdasya abhyupagatam liḍa ādi śabdebhyaḥ tathā tad avagamāt kārya antara anavagamāt bhāva artha mātra kārya tva pakṣasya ca ati daurbalyāt vidhiḥ eva anuṣṭheyaḥ iti arthāt tasya kāryatvam anyaiḥ tu kāryatvena niyoga pratīteḥ arthāt tasya preraka tvam iti saṃśritam kāryam avagatam sva siddhaye puruṣam niyuṅkte mama idam kāryam iti avagate hitat siddhaye puruṣaḥ pravartate iti apare punar abhinavam vākya artham udyogam nāma varṇayāṃbabhūvuḥ iti aneka śākhā vipratipattiḥ tat atra kim tattvam iti vākya arthasya abāhya tvam jñānasya eva vākya artha tvam iti bauddha pakṣaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.235	 atra eke tāvat āhuḥ vākya arthaḥ nāma pāramārthikaḥ bahis na asti eva sa hi padārthebhyaḥ vyatiriktaḥ vā syāt avyatiriktaḥ vā na vyatiriktaḥ bheda anupalambhāt gauḥ śuklāḥ ānīyatām iti atra pada grāme jāti guṇa kriyā ādi padārtha vyatirekeṇa kaḥ asau vākya arthaḥ sa na darśayitum śakyate avyatireke tu padārthāḥ eva vākya arthaḥ pratyekam vā syāt sāmastyenavā na pratyekam tathā anavagamāt na hi gauḥ iti padārthaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ bhavati 
NM_5,2.3.236	 sāmastyam tu na teṣām asti tat hi sat tayā bhavet pratītyā vā sattayāna sāmastyam aśeṣa padārtha rāśeḥ asti iti na niyataḥ kaścana vākya arthaḥ avadhāryate pratītyā tu sāmastyam adhaṭamānam yugapad bhāvi tvena jñānānām eka padārtha pratīti samaye padārtha antara pratīti asaṃbhavāt padārtha pratiti upāyāḥ ca varṇāḥ taapinaḥ yugapad bhāvinaḥ kutas pratīti kṛtam sāmastyam 
NM_5,2.3.237	 api ca padārtha samudāyaḥ kim itaretara saṃsṣṭaḥ vākya arthaḥ anyathāvā na tāvat anyathā gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ hastī iti evam ādau= adarśanāt saṃsargaḥ tu durupapādaḥ sa hi apekṣā gataḥ bhavati na ca arthaḥ artha antaram ākāṅkṣati acetana tvāt buddhīnām api kṣaṇika tvāt anyonyam na ākāṅkṣāḥ na ca tad kṛtaḥ sambandhaḥ padārtha saṃsargasya api vākya artha tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.238–5,2.3.240	 atas eva na saṃsargaḥ vākya arthaḥ na hi asau arthānām jñānānām vāyatha ukta nītyā avakalpate vyavacchedaḥ api evam eva nirākāryaḥ saḥ api hi na jñānānām upapadyate tat uktam yadi dhriyeta go buddhiḥ śukla buddhi janikṣaṇe tatas anyābhyaḥ nivarteta saṃsṛjyeta athavā tayā iti na ca apekṣāyām satyām api sambandhaḥ kaścid upalabhyate yathā uktam apekṣaṇe api sambandhaḥ na eva kaścid pratīyate kārya kāraṇa saṃyoga samavāya ādi lakṣaṇaḥ eka artha vṛtti prāyaḥ tu sambandhaḥ ati prasajyate iti 
NM_5,2.3.241–5,2.3.242	 arthānām tu kacid api bhavan sambandhaḥ śabdaiḥ anabhidhīyamāna tvātasat kalpaḥ eva na ca bheda saṃsargayoḥ vācakam kiṃcid padam asti aśravaṇāt asati ca tad vācini pade na tayoḥ padārtha tvam apadārthasya ca navākya artha tvam śrute api tad vācini pade suta rām asaṅgatiḥ gauḥ śuklaḥ ānīyatāṃsaṃsargaḥ iti kaḥ arthaḥ tasmāt bāhyasya vākya arthasya sarva prakāram asaṃbhavāt padārtha sarga nirbhāsam jñāna gātram vākya arthaḥ tena eva loka vyavahāraḥ iti bāhya arthasya eva vākya artha tvam jñānasya tattva nirāsaḥ ca 
NM_5,2.3.243–5,2.3.244	 tat idam anupapannam bāhya arthasya anantaram eva vistareṇa prasādhita tvāt na ca saṃsarga nirbhāsam jñānam vākya arthaḥ bhavitum arhati sthāpayitvā hi bāhyam artham vākya artha cintām upakra ntovantaḥ vayam atas kaḥ avasaraḥ vijñāna māṃtra vākya artha tva varṇanasya padārtha vākya arthayoḥ vailakṣaṇyam na ca padārtha vyatiriktaḥ na asti vākya arthaḥ idam tāvat bhavān pṛṣṭaḥ vyācaṣṭām kim gauḥ iti pada ādyādṛśī pratipattiḥ tādṛśī eva gauḥ śuklaānīyatām iti vākyāt uta bhinne ete pratipattī iti 
NM_5,2.3.245–5,2.3.246	 tatra tulya tvam tāvat pratipattyoḥ anubhava viruddham vailakṣaṇye tu pratītyoḥ vaṣaya vailakṣaṇyam api balāt upanatam asati viṣaya bhede pratīti bheda anupapatteḥ yaḥ ca tat atiriktaḥ viṣayaḥ sa vākya arthaḥ evam kevala guṇa kriyā pada uccāraṇe api yojanīyam tat uktam yadādhikyam sa vākya arthaḥ iti saṃsargaḥ api padānām na na pratīyate na hi gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ hastī iiti asaṃsṛṣṭa padārtha pratīti vat gauḥ śuklaḥ ānīyatām iti pratītiḥ yathā ca saṃsargaḥ pratīyate yaḥ ca prati iti upāyaḥ tat sarvam vistarataḥ nirṇeṣyate tasmāt bāhyaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ vyavacchedasya vākya artha tva nirākaraṇam 
NM_5,2.3.247–5,2.3.248	 bāhyaḥ eva bhavat na vyavacchedaḥ vākya arthaḥ vidhi rūpa tvena avagamāt saṃsargam antareṇa ca anya vyavacchedasya api durupapāda tvāt na hi śukla padena asaṃsṛṣṭaḥ go padārtha kṛṣṇa ādibhyaḥ vyāvṛttaḥ iti avagamyate go śabdāt sarva gavīṣu buddhiḥ upasarpantī pada janitā śukla pada sannidhānāt anyatas kṛṣṇa ādeḥ apasarpati iti vyavacchedaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti ced mā evam tad sambandha avagama pūrvaka tvāt tad itara vyāvṛtteḥ tad sambandha avabodhena eva siddhe vākyasya arthavat tve pāścātyaḥ kṛṣṇa ādi vyavaccheda avagamaḥ yadi bhavati bhavatu kāmam na tu asau vākya arthaḥ iti kriyāyāḥ vākya artha tva pakṣaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.249–5,2.3.250	 tat evam vidhi rūpe bāhye ca śabda arthe avasthite sati kriyām eva kecid vākya artham varṇayanti ayameṣām āśayaḥ padārthāḥ kila vākya artha bhāvam āyānti saṃhatāḥ apekṣa anuguṇa anyonya vyatiṣaṅga viśeṣataḥ na ca guṇa pradhāna bhāvam antareṇa saṃsargaḥ padārthānām avakalpate naca ākhyāta rahitam vākyam kiṃcad prayoga yogyam anuccārite tasmin ākāṅkṣāyāḥ anivṛtteḥ śrotra ākāṅkṣā nivṛttaye ca vākyānām loke prayogaḥ loka vat ca vedāt api arthaḥ avasīyate ākhyātāt ca pūrva aparībhūtaḥ sādhya rūpaḥ arthaḥ avagamyate na siddha rūpaḥ siddha sādhya samuccāraṇe kasya kiṃtantra tā iti cintāyām sādhya siddhaye siddham upāttam iti pratīyate sādhyam ca sādhyamāna tvāt pradhānam avagamyate tasmāt tat eva vākya arthaḥ kriyātaḥ na aparam ca yat sarveṣām kriyā pradhānye nidarśanāni 
NM_5,2.3.251	 kriyā hi pratīyamānā sva niṣpattaye sādhanāni ākṣipati taiḥ ca yogyaiḥ saṃbadhyate tāni ca kānicid pada antara upāttāni bhavanti kānicid vākya antara upanītāni kānicid prakaraṇa antara pāṭha labhyāni kānicid ārāt upakārakāṇi kānicid sannipatya upakārakāṇi kānicid antikā upanipatitāni api yogya tā virahāt pariharati kānicid ati dūra vartīni api yogyāni sva saṃpatti artham āharati iti evam dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa upakāraka aneka kāraka kalāpa saṃpādyamāna svarūpā kriyā eva vākya arthaḥ yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt adhīyīta iti coditaḥ kriyām sādhya tayā vetti tām ca lokaḥ anutiṣṭhati katuḥ api kriyā śeṣa tvam eva 
NM_5,2.3.252	 adhikāri padam api kriyā apekṣita kartṛ samarpaṇena tad upayogitām eva avalambate asyām kriyāyām ayam kartā anena iyam kriyā saṃpadyate iti tatra cana kriyā sva prādhānyam ujjhati na hi kriyā kartṛ arthāḥ kartā tu kriyā arthaḥ sa hi tām nirvartayan= upalabhyate śabdaḥ api tathā eva upadiśati eṣaḥ idaṃkuryāt iti kartuḥ aprādhānye api pravṛtti upapattiḥ 
NM_5,2.3.253	 kim atha punar asau kriyām anutiṣṭhati iti ced śabda prāmāṇyāt eva iti brūmaḥ śabdena hi coditaḥ tvayā idam kartavyam iti sa ced niyukta ūna anutiṣṭhan codanām atikrāmet śāstra pratyayāt ca kriyām anutiṣṭhati virata phala abhilāṣaḥ karma saṃskārāt eva paripakva kaṣāyaḥ stoka stoka prapaṃca pravilāpana dvāreṇa uttama adhikāram ārūḍhaḥ tatas eva jñāta āsu ādaḥ tam eva parama puruṣa artham āsādayati iti dīrghā sā kathā tiṣṭhatu ! kim anayā sarvathā kriyā prādhānyāt sā eva vākya arthaḥ iti tat uktam dravya guṇa saṃskāra iṣu bādariḥ iti 
NM_5,2.3.254–5,2.3.255	 etat uktam bhavati dravya ādīnām eva kriyām prati śeṣa tvam anugamyate nakriyāyāḥ anya śeṣa tvam iti phalasya eva vākya artha tvam yuktam atra ucyate kutas idam kriyāyāḥ prādhānyam upeyate vastu vṛttena vā śabda pratyaya mahimnā vā phalasya vastutas tāvat prādhānyam avagamyate na sa cetāḥ kriyām kāṃcid anutiṣṭhati niṣphalām vedāt guru niyogāt vā śāsanāt vā mahībhujaḥ na vai phalam apaśyantaḥ kriyām vidadhate janāḥ bālaḥ māṇavakaḥ api eṣaḥ capeṭā mātra hānaye modaka ādi āptaye vā api karoti guru śāsanam kriyāyām śabda prādhānyasya api asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.256–5,2.3.258	 atha ucyate nava stutaḥ prādhānyam iha āśrīyate api tu śabdataḥ śabda pramāṇakāḥ vayam yat śabdaḥ āha tat eva asmākam pramāṇam tat yathā rāja puruṣaḥ iti vastu vṛtte rājā jagatām īśitā pradhānam puruṣaḥ tapasvī tad icchā anuvartanena jīvati śabdaḥ tu puruṣa prādhānyam ācaṣṭe uttara padārtha pradhāna tvāt tatpuruṣasya iti evam iha api yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt iti kriyām prādhānyena upadiśati śabdaḥ svarga kāmaḥ iti api kriyām prati kartuḥ upadeśaḥ vastu vṛttena tu karmaṇi kriyamāṇe karma svābhāvyāta phalam ced bhavati bhavatu tat ! puruṣaḥ api prīyatām nāma phalena na tu śabdaḥ phala upadeśa niṣṭha āha ca tasmin= tu kṛte svayam eva tat bhavati iti svayam eva iti kaḥ arthaḥ na śabdaḥ phala pāratantryam kriyāyāḥ pratipādayati iti tat etat ayuktam evam varṇyamāne svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti svarga kāma padasya anvayaḥ durupapādaḥ phalasya vākya artha tve ākṣepaḥ nanu ! kartṛ padam etat kartā ca kriyā arthaḥ na kartṛ arthā kriyā iti uktam 
NM_5,2.3.259	 na kartṛ padam svarga kāmaḥ iti kintu adhikāri padam etat na hi jātyā evakaścid svarga kāmaḥ nāma kutracid puruṣaḥ avagamyate yaḥ atra kartṛ tvena niyujyeta svarge kāmaḥ yasya asau svarga kāmaḥ svargam vā kāmayati svarga kāmaḥ ubhayathā api svarga kāmanā viśiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ tasmāt padāt avagamyate tat atra kāmyamānaḥ svargaḥ katham yāga kriyayā saṃbadhyate dṛṣṭena adṛṣṭenavā upakāreṇa yadi hi candanam svargaḥ ṣoḍaśa varṣa deśīyāḥ aṅganāḥ svargaḥ iti candana aṅganā ādi dravya sāmāna ādi karaṇya prayogāt dravya vacanaḥ svarga śabdaḥ tadā dravyāṇām karma saṃyoge guṇa tvena abhisaṃbandhaḥ iti dadhi ādi vat sādhana tvena svarge upakaroti kriyāyāḥ kāmanā api dravya āharaṇa aṅga tvāt upakāriṇī yat tayā dravyam ānetum yatataḥ iti dṛṣṭa upakāri tvam phalasya vākya artha tva samarthanam svarga padārthaḥ ca 
NM_5,2.3.260–5,2.3.261	 tat ca etat asāram svarga śabdasya dravya vāci tva abhāvāt prīti vacanohi eṣa svarga śabdaḥ na dravya vacanaḥ tat eva candanam śīta ātureṇa agrīṣma upahatenavā na svargaḥ iti vyapadiśyate sā eva aṅganā viratāyām surata tṛṣi na svargaḥ iti ucyate tat evam eṣa svarga śabdaḥ prītim na vyabhicarati dravyam tuvi abhicarati evam adravya tvāt svargasya na kriyā aṅga tvam atha api niratiśaya sukha pratīti anyathā anupapattitaḥ parikalpitaḥ kanaka giri śikhara ādiḥ deśaḥ svargaḥ sutarām tasya na kriyā sādhana tvam avakalpate dadhi ādi vat upādātum aśakya tvāt 
NM_5,2.3.262	 atha api adṛṣṭena eva dvāreṇa samudram manasā dhyāyete iti vat svarga kāmanā tatra upakāriṇī tat api kliṣṭa kalpanā mātram prītiḥ hi niratiśaya āsvargaḥ prīteḥ ca ananya artha tvam yuktam prīti artham anyat na anyārthā prītiḥ tasmāt na yāgāya svargaḥ api tu svargāya yāgaḥ ittham ca kriyā sādhana anupadeśāt na kartṛ samarpaka tvena svarga kāma padam samanveti svarga kāma ādi padānām anvaya kramaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.263–5,2.3.265	 katham tarhi asya anvayaḥ adhikāri vāci tvena brūmaḥ kaḥ ayam adhikārī nāma karmaṇaḥ svāmī īsvara vacanaḥ hi adhikṛta śabdaḥ nanu kartā eva karmaṇaḥ svāmī na anyaḥ mā evam svāmī san kartā nakartā san svāmī iti nanu kriyā kāraka sambandhavya tiriktaḥ kaḥ anyaḥ karmaṇaḥ puruṣasya casambandhaḥ ucyate mama idam kartavyam aham atra svāmī iti sva svāmi bhāvam avagatya pāścātyaḥ kriyā kāraka sambandhaḥ avagamyate adhikāriṇaḥ kartuḥ ca viśeṣaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.266	 nanu tvayā api kriyā kāraka sambandhau na apahnūyate eva jāti vādinā iva vyakti pratītiḥ sa tu pāścātyaḥ inyatra kim pramāṇam uktam atra anupādeya viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭasya puṃsaḥ nirdeśāt iti kāraka tva anuguṇa viśeṣaṇa yoginaḥ hi asya kartṛ tayā yogyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ tad viparyaye tu adhikāri tvena iti tasmāt adhikṛtasya kartṛ tvam na kartuḥ adhikāraḥ 
NM_5,2.3.267	 ittham ca svarga kāmasya adhikṛta tvam nirvahati yadi hi tat karma svarga ayasyāt svargaḥ me bhogyaḥ bhavet katham aham svargam prāpnuyām iti evam sādhya tvena svargam icchan svarga kāmaḥ iti ucyate yadi ca na svarga sādhanam tat karma tad viruddham eva idam āpatati svargam kāmayate yāgam karoti iti anyat icchati anyat karoti iti hi syāt atas karmaṇaḥ kāmyamāna sādhana tām apratipadyamānaḥ svarga kāmaḥ tatra na eva adhikriyate na ca anadhikriyamāṇaḥ tatra saṃbadhyate 
NM_5,2.3.268	 tat evam adhikṛta tvena svarga kāmasya karmaṇi saṃbandhāt svarga yāgayoḥ ca sādhya sādhana bhāva avagamam antareṇa tasya adhikāra nirvāha asaṃbhavāt avaśyaṃkriyāyāḥ sādhana tvam svargasya ca sādhya tvam abhyupagantavyam atas ca kriyāyāḥ phalam prati guṇa bhāvāt na prādhānyam aprādhānyāt ca na vākya artha tvam tat uktam karmaṇi api jaiminiḥ phala artha tvāt iti kriyāyāḥ api phala śeṣa tvam eva 
NM_5,2.3.269–5,2.3.270	 kā ca iyam kriyā vākya arthaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ eṣa yāga ādiḥ bhāva arthem dhātuvācyaḥ uta pratyaya arthaḥ kaścid tad atiriktaḥ iti tatra bhāva arthasya kāmyamāna sādhana tvāt aprādhānyam uktam eva pratyaya arthe api kāmya māna bhāva artha gata sādhana bhāva aparityāga ena eva pratīyamānaḥ vākya artha tām eti na anyathā iti sa ca ayam pareṣām api pakṣaḥ tasmāt na kriyā mātra paryavasāyī vākya arthaḥ iti siddham phalasya api vākya artha tva asaṃbhavaḥ puruṣasya vākya artha tva vimarśaḥ ca 
NM_5,2.3.271	 kim idānīm phalasya eva vākya artha tvam pracakṣmahe tat hi pradhānam sādhyam etad arthaḥ hi akhilaḥ śramaḥ etat api na asti kriyā arthaḥ eva tāvat vākya artha tvaṃkatham utsṛṣṭam aprādhānyāt iti ced phale api samānam phalam api puruṣa artha tvāt apradhānam na hi svargaḥ svatantraḥ eva sattām labhatām itiyatate puruṣaḥ kintu sva upabhogya tayā eva sarvam abhilaṣati iti atas tasya api tad artha tvāt na prādhānyam āha ca phalam ca puruṣa artha tvāt iti 
NM_5,2.3.272–5,2.3.274	 hanta ! tarhi puruṣaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ bhavatu sa hi ananya niṣṭhaḥ svatantra tvāt ucyate puruṣaḥ api audumbarī saṃbhāra ādiṣu viniyujyate eva yajamāna saṃmitā audumbarī bhavati iti tasya api tad artha tvam uktam capuruṣaḥ ca karma artha tvāt iti yadi evam saṃkaṭe patitāḥ smaḥ na vidmaḥ kim vidadhmahe kriyā hiphala arthāḥ phalam ca puruṣaḥ ca kriyā arthaḥ iti parivartamāne cakre kasya prādhānyaṃśiṣmaḥ kasya vākya artha tvam puruṣasya api vākyartha tva asaṃbhavaḥ ucyate puruṣaḥ tāvat na vākya arthaḥ ākhyāta vācyatvaḥ eva tasyavivadante kā kathā vākya artha tvasya 
NM_5,2.3.275	 nanu kartari lakāraḥ iti smaraṇāt katham na ākhyāta vācyaḥ kartā kaḥ ayam lakāraḥ nāma sa hi vartamāne laṣ iti vidhāya kartari śabh yuṣmadi madhyamaḥ asmadi uttamaḥ śeṣe prathamaḥ tiptasjhi iti bahuṣu bahuvacanam dvi ekayoḥ dvivacana eka vacane iti vākya antaraiḥ vibhajya vivṛtaḥ tat etāni kāraka saṃkhyā vibhakti vidhāyīni sūtrāṇi eka vākyatayā avyākhyeyāni eka artha viṣaya tvāt ekaḥ hi pacati ityādiḥ śabdaḥtaiḥ vyākriyate tat evam eṣa vākya arthaḥ bhavati kartu bahutve bahuvacanam jhi iti sā iyam kartṛ saṃkhyā aakhyāta vācyā bhavati na kartā iti kutas tasya vākya artha tvam alam ca anayā śāstra antara garbhayā drādhīyasyā kathayā puruṣaḥ tau= anna vākya arthaḥ bhāvanāyāḥ vākya artha tva pakṣaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.276	 phalam api na vākya arthaḥ siddha asiddha vikalpa anupapatteḥ siddhasyatāvat phalasya abhidhānam eva na asti sādhyamāna tvena nirdeśāt sādhyamāna tva pakṣe tu sākṣāt tad siddhi vedanāt vyāpāraḥ eva tad niṣṭhaḥ tat hi vākya arthaḥ ucyatām atas eva hi vākya artham bhāvanām pratijānate yathocita phala āḍhyām ca traya sambandha bandhurām bhāvanā svarūpa vivaraṇam 
NM_5,2.3.277	 kevam bhāvanā nāma bhāvya niṣṭhaḥ bhāvaka vyāpāraḥ bhāvanā bhāvyam hi svarga ādi phalam sādhyamāna tvāt sādhya tvam ca asya bhavana kriyā kartṛ tvāt bhavana kriyāyām ca kartṛ tvam utpatti dharmakasya vastunaḥ dṛṣṭam na nityam bhūtasya na api nityam abhūtasya yathā aaha nityam na bhavanam yasya yasya vā nitya bhūta tā na tasya kriyamāṇa tvam kha puṣpa ākāśayoḥ ivaḥ iti 
NM_5,2.3.278	 svarga ādiḥ ca kāmya rūpaḥ arthaḥ kha tad puṣpābhyām vilakṣaṇaḥ iti bhāvyobhavati tad niṣṭhaḥ tad utpādakaḥ ca puruṣa vyāpāraḥ yaḥ sa bhāvanā sā ṇi antenabhavatinā ucyate prakṛti arthasya bhavateḥ kartā yaḥ svarga ādiḥ saḥ eva ṇi antasyatasya karma tām pratipadyate kartā tu asya prayojakaḥ puruṣaḥ ṇeḥ ca arthaḥ prayojaka vyāpāraḥ puruṣaḥ hi bhavantam svarga ādim artham sva vyāpāreṇa bhāvayati saṃpādayati sa tad saṃpādakaḥ vyāpāraḥ bhāvanā iti ucyate bhāvanā na kriyā rūpā 
NM_5,2.3.279–5,2.3.280	 nanu vyāpāraḥ kriyā eva tad atiriktasya vyāpārasya asaṃbhavāt kriyā vākya artha pakṣaḥ ca pratikṣiptaḥ ucyate na kriyā mātram bhāvanā api tu paridṛśyamāna pūrva aparībhūta yajya ādi bhāva svarūpa atiriktaḥ puruṣa vyāpāraḥ pratyayāt pratīyamānaḥ bhāvanā yathā aaha na sā kenacid utpādyā janikā sā na kasyacid kevalam jananī hi eṣā janyasya janakasya ca iti kriyā kāraka ādi vilakṣaṇā eva hi sā śabdāt pratīyate iti arthaḥ bhāvanāyāḥ ākhyāta vācya tvam 
NM_5,2.3.281	 nanu ca yajate iti atra prakṛti arthaḥ yāga ādiḥ kiyā pratyaya arthaḥ tu preraṇā rūpaḥ vidhiḥ kartṛ saṃkhyā ādiḥ ca na tu dhātu abhidhīyamāna vyāpāra vyatiriktaḥ bhāvanā ākhyaḥ puruṣa vyāpāraḥ pratyayāt pratīyate na hi bhāvanā vācinīm kāṃcid vibhaktim smarati pāṇiniḥ liṅā ādim iva vidhi ādau tasmāt na bhāvanā vākya arthaḥ ucyate bhāvanā api pratīyate eva ākhyātāt yadi naipuṇyena śābdī pramitiḥ avamṛśyate āstām vidhi padam tāvat vartamāna apadeśinaḥ śabdāt yajate iti ādeḥ bhāvanā na na gamyate 
NM_5,2.3.282–5,2.3.283	 pacati gacchati iti atas yathā pākādiḥ dhātvarthaḥ pratīyate tathā asarva anugataḥ kartṛ vyāpāraḥ api pāka ādi upajanana apāye api vyāpāra pratīteḥ anapāyāt yathā hi aupagavaḥ kāpaṭavaḥ aupamanyavaḥ iti upagu prabhṛtīnām uddhāre ca nikṣepe ca pratyaya arthaḥ anuvartate tat hita anteṣu tathā aakhyāteṣu apisaḥ anuvartamānaḥ dṛśyate api ca pacati iti ākhyāta padasya yadā arthaḥ vyāci khya asitobhavati tadā pākam karoti iti vākyam vyākhyātāraḥ prayuṃjate pacati iti kaḥ arthaḥ  pākam karoti iti pāka śabdeta dvitīya antena sādhi aṃdhātu artham vyācakṣate kartṛ vyāpāra ātmakam pratyaya artham karoti iti padena 
NM_5,2.3.284	 kim ca kim karoti devadattaḥ iti pṛṣṭāssantaḥ dvaye vaktārobhavanti karoti pākam iti pacati iti vat tat idam ubhaya rūpam api uttaram ekārtham anyathā na tena praṣṭā pratyāyyeta tasmāt pākam karoti iti pada dvayasya yaḥ arthaḥ saḥ eva arthaḥ ekasya pacati iti padasya atra api pacati arthāt anyaḥ karoti arthaḥ pratīyate eva yaḥ asau= anyaḥ karoti arthaḥ sābhāvanā bhāvanāyāḥ atirikta tvānatirikta tve 
NM_5,2.3.285	 āha na kartṛ saṃkhyā ādi vyatirekeṇa pratyayāt dhātu artha atiriktam vyāpāraṃpratipadyante pratipadyeran= ced karoti iti atas api śabdāt pratipadyeran na ca karoti iti atra prakṛti pratyaya vācye kriye vibhajya darśayitum śakyete ucyate na idam sādhu budhyase yaḥ ca pākam karoti iti vyavahāraḥ vibhāgataḥ saḥ eva samudāyena proktaḥ pacatinā yathā tathā kāryam karoti iti pratītiḥ na asti laukikī pratyaya arthaḥ karoti arthe pacati ādau tu vartate kartṛ saṃkhyā pratītau ca na vivādaḥ asti kasyacid tāvatā nihnavaḥ kāryaḥ na tu vyāpāra saṃvidaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.286–5,2.3.288	 karoti ityādi śabdebhyaḥ ca yathā na bhavitavya viśiṣṭebhyaḥ tat pratītiḥ iṣyate na tathā sarvebhyaḥ ke punar te viśiṣṭāḥ śabdāḥ ye bhāvanām abhidadhati ucyate bhāva arthāḥ karma śabdāḥ ye tebhyaḥ gamyeta bhāvanā yajeta iti evamādibhyaḥ saḥ eva arthaḥ vidhīyate bhavanti kecid bhāva arthāḥ na karma śabdāḥ yathā bhāvaḥ bhavanam bhūtiḥ iti bhavanti kecid karma śabdāḥ na bhāva arthāḥ yathā śyena eka trika ādayaḥ karma nāmadheya tayā prāk samarthitāḥ ye tu bhāva arthāḥ santaḥ karma śabdāḥ yajate dadāti juhoti iti evamādayaḥ tebhyaḥ bhāvanā ākhyā kriyā gamyate taiḥ eva liṅa ādi vibhakti antaiḥ saḥ arthaḥ abhidhīyate yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt iti tat uktam yajyādi arthaḥ ca atas avagamyate bhāvayet iti ca iti 
NM_5,2.3.289	 karoti śabdāt api kevalāt kartṛ vyāpāraḥ na na asau= avagamyate yatra yāga ādi karmaṇā ananuraktena prayoga yogya tām pratipadyate iti viśiṣṭebhya eva yajati ādi śabdebhyaḥ bhāvanā ākhyaḥ anuṣṭheyaḥ puruṣa vyāpāraḥ pratīyate iti siddham akhyāta artha vastu svarūpe pakṣa bhedāḥ kriyā viśeṣaḥ eva ayam vyāpāraḥ jñāturāntaraḥ spanda ātmaka bahis bhūta kriyā akṣaṇa vicakṣaṇaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.290–5,2.3.291	 iti evam kecid puruṣasya prayatnaḥ vā bhāvanā iti abhidhīyate audāsīn yadaśa apāyam pumān yena prapadyate sa yatnaḥ yāga homa ādi kriyā nirvṛtti kāraṇam tasya tad vyatirikta tvam prāyas sarve anumanyate sa ca ayam ātma dharmaḥ api na vibhu tva ādi sannibhaḥ sādhya rūpa abhisambandhāt dhatte viṣaya tām vidheḥ iti apare bhāvanāyāḥ dhātu artha anugata tva pakṣaḥ anye dhātu artha sāmānyam bhāvanām abhyupāgaman yāga dāna ādi anusyūtam rūpam go tva ādi jāti vat 
NM_5,2.3.292	 yathā hi śābaleya ādiṣu anugatam ca go rūpam avabhāsate vyāvṛttam caśā baleya ādi rūpam evam iha api yāga ādi karmaṇām anugatam ca vyāpāra rūpam pratibhāsate paraspara vibhaktam ca yāga ādi rūpam yat tad anugatam vyāpāra rūpam sā bhāvanā yathā ca śābaleya ādi ananuraktam pṛthaktvena go tvam darśayitum aśakyam tad uparakta tvena tasya sarvadā avagamāt na ca etāvatā tasya nāstitvam sukha duḥkha ādi avasthā anugatasya iva ātmanaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.293–5,2.3.294	 tathā ca kim karoti iti anavagata viśeṣa vyāpāra sāmānya praśne sati pacati paṭhati iti tad viśeṣa uttara vacanam anuguṇam bhavati iti tat ca sāmānya rūpam api na go tva ādi vat kriyā tva vat vā siddha tayā avabhāsate yena vidhera viṣayaḥ syāt api ca yajate dadyāt juhuyāt iti sarvatra aparityakta pūrva aparībhūta svabhāvam tat vyāpāra sāmānyam avagamyate tena vidheḥ ca viṣaya tām pratipadyate tat idam sakala dhātu artha sādhāraṇam sādhyamāna avastham vyāpāra sāmānyaṃbhāvanā iti ucyate tasmin= ca pakṣe dhātu vācya tvam api bhāvanāyāḥ vaktuṃśakyate 
NM_5,2.3.295–5,2.3.297	 pāka ādi śabdebhyaḥ dhātau sati api tat apratīteḥ na dhātu vācya tvam bhāvanāyāḥ iti ced bhavati ādau tarhi satyati pratyaye tad apratīteḥ pratyaya vācya tvam apina syāt tat alam anena nirdhāraṇa prayatneta sarvathā dhātoḥ vā pratyayāt vābhāvanā avagamyate iti siddham bhāvanāyāḥ aṃśa traya viśiṣṭa tvamsā dhātoḥ pratyayāt vā api bhāvanā avagatā satī apekṣa rte aśatritayam kim kena katham iti adaḥ bhāvayet iti avagate nūnam apekṣā trayam bhavati kim bhāvayet kena bhāvayet katham bhāvayet iti tatra kim iti apekṣā svarga kāma padena pūryate kim bhāvayet svargaṃ iti 
NM_5,2.3.298–5,2.3.299	 nanu ! svarga kāmaḥ iti puruṣa nirdeśaḥ ayam na phala nirdeśaḥ satyam svarga paraḥ tu ayam nirdeśaḥ uktam hi niratiśaya prīti vacanaḥ svarga śabdaḥ prītiḥ ca yān na artha iti api uktam sādhya tvena ca svargaḥ kāmyate iti saḥ eva hi kim iti aṃśe nipatati svargam bhāvayet iti svargam kāmayate iti cavyat pattau vispaṣṭam eva tasya sādhya tvam bahu vrīhau= api tasya eva sādhya tvaṃvidhi vṛtta paryālocanayā avadhāryate karaṇa ākāṅkṣā vivaraṇam evam svargam bhāvayet iti avagatekena bhāvayet iti apekṣāyām yāgena iti sambadhyate 
NM_5,2.3.300	 nanu ! yāgena iti na śrūyate kintu yajeta iti tat ca ākhyāta padaṃprakṛti pratyaya ātmaka samudāya rūpam tatra ṅipratyayasya bhāvanā vācya iti uktam yat iti dhātu mātram avaśiṣṭam tasya kṛdantasya tṛtīya antasya yāgena iti yaḥ arthaḥ sa katham ekākinā tena pratyāyyeta ucyate bhāvanā ced pratyaya arthaḥ iti soḍham āyuṣmatā yāgena iti abhisambandhaḥ soḍhavyaḥ eva yohi tasyām yathā sambaddhum yogyaḥ tamasau tathā pratyeṣyati na anyathā iti karaṇa ākāṅkṣā paripūraṇena sambandha yogyaḥ yajiḥ iti tathā eva eṣa bhāvanayā abhisambadhyate yāgasya karaṇa tvam śabda sāmarthya labhyam aprātipadika tvāt hi tṛtīyā tatra mā sma bhūt śabda sāmarthī a labhyā tu nūnam kāraṇa tā yajeḥ 
NM_5,2.3.301	 kasya punar śabdasya sāmarthyam etat bhāvanā vācinaḥ iti brūmaḥ tṛtīyayā eva kāraṇa tvam abhidhānīyam iti na iyam rājā ājñā tatas tad avagateḥ tutathā abhyupagamyate evam iha api svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti tathā avagatiḥ bhavantī kim iti na mṛṣyate ākhyātāt sādhya tā yā ca dhātu arthasya avagamyate dvitīyā śrūyate tatra kim vā tad abhidhāyinī yāgasya karaṇa tva aucityam 
NM_5,2.3.302	 nanu evam tarhi dhātu arthasya sādhya tā avagateḥ kim iti aṃśe yajinā patitavyam kim bhāvayet  yāgam kena iti apekṣite vākya antara samarpitaṃbrīhibhiḥ ityādi sambadhyatām na punar yajeḥ sādhya rūpa vyāpāra abhidhāyi pratyaya upasarjanī bhūta karmatām ati pratyāsannāman āruhya dūra vartinīm karaṇa tām adhiroḍhum arhati ucyate syāt etat evam yadi hi svarga kāmaḥ iti naśrūyeta tasmin= tu śrute na evam bhavitum arhati kutas svarga ādi sādhya saṃbandhāt alabdhvā sādhya tā anvayam yajiḥ tadā anuguṇyena karaṇa aṃśe avatiṣṭhate 
NM_5,2.3.303–5,2.3.304	 svargasya hi kāmyamāna tvena prīti ātmaka tvena ca ananya artha tvāt sādhyatāyām yogya tvāt kim iti aṃśa upanipāte siddhe tatra alabdha niveśaḥ yajiḥ tad apekṣitām karaṇa tām eva yogya tvāt abalambate sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca jyotiṣṭoma ādibhiḥ padaiḥ evam sati upapadyeta karaṇa tva anuvādibhiḥ karma nāmadheya tvam ca jyotiṣṭoma ādīnām śabdānām uktam sādhyasya bhāgasya karaṇa tva saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.305	 nanu sādhya tva pakṣa sākṣitām api karma nāmadheyāni bhajante agni hotraṃjuhoti iti na eṣa doṣaḥ sādhyaḥ eva bhavan bhāva arthaḥ sādhana tām abalambate tatra api hi svarga bhāvanāyām agnihotra ākhyaḥ homaḥ karaṇam eva anyathā svarga kāma padān anvaya prasaṅgāt iti uktam nāmadheya padam tu karma tām anuvat ati kiṃcid karaṇa tām agnihotram ityādi jyotiṣṭomena iti tasmāt yajeḥ karaṇa tvena eva anvayaḥ iti siddham 
NM_5,2.3.306–5,2.3.308	 yat tu pratyāsanna tvāt sādhya aṃśa upanipātitā iti ucyate tat ayuktam yogya tva virodhinī pratyāsattiḥ saṃbandha kāraṇam na tad viparitā yogya tvam ca svargasya eva sādhyatāyām yajeḥ ca karaṇa tāyām iti uktam kartha bhāva ākāṅkṣā vivaraṇam evam yāgena bhāvayet iti avagate katham iti apekṣāyām iti kartavyata tad vākya paṭhitā vākya antara niveditā vā saṃbadhyate tad vākya upāttā tāvat yathā etasya eva revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kṛtvā paśu kāmaḥ hi etena yajeta iti 
NM_5,2.3.309	 vākya antara upāttā brīhīn abahanti taṇḍulān pinaṣṭi samidhoyajati barhiḥ yajati tanūnapātam yajati iti itikartavya tā hi iṣṭā dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa prayojanā prāyas sarvatra bhāva arthe katham aṃśa upapādinī dṛṣṭa upakāra dvāreṇa sambaddhā peṣaṇa ādikāḥ itikartavya tā jñeyā sannipatya upakāriṇī bhāva artham anugṛhṇāti yā tu adṛṣṭena vartmanā samidh ādya ātmikām āhuḥ tāmārāt upakāriṇīm evam aṃśa traya āśleṣa labdha anuṣṭhāna yogya tām bhāvanām īdṛśīm prāpya vṛtti vidhi niṣedhayoḥ 
NM_5,2.3.310–5,2.3.311	 darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta svarga kāmaḥ jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta eti atra anantara ukta rītyai eṣa vākya arthaḥ jātaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsena yāgena svargam vavet anayā agni ādhāna ādikayā itikartavyatayā iti vidhi pratyayasya avaśyaka tā kimartham punar vidhiḥ āśrīyate vartamāna apadeśiṣu api ākhyāteṣu bhāvanā pratīyate iti darśitavān bhavān atas kim vidhinā tasya hi īḥ cayaṇaṃsvarga yāgayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāva bodhanāya pravṛtti nivṛtti liddhaye vā sādhya sādhana sambandhaḥ tāvat ākāṅkṣā sannidhi yogya tā parya ālocanayā āvartamāna apadeśinaḥ a pyākhyātāt bhāvanā avagame sati bhavati eva antareṇa api vadhim 
NM_5,2.3.312	 pravṛttiḥ api puruṣa icchā nibandhanā svargasya sādhya tve yāgasya sādhana tve avadhārite yaḥ svargam icchet sa tad siddhaye pravarteta eva yaḥ tu na icchet tasyavidhiḥ api kiṃkuryāt na hi apravartamānasya puṃsaḥ vidhiḥ gale pāśam nidadhātiḥ rajvā vā bāhū badhnāti niṣedha adhikāre api surā pāna brāhmaṇa hana nāde pratyavāya sādhanatva avadhāraṇāt tad parijihīrṣayā nivṛttiḥ bhavati na vidhitaḥ yaḥ tu pratyavāyāt na bibheti sa vidhau= api śrute na nivartate eva iti tasmāt pravṛtti nivṛttyoḥ na kāraṇam vidhiḥ iti tad artham api tad āśrayaṇam asāṃpratam vidhi svarūpa vimarśaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.313–5,2.3.315	 kaḥ ca ayam vidhiḥ nāma iti etat api na vidmaḥ nanu ca āhuḥ vidheḥ lakṣaṇam etāvat apravṛtta pravartanam atiprasaṅga doṣeṇa na ajñāta jñāpanam vidhiḥ bāḍham śrutaḥ ayam ślokaḥ kintu kaḥ asau= apravṛtta pravartakaḥ iti najānīmaḥ pravartaka svarūpe hi saṃśerate pravādukāḥ iti pravartaka tvam kasya iti vimarśaḥ kim liṅādiḥ śabdaḥ eva pravartakaḥ tad vyapāraḥ vā tad arthaḥ niyogaḥ phalam vā svarga ādiḥ śreyassādhana tvam vā rāga ādiḥ vā pravartaka svarūpa anavadhāraṇāt vidheḥ api anadhāraṇam iti 
NM_5,2.3.316–5,2.3.317	 yat tāvat uktam kim vidhi āśrayaṇena iti tatra ucyate yat ayam sādhana tvena yajeḥ abhihitaḥ anvayaḥ svargasya ca phalatvena saḥ eva mahimā vidheḥ vidhivacanam antareṇa hi svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti puruṣa lakṣaṇa artha svarga kāma śabdaḥ śuklaḥ hotā iti vat syāt tadā ca eka pada upādāna lakṣaṇa pratyāsatti sambandha nisarga ghaṭita pūrva aparībhūta svabhāva dhātu artha sādhyatā atikrameṇa dūrāt svargasya sādhya tvam anyatra upasarjanībhūtasya katham kalpayitum śakyate tasmāt eṣa viśiṣṭaḥ sādhya sādhana sambandhaḥ vidhi prasāda labhyaḥ eva bhavati na anyathā iti vidhiḥ āśrayaṇīyaḥ vidheḥ āvaśyaka tā 
NM_5,2.3.318	 katham punar vidhiḥ api amum sādhya sādhana bhāvam bodhayati ittham bodhayati sa hi sa pratyaya pravartaka svabhāvaḥ na ca apuruṣa artha rūpe vyāpārepuruṣaḥ prayatna śata preryamāṇaḥ api sa pratyayaḥ pravartate pravartamāne api puṃsi pravartaka tva ākhya nija svarūpa saṃkocam āśaṅkamānaḥ vidhiḥ puruṣa artha svabhāvam svargaṃsādhya tayā vyavasthāpayati yāgam ca asya sādhana tayā iti evam hi avabodhayataḥ asya pravartaka tvam nirvahati phala upadeśa mātrāt na pravṛttiḥ 
NM_5,2.3.319	 yat tu darśite api svarga ādau phale na pravartate ced puruṣaḥ kim vidhiḥ kuryāt iti tat api uktam na hi vāyu ādi vat puruṣasya pravartakaḥ vidhiḥ vāyu ādiḥ khalu sa pratyayam api tad itaram api pravartayati vidhiḥ tusa pratyayasya eva pravartakaḥ sa pratyayasya ca etāvat pravartanam yat pravartitaḥ aham iti jñāna jananam na ca phalam adarśayatā vidhi nāsa pratyayasya īdṛśam jñānam janayitum śakyam phale tu darśite satita dasya jñānam janitam eva anena janitam ced jñānam pramāṇa vṛttena pravartitaḥ eva asau vidhinā puruṣaḥ ālasya ādinā anarthi tvena vā bahis pravṛtti paryanta tayā ced na pravarteta mā pravartiṣṭaḥ ! vidhinā tu sva kartavyaṃkṛtam pravartitaḥ aham iti jñāna jananāt anyaḥ hi pravartana avagamaḥ anyaḥ ca bāhyaḥ vyāpāraḥ vidheḥ eva sādhya sādhana bhāva avagamaḥ evam vidhi vaśāt eva sādhya sādhana bhāva dhīḥ sā hi prathama nirvṛtta preraṇā jñāna pūrvikā 
NM_5,2.3.320	 yajeta iti preraṇā pratīyamānā sādhya sādhana sambandham anavabodhayati vidhau na nirvahati iti tad kṛtaḥ tad avabodhaḥ ucyate niṣedhe ca na hanyāt iti niṣedhyamānasya bhāva arthasya anartha tām anavabodhayan vidhiḥ na rāgataḥ pravartamānam pumāṃsam niroddhum utsahate iti vidheya vat niṣedhye api tasya eva vyāpāraitya vaśya āśrayaṇīyaḥ vidhiḥ 
NM_5,2.3.321	 yaḥ ca eṣa paryanuyogaḥ kimartham vidhiḥ āśritaḥ iti sa tu khalu saralam atikṛtaḥ iva lakṣyate na hi vaya madya kṛta vidhim āśrayema jahīmaḥ vā pratipattāraḥ hi vayam vedasya na kartāraḥ tatra ca sa vidhikāni yajeta svarga kāmaḥ iti prabhṛtīni śrūyante teṣām mīmāṃsyamānaḥ arthaḥ īdṛś avatiṣṭhate svargaḥ sādhyaḥ yāgaḥ sādhanam iti sa ca ayam vidhi sāmarthī alabhya eti yuktam vidheḥ a āśrayaṇam kasya pravartaka tvam yuktam phalasya tat jñānasya vā 
NM_5,2.3.322–5,2.3.323	 yat tu pravartaka svarūpā niścayāt vidhera niścayaḥ iti tatra api ucyate phalaṃtāvat na pravartakam siddhi asiddhi vikalpa anupapatteḥ siddhasya phalasya apravartaka tvam siddha tvāt eva na hi yat yasya asti sa tad artham yatate na api asiddhasya khara viṣāṇa prakhyasya phalasya pravartaka tvam yuktam adṛṣṭa tvāt atha kāmanā viṣayīkṛtam phalam pravartakam iṣyate sā iyam kāmanā eva pravartikā abhavati na phalam tasmāt rāga ādiḥ pravartakaḥ iti āhuḥ śreyassādhana tvasya pravartaka tva pakṣaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.324	 etat api na peśalam upajāta pravṛddhatara rāgasyā pikāmi amanopāya paricchedam antareṇa pravṛtti anupapatteḥ na hi svarga kāmaḥ sāṃgrahiṇīm anutiṣṭhati tad varam śreyassādhana tvam pravartakam loke api ca evam eva vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate harītakī ādīnām ārogya sādhana tām vaidya ācārya codanā ataḥ avagatya tad upayogāt au= ātura janaḥ pravartate tṛpti sādhana tām odanasya manyamānaḥ tad bhakṣaṇāya bubhukṣitaḥ pravartate iti śreyassādhana tvam eva pravartakam vidhi pratyaya ādeḥ pravartaka tva pakṣaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.325	 etat api na catur asram śreyassādhana tvam hi anavagatam avagatam vā pravartakaṃbhavet na anavagatam avyutpannasya pravṛtteḥ adarśanāt yaḥ hi harītakīnām a ārogya hetu tām na kutaścid adhigatavān na asau tad arthī api tām upayuṅkte tasmāt tad bodha hetuḥ pravartakaḥ sa ca dṛṣṭe viṣaye anvaya vyatireka ādeḥ apisaṃbhavati kim tena adṛṣṭe tu viṣaye śreya ssādhana adhigamaḥ śabda eka nibandhana eti tad adhigama upāyaḥ śabdaḥ eva pravartakaḥ atas eva śabdaḥ api na svarūpa mātreṇa pravartakaḥ vāyu ādi tulya tva prasaṅgāt yadi hi pavanaḥ iva piśācaḥ iva ku nṛpaḥ iva śabdaḥ pravartakaḥ bhavet anavagata śabda artha sambandhaḥ api śravaṇa para vaśaḥ pravarteta na ca evam asti tasmāt artha pratītim upajanayataḥ śabdasya pravartaka tvam liṅā ādeḥ pravartaka tva prakāraḥ 
NM_5,2.3.326	 na ca nāma pada pratītau vartamāna apadeśaka ākhyātāt padārtha pratītau ca satya aṃsa pratyayaḥ apravartamānaḥ kaścid dṛśyate iti liṅādiḥ eva śabdaḥ pravartaka abhidhāna dvāreṇa pravartakaḥ bhavitum arhati śabdasya ca jñāpaka tvāt cakṣuḥ ādi kāraka vailakṣaṇye sati api pratīti janmani karaṇa tvam aparihāryam karaṇam cakārakam ca na nirvyāpāram sva kārya nirvṛtti kṣamam iti vyāpāraḥ tasya avaśyaṃbhāvī liṅā ādeḥ ca śabdasya na pratīti janma mātre vyāpāraḥ kintu puruṣa pravṛttau= api tathā avagamāt liṅā artha avagame sati pravṛttiḥ dṛśyate ititatra api liṅavyā pāraḥ prabhavati sa ca ayam liṅā ādi vyāpāraḥ śabda bhāvanā nāmadheyaḥ vidhiḥ iti ucyate saḥ eva pravartakaḥ bhāvanāyāḥ dvaividhyam 
NM_5,2.3.327–5,2.3.329	 iha hi liṅa ādi yukteṣu vākyeṣu dve bhāvane pratīyete śabda bhāvanā artha bhāvanā ca iti tatra artha bhāvanā tāvat dhātu artha atirikta prayojaka vyāpāra ātmikā ādarśitā eva yaḥ bhavana kriyā kartṛ viṣayaḥ prayojaka vyāpāraḥ puruṣa sthaḥ yatra bhavana kriyāyāḥ kartā svarga ādiḥ karma tām āpadyate saḥ artha bhāvanā śabdena ucyate vyākhyātaḥ ca asau bhāvanā dvaya svarūpam yaḥ tu śabda gataḥ prayojaka vyāpāraḥ yatra puruṣa pravṛttiḥ sādhyatām pratipadyate sā śabda bhāvanā tathā hi uktam abhidhām bhāvanām āhuḥ anyām eva liṅa ādayaḥ iti 
NM_5,2.3.330	 liṅanta śabda śravaṇe hi yathā yajya ādi avacchinnam sva vyāpāram puruṣaḥ adhigacchati tathā tad anuṣṭhāne preritaḥ aham iti api pratipadyate tena anuṣṭheya artha pratipādanaḥ iva preraṇāyām api śabdasya sāmarthyāt bhāvanā dvaya pratipāda kaṃliṅa ādi yuktam vākyam iṣyate tatas puruṣa vyāpāraḥ ca artha bhāvanā śabda vyāpāraḥ ca śabda bhāvanā avagamyate śabda vyāpāra ātmaka tvāt ca śabda bhāvanā śabdena abhidhīyate anavagatā ca satī na kārya aṅgam iti śabdena sā abhidhīyate api tat uktam abhidhatte karoti ca iti śabda bhāvanāyāḥ aṃśa traya varṇanam 
NM_5,2.3.331	 nanu ! śabda bhāvanā api bhāvanā ātmaka tvāt artha bhāvanā avat aṃśa trayam epakṣataeva iti tat asyāḥ darśayitavyam ucyate bhāvya aṃśe tāvat asyāḥ puruṣa pravṛttiḥ upanipati iti uktam eva puruṣa preraṇa ātmakaḥ hi vidhiḥ śabda bhāvanā iti tad sādhyā puruṣa pravṛttiḥ eva tatra bhāvyatām pratipadyate karaṇa aṃśe tu tasyāḥ niyojya viṣaya samarpaka pada vyāpāraḥ niviśate yathā hi yajya ādi nā svarga ādiḥ bhāvyaḥ saṃpadyate iti artha bhāvanāyām asau tad karaṇa tām abalambate evam iha api niyojya puruṣa pravṛtti viṣaya ādi avagamāt saṃpadyate iti tad abhidhāyaka śabda vyāpāraḥ tatra karaṇa tām pratipadyate itikartavya aṃśe tu arthavāda pada vyāpāraḥ asyāḥ avatiṣṭhate kevalam vidhi pada śravaṇe hi sati na tathā pravartayitum utsahante śrotāraḥ yathā artha vāda janita bahu prakāra karma prāśastyajñāna paripoṣita hṛdayāḥ santaḥ iti artha vādāḥ pravṛtti atiśaya hetavaḥ tena tad vyāpāra eti kartavyatā aṃśam asyāḥ pūrayati iti 
NM_5,2.3.332–5,2.3.333	 evam niyojya vyāpāraḥ bhāvyaḥ viṣaya ādi samarpaka pada vyāpāraḥ karaṇam arthavāda pada vyāpāraḥ itikartavyatā iti sā iyam tri aṃśā śabda bhāvanā sā eva ca vidhiḥ vidheḥ bhāvanāyāḥ ca sambandha varṇanam na ca vidheḥ vākya arthān anvaya lakṣaṇaḥ doṣaḥ āśaṅkanīyaḥ eka pratyaya upādāna lakṣaṇayā pratyāsatyā tad anvita tva avagamāt āhuḥ ca vidhi bhāvanayoḥ tu eka pratyaya grāhyatā kṛtaḥ dhātu arthāt prathamam tāvat saṃbandhaḥ vyavasīyate iti 
NM_5,2.3.334–5,2.3.336^1	 vidhiḥ bhāvanāyām puruṣam niyuṅkte yathā aaha sva vyāpāre hi puruṣaḥ kartṛ tvena niyujyate iti tayoḥ katham anvayaḥ syāt vidheḥ preraka tva prakāraḥ nanu ca tvayā eva uktam dhātu arthāt pūrvataram tad bhāvanāyāḥ vidheḥ ca saṃbadhaḥ avagamyate eka pada upādāne api dhātu arthaḥ tāvat prakṛti aṃśa abhidheyaḥ vidhi bhāvane tu dve api pratyaya aṃśena abhidhīyete iti atas ca svacchā eva bhāvanā vidhinā spṛśyate na viṣaya ādi anuraktāḥ su acchā ca na prayoga yogyā bhavati yathā ca phala karaṇa iti kartavyatā aṃśa paripūrti prasthitā prayoga yogyā na tāṃvidhiḥ spṛṣṭavān 
NM_5,2.3.336^2	 avidhi spṛṣṭeṣu ca dhātu artha kāraka ādiṣu kim iti sa cetāḥ puruṣaḥ pravarteta iti ucyate yadi api vidhiḥ anadhigata dhātu artha anurāga tayā su acchām eva bhāvanām eka abhidhāna tvāt prathamam ākrāmati tathā api tādṛśitasyām sa pratyaya pravartana ātmaka nija svarūpa nirvahaṇam alabhamānaḥ na tāvatī evaviramati kintu pariṇīta bāla kanyakaḥ varaḥ iva tāvat vilambamānaḥ prasārita hastaḥ āste yāvat sarva aṅga sundarī prayoga yogyā bhāvanā bhavati āha ca yadi api aṃśaiḥ asaṃspṛṣṭām vidhiḥ spṛśati bhāvanām tathā api aśaktitaḥ na asau tanmātre paryavasyati anuṣṭheye hi viṣaye vidhiḥ puṃsām pravartakaḥ aṃśa trayeṇa ca āpūrṇām na anutiṣṭhati bhāvanām tasmāt prakrānta rūpaḥ api vidhiḥ tāvat pratīkṣate yāvat yogya tvam āpannā bhāvanā anya anapekṣiṇī iti bhāvanāyāḥ vākya arthe anvaya prakāraḥ 
NM_5,2.3.337–5,2.3.338	 sā hi vākya antara upāttam api apekṣate prakaraṇa antara adhītam api vā aṃchati prakṛti vat bhāvalabhyam api yācate artha sāmarthya gamyam pramāṇam apispṛhayati iti evaṃvidhaḥ eṣa śabda pramāṇa mahimā iti sa ca ayam vyutpādana kramaḥ īdṛśaḥ vyākhyātṛbhiḥ upadiśyate ittham asya anvayaḥ ittham asya iti vākya arthaḥ punarbhāvanā ātmā avagamyamānaḥ ekayā eva buddhyā a neka jāti guṇa dravya kriyā ādi aṅga kalāpa kalmāṣita tanuḥ avagamyate tādṛśī ekā eva iyam vākyāt vākya artha buddhiḥ yathā āha bhāvanā eva hi vākya arthaḥ sarvatra ākhyāta vattayā aneka guṇa jāti ādi kāraka artha anuraṃjitāḥ ekayā eva ca buddhyā asau gṛhyate citra rūpayā padārtha āhita saṃskāra citra piṇḍa prastayā iti bhāvanāyāḥ pūrṇa svarūpam 
NM_5,2.3.339	 ekaḥ eva ayam ati dīrdhaḥ krama vikasvaraḥ sakala aṅga paripūrita bhāvanā tattva viṣayaḥ pratibhāsaḥ yathā hi sthālī adhiśrayaṇāt prabhṛti ānirākāṅkṣa odana niṣpatteḥ ekā eva iyam pāka kriyā salila avaseka taṇḍulā vapana darvī vighaṭṭana asrāvaṇa ādi aneka kṣaṇa samudāya svabhāvāḥ tathā prathama pada jñānāt prabhṛtiā nirākāṅkṣa vākya artha paricchedāt ekā eva iyam śābdī pramitiḥ āha ca padāt prabhṛti yā ca eṣā prajñā jñātuḥ vijṛmbhate puṣpitā sā padārtheṣu vākya artheṣu phaliṣyati 
NM_5,2.3.340–5,2.3.342	 iti kṛtam ati vistareṇa saḥ ayam vākya arthaḥ bhāvanānām adheya kartṛ vyāpāraḥ svarga yāga ādiḥ arthaḥyaḥ tu vyāpāraḥ praiṣa rūpaḥ liṅā ādeḥ vācyaḥ kārye vā tam vidhim saṅgirante śabda bhāvanāyāḥ vākya artha tva vicāraḥ tat etat ananumanyamānāḥ anye pracakṣate yaḥ asau śabda bhāvana ākhyaḥ śabda vyāpāraḥ śabdasya kāryaḥ abhidheyaḥ ca tam abhidadhataḥ kurvataḥ vā śabdasya vyāpāra antaram asti na vā 
NM_5,2.3.343	 yadi tāvat na asti tat eṣa vyāpāra antara nirapekṣasva vyāpāram iva artham apivadatu viśrāmyatu vyāpāra kalpanā asti ced asya tad abhidhāne vyāpāra antaram tadā anavasthā pratīkāraḥ kaścid anveṣaṇīyaḥ na jāsau dūrāt apilabhyate bhūta parispanda vyatirikta vyāpāra nirāsaḥ ca pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇe vistareṇa kṛtaḥ iti asau mārgaḥ iha api anusaraṇīyaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.344–5,2.3.345	 yaḥ ca asau vyāpāraḥ kriyate ca abhidhīyate ca sa kim pūrvam abhidhīyate tatas kriyate pūrvam vā kriyate paścāt abhidhīyate yugapad eva vā karaṇa abhidhāne iti na tāvat pūrvam abhidhīyate tatas kriyate anutpannasya abhidhāna anupapatteḥ na hi ajāte putre nāmadheya karaṇam artha asaṃsparśī ca tathā sati śabdaḥ syāt 
NM_5,2.3.346–5,2.3.348	 atas eva na yugapad ubhayam anutpanna tvānapāyāt prayatna gaurava prasaṅgāt ca na api kṛtvā abhidhānam viramya vyāpārā saṃvedanāt liṅa ādibhiḥ śabda bhāvanā prati iti asaṃbhavaḥ api ca ayam tapasvī liṅādiḥ pratyayaḥ sati api go bṛndāraka tve katham amumati bṛhantam bhāram vakṣyati kartāram ca tad saṃkhyām ca ākhyāsyati bhāvanām abhidhāsyate śabda bhāvanām ca kariṣyati tām ca vadiṣyati iti durvahaḥ ayam bhāraḥ śabda bhāvanāyāḥ vākya arthe anvayāsaṃbhavaḥ kaḥ ca ayam śabda bhāvanā nāmadheyasya vidheḥ vākya arthe bhāvanāyām anvayaḥ iti vaktavyam 
NM_5,2.3.349	 nanu uktaḥ eva eka pratyaya abhidheya tva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti na brūmaa abhidhānikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ na uktaḥ iti kintu puruṣa vyāpāra ātmikāyāḥ artha bhāvanāyāḥ pradhāna tvena vākya artha tvāt tad apekṣyamāṇa phala karaṇa iti kartavyatā aṃśa pūraṇena svarga kāma ādi pada antara abhidheyaḥ arthaḥ samanveti guṇa tvena śabda vyāpāraḥ tu tat apekṣitam anyatamam api na aṃśam pūrayitum alam iti tatra na guṇa tām abalambate na ca dvayoḥ pradhānayoḥ ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ itivat vā pacati paṭhati iti vat vā saṃbandhaḥ upalabhyate bhāvanayoḥ guṇa pradhāna bhāva saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.350–5,2.3.353	 atha artha bhāvanā śabda bhāvana ākhya vidheḥ viṣaya samarpaṇena guṇa tām abalambate vidhiḥ tarhi vākya arthaḥ na bhāvanā tasyāḥ aprādhānyāt atas bhāvanā dvayam pratyaya arthaḥ iti na hṛdayaṃgamam etat eka abhidhāna abhidheya tvam ca na bhāvanayoḥ anyonya samanvaye kāraṇam akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ iti ādau= adarśanāt bhāvanā dvaya sadbhāve na pramāṇam asti kiṃca kasya anurodhena dve bhāvane pratyaya vācye iṣyete  ucyate liṅā ādi śabda śravaṇe sati kārye ca preraṇāyām ca buddhiḥ utpadyate iti yadi evam ekaḥ eva tādṛśaḥ asau liṅarthaḥ bhavatu tat eka tvāt ca na paraspara samanvayaḥ cintayiṣyate na ca pratyaye api atibhāraḥ āropayiṣyate niyoga vākya artha vicāraḥ 
NM_5,2.3.354	 nanu ! ekasya api liṅarthasya yadi śabdaḥ kārya tvam preraṇām ca bravīti tatas tad avasthaḥ eva ati bhāraḥ kaḥ ca asau= ekaḥ kārya ātmā preraṇa ātmā catasya arthaḥ ucyate yaḥ liṅā ādi pratyayāt avagamyate yam abhivadataḥ natasya ati bhāraḥ yatra na tad vyatirekeṇa pramāṇa antaram kramate sa niyogaḥ nāma avākya arthaḥ tathā hi vṛddha vyavahārataḥ śabdānām arthe vyutpattiḥ iti atra tāvat avivādaḥ eva vyavahāre ca vākya arthe vākyasya vyutpattiḥ vākyena sarvatra vyavahārāt tatra yajeta iti āditiṅanta pada yukteṣu pada antarāṇām arthaḥ tāvat āstām ākhyāta arthe hi avagate tadā anuguṇyena āsausthāsyati ākhyātasya ca yajeta iti evamādeḥ arthaḥ parīkṣyamāṇaḥ preraṇa ātmakaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate yatas pada antara sannidhāne sati api na preraṇā buddhiḥ upajāyate ākhyāta pada śravaṇe ca sati sā jāyate tasmāt tasya eva preraṇa ātmakaḥ arthaḥ tatra api tu juhoti ādi dhātu antara upajanana apāya paryālocanayā dhātoḥ tad pratītau vyabhicārāt pratyayasya ca avyabhicārāt tasya evasaḥ arthaḥ iti gamyate vidhi rūpa niyogasya liṅartha tvam 
NM_5,2.3.355–5,2.3.356	 kaḥ punar asau= arthaḥ yasmin sati niyuktaḥ aham atra iti pratipadyatepuruṣaḥ saḥ asau= arthaḥ saḥ eva vidhiḥ iti ucyate vidhau hi liṅā ādi pratyayaṃsmarati pāṇiniḥ na dhātu arthe yāga ādau na kartṛ vyāpāre bhāvanāyām vidhiḥ ca nāma preraṇa ātmakaḥ eva atas eva vartamāna apadeśika ākhyāta janita pratīti vilakṣaṇā iyam pratītiḥ yajeta iti atra hi praiṣa praiṣyayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ avagamyate anyaḥ eva ayam kriyā kartṛ saṃbandhāt praiṣa praiṣya saṃbandhaḥ akhyātena preraṇāyāḥ prādhānyena upasthitiḥ nanu yajeta iti kriyā kartṛ saṃbandhaḥ avagamyate  na brūmaḥ na avagamyate iti kintu praiṣa praiṣya lakṣaṇaḥ api saṃbandhaḥ prathamam avagamyate preṣita ūhi kriyām kartum udyacchati iti 
NM_5,2.3.357	 nanu ! kriyā saṃbandhi tayā eva asau preṣyate yajatām bhavān iti satyam kriyā saṃbandhi tayā eva preṣyate preṣyate tu saḥ preṣyate ced ayam anyaṃtarhi saṃbandhaḥ kriyā saṃbandhāt tu ubhaya saṃbandhi tāmasya rāja gavī kṣīra vat avagamiṣyāmaḥ yathā gauḥ rājñā ca saṃbadhyate kṣīreṇa ca yā rāja saṃbandhinī sā kṣīra saṃbandhinī yā kṣīra saṃbandhinī sā rāja saṃbandhinī iti evam iha api puruṣaḥ preṣitena ca saṃbhantsyate kriyayā ca yaḥ preṣyate sa karoti atha yaḥ karoti preṣyate saḥ iti preraṇāyāḥ atirikta tvam 
NM_5,2.3.358	 nanu ! na idam ubhayam bhavati praiṣaḥ api kriyā eva pravartanam hi kurvan pravartayati iti ucyate saḥ ayam kriyā sambandhaḥ eva bhavati na tatas anyaḥ praiṣa praiṣya saṃbandhaḥ iti syāt etat evam yadi vāyu ādi vat pravartane kartā āliṅa ādiḥ syāt preritaḥ aham atraḥ iti tu jñāna janaka tvam vidheḥ pravartaka tvam saḥ eṣa pravartanam jñāpayati na karoti iti anyaḥ eva ayam kriyā kartṛ saṃbandhāt praiṣa praiṣya saṃbandhaḥ jñānasya kriyā vilakṣaṇa tvam 
NM_5,2.3.359	 nanu ! jñānam api kriyā eva tad karaṇe ca punar ayi saḥ eva ayam kriyā kartṛ saṃbandhaḥ mā evam kāraka jñāpakayoḥ bhedasya su prasiddha tvāt iha cayaḥ ayam yāga puruṣayoḥ kriyā kartṛ saṃbandhaḥ tatas anyam praiṣa praiṣya saṃbandham upadarśayituṃpravṛttāḥ smaḥ sa tatas vilakṣaṇaḥ pradarśitaḥ eva vailakṣaṇye api tasyayathā kathaṃcid nāma kriyamāṇam na vārayāmaḥ preraṇāyāḥ prathamam pratītiḥ 
NM_5,2.3.360	 bhavatu ayam anyaḥ praiṣa praiṣya saṃbandhaḥ sa tu prathamam avagamyate iti eṣa kutoniścayaḥ uktam atra preṣitaḥ aham iti hi viditvā kriyāyām pravartate ācārya coditaḥ karomi iti hi dṛśyate yajeta iti śrute niyuktaḥ aham iti prathamam avagacchati tatas yajate tena ayam ādyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pāścātyaḥ tu kriyā kartṛ saṃbandhaḥ tat yaḥ ayam liṅarthaḥ prathamam avagamyate praiṣaḥ nāma sā preraṇāḥ sa niyogaḥ sa vākya arthaḥ vidhi ni mantraṇā ādīnām vailakṣaṇyam 
NM_5,2.3.361	 nanu ! vidhau= iva nimantraṇa ādiṣu liṅa loṭau= api smaryete eva satyam te tu preraṇāyāḥ eva aupādhikāḥ avāntara bhedāḥ sama hīna jyā yaḥ viṣaya ā iva prayoga upādhi nibandhanaḥ eṣa preṣaṇāḥ dhyeṣaṇa ādi bheda vyavahāraḥ preṣaṇātu sarvatra anusyūtā avagamyate tat uktam pravartaka tvam tu śabda arthaḥ sarvatra aparityāgāt iti sa ca ayam liṅā ādīnām arthaḥ praiṣaḥ ṇijartha vilakṣaṇaḥ pratīyate ṇijartha vailakṣaṇyam liṅarthasya 
NM_5,2.3.362	 nanu ! prayojaka vyāpāre ṇit vidhīyate prayojaka vyāpāraḥ ca praiṣaḥ praiṣe ca loḍa ādayaḥ vidhīyante iti ṇijarthaḥ eva loḍarthaḥ tathā ca kuru kuru iti yaḥ brūte sa kārayati iti ucyate na pratīti bhedāt anyā hi karotu kuryāt iti pratītiḥ anyā ca karoti kārayati iti pratītiḥ prayojaka vyāpāraḥ hi ṇijarthaḥ jñāpaka vyāpāraḥ tu liṅarthaḥ pravṛtta kriyā viṣayaḥ ca prayojaka vyāpāraḥ ṇijarthaḥ ihatu tad viparītaḥ tatra hi kāryaṃpaśyataḥ pravartanam iha tu pravatitasya kārya darśanam iti mahān bhedaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.363	 tatra yathā kurvantam kārayati tathā eva iha api praiṣaḥ pravartamānam prerayati na apravartamānam sthāvaram iti na hi vanaspatiḥ ucyate yajasva iti na sthāvara ādeḥ ayogya tvāt brāhmaṇa ādiḥ tu yaḥ preryate asā vapra vṛtta kriyaḥ eva na hi yajamānaḥ eva yajeta iti codyate kintu apravṛtta kriyaḥ eva iti sarvathā ṇijarthāt vilakṣaṇaḥ liṅarthaḥ niyoge vyutpatti pradarśanam 
NM_5,2.3.364	 āha bhavatu ayam vilakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ sa tu pramāṇa antarauvagamyaḥ ced tad upadarśya tām ayam asau= evaṃrūpaḥ iti pramāṇa antara anavagamyaḥ ced kathaṃśabda eka gocare tatra saṃbandha vyutpattiḥ ucyate śabda eka gocaraḥ tu niyogaḥ vyutpattiḥ ca tatra sūpa pādā eva yaḥ hi yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt iti liṅa ādibhyaḥ vidhiḥ pratīyate katham asau liṅā ādīnām agamyaḥ iṣyeta vyutpattiḥ ca asya vyavaharāt avakalpate gaccha adhīṣvaḥ iti śrṛṇvan vṛddhaḥ ceṣṭamānaḥ dṛśyate ceṣṭā ca sva ātmani pravartikā avagama pūrvikā dṛṣṭāḥ pratyakṣa dṛṣṭe ca āmra ādau sukha sādhana tayā anvaya vyatirekābhyām avagate tad anusmaraṇāt pravartamānaḥ kasmiṃścid ātmā ākūte samupajāte sati bhautikam vyāpāram ārabhate sa ca ātma dharmaḥ ātmā iva sva saṃvedyaḥ ātmanaḥ sva prakāśa tvam 
NM_5,2.3.365	 ahaṃpratyagamyaḥ hi ātmā na asau parasmai darśayitum śakyate na cana carcayitum śakyate etāvatā na anubhūyate iti na śakyate vaktum paraḥ api hi enam ahaṃpratyayena anubhavati eva tathā ayam api bhautika vyāpāra hetuḥ ātma ākūta viśeṣaḥ na pramāṇa antara vedyaḥ bhavati na ca na vedyate tad saṃvedanesati ceṣṭāyāḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt tasmāt param api gaccha adhīṣvaḥ iti śabda śravaṇe sati ceṣṭā āpannam dṛṣṭvā tasya api tādṛś preraṇa avagamaḥ anumīyate sa ca śabda antara śravaṇe sati api adṛśyamānaḥ liṅā ādi śravaṇe ca sati dṛśyamānaḥ tad arthaḥ eva iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām avagamyate itīyati iyam vyutpattiḥ 
NM_5,2.3.366	 tat etat ātma pratyakṣam liṅā ādi śravaṇe sati preraṇa avagatiḥ bhavati prathama śrutāt ca liṅa ādeḥ asau na bhavati na ca pramāṇa antareṇa saḥ arthaḥ darśayituṃśakyate kuryāt iti asya arthaḥ kuryāt iti anena eva pratipādyate na prakāra antareṇa iti evam vyutpattau saṃbhavantyām api yaiḥ agṛhīta sambandhaḥ eva liṅādiḥ svarūpa sāmarthyena eva prerakaḥ iṣyate te atyanta bhīravaḥ iti upekṣaṇīyāḥ liṅādinā eva niyoga pratītiḥ 
NM_5,2.3.367–5,2.3.369	 nanu ! yadi liṅā ādi vyatirekeṇa na anyatas niyogaḥ avagamyate katham asauni yoga śabdāt pratīyate katham vā niyośabdasya nāmnaḥ api arthaḥ pramāṇa antara gocaraḥ syāt ayi sādho ! na niyogaḥ nipūrveṇa yujinā ghañatena bodhayitum śakyate vyavahāra mātram etat svarūpam ākhyātum āśrīyate yathā tu yajeta iti evamādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ saḥ avagamyate tathā na anyatas iti atas eva na pramāṇa antara gocaraḥ dharmaḥ iti āhuḥ liṅarthaḥ hi niyogaḥ vākya arthaḥ saḥ eva dharmaḥ sa ca na pramāṇa antara gamyaḥ iti niyogasya eva preraka tvam kārya tvam ca 
NM_5,2.3.370	 nanu ! liṅarthaḥ preraṇa ātmakaḥ ayam vyākhyātaḥ kārya ātmā ca ayam anuṣṭheyaḥ dharmaḥ saḥ eva ca vākya arthaḥ yuktaḥ kārye arthe vedasya prāmāṇyam iti hi mīmāṃsakāḥ tasmāt punar api bhāṭṭa pakṣa vat dvayam āpatati prerakaḥ ca vidhiḥ kārya rūpaḥ ca anuṣṭheyaḥ arthaḥ iti sukha edhitaḥ niranusandhānā eva āyuṣmān evam vyavaharati na hi anyaḥ prerakaḥ anyaḥ ca anuṣṭheyaḥ iti uktam niyogaḥ eva prerakaḥ niyogaḥ eva ca anuṣṭheyaḥ preraka tva kārya tvayoḥ avirodhaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.371–5,2.3.372	 katham dvairūpyam asya śabdaḥ vadati iti ced mā evam preraka tvam eva śabda arthaḥ ārtham tu kāryatvam yatas vidhiḥ eva anuṣṭheya tayā avagamyatea ācārya ājñām karomi rāja ājñām karomi iti kimartham tarhi viṣaya anuṣṭhānam iti ced na hi ājñā ghaṭa ādi vat sva rūpeṇa kartum śakyāḥ api tu viṣaya dvārakam tad saṃpādanam kamaṇḍulam bibhṛhi iti ācāryeṇa ājñaptaḥ kamaṇḍulam bhṛtvā aacārya ājñām kṛtām manyate kaṭakam gaccha eti rājñā aaptaḥ kaṭakam gatvā rāja ājñām kṛtām manyate saḥ ayam niyogaā iva anuṣṭheyaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.373–5,2.3.375	 nanu ! rāja ājñayā karomi iti api vyapadeśaḥ dṛśyate sa ca ananuṣṭheyām eva ājñām darśayati mā evam tatra api ājñā eva anuṣṭheyāḥ preṣāṇa abhiprāyeṇa tṛtīyā nirdeśaḥ iti evam kecid niyogasya eva śābda tvam anye tu śābdam kārya tvam niyogasya preraka tvam tu arthāt iti ācakṣate anuṣṭheya tā hi tasya nijam rūpam sva siddhaye sa tu niyojyam niyuṃjānaḥ prerakaḥ iti ucyate tat idam kārya tvam aparityakta preraka bhāvam asya avagamyate preraka tvam ca aparityakta kārya bhāvam iti anyatarat atra śābdam rūpam anyatarat ca artham rūpam iti na bhāṭṭaiḥ iva asmābhiḥ pratyaye guruḥ bhāraḥ āropitaḥ niyogasya viṣaya adhikāra ādi kathanam 
NM_5,2.3.376	 sa ca ayam niyogaḥ pratīyamānaḥ yajeta svarga kāmaḥ iti anubandha dvaya avacchinnaḥ pratīyate yajya ādina asya viṣaya anubandhaḥ dhātunā ucyate svarga kāmaḥ iti adhikāra anubandhaḥ pada antareṇa arpyate tatra ca svarga kāmasya eva adhikāraḥ nirvahati yadi bhāva arthasya svargam prati sādhana tvam avagamyate evam tarhi svarga kāmena eva asau kṛtaḥ bhavati iti svarga kāma pada anvaye prāktana ā iva mārgaḥ anumantavyaḥ na punar svarga ādi phala pradarśana pūrvakam vidheḥ pravartaka tvam asvātantrya prasaṅgāt na hi īdṛśam śāstrasya dainyam yat phalam vinā puṃsaḥ pravartayitum na śaknoti iti anyathā yāvajjīvam yajeta iti ādau= apravartakam śāstram syāt niyogasya phala śeṣa tva abhāvaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.377	 kim yāvajjīvam iti ādi codanāḥ phala śūnyāḥ eva om iti ucyate na hi vidhiḥ phalam ākāṅkṣati api tu niyojyam viṣayam ca kasya niyogaḥ kutra niyogaḥ iti te ete ubhe api ākāṅkṣe paripūrṇe tatra jīvataḥ niyogaḥ yāge ca niyogaḥ iti atas param phala kalpa naṃpuruṣa buddhi prabhavam bhavati na śāstrī iyam kāma adhikāre tu niyojyatā evaanyathā svarga kāmasya na upapadyate iti svargasya sādhya tvam abhyupagatam napunar vidheḥ phala artha tvāt atas eva na tatra vaidhī pravṛttiḥ lipsayā eva pravṛtta tvāt āha ca tasya lipsā arthaṃlakṣaṇāḥ iti sādhya sādhana bhāva pratipādana paryavasitaḥ hi tatra vidhi vyāpāraḥ na prayoga paryavasitaḥ iti śyena ādeḥ adharma tve kāraṇam 
NM_5,2.3.378	 atas eva śyena ādeḥ adharma tvam tatra hi abhicaran iti śatra aśatrum vaidikena upāyena jighāṃsuḥ adhikārī darśitaḥ tasya na tatra śāstraṃpravartakam jānāti eva asau mayā etat kartavyam upāyam tu na veda eti evam upāya mātram asya upadiśyate śyenaḥ śyanam kuru iti tu na vidhiḥ prabhavati jighāṃsāyāḥ eva tatra pravartaka tvāt atas śyena ādeḥ adharma tvāt tad vyudāsa artha pada upādānam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti 
NM_5,2.3.379–5,2.3.380	 kāma adhikāreṣu hi iti kartavya tā aṃśe śāstrīyā pravṛttiḥ yathā uktam kratu arthaḥ hi śāstrāt avagamyate iti bhāva artha mātrasyahi karaṇa tvam avagatam itikartavya tā aṃśaḥ tu na karaṇa tva avagati belāyām upanipatitaḥ iti tatra lipsāyāḥ abhāvāt śāstram eva pravartakam agnīṣomīya ādiḥ hisāyāḥ adharma tva abhāvaḥ atas eva agnīṣomīyahiṃsāyāḥ na adharma tvam na hiṃsyāt sarvāḥ bhūtāni iti niṣedhaḥ sāmānya śāstram sāmānya śāstram ca viśeṣa śāstra kroḍīkṛta viṣaya parihāreṇa pravartate iti agnīṣomīyahiṃsāyāḥ śāstrīya tvāt na niṣedha vidhiḥ anartha tām bodhayet iti 
NM_5,2.3.381–5,2.3.382	 nanu ! śyene api śāstrīyā pravṛttiḥ pravartaka tvam hi vidheḥ svarūpaṃpramāṇa antara vilakṣaṇam na anvaya vyatireka vat sādhya sādhana pratīti mātra paryantaḥ hi vidhi vyāpāraḥ bhavitum arhati iti sarvatra vidheḥ prayoktṛ tvān apāyāt eva mevaceyam pravṛttiḥ śyenena yajeta iti ucyate pravartitaḥ aham iti jñāna jananam vidheḥ preraka tvam tatasatyam sarvatra tulyam karaṇe ca śyene itikartavya tāyām agnīṣomīye bāhye tu pravṛtti lakṣaṇe bhautike vyāpāre yatra lipsā ādi prakāra antaram asti tatra bhavagti api vidheḥ prayauktṛ śaktiḥ udāste paśu puroḍāśa prayāja vat tatra udāsīne vidhau niṣedha śāstram avataratina hiṃsyāt iti śyena jyotiṣṭoma ādeḥ vailakṣaṇyam 
NM_5,2.3.383–5,2.3.384	 yadi tu sarvatra eva prayoktṛ śaktiḥ udāsīnā bhavet tadā jyotiṣṭoma anna viśiṣyeta śyenaḥ śāstrīyāyām pravṛttau agnīṣomīya iva niṣedha śāstrasya anavakāśāt jyotiṣṭome anullaṃghita niṣedhaḥ adhikārī svargasya aniṣiddha tvāt śyene tu hiṃsāyāḥ pratiṣiddha tvāt utkrānta niṣedhaḥ adhikārī iti ced mā evam adhikāri daśāyām api bhavat mate vidheḥ prayoktṛ tva anapāyāt naniṣedha śāstram avakāśam labhate iti śyene api na avadhīrita niṣedhaḥ adhikārī syāt 
NM_5,2.3.385	 nanu ! na vidhiḥ phale prayojyam prerayati phalam kuru iti karmaṇi tvenam pravartayati yajasva iti tena adhikāri daśāyām apratihataḥ niṣedha śāstra avakāśaḥ āyuṣman ! asmat pakṣam eva āśritaḥ asi phale ced na pravartayati vidhiḥ puruṣam phala arthi tvāt eva enam upāye pravartamānam tatra api na prerayet upāya anabhijñasya tu upāyam eva darśayet yāvat aprāptam hi vidheḥ viṣayaḥ tat uktam jānāti eva asau mayā etat kartavyam upāyam tu na veda eti pratītiḥ api iyam īdṛśī abhicaran yajet iti yadi tvam śāstrīyena upāyena vairiṇam hantum udyataḥ śyenena jahi śyenaḥ tava upāyaḥ iti arthaḥ tad alam ati prasaṅgena 
NM_5,2.3.386	 kāma adhikāreṣu tāvat na phala ākāṅkṣī vidhiḥ phalam tu adhikārehetuḥ iti sthitam niṣedha sthale vidhi arthaḥ pratiṣedha adhikāre api pratyavāyaḥ na kalpate niṣedhyāt viṣayāt eva labdha tvāt adhikāriṇaḥ tatra asau kalpyamānaḥ api naraka ādi phala udayaḥ avaidha tvam prapadyeta na hi ākāṅkṣedṛśī vidheḥ vidheḥ apekṣe dve eva niyojya viṣayau prati tad pūraṇena tṛptaḥ tu na vā aṃchati tatas adhikam niyojyaḥ tāvat etāvān kruddhaḥ ari hanana udyataḥ viṣayaḥ tad nivṛttiḥ ca niyogaḥ yatra gamyate niṣedha sthale nirvāha kramaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.387	 nanu ! etāvat na vibudhyāmahe niṣedha vidheḥ kaḥ viṣayaḥ iti bhāva arthāḥ karma śabdāḥ tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta iti sthite nañarthaḥ tāvat pūrva aparībhūta tva abhāvāt na vidheḥ viṣayaḥ ananvita abhidhānāt ca na hi nañaḥ anantaram liṅa vibhaktiḥ śrūyate api tu hanteḥ hananam api na vidheḥ viṣayaḥ tasya dharma tva prasaṅgāt nañprayogasya vaiyarthya prasakteḥ hanane capuruṣasya svatas pravṛtteḥ ca nañviśiṣṭaḥ api na hanti arthaḥ asya viṣayaḥ tayoḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva abhāvāt yuktam dadhnā juhoti iti home dadhi anurakta tā hanteḥ svarūpa nāśāt tu na nañartha anurakta tā 
NM_5,2.3.388–5,2.3.389	 puruṣa prayatnaḥ api na kevalaḥ vidheḥ viṣayaḥ svatā ssiddha tvāt na apinañartha anuraktaḥ kutra api nañarthasya viśeṣaṇa tva anupapatteḥ na hiṃsi āditi asya paryudāsatva asaṃbhavaḥ atha ayam abrāhmaṇa ādi nyāyena hantau paryudaste bhāva artha antare niyogaḥ kalpyate na hanyāt iti kaḥ arthaḥ anyat kim api kuryāt iti tarhikim tad bhāva antaram iti na vicārayitum śakyam yat kiṃcid iti ced na tasya svatassiddha tvena vidhi anarha tvāt avaśyam jīvan pumān kiṃcid karoti paṭhati gacchati bhaṅkte ca 
NM_5,2.3.390	 atha viṣaya aṃśam parihṛtya pramāṇa aṃśe nan niviśate sā hi pravartamāna pumāṃsam ruṇaddhi yat hanyāt tat na iti tat api anupapannam anvita abhidhānena vidhi vibhakteḥ hantinā avaruddha tvāt preraṇa śakti svabhāvaḥ vidhiḥ sthitaḥ yaḥ tu niṣedha ātmā nan pārśvem sthitaḥ tatra na vidhiḥ saṃkrāmati saṃkrāntau= api nañaḥ ca saṃbandhe sati vidheḥ svarūpa nāśaḥ avagamyate svabhānaḥ hi eṣa nañaḥ yat ayam yena yena saṃbadhyate tasya tasya abhāvam bodhayati iti atas vidhi saṃbandhe nañaḥ iṣyamāṇe etāvān vākya arthaḥ avatiṣṭhate hanana vidhiḥ na asti iti tatas ca hananasya vidhi tvam ca syāt niṣedha vākya artha siddhāntaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.391–5,2.3.392	 atra ucyate dadhnā juhoti iti homasya vacana antara codita tvāt vidhi vibhakti śaktiḥ upapadam saṃkāmati iti yathā varṇitam evam iha api hana nesu ataḥ pravṛtta tvena vidhi vaiphalyāt nañaḥ ca śrūyamāṇasya anarthakya prasaṅga ātvidhāyikā śaktiḥ nañartham eva spṛśati iti kim na iṣyate nanu ! ukta matpra bhāva arthāḥ karma śabdāḥ iti tatra dadhi anuraktohomaḥ eva vidhīyate iti phalataḥ dadhi vihitam bhavati na pramāṇataḥ ihatu nañaḥ tad upamarda svabhāva tvāt saṃsargaḥ dadhi ādeḥ iva kalpate 
NM_5,2.3.393–5,2.3.394	 mā evam nivṛttim eva kurvan viśeṣaṇībhavati sā iyam nañupahite hanta auśrute hanana nivṛttiḥ gamyate yathā siddha rūpa dadhi anupraveśe api na homasi asādhyamānā avasthā nivartate tathā nañanuviddha hanti artha avagatau na pūrva aparībhāva buddhiḥ nivartate na hi abrāhmaṇa vat na hanyāt iti siddha rūpa buddhiḥ saḥ ayam hanana nivṛtti rūpaḥ pūrva aparībhūtaḥ arthaḥ vidhi viṣayaḥ bhavati prakāra antareṇa niṣedha vākya arthaḥ athavā vibhakti arthena nan saṃbhantsyati śuddhasya liṅā ādeḥ arthaḥ pravartakaḥ nañupahitasya tasya arthaḥ nivartakaḥ iti śabda śaktiḥ eva eṣā vā aparyanuyojyā iti 
NM_5,2.3.395	 yat tu sākṣāt nañaḥ anantaram vidhi vibhaktiḥ na utpadyate tat tasya ādhātu tvāt dhātoḥ pare tiṅādayaḥ pratyayāḥ bhavanti na anyasmāt iti yogyatayā atu nañarthena tasya saṃbandhaḥ na ca tatra ayam arthaḥ avatiṣṭhate hanana vidhiḥ na asti iti kintu nañupahitaḥ vidhiḥ audāsīnye puruṣam niyuṅkte tad avacchedakaḥ ca hantiḥ anyathā sarva kriyā audāsīnyam pratīyeta iti alam ati vimardena niṣedha vidheḥ api siddhaḥ anubandha dvaya yogaḥ niṣedha sthale phala vimarśaḥ evam niyoga vyāpāre samāpte phala kalpanā nṛ buddhi prabhavā eva syāt atas sa apekṣatā bhavet katham naraḥ nivarteta pratyavāya bhayāt vinā mā nivartiṣṭa vidhinā tāvat uktam nivartanam pravṛddhatara rāga andhaḥ pratyavāye api kalpite na nivarteta iti evam kim vidhera pramāṇa tā phalam bhavatu mā vā bhūt puruṣaḥ api pravartatām mā pravartiṣṭa vā sve tu na asti arthe khaṇḍanā vidheḥ 
NM_5,2.3.396–5,2.3.397	 pravartana avagāma janane hi vidhi vyāpāraḥ iti asakṛt uktam tatra ca āsyana kiṃcid vaikalyam phala abhāve api vidhi saṃbhavaḥ nanu ! vidheḥ phala apekṣā na asti ced kim tarhi aśrūyamāṇa phala iṣu viśva jit ādiṣu svarga ādi phalam kalpyate anabhijñaḥ devānāṃpriyaḥ na tatra vidheḥ phala apekṣā na ca phalam tatra kalpyate kintu aśrūyamāṇa tvāt adhikāra anubandhasya niradhikārasya ca vidheḥ vidhi tva anirvāhāt adhikāra anubandhaḥ kalpyate tatra sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭa tvāt svarga kāmaḥ codanā śeṣa bhāvena niyojyaḥ kalpyate na ca iyam pauruṣī kalpanā śruti eka deśaḥ saḥ itihi tad vidaḥ tat iyam adhikāra anubandha kalpanā na phala kalpanā iti saḥ ayam anubandha dvaya avacchinnaḥ niyogaḥ vākya arthaḥ niyogasya eva prādhānyam 
NM_5,2.3.398	 vākya artha tvam ca asya pradhāna tvāt anyaḥ hi yajyādiḥ arthaḥ avagamyamānaḥ tad anupraveśena pratīyate iti guṇaḥ bhavati niyogaḥ tu sva mahima ākṣipta dṛṣṭa upakāra aneka kriyā kāraka kalāpa upabṛṃhita svarūpaḥ pratīyate iti prādhānyam abalambate kāryam ced pradhānam ucyate niyogaḥ eva kāryam phalam ced pradhānam uyate tat api na siddham api tu sādhyam sādhya tvaṃca asya niyoga adhīnam iti niyogaḥ eva pradhānam puruṣaḥ tu niyojyamāna tvāt apradhānam iti niyogasya caturvidha tvam 
NM_5,2.3.399–5,2.3.401	 evam niyogaḥ eva pradhāna tvāt vākya arthaḥ sa ca pratīti bheda paryālocanayā catur avasthaḥ ucyate utpatti vidhiḥ viniyoga vidhiḥ prayoga vidhiḥ adhikāri vidhiḥ iti utpatti vidhiḥ agnihotram juhoti iti agnihotra ākhya karma svarūpa utpāda vyatirekeṇa artha antara anavagamāt viniyoga vidhiḥ dadhnā juhoti iti utpatti vidhitaḥ pratipannebhāva arthe tatra dadhi ādi guṇa viniyoga avagamāt 
NM_5,2.3.402–5,2.3.404	 adhikāri vidhiḥ agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti nirjñātekarmaṇi tatra adhikṛtasya puṃsaḥ tatas avagamāt prayoga vidhiḥ tu yaḥ krama paryantam prayoge padārthān avagamayati ayaṃca adhikāra vidheḥ eva vyāpāra viśeṣaḥ iti tat eva asya udāharaṇam agni hotraṃjuhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti kvacid ekasmin= eva vākye rūpa catuṣṭayam vidheḥ avagamyate na tatra pṛthak udāharaṇam apekṣyate yathā etasya eva revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kṛtvā apaśu kāmaḥ hi etena yajeta iti niyogasya rūpa antarāṇi 
NM_5,2.3.405–5,2.3.406	 anyāni api niyogasya rūpāṇi vyāpāra bhedāt avagamyante sa hi bhāva artha sidhi artham tat samartham artham ākṣipati iti tad prayojakaḥ ucyate yathā māṇavaka sthasya adhyayanasya ācārya karaṇa vidhiḥ kvacid anya ākṣipte vastuni labdhe sati tatra aprayojakaḥ vidhiḥ bhavati yathā kraya niyukta eka hāyinyā lābhe sati na pādapa aṃsu grahaṇa artham anyām eka hāyanīm ākṣipati vidhiḥ iti prakaraṇa paṭhita padārtha paṭala parigrahāt cagrāhakaḥ iti vidhiḥ ucyate 
NM_5,2.3.407–5,2.3.408	 kvacid prakaraṇa paṭhitasya api tena agṛhītasya dvādaśa upasadādeḥ prakaraṇāt utkarṣa darśanāt atas eva niyoga garbhaḥ viniyogaḥ iti ācakṣate kvacid viniyojaka śruti ādi pramāṇa virahe api paśu eka tva ādi upādānam śeṣīkurvan= upādāyakaḥ iti ucyate paśunā yajeta iti vibhakyā hi prātipadikā arthaḥ viniyuktaḥ tad stham tu eka tvam uktam eva na viniyuktam ekena aitya śravaṇāt paśuḥ upādīyamānaḥ na saṃkhyā rahitaḥ upādātum śakyate śruta saṃkhyā parityāga kāraṇā bhāvāt ca ekatva viśiṣṭaḥ paśuḥ upādīyate iti upāda ānata śeṣīkṛtam eka tvam niyoga vāda upasaṃhāraḥ 
NM_5,2.3.409	 vaikṛtaḥ tu saurya ādi vidhiḥ prākṛta miti karta vyātā jātam ākarṣaḥ caḥ daka eti ucyate tat idam ekasya eva bhagavataḥ liṅarthasya prayoktṛ śavitaḥ khacita ātmanaḥ pracura vyāpāra vaicitryam upadarśitam iti alam anayā mahām ati mānasavatyā mīmāṃsā artha kathayā saḥ ayam īdṛśaḥ niyogaḥ vākya arthaḥ tasya dvādaśa lakṣaṇyām tad tad rūpam prakāśitam tat na iha likhyate asmābhiḥ grantha gaurava bhīrubhiḥ diṅa mātram tu etat ākhyāyi niyogasya yathā aagamam amuṣman= api vākya arthe vivadante manīṣiṇaḥ niyoga vākya artha nirāsaḥ 
NM_5,2.3.410–5,2.3.412	 liṅā ādeḥ avagamyamānaḥ kārya rūpaḥ preraṇa ātmā ca vākya arthaḥ niyoga eti uktam na ca asau= evaṃrūpaḥ api paridṛśyamāna bhāva artha ādi vyatiriktaḥ avagamyate kriyā eva tāvat kārya ātmā preraṇa ātmā phala arthitāḥ pratīyate tatas anyaḥ tu niyogaḥ na ubhaya ātmakaḥ nanu ! anyaḥ eva kriyā kartṛ saṃbandhāt praiṣa praiṣya sambandhaḥ hi darśitaḥ na yuktaḥ asau kuryāt ityādi śabdebhyaḥ kriyā di vyatirekiṇaḥ na artha antarasya saṃvittiḥ kasya cit preraṇa ātmanaḥ niyogasya atirikta tva nirāsaḥ kim idānīm karoti kuryāt ityādi ca tulye ete pratipattī abhinavam idam śabda jña tvam āyuṣmataḥ na brūmaḥ na bhinne ete pratipattī iti karoti iti pravṛtta kriyaḥ ucyate vartamāna kāla avacchinnaḥ ca kim tu asā aupraiṣaḥ tatas avagamyamānaḥ api prerakaḥ na bhavati na ca kāryaḥ iti brūmaḥ
