NM_6,2.143.395–6,2.143.397	 dṛśyate hi adyatve api vyākaraṇa kovidānām itareṣām ca kṛṣī bala ādīn āṃati mahān vacasi viśeṣaḥ iti evam pramāda ādi mūla gāvyāt yapaśabda prayoga saṃbhava ātaneka śabda gata vācaka śakti kalpanā gaurava prasaṅgāt abhiyoga viśeṣa sādhya māna sādhvasādhu śabda adhigama saukaryāt ca gavā ādīnām eva vācaka tvam na gāvi ādīnām iti sthite pūrva pakṣa upanyastaḥ samastaḥ eva parīvādaḥ parihṛtaḥ veditavyaḥ śabda sādhu tvasya pramāṇa gamya tva pradarśanam tathā hi yat tāvat abhyadhāyi sādhu tva niścaye pramāṇam na asti iti sādhu tvam na indriya grāhyam liṅgam asya na vidyate śāstrasya viṣayaḥ na eṣa prayogaḥ na asti asaṃkaraḥ iti tatra ayam pratiślokaḥ sādhu tvam indriya grāhyam liṅgam api asya vidyate śāstrasya viṣayaḥ api evam prayogaḥ api asti asaṃkaraḥ 
NM_6,2.143.398	 iti śrautre hi pratyaye grasta nirasta roma śāmbūkṛta ādi doṣa rahita udātta ādi dharma saṃbandha prasiddha anupūrvīka varṇa gaṇa ātmaka pada pratibhāsaḥ tāvat asti saca na saṃdigdhaḥ na bādhaka vidhūta dhairyaḥ na aśuddha karaṇa janmā na kalpanā mātra svarūpaḥ iti tatra parisphurat sphuṭa krama varṇa ātmaka pada grahaṇam eva sādhu tva grahaṇam tad viparīta yathā nirdiṣṭa doṣa kaluṣita śabda grahaṇam eva ca asādhu tva grahaṇa miti pratyakṣamye eva sādhu tva asādhu tve iti sādhu tva asādhu tvayoḥ aindriyaka tvam 
NM_6,2.143.399	 nanu ! yadi śrotra karaṇakena eva pratyayena sādhu tva asādhu tve pratipattāraḥ pratipadyante vyākaraṇa adhyayana vandhya buddhayaḥ api pratipadyeran na ca pratipadyante tasmāt na te indriya viṣaye iti na eṣa doṣaḥ vaiyākaraṇa upadeśa sahāya kopa kṛta śrotra indriya gāhya tva abhyupagamāt yathā hi brāhmaṇa tva ādi jātiḥ upadeśa savyapekṣa cakṣuḥ indriya grāhyā api na pratyakṣa gamyatām apojjhati yathā aaha na hi yat giri śṛṅgam āruhya gṛhyate tat apratyakṣam iti yathā vā sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa prāmāṇya siddhau śabda anuviddha bodhe api prāmāṇyam upapāditam ādau 
NM_6,2.143.400	 kila saṃjñā upadeśinā panasaḥ ayam iti vṛddha vacasā cakṣuḥ indriyeṇa panasa jñānam utpadyate saṅketa karaṇa kāle tad ubhaya jam iti avyapadeśya padena vyapanītam vyavahāra kāle tu punar panasa ādi jñānam upadeśa smaraṇa apekṣa cakṣuḥ janitam api cākṣuṣam eva iti varṇitam evam iha api vyākaraṇa kovida upadeśa saciva śravaṇa indriya grāhye api sādhu tva asādhu tve na pratyakṣatām ativartete brāhmaṇa tva ādeḥ ācāra gamya tve api pratyakṣa tvam 
NM_6,2.143.401	 yathā ca brāhmaṇa tva ādi jāti pratītau kāraṇa antaram uktam kvacid ācārataḥ ca api samyak rāja anupālitāt iti manu ādi darśitān avadya vartma anusaraṇa nipuṇatara bhūpati paripālyamāna varṇa āśramāṇām śaṅkita kṛtakaka paṭa ārya veṣa duṣṭa śūdra tā vyabhicāre deśe viśiṣṭa ācāra gamyā api brāhmaṇa tva ādi jātiḥ bhavati evam iha api v i ś i ṣ ṭ a ś a b d a ś r a v a ṇ ā n a n t a r a k ā l a p ravṛtta vyavahāra avagama artha pratipatti sahitaṃśabda anuśāsana śāstra upadiṣṭa prakṛti pratyaya vikaraṇa varṇa la upāgama ādeśa ādi liṅgam avyabhicāri tad svarūpa avadhāraṇe kāraṇam bhaviṣyati yat evaṃlakṣaṇakam artha pratyāyakam ca śabda svarūpam tata sādhu tayā avadhṛtam iti vyāpti grahaṇa upapatteḥ śabda sādhu asādhu tvayoḥ śāstram api pramāṇam 
NM_6,2.143.402–6,2.143.403	 śāstram api śruti smṛti rūpam aduṣṭa śabda prayoga upana ta kratu upakāra karaṇaka svarga ādi phala saṃyogam upadiśat apaśabda bhāṣaṇa prabhava pratyavāya pratipādakam ca vāc yoga vid duṣyati cāpa śabdaiḥ ityādi sādhu tva itara paricchede pramāṇa tāṃpratipadyate eva śāstreṇa sādhu asādhu śabda nirṇayaḥ nanu ! brīhi kalaṃja vat tad svarūpa siddhau satyām tad vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ śāstram kramate na tu tad svarūpam eva vidhatte svarūpasya abhāva artha tvena vidhi viṣaya tva ayogāt iti uktam satyam kintu śruti smṛti śāstrayoḥ dharma upadeśinoḥ yathā upavarṇitena eva prakāreṇa sādhu asādhu viṣaya vidhi niṣedha paratvam tad svarūpa pratipatti kartavyatā param tu vidhi apekṣita vyākaraṇa smṛti rūpam eva śāstram veditavyam mūla vidhi apekṣita sādhu tvā anvākhyāna paratvāt cavya akaraṇasya mūla śāstram api tatra sopāna vyavahitam pramāṇībhavati eva sādhu tva asādhu tvayoḥ śāstra gamyatam 
NM_6,2.143.404–6,2.143.405	 yadi vā pāṇini ādiṣṭa smṛti draḍhimnā mūla bhūtam ācamana ādi vidhivat vaidikam api tathāvidham vidhi vākyam kalpayitum śakyam iti śāstrasya api na aviṣayaḥ sādhu tvam vaiyākaraṇānām prayogasya upādeya tvam śabda vid prayogaḥ ca saṅkara rahitaḥ eva tathā hi anyāḥ eva niravadya varṇa krama udīraṇa udāra gambhīra gatayaḥ sūktayaḥ sūri janasya anyāḥ eva duḥśravāḥ kussita saṅkīrṇa varṇa vibhāga vinihita hṛdaya udvevāḥ grāmyāḥ giraḥ iti pratyakṣam upalabhyate 
NM_6,2.143.406–6,2.143.407	 sa ca ayam asaṅkaraḥ prayogaḥ vyākaraṇa sahāyakam pratipadyamānaḥ sādhu tva avagama upāya tām bhajate eva iti sarvathā na aprāmāṇakaḥ sādhu asadhu śabda vibhāga eti evam ca brāhmaṇena na mlecchita vai na apabhāṣita vai mlecchaḥ havā eṣayat apaśabdaḥ iti ādi a āgama śabdāni api tad upayogīni vyākhyātāni iva bhavanti iti vidheḥ niyama karaṇa saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_6,2.143.408	 yat punar niyama śāstre sādhubhiḥ bhāṣitavyam asādhubhiḥ naḥ iti asmin= apabhāṣitam tat api na peśalam na hi nīra pāna upadeśa vat kṛśa anupāna niṣedha vat vā anavakāśam idam śāstram apaśabdānām anārya jana vadana pratiṣṭhānām yathātathā a rtha prati iti upāya tva darśana pūrvaka prayoga prasaṅga an apāyena prāptau satyām pratiṣedhasya avakāśa saṃbhavāt sādhubhiḥ eva bhāṣaṇasya bhojana prāṅmukha tā ādi vat niyama adṛṣṭa sāphalyāt sādhu asādhu śabda upadeśa saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_6,2.143.409–6,2.143.410	 yat api sādhu asādhu svarūpa anavadhāraṇāt pratipadā upadeśa ādi aśakya tvaṃāśaṅkitam tat api prativihitam yādṛś idam pratyakṣa anumāna gamyam sādhu asādhu śabda svarūpam vyākhyātam tad abalambana purassara niyama karaṇasya suśaka tvāt atas eva sādhu tvam nāma kim ucyate iti yat vikalpitam tat prativihitam eva bhavati yatas vyākaraṇa lakṣaṇa anugama viśeṣitam vācaka tvam sādhu tvam iti uktam tat ca sarva anugāmi go tva ādi vat sāmānyam vā bhavatu pācaka tva ādi vat asatī api sāmānye avacchedakam bhavatu sarvathā tad kṛtonirvahati sarvaḥ vyavahāraḥ vargīkaraṇe hi tat eva kāraṇam iti 
NM_6,2.143.411–6,2.143.412	 athavā punar astu vācaka tvam eva sādhu tvam tathā api tatra niyamaśāḥ traṃsādhubhiḥ eva bhāṣitavyam iti pravartitum arhati eva sādhu śabda bhāṣaṇa vidheḥ niyama vidhi tva saṃbhavaḥ yadi api asādhora vācaka tvāt prayoga prasaṅga ūna asti tathā api sādhu smaraṇa saraṇi samupārūḍha vācaka tva śaṅkā upaplava māna prasaṅga nivṛttaye niyama sāphalyaṃbhaviṣyati vidhi phala tvena niyamasya phalatas parisaṃkhyā kāryam asādhu śabda nivṛttiḥ sthāsyati iti saḥ api na doṣaḥ sādhu asādhu śabda prayogasya puṇya pāpa hetu tvam 
NM_6,2.143.413	 yat api para artha tvāt phala śrutim artha vādīkurvatā puṇya pāpa phala tvam dūṣitam tat api na sāṃpratam artha pratīti pārārthye sati api prayoga niyama apūrva dvāraka puṇya pāpa phala tva saṃbhavāt parṇa mayī ādiṣu api tathā prasaṃgaḥ iti ced bhavatu kodoṣaḥ naiyāyikaiḥ eka ākāra nirabalambana artha vāda pada upadeśa anabhyupagamāt śabda śakti tātparya paryālocanam api taiḥ anyathā kriyate iti prāk vicārita miti tiṣṭhatu eṣā kathā tena kāmadhuk bhavati ityādi vacanāni api vyākaraṇa adhyayana phala prakaṭana paṭūni tathā eva netavyāni sūtre prayojana ākathana nidānam 
NM_6,2.143.414	 yat api sūtra kṛtā svayam prayojanam kim iti na vyāhṛtam iti vyāhṛtam tat api adūṣaṇam eva vyākaraṇam hi vedāṃgam iti prasiddham etat ā himavataḥ ā cakumārībhyaḥ vedaḥ ca yadi niṣprayojanaḥ svasti prajābhyaḥ samāptā nidṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa phalāni sarva karmāṇi jitam cāturvarṇya bāhyaiḥ antya janapada vāsibhiḥ mlecchaiḥ 
NM_6,2.143.415–6,2.143.416	 atha sa prayojanaḥ vedaḥ soṃ agavat tvāt aṃgaiḥ saha eva sa prayojana tām bhajatā eti kaḥ arthaḥ prayojana antara cintayā na hi darśa pūrṇamāsa prayojanāt anyat prayāja ādi prayojanam anviṣyate iti manvānaḥ svayam sūtra kṛt prayojanam na ākhyat vyākhyātāraḥ tu mukhya an uṣaṃgika bheda bhinna prayojana prapaṃca prarocana atiśaya vyutpādana dvāraka śrotṛ jana utsāha paripoṣa siddhaye darśitavantaḥ iti na kaścid upālabhyaḥ vyākaraṇasya vedāṅga tva samarthanam 
NM_6,2.143.417	 katham punar aṃgatā vyākaraṇasya kam upakāram āvahate iti kasya eṣa paryanuyogaḥ veda vat aṃgānām anādi tvāt īśvara praṇīta tvāt vā paryanuyojana anupapatteḥ saṃkṣepa vistara vivakṣayā hi pāṇi nipiṃgala parāśara prabhṛtayaḥ tatra tatra kartāraḥ prasiddhim gatāḥ paramārthataḥ tu vedaḥ iva tad arthaḥ api tad artha avagama upāyaḥ api hi sarve eva anādayaḥ prajāpati nirmitā vā iti evam aparyanuyojyāā iva atas eva vedaiḥ tad aṅgaiḥ ca saha caturdaśa vidyā sthānāni gaṇyante aṅgāni vedāḥ catvāraḥ mīmāṃsā nyāya vistaraḥ purāṇam dharma śāstram ca vidyāḥ hi etāḥ caturdaśaḥ iti bhāṭṭa ukta śabda saṃskāra ādi pakṣaḥ 
NM_6,2.143.418	 ye api śabda saṃskāra ādi vikalpāḥ kṛtāḥ te api bahu bhāṣi tvā apasmāra nirmitāḥ eva na vastu spṛśaḥ śiṣṭāḥ eva atra praṣṭavyāḥ te eva cajānanti ke saṃskṛtāḥ śabdāḥ ke vā tad viparītāḥ kaḥ ca teṣāṃsaṃskāraḥ iti na ca tāvatā śiṣṭa prayoga mūlam eva vyākaraṇam brūmaḥ veda vadana ādi tvasya darśita tvāt andha paramparā prasaṅga doṣa parijihīrṣayā tuśiṣṭa prayoga mūla tvam abhidhīyate vaidyaka smṛteḥ iva anvaya vyatireka mūla tvāt ye hi vyākaraṇa smṛtau sādhavaḥ iti anuśāsyante śabdāḥ te śiṣṭaiḥ tathā eva prayujyamānāḥ dṛśyante harītakī bhakṣaṇāt iva ārogyam na tu śiṣṭebhyaḥ śabda samāmnāyam adhigamya pāṇiniḥ grantham praṇītavāt na ca anvaya vyatireka abhyadravya śaktīḥ avagamya carakam praṇītavān iti vidyānām anāditva abhidhānāt 
NM_6,2.143.419–6,2.143.420	 etena itaretara āśrayam api pratyuktam na hi śiṣṭebhyaḥ vyākaraṇasyaprabhavaḥ iti śiṣṭa prayukta apaśabdānām gamanikā yat tu śiṣṭānām api pramādi tvam upavarṇitam kila purāṇaiḥ munibhiḥ api bahubhiḥ apa śabdāḥ prayuktāḥ iti tatra abhiyuktaiḥ tad apanayana mārgaḥ pradarśita ā iva sa tu grantha vistaratrā sādiha na pratanyate pāṇinyādi uktiṣu doṣa śaṅkā parihāraḥ 
NM_6,2.143.421–6,2.143.422	 yat api pāṇinitantre dhātu prātipadika kāraka ādi anuśāsana visaṃṣṭhula tvam aneka śākham ākhyāpitam tat api nipuṇa matibhiḥ pratisamāhitam eva na cateṣām api doṣa utprekṣaṇa saṃbhavāt anavasthā nipuṇa darśita mārge vipla vakāra vaitaṇḍika paṇḍita taskara avakāśa anupapatteḥ śobhā ādi śabdānām sādhu tvam etena śobhā cīrṇa varṇa vareṇya gaṇeya bhrājiṣṇukān diśīka ādi śabda asaṃgraha smṛti saṃdeha viparyaya ādi dūṣaṇāni api kaiścid utprekṣitāni pratikṣiptā nimantavyāni tāni ca taiḥ eva samāhitāni iti bṛhaspati vacanasya gati pradarśanam 
NM_6,2.143.423–6,2.143.424	 bārhaspatyam api sūtram asūtram eva iti alaṃsva manīṣikā kalpitānalpa durvikalpa ḍaṃbara uttarbhita alīka pāṇḍitya garva gala grahaṇa gadgada girām udvega kāriṇā anena vastu vicāreṇa sarvathā prakṛti nirmalam ati udāram vyākaraṇa ambaram evaṃprāyaiḥ parivāda pāṃsu pātaiḥ na manāk api dhūsarīkartum pāryate iti siddham tasmāt pavitrāt sarvasmāt pavitram ārya jana bahu matam adhigata caturvargaa grāmyam ātmānam kartum adhyetavyam vyākaraṇam vyākaraṇasya avaśya adhyeya tva upasaṃhāraḥ 
NM_6,2.143.425–6,2.143.428	 āha ca āpaḥ pavitram prathamam pṛthivyāṃapām pavitram paramā hi mantrāḥ teṣām ca sāmargya juṣām pavitraṃmahaṛṣayaḥ vyākaraṇam nirāhuḥ vyākaraṇa adhyayana praśaṃsā iha api uktam rūpa antareṇa devāḥ te viharanti mahī tale ye vyākaraṇa saṃskāra pavitrita mukhāḥ narāḥ kiṃca varam hi jātāḥ timayaḥ gabhīrejalāśaye paṅkini nitya mūkāḥ na mānavāḥ vyākaraṇa abhiyoga prabuddha saṃskāra vihīna vācaḥ manunā ca paṅkti pāvana tvena adhigata vyākaraṇaḥ mīmāṃsakaḥ ca svasmṛta aupaṭhitau yaḥ ca vyākurute vācam yaḥ ca mīmāṃsate adhvaram 
NM_6,2.143.429^1	 iti puṣpadantaḥ api āha bhraṣṭaḥ śāpena devyāḥ śiva pura vasateḥ yadi aham mandabhāgyaḥ bhāvyam vā janmanā me yadi mala kalile martya loke sa śoke snigdhābhiḥ dugdha dhārā mala madhura sudhā bindu niṣyandinībhiḥ kāmam jāyeya vaiyākaraṇa bhaṇitibhiḥ tūrṇam āpūrṇa karṇaḥ vyākaraṇena veda sahakāraḥ evam vyākaṇa abhiyoga sulabha prauḍhā uktibhiḥ paṇḍitaiḥakleśena vicitra vaidika pada vyutpattiḥ āsādyate anyaiḥ api upabṛṃhite dṛḍhataraiḥ aṅgaiḥ nirukta ādibhiḥ vede sva arthadhiyam vitanvati kutas prāmāṇya bhaṅgaḥ bhavet aṅga bhāva nirapekṣayā eva naḥpratyayaḥ yadi ha śabda vidyayā 
NM_6,2.143.429^2	 vaidika artha viṣayaḥ vidhīyatetat kutastyam itaretara āśrayam pāṇi nivyākaraṇa vaiśiṣṭyam ādṛtam askhalita vyavahāraiḥ bhogi matam śruta saṅgibhiḥ āryaiḥ vyākaraṇam katham etat anādi prākṛta lakṣaṇa sāmyam upeyāt śabda prāmāṇya nigamanam evam mṛṣā tvam udagīyata yena yena = chidreṇa kalpita piśāca ravaiḥ anāryaiḥ tad tat samagram apasāritam iti atas ca prāmāṇyam apratihatam sthitam āgamānām pramāṇa vicāra nigamanam iti pramāṇāni yathā upadeśaṃetāni catvāri parīkṣitāni pravanvatām saṃvyavahāram ebhiḥ sidhyanti sarve puruṣa artha sārthāḥ iti jayanta bhaṭṭa kṛtau nyāyamañjaryām ṣaṣṭham āhnikam 
NM_7,2.263.1	 evam pramāṇa padārthe parīkṣite sati yad artham tat parīkṣaṇam tat prameyam idānīṃdarśayitum āha ātma śarīra indriya artha buddhi manaḥ pravṛtti doṣa pretya bhāva phala duḥkha apavargāḥ tu prameyam pramāṇa vat iha api etat sūtram vyākhyāyi sūribhiḥ evam vibhāga sāmānya lakṣaṇa pratipādakam prameya śrutiḥ ātma ādi pada paryanta vartinī teṣām eva prameya tvam na anyasya iti niyacchati 
NM_7,2.263.2–7,2.263.3	 yathā deva datta yajña datta viṇthu mitrā bhojyantām iti evakāra ādi śrutim antareṇa api śabda sāmarthyāt te eva bhojana kriyā yoginaḥ avagamyante na anye tathā iha api ātma ādayaḥ prameyam iti ukte tathā eva tad itara prameya niṣedhaḥ avadhāryate prameya vibhāgākṣepaḥ nanu katham dvādaśavidham eva prameyam avadhāryate yāvatā samāna tantre pṛthivyānī ninava dravyāṇi rūpa ādayaḥ catur viśati guṇāḥ utkṣepaṇa ādi paṃcakarmāṇi parāpara bhedena dvividham sāmānyam nitya dravya vṛttayaḥ antya aviśeṣāḥ ekaḥ samavāyaḥ iti ṣaṣ padārthān anukramya tat avāntara viśeṣaiḥ ānantyam prameyasya upavarṇitam asti 
NM_7,2.263.4–7,2.263.6	 ucyate kim punar iha prameyam vivakṣitam iti tad sāmānya lakṣaṇam tau= aparīkṣyatām prameya sāmānya lakṣaṇam āha sūktam idam kasya api karṇe pṛṣṭaḥ kaṭim cālayati iti dvādaśavidha tvam ākṣiptam na pratisamādhatte bhavān prayeyasya sāmānya lakṣaṇam tuparīkṣate iti ucyate alam kelinā ! etat eva atra pratisamādhānam bhavati na hipramāṇa viṣaya mātram iha prameyam abhimatam evaṃvidhasya prasiddha tvena lakṣaṇān arha tvāt pramāṇaḥ evam jñāte sati tat viṣayaḥ arthaḥ prameyam iti prajñāyataeva kim tena lakṣitena tasmāt viśiṣṭam iha prameyam lakṣyate jñātam samyak atamyak vā yat mokṣāya bhavāya vā tat prameyam iha ābhoṣṭam na pramāṇa artha mātrakam 
NM_7,2.263.7–7,2.263.8	 tat ca dvādaśavidham eva bhavati na nyūnam adhikam vā iti samāhitam itthaṃbhavati vibhāgākṣepaḥ dvādaśānām viśiṣṭa prameya tvam kutas punar eṣaḥ prameya viśeṣaḥ labhyate niḥśreyasa artha tvāt śāstrasya prameya jñānasya pramāṇa jñāna vat anya jñāna upayogi tām antareṇa svatas evamithyā jñāna nivṛtti ādi krameṇa apavarga ahetutva pratijñānāt tathāvidhasya cāpa varga upāya tvasya ātma ādiṣu eva bhāvāt ātma ādīnām prameya tva upapādanam 
NM_7,2.263.9–7,2.263.10	 bhavatu evam ! sūtrasya tu katham īdṛśa prameya viśeṣa samarthane sāmarthyam viśeṣa nirdeśāt tu śabda prayoga sāmarthyāt ca satyam ākāśa kāla diś ādi pramāṇa viṣaya tvāt prameyam bhavati tat tuna sa prayojanam ātma śarīra indriya artha manaḥ pravṛtti doṣa pretya bhāva phala duḥkha apavargāḥ tu prameyam asya eva niḥśreyasa hetu tvāt iti a āśayaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.11	 tat ittham eṣa tuśabdaḥ niḥśreyasa anaṅga bhūta prameya antara parihāra dvāreṇa viśiṣṭam ātma ādi prameyam iha sūcayati tad dvādaśavidha tve api heya upādeya bhedataḥ dvidhā ucyate mumukṣūṇām tathā eva dhyāna siddhaye tatra deha ādi duḥkhāntam heyam eva vyavasthitam upādeyaḥ apavargaḥ tu dvidhā avarithatiḥ ātmanaḥ sukha duḥkha ādi bhoktṛ tva svabhāvaḥ heyaḥ eva saḥ upādeyaḥ tu bhoga ādi vyavahāra parāṅmukhaḥ ātma ādi jñānasya mumukṣu saṃpādya tvam 
NM_7,2.263.12	 ātmanaḥ hi bhoga adhiṣṭhānam śarīram bhoga sādhanāni indriyāṇi bhoktavyāḥ indriya arthāḥ bhoga kāraṇam manaḥ pravṛttiḥ puṇya pāpa ātmikā rāga ādayaḥ ca doṣāḥ śarīra ādi janma hetavaḥ etad kṛtaḥ ca śarīra ādi yoga viyoga abhyāsaḥ pretyabhāvaḥ etat kṛtam eva ca saṃsāre sukha duḥkha rūpam phalam tacya vividham eva vivekavataḥ sarvam duḥkham eva iti evam śarīra ādi duḥkha antam heya tayā eva bhāvanīyam edat anupayuktaḥ ca ātmā api tathā eva etad viyuktaḥ tu ātmā eva apavargaḥ ucyate sa ca upādeya tayā bhāvanoyaityataeva ātma pada saṃgṛhītasya api asya punar nirdeśaḥ sa rdi paramaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ iti tattva jñānasya mokṣa hetu tva upapāpanam 
NM_7,2.263.13	 evam idam dvādaśavidham prameyam heya upādeya tayā tattva jñānena bhāvayana abhyāsāt tad viṣaya viparīta graha ātmakam mithyājñānam kṣiṇoti tattva jñāna udayena asya mithyājñāne apabādhite rāga dveṣa ādayaḥ doṣāḥ tad mūlāt kṣayam āpnuyuḥ kṣīṇa doṣasya na udeti pravṛttiḥ puṇya pāpikā tad abhāva anna tat kāryam śariḥ ādi upajāyate aśarīraḥ ca na eva ātmā spṛśyate duḥkha ḍambaraiḥ aśeṣa duḥkha uparamaḥ saḥ apavargaḥ abhidhīyate 
NM_7,2.263.14	 tat ittham eva dvādaśavidham prameyam ati gahana saṃsāra m ārava sthala prabhava bhīma santāpa nirvāpaṇa mahā hradatām upayāti iti tat eva upa deśa arham iti siddham ātma vicāra upakṣepaḥ virakta saṃkathāḥ tāvat asatām tāpasa uditāḥ ātmā eva tu asti na asti iti katham na paricintyate śarīra ātma vāda upakṣepaḥ tathā ca lokāyatikāḥ para loka apavādinaḥ caitanya khacitāt kāyāt na ātmā anyaḥ asti iti manvate 
NM_7,2.263.15	 na ca tāvat ātmā pratyakṣataḥ gṛhyate ghaṭa ādi vat bāhya indriyeṇa sukhāt iyat manasā vā paricchettum aśakyatvāt anumānam tu na pramāṇam eva cārvākāṇām na ca ātma siddhau kiṃcana liṅgam asti jñāna ādi yogaḥ tu bhūtānām eva pariṇāma viśeṣa upapādita śakti atiśaya juṣām bhaviṣyati yathā guḍa piṣṭa ādayaḥ prāk asatīm api mada śaktim āsādita sura ākāra pariṇāmāḥ prapadyante tathā mṛd ādi avasthāyām acetanāni api bhūtāni śarīra ākāra pariṇatāni caitanyaṃ= prakṣyanti kāla antare ca vyādhi ādinā pariṇāma viśeṣam avaja hantitāni eva caitanya śūnyatām upayāsyanti caitanyavat tvānapāyāt ca tau= antaṃkālam tāni eva smṛti anusandhāna ādi vyavahāra nirvahaṇa nipuṇa tām anubhaviṣyanti iti kim anumānakaḥ ātmā syāt 
NM_7,2.263.16	 āgamāḥ tu manoratha adhirūḍha prāmāṇyāḥ katham ātmānam avabodhayituṃśakṣyanti ayam api ca āgamaḥ asti eva vijñāna ghanaḥ eva etebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāni eva anu vinaśyati na pretya saṃjñā asti iti tat ātmanā unityasya para lokinaḥ abhāvāt kṛtam etābhiḥ apārthaka pariśrama kariṇībhiḥ para loka kathābhiḥ ātmanaḥ aham artha tvam tatra pratyakṣam ātmānam aupavarṣāḥ prapedire ahaṃpratyaya gamya tvāt sa yūthyāḥ api kecana 
NM_7,2.263.17	 asti ayam ahaṃpratyayaḥ kaścid śarīra samāna adhikaraṇaḥ sthūlaḥ aham kṣāmaḥ aham iti kaścid jñātṛ samāna adhikaraṇaḥ jānāmi aham smarāmi aham iti tatra sthūla ādi samāna adhikaraṇaḥ tāvat āstām ahaṃpratyayaḥ jñāna icchā sukha duḥkha ādi sāmāna adhikaraṇya bhāj yaḥ tu ahaṃpratyayaḥ tatra na ātmanaḥ anyaḥ prakāśate na hi jñāna sukha icchā ādi yogaḥ kāya indriya ādiṣu na ca jñāna ādi śūnye arthe jānāmi ityādi saṃvidaḥ jñāna mātra avabhāsaḥ api vāritaḥ pratyabhijñayā jñātavān aham eva ādau aham eva adya vedmi ca na uttarasya ca pūrvasya na jñāna kṣaṇayoḥ dvayoḥ na santānasya ca etasmin pratyaye asti avabhāsanam na uttaraḥ jñānavān pūrvam pūrvaḥ jānāti na adhunā na dvayoḥ dvayam api asti santānaḥ tu na vāstavaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.18–7,2.263.19	 avastu tvāt ca na asau pūrvam kiṃcid jñātavān na ca adya kiṃcid jānāti iti tasmāt aham eva hyas jñātavān aham eva adya jānāmi iti asmin pratyaya ihyaḥ ca adya ca anuvartamānaḥ jñātā pratibhāti iti gamyate śarīram na aham arthaḥ na ca asau kāyaḥ bāla ādi avasthā bhedena nānātvāt acetana tvāt ca evaṃca pratyabhijñā ahaṃpratyaya grāhye jñātari siddhe saḥ ayam sthūla ādi samāna adhikaraṇaḥ ahaṃpratyayaḥ tad abheda upacāreṇa śarīre vartamānaḥ mithyā iti kalpayiṣyate na punar etat anurodhena jñāna ādi samāna adhikaraṇa ahaṃpratyaya mithyā tva kalpanam yuktam abādhita tvāt na khalbaham jānāmi iti pratyayaḥ kena cit alpīyasā doṣa kāraṇena kaluṣīkartum pāryate tat asya ātmā eva mukhyaḥ viṣayaḥ tat atiriktam vastu bhāktaḥ iti tasmāt ahaṃpratyaya gamya tvāt ātma apratyakṣaḥ iti ātmanaḥ ahaṃpratīti viṣaya tve vivādaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.20	 atra vadanti śabda mātra uccāraṇam etat aham jānāmi aham icchāmi ahaṃsukhī aham duḥkhī iti na tu jñāna ādi svarūpa atiriktaḥ tad āśrayaḥ kaścid etāsu buddhiṣu parisphurati iti katham ekasyām eva saṃvidi kartā ca karma cātmā bhavet grāhya grāha ka tā ekasya jñānasya apākariṣyate tvayā api na iṣyate ca iti tathā na asti ātmanaḥ api sā vijñāna ātmanaḥ jñātṛ tva asaṃbhāvaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.21	 yat ca avasthā akṛtam bhedam abalambya grāhma grāhaka bhāva samarthanam ekasya eva ātmanaḥ kṛtam kila dravya ādi rūpam ātmanaḥ grāhyam jñātṛ rūpam ca grāhaka miti tad anupapannam dravya ādi rūpe grāhye na jñātari grāhyatā sādhitā syāt ātma vartinaḥ api dravya ādi rūpasya ghaṭa ādi tulya tvāt vyavasāya anuvyavasāyar vailakṣaṇya vimarśaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.22	 yat api nipuṇaṃmanyaiḥ ucyate bhavatu jñātṛ tā iva grāhikā tathā api viṣaya upādhikṛ taḥ asti eva bhedaḥ ghaṭa avacchinnā hi hi jñātṛ tā grāhmā śuddhā evatu jñātṛ tā grāhikā iti ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti kaḥ arthaḥ katham ja anantam ātmānam jānāmi iti asmad prayoga saṃbhedāt ca evam avakalpate anyatratu śuddha viṣaya grahaṇam eva bhavati ghaṭaḥ ayam iti tat etat api saralam ati pratāraṇa mātram yathā hi ghaṭaḥ ayam ittra ghaṭa mātra pravaṇā eva saṃvid evaṃasmad prayoga saṃbhede api ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti atra ghaṭa pravaṇā eva buddhiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.23–7,2.263.25	 iyān= tu viśeṣaḥ pūrvam kevalam ghaṭa grahaṇam adhunā tu jñāna viśiṣṭa ghaṭa avamarśaḥ iti vijñānasya ātma tve yuktiḥ nanu ! vibhajyamānāyām pratītau ghaṭaḥ ayam iti tāvat viṣaya grahaṇam jānāmi iti tu jñāna grahaṇam api bhavatu nāma aham iti tu kasya grahaṇam na ca ekasyām eva pratītau aṃśa vibhāgā iva prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam cavaktum yuktam ghaṭam iti jānāmi iti ca pramāṇam aham iti tu na pramāṇam iti tasmāt atra jñātuḥ ava bhāsaḥ abhyupeyaḥ uktam atra na ekasyām pratītau= ātmanaḥ kartṛ tā karma tā ca syātām iti grāhyasya eva na grāhaka tvam 
NM_7,2.263.26	 yaḥ tu upādhiḥ tu ayā unnetum upakrāntaḥ saḥ ayam na ghaṭate ghaṭa pravaṇa tvāt ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti pratīteḥ vibhajyamāna tve api ghaṭam iti jānāmīti ca aṃśa dvayam viṣaya niṣṭham eva jātam aham iti tu ayam aṃśaḥ yadi ātma viṣaya eṣyate tarhi saḥ eva tu śuddhaḥ avaśiṣyate grāhyaḥ grāhakaḥ ca iti na avasthā kṛtaḥ tad bhedaḥ samarthitaḥ syāt bheda abhāvena ca ekasya eva grāhya grāhaka bhāvam anupādhikam abhidadhatā vijñāna vāda vartma saṃśritam syāt tasmāt ahaṃpratyayasya grāhakāt bhinnam grāhyam abhidhitsatā śarīram eva grāhyam abhyupagantavyam jñāna sāmānādhikaraṇyā anupapatteḥ ca varam asya mithyātvam astu nāma ātma avalambanatā atas eva kṛśa śyāma sāmāna adhikaraṇya dhīḥ śarīra ālambana tvasya sākṣiṇī na virotsyate aham arthasya śarīra atirikta tvam na anubhava siddham 
NM_7,2.263.27–7,2.263.28	 nanu ! mama idam śarīram iti bheda pratibhāsāt katham ahaṃpratyayaḥ śarīra ālambanaḥ syāt bhoḥ sādho ! na evaṃvidheṣu viśvasitum arhati mama ātmā aiti api bheda pratyaya darśanāt atha avasthā bheda ādinā yathā tathā tad samarthanam āsthīyate tat iha śarīra ālambana tve api sā eva saraṇiḥ anusariṣyate tasmāt ahaṃpratyayaḥ śarīra ālambanaā iva iti sa ca jñāna ādi samāna adhikaraṇaḥ mithyā sthūla ādi samāna adhikaraṇaḥ tu samyak iti mama śarīram iti pratiteḥ mithyātvam 
NM_7,2.263.29–7,2.263.30	 ye tu mama śaroram mama ātmā iti buddhī  te dve api mithyā mama pratyayasya ahaṃpratyaya vat ātma anālambana tvāt śarīre ca bheda anupapatteḥ mama pāṇiḥ bhujaḥ vā iti bhinna tvāt upapadyate śarīram tu mama iti eṣā kalpanā rāhu mūrdha vat tasmāt ahaṃkāra mamakārayoḥ dvayoḥ api aviṣaya tvāt ātmā parokṣa eti siddham ātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśa tva pakṣaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.31	 apare punar āhuḥ  grāhya grāhaka rūpa ubhaya saṃpatteḥ ekasya karma tvam kartṛ tvam cayugapada ātmanaḥ manyāmahe kintu citi śakti svabhāvam apara sādhanam aparokṣam ātma tattvam pracakṣmahe na hi ātmā anya janyena jñānena ghaṭa ādiḥ ḥ iva prakāśyate api tu svatas eva prakāśyate cetana tvam api tasya naisargikam eva na karaṇa upanīta citi yoga nibandhanam cit yogāt hi cetana tve ghaṭa ādau= api tad prasaṅgaḥ na ca asti niyama hetuḥ aneka kāraka nikara parighaṭita tanuḥ api citiḥ ātmānam eva jñātāram karoti na kāraka antaram iti tasmāt svatas eva cit svabhāva tā tasya bhadrikā tat idam ātma prakāśanaṃsaṃvid vat avagantavyam yat āhuḥ saṃvita saṃvid tayā eva saṃvedyate na saṃvedyatayā iti na asyāḥ karma bhāvaḥ vidyate iti arthaḥ evam ātmā grāhaka tayā eva prakāśyate nagrāhyatayā iti tat vairupyasya codanam anupapannam iti ātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśa tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.32	 etat api na caturaśram apara sādhanam iti kaḥ arthaḥ upāya antara nirapekṣam eva prakāśamānam ātma tattvam āste iti tat ayuktam akaraṇikāyāḥ pratīteḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt apūrvam ca tat kim api yathā abhyupagata pramāṇa atiriktam eva pramāṇam syāt na ca niyama kāraṇam atra paśyāmaḥ tathā prakāśamānaḥ sva eva ātmā prakāśate na parātmā iti prakāśamāna tvena ca ātmanaḥ nūnam anubhūyamāna tā vācyā anubhūyamāna tā ca anubhava karma tvam itarathā asyāḥ pratyakṣa tā eva na syāt ātmanaḥ aparokṣa tva nirākaraṇam 
NM_7,2.263.33–7,2.263.34	 atha ucyate na pratyakṣaḥ ātmā kiṃntu aparokṣaḥ iti na idam artha antara vacanam śiśavaḥ evam pratāryante na prāmāṇikāḥ pratyakṣaḥ ca na bhavati aparokṣaḥ ca bhavati iti citram pratyakṣa jñāna karma tvam asya na asti iti ced tarhi aparokṣa tvam api mā bhūt prakāśa tvāt aparokṣa tvam iti ced na dīpa ādeḥ prakāśasya api andhādibhiḥ agṛhyamāṇasya prakāśamāna tva ayogāt tasmāt prakāśate ced ātmā nūnam anubhūyeta api iti balāt karma tvam aparihāryam atas ca tad avasthā eva dvairūpya codanā jñānam api na svayaṃprakāśam 
NM_7,2.263.35	 prakāśa jñāna pakṣam ca pratikṣepsyāmaḥ sa ca ātmani api tulyaḥ nyāyaḥ kalpanāt vairūpyam ca bhavatām ātmā ca sva prakāśaḥ saṃvid ca sva prakāśa iti na ca nipuṇa matiḥ api vivekam īdṛśam upadarśayitum śaknoti bhavān iyaṃsu aprakāśā phala rūpā saṃvid ayam sva prakāśaḥ jñātṛ rūpaḥ ātmā iti citraṃcedam yat tayoḥ dvayoḥ prakāśayoḥ antarāle tad vyāpāraḥ parokṣaḥ jñāna ākhyaḥ saṃpannaḥ iti ahaṃpratīteḥ śarīra viṣaya tvam 
NM_7,2.263.36–7,2.263.38	 nanu ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti atra traya pratibhāsaḥ ghaṭam iti viṣayaḥ prakāśate aham iti ātmā jānāmi iti saṃvid iti uktam atra ghaṭam jānāmi iti jñāna viśeṣaṇa viṣaya pratibhāsaḥ ahaṃ iti tu śarīre jñātṛ tva bhramaḥ ekasya ātmanaḥ grāhya grāhaka bhāva anupapatteḥ iti ātmanaḥ caitanya rūpa tva asaṃbhavaḥ yat api svatas cetana svabhāva tvam ātmanaḥ kalpyate tat api na sa upapattikam sa cetanaḥ citā yogāt tad yogena vinā jaḍaḥ na artha avabhāsāt anyat hi caitanyam nāma manmahe atmanaḥ jñāna rūpa tve doṣaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.39–7,2.263.40	 yadi ca svatas eva artha avabhāsa sāmarthyam ātmanaḥ tat kim indriyaiḥ prayojanam manaṣṣaṣṭhaiḥ indriya nirapekṣa padārtha pariccheda sāmarthya pakṣe ca sarva sarvajña tā āpattiḥ atas avaśyam jñāna samavāyi nibandhanam eva ātmanaḥ cetayitṛ tvam na ca ghaṭa ādibhiḥ ati prasaṅgaḥ āśaṅkanīyaḥ padārtha svabhāva upanatasya eva kriyā vaicitryasya sarva loka prasiddha tvāt cetana ādi kriyāḥ karma samavāyinyaḥ na bhavanti gamana ādi kriyāḥ tu kartṛ sama vāyinyaḥ tat iyaṃjñāna kriyā api kartṛ samavāyini eva na ca vastu śaktiḥ anuyojyā bhavati na jaḍa tva aviśeṣe api karma ādau samavaiti cit na dravya tva aviśeṣe api gandhaḥ spṛśati pāvakam 
NM_7,2.263.41–7,2.263.42	 tasmāt na pratyakṣaḥ ātmā na api svatas cetayitā iti sthitam ātmanaḥ mānasa pratyakṣa gamya tva pakṣaḥ sva yūthyāḥ tu kecid ācakṣate yadi ekasya kartṛ tvam karma tvam ca anupapannam iti apratyatyakṣaḥ ātmā iṣyate tad ayam anumānena api katham grahīṣyate ātmānam ātmanā aatmā eva liṅgāt anuminoti hi tatra nūnam upetavyā kartṛ tā karma tā asya ca tatra anumāna jñānasya yathā aatmā yāti karma tām tathā ahaṃpratyayasya eṣaḥ pratyakṣasya api gacchatu deha ādi vyatiriktaḥ ca yathā liṅgena gamyate tathā ahaṃpratyayena api gamyatām tad vilakṣaṇaḥ arūpasya api ātmanaḥ pratyakṣa tvam 
NM_7,2.263.43–7,2.263.44	 nanu ! ātmanaḥ kim rūpam yat pratyakṣeṇa sākṣātkriyate  yadi evaṃsukha ādeḥ api kim rūpam yat mānasa pratyakṣa samadhigamyam iṣyate nanu ! ānanda ādi svabhāvam prasiddham eva sukha ādeḥ tarhi tad ādhāra tvam ātmanaḥ api rūpam avagacchatu bhavān sukha ādi ca ityamānam hi svatantram na anubhūyate matu bartha anuvedhāt tu siddham grahaṇam ātmanaḥ idam sukham iti jñānam dṛśyate na ghaṭa ādi vat aham sukhī iti tu jñaptiḥ ātmanaḥ api prakāśikāḥ ātmanaḥ pratyakṣa tvam antarā sukha ādeḥ pratyakṣam na saṃbhavati 
NM_7,2.263.45–7,2.263.46	 api ca jñātṛ jñāna viśiṣṭa artha grahaṇam kila bhāṣya kṛt svayam prādīdṛśat tat ca kim vā yuktam upekṣitum viśeṣya buddhim icchanti na agṛhīta viśeṣaṇām pūrvam ca ananubhūtasya smaraṇam na avakalpate na ca anumānataḥ pūrvam jñātvā aatmānam viśeṣaṇam tad viśiṣṭa artha buddhiḥ syāt kramasya anavadhāraṇāt tasmāt pratyakṣaḥ ātmā ātmanaḥ pratyakṣa tva abhāve pratisandhāna asaṃbhavaḥ sāmāna ādhikaraṇyam ca smaraṇa anubhava ādiṣu anusandhīyamānam yat dṛśyate tat katham bhavet 
NM_7,2.263.47	 pūrvam aham amum artham anubhūtavān aham eva adya punar anubhavāmi iti tulya viṣayam tāvat tulya kartṛkatā api tatra prakāśate itarathā tu anumātum api ātmā na śakyeta jñāna icchā sukha duḥkha ādi kila idam liṅgam ātmanaḥ eka āśraya tayā jñātam anusandhātṛ bodhakam tathā tvena ca tat jñānam āśraya jñāna pūrvakam jñāte tatra aphalam liṅgam ajñāte tu na liṅgatā tasmāt pratyakṣaḥ eva ātmā varam abhyupagamyatām vṛddha āgama anusāreṇa saṃvid ālokanena ca ātmanaḥ anumeya tva pakṣaḥ athavā abhiniveśena kim anena prayojanam anumeya tvam eva astu liṅgena icchā ādinā aatmanaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.48–7,2.263.50	 tat āha sūtrakāraḥ icchā dveṣa prayatna sukha duḥkha jñānāni ātmanaḥ liṅgam icchā nāma tāvat ittham upajāyate yat jātīyam arthamu payuṃjānaḥ puruṣaḥ purā sukham anubhūtavān punar kāla antare tat jātīyam artham upalabhya sukha sādhana tām anusmṛtya tadādātum icchati sā iyam anena krameṇa samupajāyamāna icchā pūrvā para anusandhāna samartham āśrayam anumāpayati kāryasya nirādhārasya anupapatteḥ āśraya mātra pratītau ca ayam anvaya vyatirekavān eva hetuḥ bhavati icchā dharmiṇī āśritā iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ kāryatvāt ghaṭa ādi vat guṇa tvāt rūpa ādi vat iti vā hetuḥ vaktavyaḥ guṇa tvam ca icchā ādīnām acākṣuṣa pratyakṣa tva ādinā rasa ādi vat darśitam ācāryaiḥ ātma anumāna prakāraḥ 
NM_7,2.263.51	 evam anvaya vyatirekavatā amunā hetunā adhiṣṭhāna mātre anumite tad adhiṣṭhāna tve ca deha indriya ādau prasakte pūrva anubhūta sukha sādhanatva anusandhānasa vyapekṣa tad utpādana paryālocanayā tad kārya samāna kartṛka tva avagamāt śarīra ādi pratiṣedhe sati saḥ eva kevala vyatireki bhavane tu viśiṣṭam āśrayam anumāpayati icchā śarīra ādi vilakṣaṇa āśrayāḥ śarīra ādiṣu bādhaka upapattau satyām kāryatvāt atra ca sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ na saṃbhavati iti vedharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ pradarśyate sa ca ghaṭaḥ eva yaḥ abhūt sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ kāryatve nirviśeṣaṇe api ghaṭaḥ saḥ eva vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa viśeṣaṇe yatra vilakṣaṇa āśrita tvam na asti tatra sa viśeṣaṇam kāryatvam api na asti yathā ghaṭa ādau= itina na śakyate vaktum tatra kāryatva mātra yoge api sa viśeṣaṇānām kāryatva abhāvāt vilakṣaṇa āśrita tvam api tatra na asti bhūta āśrita tvena pratyakṣam upalabhyamāna tvāt kevala vyatireki samarthanam 
NM_7,2.263.52	 nanu ca anvaya darśanam antareṇa kevalaḥ vyatirekaḥ pratīyamānaḥ saṃdigdhobhavati kim tad sādhya abhāva kṛtā eva tasya tasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ uta nimitta antara kṛtā iti sandigdha vyatirekasya hetoḥ agamaka tvam niścita vyabhicāra hetu vat iti tārkikāḥ ucyate syāt etat evam yadi prathamam anavagata anvayaā iva kevala vyatireka śaraṇaḥ hetuḥ prayujyeta yatra tu anvaya vyatirekavān eva hetuḥ kaṃcana viśeṣam āśritya kevala vyatireki tām abalambate tatra na sandigdha vyatireka tā avakāśam labhate ghaṭaḥ hi bhū tala āśrita tvena pratyakṣam upalabhyate tat asya vilakṣaṇa āśraya virahāt eva sa viśeṣaṇa hetu śūnyatā jātā nirviśeṣaṇa avasthāyām tad yoga darśanāt iti na sandigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.53–7,2.263.54	 athavā śarīra tvam sāmānyam iha vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntīkartavyam tatra hisarva ātmanā kāryatvasya śaṅkā api na asti na ca tad vilakṣaṇa āśritam śarīra āśrita tvasya pratyakṣam upalambhāt iti icchā liṅgaka ātma anumānam tat iyam icchā prathama padārtha darśana ādi kārya samāna kartṛkatayā a vagamyamānā śarīra ādi vilakṣaṇam āśrayam avagamayati sa viśeṣaṇāt kārya tvāt iti sthitam yaḥ ca sa vilakṣaṇaḥ āśrayaḥ tatrā aatma saṃjñā agamikī dveṣa ādi liṅgaka ātma anumānam 
NM_7,2.263.55–7,2.263.56	 evam eva dveṣa ādeḥ ātma liṅga tā vaktavyā yat jātīyasya arthasya sannidhānāt duḥkham anubhūtavān puruṣaḥ tat jātīyam artham punar upalabhamānaḥ duḥkha sādhana tām anusandhāya tat dveṣṭi iti saḥ api pratisandhātāram ekam antareṇa na upapadyate ābhyām icchā dveṣābhyām anantaram prayatnaḥ samutpadyate saḥ api yathā uktena krameṇa anusandhāna pūrvakaḥ eva prayatamānasya sukha duḥkhe bhavataḥ te api tathā eva draṣṭavye jñānasya ātma anumāna liṅga tvena akathane hetuḥ 
NM_7,2.263.57	 jñānam tu yadi api prathamam anu sandhāna nirapekṣam api bhavati tat api caśakyataḥ eva ātma liṅgam abhidhātum tathā api anusandhāna pūrva icchā ādi kārya prakaraṇāt nirṇaya ātmakam eva jñānam udāhartavyam tatra hi bubhutsā vimarśa ādi pūrvaka tvam upalabdham iti tat eka kartṛka tvam upakalpyate tat evam icchā ādīni ātma liṅgāni iti sthitam aneka hetu kathane doṣa abhāvaḥ śāstre ca aneka hetu uktiḥ na doṣāya kathāsu iva śiṣyaḥ kaścid kvacid kiṃcid anusmṛtya abhidhāsyati 
NM_7,2.263.58–7,2.263.59	 iti kāruṇikaḥ hi muniḥ anekam iha hetu mārgam upadiṣṭavān ātmanaḥ anumeya tve api sukha ādi upalabdhi saṃbhavaḥ nanu ! atra coditam anusandhātāram antareṇa tat etat icchā ādi kāryaṃna avakalpate iti katham jñāyate ekatra pramātari tad darśanāt iti yat ucyate tat idam eka pramātṛ grahaṇāt ātma pratyakṣa tvam aṅgīkṛtam syāt iti vyartham anumānam agrahaṇe tu pramātuḥ ekasya tad pūrvaka tvena icchā ādeḥ pratibandha agrahaṇāt aśakyam anumānam iti parihṛtam etat kāryatvena eva liṅga tvam icchā ādeḥ upavarṇitam asmābhiḥ na smaraṇa ādi samāna ādhāratayā iti 
NM_7,2.263.60–7,2.263.61	 kimarthaḥ tarhi pratisandhāna upanyāsaḥ śarīra ādiṣu tad āśraya tva pratiṣedha arthaḥ na tu evam vyākhyātavantaḥ vayam ekasya pramātuḥ icchā ādi kāryāśraya tva darśanāt eka āśraya tva anumānam iti tasmāt na doṣaḥ ātma sādhaka vyāpti grahaṇa samarthanam nanu katham na doṣaḥ śarīra ādyāśraya tva pratiṣedha sādhane api hetoḥ vyāpti grahaṇa asaṃbhavāt yāvat hi darśana smaśṇa icchā ādi kārya jātam eka pramātṛ niyata tayā anavadhāritam tāvat katham asmad avasthābhiḥ na śarīra ādyāśraya tva niṣedhasya tad pūrvakasya ca ekātma āśrita tvasya siddhiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.62–7,2.263.63	 kaḥ evam āha na gṛhītam eka kartṛka tayā kāryam icchā ādi iti yadi gṛhītaṃtarhi vaktavyam kva gṛhītam kena vā pramāṇena gṛhītam iti sva ātmani eva iti ced saḥ ayam pratyakṣaḥ ātmā bhavet evam anabhyupagame vā na vyāpti grahaṇam iti ucyate na ca pratyakṣaḥ ātmā na ca vyāpteḥ agrahaṇam na ca eva dharmi antare vyāptiḥ gṛhyate kintu sva santānaḥ eva tathā api na sidhī ati pramātṛ niyata tā anumānam katham iva sidhyati santāna antareṣu eka pramātṛ pūrvaka tvena pratisandhānasya dṛṣṭa tvāt vyāpti grahaṇa kāla asaṃbhava pradarśanam 
NM_7,2.263.64	 nanu ! kaḥ atra vyāpti grahaṇa kālaḥ pramāṇa anumāna baddhi tad bhedena bhavitavyam tatas kim idam tatas bhavati katham sva santānaḥ eva vyāptiḥ gṛhyatām katham vā tatra eva pramātṛ niyamaḥ anumīyatām iti seyasu bhayataḥ pāśāḥ rajjuḥ ātmā vā pratyakṣaḥ vyāptiḥ vā duravagam eti ātmanaḥ apratyakṣe api vyāpti grahaṇam 
NM_7,2.263.65	 na etat evam yathā śākya pakṣe sattvāt kṣaṇikatva anumāne vyāpti grahaṇam tathā iha api bhaviṣyati tatra hi yā eva krama yaugapadya vyāvṛttyā sattvasyanityebhyaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ saḥ eva kṣaṇikaiḥ anvayaḥ iti dharmi antara nirapekṣa tayā eva sādhye api dharmiṇi pratibandha grahaṇam ca anumānam ca darśitam tadvat iha api eka pramātṛ pūrvaka tvena pratisandhānasya dharmi antare yadi api grahaṇam na asti tathā api santāna antara bhede yat asya adarśanam tat eva eka kartṛka tva darśanam iti kaḥ anayoḥ hetu tve viśeṣaḥ vyapti grahaṇa asaṃbhava ākṣepa parihārau 
NM_7,2.263.66–7,2.263.67	 nanu ! tatra nityebhyaḥ krama yaugapadya vyāvṛttyā vyāvṛtta tvam śakya grahaṇam iha tu pramātṛ bhedena pratisandhāna vyāvṛttiḥ duravagamāḥ sva santāne api jñāna kṣaṇa abhinnāḥ eva pramātāraḥ na ca tebhyaḥ vyāvṛttam pratisandhānam iti tiṣṭhatu anvayaḥ vyatireka mukhena api kaṣṭam idam anumānam vartate sva santāne santāna antara vat pramātṛ bheda agrahaṇāt tad bheda grahe hi sva para santāna vivekaḥ na syāt yadi evam pramātṛ bheda grahaṇa abhāvāt punar api ātmā pratyakṣaḥ āyātaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.68–7,2.263.69	 mā evam na ātmā pratyakṣaḥ pramātṛ bhedaḥ hi sva santāne na gṛhyate iti uktam na punar tat aikyam gṛhyate anyat ca bheda agrahaṇam anyat catad aikya grahaṇam bheda agrahaṇāt eva ca vyāpti siddheḥ na kaṣṭam anumānam nanu ca sva santāne api pramātṛ bheda agrahaṇam kim pramātuḥ eka tvāt uta jñānānām kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt iti na niścīyate tatas ca saṃdigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ yathā jñānānām kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na asti yathā ca na tad kṛtaḥ ayaṃvyavahāraḥ tathā anantaram eva sa vistaram vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt icchā ādi kāri eṇa yuktam eka pramātṛ anumānam deha ādeḥ icchā ādi āśraya tva asaṃbhavaḥnanu ca āśritam icchā ādi dehaḥ eva bhaviṣyati bhūtānām eva caitanyam iti prāha bṛhaspatiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.70–7,2.263.71	 uktam ca mada śakti vat vijñānam iti ucyate śarīram tāvat na icchā ādeḥ āśrayaḥ śaiśava yauvana vārdhaka ādi daśa abhedena bhinna tvāt tathā hi na anya dṛṣṭaḥ arthaḥ smartum anyena śakyate na ca anyena smṛte tasmin anyasya icchā upajāyate tena adyāt artha vijñānāt prakṛtya icchā samudbhavāt ekasya kārya cakrasya vaktavyaḥ kaścid āśrayaḥ śarīram ca bālya ādi avasthā bhedena bhinnam atas tasya na āśrayaḥ bhavitum arhati santāna antara vat yathā hi devadatta dṛṣṭe arthe na yajñādattasya smaraṇam evam bāla śarīra anubhūte yuva śarīrasya tat na syāt śarīrasya ekatva nirāsaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.72	 nanu avasthā mātram eva bhinnam avasthātṛ śarīra svarūpam abhinnam eva pratyabhijñā pratyaya prāmāṇyāt avagamyate na ca iyam pratyabhijñā lūna punar jāta keśa nakha ādi pratyabhijñāvat anyathā asiddhāḥ vināśasya anupalambhāt stambha ādauhi kṣaṇa bhaṅgi tva pratiṣedhaḥ pratyabhijñayā eva kariṣyate sā ca iha api tādṛśi eva tat ayuktam stambha ādau nānātva kāraṇā grahaṇāt iha tu rūpa pariṇāma sanniveśa ādi anyatva darśanāt sādṛśya nibandhanā iyam bhrāntiḥ eva pratyabhijñā nakhalu śiśu śarīre taruṇa śarīre jarat śarīre ca tulyam eva parimāṇa ādi upalabhyate śarīra bheda sādhanam āhāra pariṇāmāt ca dehabhedaḥ avagamyate pākaja utpatti mārgeṇa na jīryeta annam anyathā na bhavet paripoṣaḥ hi dadhi kṣīra ādi bhakṣaṇe kāṃcika ādi upayoge ca na dṛśyeta asya rakta tā kṣīṇaiḥ avayavaḥ kaiścid kaiścid ca abhinava udgataiḥ abhinnaḥ eva avayavī katham bhavitum arhati 
NM_7,2.263.73–7,2.263.74	 tathā ca kecid pacyamānasya ghaṭa ādeḥ api prāk avasthā visadṛśa rūpa ādi yoginaḥ pāka kāraṇa bhūta vegavat agni dravya saṃyoga paryālocanayā eva pralaya udayaukalpitavantaḥ pīlu pākavāda varṇanam yadi api kanduka nikṣiptā ghaṭa ādayaḥ tṛṇa parṇa ādi pihita vapuṣaḥ a pi tad vivara prasṛtena nayana raśminā na vinaṣṭāḥ iti upalabhyante yadi api tad saṃkhyā tad parimāṇaḥ tad sanniveśaḥ tad deśāḥ ca pakvāḥ api dṛśyante yadi api patantaḥ na vibhāvyante yadi api ca tadā teṣām kartṛ ādi kāraka kalāpa asaṃbhavāt punar ghaṭanam aghaṭa mānam iva lakṣyate tathā api teṣām anumānena vināśaḥ parikalpyate sarva avayaveṣu antar bahis ca pākāt pūrvarūpa ādi vilakṣaṇa guṇa upalabdheḥ antar praveśaḥ kṛśānoḥ anumīyate tena vegavatā vahni dravyeṇa nodanāt abhighātāt vā nūnam ghaṭa ādi ārambhakeṣu avayaveṣu kriyā jāyate kriyātaḥ vibhāgaḥ vibhāgāt dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga vināśaḥ tad vināśāt dravya vināśaḥ iti 
NM_7,2.263.75–7,2.263.77	 anupraveśa pakṣe api sūkṣma vivara parikalpanāt avaśyam avayava saṃyoga vighaṭanam ghaṭa ādeḥ iti vināśaḥ eva pīlu pāka vāde yukti antaram api ca pāka anantaram kandukāt apakṛṣyamāṇāḥ piṭhāra ādayaḥ kecid sphuṭitāḥ kecid vakra tām gatāḥ kecid sanniveśa antaram eva pratipannāḥ dṛśyante tasmāt api paśyāmaḥ naśyanti iti tad saṃkhya tvāt iti sarvam anaikāntikam sūcī agra viddha kaṇṭha koṇaiḥ kumbha ādibhiḥ atas pūrva ukta nītyāḥ naṣṭeṣu ghaṭa ādi kārya dravyeṣu paramāṇavaḥ evapacyante pakvāḥ ca śyāma ādi guṇān avaja hataḥ rakta ādi guṇa antara yogam anubhavantaḥ prāṇi gata sukha duḥkha upabhoga sādhana bhūta adṛṣṭa preryamāṇāḥ parasparam saṃyujya dyaṇuka ādi prakrameṇa tādṛśam eva ghaṭa ādi kāryam ārabhante tatra amuṣmin kṣaṇe amuṣya kāryasya prasavaḥ amuṣya pralayaḥ iti prakriyā na likhyate grantha vistara bhayāt aprayojana tvāt ca iti āmra phala ādiṣu api pīlu pākaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.78–7,2.263.79	 evam tapana ātapa pacyamāneṣu āmra ādi phaleṣu eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ śarīre api audaryeṇa tejasā pacyamāneṣu anna pāna ādiṣu rasa mala dhātu bhāvena pariṇāmam upagacchatsu prāyeṇa pratikṣaṇam utpāda vināśau saṃbhavate iti sthairya abhāvāt katham anusandhāna ādi kārya yogaḥ tasya iti piṭhara pāka vāda samarthanam apare punar pratyakṣa balavat tayā ghaṭa ādeḥ avināśam eva pacyamānasyamanyante suṣira dravya ārambhāt ca antar bahis ca pākaḥ api upapatsyate dṛśyateca pakve api kalaśe niṣiktānām apām bahis śīta sparśa grahaṇam atas ca pāka kāle jvalat anala śikhā kalāpa anupraveśa kṛta vināśa vat tadā api śiśiratara nīrakaṇa nikara anupraveśa kṛta vināśa prasaṅgaḥ na ca īdṛśī pramāṇa dṛṣṭiḥ atas prakṛti suṣira tayā eva kārya dravyasya ghaṭa ādeḥ ārambhāt antarā antarā tejaḥ kaṇā anupraveśa kṛta pāka upapatteḥ alam vināśa kalpanayā piṭhara pāka pakṣaḥ eva peśalaḥ yādṛś eva hi nikṣiptaḥ ghaṭaḥ pākāya kanduke pāke api tādṛś eva asau uddhṛtaḥ dṛśyate tatas 
NM_7,2.263.80–7,2.263.81	 kvacid tu sanniveśa antara darśanam kāṣṭha ādi abhighāta kṛtam upapatsyate pāvaka saṃparka kāri tve tu sarvatra tathā abhāvaḥ syāt tasmāt avinaṣṭāḥ eva ghaṭa ādayaḥ pacyante saḥ ayam tu ghaṭa ādi nyāyaḥ śarīre na iṣyate na hi anna pākaḥ sthairye api tatra kumbha ādi pāka vat caya apacaya yuktam hi śarīram upalabhyate tasmāt parimāṇa ādi bheda darśanāt na ekam śarīram iti jvālā ādi pratyabhijñāvat tat pratyabhijñā iti sthitam avasthā avasthā avatoḥ bheda abheda vimarśaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.82–7,2.263.83	 yat api ucyate avasthānām eva nānātvam avasthātā punar ekaḥ eva deha ākhyā eti tat api ayuktam bheda abheda vikalpa anupapatteḥ yadi śarīrāt avyatiritāeva tad avasthāḥ tarhi tad nānā tvāt śarīra nānā tva prasaṅgaḥ ekasmāt śarīrāt api ananya tvāt avasthānām api anyonyam bhedaḥ na syāt atha vyatiriktāḥ śarīrāt avasthāḥ tarhi bhedena tad upagrahaḥ darśayitavyaḥ na ca asau= asti go tva ādau= anuvṛttā buddhiḥ anyathā asiddhāsatī jāti tad vatoḥ bhedam āpādayantī na kenacid pratihanyate iha punar avasthātuḥ eka tva grāhiṇī buddhiḥ pūrva nītyā pramāṇa bādhita tvāt bhrāntā iti tasmāt śarīrasya bhinna tvāt santāna antara vat smṛti anusandhāna ādi kārya yogaḥ durghaṭaḥ iti na tasya icchā ādi kāri āśraya tvam śarīra caitanya vāda nirāsaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.84–7,2.263.85	 itas ca na śarīrasya jñāna ādi yogaḥ pariṇāmi tvāt kṣīra vat rūpa ādimat tvāt tadvat eva aneka samūha svabhāva tvāt tridaṇḍa ādi vat sānniveśa viśiṣṭāt ca bhūta tvāt vāhya bhūta vat caitanya śūnyam śarīram śarīra tvāt bhūta śarīra vat na śarīra dharmaḥ caitanyam ayāvat dravya bhāvi tvāt na ca saṃyoga ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ tad upajanana apāyayoḥ nimitta antara janya tva darśanāt iha ca tad abhāvāt viśeṣa guṇa tve sati iti vā viśeṣaṇa upādānāt na vyabhicāraḥ tad viśeṣa guṇa tva ihi caitanyasya rūpa ādi vat tad avasthānāt avināśa prasaṅgaḥ kiṇva ādi dṛṣṭānta dausthyam 
NM_7,2.263.86–7,2.263.87	 yat tu mada śakti vat iti uktam tatra mada śakteḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt abhyupagamaḥ na tu jñānasya tatra darśanam nanu jñānam api tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi prāyeṇa dṛśyate bhūteṣu anna pāna ādi upayoga puṣṭeṣu paṭvī cetanā bhavati tad viparyaye viparyayaḥ brāhmī ghṛta ādi upayoga saṃskṛte ca kumāra śarīre paṭu prajña tā jāyate 
NM_7,2.263.88–7,2.263.89	 varṣāsu ca sveda ādinā anati davīyasā eva kālena dadhi ādi avayavāḥ eva calantaḥ pūtanā ādi krimi rūpāḥ upalabhyante caitanye ca gurulāghava vyavahāraḥ api bhūta atiśaya sada sattva kṛtaḥ bhaviṣyati iti bhūta caitanya pakṣaḥ eva yukti yuktaḥ lakṣyate na etat cāru ceṣṭa indriya artha āśrayaḥ śarīram lakṣyate tatra tad anugrahāt indriya anugrahe sati paṭu karaṇa tvāt viṣaya grahaṇam api paṭutaram ivabhavati na ca viṣaya grahaṇāt anyat caitanyam nāma cetanā nām abhautika tvam 
NM_7,2.263.90–7,2.263.91	 etena brāhmī ghṛta upayogaḥ api vyākhyātaḥ vyāpaka tvāt ātmanaḥ sarvatrabhāve sati bhoga āyatana tvena kadācid bhūta avayavānām upādānam atas śukra śoṇita ādi vat dadhi avayavān vikṛta anupādāsyate tathā ca sveda ja ādi bhedena bahu bhedaḥ bhūta sargaḥ pravartate vicitra karma paripāka apekṣayā itiyat kiṃcid etat tasmāt na sarvathā bhūtānām caitanyam iti siddham indriya caitanya vāda nirāsaḥ na api indriyāṇi yathā uktasya jñāna ādeḥ kāryasya āśraya tām pratipadyante darśana sparśanābhyām ekārtha grahaṇāt 
NM_7,2.263.92	 yam artham aham adrākṣam cakṣuṣā tam eva etarhi sparśanena spṛśāmi yamasprākṣa sparśanena tam adhunā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi iti katarat indriyam evam anusanda dhīta na cakṣuḥ sparśa aviṣaya tvāt na tvac indriyam rūpa aviṣaya tvāt tasmāt ubhaya viṣaya grahaṇa samarthaḥ kaścid anusandhātā asti iti saḥ indriya vyatiriktaḥ gamyate guṇa guṇi bheda siddhi ḥamunā eva prasaṅgena rūpa ādi vyatirekiṇaḥ vaktavyā guṇinaḥ siddhiḥ etat buddhi nibandhanā rūpa ādiṣu svatantreṣu na hi eṣa pratyayaḥ bhavet na rūpam asya viṣayaḥ na sparśaḥ na ca tad dvayam 
NM_7,2.263.93–7,2.263.94	 atas ca na guṇa vyatiriktaḥ guṇī bhedena agrahaṇāt iti asiddhaḥ para uktaḥ hetuḥ bheda grahaṇasya darśita tvāt vṛtti vikalpa ādīnām tu pratisamādhānam sāmānya samarthana avasare kathitam avayavi siddhau vakṣyateca iti alam avāntara cintayā indriyāṇām anātma tve hetu antarāṇi itas ca na indriyāṇām caitanyam karaṇa tvāt vā asya ādi vat bhautikāni ca indriyāṇi varṇayiṣyāmaḥ tena yaḥ eṣa bhūta caitanya nirākaraṇe nyāyaḥ varṇitaḥ sa teṣu api yojanīyaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.95–7,2.263.97	 atas ca evam indriya antara vikārāt nyā sū āmre hi cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭe rasa niṣyanda sundare rasanasya vikāraḥ syāt na danta udaka saṃplavaḥ bahūnām indriyāṇām ca bhinna abhiprāya tā bhavet tena ekatra eva santāne nānā cetana tā bhavet ati tucchaḥ ca ayam indriya caitanya pakṣaḥ iti kim atra bahu likhyate manaḥ caitanya vāda nirāsaḥ nanu ! manaḥ tarhi icchā ādeḥ adhiṣṭhānam bhaviṣyati tat hi nityam ekaṃsarva viṣayam abhautikam iti na prāktana dauṣaiḥ spṛśyate ucyate manasaḥ api tat āśraya tvam anupannam kutas jñātuḥ jñāna sādhana upapatteḥ saṃjñā bheda mātram nyā sū 
NM_7,2.263.98^1	 manasaḥ hi icchā ādi āśraya tve jñāna ādau kartṛ tvāt tasya api bāhya gandha ādi viṣaya jñāna yauga padya anupapatteḥ tad grahaṇa karaṇa ghrāṇa ādi adhiṣṭhāna paṭunā kenacid āntara sukha duḥkha ādi viṣaya grāhiṇā smṛti ādi kriyā kāriṇā ca karaṇena bhavitavyam iti tatra ātma saṃjñā bhavet ātmani ca kartari manassaṃjñā iti bāhya antara karaṇayoḥ āvaśyaka tāna ca asya bāhya karaṇaiḥ sidhyanti sakalāḥ kriyāḥ na ca smṛti sukha icchā ādau cakṣuḥ ādīni sādhanam tena icchā ākṛti sukha duḥkha vedanānāṃādhāraḥ na khalu manaḥ na ca indriyāṇi dehaḥ api vrajati na tad samāśraya tvaṃtena anyam puruṣam atas prakalpayāmaḥ ātma sādhane hetu antarāṇi diś pradarśanam idam kṛtam icchā dveṣa yatna sukha duḥkha matīnām liṅga tā kathanam ātmani tatra tvasti hetu nivahaḥ bahuḥ anyaḥ kartṛ prayojya tā khalu dṛṣṭā dātṛ ādi karaṇa jātasya tvac śrotra ādi api karaṇam tathā eva kartrā prayujyeta hita ahita prāpti visarga yogyā ceṣṭā ca dṛṣṭā niyatā śarīre 
NM_7,2.263.98^2	 tad cetanā adhiṣṭhita tām amuṣya gantrī ratha ādeḥ iva kalpayāmaḥ prāṇa ādi mārutānām antar cala tām cala acala gatīnām sahaja nija karma vikṛtau kāraṇam anumīyate kiṃcid idam ca dehāt itaratra durlabhaṃnirīkṣya vṛddhi kṣata bhagna rohaṇam dhruvam grahasya iva gatiḥ prakalpatenija āśraya kṣema parāyaṇaḥ naraḥ manasaḥ jñāna sāmānya karaṇa tvam anātma tvam ca yuktam ca na eva manasā hi anadhiṣṭhitānānsva artha pramākaraṇa kauśalam indriyāṇām syāt kaścid iṣṭa viṣaya anuguṇaḥ prayatnaḥyat preritam samadhitiṣṭhati tāni cetaḥ jñāna prayatna ādim ataḥ atha kasyadṛṣṭānta tā syāt karaṇa ādi liṅge kārye na naḥ paryanuyogaḥ eṣaḥ sāmānya mātrasya tava api siddheḥ ātma nitya tva avaśyaka tā pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇaiḥ yaḥ vyavahāraḥ sa ca ātmanā vinā nityena na iti evam tatas api etasya kalpanā yat pratyakṣam pratyabhijñāsvabhāvaṃjñā tra nya tve tasya na hi ātma lābhaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.98^3	 grāhyasya aikyam yadvat arthasya tasmāt sidhyati evam grāhakasya api puṃsaḥ avinābhauva grahaṇam liṅga jñānam tad anvaya smaraṇam liṅgipramitiḥ iti idam na boddhṛ bhede pramāṇam syāt jñāte vanecara mukhāt ati deśa vākya īdṛṣṭe mṛge vipina vartini go sadṛkṣe tad saṃjñitāmiti phalam labhate pramātṛ bhede na ca idam upamānam iti pratiṣṭham varṇānām śravaṇam krameṇa samaya smṛtyā padārtha grahaḥ tad saṃskāra jamanti avarṇa kalanā kāle tad ālocanam āka aṃkṣa ādi nibandhana anvaya kṛtam vākya artha saṃpiṇḍanaṃjñātra ekena vinā ati durghaṭam atas nitya ātma siddhiḥ dhruvā mayā idam pūrvedyus vihitam idam anyedyus aparaṃvidhātavyam ca iti śruti kṛṣi vaṇijyā ādiṣu janāḥ yat evam ceṣṭante nipuṇam anusandhāya tat amīdhruvam sarva avasthā anugatam avagacchanti puruṣam ātma lakṣaṇa jñānasya phalam iti ātma lakṣaṇam avādi yat etad icchā dveṣa prayatna sukha duḥkha samāśraya tvam 
NM_7,2.263.98^4	 tad saṅginam tat iha heya tayā vyavasyet tat viprayuktam adhigamya tayā mumukṣuḥ vijñāna ātmavāda upakṣepaḥatho tathāgatāḥ prāhuḥ kim puṃsā kalpitena vaḥ jñāna mātreṇa pūrva uktaḥ vyavahāraḥ prasiddhyati jñānam kim ātma vat nityam saugataiḥ upagamyate prāk darśita anusandhāna kāmanā ādi kriyā kṣamam jñānam bauddha gṛhe tāvat kutas nityam bhaviṣyati anye api sarve saṃskārāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ iti gṛhyatām kṣaṇikam ca iṣyate kāryam na kvacid kiṃcid āśritam svatantram jñānam eva atas na anyaḥ tena anumīyate icchā ādīnām jñāna rūpa tvam jñānasya ca prabhedaḥ ayam icchā dveṣa sukha ādikaḥ na vastu antaram iti evam na tatas api anya kalpanam guṇa tvam api na asti asya yatas adhiṣṭhāna kalpanā na guṇa vyatiriktaḥ ca guṇī nāma asti kaścana kṣaṇika vijñāna vāde smaraṇa ādi upapattiḥ nirāśrayeṣu vijñāna skandheṣu kṣaṇa bhaṅgiṣu katham smṛti ādi kāryam vā para lokaḥ api vā katham 
NM_7,2.263.99	 sati api para loke katham akṛta abhyāgama kṛta vipraṇāśau parākriyete yena hi jñānena caitya vandana ādi karma kṛtam tasya vināśāt na tad phala upabhogaḥ yasya ca phala upabhogaḥ tena na tat karma kṛtam iti na eṣa doṣaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya niyāmaka tvāt anādi prabandha pravṛttaḥ hi jñānānām hetu phala bhāva pravāhaḥ eṣaḥ eva ca santānaḥ iti ucyate tad kṛtaḥ ca ayam anusandhānādi kārya niyamaḥ santāna anādi tvāt tad avicchedāt ca para lokaḥ api nakliṣṭa kalpanaḥ santāna sāṃkarya nirāsaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.100	 yadi api santati antara patita jñāna janyam api santati antare jñānam dṛśyate tathā api na tādṛśa kārya kāraṇa bhāvena santāna vyavahāraḥ pratisandhāna ādi kārya nirvāhaḥ vā kintu upādāna rūpa tad viśeṣa nibandhanaḥ eva eṣa nirvahati niyamaḥ tasmin= eva sati svarūpa santāna vibhāgaḥ avakalpate smṛti vat parihartavyau kṛta nāśa akṛta āgamau tad santāna upasaṃkrāntyā kusume bīja rāga vat 
NM_7,2.263.101–7,2.263.102	 āha ca yasmin= eva hi santāne āhitā karma vāsanā phalam tatra eva badhnāti kārpāse rakta tā yathā yathā yasmin= eva hi kārpasabīje varṇaḥ rakta tā ākhyaḥ kṛtaḥ tasya eva kusumam api raktam na anyasya iti tathā yasmin= eva jñāna santāne yādṛśī karma vāsanā tādṛśam phalam tasmin= eva santāne bhavati na anyasmin jñāna eti arthaḥ tathā ca kṛta hāna akṛta abhyāgama doṣa nirāsaḥ ātmanaḥ nitya tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.103	 nityaḥ tu ātmā abhyupagamyamānaḥ yadi sukha ādi janmanā vikṛtim anubhavatitat ayam anityaḥ eva carma ādi vat uktaḥ syāt nirvikāra tve tu satā asatā vā sukha duḥkha ādinā karma phalena kaḥ tasya viśeṣaḥ iti karma vaiphalyam eva tat uktam varṣa ātapābhyām kim vyomnaḥ carmaṇi asti tayoḥ phalam carma upamaḥ ced saḥ anityaḥ kha tulyaḥ ced asat phalaḥ iti 
NM_7,2.263.104–7,2.263.105	 tasmāt utsṛjyatāmeṣaḥ mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ prathamaḥ mohaḥ ātmagrahaḥ nāma tad nivṛttyā ca ātmīya grahaḥ api viraṃsyati aham eva na kim mama iti tat idam ahaṃkāra mamakāra granthi prahāṇena nairātmya darśanam eva nirvāṇa dvāram abalambyatām kṣaṇika vāda upakṣepaḥ tasya ca mārgaḥ kṣaṇika padārtha niścayaḥ kṣaṇikeṣu hi sarva bhāva iṣu nirāśrayeṣu jñānasya api āśraya virahāt kutastyam ātma kalpanam iti 
NM_7,2.263.106–7,2.263.107	 katham punar eṣaḥ sakala pramāṇa atītaḥ kṣaṇika padārtha vādaḥ śakyate śākyaiḥ abhyupagantum na khalu kṣaṇa bha aṅgi tve bhāvānām akṣajā matiḥ pramāṇam kṣaṇikā ākāra kalpanā utpatya sambhavāt athavā api avinābhūta hetu jñāna upapattitaḥ na bhūmiḥ anumānasya vikalpa niyata sthiteḥ smaraṇa pratyabhijñāne pratyuta sthairya sādhake evam ca vaṃcanā mātram āśu nāśi tva deśanāḥ kṣaṇika tva sādhanam ucyate pratyakṣa gamyam kṣaṇika tvam bhavati na bhavati iti eṣam kariṣyatevicāraḥ anumānam tu saṃprati eva abhidhīyate sattvāt kṣaṇikāḥ padārtha aiti sattvam tāvat artha kriyā kāritvam ucyate yathā uktam artha kriyā samartham yat tat eva parama artha sat iti sattva svarūpam kim 
NM_7,2.263.108	 sat pratyaya gamya tve hi sattve keśoṇḍraka ādeḥ api sattva prasaṅgaḥ sattā sambandhi tve tu sattve sāmānya ādīnām tad asambandhāt asattvam syāt artha kriyā sāmarthya sattva anuvartī ca laukikaḥ vyavahāraḥ sati api putre tad kārya adarśanāt aputrāḥ vayam iti vyapadiśanti laukikāḥ putrāt anyasmin= api tad kārya kāriṇi sati sa putrāḥ vayam iti ca bruvate tasmāt artha kriyā kāri tvam eva sattvam sattvasya kṣaṇika tva sādhaka tvam 
NM_7,2.263.109–7,2.263.111	 bhavatu evam tasya tu kutra katham vā kṣaṇika tvena vyāpti grahaṇam kutra itiyat pṛcchasi yatra rocate mahābhāgāya ghaṭe paṭe vā gṛhyatām vyāptiḥ kim sādhya dharmiṇī eva vyāpti grahaṇam upapadyate dhīman ! kaḥ atra pramādaḥ na hi daiva nirmitaḥ kaścid sādhya dharmī nāmaḥ grahītum śakyate ced vyāptiḥ yatra tatra sā gṛhyatām iti sattva kṣaṇika tvayoḥ vyāptiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.112	 yat tu katham asyāḥ grahaṇam iti tat ucyate bhāvānām hi sattvam krama yaugapadyābhyām vyāptam nityeṣu ca padārtheṣu vyāpaka anupalambhanāt tad vyāptam api sattvam hi balāt tebhyaḥ nivartate na ca rāśiḥ tṛtīyaḥ asti tena gati antara kṣayāt kṣaṇikān eva tān bhāvān sattvam sama balambate tat ca sva grāhakāt bodhāt asandigdham pratīyate jñāna utpattyā eva tad hetoḥ asāmarthye parākṛte asamarthāt samutpādaḥ dṛśyate na hi kasyacid śakta aśakta prasūta tvena tad bodhaḥ asti saṃśayaḥ atas eva ca tat jñānam pramāṇam jagadussadā svarūpe śakti ja tve tu saṃśaya ādeḥ asaṃbhavāt 
NM_7,2.263.113	 kim idam rajatam uta śuktikā iti viśeṣa aṃśe saṃśeratām nāma pramātāraḥ na tu sāmarthyam prati dolā kācid saṃbhavati kim idam jñānam samarthena janitam uta tad itareṇa iti asamarthasya janakatvā anupapatteḥ vyāpaka an upalambhasya api vyāpti grāhiṇaḥ svatas eva prāmāṇyam saṃśaya viparyayoḥ tatra api abhāvāt nitya padārthasya asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.114–7,2.263.115	 katham punar nityeṣu padārtheṣu sattva vyāpakayoḥ krama yauga padyayoḥ anupalambhaḥ ucyate nityaḥ hi bhāvaḥ krameṇa vā kāryam kuryāt yaugapadyena vā paraspara parihāra vyavasthita ātmanām tṛtīya prakāra anupapatteḥ kramaśas kārya utpatti pakṣa dūṣaṇam na tāvat krameṇa sa hi samarthaḥ vā syāt asamarthaḥ vā syāt samarthaḥ ced kim krameṇa samarthasya kāla kṣepa ayogāt asamartha ḥ tua samartha tvāt eva na karoti kiṃcid iti tasya api kim krameṇa sahakāri sānnidhi ādi anupapattiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.116–7,2.263.117	 sahakārī apekṣayā karoti iti ced na asamarthasya sahakāriṇā api sāmarthya ādhāna anupapatteḥ samarthasya svatas eva sāmarthye sati saha kāri vaiyarthyāt sahakāri sannidhāne api ca asya svarūpeṇa vā kartṛ tvam syāt para rūpeṇavā svarūpasya ca prāk api bhāvāt tasya ca kāraka tvāt kim sahakāriṇā para rūpeṇa kartṛ tve pūrvarūpa parityāgāt tad rūpa antara āpatteḥ cakṣaṇika tvam āpadyate sahakāri tvam api durvacam 
NM_7,2.263.118–7,2.263.119	 evam sahakārī api samartha asamartha tayā vikalpanīyaḥ svataḥ asya sāmarthī ekim para upakāra anusaraṇa dainyena asamarthaḥ tu sacivaḥ kim āgatya api tapasvīkariṣyati kiṃca kiṃcitkaraḥ vā saha kārī syāt akiṃcitkaraḥ vā akiṃcitkara pakṣe sarvaḥ sarvasya sarvatra kārye sācivyam upagacchet kiṃcitkaraḥ ced vaktavyam kim karoti iti 
NM_7,2.263.120–7,2.263.121	 upakāram iti ced saḥ upakriyamāṇāt bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ vā abhinnaḥ ced saḥ eva kṛtaḥ syāt bhede tasya kim āyātam yat asau na pūrvavat āste kāryāt api bheda abhedābhyām cintyaḥ upakāraḥ na kāryāt bhinnaḥ anupalambhāt dvaya karaṇa abhāvāt ca kāryāt avyatireke tu upakāre sahakāriṇā kriyamāṇe kāryam eva tena kṛtam syāt iti mūla kāraṇa ānarthakyam ekaikasya kāraka tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.122	 nanu ca ekaḥ eva bhāvaḥ kārakaḥ saḥ eva hi samarthaḥ tad itara padārtha sannidhānam tu sva hetu vaśāt upanītam iti na upālambham arhati na etat yuktam ekasya kadācid api kāraka tva anupalabdheḥ tad sāmarthyasya duradhigama tvāt evam hi asau samartham ucyate yadi ekaḥ kadācid kāryam utpādayan dṛśyeta na tuvismṛtyā api dṛśyate 
NM_7,2.263.123	 atha kāryasya ayam svabhāvaḥ yat ekasmāt na utpadyate kāraṇam tu śaktam eva iti tat api ayuktam kārya svabhāva para adhīna tvena kāraṇasya sāmarthya viraha prasaṅgāt evam hi asau samarthaḥ kathyeta yadi kārya svabhāvam anādṛtya svatantraḥ ekaḥ eva prasahya kāryam janayet na ca evam dṛśyate iti yat kiṃcid etat kāraṇe sāmarthyam durupapādam 
NM_7,2.263.124	 atha samartham eva kāraṇam tasya tu ayam svabhāvaḥ yat sahasā eva kāryaṃ na karoti katipa yakṣaṇa vyavadhāne tu kāryam karoti iti yadi evam na kadācid kārya utpādaḥ syāt kāryīt pāda samaye api katipa yakṣaṇa vyavahita kārya janana svabhāvān apayāt punar katipa yakṣaṇa avekṣaṇam syāt teṣu apikati payeṣu kṣaṇeṣu atikrānteṣu saḥ eva asya svabhāvaḥ tad avasthaḥ iti punar api evaṃbhavet iti kadā nāma kāryam janayet tat evamādi doṣa upahata tvāt nakrameṇa bhāvānām artha kriyā sāmarthyam yaugapadya pakṣa dūṣaṇam 
NM_7,2.263.125	 na api yugapad loke tathā vyavahāra adarśanāt yugapad kṛta kāryasya api sthirasya punar akaraṇe hetu abhāvaḥ punar ca kurvan= api bhāvaḥ kāryaṃ na tat eva kuryāt kṛtasya karaṇa ayogāt kārya antara karaṇe tu saḥ eva ayaṃpunar krama pakṣaḥ āpatet iti evam krama yaugapadye nityebhyaḥ padārthebhyaḥ nivartete te ca nivartamāne sattvasya vyāpake iti sattvam tebhyaḥ ādau= eva nivartate tebhyaḥ pracyutam sattvam gati antara virahāt kṣaṇikeṣu eva niviśate sattva kṣaṇika tvayoḥ vyāpti grahaṇam 
NM_7,2.263.126	 atas yadi api kārya hetau dhūma agnyoḥ iva svabhāva hetau= api vā kvacitu ṛkṣa tvarśi śapā tvayoḥ iva pūrvam iha sādhya sādhana dharmayoḥ grahaṇam dharmmantare na vṛttam tathā api sādhya dharmiṇī eva vyāpti grahaṇam upapatsyate vipakṣa vyāvṛtteḥ su pariniścita tvāt sā eva ca vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ saḥ eva ca asya hetoḥsva sādhyena anvayaḥ na hi evam sambhavati nityebhyaḥ ca vyāvṛttam sattvam kṣaṇikeṣu ca na niviṣṭam iti tṛtīya rāśya bhāvāt nirāśraya tva anupapatteḥ ca 
NM_7,2.263.127–7,2.263.129	 tat evam kvacid dharmiṇi vyāptau gṛhītāya yadi saḥ eva kadācid paraṃprati dṛṣṭāntīkriyate tadā evam nāma bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ iti kṣaṇikatva anumāne anavasthā parihāraḥ nanu vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ anumānam anumānena ca anumānasya vyāpti grahaṇe anavasthā na anavasthā tāvatī eva paryavasānāt na hi vyāpaka anupalaṣdheḥ anumāna antarāt vyāpti niścayaḥ kintu pratyakṣa vikalpāt eva tad anayā vyāpti niścayāt siddham etat yat sat tat kṣaṇikam iti kṣaṇika tva sādhaka vyāpti grahaṇe pakṣa antaram 
NM_7,2.263.130	 anye tu rīti antareṇa vyāpti niścayam ācakṣate viruddhayoḥ eka paricchede anyatara nivṛttiḥ avaśyaṃbhāvinī viruddha tvāt eva viruddhe ca sattva nitya tve pūrva uktayā eva nītyā sattvam ca vispaṣṭam upalabhyate bhāvānām iti tad upalambhāt nitya tva nivṛttiḥ nitya tva nivṛttiḥ eva kṣaṇika tva niścayaḥ prakāra antara abhāvāt nitya tva agrahaṇe api vyāvṛtti siddhiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.131–7,2.263.132	 nanu ! śīta uṣṇayoḥ pṛthak upalambhāt virodha niścaye yuktaḥ eka grahaṇa īdvitīya vyudāsaḥ iha tu sattvam eva upalabhyate na nitya tvam iti katham tad virodhāt itara vyāvṛttiḥ na eṣa doṣaḥ phṛthagubhaya anupalambhe api sattva siddhyā eva nitya tva nirāsa siddheḥ sattva jñānasya kṣaṇika tve pramāṇa tvam katham anyaṣiyā buddhiḥ anyam udasyati ucyate dvi candra darśanasya eka śaśabhṛt bimba vedinī dhīra tad viṣaya tve api yathā mithyātva kāraṇam tathā sthairya asam āviṣṭā sāmarthya grāhiṇī matiḥ sthira tva aviṣaya tve api tad vyavaccheda kāriṇī sattvam nānā svabhāva tvam sthairyam eka svabhāva tā tayoḥ virodhaḥ yuktyā api vaktum na hi na śakyate 
NM_7,2.263.133–7,2.263.134	 tasmāt sattva pratītiḥ eva nitya tva nivṛttiḥ sā eva ca kṣaṇikatva vyāptiḥ iti siddham sattvāt kṣaṇika tvam kāraka tvam eva kṣaṇika tva paryavasāyi api ca sarvadā kārya anutpādāt kāraka avasthāḥ nūnam eka kṣaṇa sthāyinībhāvānām upagantavyā vyāpāra āveśa vaśena vā śrotriya ādi pakṣe saha kārya ādi sannidhana āsādanena vā naiyāyika pakṣe kāraka tvam nāma vastunaḥ rūpaṃeka kṣaṇa vṛttyā iva kārya utpatti ā iva tad kalpanāt tatas pūrvam uttara kālam vā ākāraka tva yogāt kāraka tvam eva paramārtha sat akārakasya jñāna janaka tva abhāvāt astitvam api durvacam atas ca sarva vādibhiḥ eva prāyeṇa kṣaṇika tvam idam abhyupagatam iti yaśaḥ eva kevalam saugatāḥ pītavantaḥ tasmāt siddham yat kārakam yat ca sat tat kṣaṇikam iti dhvaṃsasya hetu anapekṣa tva vādaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.135–7,2.263.137	 atas ca kṣaṇa bhaṅginaḥ bhāvāḥ pralayam prati hetu anapekṣa tvāt bhāvohi svatas naśvara ātmā bhavet tad viparītaḥ vā vinaśvara svabhāve asmin kṛtam pralaya hetubhiḥ anaśvara svabhāve hi kṛtam pralaya hetubhiḥ kva tarhi mudgara ādīnām vyāpāraḥ vijātīya santati janmani iti brūmaḥ abhāvaḥ tu tat janyaḥ na saṃbhavati eva pramāṇa viruddha tvāt bhāvaḥ hisvarūpeṇa na bhavati na tu abhāvaḥ api asya bhavati iti svarūpam tu tasya bhavana ātmakam ced sarvadā eva bhavet eva na na bhavet abhavana ātmakam tutat eva na bhavet para apekṣāyāḥ abhāvāt na hi mudgara ādi kāraṇa antara sāpekṣaḥ kumbha ādeḥ vināśaḥ bhavitum arhati utpattau= iva nāśe api samartha asamartha bhinna abhinna upakāra kāri sahakārya ādi vikalpa kalā pānapāyāt vināśasya vilamba asaha tvam 
NM_7,2.263.138–7,2.263.139	 atha katipa yakṣaṇa vyavahita vināśa svabhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ iṣyate tarhi prāktana nayena kadācid api na vinaśyet vināśa samaye api tad svabhāva an apāyena punar katipa yakṣaṇa apekṣaṇa prasaṅgāt api ca yadā api tena naṣṭavyam tadā api asya na svarūpāt atiriktaḥ kaścana vināśa hetuḥ avatarati tat ca svarūpam ādye api kṣaṇe tasya tādṛśam eva iti tadā eva vā naśyet na kadācid vā apamṛtyoḥ apakrāntaḥ tasya ced prathamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ avināśi svabhāva tvāt āstām yuga śatāni api 
NM_7,2.263.140–7,2.263.141	 na ca evam abhyupagamyate tasmāt ātma lābha avinā bhāvī bhāvānāṃvināśaḥ iti siddhaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅgaḥ pratyabhijñāyāḥ kṣaṇika vāda pratikūla tva nirāsaḥ yat api kṣaṇa bhaṅga sādhakasya padārtha sthairya avasāyi pratyabhijñāna vijñānaṃanumānasya bādhakam abhidhīyate tat api na peśalam aśithila pratibandha hetaubādhakasya niravakāśa tvāt uktam hi bādhāvinā bhāvayoḥ virodhāt na ekatra samāveśaḥ iti 
NM_7,2.263.142–7,2.263.144	 anuṣṇaḥ tejasvī kṛtaka tvāt iti atra api pratibandha vaidhuryam eva sādhya siddhim niruṇaddhi na adhyakṣa bādhya tvam athavā kim anena nirbandhena agni śaitya anumāna ādau yuktam pratyakṣa bādhanam tasya hi ananyathā siddhiḥ iha tu etat na yujyate pratyabhijñāyāḥ anyathā siddha tvam pratyabhijñāyāḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga pakṣe a pi sadṛśa para aparakṣaṇa gaṇa prasava pratārita matīnām upapadyamāna tvāt evaṃca sati yadi hi vyāpti śaithilyam siddham kim pratyabhijñayā atha na vyāpti śaithilyam siddham kim pratyabhijñayā 
NM_7,2.263.145–7,2.263.146	 na ca ittham pratyabhijñā eva vyāpti viplava kāraṇam itaretara āśraya prasaṅgāt vyāpti viplavena anumāne nyagbhūte pratyabhijñā pramāṇam bhavati  tasyām ca pramāṇībhūtāyām vyāpti vaidhuḥ yāt anumāna aprāmāṇyam anumāna prāmāṇye api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced na tasya pratibandha mahimnā eva prāmāṇya siddheḥ na hi tasya pratyabhijñā daurbalya nibandhana prāmāṇyam pratyabhijñā svarūpa vimarśaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.147–7,2.263.148	 api ca kā iyam pratyabhijñā nāma iti naipuṇyena nirūpayitum arhanti atrabhavantaḥ kim saḥ eva ayam stambhaḥ iti ekam jñānam uta dve ete smṛti anubhava jñāne yadi ekam tat asya kāraṇam vācyam yatas utpadyate na indriyam saḥiti asmin= aṃśe tasya asāmarthyāt na ca saṃskāraḥ tasya api ayam iti aṃśekauśala abhāvāt ubhābhyām na ca sambhūya tat jñānam upajanyate pṛthak pṛthak sva kārye hi nirjñātam kauśalam tayoḥ 
NM_7,2.263.149^1	 saṃskārasya smṛtiḥ eva kāryam indriyasya anubhavaḥ eva sambhūya tuna tābhyām ekam kāryam ārabhyate na hi mṛd piṇḍa tantu nirvatyem ekam ghaṭa paṭa rūpa kāryam upalabdham na ca indriyam kevalam īdṛśi kārye samartham yathā sannihita ākāra mātra grāhya viṣayakam indriyam pratyabhijñānam ātanoti iti vismayaḥ tasmāt dve ete jñāne saḥ iti smaraṇam ayam iti anubhavaḥ pratyabhijñāyāḥ jñāna dvaya rūpa tvam smṛtiḥ smartavya viṣayāḥ grahaṇam grāhya gocaram na tad aikya parāmarśi dṛśyate pratyaya antaram yathā nirantara utpanne ghaṭa jñāna paṭa smṛtī 
NM_7,2.263.149^2	 na tulya viṣaye tadvat ete api bhaviṣyataḥ pratyabhijñāyai eka jñāna tve api na iṣṭa siddhiḥyat vā bhavatu nāma idam ekam eva hi vedanam tathā api kīdṛśam vastu spṛśati iti parīkṣyatām atīta kāla yuktam ced smaraṇāt na viśiṣyate anāgata viśiṣṭam ced saṅkalpa prāyam eva tat vartamāna eka niṣṭham ced sthira tvam tarhi susthitam kāla traya parītam ced virodhāt tat tu durlabham paraspara parityāga vyavasthita nija ātmanām ekatra na samāveśaḥ katham cit upapadyate vartamāna mātra grahaṇe kṣaṇika tva siddhiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.150–7,2.263.152	 yathā hi nīla abhāva avinābhūta lohita ādi apasāraṇam kurvatā nīla bodhena nīlam bhavati niścitam tadvat iha api tad abhāva avinābhūta bhūta kāla ādi apohanam vidadhat vartamāna artha jñānam tat grāhitām vrajet pratyabhijñāyāḥ adhika viṣaya tva abhāvaḥ etena pūrva jñāna viśiṣṭa artha grāhi tvam pratyabhijñāyāḥ pratyuktam pūrva jñānasya idānīm asattvena viśeṣaṇa tva anupapatteḥ agṛhīta viśeṣaṇāyāḥ ca viśiṣṭa buddheḥ abhāvāt 
NM_7,2.263.153	 atha upajanana apāya rahita vastu svarūpa grāhiṇī pratyabhijñā iti ucyate tat api ayuktam vartamāna eka niṣṭhatāyāḥ pradarśita tvāt bhāvānām ca vināśa janmanoḥ vartamānaḥ vā kālaḥ syāt anyaḥ vā tad anyaḥ tāvat grahītum aśakyaḥ iti uktam vartamāne tu tad utpāda vināśa kāle kathyamāne tad grahaṇāt tad avinābhūtau bhāvānām utpāda vināśau= api gṛhītau syātām sā iyam tapasvinī sthairyam prasādhayitum āgatā pratyabhijñā vināśi tvam pratiṣṭhāpya gamiṣyati pratyabhijñāyāḥ sādṛśya ādi viṣayaka tvam 
NM_7,2.263.154	 api ca lūna punar jāta keśa nakha ādiṣu sādṛśyāt dṛśyamānā pratyabhijñā stambha ādiṣu api tadvat eva na sthira tām upapādayet tatra bādhaka yoga āt iti ced iha api uktaḥ eva bādhakaḥ paraspara virodhi bhūta ādi kāla samāveśasya ekatra rghaṭa tvāt iti tasmāt pratyabhijñā pratyayasya bādhakasya abhāvāt siddha mānumānikam bhāvānām kṣaṇika tvam kṣaṇika tvasya pratyakṣa gamya tva pakṣaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.155–7,2.263.156	 apare punar pratyakṣa gamyam eva kṣaṇika tvam ācakṣate na atīta anāgatau kālau vicārayati cākṣuṣam vartamānaḥ kṣaṇaḥ ca ekaḥ iti tad niṣṭham eva tat yadi ca vartamāna tā vyatirikta grāhi pratyakṣam iṣyate tat vaktavyam kiṃpūrva vijñānam anāgata kāla avacchinna padārtha grahaṇa nipuṇam uta uttara vijñānam atīta kāla āliṅgita bhāva akalana kuśalam iti 
NM_7,2.263.157–7,2.263.158	 tatra ādya vijñāna samupajanana samaye tad kṣaṇa atirikta bhāvi kālāsat nidhānāt na tena tad grahaṇam anāgata grahaṇe vā katham āgāmi janma grahaṇaṃsyāt uttara vijñāna prasava samaye api bhūtakālasya bhūta tvāt eva na sannidhānam asat nihita bhūta kāla grahaṇe vā pūrva janma grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ vartamāna kālasya tad kṣaṇa mātra rūpa tvam 
NM_7,2.263.159–7,2.263.160	 atha vartamāna anupraveśena bhūta bhāvinoḥ kālayoḥ grahaṇam manyase tarhi vartamāna anupraveśāt vartamānaḥ eva sa kālaḥ gṛhītaḥ syāt nabhūtaḥ bhāvī vā atha na kaścid eva kālaḥ kvacid gṛhyate arthaḥ eva kevalaḥ prakāśa tā eti tat ayuktam tad anavacchinna bhāva grahaṇasya bhavat gṛhe ca anabhyupagamāt pratyakṣasya vartamāna viṣayaka tvam 
NM_7,2.263.161–7,2.263.162	 nanu kaḥ ayam kālaḥ nāma śākyānām na kaścid vāstavaḥ kintukālpanikaḥ eva tad vyavahāraḥ sarvathā indriya jam jñānam vartamāna eka gocaram pūrva apara daśā sparśa kauśalam na abalambate vartamānaḥ ca kiyān kālaḥ ekaḥ eva kṣaṇaḥ tatas pūrvaḥ kṣaṇaḥ atītatāṃ= pṛśati uttaraḥ tu anāgata tām vartamāna kālasya na vitata tvam 
NM_7,2.263.163–7,2.263.165	 nanu ca pacati paṭhati iti vartamānaḥ api hi vitate eva kālaḥ pratīyate na etat sāram na hi asti kāla avayavī nānā kṣaṇa gaṇa ātmakaḥ vartamāna kṣaṇaḥ dīrghaḥ iti bāliśa bhāṣitam kṣaṇa samudāya ātmaka tve tu nānā rūpa tvam eva tasya bhavet atīta anāga takṣaṇa anupraveśāt tasmāt ekakṣaṇaḥ vartamānaḥ sa ca atyantam alpīyān iti evam eka kṣaṇa parīta artha darśi cākṣuṣam tatas pūrvam ūrdhvam vā na padārtha sattāṃgṛhṇāti iti kṣaṇikāḥ eva bhāvāḥ pratyakṣeṇa kṣaṇika tva grahaṇa upapādanam nanu ca vartamāna kṣaṇāt pūrvam ūrdhvam vā tad astitva vat nāstitvam api na gṛhītam eva iti katham kṣaṇika tvam 
NM_7,2.263.166	 kaḥ evam āha na gṛhītam na astitvam anupalabdheḥ eva nāstitva vyavahārāt upalambhaḥ hi bhāvānām sattā anupalambhaḥ cana astitvam darśana adarśane eva sat asat tvayoḥ lakṣaṇam tasmāt kṣaṇa antar etad anupalambhāt nāstitvam eva iti evam kṣaṇika tva grāhi pratyakṣam iti sthitam pratyabhijñāyāḥ vitata kāla aviṣayaka tvam nanu ca pratyabhijñātaḥ dīrgha kāla tva niścayaḥ kim adya api na muktaḥ asi tad prāmāṇyakutṛṣṇayā parīkṣitam hi tasyāḥ svarūpam kārya ca kāraṇam na śaknoti eva sā sthairyam upapādayitum dhruvam na pūrvam na uttaram jñānam grāhi kāla antara sthiteḥ tat idam bodhyamānaḥ api rāga andhaḥ na avabudhyase 
NM_7,2.263.167–7,2.263.168	 pūrvam hi jñānam tad kālam eva uttaram api sva kālam eva vastu gṛhṇāti tu na asti eva grahaṇam agrahaṇam eva hi madhyam āhuḥ dhārāvāhi jñānasya aprāmāṇikatā ananvavicchinna dṛṣṭīnām na hi tri uṭyat avasthitiḥ stambha ādiḥ avabhāti iti katham etasya bhaṅgitā na etat evam tatra api ekakṣaṇa vṛtti tvāt jñānasya kṣaṇa antare tu jñānam eva na asti tat tat kasya avicchinna sattā kasya truṭita sattā kasyavā bādhakam 
NM_7,2.263.169–7,2.263.170	 nanu asti eva kṣaṇa antare vijñānam avicchinna tvāt dṛṣṭeḥ iti ced mā evam buddheḥ adīrgha kāla tvāt jñāna antara utpādaḥ eva asau= iti avadhārayatu āyuṣmān tasmāt yathā eva santāna vṛttyā jñāna kṣaṇa udayaḥ tathā eva utpādyatām eṣā stambha kṣaṇa paramparā jñānasya sthira tve api na vastu sthairya grahaṇam saḥ ayam avicchinna dṛṣṭīnām atruṭita padārtha sattā grahaṇa abhimānaḥ ittham utthitaḥ sthireṇa api na bodhena dīrgha kāla sthiti grahaḥ na hi asat nihita grāhi pratyakṣam iti varṇitam tad kāle sannidhiḥ na asti kṣaṇayoḥ bhūta bhāvinoḥ vartamāna kṣaṇaḥ ca ekaḥ na dīrgha tvam prapadyate tena buddheḥ sthira tve api sthaiyem arthasya durvacam na tu anantarayā nītyā tasyāḥ api ciram sthitiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.171–7,2.263.172	 sā api hi sva saṃvedya tvāt eka kṣaṇa parītā eva prakāśate iti tasmāt kṣaṇika grāhi pratyakṣam iti siddham kṣaṇika vādam pratyanumānam na pratikūlam nanu sthairyam padārthānām anumānāt pratīyate anvaya vyatirekābhyām mudgara ādiḥ vināśakaḥ niścīyate ghaṭa ādīnām tena pūrvam tad āgamāt vināśa rahita tvena siddhati eṣām avasthitiḥ na anupalambha vyatiriktasya hetumataḥ vināśasya anupalabdheḥ upalambhaḥ eva astitvam bhāvānām anupalambhaḥ ca nāstitvam na ca ghaṭa anupalabdhiḥ mudgara ādi kāryā tatas prāk api bhāvāt ghaṭa kāle api ghaṭānupalaṃbhaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.173	 nanu dṛśya anupalabdheḥ asattva niścayaḥ sa ca kapāla kāle eva ghaṭasya avakalpate madhye tu adarśanam anyathā api syāt iti na adarśana mātram evana astitvam mā evam tvad abhimate madhye api dṛśyasya eva ghaṭasya anupalambhaiti tadā api asya na astitvam eva atha api madhye sarveṣām na ghaṭa anupalambhanam tadvat kapāla kāle api sarveṣām iti kā pramā anubhavaḥ sarveṣām na eka rūpaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.174	 yat aham na vedmi tat paraḥ api na veda iti ced tarhi madhye api ghaṭam sarva eva na paśyeyuḥ iti na asti eva asau kapālībhūta ghaṭa vat api ca yadi yat tvam na jānāsi tad anyaḥ api na manyate sva jāyā jaghana sparśa sukham api eṣa mā grahīt yadi vā budhyase yat tvam tad anyaḥ api adhigacchati tvad jāyā jaghana sparśa sukham api adhigacchatu 
NM_7,2.263.175^1	 tat alam te para gṛha vṛttānta cintayā yat paśyasi tat asti iti jānīhiyat na paśyasi tat na asti iti viddhi evam anupalambhaḥ eva bhāvānām vināśaḥ itinaḥ tasya mudgara ādi kārya tvam atas anumānam api na sthairya sādhakam tasmāt yathā ukta krameṇa pratyakṣam eva kṣaṇika padārtha paricchedī iti sthitam kṣaṇika vāde doṣa uddhāraḥ smaraṇa pratyabhijñāna sva karma phala bhoktṛtāḥ kṣaṇika tve api kathitāḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvataḥ tat evam upapanneyam gṛhyatām kṣaṇa bhaṅgitā tyajyatām dīrgha saṃskāra kāraṇam sthira tā grahaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga nirāsa upakramaḥatra abhidhīyate na eva pramāṇa dvayam api adaḥ bhāvānām kṣaṇa bhaṅgi tvam upapādayitum kṣamam sattvam na artha kriyā kāri tvam artha kriyā samartha tvam sattvam yat tāvat ucyate tat asat kūṭa hema ādi vyabhicāra avadhāraṇāt kintva bādhita sat buddhi gamyatā sattvabhiṣyate sat asat vyapadeśaḥ tu putra ādau= aupacārikaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.175^2	 evam ca bādhaka abhāva paryeṣaṇa parāyaṇam na sattva grāhakam jñānam svatas prāmāṇyam arhati sattve ca saṃśayaḥ api asti sakala prāṇi sākṣikaḥ upalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ iti evam varṇayiṣyate kṣaṇikasya artha kriyā kāritva asaṃbhavaḥ artha kriyā samartha tvam tvad uktam sattvam astu vā tat api vyāpti śūnya tvāt na hetuḥ gandhavat tva vat kṣaṇikasya api bhāvasya sattvam na asti eva saḥ api hi krameṇa yugapad vā api na kārya karaṇa kṣamaḥ kṣaṇikasya kramaḥ kīdṛś yupad karaṇe punar ekavaḥ tukṣaṇasya api rūpa bhedaḥ prasajyate kāryāṇi ekena rūpeṇa bhinnāni janayet katham rūpa bheda virodhāt tu vastunaḥ na astitā bhavet kṣaṇika vādasya durvaca tvam sthite ca vastu sadbhāve kṣaṇika tvam parīkṣyate tat asattve tu tad cintā vyomni romantha keli vat jñāne kṣaṇika cintā ced kim tasya api parākṛtau vahanti etāni śāstrāṇi jñeya abhāve ca tat kutas kṣaṇika vāde kārya anupapattiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.176–7,2.263.177	 api ca kṣaṇika tva pakṣe kim ekasmāt eka utpādaḥ uta bahu bhyaeka utpattiḥ atha ekasmāt aneka niṣpattiḥ āhosvit bahubhyaḥ bahu sambhavaḥ iti parīkṣaṇīyam na tāvat ekasmāt eka utpattiḥ alaukika tvāt ekasmāt api agneḥ bhasma dhūma indhana vikāra ādi aneka prakāra kārya kalāpa utpāda darśanāt kārya siddhaye casarvatra sahakāri sannidhāpana prayatna darśanāt na vai kiṃcid ekam janakam iti grantha virodhāt ca ekasmāt kāraṇāt aneka kārya asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.178–7,2.263.179	 etena tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ nirastaḥ ekasmāt aneka utpattiḥ iti ekaḥ cana ekam janayat krameṇa janayet yugapad vā na krameṇa stherya prasaṅgāt na yagapad adṛṣṭa tvāt ekasya ca aneka kārya karaṇa śakti yogena tad bhedāt nānātva prasaṅgaḥ viruddha dharma yoge api yadi ca eka tvam iṣyate aneka kṣaṇa yoge api bhāvaḥ ekaḥ upeyatām bahubhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ eka akāryasya api asaṃbhavaḥ atha bahubhyaḥ eka utpādanam iti pakṣaḥ āśrīyate tat vaktavyam kiṃtat ekam kāryam kaiḥ vā bahubhiḥ utpādyate iti na hi asmākam iva bhavatām aneka upāya nibaha nirmitam avayavi svarūpam kāryam asti saṃcitaiḥ saṃcitāeva janyante iti abhyupagamāt 
NM_7,2.263.180	 yadi ca aneka kāraṇa kāryam ekam ucyate tat asya kāraṇa bheda upanata svabhāva nānātva yogāt eka tvam eva tāvat virudhyate anyathātve hi na kāraṇa adhīnam bhāvānām rūpam iti ākasmika tva prasaṅgaḥ kāraṇa bheda āpādita nānātvasya api yadi ca eka tvam tadā ekasya nānā kāla yoginaḥ api ekatvam syāt asattvam vā bhinna svabhāvasya vastunaḥ iti pūrvavat vaktavyam bauddha mate grāhya grāhaka bhāva anupapattiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.181	 locana āloka manaskāra ādi kāraṇa bhede kāryam api eka rūpam jñānam iti ced na tasya bhavat mate viṣaya ākāra grāhaka tva sva saṃvedana rūpa bhedāt nirākāra jñāna vādinaḥ hi bauddhasya pratikarma vyavasthā na sidhyati janakasya karmaṇaḥ pratibhāse sthairya prasaṅgāt eka sāmagrī adhīna tva pakṣasya ca asambhavāt sambhave api vā grāhya niyama nimitta abhāvāt iti bahubhyaḥ bahu saṃbhava dūṣaṇam 
NM_7,2.263.182–7,2.263.183	 atha ucyate kim anabhyupagata pakṣa upamardanena bahubhyaḥ bahu saṃbhava eti eṣaḥ eva naḥ pakṣaḥ santāna vṛttyā vartamānā pūrva sāmagrī sa rūpām uttara sāmagrīm ārabhate vijātīya kāraṇa anupraveśe tu virūpām iti atha kā iyam sāmagrī nāma na samagrebhyaḥ bhinnā pṛthak anupalambhāt avyatireke tu samagre eva sāmagrī tatra pūrva samudāyena uttara samudāya ārambhetat antargatam samudāyinam ekam ekaḥ eva utpādayet ekam vā sarve saṃbhūya iti 
NM_7,2.263.184–7,2.263.185	 tatra ādye pakṣe sā eva iyam ekasmāt eka utpattiḥ uktā syāt sā capratiṣiddhā kārya sāṃkarya prasaṃgaḥ tad mate atha ekaika samudāyi niṣpattau sarva samudāyinām vyāpāraḥ sa tu krameṇavai yaigapadyena vā tatra krama pakṣe kṣaṇika tva hāniḥ ye hi tatra paṃcaṣa āssamudāyinaḥ kṣaṇāḥ vartante te ekam tam utpādya punar aparam ārabheran punar anyam iti tāvat kāla pratīkṣaṇāt akṣaṇika tvam 
NM_7,2.263.186	 atha yugapad eva sarva niṣpattau sarve vyāpriyante tarhi nikurumba rūpam eva kāryam nikurumba rūpāt eva kāraṇāt utpannam iti kāraṇa viveka niyama abhāvātru uparasa ādi pravibhāgaḥ na syāt idam rūpam eṣa rasaḥ iti katham niścīyate citreṇa citram utpāditam iti sarvam rūpam syāt sarvaḥ vā rasaḥ yat vā na rūpam na rasaḥ anyat eva kiṃca d vastu antaram tat syāt kāraṇeṣu vailakṣaṇyam api tad mate durvacam 
NM_7,2.263.187–7,2.263.188	 atha ucyate yadi api rūpa rasa ādi sāmagrī tad sāmagryāḥ eva janikā tathā api kvacid kiṃcid upādāna kāraṇam itarat sahakāri kāraṇam tatra rūpa kṣaṇa niṣpattau rūpasya upādāna kāraṇa tvāt itareṣām ca sahakāri kāraṇa tvāt napadārtha saṅkaraḥ iti tat ayuktam sarvathā kāraṇa tvānapāyāt asmin pakṣe sthairya āpattiḥ api ca yena svarūpeṇa rūpasya rūpam pratyupādāna kāraṇa tā tena eva yadi rasam prati sahakārikāraṇa tā tadā punar api rūpa rasayoḥ aviśeṣaḥ atha anyena rūpeṇa rūpasya rūpa upādāna tā anyena ca rasa sahakāritā iti tarhi svabhāva bhedāt nānātvam nānatve ca sthairyam asattvam vā iti uktam atha na asti anayoḥ kiṃcid viruddha tvam svabhāvayoḥ katham bauddha gṛhe jātaḥ tvam evam abhibhāṣase 
NM_7,2.263.189–7,2.263.190	 bhāvānām paraspara parihāra vyavasthitarupa tvāt asti eva eṣām lakṣaṇikaḥ virodhaḥ kṣaṇika vāde kāraṇa viśeṣa vyavasthāpanam du karam api ca kṣaṇika tve padārthānām idam atra upādāna kāraṇam idam sahakāri kāraṇam iti viśeṣaḥ api duravagamaḥ tathā hi kim idam upādānam nāma kim sva santāna vināśena bīja ādi vat kārya janakam upādānam uta sva viśeṣa samarpaṇena utpādakam iti yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ para loka carcā cārvāka vat upekṣitā syāt jñāna santāna vināśena jñāna antara ārambha prasaṅgāt 
NM_7,2.263.191–7,2.263.192	 sva viśeṣa arpaṇa pakṣe api sarva viśeṣa arpaṇam vā syāt katipaya viśeṣa arpaṇaṃvā sarva viśeṣa arpaṇe nirvikalpa jñānam sa vikalpakasya na upādāna kāraṇaṃsyāt kṣaṇika vāde hetu darśanam vyāpti smārakam na syāt liṅga darśana janyā ca pratibandha smṛtiḥ katham katham vā rasa vijñānam rūpa jñānāt anantaram santāna bhūyaḥ tvāt bhaviṣyati iti ced na eka pramātṛ adhīna pratisandhāna aupa nibandhana vyavahāra pratibandha viplava prasaṅgāt nityam ekam ātmānam antareṇa santāna eka tāyām api tāvat asau vyavahāraḥ na avakalpate kim uta ekatra eva devadatta santāna bhūyastve sati iti 
NM_7,2.263.193–7,2.263.194	 katipaya viśeṣa arpaṇena tu yadi upādāna tā tadānīm rūpam api jñāna upādāna kāraṇa tām pratipadyeta tasmāt na upādāna kāraṇam nāma kiṃcid tad nirāsena ca tad vailakṣaṇya lakṣyamāṇa svarūpasya sahakāriṇaḥ api vyudāsaḥ veditavyaḥ sahakārī adhīna tve sthairya siddhiḥ api ca pratikṣipasi mad pakṣe sarvathā sahakāriṇam svayam ca aṅgīkaroṣi iti bhikṣaḥ ! rāgī iva lakṣyase bhinna abhinna upakāra ādi vikalpāḥ tvad prakalpitāḥ sahakāri pratikṣepa kāriṇaḥ kva adhunā gatāḥ  ā ! jñātam yukti śaktyā eṣaḥ yuṣmābhiḥ upakalpitaḥ doṣaḥ na bādhate yuṣmān mantra utthāpita sarpa vat kṣaṇikā vāde kārya karaṇa bhāva asiddhiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.195	 athavā tiṣṭhatu tāvat upādāna sahakāri kāraṇa vivekaḥ ! kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eṣaḥ bhadanta siddhānte durupapādaḥ para utpattau= avyāpriyamāṇam evayadi kāraṇam ucyate sarvam sarvasya kāraṇam syāt na ca alabdha ātmanaḥ tasya vyāpāraḥ para janmani labdha ātmanaḥ tu vyāpāre sthiti ssiddhā kṣaṇa antare ānantarya mātram na kāraṇa tva gamakam 
NM_7,2.263.196	 atha brūyāt idam pratītya idam pratīyate iti idaṃpratyaya tā mātram eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti tathā api labdha ātmanaḥ kṣaṇasya pratītiḥ iti dvitīya kṣaṇa avasthānam aparihāryam eva na ca ānantarya mātreṇa kārya kāraṇa grahaḥ ahetu phala bhāve api tathā anantarya darśanāt vyāpāraḥ tu para utpattau na asti eva kṣaṇa bhaṅginaḥ na vartamāna kālasya na bhūtasya na bhāvinaḥ tulā dṛṣṭānta vairūpyam
