NM_7,2.263.197	 atha manyethāḥ yathā tulā antayoḥ nāma unnāmau bhavataḥ evam pūrva uttara yoḥkṣaṇayoḥ nāśa utpādau= iti evam pūrva kṣaṇa vināśena uttara kṣaṇa nivṛtteḥ iyata evatau kārya kāraṇa bhāvam aśnuvīyātām iti etat api amanoramam na hi ayam āyuṣmatā samyak avadhṛtaḥ tulā dṛṣṭāntaḥ tatra anyat eva hema ādi nāma unnāma nibandhanam unnāmaḥ na tu nāmena tena vā sa vidhīyate 
NM_7,2.263.198–7,2.263.199	 iha hi na pūrveṇa kṣaṇena na api tad vināśena uttaraḥ kṣaṇaḥ utpadyate na ca hema sthānīyam iha anyat asti iti anutpādaḥ eva avaśiṣyate sarvathā para niṣpattau nirvyāpāram na kāraṇam sa vya apārasya kartṛ tve kṣaṇika tvam tu durghaṭam itham ca sattvam vyāvṛttam kṣaṇikebhyaḥ viśeṣataḥ tena asādhāraṇa tvena yāyāt saṃśaya hetu tām sattvam kṣaṇika tva viruddhasya eva sādhakam athavā labdha ātmanaḥ padārthasya para utpattau vyāpriyamāṇa tvena kārakatva avadhāraṇāt dvi tra kṣaṇa sthāyi tvam avaśyam anantara nītyā bhavet iti pratyuta sattvāt akṣaṇika tva siddheḥ viruddhaḥ ayam hetuḥ 
NM_7,2.263.200	 atas ca evam nityānām eva artha kriyā kāritva upapatteḥ samavāyi asamavāyi nimitta bhedena trividhā kārya kāraṇa sāmagrī paraspara saṃsargam āgatya yathāsannidhānam kāryam prasūtaḥ iti kṛtam krama yaugapadya vikalpaiḥ tāvakaiḥ yadā eva avikala saṃsargā sāmagrī tadā eva kārya utpattiḥ kāryāṇām kramāt eva utpattiḥatas eva ca kāryāṇām yugapad na samudbhavaḥ na ca api kāraṇam nityam sāmagrī na hi sarvadā prāṇi karma vipākaḥ api sāmagī antargataḥ asti naḥ sarvasya sukha duḥkha ādi hetoḥ tad upapādanāt 
NM_7,2.263.201	 na ca samagra vyatireka avyatireka vikalpaḥ asmat pakṣe sāmagrīm apabādhate samagra dharma tvāt sāmagryāḥ samagra apekṣayā ca sāmagryāḥ eva catam abartha atiśaya yogāt karaṇam iti pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇe varṇitam etat kāraṇānām pratyeka sāmarthya praśnaḥ api vyarthaḥ samartha tva asamartha tva vikalpaḥ api na saṅgataḥ sāmagryāḥ eva sāmarthyam tatas kāryasya darśanāt 
NM_7,2.263.202–7,2.263.203	 tad antargatasya tu kāraka jātasya śakaṭa ādi aṅgasya iva sāmarthyam yāvat tāvat abhyupagatam eva tad apekṣasya sāmagryāḥ sādhakatama tvasya nirvahaṇāt na hi bhavati kṛṣṇāt śuklataraḥ iti avikalam tu sāmagryāḥ eva sāmarthyam yad anantaram kārya niṣpattiḥ iti kārya niṣpatti darśanāt eva avagamyate kāraka tvam na kṣaṇikam 
NM_7,2.263.204	 yat api eka kṣaṇa sthāyi kārakam syāt iti uddha uṣitam paraiḥ tat api asat kārya niṣpatti paryanta tvāt avasthānasya ekena ca kṣaṇa ena kārya niṣpatteḥ aghaṭamāna tvāt kārya niṣpatteḥ ūrdhvam tu sāmagrī viplavate na samagrāṇiḥ teṣām ekaikaśas kvacid kvacid upalambhāt cakra sūtra daṇḍa ādīnām itthaṃsthirāṇām eva padārthānām artha kriyā sāmarthyaḥ samarthisam iti na tatas kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.205–7,2.263.206	 evaṃca sattva nitya tvayoḥ virodhāt sattva pratītya eva eka candra buddhi vat tad itara nirākaraṇam ityādi yat pralapitam tat pratikṣiptam bhavati dhvaṃsasya anapekṣa tva nirākaraṇam yat api abhāṇi nāśam pratyanapekṣa tvāt kṣaṇikāḥ padārthāḥ iti tat apiyat kiṃcid daṇḍa ādi vyavahāra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinaḥ tad kāryasya ghaṭa ādi abhāvasya vistarataḥ pramāṇa cintā avasare prasādhita tvāt pradhvaṃsa abhāvaḥ ca vināśaḥ iti ucyate naśvarān aśvara tva ādi vikalpāḥ tu na sādhavaḥ sāmagrī adhīnaḥ pradhvaṃsaḥ bhāvānām ātmalā abhavat 
NM_7,2.263.207–7,2.263.208	 mudgara ādi sāmagryā ghaṭasya kim kriyate mṛd piṇḍa ādi sāmagryākim asya kriyate ātma lābhaḥ iti ced anayā api ātma hānam kariṣyate bhāva abhāvayoḥ ubhayoḥ api hetu adhīna tvam nanu ! naśvaraḥ ced tad kāraṇam aphalam anaśvara tve tu aśaktam iti utpattau= api tulyaḥ ayam pralāpaḥ bhavana svabhāvaḥ ced ghaṭaḥ svatas eva bhavati kim daṇḍa ādi kāraka sāmagryā abhavana svabhāvaḥ tu kartum aśakyaḥ khara viṣāṇa vat iti 
NM_7,2.263.209–7,2.263.210	 kāraka vyāpāra kāryatva darśanāt aparyanuyogaḥ eṣaḥ iti ced vināśeca samaḥ samādhiḥ utpatti vat vināśasya api kāraka anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt tasmāt utpanna mātrasya vināśaḥ na asti vastunaḥ āvināśaka sadbhāvāt avasthānam iti sthitiḥ ghaṭa ādīnām nitya tva āpādana parihāraḥ nanu ! sa apekṣāṇām bhāvānām na avaśyaṃbhāvitā bhavet iti ghaṭasya vināśa hetuḥ na upanipatet api kadācid iti evam asau kim nityaḥ eva bhavatu iti aho ! mahān pramādaḥ utsannāḥ prajāḥ patitaḥ mahān vajra aśaniḥ duṣpariharaḥ ayam doṣaḥ utthitaḥ yadi ghaṭaḥ nityaḥ bhavet eṣa kālāgni rudraḥ iva tribhuvanam api bhasmīkuryāt ghaṭa ādīnām sāvayava tvena nāśa avaśyaṃbhāvaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.211	 api ca re mūḍhaḥ ! sāvayavasya āśritasya kāryasya ca nūnam avayava vibhāgāt āśraya vināśāt vā yadā kadācid bhavitavyam eva vināśena itikaḥ tad nitya tva śaṅkā avasaraḥ tathā hi na rāma abhiṣeka kalaśam adya yāvat anuvartamānam īśvara veśmani api paśyati lokaḥ iti avaśyaṃbhāvī tasya vināśa hetuḥ tasmāt sa hetukaḥ vināśaḥ iti na svatas eva vinaśvarāḥ bhāvāḥ vastu sthairyam pratyakṣa siddham 
NM_7,2.263.212	 api ca pratyajñā sva tejaḥ vibhava vidhūta bauddha siddhānta dhvānta siddhānta saṃtatiḥ abhaṅguram eva bhāva nivaham aniśam upadarśayantī dineśa dīdhiti daśa śata vibhāgavatī sarvatas jājvalī iti iti kaḥ tasya satyam kṣaṇa bhaṅginaḥ bhāva an abhidadhyāt yat ca kiṃcana tasyām apabhāṣitam tat sarvam asam aṃjasam pratyabhijñā prāmāṇyam 
NM_7,2.263.213	 yat tāvat idam vikalpitam saḥ eva ayam iti kim ekam vijñānam uta dbe iti tatra ucyate sāmānādhikaraṇyena eka viṣaya avadyotanā pravaṇa eka pratīti saṃvedanāt kā iyam dvi tva āśaṅkā yaḥ ayam ayam saḥ yaḥ saḥ saḥ ayam iti ekatva avamarśinī khalu iyam ekā svatas tu yā aneka pratītiḥ anubhūyate ghaṭaḥ ayamititat na nirantara utpanna ghaṭa jñāna paṭa smaraṇa vat bhinna viṣayam buddhi dvayam iti pratyabhijñāyāḥ pratyakṣa tvam 
NM_7,2.263.214–7,2.263.215	 yat tu kim eka pratīti janmani karaṇam iti kāryam ced avagamyeta kim kāraṇa parīkṣayā kāryam ced na avagamyeta kim kāraṇa parīkṣayā na ca kāryam akārakam bhavitum arhati kāryatvasya eva anupapatteḥ iti bhavitavyam eva tatra kāraṇena asti ca saṃskāra sahitam indriyam asyāḥ pratīteḥ kāraṇam pṛthak kārya tā api tayoḥ darśanāt eva gabhyate tat iha sannihitayoḥ eka kārya janmani vyāpārāt tat api kim iti na iṣyate mṛd tantu kāryam ekam adarśanāt eva anabhyupagatam idam tu dṛṣṭa tvāt durapahnavam 
NM_7,2.263.216–7,2.263.217	 kvacid tu kevala indriya vyāpārāt api kārya adarśanāt na sarvatra tathāvidhasya eva tasya kārya kāri tvam sahakārī apekṣeṇa kārya antara jananāt pratyabhijñā viṣaya nirṇayaḥ yat tu uktam kīdṛśaḥ arthaḥ pratyabhijñāyām avabhāti iti tatra ete vādinaḥ śata kṛtvas datta uttarāḥ api yat punar asmān anuyuṃjate tena balavat udvignāḥ smaḥ uktam atra pramitayaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ na tu vādinaḥ iti atīta kāla viśiṣṭaḥ varta māna kāla avacchinnaḥ ca arthe etasyām avabhāsate ekasya kāla dvaya saṃbandhaḥ na viruddhaḥnanu pūrva aparau kālau paraspara virodhinau na ekatra viśataḥ tena tad bhedāt vastu bhidyate 
NM_7,2.263.218–7,2.263.219	 na etat evam keyūra kirīṭa kaṭaka kuṇḍala ādi bhede api devadattasya abhadāt avayavi asti na asti iti parīkṣaṇam vāda antara gamanam apavarga āhnike ca vistareṇa avayavī sādhayiṣyate iti āḥ tām etat kuṇḍala ādīnām avirodhāt iti ced na lākṣaṇika virodha abhyupagamāt paraspara parihāra vyavasthita ātmanaḥ hi sarve bhāvāḥ iti bhaṇadbhiḥ bhavadbhiḥ abhyupeyate eṣām virodhaḥ ekasya kāla dvaya saṃbandhaḥ na viruddhaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.220–7,2.263.221	 nanu ! keyūra ādīnām virodhe api tadā avasthānāt eka deva datta saṃbandhi tvam abhyupapadyeta api bhūta vartamānayoḥ tu yugapad a sannidhānāt katham tad viśiṣṭa tā stambha ādeḥ ucyate pratīyate ca dvau kālau na ca sannihita aviti citram kim bhūtaḥ api kālaḥ idānīm asti mā evam na asau= asti iti ucyate api tvā āsīt iti asti iti ucyamānaḥ vartamānaḥ eva syāt na bhūtaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.222–7,2.263.223	 hanta tarhi bhūtaḥ bhūta tvāt eva na idānīm asti iti katham pratibhāsate bhūta tvena eva iti brūmaḥ bhūtaḥ kālaḥ bhūta tayā eva gṛhyate vartamānaḥ api vartamāna tayā eva arthaḥ tu ubhaya anugataḥ ekaḥ eva tathā grahaṇāt bhūtakālasya idānīm bhāna saṃbhavaḥ nanu bhūtakālasya idānīm abhāvāt tad viṣayam jñānam anartha jam syāt na dharmiṇaḥ tad avacchinnasya jñāna janakasya bhāvāt bhūtaḥ katham avacchedaka eti ced tathā pratibhāsāt pratītim avamṛśatu bhavān saḥ eva ayam iti yaḥ pūrvam āsīt saḥ idānīm api asti iti saḥ ayam atīta kāla viśiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ etasyām buddhau= avabhāsate pratyabhijñāyai indriya ja tvam 
NM_7,2.263.224	 nanu asatā bhūtakālena viśeṣitam artham katham indriya jā pratītiḥ ālambanīkuryāt ucyate antya saṃkhyeya saṃvitti kāle prāk avalokitāḥ yathā śata ādi jñānāni janayanti padātayaḥ atīta kāla saṃsargaḥ bhavan= evam viśeṣaṇam stambha ādi pratyabhijñāyāḥ kāraṇattham prapadyate avidyamānasya api viśeṣaṇa tayā bhāna saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.225	 saṃkhyeyāḥ padātayaḥ santi atīta kālaḥ tu na asti iti ced kapittheṣu bhakṣyamāṇeṣu kim vakṣyati devānām priyaḥ śatam kapitthānām bhakṣitavān vāhīkaḥ iti pratīti darśanāt na ca nava navatau= anupayukta iṣu kapittheṣu ekatra eva śatam mayā bhakṣitam iti matiḥ atas yathātatra atikrāntāni api navanavati kapitthāni śata pratīti hetu tām upayānti pratibhāsā upārūḍha tvāt evam atīta kāla yogaḥ api pratibhāsamānaḥ pratyabhijñām ādhāsyati iti vikalpānām prāmāṇyam 
NM_7,2.263.226–7,2.263.228	 vikalpa mātram śata pratyayaḥ iti ced bho mahātman ! kim vā tava navikalpa mātram kintu jīvanti amī sa vikalpaka prāmāṇya vādinaḥ yaḥ ca sāmānya saṃsiddhau prakāraḥ prāk pradarśitaḥ yojyaḥ saḥ eva dvi tva ādi saṃkhyā asadbhāva siddhaye iti alam kathā antarākṣepeṇa pratyabhijñāyām gata kālasya viṣaya tvam nanu ! atikrānta grāhi pratyabhijñānam indriya artha sannikarṣa jam ca iti naḥ kautukam idam kim tat kautukam arthaḥ tāvat asya puras avasthitaḥ asti eva janakaḥ stambha ādiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.229	 nanu ! asti sa tu vartamāna kāle eva na kevalam vartamāna kāla yoginā arthena tad pratyaya jananāt tasya vartamānaḥ iva atītaḥ api kālaḥavacchedaka tām pratipadyate sa ca tad avacchinnaḥ arthaḥ idam ca jñānam ādadhāti iti artha jam etat indriya jam api bhavati tad bhāva abhāva anuvidhānāt atīta viṣayakasya api indriya janya tvam 
NM_7,2.263.230–7,2.263.234	 nanu ! atīte arthe katham indriyam pravartate kasya eṣa paryanuyogaḥ na indriyasya acetana tvāt puruṣaḥ tu aviṣphārita akṣaḥ tu labhate iti saḥ api ananuyojyaḥ pratyabhijñāyai abādhita tvam nanu ! atīta grāhi tvāt aprāmāṇyam kalpayitum yuktam asyāḥ buddheḥ na indriyasya atīte api sāmarthyam dṛṣṭa pūrvam iti mā evam aprāmāṇyam nāma bādhaka pratyayāt kalpyate na ca asau= asti pratyabhijñāyām anumānam tubādhakam pratikṣiptam pratyabhijñāyai aprāmāṇye hetuḥ na asti nanu ! kāraṇa doṣāt api kalpyate eva aprāmāṇyam āyuṣman ! saḥ api ucyatām 
NM_7,2.263.235	 uktaḥ eva indriyasya atīta grahaṇa viṣaye sāmarthya virahaḥ vatsa ! na samyak uktavān asi na ayam indriyasya timira ādiḥ iva doṣaḥ atītekāle svatantre tasya asāmarthyam na tad grāhya vartamāna vastu viśeṣaṇībhūte saṃskāra sacivasya ca asya sāmarthyam na kevalasya iti uktam tasmāt atīta kāla viśeṣita purovarti vartamāna stambha ādi padārtha viṣayam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam eva idam pratyabhijñā jñānam iti siddham pratyabhijñāyāḥ mānasa tvam vā aathavā pūrva vijñāna viśiṣṭa grāhi mānasam iṣyatām pratyabhijñānam gandhavat kunda buddhi vat 
NM_7,2.263.236	 yathā hi locana gocare api kunda kusume tad aviṣaya gandha viśeṣite bāhya indriya dvārakam grahaṇam aghaṭamānam iti mānasam eva surabhi kusumam iti jñānam evaṃpūrva vijñāna viśeṣitasya stambha ādeḥ viśeṣaṇa matī takṣaṇa viṣayaḥ iti mānasī pratyabhijñā pūrva pravṛtta bāhya indriya upajanita jñāna viśiṣṭa bāhya viṣaya grāhiṇi ca antaḥkaraṇe a bhyupagamyamāne sati na andhādya bhāva prasaṅgaḥ iti bahuśas kathitam 
NM_7,2.263.237–7,2.263.238	 nanu ! kunda ādeḥ viśeṣaṇam vartamānam asti saurabham iha tu atītam pūrva vijñānam iti katham viśeṣaṇam  uktam atra kim tena satā kariṣyasi śata ādi buddhiṣu atikrāntasya api kapittha ādeḥ kāraṇa tva darśanāt iti tat evam antaḥkaraṇa janmanā api pratyabhijñānena sthairyam avasthāpyate eva bhāvānām vastu sthairya vādaḥyā tu muṇḍita keśa ādi pratyabhijñāna tulya tā stambha ādi pratyabhijñāyāḥ kathyate sā api asaṅga tā 
NM_7,2.263.239–7,2.263.241	 tatra antarāle muṇḍita śiraḥ darśanam eva bādhakam iha tu na kiṃcid asti atas eva śabde tadā eva sphurantyāḥ vināśa buddhyā vaidhuryam upanīta apratyabhijñā sthā snu tām upasthāpayitum asamartha iti uktam jvālā ādau= api taila varti kṣaya ādi anumāna bādhita tvāt bhrāntā pratyabhijñā na tu tathā stambha ādau= anumānam api bādhakam asti sattva anumānam tunirastam eva anumānena pratyakṣa bādhe api na atra tat yuktam 
NM_7,2.263.242–7,2.263.243	 yadi api na eṣa niyamaḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ virodhe pratyakṣam balīyaḥ iti tvaritatara paribhramita cakrī bhavat alāta grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya anumāna bādhya tva darśanāt iti tathā api prakṛtam kṣaṇikatva anumānam anyathā siddham ananyathā siddham tu pratyakṣam iti pratyakṣam eva kṣaṇikatva anumānasya bādhakam na ca itaretara āśraya tvam anumāna mithyā tva nibandhana pratyabhijñā pratyakṣa prāmāṇya anabhyupagamāt sva hetu balavat tayā eva pratyabhijñā pratyakṣam pramāṇam na tasya idam dainyam yat anumāna mithyā tve sati tad pramāṇībhaviṣyati iti jñānasya kṣaṇikatva asaṃbhavaḥ āstām vā pratyabhijñānam yaḥ eṣa prathama akṣa jaḥ stambha ādi bodhaḥ tena api bādhyate kṣaṇa bhaṅgitā 
NM_7,2.263.244	 tulya sāmagrī adhīna tvasya nirākṛta tvāt nirākāra tvasya nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt anvaya vyatireka upakṛta mānasa pratyakṣa niścita janaka tvasya ca arthasya avabhāsya tva niścayāt utpannaḥ arthaḥ jñānam janayati jātena ca tena jñānenagṛhyate iti balāt dvi tra kṣaṇa avasthāyi tvam asya āpadyate iti kutas kṣaṇika tvam ghaṭa ādīnām sthira tvam yadi labdha svarūpaḥ api na naṣṭaḥ prathame kṣaṇe hetu antarāt vināśaḥ asya na svarūpa nibandhanaḥ vicitrā ca padārthānām pratītiḥ iha dṛśyate cirantana matiḥ kācid kācid tad kāla jā matiḥ salila āharaṇa vyagra kumbha avagatiḥ anyathā tathā eva kandaka ākṛṣṭa kumbha avagatiḥ anyathā ravi gupta pakṣa nirāsaḥ etena ravi guptaḥ api parimlāna mukhaḥ kṛtaḥ kṣaṇika tva kṣamā adhyakṣa samutprekṣaṇa paṇḍitaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.245–7,2.263.246	 tathā hi vartamāna vastu vigraha grāhi vijñānam anantara ukta nayena sva janaka artha pratibhāsanāt dvikṣaṇa sthāyitām arthasya gamayati iti uktam ādyam ca kiṃcid vijñānam anāgata kāla sparśi bhavati yathā aaha bhaṭṭaḥ rajatam gṛhyamāṇam hi cira sthāyi iti gṛhyate iti uttaram api pratyabhijñānam atīta kāla avacchinnam artham avadyotayati iti darśitam atīta kāla grahaṇe api utpatteḥ agrahaṇam 
NM_7,2.263.247–7,2.263.249	 na ca atīta anāgata janma grahaṇam āśaṅkanīyam iyati kāraṇa sāmarthya niyamāt na hi atīta anāgata janma grahaṇam aśakya kriyam iti yat api dṛśyamānam grahaṇam tat api apahnotum yuktam na ca etāvatā atīta anāgata kāla avacchinna vartamāna vastu grahaṇa mātreṇa sāmānyatodṛṣṭena adṛṣṭam api atīta anāgata jñānam kalpyam yathādarśanam hivastūni vyavasthāpyante na tu kiṃcid dṛṣṭavā anyat api kalpyate dṛṣṭam api vā anihnūyate iti vastūnām sthira tvam pratyabhijñā grāhyam api ca animeṣa dṛṣṭeḥ atruṭita sattāka stambha ādi padārtha grāhi pratyakṣam upapadyate tat katham kṣaṇika grāhi kathyate 
NM_7,2.263.250–7,2.263.251	 yat ca tatra vikalpitam atīta anāga takṣaṇayoḥ asannihita tvena pratyakṣa grāhya tā anupapatteḥ vartamāna kṣaṇasya ca ati sūkṣma tvāt tad kāla grāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa kṣaṇika tvam eva gṛhītam bhavati iti tad upapannam mā nāma abhūt atīta anāgata kāla grahaṇam vartavānaḥ eva tu tatra animeṣa darśane kiyān kālaḥ iti cintyatām nimeṣa kṛtasya api darśana vicchedasya anavakāśāt yāvat hi darśanaṃ na vicchinnam tāvān vartamānaḥ kālaḥ iti tad grahaṇena sthairyam gṛhītam bhavati na kṣaṇika tvam vartamāna kālasya na kṣaṇa rūpa tvam nanu ! tāvān asau kālaḥ kṣaṇa samudāyaḥ bhavati na kṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇaḥ ca ekaā iva vartamānaḥ bhavati atas pūrva aparau kṣaṇau= atīta an āgatau bhavataḥ tayoḥ cana grahaṇam iti uktam 
NM_7,2.263.252	 bho mahātman ! siddhe kṣaṇaka tvaḥ eva evam śakyate vaktum na tad sādhana avasare kālaḥ hi ekaḥ nityaḥ vibhuḥ iti sādhitaḥ anumāna parīkṣāyām na tu kṣaṇa samudāya ātmā kālaḥ kālasya tu bhedāḥ kriyā upajanana vināśa ādi upādhi nibandhanāḥ kalpyante iti api tatra eva parīkṣitam tad ayam animeṣa dṛṣṭeḥ darśana viccheda anupagrahāt tāvān ekaḥ kālaḥ saḥ iti vartavānaḥ eva bhavati nāna akṣaṇa samudāyaḥ kṣaṇa samudāya ātmake api vā kāle darśana viccheda anavadhāraṇāt kṣaṇa samudāyaḥ eva vartamānībhavatu kālasya aprāmāṇika tve api na kṣaṇika tva siddhiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.253–7,2.263.256	 nanu ! kālaḥ nāma na kaścid pāramārthikaḥ padārthaḥ eva paridṛśyamānaḥ vartamāna ādi vyavahāra hetuḥ sa ca na ciram anubhūyate iti kṣaṇikaucyate bhikṣaḥ ! alam avāntara gamanena mā bhūt kālaḥ padārthaḥ tu animeṣa dṛṣṭi avicchedāt na naśyan dṛśyate iti na kṣaṇika grāhi pratyakṣam jñānasya asthira tve api vastu sthairya upapattiḥ nanu ! bhavadbhiḥ api na sthiram jñānam iṣyate kṣīṇe ca jñāne saḥ artha udvitīya kṣaṇe kena gṛhyeta jñāna antareṇa tu gṛhyamāṇaḥ saḥ eva iti atra koniḥ cayaḥ animeṣa dṛṣṭeḥ jñānam na kṣīyate eva iti eke 
NM_7,2.263.257	 athavā kim na etena na hi viṣaya pratibhāsa kāle jñānam avabhāsa tā eti asakṛt uktam vakṣyate ca tena tat kīdṛśam iti kutas vayam vidmaḥ arthaḥ tu avicchinna sattākaḥ eva gṛhyate jñānam tu vartamāna kālam api atīta anāgata kāla grāhi bhavati smaraṇam iva bhūta bhaviṣyat vṛṣṭi anumānam iva indriyasya sannikarṣasya arthasya ca sthira tvam 
NM_7,2.263.258–7,2.263.259	 nanu ! indriya vyāpāraḥ na kṣaṇa antara sthāyi iti tasmin= asati kutas arthasya vitata kāla tā grahaṇam bhadanta ! bhavatu śrāntaḥ asi lajjasva evaṃbruvāṇaḥ nimeṣa kṛtaḥ api vicchedaḥ asya na asti atha ca na sthiraḥ indriya vyāpāraḥ itigrāhika tā mātram sannikarṣaḥ ca asya viṣaya grahaṇe vyāpāraḥ sa ca sthiraā iva tasmāt vitata kālasya vastunaḥ pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam iti sthitam dhvaṃsasya hetu janya tvāt vastu sthairya siddhiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.260–7,2.263.261	 evaṃca sthite na sva rūpa mātra nibandhanaḥ eva bhāvānām vināśaḥ kiṃtu hetu antara nibandhanaḥ bhavati tatas ca āvināśa hetu upa nipātāt avasthānam eva bhāvānām avidyamāna vināśa kāraṇānām ca nitya tvam eva vyoma ādīnām iti siddham sattva asattvayoḥ darśana adarśana rūpa tva abhāvaḥ yat punar abhāṇi darśana adarśane eva sattva asattve bhāvānām iti tat apivyā mūḍha bhāṣitam darśana adarśanābhyām bhāva abhāvayoḥ paricchedaḥ na punar darśana adarśane eva bhāva abhāvau 
NM_7,2.263.262–7,2.263.264	 abhāvaḥ ca vistarataḥ prāk prasādhitaḥ sa ca sa hetukaḥ iti na svataeva viśara āravaḥ bhāvāḥ kṣaṇika vāde vyavahāra anupapattiḥ evam tu aniṣyamāṇe padārtha sthairya pakṣe jñāna janakasya niyatasya vastunaḥ darśanam darśana viṣayīkṛte asya pravṛttiḥ pravṛtti viṣayīkṛtasya prāptiḥ iti vyavahāraḥ na syāt artha kṣaṇa nānā tvāt kṣaṇika vāde bādhya bādhaka bhāva anupapattiḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ ca kvacid jñānānām dṛṣṭaḥ sa ca na syāt pūrva avagata rajata ādi viṣaya abhāva grāhiṇaḥ jñānasya gṛhīta mudgara dalita śva dhaṭa abhāva jñāna vat bādhaka tva anupapatteḥ 
NM_7,2.263.265^1	 pūrva dṛṣṭasya smaraṇam smṛtasya kasya cit pratyabhijñānam pratyabhijñātasya ca gṛha ādeḥ eva ardha kṛtasya samāpanam ityādayaḥ ca vyavahārāḥ vilupyeran kṣaṇika vāda nirāsa saṃgrahaḥ atha santānam āśritya kriyate tad samarthanam na tasya bhinna abhinna tva vikalpa anupapattitaḥ abheda pakṣe kṣaṇa vat vyavahāraḥ na sidhyati vyatireke tu cintyaḥ asau vāstavaḥ avāstavaḥ api vā avāstava tve pūrva uktam kāryam vighaṭate punar vāstava tve sthiraḥ vā syāt kṣaṇikaḥ vā iti cintyatām santāni nirviśeṣaḥ syāt santānaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅguraḥ na sidhyet punar api evam vyavahāraḥ purā uditaḥ atha api nityam parama artha santaṃsantāna nāmānam upaiṣi bhāvam 
NM_7,2.263.265^2	 uttiṣṭha bhikṣaḥ ! phalitāḥ tava āśāḥ saḥ ayam samāptaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga vādaḥ tat evam sati santāna= chadmanaḥ vinivāraṇāt lokayātrā sthiraiḥ eva padārthaiḥ upapādyatām kṣaṇika vāde pramāṇa abhāvaḥ evam anantara nigadita dūṣaṇa nikuramba vinihata prasaram na adhyakṣam kṣaṇika tve na ca anumānam pramāṇam syāt kṣaṇa bhaṅge niraste ca kāryam ādhāra vat dhruvam atas jñāna ādi kāryeṇa yuktam āśraya kalpanam sukha ādeḥ api kāryasya vijñānāt vyatirikta tā prāk uktā iti tat api anyat bhavati asya anumāpakam kṣaṇika vāde pāralaukika vilopaḥ kiṃca nāṃgīkaroṣi tvam ātmānam pāralokinam upaiṣi para lokam ca viditam te baka vratam 
NM_7,2.263.265^3	 karma santāninā anyena yat kṛtam caitya vandanam tatas adya phalam anyena bhujyate akṛta karmaṇā na ca nirvṛttiḥ api asya caitya vandana karmaṇā jñāna kṣaṇena na ekena kiṃcid karma samāpyate kārya kāraṇa bhāvāḥ ca yaḥ tvayā uktaḥ sa dūṣitaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāve api na hi anya tvam nivartate anaikāntika tā ca asya santāna antara buddhibhiḥ upādāna tva rūpaḥ api viśeṣaḥ prāk nirākṛtaḥ kārpāsa rāga saṃkrāṃnti dṛṣṭāntaḥ yaḥ ca varṇitaḥ saḥ api ayuktaḥ sva rūpeṇa tatra tasya eva darśanāt yaḥ eva rāgaḥ kārpāsa bīje samupakalpitaḥ saḥ eva dṛśyate puṣpe na tu tasmāt phala antaram erva karma anuvṛttiḥ syāt phala bhogaḥ tu durghaṭaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.265^4	 kṣaṇika vāde kṛta hāna ādiḥ a nivāryāṃkarma anuvṛttiḥ api eṣā na ca ekasya asti kasyacid kārya kāraṇayoḥ bhedāt kārpāsa kusuma ādi vat anyatra eva hi karma syāt anyatra eva ca tad phalam na ca santāna bhogāya kaścid karma anutiṣṭhati phalam asmān mama eva syāt iti sarvaḥ pravartate sarvathā śākya bhikṣūṇām para lokaḥ visaṃṣṭhulaḥ na tad prasādhane teṣām kācid gamanikā asti vā jñāna santānasya avicchedaḥ api durvacaḥ garbha ādau prathamam jñānam vijñāna antara pūrvakam jñāna tvāt iti ayam hetuḥ aprayojakaḥ iṣyate mūrchā ādi anantara udbhūta jñānaiḥ ca vyabhicārya tāmmūrchitasya api vijñānam asti iti etat tat tu kaitavam 
NM_7,2.263.265^5	 na hi artha avagateḥ anyat rūpam jñānasya kim cana mūrchā ādiṣu kutas tat syāt kutas vā kalala ādiṣu kalala ādi daśāyām vā yadi vijñānam iṣyate mātā pitṛ sthayoḥ aḥ tu śukra śoṇitayoḥ api tatas ca ekatra saṃtāne cetana dvayam āpatet cetanānām bahu tvam vā dampatyoḥ bahu putrayoḥ santānānām sausādṛśyam api durvacam na ca eṣa niyamaḥ loke sadṛśāt sadṛśa udbhavaḥ vṛścika ādessamutpādaḥ gomayāt api dṛśyate śarīra antara saṃcāra cāturyam ca dhiyām katham jvālā ādi vat na mūrta tvam na ca vyāpaka tā atma vat janana maraṇa ādi upapādanam api kṣaṇika vāde durghaṭa mātivādika dehena nīyante ced bhava antaram nanu ātivāhike api āsām katham saṃcāra saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.265^6	 āstām eva eṣa vā jīvet dehe api pathi gacchatām pradeśa antara saṃcāraḥ jñānānām bhavatām katham na hi eṣām bhūta dharma tvam na svatas gati śakti tā na ca jāti ādi vat vṛttiḥ na ca vyāpaka tā aatma vat evam yadā eva niṣkrāntaḥ vihāra kuharāt bhavān tadā kāṣṭhībhavet dehaḥ jñāna saṃkrānti asaṃbhavāt tat ayam saṃkṣepa arthaḥ tyaktavyaḥ vā nirasya kaurukucīm sura guru vat para lokaḥ nityaḥ vā aatmā abhyupetavyaḥ ātmanaḥ jñāna sukha ādi upapattiḥyat tvasya carma gagana upamatām vikalpya nāśi tvam uktam athavā viphala tvam eva tat na eva sādhu sukha duḥkha daśa upabhoga yoge api nāśam adhigacchati na ayam ātmā 
NM_7,2.263.265^7	 vikṛtiḥ ca tasya sukha duḥkha janmanāna hi tādṛśī bhavati lupyate yayā sahakāri kāraṇa vaśāt tu jāyatetat avaśyam eva samupaiti bhoktṛtām avasthā vāda ḥathavā upajana vyaya svabhāvaḥ sva daśa abheda samanvaye hi puṃsaḥ phaṇinaḥ kila kuṇḍala ādi avasthā anugatasya iva na bhinna tā iti kecid avasthāḥ eva etāḥ prasabha vilaya ātaṅka vidhurāḥ avasthātā tu ekaḥ sphurati nirapāya sthira vapuḥ asati asmin pūrva avagata viṣayā anusmṛti bhuvāṃna siddhiḥ kāryāṇām iti nipuṇam āveditam idam ātmanaḥ sthira tva jñānena lābhaḥnanu vimṛśati bhoge karma nityaḥ api na ātmāna hi naraka nimagnaḥ manyate kaścid evam kila yat aham akārṣam prāc bhave karma pāpaṃphalam upanatam asmāt bhujyate tat mayā iti 
NM_7,2.263.265^8	 kārya upabhoga samaye kim anena kṛtyaṃna asya pravṛttiḥ adhunā na nivṛttiḥ asmāt yassu apravṛtti janana aupayikaḥ avamarśaḥ śāstrāt asau bhavati śāstra vidām avaśyam vimarśaḥ ayam paścāt api bhavatu dṛṣṭe tu viṣayemayā yūnā yat tat kim api sat asat vā kṛtam abhūt tatas vṛddhaḥ adya aham phalam anubhavāmi iti tat ayaṃpumān asti sthāyī su kṛta phala bhoga ādi nipuṇaḥ kṣaṇika vādinām kriyā vairūpyamnā asti ātmā phala bhoga mātram atha ca svargāya caitya arcanaṃsaṃskārāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ yuga sthiti bhṛtaḥ ca ete vihārāḥ kṛtāḥ sarva śūnyam idam vasūni gurave dehi iti ca ādiśyatebauddhānām caritam kim anyat iyatī dambhasya bhūmiḥ parā arvācīn acārvāka matam 
NM_7,2.263.266–7,2.263.267	 atra su śikṣita cārvākaḥ āha yāvat śārīram avasthitam ekam pramātṛ tattvaṃ anusandhāna ādi vyavahāra samartham astu nāma kaḥ tatra kalahāyate śarīrāt ūrdhvaṃtu tat asti iti kim atra pramāṇam na ca pūrva śarīram apahāya śarīra antaraṃsaṃkramati pramātā pāralaukika ātmā na asti yadi hi evam bhavet tat iha śarīre śaiśava daśa anubhūta padārtha smaraṇa vata tīta janma anubhūta padārtha smaraṇam api tasya bhavet na hi tasya nitya tva aviśeṣe ca śarīra bheda aviśeṣe ca smaraṇa viśeṣe kāraṇa viśeṣam utpaśyāmaḥ yat iha janmani eva anubhūtam smarati na anya janma anubhūtam iti tasmāt ūrdhvaṃdehāt na asti eva pramātā iti nitya ātma vāda mūla para loka kathā kaurukucīm apāsya yathāsukham āsyatām yathā aaha yāvajjīvam sukham jīvet na asti mṛtyoḥ agocaraḥ bhasmībhūtasya dehasya punar āgamanam kutas iti ātmanaḥ sthira tvasya autsargika tvam 
NM_7,2.263.268	 atra ucyate na khalu nipuṇam iva su śikṣitam āyuṣma tā cārvāka ācārya cāturyam yāvat śarīram ekam anuyāyi pramātṛ tattvam asti iti yat uktavān asitat na vismartum arhasi na ca astitva avinā bhāvī bhāvānām vināśaḥ svābhāvikaḥ kintu hetu antara nimittakaḥ iti saugataiḥ saha kalaham atimātra madhunā eva kṛtvā samarthitaḥ ayam arthaḥ na ca vināśa hetuḥ pramātuḥ ati ciram api vicāryamāṇaḥ kaścid kutaścid avāpyate na ca anupalabhyamānaḥ api asau kalpayituṃpāryate ātmanaḥ vināśa hetuḥ na asti 
NM_7,2.263.269–7,2.263.270	 na hi ātmā paṭadiḥ iva sa avayavaḥ upalabhyate yad avayava vibhāga ādinā anaṅkṣyatīsi gamyate utpattiḥ api na ātmanaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ yatas tad avinābhāvinaḥ niravayavasya api karma ādeḥ iva vināśaḥ pratīyate na ca eṣa kasyayidātmā guṇaḥ yā ena āśraya vināśāt vā virodhi guṇa antara prādurbhāvāt vā pradhvaṃsam āsādayet na ca evam śakyate vaktum kim vināśa hetu anumānena pratyakṣaḥ eva āsya vināśaḥ dṛśyate iti yatas na śarīra vat asau dahyamānaḥ śakunibhiḥ avalupyamānaḥ vā kadācid ulabdhaḥ iti tasmāt vināśa adarśanāt vināśa hetu anumāna asaṃbhavāt ca asti ced ātmā nityaḥ eva iti avadhāryatām 
NM_7,2.263.271–7,2.263.273	 tasmāt bhūta caitanyam eva cirantana cārvāka ācārya vat para lokā palāpa paritoṣa ālamba nayat kiṃcid kāri tva sulabha sukha āsikā āsakta hṛdayaiḥ varam āśritum āśarīram avasthite tu pramātṛ tattve sati na phalanti ete para loka apalāpa manorathāḥ bhūta caitanya pakṣaḥ api ca purā parākṛtaḥ eva tasmāt asti nityaḥ para lokī pramātā iti nitya tve sati pūrva deha saṃbandhaḥ bhaviṣyat deha antara saṃbandhaḥ ca asya naduḥ upapādaḥ ātmanaḥ vibhu tve api śarīra antara prāpti ādi yujyate śarīra antara saṃcāraḥ tu asya na asti iti yat uktam tat yuktam eva vyāpinaḥ sarvatra vidyamānasya ātmanaḥ kaḥ saṃcāra arthaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.274	 vyāpitvaḥ eva kim pramāṇam iti ced sarvatra eva kārya upalambhaḥ pramāṇam itas vārāṇasīm api gatasya me bhadati eva smaraṇa icchā ādi kārya yogaḥ saca ātma eka prabhavaḥ ātmanaḥ ca śarīrasya iva na tatra gamanam amūrta tvāt na śarīra guṇavat tad anāśrita tvāt na prāṇa ādi vat antar śarīra vṛtti tva abhāvāt ātmanaḥ na śarīra antar varti tvam 
NM_7,2.263.275–7,2.263.276	 antar śarīra vṛtti tva abhāvaḥ eva kim pramāṇam iti ced ucyate antar śarīra vṛtti tve hi dvayī gatīḥ eka deśa vṛtti tvam sarva śarīra āpūraka tvam vā tatra sarva śarīra āpūraka tve śarīra parimāṇa anuvidhāyi tvāt bāla yuvasthāvira śarīra vat pūrva nītyā parimāṇa anya tvena tad anya tvāt punar api pratisandhāna ādi kārya vaidhurya prasaṅgaḥ kari maśaka śarīra yoge ca karma pariṇāma upanate tasya saṃkoca vikāsau prāpnutaḥ tau ca nityasya virudhyete 
NM_7,2.263.277–7,2.263.278	 eka deśa vṛtti tve tu tad anadhiṣṭhitānām avayavānām anātmaka tvāt mṛta śarīra avayavat ayatheṣṭa viniyojya tā kāṣṭhībhāvaḥ syāt ātmanaḥ na sva jñānena sarva śarīra vyāpaka tvam pradā upavat eka deśa vṛtteḥ api ātmanaḥ sakala śarīra adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam iti ced varti pradeśa upacita tejaḥ piṇḍa vat ekatra śarīra avayave sa viśeṣa caitanya saṃvittiḥsyāt 
NM_7,2.263.279–7,2.263.281	 asti eva hṛdaya deśe tat atiśayaḥ iti ced na anupalambhāt dahana hima kṛpāṇa ādi sparśeṣu na hṛdayasya pradeśa antarasya vā śarīre vedanā viśeṣaṃpaśyāmaḥ tasmāt na hṛd puṇḍarīke dīpa vat avasthānam ātmanaḥ ātmanaḥ avibhu tva para vacana gatiḥ atas eva aṅguṣṭha mātram puruṣam niścakarṣa yamaḥ balāt iti vyāsa vacanam anevaṃparam avagantavyam 
NM_7,2.263.282	 yadi tu manaḥ vat eka deśa vṛtteḥ aṇu parimāṇasya āśu saṃcarataḥ śarīra adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam ātmanaḥ kathyate tathā api sahasā eva cira proṣita āgata dayita jana darśana udbhata sakala śarīra vyāpi sveda romāṃca ādi darśanam virudhyate na ca dvayoḥ aṇvoḥ ātma manasoḥ kartṛ karaṇa vyavasthā api nirvahati iti tasmāt na aṇuḥ ātmā na caśarīra mātra parimāṇaḥ iti vyāpakaḥ eva avaśiṣyate tat evam vārāṇasyām api ayam ātmā vidyate eva iti tatra tad kārya darśanam avakalpate na anyena gamana ādi prakāreṇa iti aikātmya vāda nirāsaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.283–7,2.263.285	 nanu ! sarvatra sukha duḥkha jñāna ādi kārya darśanāt sarva prāṇinām ekaḥ eva ātmā abhavet na sukha duḥkha vyavasthā darśanāt bandha mukta vyavasthā upapatteḥ ca ātma bhedasya darśayiṣyamāṇa tvāt vibhoḥ api kartṛ tva upapattiḥ vyāpinaḥ tatham kartṛ tvam iti ced jñāna cikīrṣā prayatna samavāya eva asya kartṛ tvam na vyāpāra yogaḥ iti nirṇītam etat nanu ! vyāpini ātmani katham śarīrāt bahis aṇu api tat kāryam na dṛśyate karma ākṣipta śarīra indriya ādi sahakāri sannidhāna nibandhanaḥ hi tad kārya utpādaḥ sa katham tatas bahis bhavet iti tasmāt anantara uktena prakāreṇa upapāditam nitya tvāt vyāpaka tvāt ca para loki tvam ātmanaḥ ātmanaḥ deha atirikta tve hetu antarāṇi 
NM_7,2.263.286	 sūtrakāraḥ tu pāralaukika tva siddhaye hetu antarāṇi pratyapādayat sadyojātasya bālasya vadana vikāsa rodana ādi anumitaḥ harṣa śoka ādi yogaḥ tovat asti yuva śarīra ādau rodana ādi śoka ādi kāraṇakam avagatam ānana vikāsa ādi harṣa hetukam evam śiśoḥ api tad nibandhanaḥ tad utpādaḥ tau ca harṣa śokausukha duḥkha sādhana adhigama tad anusmaraṇa ani atara kāraṇakau bhavitum arhataḥ tathā dṛṣṭa tvāt iha ca asya na sukha duḥkha sādhana padārtha anubhavaḥ tādanīm asti ititad anu smaraṇam eva harṣa śoka hetuḥ bhavet 
NM_7,2.263.287–7,2.263.288	 tad anusmaraṇapi tad anubhava prabhavam anubhavaḥ ca iha janmani sadyojātasya na samasti iti janma antara anubhūta sukha duḥkha sādhana anusmaraṇa nimittaka eva asya harṣa śoka samutpādaḥ iti janma antara anugamāt nityaḥ ātmā śiśossukha duḥkha anusmaraṇam nanu ! abhinava jīva loka avalokana āhlāda nibandhanaḥ eva asya mukha vikāsaḥ tathā yoni dvāra nirgamana udgata nirargala kleśa pīḍitasya tasya rodanam iti na janma antara anubhūta smaraṇam kalpayitum yuktam atiprasaṅgāt mā evam sukha duḥkha hetum īdṛśam ananubhavataḥ api akasmāt eva harṣa śoka darśanāt śiśoḥ mukha vikāsa ādeḥ ahetuka tva nirāsaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.289–7,2.263.291	 nanu ! kamala mukula vikāsa ādi vat svābhāvikam eva śiśoḥ mukha vikāsa ādi kāryam syāt svābhāvikam nāma kim ucyate kim ahetukam avijñāta hetukam aniyata hetukam vā na tāvat ahetukam kāryam saṃbhavati kārya tva hāniprasaṅgāt na api avijñāta hetukam tat bhavitum yuktam kāryam upalabhyate tad hetu parijñāne yatatām bhavān kim udāḥ te na ca asau jñātum aśakyaḥ kāryasya eva tatra jñāpaka tvāt 
NM_7,2.263.292–7,2.263.293	 na api aniyata hetukam kāryam kiṃcid asti kārya utpādana niyamena eva hetu niyama siddheḥ atas eva tad kāryam upapādayitu kāmāḥ tat niyatam eva kāraṇam upādadate laukikāḥ gomaya vṛścika ādeḥ upapatti pradarśanam yatrā api aniyataḥ hetuḥ vṛścike gomaya ādikaḥ abhiyuktaḥ tu tatra api viśeṣam na na manvate tat eva kāraṇa niyamaḥ api kārya viśeṣa darśanāt durapahnavaḥ iti mukha vikāsasya harṣaḥ eva kāraṇam avagamyate sahasra kṛtvas tathā darśanāt 
NM_7,2.263.294–7,2.263.295	 acetanānām tu tāmarasa ādīnām vikāsa kāraṇam taraṇi kiraṇa nikara pariṣvaṅga ādi upalabdham iti tat api na svābhāvikam tasmāt mukha vikāsasya harṣaḥ harṣasya ca smṛtiḥ smṛteḥ anubhavaḥ hetuḥ sa ca janma antare śiśoḥ janma antara anubhūtānām na sarveṣām smaraṇam nanu ! śiśoḥ janma antara anubhūta smaraṇe sarvadā sarva smaraṇa prasaṅgaḥ na yāvat kāryam kāraṇa kalpanāt na hi sarvadā sarva anusmaraṇam saṃvedyate na ca tad kalpanāyām kāraṇam upalabhyate na ca eka darśanāt sarvam kalpyam dṛṣṭam api vā nihnotavyam iti parīkṣakāṇām ucitaḥ eṣa panthāḥ iti asakṛt uktam śiśaḥ stanya pāna pravṛttyā janma antara siddhiḥ 
NM_7,2.263.296–7,2.263.297	 api ca payasaḥ tṛpti hetutām anusmaran bālakaḥ stanya abhilāṣeṇa mātu stana taṭe dṛṣṭim nidadhāti na ca adya tena tasya tad sādhana tvam avagata miti janma antare sambandha grahaṇam asya vṛttam iti manyāmahe na ca ayaskānta dṛṣṭānta samāśrayeṇa svābhāvikam eva tat bālakasya kuca kalaśa nikaṭa upasarpaṇam iti vaktum ucitam anantaram eva nirasta tvāt garbha stha śiśoḥ poṣaṇa kāraṇam 
NM_7,2.263.298–7,2.263.300	 nanu ca garbhaśayyā śāyinaḥ api paripoṣa darśanāt tad sādhana upādān etat anusmaraṇam eva prāpnoti yadi kāryam avagamyate tatra api tad kāraṇam avagamyatām kaḥ doṣaḥ tatra tu janayitrī jaṭhara patita anna pāna paripāka saṃkrānti ā tat paripoṣam āyurveda vidaḥ vadanti iti katham tatra smataṇa ādi kalpanā kalpanāyām vā prathamam niṣeka anantaram eva kalala ādi śukra śoṇita vikāra saṃbhavāt tad daśāsu api smaraṇa kalpanā prasaṅgaḥ na ca tad kalpanāyām apikācid asmākam kṣatiḥ ayam tu stanya abhilāṣeṇa kuca kṣīra kalaśa avalokana upasarpaṇa ādaraḥ dārakasya tad anusmaraṇa kṛtaḥ eva iti sarvathā janma antara saṃbandha anumānāt nityaḥ ayam ātmā iti janma antara samarthaka hetu antaram atas ca evam vīta rāga janma adarśanāt 
NM_7,2.263.301^1	 rāga ādi vāsanā abhyāsena su dṛḍha prarūḍhena anādi prabandha pravṛttena aparityajyamānāḥ sa rāgāḥ eva jantavaḥ jāyante na khalu loke kaścana tādṛśaḥ dṛśyate prāṇī yaḥ jātaḥ vīta rāgaḥ ca iti saḥ eṣa sa rāgaḥ jāyamānaḥ pūrva upacitām rāga ādi vāsanām anusarati iti siddhaḥ janma antara saṃbandhaḥ jagat vaicitrya hetu tayā karma paraṃparā siddhiḥ tathā ca kecid jajāyante lobha mātra parāyaṇāḥ dravya saṅgrahaṇa ekāgra manasaḥ mūṣaka ādayaḥ manobhava mayāḥ kecid santi pārāvata ādayaḥ kujat priyatamā caṃcu cumbana āsakta cetasaḥ kecid krodha pradhānāḥ ca bhavanti bhujaga ādayaḥ jvalat viṣa anala jvālā jāla pallavita ānanāḥ jagataḥ yat ca vaicitryam sukha duḥkha ādi bhedataḥ kṛṣi sevā ādi sāmye api vilakṣaṇa phala udayaḥ akasmāt nidhi lābhaḥ ca vidyutpātaḥ ca kasya cit kvacid phalam ayatne api yatne api aphala tā kvacid tat etat durghaṭam dṛṣṭāt kāraṇāt vyabhicāriṇaḥ tena adṛṣṭam upetavyam asya kiṃcana kāraṇam 
NM_7,2.263.301^2	 jagat vaicitrya kāraṇasya na bhautika tvam adṛśyaḥ bhūta dharmaḥ tu jagat vaicitrya kāraṇam yadi kaścid upeyeta kaḥ doṣaḥ karma kalpane saṃjñā mātre vivādaḥ ca tathā satya āvayoḥ bhavet bhūta vat bhūta dharmasya na ca adṛśya tva saṃbhavaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ca sādhvī sutayoḥ yamayoḥ tulya janmanoḥ viśeṣaḥ vīrya vijñāna saubhāgya ārogya saṃpadām svābhāvika tvam kāryāṇām adhunā eva nirākṛtam tasmāt karmabhyaḥ eva eṣa vicitra jagat udbhavaḥ karmaṇām śakti vaici tryam karmaṇām nanu vaicitryam karma antara kṛtam yadi aniṣṭam tat svatassiddham jagati eva tat iṣyatām karmaṇām śāstrataḥ jñātā vicitra phala śakta tā dṛṣṭa artheṣu ca vākyeṣu dṛṣṭā pratyakṣataḥ api sā tasmāt dṛṣṭasya kāryasya yuktā kāraṇa kalpanā kāraṇasya tu adṛṣṭa tvāt kim hetu antara cintayā kārya kāraṇa bhāva paraṃparāyām na anavasthā doṣaḥ hetu antaram tu tad hetoḥ na asti iti etāvatā eva kim 
NM_7,2.263.301^3	 dṛṣṭasya api asya kāryasya yujyate hetu apahnavaḥ  hetu antara nimitte api karma vaicitrya kalpane saṃsārasya tu anādi tvāt na anavasthā bhaya abahāḥ tathā ca puṇyaḥ puṇyena pāpaḥ pāpena karmaṇā jāyate jantuḥ iti evam dharma śāstreṣu paṭhyate tasmāt kutarka mūlena dṛṣṭa kārya upapātinā sarva loka viruddhena codyena kṛtam īdṛśāḥ tasmāt kalpyāni karmāṇi dṛṣṭa kārya upapattaye sthirasya ātmanaḥ āvaśyaka tvam eṣām ca kṣaṇa bhaṅgi tvāt saṃskāra dvārikā sthitiḥ sa karma janya saṃskāraḥ dharma adharmagirā ucyate vinā ca nityam ātmānam na dharma adharmayoḥ sthitiḥ nityaḥ tasmāt bhavati puruṣaḥ sva praṇīta anugaccha ddharma adharma krama pariṇata ānanda tāpa upabhogaḥ prāmāṇyam ca sphuṭam abhihitam pūrvam eva āgamāna aṃtebhyaḥ api ātmā janana nidhana atīta tattvaḥ prasiddhaḥ 
NM_7,2.263.301^4	 ātma anitya tva vacana gama nikāya dvijñāna ghana ādi veda vacanam tat pūrva pakṣe sthitaṃpaurvāparya vimarśa śūnya hṛdayaiḥ saḥ arthaḥ gṛhītaḥ tathā maitreyyāḥ paricoditaḥ tu bhagavān yadi ājñavalkyaḥ abravīt ātmā na eva vinaśyati iti tat idam siddhānta sāram vacaḥ tena ātma nitya tva samarthanena su spaṣṭa siddhaḥ para loka mārgaḥ yaḥ eva deha antara saṃgamaḥ asyatam eva tad jñāḥ para lokam āhuḥ janma antara jñāna prayojanam iti kabalane māṃspākānām para sva parigrahe kitava jana tā goṣṭhyām veśyā mukha ambuja cumbane rata matiḥ abhūt dhūrtaḥ matvā bhava antara nāstitāṃta dayamadhunā tad saṃsiddheḥ aho bata dūyate tasmāt nityaḥ ayam ātmā na ca kaluṣa phalaḥ tasya naisargikaḥ ayaṃrāga dveṣa ādi yogaḥ api tu sakala guṇa apoḍham eva asya rūpam tena anādi prabandha upacita pariṇamat karma pāka upanītaṃduḥkham saṃtyajya niḥśreyasam akhila bhaya atītam āptum yateta iti śrī bhaṭṭa jayanta kṛtau nyāyamañjaryām saptamam āhnikam 
NM_8,2.360.1–8,2.360.3	 ātma anantaram vibhāga sūtre śarīra nirdeśāt tad anukrameṇa tad svarūpa nirūpaṇa artham āha ceṣṭa indriya artha āśrayaḥ śarīram śarīrasya yat lakṣaṇam yena rūpeṇa vibhāvyamānasya apavarga upayogi tā tat ubhayam api pratipādyate śarīra lakṣaṇam tatra śarīra tvam eva tāvat prathamam śarīrasya lakṣaṇam tena hi samāna asamāna jātīyakebhyaḥ tad vyavacchidyate tasmin sati api ceṣṭa indriya artha āśraya tvam yat asya lakṣaṇam ucyate tat tena rūpeṇa ātmanaḥ bhoga āyatanam śarīra miti jñāpayitum ceṣṭa indriya artha āśraya tayā hi śarīram ātmanaḥ bhoga sādhanam bhavati mumukṣuṇā ca sukha duḥkha upabhoga rahita ātma tattva svabhāva niḥśreyasa adhigama vinihita manasā tathā bhoga adhiṣṭhāna tvena śarīram bhāvayatā tad pariharaṇeyatnaḥ kāryaḥ iti ācāryaḥ ceṣṭa indriya artha āśraya tvam asya lakṣaṇam uktavān ceṣṭā svarūpam 
NM_8,2.360.4	 nanu ! ceṣṭā kriyā kriyā āśraya tve sati api na vṛkṣa ādīnām śarīra tvam iti ati vyāpakam lakṣaṇam na viśiṣṭa ceṣṭā āśraya tvasya viśiṣṭa prameya lakṣaṇa prakramataḥ avasīyamāna tvāt hita ahita prāpti parihāra yogya vyāpāra adhikaraṇam hi śarīram ucyate na ceṣṭā mātrasya adhiṣṭhānam ratha ādinā api na ati vyāptiḥ yathā ukta prakrama vaśāt eva anyena preraṇāyāmasatyām iti viśeṣa lābhāt ātma prayatna atirikta preraka nirapekṣa hita ahita upādāna parityāga upādhika ceṣṭā viśeṣa āśrayaḥ śarīram iti arthaḥ śarīra lakṣaṇe doṣa parihāraḥ 
NM_8,2.360.5	 nanu ! pāṣāṇa antargata maṇḍūka śarīreṣu tad āśraya tva adarśanāt avyāptiḥ na yogyatāyāḥ statra api bhāvāt satyām api kriyā yogya tāyām sarvatonirvivara nibiḍa dṛṣad karpara uparuddha avakāśa tayā calitum asau na prabhavati bhekaḥ varākaḥ tathā ca sphuṭite tasmin= aśmani tad kṣaṇam eva asau calat dṛśyateiti nibiḍa pāśa saṃyata śarīra vat tadānīm ceṣṭāyāḥ adarśane api na avyāptiḥ mumukṣu śarīra niyama abhāvaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.6–8,2.360.7	 mumukṣu śarīram eva lakṣyam iti eke tena na maṇḍūka śarīra ādibhiḥ avyāptiḥ alakṣaṇīya tvāt teṣām iti tat ayuktam niyatasya mumukṣu śarīrasya abhāvāt tādṛśim ca bheka ādi śarīrāṇi nitarām nirveda kārīṇi bhavanti mumukṣuḥ apikarma vipākam aneka prakāram ākalayan maṇḍūkībhāvam ātmanaḥ api na na śaṅkate pratyāsanna apavarga pura praveśa vipaḥ cittamam apaścittamam apaścima janmānam mumukṣuṃprati lakṣaṇa ādi upadeśaḥ kva upayujyate iti atas pūrva uktaḥ eva avyāpti parihāraḥ śreyān indriya āśraya tva parīkṣā 
NM_8,2.360.8–8,2.360.9	 bhavatu evam ceṣṭā āśraya tvam śarīra lakṣaṇam indriya āśraya tvam tu katham bhautikāni hi indriyāṇi syāvayava samāśritāni ghrāṇa rasana nayana sparśanāni śrotra manasī tu nitya dravya tvāt anāśrite eva iti katham indriya āśraya tā śarīrasya iti ucyate na atra ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ āśraya arthaḥ kintu tad anugrāhya tvāt tad āśritāni indriya api ucyante deśa kāla daśa anukūla pathya bhojana abhyaṅga vyāyāma mardana ādi upacāra upacita śarīrasya hi puṃsaḥ padutarāṇi sva viṣaya grahaṇe bhavanti indriyāṇi dīrgha adhva laṅghanaka daśana śuṣka jarat purandhrī sevana ādi kliṣṭa śarīrasya tu puṃsaḥ manda śaktīni bhavanti tad anugrāhaka tvāt indriyāṇām āśrayaḥ śarīram artha āśraya tva lakṣaṇa parīkṣā 
NM_8,2.360.10–8,2.360.11	 arthānām tu rūpa rasa gandha ādīnām keṣām cit āśrayaḥ śarīram bhavati eva tad samavāyinām na tu tāvatā kiṃcid bhoga āyatana tva upayogi rūpam abhihitaṃbhavati lakṣaṇam api tat ativyāpakam rūpa rasa ādi samavāyasya vṛkṣa ādau= api bhāvāt tasmāt tad artha āśraya tvam īdṛśam atra vivakṣitam ye ete para vanitā ādi śarīra vartinaḥ pravikaca mucukunda kunda kandala kumuda kuḍmala ādi bāhya viṣaya samavāyinaḥ ca rūpa rasa ādayaḥ arthā ramaṇīya tām ādadhānāḥ rāga vṛddhi hetavaḥ bhavanti bhoktuḥ ātmanaḥ śarīre sati na śarīra rahitasya iti arthānām bhoga sādhana bhāvāt āśrayaḥ śarīram atas suṣṭhu uktam ceṣṭa indriya artha āśrayaḥ śarīram iti 
NM_8,2.360.12–8,2.360.13	 tat ittham bhoga āyatana tvena bandha hetu tvāt heyam iti arthaḥ tat idānīm asmad ādi śarīram kim parthivam kim vā nānā bhūta nirmitam iti parīkṣyate śarīrasya pārthiva tva vicāra phalam nanu ! kim anayā parīkṣayā prayojanam niḥśreyasa upayogaḥ hi yaḥ śarīrasya darśitaḥ saḥ aneka prakṛti tve api na sa tasya viśiṣyate 
NM_8,2.360.14–8,2.360.17	 mā evam vocaḥ pratipanna svarūpasya cintyā kārya upayogitāḥ kāryā kārya arthinaḥ api ādau yatnaḥ tad rūpa nirṇaye tathā ca indriyāṇi bhautika tva ahaṅkārika tva ādi vekena parīkṣiṣyante arthāḥ api kati kiṃguṇāḥ iti buddhiḥ api kim pradhānasya prathamaḥ vikāraḥ mahat śabda vācyaḥ utaa ātmanaḥ eva dharmaḥ jñāna ākhyaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ iti evam sarvatra draṣṭavyam mānava śarīrasya pārthiva tva ādi vikalpāḥ 
NM_8,2.360.18–8,2.360.20	 tatra pāthivam eva asmad ādi śarīram iti kecid asādhāraṇaḥ hidharaṇi dharmaḥ gandhaḥ tasmin= upalabhyate iti pṛthivī udaka kāraṇam iti anye kledasya api tasmin darśanāt asati hi salila saṃsarge na pārthiva avayavāḥ kledam anubhavanti iti kṣiti jala jvalana janitam iti apare gandha kleda vat ūṣmaṇaḥ api tatra upalaṃbhāt iti 
NM_8,2.360.21–8,2.360.22	 vasumatī salila sita itara saraṇi samīraṇa racitam iti ca anye racanā viśeṣasya pavana kāryasya tatra avadhāraṇāt iti avani vana dahana pavana gagana vinirmitam iti ca apare gandha ādi vat avakāśasya api ākāśa kāryasya tatra darśanāt suṣiram hi śarīram upalabhyate avakāśeca ākāśa eka deśe api avaccheda abhiprāyeṇa śrotra vat bhaktyā tad kārya tva vyapadeśa eti mānava śarīrasya pārthiva tvam 
NM_8,2.360.23	 tat atra kim tattvam pārthivam eva asmad ādi śarīram iti vijātīya kāryasya avayavinaḥ anupapatteḥ pārthiva avayava samaveta śarīra avayavi grāhiṇaḥ tu abheda pratyayasya tṛṇa parṇa pāṣāṇa mūlaka ādi abheda pratyaya vat apavāda asaṃbhavāt na vayam iha bhūta antarāṇām kāraṇa bhāva niṣedham śikṣmaḥ kevala pārthiva tayā nirvivāde api kumbha ādau= ambhaḥ prabhṛtīnām kāraṇa tvānapāyāt tad vyatirekeṇa ghaṭa ādeḥ ghaṭayitum aśakyatvāt 
NM_8,2.360.24	 kintu ghaṭa ādau= iva śarīre api samavāyi kāraṇam pṛthivī avayavān eva ācakṣmahe tadā aścita tvasya asya pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇāt sahakāri kāraṇa anupraviṣṭa bhūta antara saṃbandhana bandhanaḥ tu tisman kleda ūṣma vyūha avakāśa saṃpratyayaḥ tat yathā aagama paṭhiteṣu varuṇa loka ādau kevala jala ādi janyeṣu śarīreṣu sahakāritva anupraviṣṭa pārthiva avayava upaṣṭambha vaśena sthairya ādi upalaṃbhā eti tasmāt asmat ādi śarīram pārthivam śarīrasya pārthiva tvam veda saṃmatam 
NM_8,2.360.25	 vede ca tathā eva vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate agnīṣomīya ādi paśoḥ pralaya kāle yajamānasya vā pretasya pātra cayana karmaṇi sūryam cakṣūḥ ga maya tāt iti upakramya pṛthivīm te śarīram iti paṭhyate tat ca prakṛti gāmi tva vacanam yadi atas prakṛteḥ utthitam tat tasyām eva līyatām iti arthaḥ tatra yathātaijasam cakṣuḥ iti sūrya ākhye tejasi tad gamanam upadiṣṭam evam pṛthivyām śarīrasya iti tasmāt pṛthivī avayavaiḥ ayam asmad ādi dehaḥ nibaddhaḥ iti na atra satām vivādaḥ saḥ ayam ca duḥkha vasateḥ bhava mandirasya stambhaḥ kaṭhoraḥ iti yatnatas eva heyaḥ indriya parīkṣā ghāṇa rasana cakṣuḥ tvac śrotrāṇi indriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.26–8,2.360.31	 atra indriyāṇām viṣaya upalabdhi kāraṇa tvam sāmānya sakṣaṇam prasiddham eva vibhāgaḥ api paṃca bāhya indriyāṇi iti eṣa sūtritaḥ eva sa ca anantaram eva tīrtha antara kathita karmendriyā niṣedhāt sādhayiṣyate cakṣuḥ ādi lakṣaṇam viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni tu paṃcānām paṃca samākhyā nirvacana sāma arthyāt pramāṇa vat avagantavyāni jighrati anena iti ghrāṇam gandham gṛhṇāti iti gandha upalabdhau= asā dhāraṇa kāraṇam ghrāṇam rasayati anena iti rasanam rasam gṛhṇāti iti rasa upalabdhau= asādhāraṇaṃkāraṇam rasanam caṣṭe anena iti cakṣuḥ rūpam paśyati iti rūpa upalabdhau= asā dhāraṇam kāraṇaṃcakṣuḥ īkṣaṇam locanam tat ucyate spṛśyati anena iti sparśanam sparśam gṛhṇāti iti sparśa upalabdhau= asādhāraṇaṃkāraṇam sparśanam 
NM_8,2.360.32	 sparśanam iti vaktavye tvac grahaṇam upacāra ātmaṃcāḥ krośantiiti vat tad adhiṣṭhāna tvam darśayitum yathā tri puṭikā adhiṣṭhānam ghrāṇam jihvā adhiṣṭhānam rasanam golaka adhiṣṭhānam cakṣuḥ tathā tvac adhiṣṭhānam sparśanam śiraḥ prabhṛti āpādāṅguṣṭham sparśa upalambhāt tvak iti ca na bāhyam eva carmakevalam ucyate api tu sakala śarīra vyāpi tuhina kaṇa śiśira salila pāna samaye antar hṛdaye api śīta sparśa upalambhāt iti indriyāṇām āśrayāḥ 
NM_8,2.360.33–8,2.360.34	 sva avayava samavāyi tve api ca indriyāṇām tri puṭikā ādi āśraya tvam āśraya tva mātrā apekṣayā ucyate na samavāyi tvāt iti śṛṇoti anena iti śrotram śabdam gṛhṇāti iti śabda upalabdhau= asādhāraṇaṃkāraṇam śrotram tat ca ākāśa eka deśa tvāt anāśritam api karṇa śaṣkulī adhiṣṭhānam ucyate tat evam viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni paṃca paṃcanā muktāni bhavanti indriyāṇām bandha hetu tvam 
NM_8,2.360.35–8,2.360.36	 tāni imāni indriyāṇi sva viṣaya grahaṇa lakṣaṇāni ātmanaḥ bhoga sādhana tvāt saṃsāra kāraṇāni iti heya tayā bhāvayitavyāni tathā bhāvya mānā ninirveda utpādana ādi dvāreṇa apavargāya kalpayiṣyante iti indriyāṇām bhautika tvam bhūtebhyaḥ iti kimartham uktam hi indriyāṇām sva viṣaya grahaṇa lakṣaṇa tvam tatra na bhūta grahaṇam lakṣaṇa artham api tu tad viniścaya artham yathā āpta upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti atra āpta grahaṇam lakṣaṇa viniścaya artham sva sva viṣaya upalabdhi lakṣaṇa tvam hi indriyāṇām bhūta prakṛti tve sati nirvahatinā anyathā iti indriyāṇām bhautika tvam kīdṛśam 
NM_8,2.360.37	 tāni punar indriyāṇām kāraṇāni pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam iti bhūtāni ebhyaḥ paṃcabhyaḥ yathāsaṅkhyam ghrāṇa rasana cakṣuḥ tvac śrotra aṇipan= ca indriyāṇi bhavanti bhūta prakṛti tvam iti bhūta svabhāva tvam vyākhyāyamānaṃpaṃcasu api saṃbhavati bhūtakāraṇaka tvam tu anyeṣu caturṣu api tathā eva śrotretu kathaṃcid karṇa śaṣkulī avācchinna nabhaḥ bhāga abhiprayeṇa vyavahārataḥ samarthanīyam evam sati bhautikāni indriyāṇi svam svam viṣayam adhigantum utsahante iti tad lakṣaṇa tvam eṣām siddhyati iti atas bhūtebhyaḥ iti uktam indriyāṇām prāpya kāri tve sāṃkhya pakṣaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.38–8,2.360.39	 nanu etat parīkṣaṇīyam vartate kim bhautikānām indriyāṇām sva viṣaya grahaṇa karaṇa tvam uta anyathā iti evam hi sāṅkhyāḥ saṃpravadante āhaṅkārikāṇi indriyāṇi arthaṃsādhayitum arhanti na anyathā tathā hi kārakam kāraka tvāt eva prāpyakāri bhavati bhautikāni ca indriyāṇi katham prāpya kārīṇi dūra vartini viṣayebhaveyuḥ āhaṅkārikāṇām tu teṣām vyāpaka tvāt viṣaya ākāra pariṇāma ātmikā vṛttiḥ vṛttim ataḥ ananyā satī saṃbhavati eva iti su vacam prāpya kāri tvam indriyāṇām āhaṃkārika tve yuktiḥ 
NM_8,2.360.40–8,2.360.41	 api ca mahat aṇu grahaṇamāhaṅkārika tve teṣām kalpate na bhautika tve bhautika tve hi yat parimāṇam grahaṇam tat parimāṇam grāhyam gṛhṇīyāt asti ca golakāt adhika parimāṇasya paṭa piṭhara ādeḥ grahaṇam hīna parimāṇasya ca vaṭa dhāna ādeḥ atas api na bhautikāni indriyāṇi bhautikānām api dīpa ādīnām param prakāśayatām sva ātma prakāśaka tvam apidṛṣṭam evam indriyāṇi api paṭa ādi svarūpam prakāśayanti svarūpam apiprakāśayeyuḥ na ca prakāśayanti iti atas api na bhautikāni indriyāṇām prāpya kāri tve siddhāntaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.42	 atra abhidhīyate yat tāvat prāpya kāri tvam bhautika tva pakṣe na avakalpa tā eti jalpitavān asi tat manye nūnam tvayā golakam eva cakṣuḥ iti cetasi gṛhītam anyathā katham ittham akathāyavyaḥ sa ca ayam āyuṣmataḥ mahān bhramaḥ na khalu kṛṣṇasāram cakṣuḥ tad adhikaraṇam tu tejaḥ cakṣuḥ tat ca vegavat dravya tvāt dūram api prasarati iti kaḥ asya prāpya kāritāyāṃma ādaḥ cakṣuṣaḥ golaka rūpa tva ākṣepaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.43	 nanu ! golake api cikipsā ādi prayogāt golaka guṇa doṣa anuvarti tvāt ca viṣaya upalabdheḥ golakam eva cakṣuḥ syāt anupalabhyamānam ca tejaḥ katham indriyam ucyate katham ca tejasā vegavatā api visphārite cakṣuṣi sahasā eva yojana śata sahasra vyavahita sita kara taraṇitārakā ādi grahītum śakyeta katham vā tat alpakam varākam na ayanam tejaḥ samantataḥ prasaratā sakala bhuvana prathita prabhāvena mahīyasā api mihira mahasā pratihata gati bhavet iti bhāskara darśanam ittham na sampadyeta tejaḥ pakṣe ca kāca abhraka paṭala spaṭikā antarita padārtha upalabdhiḥ katham samarthyeta tasmāt varam śakti viśeṣa yuktam golakam eva sādho ! cakṣuḥ abhyupagaccha iti cakṣuṣaḥ golaka atirikta tvam 
NM_8,2.360.44	 ucyate na khalu bhavat anuśāsanena yukti viruddham artham abhyupagacchāmaḥ prāpya kāri hi kārakam dṛṣṭam kṛṣṇasāra pakṣe ca kutas prāpya kāri tvam śaktiḥ api kalpyamānā nirāśrayā na parikalpanīyā eva iti tad āśraya cintāyāṃ na golaka mātram āśrayaḥ bhavitum arhati aprāpya kāri tva prasaṃga āditi tadadhikaraṇam tejaḥ eva śakteḥ āśrayaḥ bhavet indriyāṇām aprāpya kāri tva pakṣaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.45–8,2.360.46	 nanu ca ! prāpya kāri tvam eva cintyam vartate tat hi rasana sparśanayoḥ kevalam avalokyate loke cakṣuḥ śrotre tu dūra deśa vyavasthita viṣaya grāhiṇī katham prāpya kāriṇī syātām ghrāṇam tu tri puṭikā nikaṭa nihita padārtha gandham api gṛhṇāti dūratas api capracalat anila bala vellita phulla mallikā ādi saurabham upalabhate tri puṭita kopa kaṇṭha ḍhaukitena api dravyeṇa na tasya sannikarṣaḥ iti tat api aprāpya kāri eva tasmāt śakti viśeṣaṇam adhiṣṭhānam eva tat tat indriyam iti gṛhyatām utsṛjyatāṃprāpya kāri tva pakṣaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.47–8,2.360.49	 cakṣuṣi candra arka graha ādi grāhiṇi nitarām prāpya kāritvam iti uktam eva indriyāṇām prāpya kāri tva pakṣaḥ atra ucyate na prāpya kāri tvam utsraṣṭum śaknumaḥ kāraka tvam eva tathā asatyeṣām utsṛjema kārakam ca aprāpya kāri ca iti citram adṛṣṭam api kāraṇam ātmanaḥ vyāpaka tvāt tadvatti dharma adhikam na aprāpya kāri bhavet kim uta dṛṣṭam cakṣuḥ ādi kārakam iti 
NM_8,2.360.50	 aprāpya kāri tve ca śakteḥ aviśeṣaṇāt kuḍya ādi vyavahitam api vastu cakṣuṣā dṛśyeta tatra kārya anupalambhāt na śaktiḥ kalpyate iti ced kiṃśaktaḥ kalpyatām kim tejaḥ iti saṃpradhāraṇāyām tejasaḥ dravya tvāt vyavadhāna ādi anuguṇam amūrtāyāḥ tu śakteḥ vyavadhānam abādhakam bhavet ititejaḥ eva indriyam kalpanīyam na śaktiḥ śaktimat adhiṣṭhānam vā prāpya kāritva upapādanam 
NM_8,2.360.51–8,2.360.52	 prāpya kāritā ca śrotrasya tāvat vīcī santāna sadṛśa śabda paramparā ārambhaṇa dvāreṇa darśitā śabda adhikaraṇe ghrāṇasya api samīraṇa āndolita kunda latā ādi prasṛta tad parimāṇa nikara adhikaraṇa gandha grahaṇāt prāpya kāritā na ca paramāṇūnām apasarpaṇe dravya parikṣaya ādyāśaṃkanīyam bhūyastvāt parimāṇūnām atas eva gandha dvāraka tad dravya samparka doṣa nirharaṇāya prāyaścittam aśuci dravya ghrāṇe samāmananti 
NM_8,2.360.53	 cakṣuṣaḥ tejaḥ prasaraṇāt prāpya kāritā anupalabhyamānam tejaḥ iti ced kim candramasaḥ para bhāgaḥ upalabhyate pṛthivyāḥ ca adhas bhāgaḥ na khalu pratyakṣa eka śaraṇāḥ padārthāḥ anumāna ādibhiḥ api eṣām upalambhaḥ sambhavati eva uktam ca anumānam rūpa upalabdhi kāryeṇa taijasam eva cakṣuḥ anumīyate tejaḥ dravyam hi dīpa ādi rūpasya prakāśakam dṛṣṭam iti cākṣuṣa tejasaḥ apratyakṣa tvam 
NM_8,2.360.54	 pratyakṣeṇa tu na ayanam tejaḥ kim iti na upalabhyate iti ced ucyate vicitrāḥ hi dravya guṇānām udbhava abhibhava ādi vaśena gatayaḥ bhavanti tat yathā sarvatas prasaratā bahala bahalena śīta sparśa āśrayeṇa dravyeṇa vyāptau hemanta śiśirau ṛtū bhavataḥ nirādhārasya śīta sparśa guṇasya anupalabdheḥ athaḥsati api tatra salila dravye tad guṇasya śīta sparśasya eva upalabdhiḥ na śukla rūpasya iti 
NM_8,2.360.55–8,2.360.57	 tejaḥ dravyeṇa ca nirargalam vijṛmbhamāṇena bhūyasā grīṣmaḥ bhavati tatra sati api tejaḥ dravye tad guṇasya uṣṇa sparśasya eva grahaṇam na bhāsvara rūpasya iti bhāsvaram ca kārtasvara ādau taijasa dravye rūpam upalabhyate na uṣṇa sparśaḥ udaka antargate ca tejasi jvalana tapte jale jvalana guṇaḥ uṣṇa sparśaḥ anubhūyate na bhāsvaram rūpam iti 
NM_8,2.360.58–8,2.360.60	 evam iha naya naraḥ tejasi dravye dvau= api rūpa sparśau na upalabhyeteiti kam upāla bhemahi uktam ca dṛṣṭa anumitānām ca niyoga pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ pramāṇasya tattva viṣaya tvāt iti cakṣuḥ tejasaḥ kvacid upalaṃbhaḥ na ca sarvatra nayana raśmeḥ anupalambhaḥ kvacid hi pṛṣadaṃśa prabhṛtīnāṃnaktaṃcaraṇām niśi nibiḍatama tamaḥpaka paṭala avalipte veśmani saṃcaratāṃcākṣuṣam tejaḥ bhāsvaram rūpam dūram api prasarat upalabhyate eva anyatra madhyandina ulkā prakāśa vat agrahaṇam asmad ādi nayana raśmeḥ 
NM_8,2.360.61–8,2.360.62	 ayam tu viśeṣaḥ ulkā rūpasya divākara kara vibhava abhibhūta tvāt agrahaṇam nayana raśmi rūpasya tu anudbhata tvāt eva iti kāca ādya antaritānām grahaṇa upapattiḥ yat tu kāca abhra paṭala sphaṭika antarita padārtha upalambanam tatra kāca ādīnāṃkeṣāṃcid ati svaccha tvāt keṣām cit ca suṣira tvāt cākṣuṣa tejaḥ prasara nirodha kauśalam na asti iti na aprāpya kāri tvam cakṣuṣasvāvatā bhavati cākṣuṣa tejasaḥ vega atiśayaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.63	 yat tu kutas nayana raśmeḥ īdṛśī gatiḥ gaganam ākramya yat gabhasti mālinaṃ= pṛśati na pratihanyate ca sāvitreṇa vegavatā tejasā iti uktam atra dṛṣṭa anumitānām niyoga pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ iti kārya sat tayā hi tathāvidhaṃkāraṇam kalpyate yat dūram api prasarati prasarat api pareṇa na nirudhyate dṛṣṭaḥ ca anirodhaḥ bharjana kapāla ādau tejasaḥ pacyamāna dravya pāka siddheḥ kalaśeca niṣiktānām apām bahis śīta sparśa grahaṇāt anirodhaḥ evam nayana raśmeḥ api bhaviṣyati na tu golakasya eva śakti kalpanā laghvī iti vaktavyam prāpya kāri kāraka svarūpa parityāga prasaṅgāt prāpya kārīṇi cakṣuḥ śrotre tvac ādi vat iti indriyāṇām āśraya atirikta tvam 
NM_8,2.360.64	 atas eva sarva indriyāṇām prāpya kāri tvam paśyadbhiḥ śāstra jñaiḥ indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ ṣaṣ prakāraḥ vyākhyātaḥ prāpya kāritā ca na golakasya upapadyate tad aprāptasya parvata ādegrahaṇāt prāptasya ca pratyuta aṃjana śalāka ādeḥ agrahaṇāt atas na golakam cakṣuḥ golaka saṃskāreṇa cakṣuṣaḥ atiśaya lābhaḥ cikitsā ādi prayogaḥ tu golake yaḥ pravartate saḥ ayam ādhāra saṃskāraḥ ādheyasya upakārakaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.65–8,2.360.66	 atas eva golaka guṇa doṣa anuvarti tvam api viṣaya upalabdheḥ ghaṭamānam ādhāra dvārakaiḥ hi tad ādheyasya eva tau guṇa doṣau= iti tasmāt aprāpta viṣaya grahaṇa anupapatteḥ golaka cakṣuḥ pakṣaḥ bhikṣūt prekṣitaḥ prekṣāvatām hṛdayeṣu na viśrāmyati iti prāpya kāri tejaḥ eva cakṣuḥ iti sthitam indriyāṇām āhaṃkārika tva anupapattiḥ ittham bhautika indriya vāde api prāpya kāri tva siddheḥ na kāpila kathitam āhaṅkārika tvam indriyāṇām upapadyate 
NM_8,2.360.67	 nanu ! pakṣa dvaye api prāpya kāritva upapatteḥ kaḥ ayam bhotika tvam pratyabhiniveśa atiśayaḥ bhavatām iti ucyate eka prakṛtika tve hi indriyāṇāṃekam eva sarva viṣaya prakāśana kuśalam indriyam bhavet sarvāṇi vā sarva viṣaya grāhīṇi bhaveyuḥ kāraṇasya aviśeṣāt kāraṇa niyama adhīnaḥ hi kārya niyamaḥ ahaṅkāra ākhyam ca kāraṇam sakala viṣaya prakāśana śakti yuktam indriyāṇi api tathā bhaveyuḥ eka viṣaya prakāśana śakti yukte tasmin katham indriya antarāṇi viṣaya antara grāhīṇi bhaveyuḥ bhotika tve tu bhūtānāṃbhedāt niyata guṇa utkarṣa yogi tvāt niyata viṣaya grāhi indriya prakṛti tvam 
NM_8,2.360.68	 tathā ca pradīpa ādi teja rūpa rasa ādi aneka viṣaya sannidhāne api rūpasya eva prakāśakam upalabdham atas tejaḥ prakṛti cakṣuḥ indriyam api rūpasya eva prakāśakam bhavitum arhati evam indriya antareṣu api vaktavyam tad eṣa viṣaya niyamaḥ prakṛti niyama kāritaḥ indriyāṇām iti bhautikāni indriyāṇi cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ rūpa ādi grahaṇa upapattiḥ 
NM_8,2.360.69	 yadi evam taijasena cakṣuṣā katham pārthivasya rūpasya grahaṇam pṛthivyāeva vā āpyena ca rasanena pārthivasya rasasya vāyavīyena sparśana indriyeṇa ca pṛthivī ādi sparśasya tat idam prakṛti niyame api katham viṣaya sāṃkaryam iti na eṣa doṣaḥ rūpa ādi viṣaya viṣayaḥ api hi eṣām niyamaḥ na tad āśraya viṣayaḥ taijasam hi pradīpa ādi dravyam rūpam eva prakāśayat dṛśyate na tejaḥ vṛttyā iva rūpam āpyam api dravyam rasam eva vyanakti na tu salila stham eva iti ghrāṇe tu nakaścid doṣaḥ tat grāhyasya gandhasya pṛthivī eka vṛtti tvāt iti 
NM_8,2.360.70–8,2.360.71	 dravyasya api darśana sparśana grāhya tvam aviruddham ittham bhautika tve api iti indriyaiḥ mahat vastu grahaṇa upapattiḥ yat tu uktam mahat aṇu grahaṇāt na bhautikāni indriyāṇi iti parihṛtam tad golaka ādi adhiṣṭhāna atiriktasya indriyasya darśita tvāt tat ca vitata tvat vitata grāhi bhavati eva vitatena api ca tejasā aṇudravyam prakāśyamānam dṛśya tedī pādinā taṇḍulā ādi iti atas api na ahaṅkārika tvam indriyaiḥ sva guṇa agrahaṇam 
NM_8,2.360.72	 yat punar abhyadhāyi bhautika tve para guṇa vat sva guṇasya api prakāśakam indriyam syāt iti tat ayuktam sa guṇasya indriyasya indriya bhāvāt indriyeṇa hi satā tena viṣayaḥ paricchidyate sa guṇasya ca asya indriya tvam sva guṇa rahitam tat indriyam eva na syāt anindriyam ca katham grāhakam atas indriya guṇānām pramāṇa koṭī antar pāti tvāt na tat prameya tvam tasmāt bhautikāni indriyāṇi svam svam viṣayam upalabhante iti siddham indriyāṇām bhautika tva sādhaka anumānam 
NM_8,2.360.73	 prayogaḥ tu pārthivam ghrāṇam dravya tve sati rūpa ādi madhye gandhasya eva vyaṃcaka tvāt gandha yukti dravya vat tatra vyaṃjaka tva mātram anaikāntikam iti gandhasya eva viśeṣyate saḥ ayam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ bhavet gandha tvasya apighrāṇa vyaṅgya tvāt iti rūpa ādi madhye iti uktam tathā api sannikarṣeṇa vyabhicāraḥ iti tat vyudāsāya dṛśya tve sati iti viśeṣaṇam 
NM_8,2.360.74–8,2.360.75	 evam rasanā ādiṣu api prayogāḥ racanīyāḥ śrotram tu ākāśa eka deśaḥ iti śabda adhikaraṇe nirṇītam gandha ādi viṣaya upalabdhi nibandhana sukha duḥkha upabhoga hetu bhūta dharma adharma upanibaddhānām ca indriyāṇām indriya tvam iti tad vaśāt yathā yathā niyata viṣaya grahaṇa karaṇa tā ghaṭate tathā tathā kalpyate iti sarvam anavadyam tvac indriya ekānta vādaḥ āha bhavantu bhautikāni indriyāṇi paṃca iti tu na yuktam uktam tvac eva hi ekam indriyam bhavitum arhati sarvatra anapāyāt 
NM_8,2.360.76–8,2.360.77	 kara tala kapola kaṇṭha ādi vartinā api tvac indriyeṇa rūpa upalambha prasaṅga eti ced na avayava viśeṣe śakti viśeṣa niyamāt na hi pāṇinā pādena vā upastha kāryam kartum śakyate asti ca avayava viśeṣe svabhāva viśeṣa vaicitryam tuṣāra karpūra āpūrṇa vāriṇī uttara mānase yathā ca vṛṣaṇau snātuḥ sphuṭataḥ na tathā sphicau klinna ārdra tṛṇa kāṣṭha ādi dhūmena kaṭunā yathā mūrdha akṣi vedana udeti na tathā avayava antare tasmāt avayava viśeṣa vyavasthita nānā śakti khacitam tvac eva ekam indriyam iti tvac indriya ekānta vāda nirāsaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.78	 ucyate kutas ayam apūrvaḥ eṣa mahā prājñaḥ vādī sarala matīnasmāna vaṃcayitum āgataḥ yaḥ avayava viśeṣe śakti viśeṣam āśrayan= api ekam indriya m anyate śakti bhedāt āśraya bhedāt ca nānātvam eva etat indriyāṇām yuktam iti ala mahātmabhiḥ saha kalahena manuṣyaiḥ saha saṃvādaḥ mādṛśānām hi śobhate devāḥ tu nara rūpeṇa te ime bhānti vādinaḥ cakṣuḥ śrotrayoḥ ekaika indriya tvam nanu ! nānā tva pakṣe api paṃcatva niyamaḥ katham dve śrotre cakṣūṣī dve ca katham te ekam indriyam 
NM_8,2.360.79–8,2.360.80	 āha ca sa vyaṣṭasya itareṇa pratyabhijñānāt iti cakṣuṣṭava jāteḥ eka tvāt iti ced tarhi indriya tva jāteḥ eka tvāt ekam eva indriyaṃsyāt ucyate cakṣuḥ tāvat tejaḥ iti nirṇītam tat ca ekam eva tad adhiṣṭhānam api ekam eva ghoṇā vaṃśa vyavahitam anekam iva upalabhyate bhinnam vā tat bhavatu tejaḥ tad kakārya aikyāt āśraya bhede api ekam eva śrotram api karṇa= chidra dvaya anusyūtam ekam eva nabhaḥ deśa prāyam veditavyam kārya aikyasyatatra api bhāvāt tena adhiṣṭhāna bhede api kāryā eka tvasya darśanāt tad sāmānyasya ca eka tvāt ekatvam śrotra cakṣuṣoḥ 
NM_8,2.360.81	 na ca indriya jāteḥ aikyāt ekam indriyam kāryasya upalabdhi lakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya gandha ādeḥ adhiṣṭhānasya tri puṭikā ādeḥ gateḥ ca bahis prasaraṇa ātmikāyāḥ ākṛteḥ ca parimāṇa svabhāvāyāḥ jāteḥ ca ghrāṇa tva ādeḥ jāti śabda vācyasya yoneḥ vā pṛthivī ādeḥ paṃcavidha tvāt paṃca eva indriyāṇi kalpyante yathā parama aṇu tva sāmānya aviśeṣaḥ api pṛthivī ādi caturvidha kārya darśanāt caturvidhāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kalpyante iti karmendriyāṇām āvaśyaka tā 
NM_8,2.360.82–8,2.360.83	 nanu ! tathā api na paṃca indriyāṇi katham buddhīndriya vat karmendriyāṇām api paṃcānām upasaṃkhyeya tvāt tat uktam vāc pāṇi pāda pāyu upasthāḥ karmendriyāṇi āhuḥ teṣām ca vacana ādāna viharaṇa utsarga ānanda ātmaka paṃcavidha kārya sādhanāt indriya tvam tad kāryasya anitaretara sādhya tvāt iti atirikta karmendriya nirāsaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.84	 atra āha atyalpam idam ucyate paṃca karmendriyāṇi iti anyāni api khaluna santi karmendriyāṇi tathā hi kaṇṭhaḥ anna nigaraṇena stana kalaśa āliṅganādinā vakṣaḥ bhāra vahanena ca aṃsa dvayam indriyam ucyate na katham tad kāryasya śarīra avayava antare api darśanāt iti ced kinnu bhavān anna pānaṃpāṇi pādena nigirati pāyunā vā ādānam api kim āsya ādinā vāna kurvate tiryaṃcaḥ manuṣyāḥ api hi kvacid asatsu api ca bhavat kalpiteṣu karmendriyeṣu tat kāryam yāvat tāvat anyathā api dṛśyate na tu evam buddhīndriyeṣu bhavati utpāṭikṣasya na manāk api rūpa dhīḥ īṣat vihāra ādāna ādi dṛṣṭam lūna aṅghri pāṇiṣu karmedriyāṇām atiprasakta tvam 
NM_8,2.360.85–8,2.360.86	 api ca viharaṇam api na kevalam caraṇa yugala kāryam api tu jānu ūru jaṅghā ādi sahita pāda sampādyamānam api ādānam api bāhu sahitābhyām pāṇibhyām abhinirvartyate na kevalābhyām vāc indriyam tu nābheḥ ūrdhvam sarvam eva syāt evam hi āhuḥ vāyuḥ nābheḥ utthitaḥ urasi vistīrṇaḥ kaṇṭhe vivartitaḥ mūrdhānam abhihatya parāvṛttaḥ vaktrecaran vividhān śabdān abhivyanakti iti asti ca īdṛś anubhavaḥ jalpatām viśeṣataḥ tu akhaṇḍa geyam gāyatām iti evaṃca karmendriya mayam eva viśva mitina śarīram indriya vyatiriktam kiṃcid bhavet 
NM_8,2.360.87–8,2.360.90	 atha śarīra avayaveṣu eva bhinna kārya kāriṣu karmendriyavahāraḥ tarhi kaṇṭha ādibhiḥ ati prasaṅgaḥ iti uktam upastha indriyam ca katham ekam gaṇyate tena ānanda vat mūtra utsargasya api sādhanāt vācaḥ indriya tva anupapattiḥ vāc indriyam tu suta rām ahṛdayaṅgamam saṃyoga vibhāga nirvartyaḥ bāhyaḥ śabdaḥ upalabhyate tad bhedāt ca bhidyate yādṛśaḥ hi bherī daṇḍa saṃyoga jaḥ śabdaḥ na tādṛśaḥ kūrmī koṇa saṃyoga jaḥ evam vicitra sthāna karaṇa saṃyogāt vicitraḥ varṇa ātmakaḥ śabdaḥ udeti iti na vāc indriyam nāma kiṃcid lokaḥ ca vākcchabdena varṇa ātmakam eva śabde vyapadiśati śabdaḥ ca indriya viṣayaḥ na indriyam tasmāt anekavidha duḥkha upabhoga kṣepa kṣama karma pariṇāma nirmitam etat śarīram taiḥ taiḥ avayavaiḥ tam tam karbhaphala upabhogam ātmanaḥ saṃpādayati iti alam evaṃvidha indriya kalpanā rjavena manaḥ ekam eva antar indriyam 
NM_8,2.360.91	 antaḥkaraṇasya api traividhyam anupapannam ekena manasā eva paryāpteḥ buddhiḥ tu upalabdhi svabhāva tvāt karaṇa kāryam na tu karaṇam ahaṅkāraḥ api jñāna viṣayaḥ eva na karaṇam etat ca sa vistaram buddhi lakṣaṇevṛkṣyāmaḥ tasmāt na trayodaśavidham karaṇam iti siddham nyūna adhika tva śamanāt atas indriya aṇi paṃca eva bāhya viṣaya adhigama kṣamāṇi antassukha ādi viṣaya grahaṇa upayogi ṣaṣṭham manaḥ tu kathayiṣyati sūtrakāraḥ tasmāt imāni viṣaya prasabha upabhoga lubdhāni cora caṭulāni yathā indriyāṇi puṃsaḥ bhava abdhi patitasya viveka ratnaṃānanda dāyi na haranti tathā vidheyam indriya artha parīkṣā gandha rasa rūpa sparśa śabdāḥ pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ tad arthāḥ 
NM_8,2.360.92–8,2.360.93	 tad arthāḥ iti atas eva apakṛṣya vā prakramāt vā arthāḥ iti lakṣya padaṃdarśayitavyam tad arthāḥ iti lakṣaṇam tat iti prakrānta indriya parāmarśaḥ teṣām arthāḥ viṣayāḥ indriya viṣayāḥ arthāḥ iti arthaḥ etat ca teṣām sāmānya lakṣaṇam gandha rasa rūpa sparśa śabdāḥ iti vibhāgaḥ indriya lakṣaṇāni viśeṣa lakṣaṇam tu punar tad arthāḥ iti evam yojanīyam tat iti ghrāṇa ādīnām viśeṣa saṃjñā nirdiṣṭānām avamarśaḥ evaṃca ghrāṇasya viṣayaḥ gandhaḥ rasanasya viṣayaḥ rasaḥ ityādi viśeṣa lakṣaṇam uktam bhavati gandha tva ādīnāṃtu ghrāṇa ādi grāhya tvāt ativyāptiḥ iti pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ iti viśeṣaṇa upādānam te ca amī gandha ādayaḥ indriya arthāḥ bhogyāssantaḥ sakti hetavaḥ saṃsāra māṇam āvahanti iti heya tayā bhāvayitavyāḥ gandha ādīnām rāga hetu tvam 
NM_8,2.360.94	 nanu evam gandha ādi guṇa adhikaraṇasya avayavinaḥ prathamasya rāga hetoḥ asaṃgrahaḥ syāt vakṣyati ca tad nimitam tu avayavi abhimānaḥ iti saṃkhyā parimāṇa ādi guṇa antarāṇām api rāga hetu tvam asti eva yathā hi barhi kalāpa anukāri parimṛdita kusuma dala paṭala śabala vilāsinī keśa pāśa vṛtti rūpam harati hṛdayam yūnām tathā tad gatā bahu tva saṃkhyā api uttapta kanaka śilā nibha nitamba bimba rūpa vat tat parimāṇam api harati ca sarabhasam avayava saṃyoga vibhāga ādi api 
NM_8,2.360.95–8,2.360.97	 tathā kanduka ādi krīḍāsu kisalayita vilāsa rasa madhura paribhramaṇa ādi karma jātam tathā antya jāti ādi parihāreṇa sva anurūpa jāti yogi tvam api ityādi sarva dravya guṇa karma ādi sakti kāraṇam anuktam syāt sūtra yojanāyām pakṣa bhedaḥ tatra kecid pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ iti dvandva samāsam vyācakṣate pṛthivī ādīni ca guṇāḥ ca iti pṛthivī ādi padena guṇa adhikaraṇam avayavi dravyam uktam āśrita tva viśeṣaṇābhyām sarve guṇāḥ iti guṇa grahaṇena saṃkhyā parimāṇa ādi vat karma sāmānya ādi api sarvam uktam atas na asaṃgrahaḥ iti 
NM_8,2.360.98–8,2.360.99	 tat idam anupapannam gandha ādi grahaṇasya hi tadā ānīm ānarthakyam guṇāḥ ca etyanena eva gata artha tvāt viśeṣa khyāpana artham tad upādānam iti ced tarhikim dvandva samāsa varṇanena ayam eva astu samādhiḥ rūpa rasa ādīnām indriya artha tve viśeṣaḥ yadi api dravya karma sāmānyānām anyeṣām ca saṃkhyā parimāṇa ādi guṇānāṃasti eva sakti hetu tā tathā api prādhānyena gandha ādīnām eva sā dṛśyate na hi rūpa ādi nirapekṣasya dravyasya saṃkhyā ādeḥ sāmānyasya vā sakti hetu tvam samasti iti rūpa ādayaḥ eva mukhyam rāga kāraṇam tatra jhaṭiti buddheḥ prasaraṇāt uktam ca tathā api nitarām rāga vṛddhyai rūpa ādayaḥ nṛṇām te eva kavibhiḥ gītāḥ paṃca iṣoḥ paṃca sāyakāḥ 
NM_8,2.360.100–8,2.360.102	 tasmāt pṛthivī ādīnām guṇāḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī samāse eva śreyān guṇa vyatiriktaḥ ca guṇī pūrvam eva sādhitaḥ yam aham adrākṣam tam spṛśāmi iti pratyaya prāmāṇyāt pṛthivī ādīnām guṇa vibhāgaḥ pṛthivī ādīnām guṇāḥ iti yat uktam didānīm vibhajya varṇyate kasyakati guṇāḥ iti tatra gandha ādayaḥ niyoktavyāḥ catvāraḥ pṛthivī guṇāḥ ap tejaḥ marutām ekam pūrva pūrvam apohya tu gandha varjam rasa rūpa sparśāḥ apām rasa varjam rūpa sparśau tejasaḥ rūpa varjaṃsparśaḥ eva vāyoḥ iti ākāśasya tu guṇaḥ śabdaḥ bhūtānām ekaika guṇavat tva nirākaraṇam 
NM_8,2.360.103	 nanu ! na ayam guṇa viniyogaḥ sādhīyān pṛthivyāḥ caturguṇa tve pārthivena ghrāṇa indriyeṇa caturṇām api tad guṇānām grahaṇam syāt evam uttareṣu api vaktavyam tasmāt ekaika guṇa tvam eva bhūtānām ucyatām na etat evam na higuṇāḥ sva icchayā labhyante kintu yathā upalabhyante tathā vyavasthāpyante pratīti pramāṇakāḥ hi vayam tatra pārthive dravye caturṇām api guṇānāṃ upalaṃbhāt katham ekaguṇām pṛthivīm brūmaḥ rūpa eka guṇe ca tejasi pṛthivī udakayoḥ vāyu vada rūpa tvāt apratyakṣa tvam syāt tasmāt trīṇi rūpavantitavyāṇi sarvasya sarva guṇavat tva nirākaraṇam 
NM_8,2.360.104	 yadi evam sarveṣām sarvatra upalaṃbhāt sarvāṇi sarva guṇāni bhavantu bhūtāni paṭapaṭāyate pṛthivī calacalāyante āpaḥ dhagadhak āyate tejaḥ kathakathāyate vāyuḥ iti sarveṣām guṇaḥ śabdaḥ syāt ucyate na sarve guṇāḥ sarvatra upalabhyante nirgandhānām apām sarvatra darśanāt klinna rūpa ādau tu pārthiva avayava saṃkrāntyā gandhaḥ payasi upalabhyate śabdasya ākāśa mātra guṇa tvam 
NM_8,2.360.105	 evam suvarṇe taijase dravye saṃyukta samavāyāt rasa ādi upalabdhiḥ śabdaḥ tu sarva kālam ākāśa vṛttiḥ eva pratīyate pṛthivī ādi avayava saṃyoga vibhāga prabhavaḥ tu asau= iti tad āśrita tva bhramam āvahati na tu akāśāt vinā tasya grahaṇam iti ākāśa guṇaḥ eva śabdaḥ iti etat ca prāk nirṇītam tasmāt na sarveṣām sarva guṇa tvam indriyāṇām viṣaya naiyatyam 
NM_8,2.360.106	 yat ca pṛthivyāḥ catur guṇa tve tad guṇānām caturṇām api pārthiva ghrāṇa indriya grāhya tvam syāt iti tat na guṇa utkarṣasya niyāmaka tvāt sa atiśaya gandha guṇa adhikaraṇaiḥ vijātīya dravya avayava saṃsparśa leśa rahitaiḥ kevala pṛthivī avayavaiḥ adṛṣṭa sahakāribhiḥ ghaṭitam ghrāṇa indriyam iti gandhasya eva grāhakam tad tad indriyeṣu tad tad guṇasya prādhānyam 
NM_8,2.360.107–8,2.360.108	 etat eva ca bhūyas tvam ācakṣate yathā aaha kaṇa vrataḥ bhūyastvāt gandhavat tvāt ca pṛthivī gandha jñāne prakṛtiḥ iha api uktam tad vyavasthānam tu bhūyaḥ tvāt iti dṛśyante ca kevala pṛthivī avayava upādāneṣu api padārtheṣu vyavasthita kārya niyamāḥ śaktayaḥ yathā pārthiva tva aviśeṣe api viṣam maraṇa kāraṇam agada dravyam anyat tu jīvitāya prakalpate tasmāt aparyanu yojyaḥ ayam pārthivena ghrāṇena gandha vat tad rasa ādayaḥ api kathaṃna gṛhyante iti indriyaiḥ sva gata guṇa grahaṇa agrahaṇe 
NM_8,2.360.109	 sa atiśaya prakṛti guṇa yoge api na ca sva guṇa grahaṇa naipuṇyam indriyāṇām iti indriya cintāyām nirṇītam śrotreṇa tu sva guṇasya śabdasya grahaṇam iti pariśeṣa anumāna pramāṇakaḥ a yam arthaḥ śabda parīkṣāyām eva parīkṣitaḥ iti alam ati prasaṅgena iti nipuṇa dhiyām asammata eṣāsakala guṇa eka guṇa tva kalpanā tad ayam akaluṣaḥ abhyupeya tāṃguṇa viniyoga vidhiḥ yathā uditaḥ indriyāṇām vimarśanasya phalam te amī jñeyāḥ kṛtaka madhuram rūpam ādarśayantaḥ tikta udgārāḥ pariṇati vipad kāriṇaḥ hi indriya arthāḥ tyaktāḥ ca ete vyapagata mahā moha paṅkena puṃsā ātīrṇaḥ ca ayam bhava jalanidhiḥ kleśa kallola raudraḥ 
NM_8,2.360.110–8,2.360.111	 iti indriya parīkṣā buddhi parīkṣā buddhiḥ upalabdhiḥ jñānam iti anarthāntaram nanu ! paryāya uccāraṇam etat na buddheḥ lakṣaṇa abhidhānam na paryāya prayogasya eva lakṣaṇa kṣama tvāt lakṣaṇam hi tat ucyate yena samāna itara jātīyebhyaḥ lakṣyam vyavacchidyate vyavacchidyate ca buddhiḥ buddhi ādi paryāya vācya tayā evatebhyaḥ iti na abhidhāna mālā mātram idam sūtrasya lakṣaṇa paratvam 
NM_8,2.360.112–8,2.360.113	 nanu ! sāmayika tvāt śabda artha pratyayasya samayasya ca puruṣa icchā anuvarti tvāt katham idam vyavasthitam lakṣaṇam syāt  mā evam sārvajanī nasya samayasya viplāvayitum aśakyatvāt tad viśiṣṭasya tad vācyasya lakṣaṇa tvāt prakāra antareṇa lakṣaṇam asyāḥ kim iti na uktam iti ced śiṃśapā ca udyam idam tasmin= api ukte anuyuṃjīta bhavāt ittham kim iti nīktam iti buddhi lakṣaṇa vicāraḥ 
NM_8,2.360.114	 asti ca prayojanam paryāya dvāraka lakṣaṇa upavarṇanasya yat sāṃkhyānāṃvyāmoha nirasanam evam hi sāṅkhyāḥ saṃgirante buddhiḥ anyā jñānam anyat upalabdhiḥ anyā iti tat bhraya apanayanāya idam ucyate buddhiḥ upalabdhiḥ jñānarmiti anartha antaram ekaḥ eva arthaḥ iti arthaḥ ittham ca svarūpataḥ nirjñātā buddhiḥ bhoga svabhāva tvāt tad sādhana tvāt ca saṃsāra hetuḥ iti heya tvena bhāvyate sukha ādi buddhiḥ bhogaḥ tad sādhana buddhiḥ tu bhoga sādhanam iti katham punar pāramarṣāḥ pravadanti buddhiḥ anyā jñānam anyat upalabdhiḥ anyā iti nityām hi buddhim temanyante sāṃkhya saṃmata buddhi parīkṣā 
NM_8,2.360.115–8,2.360.117	 tat kim ātmā eva taiḥ buddhiḥ iti gṛhītaḥ  na acetanāyāḥ bhogyāyāḥ prakṛteḥthamā vikṛtiḥ mahat śabda vācyā buddhiḥ puruṣaḥ tu cetanaḥ bhoktā anyaā iva tau= imau prakṛti puruṣau vivekena apaśyatām saṃsāraḥ prakṛti puruṣa viveka jñānāt mokṣaḥ iti prakṛti svarūpam kā punar prakṛtiḥ nāma sattva rajaḥ tamasām trayāṇām guṇānām sāmya avasthā prakṛtiḥ pradhānam avyaktam ca tat ucyate yat sāmya avasthā gatam guṇatrayam iti nanu ! tad sattve kim pramāṇam anumānam iti āha tathā hi carācaram idam viśvam sukha duḥkha moha avinābhūtam upalabhyate na hi brahma ādau stamba paryante jagati tathābhūtam kim api bhūtam upalabhyate yat sukha duḥkha mohaiḥ vinākṛtam 
NM_8,2.360.118	 tatra sukha svabhāvam sattvam duḥkha svabhāvam rajaḥ moha svabhāvam tamaḥ sarvatra ca prīti aprīti viṣāda darśanāt prakāśa pravṛtti niyama avagamāt ca sarvaṃtri guṇa ātmakam jagat kāryam ca yat paraspara anvita rūpam tad eka rūpāt kāraṇāt utpadyamānam dṛśyate mṛd anvitāni hi ghaṭa śarāva udaṃcana prabhṛtīni kāryasya ekasmāt mṛdā ātmanaḥ kāraṇāt udbhavanti tat idam viśvam sukha duḥkha moha anvitam iti tad ātmaka kāraṇa kāryam bhavitum arhati yat sukha duḥkha moha ātmakam kāraṇaṃsā sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ rūpā prakṛtiḥ prakṛti sādhaka anumāna antarāṇi 
NM_8,2.360.119	 evam anvaya purassarāḥ parimāṇa ādi hetavaḥ api vakyavyāḥ iyat tayā vācaturaśrata ādinā vā parimāṇena tadvatām kāryāṇām eka prakṛti tva darśanāt viṣama vṛttayaḥ ca ete guṇāḥ kāryeṣu dṛśyante kvacid sattvam ādhikam ūneḥ ajaḥ tamasī kvacid rajaḥ prakṛṣṭam alpe sattva tamasī kvacid tamaḥ pravṛddham tucche sattva rajasī iti tat eṣām vaiṣamya bheda upadarśita viśva rūpa kāryāṇāṃkvacid sāmya avasthayā bhāvyam sā prakṛtiḥ ucyate sā iyam acetanābhogyā prakṛtiḥ asyāḥ tu bhoktā cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ sāṃkhya ukta puruṣa anumāna prakāraḥ 
NM_8,2.360.120–8,2.360.121	 puruṣaḥ idānīm kim anumānakaḥ uktam eva bhogyena bhoktuḥ anumānam na hi acetanasya bhogyasya bhoktāram antareṇa bhogya tā eva upapadyate dṛṣṭā casa iti bhoktā kalpyate sa ca citi śakti svabhāvakaḥ eva sarva prakāra kartṛ tva ādivyahāra nirvaha bahiṣkṛta svarūpaḥ draṣṭṛ tvam eva puruṣasya svarūpam āhuḥ yathā abhavantaḥ enam ātmāna madhyavasāya ādi dharma yoginam manyante na tathā asau bhavitum arhati adhyavasāya ādeḥ buddhi dharma tvāt kartum śaknoti puruṣaḥ tṛṇasya api na kubjatām anya upanītam artham tu sa paśyati eva kevalam prakṛteḥ eva sarva kartṛ tvam 
NM_8,2.360.122	 prakṛtiḥ eva enam bhoga apavargābhyām saṃyunakti na ca nirvikārā satī bhoga saṃpādana samarthā asau bhavati iti mahat ādi vikṛtīḥ pratipadyate paṅga bandha nyāyena prakṛti puruṣau saṃyujyete prakṛtiḥ acetanā dṛśyā bhogyā draṣṭāraṃbhoktāram puruṣam apekṣate puruṣaḥ api draṣṭā bhoktā dṛśyam bhogyam apekṣate iti evam tayoḥ paṅgu andha vat saṃyogaḥ bhavati darśana śaktyā paṅgoḥ gamana śaktyā ca andhasya ekatra melanāt kārya siddhiḥ evam prakṛti puruṣa saṃyogāt sargaḥ pravartate tat uktam puruṣasya darśana arthaḥ kaivalya arthaḥ tathā pradhānasya paṅgu andhavat ubhayoḥ api saṃyogaḥ tad kṛtaḥ sargaḥ buddheḥ pariṇāma bhedāḥ 
NM_8,2.360.123–8,2.360.126	 yat ca ittham pradhānāt mahat tattvam utpadyate sā buddhiḥ adhyavasāya ātmikāṃdharma jñāna vairāgya aiśyarya tad viparyaya rūpa vṛtti yoginī mahat tattvam ucyate buddheḥ ahaṅkāraḥ udeti sa ca abhimāna svabhāvaḥ ahaṃkārāt tu ghrāṇa ādīni paṃca buddhīndriyāṇi vāc ādīni paṃca karmendriyāṇi saṅkalpakam ekādaśam manaḥ gandha ādi tanmātrāṇi ca paṃca iti ṣoḍaśa koguṇaḥ prabhavati tatas gandha ādi tanmātra paṃcakāt paṃca pṛthivī ādīni mahābhūtāni jāyanta eti āha ca prakṛteḥ mahāḥ tatas ahaṅkāraḥ tasmāt gaṇaḥ ca ṣoḍaśakaḥ tasmāt api ṣoḍaśakāt paṃcabhyaḥ paṃca bhūtāti 
NM_8,2.360.127	 tāni imāni paṃcaviṃśati tattvāni saṃcakṣate pradhānam prakṛtiḥ eva navikṛtiḥ mahat ahaṅkāra tanmātrāṇi sapta pūrva pūrva apekṣayā vikṛtayaḥ uttarova uttara kārya apekṣayā prakṛtayaḥ ekādaśa indriyāṇi paṃca bhūtāni vikṛtayaā iva aprakṛti vikṛti rūpaḥ tu śuddhaḥ puruṣaḥ iti tat āha mūlaprakṛtviravikṛtiḥ mahat ādyāḥ prakṛti vikṛtayaḥ sapta ṣoḍaśakaḥ tu vikāraḥ na prakṛtiḥ na vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ bādhaka tva prakāraḥ 
NM_8,2.360.128	 evam mahā ādi vikāravatī prakṛtiḥ ātmanaḥ bhogam sādhayati kaḥ ca āsya bhogaḥ buddhi vṛtti anupāti tvam viṣaya ākāra pariṇata indriya vṛtti anurakta aṃbuddhi vṛtim jñāna ātmikām puruṣaḥ paśyati darśane api na tasya kiṃcid anya tvam tat eva darśanam yat tatra pratibimbanam iti ittham tayoḥ buddhi puṃsoḥ saṃyogesati puruṣa dharmaḥ cetayitṛ tva lakṣaṇaḥ buddha avasan= api san= iva lakṣyate buddhi dharmaḥ ca kartṛ tva ādiḥ ātmani sākṣi sthānīye asan= api san= iva vibhāvyate tat āha tad smāt tad saṃyogāt acetanam cetanāvat iva liṅgam guṇa kartṛ tve api tathā kartā iva bhavati udāsīnaḥ prakṛteḥ mocaka tva prakāraḥ 
NM_8,2.360.129	 atha apavargāya katham ātmanaḥ prakṛtiḥ avakalpate svarūpam prakāśayati iti ācakṣate anavadhṛta prakṛti svarūpaḥ pumān svarūpa niṣṭhaḥ eva prakṛti kṛtam akhilam ātma kṛtam iti manyamānaḥ tad upārjitam bhuṅkte yadā tu pṛthak thūtām enām manyate tadā bhavatu iyam āyāsa hetuḥ eva mama iti buddhyamānaḥ tad kṛtam anupabhuṃjānaḥ svarūpa niṣṭhaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate prakṛtiḥ api bhavatu ! dṛṣṭā aham anena pṛthak mām eṣa manyate iti na tad abhimukhībhavitum utsahate tat āha prakṛtessukumārataram na kiṃcid asti iti me matiḥ bhavati yā dṛṣṭā asmi iti punar na darśanam upaiti puruṣasya prakṛti puruṣa vivekaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.130–8,2.360.131	 parasparam ca bhagna rasayoḥ prakṛti puruṣayoḥ vyāpaka tvāt sati apisaṃyoge sargaḥ na pravartate eva iti āha dṛṣṭā mayā iti upekṣakaḥ ekaḥ dṛṣṭā aham asmi iti upara tyanyā sati saṃyoge api tayoḥ prayojanam na asti sargasya aparimlāna kutūhalaḥ hi pumān vaṃcayitum śakyate na dṛṣṭa tattvaḥ itimatvā satyām api yogyatāyām nivartate prakṛtiḥ naṭī iva raṅga bhūmau pradarśita nikhila nija nṛtta vṛttānta naipuṇā tatas iti āha raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nṛtyāt puruṣasya tathā aatmānam prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ prakṛteḥ eva bandha mokṣau 
NM_8,2.360.132–8,2.360.133	 tat evam prakṛtiḥ eva saṃsāre pravartate prakṛtiḥ eva mokṣam anubhavati iti āha tasmāt na badhyate addhā na api mucyate na api saṃsarati kaścid saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca nānā āśrayā prakṛtiḥ kimartham punar asau= evam ceṣṭate prakṛtiḥ iti ced kim kriyate svabhāvaḥ eva eṣa daiva hati kāyāḥ tasyāḥ nānāvidhaiḥ upāyaiḥ upakāriṇī anupakāriṇaḥ puṃsaḥ guṇavati aguṇasya sataḥ tasya artham apārthakam carati acetanāyāḥ api prakṛteḥ kartṛ tva ādi 
NM_8,2.360.134–8,2.360.135	 acetana tvāt asyāḥ katham evaṃkāri tvam iti ced uktam atra vatsa vivṛddhi nimittam kṣīrasya yathā pravṛttiḥ ajñasya puruṣa vimokṣa nimittam tathā pravṛttiḥ pradhānasya nanu ! utpanna tattva jñāne puṃsi prakṛteḥ bhoga anukūla mahat ādi kārya ārambha parāṅmukha tvāt ekasmin= tattva vidi mukte sati sarve muktāḥ syuḥ naiṣaṃdoṣaḥ tattva vidam eva pumāṃsam prati tasyāḥ audāsīnyāt anya sādhāraṇa tvena tad kāryān apāyāt tathā ca pāta jaliḥ kṛtārtham prati naṣṭam api anaṣṭa tadatya sādhāraṇa tvāt sa deha muktiḥ videha muktiḥ ca 
NM_8,2.360.136–8,2.360.137	 nanu evam yadā eva tattva jñānam utpannam tadā eva prakṛti upājita karma phala upabhoga parihāriṇaḥ puṃsaḥ śarīra pātaḥ syāt na iti āha tiṣṭhati saṃskāra vaśāt cakra bhrami vat dhṛta śarīraḥ tatas saṃskāra viratau satyām prāpte śarīra bhede caritārtha tvāt pradhāna vinivṛttau aikāntikam ātyantikam ubhayam kaivalyam āpnoti iti buddhi jñāna upalabdhi padānām aparyāya tvam 
NM_8,2.360.138	 aho nu khalu kāpilaka vikathā rasa ākṣipta hṛdayaiḥ atibahu prasakta anuprasaktyā likhitam asmābhiḥ tat iyam pradhāna vikṛtiḥ prathamā mahat śabda vācyā sā buddhiḥ tattva vidam prati naṣṭā api anya sādhāraṇa tvāt anaṣṭā eva iti nityāḥ nitya tvāt ca pratyabhijñā sanu sandhānādi vyavahāra prabandha nirvahaṇa kṣamā buddhiḥ jñānam tu tasyāḥ vṛttiḥ upalabdhiḥ tu puṃsaḥ vṛttimat buddhi darśanam iti na eṣām paryāya śabda tvam iti sāṃkya prakriyā nirāsaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.139	 atra pratividhīyate ātmani eva nitye vyāpini boddhari jñātari adhyavasātari dharma adharma ādi yogini pratyabhijñāna ādi kāryāṇām kartari sā iyam buddhiḥasaṃjñā sāṃkhyaiḥ kalpitā cetana tvam tu jñāna ādi yoginyāḥ api yat tvasya ana abhyupagatam saḥ ayam atīva tamasvinām bhramaḥ yaḥ eva budhyate jānāti adhyavasyati saḥ eva paśyati cetayate ca na khalu atra vastu svarūpa bhedaṃpaśyāmaḥ tatra buddhiḥ budhyate jānāti adhyavasyati puruṣaḥ tu paśyati cetayate ca iti vaṃcanāya evam ucyate mugdha tayā vā ātmanaḥ draṣṭṛ tva ādikam svābhāvikam 
NM_8,2.360.140	 yat ca idam ucyate budhya adhyavasitam artham puruṣaḥ paśyati iti tat vyākhyeyam kim idam tasya draṣṭṛ tvam iti pratibimbanam iti ced kim svacchepuṃsi vṛttimatī buddhiḥ saṃkrāmati uta vṛttimatyām buddhau pumān iti tatra cati śaktiḥ apariṇāminī apratisaṃkrama iti na buddhau puruṣasya saṃkramaṇam buddhau tu puṃsi saṃkrāntāyām api puṃsaḥ kim vṛttam yena draṣṭā saṃpannaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.141–8,2.360.142	 draṣṭṛ tvam svabhāvaḥ eva asya iti ced kim buddhau pratibimbanena viśiṣṭa viṣaya avacchedaḥ iti ced tatas pūrvam anālambanam draṣṭṛ tvam aghaṭamānam iti na naisargikam draṣṭṭa rūpa tvam puṃsaḥ syāt buddhi puruṣa dharma vibhāga anupapattiḥ darśana śaktiḥ svābhāvikī iti ced na tasyāḥ bheda abhedābhyām nirūpayiḥtum aśakya tvāt pratibimba pakṣe ca paraspara anurāgasya tulya tvāt aviyogāt cakatham idam nirdhāryatām amī buddhi dharmāḥ amī puṃdharmā iti na hi tayā upārtha garthyena kadācid svarūpa avadhāraṇam vṛttam buddhi puruṣayoḥ availakṣaṇya prasaṅgaḥ
