NM_8,2.360.143–8,2.360.144	 anavadhārita kārya bheda tvāt ca nānātvam api tayoḥ durvacam cetana acetana tvāt bhoktṛ bhogya tvāt ca vispaṣṭam tayoḥ nānātvam iti ced na jñāna ādi yogi tvam buddheḥ acetana tvam ca iti citram api ca kalpayitvā api buddhi puṃsoḥ nānātvam buddhi dharmāḥ puṃsi puṃdharmāḥ ca buddhau= āropaṇīyāḥ iti kim bhedena ! bhede ca buddheḥ jñāna ādi yogi tvena cetanatva āpatteḥ ekatra kārya kāraṇa saṃghāte cetana dvayam aniṣṭam prasajyeta buddheḥ āvaśyaka tva abhāvaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.145–8,2.360.147	 nityam antaḥkaraṇam antareṇa puṃsaḥ upalabdhiḥ na bhavet iti buddheḥ kalpanāced asti eva nityam antaḥkaraṇam manaḥ tena karaṇena kartuḥ ātmanaḥ viṣaya upalabdhi kriyā nirvartyate sā eva ca buddhiḥ iti ākhyāyate na tu anyā nitya abuddhiḥ asti iti buddheḥ kartṛ tva ādi anupapattiḥ kiṃca kasya kṛte paridṛśyamānam ātmanaḥ jñāna ādi kartṛ tvam utsṛjya buddheḥ adṛśyamānam tat upeyate kaḥ atra atiśayaḥ nanu ! puruṣasya svātantrya ātmaka kartṛ tve sati sva kṛta karma phala upabhoga ānantyāt anirmokṣaḥ syāt na hi karmaṇām parikṣayaḥ janma koṭi śataiḥ api śakya kriyaḥ yadā tu akartāram udāsīnam evam prakṛtiḥ badhnāti tadā sā eva jñāta asatī mokṣyati iti na dūram mokṣa vartma bhaviṣyati iti puruṣasya anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.148	 aho bata ! nikhilam eva maurkhyam sāṃkhya hṛdayeṣu eva pratiṣṭhitam iti katham anyaḥ janaḥ idānīm mūrkhaḥ bhaviṣyati ! acetane hi niraṅkuśe pradhāne bandhayitari suta rām anirvokṣaḥ syāt tattva vidam api pumāṃsam na badhnāti prakṛtiḥ iti kaḥ asyāḥ niyantā paṅgu andha nyāyena saṃyogasya tadā api tulya tvāt nivṛtta kutūhalaḥ pumān iti ced prakṛtiḥ anirmukta kautukā abhinava vadhu ūḥ iva sthitā eva 
NM_8,2.360.149–8,2.360.150	 api ca re mūḍhaḥ ! pūrvam api tapasvinā puṃsā kim kṛtam yadā asaubaddhaḥ abhūt draṣṭṛ tvam tu tasya rūpam tad avinābhūtam iti kaivalya daśāyām apitanna naśyati eva iti tadā api tasya bandhanāya katham na pravarteta nirmaryādā prakṛtiḥ dṛṣṭā asmi iti viramati iti ced mā evam na hi asau eka patnī vrata durgraha gṛhitā nissaṅkhya puruṣa upabhoga saubhāgyā paṇya vanitā iva na vā asauni yamena vyavahartum arhati iti āḥ tām etat mahat ādi sṛṣṭi krama nirākaraṇam 
NM_8,2.360.151	 yat ca sattva rajaḥ tamobhiḥ tribhiḥ guṇaiḥ sama avasthāyāḥ pradhāna śabda vyapadeśa bhājaḥ prakṛteḥ mahān nāma buddhiḥ utpadyate ityādi prakriyā jālam ālapitam tat sarvam mahā andha parampara anyāya pravṛtta guru pāṭha krama upanatam eva na pramāṇa mūlam kāryāt hi kāraṇam alpa parimāṇam upalabhyate na tu viparyayaḥ sva avayava āśritasya ghaṭa paṭa ādeḥ darśanāt tad avayavānām tad apekṣayā alpa tvāt anyasyāḥ mṛdaḥ mahā parimāṇa tvam aprayojakam ahaṃkāra ādi sṛṣṭayanupapattiḥ 
NM_8,2.360.152	 api ca buddhiḥ nāma viṣaya upalaṃbhaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ api ahaṃpratyaya rūpaḥ abhimānaḥ buddhi viśeṣaḥ eva tena bāhyāni indriyāṇi janyante gandha ādayaḥ ca guṇāḥ guṇaiḥ ca pṛthivī ādīni bhūtāni iti mahāvyāmohaḥ idam ca citram viṣaya janyāḥ hi sukha ādayaḥ prasiddhāḥ te adya sukha ādi janyāḥ viṣayāḥ saṃvṛttāiti naveyam viśvāmitrasya iva sāṃkhya muneḥ sṛṣṭiḥ prakṛti sadbhāve pramāṇa abhāvaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.153	 na ca pradhāna astitvam api pramāṇa vat anvaya ādi hetūnām asādhana tvāt cetanānām api hi kāmam bhavet api sukha duḥkha moha anvita tvam acetanā nibhūtāni sukha duḥkha mohavanti iti su bhāṣitam ghaṭe paṭe śakaṭe ca sukha duḥkha mohāḥ santi iti kaḥ pratipadyeta prakāśa pravṛtti niyamāḥ api cetaneṣu evadṛśyante na acetaneṣu iti asiddha tvāt hetoḥ na pradhāna siddhiḥ satkārya vāda parikṣā 
NM_8,2.360.154–8,2.360.155	 api ca satkārya vāda mūlaḥ eṣa tapasvinām vibhramaḥ sarvam sarvatra asti iti tatas anvaya siddham budhyamānāḥ te pradhāna siddhau= adhyavasitāḥ satkārya vādaḥ ca vicāryamāṇaḥ na samasti eva iti kutastyāḥ hetu siddhiḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva viṣaye vipratipattiḥ nanu ! satkārya vāde kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ bhavati bhāvānām na anyathā tathā hi catuṣṭayī gatiḥ iha syāt ghaṭa ādi kāryam mṛd piṇḍa ādinā kārayena kriyamāṇam asat vā kriyate sat vā sat asat vā anubhaya svabhāvam vā iti sāṃkhyaiḥ asat kārya vāda nirāsaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.156–8,2.360.157	 tatra āsataḥ karaṇe khara viṣāṇāt epi karaṇam syāt asattve hi ghaṭasya khara viṣāṇasya kaḥ viśeṣaḥ ghaṭasya api prāc abhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāva daśa yoḥasattva aviśeṣāt prāgabhāva daśāyām iva pradhvaṃsa daśāyām api karaṇam bhavet asat karaṇe ca niyata upādāna grahaṇam na prāpnoti taila arthī tila sarṣapān upādatte na sikatāḥ asattve ca tailasya kaḥ viśeṣaḥ sarṣapāṇāṃsikatābhyaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.158–8,2.360.160	 asati ca kārye nirālambanaḥ kāraka vyāpāraḥ bhavet na hi asaumṛd piṇḍa ādi viṣayaḥ bhavitum arhati kāryam ca asat upādāna upādeyayoḥ bheda anupapattiḥ api ca avidyamāne kāraṇa vyatirikte ca kārye janye tad kāraṇasya mṛd piṇḍa ādeḥ ghaṭa ādi kāryam janitavataḥ kim iti na svarūpam upalabhyate atha sva vināśena kāraṇam kāryasya janakam iṣyate tat iyam abhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ bhavet tasyām ca kutas ayam niyamaḥ yad anantara vṛttaḥ eva mṛd piṇḍa abhāvaḥ kumbham abhinirvartayati na cira atikrāntaḥ iti atas ca parutmṛd piṇḍe naṣṭe eṣamaḥ kumbhotpādaḥ syāt 
NM_8,2.360.161–8,2.360.162	 atha sva avyatiriktam eva kāraṇena kāryam janyate tarhi kāraṇasya sattvāt tat avyatiriktam kāryam sat eva iti na asataḥ karaṇam kāryasya sat asat rūpa tva nirāsaḥ sat asat api na kārya vaktum yuktam sat asatoḥ vipratiṣedhena ekatra samāveśa ayogāt rūpa bhedāt avirodhaḥ iti ced na kāryasya vicāryamāṇasya eka tvāt tat ca tena eva svena kāryeṇa rūpeṇa sat ced na asat bhavet asat ced na sat iti para rūpeṇa tu asattvam sarva bhāvānām asti eva 
NM_8,2.360.163–8,2.360.164	 anubhaya ātmakam tu vastu na asti eva iti tat pāriśeṣyāt sat eva kāryam kim iti ca tadā na upalabhyate iti ced anumānena api yat upalabdhaṃtat kim anupalabdham bhavati pratyakṣeṇa tu tadanīm anupalambhaḥ anabhivyakta tvāt abhivyati sampādanaḥ eva ca kāraka prayatna sāphalyam kāryam tusat eva iti kārya svarūpa siddhāntaḥ satkārya vāda nirāsaḥ ca 
NM_8,2.360.165	 atra abhidhīyate kena tu rūpeṇa tadānīm kāryam sat iti manyase yadikārakavyāpāra abhinirvartyena salila āharaṇa ādi artha kriyā samarthena pṛthu budhnā udara ākāravatā rūpeṇa cakra mūrdhani ghaṭaḥ asti iti tadā abhivyaktena api rūpeṇa sattva ātatyantāya kāraka vyāpāra vaiphalyam ityam api ca kāraka pravṛttau tad vyāpāra anuparama prasaṅgaḥ kim hi tadā upalabhya kārakāṇi nivarteran kāryasya prāc upalabdha tvāt ghaṭasya pūrvam sattva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.166–8,2.360.167	 atha mṛd piṇḍa rūpeṇa tadānīm ghaṭaḥ asti iti kathyate na tarhi asau tadānīṃghaṭaḥ asti mṛpiṇḍaḥ evā vasti na hi anya rūpeṇa anyaḥ asti iti śakyatevaktum uṣṭraḥ api asan mṛd piṇḍa rūpeṇa asti iti syāt atha uṣṭra rūpam uttara kālam api na nirvartyate ghaṭaḥ tu tatas nirvartyate yadi evam yadā eva asau nirvartyate tadā eva asti na tatas pūrvam iti 
NM_8,2.360.168–8,2.360.169	 atha pūrvam śaktayā ātmanā tasya astitvam idīnīm abhivyakti ātmanā akriyate iti tat api anupapannam abhivyaktiḥ api tad svarūpāt bhinnā abhinnāvā satī asatī vā iti vikalpyamānā na pūrva uktam doṣam ativartate abhivyakti svarūpa vimarśaḥ kā ca iyam abhivyaktiḥ kim kārya ātmanā avasthānam atha saṃsthāna viśeṣaḥ uta pratītiḥ iti 
NM_8,2.360.170–8,2.360.172	 yadi kārya ātmanā avasthānam tat pūrvam na abhūt tad adhunā bhūtam iti asat kāryam pūrvam api vā yadi tadā āsīt tadā punar kāraka vaiphalyam saṃsthānam api avayava sanniveśa viśeṣaḥ sa ca āsan= eva kriyate avayavāḥ tu santi iti kasya atra vivādaḥ na hi paramāṇavaḥ asmābhiḥ na aṅgīkṛtāḥ pratītiḥ tu ghaṭasya cakṣuḥ ādi kāraka sāmagrī adhīnā na mṛd piṇḍa daṇḍa cakra ādi kāraka cakra sādhya iti sā cakra mūrdhani ghaṭasya na asti eva iti asan ghaṭaḥ darśana adarśana adhīne sat asat tve hi vastunaḥ dṛśyamyādarśanāt tena cakre kumbhasya na astitāḥ 
NM_8,2.360.173–8,2.360.175	 cakra mūrdha vat pradhvaṃsa daśāyām api anupalambhāt ghaṭasya na astitvam eva iti atas ca na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ iti apramāṇakam pūrva apara antayoḥ bhāva svarūpa adarśanāt śakti ātmanā api kāryasya na sattvam śakti ātmanā api yat astitvam asya ucyate atra api cintyam keyaṃśaktiḥ nāma iti yadi ghaṭa svarūpāt bhinnā asau tarhi para rūpeṇa ghaṭaḥ asti sva rūpeṇa ca na asti iti asat kāryam uktam syāt ghaṭāt abhinna tve tu śakteḥ śakti rūpeṇa ghaṭaḥ asti iti sva rūpeṇa eva ghaṭa astitvam uktam bhavet tat ca pratyakṣa virodhāt nirastam asat kārya vāde dūṣaṇa uddhāraḥ 
NM_8,2.360.176	 asat karaṇa pakṣe ca yat ca uditam śaśa viṣāṇa ādi api kriyeta iti tat tu vacana vyakti aparijñānāt yat asat tat kriyate iti na iyam vacana vyaktiḥ api tu yat kriyate tat asat iti asataḥ kāryasya śaśaśṛṅga ādi vailakṣaṇyam svarūpa saha kārya ādi hetavaḥ yat vidhāyinaḥ dṛśyante janyate tat hi na vyoma kusuma ādikam prāc abhāva daśāyām ca hetu vyāpāra darśanam na tu pradhvaṃsa velāyām atas kam anuyuṃjmahe upādānam tu sarvasya yat na sarvatra dṛśyate tat na kāryasya sadbhāvāt api tu evam nirīkṣaṇāt adya tve vyavahāraḥ api na eva apūrvaḥ pravartate yathā upalabdhaḥ vṛddhebhyaḥ sa tathā eva anugamyate taila arthī sikatāḥ kaścid ādadānaḥ na dṛśyate adṛṣṭavā ca adya na anyaḥ api tad arthī tāsu dhāvati anvaya vyatirekau ca gṛhyete vyavahārataḥ anādiḥ ca eṣa saṃsāraḥ iti kasya anuyojya tā kāraṇasya kārya anukūla śaktimat tvam 
NM_8,2.360.177–8,2.360.178	 athavā śakti niyamāt eva upādāna niyamaḥ upapatsyate śaktiḥ tu nityā sūkṣmā ca na iha kācid upeyate tad abhyupagame nityam kārya utpatti prasaktitaḥ kintu yogya tā avacchinna svarūpa sahakāri sannidhānam eva śaktiḥ sā eva iyaṃ dvividhā śaktiḥ ucyate avasthitāḥ āgantukī ca mṛd tva ādi avacchinnaṃsvarūpam avasthitā śaktiḥ āgantukī ca daṇḍa cakra ādi saṃga rūpāḥ śakti dvaya kṛtā ca kārya niṣpattiḥ asakṛt dṛṣṭā iti tad arthibhiḥ tu tad upādānam 
NM_8,2.360.179–8,2.360.180	 yogya tā api na artha antaram kiṃcid kintu vastu viśeṣaḥ eva iti evam vastu viśeṣa niyamāt upādāna niyama siddheḥ na sat kāryam yogyatā na kārya svarūpā na ca śaktiḥ eva kāryam iti vaktavyam kārya svarūpasya tatas pṛthak bhūtasya pratītyā vyavasthāpanāt śakteḥ ca kāryatve kāryāt eva kārya utpādaḥ aṅgīkṛtaḥ syāt na ca ghaṭāt ghaṭaḥ utpattum arhati śakteḥ ca kāryam utpadya tā eti abhyupagatam atas anyat kāryam anyā ca śaktiḥ yogyatāyāḥ adviṣṭha tvam 
NM_8,2.360.181–8,2.360.182	 nanu ! vācya vācakayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ vyaṅgya vyaṃjakayoḥ ca dīpa ghaṭayoḥ ubhaya āśritā śaktiḥ dṛṣṭā iti kārya kāraṇayoḥ api asau= ubhaya adhiṣṭhāna abhavitum arhati asati dvitīye kārya ākhye tad āśraye katham iyam ubhaya āśrita āsyāt iti na etat evam yathādarśanam śakteḥ abhyupagamāta na ca ekatra dṛṣṭam rūpam anyatra api mṛgyate vācya vācakayoḥ vyaṅgya vyajakayoḥ ca dvayoḥ pṛthaktvena darśanāt ubhaya āśritā śaktiḥ aṅgīkṛtā iti hetu dvayasya anupalambhāt kevala kāraṇa vattiḥ eva śaktiḥ tad kṛtaḥ ca upādāna niyamaḥ iti siddham asat kārya vāde svārasyam 
NM_8,2.360.183–8,2.360.184	 asat kārya pakṣaḥ eva upādāna niyama vicāraḥ yuktaḥ utpattau khalu siddhāyām upādānam vicāryate sataḥ tu na eva na asti iti kim upādāna cintayā satkārya vāde ca sutarām upādāna niyamaḥ durghaṭaḥ sarvasya sarvatrabhāvāt sikatā tila sarit tīra kedāra vyapta bīja niyata aṅkura ādi krama utpadyamāna tila svarūpa paryālocanayā tileṣu iva sikatāsu api taila saṃbhavāt  sarvasya sarvatra ca astitve niyata padārtha pratiṣṭhita hāna upādāna ādi vyavahāra sakalaḥ eva viplaveta satkārya vāde asāmañjasyam 
NM_8,2.360.185–8,2.360.186	 api ca prāyaścittam eṣa tapasvī taptakṛcchram atikaṣṭam katham cariṣyati itim ahat mama manasi kāruṇyam annam ca tāvat ayam aśnāti anne ca varcaḥ asti iti viṣ bhakṣaṇāt prāyaścittīyate eva ayam iti alam satkārya vāda pramādena asat kārya vāde doṣa uddhāraḥ yat punar abhāṇi kāraṇa anupamardena kārya anutpādāt abhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ bhavet tatra ca anantara vṛtti utpatti niyamaḥ na syāt iti tat api ayuktam mūrtānām samāna deśa ṛtva avarodhāt kārya kāraṇayoḥ eka deśa tvam na iṣyate na etāvatā bhāva utpattiḥ abhāvāt bhavitum arhati kāraṇa adhīna tad utpāda darśanāt ataā iva ānantarya niyamaḥ api upapannaḥ na ca kārya kāraṇayoḥ abhedāt sat kāryam iti vaktavyam tayoḥ pratyakṣa siddha bhinna svarūpa tvāt asaṃbaddhāt kāryā utpatti nirāsaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.187–8,2.360.188	 yat tu niralambanā kāraka pravṛttiḥ iti coditam parihṛtam tat bhāṣya kāreṇa buddhi siddham tu tat asat iti vṛddha vyavahārataḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvām avagamya amuṣmāt kāraṇāt idam īdṛśam kāryam utpadyata iti buddhau nirdhārya kārakāṇi kartā niyuṅkte iti na nirviṣayaḥ kāraka vyāpāraḥ tat evam satkārya vādasya niṣpramāṇaka tvāt tad mūla anvaya ādi hetu sidhya bhāvāt na pradhāna astitva siddhiḥ tad abhāvāt ca na tad vikṛtiḥ nitya abuddhiḥ api tu jñāna upalabdhi rūpā eva iti samyak sūtritam buddhiḥ upalabdhiḥ jñānam iti anarthāntaram iti buddheḥ anitya tvam 
NM_8,2.360.189–8,2.360.190	 itas ca anityā buddhiḥ jānāmi jñāsyāmi ajñāsiṣam iti upajanana apāya dharma tayā pāka ādi vat kāla traye api prakāśamāna tvāt jñāna vyatiriktāyāḥ ca buddheḥ apratibhāsāt ayam tu viśeṣaḥ pāka ādi kriyāṇām odana ādi phala avaccheda dvāra kaṃkāla vaitatyam api bhavati upalabdheḥ tu vastu svarūpa prakāśana mātra parisamāpta prayojanāyāḥ kāla vetatyam na asti eva atas eva anitya tve api utpanna apavargiṇīm eva buddhim ācakṣate śabda vat na ghaṭa ādi vat kāla antara sthāyinīm iti buddheḥ ātma guṇa tvam 
NM_8,2.360.191	 sā ca iyam buddhiḥ ātma antaḥkaraṇa śabda dīpa indriya artha ādi aneka kāraka kalāpa kāryā api satī na bāhyena bāhya karmaṇi samavaiti na bāhya karaṇe cakṣuḥ ādau na antaḥkaraṇe manasi kintu kartari eva kartā api ca nityaḥ vibhuḥ ātmā na bhūta saṅghāta svabhāvaḥ kāryaḥ tasyāḥ āśrayaḥ iti ātma parīkṣāyāṃnirṇītam guṇa tvam api ca asyāḥ tatra eva darśitam buddheḥ āśutara vināśi tve hetuḥ 
NM_8,2.360.192	 nanu evam tarhi na buddheḥ anitya tvam vināśa kāraṇa abhāvāt dvividhohi guṇānām vināśa hetuḥ āśraya vināśaḥ virodhi guṇa prādurbhāvaḥ vā na iha āśraya vināśa nitya tvāt ātmanaḥ na ca virodhinam asyāḥ kam cit ruṇam upalabhāmahe na śabda vat āśu vināśi tvāt nitya ākāśa guṇaḥ api śabdaḥ śabda antaram ārabhya yathā vinaśyati tathā buddhiḥ buddhi antaram ārabhya vinaśyati iti tathā darśanāt kalpyate yāvān= ca kaścana vināśa darśana bheda upalambha ādiḥ śabdasya anitya tāyām nyāya uktaḥ sa sarvaḥ api buddhau= api yojanīyaḥ jñānānāma gapadya kāraṇam 
NM_8,2.360.193–8,2.360.194	 atas eva na buddhīnām eka pramātṛ vṛttīnām yaugapadya vidyate varṇānām iva eka vaktṛ prayuktānām vinaśyadavinaśyat daśayoḥ tu buddhyoḥ āśu vināśi tve api yaugapadyam anubhavāt abhyupeya taiti alam ati vistareṇa buddheḥ anitya tāyām ca prāyeṇa sarva vādinām a vivādaḥ tathā ca aha jaiminiḥ sat saṃprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma tat pratyakṣam iti buddheḥ api heya tvam 
NM_8,2.360.195–8,2.360.197	 acira ruci vat tasmāt buddhiḥ nisarga vinaśvarī bhavati janakaḥ sva ātmā tasyāḥ saḥ eva samāśrayaḥ bhava maru bhavaiḥ tāpaiḥ yā jātam eva yunakti sā vyasana jananīm jahyāt enām parama artha vid iti buddhi parīkṣā manaḥ parīkṣā yugapad jñāna anutpattiḥ manasaḥ liṅgam manasaḥ yat eva sattve pramāṇam tad gamya tvam eva asya lakṣaṇam samāna itara jātīya vyavaccheda kāri tvāt manasaḥ pratyeka gaṇanāyām hetuḥ 
NM_8,2.360.198–8,2.360.199	 nanu ! manasaḥ indriya tvāt tad vargaḥ eva paṭhanam yuktam kimarthaḥ ayaṃpṛthak nirdeśaḥ  na dharma bhedāt bhautikāni indriyāṇi niyata viṣayāṇi sa guṇānām ca eṣām indriya bhāvaḥ manaḥ tu na bhautikam na niyata viṣayam na ca asya sa guṇasya indriya bhāvaḥ iti manasaḥ abhautika tvam tat ca na bhautikam akārya tvāt atas eva na tad guṇa yogi na ca niyata viṣayam sarva viṣaya tvam tu asya sakala bāhya indriyāṇām adhiṣṭhātṛ tvat tad anadhigamya sukha ādi viṣaya grāhi tvāt ca bāhya indriyāṇi hi manaḥ adhiṣṭhitāni sva viṣayeṣu pravartitum utsahante cakṣuḥ ādīni na anyathā 
NM_8,2.360.200–8,2.360.201	 kasmāt evam iti ced yugapad jñāna anutpatteḥ uttara kālam ca bāhya indriya vyāpāra virahe api tad artha avamarśāt asti eka indriya gamyeṣu kvacid jāti guṇa ādiṣu vijñāna ayaugapadyam yat manasaḥ tat na sādhanam tatra viṣaya ādi doṣeṇa dūra tva ādinā jāti ādeḥ yugapad gṛhītum aśakyatvāt jñānāya egapadyasya manassādhaka tvam 
NM_8,2.360.202–8,2.360.203	 yat tu nānā indriya grāhyeṣu yugapad sannihiteṣu api gandha rasa rūpa ādiṣu viṣaya iṣu tad grahaṇeṣu ca sva kārya anumita sannidhāneṣu satsu api avikaleṣu kāraṇeṣu yugapad upalabdhayaḥ na bhavanti tatas avasīyate nūnam kāraṇān daram ebhiḥ apekṣyate tat ca manaḥ iti ākhyāyate jñāna ayaugapadye kāraṇam nanu ca! sugandhi śītalām dīrghām aśnantaḥ śuṣka śaṣkulīm kapila brāhmaṇāḥ santi yugapad paṃca buddhayaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.204	 api ca ayam khalu adhyāpakaḥ adhīte vrajati kamaṇḍalum dhārayati panthānam paśyati śṛṇoti araṇya jān śabdān bibhyat vyāla liṅgānibubhutsataḥ iti krama agrahaṇāt yugapad etāḥ buddhayaḥ asya bhavanti iti na āśu utpatteḥ sūcī agra bhidyamāna kokanada daḍa kadamba kāla vat ati sūkṣma tvāt kālasya kramaḥ tatra na vibhāvyate bhavitavyam tu tena iti smṛti kāraṇa tayā api manassiddhiḥ 
NM_8,2.360.205–8,2.360.206	 yadi kāraṇa antara nirapekṣa cakṣuḥ ādi karaṇa sādhyāḥ eva rūpa ādi viṣaya upalabdhayaḥ tad uttara kālam upahata karaṇānām api katham smaraṇa ādi rūpaḥ tad avamarśaḥ atas nūnam nayana ādi vat karaṇa antaram avikalam tat grāhi vidyate manasaḥ aṇu tva ādiḥ avyāpakam ca tat vyāpi tve na hi buddhīnām yaugapadyam nivartate asti ca ayam vyavahāraḥ ukte api kyacit vacasi kaścid āha na aham etat aśrauṣama anyatra me manaḥ abhūt iti tasmāt na vyāpakam manaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.207–8,2.360.211	 pratiśarīram ekam ca tad aneka tve punar api jñāna yaugapadyān apāyāt kriyāvat ca tat niṣkriyeṇa indriyāṇām adhiṣṭhātum aśakya tvāt mūrta ca tat amūrtasya kriyā anupapatteḥ mūrta tve sati nityam ca tat niravayavat tvāt anāśrita tvāt camurta tvam tu anitya tā āyām aprayojakam iti vakṣyāmaḥ niravayavam ca tad avayava kalpanāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt 
NM_8,2.360.212–8,2.360.215	 vegavat ca tad ā āśu saṃcārāt āśu saṃcāram antareṇa upalabdhi śaighryasya dṛṣṭasya anupapatteḥ indriya saṃyogi ca tat dravya tvāt dravyam ca tat vega ādi guṇa yogāt kriyāvat tvāt anāśrita tvāt ca acetanam ca tat kāraṇa tvāt itarathāḥ hi ekatra śarīre cetana dvaya samāveśāt avyavahāraḥ syāt iti tasmāt evaṃrūpam manaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.216–8,2.360.217	 sāṅkhya uktam su tasya rūpam ayuktam iti tad prakriyā niṣedha ādeva vyākhyātam manassādhaka hetu antarāṇi anyāni api smṛti anumāna āgama saṃśaya pratibhāsvapnoha jñānāni āntara sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa ādi viṣaya grāhīṇi ca jñānāni manasaḥ liṅgāni santi eva teṣām bāhya indriya vyāpāra sādhya tva asaṃbhavāt karaṇa rahitāyāḥ ca kriyā abhinivṛtteḥ adarśanāt iti mānasāni jñānāni 
NM_8,2.360.218–8,2.360.220	 smṛtiḥ tāvat manaḥ janyā eva anumāna āgama jñānam tu parokṣa artha viṣayat tvāt mānasam saṃśayaḥ tu mānasaḥ api kaścid vakṣyate pratibhā manāsī darśitā eva śvas me bhrātā aagantā iti svapna jñānam uparata indriya grāmasi abhavat katham nāma na mānasam tarkaḥ api saṃśaya vat kvacid viṣaye mānasaḥ bhavati eva sukha ādīnām tujñapti vat utpattiḥ api manaḥ nibandhana eva kāryaṇām ātma guṇānām utpatta aupratyāsanna kāraṇa antara saṃbhave api ātma mana ssaṃyogasya avadhṛta sāmarthyasya asamavāyi kāraṇa tvāt atas ca viṣaya anubhava janye api sukha ādau manassaṃyogaḥ kāraṇam sukha ādīnām ca bodha svarūpa tvam sva saṃvedya tvam ca nirastam atas tad upalabdhau manasaḥ eva kāraṇa tā manasaḥ saṃskāra viśeṣava tvam heya tvam ca 
NM_8,2.360.221	 tat idam manaḥ pūrva kṛta śubha aśubha karma saṃkāravatā aatmanā tad vaśā deva śarīra deśe saṃyogam pratipadyate tatra eva ca jīvana vyavahāraḥ vipacyamāna karma āśaya sahitaḥ ātma mana ssaṃyogaḥ jīvanam iti hi vadanti saṃyuktaṃca ātmanā manaḥ teṣu teṣu upapatti sthāneṣu nānāvidha bhoga sādhana tayā saṃsāra kāraṇam bhavati nitya tvāt ātma manasoḥ anādi tvāt ca saṃsārasya na idaṃcodanīyam prathamam eva katham ātma manasossaṃyogaḥ iti na hi prathamaḥ nāma kaścid kālaḥ samasti ādisargasya api pūrva sarga sāpekṣa tvāt īśvaraḥ api hi karma apekṣaḥ eva vicitrasya jagataḥ sraṣṭā iti nirṇītam etat iti kṛtam vistareṇa vidadhat sukha ādi bhogam vahat ca tarala indriya aśvasārathitām bandha nimittam manaḥ iti manasvinā yatnataḥ heyam 
NM_8,2.360.222–8,2.360.223	 iti buddhi parīkṣā pravṛtti parīkṣā pravṛttiḥ vāc buddhi śarīra ārambhaḥ vāc iti varṇa ātmaka śabda kāraṇa saṃyoga ādi ucyate na indriyam iti vyākhyātam buddhiḥ iti manaḥ iha ucyate na upalabdhiḥ śarīram prasiddham teṣāṃārambhaḥ vyāpāraḥ taiḥ vā ārambhaḥ iti sarvathā tadīya kriyā pravṛttiḥ iti ucyate pāpa rūpā pravṛttiḥ 
NM_8,2.360.224–8,2.360.227	 sā ca dvividhā puṇyā pāpikā ca tatra pāpikā vācā caturvidhāḥ manasā trividhā śarīreṇa trividhā eva iti daśavidhāḥ vācā pravṛttiḥ tatra anṛta paruṣa sūcanā sambaddha vacana rūpā caturvidhāḥ para droha para dravya abhilāṣa na āstikya anuvyāna rūpā trividhā manasā apravṛttiḥ hiṃsā steya pratiṣiddha maithuna ācaraṇa rūpā trividhā śarīreṇa pravṛttiḥ maithuna grahaṇam evaṃprakāra surā pāna ādi upalakṣaṇa artham sā iyam daśavidhā pravṛttiḥanavaratam abhijvalataḥ niratiśaya duḥkha vedanā dāyinaḥ naraka analasya indhanam puṇya rūpā pravṛttiḥ 
NM_8,2.360.228–8,2.360.230	 puṇyā api satya priya hita vacana svādhyāya adhyayana rūpā caturvidhā vācā pravṛttiḥ japa yajñe hi svādhyāya pāṭhaḥ eva upāṃśunā anta ssaṃjalpena vā aspṛhā anukampā para loka śraddhā ātmikā trividhā manasā pravṛttiḥ dāna paritrāṇa paricaraṇa rūpā trividhā śarīreṇa pravṛttiḥ iti iyam apidarśavidhā eva eṣā ca svarga sadana dvāra sopāna kalpāḥ pravṛtteḥ dvividha tvam 
NM_8,2.360.231	 sā iyam ubhayatas viṃśati bhedā pravṛttiḥ saṃkṣepataḥ dvividhā eva vidhi niṣedha ātmaka tad avagama upāya bhedāt vidhi niṣedha avagama śaraṇaḥ eva hi sat asat karma avagamaḥ tatra vihita anuṣṭhānam svargāya niṣiddha ācaraṇam narakāya iti evaṃsukha duḥkha upabhoga sthāna śarīra indriya ādi abhisamba dhani bandhanam eṣā pravṛttiḥ bhavantī saṃsārasya paramam kāraṇam bhavati pravṛtteḥ dharma adharma hetu tvam 
NM_8,2.360.232	 yaḥ hi ayam deva manuṣya tiryagyoniṣu śarīra saṃsargaḥ yaḥ ca prativiṣayam buddhi saṃsargaḥ yaḥ ca ātmanā saha manasassaṃsargaḥ sa sarvaḥ pravṛtteḥ eva pariṇāma vibhavaḥ vṛtteḥ ca sarvasyāḥ kriyā tvāt kṣaṇika tve api tad upagataḥ dharma adharma śabda vācyaḥ ātma saṃskāraḥ karma phala upabhoga paryanta sthitiḥ asti eva na ca phalam adattvā dharma adharmau kṣīyete antya sukha duḥkha saṃvid virodhinau hi dharma adharmau= udāharanti na ca jagati tathāvidham kim api kāryam asti vastu yat na dharma adharma abhyām anākṣipta saṃbhavam iti tad ucchede mumukṣuṇā yatnaḥ āstheyaḥ iti vitanutaḥ puṇya apuṇya pravṛtti samudbhava onigala vat imau dharma adhamau rujam bhava bandhane yadi niravadheḥ duḥkhasya antam cikīrṣasi sarvathā parihara manaḥ vāc kāyānām pravṛttim anargalām doṣa parīkṣā pravartanā lakṣaṇāḥ doṣāḥ 
NM_8,2.360.233–8,2.360.234	 pravartanā pravṛttim prati prayojaka tā sā lakṣaṇam yeṣām iti pravartanā lakṣaṇāḥ doṣāḥ doṣa prayuktaḥ hi puruṣaḥ puṇye karmaṇi pāpe vā pravartate doṣasya anupadeśya tva śaṅkā parihārau nanu ! pratyātma vedanīya tayā doṣāṇām sva rūpam aparokṣam eva tat kim artham eṣām lakṣaṇataḥ rūpam nirūpyate satyam pratyātma vehanīya tve apiyat eṣām pravartanā lakṣaṇa tvam upadiśyate tat anena rūpeṇa saṃsāra kāraṇa tva jñāpana artham dharma adharma nirmitaḥ hi śarīra ādi duḥkha adhiṣṭhāna saṃbandhaḥ tad bījasya cakarmaṇaḥ kāraṇam doṣāḥ karmaṇi pumāṃsam pravartayantaḥ bhavanti iti pravartana ālakṣaṇa āiti uktāḥ 
NM_8,2.360.235–8,2.360.236	 para santāna vartinām doṣāṇām apratyakṣa tvāt tat pratītaye pravartana ālakṣaṇattva kathanam iti tu apavyākhyānam alpa prayojanaka tvāt iti doṣāṇām vibhāgaḥ teṣām doṣāṇām trayaḥ rāśayaḥ bhavanti rāgaḥ dveṣaḥ mohaḥ iti tatra anukūleṣu artheṣu abhilāṣa lakṣaṇaḥ rāgaḥ pratikūleṣu asahana lakṣaṇaḥ dveṣaḥ vastu pāramārthya apariccheda lakṣaṇaḥ mithyā adhyavasāyaḥ mohaḥ īrṣi ā ādīnām kpteṣu eva antarbhāvaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.237–8,2.360.238	 nanu ca ! īrṣyā asūyā lobha māna mada matsara ādi doṣa antara saṃbhavāt katham trayaā iva doṣāḥ  na īrṣi ā ādīnām yathā nirdiṣṭeṣu eva antar bhāvāt rāga prabhedāḥ kāmaḥ matsaraḥ spṛhā tṛṣṇā lobhaḥ iti paṃca prakāraḥ rāga pakṣaḥ strī saṃyoga icchā kāmaḥ yat anyasmai nivedyamānam api vastu dhana vat na kṣīyate tad aparityāga icchā matsaraḥ anātmīyavaḥ tu āditsā spṛhā punarbhava pratisandhāna hetu bhūta icchā tṛṣṇā niṣiddha dravya grahaṇa icchā lobhaḥ iti abhilāṣa prakāra bhedāt rāga pakṣaḥ eva ayam doṣa prabhedāḥ 
NM_8,2.360.239	 dveṣapakṣaḥ api paṃcavidhaḥ krodha īrṣyā asūyā drohaḥ amarṣaḥ iti akṣi bhvra ādi vikāra hetuḥ prajvalana ātmakaḥ krodhaḥ sādhāraṇe api vastuni parasya darśana ādya sahanam īrṣyā para guṇeṣu akṣamāḥ asūyā para apakāraḥ drohaḥ adarśita mukha ādi vikāraḥ param prati manyuḥ amarṣaḥ iti asahana prakāra bhedāt eṣa dveṣa pakṣaḥ moha prabhedāḥ 
NM_8,2.360.240	 mohapakṣaḥ tu caturvidhaḥ mithyājñānam vicikitsā mānaḥ pramāda eti atasmin= tat iti jñānam mithyājñānam kim svid iti vimarśaḥ vicikitsā asat guṇa adhyāropeṇa sva utkarṣa buddhiḥ mānaḥ kiyat etat iti avajñayā kartavyā karaṇam pramādaḥ saḥ eva madaḥ iti ākhyāyate saḥ ayam tattva aparijñāna prakāra bhedāt mohapakṣaḥ mohasya pāpatama tvam 
NM_8,2.360.241	 evam trayaḥ eva ete doṣāḥ śoka haṣau tu sukha duḥkhe ucyete na doṣa antaram teṣām tu mohaḥ pāpatamaḥ itarayoḥ tu tad adhīna ātma lābha tvāt mūḍhasyahi rāga dveṣau bhavataḥ mithyā saṃkalpāt utpadyamānayoḥ anubhavāt ku saṃkalpaḥ camithyā jñāna prakṛtiḥ evam mithyājñānasya eva bhagavataḥ sarvam idam vilasitam yaḥ ayam aneka prakāraḥ saṃsāra duḥkha bhāraḥ mohasya svatas doṣa tvam doṣa hetu tvam ca 
NM_8,2.360.242–8,2.360.243	 yadi evam na tarhi mohasya doṣa tvam doṣa kāraṇa tvāt iti na tad lakṣaṇānapāyāt sati api doṣa antara hetu tve svayam api puruṣa pravṛtti prayojaka tva lakṣaṇa yogāt rāga vat doṣa tvam na mohaḥ api jahāti te ime doṣāḥ saṃsāra hetavaḥ iti yatnataḥ śamanīyāḥ doṣa śamana upāyaḥ katham punar amī śamayitum śakyāḥ uktam atra na akasmikāḥ na nityāḥ na ajñāta śamana upāyāḥ na ca aśakya pratikriyā iti vistarataḥ ca etat apavarga āhnike parokṣyate mithyājñāna nimittāḥ khalu ete doṣāḥ tasmin samyak jñāna prabhāva nihate hetoḥ abhāvāt na bhavanti eva iti doṣasya ekatva śaṅkā parihārau 
NM_8,2.360.244	 nanu ! evam prasava vināśa kāraṇayoḥ eka tvāt ekaḥ eva doṣaḥ bhavet iti tri tvam hīyeta na anubhava siddha bheda tvāt anubhūyate hi rāga dveṣa mohānām itaretara vibhaktam sva rūpam kāraṇa eka tvam tu na prayojakam ekasmāt eva jvalana saṃyogāt utpadyamānānām vinaśyatām ca pārthiva padārtha vṛttīnām gandha rasa rūpa sparśānām nānātva darśanāt atas sūktam doṣaṇām trairāśyam iti saṃsāra kāra abhavana praveśa mārgāḥ te ete trayaḥ eva doṣāḥ eṣām prahāṇa udyamam ādadhānaḥ na janma mṛtyū punar abhyupaiti pretyabhāva parīkṣā punar utpattiḥ pretyabhāvaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.245	 kasya iyam punar utpattiḥ ucyate ātmanaḥ śarīrasya vā tatra ātmanaḥ nitya tvāt utpattiḥ eva na asti kā kathā punar śabda arthasya śarīrasya tu utpattiḥ asti na tu paunaḥpunyena na hi mṛtam śarīram tat eva punar utpadyate tasmāt punar utpattiḥ pretyabhāvaḥ iti avācakam sūtram ucyate punar śabda arthasyayatnataḥ upadiṣṭasya parihartum aśakyatvāt tasya eva nirveda utpāda dvāraka apavarga upayoga yogya upadeśa tvāt ātmanaḥ ca sthāyi tvena kriyā abhyāvṛtti saṃbhavāt tasya eva punar punar utpatti brūmaḥ utpatti vat maraṇam api saḥ ayam ātmanaḥ eva mṛtvā punarjanma pretyabhāvaḥ iti nityasya api ātmanaḥ janma maraṇa upapādanam 
NM_8,2.360.246	 nanu ! janma maraṇe ubhe api nitya tvāt ātmanaḥ na saṃstaḥ iti uktam satyam śarīra ādi saṃyoga viyogayoḥ tu tathā abhidhānāt na doṣaḥ maraṇam ātmanaḥ bhoga āyatana deha indriya ādi viyogaḥ ucyate janma tu tad saṃbandhaḥ teete vipacyamāna karma āśaya anurūpeṇa deha indriya ādi tyāgopādāne eva maraṇa janmanī kriyā abhyāvṛttyā bhavantī pretyabhāvaḥ iti ucyate saḥ eva ca saṃsāraḥ tat ittham anudhyāyataḥ kasya sacetasaḥ nirvedaḥ na udiyāt tat uktam jarā viyoga maraṇa vyādhayaḥ tāvat āsatām janma eva kim na dhīrasya bhūyas bhūyastra pākaram deha indriya ādi racanā prakāraḥ 
NM_8,2.360.247–8,2.360.248	 atha yaiḥ utpadyamānaiḥ deha indriya ādibhiḥ ātmanaḥ saṃbandhaḥ teṣām katham utpattiḥ iti uktam sūtra kṛtā vyaktāt vyaktānām utpattiḥ pratyakṣa prāmāṇyāt iti vyaktāt iti kāpila abhyupagata triguṇa ātmaka avyakta rūpa kāraṇa niṣedhena paramāṇūnām śarīra ādau kārye kāraṇa tvam āha tathā hi pārthivam āpyam taijasam vāyavīyam iti caturvidham idam kāryaṃsvāvayava āśritam upalabhyate tatra yathā ghaṭaḥ sa avayavaḥ kapāleṣu āśritaḥ evam kapālāni api sāvayava tvāt tad avayaveṣu tad avayavāḥ api tad avayava antareṣu iti evam tāvat yāvat paramāṇavaḥ niravayavāḥ iti yatra yāvataḥ kārya jātasya sva avayava āśritasya pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam tatra tat eva pramāṇam tatau ūrdhvam anumānam paramāṇu sādhaka anumānam 
NM_8,2.360.249	 tat api hi kāryam sva avayava āśritam sāvayava tvāt paridṛśyamāna kārya vat niravaya tve tu tasya parama aṇu tvam eva paramāṇuṣu ca sāvayava tvasya ca hetoḥ asiddha tvāt na avayava antara kalpanā teṣām hi sāvayava tve tad avayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ bhaveyuḥ na te utpatti krama vat vināśa krameṇa api paramāṇavaḥ anumīyante loṣṭasya pravibhajyamānasya bhāgāḥ tad bhāgānām ca bhāga antarāṇi iti evam tāvat yāvat aśakya bhaṅga tvam adarśana viṣaya tvam ca bhavati tat yatas param a vayava vibhāgaḥ na saṃbhavati te paramāṇavaḥ ucyante teṣu api hivibhajyamāneṣu tad avayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ bhaveyuḥ na te tat etat evam utpatti kramavatvināśa kramasya īdṛśaḥ darśanāt santi paramāṇavaḥ paramāṇūnām āvaśyaka tā 
NM_8,2.360.250	 atra hi trayī gatiḥ asya ghaṭa ādeḥ kāryasya niravayava tvam eva vā avayava ānantyam vā paramāṇu anta tā vā tatra niravayava tvam anupapannam avayavānām paṭe tantūnām ghaṭe ca kapālānām pratyakṣam upalambhāt ananta avayava yogi tvam api na yuktam meru sarṣapayoḥ ananta avayava yogi tva aviśeṣeṇa tulya parimāṇa tva prasaṅgāt tasmāt paramāṇu anta tā eva yuktimatī 
NM_8,2.360.251–8,2.360.252	 te ime paramāṇavaḥ cetanā icchā preraṇam antareṇa viśiṣṭa kramakam itaretara saṅghaṭanam alabhamānāḥ kārya siddhaye na paryāpnuyuḥ acetana tvāt iti cetana eṣām adhiṣṭhānā sakala bhuvana nirmāṇa nipuṇa matiḥ īśvaraḥ abhyupagataḥ tad siddhaye ca sakala kutarka timira tiraskāra pūrvakam pūrvam eva niravadyam anumānam upapāditam īśvaraḥ api na aneka ātma vṛtti vipāka unmukha dharma adharma saṃskāra vaicitryam ananurudhyamānaḥ vicitrasya jagataḥ janma nirmātum arhati iti etat api darśitam paramāṇubhiḥ jagat ārambha kramaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.253	 na ca sakṛt eva sarve nirvartyamāna kārya parimāṇa anuguṇa saṅkhyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ ekatra saṃyojya kāryam ārabhante kintu dvi aṇuka ādi prakrameṇa sakṛt ārambhe hi kumbhe bhajyamāne kapāla śarkarā kaṇa cūrṇa ādi kramam apahāya prathamam eva paramāṇu anta tā bhavet sarva saṃyogasya sarva vibhāgena sahasā eva vināśāt atas ca karpara ādi krama darśanam virudhyeta avinaṣṭe api paṭa ādau tantu ādi avayava āśrita tvam upalabhyamānam katham vā samarthyeta paramāṇūnām apratyakṣa tvena tad āśrita tvasya grahītum aśakyatvāt paramāṇūnām ghaṭasya ca madhye kārya antara anārambhāt iti tasmāt dvi aṇuka ādi prakrameṇa paramāṇavaḥ kāryam ārabhante dvi aṇuka utpattiḥ 
NM_8,2.360.254	 nanu ! dvādveva paramāṇū prathamam saṃghaṭete iti atra kā yuktiḥ ucyate bahutva saṃkhyāyāḥ mahat parimāṇa kāraṇa tva darśanāt triṣu paramāṇuṣu prathamaṃmilatsu tad kārye bahu tva saṃkhyāyāḥ mahat tva ārambhaka tvāt tad pratyakṣa tvam prasajyeta na ca tad pratyakṣa tvam ati sūkṣma tvāt atas dvābhyām paramāṇubhyām dvi aṇukam ādau= utpadyate dvi aṇukasya apratyakṣat tvam tri aṇuka utpattiḥ ca 
NM_8,2.360.255	 tat ca paramāṇu vat apratyakṣam eva mahat tva anutpādāt dvi aṇuka dvayena tukārī a ārambhaḥ iṣyamāṇe tad aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ dvi aṇukaḥ iva tatra api mahat tva utpattau kāraṇa abhāvāt atas tribhiḥ dvi aṇukaiḥ tri aṇukam ārabhyate tatra ca bahu tva saṃkhyayā mahat tvam api ārapsyate pratyakṣa tvam ca bhaviṣyati tatas paraṃtu krama sāmānye pramāṇam asti loṣṭa ādi bhaṅge sva avayava khaṇḍa avayava darśanam krama viśeṣe tu pramāṇam na asti ittham ārambhaḥ iti yatra vā darśanam asti tatra tat astu krama viśeṣe pramāṇam iti antya avaya vinirūpaṇam 
NM_8,2.360.256–8,2.360.257	 ārabhya ārambhaka tvam na iṣyate mūrtānām samāna deśa tva virodhāt na hi paramāṇavaḥ prathamam kāryam ārabhya tadanu te eva uttarottara kālam kāryāṇi ārabhante kintu yat paramāṇu nirvṛttam kārya dvi aṇukam tat kārya antarasya ārambha kam tat api anyasya kāryaṇya iti evam tāvat yāvat paripūrṇa avayavi niṣpattiḥ ittham ca tantubhiḥ paṭaḥ kriyate na tantu avayavaiḥ aṃśubhiḥ itaratha ahi uttarottara kārya ārambhe api pūrva pūrva kāraṇān apāyāt mūrtānām eka deśa tvam syāt na ca tat dṛśyate iti yathā uktaḥ eva kramaḥ śreyān 
NM_8,2.360.258–8,2.360.259	 tat evam aneka ātma samaveta dharma adharma saṃskāra paripāka anurūpa prasarat īśvara icchā preryamāṇa paramāṇu kriyā ānupūrvī nirvartyamāna dvi aṇuka ādi kārya prakrameṇa śarīra ādi a vaya vi nivṛttiḥ iti sthitam śarīra viṣaye pakṣa antarāṇi etad viparītāni tu mata antarāṇi pramāṇa viruddhāni tathā hi nityam eva śarīra ādi anutpatti dharmakam iti pratyakṣa viruddham pṛthivī ādeḥ api avayava sanniveśa viśiṣṭa tvāt kāryatvam īśvara siddhau nirṇītam 
NM_8,2.360.260–8,2.360.266	 ākasmika tvam api śarīra ādeḥ kāryasya na yuktam kāraṇa niyama upalambhāt animittāyāḥ ca bhāva utpatteḥ anupapatteḥ abhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ api tādṛś eva triguṇa ātmaka pradhāna vikāra mahat ahaṅkāra ādi kāraṇaka tvam api kāryasya pṛthivī ādeḥ prāk eva pratiṣiddham anārabdha avaya vi rūpa kāryāḥ paramāṇavaḥ eva ete saṃcaya viśiṣṭa assantaḥ lokayātrām vahanti iti etat api na samīcīnam saṃcayasya bheda abheda vikalpābhyām nupapadyamāna tvāt paramāṇūnām ca ati saukṣmyāt apratyakṣa tvāt paudgalika kārya pakṣe api paryāya antareṇa paramāṇūnām kathanam apramāṇaka tvam vā śabda vivarta tvam tad anugama agrahaṇāt anupapannam paramātma upādāna tvam api na saṃbhavati tasya eva niṣpramāṇaka tvāt 
NM_8,2.360.267	 na ca na kadācid anīdṛśam jagat iti pāda prasārikā mātram kartum ucitam sarga pralaya prabandhasya samarthita tvāt iti atas ca pakṣa antara durbala tva atyathā uditaḥ siddhyati bhūta sargaḥ tam yaḥ tu paśyan= api nihnuvīt tasmai namaḥ paṇḍita śekharāya anādau saṃsāre sthitam idam aho mūḍha manasā aṃjanitvā jantūnām maraṇam atha mṛtvā api jananam iyam sā duḥkhānām saraṇiḥ iti saṃcintya kṛtinā nidhātavyam cetaḥ janana maraṇa ucchedini pade phala parīkṣā pravṛtti doṣa janitaḥ arthaḥ phalam 
NM_8,2.360.268	 pravṛtti doṣāḥ tu vyākhyātāḥ tat janitaḥ arthaḥ phalam iti ucyate artha pada grahaṇam gauṇa mukhya bheda pradarśana artham sukha duḥkhe mukhyam phalam tad sādhanam tu śarīra indriya viṣaya ādi gauṇam sarvam hi idam pravṛtti doṣa ākṣiptaṃphalam iti uktam tat idam anādinā prabandhena pravartamānam phalam punar punar upabhujyate iti mahataḥ khedasya hetuḥ iti bhāvyamānam nirveda vairāgya ādi mārgeṇa apavarga upayogi tām pratipadyate ātta māttam vijahataḥ tyaktam tyaktam ca gṛhṇataḥ puṃsaḥ phala ghaṭīyantram aho kaṣṭaḥ pariśramaḥ phala dvaividhyam 
NM_8,2.360.269–8,2.360.270	 tat punar phalam karmaṇā kim sadyas eva saṃpadyate kāla antareṇa vā ucyate dvividham karma vihitam niṣiddham ca tatra vidhi phalānām kāla niyamaḥ na asti kriyā phalam hi dogdhi pacati iti samanantaram utpadyamānam dṛśyate vidhi phalānām tu na eva niyamaḥ iti śabda parīkṣāyām citra ākṣepa parihāra avasare nirūpitam etat vidhi phale viśeṣaḥ vidhi phalam apiḥ ca kiṃcana codanā vacana paryālocanayā sadyas iti niścīyate vṛṣṭiḥ iva kārīryāḥ kiṃcid aihika phalam api karma vastu balāt kāla antara apekṣam bhavati putra iṣṭi ādi na hi sahasā eva nidhi lābha vat putra lābhaḥ saṃbhavati garbha saṃbhava hetu bhūta bhāryā parirambhaṇa ādi krama apekṣa tvāt 
NM_8,2.360.271	 jyotiṣṭoma ādi tu svarga phalam karma phala svarūpa mahimnā eva pāralaukika phalam avartiṣṭhate svargaḥ hi niratiśayā prītiḥ tad anyathā anupapatti parikalpitaḥ kanaka giri śikhara ādiḥ vā bhoga deśaḥ ubhayathā api na etat deha upabhoga yogya tām pratipadyate aniyata phalam tu citra ādi kaiścid uktam tat ca yuktam ayuktam iti vā tatra eva parīkṣitam niṣiddha phala vicāraḥ 
NM_8,2.360.272–8,2.360.274	 niṣiddhasya tu karmaṇaḥ sarvasya eva prāyeṇa para loke eva phalam para dāra abhimarṣaṇa ādau hi kriyā phalam surata sukha ādi sadyas phalam niṣedha vidhi phalam tu naraka patanam pāralaukikam svarga vat narakasya api niratiśaya duḥkha ātmanaḥ tad anyathā anupapati parikalpita deśa svabhāvasya vai etat śarīra anupabhoga yogya tvāt tīvra saṃvega nirvṛttam tu karma vihitam itarat vā pratyāsanna vipākam iha eva ibhavati nandīśvara nahuṣayoḥ iva iti āgama vidaḥ cora brahma ghna ādayaḥ ca kecid pratyāsanna pratyavāyāḥ prāyeṇa dṛśyante eva iti evam eṣām vicitraḥ karmaṇām vipākaḥ karmaṇām phala pradatva prakāraḥ 
NM_8,2.360.275	 yat api ca ucyate karma kāle phalam na asti phala kāle karma na asti kāla antare ca phalasya anyat pratyakṣam kāraṇam upalabhyate sevā ādikam iti tad apipūrvam parihṛtam karmaṇām vināśe api tat janitasya ātma saṃskārasya dharma adharma śabda vācyasya bhāvāt dṛṣṭasya ca sevā ādeḥ kāraṇasya vyabhicārāta dṛṣṭa kalpanāyāḥ avaśyaṃbhāvi tvāt 
NM_8,2.360.276	 dharma ādeḥ ātma ni samavāyāt phalasya ca putra paśu ādeḥ anyatra samaveta tvāt bhinna adhikaraṇa tvam karma phalayoḥ iti api na ca udyam mukhyasya sukha duḥkha ātmanaḥ phalasya bhinna āśraya tva anupapatteḥ sukha duḥkhe hi ātmani vartete dharma adharmau ca tad sthau= eva iti dṛṣṭam na eva sukhasya kāraṇam atas tad hetu rāgeṇa kim duḥkhasya api na tad nibandhanam iti dveṣaḥ tad artheṣu kaḥ tasmāt karma nimittakam phalam iti dhyāyan na kuryāt kṛtī saṅgam karmaṇi yena dustaram asau saṃsāram āpadyate duḥkha parīkṣā bādhana alakṣaṇam duḥkham 
NM_8,2.360.277	 bādhanā pīḍanam santāpanam sā lakṣaṇam asya iti bādhanā lakṣaṇaṃduḥkham tatra mukhye duḥkhe lakṣye lakṣaṇa śabdaḥ yathāśrutaḥ eva bādhanayā eva hi duḥkha svarūpam lakṣyate bādhayati duḥkhayati iti gauṇe tu duḥkha īśarīra ādau lakṣye bādhanā lakṣaṇam bādhana anuṣaktam iti vyākhyeyam pratyekam duḥkha lakṣaṇa kathana ākṣepaḥ 
NM_8,2.360.278	 nanu ! pūrva sūtra vyākhyātena phala grahaṇena eva duḥkhasya upadiṣṭa tvāt kimartha punar upadeśaḥ sukha pratyākhyana arthaḥ iti ced na pūrva apara virodhāt sakala prāṇabhṛt anubhava sākṣika tvena ca sukhasya pratyākhyātum aśakya tvāt tad pratyākhyāne ca vivakṣite kim artham prameya sūtre phala pada upādānam phale khalu sukha duḥkhe iti vyākhyātam tatas ca sukhe pratyākhyāte duḥkham eva avaśiṣyate tat ca anena duḥkha śabdena eva nirdiṣṭam iti kim phala grahaṇena ukta ākṣepa parihāraḥ 
NM_8,2.360.279	 ucyate na sukha leśasya saṃsāre jantubhiḥ antarā antarā anubhūyamānasya pratyākhyānāya duḥkha grahaṇam kintu sarvatra tathātva bhāvanā upadeśa artham saḥ api hi sukha lavaḥ duḥkham eva iti bhāvayitavyaḥ tad sādhana duḥkham eva iti mantavyam na tad vyavasitam puṃsām na tat karma na tad vacaḥ na tad bhogyam samasti iha yat na duḥkhāya jāyate duḥkhe tāratamyam 
NM_8,2.360.280	 tat ittham duḥkham utkṛṣṭam tiraścām madhyamam manuṣyāṇām hīnaṃdevānām hīnataram vīta rāgāṇām iti āgama vidaḥ vīta rāgāṇām duḥkha tānavam yuktitaḥ api avagamyate duḥkhasya rāga nibandhana tvāt tattvataḥ cintyamānam hi sarvam duḥkham vivekinaḥ viṣa saṃpṛkta madhu vat sukham duḥkhībhavati adaḥ sukha adhigama lobhena yatamānaḥ hi puruṣaḥ sahasra śākham āpnoti duḥkham eva tad arjane evam sarvam idam duḥkham iti bhāvayataḥ aniśam sarva upapatti sthāneṣu nirvedaḥ asya pravartate nirviṇṇasya ca vairāgyam viraktasya ca dehinaḥ kleśa karma prahāṇa ādi dvāraḥ niḥśreyasa udayaḥ duḥkhasya phala rūpa tva varṇana phalam 
NM_8,2.360.281	 nanu ! evam tarhi phala grahaṇam na kartavyam duḥkha padena eva gata artha tvāt iti uktam mā evam tasya anya prayojana tvāt pravṛtti doṣa janita tvena sukha duḥkhebhāvayitavye abhyāsena ca vartamāne iti karma doṣa janita tvena hi phalam anucintayataḥ tad kāraṇayoḥ anukūla pratikūlayoḥ asya rāga dveṣau mā bhūtām abhyāvṛttyā ca sa sādhanasya phalasya hāna upādāna srotasohyamānaḥ tatra atyantāya niḥ vidyatām iti phala grahaṇam tat evam anyathā phalasya niḥśreyasa upayogi tvam anyathā tu phalatve sati api duḥkhasya iti duḥkha svarūpa nigamanam dīrghasya duḥkhasya nimitta bhūtaṃsukham ca duḥkha ātmakam eva sarvam mumukṣuṇā heya tayā vicintyaṃdeha ādi duḥkhāntam idam prameyam iti nipuṇa matiḥ yaḥ dukham eva iti sarvaṃpariharati śarīre kleśa karma ādi jālam ajam ajaram anantam cintayan= ātma tattvaṃgata bhayam apavargam śāśvatam saḥ abhyupaiti iti śrī bhaṭṭa jayanta kṛtau nyāyamañjaryām aṣṭamam āhnikam 
NM_9,2.430.1–9,2.430.3	 evam śarīra ādau duḥkha paryante heye prameye nirṇīte yad arthaḥ etat upadeśaḥ yat param upādeyam prameyam yad arthaḥ śāstra ārambhaḥ tam apavargam lakṣayitum āha tad atyanta vimokṣaḥ apavargaḥ tat iti prakrāntasya duḥkhasya avamarśaḥ na ca mukhyam eva duḥkham bādhanā svabhāvam avamṛśyate kintu tad sādhanam tat anuṣaktam ca sarvam eva tena duḥkhena viyogaḥ apavargaḥ asti pralaya velāyām api ātmanaḥ duḥkha viyogaḥ sa tu apavargaḥ na bhavati sarga samaye punar akṣīṇa karma āśaya anurūpa śarīra ādi saṃbandhe sati dukha saṃbhavāt atas tad vyāvṛtti artham atyanta grahaṇam aśeṣa viśeṣa guṇa ucchedaḥ eva mokṣaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.4	 ātyantikī duḥkha nivṛttiḥ apavargaḥ na sau= adhikāḥ dvividha duḥkha avamarśinā sarva nāmnā sarveṣām ātma guṇānām duḥkha vat avamarśāt atyanta grahaṇena casarva ātmanā tad viyoga abhidhānāt navānām ātma guṇānām buddhi sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatna dharma adharma saṃskārāṇām nirmūla ucchedaḥ apavargaḥ iti uktam bhavati viśeṣa guṇānām muktau nāśasya āvaśyaka tāya avat ātma guṇāssarve na ucchinnāḥ vāsanā ādayaḥ tāvat ātyantikī duḥkha vyāvṛttiḥ na avakalpate dharma adharma nimittaḥ hi saṃbhavaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ mūla bhūtau ca tau= eva stambhau saṃsāra sadmanaḥ tat ucchede tu tad kārya śarīra ādi anupaplavāt na ātmanaḥ sukha duḥkhe staḥ iti asau muktaḥ ucyate hacchādveṣa prayatna ādi bhoga āyatana bandhanam ucchinna bhoga āyatanaḥ na ātmā taiḥ api yujyate prāṇasya kṣuppipāse dve lobha mohau ca cetasaḥ śīta ātapau śarīrasya ṣaṣ ūmi rahitaḥ śivaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.5	 tat evam navānām ātma viśeṣa guṇānām nirmūla ucchedaḥ apavargaḥ iti yat ucyate tat eva idam uktam bhavati tad atyanta vimokṣaḥ apavargaḥ iti mukti kālikā ātma svarūpam nanu ! tasyām avasthāyām kīdṛś ātmā avaśiṣyate svarūpa eka pratiṣṭhānaḥ parityaktaḥ akhilaiḥ guṇaiḥ umiṣṭaka atigam rūpam tat asya āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ saṃsāra bandhana adhīna duḥkha kleśa ādya dūṣitam vedānti saṃmata mokṣa nirāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.6	 atra tāvat vedāntinaḥ āhuḥ na ayam idṛśaḥ mokṣaḥ prekṣāvatām prayatna bhūmiḥ bhavitum arhati kaḥ hi nāma śilā śakala kalpam apagata sakala sukha saṃvedana saṃsparśam ātmānam upapādayitum yateta sa upādhi sau= adhika parimita ānanda niṣyandāt svargāt api adhikam anavadhika niratiśaya naisargika ānanda sundaraṃa parimlāna tad saṃvedana sāmarthyam caturtham puruṣa artham ācakṣante vicakṣaṇāḥ mukteḥ api saṃsāraḥ eva varam 
NM_9,2.430.7	 yadi tu jaḍaḥ pāṣāṇa nirviśeṣaḥ eva tasyām avasthāyām ātmā bhavet  tad kṛtam apavargeṇa ! saṃsāraḥ eva varamaḥ tu ! yatra tāvat antarā antarā api duḥkha kaluṣitam api su alpam api sukham upabhujyate cintyatām tāvat idam kim alpa sukha anubhavaḥ bhadrakaḥ uta sarva sukha ucchedaḥ eva tasmāt nitya sukham ātmanaḥ mahattva vat asti iti āgama prāmāṇyāt abhyupagamyatām tat ca saṃsāra daśāyāṃavidyā āvaraṇa vaśena na anubhūyate tattva jñāna abhyāsa bhāvanā abhibhūta nirantara avidyā varaṇaḥ tu ātmā tasyām avasthāyām tat anubhavati iti siddhānte muktau sukha abhāve pramāṇam 
NM_9,2.430.8–9,2.430.9	 tat idam anupapannam ātmanaḥ nitya sukha sattāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt pratyakṣam tāvat na asmad ādīnām anyeṣām vā keṣāṃcid asmin= arthe prabhaviṣyati itikā iyam kathā anumānam api na saṃbhavati liṅga leśa anavalokanāt iti nitya sukha sadbhāve anumānam na pramāṇam nanu ! uktam eva anumānam apavargāya yatra prekṣāvatām prayatnaḥ sukha siddhaye hi buddhimantaḥ yatante na aśma kalpam ātmānam kartum iti tat ayam iṣṭa adhigama arthaḥ mumukṣoḥ prayatnaḥ prekṣā pūrva kāri prayatna tvāt kṛṣi ādi prayatna vat iti na aniṣṭa uparama artha tvāt aniṣṭasya api śāntaye santaḥ prayatamānāḥ hi dṛśyante vyādhi kheditāḥ 
NM_9,2.430.10–9,2.430.12	 ati durvahaḥ ca ayam saṃsāra duḥkha bhāraḥ iti tad upaśamāya vyavasyantaḥ santaḥ naniṣprayojana prayatnāḥ bhavanti iti anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ nitya sukha sadbhāve āgamāḥ na pramāṇam atha āgamāt avagamyate bibhutvena iva nityena sukhena avinākṛtaḥ sva ātmā iti tathā ca paṭhyate vijñānam ānandam brahma iti syāt etat evam yadi etat eva kevalam āgama vacanam aśroṣyata vacana antaram api tu śrūyate na ha vai sa śarīrasya sataḥ priya apriyayoḥ upahatiḥ asti aśarīram vā va santam na priya apriye spṛśataḥ iti āgama vākyānām anyathā siddha tvam 
NM_9,2.430.13–9,2.430.14	 nanu ! bhavat paṭhitam āgama vacanam anyathā api vyākhyātum śakyate sa śarīrasya iti prakramāt sāṃsārike sukha duḥkhe anukūla itara viṣaya upalaṃbha saṃbhaveta dānīm aśarīram ātmānam na spṛśate iti arthaḥ hanta ! tarhi tvad adhītam api veda vacanam ānandam brahma iti saṃsāra duḥkha parihāra prakaraṇāt eva tad duḥkha apāya viṣayam vyākhyāsyate na khalu vyākhyānasya bhagavataḥ kācid abhūmiḥ asti dṛṣṭāḥ ca duḥkha uparame sukha śabda prayogāḥ cira jvara śirorti ādi vyādhi duḥkhena kheditāḥ sukhinaḥ vayam adya iti tad apāye prayuṃjate muktau śarīra ādīnām api aṅgīkāra prasaṅgaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.15	 yadi ca ānandam iti vacanāt nityam sukham ātmanaḥ iṣyate tarhi brahma iti vacanāt vyāpaka tvam iva vijñānam iti vacanāt jñānam apinityam asya abhyupagantavyam atas ca sukha vat jñānasya api nitya tvāt saṃsāre api nitya sukha upalabdhiḥ syāt tatas ca dharma adharma phalābhyām sukha duḥkhābhyām asyanityasya sukhasya sāhacaryam anubhūyeta api ca sukha vat jñāna vat ca asya kāmam deha indriya ādi api nityam prakalpyatām ittham mokṣaḥ ramyataraḥ bhavet 
NM_9,2.430.16	 atha kāryam sukha jñānam hetuḥ tasya vicintanīyaḥ yatas utpadyatā eti dharmāt ced saḥ api kiṃprabhavaḥ iti vācyam yoga samādhi jaḥ iti ced tasya sva kārya tvāt sva kārya sukha saṃvedana avasāna tvāt na śāśvatika tvaṃsyāt aprakṣayaḥ ca dharmasya niranumānakaḥ na hi yoga samādhi jaḥ dharmaḥ na kṣīyate iti atra ca kiṃcid anumānam asti viparyaye tu prasiddham anumānam sarvasya kṛtakasya anitya tva darśanāt iti kṣīṇe ca dharme tad kārya jñāna abhāvāt sat api sukham anupalabhyamānam asataḥ na viśiṣyate ātma sukhasya sva prakāśa tva nirākaraṇam 
NM_9,2.430.17–9,2.430.18	 sva prakāśam tat sukham iti ced na saṃsāre api tad upalabdhi prasaṅgāt śarīra ādi saṃbandhaḥ pratibandha hetuḥ iti ced na śarīra ādīnām upabhoga artha tvāt bhoga arthāḥ śarīra ādayaḥ te bhoga pratibandham vidadhati iti na sādhvī kalpanā sukhasya āvaraṇa asaṃbhavaḥ avidyā āvaraṇāt saṃsāre sva prakāśa sukha anupalambhaḥ iti ced na prakāśasyatu= chena avaritum aśakyatvāt na ca prakāśa rūpam pāramārthikam ātmanaḥ sukhaṃtad viparīta tuccha svabhāvā iyam avidyā na parītum arhati megha ādinā dinakara kiraṇa āvaraṇa avadhāraṇāt avirala gavala m alīmasam balāhaka vyūha pihita ravi bimbam tat api na rajanī sadṛśam dinam iti sahasā moha mahimā meghāḥ api raveḥ anye svarūpeṇa ca vāstavāḥ tattva anya tvāt acintyā tu na avidyā avaraṇa kṣamā 
NM_9,2.430.19–9,2.430.21	 tasmāt na nitya ānanda tvam ātmanaḥ suvacam mokṣasya nitya sukha rūpa tve mukti asaṃbhavaḥ api ca mokṣe nitya ānanda svabhāve tad rāgeṇa prayatamānaḥ mumukṣuḥ na mokṣam adhigacchet na hirāgiṇām mokṣaḥ asti iti mokṣa vidaḥ duḥkha nivṛtti ātmake api mokṣe duḥkha dveṣāt prayatamānasya samānaḥ doṣa eti ced na mumukṣoḥ dveṣa abhāvāt rāga dveṣau hi saṃsāra kāraṇam iti cajānāti mumukṣuḥ dveṣṭi ca duḥkham iti katham saṃgacchate 
NM_9,2.430.22–9,2.430.24	 sukhe api asya rāgaḥ na asti eva iti ced na svarga nirviśeṣe apavarge svarga vat rāgasya saṃbhāvyamāna tvāt duḥkhena tu nirviṇṇasya mumukṣoḥ vairāgyam jāyatena duḥkha viṣayaḥ dveṣaḥ viraktasya ca asya mokṣam prati yatnaḥ bhavati na duḥkhaṃdviṣate iti na samānaḥ nyāyaḥ kevala duḥkha nivṛtteḥ api puruṣa artha tvam yat uktam tādṛśaḥ mokṣaḥ prekṣāvatām prayatna viṣayaḥ na bhavati iti tat apina sāṃpratam prayojana anusāreṇa pramāṇa vyavasthā anupapatteḥ na hi prayojana anuvarti pramāṇam bhavitum arhati yadi nirānandaḥ mokṣaḥ prekṣāvatām na ruciraḥ kāmam mā bhūt na tu apramāṇakam ānandam tu atra kalpayitum śaknumaḥ sukha rahitasya api mokṣasya upādeya tvam 
NM_9,2.430.25	 na ca sarva ātmanā sādhūnām anabhimataḥ eva tathāvidhaḥ mokṣaḥ na catad avāptaye na prayatante te hi evam vivecayanti duḥkha saṃsparśa śūnya śāśvatika sukha saṃbhoga asaṃbhavāt duḥkhasya ca avaśyam hātavya tvāt viveka hāna sya cā śakyatvāt viṣa madhunī iva eka pātre patite ubhe api sukha duḥkhe tyajyetām iti atas ca saṃsārāt mokṣaḥ śreyān yatra ayam iyān ati dussahaḥ duḥkha prabandhaḥ avalupyate varam iyatī kādācid kī sukha kaṇikā tyaktā na tasyāḥkṛte duḥkha bhāraḥ iyānūḍhaḥ iti tasmāt na sukha upabhoga ātmakaḥ mokṣa eti jāgati sukham eva na asti iti bauddha pakṣaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.26	 anyaḥ tu āha tiṣṭhatu tāvat mokṣaḥ ! saṃsāre api na sukham nāma kiṃcid asti iti sarve eva ayam dukha abhāva mātre suḥkha vyavahāraḥ tathā hi tṛṣā śuṣyati āsye pibati salilam svādu surabhi kṣudhā ārtassan śālīn kabalayati māṃ= pāka valitān pradīpte rāga agnau ghana nibiḍam āśliṣyati vadhūṃpratīkāre vyādheḥ sukham iti viparyasyati janaḥ saṃsāre sukha sadbhāva siddhāntaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.27–9,2.430.28	 ucyate tad idam ati kṛta ka vairāgya prakaṭana kaurukucī kauśalam ānanda ātmanaḥ prati prāṇi saṃvedyasya sukhasya nihnotum aśakyatvāt anivṛtte api duḥkhe kvacid sukha saṃvedanāt na duḥkha abhāvaḥ sukham nirabhilāṣasya api atarkita upanata sukha sādhana viṣaya saṃparke sati sukha saṃveda darśanāt abhilāṣa ātmaka duḥkha abhāvaḥ sukham iti api na manojñam yaḥ tu duḥkha abhāve kvacid sukham iti api vyapadeśaḥ praśānta rogāṇām iva pūrvam darśitaḥ sabhā aktaḥ iti na tāvatā sva saṃvedana sākṣika sukha apahnavaḥ kartum ucitaḥ mokṣatu nitya sukham asaṃbhavat pramāṇa tvāt na abhyupagamyate mokṣasya ātma svarūpa ātmaka tvam 
NM_9,2.430.29	 api ca mokṣe sukham asti na vā iti vicāraḥ eṣa na prāmāṇika jana ucitaḥ sva rūpeṇa vyavasthānam ātmanaḥ mokṣaḥ iti mokṣa vidaḥ tatraa ātma svarūpam eva kīdṛśam iti cintyam na pṛthak mokṣa svarūpam ātmanaḥ ca sukha duḥkha budhi ādayaḥ āgantukāḥ guṇāḥ na mahattva vat sāṃsiddhikāḥ iti nirṇītam etat ātma lakṣaṇe sukha ādi kāryeṇa ca ātmanaḥ anumānāt iti ātmanaḥ caitanya rūpa tva nirāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.30	 atas eva kāpila kathita citi śakti svabhāva tvam api na yuktam ātmanaḥ sa cetanaḥ citā yogāt tad yogena vinā jaḍaḥ citiḥ nāma artha vijñānam kādācid kam tu tasya tat na artha saṃvenāt anyat caitanyam nāma vidyate tat ca sāmagrī adhīna tvāt katham mokṣe bhaviṣyati jāgrataḥ svapna vṛtteḥ vā suṣuptasya api vā aatmanaḥ jñānam utpadyate anyā tu caturthī na asti tādṛśī jāgrat daśāyām svapne ca buddheḥ pratyātma vedya tā sukham suptaḥ aham adya iti paścāt pratyavamarśanāt tadā tu avedyamānā api suṣupte dhīḥ prakalpyate turya avasthā tu saṃvitti śūnyasya sthitiḥ ātmanaḥ turya avasthā atigam rūpam yat āhuḥ kecid ātmanaḥ pramāṇa agocara tvena kalpanā mātram eva tat saṃvid prasava sāmarthyam sāmagrī sannidhānataḥ yadi nāma ātmanaḥ asti asya tāvatā na cit ātma tā jñāna utpatti arha tva rūpa caitanya rūpa tve avirodhaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.31	 yadi tu darśana śakti yogyatā mātram eva puṃsaḥ caitanyam ucyate tarhi tathāvidhasya tasya kaivalyasya asmākīna mokṣa sadṛśa tvam eva sat saṃvid prasava yogya tā mātra saṃbhave api dṛśya indriya saṃprayoga ādi sāmagrī vaikalyāt kaivalya avasthāyām ātmanaḥ draṣṭṛ tva asaṃbhavāt darśana śūnyasya ca anyasya caitanyasya nirasta tvāt iti bauddha saṃmata mokṣa vimarśaḥ nirvāṇa ādi pada ākhyeyam apavargam tu saugatāḥ santati ucchedam icchanti su acchām vā jñāna santatim mata dvitayam api etat pratyuktam pūrvam eva yat dhvastaḥ ca jñāna santānaḥ nityaḥ ca ātmā samarthitaḥ santati uccheda pakṣaḥ tu naiyāyika matāt api śocyaḥ yatra aśma kalpaḥ api na kaścid avaśiṣyate jainasaṃmata mokṣa vimarśaḥ arhat pakṣe api yat rūpam anya sa apekṣam ātmanaḥ na kevalasya tādrapyam iti asmad mata tulya tā vikāri tvam tu jīvānām atyantam asamaṃjasam śabda pudgala vat ca etat pratyākhyeyam asaṃbhavāt tasmāt na vedānta vidaḥ vadanti mokṣam na sāṅkhyāḥ na ca saugata ādyāḥ iti akṣa pāda abhihitaḥ apavargaḥ śroyān= tad atyanta vimokṣaḥ eva mokṣa upāya vicāraḥ 
NM_9,2.430.32–9,2.430.33	 āha bhavatu ayamī dṛś apavargaḥ sa tu katham adhigamyate iti ucyatām uktam eva bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa duḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣa mithyā jñānānām uttarottara apāyetat anantarā pāyāt apavargaḥ duḥkha ucchedaḥ tāvat apavargaḥ iti kathitam kārya tvāt ca duḥkhasya kāraṇa ucchedāt tad ucchedaḥ kāraṇam ca asya janma janmani sati hi duḥkhaṃbhavati jāyate iti hi janma deha indriya ādi saṃbandhaḥ ātmanaḥ tad api janma kāraṇa ucchedāt eva ucchedyam atas tad kāraṇam pravṛttiḥ ucchedyāḥ tasya aapi hetu ucchedāt ucchedaḥ iti tad hetayaḥ doṣāḥ ucchedyāḥ teṣām tunimittam mithyājñānam tasmin= ucchinne doṣāḥ ucchinnāḥ bhavanti iti mithyājñānam ucchedyam tat ucchede ca tattva jñānam upāyaḥ prasiddhaḥ hi ayam arthaḥ samarthitaḥ ca pūrvam vistarataḥ tattva jñānam mithyājñānasya bādhakam iti tasmā tattva jñānāt mithyājñāna doṣa pravṛtti janma duḥkha nivṛtti krameṇa apavargaḥ iti tattva jñānasya mithyājñāna nivartaka tvam 
NM_9,2.430.34	 yadi api mithyājñānam api janma kāryam aśarīrasya ātmanaḥ mithyājñāna anupapatteḥ itaretara kārya kāraṇa bhāvena bīja aṅkura vadana ādi prabandha pravṛttena pravartamānāḥ mithyājñāna ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ saṃsāraḥ iti ākhyāyate tathā api tad kāraṇa uccheda cintāyām kutas prabhṛti ucchedaḥ upakramyatām iti vicāryamāṇe viśeṣa niyama abhāvāt yatas kutaścid iti prāpte mithyājñānasya pratikūlam uccheda kāraṇam tattva jñānam upalabdham iti viśeṣe pramāṇa abhavāt tad ucchadaḥ eva upakramyate 
NM_9,2.430.35–9,2.430.36	 atas eva mithyājñāna mūlaḥ saṃsāraḥ ucyate tasmin ucchinne tad uccheda saṃbhavāt na tatas prabhṛti saṃsāraḥ pravartate iti nipuṇa matibhiḥ api nirdhārayitum śakyam anādi tvāt tasya iti tat evam tattva jñānāt mithyājñāna apāye tad kārya doṣa apāyaḥ doṣa apāye pravṛtti apāyaḥ pravṛtti apāye janma apāyaḥ janma apāye duḥkha apāyaḥ saḥ eva apavarga eti tat idam uktam uttarottara apāye tad anantara apāyāt iti mokṣasya duradhigama tu a śaṃkā 
NM_9,2.430.37–9,2.430.38	 āha viditaḥ ayam sūtra arthaḥ kintva ghaṭamāna manoratha viḍambanā mātram idam alīka śraddadhāna tā prakaṭanam vā duradhigamaḥ tu saṃkaṭaḥ mokṣa mārgaḥ sādhyaḥ trivargaḥ eva eṣaḥ dharma karma artha lakṣaṇaḥ caturthaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ tu kathāsu eva virājate yadā priya viyoga ādi bhavati udvega kāraṇam tadā mokṣa kathāḥ kāmam kriyantām śoka śāntaye na tu udyam asamaye tad adhigama samarthām upalabhāmahe saraṇim ṛṇa kleśa pravṛtti anubandhasya dustara tvāt ṛṇa trayasya dustara tvam 
NM_9,2.430.39	 ṛṇa anubandhaḥ tāvat jāyamānaḥ ha vai brāhmaṇaḥ tribhiḥ ṛṇaiḥ ṛṇavāḥ brahmacaryeṇa ṛṣibhyaḥ yajñena devebhyaḥ prajayā pitṛbhyaḥ iti idam hivede paṭhyate tatra prathamam ṛṣīṇām anṛṇaḥ syām iti brahmacaryam ācarati tatas pitṛṇām anṛṇaḥ syām iti kṛta dāra saṅgrahaḥ prajā utpādanāya vyavaharati tadanu gṛhasthaḥ eva darśa pūrṇamāsa ādiṣu sahasra saṃvatsara paryanteṣu karmasu adhikṛtaḥ kratūn anutiṣṭhati iti devānām anṛṇaḥ syām iti kaḥ asya mokṣa vyavasāya avasaraḥ mokṣasya śruti viruddha tvam 
NM_9,2.430.40–9,2.430.41	 nanu ca! ṛṇāṇi trīṇi apākṛtya manaḥ mokṣe niveśayet iti manu ādi smaraṇāt asti eva tad avasaraḥ na śruti vākya virodhāt evam hi śrūyate jarā maryam vai etat satram yat agni hotram darśa pūrṇamāsau ca jarayā āha vai eṣaḥ etasmāt mucyate mṛtyunā vā iti na ca karma prayoga aśaktyā akarmabhyaḥ virantum śakyate svayam aśaktasya bāhya śakti upadeśāt antevāsī vā juhuyāta brahmaṇā hi sa parikrītaḥ krītaḥ vā juhuyāt dhanena hi sa parikrītaḥ aśaktasya ca mokṣa upāya anuṣṭhāne api asya kathaṃśaktiḥ rāga ādīnām avarjanīya tvam 
NM_9,2.430.42–9,2.430.43	 kleśa anubandhāt api apavarga abhāvaḥ ye hi rāga ādayaḥ doṣāḥ ātmanaḥ cira saṃbhṛtāḥ kaḥ tān śamayitum śaktaḥ punarāvṛtti dharmakān kāmam ciram vijitya api krodham vā lobham eva vā punar gacchan vaśe teṣām lokaḥ prāyeṇa dṛśyate tathā hi ciram api tapasi niyamita matiḥ api avijita viṣama śara vikṛtiḥ tanu pavana apanīta vasana kāminī stana jaghana darśanāt eva vaśam viśvāmitraḥ kusumadhanvanaḥ gataḥ iti śrūyate rāga vivṛddhi hetavaḥ eva adhikāḥ 
NM_9,2.430.44–9,2.430.46	 alam ākhyāyikayā adyatve api evam śataśas dṛśyate iti duruccheda adoṣāḥ vīta rāga janma adarśanāt iti ca vicāritam ātma parīkṣāyām aviyuktaḥ eva doṣaiḥ jantuḥ jāyate iti doṣa vivṛddhi hetavaḥ ca rūpa ādayaḥ viṣayāḥ te katham iva sva karmaṇi udāsate tāmbūlam kusuma sugandha yassamīrāḥ saudheṣu pratiphalitāḥ śaśāṅka bhāsaḥ vācaḥ ca praṇaya nava amṛta drava ārdrāḥ dūtīnām dadhati na kasya rāga vṛddhim api ca mugdha smita sughādhauta madhura ālāpa śālinā mukhena pakṣmala akṣīnām kasya na ākṣipyate manaḥ iti evam nidāna anupaśamāt api sthitaḥ eva kleśa anubandhaḥ pravṛtteḥ api dustyaja tvam 
NM_9,2.430.47	 pravṛtti anubandhaḥ khalu api rāga ādi preryamāṇaḥ hi karmāṇi ārabhate naraḥ dīrgha dīrghāḥ pratāyante yaiḥ dharma adharma vāsanāḥ yaḥ pravṛtti anubandhaḥ ca hetuḥ anyasya janmanaḥ tena janma antareṇa anyā janyate karma vāsanā ekam eva īdṛśam karma kartum āpatati kvacid janma ayuta śatena api yat phalam bhujyate na vā kleśa karma anubandha utthāḥ janma duḥkha ādi śṛṅkhalā punar āvartamānā eṣā kena upāyena bhajyatām vinā phala upabhogena na vināśaḥ asti karmaṇām teṣām jñāna agninā dāhaḥ iti śraddhā vijṛmbhitam kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ hi śāstrāt eva avadhāritaḥ karmaṇām ca phalānām ca sa katham vā nivartatām na ca pyajñāna sāpekṣam karma iṣṭam bandha kāraṇam yena ātma jñāna yuktānām tat udāsīta tān prati 
NM_9,2.430.48	 ajñāna nairapekṣyeṇa karmaṇām svabhāvaḥ eva eṣaḥ yat phala avinābhauvi tvam iti tasmāt ittham ṛṇa kleśa pravṛtti ādi anubandhataḥ na mokṣa siddhiḥ asti iti tad arthaḥ viphalaḥ śramaḥ aśakye arthe vṛthā yatnaḥ iti matvā manīṣibhiḥ mokṣa carcāḥ parityajya sve gṛhe sukham āsyatām mokṣasya duradhigama tva śaṅkā nirāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.49–9,2.430.50	 atra abhidhīyate yat tāvat uktam ṛṇa anubandhāt iti tat ayuktam vidhi padā śravaṇāt aupacārikam ṛṇa śabdam jāyamāna śabdam ca prayujya karma stutiḥ iyam kriyate jāyamānaḥ ha vai brāhmaṇaḥ iti na tad vyatirikta puruṣa artha viṣaya prayatna pratiṣedhaḥ vidhīyate tathā hi ṛṇa śabdaḥ ayam viṣaya antare mukhya arthaḥ prasiddhaḥ yatra uttamaṛṇaḥ sa lābham amutas pratigrahīṣyāmi iti dhanam adhamarṇāya prayacchati adhamarṇaḥ api sa lābham asmai pradāsyāmi iti mattvā gṛhṇāti saḥ ayam ṛṇa śabdasya mukhyaḥ viṣayaḥ iha na asti eva 
NM_9,2.430.51	 jāyamānaḥ api mukhyaḥ utpadyamānaḥ hi mātuḥ kukṣi kuhārān nissaran= abhidhīyate na ca asau tapasvī bālaḥ karmabhiḥ abhisaṃbadhyate tasmāt brahmacaryam apatya utpādanam adhvara prayogaḥ iti tritayam idam ṛṇavat avaśya kartavyam iti karma stutiḥ iyam aupacārika pada prayogāt gamyate na ca etāvatā mokṣa vyavasāya avasara virahaḥ iti pariśaṅkanīyam āśrama antarasya tad aupayikasya darśanāt karmaṇām viratiḥ āvaśyakī 
NM_9,2.430.52	 nanu ! maraṇa avadhi darśa pūrṇamāsa ādi dharma upadeśāt katham āśrama antara grahaṇam na jarā marya vāda sthāpya parityāga pratipādanāya karma praśaṃsā artha tvāt ye catvāraḥ pathayaḥ deva yānāḥ ityādayaḥ hi caturtha āśrama śaṃsinaḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ santi mantra artha vādāḥ manu ādi smṛti vacanāni caturtha āśrama upadeśīni caturtha āśrama ucita śauca ācāra ādi iti kartavya tā vitāna vidhāna parāṇi ca prabandhena eva adṛśyante evam gṛha āśrame sthitvā vidhivat snātakaḥ dvijaḥ vane vaset su niyataḥ bhaikṣa bhuj vijita indriyaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.53–9,2.430.54	 iti upakramya caturtha āśrama ucita mokṣa upāya anuṣṭhāna upadeśāya ṣaṣṭhaḥ adhyāyaḥ samastaḥ eva manunā anukrāntaḥ sa nyāsa āśramaḥ spaṣṭa śruti siddhaḥ jābāla śrutau ca vidhāyakena eva brāhmaṇa vākyena pratipadam āśrama catuṣṭayam upadiṣṭam brahmacārī bhūtvā gṛhī bhavet gṛhī bhūtvā vanī bhavet vanībhūtvā pravrajet iti 
NM_9,2.430.55–9,2.430.56	 agni samāropaṇa vidhāna upadeśaḥ ca pratyakṣa śrutaḥ katham apahnūyate ātmani agnīn samāropya brāhmaṇaḥ pravrajet gṛhāt iti api ca upaniṣadām adhyayanam asati mokṣa upāya prayoga samarthe caturtha āśrameniḥ arthakam eva prāpnoti kriyā kāṇḍa anuṣṭhāna niṣṭha tve hi vedasya jñāna kāṇḍa upadeśaḥ kiṃprayojanaḥ syāt caturtha āśrama kālaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.57–9,2.430.59	 tat evam varṇa vat āśramāṇām api caturṇām pratyakṣa upadeśa siddha tvāt caturtha āśramiṇām ca mokṣa adhigama upāya tattva jñāna bhāvanā abhyāsa avasara saṃbhavāt saḥ ayaṃjarā marya vādaḥ praśaṃsā mātra paraḥ eva avatiṣṭhate jarayā ha vai eṣaḥ etasmāt mucyate mṛtyunā vā iti ca vacanāt jarasā karma tyāga anujñānāt saā iva caturtha āśrama avasaraḥ iti gamyate tat uktam gṛhasthaḥ tu yadā paśyet valī palitam ātmanaḥ apatyasya eva ca apatyam tadā araṇyam samāśrayet iti itarathāḥ hi mṛtyunā eva ca tasmāt mṛcyate iti avakṣyata ca tu evam abravīt tasmāt vārdhaka daśa ucitam caturtham āśramam anumanyante viraktasya sarvasya sanyāsa adhikāraḥ 
NM_9,2.430.60	 tiṣṭhatu vā vārdhaka daśā yūnaḥ api paripakva kāṣa yasya āśrama catuṣṭaya kramam anapekṣya eva mokṣa adhikāraḥ ākhyātaḥ yathokyam brahmacaryāt eva pravrajet iti atas eva dvividhaḥ brahmacāri bhavati upakurvāṇaḥ naiṣṭhikaḥ ca tatra upakurvāṇakaḥ yaḥ brahmacaryam anubhūya gṛhastha āśramam anubhavati sa ca aparipakva kaṣāyaḥ anuṣa śānta rāgaḥ tam eva pratīdam ucyate anadhītya dvijaḥ vedān anutpādya ca santatim aniṣṭavā ca eva yajñaiḥ ca mokṣam icchan vrajati adhas 
NM_9,2.430.61–9,2.430.63	 iti yaḥ tu paripakva kaṣāyaḥ sa naiṣṭhikaḥ eva brahmacārī bhavati na gṛhasthāḥ mam pratipadyate gṛhasthaḥ api paripakva kaṣāyaḥ vānaprastha āśramam ullaṅghyayati tve adhikriyate yathā uktam gṛhāt vā vanāt vā pravrajet iti gṛhasthasya api mokṣaḥ kecid tu karma phala abhisandhi rahitasya kartavyam iti karma kurvataḥ kṣīṇa rāgasya ātma vidaḥ gṛhasthasya api mokṣam ācakṣate yathā aaha yājñavalkyaḥ nyāya arjita dhanaḥ tattva jñāna niṣṭhaḥ atithi priyaḥ śrāddha kṛt veda vidyā vid gṛhasthaḥ api vimucyate 
NM_9,2.430.64–9,2.430.65	 iti tasmāt ṛṇa anubandhāt apavarga abhāvaḥ iti ayuktam kleśānām parihāra upāyaḥ yat tu kleśa anubandhāt iti tat api anadhyavasāya mātram pratipakṣa bhāvanādinā kleśa upaśamasya suśaka tvāt yadi hi doṣāḥ nityāḥ bhaveyuḥ anitya tve api ākasmikā vā sa hetu tve api yadi eṣām nityaḥ hetuḥ bhavet kāryaḥ api vā yadi asau na jñāyeta jñātasya vā asya śamana upāyaḥ na jñāyeta jñātaḥ api vā anuṣṭhātum asau na śakyeta tadā kaḥ eva enam ucchindyāt kintu na akasmikāḥ na nityāḥ te na nitya ajñāta hetukāḥ na ajñāta śamana upāyāḥ na ca aśakya pratikriyāḥ 
NM_9,2.430.66–9,2.430.67	 na hi doṣāṇām ātma svarūpa vat nitya tvam upajanana apāya dharmaka tvena grahaṇāt mithyājñānam ca prasava kāraṇam eṣām avadhṛtam iti na akasmika tvam avināśi hetuka tvam ajñāta hetuka tvam vā pratipakṣa bhāvanayā kleśa kṣayaḥ mithyājñānasya ca sanyak jñānam pratipakṣa bhāvanā abhyāsena ca sa mūlam unmīlayitum śakyante doṣāḥ iti na ajñāta pratīkāra tvam teṣām uktam cakena cit sarveṣām sa vipakṣa tvāt nirhrāsa atiśaya āśritāt sā ātmībhāvāt tad abhyāsāt hīyeranna āsravāḥ kvacid 
NM_9,2.430.68^1	 iti viṣaya doṣa darśanena hi teṣu sakti lakṣaṇaḥ rāgaḥ śāmyati yadā hi eṣa cintayati vivekī asau tarala tārākṣī pīna unnata ghana stanī vilupyamānā kāntāre vihagaiḥ adya dṛśyate vibhāti bahis eva asyāḥ padma gandha nibham vapuḥ antar majja asthi viṣ mūtra bhedaḥ krimi kula ākulam asthīni pittam uccārāḥ klinnāni āntrāṇi śoṇitam iti carma pinaddham tat kāminī iti abhidhīyate medaḥ granthī stanau nāma tau svarṇa kalaśau katham viṣṭhā ādṛtau nitambe ca kaḥ ayam hema śilā bhramaḥ mūtra asṛj dvāram aśuci cchidram kledi jugupsitam 
NM_9,2.430.68^2	 tat eva hi rati sthānam aho puṃsām viḍambanā prītiḥ yathā nija asya uttham lihataḥ śoṇitam śunaḥ śuṣke asthini tathā puṃsaḥ sva dhātu syandinaḥ striyām vyātta ānanā vivṛtta akṣī vivarṇā śvāsa ghurgharāḥ katham adya na rāgāya mriyamāṇā tapasvinī aho bata varākaḥ ayam akāle tṛṣitaḥ phaṇī prasārita mukhaḥ asmākam śoṇitam pātum āgataḥ kim anena aparāddham naḥ svabhāvaḥ vastunaḥ svayam spṛśyamānaḥ dahati agniḥ iti kasmai prakupyati na anukūlaḥ priye hetuḥ pratikūlaḥ na vipriye sva karma phalam aśnāmi kaḥ suhṛtkaḥ ca me ripuḥ 
NM_9,2.430.69–9,2.430.70	 evam ahaniśam cintayataḥ nitāntam śāntasya manasaḥ sama citta tā sarvatra samudbhavati iti vilīyante doṣa granthayaḥ atas eva upadiśyante mokṣa śāstreṣu anekaśas tasya tasya upaghātāya tāḥ tāḥ pratyūha bhāvanāḥ pratipakṣa bhāvanayā doṣa kṣayaḥ nanu ca pratipakṣa bhāvane api na sarva ātmanā doṣa pakṣaḥ kṣayam upayāti nimba abhyupayogaḥ iva kriyamāṇe kapha dhātuḥ iti na etat evam tatra nimba upayoga vat tad anukūlasya anna pāna ādeḥ upayoga darśanāt api ca dharmi lopa bhayāt tatra na iṣṭaḥ sarva ātmanā kṣayaḥ kapha ādhikyam tu hantavyam dhātu sāmyasya siddhaye iha sarva ātmanā ucchedyāḥ kleśāḥ saṃsāra kāriṇaḥ chedaḥ ca ekāntataḥ teṣām pratipakṣa upasevayā 
NM_9,2.430.71–9,2.430.73	 na ca pratipakṣa bhāvanā abhyāsam ekam astram apāsya tad upaśame nimitta antaraṃkim api kramate bhogānām na upabhegena kṣayaḥ na hi viṣaya abhilāṣaḥ tad upabhogena viraṃsyati yathā aaha na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmā iva bhūyas eva abhivardhate anyatra api uktam bhoga abhyāsam anu vivardhante rāgāḥ kauśala ānica indriyāṇām iti 
NM_9,2.430.74–9,2.430.75	 pārāśaryaḥ api āha tṛṣṇā khaniragādheyam duṣpūrā kena pūryate yā mahadbhiḥ api kṣiptaiḥ pūraṇena eva khanyate iti tasmāt pratipakṣa bhāvanā eva bhagavatī bhīma kāntiḥ antaḥkaraṇa kāntāreniḥ antaram abhijvalantī dāva dahana dīdhitiḥ iva dahati doṣa viṭapakān iti tat evam doṣa anubandha vidhvaṃsa upāya saṃbhavāt na tad kṛtaḥ mokṣa mārga nirodhaḥ abhidhātavyaḥ kleśa ādi anubandha nivṛtti mātram sādhyam 
NM_9,2.430.76–9,2.430.77	 atas eva kecana cetanasya prakṛtyā nirmala tvāt malānām āgantuka tvāt mala nibarhaṇa hetoḥ ca yathā uktasya saṃbhavāt tad ācaraṇāt tad apāye sati sva tassakala padārtha darśana sāmarthya svabhāva cid tattva avasthānāt sarvajña siddhim adūra vartinīm eva manyante suṣupti ādau śuddhasya ātmanaḥ leśataḥ bhānam yat api uktam kleśa śūnya tvam ātmanaḥ na kadācid api dṛṣṭam anubandha vṛtti tvāt kva īśānām iti tat api asatyam suṣupta avasthāyām aspṛṣṭasya doṣaiḥ ātmanaḥ pratyaham upalambhāt jāgrataḥ api kā cana tādṛśī dṛśā dṛśyate eva yasyām asau= ātma svarūpaḥ eva ātmā nirmalaḥ avatiṣṭhate yathā uktam aharahar brahma lokam yānti iti tat alam anena doṣa anubandha kathā anubandhena pravṛttīnām virati saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.78–9,2.430.79	 yat api pravṛtti anubandhāt iti pratyapādi tat api sūtra kṛtā samāhitam na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya hīna kleśasya iti doṣeṣu bandha hetuṣu vigaliteṣu pravṛttiḥ api na deha indriya ādi janmane prabhavati iti karma kṣaya prakāra varṇanam nanu doṣa kṣayāt mā bhūt uttaraḥ karma saṅgrahaḥ katham phalam adattvā tu prāktanam karma śāmyati atra kecid āhuḥ dadati eva karmāṇi na adattvā śāmyanti tathā apibandha hetavaḥ na bhavanti yatas śama santoṣa ādi janitam yoginaḥ sukham utpādya dharmaḥ vinaṅkṣyati adharmaḥ ca śīta ātapa kleśa ādi dvārakam duḥkham dattvā iti karmaṇām phala naiyatye api na hāniḥ iti pakṣaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.80	 nanu ! amuṣmāt karmaṇaḥ idam phalam bhavati iti karma phalānām kārya kāraṇa bhāva niyamāt katham iyatā karma phala upabhogaḥ bhavet iti anyathā tad upabhogam aparevarṇayanti yogī hi yogardhi siddhyā vihita nikhila nija dharma adharma karma anirmāya tad upabhoga yogyāni teṣu teṣu upapatti sthāneṣu tāni tāni sa indriya aṇi śarīrāṇi raṇḍa antaḥkaraṇāni ca muktaiḥ ātmabhiḥ upekṣitāni gṛhītvā asakṛt eva sakala karma phalam anubhavati prāpta aiśvaryaḥ iti ittham upabhogena karmaṇā aṃkṣayaḥ tattva jñānena karmaṇām nāśa pakṣaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.81	 anye tu ācakṣate kim anena bhoga āyāsena adatta phalāni eva karmāṇi yoginaḥ naṅkṣyanti tattva jñānasya eva bhagavataḥ iyān prabhāvaḥ yat asmin= utpanne cira saṃcitāni api karmāṇi sahasā eva pralayam upayānti bhogāt apiteṣām prakṣayaḥ śāstra prāmāṇyāt eva avagataḥ tathā tad prāmāṇyāt eva tattva jñānāt api tad prakṣayam pratipatsyāmahe tathā ca āha yathā edhāṃsi samiddhaḥ agniḥ bhasmasāt kurute arjunaḥ jñāna agniḥ sarva karmāṇi bhasmasāt kurute tathā 
NM_9,2.430.82–9,2.430.84	 iti na ca idam śraddhā mātram veda vidāmagraṇyāḥ vyāsa muninā eva samabhidhānāt aveda artham hi na asau= abhidadhīta iti karmaṇām phala janana śakti nāśa pakṣaḥ tam anye na manyante na sarva amanā karmaṇām dāhaḥ kintu sva rūpeṇa satām api saha kāri vaikalyāt sva kārya karaṇa udāsīna tā teṣām bhavati bhraṣṭānām iva bījānām aṅkura karaṇa kauśala hāniḥ yatas sāmagrī kāryasya janikā na kevalam kārakam atas na karmāṇi eva kevalāni phala upabhoga yogya śarīra indriya ādi janma nimitta tām upayānti kintu mithyājñānena doṣaiḥ ca sahitāni tat uktam avidyā tṛṣṇe dharma adharmau ca janma kāraṇam iti 
NM_9,2.430.85–9,2.430.86	 tattva vidaḥ ca tattva vid tvāt eva na avidyā mithyājñāna ātmikā bhavati doṣāṇām tu prathame darśitaḥ eva kramaḥ tad abhāve bhavantau= api dharma adharmau nabandhāya kalpete na hi sva kāryam aṅkura ādi kusūla vartīni bījāni janayitum utsahante bhraṣṭa bījānām api svarūpa śaktiḥ api tānavam gatāḥ tadvat karmaṇā aṃsvarūpa śakti śaithilyam mā nāma bhūt tathā api kusūla varti bīja vat sahakāri vaidhuryāt kārya anārambhaḥ iti tat ida suktam na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya hīna kleśasya iti dharma ādharthayoḥ na saṃpūrṇa nāśaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.87–9,2.430.88	 nanu svarūpa sattāyām dharma adharmayoḥ katham idam uktam navānām ātma guṇānāṃniḥ mūla ucchedaḥ apavargaḥ iti na eṣa doṣaḥ manassaṃyoga vat akiṃcitkarayoḥ avasthānam api ucchedāt na viśiṣyate muktasya ātmanaḥ vibhu tvāt aparihāryaḥ manassaṃyogaḥ na ca tadānīm asau san= api sukha duḥkha jñāna ādi janmani vyāpriyate evam dharma adharmau santau= api phala m anākṣipantau kim kariṣyate iti phala taucchinnau= eva bhavataḥ tasmāt navānām ātma guṇānām ucchedaḥ apavargaḥ iti aviruddham evam pravṛtti anubandhasya api bandha hetoḥ abhāvāt na durgamaḥ apavargaḥ jñāna karma samuccaya vādaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.89	 apare punar āhuḥ karma phalānām śāstrataḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva niyama avagateḥ śama santoṣa śīta ātapa ādi dvāraka sukha duḥkha mātra upapādanena karma parikṣayā anupapatteḥ yoga ṛddhyā ca dīrgha kāla avadhi sukha duḥkha upabhogasya sakṛt eva saṃpādayitum aśakyatvāt jñāna agninā ca dāhe tad karma upadeśi vaidika vacana sārtha ānarthakya prasaṅgāt adatta phalasya karmaṇaḥ anuparamāt avasthāna pakṣe ciram api uṣi tvā kusūla avasthita bīja vat kāla antareṇa api tad phala ākṣepa prasaṅgāt avaśyam sva phala upabhoga dvārakaḥ eva karma kṣayaḥ vācyaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.90	 na ca anirmokṣaḥ āśaṅkanīyaḥ tatas cirāt api tad siddhi saṃbhavāt tathā ca mumukṣuḥ nitya naimittikam karma avaśyam anutiṣṭhet ananutiṣṭhan pratyaveyāt iti tat kutas asya bandhaḥ syāt kāmyam niṣiddham ca karma svarga naraka kāri vispaṣṭam eva bandha sādhanam iti tad pariharet eva iti evam tāvat uttaraḥ ayam nakarma saṃcayaḥ pravartate tat āha nitya naimittike kuryāt pratyavāya jihāsayā mokṣa arthī na pravarteta tatra kāmya niṣiddhayoḥ iti nitya kāmya karma vibhāgaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.91–9,2.430.92	 prāktanasya tu karma saṃcayasya bhogāt eva kṣayaḥ ātma vidaḥ ca mumukṣoḥ ayam anuṣṭhāna kramaḥ bhavati na itarasya iti saḥ eva ittham apavṛjyate iti āha ca ātma jñe ca etat asti iti tat jñānam upayujyate tatra jñāta ātma tattvānām bhogāt pūrva kriyā kṣaye uttara pracaya asattvāt dehaḥ na utpadyate punar nanu ! nitya karma nuṣṭhāna pakṣe na asti eva mokṣaḥ yāni eva hi nitya anidarśa paurṇamāsa ādi karmāṇi yāvajjīvam darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta iti ādi codana upadiṣṭāni tāni eva phalavanti śrūyante iti kāmyāni api bhavitum arhanti darśa paurṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajet agniṃhotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti na phala abhisandhāna pūrvaka tvena aprayogāt tathā aaha prārthyamānam phalam jñātam na anicchoḥ tat bhaviṣyati 
NM_9,2.430.93–9,2.430.94	 iti saḥ ayam pravṛttau viśeṣaḥ prayoge api viśeṣaḥ kāmyam karma sarva aṅga upasaṃhāreṇa prayujyamānam phala sādhanam iti na yathāśakti tathā tathā aprayoktavyam iti nityakarmaṇaḥ akaraṇāt pratyavāyaḥ iti yathāśakti apitat prayoktavyam ananuṣṭhitāt yādṛś tādṛś anuṣṭhita śreyaḥ pratyavāya parihāra upapatteḥ kāmye tu sarvāṇi aṅgāni yadi asau= upasaṃhartum na śaknuyāt mā pravartiṣṭaḥ na hi apravartamānaḥ pratyaveyāt iti 
NM_9,2.430.95	 evaṃca tat eva darśa paurṇamāsa ādi karma yāvajjīvam iti ca udanayā upadiṣṭaṃnityam sat tad phala anabhisandhānāt prayuktam na bandhāya kalpate kva sāsvarga sādhana tva śaktiḥ asya gatā iti ced na na vayam karmaṇām śaktim aśakti vā pratyakṣatas prapaśyāmaḥ śāstra eka śaraṇāḥ tu śrotriyāḥ vayam codanā eva dharme pramāṇam iti naḥ kula vratam etat sā ca codanā ekatra kāminam adhikāriṇam āśritya pravṛttāḥ tad adhikāraḥ ca phala nirvṛtteḥ vinā na syāt iti phala paryanta tām pratipadyate 
NM_9,2.430.96	 anyatra tu yāvat padoṣa baddha jīvana padārtha avacchinna adhikāri lābhena pravartamānā na phalāya prabhavati akriyamāṇe tu śāstra arthe pratyavāyāya bhavati adhikṛtena satā śāstra arthaḥ tyaktaḥ iti kāmye tu anutpanna kāmaḥ adhikṛta ā iva na bhavati iti na adhikṛtena satā vidhiḥ tyaktaḥ iti na pratyavaiti iti upakramya tu antarāle tyaktum na labhate eva vītāyām phala icchāyām āvāpte vā aphale tad karma samāpana vat avaśya kartavyam eva tat iti alam śāstra antara garbheṇa bhūyasā kathā vistareṇa sarvathā suṣṭu uktam nitya naimittike kuryāt iti mokṣasya durlabha tvam 
NM_9,2.430.97–9,2.430.98	 nanu ! bhogāt prāktana karma kṣaya pakṣe dīrgha kāla apekṣaṇāt apratyāsannā eva mokṣaḥ lakṣyate kim tvayā jñāta madhunā eva huṃ kṛtvā nirvilambam eva m okṣam āpnuyāt iti na khalu sulabhaḥ ayam puruṣa arthaḥ kim na śrutam idam āyuṣmatā kyāsa vacanam aneka janma saṃsiddhaḥ tatas yāti parām gatim iti jñāna agni dāha vacanam tu jñāna praśaṃsā artham eva saḥ ayam jñāna karma samuccayāt mokṣaḥ ucyate iti jñāna karma samucca yavāda nirāsa ārambhaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.99–9,2.430.100	 atra abhidhīyate na khalu phala upabhoga dvārakaḥ karmaṇām parikṣayaḥ janma koṭi śataiḥ api śakya kriyaḥ uktam hi ekam eva īdṛśam karma kartum āpatati kvacid janma ayuta śatena api yat phalam bhujyate na vā dehaiḥ tad karma bhoga arthaiḥ karma anyat na kariṣyate deha bandhanam iti eṣā durāśā eva tapasvinām tat īdṛśam enam mokṣa patham upadiśadbhiḥ yājñikaiḥ mokṣa upekṣaṇam anakṣaram upadiṣṭaṃbhavati iti tasmāt pūrva ukta nītyā eva karmaṇām bandha hetu tvam apākaraṇīyam karma nāśa svarūpa niścayaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.101–9,2.430.102	 nanu ! pakṣa catuṣṭaye api doṣaḥ uktaḥ na caturtha pakṣasya niravadya tvāt saha kāri vaikalyāt kusūla avasthita bīja vat karmaṇām anārambhakatvesati na kaścid doṣaḥ eṣaḥ eva ca teṣām dāhaḥ yat kārya anārambhaka tvam karmaṇām phala ādānam nanu ! avinaṣṭa svarūpāṇi kusūla bīja vat eva kadā cirāt ārapsyantekāryam tasmāt varam ucchidyantām eva kim idānīm nityam ātmānam api ucchet tuṃyatāmahe sa hi purā bhoktā abhūt iti muktaḥ api punar bhoktṛtām pratipadyeta iti varam ucchidyantām eva 
NM_9,2.430.103	 sāmagrya bhāvāt katham asau punar bhoktṛtām gacchet iti ced karmāṇi api saha kārya bhāvāt katham kāryam ārabheran na ca karmaṇām bandha karaṇerāga ādayaḥ na sahakāriṇaḥ iti vaktum śakyate vīta rāgasya jatma adarśana atitya sakṛt ukta tvāt tasmāt ayam eva sūtrakāra upadiṣṭaḥ panthāḥ peśalaḥ na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya hīna kleśasya iti jñāna karma samuccaya vāda rūṇḍanam 
NM_9,2.430.104–9,2.430.105	 yat ca idam ucyate jñāna karma samuccayāt mokṣaḥ iti tatra idam vaktavyam karmaṇām kīdṛśaḥ mokṣam pratyaṅga bhāvaḥ na hi tad sādhyaḥ mokṣaḥ svarga ādi vat anitya tva prasaṅgāt api ca ātmā eva svarūpa avasthitaḥ mokṣaḥ iti ucyate na ca ātma svarūpaṃkarma sādhyam anādi nidhana tvena siddha tvāt karmaṇām citta kaṣāya nivartaka tvam 
NM_9,2.430.106–9,2.430.107	 nanu ! nitya karma ananuṣṭhāne pratyaveyāt iti tad dvāraka bandha parihāra upāya tvāt karma api mokṣa aṅgam syāt na sa nyāsa vidhānasya pratyakṣa upadeśāt iti ukta tvāt aparipakva kaṣāyāṇām śanaiśśanaiḥ tad paripāka aupayika tvena karma anuṣṭhānam pāramparyeṇa apavarga upāyaḥ iti tu bāḍham abhyupagamyate yathā aaham anuḥ mahāyajñaiḥ ca yajñaiḥ ca brāhmī iyam kriyate tanuḥ iti adhyātma vidaḥ ca jñāna kāṇḍa aupayikam eva kriyā kāṇḍam manyante sākṣāt tukarma sādhye apavarge svarga vat apāyi tva prasaṅgāt kṛtakasya sarvasya anitya tvāt tattva jñānam eva mokṣa upāyaḥ iti uktam yama niyama ādīnām api jñāna aṅga tvam 
NM_9,2.430.108	 yat api yama niyama ādi sādhyam aṅga bhūtam karma jātam tat api tad aṅgatā aṃgacchat na vāryate tad kārya tve api yāvat guṇa praghvaṃsa abhāva svabhāva tva ātmokṣasya na kṣayitvam svarga vat anyaḥ tu na mokṣaḥ iti uktam tad pūrva ukta prakrameṇa apavarga prāpteḥ tattva jñānam eva abhyupāyaḥ karma tu aṅgam tatra śauca ādi kiṃcid kiṃcid tat syāt ātma saṃskāra pūrvam mokṣa hetu tattva jñāna svarūpa vicāraḥ 
NM_9,2.430.109–9,2.430.111	 āha tattva jñānam idānīm vicintyatām kiṃviṣayam tad apavargāya kalpate kutas vā tasya niḥśreyasa sādhana tvam avagatam iti nanu ! ātma jñānam apavarga hetuḥ iti bahuśas kathitam eva etat iti kaḥ ayaṃpraśnaḥ  na vipratipatteḥ vipra vadante hi atra vādinaḥ mokṣa hetu jñāna viṣaye pakṣa bhedāḥ ekaḥ eva ayam avidyā parikalpitaḥ jīva ātma parama ātma vibhāgaḥ paramātma tattva jñānāt avidyā apāye mokṣaḥ iti brahma vādinaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.112–9,2.430.118	 śabda advaita niścayāt iti vaiyākaraṇāḥ vijñāna advaita darśanāt iti śākya bhikṣavaḥ prakṛti puruṣa viveka vijñānāt iti pāramarṣāḥ īśvara praṇidhānāt iti ca anye tat evam kasmai tattva jñānāya spṛhayantu mumukṣavaḥ iti vācyam ātma tattva jñānasya eva apavarga upāya tvam ucyate bhinnāḥ tāvat ātmānaḥ iti gṛhyatām ātma jñānam eva niḥśreyasa aṅgam iti yat tu kutas tasya niḥśreyasa sādhana tvam avagatam iti akṣa pāda vacanāt iti brūmaḥ akṣapādaḥ tāvat evam upadiṣṭavān ātma jñānāt niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ iti na ca niṣpramāṇakam artham eṣaḥ ṛṣiḥ upādiśat iti bhavitavyam atra pramāṇena tat tu vaidikam vidhi vākyam ātmā jñātavyaḥ iti 
NM_9,2.430.119	 saḥ eṣa tāvat na niradhikāraḥ vidhiḥ adhikāra rahitasya ca vidheḥ prayoga yogya tva abhāvāt adhikāra anveṣaṇam upakramaṇīyam para prakaraṇa paripaṭhana virahāt ca na asya samidh ādhi vidhi vat pradhāna adhikāra niveśi tvam atas viśva jit adhikaraṇa nyāyena svarga kāmam adhikāriṇam iha yāvat upādātu m adhyavasyāmaḥ tadā eva na sa punar āvartate iti arthavāda samarpitā iyam apunarāvṛttiḥ eva hṛdaya patham avatarati rātri satraḥ iva pratiṣṭhā iti tām eva asya phala tvena pratipadyāmahe sā ca iyam sādhyamānā api rūpāt eva hi śāśvatī cakāsti apunarāvṛttiḥ na svarga vat apāyinī ātma jñānasya na dṛṣṭa phala saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.120	 nanu ! dṛṣṭa prayojana alābhe sati adṛṣṭa prayojana parikalpana avasaraḥ iha ca dṛṣṭam eva prayojanam ātma jñānasya karma pravṛtti hetu tvam upalabhyate nityena ātmanā vinā bhūteṣu eva acetaneṣu śmaśāna avadhiṣu bahu vitta vyaya āyāsa sādhyāni kaḥ nāma jyotiṣṭoma ādi karmāṇi anutiṣṭhet iti nityaḥ eva ātmā para lokī jñātavyaḥ evam hi nirviśaṅkaḥ karmasu pravarteta iti 
NM_9,2.430.121–9,2.430.122	 tat idam anupapannam anyatas eva siddha tvāt pratyabhijñā pratyakṣa pratyayena jaiminīyaiḥ anumāna mahimnā ca naiyāyika ādibhiḥ ātmā nityaḥ iti niścitaḥ eva kim atra vidhiḥ kariṣyati itikartavya tā kalāpa upadeśaḥ catadānīm atyanta niṣprayojanaḥ syāt vedasya phalavat tvam amī ca tathā nāma ati mahā antaḥ veda granthāḥ iyati eva paryavasat = āiti  tat idam upanatam sā iyam mahataḥ vaṃśastambāt laṭvā aakṛṣyate iti tasmāt arthavāda samarpita mapunarāvṛtti rūpam eva phalam ātma jñāna vidhiḥ abalambata aiti evam kecid ātma jñānasya mokṣa sādhana tvam vidhi siddham 
NM_9,2.430.123	 sūkṣma darśinaḥ tu āhuḥ iyam arpi mahatī durgatiḥ yat artha vāda mukha prekṣi tvam asya uktam adhikāra vidheḥ viśvajiti rātri satre vā kim anyat kriyatām na hi viśva jit rūpa paryālocanataḥ kaścid adhikārī labhyate itibalāt svarga kāma ādiḥ kalpyate vā arthavāda samarpitaḥ vā abalambyate yatratu vidhi svarūpa mahimnā eva tad upalambhaḥ tatra kim kalpanayā kim artha vāda vadana avalokana dainyena vā 
NM_9,2.430.124	 iha ca svādhyāyaḥ adhyetavyaḥ iti vat agnīnāt adhītaḥ itivat vākṛtyena dvitīyayā vai īpsitatama tva nirdeśāt tad niṣṭha tvam eva avatiṣṭhate tatra yathā agni artha tayā aadhāna vidhiḥ avagamyamānaḥ agnīnām anekavidha puruṣa arthaupayika karma kalāpa upayogāt tadā arjanena eva kṛtārtha tvam upagataḥ iti na phala antaram apekṣate yathā vā svādhyāyaḥ adhyetavyaḥ iti akṣara grahaṇa artha tvāt asya vidheḥakṣara grahaṇasya ca phalavat karma avabodha dvāreṇa parama puruṣa artha upāya tva avadhāraṇa anna tadatirikta ghṛta madhu kulyādi phala antara apekṣi tvam na ca adhyāpana vidhi aṅga tvam sva mahimnā eva īpsitatama saṃskāra dvāraka adhikāra lābhāt evam iha api apahata pāpma ādi ātma svarūpa parijñānam eva tasya parama puruṣa artha tām avabodhayat nasyavidheḥ anya prayojana tām āpādayati 
NM_9,2.430.125	 kaścid kila saṃskāra vidhiḥ saṃskriyamāṇa niṣṭhaḥ api saṃskriyamāṇa prayojana apekṣayā para mukha prekṣī bhavati brīhīn prokṣati iti vat kaścid tu saṃskriyamāṇa prayojanam alabhamānaḥ tad īpsita tama tva anirvahaṇāt saṃskāra vidhi tvam eva jahāti saktūn juhoti iti vat yathā uktam bhūta bhāvi upayogam hi dravyam saṃskāryam iṣyate saktavaḥ na upayokṣyante na upayuktāḥ ca te kvacid iti svatas puruṣa arthānām na phala antaram
