NM_9,2.430.126	 yasya tu saṃskāryam anardham iva ratnam aparyuṣitam iva amṛtam anastamita= iva candra bimbam aparimlānam iva śatapatram asti kaḥ tarhi prakaraṇa pāṭhā apekṣāyām arthavāda mukha prekṣaṇena phala kalpanāyām vā abhilāṣaḥ atas eva na kāma śruti prayukta tvam ādhānasya na ca ācārya karaṇa vidhi prayukta tvam adhyayanasya iti 
NM_9,2.430.127–9,2.430.128	 tasmāt svādhyāya adhyayanāḥ dhāna vidhi samāna yogakṣema tvāt ātma jñāna vidheḥ tad kṛtam ātma jñānam apavarga artham avagamyate tathāvidha svarūpaḥ ātmā eva para upādhi janita dharma rahitaḥ apavargaḥ iti ucyate yatas tat idam ittham ātma jñānam eva niḥśreyasa sādhanam ananya labhyam iti tat eva upadiṣṭavān ācāryaḥ akṣa pādaḥ yat tu vijñāna satta ātma śabda āt i advaita darśanam tat mithyājñānam eva iti na niḥśreyasa sādhanam iti brahmādvaita vāda nirāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.129	 nanu katham advaita darśanam mithyā kathyate tat pratyuta dvaita darśanam avidyā māyā api mithyājñānam iti yuktam tathā hi pratyakṣam eva tāvat nipuṇaṃnirūpayatu bhavān tatra hi yat anya anapekṣa tayā jhagiti padārtha svarūpam avabhāsate tat pāramāthikam itarat kālpanikam iti gamyate sat rūpam eva caca tatra abhinnam anya nirapekṣam avabhāti bhedaḥ tu anya apekṣaḥ iti na akṣaja vijñāna viṣaya tām upayāti kāraṇasya eva satya tvam kāryasya mithyātvam 
NM_9,2.430.130–9,2.430.131	 tatra yathā mṛd ru upatātaḥ prabhṛti yāvat kumbha avasthā iti asmin= antarāḍe āvirbhavatām tirobhavatām ca ghaṭa kapāla śakala śarkarā kaṇā ādīnām kāryāṇām rūpam aparama artha sat eva vyavahāra padavīm avatarati paramārthataḥ tu mṛttikā eva yathā aahuḥ mṛttikā iti eva satyam iti evam tat api mṛttikā rūpam sattā apekṣayā na paramārtha sat iti sattā eva sarvatra parama arthāḥ tat eva sat lakṣaṇam brahma iti āhuḥ āgamaḥ ca ekam eva advitīyam ityādiḥ abhedam eva darśayati na iha nānā asti kiṃcana mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti yaḥ iha na anā ivapaśyati iti ca pratyakṣasya śātra avirodhi tvam 
NM_9,2.430.132	 na ca pratyakṣa viruddha tvam abheda śaṃsinaḥ vaktum śakyam āgamasya na hi anya niṣedhe pratyakṣam prabhavati sva rūpa mātra grahaṇe parisamāpta vyāpāra tvāt para rūpa niṣedham antareṇa ca bhedasya durupapāda tvāt bhede kuṇṭham eva pratyakṣam iti katham abheda grāhiṇam āgamam virundhyāt tat uktam āhuḥ vidhātṛ pratyakṣam na niṣeddhṛ vipaścitaḥ na ekatve āgamaḥ tena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate bandha mokṣa vyavasthā 
NM_9,2.430.133	 nanu yadi ekam eva brahma na dvitīyam kiṃcid asti tarhi tat brahma nitya śuddha buddha svabhāva tvāt muktam eva āste kena tat baddham iti kimarthaḥ ayam mumukṣuṇāṃ prayatnaḥ kutastyaḥ vā ayam vicitra jagat avabhāsaḥ avidyā ucchet a artha umumukṣu prayatnaḥ iti brūmaḥ tatas tyaḥ eva ayam vicitra jāgada vabhāsaḥ avidyā svarūpam 
NM_9,2.430.134	 kā iyam avidyā brahmaṇaḥ vyatiriktā ced na advaitam avyatireke tubrahmā eva sā tatas na anyā asti eṣa iti katham ucchidyeta mā evam vastunī dṛṃśi ku tārkika codyāni kramante avidyā tu iyama vastu rūpāḥ māyā mithyā avabhāsa svabhāvā abhidhīyate tattva agrahaṇam avidyā agrahaṇam ca nāma kathaṃvastu dharmaiḥ vikalpyate avidyā āśrayaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.135–9,2.430.136	 nanu ! tattva agrahaṇa rūpā api kasya iyam avidyā na hi brahmaṇaḥ nitya buddha svabhāva tvāt avidyā bhavati anyaḥ tu na asti eva tad āśrayaḥ na caniradhikaraṇam eva mithyājñānam bhavitum arhati ucyate jīvātmanām avidyā na brahmaṇaḥ nanu ! ke te jīva ātmānaḥ te api brahmaṇaḥ anya ananyatayā cintyāḥ evaāḥ ! kṣudra tārkika ! sarvatra anabhijñaḥ asi brahma eva jīva ātmānaḥ na tatas anye na hi dahana piṇḍāt bhedena api bhāntaḥ sphuliṅgāḥ agni svarūpāḥ nabhavanti jīva ajñāna vādaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.137	 tat kim brahmaṇaḥ eva avidyā  na ca brahmaṇaḥ avidyā yathā hi ekam eva ghaṭa ādi āvaraṇa upahita bheda tayā bhinnam iva vibhāti nabhaḥ paṭa ākāśam ghaṭākāśam iti tad āvaraṇa vaśāt eva ca rajaḥ dhūma ādi kaluṣitam api bhavati tad āvaraṇa viratau tu gaḍita kāluṣya male tatra eva parame vyomni līyate tathā eva jīva ātmānaḥ api avidyā kalpita bhedāḥ tad kṛtam aneka prakāra kāluṣyam anubhavanti tad uparame ca pare brahmaṇi līyante iti anyonya āśraya parihāraḥ 
NM_9,2.430.138–9,2.430.140	 nanu ! evam sati api avidyā parikalpitaḥ eṣa brahma jīva ātma vibhāgaḥ sā ca jīvātmanām avidyā iti ucyate tat etat itaretara āśrayam āpadyate avidyā kalpanāyām satyām jīvātmānaḥ jīvātmasu ca satsu avidyā iti bhavatu itaretara āśrayam avidyā prapaṃcaḥ eva ayam aśeṣaḥ kasya eṣa doṣaḥ yadi vā anādi tvam asya parihāraḥ bīja aṅkura vat bhaviṣyati bhavadbhiḥ api ca ayam anādiḥ eva saṃsāraḥ abhyupagataḥ avidyayā eva ca saṃsāraḥ iti ucyate avidyā nivṛtti upāyaḥ nanu ! anādeḥ avidyāyāḥ katham ucchedaḥ kim anādeḥ ucchedaḥ na bhavati bhūme rūpasya bhavadbhiḥ vā katham anādi ssaṃsāraḥ ucchedyate 
NM_9,2.430.141	 nanu ! upāye satyanādiḥ api ucchidyate advaitinām kaḥ tad uccheda upāyaḥ avidyā eva iti brūmaḥ śravaṇa manana nidhyāna ādiḥ api avidyā eva sā tu abhyasyamānā satī avidyā antaram utsādayati svayam api utsīdati yathā payaḥ payojarayati svayam ca jīryati viṣam viṣa antaram śamayati svayam ca śāmyati yathā vā dravya antara rajaḥ kṣiptam rajaḥ kaluṣite ambhasi tat ca ātmānam saṃhṛtya svaccham ambu karoti evam iyam avidyā eva avidyā antaram ucchindantī vidyā upāya tām pratipadyate asatyāt api satya siddhiḥ 
NM_9,2.430.142–9,2.430.143	 nanu ! sva rūpeṇa asatyaiva iyam avidyā katham satya kāryam kuryāt ucyate asatyāt api satya artha sampattiḥ upapatsyate māyā sarpa ādayaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ satya pralaya hetavaḥ rekhā gakāra ādayaḥ ca asatyāḥ satya artha prati iti upāyāḥ dṛśyante svarūpeṇa satyāste iti ced kim tena kriyate gakāra ādi tvena hi te pratipādakāḥ tat ca eṣām asatyam iti śuddhasya api brahmaṇaḥ avidyayā aavaraṇam 
NM_9,2.430.144–9,2.430.145	 nanu ! brahmaṇaḥ nitya śuddha tvāt jīvānām ca tatas ananya tvāt kathaṃteṣu avidyā avakāśam labhate parihṛtam etat ghaṭa ākāśa dṛṣṭānta upavarṇanena api ca yathā viśuddham api vadana bimbam ambu maṇi kṛpāṇa darpaṇa ādi upādhi vaśena śyāma dīrgha sthūla ādi rūpam apāramārthikam eva darśayati tathā brahmaṇaḥ tad abhāve api jīveṣu tad avakāśaḥ iti baddha mukta vyavasthā upapattiḥ 
NM_9,2.430.146	 nanu ! paramātmanaḥ nitya tvāt jīvānām api anyonyam ananya tvam iti ekasmin baddhe mukte vā sarve baddhāḥ muktāḥ vā syuḥ ayi kutarka kaluṣitam atekatham bodhyamānaḥ api na budhyase ghaṭa ākāśe hi ghaṭa bhaṅgāt parama ākāśa pratiṣṭhe jāte na paṭa ākāśaḥ api tathā bhavati ekasya api jīva ātmanaḥupādhi bhedāt sukha duḥkha anubhava bhedaḥ dṛśyate pāde me vedanā śirasi mevedanā iti tīvratara taraṇi tāpa upanatā tanutara klamasya ca yatra eva caśarirāvayave śiśira haricandana sthāsakam uparacayati parijanaḥ tatra eva tad duḥkha uparama anubhavaḥ na anyatra iti evam ekasmin= api paramātmani kalpanā mātra pratiṣṭheṣu api jīva ātmasu baddha mukta vyavasthā siddhi ati eva iti eka ātma vādaḥ eva ayam āgama anuguṇaḥ upagantum yuktaḥ na ānantyam ātmanām brahma darśanam eva atas niḥśreyasa nibandhanam bheda darśana mūḍhānām saṃsāra viratiḥ kutas iti brahmādvaita vāda nirākaraṇam 
NM_9,2.430.147	 atra abhidhīyate kapaṭa nāṭaka rahasya prakriyā kūrca uparacane tad anuguṇa dṛṣṭānta parampara upapādane ca kim ucyate param kauśalam bhavatām ! pramāṇa vṛtta nirūpaṇe tu tapasvinaḥ eva bhavantaḥ tathā hi bhedasya pramāṇa bādhita tvāt kim ayam abheda abhyupagamaḥ bhavatām uta svid abhedasya eva pramāṇa siddha tvāt iti dvayam api na asti pratyakṣa ādīni hi sarvāṇi eva bheda pratiṣṭhā ni pramāṇāni bhedasya pratyakṣa tvam 
NM_9,2.430.148–9,2.430.149	 yat tāvat bhedasya para apekṣa tvāt akṣaja jñāna gamyatā na asti iti tat ayuktam abhedasya sutarām para apekṣa tvāt mṛd piṇḍāt prabhṛti ghaṭa karpara cūrṇa paryanta kārya paramparā paricchede tad anugata mṛd rūpa tā grahaṇe ca sati mṛdaḥ tad abhinna rūpa tvam avadhāryeta na anyathā bhikṣavaḥ tu ācakṣate cākṣuṣam vyāvṛtta sva lakṣaṇa grāhi nābheda viṣayam abhedasya para apekṣa tvāt iti abhedasya bheda adhīna tvam 
NM_9,2.430.150–9,2.430.151	 ayam asmāt anyaḥ iti iyam para apekṣā pratītiḥ iti ced ayam asmin= anusyūtā etīyam api para apekṣā eva tat atra bhavān bhikṣavaḥ ca dvau= api durgraha upahatau bheda abheda grahaṇa nipuṇam akṣa jam iti parikṣitam etat vistarataḥ sāmānya cintāyām aṅguli catuṣṭayam hi pratibhāsamānam itaretara vivikta rūpam api anugata rūpam api prakāśa taiti uktam vyāvṛttiḥ anuvṛttiḥ vā para apekṣā astu vastuṣu asaṅkīrṇa svabhāvāḥ tu bhāvāḥ bhānti akṣa buddhiṣu pratyakṣam bheda abheda ubhaya viṣayakam 
NM_9,2.430.152–9,2.430.153	 yat api uktam āhuḥ vidhātṛ pratyakṣam na niṣeddhṛ iti tat api asādhu vidhātṛ iti kaḥ arthaḥ idam api vastu svarūpam gṛhṇāti na anya rūpam niṣedhati pratyakṣam iti ced mā evam jñānam tarhi na tat bhavet anya rūpa niṣedham antareṇa tad svarūpa paricchedasya api asampatteḥ pīta ādi vyavacchinnam hi nīlam nīlam iti gṛhītam bhavati na itarathā tathā ca āhatat paricchinatti anyat vyavacchinatti iti 
NM_9,2.430.154–9,2.430.155	 bhāvavat abhāvam api gṛhītum prabhavati pratyakṣam iti ca sādhitam asmābhiḥ eva etat tasmāt itaretara vivikta padārtha svarūpa grāhi tvā anna abheda viṣayaṃpratyakṣam śabda anumānayoḥ bheda abalambana tvam śabda anumānayoḥ tu saṃbandha grahaṇa adhīna sva viṣaya vyāpārayoḥ bhedam antareṇa svarūpam eva na avakalpate iti tau= ubhau= api bheda viṣayau= eva viśeṣa viṣaya tva abhāve api liṅga sāmānyasya tad itara vilakṣaṇasya paricchedāt bheda viṣayam anumānam 
NM_9,2.430.156–9,2.430.158	 śabdasya tu pada ātmanaḥ tadvat ādi vācya bheda rūpasya tu paraspara uparakta padārtha puṃja svabhāvaḥ itara padārtha viśeṣita anyatama padārtha rūpaḥ vā vākya arthaḥ viṣayaḥ iti pūrvam eva nirūpitam atas sarvathā na bhedasya pramāṇa bādhita tvam na api abheda grāhi kiṃcana pramāṇam asti yathā uktena eva nyāyena abhede na śrutiḥ pramāṇam yaḥ tu āgamaḥ paṭhitaḥ ekam eva advitīyam na iha nānā asti kiṃcana etyādiḥ tasya artha vāda tvāt na yathāśrutaḥ eva arthaḥ grahītavyaḥ artha vādānām sarveṣām na sva arthe prāmāṇyam 
NM_9,2.430.159	 nanu ! siddhe api arthe vedasya prāmāṇyam abhyupagatam eva bhavadbhiḥ bāḍham abhyupagatam kintu dhūmaḥ eva agnedivā dadṛśe na arciḥ iti evamādīnām pratyakṣa ādi viruddha artha abhidhāyinām artha vādānām mukhyām vṛttim apahāya gauṇyā api vṛttyā avyākhyānam āśritam evam idam api vacanam itara pramāṇa viruddham artham abhidadhat anyathā vyākhyāyate 
NM_9,2.430.160–9,2.430.161	 ye tu pramāṇa antara viruddha artha anuvādinaḥ na bhavanti artha vādāḥ teṣām astu svarūpe prāmāṇyam vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhāḥ devatāḥ iti evamādīnām tasmāt sukha duḥkha avasthā bhede api na avasthātuḥ ātmanaḥ bhedaḥ deha indriya ādi nānātve api vā na tasya nānātvam iti evam yathākathaṃcid ayam artha vādaḥ yojanīyaḥ abheda upadeśī tu tad paraḥ śabdaḥ vidhi rūpaḥ iha na asti eva evam āgama balāt api na advaita siddhiḥ avidyā svarūpa ādi anupapattiḥ 
NM_9,2.430.162–9,2.430.163	 yat punar avidyā ādi bheda codyam āśaṅkya āśaṅkya parihṛtam tatra āśaṅkā āsādhīyasī samādhānam tu na peśalam tattva anya tvābhyām anirvacanīyeyam avidyā iti kaḥ arthaḥ anādinā prabandhena pravṛttā aavaraṇa kṣamā yatna ucchedya api avidyā iyam asatī kathyate katham astitve kaḥ enām ucchindyāt iti ced kātara santrāsaḥ ayam satām eva hi vṛkṣa ādīnām ucchedaḥ dṛśyate na asatām śaśa viṣāṇa ādīnām tat iyam ucchedya tvāt avidyā nityāḥ mā bhūt satī tu bhavati eva nityam na śakyam ucchettum sat anityam tu śakyate asattvam anyat anyā ca padārthānām anitya tā avidyā bhāva rūpā api 
NM_9,2.430.164–9,2.430.165	 na ca tattva agrahaṇa mātram avidyā saṃśaya viparyayau= api avidyā eva tauca bhāva svabhāva tvāt katham asantau bhavetām grahaṇa prāgabhāvaḥ api na āsan= iti śakyate vaktum abhāvasya api astitva samarthanāt iti sarvathā na asatīa vidyā asattve ca niṣiddhe asyāḥ sattvam eva balāt bhavet sat asat vyatiriktaḥ hi rāśiḥ atyanta durlabhaḥ sattve ca dvitīyāyāḥ avidyāyāḥ bhāvān na advaitam jīvasya kalpita tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.166	 yat tu brahmaṇaḥ satata prabuddha tvāt avidyā kṣevatā na iti jīvānām avidyā āspada tvam abhihitam avidyā uparame brahmaṇi parame te eva ghaṭa ākāśa vallīyantā eti ca tat api na caturaśram ākāśa avaccheda hetoḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ ghaṭamāna tvāt avidyāyāḥ tu asattvāt tad kṛtaḥ paramātmanaḥ avacchedaḥ iti viṣamaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ avacchedaka abhāvāt ca jīva vibhāga kalpanā api niravakāśa eva adidyāyāḥ anādi tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.167	 yat ca itaretara āśraya tvam parihartum anādi tvam āveditam avidyāyāḥ tatra bīja aṅkura vat vādi antara upagata saṃsāra vat ca tasyāḥ satya tvam eva syāt anādi prabandha pravṛtta tve sattve ca asyāḥ pratikūla hetu antara upanipāta kṛtam apākaraṇam ucitam eka ātma vādinām tu tad ati durghaṭam iti anirmokṣaḥ eva syāt yathā aaha bhaṭṭaḥ svābhāvikīm avidyām ca na ucchettum kaścid arhati vilakṣaṇa upapāte hi naśyet svābhābikam kvacid na tu eka ātmā abhyupāyānām hetuḥ asti vilakṣaṇaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.168–9,2.430.169	 iti avidyāyāḥ na bandha nivartaka tva saṃbhavaḥ yat punar avidyā eva vidyā upāyaḥ iti atra dṛṣṭānta parampara udghāṭanam kṛtam tat api kleśāya na artha siddhaye sarvatra upāyasya sva rūpeṇa sattvāt asataḥ kha puṣpa ādeḥ upāya tva abhāvāt rekhā gakāra ādīnām tu varṇa rūpa tayā sattvaṃyadī api na asti tathā api svarūpataḥ sattvam vidyate eva satyasya eva sarvatra nivartaka tvam 
NM_9,2.430.170	 nanu ! gakāraḥ ayam iti gṛhyamāṇaḥ sa rekhā āsanniveśaḥ artha pratyāya kobhavati na ca asau tena rūpeṇa asti mā evam sva rūpeṇa sataḥ arthasya rūpa antareṇa api gṛhyamāṇasya kūṭa kārṣa āpaṇa ādeḥ iva vyavahāra hetu tā dṛśyate ca yuktāca yaḥ tu svarūpataḥ eva na asti na tasya sva ātmanā para ātmanā vā avyavahāra aṅga tā samasti rekhā āsanniveśaḥ ca svarūpeṇa san= iti varṇa ātma tvena āsan= api tad kāryāya paryāpnuyāt na tu ayam avidyāyām nyāyaḥ sva rūpa asattvāt tasyāḥ 
NM_9,2.430.171–9,2.430.173	 sarpa ādau tu sarpa ādi svarūpa vat tad jñānasya api tat kāryatvam avagatam atas eva śaṅkā viṣasya api sva śāstreṣu cikitsām upadiśanti evam vana guhā kuhara deśāt eṣa nissṛtaḥ kesarī saroṣa mitas eva abhivarttate iti asatye api ukte yat bhīrūṇām palāyana ādi śūrāṇām ca sa utsāham āyudha udyamana ādi satyam kāryam upalabhyate tatra siṃha jñānasya tad kāryatvāt na asataā iva upāya tvam 
NM_9,2.430.174–9,2.430.175	 etena pratibimba dṛṣṭāntaḥ api pratyākhyātaḥ khaṅga ādeḥ mukha ādi kāluṣya kalpanā kāraṇasya tatra sadbhāvāt iha tu tad abhāvāt iti eka ātma vāde baddha muktā ādi vyavasthā anupapattiḥ yat api baddha mukta vyavasthā siddhaye pāda vedana ādi udāhṛtam tat api evam apākṛtam avacchedakasya pāda ādeḥ tatra tāttvika tvāt iha tu bheda kalpanā bījam advaita vādinām durghaṭam iti bahuśas pradarśitam 
NM_9,2.430.176–9,2.430.177	 tat atra ayam vastu saṅkṣepaḥ avidyāyām asatyām sarve eva ayam yathā udāhṛtaḥ vyavahāra prakāraḥ tad kṛtaḥ iti na avatiṣṭhate satyām tu tasyām na advaitam iti atas eva āha sūtrakāraḥ saṅkhyā ekānta asiddhiḥ pramāṇa upapatti anupapattibhyām iti ātmādvaita vāda nirākaraṇa upasaṃhāraḥ yadi tāvat advaita siddhau pramāṇam astiḥ tarhi tat eva dvitīyam iti na advaitam atha na asti pramāṇam na tarāma dvaitam aprāmāṇikāyāḥ siddheḥ abhāvāt iti mantra artha vāda uttha vikalpa mūlam advaitavāda parihṛtya tasmāt upeya tām eṣa padārtha bhedaḥ pratyakṣa liṅga āgama gamyamānaḥ śabdāt vaitavāda nirākaraṇam 
NM_9,2.430.178–9,2.430.180	 etena śabdāt vaitavadaḥ api pratyuktaḥ anādi nidhanam brahma śabda tattvam yat akṣaram vivartate artha bhāvena prakriyā jagataḥ yatas iti ucyate tatra anādi nidhana pada niveditā pūrvā para anta rahitā vastu sattā nitya tvam brahma pada pratipāditam ca vyāpi tvam iti ubhayam api śabdasya prāk eva nirastam niravayavaḥ ca sphoṭa ātmā śabdaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ eva śabda vivartavāda upanyāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.181–9,2.430.182	 yat tu nityam vyāpi ca kiṃcid ucyate tat śabda tattvam iti atra kāyuktiḥ āha śabda upagrāhya tayā ca śabda tattvam tathā hi sarva pratyayaḥ upajāyamānaḥ na anullikhita śabdaḥ upajāyate tad ullekha virahiṇaḥ anāsādita prakāśa svabhāvasya pratyayasya anutpanna nirviśeṣa tvāt evam īdṛśam iti ādi parāmarśa pramuṣita vapuṣi vedane vedanā ātmaka tā eva na bhavet sarva pratyayānām śabda anuviddha tvam 
NM_9,2.430.183	 ye api vṛddha vyavahāra upayoga vaidhuryāt anavāpta śabda artha saṃbandha viśeṣa vyutpattayaḥ bāla dāraka prāyāḥ pramātāraḥ te aapi nūnam yat sat tat kim iti ādi śabda jātam anullikhantaḥ na pratiyanti kim api prameyam atas śabda unmeṣa prabhāva prāpta prakāśa svabhāva tvāt sarva pratyayānām śabda anuviddhaṃbodhaka tvam iti sarvam śabda tattvam iti avadhāryatām tat āha na saḥ asti pratyayaḥ loke yaḥ śabda anugamāt ṛte anuviddham iva jñānam sarvam śabdena gamyate iti 
NM_9,2.430.184–9,2.430.185	 evam anabhyupagame tu saṃvidaḥ prakāśa śūnya tayā anadhigata viṣayaḥ sarvaeva andha mūka prāyaḥ lokaḥ syāt āha ca vāc rūpa tā ced utkrāmet avabodhasya śāśvatī na prakāśaḥ prakāśeta sā hi pratyavamarśinī iti atas krameṇa tāvat evam bodhyase śabda ākhya viśeṣaṇa anuvedha viśeṣa abhavāt sarvam nirvikalpakam indriya jam sa vikalpakam vā jñānam śabda viśiṣṭam artham avadyotayati gauḥ śuklaḥ gacchati iti jāti guṇa kriyā avacchinna viṣaya avabhāsini pratyaye śabda viśiṣṭaḥ eva arthaḥ sphurati iti budhyasva arthānām śabda ātmaka tva samarthanam 
NM_9,2.430.186–9,2.430.187	 evam ced boddhum avatīrṇaḥ asi śabda ākhya viśeṣaṇa anuraktasya tasya viśeṣyasya svarūpam pṛṣṭaḥ śabdena eva darśayasi śabda aparityāga labdha prakāśa svarūpayā evavā anubhūtyā anubhavasi iti saḥ api viśeṣyaḥ śabda rūpaḥ eva iti jānīhi tat evaṃśabdaḥ eva artha upārūḍhaḥ pratibhāti iti vyavatiṣṭhate ittham iyantam adhvānam ced prāptaḥ api tad adhunā yat upārūḍhaḥ śabdaḥ prakāśate tasya pṛthak pradarśayitum anubhavitum ca aśakya tvāt śabdaḥ eva tathā tathā apratibhāti iti śabda vivarte eva ayam arthaḥ na anyaḥ kaścid iti pratipattum arhasi 
NM_9,2.430.188–9,2.430.189	 yathā ca ayam indriya jeṣu pratibhāseṣu prakramaḥ tathā śābdeṣu api pratyayeṣu śabda viśiṣṭaḥ vā arthaḥ pravibhāti śabdaḥ vā artha ārūḍhaḥ śabdaā iva artha rūpeṇa vivartate iti gṛhyatām atas ca śabdabrahma idam ekam avidyā upādhi darśita vicitra bhedam avidyā uparame yathā avasthita svarūpam prakāśate iti yuktam śabda vivartavāt anirāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.190	 atra abhidhīyate na khalu prakāra trayam api idam upapadyate pada padārtha saṃbandha vyutpatti virahiṇām anavāpta śabda yojana avairūpya svarūpa mātra pratiṣṭha viśuddha vastu grahaṇa pravaṇa indriya ja pratyaya darśanāt vṛddha vyavahāra paricaya adhigata śabda artha saṃbandha saṃskṛta dhiyām api śabda smaraṇa saṃskāra prabodha hetu bhūta prathama uda bhūta viśuddha vastu avabhāsasya aparihārya tvāt yatra hi vastuni niviśamānaḥ śabdaḥ śabda vid vyavahāreṣu yaḥ avadhṛtaḥ tad darśane tad saṃskāra prabodhāt sahi smṛti patham eti na anyathā iti pratyayānām na śabda anuviddha tvam 
NM_9,2.430.191–9,2.430.192	 sāmānya śabdeṣu api yat tat kim ityādiṣu viśeṣa śabdeṣu ivasā eva vārtā teṣām api vyutpatti upayoga virahe vividha vana vihāri vihaṅga kūjita ādi vat artha pratīti hetutva anupapatteḥ sa vikalpa kadaśāyām api na vācaka viśiṣṭam vācyam mecaka guṇa khacitam iva kuvalayam avalokayati lokaḥ iti vistaraśaḥ pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe parīkṣitam etat āha ca na śabda abheda rūpeṇa buddhiḥ artheṣu jāyate prāk śabda āt yādṛśī buddhiḥ śabdāt api hi tādṛśī iti arthena sākam śabda bhānā saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.193	 saṃjñi tva mātram adhikamadhunā dhvani sannidhāne buddhisadhirohati na tat vi śiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ tasya hi na netreṇa na śrotreṇa na ubhābhyām na kevalam manasā avā grahaṇam upapadyate atiprasaṅgāt śabdaḥ hi aneka dharmake dharmiṇi ekatara dharma avadhāraṇa abhyupāyaḥ bhavati na tatra ātmānam āropayati na hidīpa indriya prabhṛtayaḥ prati iti upāyāḥ tad upeye rūpa ādau= ātmānam āropayanti atas eva tad upāya tva bhrama kṛtaḥ tad abheda vādaḥ api na yuktaḥ na hi upāyāt abhinna tvam tad upeyasya yujyate rūpasya na hi abhinna tvam dīpāt vā cakṣuṣaḥ api vā arthasya śabda vivartatva abhāvaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.194–9,2.430.195	 api ca yadi śabdāt abhinnaḥ arthaḥ pratibhāti eva kaḥ adhyāsa arthaḥ abhede api śabda mayam eva viśvam iti tatra api kaḥ adhyāsa arthaḥ adhyāsa bhramaḥ tu vaiyākaraṇānām eka ākāra nirdeśa doṣa nirmitaḥ yathā aaha gauḥ iti eva hi nirdeśaḥ vācyaḥ tad buddhi vācinām iti kaḥ tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ arthaḥ iti pṛṣṭaḥ vakti gauḥ itiki īdṛśam te jñānam utpannam gauḥ iti kīdṛśam śabdam prayuktavān asi gauḥ iti tatas eṣā bhrāntiḥ vastutas tu viviktāḥ eva ete śabda jñāna arthāḥ tat uktam gavi sāsna ādi sat rūpā gādi rūpa abhidhāyake nirākāra ubhaya jñāne saṃvittiḥ paramārthataḥ iti nānā arthaka sthale śabda arthayoḥ abheda asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.196	 evam indriya jeṣu iva śābdeṣu api pratyayeṣu na śabda svarūpa madhyasyati iti yuktam yadi ca śabdaḥ sva rūpeṇa artham pratipādayati tadā akṣa śabdasya aikyāt devana vibhītaka ratha akṣeṣu tulyā pratītiḥ syāt na ca akṣa śabdāḥ bhinnāḥ iti vaktavyam svarūpa pratyabhijñānānapāyāt tad uccāraṇeca artha travyām saṃśaya darśanāt 
NM_9,2.430.197–9,2.430.198	 bhavati śabdayoḥ ca suptiṅantayoḥ tulya rūpa tvāt adhyāsa pakṣe tulya artha pratīti hetu tvam prāpnoti tathā ca siddha sādhya buddhiḥ saṃvedyamānā apinihnūyeta evam agāt iti aśvaḥ iti aja avayaḥ iti ādau= api draṣṭavyam śabde artha adhyāsaḥ viruddhaḥ ca śabdasya siddha rūpa tvāt tad adhyāsena artha buddha aviṣyamāṇāyām yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt iti ādau na kvacid sādhya buddhiḥ bhavet siddha adhyāsena sādhya buddheḥ ananurūpa tvāt 
NM_9,2.430.199–9,2.430.200	 jāti guṇa kriyā śabdāḥ ca gauḥ śuklaḥ gacchati ityādayaḥ kena kāraṇena niyata madhyāsam anurundhate iti na avagacchāmaḥ śabdasya artha an apekṣa nisarga siddha vaiśva rūpya kalpanā bīja abhāvāt pratiniyata śabda vṛtteḥ ca kasyacid lakṣaṇasya anupalakṣaṇāt vṛkṣa plakṣa śabdayoḥ ca ghaṭa paṭa śabdayoḥ iva sva rūpa bheda aviśeṣāt artha anapekṣi tvāt ca viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva sāmānādhikaraṇye śabda adhyāsa vādinaḥ na bhavetām na hi ekatra vastuni vācye kvacid anayoḥ śabdayoḥ vṛttiḥ etena nīlotpalam api pratyākhyātam śabda vivartavāde sāmānādhikaraṇya asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.201	 tatra etat syāt na nīla guṇa viśeṣitam idam utpalam nāma kiṃcid asti viśeṣyam api tu tat nirasta avayava artham aśva karṇa ādi vat artha antaram eva idam vyutpatti prakāra mātram tu viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva varṇanam iti tat etat asamī cīnam anubhūyamāna avayava artha pratīti nihna va nirmitta anupalambhāt aśva karṇa ādau hi yuktam artha antara tvam tatra hi na aśva arthaḥ na karṇa arthaḥ niravayava vākya artha vādaḥ ca prāk eva vistareṇa nirastaḥ iti alam punarukta ālāpena śabda vivartavāde paryāya padānām sāmānādhira karaṇyam syāt 
NM_9,2.430.202–9,2.430.203	 atha śabda dvaya adhyāsa mātra nibandhanam eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti ucyate tat api na cāru vṛkṣaḥ taruḥ iti paryāyayoḥ api tad saṃbhavesati sāmānādhikaraṇya prasaṅgāt api ca paryāyeṣu hastaḥ karaḥ pāṇiḥ ityādiṣu śabda rūpa bheda adhyāsa pakṣe artha buddhi bhedaḥ prāpnoti na ca asau= asti iti na adhyāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.204	 kiṃca saṃbandha grahaṇa nirapekṣaḥ api śabdaḥ sva sāmarthyam anurudhyamānaḥ svādhyāsena buddhim vidadhyāt tad apekṣāyām vā kasya kena saṃbandhaḥ iti nabudhyāmahe śabdāt arthasya pṛthak vyavasthita ātmanaḥ tvad mate durlabha tvāt śabda vyatirikta artha upagame vā kim anena śabda adhyāsa samarthanāḍambareṇa viramyatām atas mṛgatṛṣṇā anusaraṇa raṇikāt śabde artha adhyāsa asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.205	 api ca adhyāsaḥ kvacid sādṛśyāt bhavati śuktau= iva rajatasya kvacid anurāgāt bhavati lākṣāyāḥ iva sphaṭike śabda arthayoḥ mūrtā mūrta tayā ati dūra bhinna svarūpayoḥ sādṛśyam tāvat anupapannam anurāgaḥ api tatas eva durghaṭaḥ pṛthak deśa tvāt bhinna indriya grāhya tvāt ca śabda arthayoḥ bimba pratibimba bhāva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.206–9,2.430.207	 pratibimba varṇanam api na sundaram dūra deśa tvena śabda arthayoḥ prāpti abhāvāt aprāptayoḥ ca pratibimbe dvāraka udyāna nivāsi vāsudeva sundarī vadana tāmarasāni sāgara taraṅga pavana paricaya cala dala kalati kālān= chita anisu accheṣu jyotsnā avadāta dyutiṣu tuṣāra giri gahvara gata tuhina śilā karpūra darpaṇeṣu pratibimbitāni dṛśyeran atha sarva gata tvena śabdānām artha deśe prāptiḥ abhidhīyate tarhi sakala śabda sārtha sādhāraṇyāt atyantam adhyāsasā aṅkaryam anavadhāryamāṇa viśeṣa niyama kāraṇam āpadyate iti alam ati prasaṅgena sarvathā na saṃbaddhaḥ śabda adhyāsa vādaḥ vivartavādaḥ eva asamarthanīyaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.208	 vivartavādaḥ api na samaṃjasaḥ tathā hi vivartate artha bhāvena itikaḥ arthaḥ na tāvat artha ātmanā śabdaḥ pariṇāmam upayāti kṣīram iva dadhi rūpeṇa pariṇāmi tvena vikāritayā vā kṣīra ādeḥ iva anitya tva prasaṅgāt tathā abhāve api ca na advaita siddhiḥ dadhnaḥ iva kṣīra vikārasya śabda vikārasya arthasya tatas anya tvāt anya tvāt ca bādha kāraṇa kāluṣya ādi upaplava viraha pratīti samarpita bheda tvāt artha pratibhāsasya ayathārtha tva pakṣa nirāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.209	 atha artha pratibhāsam asatyam api indra jāla vat upadarśayati śabdaḥ iti ayam vivartaḥ arthaḥ saḥ api na yuktaḥ bāhyasya vastunaḥ pada abhidheyasya jāti vyakti ādeḥ vākya vācyasya api bhāvanā ādeḥ pūrva prasādhita tvāt avayava vyādeḥ ca adūraḥ eva agre samarthayiṣyamāṇa tvāt na ca indrajāla māyā ādi vat ayathārtha tāyām iha kim api kāraṇam utpaśyāmaḥ arthānām mithyātva pakṣa nirāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.210	 atha artha rūpeṇa śabdaḥ śuktiḥ iva rajata ākāratayā avabhāsate iti iyaṃvivarta vācaḥ yuktiḥ iyam api na sādhīyasī śuktikā hi rajata vat prakāśataḥ iti śakyam vaktum śukteḥ ākāra sārūpyeṇa tathā avabhāsa sambhavāt iha tu śabda arthayoḥ atyanta visadṛśa vapuṣoḥ ākāra samāropakāraṇa anavadhāraṇāt katham itara rūpeṇa itarasya avabhāsaḥ śuktikā rajata ādiṣu cabādhaka vaśāt tathātvam avagatam iha tu na bādhakam kiṃcid bhavati bhaviṣyati vā iti varṇitam śabda anuvedhaḥ api na sādhīyaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.211	 atha sva anuvedham ajahat satyām asatyām vā artha buddhim ādadhāti śabdati ayam vivarta arthaḥ eṣaḥ api saṃprati eva pratikṣiptaḥ śabda anuvedha virahiṇīnām prācuryeṇa pratipattīnām pradarśita tvāt na ca anyaḥ kaścid vipaścit cetasi vivartate vivarta prakāraḥ iti avācakam ucyate vivartate artha bhāvena eti śabdasya jagat sraṣṭṛ tva nirāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.212–9,2.430.213	 atha śabdabrahmā eva sṛjati jagat iti ayam vivarta prakāraḥ ucyate saḥ apina samyak acetana tvena śabdasya īśvarasya iva sraṣṭṛ tvā anupapatteḥ na caparam āṇu vat asya kāraṇa tvam avayava samavāyi tvena pṛthivī ādeḥ kāryasya grahaṇāt atha vijñānam ānandam brahma iti āgama vacanam anusara tā vibhu tvam iva cetana tvam api śabdabrahmaṇaḥ varṇyate tarhi īśvarasya eva śabdabrahma iti nāma kṛtaṃsyāt brahma dvaividhya nirāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.214	 yat api ucyate dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma param ca yat śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ param brahma adhigacchati iti tadā api brahma subhikṣam atyantam alaukikam ekatarasya brahmaṇaḥ kālpa nika tvāt aka alpa nika tve vā katham advaita vādaḥ tasmāt kṛtam anena śabdabrahmaṇā svasti parasmai brahmaṇe bhūyāt 
NM_9,2.430.215–9,2.430.217	 avidyā māyā vinirmita vividha bheda prathana kalpaḥ ca sattā dvaita dūṣaṇa avasara eva nivāritaḥ iti śabda advaitam api tad bada samaṃjasam iti siddham jagataḥ brahma upādāna tva nirāsaḥ etena paramātma upādāna tvam api pratyuktam paramātmanaḥ nisarga nirmalasya evaṃprāya kaluṣa vikāra kāraṇa tva anupapatteḥ asatyam eva vikāra jātam avidyātaḥ paramātmani vibhāti iti etat api dūṣitam atas sarvathā na advaitapakṣaḥ kaścid anavadyaḥ aikātmya vāde anupapattayaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.218–9,2.430.219	 atha sarva prāṇinām ekaḥ eva ātmā na nānā ātmānaḥ iti īdṛśam ucyate tat api apramāṇakam ekasmin sukhini na sarve sukhinaḥ ekasmin duḥkhitena sarve duḥkhitāḥ iti vyavasthā darśanāt ātma para vyavahārasya ca sarva jana pratīti siddhasya durapahnava tvāt anya dṛṣṭe ca sukha duḥkha sādhane vastu nismaraṇa anusandhāna pūrvaka icchā dveṣa ādi kārya jātasya anyatra anupalambhāt ekasmin= ca vīta rāge mokṣam āsāditavati saṃsāriṇām anyeṣām ānantya darśanāt ahaṃpratyayasya pratyagātma vṛtteḥ paratra asambhavāt jagat vaicitryasya ca puruṣa bheda niyata dharma nibandhanasya anyathā anupapatteḥ ātma bhedasya vispaṣṭa siddha tvāt 
NM_9,2.430.220	 tapta loha sphuliṅka ghaṭa ākāśa pāda vedanā ādi dṛṣṭānta kadambakasya ca niṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ eva iti eka ātmavādaḥ api na yuktimān iti alam vistareṇa śabda vivartavāda upasaṃhāraḥ śabdasya ayam vivartaḥ katham akhilam iti prasphurat tad viviktasva ākāraḥ artha prapaṃcaḥ katham iva vikṛtiḥ brahmaṇaḥ vedṛśī syāt tasmāt na anātma tattvaḥ paricita sat asat karma pāka anusāra prādurbhūta īśvara icchā vaśa vicala daṇu prodbhavaḥ bhūta sargaḥ vijñānāt vaitavādaḥ evam sthiteṣu sarveṣu tūṣṇīm advaita vādiṣu vidvān ādvaita vādī tu punar pratyavatiṣṭhate 
NM_9,2.430.221–9,2.430.222	 satyam anupajananam anapāyam aparimitam advayam brahma na yuktimat iti yukta ā iva tad anabhyupagamaḥ vijñānam eva tu kṣaṇikam upajanana apāya dharmakam anādi santāna prabandha pravṛtam idam tathā tathā avabhāti iti na tatas advitīyam artha rūpam nāma kiṃcid asti iti paśyāmaḥ vijñāna advaitasamarthanam nanu ! pratyakṣa ādinā pramāṇena paraspara visadṛśa padārtha svarūpa saṃvedanasya darśita tvāt katham vijñānasya ayam avabhāsaḥ artha abhāve tad svarūpa anupapatteḥ grāhya grahaṇam hi nāma vijñānam bhavati na grahaṇa grahaṇam iti 
NM_9,2.430.223–9,2.430.224	 ucyate idam tāvat parīkṣyatām yat etat pratyakṣa vijñānam nīlam idam pītam idam iti utpadyate tatra kim ekaḥ ākāraḥ prakāśate uta dvitayam iti ākāra dvaya an upalaṃbhaḥ yadi dvitayam avabhāti ayam arthaḥ nīlam idam tat jñānam iti tat kim atra vicāryate jitam bhavadbhiḥ jitasya yat ā āpadyate tat asmāsu vidhīyatām 
NM_9,2.430.225–9,2.430.226	 atha ekaḥ eva ayam ākāraḥ prathate tarhi asti vicāra avasaraḥ kasya ayam ākāraḥ kimarthasya kim jñānasya iti sa ca evam vicāryamāṇaḥ ākāraḥ yadi arthasya iti tat bhavantaḥ jeṣyanti jñāna ākāra pakṣe tu vayam jeṣyām aiti jñānasya āvarjanīya tvam kim tāvat atra yuktam jñānasya ayam ākāraḥ iti kutas kalpanā tāvat iha alpīyasi iti artha ākāra pakṣe hi arthasya jaḍa ātmanaḥ prakāśa ayogāt grāhya tvam anyathā na syāt iti grāhaka antara kalpanā avaśyaṃbhāvinī iti kalpanā t vaiguṇyam 
NM_9,2.430.227–9,2.430.228	 atha arthaḥ eva grāhya ātmā yaḥ saḥ eva grāhakaḥ iti kathyate sa tarhi prakāśaḥ eva iti saṃjñāyām eva vivādaḥ syāt bāhya abhyantara kṛtaḥ viśeṣaṃ iti ced aho viśeṣa jñaḥ devānāṃpriyaḥ grāhakāt vicchinna tā higrāhyasya bāhya tā na śarīra apekṣiṇaḥ bāhya tā bhavati yadā ca grāhyāt arthāt avyatiriktaḥ eva grāhakaḥ iṣyate tadā asya na tatas vicchinna tā itia bāhya tvāt jñānam eva tat iti katham na nāmni vivādaḥ ubhaya siddha tvāt jñānasya tasya ayam ākārī bhavitum arhati jñāne hina kecana vivadante atas tasya eva ayam ākāraḥ iti yuktam aneka kalpanā tohi eka artha kalpanā jyāyasi iti jñānasya āvaśyaka tve hetu antaram 
NM_9,2.430.229	 atas ca jñānasya ayam ākāraḥ jñānam hi prakāśakam aprakāśasya arthasya bhavadbhiḥ abhyupagamyate tatas ca arthāt prathamataram asya grahaṇena bhavitavyam agṛhītasya dīpa ādeḥ prakāśasya prakāśaka tvā darśanāt utpanneṣu api ca ghaṭa ādiṣu artheṣu prakāśa vaikalyāt vā pratibandha vaidhuryāt vā bhavati agrahaṇam jñānasya tu utpannasya sataḥ na kiṃcid grahaṇe pratibandhakaḥ na ca prakāśaka antara apekṣaṇam svatas eva dīpa vat prakāśa svabhāva tvāt atas yadā eva tasya utpādaḥ tadā eva grahaṇam avaśyam bhavet na ced kāla antare apina syāt jñānasya sva prakāśa tvam 
NM_9,2.430.230	 kim hi tasya kāla antare bhaviṣyati kim vā tadā na abhūt yena tat kāla antare grahīṣyate tadā ca na gṛhyate iti jñāna antareṇa kāla antar etat grahīṣyate iti ced tat api kena grāhīṣyate anyena iti ced tat api anyena iti kaḥ avadhiḥ śramaḥ iti ced kāmam śrāntaḥ viraṃsyati bhāvan artham tuna gṛhītavān eva prakāśa agrahaṇe tad prakāśya pariccheda ayogāt iti evam na kadācid artha grahaṇam syāt tasmāt artha grahaṇa vādinā api pūrvam jñāna grahaṇam avaśya āśrayaṇīyam yathā uktam apratyakṣa upalambhasya na artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati iti prathamam jñānasya eva bhānam 
NM_9,2.430.231–9,2.430.232	 atas ca etat evam jñāna pṛṣṭhena ca uttara kāla bhāvi pratyavamarśa darśanāt jñātaḥ mayā ayam arthaḥ iti hi pratyavamṛśantaḥ pramātāraḥ prathamam jñāna grahaṇam anumodante na hi agṛhīta viśeṣaṇā viśeṣya buddhiḥ bhavati tasmāt api pūrvaṃjñāna grahaṇam iti siddham jñānam ca gṛhyamāṇam ākāra rahitam grahītum aśakyam iti balāt sa ākāram eva tat grahītavyam sa ākāre ca jñāne gṛhīte sati dvitīya kāraṇa abhāvāt kutas jñāna atiriktaḥ bāhyaḥ arthaḥ jñānasya viṣaya saṃbandhāt sa ākāra tvam 
NM_9,2.430.233	 itas ca sa ākāram jñānam ākāravat tām antareṇa asya pratikarma vyavasthā anupapatteḥ kalpayitvā api bāhyam artham avaśyam ākāravat tā vijñānasya viṣaya niyama siddhaye vaktavyā nīla jñānam hi idam aneka sannidhāne samupajāyamānam katham akhila taditara padārtha parihāreṇa kevala nīla ālambanatām avalambeta bodha svabhāva tāyāḥ sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭa tvāt pravṛttiḥ api prekṣā pūrva kāriṇām katham tad eka viṣayā eva syāt na ca nīla janita tva kṛta eṣa tad adhigama niyamaḥ iti kathayitum ucitam āloka locana ādi kāraka antara janita tvasya api bhāvena tad viṣaya tva prasaṅgāt atas nīla ākāra taiva nīla viṣaya tva vyavasthā hetuḥ na nimitta antaram āha ca tatra anubhava mātreṇa jñānasya sadṛśa ātmanaḥ bhāvyate anātmanā yena pratikarma vibhajyate iti jñānasya eva pramāṇa tvam phala tvam ca 
NM_9,2.430.234	 atas eva ākāra grahaṇam eva atiśayam āśritya tam abartha samarthane sati sādhakatamam jñānam eva pramāṇam bhaviṣyati aparathā kāraka atiśaya darśana abhau= etat tad sādhakatama tvasya durupapāda tvāt sa ākāra jñāna sākṣī ca laukikaḥ apidṛśyate vyavahāraḥ evam ca vaktāraḥ bhavanti laukikāḥ nīlaḥ arthaḥ ayam yatas atra tat ākāram jñānam utpannam iti tena pratikarma niyamāni atha anupapatteḥ avaśyam sa ākāram eva jñānam ittham sati api bāhye arthe jñānasya ākāra kalpanā bhavet eva iti tatra eva santuṣya sthīyatām varam vijñāna vādina sauṃtra antika khaṇḍanam 
NM_9,2.430.235–9,2.430.236	 ye tu bruvante jñānasya svatas svaccha tva bhāva tvena nīla pīta ādi avabhāsaḥ para upādhiḥ eva bhavitum arhati sphaṭikasya iva lākṣā ādinā aruṇim a ādi anuvedhaḥ atas pṛthak ananubhūyamānaḥ api bāhyaḥ arthaḥ sa ākāra jñāna avabhāsā anyathā anupapattyā anumīyate yathokatam bāhya siddhiḥ syāt vyatirekataḥ iti tat idam anupapannam anvaya anupalabdheḥ arthe hi sati sa ākāram nirākāram tat atyaye nitya anumeya bāhya artha vādī jñānam kva dṛṣṭavān 
NM_9,2.430.237–9,2.430.238	 lākṣā sphaṭika ādau tu tathā yuktam tad anurakta sphaṭika śakala avalokanāt iha punar arthena rajyamānam hi nirākāram nisargataḥ jñānam na khalu paśyāmaḥ lākṣayā sphaṭikam yathā ākāra dvayam tu anubhava viruddham ākāra dvaya pratibhāsaḥ hi na asti iti uktam abhyupagame vā su dustaram anavasthā dūṣaṇam artha ākāraḥ ca pratyakṣaḥ tad kṛtaḥ ca jñāna ākāraḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti ucyamāne artha ākāraḥ tāvat sa ākāreṇa jñānena gṛhītaḥ saḥ idānīṃjñāna ākāraḥ api grāhya tvāt sa ākāra jñāna antaram bhavet tat api sākāraṃjñāna antaram tathābhūta jñāna antara grāhyam eva syāt iti aniṣṭam 
NM_9,2.430.239–9,2.430.240	 atha sva prakāśam tat sa ākāram jñānam iṣyate tena jñāna antara anapekṣaṇāt na anavasthā iti tarhi sva prakāśa sa ākāra jñāna vyatirikta artha ākāra anavabhāsāt tat eva astu kutas dvitīyaḥ idānīm artha ākāraḥ viṣaya mithyā tve api jñānasya ākāra saṃbhavaḥ na ca anyathā anupapattyā api tad kalpanā yuktimatī na hi rāja śāsanam idam arthena ākāravatā bhavitavyam iti jñānam eva nīla ādi ākāram yat ibhavet kaḥ doṣaḥ syāt iti nīla ādi ākāra yogāt arthaḥ sa bhavet iti ced saṃjñāyām vivādaḥ iti uktam dvitīyasya abhāvāt svaccha tvāt jñānasya kāluṣyam anya kṛtam yuktam iti ced avidyā vāsanā akṛtam tat bhaviṣyati svatas su accham api jñānam anādya vidyā vāsanā vibhava upanatam aneka ākāra kāluṣya rūṣita vapuḥ iva prakāśate 
NM_9,2.430.241–9,2.430.242	 jñāna vāsanā bheda santānayoḥ ca bīja aṅkura vat anādi tvāt na atra paryanuyogasya avasaraḥ kutas vāsanā pravṛttāḥ iti tasmāt anādi vāsanā vaicitrya racita jñāna vaicitrya upapatteḥ kṛtam anumeyena api bāhyena arthena iti jñānasya eva ayam ākāraḥ iti siddham jñāna atirikta artha nirākaraṇam atas ca jñānasya eva ayam ākāraḥ jñānena vinā hi na kvacid artha rūpam upalabhyate jñānam tu artha rahitam api gandharvanagara māyā ādiṣu vispaṣṭam upalabhyate iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām api jñāna ākāra tvam avagacchāmaḥ yadi ca jñānāt arthaḥ pṛthak avasthita ātmā bhavet jñānam antareṇa api asau= upalabhyeta naca evam asti tasmāt abhedaḥ eva jñāna arthayoḥ yat āha saha upalambha aniyamāt abhedaḥ nīla tad dhiyoḥ iti ākārasya jñāna artha melana kṛta tva nirāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.243	 na ca jñāna artha saṃsarga dharmaḥ ākāraḥ bhavitum arhati yadi hi pṛthak artham anākāram pṛthak ca jñāna māna ākāraḥ upalabhya saṃsṛṣṭayoḥ jñānayoḥ ākāra vat tām upalabhemahi tatas imam ākāram saṃsarga dharmam pratipadyemahi na tu ayam astikramaḥ artha rahita tve api ca smaraṇa svapna ādi jñānānām ākāravat tvam asti iti uktam atas katham saṃsarga dharmaḥ ākāraḥ artha ākārāṇām kalpita tvam āvaśyakam 
NM_9,2.430.244–9,2.430.249	 api ca nakṣatram tārakā tiṣyaḥ iti katham ekasmin= arthe paraspara viruddha liṅga samāveśaḥ  parivrājaka kāmuka kauleyakānām ca katham ekaḥ eva vanitā rūpaḥ arthaḥ kuṇapā eti kāminī iti bhakṣyam iti ca pratibhāsa tritaya viṣaya tām anubhavet  dārāḥ iti katham ekā eva strī vyaktiḥ puṃvacana bahu vacana viṣaya tāṃyāyāt  ṣaṇṇagariti ca katham bahanām anya liṅgānām ekatā strī liṅga tā cabhavet  hrasva dīrghayoḥ ca katham paraspara apekṣa grahaṇayoḥ arthena ekataraḥ ākāraḥ pāramārthikaḥ syāt  jñānānām tu bhinna tvāt vicitra vāsanābheda sahakāri rūpa anuvidhānena jāyamānānām na kiṃcid api virodhaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.250	 tasmāt jñānam eva idam sarvatra tathā tathā pratibhāti na tat vyatiriktaḥ arthaḥ nāma kiṃcid iti jñānaḥ eva ca ekatra ayam pramāṇa prameya pramiti vyavahāraḥ parisamāpyate tasya hi viṣaya ākāra tā prameyam grāhaka ākāra tā prāmāṇam sva saṃvittiḥ ca phalam iti yathā uktam yadābhāsam prameyam tat pramāṇa phalate punar grāhaka ākāra saṃvittyoḥ trayam na atas pṛthak kṛtam iti 
NM_9,2.430.251–9,2.430.253	 tat idam anādya vidyā vāsanā vilāsa viparyāsita tattva darśana tayā jñānam eva grāhya grāhaka saṃvitti bheda vat iva lakṣyate avidyā viratau tu svaccham eva tad saṃpadyate na kiṃcid vā iti tat uktam na anyaḥ anubhāvyaḥ buddhyā asti tasyāḥ na anubhavaḥ aparaḥ grāhya grāhaka vaidhuryāt svayam sā eva prakāśate tathā avibhāgaḥ api buddhi ātmā viparyāsita darśanaiḥ grāhya grāhaka saṃvitti bhedavān iva lakṣyate iti artha rūpa rahitam saṃvid mātram kila idam iti paśyan parihṛtya duḥkha santatim abhayam nirvāṇam āpnoti vijñāna advaita nirāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.254	 atra abhidhīyate na khalu ekaḥ eva bodha ātmā grāhya grāha katayā ubhaya svabhāvaḥ bhavitum arhati grāhya grāhaka rūpayoḥ ita retara vi sadṛśa tvena ekatra samāveśa anupapatteḥ tathā hi nīla jñānam pīta jñānam śukla jñānam iti nīla pīta ādi upajanana apāye api anuvartamāna bodha rūpa tayā nīla ādi vilakṣaṇam anvaya vyatirekābhyām avadhāryate 
NM_9,2.430.255–9,2.430.257	 api ca jñānam ahaṃkāra āspadam ānanda ādi svabhāvam sva karmaṇi casa vyāpāram iva bhavadbhiḥ abhyupagatam arthaḥ tu na evam ātmakaḥ iti katham anayoḥ abhedaḥ pratīyamānaḥ ākāraḥ arthasya eva yadi api jñānam idam ayam arthaḥ iti evam ākāra dvaya pratibhāsaḥ na asti tathā api ayam ekaḥ api ākāraḥ pratibhāsamānaḥ prakāśya eva pratibhāti na prakāśakaḥ idam nīlam iti grāhakāt vicchinnaḥ eva grāhya ākāraḥ avabhāsate na tu aham nīlam iti tad aikyena avabhāsaḥ asti iti api ca prakāśyasya nīla ādeḥ prakāśaka bodha adhīnam yuktam nāma grahaṇam bodhasya tu tad grāhakasya tadā kiṃkṛtam grahaṇam iti cintyam na bodha antara nibandhanam anavasthā prasaṅgāt na api sva prakāśam jñānam ahaṃnīlam iti apratibhāsāt arthasya prakāśa saṃbhava ākṣepaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.258	 nanu ! na eva grāhya grāhakayoḥ anyatvam iti yaḥ ayam grāhya avabhāsaḥ itibhavatā abhyupagataḥ saḥ eva grāhaka avabhāsaḥ grāhakāt anyaḥ ahi grāhyaḥ jaḍa ātmā bhavet grāhakaḥ tu prakāśa svabhāvaḥ grāhaka tvāt eva dvaya pratibhāsaḥ ca na asti iti uktam tatra anyatarasya pratibhāsane jaḍa prakāśayoḥ katarasya avabhāsitum yuktam iti cintāyām balāt prakāśaḥ eva prakāśate najaḍaḥ nirākāraḥ ca na prakāśaḥ prakāśate iti tasmin sa ākāre prakāśyamāne kutas jaḍa ātmā tat atiriktaḥ arthaḥ syāt artha prakāśe jñāna prakāśa asaṃbhava pradarśanam 
NM_9,2.430.259	 tat idam apeśalam upāyena upeya nihnavasya aśakya karaṇīya tvāt rūpasyahi prakāśakam cakṣuḥ na cakṣuḥ eva prakāśa tām iti uktvā rūpam apahnā utuṃśakyate tat idam arthasya mūrti drava tva kāṭhinī ādi dharma viśeṣita ātmanaḥ tad viparīta svaccha svabhāvam jñānam prakāśakam na tat eva cakṣuḥ vat tadā avabhāsitum arhati ca jñāna anavabhāse api artha prakāśa saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.260	 nanu ! cakṣuḥ vat upāya tvam jñānasya prakāśa svabhāva tvāt cakṣuḥ janyaḥ hi prakāśaḥ nāma jñānam ucyate na ca agṛhītaḥ prakāśaḥ prakāśyaṃprakāśayati iti satyam vakṣuḥ janyaḥ prakāśaḥ jñānam iṣyate sa tu prakāśaḥ rūpa ādi viṣaya prakāśaḥ na prakāśa prakāśaḥ na hi cakṣuṣā prakāśaḥ prakāśyate api tu rūpam prakāśyate tatra yat rūpam ucyate sa viṣayaḥ grāhyaḥ yat tat prakāśate iti ucyate sa prakāśaḥ jñānam grāhakam tad utpatti mātreṇa ca rūpam prakāśitam bhavati iti na prakāśaḥ grahaṇam apekṣate jñāna prakāśe bāhya viṣaya anavabhāsa prasaṅgaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.261–9,2.430.263	 nanu ! uktam atra na anupalabdhāyām buddhau= arthaḥ prakāśate apratyakṣa upalambhasya na artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati iti tat ayuktam apratyakṣa upalambhasya ca pratyuta artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasiddhyati upalambha utpādaḥ eva artha dṛṣṭiḥ na punar upalambha dṛṣṭiḥ nanu ! upalabdheḥ agrahaṇe tad utpāda nutpādayoḥ aviśeṣāt anutpanna upalambhasya api arthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ syāt iti sarva sarvajña tva prasaṅgaḥ tat idam ati subhāṣitam artha prakāśa ātmā eva khalu upalambhaḥ sa katham utpannāt anutpannaḥ na viśiṣyeta tasmāt artha pratyakṣīkaraṇa ātmaka tvāt jñānasya tad utpādaā iva artha pratyakṣa tā na tat grahaṇam iti agṛhītam eva jñānam artha prakāśakam iti yuktam am jñāna agrahaṇaḥ eva artha grahaṇam 
NM_9,2.430.264	 yat tu upāya tvāt jñānasya pūrvam grahaṇam ucyate tat cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ anaikāntikam iti uktam gṛhītam yadi ca jñānam bhavet artha prakāśakam dhūma vat dīpa vat vā iti vaktavyam yadi dhūma vat bhavet artha anumeya tvam tattvayā eva ca dūṣitam ākāra dvaya saṃvitti virahāt na ca dīpa vat ghaṭam dīpena paśyāmi iti asti dvitaya vedanam na tu jñānena vijñeyam jānāmi iti dvaya grahaḥ sva prakāvaḥ tu asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.265–9,2.430.266	 yat api prakāśa tvāt jñānasya pradīpa vat pūrvam grahaṇam uktam tat api vyākhyeyam prakāśa tvāt iti kaḥ arthaḥ prakāśayati iti prakāśaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ prakāśa tvam iti tat cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ anaikāntikam uktam eva atha prakāśanam prakāśaḥ tarhi prakāśa tvāt iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ na hi artha grahaṇa kāle buddheḥ prakāśanam asti 
NM_9,2.430.267–9,2.430.268	 atha prakāśa śabdaḥ bodha paryāyaḥ eva prakāśa tvāt bodha rūpa tvāt iti arthaḥ tadā sādhana vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ pradīpasya bodha rūpa tva abhāvāt atas ca sva saṃvedana pakṣaḥ na yukti yuktaḥ svatas prakāśasya kasyacid api adṛṣṭa tvāt sva prakāśa padārtha svarūpam nanu ! jñāna śabda dīpāḥ trayaḥ sva para prakāśāḥ iti āhuḥ tat ayuktam śabda dīpayoḥ sva grahaṇe artha prakāśane ca sāmagryanta rasa vyapekṣa tvāt śabdaḥ artha prakāśane samaya grahaṇam apekṣate sva prakāśane tu śrotram dīpaḥ api cakṣuḥ ādi apekṣaḥ eva gṛhyate grāhayati ca artham 
NM_9,2.430.269–9,2.430.270	 iyān= tu viśeṣaḥ ghaṭa ādi grahaṇe āloka sāpekṣam cakṣuḥ pravartate āloka grahaṇe tu nirapekṣam iti na etāvatā dīpasya sva prakāśa tā syāt ittham ca mārjāra ādi naktaṃcara cakṣuḥ apekṣayā sarve eva ghaṭa ādayaḥ sva prakāśāḥ syuḥ jñānasya para prakāśaka tvam eva dṛśyate na sva prakāśaka tvam artha prakāśa kāle tad aprakāśasya darśita tvāt mudhā eva nasmāt bhaṇitaḥ te etetrayaḥ prakāśāḥ sva para prakāśāḥ pradīpa bodha dhvani nāmadheyāḥ vibhinna sāmagrī abhivedya vedakāḥ 
NM_9,2.430.271–9,2.430.272	 ātma pratyakṣa vādinām tu avasthā bhedena grāhya grāhaka aṃśayoḥ bhedaḥ vidyataeva iti sarvathā na sva prakāśam jñānam artha grahaṇa velāyām na jñāna grahaṇa saṃbhavaḥ yat api abhihitam utpadyamānam eva jñānam anapekṣa tvāt apratibandha tvāt catadā eva gṛhyate na vā kadācid iti tat api asāṃpratam tadānīm tad grahaṇa sāmagrya bhāvāt na ca avibandha mātreṇa pratītiḥ avakalpate upāya viraheṇa api tadā jñānasya na grahaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.273–9,2.430.275	 na ca jaiminīyāḥ iva vayam jñānam nitya parokṣam ācakṣmahe jñātaḥ mayā ayam arthaḥ iti kāla antare tad viśiṣṭa artha grahaṇa darśanāt śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti jñāne yathā asau bhāti tad guṇaḥ tathā jñātaḥ arthaḥ iti atra bhāti arthaḥ dhī viśeṣaṇaḥ na viśeṣye ca saṃvittiḥ agṛhīta viśeṣaṇā na anusāyadhiyam vā ittham pratīyeta krama agrahāt na ca nitya parokṣā buddhiḥ anumātum api na śakyate iti ca vicāritam eva tat alam anayā kathayā kim iti śākya sutsṛjya śrotriyam idānīm anuyuṃjmahe jñāna agrahaṇe api viṣaya grahaṇam 
NM_9,2.430.276	 atas ca yat uktam jñāna pṛṣṭha avamarśa darśanāt jñāna grahaṇa pūrvakam artha grahaṇam iti tat na sārvatrikam api tu kvacid eva jñāna viśiṣṭa artha saṃvedanāt tathā abhyupagamyate tasmāt artha grahaṇāt pūrvam jñānasya anavabhāsāt nirākāra avasāya virahāt ca jñānasya eva ayam ākāraḥ iti kadāśā pralapitam etat aruṇa ambarāṇām arthasya kalpanīya tvam na 
NM_9,2.430.277–9,2.430.278	 yat punar abhyadhāyi jñāna ākāra pakṣe kalpanā alpīyasi iti tatra yathā ukta nītyā pratyakṣa gamye bāhye grāhye artha ākāre kalpanā uktiḥ kīdṛśī kīdṛśaṃvā tat alpa tvam mahat tvam vā iti artha apalāpe jñānasya api apalāpaḥ syāt ubhaya siddha tvam api yat avādi jñānasya tatra yadi pramāṇa āyattā vastu sthitiḥ arthaḥ api ubhaya siddhaḥ eva icchā dveṣa nibandhanāyām tu vastu sthita aujñānam api katham ubhaya siddham syāt iti yat kiṃcid etat jñāna ākāram antarā api pratikarma vyavasthā siddhiḥ 
NM_9,2.430.279–9,2.430.280	 yat punar idam abhihitam abhyupagamya api bāhyam artham apratyākhyeyaḥ pratikarma vyavasthā siddhaye jñānasya ākāra yogaḥ iti tat api na sāṃpratam pratikarma vyavasthāyāḥ prakāra antareṇa api upapatteḥ yadi api aneka sannidhāne nīla jñānam upajāyate yadi api ca bodha svarūpa tvam aśeṣa sādhāraṇam tathā api nīlena eva karma kārakeṇa tad upajanita miti nīla niṣṭham eva avatiṣṭhate cakṣuḥ ādinā api tat janitam iti ced sati aṃjanitam na tu karmaṇā satā nīlena tu karma bhūtena tat utpādyate ititad eka viṣayam eva bhavati kutas eṣa niyamaḥ iti ced vastu svabhāva kṛta ā iva ākāra pakṣe api samānaḥ ayam paryanuyogaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.281–9,2.430.283	 yat ucyate kim iti nīlam eva karma kārakam kim iti vā karma viṣayam eva jñānam iti tatra vastu svabhāvaiḥ uttaram vācyam ākāram api ca jñānam upādadānam karmakārakasya eva katham upādadīta nakāraka antarasya iti atra api vastu svabhāvaḥ eva śaraṇam iti jñānam prati viṣayasya kāraṇa tvam arthasya ca jñāna janaka tvam anvaya vyatirekābhyām avagamyate yadā hi devadatta arthī kaścid vrajati tad gṛham tatra asat nihitam ca enam gatvā api na sa paśyati kṣaṇa antare saḥ āyāntam devadattam nirīkṣate tatra tad sat asattvena tathātvam vetti tat dhiyaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.284–9,2.430.285	 anāgate devadatte na deva datta jñānam udapādi tasmin= āgate ca tat utpannam iti tad bhāva bhāvi tvāt tat janyam tat avasīyate ittham ca tad janya tvena evatatra niyama siddheḥ alam ākāra kalpanayā etena puruṣa pravṛttiḥ api niyata viṣayā vyākhyātāḥ sādhakatama tvam tusāmagryāḥ pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇe nirṇītam eva 
NM_9,2.430.286–9,2.430.288	 yaḥ tu lokikaḥ vyapadeśaḥ udāhṛtaḥ saḥ api vyabhicarati nīlaḥ arthaḥ ayam yatas tat viṣayam jñānam utpannam iti api na vyapadiśanti laukikāḥ tasmāt arthe sati api sa ākāram jñānam eṣitavyam iti yat uktam tad anupapannam saha upalaṃbhāt na jñāna arthayoḥ abhedaḥ yat api avarṇi saha upalaṃbha niyamāt abhedaḥ nīla tad dhiyoḥ iti tat api bāla bhāṣitam iva naḥ pratibhāti abhede saha artha anupapatteḥ 
NM_9,2.430.289–9,2.430.290	 atha eka upalaṃbha niyamāt iti hetu arthaḥ vivakṣitaḥ tat ayam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ nīla ādi grāhya grahaṇa samaye tad grāhaka an upalambhāt grāhaka ākāra anuvedha rahita tad vicchinna bāhya grāhya mātra pratibhāsaḥ eva ayam nīlam idam iti ādiḥ darśitaḥ saha upalaṃbhaḥ api asiddhaḥ kvacid ca grāhya ākāra anuparśliṣṭa kevala grāhaka avamarśanam arpi dṛśyate na smarāmi mayā kaḥ api gṛhītaḥ arthaḥ tadā iti tat evam itaretara vibhakta jñāna artha ākāra saṃvedanāt katham eka upalambha niyamāt abhedaḥ nīla tad dhiyoḥ 
NM_9,2.430.291–9,2.430.293	 iti ucyate nīla tad dhiyoḥ iti vadatā bhavatā aṣi eṣa bhedaḥ eva nirdiśyate para ma tā anuvāda mātram etat iti ced na abhede pṛthak nirdeśasya api aghaṭamāna tvāt tasmāt api na jñānasya ayam ākāraḥ jñāna arthayoḥ bhedaḥ anubhava siddhaḥ yat api uktam asatī api bāhye arthe svapna gandharvanagara māyā ādiṣu jñānasya ākāravat tā dṛśyate iti tasya eva ayam ākāraḥ yuktaḥ iti tat api durāśā mātram sarvatra jñānāt vicchinnasva grāhya ākārasya pratibhāsanāt 
NM_9,2.430.294–9,2.430.296	 tathā hi bhrama jñāneṣu catuṣṭayī gatiḥ ātma khyātiḥ asat khyātiḥ akhyātiḥ viparīta khyātiḥ vā tatra rajatam idam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena eka artha pratibhāsāt tad mateca saṃvitteḥ aparokṣa tvāt rajata adhigama abhimānena tad arthinaḥ tatra pravṛtteḥ bādhaka pratyayasya tathāvidha bodha niṣedha paratvena prādurbhāvāt na tāvat akhyātiḥ iti prāk eva prāsādhitam etat asat khyāti nirāsaḥ asat khyātiḥ api na asti ekānta asataḥ sva puṣpa ādeḥ pratibhāsā yogāt deśa kāla vyavahita anubhūta pūrva padārtha viṣayaḥ eva bhrāntaḥ api pratyayaḥ prāṇabhṛta aṃbhavati na tu atyanta asad artha viṣayaḥ sarveṣām bhramāṇām sa ālambana tvam 
NM_9,2.430.297	 tathā hi dvividhā bhrāntiḥ bāhya indriya jāḥ mānasī ca tatra bāhya indriya je bhrama jñāne viṣaya doṣāt indriya doṣāt vā samutpadyamāne nakvacid nirālambanatā dṛśyate bhāsvara rūpa sādṛśyena hi viṣaya doṣeṇa śuktikāḥ rajatam iti parisphurati maru sthalī patita utphalitam ca sāvitram tejaḥ tarala taraṅga sārūpyeṇa payaḥ iti cakāsti indriya doṣāt api pitta upahata rasanasya tikta tayā śarkarā avabhāsate timira sīmantita nayana vṛtteḥ candra maṇḍalam ekam api dvidhā pratibhāti timira kaṇa nikara vivara viracita prasṛtāḥ ca nayana raśmayaḥ eva sūrya āśu saṃvalitāḥ santaḥ sūkṣma tayā keśa kūrcaka ākārāḥ pratibhānti iti mānasa vibhramāṇām api sa ālambana tvam antaḥkaraṇa doṣeṇa vibhramaḥ yaḥ tu jāyate asati api mahelā ādau puṣpeṣu muṣita ātmanām 
NM_9,2.430.298–9,2.430.300	 saḥ api kaścid viṣaya doṣa sahāyaḥ bhavati sa ca ālambanaā iva tasyāḥ pāṇiḥ iti jñānam yathā bhavati kutracid komala anila kallola vellite bāla pallave anapekṣita tad tulya padārthasya eva yā punar mānasī manmatha unmāda mahimnā māninī matiḥ tasyām api rāga ādi vāsanā bala upaplavamāna smṛti upasthāpita deśa kāla vyavahita upalabdha purandhrī rūpa ādi samullekhaḥ na tu ekāntāsataḥ khara viṣāṇa ādeḥ iva pratibhā nidrā ādi manaḥ doṣa janmani svapne api dṛṣṭa pūrvasya eva tasya ākārasya ullekhaḥ jāla jvalā gaḍa t vahni drava dravya ādi darśane rūpam anya stham anyatra vetti na tu asat eva tat tat evam bhrānti bodheṣu na asti atyanta asa tām prathā deśa kālānyathātvam tu kevalam bhāti vastunaḥ asat khyāti vāde viśeṣaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.301	 nanu ! tatra asataḥ arthasya pratibhāse deśa antara ādiṣu sattvam kva upayujyate deśa antare hi san asan vā tatra tāvat na asti eva saḥ arthaḥ na ca dvayoḥ asattvayoḥ kiṃcid viśeṣaḥ deśa kālau= api kim santā vasantau vā pratibhāseta iiti vikalpanāyām tathā tayoḥ api tulyaḥ doṣaḥ mā evam bhavataḥ api asat khyāti vādinaḥ kim sarvatra eva tad artha asattvam saṃmatam uta tad deśaḥ eva tatra asannidhāna mātreṇa tāvat kaḥ iva tava sva arthaḥ sarvatrāsataḥ tu pratibhāsekutastyaḥ eṣa niyamaḥ yat asattva aviśeṣe api rajata ādi eva asat pratibhāti na khara viṣāṇa ādi iti 
NM_9,2.430.302–9,2.430.303	 ayam tu dvayoḥ asattvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ deśa antara ādiṣu sataḥ arthasya smaraṇa ādi upāroheṇa pratibhāsamāna tā yujyate na tu ekānta asate iti evam deśa kālayoḥ api sat asattva vikalpa codyam parihartavyam atas ca kiṃcid api na atyanta asad artha grāhi jñānam asti iti kim dṛṣṭānta balena sarvatra artha śūnyatā kalpyeta tasmāt na asat khyātiḥ ātma khyāti nirāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.304–9,2.430.306	 ātma khyāteḥ tu nirākaraṇāya saḥ ayam iyān kaliḥ vartate tatra ca bahuśas kathitam grāhakāt vicchinnam eva grāhyam avabhāsate nīlam idam iti na tu tat abhedena nīlam aham iti bhrānti jñāneṣu tad artha asannidhānāt bhānta tvam astu na ātma tattva grahaṇam iti yat ca ucyate yad antar jñeya rūpam tat bahis vadavabhāsate iti sā iyam viparīta khyātiḥ eva aṅgīkṛtā syāt tat varam sā eva tapasvinī sādhīyasī arthasya jñāna rūpa tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.307	 atha kathyate grahakāt satyam vicchinnam grāhyam tat tu jñāna rūpam eva iti tatra vicchinnam iti priyam āveditam jñāna tve tu tasya kā yuktiḥ na ca jñānayoḥ yugapad utpannayoḥ krama bhāvinoḥ vā grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ upapadyate yaugapadye savya itara go viṣāṇa vat grāhya grāhaka niyama abhāvāt krama pakṣe api pūrvam uttarasya grāhakam ced tad utpatti tad grahaṇa kāla pratīkṣaṇāt kṣaṇika tām jahyāt uttaram api yadi pūrvasya grāhakam tadā api sā eva vārtā tāvat kālam avasthitim antareṇa tat grāhya tā anupapatteḥ na ca jñāna tvam nāma sāmānyam grāhya grāhakayoḥ anugatam go tvam iva śābaleya ādau vibhāti atas vicchinnaḥ ced grāhakāt grāhya aṃśaḥ saḥ arthaḥ eva bhavet iti na jñānasya ayam ākāraḥ ākārasya saṃsarga dharma tva abhāvaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.308–9,2.430.309	 yat tu saṃsarga dharmaḥ ākāraḥ na bhavati iti bhāṣitam tat yuktam eva na kuṇḍa dadhi vat kaścid saṃsargaḥ asti artha bodhayoḥ tad kṛta ākāravattā vā prāganākārayoḥ tayoḥ tat evam śākya ukta yukti śakala daurbalyāt sarvatra viccheda pratibhāsāt jñānasya sdataḥ vaivitrya anupapatteḥ arthasya eva ayam ākāraḥ iti siddham ekasmin= arthe na viruddha ākāra ullekhaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.310	 yat tu artha ākāra pakṣe coditam ekatra arthe nakṣatram tārakā tiṣya eti paraspara virūddha ākāra samāveśaḥ na yuktaḥ iti tatra ucyate anupapannam iti naḥ kva saṃpratyayaḥ yat na pramāṇena avagatam viruddham api tad avabuddhyāmahe yat ekatra niviśamānam na paśyāmaḥ tat iha yadi abādhitena jñānena vispaṣṭam ākāra trayam ekatra gṛhyate tat katham anupapannam syāt katham vā aviruddham iti nānā ākāreṣu anyatamasya kalpita tva saṃbhavaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.311	 atha ekam samyak pramāṇa pariniścita rūpam itarat kālpanikam iti pratīyate tat evam astu kaḥ dīṣaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ca citra ādau= aneka varṇa samāveśaḥ naca ekatra virodham avirodham vā dṛṣṭavā sarvatra tad kalpanam ucitam abādhita avagati nibandhanāḥ hi vastu sthitayaḥ bhavanti na kalpanā nirmitāḥ śabda sādhu tvam vyākaraṇa adhīnam api vā vastu tāt rūpya sada sattā anapekṣayā śabda prayoga sādhu tvam anvākhyāyeta kevalam 
NM_9,2.430.312	 dārāḥ iti na ekasyāḥ strī vyakteḥ puṃstvaṃhuvam tva vā vidyate śabdaḥ tu eṣa tatra prayujyamānaḥ sādhuḥ bhavati na artha asaṃsparśitā ca asya tāvatā vyavatiṣṭhate yathā etat ātmakam vastu tathā śaknoti bhāṣitum sarvasya vastunaḥ aneka rūpa svamparivrāj prabhṛtīnām ca kuṇapa ādi pratītayaḥ arthasya aneka śakti tvāt na avahanti artha śūnyatām kim na bhakṣayitum śakyā nārī kauleyakena sā kim vā na śamayati eṣā kāminaḥ madana jvaram śavāt vā kena rūpeṇa sā viśiṣyeta yoginaḥ dhī trayam tu na sarveṣām abhāvāt sahakāriṇaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.313–9,2.430.314	 prati prāṇi niyata anekavidha vāsanā bheda sahakāri sāpekṣaḥ hi tasyatasya jñānasya ātma lābhaḥ iti na sarveṣām sarva sārūpyeṇa jñānam arthānām vāsanā kalpita tva asaṃbhavaḥ yadi evam vāsanā bhedaḥ eva vividha pratibhā udbhava hetuḥ bhavati kim artha kalpanayā ayi sādho ! kim adya api na pariharasau su ciram guṇitāṃkalpanā vācaḥ yuktim na hi arthaḥ kalpyate api tu pratibhāsate eva bahu rūpasya tu tasya ekatama rūpa pariccheda niyame kim arpi vāsanā ādi kāraṇaṃkvacid kalpyate kaḥ tāvatā artha nihnavasya avasaraḥ vāsanāyāḥ durnirūpa tvam 
NM_9,2.430.315	 yat ca uktam vāsanā bhedaḥ eva jñāna vaicitrya kāraṇam itaretara kārya kāraṇa bhāva prabandhaḥ ca bīja aṅkura vat anādiḥ jñānayāsanayoḥ iti tat api aghaṭamānam kā iyam vāsanā nāma jñānāt avyatiktā ced sā api svaccha rūpa tvāt na jñāna kāluṣya kāraṇam bhavet jñāna vyatirikta ācedvāsanā tad vaicitrya hetuḥ ca saḥ arthaḥ eva paryāya antareṇa uktaḥ syāt vāsanāyāssaṃska ākāra rūpa tvam 
NM_9,2.430.316–9,2.430.317	 api ca vāsanā nāma viṣaya anubhava samāhitaḥ saṃskāraḥ iti lokeprasiddhiḥ saṃskāraḥ ca yat anubhava ghaṭitaḥ tatra eva kvacid avasare smaraṇam upajanayati na punar asadeva vaicitryam idam īdṛśam āvahati kiṃca bhikṣu pakṣe kṣaṇika tvena jñānānām grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ iva vāsya vāsaka bhāvaḥ api nirākartavyaḥ sthāyinaḥ hi bhāvāḥ tila ādayaḥ sthāyibhiḥ eva campaka ādibhiḥ vāsyante na tu utpadya sapadyeva vinaśyadbhiḥ jñānaiḥ tādṛṃśyā iva jñānāni iti niranvaya vināśāt ca na tad aṃśaḥ anuvartate yatas kathaścid vāsyeta pūrveṇa jñānam uttaram vāsanā vāde avyavasthāpattiḥ 
NM_9,2.430.318–9,2.430.320	 api ca ekatra devadatta santāne vāsanātaḥ sahasrāṇi jñāna vaicitrya kārīṇi bhaveyuḥ na hi go vāsanātas hasti jñānam udeti ananta tve api khalu āsām ārambhe niyamaḥ kutas asamaṃjasa kāri tve vyavahārasya viplavaḥ dhūma jñāna samutpāde dhūma vāsanayā kṛte kim tadā na jala jñānam janayet jala vāsanā vāsanāḥ ca vāsanā santānārambha hetavaḥ eva bhaveyuḥ na punar anubhava jñānam ādhātum udyaccheyuḥ sadṛśāt sadṛśa utpattiḥ iti hi bhavatāṃdarśanam vāsanāyāḥ āśraya anupapattiḥ api ca na nirādhārāḥ vāsanāḥ āsate na ca bhavat pakṣe tad ādhāraḥ kaścana saṃbhavati bhaṅgura tvena jñānasya tadāśraya tva anupapatteḥ eka jñāna āśrita tve sarvāsām vāsanānām tad vināśe nāśaḥ syāt prativāsanam āśraya abhede tad ānantyena aniyamaḥ ca śata śākhaḥ ālayavijñāna pravṛtti vijñāna bheda nirāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.321	 na ca ālayavijñānam nāma kiṃcid asti sati api tasmin= aśeṣa vāsanā sahasra samāśraye tad kṣaṇika tvāt sakṛt eva tathāvidha vāsanā kusūla jñāna vināśaḥ syāt punar utpāde api katham tathāvidham jñānam eva samutpādyeta te tugava aśvādi jñāna krama niyamaḥ bhavet iti sarvathā saṅkaṭaḥ ayam panthāḥ tasmāt mṛgatṛṣṇikā eṣā tapasvinām vāsanātaḥ eva lokayātrā liddheḥ kiṃbāhyena arthena iti kṛtam ati vācāla tayā ciram api nipuṇaiḥ nirūpyamāṇaḥ atas arthasya eva na buddheḥ sidhyati nīla ādiḥ ākāraḥ ekaḥ ca bodhaḥ pramiti pramāṇa prameya rūpāṇi katham bibharti bhinnam pramāṇāt phalam abhyadhāyi pranyakṣa cintā vasare purastāt śūnya vādibhiḥ avayava atirikta avaya vi khaṇḍanam 
NM_9,2.430.322	 ye tu bruvate tiṣṭhatu tāvat pramāṇa mārgam iti prameyam eva vikalpayantaḥ na brāhmam artham kaṃcana nirapavādam pratipadyāmahe tathā hi na tāvat ayaṃavayavī ghaṭa ādiḥ avakalpate avayava vyatirekeṇa avayavinaḥ anupalambhāt yaḥ hiyasmāt vyatiriktaḥ saḥ tad adhiṣṭhita deśa vyatirikta deśa adhiṣṭhānaḥ upalabhyate ghaṭadiva paṭaḥ na ca evam avayavebhyaḥ pṛthak deśaḥ dṛśyate avayavī tad agrahaṇeca tat budhya bhāvāt ghaṭāgrahaṇe api paṭaḥ gṛhyate na tu avayava anupalabdhau= avayavī iti katham sa tebhyaḥ bhidyeta sarva avayavaiḥ na indriya sannikarṣaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.323–9,2.430.324	 avayava grahaṇa anupapatteḥ ca na hi sarve tad avayavāḥ śakyante grahītuṃmarvāc bhāga vartinaḥ eva gṛhyeran na madhya para bhāga gatāḥ iti budhyāḥ vibhajyamāne ca anupalambhāt yadā hi paṭam pāṇau nidhāya budhyā vivinākti eṣa tantuḥ eṣa tantuḥ iti tadā prācyādaṃcalāt prabhṛti praticīnam aṃcalam yāvat viviṃcayan= asau tantu santatim eva kevalām upalabhate natataḥ atiriktam paṭa a= ayavinam avayinaḥ vṛtti anupapattiḥ 
NM_9,2.430.325	 vṛtti anupapatteḥ ca na ekatra avayave kārtsnyena avayavī vartate tad anyeṣu avṛtti prasaṅgāt na eka deśena vartate su a ārambha avayava vyatirikta deśa abhāvāt abhyupagame vā anavasthā prasaṅgāt yaiḥ api eka deśaiḥ avayaveṣu asauvartate teṣu api katham vartate anyaiḥ eka deśaiḥ teṣu api anyaiḥ iti na asti antar asaṃbaddhaḥ tu eka deśaiḥ avayavī iti katham tad vāreṇa su a ārambhakaiḥ api saṃbadhyeta tasmāt abhayi apinā asya vṛttiḥ avayaveṣu iti dhāraṇa ākarṣaṇa ādikam na avayavinaḥ kintu saṃdhātasya eva 
NM_9,2.430.326	 dhāraṇa ākarṣaṇa ādi tu anārabdha kārye kāṣṭhamūlaka kārpāsa ādau= api dṛśyataiti anaikāntikam eka ākārātu pratīti vikalpa mātram eka deśa avasthāna ādi nimittam āśritya kari turaga padāti prabhṛtiṣu iva senā iti dhava khadira palāśa ādiṣu iva vanam iti saṃciteṣu abhava yaveṣu eva ghaṭhaḥ ityādi buddhiḥ bhaviṣyati iti eva avayava avayava paryālocanayā aṇu saṃcaya mātram eva avaśiṣyate na anyat saṃghātaḥ apinā atiriktaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.327–9,2.430.328	 saṃcayaḥ api ca vyatirikta avyatirikta tayā cintyamānaḥ na asti eva iti aṇavaā iva avaśiṣyante paramāṇavaḥ api ṣaṭkena yugapad yogāt paramāṇā ūṣṣa ṣ aṃśatā iti evam vikalpyamānāḥ viplavantaḥ eva na ca taiḥ ati sūkṣmaiḥ eṣa vyavahāraḥ abhinirvartyate iti tasmāt vāhyasya prameyasya eva nirūpyamāṇasya anupapatteḥ vijñāna mātram eva idam iti abhyupagamanīyam avayava atirikta avayavi sādhanam 
NM_9,2.430.329–9,2.430.330	 te api evam vadantaḥ prāktanebhyaḥ api bhikṣubhyaḥ kṛpaṇatarāḥ iva lakṣyante apūrvam eṣa tarka mārgaḥ yatra pratītim utsṛjya tarjanī visphoṭanena vastu vyavasthāḥ kriyante dṛḍhena ced pramāṇena bādha ādi rahita ātmanā gṛhītaḥ eva avayavī kim ebhiḥ bāla valgitaiḥ atha na asti pramāṇena kena cittadupagrahaḥ etat eva ucyatām vṛtti vikalpaiḥ kim prayojanam na ca śaknuyaḥ pade pade vayam ebhiḥ abhinavam alpam api kiṃcid apaśyadbhiḥ tat eva punar punar pṛcchadbhiḥ śākyahatakaiḥ saha kalaham atimātram kartum avayavini pramāṇa upanyāsaḥ 
NM_9,2.430.331	 sa vikalpakam pratyakṣam pramāṇam iti sādhitam nirvikalpa kena api śabda ullekha mātra rahitam sa vikalpaka grāhyam eva vastu gṛhyate iti ca darśitam eka ākāra viṣaya vyatirekeṇa ca tad buddheḥ eka kāryatva eka deśa ādi anyathā siddhi nibandhana tvam api na kiṃcid vaktum śakyate iti api varṇitam kvacid vā pṛtanāvana ādau bādhakopanipātāt eka avagati mithyā tvāt na sarvatra mithyā tva kalpanā yuktā iti api uktam kim vā tat asti yad sāmānya samarthana avamarena ākathitam tasmāt tayā eva nītyā avayavi api siddhaḥ eva tad grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya nirapavāda tvāt avayavinī ākṣepānām parihāraḥ 
NM_9,2.430.332	 yat tu deśa bhedena agrahaṇāt tad agrahe tad buddhi abhāvāt iti tatra avayava āśrita tvam eva nimittam na asattvam deśa bhedena hi jñānam tad deśasya katham bhavet na hi kaścid svatantraḥ asau api tu avayava āśritaḥ yāvatām grahaṇaḥ api asmin buddhiḥ bhavati tāvatām apekṣate asau grahaṇam na sarveṣām iti sthitiḥ vivicyamāneṣu aṃśeṣu yuktaḥ tad anupagrahaḥ tadā avaya vināśaḥ hi buddhau viparivartate 
NM_9,2.430.333	 avayava vavibhāgaḥ hi avayavinaḥ vināśa hetuḥ tasmin buddhyā samullikhyamāne avayavi vināśaḥ api na anullikhitaḥ bhavet iti katham avayavīta dānīm gamyeta avayaveṣu avayavinaḥ vyāpta jya vartamāna tvam vṛttiḥ ca avayaveṣu asya vyāsa jyā eva iti gamyate na pratyavayavam tasya samāptiḥ vyakti jāti vat vyāsajya vartamānaḥ hi na khalu avayava antaraiḥ vartate tad asaṃvitteḥ kintu vartate eva saḥ 
NM_9,2.430.334–9,2.430.336	 tathā ca āhuḥ vartate iti brūmaḥ anāśritasya anupalaṃbhāt vṛttiḥ evaṃvidhā anyatra kva dṛṣṭā iti yat ucyate pratyakṣa dṛṣṭaḥ eva arthe dṛṣṭānta anveṣaṇena kim tasmāt pratyakṣatas eva avāyava vṛtteḥ avayavinaḥ upalabdheḥ na tadvat tauvikalpānām avasaraḥ avayavi grāhaka pramāṇasya ananyathā siddha tvam sraj sūtra ādi vṛttiḥ api tathā darśanāt abhyupagatā tat iyam avayavi vṛttiḥ api īdṛśī dṛśyamānā kim iti nihnūyate na ca avayavi grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasyakaścid apavādaḥ samasti aduṣṭa kāraṇa udbhūtam anāvirbhūta bādhakam asandigdham ca vijñānam katham mithyā iti kathyate 
NM_9,2.430.337–9,2.430.338	 na ca senā vanavadavaya vigrahaṇam abhidhātum ucitam abādhita tvāt senā ādau bādhaka sadbhāvāt senā ādi vailakṣaṇyam paṭāt eḥ avayavinaḥ api ca gaja vāji padāti pīlu palāśa śiṃśapa ādi darśanasya tatra ghaṭamāna tvāt tad samavāye senā vanādi pratītiḥ upapadi eta api iha tu kiṃsamudāya viṣayaḥ paṭa pratyayaḥ iti cintyam tantu sasudāya ālambanaḥ iti ced tantu pratyayaḥ idānīm kim ālambanaḥ saḥ api su āvaya bālambanaḥ iti evam avayava avayava nirūpaṇe paramāṇavaḥ patti aśva śamī śiṃśapa ādi sthānīya vaktavyāḥ teṣāṃca tadvat grahaṇam anupapannam atīndriya tvāt iti na tad ālambanaḥ avayavi pratyayaḥ tasmāt avayavī pratyakṣa grāhyaḥ asti iti siddham paramāṇūnām pramāṇa siddha tvam 
NM_9,2.430.339–9,2.430.340	 paramāṇavaḥ api kārya anumāna pariniścita nitya niravayava svarūpāḥsanti iti pūrvam eva samarthitam atas na ṣaṭka yoga ādinā sāvayava tva meṣāupapādayitum pāryate mūrta tvam api anitya tā āyām aprayojakam iti darśayiṣyate śūnya vāde pramāṇa abhāvaḥ atas prameya paryālīcana vartmanā api śūnya vāda samarthanam na suśakam prameya vicāre api hi pramāṇa vṛttam eva parīkṣyate atas ca pramāṇa carcā atovibhyadbhiḥ prapalāyya yā prameya kathā vīthī tathāgata ebalambitā tasyām apisā eva bhīṣaṇa mukhī pramāṇa carcikā eva upanatā sarvatī vipadām mārgam ādeśayitum udyate vidhau vidhura tām yati prapalāpya kva gamyate tasmāt pramāṇataḥ aśakye śakye vā vastu nirṇaye evaṃprāyam ayuktam vaḥ kuśa kāśa abalambanam evam niṣphalam utsṛthya śūnya vāda baka vratam bāhyena eva artha jātena vyavahāraḥ vidhīyattam vairāgya jananāya api na kṣaṇika vāda ādi āvaśyaka tā 
NM_9,2.430.341^1	 atha asthā śaithilya jananāya sarvam śūnyam sarvam kṣaṇikam sarvam nirālambanam iti upadiśyate tarhi kim anena mṛṣodyena ! sati api ātmani satsu apisreṣu padārtheṣu viṣaya doṣa darśana dvāreṇa bhavati eva vivekavatām vairāgya miti tad upajananāya śūnyavāda ādi varṇanam vakraḥ panthāḥ pratyuta prājñaḥ mumukṣuḥ kṣaṇika nairātmya śūnyatā ādi vacanam yukti bādhitam avabudhyamānaḥ vaṃcanāmayam ivatad upadeśam āśaṅkate saḥ eṣa buddhi śūnyānām śūnya vāda parigrahaḥ pratāraṇa parāṇām vā na tu tattva artha darśinām tasmāt parīkṣyamāṇaḥ ayam śabda ādi advaita pakṣa vat 
NM_9,2.430.341^2	 vijñānāt vaitapakṣaḥ api gandharvanagarāyate apavarga parīkṣā upasaṃhāraḥ tat evam advaitadṛśāna dṛśya tejanasya niḥśreyasa saṃpad āgamaḥ atas yathā ukta ātma su tattva cintayā ākṛtī vyavasyet apavarga siddhaye sāṃkhya ukta prakriyāyāḥ ḍapa saṃhāraḥ sāṅkhyaiḥ yaḥ tu apavarga sādhana vidhau= uktaḥ prakṛti ātmanoḥanyatva avagamaḥ a bhyupāyaḥ iti sa prāk eva nirvāsitaḥ ajñā śaktimati vikāra bahulā badhnāti akiṃcit karaṃbhūyaḥ na prakṛtiḥ pumāṃsam iti vā kaḥ tām niyantum kṣamaḥ puṃsā na kiṃcid api bandha nidhāna bhūtaṃati alpa mātram api karma kṛtam kadācid 
NM_9,2.430.341^3	 mathnāti tam prakṛtiḥ eva niraṅkuśa eṣāmattā kareṇuḥ iva padma vanāni bhūyas jainādi ukta prakriyāyāḥ upāsaṃhāraḥ kaca niluṃcana diś paṭa dhāraṇa kṣiti dharā kramaṇa krama pūrvakam kṣapaṇakāḥ tu apavargam uśanti amīhi atitarām parama artha vidaḥ tu te lomnām nitya saṃbhavāt khalatayaḥ mokṣam kṣaṇāt prāpnuyuḥ saṃsāra uparamaḥ digambara tayā sadyas tiraścām bhavet muktāḥ syuḥ giri śṛṅga vāsinaḥ ime śaśvat tad ārohaṇāt jantūnām apavarga vartma nikaṭam kena īdṛśam darśitam tasmāt ātma jñānam santaḥ mokṣa prāptau hetum prāhuḥ 
NM_9,2.430.341^4	 tīrthe tīrthe tat ca ācāryaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ uktam saṃjñā bhedaiḥ pātañjala prakriyā upasaṃhāraḥ yat api iha kecid a vikalpam īśvara praṇidhānam āhuḥ apavarga sādhanam idam ātma darśanam avādi taiḥ api prathitaḥ hi pūraṣa viśeṣaḥ īśvaraḥ gautama ukta prakriyā eva sādhīyasī dṛṣṭā vādi antarāṇām gatiḥ iyam iyatī na apavargasya mārgan= praṣṭum draṣṭum samarthāḥ te iti ciram iha śvabhraḥ eva bhramanti nedī yāneṣu tasmāt bhava maru patitaiḥ akṣapāda upadiṣṭaḥ panthāḥ kṣemāyāḥ mokṣa adhigama samucitaḥ kṣipram ālambanīyaḥ iti śrī bhaṭṭa jayanta kṛtau nyāyamañjaryām navamam āhnikam 
NM_10,2.522.1	 saṃśaya ādeḥ padārtha gaṇasya pramāṇa prameya pada saṃgṛhītasya apinyāya pravṛtti prayojana tayā pṛthak vyutpādanīya tvasya prāk eva samarthita tvāt prathama sūtre ca prameya anantaram saṃśaya uddeśāt uddeśa anukrameṇa tasya lakṣaṇam pratipādayitum āha samāna aneka dharma upapatteḥ vipratipatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ ca viśeṣa apekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ nyā sū 
NM_10,2.522.2	 nanu ! saṃśayasya samāna dharma upapatti ādi kāraṇa bhedena paṃcavidha tvāt sāmānya sakṣaṇam vibhāgaḥ viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni ca vaktavyāni tatrasāmānya lakṣaṇe vibhāge ca sūtra dvayam viśeṣa lakṣaṇa artham ca paṃcānām tad pramedānām sūtrapaṃcakam iti evam sapta sūtrāṇi praṇetum yuktāni ekam ca idam sūtraṃśrūyate tat katham etat bhaviṣyati ucyate satyam āha bhavān kim tu ekam eva idaṃsūtram āvṛtti nyāyam āśritya saptadhā kalpayiṣyate sūtra vibhāgaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.3	 tatra ācāryāḥ tāvat evam vyācakṣate samāna dharma upapatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ viśeṣa apekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti iyat sūtram sāmānya lakṣaṇa apratipādakam samāna aneka dharma upapatteḥ vipratipatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ ca iti vibhāga sūtram punar ca samāna dharma upapatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ viśeṣa apekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti etat eva sūtram prathamasyasaṃśayasya viśeṣa lakṣaṇa pratipādakam iti sūtrasya sāmānya viśeṣa lakṣaṇa paratvam 
NM_10,2.522.4–10,2.522.5	 nanu ! etat eva sūtram sāmānya lakṣaṇa artham iyat eva ced ayamanyūna an atiriktam viśeṣa lakṣaṇa artham iti katham etat ucyate viśeṣa smaraṇa kāraṇa bhūta sādhāraṇa dharma grahaṇāt viśeṣa agrahaṇāt viśeṣa āsmṛteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ bhavati iti pratyātma vedanīyam tāvat etat sūtre viśeṣa apekṣaḥ iti anena padena viśeṣa smaraṇam upadiṣṭam upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthā padena ca viśeṣa agrahaṇam iti īyat tāvat dvayoḥ aṇi sāmānya viśeṣa lakṣaṇayoḥ tulyam samāna śabdaḥ tu ākṣipta sāmānya vacanaḥ san tad sāmānya lakṣaṇam āha anugata sāmānyatracanaḥ tu viśeṣa lakṣaṇam iti sāmānya viśeṣa lakṣaṇa pratipādana prakāraḥ katham punar ayam eva ākṣipta sāmānya vacanaḥ kathaṃca anugata sāmānya vacanaḥ iti ucyate saṃśaya utpattyā eva samāna dharya mātram ākṣipyate yat gṛhyamāṇam viśeṣa smaraṇa bīja saṃskāra udbodha nimitta tām pratipadyate tad vyatirekeṇa saṃśaya an utpādāt 
NM_10,2.522.6	 tathā hi viruddha viśeṣa avamarśa svabhāvaḥ tāvat saṃśayaḥ na ca viruddha viśeṣāṇām puras avasthite dharmiṇi sannihitānām avamarśanam viruddha tayā eva ekatra sannidhāna abhāvāt atas smṛti upārūḍhānām avamarśanam smṛtiḥ ca na akasmāt udbhavati iti yad sahacaritānām teṣām viśeṣāṇām pūrvam paryāyeṇa grahaṇam vṛttam tad darśana saṃskāra prabodha dvāreṇa smaraṇa kāraṇam avaśyam eva āśrayaṇīyam tat tu anugatam vā bhavatu vyāvṛttam vā vipratipatti ātmakaṃvā āntaram upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthā rūpam vā iti evam ākṣipta sāmānya vācini samāna śabde paṃcasa ādhāraṇa rūpa avagamāt sāmānya lakṣaṇa artha tā 
NM_10,2.522.7–10,2.522.8	 yadā tu anugatam eva dharmam āroha pariṇāha ādi svabhāvam ācaṣṭe samāna śabdaḥ tadā aviśeṣa lakṣaṇa arthaḥ iti sūtra yojānā pradarśanam tatra ca ittham sūtra yojanā samānaḥ dharmaḥ pariṇāha ādiḥ tasya guṇa tvena pratidravyam anya tve api tulya rūpa avagati viṣayīkṛta tvāt samāna tvam upapadyate tasya upapattiḥ upalabdhiḥ atha api sattā upapatti śabdena ucyate sā api upalabdhi adhīna sthitiḥ eva bhavati iti sarvathā samāna dharma upalabdheḥ saṃśayaḥ iti uktam bhavati saṃśayasya dharmi viṣayaka tvam 
NM_10,2.522.9	 nanu ! samāna dharmaḥ artha antaram dharmiṇaḥ na ca artha antare dṛṣṭe anyatra saṃśayaḥ bhavitum arhati na artha antara viśeṣa tvāt artha antara viśeṣaḥ tu dharmyā iva ucyate artha antareṇa pariṇāha ādinā viśeṣyate iti tasmin= eva sādhāraṇa dharma adhyāsita vapuṣi dharmiṇi nayana patha vartini tad gata viśeṣa avamarśa ātmā tatra eva saṃśayaḥ jāyate yaḥ ayam ūrdhva tva viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī dṛśyate saḥ sthāṇuḥ vāsyāt puruṣova iti na artha antara tvam dūṣaṇam saṃśaya kāraṇa antaram 
NM_10,2.522.10	 tathā api vakra koṭara tva kara caraṇa ādi viśeṣa darśinaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti kāraṇa antaram ucyate upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ iti viśeṣa agrahaṇāt iti arthaḥ katham punar upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ iti anena viśeṣa agrahaṇam ucyate ittham ucyate idantayā anidantayā vā tatra upalabdhiḥ na vyavatiṣṭhate anupalabdhiḥ vā iti viśeṣa grahaṇe hi sati tad vyavasthānam saṃbhavati sthāṇuḥ ayam na puruṣaḥ iti vakra koṭara ādi yiśeṣa grahaṇe śiraḥ pāṇi ādi paricchede tu puruṣaḥ ayam na sthāṇuḥ iti saṃśaya kāraṇa antaram 
NM_10,2.522.11–10,2.522.12	 evam anena padena viśeṣa agrahaṇam uktam tathā api preṅkhā rūḍhasya sādhāraṇa dharma darśinaḥ viśeṣān upalabhamānasya api na dṛṣṭaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti kāraṇa antaram ucyate viśeṣa apekṣaḥ iti viśeṣa smṛti apekṣaḥ iti arthaḥ sautram viśeṣa padam viśeṣa smṛti param nanu ! viśeṣa apekṣaḥ iti śrūyate na viśeṣa smṛti apekṣaḥ iti satyam aśrūyamāṇam api tad smaraṇam saṃśaya prastāvāt avagamyate smaryamāṇa tvena hiviśeṣāṇām saṃśaya utpattau= apekṣā nāna bhūyamāna tayā anubhūyamāneṣu hi teṣu saṃśaya= chedaḥ bhavati na saṃśayaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.13–10,2.522.14	 apekṣā śabda artha nirūpaṇāt eva vā smṛtiḥ labhyate viśeṣāṇām apekṣā ākāṅkṣā te ca anupalabhyamānāḥ pūrva anubhūtāḥ ca ākāṅkṣyante iti iyam sāteṣām smṛtiḥ saṃprati upalabhyamāneṣu ekāntān anubhūteṣu vā teṣu ākāṅkṣā anupapatteḥ viśeṣa agrahaṇasya saṃśaya kāraṇa tvam nanu ! samāna dharma upapatteḥ viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca iti kāraṇa dvayam eva astu kiṃvaśeṣa agrahaṇena api ca viśeṣa smaraṇāt eva nanu ākṣiptaḥ tadā agrahaḥ grahaṇam smaraṇam ca eva bhavetām yugapad katham 
NM_10,2.522.15	 asti etat kintu na ati dūra gatāyām nija pramadāyām anurāgavataḥ kāminaḥ samāna dharma darśane tad gata viśeṣa adarśane tad anusmaraṇe casanī api na bhavati eva saṃśayaḥ atas saṃśaya utpatti avyabhicāre deśa kāla vyavahita viśeṣa agrahaṇa siddhaye pada antaram upādīyate deśa antare kāla antare vā cira dṛṣṭānām viśeṣāṇām idānīm agrahaṇam saṃśaya kāraṇam na viśeṣa agrahaṇa mātram evam amunā pada trayeṇa saṃśaya lakṣaṇam idam uktam saṃśaya kāraṇānām melana asaṃbhava parihāraḥ 
NM_10,2.522.16	 nanu ca ! saṃbhūya kārakaiḥ kāryam ārabhataḥ iti nyāyāt samāna dharma upalabdhi viśeṣa anupalabdhi tad smṛti lakṣaṇa kāraṇa traya janye saṃśaye jñāna yaugapadyam āpadyate krama bhāvi tve hi buddhīnām na eka kārya utpattau yugapad vyāpāraḥ samasti viśeṣāḥ ca bahavaḥ api saṃbhavanti iti tad smaraṇāni api yugapad bhūyāṃsi bhaveyuḥ na etat evam samāna dharma grahaṇa anantaram pūrva upajāta vividha viśā eṣa anubhava paramparā upacita pīvara saṃskāra dvārakam ekam eva tat viṣayam smaraṇam bhaviṣyati yathā varṇānām artha pratītau varṇitam viśeṣa anupalabdhiḥ prāc abhāva rūpā 
NM_10,2.522.17–10,2.522.18	 upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthā sūcitā ca viśeṣa anupalabdhiḥ anupalabdhiḥ eva na sā jñāna ātmikā kintu jñāna anutpādaḥ iti tat tṛtīyam kāraṇam apibhavat na jñāna ātmakam iti dve eva jñāna ātmake kāraṇe samāna dharma grahaṇam viśeṣa smaraṇam ca tayoḥ prathamam samāna dharma grahaṇam vinaśyat avastham viśesmaraṇam ca dvitīyam avinaśyat avastham saṃśayam upajanayataḥ īdṛśayoḥ ca jñānayoḥ yaugapadyam aviruddham iti śāstre sthitam evam samāna dharma grahaṇāt viśeṣa agrahaṇāt viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ iti pada trayeṇa saṃśaya lakṣaṇam anavadyam ucyate iti pakṣa antareṇa saṃśaya sūtra vyākhyānam 
NM_10,2.522.19	 tat etat ācārya vyākhyānam arocayantaḥ pare aparathāḥ vyācakṣate sāmānya lakṣaṇam tāvat vimarśa padena eva pratipādyate na hi paryāya uccāraṇa mātram idaṃvimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti kintu saṃśayaḥ iti lakṣya padam vimarśaḥ iti lakṣaṇa padam pramāṇa pada vat ca nirvacana savyapekṣam etat padam lakṣaṇa pratipādana kṣamam bhavati viruddha artha avamarśaḥ vimarśaḥ sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti iyatā ca sajātīya saṃśaya paścaka anugatam vijātītebhyaḥ pramāṇa ādibhyaḥ vyavaccinnam sāmānya lakṣaṇam uktam bhavati saṃśayīt pādaka kāraṇa parigaṇanam punar indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna grahaṇa vat iha api na upayujyate kāraṇa antarāṇām apiātmam anasyat nikarṣa ādīnām aparihārya tvāt 
NM_10,2.522.20–10,2.522.21	 atha anyāsādhāraṇa kāraṇa nirdeśaḥ cikīrṣitaḥ tena api kī arthaḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇasya pratipipādayiṣita tvāt tasya ca vimarśa padāt eva siddha tvāt vyākhyāna antarasya kliṣṭa tvam upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthāpada pratipādyamāna viśeṣa agrahaṇa varṇanam ca atīva kliṣṭam iti punar ca viśeṣa lakṣaṇa prasaṅge yathāśrutam eva tat vyākhyeyam iti atibhāraḥ 
NM_10,2.522.22–10,2.522.23	 evam vimarśa padena vijātīya vyavaccheda kāriṇi sāmānya lakṣaṇe varṇitesamāna dharma upapatteḥ iti ekam eva padam sajātīya saṃśaya antara vyavaccheda kāri viśeṣa lakṣaṇa kṣamam bhavati iti tatra api pada traya yojanam na upāyujyate iti atra vyākhyāna dvaye api katarat sādhu iti tad vidaḥ pramāṇam aneka dharma upatti padārtha vivaraṇam 
NM_10,2.522.24	 aneka dharma upapatteḥ iti atra api tripada parigrahaṇena ena lakṣaṇam ācāryāḥ varṇayanti aneka dharma upapatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ viṣeṣa apekṣā aitya sādhāraṇa dharma grahaṇāt viśeṣa grahaṇāt viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ iti arthaḥ ekaika pada upādāna phalam ca pūrvavat atra api darśayitavyam na ca indriya mana ssaṃyoga ādi kāraṇa antara parigaṇana codanam yuktam teṣām sarva buddhi janma su tulya tvāt iha asādhāraṇa saṃśaya jñāna kāraṇa upadeśa prastāvāt iti saṃśaya sūtra vyākhyāne pakṣa antaram 
NM_10,2.522.25–10,2.522.27	 anye tu sāmānya lakṣaṇa sampādite vijātīya vyavacchede kevala sajātīya vyavacchinna lakṣaṇa pradhita pādana nipuṇam aneka dharma upapatti padam eva pūrvavat varṇayāṃcakruḥ nanu ! aneka dharma śabdena katham asādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ ucyate  evam ucyate samāna jātīyam asamāna jātīyam ca anekam tasmāt parāvṛttaḥ dharmaḥ aneka dharmaḥ iti yat vā kim anayā kliṣṭa kalpanayā ! asti ayam eka śabdaḥ samāna paryāyaḥ tatra spaṣṭaḥ eva nañsamāsena asamāna dharmaḥ aneka dharmaḥ sādhāraṇa dharmaḥ ucyateeva iti asādhāraṇa dharmasya saṃśaya kāraṇa tva ākṣepaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.28	 bhavatu evam ! asādhāraṇa dharmasya tu katham saṃśaya kāraṇa tvam iti cintyam viruddha viśeṣa anusmaraṇa kāraṇakam hi saṃśayam āhuḥ viśeṣāṇām ca smaraṇa hetoḥ saṃskārasya tat udbodhakam bhavati yena saha ete pūrvam paryāyeṇa upalabdhāḥ asādhāraṇa dharmasya tu asādhāraṇa dharma tvāt eva na kenacid saha pūrvam grahaṇam abhavat bhāve tu asādhāraṇa dharma tā eva hīyeta iti atas katham asau tad smṛti hetuḥ vyāvṛtta tayā eva tu smṛti hetu tve asya trailokya smaraṇa nimitta tā prasajyeta tatas api vyāvṛtta tvāt iti asādhāraṇa dharmasya saṃśaya kāraṇa tva nirūpaṇam 
NM_10,2.522.29	 na eṣa doṣaḥ prakāra antareṇa asya smṛti hetu tvāt iha hi keṣucid keṣucid asādhāraṇa dharmāḥ dharmiṣu bhavantaḥ tad gata sādhāraṇa dharma antara sahacaritā abhavanti tat yathā pṛthivī tvac andha tva ādayaḥ dharmāḥ pṛthivyām asādhāraṇā ssantaḥ sneha vat tva ādi dharmāḥ ca tathā eva apsu dravya tva sahacāriṇaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ rūpa ādiṣu rūpa tva ādi dharmāḥ guṇa tva sahacāriṇaḥ utkṣepaṇa ādiṣu utkṣepaṇa tva ādi dharmāḥ karma tva sahacāriṇaḥ evam prakṛte api dharmiṇi kasmiṃścid asādhāraṇaḥ dharma aupalabhyamānaḥ kena api sādhāraṇa dharma antareṇa sahacaritaḥ bhavati iti bhavati viśeṣa anusmṛti dvāreṇa saṃśaya sādhanam aneka dharmasya samāna dharmāt viśeṣaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.30–10,2.522.31	 nanu ! evam tarhi vyāvṛtta tvāt eva samāna dharmāt eṣa saṃśayaḥ na aneka dharmāt iti mā evam aneka dharmaḥ eva asau tena vartmanā viśeṣān smārayan saṃśaya janmane kalpate asati hi tasmin kim ālambanam vyāvṛtta tvaṃsi āt iti ala m ati sūkṣma īkṣikayā tasya udāharaṇam bhāṣya kāreṇa darśitam śabde vibhāga ja tvam yathā hi pṛthivī ādau pṛthivī tva ādiḥ vyāvṛttaḥ dharmaḥ dravya tva ādi anugata dharma sahacārī dṛṣṭaḥ evam śabde vibhāga ja tvam dharmaḥ kenacid dravya tva ādīnām anyatamena dharmeṇa sahacaritaḥ syāt iti saṃśayaḥ vibhāga ja vibhāga vimarśaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.32–10,2.522.33	 nanu ! vibhāga ja tvam asādhāraṇaḥ na bhavati eva śabda dharmaḥ vibhāga ja vibhāge api bhāvāt tathā ca prayogaḥ guṇaḥ śabdaḥ vibhāga ja tvā t vibhāga ja vi bhāga vat iti tatra kecid āhuḥ satyam asti vibhāge api vibhāga ja tvam śabde tu viśeṣaḥ vivakṣitaḥ dvividhaḥ hi vibhāga jaḥ vibhāgaḥ kāraṇa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ kāraṇa akāraṇa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ ca kāraṇam samavāyi kāraṇam atra abhipretam kāraṇa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ tāvat tantu vibhāgāt tantu ākāśa vibhāgaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.34–10,2.522.35	 kāraṇa akāraṇa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ tu aṅgulī ākāśa vibhāgāt hasta ākāśa vibhāgaḥ hasta ākāśa vibhāgāt api śarīra ākāśa vibhāgaḥ iti śabdaḥ tu niyamena eva kāraṇa vibhāga pūrvaka vibhāga prabhavaḥ vaṃśa dala vibhāgāt dala ākāśa vibhāgaḥ dala ākāśa vibhāgāt ca asamavāyi kāraṇāt śabdaḥ niṣpadyate iti anena viśeṣeṇa āsya īdṛśa vibhāga ja tu asya asādhāraṇa tvam śabda dharmasya ucyate iti vibhāga ja vibhāga anaṅgīkāra pakṣaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.36–10,2.522.37	 anye tu vibhāga jam vibhāgam amṛṣyamāṇāḥ yathāśrutasya eva śabde vibhāga ja tu asya asādhāraṇa dharma tām ācakṣate nanu ! kim iti vibhāga jam vibhāgam te na mṛṣyante asti hi ayaṃtat siddhau nyāyaḥ yadā hi avayave karma utpannam avayava antarāt vibhāgam karoti natat ākāśa ādi deśāt yadā tu ākāśa ādi deśāt na tadā aayava antarāt iti sthitiḥ vibhāga ja vibhāgasya āvaśyaka tā 
NM_10,2.522.38–10,2.522.39	 kim kṛtā punar iyam sthitiḥ iti ced ucyate yā hi avayava kriyā nabhaḥ bhāga vibhāga kāriṇī na asau dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga pratipakṣa bhūtam vibhāgam ārabhamāṇā dṛśyate dinakara kiraṇa parāmarśa upajanita kamala dala vikāsa kāri kriyā vat tat eva katham iti ced kamalasya mukula vikāsa daśayoḥ pratyabhijñāyamāna tvena avināśa niścayāt iyam tu pāṭyamāna vaṃśa dala kriyā dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga pratidvandvi bhūta vibhāga ārambhikā dravyān āraṃbhaka saṃyoga pratidvaṃdvi vibhāga janikā upalabhyateiti na asau nabhasaḥ vibhāgam ārabheta iti atas eṣā sthitiḥ asti iti vibhāga ja vibhāga kalpanā kriyate vibhāgasya eva saṃyoga nāśaka tvam
