NM_10,2.522.40	 saṃyoga antam karma iti tāvat sthitam anyathā hi tasya kāla antara sthāyi tvam nitya dravya samavetasya ca nitya tvam syāt tasmāt karmaṇaḥ acira jīvi tvāt tad vināśakena saṃyogena bhavitavyam uttaraḥ tu saṃyogaḥ pūrva saṃyoga uparame sati jāyate na anyathā na ca vibhāga vyatiriktaḥ kaścana saṃyogasya hantā samasti karma tu uttara saṃyoga janma nirjñāta kauśalam na hi prāktana saṃyoga vināśāya prakalpate 
NM_10,2.522.41–10,2.522.42	 tasmāt vibhāgena eva saṃyoga virodhinā bhavitavyam yat adhikaraṇaḥ vibhāgaḥ tad adhikaraṇam eva saṃyogam upaśamayati na tu aṅguli vibhāgaḥ kuṇḍa badara saṃyoga upamardāya prabhavati iti atas na vaṃśa dala vṛtti vibhāgaḥ dala ākāśa saṃyogam upahantum alam iti nūnam dala ākāśa saṃyoga vairiṇāḥ dala ākāśa vibhāgena bhavitavyam vibhāga ja vibhāgasya āvarjanīya tvam 
NM_10,2.522.43	 tat idānīm tasya utpatti kāraṇa cintāyām kriyāyām vaṃśa dala vibhāga mātra upajanane caritārtha tvāt tam nirmāya vibhāga antara nirmāṇe viramya vyāpārā saṃvedanāt avaśyam vaṃśa dala vibhāgaḥ eva pratyāsanna tayā dala ākāśa vibhāga ārambhakaḥ abhyupagamanīyaḥ evam anabhyupagame karma nitya tva prasaṅgāt iti vibhāga ja vibhāga khaṇḍanam 
NM_10,2.522.44	 atra vadanti na karma nitya tvam anabhyupagamyamāne api vibhāga jevibhāge bhaviṣyati uttara saṃyogasya karma vināśa hetoḥ astitvāt pūrva saṃyoga anuparame katham tad utpādaḥ iti ced bāḍham ! uparataḥ eva pūrva saṃyogaḥ kaḥ tasya uparama hetuḥ iti ced karma hi uttara saṃyoga nimittam yat upeyate tat eva pūrva saṃyoga dhvaṃsa kāri bhaviṣyati na yat janane śaktam aśaktam tad vināśane hetuḥ dahana saṃyogaḥ pākaja utpāda nāśayoḥ 
NM_10,2.522.45	 yathā ca vibhāge adhikaraṇa niyamaḥ yad ādhāraḥ vibhāgaḥ tad ādhāram eva saṃyogam niruṇaddhi tathā kamaṃṇi api niyamaḥ karma api sva āśrayasya yat anya diś saṃyoga nibandhanam tat tad viruddha diś vṛtteḥ saṃyogasya upamardakam iti na ati prasaṅgaḥ evam karma āviṣṭasya uttara saṃyoga darśanam adūṣaṇam vigantara saṃyogasyatena upamardanāt ekasya ubhaya kāri tve adoṣaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.46–10,2.522.47	 api ca yat eva karma vaṃśa dalana vibhāga kāri kathyate tat eva dala ākāśa vibhāga kāri bhaviṣyati kaḥ doṣaḥ nanu ! vyoma vibhāga kāri karma na dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga pratyanīka bhūta vibhā ārambhakam ambhoruha karma vat iti uktam satyam uktam ayuktam tu śatapatra patra karmaṇaḥ api dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga pratikūla vibhāga ārambhaka tvāt tat cakarma kuḍmala kamalāt vikaca kamalasya anya tva niścayāt niścitam kamala kuḍmala kusumayoḥ bhedaḥ āvaśyakaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.48–10,2.522.49	 nanu ! tat eva idam aravindam iti saṃdeha viparyaya rahita tāmarasa pratyabhijñā darśanāt katham saṃkoca vikāsa daśā mātra bhedāt tad anyatvam iti kṛtam anayā durāśayā śarīre api su spaṣṭa upalabhyamāna śaiśava yauvana vārdhaka ādi daśa abheda bhinna svarūpe pratyabhijñāna darśanāt na ca śarīra kuśeśayayoḥ viśeṣa leśam ati kṛśam api paśyāmaḥ iti kutas tat eka tvam bhavatu vā puṇḍarīkasya avināśaḥ ! nidarśana mātram idam tu varṇitam na tu pratibaddhaḥ kaścana hetuḥ asti iti abhyadhāyi yena vaṃśa dala karmaṇaḥ kokanada pallava karma sāmyam kalpyeta kriyā tvam tu aprayojakam eva tad karmaṇām vicitra kārya hetu tvāt avayava avayavi vibhāgayoḥ aikyam 
NM_10,2.522.50	 yadi vā na anyaḥ vaṃśa dala vibhāgaḥ na anyaḥ ca tad kāryaḥ dala ākāśa vibhāgaḥ kintu ekaḥ eva vibhāgaḥ ayam bhedaḥ asi a āśraya bhedataḥ ekatra deśe avasthānāt vyomnaḥ vaṃśa dalasya ca samāna deśe vṛtti tvam mūrtānām hi viruddhyate vyomnassarva gata tvāt tu vidyate tatra sannidhiḥ eka deśa āśraya tve tu yat ekasmāt vibhāga kṛt tat eva anyatas iti asti na vibhāgaḥ vibhāga jaḥ atirikta vibhāga nirākaraṇam 
NM_10,2.522.51	 apare punar vibhāga ja vibhāga parākaraṇa upārūḍha rabhasāḥ saṃgirante tiṣṭhatu tāvat dūratas eva vimāga jaḥ vibhāgaḥ karma jaḥ api na vibhāgaḥ nāmakaḥ cid asti saṃyoga virodhini tasmin= abhyupagamyamāne mudgara ādi vat pūrva siddha tā avaśyaṃbhāvinī tatas ca pūrva siddhaḥ vibhāgaḥ saṃyogam unmūlayati iti ghaṭa mudgarayoḥ iva saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ ekatra yugapad upalabdhiḥ bhaveta na ca evam asti tasmāt saṃyoga abhāva viṣayaḥ eva vibhakta pratyayaḥ iti na vibhāga ālambanatāṃpratipadyate 
NM_10,2.522.52–10,2.522.53	 sati api vibhāge tasmin kṣaṇe saṃyogasya avināśāt na bhavati vibhakta pratibhāsaḥ kṣaṇa antare ca saṃyoga vināśe sati bhavati iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām saṃyoga abhāva viṣayaḥ eva avasīyate iti atas na pratyakṣa gamyatā nibhāgasya saṃyoga bhaṅga liṅgena ca tad parikalpana kriyā iva tam hinasti iti purastāt upapāditam kāraṇa trevidhyam katham tarhi vibhāga ja tvam śabdasya bhāṣya kāraḥ udāhṛtavān ucyate trividham kāraṇam kārya utpattim prati vidhatte samayāyi kāraṇam asamavāyi kāraṇam nimitta kāraṇam cetiḥ tatra samavāyi kāraṇam tat ucyate yatra āśritaṃkāryam upalabhyate yathā paṭasya tantavaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.54	 asamavāyi kāraṇam tu dvividham kāryā eka artha samavāya lakṣaṇayā pratyāsattya pratyāsannam kāraṇa eka artha samavāya lakṣaṇayā vā saṃbaddham tatra kārya eka artha samavāyena pratyāsannam yathā paṭasya tantu saṃyogaḥ kāraṇa eka artha samavāyena tu pratyāsannam yathā paṭa rūpasya tantu rūpam iti asamavāyi kāraṇe viśeṣaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.55–10,2.522.56	 avadhṛta kāraṇam ca tad asamavāyi kāraṇam āśrayaṇīyam atas buddhi janma nisati api eka artham amavāye na anyeṣām ātma guṇānām icchā dīna asamamavāyi kāraṇa tvam api tu avaghṛta sāmarthyasya ātma mana ssaṃyogasya eva iti samavāyi asamavāyi vyatiriktam tu kārya utpattau nirjñāta sāmarthyam yat kāraṇam tat nimitta kāraṇam ucyate iti vibhāgasya āvaśyaka tā 
NM_10,2.522.57	 evam sthite śabdasya nitya tve niraste kāryatve ca sādhite tad utpatta auākāśam tāvat samavayi kāraṇam nimitta kāraṇāni tu bhūyāṃsisanti eva asamavāyi kāraṇam tu cintyam tat ca ākāśa āśritam avaśyam anyathā pratyāsatti abhāvāt tad guṇa antarāṇām ca vibhu tva ādīnām anavadhṛta śakti tvāt vaṃśa dala pāṭana samanantaram ca śabda utpāda darśanāt evaṃmanyāmahe kriyā yadā eva saṃyogam hanti vaṃśa dala āśritam tadā eva gagane kaṃcid karoti atiśayam dhruvam ākāśa atiśayaḥ yaḥ ca kriyājaḥ śabda kāraṇam asau vibhāga nāma iti śabde tat janyatā ucyate 
NM_10,2.522.58–10,2.522.60	 tat evam etat yathāgamam ācārya matam abhihitam asmābhiḥ kīdṛśaḥ vibhāgaḥ śabda hetuḥ etat ca matimat bhivicāraṇīyam kim ākāśa atiśaya mātram kiṃcita samavāyi kāraṇam uta yathā mudgara daṇḍa saṃyoga kārye śabde bherī gagana saṃyogasya asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam evam vaṃśa dala vibhāga kārye tasmin dala gagana vibhāgasya iti dala ākāśa vibhāgaḥ api kim dala vibhāga jaḥ uta karma jaā iva iti sarvathā kaścid asādharaṇaḥ dharmaḥ saṃśaya hetuḥ udāhartavyaḥ iti iyatā naḥ prayojanam vipratipatteḥ saṃśaya janaka tvam 
NM_10,2.522.61	 virūddhā pratipattiḥ vipratipattiḥ asti ātmā iti eke na asti ātmā iti apare sā iyam vipratipatti rūpalabhyamānāḥ viśeṣa smaraṇa dvāreṇa saṃśayam āvahati na ca iha kaścid anugataḥ vyāvṛttaḥ vā dharmaḥ saṃśaya kāraṇam api tu vipratipattiḥ eva iti kim tatra api tripada parigraheṇa lakṣaṇa varṇanam ekena eva vāpadena iti pūrvavat ācārya dvaya matam anusaraṇīyam upavyabdhi alava sthayā saṃśayaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.62–10,2.522.63	 upalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ khalu a vapi bhavati saṃśayaḥ sat ca udakam upalabhyateyathā hrada ādiṣu kvacid asat ca bhāskara kara nikara pratiphalana taralita asumaru sthālīṣu tat evam upalabdhekhyavasthita tvāt kvacid upalabhyamāne bhavati saṃśayaḥ kim idam sat upalabhyate kim asat iti anupalabdhi avyavasthāyā saṃśayaḥ anupalabdhi avyasthātaḥ ca bhavati saṃśayaḥ kiṃcid asat eva na upalabhyatena bhaḥsamādi kiṃcid sat api na upalabhyate mṛd antarita śaṅku mūla jala ādi tad anyatra anupalabhyamāne saṃśete pumān kim idam asat eva na upalabhyete utasat iti avyavasthāyāḥ svarūpam 
NM_10,2.522.64	 avyavastha śabdena atra pūrvam paryāyeṇa pravṛtta sadasat āśrita viśeṣa adarśanaṃsūcitam idānīm punar artha kriyā samartha tā ādiḥ viśeṣa darśana śūnya cetasāṃupalabdhi anupalabdhi mātra upapatteḥ saṃśayaḥ bhavati iti varṇyate na ca evaṃsati sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ iti śaṅkanīyam yathā anubhavam saṃśaya abhyupagamāt sarvatra ca tad utpādaka viśeṣa agrahaṇa tad smaraṇa ādi kāraṇa sānnidhya asaṃbhavāt iti 
NM_10,2.522.65–10,2.522.67	 atra api pada trayeṇa ekena vā padena lakṣaṇa upapādanam pūrvavat draṣṭavyam sautra padānām na pauna rūktyam nanu ca ! upalabdhi anupalabdhī sat asataḥ samānaḥ eva dharmaḥ iti pūrveṇa gata artha tvam na etat pūrva nirdiṣṭasya ūrdhva tva ādeḥ dharmasya jñeya stha tvāt upalabdhi anupalabdhyīḥ ca jñātṛ stha tvāt atas eva ca mānasam imam saṃśayam ācakṣate na bāhya dharmi saṃbaddha sādhāraṇa ūrdhva tā ādi dharma adhigama adhīna saṃśaya vat bāhya indriya jam upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthayoḥ viśeṣaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.68	 nanu ca ! upalabdhi tvam anupalabdhi tvam vā atra saṃśaya kāraṇam tat hi na jñātari vartate kintu buddhau= iti katham ayam viśeṣaḥ satyam evam asamāna dharmaḥ api upalabdhita ādikaḥ yat āśritaḥ tat hi boddhari vartate atas viśeṣāt pṛthak eva kathyate yathā hi asādhāraṇa tā āśrayaḥ evaṃprakāram eva ca viśeṣam āśritya kiṃcid paṃcavidha tvam vipaṃcyate 
NM_10,2.522.69	 paramārtataḥ tu sarvatra anugata saṃbandhaḥ duṣpariharaḥ viśeṣa smaraṇa janya tvāt saṃśayasya viśeṣāṇām ca yena saha pūrvam darśanam abhūt tasmin= anupalabhyamāne smaraṇa asaṃbhavāt atas tasya aneka viśeṣa anugāmi tvāt samāna tvam aparihāryam atas eva ca ākṣipta sāmānya vācinam samāna śabdam sāmānya lakṣaṇe vyācakhyuḥ ācāryāḥ iti alam ati vistareṇa iti paṃcavidhaḥ prapaṃcitaḥ muninā darśitaḥ eṣa saṃśayaḥ phalavat vyavahāra hetu tāṃanumāna aṅga tayā vibharti yaḥ anumāniḥ apekṣaḥ eva vākila dṛṣṭe viṣaye artha saṃśayaḥ vahati vyavahāra vartanīṃ iti pūrva ca vicāritam budhaiḥ 
NM_10,2.522.70–10,2.522.71	 iti saṃśaya parīkṣā atha prayojana parīkṣā ayam artham adhikṛtya prarvatate tad prayojanam yam iti atra deśa kāla puruṣa daśā bheda bhinna prayojana viśeṣa vyāptaye vīpsā draṣṭavyā arthaḥ arthyamānaḥ ucyate na vastu rūpaḥ eva abhāvasya api prayojana tva saṃbhavāt adhikāraḥ arthasya vyavasāyaḥ yam yam artham āptavyaṃhātavyam vā adhikṛtya vyavasāyaḥ pravartate tad prāptaye parihārāya vā ceṣṭatepuruṣaḥ tat prayojanam iti phalasya dvividha tvam āpekṣika tvam ca 
NM_10,2.522.72–10,2.522.74	 tat ca gauṇa mukhya bhedena dvividham mukhyam sukha prāptiḥ duḥkha parihāraḥ ca tad sādhanam tu gauṇam sukha sādhanam api candana dhana sāra hāra mahilā ādi prāptavya tvāt mukhya tvena yadā vivakṣitam bhavati tadā tad avāpti upāye gauṇa tā draṣṭavyā tat ca prayojanam deśa kāla puruṣa śābhedāt avyavasthitam bhavati tat yathā grīṣme maru sthale niśāta malātaka nikaram iva kirati kiraṇa miṣeṇa pūṣaṇi tṛṣā āturasya tuṣāra kaṇā utkara danturam ambu paramam sukha sādhanam tat eva śiśiresakala jagat kampa kāriṇi dāruṇa samīraṇa śithilīkṛta nīreṣu kāśmīra iṣu śleṣma upacaya janita jaḍima jaṭhara śikhinaḥ khedāya jāyate tasyāt aniyata eva ayam sukha duḥkha sādhana bhāvaḥ bhāvānām yadi api ca yat ekadā sukha sādhanam iti viditam upayuktam atikrāntaṃvastu tat tathā api tad jātīya tva liṅga avadhṛta sukha sādhana bhāve bhāva antare adipravartante eva tad arthinaḥ prayojanasya pravartaka tva ākṣepa samādhāne 
NM_10,2.522.75	 nanu ! prayojanasya pravartaka tvam ayuktam sat asat vikalpābhyām anupapatteḥ sattve karṇa nāsā ādi vat na tad arthā pravṛttiḥ asattve tu kha puṣpa ādi vat na tarām na eṣa doṣaḥ īpsā ajihāsa aviṣayīkṛtasya tasya pravartaka tvāt na hi tat kha puṣpa ādi vat asādhyam na api śiraḥ pāṇi ādi vat siddham eva adi tu sādhya tvena buddhi upārūḍham tat pravartakam iti sarva loka sākṣikam etat tasmāt icchā viṣayīkṛtam tat pravartakam iti yuktam ittham pravartaka tve prayojanasya upapadite muninā bhagnāḥ bhavanti sarve preraka pakṣāḥ para abhihitāḥ prayojanam atas akhila evidhi vacobhiḥ ādiśyateprayojana nibandhanāḥ tanubhṛtām aśeṣāḥ kriyāḥ krimeḥ api yathā tathā kim api jīvitam bibhrataḥ prayojana bahiṣkṛtam na khalu ceṣṭitam dṛśyate vaitaṇḍikaḥ prayatate nija pakṣa siddhyā etām ca eṣa veda para pakṣa niṣedha labhyām tasmāt iyam sva mata sādhana varjitā api yuktā prayojanavatī bhavitum vitaṇḍā 
NM_10,2.522.76–10,2.522.77	 iti prayojana parikṣā atha dṛṣṭānta parīkṣā laukika parīkṣakānām yasmin= arthe buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ laukika parīkṣakau vādi prativādinau dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇa prastāvāt veditavyau na tu mūrkha paṇḍitau prakṛta asaṅgateḥ tayoḥ ca saṅgatyabhāvāt tayoḥ ca yasmin= arthe bhāva svabhāve abhāva ātmake vā buddhi sāmyam prayojya prayojaka bhāva vyavasthita sādhya sādhana dharma adhikaraṇa tve sādhya vyāvṛtti pūrvaka sādhana dharma vyāvṛtta tāyām vā tulya rūpā buddhiḥ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ tasya tathāvidha dharma ādhāra tvam tat rahita tvam vā vakṣyamāṇāt udāharaṇa lakṣaṇāt mantavyam śiṣṭam anyatas grāhyam 
NM_10,2.522.78	 yathā ca anumāna lakṣaṇe tad pūrvakam iti pratibandha grahaṇa upāya mātram pratipāditam tad svarūpam tu avayava lakṣaṇe nirṇītam udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ tathā vaidharmyāt iti evam iha vādi prativādi prasiddhi mātram dṛṣṭāntasya darśitam rūpam tu tasya dvividham api tatra eva vakṣyatesādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam tad viparyayāt vā viparītam iti 
NM_10,2.522.79	 anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭame yathā ghaṭa eti sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ yat punar anityam na bhavati tat kṛtakam api na bhavati eva yathā aakāśaḥ iti vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathā ukta lakṣaṇa vaikalyāt tu dṛṣṭānta ābhāsa tā bhavati ābhāsa bheda vibhavaḥ kathayiṣyate tuteṣām udāharaṇa lakṣaṇa vāc prasaṅge ābhāsatā vacana doṣa kṛtā api kācitasti iti sā avayava lakṣaṇaḥ eva vācyā dvividhaḥ api dṛṣṭāntaḥ su dṛṣṭibhiḥ yatnataḥ adhigantavyaḥ sa hi niścalaḥ phala nidheḥ anumāna mahā taroḥ skandhaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.80–10,2.522.81	 iti dṛṣṭānta parīkṣā atha siddhānta parīkṣā tantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama saṃsthitiḥ siddhāntaḥ tantryate anena padārtha sthitiḥ iti tantram pramāṇam ucyate adhikaraṇam āśrayaḥ tantram adhikaraṇam yasya saḥ tantra adhikaraṇaḥ pramāṇa mūlakaiti arthaḥ abhyupagamaḥ svīkāraḥ tasya saṃsthitiḥ itthaṃbhāva vyavasthā dharma niyamaḥ idam ittham iti idam iti sāmānya nirdeśaḥ itthamiti viśeṣa nirdeśaḥ evam ca tantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama saṃsthitiḥ pramāṇa mūla abhyupagama viṣayīkṛtaḥ sāmānya viśeṣavān arthaḥ siddhānte iti sāmānya lakṣaṇam uktam bhavati sūtra vyākhyāne pakṣa antaram 
NM_10,2.522.82	 anye tu vyācakṣate tantram itaretara saṃbaddhasya artha samūhasya upadeśaḥ śāstram adhikriyate iti adhikaraṇam pakṣaḥ ucyate abhyupagamaḥ yathā ukta eva saṃsthiti śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate tantra saṃsthitiḥ adhikaraṇa saṃsthitiḥ abhyupagama saṃsthitiḥ iti anena tantra nirdeśa sāmyāt sarva tantra pratitantra siddhāntayoḥ sūcanam itarābhyām padābhyām uttarayoḥ adhikaraṇa bhyupāgama siddhāntayoḥ iti etāt vyākhyāne nyūna tā 
NM_10,2.522.83	 etat tu apavyākhyānam na hi evam siddhānta catuṣṭaya anugatam kiṃcid sāmānya lakṣaṇam uktam bhavati na ca idam vibhāga artham viśeṣa sakṣaṇa artham vā sūtram tad pratipādanasya uttara sūtraiḥ kariṣyamāṇa tvāt uktasya ca punarvacane prayojana abhāvāt atas pūrva prakrameṇa eva siddhāntasya sāmānya lakṣaṇa varṇa naṃśreyaḥ siddhānta vibhāgaḥ lakṣaṇāni ca 
NM_10,2.522.84–10,2.522.86	 tasya sva kaṇṭhena vibhāgam āha sa caturvidhaḥ sarva tantra pratitantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama saṃsthiti artha antara bhāvāt catuṣprakāraḥ hi siddhāntaḥ sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ prati tantra siddhāntar adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti tatra sarva tantra aviruddhaḥ svatantre adhikṛtaḥ arthaḥ sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.87–10,2.522.88	 atra tantra śabdena śāstram uccate sva śāstre yaḥ upadiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ sarva śāstra avirūddhaḥ ca sa sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ yathā cākṣuṣam pramāṇam iti nanu atra api vividante brahma vādinām hi sarvā eva iyam avidyā avidyā ca katham pramāṇam iti na vyavahāra avasthāyām taiḥ api tad prāmāṇya abhyupagamāt saṃkhyā lakṣaṇa viṣaya vipratipattiḥ tu pratiśāstram bhavatu cākṣuṣam pramāṇam iti iyati sarva vādināma vivādaḥ prati tantra siddhānta lakṣaṇam 
NM_10,2.522.89–10,2.522.90	 tantre adhikṛtaḥ arthaḥ iti varthate yathā asmākarma aśvara icchā prerita paramāṇu nirmitāni samāna tantre kaṇa vrata mate tathā eva siddhāni paratantre ca saṃkhyā śāstre tathā na abhyupagamyante iti yathā vā guṇatraya ātmikāyāḥ prakṛteḥ mahat ahaṅkara ādi rūpeṇa bhūta sargati sāṃkhyānām svatantra siddhaḥ arthaḥ samāna tantre api pātaṃjale yoga aśātre siddhaā iva para tattre tu vaiśeṣika ādimate na siddhaḥ iti 
NM_10,2.522.91–10,2.522.92	 nanu ! asya katham pramāṇa mūla tā sthāne praśnaḥ satyam etat āsmākīne hi pratitantra siddhānte pramāṇa mūla tvam yathārtham eva sāṃkhya siddhāntasya tu pramāṇaḥ mūla tva abhāve api paratantra tva khyāpanāya udāhṛtaḥ tad arbhiprāyeṇa vā asya pramāṇa mūla tā vaktavyā iti adhikaraṇa siddhānta lakṣaṇamyat siddhau= anya prakaraṇa siddhaḥ sā adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ prakriyate iti prakaraṇam pakṣaḥ ucyate yasya arthasya siddhau satya aṃprakaraṇa antara siddhiḥ bhavati saḥ adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ tad adhikaraṇānām artha antarāṇām siddheḥ 
NM_10,2.522.93	 kaḥ punar yad siddhau iti sarva nāmnā pratyavamṛśyate pakṣaḥ hetuḥ vā kiṃca atas pakṣaḥ katham pakṣa antara siddhaye kalpate hetunā hi pakṣa siddhiḥ kriyate na pakṣeṇa hetoḥ hetoḥ tu adhikaraṇa siddhānta tve katham siddhānta āśraya anyāya pravṛttiḥ iti tad uddeśa prayojanam varṇitam nyāyaḥ hi hetuḥ eva saḥ eva ca adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ na ca hetuḥ hatvā āśrayaḥ iti siddha sādhya bhāvaḥ āpokṣikaḥ eva 
NM_10,2.522.94–10,2.522.95	 ucyate ubhayathā api adoṣaḥ hetuḥ api kvacid pakṣībhavati pakṣaḥ api hetūbhavati eva tatra tāvadāṃjasyena hetu adhīnā pakṣa siddhiḥ iti hetuḥ eva sarva nāmnā avamṛśyate tad siddhau= anya prakaraṇa siddheḥ saḥ eva adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ katham tarhi tad āśrayā nyāya pravṛttiḥ  ucyate hetuḥ api tad anyatara asiddhaḥ iva sādhyamāna tvāt pakṣībhavat nyāya antara āśraya tām pratipatsyate 
NM_10,2.522.96–10,2.522.97	 api vā pakṣaḥ eva sarva nāmnā avamṛśyamānaḥ bhavatu adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ sa ca spaṣṭaḥ eva nyāyasya āśrayaḥ sa ca sidhyan pakṣa antarāṇi ākṣipan= eva siddhi ati iti adhikaraṇa siddhānta tām bhajate tasya udāharaṇam indriya vyatiriktaḥ jñātā darśana sparśanābhyām ekārtha grahaṇāt iti atra indriya vyatirikte jñātari siddhyati tad anuṣaṅgīṇi artha antarāṇi api siddhyanti nānā indriyāṇi niyata viṣayāṇi guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam iti evamādīni abhyupagama siddhānta nirūpaṇam aparīkṣita abhyupagamāt tad viśeṣa parīkṣaṇaṃabhyupagama siddhāntaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.98	 atra aparīkṣita abhyupagamāt iti yathā śruta paṃcamī nirdeśam anurudhyamānāḥ pramāṇa mūla abhyupagama viṣayīkṛtaḥ arthaḥ siddhāntaḥ iti ca sāmānya lakṣaṇam anusarantaḥ kecid evam vyācakṣate dharmiṇaḥ śabda ādeḥ nitya anitya tva vicāra carcāyām aparīkṣitasya eva ākāśa viśeṣa guṇa tva ādi dharma parīkṣā rahitasya evā abhyupagamaḥ kartavyaḥ tatas aparīkṣita abhyupagamāt kiṃsiddhyati  ucyate tad viśeṣa parīkṣaṇam iti tad gata nityāni tva tva parīkṣaṇaṃhi sāmānyena dharmiṇī upādīyamāne vyoma viśeṣa guṇa tva ādi dharma parīkṣā ra hitesatyupapadyate yadi punar ākāśa viśeṣa guṇa tva viśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ dharmi tvena upādīyate param pratyasiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣaḥ bhavet iti 
NM_10,2.522.99	 evam api kṛte yadi purodharmiṇam vikalpayet kīdṛśasya sataḥ śabdasyabhavatā nitya tvam sādhyate dravyasya guṇasya vā iti saḥ evam vikalpayanartha antara gamanāt tāvat parājitaḥ eva bhavati jitam api enam punar jetum sva buddhi atiśaya cikhya apayiṣayā para buddhi avajñayā ca vādī bravīti astu dravyam śabdaḥ iti pūrva ukta vyākhyāna nirākaraṇam 
NM_10,2.522.100–10,2.522.101	 etat tu vyākhyānam na buddhyāmahe evam vyācakṣāṇānām eṣām abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti kaḥ nu vyavasitaḥ iti yadi tāvat anityaḥ śabda eti dravya tva guṇa tva ādi viśeṣa rahitaḥ śabda ākhya dhami nirdeśaḥ yaḥ prathamam upāttaḥ saḥ eva abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ tatra abhyupāgama arthaḥ krīdṛśaḥ kaḥ ca prati tantra siddhāntāt asya viśeṣaḥ atha astu dravyam śabdaḥ iti sva buddhi atiśaya abhimānena paścāt abhyupagamyamāna dravya tva viśiṣṭa śabda nirdeśaḥ abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ tarhi sūtram aparīkṣita abhyupagamāt iti na yojitam anyatra eva taiḥ sūtra arthaḥ nītaḥ iti 
NM_10,2.522.102–10,2.522.103	 tasmāt evam vyākhyāyate aparīkṣita abhyupagamaḥ eva sva m ati kauśalyena kriyamāṇaḥ abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ astu dravyam śabdaḥ iti pramāṇa mūla abhyupagama viṣayīkaraṇam tu sāmānya lakṣaṇe prauḍha vādī abhiprāyeṇa eva yojyam dravya tvam api pramāṇa mūlam śabdasya bhavatu tathā api tasya anitya tvam iti kila niravayavam dravyam anityam iti na asti eva śabdasya tu tādṛśasya api anitya tvam aham sādhayāmi iti katham tarhi paṃcamī kim paṃcamyā ! vastu tāvat īdṛśam yathā vyākhyatam asmābhiḥ abhyupagamāt iti atra pañcamī arthaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.104	 paṃcami api ca ittham yojyate kimartham punar ayam aparīkṣitaḥ eva śabda gata dravya tva abhyupagamaḥ kriyate iti pṛcchate uttaram paṃcamyā abhidhīyate yasmāt aparīkṣita abhyupagamāt tad viśeṣa anitya tva parīkṣaṇam avakalpate tasmāt aparīkṣita abhyupagamaḥ api abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti na tu tad viśeṣaṇa parīkṣaṇam eva sāmānādhikaraṇya nirdeśāt abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti mantavyam parīkṣaṇasya siddhānta āśrita tvāt tasmāt tad viśeṣa parīkṣaṇa arthaḥ aparīkṣita abhyupagamaḥ prauḍha vādinā kriyamāṇaḥ abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti sūtra arthaḥ ittham eva catatra tatra pravādukānām vyavahāraḥ imāḥ ca siddhānta bhidāḥ catasraḥ nyāya pravṛtteḥ prathamam nimittam pravartate na eva parīkṣakāṇāṃana āśritā nyāya kathā kadācid 
NM_10,2.522.105–10,2.522.107	 iti prayojana parikṣā nyāya avayava parīkṣā iha hi svayam avagatam artham anumānena parasmai pratipādayatā sādhanīyasya arthasya yāvati śabda samūhe siddhiḥ parisamāpyate tāvān prayoktavyaḥ tam eva ca para artha anumānam ācakṣate nīti vidaḥ para artha anumāna nirākaraṇa pūrvapakṣaḥ nanu ! na eva parārthānumānam nāma kiṃcid astiḥ vaktṛ apekṣayā śrotra pekṣayāvā tad anupapatteḥ vaktra anvamāyi sa hi arthaḥ na idānīm anumīyate śrotuḥ sva artha anumānam tat vākya avagati hetukam yathā pratyakṣatas dhūmam dṛṣṭavā agnim avagacchati tathā tadīyāt vacanāt iti kasya parārtha tā āgamaḥ tu eṣa bhidyeta kaścid artha upadeśakaḥ kaścid tad pratyaya upāya nyāya mārga upadeśakaḥ iti para artha anumāna sādhanam 
NM_10,2.522.108	 satyam na paramārthataḥ para artham anumānam upapadyate kintu dvividhaḥ pratipattā svayam avagata yathā prakṛta liṅga vyāptikaḥ tad viparītaḥ ca tatra svayam avadhṛta pratibandham prati na upadiśyate evam anumānam svatas eva tasya ti iti upapatteḥ anavadhṛta vyāptikasya tu vyāptiḥ eva vyutpādyate iti taṃprati para artham anumānam tad upadeśakam vākyam eva ākhyāyate tathā hi vaktrā sva pratyayena idam na hi vākyam prayujyate paraḥ mad vacanāt eva tam artham buddhyatām iti kim tu enam anumānena bodhayāmi iti manyate saḥ api tad vacanāt na eva tam artham avabuddhyate kintu vyāptimataḥ liṅgāt svayam tat tu na paśyati tad prati iti abhyupāya tvāt para artham idam ucyate 
NM_10,2.522.109–10,2.522.110	 atas ca śrotuḥ sva artha anumānam eva idam vaktā tu tathā param pratipādayan para artha anumānam prayuṅktaḥ iti ucyate para artha anumānasya pramāṇa tvam na ca anuvāda mātram tat vaktuḥ iti upapadyate yatas vyāpriyate samyak parasya pratipattaye tena anadhigata artha upadeśaka tvāt na anuvāda mātram sva avagama apekṣayā tu anuvāda tve nedānīm āpta vacanam ananuvāda rūpam kiṃcid bhavet sarvasya sva upalabdhi pūrvaka tvāt iti 
NM_10,2.522.111–10,2.522.112	 tasmāt para artha anumāna vākya upapatteḥ tad eka deśāḥ avayavāḥ yuktāḥ itilakṣyante pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanayana nigamanāni avayavāḥ etat ca sūtram ekam eva sāmānya lakṣaṇam avayavānām abhidhatte vibhāgam ca pramāṇānām iva pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabdāḥ pramāṇāni iti tatra ava yavāḥ bhāgāḥ aṃśāḥ eka deśāḥ iti evam avayava śabdaḥ sādhanīya artha pratipatti paryanta vacana kalāpa eka deśa tvam avayavānām sāmānya lakṣaṇam ācaṣṭe nyāyasya vākya samudāya rūpa tvam 
NM_10,2.522.113	 yadi api ca eka vadana vinirgatānām nisarga bhaṅgurāṇām adīrgha āyuṣām aparihārya krama janmanām varṇānām drumāṇām iva pāramārthika ssamūhaḥ na samatti eva tathā api siṣā dhayiṣita artha pratipādana rūpa eka kārya upayoga mūlīkṛta ātmanām teṣāṃkālpanikaḥ kalāpaḥ pūrvam eva vākya kalpanā avasare samarthitaḥ iti tad bhāgāḥ apisaṃbhavanti eva padānām api vākya tvam 
NM_10,2.522.114–10,2.522.115	 na ca padānām eva anumāna vākya avayava tvam api tu khaṇḍa vākyānām ekaikena padena pratijñā udāharaṇa ādīnām abhidhātum aśakyatvāt hetu vacanam tuekam api padam kvacid bhavati kṛtaka tvāt iti tat api vā sa viśeṣaṇaṃprayujyamānam pada samudāyena eva pratipādyate vastu tve sati kṛtaka tvāt iti udāharaṇa vacanam api ghaṭa vat iti ālasyāt eva prayuṃjate tat hi vyāpti pradarśanāya evam vaktavyam yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti 
NM_10,2.522.116–10,2.522.119	 tasmāt avayavān ām avayatvam eva lakṣaṇam na padatvam vibhāgaḥ api pratijña ādi pada sannidhau= avayava śruteḥ eva avagamyate pratijña ādayaḥ paṃca avayavāḥ na nyūnāḥ na atiriktāḥ iti avayava saṃkhyā vimarśaḥ nanu atra vivadante kecid nūna tām avayavānām ācakṣate tri avayavaṃdvi avayavam vā sādhana vākyam vadantaḥ anye tu jijñāsā saṃśayaḥ śakya prāptiḥ prayojanam saṃśaya vyudāsā eti paṃcabhiḥ saha pratijña ādīn daśa avayavān āhuḥ pakṣa antara nirākaraṇam 
NM_10,2.522.120–10,2.522.122	 ucyate nyūna tā yathā avasaram pratisamādhāsyate ādhikyam api ayuktam jijñāsā ādīnām aśabda svabhāva tvena vākya avayava tva ayogāt tathā hi apratīyamāne arthe pratīti prayojanasya pravartikā jijñāsā sā ca icchā svabhāva tvāt āntaraḥ pramātṛ dharmaḥ na vākya avayavaḥ artha kriyā sādhane arthe vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ kim eva m ayam ayathā evam iti saḥ api jñāna ātmaka tvāt na vākya avayavaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.123–10,2.522.126	 pramātuḥ pramāṇāni pravartamānāni prameyam arpayitum pārayanti iti sambhāvanā śakya prāptiḥ sā api tathā eva na vākya avayavaḥ prayojanam saṃśayitasya nirṇayaḥ katham vākya avayava tām spṛśet saṃśaya vyudāsaḥ tu pratyakṣa upālambhaḥ sa ca vacana svabhāva tve api na sādhana vākyasya avayava tvam pratipadyate tat ime saṃśaya ādayaḥ prakaraṇa pravṛtti hetavaḥ bhavanti na vākya avayava aiti sūktam pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamanāni avayavāḥ iti pratijñā lakṣaṇam 
NM_10,2.522.127–10,2.522.128	 teṣām sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā pratijñā iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ sādhya nidaśaḥ iti lakṣaṇam śuddhasya dharmiṇaḥ vā dharmasya vā dvayoḥ vā svatantrayoḥ dharmi viśiṣṭasya vā dharmasi asādhya tva anupapatteḥ dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī sādhyaḥ iti anumāna lakṣaṇe nirṇītam etat tasya nirdeśaḥ parigraha vacanam pratijñā iti pratijñā lakṣaṇasya duṣṭa tva ākṣepaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.129–10,2.522.130	 nanu ! sa avadhāraṇa tvāt vākyānām kim sādhya nirdeśaḥ eva pratijñā iti avadhāraṇam uta pratijñā eva sādhya nirdeśaḥ iti yadi sādhya sideśaḥ eva pratijñā iti avadhāryate tadā yatas evakāra karaṇam tatas anyatra avadhāraṇam iti pratijñā niyamyate sādhya nirdeśam mā hāsīḥ iti sādhya nirdeśaḥ tu aniyamitaḥ iti pratijñām apahāya api bhavet iti ati vyāpa kaṃlakṣaṇam 
NM_10,2.522.131–10,2.522.132	 atha pratijñā eva sādhya nirdeśaḥ iti avadhāryate tatas sādhya nirdeśaḥ niyamyatepratijñām mā tyākṣīt iti pratijñā tu aniyamitā iti sādhya nirdeśam apahāya apibhavet iti sādhya nirdeśena pratijñāyāḥ avyāpta tvāt avyāpakam lakṣaṇam iti ukta doṣa parihāraḥ tat etat ayuktam na hi sarvam vākyam sa avadhāraṇam bhavati yathā āeṣa panthāḥ srughnam gacchati iti na hi tatra eṣaḥ eva iti srughnam eva iti vā āgacchati eva iti vā niyantum śakyate iti 
NM_10,2.522.133	 atha api avadhāraṇam amaśya āśrayaṇīyam tat bhavatu sādhya nirdeśaḥ eva pratijñati na ca ativyāptiḥ pratijñām apahāya ani atra sādhya nirdeśasya adarśanāt aniyamitaḥ api asau= anyatra na ca dṛśyate eva iti tasmāt sādhyatiḥ deśaā iva pratijñā iti sthitam tat yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti viśeṣaṇasya sva viruddha dharma mātra vyāvartaka tvam 
NM_10,2.522.134	 nanu ! atra api kim anityaḥ eva śabdaḥ iti avadhāraṇam uta śabda ā iva anityaḥ iti tatra anityaḥ eva śabdaḥ iti ukte tad gata dharma antara tiraskārāt kṛtaka tvam api tatra na bhavet iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ śabdaḥ eva anityaḥ iti tu avadhāryamāṇe ghaṭa ādau= anitya tva pratiṣedhāt anvaya śūnyatā hetoḥ syāt iti na eṣa doṣaḥ niravadhāraṇasya api vacana prayogasya darśita tvāt anityaā iva śabdaḥ iti avadhāraṇe vā na anitya tva vyatirikta tad aviruddha kṛtaka tva ādi aśeṣa dharma antara niṣedhaḥ tatra vidhīyate kintu tad viruddha nitya tva mātra niṣedhaḥ eva anityaḥ eva śabdaḥ na nityaḥ iti arthaḥ tat uktam niyamaḥ tad viruddhāt ca kalpyate na avirodhinaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.135–10,2.522.136	 iti tasmāt na hetoḥ asiddha tvam pratijñā vākya vaiyarthya śaṅkā nanu ! sādhana vākye pratijñā vacanam asamaṃcatam asādhana aṃga vacana tvāt hetu dṛṣṭānta vacanābhyām hi sādhya siddheḥ te eva vaktavye na ca sva pratipattau= upalabdham sarvam eva parasmai ākhyeyam ākhyāne vā dharmi mātram ākhyāyatām sva pratipattau hi pūrvam parvata ādeḥ śuddhasya dharmiṇaḥ grahaṇam siṣā dhayiṣita hutavaha ādi dharma viśeṣa rūṣita vapuṣaḥ evam abhyupagame anumāna vaiphalya prasaṅgāt atas katham prathamam eva sādhya dharma adhyāsita svarūpa dharmi nirdeśa karaṇam 
NM_10,2.522.137–10,2.522.138	 api ca vivādāt eva pratijñā arthau labhyate iti kim sva kaṇṭha uktena tena prayojanam pratijñā vākyasya avaśyaka tā ucyate sva pratipattim anusaratā parasya pratipattiḥ utpādanīyā iti sva pratipattau prathamam upalabdhaḥ dharmī tāvat ākhyeyaḥ eva anucyamāne hidharmiṇi niradhikaraṇaḥ hetuḥ ku asādhyam sādhayet dharmiṇī anavacchinne cadharma mātre anumānam anarthakam avivāda siddha tvāt asti hi yatra kvacita nitya tvam iti 
NM_10,2.522.139–10,2.522.140	 āśraya asiddhaḥ ca dharmi nirdeśāt vinā hetuḥ navet iti avaśya nirdeśyaḥ dharmaḥ yadi api dharmi mātra darśanam eva prathamam abhūt tathā api kim sādhayitumeṣa hetuḥ prayuktaḥ bhavet iti upaplava śamanāya sādhya dharma nirdeśaḥ api kartavyaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti hi prayujyamānam tat idam andha padam iva asādhanam bhavet udāharaṇa ādinā pratijñāyāḥ na anyathā siddhiḥ 
NM_10,2.522.141	 atha vyāpti pradarśana pravaṇena yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam iti dṛṣṭānta vacasā tasmāt anityaḥ iti nigamana vacanena vā viraṃsyati saḥ upaplava eti tathā api śrotṛ bubhutsa uparam apariśrama phale sādhana vākye sādhana adhigama ākāṅkṣā saṃpādanāya sādhyam nirdeṣṭavyam na hi śabdaḥ iti etau= atī ukte tatrasādhanam ākāṅkṣati kaścid iti sādhana vacana avasara tad prayoga sāphalya utpādanāya eva nūnam anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñā vacanam prayoktavyam pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ eva pratijñā 
NM_10,2.522.142	 yat ca vivādāt eva pratijñā arthasya labdha tvam abhidhīyate tad abhyupagamanam eva śabda antareṇa pratijñāyāḥ yatas viruddhaḥ vādaḥ vivādaḥ ekaḥ āha nityaḥ śabdaḥ itaraḥ tu anityaḥ iti āha saḥ ayam pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ vivādaḥ pratijñā eva sa tu pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ tat ahar eva bhavatu dina antar eva iti kim anena viśeṣeṇa aparihāryam pratijñā vacanam iti pakṣa ābhāsānām pratijñātvā asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.143–10,2.522.144	 pratijñā eva ca pakṣaḥ iti ucyate tat evaṃvidhe pakṣa lakṣaṇe pradarśite balāt pakṣa ābhāsāḥ pratikṣiptāḥ bhavanti tat yathā anuṣṇaḥ agniḥ iti pratyakṣa viruddhaḥ pakṣaḥ na rūpa grāhi cakṣuḥ iti anumāna viruddhaḥ śabda viruddhaḥ tu bahu śākhaḥ brāhmaṇena surā peyāḥ iti agāma viruddhaḥ janayitrī me vandhyā pitā me brahmacārī iti dharmi dharma padayoḥ eva vipratiṣedhāt sva vacana viruddhaḥ na candraḥ śaśī iti loka prasiddhi viruddhaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.145–10,2.522.146	 upamāna viruddhaḥ tu na gavaya pada vācyaḥ ayam go sadṛśaḥ iti aprasiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ nabhaḥ kusuma kṛta avataṃsaḥ caitraḥ iti aprasiddha viśeṣyaḥ sugandhi gagana kamalam iti aprasiddha ubhayaḥ kha puṣpa kṛta śekharaḥ vandhyā sutaḥ iti siddhasāsya pakṣa abhāsata yatra api viśeṣi aṇaya ūrūbhayoḥ api pramāṇantarataḥ svarūpam niścitam eva tat nirdeśaḥ api pakṣa ābhāsaḥ eva śītam tuhinam uṣṇaḥ agniḥ itisādhya tva abhāvena anumāna prayoga avasara virahāt iti iyam eva ca sa asiddha sādhyatocyate iti sarveṣām api hetu doṣa tvam evam 
NM_10,2.522.147	 ye ca ete pratyakṣa viruddha tā ādayaḥ pakṣa doṣāḥ ye ca vakṣyamāṇāḥ sādhana vikala tva ādayaḥ dṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ te vastu sthityā sarve hetu doṣāḥ eva prapaṃca mātram tu pakṣa dṛṣṭānta doṣa varṇanam tathā ca ābādhita tvam hetu lakṣaṇam eva uktam dṛṣṭānta duṣṭa tayā ca hetoḥ eva lakṣaṇam anvaya vyatirekayoḥ anyat hīyate iti sarve ca te hetu doṣāḥ eva atas eva ca śāstre asmin muninā tattva darśinā pakṣa ābhāsa ādayaḥ na uktāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ tu darśitāḥ kaścid hetu anapekṣaḥ api pakṣa mātra pratiṣṭhitaḥ bodhaḥ anumāna arūpasya svāvākya ādi kṛtaḥ yathā hetu parīkṣā 
NM_10,2.522.148–10,2.522.149	 evam lakṣaṇakaḥ hetuḥ iti tad svarūpa avadhāraṇam sati tad abhidhāyakam vacanaṃmukham eva lakṣyate iti artha ātmaka hetu lakṣaṇam tāvat ucyate udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti nanu ! artha ātmakaḥ hetuḥ anumānam tat ca lakṣitam eva pūrvam tad pūrvakam trividham anumānam iti satyam tatra tad pūrvakam iti sarva nāmnā parāmṛṣṭa pratyakṣa mūla tā upavarṇanena pratibandha pariccheda upāya mātra nirūpaṇaṃkṛtam iha tu pratibandha svarūpam api pratipādyate sūtre pāṭha bhedaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.150	 tatrā hi artha ātmake hetau lakṣye paṃcamīm apāsyaḥ uvāharaṇa sādharmyesādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti sūtram paṭhanti vyācakṣate ca sādharmyam hetuḥ iti ucyamāne gandhavat tva ādeḥ asādhāraṇa hetoḥ sādhya dharmi vyakti bheda vṛtti tvena sādharmya rūpa saṃbhavāt viruddhasya ca pakṣa vipakṣa vṛtteḥ tad sādharmya svabhāvat tvāt hetu tvaṃprasajyate iti tad nivṛtti artham udāharaṇa grahaṇam udāhriyate asmin sādhya sādhanayoḥ prayojya prayojaka bhāvaḥ iti udāharaṇam dṛṣṭāntaḥ tena sādharmyaṃkasya iti prakṛta tvāt pratyāsatteḥ ca sādhya dharmiṇaḥ iti avagamyate udāharaṇa sādharmye sādhya dṛṣṭānta dharmi sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ hetuḥ iti nāsā dhāraṇa ādau tathā avipra saktiḥ iti sādhya sādhana dala prayojanam 
NM_10,2.522.151	 evam api prameya tva ādeḥ anaikāntika hetoḥ tathā bhāga asiddhasya anitya tva siddhaye caturvidha paramāṇu pakṣīkaraṇe gandhavat tvādeḥ prakaraṇa sama kāla atyaya apadiṣṭayoḥ ca udāharaṇa sādharmya saṃbhavāt hetu tvam bhavet iti tad vyavacchedāya sādhya sādhana grahaṇam sādhya dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇoḥ ca samānaḥ dharma sādhyaḥ api anitya tva ādiḥ bhavati eva iti tasya api hetu tā mā prasāṅkṣīt iti sādhya sādhana grahaṇam liṅga sāmānya lābha artham sādhya sādhanam yat udāharaṇa sādharmyam sa hetuḥ iti 
NM_10,2.522.152–10,2.522.153	 sādhya sādhana śabdena ca pratibandhaḥ lakṣyate sa ca savyabhicāra ādiṣu na asti iti na te hetavaḥ pratibandhaḥ ca paṃca lakṣaṇakaḥ iti eka eka lakṣaṇa apāya kṛta hetvābhāsa paṃcaka nirdeśāt eva sūtritavān ācāryaḥ udāharaṇa sādharmya dala prayojanam nanu ! evam tarhi sādhya sādhana grahaṇam eva hetu lakṣaṇam astu tat hi sakala hetu ābhāsa vyudāsa samartham iti kim uda āharaṇa sādharmya grahaṇena na samāna jātīya vyavaccheda artha tvāt ahetavaḥ hi vijātīyāḥ tad vyavacchedaḥ sādhya sādhana grahaṇāt samāna jātīyasya kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ vyavacchedāya audāha raṇa sādharmya grahaṇam iti kevala anvayi hetu vimarśaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.154	 tat kim kevala anvayī hetuḥ iti lakṣya tvena vivakṣitaḥ na tathāvidhasya hetoḥ abhāvāt anvaya vyatirekavān eva lakṣyaḥ tatra udāharaṇa sādharmya vaidharmya saṃbhave tu sati sādharmyam api asti eva iti na sa avadhāraṇam vā viśeṣa vidhi rūpeṇa eva ida sudāha raṇa sādharmya grahaṇam kevala anvayi lakṣaṇam varṇanīyam iti hetu sāmānya lakṣaṇam 
NM_10,2.522.155	 nanu ! yadi dvividhaḥ hetuḥ iṣyate tarhi sāmānya lakṣaṇam ādau vaktavyamtatas viśeṣa lakṣaṇam iti ucyate sādhya sādhana grahaṇam eva pratibandha sūca kaṃsāmānya lakṣaṇam bhaviṣyati udāharaṇa sādharmya grahaṇam tu anvaya vyatirekiṇaḥ lakṣaṇam uttara sūtram ca kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ kevala anvayī hetuḥ na asti eva iti evam paṃcamīm upekṣya artha ātmaka hetu lakṣaṇam ācakhyuḥ prasiddha sautra pāṭha nirvāhaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.156	 api vā bhavatu tatra api saṃśaya vyavaccheda phalaḥ paṃcamī pāṭhaḥ kaścid evam abhidadhīta sādhya sādhanam iti paryāya paṭhana mātram etat na hetu lakṣaṇam api ca yatra eva vṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi hetu dharma prayukta tayā sādhya dhamaḥ avadhāritaḥ tatra eva punar asābu palabhyamānaḥ tam upasthāpayatu dharmi antare tutad upalambhāt bhavatu saṃśayaḥ kim tat sādhyāvinābhūtam iha hetoḥ sattvam uta anyathā iti tasya idam uttaram ucyate udāharaṇa sādharmyāt iti pañcamī artha varṇanam 
NM_10,2.522.157–10,2.522.158	 ayam arthaḥ deśa kāla vyakti viśeṣāṇām vyabhicārāt na teṣu pratibandha avadhāraṇam api tu sāmānya dharmayoḥ eva vyakti bheda āśraya tve hi na eva vyāpti grahaḥ bhavet dṛṣṭānte api abhyanujñā evam bhavatā dīyate katham tad abhyanujñānāt tu sāmānyena vyapti grahaṇam aṅgīkṛtam eva bhavati tasmin= ca sati udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam eva bhavati na saṃśayaḥ saṃśayasya viśeṣa agrahaṇa kāraṇaka tvāt iha ca udāharaṇa sādharmya pada upāttaṃliṅga sāmānyam eva viśeṣaḥ gṛhyate iti kutas saṃśayaḥ hetoḥ pañca lakṣaṇaka tvam 
NM_10,2.522.159	 sādhya sādhana padam api na paryāya mātram api tu paṃca lakṣaṇaka pratibandha sūcanena hetoḥ hetu tva samarthana artham eva kasmāt hetuḥ hetuḥ bhavati sādhya sādhana tvāt gamaka tvāt iti arthaḥ sādhya sādhana tā ca asya paṃca lakṣaṇakāt pratibandhāt vinā na nirvahati iti asau sādhya sādhana padena lakṣyate saḥ api caprayojya prayojaka bhāva garbhaḥ sādhana tā aṅgatām eti iti tathāvidhaḥ eva sūcyate 
NM_10,2.522.160–10,2.522.163	 atas eva ca aprayojakaḥ eva ekaḥ paramārthataḥ hetvābhāsaḥ iti vakṣyate tat idam īdṛśam sādhya sādhana tvam hetoḥ kutas bhavati iti udāharaṇa sādharmyāt iti saṃśayam vyavacchindantyā paṃcamyā kathyate diṅnāga ukta dūṣaṇa uddhāraḥ atas ca yat ucyate paraiḥ sādharmyam yadi hetuḥ syāt na vākya aṃśaḥ na paṃcamī iti tat idam anupapannam paṃcamyāḥ artha ātmaka tve hetau= anupayogāt tatra api vā tasyāssamarthita tvāt vākya aṃśe lakṣaṇa antara karaṇāt tat ca idam idānīm ucyate udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ yathā uktāt udāharaṇa sādharmyāt vivakṣā ādi krameṇa yat vacanam pravartate sa hetuḥ 
NM_10,2.522.164–10,2.522.166	 yadi api ca jñānasya api udāharaṇa sādharmyāt kam aṃbhūtāt karaṇa ātmakā dvā abhavati abhinirvṛttiḥ tathā api vākya avayava karaṇa sāmarthyāt vacanam avasīyate yadi vākya avayava karaṇam idam kimartham tarhi artha vyutpādanam  uktam atra tad aupayika tvāt iti sādhya sādhana grahaṇam vacana lakṣaṇe kimartham hetvābhāsa vacana nirasanam artha ātmaka hetu nirasanāt eva hi siddham na hetvābhāsa vacana vyavaccheda artham tat kintu hetu vacana viśeṣa pratipatti artham na sva rūpa mātra nirdeśa kaṃvacanam kṛtaka tvam iti evamādi prayoktavyam api tu hetu vibhakti antam kṛtaka tvāt iti kṛtaka tvena iti kṛtakaḥ ayam asmāt itibā abhidhātavyam evam hi tat sādhya sādhanam bhavati iti tathā vaidharmyāt 
NM_10,2.522.167	 udāharaṇa grahaṇam anuvartate sādhya sādhanam iti ca etat ca tathā śabda upādāna sāmarthyāt gamyate udāharaṇa vaidharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ atra api artha ātmaka hetu upūrva kanvāt tat vacanasya artha ātmakaḥ eva hetuḥ prathamam prayujyatā eti tad lakṣaṇāya pūrvavat paṃcamī pāṭha śūnyam eva sūtram varṇayanti vaidharmyaṃhetuḥ iti ucyamāne pakṣa vaidharmyasya api vipakṣa vṛtteḥ aśeṣa aśva vyakti pakṣīkaraṇe turagāḥ ime viṣāṇi tvāt iti evamādeḥ hetu tvam syāt iti udāharaṇa grahaṇam 
NM_10,2.522.168–10,2.522.169	 tathā api asādhāraṇa ādeḥ udāharaṇa vaidharmyasya hetu tā prasajyate iti pūrvavat sādhya sādhana grahaṇam pratibandha sūcakam sakala hetvābhāsa vyavacchedakam yojanīyam tasmāt eva sakala hetvābhāsa vyavaccheda siddheḥ udāharaṇa vaidharmya grahaṇam samāna jātīya anvaya vyatireki hetu vyavacchedāya vyākhyeyam anvaya vyatireki vailakṣaṇyam kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.170	 nanu ! yaidharmya śabdaḥ kevala anvayinam eva hetum avyatirekam vyavacchet tum alam tasya vardhami aṃśūnyatvāt anvaya vyatirekiṇaḥ tu hetoḥ udāharaṇa sādharmya vat tad vaidharmyasya api bhāvāt katham anena vyāvartanam ucyate vaidharmya śabda upādānāt kevala anvayinaḥ yathā nivṛttiḥ gamyate tadvat anvaya vyatirekiṇaḥ sādhya sādhana śabdaḥ hi pratibandha upalakṣaṇaḥ vyākhyātaḥ pratibandhaḥ ca vyatireka anvaya ātmakaḥ vaidharmya sādhane api asmin saḥ eva yadi varṇyate pūrvatra kathanāt vyartham vaidharmya grahaṇam bhavet kevala vyatireka ākhya pratibandha abhidhitsayā vaidharmya vacanam tasmāt saphalam vyavatiṣṭhate adhyāhṛtā evakāram vā tat vyudāsāya paṭhyatām viśeṣa vidhi rūpeṇa vyākhyānam vā vidhīyatām kevala anvayi hetuḥ ca na kaścid upalabhyate tena pūrva uktaḥ eva asya vyavacchedyaḥ bhaviṣyati pūrva sūtre avadhāraṇa abhāvaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.171–10,2.522.172	 nanu ! evam tarhi anena eva nyāyena pūrva sūtram kevala ātvayi lakṣaṇa artham syāt yathā iha vaidharmi aṃgrahaṇam sādharmya vyavacchedakam evam tatra sādharmya grahaṇam vaidharmya vyavacchedāya syāt iti uktam atra na kevala anvayī nāma hetuḥ saṃbhavati iti alakṣaṇīyaḥ eva asau tat evam anvaya vyatirekavataḥ hetoḥ lakṣaṇāya pūrva sūtram idam tu kevalalī atireki lakṣaṇāya iti sthitam pañcamī anta pada pāṭha pakṣaḥ artha ātmaka hetu lakṣaṇa pakṣe api paṃcamī pāṭhaḥ pūrvavat saṃśaya parākaraṇa phala tvena varṇanīyaḥ vacana ātmaka hetu lakṣaṇe api tathā eva sūtram yojyam yathā ukta vaidharmyāt pravṛttam vacanam sādhya sādhanam hetu vibhakti antam prayoktavyam iti kevala vyatireki nirākaraṇam 
NM_10,2.522.173	 tat etat ākṣipanti lakṣye sati lakṣaṇam vaktavyam bhavati kevala vyatirekī tu nāma na samasti eva hetuḥ iti kasya idam lakṣaṇam ucyate pratibandhena hi hetoḥ gamaka tvam uktam pratibandhaḥ ca paṃca lakṣaṇakaḥ vyākhyātaḥ ekaika lakṣaṇa viraha nibandhanāḥ ca paṃca hetvābhāsāḥ bhaviṣyanti tat pakṣa dharma tva virahiṇā eva asiddhasya hetoḥ anvaya śūnyasya api na hetu tā yuktāḥ kevala vyatireka mātra śaraṇena hetunā sādhya siddhau tathāvidha siddhi subhikṣa saṃbhavāt yat yasmairocate sa tat sarvam sādhyet asādhāraṇasya vā kim iti hetu tvam vyatirekavataḥ apinā iṣyate kevala vyatireka vyāpteḥ asādhaka tvam 
NM_10,2.522.174–10,2.522.175	 api ca anvayasya aparicchedāt vyatireke api saṃśayaḥ sādhya abhāva kṛtā tasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ uta vā anyathā anvaye hi kvacid gṛhīte anyatra hetu vyāvṛttiḥ avagamyamānā sādhya vyāvṛtti kṛtā eva iti avadhāryate na itarathā ittham eva ca sandigdha vyatireka tā vyāvartate na anyathā iti sandigdha vyatireke ca sādhya sādhana tā katham lakṣya abhāvādatas ca idam kathyate tasya lakṣaṇam kevala vyatirekya bhāve sūtra nirvahiḥ 
NM_10,2.522.176	 tasmāt na sādhya sādhana grahaṇena hetu dvaya sāmānya lakṣaṇam abhidhāya udāharaṇa sādharmya grahaṇena anvaya vyatirekiṇaḥ lakṣaṇam udāharaṇa vaidharmya grahaṇena ca kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ varṇanīyam api tu sūtra dvayena ekasya eva anvaya vyatirekavataḥ hetoḥ lakṣaṇam vyākhyeyam anvaya vyatirekayoḥ gamaka aṅga tvāt ekena anvayanirūpaṇam apareṇa ca sūtreṇa vyatireka vyutpādanam atas eva bhāṣya kāraḥ kim etāvat hetu lakṣaṇam na iti ucyate tathā vaidharmyāt iti eka vākya tayā eva vyākhyātavān udāharaṇam api ca sūtra dvaye tulyam eva anvaya vyatireki hetoḥ uktavān utpatti dharmaka tvāt iti kevala vyatireki sādhanam 
NM_10,2.522.177	 atra vadanti yadi vayam kaṃcana śuṣkam eva kevala vyatirekiṇam hetum upagacchema tatas evam anuyujyemahi kintu anvaya vyatireka vān eṣu hetuḥ kvacid sādhya viśeṣe viśeṣaṇa vaśāt kevala vyatireki tām abalambataḥ iti brūmaḥ tat yathā icchā ādi gatam kārya tvam ātma siddhau tatra hi kāryatva mātraṃāśrita tva mātreṇa vyāptam upalabdham anvaya vyatireka yuktam eva ghaṭa ādeḥ kāryasya āśritasya dṛṣṭa tvāt yatra ca āśrita tvam na asti tatra kāryatvam api na asti eva vyoma ādau saḥ ayam anvaya vyatirekavān eva hetuḥ yadā paridṛśyamāna śarīra ādi āśraya vyatirikta āśraya āśrita tve sādhye deha ādiṣu bādhaka upapattau satyām kāryatvāt iti sa viśeṣaṇaḥ prayujyate tadā kevala vyatirekī saṃpadyate deha ādi yati riktasya āśrayasya ātmanaḥ nitya parokṣa tvena anvaya anupalambhāt iti 
NM_10,2.522.178–10,2.522.179	 dṛśasya ca anvaya mūlasya tasyām daśāyām kevala vyatirekitām upagatasyu hetutva upagamāt na pūrva ukta doṣa avasaraḥ na hi īdṛśā hetunā sarvaḥ sarvaṃsādhayitum utsahate na ca asādhāraṇasya hetu tvam ittham sthite prasajyeta paṃca lakṣaṇa tvam api pūrva āśraya apekṣam asya bhaviṣyati kevala vyatirekiṇi doṣa uddhāraḥ yat ca sandigdha vyatireki tvam āśaṅkitam tat api anvaya vyatireka mūlekevala vyatirekiṇi niravakāśam kāryasya āśritasya upalambhāt aśrita tva vyāvṛttyā vyoma ādau ca kāryatva vyāvṛtti darśanāt idānīm ghaṭa ādau śarīrā ivā sa viśeṣa vyāvṛttiḥ dṛśyamānā viśiṣṭa āśraya vyāvṛtti kṛtā eva avagamya taiti na sandigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ etat ca ātma siddhi prasaṅge nirṇīta miti nirapavādaḥ kevala vyatirekī hetuḥ asti eva lakṣyaḥ iti tad lakṣaṇa artham uttara sūtram anvaya vyatireki hetu lakṣaṇa artham pūrva sūtram kevala anvayī hetuḥ na asti eva sāmānya lakṣaṇe tu anumāna lakṣaṇa vat sādhya sādhana padāt vā avagantavyam bhāṣya virodha parihāraḥ 
NM_10,2.522.180–10,2.522.181	 bhāṣya akṣarāṇi tu kāmam upekṣiṣyāmahe athavā yathā kartha cit vāvya ākhyāsyāmaḥ kevala vyatirekiṇam tu īdṛśam ātma ādi prasādhane paramam astram upekṣitum na śaknumaḥ iti ayathābhāṣyam api vyākhyānam śreyaḥ udāharaṇa nirūpaṇam sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam yathā tad pūrvakam anumānam iti atra pratibandha grahaṇa upāya mātram pratipāditam iha tu pratibandha svarūpam udāharaṇa sādharmyam uktam evam laukika parīkṣakāṇāṃyasmin= arthe buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti atram vādi prativādi pratipanna tvam dvividhasya api dṛṣṭāntasya sāmānya lakṣaṇam uktam iha tu prayojya prayojaka bhāva vyavasthita sādhya sādhana dharma adhikaraṇa tvam ekasya dvitīyasya ca tad rahita tvaṃlakṣaṇam upapādyate udāharaṇa sūtra vivaraṇam 
NM_10,2.522.182–10,2.522.184	 tatra sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī iti sādharmya dṛṣṭāntasya lakṣaṇam vacana adhikāre api artha ātmaka dṛṣṭānta cintanam tad aupayika tvāt hetu vat kartavyam sādhyaḥ dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī tena sādharmyam samānaḥ dharmaḥ liṅga sāmānyam yat udāharaṇa sādharmyam pūrvam uktam tat eva dviṣṭha tvāt ubhābhyām vyapadiśyate iti iha ca sādhya sādharmya padena uktam tasmāt sādhya sādharmyāt yaḥtad dharma bhāvī tasya sādhyasya dharmaḥ nitya tva ādiḥ yasmin bhavati saḥ tad dharma bhāvī paṃcamyā prayojaka tvam ucyate hetu dharma prayuktaḥ hi sādhya dharmaḥ yatra asti saḥ sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti arthaḥ saḥ eva ca vacasaḥ karmatāṃpratipadyamānaḥ udāharaṇam bhavati iti artha vacana vācinoḥ dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇa śabdayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam aviruddham dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva anvaya khyāpakena vacanena ucyamānaḥ udāharaṇam iti ukte sati tat abhidhāyakam vacanam udāharaṇam bhavati eva yat yat kṛtakam tat tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti kāryeṇa kāraṇa anumānasya api saṃgrahaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.185	 nanu ! evam yatra hetu kṛtā sādharmyavattā yathā jaladhara unnamana vṛṣṭi ādau tādṛśaḥ evam dṛṣṭānte upadiṣṭaḥ bhavet na yatra sādhya dharma kṛtā hetu sattā yathādhūma anumānaḥ iti adarśana jñaḥ devānāṃpriyaḥ na atra utpatti apekṣayā prayojya prayojaka bhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ kintu jñapti abhiprāyeṇa jñaptau ca dhumaḥ eva agneḥ prayojaka tām pratipadyate na hi dhūma agnyoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvena gabhya gamaka bhāvaḥ kintu nitya sāhacaryeṇa eva niyama nāmnā saṃbandhena iti asakṛt uktam kāraka jñāpaka rūpa hetu dvaividhyam dhūmaḥ svarūpataḥ nāma jāyatām jātavedasaḥ agniḥ tu na ākṣipati enam saḥ eva hi agnim ākṣipet prayojaka tvam agneḥ ca paṃcamyā yadi kathyate yatra yatra agniḥ iti evam tat nirdeśaḥ prasajyate yasya prayojaka tvam hi cikhyā payiṣitam bhavet yat śabdena ca pūrvatra sa hi nirdeśam arhati bhavet evam ca hetu tvam dhūmam prati vibhāvasoḥ na ca tat yujyate vaktum anaikāntika doṣataḥ prayojaka tvam icchanti tasmāt na utpatti apekṣayā api tu jñapti abhiprāyam hetoḥ eva ucitam ca tat 
NM_10,2.522.186–10,2.522.187	 tasmāt hetu dharma prayuktaḥ sādhya dharmaḥ yatra khyāpyate sa sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ tat vacanam udāharaṇam iti siddham vaidharmya udāharaṇam tad viparyayāt vā viparītam dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam iti vartate tat iti sādhya sādharmya parāmarśaḥ tat ca yadi api pūrva sūtre liṅga sāmānyam vyākhyātam tathā api ubhayasya saṃbhavāt iha anu meya sāmānyam sādhya sādharmyam draṣṭavyam tad viparyayāt sādhya abhāvāt tad viparītaḥ atad dharma bhāvī sādhana rahitaḥ yaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ pūrvavat vacasaḥ karmatām āpadyamānaḥ vaidharmya udāharaṇam bhavati viparītam iti udāharaṇa apekṣayā napuṃsaka liṅga nirdeśaḥ vaidharmya dṛṣṭānte viśeṣaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.188–10,2.522.189	 kimartham punar sādhya abhāvāt sādhana abhāvaḥ vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ varṇyate napunaḥ sādharmya dṛṣṭānta sthityā sādhana abhāvāt evam sādhya abhāvaḥ iti uktam atra vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ yaḥ sādhya sādhana dharmayoḥ saḥ eva vaiparītyena mantavyaḥ tad abhāvayoḥ iti kim kāraṇam sādhana dharme hi dhūme sādhya dharmeṇa agninā vyāpte anagniḥ tatra niveśam alabhamānaḥ anyatra anavakāśa āt adhūmaḥ eva niviśate evam sādhya dharma abhāve anagnau sādhana dharma abhāvena ādhūmena vyāpte sati dhūmaḥ tatra alabdha avakāśaḥ ananya gati tvāt agnau= eva niviśate iti sādharmya dṛṣṭāntāt vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta vaiparītyam 
NM_10,2.522.190	 yadi tu sādharmya dṛṣṭānta vat tathā eva vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ khyāpyate ssādhana abhāve sādhyam na asti iti tadā dhūma abhāvena anagninā vyāptena agni tatra alabdha niveśaḥ dhūmam eva ābalambeta iti syāt na ca etat nirvahati adhūme api vahni darśanāt iti evam sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ hetu tvam api prasiddham hīreta vyāpti vaidhuḥ yāt iti 
NM_10,2.522.191	 api ca dhuma abhāvena agni abhāve vyāpte kathyamāne satya dhūmaḥ niyamitā ubhavati anagnim mā ha āsīt iti agniḥ tu aniyamitaḥ iti svātantryāt adhūma vat dhūmam api spṛśet iti vyabhicārāt pratibandhaḥ viplaveta tat uktam yadā tu sādhya abhāvena hetu abhāvaḥ viruddhyate tadā sādhyam tatas dṛṣṭam avatiṣṭheta sādhane evam niyavitam sādhyam sādhane khyāpitam bhavet sādhanam tu svatantra tvāt sādhya abhāve api saṃbhavet samavyāptika sthale api tulyaḥ nyāyaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.192–10,2.522.193	 tasmāt yatra api samavyāptikau sādhya sādhana dharmau= iti sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛtti tvena ahetutvam āśaṅkyate tatra api sādhana dharmasya vipakṣāt vyāvṛttim abhidhitsatā sādhya abhāve sādhana abhāvaḥ darśayitavyaḥ yatra anitya tvam na asti tatra kṛtaka tvam api na asti yathā aakāśaḥ iti yaḥ api avidyamāna vipakṣaḥ hetuḥ saḥ api sutarām tatas vyāvṛttaḥ bhavati tad abhāvāt tatra āvṛtteḥ iti atas ca sarva padārtha anitya tva vādī evam api vaidhamya dṛṣṭāntam pradarśayan na vāryate yatra nitya tvam na asti tatra kṛtaka tvam api nāstiyathā śaśa viṣāṇa ādau= iti 
NM_10,2.522.194–10,2.522.196	 te ete sādharmya vaidharmya udāharaṇe anvavyayatirekavati hetau= ubhe apisaṃbhavantī viklpena prayoktavye ekena eva vyāpteḥ pradarśanāt kim anyena kṛtyam ubhayavidha vyāptya uḥ āvaśyaka tā kecid tu vyāpti sauṣṭhava pradarśanāya dvayoḥ api prayogam icchanti sabhavatu mā vā bhūt na idam mahat vimarda sthānam nanu ! hetu udāharaṇa adhikam iti nigraha sthānam idam ādiṣṭam na samāna jātīya abhiprāyam tat bhaviṣyati sādharmya dṛṣṭantā an eka tve vaidharmya dṛṣṭat tān eka tve vā tad nigraha sthānam ityāḥ tām etat saḥdhyarmyam dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ 
NM_10,2.522.197	 itthai sādharmya vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta svarūpe vyutpādite basāt tad lakṣaṇa rahita adṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ bhavanti tatra sādhya vikalaḥ sādhana vikalaḥ uthaya vikalā eti vastu doṣa kṛtāḥ trayaḥ sādharmya dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ ananvayaḥ viparīta anvayaḥ iti dvau vacana doṣa kṛtau yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ amūrta tvāt iti atrabruddhi vat iti sādhya vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ paramāṇu vat iti sādhana vikalaḥ ghaṭa vat iti ubhaya vikalaḥ vyomni nitya tvāt mūrta tvam vidyate inyananvayaḥ yat amūrtam tat nityam iti vaktavye yat nityam tat amūrtam iti viparīta anvayaḥ iti vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ 
NM_10,2.522.198	 vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ api paṃca eva sādhya avyāvṛttaḥ sādhana avyāvṛttaḥ ubhaya avi āvṛttaḥ iti vastu doṣāḥ trayaḥ avyatirekaḥ viparīta vyatirekaḥ iti vacana doṣau dvau yathā tatra eva hetau yatra nitya tvam na asti tatra amūrta tvam api na asti yathā paramāṇuṣu iti sādhya avyāvṛttaḥ yathā buddhau= iti sādhana avyāvṛttaḥ yathā aakāśaḥ iti ubhaya avi āvṛttaḥ nitya tva amūrta tve ghaṭe na vidyete iti avyatirekaḥ yatra nitya tvam na asti tatra amūrta tvan api na asti iti vaktavye yatra amūrta tvam na asti tatra nitya tvam api na asti iti viparīta vyatirekaiti 
NM_10,2.522.199–10,2.522.200	 ete ca vastu vṛttena hetu doṣāḥ eva tad anuvidhāyi tvāt atas eva hetvābhāsa vat sūtra kṛtāḥ na upadiṣṭāḥ asmābhiḥ tu śiṣya hitāya pradarśita aevam upanaya lakṣaṇam udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāse na tathā iti vā asādhyasya apenayaḥ udāharaṇam ātma lābhe apekṣate iti udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ pakṣa dharmīpasaṃhāraḥ upanayaḥ dvividhaḥ ca asau tathā iti na tathā iti vā udāharaṇa dvaividhyāt tatra sādharmya udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ tathā iti udanayaḥ yat kṛta kaṃtada nityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ na ca tathā kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti vedharmyā udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ tu na tathā iti upanayaḥ yat nityam tat akṛtakam dṛṣṭam yathā aakāśaḥ na ca tathā kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti atra api niṣedha dvaya yogāt vidhiḥ evagamyate sautra pada vaiyarthya śaṅkā parihārau 
NM_10,2.522.201	 nanu ! sādhyasya iti avācakaḥ sūtra avayavaḥ pakṣa dharma upasaṃhārohi upanayaḥ na sādhya upasaṃhāraḥ sādhyaḥ hi dharmaḥ dharmī vā syāt nataryīḥ anyatarasya api ayam upasaṃhāraḥ iti ucyate sādhyaḥ dharmyā iva na dharma aiha vivakṣitaḥ tatra ayam hetoḥ upasaṃhāraḥ tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti sā iyam sādhyasya iti saptamī arthe ṣaṣṭhī mantavyāḥ sādhye dharmiṇi hetoḥ upasaṃhāraḥ upanayaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhyāḥ saptamī artha saṃbhavaḥ nanu ādhāra vivakṣāyām iha prāpnoti saptamī saṃbandha mātre vā vācye katham ādhāratā ucyate na etat saṃbandha sāmānye api ukte bhavati dharmiṇā yogaḥ viśeṣa cintāyām tasya tu ādhāra tā bhavet viśeṣe antar nigūḍhe ca prāyas ṣaṣṭhī prayujyate śeṣaḥ nāma avivakṣā eva kārakāṇām iti sthitiḥ tathā ca rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ brāhmaṇasya kamaṇḍaluḥ taroḥ śākhā iti sarvatra viśeṣaḥ antar vyavasthitaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.202–10,2.522.203	 atas ca dharmāya jijñāsā dharma jijñāsā sā hi tasya jñātum icchā iti vat saṃbandha mātra samarpikā api se ayam ṣaṣṭhī viśeṣa yaryavasānā bhaviṣyati iti sūktam sādhyasya upasaṃhāraḥ iti upanayasya vyartha tva ākṣepaḥ nanu ! upanaya vacanam anarthakam pakṣa hetu dṛṣṭānta vacanaiḥ kim na paryāptam yad artham upanaya vacanam uccāryate yadi dharmiṇi hetoḥ sattva siddhayetat abhidhānam tadā eṣa vṛthā eva śramaḥ pakṣa dharma vacanena eva kṛtaka tvāt iti evamādinā siddha tvāt 
NM_10,2.522.204–10,2.522.206	 atha sādhya dṛṣṭānta dharṇiṇoḥ sāmya āpādanāya tad uccāraṇam tat apina caturaśram udāharaṇa sādharmyāt iti anena eva gata artha tvāt udāharaṇa sādharmya vacanam hi hetu vacanam eva bhavet atha sva pratipattau tad artha darśanāt param prati tat vacanaḥ tatra api parāmarśa jñāne vivadante api ca svayam dadhi bhakṣaṇa samanantaram yadi kadācid anumeya matiḥ upajāyate tat kim aparasmai tad upadiśyatām pratijña ādīnām krame api ākṣepaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.207	 yaḥ api ayam pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamana prayoga kramaḥ āśrīyate saḥ api sva prakriyā anurāgu nirmitaḥ eva na vastu bala pravṛttaḥ tathā hi yat yat kṛtakam tat tat anityam dṛṣṭam kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti iyataḥ vananāt kaḥ nāma śabda anitya tām na avagacchet tvam eva atra satya vrata dhanaḥ pramāṇam ḍiṇḍika rāgam parityajya akṣiṇī nimīlya cintaya tāvat kim iyatā artham buddhi asena vā tasmāt sva prakriyā pakṣapātam apāsya paṃcāvayavam evam kramakam vākyaṃupekṣya yathoktam eva vākyam prayuṅkṣva iti upanayasya avaśyaka tā āvarṇanam 
NM_10,2.522.208	 atra ucyate idam tāvat bhavān pṛṣṭaḥ vyācaṣṭām kim sva pratipattim anusarantaḥ para pratipādanāya vākya racanām kurmaḥ uta para hṛdaya anuvarthanena iti tatra para abhiprāyasya vaicitryāt parokṣa tvāt ca duravagama tvena na vidmaḥ kiṃvidadhmahe kim bhuvam utkṣipāmaḥ kim aratninā param pīḍayāmaḥ uta hasta saṃjñayā vyavaharāmaḥ āho hetu mātram eva kevalam prayujmahe kim vātri avayavam vākyam abhidadhmaḥ uta paṃca avayavāt api vākyāt abhyadhikam ākhyānakam asmai iti evam anavasthita tvāt para abhiprāyasya sva pratipattim eva anusaratā paraḥ pratyāyyaḥ pratijña ādi kramasya yukta tvam 
NM_10,2.522.209	 tatra sva pratipattau parvata ādi dharmī prathamam dṛṣṭaḥ iti sa pratijñāya kathyate tatas api dhūma ādi liṅgam upalabdham iti hetu vacanena tadā avedyate tatas yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ yathā mahānasaḥ iti vyāpti smaraṇam abhavat iti dṛṣṭānta vacasā ātad abhidhīyate tatas tathā ca ayam dhūmaḥ iti parāmarśa jñānam udapādīti tad upanaya vacanena pratipādyate tatas tasmāt atra agniḥ iti anumeya jñānam upajāyate iti nigamanena tat ucyate tatas para pratipatti paryavasānāt kim anyat upadiśyamānam iti na ca dadhi thakṣaṇa sadṛśam atas anyatamam api bhavitum arhati anumeya pratipattau= upādaya tvāt sarvaiḥ upanayasya aparityājya tā 
NM_10,2.522.210	 yeṣām api mate parāmarśa jñānam na ati taiḥ api upanaya vacanam avaśyam eva aparihāryam anumeya pratipattaye dṛṣṭānte darśita śaktiḥ eva hetuḥ prabhavati na anyathā iti atas yadi api pakṣa dharma vacanena hetu dharmi saṃbandha mātram upapāditam tathā api adhunā dṛṣṭha ante darśita śakti dharmaḥ saḥ tasmin dharmiṇi tathāvidhohetuḥ syāt na vati asiddhi āśaṅkā śamanam upanaya vacanam antareṇa na bhavati eva iti avaśyam prayoktavyam tat iti sva prati iti anusaraṇena ca vākya racanāyāḥ sthata tvāt kramaḥ api yathā uktaḥ upayujyate avayava dvaya vāda nirāsaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.211–10,2.522.212	 atas eva ca yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam iti abhidhānam anupapannam anavagate dharmiṇi tad vartini ca hetau prathamam eva vyāpti smaraṇa asaṃbhavena tad vacana ayogāt tad idam avayavi viparyāsa vacanam aprāpta kāla nigraha sthānam upadekṣyāmaḥ api ca yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti etāvat eva prayoktavyam iti vadatā bhavatā kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti idam upanaya vacanam anujñātam kṛtaka tvāt iti pakṣa dharma vacanam tu nihnutam kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti etāvat eva hetu vacanam iti ced na prayojakasya paṃcami ādinā nirdeśa arha tvāt iti yat kiṃcid etat eka avayava vāda nirāsaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.213–10,2.522.214	 yat api ucyate  viduṣām vācyaḥ hetuḥ eva hi kevalaḥ iti tat api acāru vidvadbhiḥ vid tvāt eva hetoḥ api prajñānāt apūrvāḥ imevidvāṃsaḥ ye pratijña ādi ava yava catuṣṭayasya artham jānanti hetu vacanasya tu navindanti iti tasmāt parāśayasya sarvathā durbodha tvāt pūrva uktena eva krameṇa sva anubhava sākṣikeṇa vākya racanām kṛtvā paraḥ pratyāyyaḥ iti nigamana lakṣaṇam hetu apadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam 
NM_10,2.522.215	 hetuḥ dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi nirjñāta śaktiḥ sādhye dharmiṇi apadiśyate anena iti hetu apadeśa upanayaḥ tasmāt hetu apadeśāt pravṛttam prarti jñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam nigamyate anene pūrva uktāḥ avayavāḥ ekatra sādhye arthesamarpyante niyojyante iti nigamanam tasmāt kṛtaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tat idam nigamanam sādharmya vaidharmya bhedena hetoḥ dṛṣṭāntasya catadapekṣiṇaḥ ca tathā na tathā iti upanayasya dvaividhye api pratiśāvacana vat tulyam eva bhavati nigamana lakṣaṇa ākṣepaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.216–10,2.522.217	 nanu ! pratijñā vacanam eva tāvat asādhana aṅga vacana tvāt apārthakam tasyāḥ eva punarvacanam nigamanamadhunā saphalam bhaviṣyati iti kā iyam kathā pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam iti ca na vācakaḥ granthaḥ sādhya nirdeśaḥ hi pratijñā asiddha nirdeśaḥ tu nigamanam iti vācake vā granthe paunaruktyāt eva nigamanasya vaiphalyam sva pratipatta auca parāmarśa jñāna antaram sādhya avagatiḥ eva bhavantī dṛśyate sā parasya api upanaya vacana śravaṇa samanantaram upajāyate eva iti kim tad uktyā prayojanam ukta ākṣepa parihāraḥ 
NM_10,2.522.218	 ucyate pratijñāyāḥ tāvat sāphalyam samarthitam eva tasyāḥ ca idam punarvacanam siddha sādhya bhede sati api dharmi dharma nirdeśa mātra sāmyāt ucyate siddha sādhya bhedāt eva ca na paunarukti akṛtāphalyam sva pratipattaye ca parāmarśa jñāna anantaram sādhya buddhiḥ utpannā sā parasmai kathyamānā na niṣprayojanā abhavati asmāt hetoḥ idam sādhyam aham ajñāsiṣam yathā tathā tvam api jānīhi mā sma vighnaḥ atra te bhavet 
NM_10,2.522.219–10,2.522.220	 evam ukte saṃśayān asya saṃśayaḥ śābhyati viparyasta mateḥ ca viparyayaḥ tad arthaḥ ca ayam para artha anumāna upanyāsa śramaḥ tat idam viparīta prasaṅga pratiṣedha artham nigamanam āhuḥ asādha araṇya nirāsaka tva pakṣaḥ tad nirāsaḥ ca ye tu yathā śruta sādhya nirdeśa ātmaka pratijñā punarvacana samarthana lobhāt adya api pratijñāyāḥ siddhim abudhyamānāḥ asādhāraṇa āśaṅkā vyavacchedāyani gamana vacanam icchanti te na samyak abhyayus asādhāraṇa āśaṅkāyāḥ dṛṣṭānta vacanena eva nirasta tvāt viśeṣasya hi hetu tva saṃbhāvanā āyām asādhāraṇa āśaṅkā syāt yat kṛtakam tat anityam iti tu dṛṣṭānta vacasā sāmānyasya hetu tve kathite katham asādhāraṇa tvam āṅkyeta 
NM_10,2.522.221	 yadi punar upanaya vacanena sādhye dharmiṇi hetoḥ upasaṃhārāt asāthāraṇa tvam āśaṅkyeta tad punar dṛṣṭānta dharmi vṛtti tvam asya darśayitavyam tasmin darśite punar tad vṛtti tvāt dharmiṇī a siddha tvam āśaṅkanīyam punar tad vyāvṛttaye dharmiṇi hetoḥ upasaṃhāraḥ vidheyaḥ iti evam asādhāraṇā siddhāya śaṅkābhyāṃgacchet iti na kadācid sādhya pratītiḥ bhavet iti nāsā dhāraṇa śaṅkā vyudāsāya tat prayogaḥ kintu pūrva rītyā eva iti tasmāt vivakṣite arthe yathā udita krama niveśinaḥ avayavān ekatra saṃghaṭayitum nigamana vacanam prayoktavyam para artha anumāna parama phalam 
NM_10,2.522.222–10,2.522.223	 te ime pratijña ādayaḥ nigamana paryantāḥ paṃca avayavāḥ yathā asaṃbhavam āgama ādi pramāṇa anugṛhītāḥ paraspara anuṣaktāḥ ca sva artham sādhyanti tatra mukhyayā āvṛttyā pratipādyena anumānena eva sarve avayavāḥ anugṛhyante prapaṃcāya tu pramāṇa antara anugrahaḥ eṣām ucyate pratijñāyāḥ tāvat āgamaḥ anugrāhakaḥ upeyate upadeśa svabhāva tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti vaktā tu evaṃvidhe viṣaye ṛṣi vat asvatantra tvāt anumānam upadiśati pratijñā vacanam tu tad chāyā anupāti tvāt śabda prāmāṇya siddhi arthe vā śāstre tad pratijñāyāḥ śabda viṣaya tvāt āgama anugṛhīta tvam ucyate 
NM_10,2.522.224–10,2.522.227	 hetu vacanam anumānena anugṛhyate udāharaṇam tu pratyakṣeṇa tad mūla tvāt vyāpti pāricchedasya yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ iti vat yathā ghaṭaḥ tathā śabdaḥ iti anayāt chāyayā upamāna kāraṇa bhūta vanecara ādi vacana sadṛśa tvāt upamānam upanayasya anugrāhakam abhidhīyate nigamanasya tu sarva avayavānām ekatra niyojana artha tvāt sarva pramāṇa anugrāhya tā eva pratijña ādīnām prayoga kramaḥ 
NM_10,2.522.228	 itaretara anuṣakta tvāt pratijñām vinā nirāśrayaḥ hetuḥ bhavet iti sā pūrvaṃprayoktavyāḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tatas hetum parojijñāsate iti hetu vacanam uccāryate kṛtaka tvāt iti hetau śrute kva asya vyāptiḥ avadhṛtā iti darśayitum udāharaṇam ucyate yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti evam ukte īdṛśaḥ nirjñāta śaktiḥ eṣa hetuḥ sādhye dharmiṇi bhavet na vā iti asiddha tā śaṅām apākartum upanayaḥ prasajyate tatas amunā krameṇa tava api sādhya pratītiḥ bhavatu iti sarva avayavān ekatra sādhye arthe samarthayitum nigamanam abhidhīyate anyatamam avayavam antareṇa sakalam idam anuṣakta artha vākyam syāt iti paṃca avayavam eva yathā upadiṣṭa kramakam vākyam prayoktavyam avayava parīkṣā upasaṃhāraḥ iti ārabdha upakāraḥ tad anuguṇa phalaiḥ āgama ādi pramāṇaiḥatyonya apekṣiṇaḥ amī niyatam avayavāḥ sādhayanti artha jātam yaḥ ca eteṣām prameye vacasi ca caturaḥ tasya jāti prayoga prāyaiḥ śakyaḥ na pakṣaḥ kṣapayitum iti hivyā harat vṛtti kāraḥ iti avayava parīkṣā iti śrī bhaṭṭa jayanta kṛtau nyāyamañjaryāḥ daśamam āhnikam 
NM_11,2.584.1–11,2.584.2	 avayava anantaram prathama sūtre tarkasya uddeśātaḥ uddeśa anukrameṇa tasya lakṣaṇam āha avijñāta tattve arthe kāraṇa upapattitaḥ tattva jñāna artham ūhaḥ tarkaḥ avijñāta tattve atha iti sāmānādhikaraṇya nirdeśāt arthaḥ eva anya padārthaḥ na puruṣaḥ puruṣām hi ṣaṣṭhyā niradekṣyata avirjñātam tattvam asya eti tattva pada upādānena dharmiṇaḥ sāmānya dharma mānna viśiṣṭasya vijñāta tvaṃsūcayati kāraṇa upapattitaḥ iti saṃśaya jñāna ullikhya māna pakṣa dvaya anyatara pakṣa utthāpana anukūla kāraṇa avalokanam tarkasya utthāpakam āha atas evaa vijñāta tattve arthe bhavantau= api bubhutsā vim aśauna tarka tām prāpnutaḥ tattva jñāna artham iti sākṣāt pramāṇa tām asya nirasyati pramāṇa anugraham tu viṣaya pariśodhana dvāreṇa vidadhat tattva jñānāya kalpate tarkaḥ ūhaḥ iti paryāya pada upādānasya prayojanam vakṣyāmaḥ ni kṛṣṭa sūtra arthaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.3	 tena ayam sūtra arthaḥ avijñāta tattve sāmānyatas jñāte dharmiṇi eka pakṣa anukūla kāraṇa darśanāt tasmin saṃbhāvanā pratyayaḥ bhavitavya tā avabhāsaḥ tad itara pakṣa śaithilya āpādanena tad grāhakam pramāṇam anugṛhṇat sukham pravartayan tattva jñāna artham ūhaḥ tarkaḥ iti yathā vāha keli pradeśa ādau ūrdhva tva viśiṣṭa dharmi darśanāt puruṣeṇa anena bhavitavyam iti pratyayaḥ tattva jñāna artha dala prayojanam 
NM_11,2.584.4	 nanu ! tattva jñāna artham iti ukte sati sāma arthyāt avijñāta tattva tā labhyate eva iti kim artham kaṇṭhena punar anūdyate bāḍham kintu kvacid viṣaya ijñāta tattve api pūrva tarkeṇa avasṛṣṭe sati uttarakālam tarkitaḥ mayā ayam arthaḥ iti smaryamāṇa tarka viśeṣaṇa tayā gṛhyamāṇaḥ viśeṣaṇībhūtaḥ tarkaḥ tattva jñāna arthobhavati iti tadyudāsāya punar avijñāta tattva grahaṇam mārga śodhana dvāreṇa tarkasya tattva jñāna artha tvam iha vivakṣitam tat ca avijñāta tattve arthe saṃbhavati iti tarkasya atirikta tva ākṣepaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.5	 nanu ! na eva saṃśaya nirṇaya antarāla vartī tarka pratyayaḥ kaścid asti tathā hi yadi tāvādanavagata viśeṣasya saṃbhavati asau pratyayaḥ tarhi saṃśayaā iva bhavet avagata viśeṣasya bhavat nirṇaya tām eva spṛśet puruṣaḥ eva eti eva kāra arthāsam unmeṣa rahitaḥ api pratyayaḥ na anirṇayaḥ bhavitum arhati turaga parisaraṇa samucita deśa darśanam api yadi sthāṇu pakṣam sthagayitum alam itimanyate tat kara caraṇa ādi nara viśeṣa darśana vat tat nirṇaya kāraṇam eva syāt atha tasyām api turaga viharaṇa bhuvi niśi nikhanati kaścana sthāṇum iti śaṅkase yadi evam sthāṇu pakṣān apāyāt punar saṃśayaḥ eva syāt iti na tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ samasti iti lakṣya abhāvāt kasya idam lakṣaṇam iti tarkasya atirikta tva nirūpaṇam 
NM_11,2.584.6	 ucyate na khalu sva mati parikalpita vikalpa vitānena pratyātma vedanīyāḥ pratītayaḥ apanetum śakyāḥ tathā hi sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti pratītiḥ ekā puruṣaḥ eva ayam iti anyā anyā capuruṣeṇa anena bhavitavyam iti madhya vartinī tṛtīyā saṃbhāvanā pratītiḥ sva hṛdaya sākṣikā eva sāmyena hi samullekhaḥ saṃśaye pakṣayoḥ dvayoḥ nirṇaye tu itaraḥ pakṣaḥ spṛśyate na manāk api tarkaḥ tu ekataram pakṣam vibhāti utthāpayan= iva nara saṃbhāvanā bīja vāji vāhana darśanāt 
NM_11,2.584.7	 vāha keli pradeśa viśeṣa darśanam hi puṃsi saṃbhāvanā mātram upajanayitum alam na tu śiraḥ pāṇi ādi viśeṣa darśana vat sarva ātmanā sthāṇu pakṣa apasāraṇena puruṣasyanirṇayāya prabhavati atas ayam agṛhīta viśeṣasya eva bhavati pratyayaḥ na tu saṃśayaḥ ekatara pakṣa anukūla kāraṇa upapattyat jāyamāna tvāt tarkasya anirṇaya rūpa tvam 
NM_11,2.584.8	 katham punar pāṇi pāda ādi puruṣa viśeṣa vat aśva vāhana deśa viśeṣaḥ viśeṣa kāryam na kuryāt karaṇe vā sthāṇu pakṣa utsāraṇāt nirṇayaḥ eva ayam iti kasya eṣa paryanuyogaḥ yathā hi śiraḥ pāṇi ādi darśane sati puruṣa nirṇayaḥ bhavati na tathā turaga vahana darśane sati ananuyojyāḥ ca padārthāḥ evaṃbhavataḥ evam mā bhūtaḥ iti yathā ca deśa antare spardhamānaḥ eva sthāṇu pakṣe āste na tathā vāhakeḍi bhūmau api tu śithilībhavati saṃbhavat pramāda tvāt ca na sarva ātmanā nivartate tarkaḥ na saṃśaya rūpaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.9	 nanu ! yadi na nivartate tarhi spardhatām mā vā spardhiṣṭaḥ sthitaḥ tāvat sthāṇu pakṣaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ eva ayam iti mā evam na sthāṇupakṣaḥ sarva ātmanā nivartate na api āste evam eva ayam triśaṅkuḥ iva lambamānaḥ pratyāya antara nirvṛttaye prabhavati iti tathā vidha pratyaya anubhavāt eva parikalpyate vāha keli pradeśa darśane hi yathā puruṣa viśeṣāḥ smaraṇa patham avataranti na tathā sthāṇu viśeṣāḥ ubhaya viśeṣa smaraṇa janmā ca saṃśayaḥ iti saḥ ayam vāha keli pradeśa viśeṣaḥ śithilayati sthāṇu pakṣam na sarva ātmanā ucchinatti iti tad darśanāt bhavati pratyaya antaram ūha rūpam puruṣeṇa anena bhavitavyam iti iti alam ati vistareṇa bhāṣya ukta udāharaṇa vimarśaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.10–11,2.584.11	 yat tu bhāṣya kāreṇa tarka udāharaṇam abhyadhāyi janma uccheda darśanāt kṛtaka tad kāraṇa pratyayaḥ iti na tad hṛdayaṅgamam tena krameṇa nirṇaya ā iva asau tad kāraṇa tathā tvam na tarkaḥ iti athavā kārya udāharaṇa tvāt asya tatra api saṃśaya nirṇaya antarāla vartī tarka pratyayaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ saḥ udāharaṇam bhaviṣyati ūhā ādi pada prayojanam 
NM_11,2.584.12–11,2.584.13	 ūhaḥ iti paryāya abhidhāne kim prayojanam lakṣaṇa pratipādanam eva tarkasya lakṣaṇam yat ūha rūpa tvam itaraḥ tu sūtre kāraṇa viśeṣāya phala nirdeśaḥ kāraṇa upapattitaḥ iti kāraṇa nirdeśaḥ avijñāta tattve arthe iti viṣaya nirdośaḥ tattva jñāna arthaḥ iti phala nirdeśaḥ api ca tarka śabdam kecid anumāne prayuṃjate yathā smṛti kārāḥ paṭhanti ārṣam dharma upadeśam ca veda śāstra avirodhinā yaḥ tarkeṇa anusandhatte sa dharmam veda na itaraḥ iti 
NM_11,2.584.14–11,2.584.15	 tat iha api tarkaḥ anumānam mā vijñāyi iti ūha grahaṇam ūhaḥ atra tarkaḥ ucyatena anumānam tattva jñāna artha tā api asya pramāṇa anugrāhaka tvena na sākṣāt tathā eva ca artham sādhayitum eṣa vāde prayujyate hṛdaya śuddhi prakāśana artham sāṃkhya pakṣa nirākaraṇam kāpilāḥ tu buddhi dharmam ūham āhuḥ saḥ tad siddhānta prasiddha sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ rūpa prakṛti prabhava bhuvana sarga ādi vyavahāra nirākaraṇa vartmanā pūrvam eva nirastaḥ mīmāṃsa saṃmata ūha pradarśanā 
NM_11,2.584.16–11,2.584.17	 jaininīyāḥ tu bruvate yuktyā prayoga nirūpaṇam ūhaḥ iti iha hikiṃcit upadiṣṭa dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa svabhāva sa kala iti kartavyatā kalāpam karma bhavati yathā āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ iti darśa pūrṇamāsa kāṇḍe paṭhitam kvacid punar pradhāna karma mātram upadiśyate itikartavya tā tu kācana nāmnā āyate yathā sauryam carum nirvapeda brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ iti tatra vicāryate kim itikartavya tā virahita yathā śruta pradhāna mātra saṃpādanena tatra śāstra artha prayogaḥ parisamāpyate uta tat api sa iti kartavya tā kaṃpradhānam anuṣṭhe yam iti 
NM_11,2.584.18	 tatra apūrva prayukta tvena dharmāṇām pratikaraṇam bhede sthite niraṅgasya pradhānasya ananuṣṭheya tvāt vidhi anta adhikaraṇa siddhānta nyāyena prākṛtavatu aikṛta karma kartavyam iti sa iti kartavya tākam tat anuṣṭhīyate evam sāmānya atideśe sthite sati kasya vaikṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kutas prakṛteḥ dharmāḥ adhigantavyāiti cintāyām draya devatā ādi codanā sārūpya paryā locana upanata hṛdaya sannidhāna prākṛta karma viśeṣa saṃbandhina eva tatra dharmāḥ bhavitum arhanti iti sthāpite yugapad upanipatadanargala codaka vyāpāra upanīta nikhila akhaḍa maṇḍala vidhi anta kāṇḍa adhi gamya dharma prabandha prāptau satyām te dharmāḥ katham prayoktavyāḥ iti yuktyā prayoga nirūpaṇam ūhaḥ ucyate yena ittham prayoktavyāḥ iti dharmāḥ vyavasthāpyante mīmāṃsaka mate tarka traividhyam 
NM_11,2.584.19	 sa ca trividhaḥ mantra sāma saṃskāra viṣayaḥ mantra viṣayaḥ tāvat yathā atra eva saurye carau prakṛti vat bhāvena agnneyāt agnaye tvā juṣṭam nirvapāmi iti nirvāpa mantraḥ prāptaḥ katham prayoktavyaḥ iti vicāraṇāyām uccāraṇa mātreṇa mantrāṇām anupayogāt prayoga samaveta dravya devatā ādi prakāśana dvāreṇa tad upayogasya vyavasthita tvāt iha vaḥ prākṛtaḥ eva ayam agnaye juṣṭam iti prayujyamānaḥ mantraḥ prayoga samavetasya arthasya aprakāśanāt asaṅgataḥ bhavet sarva ātmanā ca utsṛjyamāne mantre mantra prakāśita karma ananuṣṭhānāt na prakṛti vat kṛtam bhavet iti agni pada uddhāreṇa sūrya pada prakṣepeṇa mantraḥ ūhena ittham prayoktavyā eti gamyate sūryāya tvā juṣṭam nirvapāmi iti 
NM_11,2.584.20–11,2.584.21	 nanu ! ūha pravara nāmadheyānām amantra tvāt ittham api na mantreṇa smṛtaṃkarma kṛtam syāt na etat eka deśa vikṛtam ananya vat bhavati iti nyāyāt sāma rūpohaḥ sāma viṣayaḥ tu gītayassāmāni iti sthite kvacid karmaṇi rathantaram uttarayoḥ gāyati bṛhaduttarayoḥ gāyati iti śruteḥ sā bṛhat rathantara gītiḥ yasyāmṛci yoni bhūtāyām utthitā tatas anyasyām api prayujyate tādṛś akṣara apāye api sā gītiḥ ṝk antara akṣareṇu api pratyabhijñāyate rathantaram anena ślokena gītam iti vyavahāra darśanāt saṃskāra rūpohaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.22–11,2.584.23	 saṃskāraḥ khalu api prākṛtau prokṣitābhyām ulūkhala musalābhyām avahanti iti saṃskāraḥ coditaḥ kvacid ca vikṛtau śrūyate nakha nirbhinnaḥ caruḥ bhavati iti tatra ulūkhala musalayoḥ prakṛtau puroḍāśa apekṣita tuṣa kaṇa vipramoka pūrvaka taṇḍulībhāva saṃpādana dvāreṇa upayogāt vikṛtau= api tad kārya āpannānām nakhānāṃprokṣaṇa ākhyaḥ saṃskāraḥ kriyate iti saḥ ayam trividhaḥ ūhaḥ tad mate ūhasya pañcavidha tva pakṣaḥ kecid tu paṃcavidham ūham ācakṣate dharmasya artha kṛta tvāt dravya guṇa saṃskāra vyatirikta krama pratiṣedhe codanā anubandhaḥ samavāyāt iti sūtram anusarantaḥ etat tu pratanyamānam atiprasaṅgam āvahati trividham eva ca ūham yājñikāḥ anumanyante iti mīmāṃsaka uktoha nirākaraṇam 
NM_11,2.584.24–11,2.584.25	 atra vadanti saḥ ayam ūha śabdaḥ śrotriyaiḥ anumāne prayuktaḥ yathā smṛti kāraiḥ tatra tarka śabdaḥ yaḥ tarkeṇa anusagdhattaiḥ iti tathā hi vaikṛtaṃkarmam dharmitaḥ tsamaveta artha prakāśaka mantra prayoga nirvartyam iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ karma tvāt prākṛta karma vat iti prākṛteṣu ca karmasu tathā tathā vyāpti grahaṇat sarvaḥ ayam anumāna mārgaḥ eva nakhāḥ prokṣaṇīyāḥ prayoga upayogi taṇḍula nirvartaka tvāt iti sāmasu tu spaṣṭam eva vacanam asti rathantaram uttarayoḥ gāyati iti tad abhāve api mantra saṃskāra samāna yogakṣema tvam eva mīmāṃsakoktohaḥ śabdaḥ eva vā 
NM_11,2.584.26	 api ca śabda pṛṣṭha sthita nyāya sahasra vyutpādana ātmake mīmāṃsā śāsat tad nyāya labhyaḥ arthaḥ codanā arthaḥ eva iti sthāpitam atas ca yathā uktohalabhyasya arthasya codanā artha tā mā ativatiṣṭa iti saḥ ayam ūhaḥ śabdaḥ eva antar bhāvaṇīyaḥ pramāṇa antara gocaraḥ vā dharmaḥ syāt nyāya viśeṣa ātmakaḥ tūhaḥ na anumānāt artha antaram syāt agnaye iti asya sthāne sūryāya iti padasya prayogaūhasya phalam na ūhar tasmāt na yājñikaiḥ pramāṇāt artha antaram ūha uktaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.27–11,2.584.29	 iha tu pūrva uktayā nītyā pramāṇa vyatiriktaḥ ūhaḥ upapāditaḥ śrotriyāḥ tu tad anabhijña tayā nyāye nyāya phale ca ūha śabdam upacaritavantaḥ iti alaṃśāḥ trantara udgāra gahanābhiḥ kathābhiḥ tat eṣa mīmāṃsaka kalpyamānaḥ nohaḥ pramāṇa vyatirekam eti pramāṇa sandeha daśa anta rāḍa vartī tu tarkaḥ kathitaḥ atra śāstre iti tarka parīkṣā nirṇaya parīkṣā tarka anantaram nirṇayaḥ bhavati paṭhitaḥ ca iti sa lakṣyate vimṛśya pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.30	 avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ iti ucyamāne mithyā avadhāraṇam api tathā syāt iti artha grahaṇam indriya ādi janitam api tattva avadhāraṇam asti eva nyāya uparama hetoḥ tu nirṇayasya uddeśāt saḥ eva anumāna janyaḥ lakṣaṇīyaḥ iha iti pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām iti uktam pakṣa pratipakṣa śabda arthaḥ eka adhikaraṇau dharmau tulya kālau virodhinau pṛthak parigrahau pakṣa pratipakṣau= udāhṛtau 
NM_11,2.584.31	 na tarhi tābhyām nirṇayaḥ tayoḥ anyatara viṣayaḥ hi bhavati nirṇayaḥ na tad karaṇakaḥ eva iti satyam iha tu pakṣa pratipakṣa śabdābhyām tad viṣayausādhana tad upālambhau lakṣyete tau ca tasmin karaṇam eva kim artha punar lakṣaṇā aaśrīyate sādhana upālambhābhyām iti eva katham na sūtritam evam abhidhīyamāne punar tayoḥ viṣayaḥ mṛgyaḥ lakṣaṇa aprayoge tu saḥ api avagata ubhavet mukhyam abhidhāya tad itaraḥ lakṣyate pakṣa pratipakṣayoḥ nirṇaya aṅga tvam 
NM_11,2.584.32–11,2.584.34	 bhavatu evam ! dvābhyām tu katham nirṇayaḥ ekam eva hi sādhanam nirṇayāya kalpate evam etat na dvitīyam api sādhanam nirṇaya nimittam ācakṣmahe kintu tad upālambhasa dhanam ca sādhana upālambhaḥ ca sādhana upālambhau tābhyāṃnirṇayaḥ etat uktam bhavati sva pakṣe sādhanam adhigacchan para pakṣa sādhane ca dūṣaṇam utprekṣamāṇaḥ sva pakṣam pramātā nirṇayati iti na khalu evam na jāne kintu upālambhasya kaḥ iva nirṇaya janma nivyāpāraḥ sa hi para pakṣa sādhanam eva ucchindyāt iti asti etat tad uccheda dvāreṇa api tu sva pakṣa sādhana abhimānam āviṣkurvan kalpataḥ eva nirṇayāya iti yuktaḥ dvayoḥ api kāraṇa bhāvaḥ artha pada prayojanam 
NM_11,2.584.35–11,2.584.36	 nanu ! idānīm artha grahaṇam anarthakam iva na hi evaṃvidha sādhana adhīna janma anirṇaya ābhāsaḥ saṃbhavati sādhana upālambha lakṣaṇa arthau= api pakṣa pratipakṣa śabdau viṣayamaḥ ditum na śaknutaḥ iti uktam eva iti kaḥ arthaḥ artha grahaṇena ucyate pakṣa pratipakṣayoḥ tu dvayoḥ anyatara arthe avadhāraṇam bhavati na ubhayatra saḥ eva ca paramārthataḥ arthaḥ itaraḥ tu bhrānti kalpitaḥ iti pradarśanāya artha pada upādānam lakṣyamāṇa sādhana upālambha niṣṭha tvāt tu pakṣa pratipakṣa śabdayoḥ viṣaya nirdeśa artham artha padam iti eke vimṛśya iti pada prayojanam 
NM_11,2.584.37	 vimṛśya iti kimartham vastu svarūpa kathana artham eva anumāna kāraṇakaḥ hi nirṇayaḥ iha lakṣyate iti uktam anumānam ca saṃśaya viṣayepravartate iti tarka anantaram api anena eva āśayena asya upādānam saṃśayāt anantaram tarkaḥ tarkāt ūrdhvam ca nirṇayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ pravartamānaḥ atas sa tatpūrvakaḥ iṣyate nirṇaye tu samutpanne bubhutsā vinivartate atas eva hi manyante tad antam nyāya cintanam sūtre niyama traya vivakṣā 
NM_11,2.584.38	 bhavatu evam idantu cintyatām kva niyamaḥ kim vimarśe kim pakṣa pratipakṣayoḥ kim nirṇaye iti traye api ca na upapadyate iti na vimṛśya eva nirṇayaḥ avimṛśya api bhāvāt na pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām eva indriya āt eḥ api tad utpādāt na nirṇayaḥ eva tarkasya api kvacid anivṛtteḥ uktam atra uddeśa sūtre tattva jñāna pada upādānāt pramāṇa padena ca tad phala ākṣepāt na nirṇaya mātreṇa uddiṣṭena kim api prayojanam viśiṣṭaḥ tu nirṇayaḥ lakṣya tvena vivakṣitaḥ parīkṣā viṣayaḥ yaḥ hi nirṇayaḥ nyāya nirmitaḥ niyama trayam api etat tasmin na hi na yujyate saṃśaya abhāve api vicāra pravṛttiḥ 
NM_11,2.584.39–11,2.584.41	 sa hi vimṛśya eva bhavati vimarśa pūrvaka tvāt parīkṣāyāḥ anumānam ca saṃdigdhe viṣaye pravartate iti prāyeṇa tad vyavahāraḥ yadi api kvacid asaṃdigdhe api viṣaye dṛṣṭam pravartamānam anumānam anala arthi tāyām atarkita upanata parvata nitamba nirgata dhūma darśanena kṛśa anu kalpam iva tathā api vastu yogya tā vaśena saṃdigdha viṣayam eva anumānam icchanti nyāya vidaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca nirṇayaḥ pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām eva nirṇayaḥ eva iti na śakyate niyantum anyathā nyāya anuparamāt iti śāstre tu vinā api saṃśayāt asti nirṇayaḥ yadi api ca tatra api sūtra kṛtā sarva parīkṣāṇām saṃśaya pūrvaka tvam upadeśa atideśābhyām abhyadhāyi tathā api na asau śāstrīyaḥ nirṇayaḥ parīkṣā kārya tvāt śāstrīya nirṇayeṣu viśeṣaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.42	 yaḥ tu śāstrataḥ eva kvacid viṣaya nirṇayaḥ sa vimarśa varjam utpadyate vāde api vimarśa rahitaḥ bhavati nirṇayaḥ ubhau niścitau vādam kurutaḥ saṃdigdhasya tatra anadhikārāt katham tarhi eṣa pravādaḥ saṃśaya= chedaḥ vādasya phalam iti prathamam ubhayoḥ api niścitayoḥ vāda pravṛttau antarāle balāt āpatati yukti dvaya upanipāta kṛtaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti vastu nirṇaya avasāna tvāt vādasya saṃśaya= cheda phala tvam ācakṣate nirṇaya parīkṣā upasaṃhāraḥ yadi api aniścita matiḥ kurute na vā adaṃśrutvā tathā api parakīyanaya prayogam antar mata dvaya bala abala cintanena saṃśayya nirṇayati nūnam asau sva pakṣam 
NM_11,2.584.43–11,2.584.45	 iti nirṇaya parīkṣā vāda parīkṣā nyāya parīkṣā dvāraka vastu vicāra yogyāḥ kathāḥ vādinām bhavanti vādaḥ jalpaḥ vitaṇḍa iti tatra vādaḥ tāvat ucyate pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ siddhānta aviruddhaḥ pañca avayava upapannaḥ pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ vādaḥ pakṣa pratipakṣau vyākhyātau tayoḥ parigrahaḥ abhyupagama niyamaḥ ekaḥ vakti nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti aparaḥ tu anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti āha saḥ ayam pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ vādaḥ etat ca rūpam kathā traye api sādhāraṇam iti viśeṣam āha pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ iti pramāṇaiḥ tarkeṇa ca sādhanam upālambhaḥ ca asmin kriyate iti pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ na tu īdṛśī vitaṇḍā tasyāḥ pratipakṣa sādhana upanyāsa śūnya svabhāva tvāt kathāsu para artha anumānam eva pramāṇam 
NM_11,2.584.46	 nanu ! pratyakṣa ādeḥ pramāṇasya para prati iti anupāya tvāt na tena vādesādhana upālambhau śakya kriyau tarkasya tu pratīti sādhana tvam api tāvat na saṃbhavati saṃbhavanā pratyaya svabhāva tvāt kim uta para pratyāyana aṅgatā iti natarām tasya sādhana upālambha hetu tvam satyam evam iha tu na pramāṇa śabdena pratyakṣa ādeḥ abhidhānam api tu pramāṇa mūlāḥ avayavāḥ ucyante taiḥ ca siddhi upālabdhī kriyete evam tarkasya tu svatas sādhana upālambha karaṇa kauśala śūnyātmanaḥ api pramāṇa anugrāhaka tvāt pāramparyeṇa tad hetoḥ āśaya śuddhi pradarśana artham upādānam pañca avayava upapanna dala prayojanam 
NM_11,2.584.47–11,2.584.48	 yadi evam pramāṇa padena eva tad mūla avayava pratipādanāt paṃca avayava upapanna grahaṇam atiricyate tatra ke cit ācakṣe pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ iti vāda lakṣaṇe chala ja ati nigraha sthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ iti ca jalpa lakṣaṇe śravaṇāt vāde sarva ātmanā chala ādi niṣedha prasaktau katipaya nigraha sthāna udbhāvanā abhyanujñāna artham paṃca avayava upapanna grahaṇam 
NM_11,2.584.49	 anena ca hīnam anyatamena api avayavena nyūnam hetu udāharaṇābhyām adhikam adhikam iti nyūna adhikayoḥ udbhāvanam anujñāyate siddhānta aviruddha grahaṇena api siddhāntam abhyupetya tad virodhī viruddhaḥ iti viruddha ākhya hetu ābhāsa udbhāvanam anujñātam iti evam vāde trīṇi nigraha sthānāni udbhāvanīyāni vāde codanīya nigraha sthānāni 
NM_11,2.584.50	 anye vadanti viruddhaḥ eva hetvābhāsaḥ vāde codyate na anaikāntika ādiḥ iti katham etat yujyate nigraha sthānebhyaḥ pṛthak upadiṣṭāḥ hetu abhāsā = āde codanīyāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti bhāṣya kāra vacanāt pramāṇa padena catad mūla avayava ākṣepāt pramāṇa ābhāsa mūla nirāse sati sakala hetvābhāsa udbhāvanam api tatra siddham iti
