NM_11,2.584.51	 siddhānta aviruddha grahaṇena siddhāntam abhyupetya aniyamāt kathā prasaṅgaḥ apasiddhāntaḥ iti apasiddhānta ākhya nigraha sthāna abhyanujñānam iti evam aṣṭau nigraha sthānāni vāde udbhāvyante iti tad anupapannam na hi trīṇi vai aṣṭauvāḥ vāde nigraha sthānāni codanīyāni iti codanārvaidikī rāja śāsanam vā vastu pariśuddhi sādhanam sarvam eva tatra prayoga arham ayam tu viśeṣaḥ jalpekasyāṃcid avasthāyām buddhi pūrvakam api chala ādi prayogaḥ kriyate vāde tu na tathā teṣām prayogaḥ bhrāntyā tu kathaṃcid prayuktānām avaśyam udbhāvanam anudbhāvane vastu pariśuddheḥ abhāvāt sva matena dala prayojanam 
NM_11,2.584.52	 katham tarhi idam pada dvayam siddhānta aviruddhaḥ paṃca avayava upapannaḥ iti apasiddhānta ādi samyak dūṣaṇa diś pradarśanena evaṃprakāra vastu śuddhi anuguṇa nigraha sthāna jāta abhyanujñāna artham eva iti abhiyuktāḥ apratibhā vikṣepa ādayaḥ hi navāde parājaya hetavaḥ kṣaṇa antareṇa api āgatya anusmṛtya ca sādhanam upālambhaṃvā tatra pravadan na parājīyate pratijñāhāni ādi tu samyak parājaya kāraṇam akhilam ābhyām padābhyām abhyanujñātam atra iti pramāṇa tarka dala prayojanam 
NM_11,2.584.53	 nanu ! idānīm pramāṇa tarka grahaṇam apārthakam paṃca avayava upapanna padena eva pramāṇa mūla avayava upadeśāt vastu pariśuddhi anuguṇa nigraha sthāna abhyanujñānāt cakim iva na uktam na abhiprāyanaiḥ malya nivedana dvāraka vāda jalpa viveka pratipādana artha tvāt sva pratipatti sādhanam api pratyakṣa ādi vāde prayoktum ucitam āśaya śuddhim upadarśayitum atra vastuni mama prathamam tarkaḥ ittham pravṛttaā āsīt tatas pramāṇam idam pravṛttam iti evamādi api tatra vaktavyam ataeva ca anyatara pakṣa nirṇaya avasānaḥ eva bhavati vādaḥ na jalpa vat alīka dūṣaṇa āḍambara viracita para paribhava paryavasānaḥ api iti tathā buddhi pūrvam ābhāsā nāmaprayoga iti nirmatsara kathā tvam asya uktam iti akaluṣa ākūta kathanāya pramāṇa tarka padam pramāṇa tarka dala prayojana antaram 
NM_11,2.584.54	 api ca sādhana upālambha vyatiṣaṅga pratipādanam api tasya phalam ubhau= api parasparam anubandhena vādibhyām parīkṣyamāṇau pakṣa pratipakṣau vādatāṃprayojayataḥ na tu sva guhe śāstre vā vivicyamānau pramāṇaiḥ eva vāde chala ādibhiḥ eva jalpe vyavahāraḥ iti niyama śaṅkā nirasanam api tad pada upādāna prayojanam uktam anyaiḥ iti kṛtam ati vistareṇa sarvathā vāda lakṣaṇam sustham vādam tu nirṇaya phala arthibhiḥ eva śiṣya sabrahmacāri gurubhiḥ saha vīta rāgaiḥ na khyāti lābha rabhasa prativardhamāna spardhā anubandha vidhuḥ ātmabhiḥ ārabheta 
NM_11,2.584.55–11,2.584.56	 iti vāda parīkṣā jalpa parīkṣā yatha ukta upapannaḥ chala ja ati nigraha sthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ jalpaḥ yathā ukta upapanna grahaṇena sarva atideśe vāda jalpayoḥ aviśeṣaḥ iti śaṅkamānāḥ kecana pakṣa pratipakṣa parigraha mātra atideśam eva vyācakṣate iyataḥ tupūrva sūtra anuvṛttyā api siddheḥ manda phalam eva yathā ukta upapanna vacanam bhavet iti samastāditi deśaḥ eva varam na ca tatra api vāda jalpayoḥ sāmyam gamyamāna arthān atideśāt śrautaḥ eva arthaḥ atidiśyate na gamyamānaḥ tad kṛtaḥ eva ca tayoḥ bhedaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.57	 tathā ca pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ iti atra gamyamānaḥ arthaḥ abhiprāya niyamaḥ sa na atidiśyate siddhānta aviruddhaḥ paṃca avayava upapannaḥ iti atra api buddhi pūrvaka jāti ādi prayoga pratiṣedha tad udbhāvana niyama rūpaḥ gamyamānaḥ arthaḥ saḥ api na atidiśyate iti kutas tayoḥ avivekaḥ atas eva ca buddhi pūrvaka prayoga anujñānāya chala jāti nigraha sthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ iti uktam jalpe chala ādeḥ abhyanujñānam 
NM_11,2.584.58	 bhavatu evam ! chala ādīnām tu asat uttara tvāt katham iva sādhana upāsambha hetu tvam para pakṣa pratikṣepa dvārakam iti ced na asat uttara tvena pratikṣepe api teṣām asāmarthyāt evam api ca sādhana grahaṇam anarthakam eva iti satyam eva idam kintu kasyāṃcid avasthāyām sva pratipatti sādhana upahita tattva jñāna rakṣāyai tāni api vyāpriyante yadā jānan= api para pakṣa kaśimānam sva pakṣet raḍhimānam ca kvacid avasare para prayukte sādhane dūṣaṇam sapadi na paśyati sva pakṣa sādhanam ca jhaṭiti na smarati tadā chala ādibhiḥ api upakramya param abhibhavati ātmānam ca rakṣati iti chala ādi prayoga phalam 
NM_11,2.584.59–11,2.584.60	 nanu ! yadi paraḥ api chala ādīni jānīyāt teṣu ca anurūpam uttaram abhidadhīta katham jīyeta pratyuta jayati eva satyam tathā api ekānta parājayāt varam saṃdehaḥ iti yuktam eva tad prayogeṇa sphuṭa āṭopa karaṇam nanu ! īdṛṃśi prayojanāni jigīṣataḥ janasya jānapada sadasi bhavanti tasya api na nipuṇam ati pariṣadi mumukṣoḥ tu dūra apetā eva kathā iyam iti katham iha mokṣa śāstre jalpa ādi upadeśaḥ  na etet evam mumukṣoḥ api kvacid prasaṅgetat upayogāt tathā uktam tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇa artham jalpa vitaṇḍe bīja praroha saṃrakṣaṇa artham kaṇṭaka śākhā āvaraṇa vat iti vitaṇḍa ādi prayoga kālaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.61^1	 yadi hi kvacid āśrame sukham āsīnam aneka śiṣya gaṇa upāsyamānam rahasya tattvam upadiśantam śānta mānasamācārya anāryaḥ kaścid vipaścit āgatya duradhi gata katipaya akṣara caya janita gurutara garva gadgadayā girā bhoḥ tapasvin ! kiṃvyākhyāyate hum ! ānvīkṣakī ! saralam ati priyā iyam vidyā kva vedāḥ !kva veda prāmāṇyam ! kva ātma jñānam kvāpavargaḥ ityādi mandam mandaṃvihasya sahasā duṣṭa medhaḥ iva prakaṭitā kāṇḍa daṇḍa kāśa ḍambara vitrāsita āśrama mṛga vargam udgrāhayan ākulayati tadā jagat jālam indrajāla paṇḍita vilasitam iti jānan= api ācāryaḥ yadi tam upekṣate tiraskaroti sadyas samyak sādhana apratibhāse api yadi chala ādibhiḥ enam na śamayati tadā tasmin gatetatas utthāya śiṣya gaṇāḥ brūyuḥ kaṣṭama sthāne kliṣṭāḥ smaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.61^2–11,2.584.62	 yaḥ asau= asmākam ācāryaḥ prakhyātaḥ nyāya vittamaḥ adya tu āgatya saḥ anyena paṇḍitena parājitaḥ tat śrutvā janaḥ itaraḥ api sat patha āsthā śaithilyāt sapadi tam eva mā anuyāsīt tat nūnam paribhava bhūmikām asabhyonetavyaḥ sadasi sa vāvadūka pāśaḥ tad vidhāna ghaṭane nirarga laṃjalpam astram upadiṣṭavān muniḥ ānuṣaṅgikam api prayojanaṃtasya rāgi janatāsu varṇitam iti jalpa parīkṣā vitaṇḍā parīkṣā sa pratipakṣa sthāpanā hīnaḥ vitaṇḍā 
NM_11,2.584.63	 saḥ eva yathā ukta lakṣaṇakaḥ jalpaḥ vitaṇḍā bhavati kaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti ced āha pratipakṣa sthāpanā hīnaḥ iti uttara pakṣa vādī vaitaṇḍikaḥ prathama vādī prathama sādhyamāna pakṣa apekṣayā tad pakṣaḥ hasti pratihasti nyāyena pratipakṣaḥ iti ucyate tamasau= abhyupagacchati eva na tatra sādhanam upadiśati para pakṣam eva akṣipan= āḥ te tarhi sādhanāt vinā pakṣaḥ api saḥ asya na asti eva iti sthāpanāpada prayojanam 
NM_11,2.584.64	 pratipakṣa hīnaḥ vitaṇḍa iti ucyatām kim sthāpana agrahaṇena  na abhyupagama mātreṇa tad bhāvāt tam anabhm upagamya pralapataḥ kaḥ tasya śṛṇuyāt aupacārikaḥ vā para mataparākaraṇa rūpaḥ eva asya pakṣaḥ tasmin hi sati svapakṣaḥ hi tasya siddhyet iti para matā ākṣepa pravaṇa pravṛtteḥ ca balāt dvitīya pakṣa vādyā iva vaitaṇḍikaḥ iti tat evam pakṣaḥ asya asti iti sādhanam tu na asti iti samyak sūtritam sa pratipakṣa sthāpanā hīnaḥ vitaṇḍāḥ iti iti udāhṛtam idam kathā trayaṃyat paraspara vivikta lakṣaṇam sthūlam api anavalokya kathyateva adaḥ ekaḥ iti śākya śiṣyakaiḥ 
NM_11,2.584.65–11,2.584.67	 iti vitaṇḍā parīkṣā hetvābhāsa parīkṣā pakṣa dharma tva ādīni paṃca lakṣaṇāni hetoḥ uktāni teṣām ekaika apāyāt paṃca hetvābhāsāḥ bhavanti iti tān darśayitum āha savyabhicāra viruddha prakaraṇa sama sādhya sama atīta kāla ahetvābhāsāḥ atra hetvābhāsa śrutiḥ eva nirvacana sahitā sāmānya lakṣaṇam bodhayati ahetavaḥ hetu vat ābhāsantaḥ iti hetvābhāsāḥ iti lakṣaṇa eka deśa yogāt ca hetu vat ābhāsanam ahetoḥ api upapadyate sakala lakṣaṇa apāye api paṃcamī nirdeśa ādiḥ bhrama hetuḥ iti eke 
NM_11,2.584.68–11,2.584.69	 savyabhicāra ādi pada paryanta vartinī tu sā eva śrutiḥ vibhāgam avagamayati pramāṇa śruti vat iti uktam pakṣa dharma tā ādi lakṣaṇānām ca krama niyama abhāvāt sādhya sama viruddha savyabhicāra atīta kāla prakaraṇa samāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ iti pāṭhona āśritaḥ hetvābhāsa saṃkhyā vimarśaḥ nanu ! trayaḥ eva hetvābhāsāḥ iti śākyāḥ na pratyakṣa āgama bādhitasya ca hetoḥ pūrvam pradarśita tvāt 
NM_11,2.584.70	 nanu ! ekasya eva rūpa dvaya vaikalyāt katham na ṣaṣṭha ādayaḥ tad prabhedāḥ syuḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt iti eṣa hi pakṣe vṛtti abhāvāt asiddhaucyatām uta sāmānya ādeḥ vipakṣāt apracyutaḥ savyabhicāraḥ uta jāti antaram eva tābhyām iti na etat evam eka eka rūpa apāya nimitta bheda paṃcaka pratipādane kṛtet vi trirūpa apāyāt na rūpa antaram avatarati kintu teṣām eva samāveśaḥ syāt 
NM_11,2.584.71–11,2.584.72	 api ca prathama gṛhīta anyatama rūpa vaikalya labdha eka hetvābhāsa rūpe asmin kim rūpa antara nirūpaṇena ityāḥ tām etat aprayojaka hetoḥ asiddhau= antarbhāvaḥ nanu ! aprayojakaḥ nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ samasti iti na punar apipaṃcatvam na tasya anyathā siddha tvena asiddhaḥ eva antarbhāvam vakṣyāmaḥ avāntara bheda vivakṣāyām tu hetvābhāsānām iyattā niścayaḥ na śakya kriyaḥ na casa prayojanaḥ iti paṃca eva hetvābhāsāḥ iti siddham savyabhicāra lakṣaṇam 
NM_11,2.584.73–11,2.584.74	 teṣām savyabhicāraḥ tāvat ucyate anaikāntikaḥ savyabhicāraḥ vyabhicāraḥ ekatra vyavasthā aniyamaḥ tena saha vartate iti savyabhicāraḥ vipakṣāt apracyutaḥ iti arthaḥ ekasmin ante bhavan aikāntikaḥ tad viparyāyāt anaikāntikaḥ iti saḥ eva arthaḥ evam iha lakṣya lakṣaṇa padayoḥ yathākāmam abhyupagamaḥ na pratyakṣa ādi vat vyavasthayā 
NM_11,2.584.75	 savyabhicāra pade lakṣya abhidhāyini lakṣaṇa vacanam anaikāntika padam anaikāntika pade tu lakṣya vācini sa vyabhicāra padam lakṣaṇa pratipādakam prasiddhi aprasiddhi vibhāga apekṣayā pika kokila vat draṣṭavyam pikaḥ kokilaḥ iti ukte yasya pika śabda arthaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa tatas kokila śabda artham avabhotsyate prasiddha kokila śabda arthaḥ tu pika śabda artham iti anaikāntika padārthaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.76	 āha bhavatu evam ! idam tu cintyatām anaikāntikaḥ iti ki mayam paryudāsaḥ prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ vā kiṃca atas paryudāsa pakṣe sva pakṣa niyatāt aikāntikāt anyaḥ yaḥ saḥ eva anaikāntikaḥ iti saḥ eva ekaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ syāt prasajya pratiṣedhe tu aikāntika abhāvasya nivṛtti rūpasya hetvābhāsa tā bhavet na lakṣya tvena abhimatasya vipakṣa vṛtteḥ hetu antarasya prameya tva ādeḥ iti ucyate praśnaḥ eva ayam anupapannaḥ saṃśayānaḥ hiparam pṛcchati saṃśayaḥ ca ubhayathā darśanāt bhavati na ca nāma pada saṃbaddhasya nañaḥ dvayī vṛttiḥ dṛṣṭā aśrāddha bhojī ityādau hi bhujinā nan saṃbadhyate śrāddhana bhuṅkte iti na tu nāmnā śrāddhena iti nāma pada saṃbaddha nañaḥ paryudāsaḥ eva arthaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.77	 ākhyātena api prayojyamānaḥ kvacid prakaraṇa sāmarthya anurodhāt pratyaya artha saṃbandham avadhūya dhātvartham eva kevalam āliṅgan paryudāsa vṛttiḥ bhavati na īkṣeta udyantam ādityam iti na tu nāmnā saṃbadhyamānaḥ kvacid api paryudāsa vṛttim ullaṅghya prasajya pratiṣedha mātra para tām abalambamānaḥ dṛśyate abrāhmaṇa ādau sarvatra tad anya avagati darśanāt iti kutastyaḥ saṃśayaḥ paryudāsa pakṣa ukta doṣa parihāraḥ 
NM_11,2.584.78	 athavā kim anayā avāntara cintayā ! yathā pṛṣṭam kṛtaḥ eva uttaram ucyate ekasmin= anitya pakṣe nitya pakṣe vā niyataḥ ekāntikaḥ eka pakṣa vṛttiḥ ucyate tatas anyaḥ pakṣa dvaya vṛttiḥ anekāntikaḥ bhavati evam na sarve hetvābhāsāḥ pakṣa dvaya vṛttayaḥ iti na saṃkhyā hāniḥ atas paryudāsa pakṣe tāvat na doṣaḥ pratipedha arthaka tve api na doṣaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.79–11,2.584.80	 prasajya pratiṣedhe api aikāntikaḥ na bhavati yaḥ saḥ eva ahetuḥ iti na nivṛtti mātra paratvam aśrāddhabhojī iti kṛtā puruṣaḥ ucyate na śrāddha bhojana abhāva mātram evam iha api tad hitena ekānta niyata tā pratiṣedha viśiṣṭaḥ hetuḥ eva ucyate na abhāva mātram iti evam ubhayathā api na doṣaḥ tasya udāharaṇam nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tvāt iti eṣa hi nitya anitya pakṣayoḥ anyatarasmin= api na niyataḥ iti vipakṣa vṛtti tvāt anaikānti kauktaḥ bhavati parokta anaikāntika vibhāga vimarśaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.81	 nanu ! ṣaṣ prakāraḥ paraiḥ anaikāntikaḥ iṣyate sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ vipakṣa vyāpī vipakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ sa pakṣa vyāpī ubhaya pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ ubhaya pakṣa vyāpī iti sādhāraṇaḥ catuṣprakāraḥ asādhāraṇaḥ viruddha avyabhicārīca iti sa katham iha na nirdiśyate ucyate sa pakṣa vyāpti ādi bheda darśanaṃtāvat aprayojanakam aśakyam ca hetvābhāsānām avāntara bheda ānantyāt vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ yasya na asti sa savyabhicāraḥ iti anyatama hetu rūpa rahita tvam anaikāntika lakṣaṇam iha vivakṣitam tat ca uktam eva kim avāntara bheda parigaṇanena 
NM_11,2.584.82–11,2.584.83	 asādhāraṇa viruddha avyabhicāriṇau tu na saṃstaḥ eva hetvābhāsau= iti navya ākhyāyete asādhāraṇa anaikantikaḥ na atiriktaḥ nanu ! sādhāraṇa vat asā dhāraṇasya api gandhavat tva ādeḥ saṃśaya hetu tva darśanāt katham asaṃbhavaḥ aneka dharma upapatteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ bhavadbhiḥ api vyākhyātaḥ eva na etat evam ubhaya viśeṣa sahacarita dharma darśanam hi tad anusmaraṇa yuktena saṃśayam upajanayati asādhāraṇaḥ tu asādhāraṇa tvāt eva na tad sahacaraḥ kadācid upalabdhā eti katham saṃśaya hetuḥ 
NM_11,2.584.84–11,2.584.85	 katham tarhi aneka dharna upapatteḥ iti varṇyate varṇitam etat vastunaḥ hiviśeṣa dharmaḥ kaścid asādhāraṇaḥ kena api dharma antareṇa sahacaritaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ saḥ aya śabde vibhāma gajatva ākhyaḥ dharmaḥ kenacid dharma antareṇa dravya tvena guṇa tvena vā sahacaritaḥ bhavet iti ittham aneka dharma upapatteḥ saṃśayaḥ varṇitaḥ tat iha api gandhavat tvam asādhāraṇam eva yadi saṃśaya hetu tayā varṇyate tarhi sādhāraṇāt vastu dharma tvāt eva saṃśayaḥ bhavet nāsā dhāraṇāt gandhavat tvāt na hi tat nitya anityayoḥ anyatareṇa api sahacaritam upalabdham vastu dharmaḥ tudharma antara anuyāyī dṛśyate iti vastu dharma tvam eva tad kāraṇam atas nityābhūḥ gandhavat tvāt iti asādhāraṇa anaikāntikaḥ na vaktavyaḥ viruddha avyabhicāraḥ api na atiriktaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.86–11,2.584.87	 viruddha avyabhicaryapi na vācyaḥ eva ekatra dharmiṇi paraspara viruddha dvaya prayojaka hetu dvaya upanipātasya anupapatteḥ nanu ! pratyakṣaḥ vāyuḥ sparśavat tvāt ghaṭa vat apratyakṣaḥ vāyuḥ arūpa tvāt ākāśa vat iti asti hetu dvaya sannipātaḥ te eva ca viruddha avyabhicāryucyate iti atra tāvat etat eva vaktavyam kaḥ ayam apūrvaḥ prāmāṇika vyavahāraḥ īdṛśaḥ yat anumānena pratyakṣa tvam apratyakṣa tvam vā sādhyataiti indriya ja pramiti viṣayaḥ hi arthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ bhavati saḥ eṣa vāyuḥyadi indriya je pratyaye pratibhāti eva kim anumānena atha tatra na pratibhāti tathā api kim anumānena iti viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ aprayojaka tvam 
NM_11,2.584.88–11,2.584.89	 kiṃca anayoḥ anyataraḥ hetuḥ avaśyam aprayojakaḥ vastunaḥ dvairūpya anupapatteḥ hetau ca prayukte tad guṇa doṣa parīkṣaṇam eva prativādī vidhattām kaḥ avasaraḥ pratihetu upanyāsasya viḍambana arthaḥ taṭupa nyāsaḥ iti ced na viḍambana upanyāsasya jāti uttara prakāra tvāt iha ca hetvābhāsāḥ vāstavāḥ eva anumāna doṣāḥ ekatra prayojaka vṛddha hetu dvaya samāveśa asaṃbhavasya ukta tvāt kathaṃtarhi prakaraṇa samaḥ iti ced tatra eva viśeṣam vakṣyāmaḥ viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ vipratipatti rūpa tvam vā atha hetu prayoga rahita ubhaya va ādi parigṛhīta pakṣa pratipakṣa upanyāsa mātraṃviruddha avi abhicāriṇaḥ rūpam ucyate saḥ ayam vipratipatteḥ sa śayaḥ bhavati na hetvābhāsāt asmāt iti 
NM_11,2.584.90	 api ca yadi saṃśaya janaka tvam anaikāntika lakṣaṇamucyeta kāmam asādhāraṇasya vā viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ vā yathā tathā saṃśaya hetu tām adhiropya kathyatām anaikāntika tā na tu saṃśaya janaka tvam tad lakṣaṇam indriya ādeḥ api tad janaka tvena tathā abhāva prasakteḥ api tu pakṣa dvaya vṛtti tvam anaikāntika lakṣaṇam sa tu pakṣa dvaya vṛtti tvāt saṃśayam api janayati iti vastu svabhāvaḥ ayam atas asādhāraṇa viruddha avyabhicāriṇoḥ kathaṃcid saṃśaya hetu tve api pakṣa dvaya vṛtti abhāvat na anaikāntika varge antarbhāvaḥ kva tarhi tau= antar bhaviṣyataḥ jāti uttarāṇām ānantyāt teṣu iti vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt asādhāraṇa saṃjñakasya hetoḥ viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ vā vipakṣa vṛtti tvam atarkayantaḥ vadanti anaikāntika tām na tad jñāḥ viruddha lakṣaṇam siddhāntam abhyupetya tad virodhī viruddhaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.91–11,2.584.92	 sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ vṛtti avṛttī hetoḥ lakṣaṇam te yasya viparyaste dṛśyete yaḥ sa pakṣe na vartate vipakṣe ca vartate saḥ sādhya viparyaya sādhanāt viruddha ubhavati saḥ ayam ucyate siddhāntam abhyupetya iti siddhānta śabdaḥ yadi api dharma viśiṣṭe dharmiṇi vyākhyātaḥ ayam ittham iti abhyupagama viṣayīkṛtaḥ arthaḥ siddhānte iti tathā api iha tad eka deśa sādhya dharma viṣayaḥ lakṣyate tam siddhāntam sādhya dharmam abhyupagamya yaḥ viruṇaddhi vyāhanti tad viparyayam sādhayati sa viruddhaḥ iti arthaḥ sūtra artha varṇanam 
NM_11,2.584.93	 nanu samāna kartṛkayoḥ ktvā apratyayaḥ smaryate iha ca hetoḥ acetanasya abhyupagamena kartṛ tva asaṃbhavāt puruṣaḥ tad kartā bhavet siddhāntam ca viruṇaddhi hetuḥ iti bhinnakakatṛ tvam ucyate ucyate samāna kartṛka tva siddhaye hetoḥ eva abhyupagame kartṛ tvam upacārāt varṇayiṣyate hetu balāt puruṣeṇa abhyupagamaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ hetunava kṛtaḥ bhavati evam ca saḥ eva abhyupagantā saḥ eva viruṇaddhi iti na bhinna kartṛka tvam 
NM_11,2.584.94–11,2.584.95	 nanu ! upacāra parigrahaḥ ced abhimataḥ tat atra tritayam vaktavyam mukhye arthe pramāṇa bādhaḥ nimittam prayojanam ca iti mukhye arthe pramāṇa bādhaḥ uktaḥ eva hetoḥ acetana tvam nimittam api asti hetu sādhanakaḥ hi abhyupagama eti prayojanam tu viśeṣa viruddhānām hetvābhāsa tva nivāraṇam siddhānta śabdasya api samudāya vācinaḥ yat eka deśe avasthāpanam tasya apiviśeṣa viruddha vyavacchedaḥ eva phalam viśeṣa viruddhasya na hetvābhāsa tā 
NM_11,2.584.96	 viśeṣa viruddhānām hi hetvābhāsa tva abhyupagame sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgaḥ na hi tathāvidhaḥ hetuḥ iha jagati kaścid avāpyate yaḥ sādhya siddhaye abhidhīyamānaḥ dharmasya vā dharmiṇaḥ vā viśeṣam na kaṃcana bādhate tathā hi anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti sakala tākika gṛha prasiddhaḥ eṣa hetuḥ anitya tām sādhayan= api yat yat kṛtakam tat tat aśrāvaṇam dṛṣṭam yaḥ yaḥ kṛtakaḥsa sa vyoma viśeṣa guṇaḥ na bhavati iti dharmiṇaḥ viśeṣam bādhataḥ eva iti ahetuḥ syāt na ca evam yuktam iti na viśeṣaviruddhaḥ nāma hetvābhāsaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ kintu sādhya svarūpa viparyaya sādhane eva iti para ukta viruddha vibhāgasya ayukta tā 
NM_11,2.584.97	 atas eva yathā tīrtha antare varṇyate viruddhaḥ catuṣprakāraḥ dharma svarūpa viparīta sādhanaḥ dharmi svarūpa viparīta sādhanaḥ dharma viśeṣa viparīta sādhanaḥ dharmi viśeṣa viparīta sādhanaḥ iti tathā iha na iṣyate atiprasaṅgasya darśita tvāt iti asya udāharaṇam nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ityādi viruddhasya vyabhicāri vailakṣaṇyam 
NM_11,2.584.98	 nanu ! ekaika lakṣaṇa apāyāt paṃca hetvābhāsāḥ iti uktam asya ca hetoḥ ubhe lakṣaṇe na staḥ yathā hi asya sa pakṣe vṛttiḥ na asti tathā vipakṣāt api vyāvattiḥ yadi hi sa pakṣāt iva vipakṣāt api vyāvṛttaḥ eṣa bhavet gandhavat tva vadasā dhāraṇaḥ eva syāt iti satyam evam vipakṣāt avyāvṛttiḥ vyabhicāraṃprati prayojaka tām pratipadyate pratipakṣa gāmī hi vyabhicaritaḥ iti ucyate sa pakṣe vṛtti vicchedaḥ tu viparyaya siddhau prayojakaḥ iti satyām api vipakṣa vṛtta ausapakṣa vṛtti viccheda nibandhanam eva asya viruddha tvam ucyate vipakṣāt apracyutaḥsu asādhyam eva na sādhayet sa pakṣe tu avartamānaḥ asau viparītam api sādhaya ti iti tad lakṣaṇa apāya kṛtam eva asya viruddha tvam ācakṣate iti alam sūkṣma īkṣikayā tat idam uktam siddhāntam abhyupetya tad virodhī viruddhaḥ iti apasiddhānta ādīnām viruddha rūpa tva pakṣaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.99	 anye tu anyathā vyācakṣate kila sādhya dharma viparyaya sādhaka vat apasiddhānta pratijñā virodha ādayaḥ api siddhānta virodhinaḥ saṃgṛhītum yuktāḥ eva te ca evam vyākhyāyamāne na saṃgṛhītāḥ syuḥ ktvā pratyaya siddhānta śabda auca na samanvitau syātām tasmāt abhyupagata siddhānta virodhī iti sūtra arthevarṇite abhyupagatam siddhāntam yaḥ viruṇaddhi sa viruddhaḥ tad kāla upātta pratijñā viṣayīkṛtam vā avasara antara vyavasthāpitam vā iti etat saṃgrahaḥ ca kṛtaḥ bhaviṣyati siddhānta śabdaḥ ca na saṅka ucitaḥ bhaviṣyati ktvā pratyaya stua saṅgata tvāt upekṣyate eva bhinna kartṛka tvāt ānantaryasya gamyamānasyaca anupayukta tvāt iti etat pakṣasya bhāṣya anuguṇa tvam 
NM_11,2.584.100	 tathā ca bhāṣya kāreṇa aviśeṣeṇa pūrva abhyupagata siddhānta viruddham eva udāharaṇam uktam saḥ ayam vikāraḥ vyakteḥ apaiti nitya tva pratiṣedhāt apetaḥ api asti vināśa pratiṣedhāt iti atra hi pratiṣiddha nitya dharma tvāt iti ayam hetuḥ vyakteḥ apetaḥ api vikāraḥ api asti iti amum siddhāntam viruṇa dianena vā viruddhi atas iti ukta pakṣe asvārasyam 
NM_11,2.584.101	 etat tva hṛdayaṅgamam iva vyākhyānam apasiddhānta pratijñā virodha ādeḥ nigraha sthāna sūtre hetvābhāsebhyaḥ pṛthak upadeśāt kim iha tad saṅgraheṇa pratyuta saṅgrahaḥ eva doṣaḥ yaḥ hi mīmāṃsakaḥ aham iti abhyupagamyaa nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti brūyāt na tasya ayam hetuḥ viruddhaḥ bhavet api tu apasiddhāntana eva asau nigṛhyeta tasmāt sādhya viparyaya sādhanaḥ eva viruddhaḥ ucyate na tu pūrva abhyupagata sva siddhānta viruddhaḥ ukta pakṣasya sūtrān anuguṇa tvam 
NM_11,2.584.102	 na ca nirabhiprāyaḥ eva sūtra kṛtā ktvā anirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ kintu tatas pratīyamānam ānantaryam api apekṣamāṇena yaḥ hi siddhāntam abhyupetya pratijñāyatat sidhi artha tayā upādīyamānaḥ tam eva viruṇaddhi sa viruddhaḥ hetvābhāsaiti prāktanam eva vyākhyānam anavadyam atas pratijñā viparīta sādhanāt viruddha tām eti na hetuḥ anyathā viśeṣa bādha ādi nibandhanam punar cahu prakāra tvam asuṣya na iṣyate sa pratipakṣa lakṣaṇamyasmāt prakaraṇa cintā sa nirṇaya artham upadiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.103	 ekaika lakṣaṇa apāya nimitta hetu ābhāsa paṃcaka pratijñānāt asat pratipakṣa tva lakṣaṇa vaikalyāt kila prakaraṇa samaḥ nāma hetvābhāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ sa cana saṃbhavati sa pratipakṣasya hetoḥ abhāvāt advyātmaka tvāt hi vastūnām ekatra paraspara virodhi dharma dvaya prayojaka hetu samāveśaḥ na asti iti asakṛt uktam ataṃā iva hi viruddha avyabhicārī nirastaḥ anumāna viruddham anumānam ca neṣyate eva tat kutas sa pratipakṣaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ atas ca lakṣya abhāvāt kasya idam lakṣaṇam iti atra āha yasmāt ityādi sūtra vyākhyānam 
NM_11,2.584.104–11,2.584.105	 vicāryamāṇau prāc ukta lakṣaṇakau pakṣapati pakṣau prakaraṇam tasya cintā saṃśayāt prabhṛti ānirṇayāt yadi api bhavati tathā api iha vimarśa ātmikā evagṛhyate sā yasmāt bhavati kasmāt ca sā bhavati viśeṣa anupalambhāt saḥ eva viśeṣa anupalambhaḥ yadi nirṇaya artham upadiśyate tad prakaraṇam anativartamāna tvāt prakaraṇa samaḥ bhavati nityaḥ śabdaḥ anitya dharma anupalabdheḥ ākāśa vat anityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya dharma anupalabdheḥ ghaṭa vat iti saḥ ayam sa pratipakṣaḥ hetuḥ iha lakṣya uvidyate viruddha hetu dvaya asam āveśe api tathā prayogaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.106–11,2.584.107	 na ca dravya ātmakāni vastūni pramātāraḥ tu rūpam eṣām niyatam avadhārayitum aśaknuvantaḥ evam bhrāmyanti iti tathā hi ekaḥ tad viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatirekāt paśyan= tathā iti sādhyam budhyeta tathā eva param pratyāyayet iti itaraḥ api dvitīya viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ sādhana tām buddhvā pratyavasthānam ca karoti iti sva pratipatti sākṣikaḥ eva eṣa prakaraṇa samaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ sa pratipakṣasya itara vailakṣaṇyam 
NM_11,2.584.108	 tathā ca na tāvat ayam samyak hetuḥ pratipakṣa upahata tvena sva sādhya upasthāna sāmarthya śūnya tvāt hetvābhāsaḥ api bhavat na tāvat asiddhaḥ sādhye dharmiṇi śabde anupalabhyamāna nitya dharma tvasya hetoḥ sadbhāvāt na api viruddhaḥ sādhya viparyaya sādhana nimitta bhūta sapakṣa vṛtti aviyoga anupapatteḥ na api anaikāntikaḥ pakṣa dvaya sādhāraṇa tva anavadhāraṇāt saṃśaya janaka tvam tu na tasya lakṣaṇam iti uktam eva sa pratipakṣasya anatirikta tva ākṣepaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.109–11,2.584.111	 nanu ! ekasmin pakṣe niyataḥ aikāntika tad viparyayāt anaikātikaḥ sa ca ayam nitya anitya pakṣayoḥ anyataratra api na niyataḥ iti anaikāntikaḥ evasyāt api ca āhuḥ aprāmāṇyam tridhā bhinnam mithyātva ajñāna saṃśayaiḥ iti tatra yathā indiyādeḥ abodhaka tvāt vā saṃśaya viparyaya svabhāva avabhāsa samutpādana daurātmyāt vā bhavati aprāmāṇya vyavahāraḥ evam anumānam api tena eva vartmanā pramāṇa ābhāsa tām abalambate hetvābhāsa traividhyākṣepaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.112–11,2.584.114	 tatra asiddhaḥ tāvat alabhamānaḥ dharmiṇi vṛttim tatra sādhya dharma dhiyam a ādhātum anadhikṛtaḥ iti ajñāna phala tvāt aprāmāṇya phalam anubhavati viruddhaḥ tu viparyaya sādhanaḥ iti bhavantaḥ eva pratipannāḥ saṃśaya janakaḥ tu anaikāntikaḥ bhavitum arhati na tu pāribhāṣika vipakṣa vṛtti tvam eva tasya lakṣaṇam ucitam ubhayam api ca anyatara pakṣa niyama virahita tanuḥ iti kim iti na bhavati vimarśam upadadhat anaikāntikaḥ iti trayaḥ eva hetvābhāsāḥ sa pratipakṣasya atirikta tva sādhanam 
NM_11,2.584.115	 ucyate na phala niyamena lakṣaṇa niyamaḥ kartum śakyate yadi api dvividham trividhaṃbhavati apramāṇa phalam tathā api na tri lakṣaṇake liṅge avinābhāvaḥ parisamāpyate api tu paṃca lakṣaṇakaḥ iti prasādhitaḥ ayam arthaḥ tad vaikalyāt ca hetvābhāsānām api paṃcatvam eva phalam tu dvividham astu trividham vā na hi apratipatti janakam kiṃcid liṅgam upalabhāmahe na ca apratipattiḥ prayatna janyā prāgabhāvasya nisarga siddha tvāt iti alam avāntara cintanena sa pratipakṣasya anekāntika vailakṣaṇya sū 
NM_11,2.584.116	 na phala apekṣaḥ liṅga lakṣaṇa niyamaḥ tatra yathā pakṣa dharma rahita tvam asiddha lakṣaṇam evam vyatireka vaikalyam anaikāntika lakṣaṇam eṣa ca hetuḥ pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatirekāṇām anyatamena api rūpeṇa na vikalaḥ iti katham anaikāntika tām pratipadyeta vyasta tāyām hi sarvāṇi etāni santi lakṣaṇāni samastaḥ tu na upanyastaḥ eva hetu tvena nitya anitya dharma anupalabdheḥ iti sa pratipakṣasya saṃśaya janaka tvam 
NM_11,2.584.117	 nanu ! yadi asya pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatirekāḥ nirapavādāḥ santi katham tarhinaḥ hetuḥ eva ayam itarasi api pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatirekāṇām nirapavādānām asaṃbhavāt saḥ api na katham hetuḥ astu iti ced na vastunaḥ dvairūpya anupapatteḥ evam imau hetū pakṣa dvaye api buddhim janayantau saṃśayam āvahataḥ nānā ekāntikavatvipakṣa vṛtti tvena iti hetvābhāsa antara tvam 
NM_11,2.584.118–11,2.584.119	 evaṃvidhasya ca asya prakaraṇa samasya viruddhāvyabhicārī iti nāma yadikriyate tat api bhavatu na punar anaikāntika prabheda tām abalambate tad lakṣaṇā saṃsparśāt ubhaya pratīti janakau hi imau hetū bhavataḥ na ubhaya pakṣa vṛtti iti sa pratipakṣasya bādhāt vailakṣaṇyam na api ayam kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ anyatarasya api bādhakasya anupalambhāt anumānam tu na anumānasya bādhakam bhavitum kṣamam iti uktam na cetara itaravādi apekṣayā anayoḥ asiddha tvam abhidheyam saṃśaya janaka tve anubhava siddhesati viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ apratyākhyeya tvāt sa pratipakṣa sthale paraspara pratighāta asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.120	 nanu ! niścitasya sādhana prayoga adhikārāt kathaṃcid tā vat sādhanaṃprayuṃjīta niścita tve ca tad dharma anupalabdhyoḥ parasparam asiddha tvam sthitam eva na etat evam anyatara dharma anupalabdheḥ eva pakṣa dharma tva anvaya vyatirekāt paśyan= asau niścita tām prāptaḥ na dvitīya dharma anupalabdheḥ asiddha tām buddhyamānaḥ atas eva bhrānti mūlaḥ eṣa hetvābhāsaḥ dvitīya dharma anupalabdhi siddha tva niścaye tu samyak hetuḥ eva syāt tad asiddha tva anavadhāraṇe api asausvasya hetoḥ trairūpya darśanāt niścita matiḥ bhūtvā sādhanam prayuṃjānaḥ itareṇa tathā eva niścita matinā pratiprayoge kṛte tasya api trairūpyam upalabhamānaḥ saṃśayam adhigacchati iti alam prasaṅgena 
NM_11,2.584.121–11,2.584.123	 tat evam asiddha ādi lakṣaṇa vaiparītyāt prati iti anuguṇaḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ nāma asaddhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ sa pratipakṣa viṣaye pakṣa antaram apare punar udāharaṇa antaram asya vyāharanti nityaḥ śabdaḥ pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ anyatara tvāt ākāśa vat anityaḥ śabdaḥ pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ anyatara tvāt eva ghaṭa vat iti nanu ! pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ anyataraḥ pakṣaḥ vā syāt sa pakṣaḥ vā syāt natṛtīyaḥ na hi mitrāvarupayoḥ anyataraḥ somaḥ bhavatum arhati tatra pakṣenyatara śabda vācye ananvayaḥ na hi śabda ākhyaḥ pakṣaḥ dharmī dharmi antare vartate sa pakṣetu anyatama abhidheye pakṣa dharma tā na asti na hi ākāśa ādiḥ sa pakṣaḥ śabda ākhye dharmiṇi vartate anyatara tvam na pratyeka mātram 
NM_11,2.584.124	 ucyate na pakṣa tvāt iti hetuḥ prayuktaḥ sa pakṣa tvāt iti vā yena evaṃsyāt pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ anyatara tvāt iti tat ca dvayoḥ api kim api sādhāraṇam rūpam na hi varuṇaḥ yaṣṭavyaḥ iti yādṛśī buddhiḥ tādṛśi evamitrāvaruṇayoḥ anyataraḥ yaṣṭavyaḥ iti viśeṣa niṣṭhatāyām tu balāt āpādyamānāyām sakala anumāna ucchedaḥ na ca anyatara tvam śabda mātra āropitam rūpam avāstavam iti vaditum ucitam artha asaṃsparśitāyāḥ pratikṣipta tvāt 
NM_11,2.584.125–11,2.584.126	 anyataratva āditya siddhaḥ hetuḥ iti ced kila pakṣaḥ eva ayam na pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ anyataraḥ iti tat ayuktam yatas eva ayam pakṣaḥ tatas eva ayam pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ anyataraḥ na hi apakṣaḥ pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ anyataraḥ syāt na hi avaruṇaḥ mitrāvaruṇayoḥ anyataraḥ iti uktam eva pakṣaḥ api ca bhavan= eṣaḥ na pakṣa tvāt iti anena rūpeṇa hetūkriyate kintuanyatara tvāt iti ittham ca hetūkaraṇe na ekaḥ api doṣaḥ iti sa pratipakṣa udāharaṇa antaram 
NM_11,2.584.127–11,2.584.129	 aparam udāharaṇam san sarvajñaḥ itaratad viparīta vinirmukta tvāt ghaṭa vat asan sarvajñaḥ itaratad viparīta vinirmukta tvāt khara viṣāṇavatiti atra api ākṣepa pratisamādhāna prakāraḥ pūrvavat anusaraṇīyaḥ dharmya siddha tā ādi ca yatnatas paricintanīyam evaṃjātīyakam tu udāharaṇam na anumodante matimantaḥ yatra hi hetunā asvayam artham samyak asamyak vā anumāya pramātā para pratyāyanāya tam eva hetuṃprayuṃjīta sa prayujyamānaḥ vastu bala pravṛtta tayā hetūbhavati hetvābhāsībhavati vā ukta anumānayoḥ anudāharaṇa tvam 
NM_11,2.584.130	 tathā hi āroha pariṇāhavati puras ava asthite dharmiṇi sthāṇu gata viśeṣa anupalambhāt ekasya puruṣaḥ iti bhavati pratītiḥ itarasya tu puruṣa gata viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ sthāṇuḥ iti bhavati matiḥ evam ca yadā asau= ekaḥ puruṣa tva siddhaye param prati sthāṇu dharma agrahaṇam hetu tvena brūyāt itaraḥ api puruṣa dharma agrahaṇena sthāṇutām pratiṣṭhāpayan pratyavatiṣṭheta tadā sva prati iti anusaraṇa pura smara sādhana abhidhānāt bhrānti saṃbhavāt ca yuktam tathāvidha udāharaṇa kīrtanam evam nityaḥ śabdaḥ anitya dharma anupalabdheḥ ākāśa vat anityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya dharma anupalabdheḥ ghaṭa vat iti api draṣṭavyam sa pratipakṣa hetvoḥ vastivatu āvaśyaka tā 
NM_11,2.584.131–11,2.584.132	 yaḥ tu na vastu mūlaḥ kevala utprekṣā mātra ābalambanaḥ sva pratītiṣu na dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ kim tad upanyāsena etena sa dvitīya prayogāḥ api pratyuktāḥ yathā kvacid sādhana prayoga kṛte sati tatra evam paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate prastuta sādhya dharma adhikaraṇa tva śūnya dharmi ghaṭa anyatarasa dvitīyaḥ ghaṭaḥ anutpanna tvāt kuḍya vat iti yathā prastutena siṣā dhayiṣitena dharmeṇa śūnyaḥ yaḥ prakṛtaḥ dharmī ghaṭaḥ ca tayoḥ anyatareṇasadvitīyaḥ ayam ghaṭa ākhyaḥ dharmī tatra hetuḥ anutpanna tvam tasya kuḍya ādauvyāptiḥ iti kevala sva buddhi kalpita tvasya āsa pratipakṣatā 
NM_11,2.584.133	 satyam vadate yadi asti loke kvacid īdṛśaḥ pratīti kramaḥ ghaṭaḥ ca dharmī dharmi ghaṭayoḥ anyatareṇa sa dvitīyaḥ iti atra anyatara śabdaḥ sāmānya vacanaḥ apidharmiṇi vyākhyeyaḥ na hi ghaṭaḥ eva ghaṭena sa dvitīyaḥ bhavitum arhati iti alam alīka kalpanā kauśala pratyākhyānena samyak vā yadi vā anyathā vidadhate ye hetavaḥ saṃvid aṃdṛṣṭāḥ sva ātmani te prayoktum ucitāḥ kāmam para jñaptaye ye tu sva pratipattim eva na tathā kartum kṣamāḥ kalpanā sāmarthya utthita vastu śūnya ghaṭanāḥ kim tad prayoge phalam anubhava asiddha hetoḥ na sa pratipakṣa tvam 
NM_11,2.584.134	 ye tu sūkṣma utprekṣaṇa kṣama prajñā atiśaya abhimāna durvidagdhāḥ tathāvidhāna piprayuṃjate kṛtakaracanā cāturyam taiḥ pradarśitam ātmanaḥ bhavati na punar śuddhiḥ kācid prameya diśaḥ kṛtā kvacid avasare evaṃprāyāḥ para bhrama kāriṇaḥ kila sa phala tām dadhyuḥ jalpe yathā kathitam purā tatra tu etān kathayati paraḥ prājña mānī yadā vātasya ākhyeyaḥ nipuṇa matinā pūrva nītyā samādhiḥ drādhīyasyā tad alam anayā tārki kam manya goṣṭhī ā hetvābhāsaḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ tu eṣa nirṇītaḥ eva asiddha lakṣaṇam sādhya aviśiṣṭaḥ sādhya tvāt sādhya samaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.135–11,2.584.137	 anyataravādi prasiddhaṃanyataram prati yat sādhayitum upādīyate tat sādhyam tat aviśiṣṭaḥ hetuḥ sādhya samaḥ katham sādhyena tulya tā hetoḥ iti ced āha sādhya tvāt iti yathā asādhyam asiddha tvāt sādhyam tathā tad sidhi artham upāttaḥ hetuḥ apiyaḥ asiddha tvāt sādhyaḥ saḥ sādhya aviśiṣṭa tvāt sādhya samaḥ ucyate etat ca anyatara asiddhasya eva lakṣaṇam yathā mīmāṃsakam prati anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti na cākṣuṣa tva ādeḥ ubhaya asiddhasya sādhya tvam saṃbhavati iti atas sakala asiddha bhada saṅgrahāya sādhya tvāt iti etat pada rahitam sādhya aviśiṣṭaḥ iti eva asiddha lakṣaṇam upavarṇanīyam sādhyasya rūpa dvayam 
NM_11,2.584.138	 sādhyasya ca rūpa dvayam asti asiddha tvam sādhya tvam ca tatra asiddha tvam eva bhavati tava viśiṣṭa tva kāraṇam iha āśrīyate sarva asiddha bheda sādhāraṇam na tu sādhya tvam anyatara asiddhi eka lagnam iti evaṃcāsiddhatvam eva asiddhasya lakṣaṇam uktam bhavati pakṣa dharma tvam yasya na asti sādhye dharmiṇi yaḥ navartate hetuḥ saḥ asiddhaḥ iti asiddhāḥ anekavidhāḥ 
NM_11,2.584.139	 tasya tu bhūyāṃsaḥ bhedāḥ bhavanti hetu svarūpe tāvat anyatarasya vādinoḥ dvayoḥ vā ajñānam saṃdehaḥ viparyayaḥ iti tathā tad āśraye apidharmiṇi ekasya vā dvayoḥ vā tathā eva ajñāna sandeha viparyayāḥ iti bhūyasi capakṣīkṛte arthe tad eka deśe kvacid vṛttiḥ  tad itaratra āvṛttiḥ iti eka deśa vṛttau= api dvayoḥ ekasya vā tathā eva ajñāna saṃśaya viparyayāḥ iti evam prakāra bheda udāharaṇa varṇanam alpa prayojanam iti na prastūyate anyatara asiddheḥ sarva saṃpratipanna tvam 
NM_11,2.584.140	 anyatara asiddhe tu na vivadante pramāṇasya apakṣa pāti tvāt yadi tāvat kṛtaka tvam śabde pramāṇataḥ niścitam tarhi mīmāṃsakasya api tārkikasya ivatat siddham eva atha tatra kṛtaka tva niścaya nipuṇam na asti eva pramāṇam tadā atārkikaḥ api tūṣṇīm āstām dvayoḥ api asau cākṣuṣa tva ādi vat na siddhaḥ hetuḥ vāc mātreṇa tu asiddhi katha nam asāṃpratam atiprasaṅgāt iti asiddhasya anitya doṣa tvam 
NM_11,2.584.141	 satyam evam na sarvadā anyatara asiddhasya hetvābhāsa tvam samabhidadhmahe kintu kiṃcid kālam iti yadā ekena vādinā hetau prayukte dvitīyaḥ vadati mām prati na siddhaḥ eṣa hetuḥ iti tadā hetoḥ prayoktrā tad sādhanam abhidheyam anabhidhānāt sa parājīyate sādhane tu tena ukte tad asiddha tā udbhāvana vādī parājīyate iti yāvat tad siddhau na upanyastam sādhanam tāvat eva asauanyatara asiddhaḥ anantaram tu samyak hetuḥ ubhaya asiddhaḥ vā bhaviṣyati iti vyadhikaraṇā siddhi svarūpam 
NM_11,2.584.142–11,2.584.143	 vyadhikaraṇa asiddhiḥ tu yathā ukta bheda antargataḥ eva yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ kākasya kārṣṇyāt iti kvacid punar ca vyadhikaraṇa asiddhaḥ api bhavati gamakaḥ iti eke tat yathā bahala bahalaḥ pracala jala dhara śyāmala vapuḥ ambara talam ākrāman dhūma prabandhaḥ kṣoṇīdhra kandara ādi pradeśa dharma tvānavadhāraṇe api tatra gamayitum alam analam iti yadāḥ vai agni māneṣu deśaḥ dhūma upalabdheḥ iti prayujyeta tadā upalabdhe rātma dharma tayā vaiyadhikaraṇye api gamaka tā asti iti anyathā siddhasya na atirikta tvam 
NM_11,2.584.144–11,2.584.145	 anye tu anyathā siddha tvam nāma tad bhedam udāharanti yasya hetoḥ dharmiṇi vṛttiḥ bhavanti api sādhya dharma pravṛttā na bhavati saḥ anyathā siddhaḥ yathā anityāḥ manaḥ paramāṇavaḥ mūrta tvāt ghaṭa vat iti nanu ! katham ayam anyathā asiddhaḥ ucyate kim iti sat hetuḥ eva na bhavati kim paramāṇuṣu mūrta tvam na vartate kim ghaṭa ādau= anitya tayā vyāptam na dṛśyate kim ākāśa ādeḥ kha puṣpa ādeḥ vā vipakṣān na pracyavate kim pratyakṣeṇa āgamena vā abādhyate kim pratipakṣeṇa prabādhyate yena ābhāsa tām bhajate na pratibandha abhāvāt anyathā siddhasya aprayojaka tvam 
NM_11,2.584.146	 nanu ! paṃcānām pratibandha lakṣaṇānām katama dasya ślathībhūtam na anyatamasya api śaithilyam brūmaḥ tat kim paṃcasu api lakṣaṇeṣu na parisamāptaḥ pratibandhaḥ na na parisamāptaḥ kā tarhi iyam viḍambanā paṃcasu lakṣaṇa iṣu pratibandhaḥ parisamāpyate tāni ca asya santi eva na ca eṣa pratibandhaḥ itikaitavam ucyate prayojya prayojaka bhāvena sādhya sādhana dharmayoḥ dhūma agni vat pratibandhaḥ avadhāryate sa ca atra prayojya prayojaka bhāvaḥ na asti iti ataeva ayam anyathā siddhaḥ aprayojakaḥ iti kathyate aprayojaka tva nirṇaya kramaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.147	 katham punar asya aprayojaka tvam avagatam ucyate mūrta tvam hi sarva gata itara dravya parimāṇa viśeṣa ādi dharmaḥ vastu svabhāva mātra nibandhanaḥ na kṛtaka tva ādi vat anitya tām prayoktum utsahate tathā hi paramāṇuṣu siddheṣu satsu tatra vartamānam mūrta tvam anitya tām sādhayet anyathātva āśraya asiddha tām upeyāt sidhyante eva ca sāvayava kārya anumāna mārgeṇa loṣṭa pravibhaṃga avabhāsamāna bhāga paramparā parikalpana krameṇa vā paramāṇavaḥ niravayavāḥ siddhyanti sāvayava tve hi tad avayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ bhaveyu na te teṣām api avayava antara parikalpanāyām api avayavānām ānantyāviśeṣat sarṣapasya meroḥ ca sāmyam āpadyate na ca tat asti tat evam niravayaveṣu parama aṇuṣu nisarga siddham anāśrita tvam atas ca āśraya vināśa avayava vibhāga ādi vināśa kāraṇa abhāvāt svābhāvika vināśa vāda nirākaraṇāt ca katham paramāṇūn anityatā spṛśet mūrta tvam tu vastu dharma tvāt bhavat api prameya tvāt na prayojakam 
NM_11,2.584.148–11,2.584.149	 iyān= tu viśeṣaḥ prameya ṛtvaḥ ubhaya pakṣa sparśāt anaikāntikam bhavat aprayojakam idam tu mūrta tvam anitya vyatiriktaḥ tu antara paricaya virahitam api na prayojakam iti mūrta tva hetoḥ anaikānki tvākṣepaḥ nanu ! idam api prameya tva vat vipakṣa vṛttyā iva mūrta tvam kva vipakṣevartate  paramāṇuṣu eva nanu teṣām pakṣīkṛta tvāt katham vipakṣatā na ṣecchā anurodhena vastu viparivartate vipakṣaḥ hi nāma saḥ ucyate yaḥ siṣā dhayiṣita dharma viparīta dharma adhyāsita tayā dṛḍha pramāṇa siddhaḥ paramāṇavaḥ ca ete anantara nirdiṣṭa nīti krameṇa nirṇīta nitya tvāḥ paramārthataḥ vipakṣa aeva anitya tva vādinaḥ sa tu rāga dveṣa kaluṣita hṛdaya tayā yadi tāvat pakṣatayā bravīti bravītu nāma na tu su spaṣṭā siddha nityatānām vipakṣa bhāvaḥ nivartate iti tasya anaikāntika tva asaṃbhavaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.150–11,2.584.151	 tat idam anupapannam anena krameṇa dhūma anumānasya api anaikāntika tva prasaṅgāt dhūmaḥ hi mahībhṛti hutavaha virahita vapuṣi vipakṣe vartate eva natatra citrabhānoḥ abhāvaḥ niścitaḥ iti ced kinnu khalu sadbhāvaḥ asya tatra gṛhītaḥ tathā sati vā kṛtam anumānena atha sattvam asat tvam vā na avadhāritam eva dharādhare dhūmaketoḥ tarhi sandigdhā tatra vipakṣa tā niścita vipakṣa vṛtti vat saṃśayita vipakṣa vṛttiḥ api na anaikāntika tām ativartate iti sarva anumānānām eva nivāpa aṃjaliḥ dattaḥ syāt pakṣasya api sa pakṣa vipakṣa tva ākṣepa parihārau 
NM_11,2.584.152	 na ca vādi hṛdaya parikalpana upārūḍha sthitiḥ api pakṣaḥ nāma na asti tad abhāve kim apekṣaḥ sa pakṣa vipakṣa vyavahāraḥ buddhi ārūḍha tva pakṣe api na sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ pakṣa tvam na ca vastūnām ubhaya ātmaka tā bhavet kintu kaṃcikālam atyatara asiddhi vat vimati patha apatitasya vastunaḥ pakṣa tvam upeyate nirṇaya janmā tu vimati viratau nūnam anyatara varga patitaḥ asau bhaviṣyati iti sarvathā na tasyām daśāyām tena anaikāntika tva udbhāvanam yuktam pakṣe sādhya siddhi asaṃbhava ākṣepa parihārau 
NM_11,2.584.153–11,2.584.154	 nanu ! anena pathā pṛthak kṛte sa pakṣa vipakṣābhyām pakṣena tatra anvaya vyatirekayoḥ anyatarasya api grahaṇam bhavet sa pakṣe hi anvayaḥ gṛhyate vipakṣe ca vyatirekaḥ eṣa tu tābhyām artha antaram iti tatra agṛhīta anvaya vyatireka ātma niyame hetuḥ ṣaṇḍhaḥ iva suta janmani na samarthaḥ eva sādhya upasthāpanebhavet alam anayā ḍimbha bibhīṣikayā na hi sakala sapakṣa vipakṣa sākṣāt karaṇa kāraṇa keka ullekha purassaram vyapti grahaṇam iti pūrvam eva nirṇotaḥ ayam arthaḥ na catad varjam iti vyāpti grahaṇam bhavati yena ṣaṇḍha suta sāmya codanā vakāśaḥ syāt sāmānyena hi vyāptiḥ gṛhyamāṇā tatra api gṛhītā bhavati eva tena api ca kāla antare sa pakṣa vipakṣa anyatara varga anupraveśinā bhavitavyam eva vimati avasthāyām tu pṛthak eva tābhyām asau= iti na tatra vartamānaḥ hetuḥ anaikāntikobhavati 
NM_11,2.584.155–11,2.584.156	 etena īśvara ādi anumānānām api anaikāntika tvam apākṛtam veditavyam tasmāt na anaikāntika tvena āgamakam mūrta tvam api tu anyathā siddha tvena eva iti ukta hetoḥ bādhita tvam api na nanu ! evam api paramāṇu prasādhana anumāna mahima hata śakti tayā mūrta tvam anitya tva siddhau= akṣamam jātam iti tatas ca kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvāt na anyathā siddha tām adhigacchet na etat evam kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ hi pratyakṣa āgama apahṛta viṣayaḥ ucyate anuṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇadartmā madirā dvijaiḥ pātavyāḥ ityādau darśitaḥ yat punar anunumānam pratyakṣa āgama viruddham nyāya ābhāsaḥ saḥ iti na ca paramāṇuṣu parama aṇu tayā eva satata parokṣeṣu pratyakṣam anitya tā viparyaya grāhi pravartitum śaktam āgamaḥ tu na asti eva iti kutas kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tā anumānena anumāna bādha ākṣepaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.157–11,2.584.158	 nanu ! kim idamaḥ nipati vacanam uta vaidikī codanā yat pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ eva bādhaka tvam anumānam prati na anumāna antarasya iti paramāṇu prasādhana anumānam hi dṛḍham adṛḍhasya tad anitya tā anumānasya mūrta tva ādeḥ yadi bādhakaṃsyāt kaḥ doṣaḥ syāt iti atha manuṣe niyamaḥ eva eṣaḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ virodhe pratyakṣam eva balīyā eti tat eva anumānasya bādhakam ucitam na anumāna antaram iti tat asat alāta cakra ādau pratyakṣam api anumānena ananyathā siddhena bādhyataḥ eva anumānena pratyakṣasya api bādhaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.159–11,2.584.160	 nanu ! bhramaṇa viratau parimita parimāṇa ulmuka grāhi pratyakṣam eva tatra pratyakṣasya bādhakam na anumānam iti na evam anavarata paribhramaṇa samudbhūta cakra avabhāsa samayaḥ eva anumānena tatra bhrānta tā niścayāt pūrva pravṛttam acakra ākāra tad alātapari chedi pratyakṣam bādhakam iti ced na pūrva pravṛtta tvena eva atikrānta tvāt tasmāt anumānam eva cakra jñāna bādhakam evaṃca ananyathā siddham anumānam api pratyakṣasya bādhakam bhavati 
NM_11,2.584.161–11,2.584.162	 yat ca ananyathā siddha tayā mūla stambha bhūtam akhila anumāna pratiṣṭhā āyatanam pratyakṣam api bādhate tat anumānasya tapasvinaḥ katham na bādhakam atas ca pratyakṣa āgama grahaṇasya upalakṣaṇa artha tvāt anumāna bādhitam api kāla atyaya apadiṣṭam eva iti anumānena anumāna bādhā saṃbhava siddhāntaḥ tat etat asamī cīnam anumāna ādeḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāva anupapatteḥ sarvatrakhalu pramāṇa bhāsa rūpam bādhyate na tu pramāṇam nāma śakyate bādhitum alāta cakra ādau= api pratyakṣa ābhāsasya bādhakam anumānam na pratyakṣasya evam atra api anumāna ābhāsasya bādhya tā na anumānasya 
NM_11,2.584.163	 tat idānīm anumāna ābhāsa tvam asya kiṃkṛtam iti cintyatām sva lakṣaṇa vaidhuryāt iti ced kim anumāna aṃtareṇa bādhakena tat vādhya tayā tu tad ābhāsa tva kathanam itarasya api tādṛśam eva paramāṇu prasādhana anumānam ananyathā siddham idam tu mūrta tvam anyathā siddham iti ced āgataḥ asi madīyam panthānam anyathā asiddha tvāt eva tad aprāmāṇye siddhe kim tad bādhayā 
NM_11,2.584.164–11,2.584.165	 anyathā siddha tvam eva katham iti ced na ghaṭa ādau mūrta tva prayuktam anitya tvam api tu kāryatva prayuktam kāryasya hi kāraṇa vibhāgāt vā tad vināśāt vā vināśa upapatteḥ kāryatvam eva anitya tva prayojarka yuktam na mūrta tvam mūrtatpe tu anitya tā kṣepiṇi paramāṇu tā eva hīyeta iti uktam tasmāt na mūrta tvam anitya tāyām kārakam jñāpakam vā iti bhavati anyathā siddham aprayojakasya asiddhau= antarbhāva hetuḥ bhavatu evam asiddha varge tu katham eṣa hetuḥ gaṇyate sādhya dharma yuktā dharmiṇi vṛttiḥ asya na asti iti ced yadi evam paṃcānām api tad prayukta vṛtti rahita tvāt asiddhaḥ eva ekaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ syāt 
NM_11,2.584.166	 atha sati api prayojaka tve vipakṣa vṛtti ādi avāṃtara rūpa bheda nibandhanānaikānti tva ādi vyapadeśa paṃcaka bhājaḥ ime hetvābhāsāḥ iṣyante hanta tarhi prakṛtaḥ ayam hetuḥ mūrta tvāt iti kim anaikāntikaḥ ucyatām atha kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ  āhosvit viruddhaḥ uta prakaraṇa samaḥ iti na eṣām anyatamaḥ api vaktum śakyate etad lakṣaṇa anupapatterini ced kāmam asiddhaḥ api māvādi pakṣe vartamāna tvena tad lakṣaṇasya api anupapatteḥ iti aprayojakasya atirikta tvam eva astu 
NM_11,2.584.167–11,2.584.168	 astu tarhi ṣaṣṭhaḥ eva ayam hetvābhāsaḥ samyak hetu tām tāvat yathā ukta nayenana aśnutaḥ eva na ca eteṣu antar bhavati iti balāt ṣaṣṭhaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate kathaṃvibhāga sūtram iti ced atikramiṣyāmaḥ idam sūtram atikrāmantaḥ su spaṣṭa dṛṣṭam api imam aprayojakam hetvābhāsam apahnuvīmahi na ca evam yuktam atas varam sūtra atikramaḥ na vastu atikramaḥ iti atha vā na sūtrakāra niyama ullaṅghanam śreyaḥ pramādyan khalu parimita darśī mādṛśaḥ anyathā brūyāt na nyāya mahodadheḥ pāradṛśvā bhagavān akṣapādaḥ tat enam hetvābhāsam asiddha vargaḥ eva nikṣipāmaḥ aprayojakasya asiddha tvam eva 
NM_11,2.584.169	 nanu ! pakṣe vartamānaḥ katham tatra nikṣeptum śakyate yathā sādhya dharma prayojaka tayā pakṣe api vartitum yuktam tathā na vartate eva ayam tatra iti adūra viprakarṣeṇa bhavati eva ayam asiddhaḥ atas eva ayam anyathā asiddhaḥ iti ucyate yathā asiddhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati tathā na siddhaḥ anyathā tu siddhaḥ iti anayāni itya uttāna vṛtti mātra lābhe api ayam asiddhaḥ evam anyeṣu tu hetvābhāsa iṣu bhaṅgyā api na antarbhavati iti uktam etat aprayojaka tvam sarva anugatam vā 
NM_11,2.584.170	 athavā sarva hetvābhāsā anuvṛttam idam anyathāsiddha tvam nāma rūpam iti nana ṣaṭhaḥ ayam hetvābhāsaḥ tat tu kvacid kevalam eva dṛśyate kvacid avyabhicāra ādiḥ upāntara sahacāritam atas ca vyabhicāra ādi rūpa apekṣam eva paṃcatu asupadiṣṭavān muniḥ iti na vibhāga sūtra virodha eti alam ati vistareṇa yuktaḥ tasmāt anyathā siddha nāmā hetvābhāsaḥ saḥ ayam eka prakāraḥ yasya uttānā vidyamānā api pakṣevṛttiḥ na syāt sādhya dharma prayuktāḥ hetvābhāsa kudumbakasya tat idam sarvasya sādhāraṇaṃrūpam yadi api lakṣaṇa antara kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ tathā na anyatas sāmānyam tu viśeṣa rūpa rahitam na asti pramāṇam yathā amā bhūt atra tathā iti na asya viṣayaḥ ca udyasya vastu sthitiḥ 
NM_11,2.584.171–11,2.584.173	 iti asiddha parīkṣā bādhita lakṣaṇamkāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ kāla atītaḥ yathāprāptam hetu prayoga kālam atītya yaḥ hetuḥ apadiśyate sa kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ kāla atītaḥ ucyate vyākhyā antaram tatra kecid ācakṣate pratijñā anantaram hi hetuḥ prayoktum yuktaḥ tatrayaḥ pratijñāyāḥ pūrvam eva dṛṣṭānta vacana ādeḥ api ūrdhvam vā prayujyate sa kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ iti tad anupapannam akṣata pratibandhasya sādhya avagati kāriṇaḥ krama atikrama mātreṇa na hetvābhāsa tā bhavet 
NM_11,2.584.174–11,2.584.175	 kiyān= ca eṣa doṣaḥ pada antara vyavahita uccāraṇam nāma vyavahitam apiyena saha samucita samayam anvetum adhikṛtam itarad ati nikaṭa paṭhitam api parāṇudyadavīyasā api tena eva saṃbandham anubhavati yathā athasā pathi gacchantīm auṣadhīm dīrgha locanām dṛṣṭaḥ si kedāre yaḥ lunāsi mama priyām iti api ca takālam etat kathitam pṛthak eva nigraha sthānam tat cepunar ucyamānam na tvā artham āvahati tasmāt apavyākhyānam etat vyākhyāna antaram 
NM_11,2.584.176	 aparaḥ āha  śeṣaṇasya hetoḥ prayujyamānasya yasya viśeṣaṇam kārya kālam atyeti na tam avatiṣṭhate sa kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ iti yathā kāla antara sthāyī ḥ saṃyoga vyaṅgya tvāt rūpavat iti atra navī aṅgya tva mātram vivakṣitam api tu sa viśeṣaṇam saṃyoga vyaṅya tvam sa cā vyaṃjakaḥ dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi rūpe tad avagati paryanta sthitiḥ upalabhyate dīpa ādi saṃyogaḥ sādhya dharmiṇi tu śabde na tathā avasthānam iti dūratas hi dāruparaśu saṃyoga vicchinne chetrā punar udyamyamāne paraśvatheśrūyate śabdaḥ iti tad upalabdhi kāle tad atyayāt kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ ayam hetuḥ iti vyākhyāna antara nirāsaḥ sva pakṣaḥ ca 
NM_11,2.584.177	 etat api na saṅgatam asiddha tvena asya hetvābhāsa antara tva anupapatteḥ tasmāt ayam artha hetoḥ prayoga kālaḥ pratyakṣa āgamān upahata pakṣa parigraha samayaḥ eva tam atītya prayujyamānaḥ pratvakṣa āgama bādhite viṣaye vartamānaḥ kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ bhavati tasya udāharaṇam pūrvam eva pradarśitam uṣṇaḥ na tejaḥ avayavī kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat brāhmaṇena surā peyā dravya tvāt kṣīra nīra vat yat ca kiṃcid abhidheyavatra tat sarvam uktam anumāna lakṣaṇe aprayojaka nirūpaṇe punar kiṃcana uditam atas viramyate hetvābhāsa parīkṣā upasaṃhāraḥ hetvābhāsāḥ te ete avagati niyamita ananya saṃkīrṇa rūpāḥ nirṇītāḥ paṃcaye arthe vidadhati mahatīm śuddhim abhyasyamānāḥ pakṣa ādau vṛtti bheda akalana gurutara kleśa niṣpādyamānaiḥ taina yattā tadīyā kvacana phalavatī nādatāḥ tena tad jñaiḥ 
NM_11,2.584.178–11,2.584.179	 iti hetvābhāsāḥ chala parokṣā tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇam jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ prayojanam uktam tad aṅga bhūtāni chala ja ati nigraha sthānāni yadi api ca vāde keṣāṃcad abhyanujñānam asti tathā api jalpa vitaṇḍe eva teṣām prācuryeṇa kṣetram iti tad aupayika tayā tad svarūpa nirūpaṇam yuktam iti uddeśa krameṇa chalasya tāvat lakṣaṇam āha vacana vighātaḥ artha vikalpa upapattyā cchalam 
NM_11,2.584.180	 chalasya bhedavat tvāt sāmānya lakṣaṇam vibhāgaḥ viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni cavaktavyāni tāni iha sarvāṇi sva kaṇṭhena kila tad pūrvakam anumānam iti atra tri catura akṣara samarpita aparimita viṣaya vitata anumāna lakṣaṇa labdha nirati śaya sūtra karaṇa kauśalyasya me kim adhunā śiṣya jana manaḥ kleśa kāriṇā saṃkṣipta abhidhāna dohadena iti manyamānaḥ sūtra kṛt uktavān chala sūtra vyākhyānam 
NM_11,2.584.181	 tatra vacana vighātaḥ iti sūtram sāmānya lakṣaṇa pratipādakam parasyavat ataḥ vacana vighātaḥ abhidhāna nirodhaḥ chalam kim āsya pidhāna ādinā na iti āha artha vikalpa upapattyā iti vaktuḥ anabhipretam arthāt tat ukte vacasisamāropya tat niṣedham chala vādī karoti katham artha antarāropaṇam iti ced artha vikalpa upattyā vikalpamāna artha ghaṭanayā iti arthaḥ nirviśeṣam na sāmānyam 
NM_11,2.584.182–11,2.584.183	 kim uda āharaṇam viśeṣa lakṣaṇeṣu vakṣyāmaḥ iha eva kasmāt na ucyate asaṃbhavāt iti brūmaḥ na hi nirviśeṣam sāmānyam upapadyate iti tat udāhriyamāṇam balāt viśeṣa niṣṭham eva avatiṣṭhate anyeṣu api gauḥ na padā spraṣṭavyāḥ iti sāmānya upadeśeṣu na amūrtāyāṃa ākāśa nirviśeṣa vapuṣi jātau sparśa prasaktiḥ tad niṣedhaḥ vā avakalpate kintu vyaktiṣu eva iti viśeṣa viṣayaḥ eva sarvatra kriyā yogaḥ iti tatra eva udāharaṇa varṇanam yuktam viśeṣasya eva sāmānya dṛṣṭānta tā api 
NM_11,2.584.184	 katham tarhi sakala hetu ābhāsa sārtha sāmānya lakṣaṇam aprayojaka tvam anapekṣita savyabhicāra viruddha ādi viśeṣam api udāharaṇa dvāreṇa darśitam anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ mūrta tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ucyate pramāṇe tarhi pratyakṣa ādi viśeṣa nirapekṣam pramāṇa sāmānyam na udāhṛtam nanu ! ayam aparaḥ doṣaḥ astu tat api ayuktam eva anuṣṭhitam kim iti na udāhṛtam anapekṣita pratyakṣa ādi viśeṣam pramāṇa sāmānyam atra ucyate na śakyam udāhartum asaṃbhavāt iti tat noda āhṛtam na punar ālasyāt pramādāt vā hetvābhāsa samūha tva ādhāraṇa rūpam tu aprayojaka tvam tathā saṃbhavāt udāhṛtam na ca tad sāmānyāt atra api tathā astu iti vaktavyam na hi cākṣuṣeṇa paṃcāśat bhavitum arhati tasmānaivam vaktum śakyam sarvatra na ekaḥ nyāyaḥ saṃbhavati 
NM_11,2.584.185–11,2.584.186	 yathā viruddha ādi viśeṣa rūpa rahitam aprayojaka tvam hetvābhāseṣu sāmānya rūpam dṛśyate tathā pramāṇeṣu api pratyakṣa ādi viśeṣa rūpa rahitam tat dṛśyatām yathā vā pramāṇeṣu tat na dṛśyate tathā hetvābhāseṣu api mā darśī iti vastu svabhāvānām anuyoga kṣetra tā anupapatteḥ api ca aprayojaka tvam sāmānyam viruddha ādi viśeṣeṣu iva tad rūpa rahita iṣu tad viśeṣeṣu api saṃbhavat dṛśyate atas eva tat api sva viśeṣa niṣṭham eva udāhṛtam anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ mūrta tvāt iti na ca ākāśa vadana ālambanam eva kiṃcid aprayojaka tva sāmānyam iti tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam na sāmānya lakṣaṇeśakyam udāhartum iti chala vibhāgaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.187–11,2.584.190	 evam sāmānya lakṣaṇam abhidhāya chalasya vibhāgam āha tat trividham vākchalam sāmānyacchalam upacāra= chalam ca  nigada vyākhyātam sūtram vibhāga sāmānya lakṣaṇayoḥ ca upadeśa paurvāparya niyamaḥ na asti iti pūrvam eva uktam vākcchala lakṣaṇam atha vibhāga krameṇa lakṣaṇāni āha tatra aviśeṣa abhihite arthe vaktuḥ abhiprāthādartha antara kalpanā vākchalam saṃbhavat viśeṣe api aviśeṣa sādhāraṇa artha samarpaṇa kauśala śālini śleṣa alaṅkāravati śabde prayukte sati vaktuḥ abhipretam artham apahnutya tatas artha antaraṃparikalpya tad niṣedha vacanam vāci nimitta bhūtāyām chalam vākchalam 
NM_11,2.584.191	 nava kambalaḥ ayam māṇavakaḥ iti navaḥ kambalaḥ asya nava kambalāasya iti vigrahada śādṛśyamāna viśeṣam api samāsapadam idam artha dvaye api aviśiṣṭam tatra abhinava kambala yogam vaktuḥ abhipretam pramāṇa upapannam ca nihnuti anava saṃkhyā saṃbandham adhyāropya tad pratiṣedhena paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate kutas asi anava kambalāḥ iti tat etat sādhāraṇa śabde vāci chalam vākchalam iti vāc chala pratisamādhānam 
NM_11,2.584.192	 yathā ca kasyāṃcid avasthāyām jalpa ādau chala ādi prayogaḥ yuktaḥ iti tad vyutpādanam evam para prayuktasya api sataḥ chala ādeḥ pratisamādhānam abhidheyam iti tat api vyutpādyate nava kambalāḥ asya iti mama vivakṣitam itikutaḥ pratipannam āyuṣmatā kim ayam abhinava kambala yoga pratipādakaḥ na bhavati eva bahuvrīhiḥ pakṣa dvaye api ca saṃbhavati yadi tāvat artha prakaraṇa ādi sāmarthya paryā locana avasita niyata abhidheya vṛtti śabda vyavahāra abhijñaḥ asi tad artha siddham artham abhinava kambala sambandham eva buddhvā tūṣṇīm āsva atha śuṣka tārkika kuṭumbaka garbha dāsaḥ iva śabda vṛtta anabhijñaḥ eva tvam tarhi pakṣa dvaya saṃbhavena saṃśayānaḥ mām eva pṛccha kim te vivakṣitam iti niṣedhakaḥ sanvaktum upakramase artha dvaya sādhāraṇa pada prayogaḥ na doṣāya 
NM_11,2.584.193	 nanu ! tvam api artha prātpya ādi phala paryanta śabda prayoga pravṛttaḥ kim iti sādhāraṇam idam andhapada prāyam vacaḥ prayuṅkṣe ayi bāliśa ! tava eva iha idam andha padam artha prakaraṇa adhīna niyata sva artha vṛtti tām yaḥ na janāti śabdānām saḥ evam apabhāṣate idam artha dvaye tāvat sādhāraṇa padam bhavet jāti śabdāḥ punar vyakti sahasra ākṣepa kāriṇaḥ spṛśanti niyatam vācyam te api prakaraṇa ādinā brāhmaṇān bhojaya ityādau tad vālena na śikṣitam  tasmāt śabda artha sandehe prayoktā vā sa pṛcchyate na tu artha antaram āropya tad niṣedhaḥ vidhīyate sāmānya= chala lakṣaṇam saṃbhavataḥ arthasya ati sāmānya yogāt asat bhūta artha kalpanā sāmānya= chalam 
NM_11,2.584.194–11,2.584.196	 anivyāpakam sāmānyam atisāmānyam tad yogāt tad saṃbhavāt kvacid vyakta arthasya kasya cit saṃbhavataḥ saṃbhāvyamāna niṣpatteḥ vaktrā abhihitasya sataḥ yā asat bhūta artha kalpanā vaktuḥ anabhipreta atisāmānya hetu tva kalpanātayā ca pratyavasthānam tad sāmānya nimittam chalam sāmānyacchalam yathā kvacid ucita upacāra vacana ārādhya māna praguṇa brāhmaṇa kule tad kathā bahule rāja kule kaścid su janmā kaṃcid agrajanmānam stauti aho nu khalu asaubrāhmaṇaḥ vidyā caraṇa saṃpannaḥ iti tasmin prasaṅge tathāvidhaḥ eva aparaḥ tam utsāhayan kathayati saṃbhavati brāhmaṇe vidyā caraṇa saṃpad iti tatra piśunaḥ chalava ādī āha yadi brāhmaṇe vidyā avacaraṇa saṃpad saṃbhavati tarhi brātye api brāhmaṇa tva jāti anapāyāt sā bhavet iti tatra idam ativyāpakam brāhmaṇa tva sāmānyam yatas vidyā caraṇa saṃpadam atyeti spṛśati ca tad yogāt brāhmaṇa vyaktau saṃbhavataḥ vidyā caraṇa saṃpad rūpasya arthasya vaktrā abhihitasya sataḥ tatra vaktra nabhimatām eva ati sāmānya hetutām āropya= chala vādī pratyavatiṣṭhate iti sāmānya= chala pratisamādhānam 
NM_11,2.584.197	 atra uttaram kena brāhmaṇa tvasya atra hetu tvam abhihitam yat anaikāntikīkurvan pratyavasthitaḥ asi saṃbhāvanā vacanam idam stuti artham upanyastam vidyā caraṇa saṃpadām pātram hi brāhmaṇaḥ sati brāhmaṇa tve pūrva janma upacita sukṛta pariṇāmāt bhavati vidyā caraṇa saṃpad na ca tat eva tasyāḥ hetuḥ iti yathā saṃbhavanti asmin kṣetre śālayaḥ iti kṣetra praśaṃsā pare vākye prayukte na evaṃvaktum āpadyate yadi kṣetram eva śāli saṃbhava hetuḥ tarhi vinā api hala balī varda ādi sāmagrīm mahati avagrahe api śālayaḥ asmin bhaveyuḥ iti tat idam arthavāda gati anabhijñasya bhavataḥ bhāṣitam iti āḥ tām etat idam tu bhavantam pṛcchāmibhaḥ mahātman! svabhāva śuddhā pariniścita artha saṃsparśinī puṇya sahasra labhyāḥ kena īdṛśī sarva jana anukūlā kalyāṇinī te niramāyi vāṇī upacāra= chala lakṣaṇam dharma vikalpa nirdeśe artha sadbhāva pratiṣedhaḥ upacāracchalam 
NM_11,2.584.198–11,2.584.199	 abhidhānasya dharmaḥ aneka prakāraḥ mukhyayā vṛttyā gauṇyāḥ vā lākṣaṇikayā vā yat arthe pratyāyanam tat anena vikalpamānena dharmeṇa gauṇena lākṣaṇikena vā nirdeśe prayoge kṛte yaḥ artha sadbhāva pratiṣedhaḥ mukhya artha niṣedhaḥ saḥ upacāra nimittam chalam upācāra= chalam yathā maṃcāḥ krośanti iti ukte chalava ādi āha katham acetanāḥ kāṣṭha racana ātmānaḥ maṃcāḥ krośanti maṃca sthāḥ puruṣāḥ ete krośanti na maṃcāḥ iti upacāra= chala pratisamādhātam 
NM_11,2.584.200	 atra samādhiḥ vṛddha vyavahārāt śabda artha vyutpattiḥ tatra na kevalayā eva mukhyayā vṛttyā śabdāḥ pravartavānāḥ dṛśyante vṛtti antara vyavahārasya api suprasiddha tvāt na ca nirnimittam eva para śabdam paratra prayuktavantaḥ vayam saha cāraṇa ādi sūtra nivedita nimitta nikurumba anyatama nimitta pūrvaka tvāt asya prayogasya sthānāt ayam tadvat upacāraḥ sa tvam gauṇala akṣaṇikā ādi śabda prayoga avagati bāhyaḥ eva yaḥ evam pratyavatiṣṭhate gauṇa lakṣiṇakayoḥ bhedaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.201	 gauṇa lākṣiṇakayoḥ katham viśeṣaḥ iti ced ucyate sati aṃgauṇe api lakṣaṇā vidyate evam sati go śabdaḥ sva artham abhidhāya sāsnādi mantam tadīyān guṇān eva jāḍya mauḍhya tiṣṭhat mūtraṇa ādīn lakṣayati na tutāvati etva viramati sa tu sāmānādhikaraṇyena vāhīke api pravartate gauḥ vāhīkaḥ iti evam prayujyamānaḥ sa gauṇaḥ bhavati 
NM_11,2.584.202	 yaḥ tu sva artha abhidhāna anantaram tat itaram artham guṇam aguṇam vā lakṣayati eva nasā māna adhikaraṇyena paratra prayujyate śabdaḥ sa lākṣaṇikaḥ bhavati gaṅgāyāṃghoṣaḥ prativasati iti tathā ca uktam gauṇe hiprayogaḥ na lakṣaṇāyām iti alam śāstra antara udgāra gahanābhiḥ kathābhiḥ mukhyam artham atha lākṣaṇikam vāgauṇam api avagamayya ca śabdaḥ loka veda vihitam vyavahāraṃsantanoti tad abhijña matīnām kuryāt ākṣepam yaḥ ca bhākte prayogemukhyam matvā artham tatra vaktuḥ na doṣaḥ tena tu ātmīyam śabda vṛtta anabhijñaṃrūpam vyaktam syāt atra vṛddhāḥ pramāṇam chala bheda ākṣepa parihārau 
NM_11,2.584.203–11,2.584.205	 evam chalasya viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni abhidhāya tad parīkṣā artham ākṣepam karoti vākcchalam eva upacāra= chalam tat aviśeṣāt na khalu vāc upacāra= chalayoḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ anekadhā śabda arthe saṃbhavati vaktrabhimatāt arthāt anyasya kalpanam tad pratiṣedhanam ca ubhayatra api samānam avāntara viśeṣa kṛta nānā tva abhyupagame ca tad ā ānantya prasaṅgaḥ atra samādhim āha na tad artha antara bhāvāt 
NM_11,2.584.206	 na etat evam vākchalam eva upacāra= chalam iti tatas artha antara tvāt vāc chalehi nava kambalaḥ iti navasu kambaleṣu nave ca kambale mukhya arthaḥ eva śabdaḥ sarāmaḥ ityādi vat tatas tu ekataram vaktuḥ anabhipretam chala vādinā aaropya niṣidhyate upacāra= chale tu kāṣṭha sanniveśe mukhya arthe maṃca śabdaḥ puruṣa bhaktyā pravṛttaḥ mukhyam abhidhāya ca gauṇaḥ pratyāyyaḥ bhavati na tveṣa kramaḥ sādhāraṇa śabdeṣu iti mahān bhedaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.207–11,2.584.208	 vākcchale ca artha sattā eva niṣidhyate kutas asya nava kambalāḥ iti iha tu sataḥ maṃcasya krośana śaktiḥ niṣidhyate samādhiḥ api sādhāraṇa śabda anabhijña tām parasya pradarśayatā vāc chalevācyaḥ upacāra= chale tu gauṇa śabda vṛtti anabhijña tām iti mahān viśeṣaḥ chala traividhya samarthanam aviśeṣe vā kiñcid sādharmyāt eka= chala prasaṅgaḥ 
NM_11,2.584.209–11,2.584.210	 chalasya dvi tvam abhyanujñāya tritvam bhavatā pratiṣidhyate yatas sāmānyacchalam pārśve kṛtvā vāc upacāra= chalayoḥ abhedam abhihitavān asi yathā ca ayaṃtad aviśeṣāt iti tritva pratiṣedhaḥ tathā dvi tvasya api kiṃcid sādharmyasya sāmānya= chale api bhāvāt tathā hi yadi tāvat vāci nimitta bhūtāyām idam pravṛttam chalam idam ceti tadabhedam manyase tarhi sāmānyacchalam api mā pṛthak vocaḥ tat api hi na śarīre manasi buddhau vā pravṛttam api tu vācyevetiḥ vākchalam eva ekasyāt 
NM_11,2.584.211–11,2.584.212	 atha evam sati api tad viśeṣaḥ dṛśyamānaḥ na parāṇudyate sāmānya= chalepi na śabda arthaḥ anyathā kṛtaḥ kintu sāmānyasya hetu tvam anuktam āropitam iti pṛthak iṣyate tarhi vāc upacāra= chale api bhidyete eva iti darśitam atas yuktaṃchalatri tvam na ca ānantyam iyattā niyama kāriṇaḥ nimitta trayasya darśita tvāt avāntara bheda kṛtam tu tat ā ānantyam iṣyate eva jāti vat iti alam prasaṅgena tasmāt paraspara vivikta nija svarūpaṃīdṛś chala tritayam etat iha upadiṣṭam tasya kvacid svayam api kriyate prayogaḥ vācyaḥ paraiḥ abhihitasya tathā samādhiḥ iti śrī bhaṭṭa jayanta kṛtau nyāyamañjaryāḥ ekādaśam āhnikam 
NM_12,2.645.1–12,2.645.3	 chala anantaram jāteḥ uddeśāt tasya assāmānya lakṣaṇam tāvat āha sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānam jātiḥ vyakhyāna antaram tad nirāsaḥ ca atra traikālya samādi sakala viśeṣa saṃgrahāya sādharmya vaidharmya ādi pada nirapekṣam eva pratyavasthāna padam jāti sāmānya lakṣaṇa pratipādakam āhu  pratīpam avasthānam pratyavasthānam tāvat mātram eva ca yat kiṃcid uttaraṃpara prayukte hetau jāyamāna tvāt jātiḥ iti abhidhīyate tad anupapannam pratyavavasthāna mātrasya sādharmya ādi nirapekṣasya jāti tve hetvābhāsa udbhāvanam api jātitām aśnu vīt 
NM_12,2.645.4	 atha tasya samyak uttara tvāt iha ca nirviśeṣaṇa pratyavasthāna mātra upapādanāt phalgu prāyam asat uttaram jāti tvena vivakṣitam iti ucyate tathā api chalasya jāti tva prasaktiḥ aparihārya eva tat vyudāsāya tu tad anya tve sati iti ādikayadi kiṃcid adhyāhriyate tat amuṣya śrūyamāṇasya sādharmya vaidharmya grahaṇasya ekaḥ doṣaḥ sautra lakṣaṇasya aduṣṭa tvam 
NM_12,2.645.5	 nanu ! traikālya samādīnām asaṃgrahaḥ kim na doṣaḥ na hi traikālya samādiṣu sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā pratyavasthānam asti iti na eṣa doṣaḥ sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām iti asamāsa karaṇena diś pradarśanasya sūcanāt sādharmyeṇa vaidhamyaiṇa vā katham eṣa hetuḥ hetuḥ bhavati iti vā kim anena kriyate itivā yat evaṃprakāram pratyavasthānam hetu pratibimba vartmanā kriyate sā jātiḥ iti ucyamāne bhaviṣyati sakala viśeṣa saṅgrahaḥ traikālya samādiṣu api vāyādṛśasya tādṛśasya sādharmya vaidharmya prakārasyaḥ yojayitum śakya tvāt na hi udāharaṇa sādharmyam sādhya sādhanam iha vivakṣitam tad vaidharmyam vā sādharmya ādi mātram tu tatra api na atyantāya duravagamam iti yathāśrutam eva sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānam jātiḥ iti sāmānya lakṣaṇam yuktam jāti vibhāgaḥ lakṣaṇāni ca 
NM_12,2.645.6–12,2.645.7	 atha bhedavat tvāt jāteḥ caturviśatidhā vibhāgam āha sādharmya vaidharmya utkarṣa apakarṣa varṇyāvarṇya vikalpa sādhya prāpti aprāpti prasaṅga pratidṛṣṭānta anutpatti saṃśaya prakaraṇa hetu artha apatti aviśeṣa upapatti upalabdhi anupalabdhi nitya anitya kārya samāḥ atra samāḥ iti striyām puṃsi ca tulya tvāt nidarśasya jāti apekṣayā strī nirdeśaḥ vā pratiṣedha apekṣayā puṃnnirdeśaḥ vā varṇanīyaḥ viśeṣa lakṣaṇa sūtreṣu punar prāyeṇa pulliṅga nirdeśaḥ dṛśyate sa tu pratiṣedha apekṣayā teṣu vyākhyeyaḥ ititad vyākhyāna avasaraḥ eva vakṣyāmaḥ jāti upadeśa ākṣepaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.8	 nanu ! āstām tāvat viśeṣa lakṣaṇa varṇanam idam eva tu ādau cintyatām kimartham evaṃvidham asat uttara jātam śāstre vyutpādyate evaṃprakārāṇām ca dhūli prakṣepa sadṛśānām sāretara parīkṣaṇa kṣama vicakṣaṇa upekṣaṇīyānām asat uttarāṇām ānantyāt caturviṃśati saṃkhyā api katham iti mahān vismayaḥ asmākam tattva saṃrakṣaṇa artham upadeśaḥ api na ghaṭate 
NM_12,2.645.9–12,2.645.10	 yat api ca tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇam tat prayojanam abhidhīyate tat api na hṛdayaṅgamam asat uttara upanyāsena tattva adhyavasāyasya saṃrakṣitum aśakyatvāt atha vikaṭa āṭopa prakaṭana pāṭava upahita apara saṃmohana dvāreṇa tat rakṣaṇam āsthīyate tarhi niṣṭhīvana hasita tarjana aṃsa mardana kaupīna āvaraṇa vidāraṇa caraṇa avasphoṭana ādi api vyutpādyatām iha mokṣa vidyāyām jāti uttarasya avasara abhāvaḥ ca 
NM_12,2.645.11	 api ca idam vicāryatām kva jāti prayogaiḥ pratyavastheyam samyak sādhane pareṇa prayukte tad ābhāse vā na tāvat sādhana ābhāse tasya hi yena nimittena asiddha tva ādinā sādhana ābhāsa tvam upanatam tat eva tatra prayoktum ucitam  jātayaḥ tena eva ca paraḥ parājīyate na api samyak sādhane tatra prayuktānām api tāsām akiṃcitkara tvāt na hi jāti prayoga kaluṣitam api samyak sādhanam asādhanībhavitum arhati para pakṣe saṃcaśaya ādhānam api na phalam 
NM_12,2.645.12	 atha ekānta parājayāt varam saṃdehaḥ iti tābhiḥ upakramyate tatra api natathā upakramamāṇaḥ kam iva pratyāyayet na nīti vidaḥ nīti vidaḥ tāvat jānanti eva saḥ ayam yathocitam abhivaditum apārayan kim api āla jāla m āla pituṃpravṛttaḥ iti śākaṭikā ādi pratyāyanam tu pratyanta gahvara jana padeṣu grāmya sadasi lābha ādi kāmasya kasyacid prayojana vat bhavet api kadācid na tumokṣa śāstre tathāvidha upadeśaḥ peśalaḥ iti jāti uttarasya jalpa ādi aṅga tayā sārthakyam 
NM_12,2.645.13	 atra abhidhīyate samāhitam etat bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa eva tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇa artham kaṇṭaka śākhā parivaraṇa vat iti vadatā jalpa vitaṇḍa aṅga bhūtāni chala ja ati nigraha sthānāni tat uktam chala ja ati nigraha sthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ jalpaḥ iti bhāsya kṛt api āha chala ja ati nigraha sthānānām pṛthak upadeśaḥ upalakṣaṇa arthaḥ upalakṣitānām sva vākye parivarjanam para vākye caparyanuyogaḥ jāteḥ tu pareṇa prayujyamānāyāḥ su vacaḥ samādhiḥ svayam casukaraḥ prayogaḥ iti jāti uttara prayoga kālaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.14	 yadā hi mumukṣoḥ āgamāt vā yuktitaḥ vā tattva jñānam utpannam na ca adya api bhāvanā abhyāsa prasāda samāsādita tad draḍhimā atiśayaḥ vartate tasyām avasthāyāṃyadi kenacid kim api anumāna prāyam abhidhāya tadākulīkriyeta tat at asauvidita yukti āgama gauravaḥ api sapadi tad utpādite tattva jñāne manāga saṃbhāvanā āleśam iva adhigacchet tasmin vā dṛḍha pratyaye api tad pārśva vartinaḥ śiṣyāḥ śithilitā sthāḥ bhaveyuḥ atas jhaṭiti sa dūṣaṇam apaśyan pratipakṣaṃjāti prayogaiḥ api asau śamayet eva na udāsīta iti uktam jalpa lakṣaṇe jāti uttarasya tattva saṃrakṣaka tvam 
NM_12,2.645.15–12,2.645.16	 para uditā vā jātīḥ pratyabhijñāya tad kṣaṇam eva pariharet iti sapha jāti vyutpādanam yathā kvacid acira vyupta sasye saṃprati udbhidyamāna komala aṅkura nikara danturita sīmani kedāre tad upadravaḥ drutatara gāminaḥ yatas kutaścana catuṣpadāt dvipādāt vā abhiśaṅkyate iti tad parihārāya samantataḥ nirantara kaṇṭaka śākhā santati paricaraṇam ādhīyate evam iha api jāti ādi prayoga tad uddhāra dvārakam tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇam kartavyam iti jāti uttara prayoga avakāśaḥ yat tu vikalpitam kva jāteḥ prayogaḥ samyak sādhane tad ābhāsā iva iti tat ucyate samyak dūṣaṇam apaśyat tā kila jāti ādi prayoktavyam tat casat dūṣaṇā darśanam samyak sādhane tad abhāvāt eva bhavatu sādhana ābhāse vā pramāda ādinā iva iti kaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.17	 mumukṣoḥ tu jñāta tattvasya tad pratikūla vādinā kena cit ākṣiptasya tad prayukte tattva pratikṣepa balāt sādhana ābhāsa viṣayaḥ eva samyak dūṣaṇam apaśyataḥjāti prayoga avasaraḥ jñātvā api sādhanānām ābhāsa tām yathā tathā satvaram eva nirbhartsyatām ayam durācāraḥ iti pārśva sthita sukumāram ati śiṣya jana utsāha jananāya jāti ādi āḍambara viracam ucitam eva mumukṣoḥ mumukṣum prati ca śāstra ārambhāt āṃjasyena tad apekṣayā sādhana ābhāsa viṣayaḥ eva jāti prayogaḥ atas eva ca bhāṣya kṛtā prathamam sādhana ābhāsāḥ eva jāti udāharaṇam darśitam 
NM_12,2.645.18–12,2.645.19	 lābha ādi kāmānām tu samyak sādhane api prayukte yuktaḥ eva jāti ādi upakramaḥ itarathāḥ hi nissaṃśayaḥ eva parājayaḥ syāt iti etat ca ānuṣaṅgi kaṃprayojanam iti uktam capeṭa ādi varjane hetuḥ yat punar abhihitam asat uttara kathane katham na capeṭa ādikam prayujyate iti tat api asat tasya atyantam alaukika tvāt lokaḥ hi tadā evam manyeta nūnam eṣa na jānāti vaktum sadṛśam uttaram anyathā vācam utsṛjya pāṇinā praharet katham khedayet vādinam yaḥ tu hasta pāda ādi cāpalaiḥ sa saṃsadi ucyate sadbhiḥ bhaṇḍaḥ eva na paṇḍitaḥ jātya upakramamāṇaḥ tu na tathā eṣa vihasyate na hi saṃdūṣaṇa= chāyā tatra atyantam asaṅga tā 
NM_12,2.645.20–12,2.645.22	 tat na kaupīna vasana apanaya ādi sāmyam jāti uttarāṇām iti jāti prayoga lābhaḥ kasya yat tu kaḥ taiḥ pratyāyyate iti tat na na sarvaḥ sarvajña kalpaḥ bhavati na ca śākaṭika tulyaḥ santi hi madhyama daśāvartinaḥ janāḥ te ārādhayiṣyante iti alam prasaṅgena yat punar asat uttarāṇām ānantyāt katham catur viśati saṃkhyā iti tatra api ucyate sati api ānantye jātī nāma saṃkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā caturviṃśati prakāra tvam upavarṇitam na tu tad saṃkhyā niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ iti sūtra pada yojana ākramaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.23–12,2.645.24	 tat atra sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇam sthāpanā hetoḥ tad sādharmya samā jātiḥ sā ca sādharmya hetau vaidharmya hetau ca prayujyate vaidharmyeṇa pravartamānam tathā eva vaidharmya samā jātiḥ utkarṣa apakarṣābhyām pratyavasthānaṃutkarṣa apakaṣaṃsame jātī iti evam sarvatra yojyam sthāpanā hetutas ca āviśeṣyamāṇa tvam jāti vādi abhiprāyeṇa tāsām draṣṭavyam jāti vādī hi evam vadati yathā bhavat prayuktam sādhanam tathā idam api kim itina bhavati iti atas eva hetu pratibimbana dvārakaḥ eva jāti upanyāsaiti uktam sādharmya vaidharmya samau 
NM_12,2.645.25–12,2.645.26	 atha viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni āha tatra sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām upasaṃhāre tad dharma viparyaya upapatteḥ sādharmya vaidharmya samau pratiṣedha apekṣayā puṃliṅga nirdeśaḥ iti tatra tatra draṣṭavyam tatra casādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā sādhanam abhidhāya siṣā dhayiṣita pakṣa upasaṃhāre sādhana vādinā kṛte sādhya dharma viparyaya upapādanāya sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇam sthāpanā hetutas sādharmya samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sādharmya samodāharaṇam 
NM_12,2.645.27	 udāharaṇam tu anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt yat prayatna ānantarīyakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti sādharmyeṇa hetau prayukte jāti vādī sādharmyeṇa eva pratyavatiṣṭhate nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt niravayavam dravyam ākāśa ādi nityam dṛṣṭam iti na ca atra viśeṣa hetuḥ asti ghaṭa sādharmyāt prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ na punar ākāśa sādharmyāt niravayava tvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti vaidharmya sama udāharaṇam 
NM_12,2.645.28–12,2.645.30	 tathā atra eva vaidharmyeṇa tyavasthānam nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt yat punar anityam tat sa avayavam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa ādi dravyam iti na ca asti viśeṣa hetuḥ ghaṭa sādharmyāt pratyatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ na punar ghaṭa vaidharmyāt niravayava tvāt nityaḥ iti vaidharmya hetau= api sādhana ādinā prayukte anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt yat anityam na bhavati tat prayatna ānantarīyakam api na bhavati ākāśa ādi vat iti atra etat eva pūrva uktam sādharmya vaidharmya pratyavasthāna dvayam udāhartavyam iti yathā kvacid avasare svayam prayogaḥ jātīnām upayujyate iti tad svarūpa vyutpādanam upakrāntam evam para prayuktānām tāsām uttaram api vaktavyam atas tad vyutpādana artham āha go tvāt go siddhi vat tad siddhiḥ 
NM_12,2.645.31	 sādharmya vaidharmya samayoḥ idam uttaram yadi sādharmya mātram vā edha rmya mātravā sādhya sādhanam pratijñāyeta syāt iyam anavasthā bhavet ca bhavat prayuktānām īdṛśām api sthāpanā hetoḥ aviśeṣaḥ viśiṣṭam tu sādharmyam vaidharmya vā prayojakaṃmucyamānam na evaṃvidhaiḥ pratyavasthānaiḥ upahanyate yathā sati api sattā ādi sāmānya saṃbandhe sati api śukla ādi guṇa saṃbandhe sati api calana ādi karma yoge nagauḥ tathā tvena tat sādharmyāt siddhyati aśva ādi vaidharmyāt vā kintu avyabhicāriṇaḥ go tva ādi saṃbandhāt eva tathā iha api askhalita niyamam sādharmyam vaidharmyam vā sādhya siddhi nibandhanam na sādharmya ādi mātram iti utkarṣa ādi samāḥ sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vikalpāt ubhaya sādhya tvāt ca utkarṣa apakarṣa varṇyāvarṇya vikalpa sādhya samāḥ 
NM_12,2.645.32	 dṛṣṭānta dharmam sādhye dharmiṇi yojayan asantam adhyāropayan utkarṣeṇa pratyavasthānam yat karoti saḥ utkarṣa samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ukte aparaḥ āha yadi prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat anityaḥ śabdaḥ ghaṭa vat eva mūrtaḥ api bhavati naced mūrtaḥ ghaṭa vat anityaḥ api mā bhūt iti mūrta tvasya dharma antarasya prasaṃjanam utkarṣa samaḥ apakarṣa samaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.33	 dṛṣṭānta dharma vikalpanena eva sādhya dharmiṇi siddhasya api dharmasya apakaṣaṇa pratyavasthānam apakarṣa samaḥ pūrvasmin= eva prayoge ghaṭaḥ khalu prayatna ānantarīyakassan aśrāvaṇaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ evam śabdaḥ api prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt aśrāvaṇaḥ astu na ced aśrāvaṇaḥ ghaṭa vat anityaḥ api mā bhūt iti sataḥ śrāvaṇa tvasya apasāraṇam apakarṣa samaḥ varṇya samaḥ avarṇya samaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.34	 khyāpanīyaḥ varṇyaḥ pratipipādayiṣitaḥ sādhya dharmaḥ tad viparyayāt avarṇyaḥ siddhaḥ dṛṣṭānta dharmaḥ tau= etau varṇyāvaṇyau viparyasyan itaram itareṇa samīkurvan pratyavasthānam yat karoti tau varṇyāvarṇya samaupratiṣeghau bhavataḥ yadi śabdaḥ nitya tvena varṇyate sādhyate ghaṭaḥ api varṇyatām iti varṇya samaḥ ghaṭaḥ ced na varṇyate śabdaḥ api mā varṇī iti avarṇya samaḥ vikalpa samaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.35–12,2.645.36	 dharma antara vikalpena pratyavasthānam vikalpa samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tatra eva prayoge prayatna ānantarīyakam kiṃcid mṛdu dṛṣṭam dukūla rāṅkavaśayi ādi kiṃcid kaṭhinam karpara paraśvadha ādi evam prayatna ānantarīyakam kiṃcid anityaṃbhaviṣyati ghaṭa ādi kiṃcid nityam śabda ādi iti sādhya samaḥ ubhayoḥ api sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ sādhya tva āpādanena pratyavasthānam sādhya samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yadi yathā ghaṭāḥ tathā śabdaḥ prāptam tarhi yathā śabdaḥ tathā ghaṭaḥ iti śabdaḥ ca anitya tayā sādhyaḥ iti ghaṭaḥ api sādhyaḥ evasyāt anyathā hi na tena tulyaḥ bhavet iti 
NM_12,2.645.37–12,2.645.38	 atra paṃcānām uttaram kiñcid sādharmyāt upasaṃhāri seḥ ddha eva dharmyāt apratiṣedhaḥ kiṃcid sādharmyāt upasaṃhāraḥ siddhyati yathā gauḥ evam ayam gavayaḥ iti na tu sarvathā rūpa abhedaḥ tayoḥ āpādayitum śakyaḥ pramāṇa avagata svabhāva bhedānām bhāvānām itaretara rūpa saṃkarasya kartum aśakyatvāt evaṃca sva pratibandha sādharmye susthite sva sādhyam upasthāpayati sthāpanā hetausādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vikalpam āpādayatā vaidharmyam ca kiṃcid abhidadhatā pratiṣedhaḥ kartum na labhyate iti 
NM_12,2.645.39–12,2.645.40	 atha ṣaṣṭhasya uttaram sādhyatideśāt ca dṛṣṭānta upapatteḥ yat ucyate ghaṭaḥ api śabda vat sādhyaḥ bhavatu iti tat na evam laukika parīkṣakāṇām yasmin= arthe buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ tena aviparīta tayā śabde atidiśyate yathā ghaṭaḥ prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ san anityaḥ evam śabdaḥ api iti evam sādhya atideśāt dṛṣṭānte upapadyamāne na tasya sādhya tva abhidhānam upapadyate prāpti sama aprāpta samauprāpya sādhyam aprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyā viśiṣṭa tvāt aprāpya asādhaka tvāt ca prāpti aprāpti samau 
NM_12,2.645.41	 prāpti aprāpti vikalpana pūrvakam ubhayatra api doṣa āpādanam prāpti aprāpti samaupratiṣedhau bhavataḥ hetau sādhana vādinā prayukte paraḥ āha saḥ ayam hetuḥ prāpya vā sādhyam sādhayet aprāpya vā prāpya ced dvayoḥ labdha svarūpayoḥ eva prāptiḥ bhavati iti kim kasya sādhyam sādhanam vā iti aviśeṣaḥ aprāpya tu sādhaka tvam anupapannam atiprasaṅgāt na hi aprāpya pradīpaḥ prakāśya prakāśayet iti 
NM_12,2.645.42–12,2.645.43	 anayoḥ uttaram ghaṭa ādi niṣpatteḥ pīḍane ca abhicārāt apratiṣedhaḥ na ayam pratiṣedhaḥ upapadyate ubhayathā api kāraṇa bhāvasya darśanāt daṇḍa cakra mūtra ādi kārakāni prāpya mṛdam ghaṭa ādi kāryam niṣpādayanti dṛśyante abhicāra karmaṇā ca śyena ādinā dūra sthasya api śatroḥ pāṭanam saṃpādyateiti prasaṅga sama pratidṛṣṭānta samaudṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇa anapadeśāt pratyavasthānāt ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṃga pratidṛṣṭānta samau 
NM_12,2.645.44	 ati prasaṅga āpādanena pratyavasthānam prasaṅga samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pūrva udāhṛtaḥ eva hetau yadi api anitya tve prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam sādhanam prayatna anantarīyaka tve idānīm kim sādhanam tad sādhane kim iti dṛṣṭāntasya ghaṭa ādeḥ anityatāyām kāraṇam na kiṃcid apadiśyate tena tad kāraṇa anveṣaṇa atiprasaṅgāt prasaṅga samaḥ ayam pratiṣedhaḥ pratidṛṣṭānta samaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.45	 pratidṛṣṭāntena pratyavasthānam pratidṛṣṭānta samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yathā ghaṭaḥ prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ san anityaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ evam ākāśam prayatna ānantarīyaka nityam dṛśyate tadvat śabdaḥ api nityaḥ syāt iti kaḥ puṇara ākāśasya prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam vadet kūpa khana nādinā aakrāśa karaṇam manvānaḥ evam brūyāt apikaḥ cid 
NM_12,2.645.46–12,2.645.47	 nanu ! evam api vyabhicāra udbhāvanam etat samyak uttaram na asat uttara prakāraḥ jāti prayogaḥ na etat evam na hi hetoḥ anaikāntika tvam udbhāvayan= asausādhuḥ iva jāti vādī pratyavatiṣṭhate api tu pratidṛṣṭānta balena nitya tvam eva sādhayan= utthitaḥ iti jāti prayogaḥ eva ayam hetvābhāsāḥ api svarūpa nigūhana purassaram apara hetu pratibimba vartmanā pradarśyamānāḥ jātitāṃpratipadyante eva atra prasaṅga samasya tāvat uttaram āha pradīpa upādāna prasaṅga vinivṛtti vat tat vinivṛttiḥ 
NM_12,2.645.48	 asiddham hi nāma sādhyate na siddham tatra prayatna vaiphalyāt sa andhakāre hi sadmani piṭhara ādi padārtha darśanāya pradīpam upādadate laukikāḥ na dīpa darśanāya dīpa antaram āharanti iti antareṇa api hi dīpa antarāṇi dṛśyataā iva pradīpaḥ evam laukika parīkṣakāṇām ghaṭa ādau prayatna anantarīyaka tvasya siddha tvāt tatra kāraṇa apadeśaḥ niṣprayojanaḥ iti tasmāt na ayam apita prasaṅga āpādanasya viṣayaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.49–12,2.645.51	 atha pratidṛṣṭānta samasya uttaram pratidṛṣṭānta hetu tve ca na ahetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ eva sādhaka buddhayā yadi tvayā upanyastaḥ tarhi viśeṣa hetuḥ vaktavyaḥ anena hetunā pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ eva sādhakaḥ na dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti naca asau viśeṣe hetuḥ ucyate tasmāt na pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ siddhi hetuḥ iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva sādhakaḥ bhavati pratidṛṣṭānta hetu tve api sthite sati ahetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ na hi sādhakaḥ syāt na ca tat asti iti uktam atas na ahetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ atha yathā pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ na sādhakaḥ evam dṛṣṭāntaḥ api mā bhūt iti anayāni ityā pratyavatiṣṭhate sa hanta tarhi pratidṛṣṭāntasya tāvat ahetu tvam sva kaṇṭhena kathitam iti tasmin= asādhake sati dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva sādhakaḥ iti anutpatti samaḥ prāk utpatteḥ kāraṇa abhāvāt anutpatti samaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.52	 anutpattyā pratyavasthānam anutpatti samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāktanaḥ eva prayoge jāti vādyāha anityaḥ iti utpatti dharmakaḥ ucyate yaḥ ca utpatti dharmakaḥ tasya utpatteḥ pūrvam anutpattyā bhavitavyam anutpanne ca śabda ākhya dharmiṇi prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam dharmaḥ kva vartatām alabdha pakṣa vṛttiḥ ca katham anitya tvam sādhayatu asiddhe ca anitya tve śabdasya balāt nitya tvam eva bhavati kāraṇa abhāvāt iti anitya tva siddhi kāraṇasya prayatna anantarīyaka tvasya abhāvāt iti arthaḥ athavā śabda utpādaka kāraṇa abhāvāt anutpanne śabde nirāśrayaḥ hetuḥ iti 
NM_12,2.645.53–12,2.645.54	 asya uttaram tathā abhāvāt utpannasya kāraṇa upapatteḥ na kāraṇa pratiṣedhaḥ śabda ākhya dharmiṇaḥ siddhasya sataḥ nitya tvam anitya tvam vā vicāryate tad asiddhau hi nitya tvam api kasya bhavān abhidadhīt utpannasya ca asya tathā abhāvaḥ bhavati na anutpannasya utpannaḥ khalu ayam śabdaḥ iti bhavati na anutpannaḥ prāk utpatteḥ alabdha ātmanaḥ kim ucyate labdha svarūpasya punar anitya tva kāraṇa prayatna anantarīyaka tvasya sadbhāvāt ayuktaḥ eva ayam pratiṣedhaḥ saṃśaya samaḥ nitya anitya tva sādharmyāt saṃśathaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.55–12,2.645.56	 nitya nitya sādharmya upanyāsena saṃśaya āpādana pravaṇam pratyavasthānam saṃśaya samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt iti asmin= eva hetau asti śabdasya anitya sādharmyam prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam asti ca nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam aindriyaka tvam atas krima nitya sādharmyāt prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ uta nitya sādharmyāt aindriyaka tvāt nityaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ evam paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate na ca sādharmya sama prayoga ā iva ayam āśaṅkanīyaḥ saṃśaya āpādana pravaṇa tvāt asya iti asya uttaram sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayaḥ vaidharmyāt ubhayathā vā saṃśaye atyanta saṃśayaḥ nitya tva anabhyupagamāt ca sāmānyasya apratiṣedhaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.57	 sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti sthāṇu puruṣayoḥ sādharmyāt ūrdhva tva ādeḥ saṃśayaḥ bhavati na tu śiraḥ pāṇi ādi vaidharbhyāt pratyuta tatas asau nivartate yadi punar ubhayathā api sādharmyāt iva vaidharbhyadipi saṃśayaḥ syāt tathā sati atyanta saṃśayaḥ prāpnoti iha cani viśeṣa darśana sthānīyam anitya tva sādhanam śabdeprayatna anantarīyaka tvam asti iti nitya tvam sāmānya gatam saṃśaya kāraṇa mitinābhyupagabhyate tasmāt apratiṣedhaḥ ayam nitya sāmānya sādharmya nibandhana saṃśaya āpādana rūpaḥ prakaraṇa samaḥu bhaya sādharmyāt prakriyā siddheḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.58	 pakṣa pratipakṣau nirṇaya lakṣaṇe vyākhyātau tau= eva prakaraṇam prakaraṇam anativartamānaḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati pūrvasmin= eva prayogenityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt ākāśa vat iti evaṃjātīyakam pratiprayogam upanyasya sva pakṣam utthāpayati jāti vādī sādharmya grahaṇam ca upalakṣaṇam vaidharbhyeṇa api pratiprayoga upanyāse prakaraṇa samaḥ eva pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati ubhaya vaidharmyāt prakriyā siddheḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ iti mūla hetau= api sādharmyeṇa vaidharbhyeṇa vā prayukte prayoga dvayam etat veditavyam prakaraṇa samasya sādharmya vaidharmya samābhyām viśeṣaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.59–12,2.645.60	 nanu ca ! te eva ete sādharmya vaidharmya same jātī sādharmya hetau vaidharmya hetau vā prayujyamāna tvāt caturdhā sthitā iiti tābhyām eva gata tvāt na abhinavaḥ ayam jāti prayogaḥ catasraḥ ca etāḥ jātayaḥ iti eka tvam api na saṅgatam ucyate tatra para pakṣa pratiṣedha pravaṇa tayā eva pratyavasthānam udāhṛtam iha tu pakṣa sādhana= chāyayā iti atas eva prakaraṇa samaḥ ayam ucyate jātiḥ anitya pakṣa vat nitya pakṣe api pratikriyate asyām iti udbhāvana bhaṅgi bhedāt ca jāti nānātvam asaṅkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā catur viśati bheda tvam vastutas tu tāsām ānantyam iti uktam atra uttaram pratipakṣāt prakaraṇa siddheḥ pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ pratipakṣa upapatteḥ
