NM_12,2.645.61	 nirṇaya utpattyā prakaraṇam paryavasitam bhavati prāk nirṇayāt tad avastham eva tat iha prakaraṇam utthāpayatā bhavatā ubhaya sādharmyam tad utthāpana kāraṇam abhihitam ubhaya sādharmyāt prakriyā siddheḥ iti bruvatā ubhaya sādharmyeca mad uktam api sādharmyam asti eva anyathā ubhaya śabda arthaḥ kaḥ evam catad abhyanujñātam bhavati iti tat pratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate pratiṣedha upapattau vāna ubhaya sādharmyam prakaraṇa kāraṇam sidhyati iti nirṇaya utpatti nimittam ca prakaraṇa uparamāya na kiṃcid uktam ubhaya sādharmya abhidhānāt iti ahetu samaḥ traikālya anupapatteḥ hetoḥ ahetu samaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.62–12,2.645.63	 kāla traya anupapattyā hetum ākṣipya kriyamāṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ahetu samobhavati hetuḥ sādhanam sādhanam ca sādhyāt pūrvam paścāt vā saha vā abhavet yadi pūrvam asati sādhye tat kasya sādhanam atha paścāt sādhanam pūrvam sādhyam tat asati sādhane kasya idam sādhyam bhavet pūrva siddhā ivā sādhye kim sādhanena atha yugapad sādhya sādhane bhavataḥ na tarhi tayoḥ savya itara go viṣāṇayoḥ iva sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ bhavet iti evam ayam hetuḥahetoḥ na viśiṣyate asya uttaram na hetu tassādhya siddheḥ traikālya asiddhiḥ 
NM_12,2.645.64	 na traikālya asiddhiḥ kasmāt hetutaḥ sādhya siddheḥ utpatta autāvat ayam paryanuyogaḥ pūrva siddhena hetunā tantu ādinā paścāt bhāvinaḥ asataḥ eva kāryasya paṭa ādeḥ siddhiḥ iti ukta tvāt buddhi siddham tu tat asat iti jñaptau= api parihṛtaḥ eṣa doṣaḥ upalabdhi hetoḥ upalabdhi viṣayasya ca arthasya pūrva apara sahabhāva aniyamāt yathādarśanam vyavasthā iti pramāṇa parīkṣayām abhidhānāt dṛśyate ca nirvartana hetunā nirvartanīya nirvṛttiḥ upalabdhi hetunā ca upalabhyasya upalambhaḥ iti pramāṇa siddhe ca vastunikaḥ ayam ākṣepaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.65–12,2.645.67	 pratiṣedhe ca tulyaḥ ayam anuyogaḥ iti āha pratiṣedha anupapatteḥ ca pratiṣeddhavya apratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ api pratiṣedhyāt pūrvam paścāt saha vā bhavet iti vikalpyamāne na pratiṣeddhavyam pratiṣeddhum utsahate iti arthāpatti samaḥartha āpattitaḥ pratipakṣa siddheḥ arthāpatti samaḥ arthāt āpadyate pratipakṣa siddhiḥ iti evam kriyamāṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ arthāpatti samaḥ bhavati pūrvasmin= eva prayoge yadi ghaṭa sādharmyāt prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ arthāt āpadyate ākāśa sādharmyāt nityaḥ iti asti ca asya nityena sādharmyam ākāśa ādinā dravyeṇa niravayava tvam iti udbhāvana prakāra bhedāt ca jāti bhedaḥ iti uktam 
NM_12,2.645.68–12,2.645.71	 asya uttaram anuktasya arthāt āpatteḥ pakṣa hāneḥ upapattiḥ anupapādita sādhanam anuktam api arthāt āpadyate iti vadataḥ pakṣa hāniḥ api upapadyate māmaka anitya pakṣa siddhau hi satyām arthāt āpadyate tāvakasya nitya pakṣasya hāniḥ iti doṣa antaram āha anaikāntika tvāt ca arthāpatteḥ ubhaya pakṣa tanānā iyam arthāpattiḥ viparyayeṇa api prayoktum śakya tvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt iti evam api ukte śakyam vaktum yadi nitya ākāśa sādharmyāt niravayava tvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ arthāt āpadyate anitya ghaṭa ādi sādharmyāt prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ iti na ca evam api kācid artha siddhiḥ na khalu vai ghanasya grāvaṇaḥ patanam iti ukte arthāt āpadyate dravasya vāriṇaḥ patana abhāvaḥ iti aviśeṣa samaḥeka dharma upapatteḥ kvacid anupapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.72–12,2.645.74	 aviśeṣa upapādanena pratyavasthānam aviśeṣa samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yadi śabda ghaṭayoḥ eka dharmaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam asti iti tayoḥ anitya tva aviśeṣa aucyate tarhi sarva bhāvānām aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ katham sadbhāva upapatteḥ sattā saṃbandhāt iti arthaḥ saḥ ayam aviśeṣa samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ etasya uttaram kvacid tad dharma upapatteḥ kvacid anupapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ kvacid aviśeṣa āpādana hetuḥ upapadyate dharmaḥ kvacid tu na upapadyate iti evam ayam apratiṣedhaḥ śabda ghaṭayoḥ ekaḥ dharmaḥ prayatna ananta tarīyaka tvam asti yena tayoḥ dharma antaram anitya tvam aviśeṣa rūpam upapādyate na tu sarva bhāvānām īdṛśam aviśeṣa kāraṇam dharma jātam asti 
NM_12,2.645.75	 yat tu sadbhāva upapatteḥ iti tena kim dharma antaram aviśeṣa rūpam sādhyeta anitya tvam eva iti ced tarhi ayam pratijñā arthaḥ vyavatiṣṭheta anityāḥ sarvebhāvāḥ sattvāt iti sa ca ayam anupapannaḥ dṛṣṭānta anupapatteḥ sarva bhāvānām pakṣīkṛta tvāt dṛṣṭāntaḥ na kaścid avaśiṣyate na ca pratijñāta eka deśaḥ eva dṛṣṭāntīkartum śakyaḥ siddha sādhya bhedāt sādhyaḥ pratijñātaḥ arthobhavati siddhaḥ ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ na ca dṛṣṭānta rahitaḥ hetuḥ sva sādhya upasthāpana sāmarthyam aśnute 
NM_12,2.645.76–12,2.645.77	 na ca saugata ukta nītyā nityebhyaḥ vyāpaka an upalabdhyā sattvam vyāvartitam anityeṣu eva pratiṣṭhām labhate yā eva vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ saḥ eva sādhyena anugamaḥ iti vaktavyam tad nīteḥ prāk eva pratikṣepāt pratyuktam hi vistarataḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga sādhanam iti kiṃcid hi sattva yogi bhāva jātam anityam bhavati kiṃcid nityam itinā ayam ekāntaḥ sattvāt anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ iti 
NM_12,2.645.78–12,2.645.80	 api ca sarva bhāvānām anitya tve sādhyamāne tad antargata tvāt śabdasya api anitya tvam abhyupagatam bhavet iti evam api ayam apratiṣedhaḥ upapatti samaḥu bhaya kāraṇa upapatteḥ upapatti samaḥ ubhaya kāraṇa upapattyā pakṣa dvaya upapatti varṇanam upapatti samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yadi anitya tva kāraṇam prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam upapadyate śabdasya iti anityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya tva kāraṇam api niravayava tvam asya upapadyate iti nityaḥ syāt ubhayatra api kāraṇa upapatteḥ 
NM_12,2.645.81–12,2.645.82	 nanu sā eva iyam sādharmya ādi samā prakaraṇa samā vā jātiḥ na bheda antaram mā evam udbhāvanā prakāreṇa bhedāt para pakṣa upamarda buddhyā sādharmya ādi samājātiḥ prayujyate pakṣa antara utthāpana āsthayā prakaraṇa samāḥ apratipatti paryavasāyi tvā śayena iyam upapatti sameti atra uttaram upapatti kāraṇa anujñānāt apratiṣedhaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.83	 ubhaya kāraṇa upapattyā pratiṣedham abhidadhatā pakṣa dvaya kāraṇa upapattiḥ anujñātā bhavati sā ced anujñātā katham ekatara pakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ ekatara pakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ ced katham ubhaya kāraṇa upapattiḥ ubhaya pakṣa kāraṇa upapattiḥ ekatara pakṣa pratiṣadhaḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham vyāghātāt eva tata pakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ avakalpa taiti ced samānaḥ vyāghātaḥ tena hi para pakṣa vat sva pakṣaḥ api pratihanyata eti na hi vyāghātaḥ ekam pakṣam sādhayati ekam bādhataḥ iti upalabdhi samaḥ nirdiṣṭa kāraṇa abhāve api upalambhāt upalabdhi samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.84–12,2.645.85	 nirdiṣṭasya sādhya dharma siddhi kāraṇasya abhāve api sādhya dharma upalabdhyā pratyavasthānam upalabdhi samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yat etat anitya tāyām śabdasya prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam kāraṇam upadiṣṭam tasya abhāve api prabala prabhaṃjana java bhajyamāna jarat pāda papāta prabhave api śabde dṛśyate eva anitya tvam anyatra api vidyut ādau vinā api prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam upalabhyate eva anitya tā iti asya uttaram kāraṇa antarāt api tad dharma upapatteḥ apratiṣedhaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.86	 atra etat eva tāvat vaktavyam sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛtti tvam idam asya hetoḥ udbhāvitam na ca sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ agamakaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvam anitya tve pratibaddham na punar anityam prayatna anantarīyaka tve yat prayatna anantaroyakam tat anityam iti hi vyāptiḥ na tu yat anityam tad prayatna anantarīyakam iti yathā yatra agniḥ tatra dhūmaḥ iti na yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti 
NM_12,2.645.87–12,2.645.88	 evam prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam antareṇa samīraṇaraya pātyamāna vanaspati ādi śabde vidyut ādau vā yā iyam anityatā upalabdhiḥ na sā tasya hetu tām apahanti iti śabdasya prayatna adhīna tvam api ca prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam iti kāraṇāt utpattiḥ iyam abhidhīyate na tu kāraṇam niyamyate prayatnaḥ eva iti tatra pavana nodana janita taru śabdavata sati api prayatne kāraṇa antaram tad utpādakam bhaviṣyati kāraṇa antara janye api anitya tvam śabde vidyut ādau vā na viruddham iti 
NM_12,2.645.89	 katham punar idam eva gamyate prayatna ādibhiḥ asan= utpādyate śabdaḥ na punar sanna bhivyajyate iti sataḥ anupalabdhau nimitta abhāvāt āvaraṇam nimittam iti ced na mūla udaka ādiṣu mṛdaḥ iva śabde kasyacid āvaraṇasya agrahaṇāt tasmāt na mūlovaka ādinā tulyaḥ śabdaḥ iti asan= eva prayatna ādinā kriyatā eti anupalabdhi samaḥtad anupalabdheḥ anupalambhāt abhāva asiddhau tad viparīta upapatteḥ anupalabdhi samaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.90–12,2.645.91	 anupalabdheḥ anupalambha upanyāsena pratyavasthānam anupalabdhi samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yat uktam āvaraṇa anupalambhāt asati āvaraṇe prāc uccāraṇāt agrahaṇāt asan= ā iva śabdaḥ prayatnena abhinirvaryatte iti tat ayuktam āvaraṇa anupabdheḥ api anupalambhāt tasyāḥ ca anupalambhāt abhāvaḥ anupalabdheḥ abhāvāt upalabdhiḥ bhavati pratiṣedha dvayena vidheḥ eva pratīteḥ āvaraṇa upalabdheḥ ca āvaraṇa sattā siddhyati iti tat kṛtam eva śabdasya agrahaṇam na asattva kṛtam iti abhivyaṃjakam eva asya prayatna ādi kāraṇam iti asya uttaram anupalambha ātmaka tvāt anupalabdheḥ ahetuḥ 
NM_12,2.645.92	 āvaraṇa anupalabdhiḥ na asti anupalabdheḥ iti yaḥ ayam hetuḥ uktaḥ sa na hetuḥ kutas anupalambha svabhāva tvāt anupalabdheḥ upalambha pratiṣedha ātmaka tvāt iti arthaḥ astitvanā astitve hi bhāvānām upalambha anupalambhābhyām avasthā api ete yat upalabhyate tat asti śaśa vat yat na upalabhyate tat na asti tad viṣāṇa vat na upalabhyate ca śabdasya āvaraṇam mūla udaka ādeḥ iva mṛttikā iti anupalambhāt na asti iti gamyate anupalambhaḥ hi ayam āvaraṇa viṣayaḥ na anupalabdhi viṣayaḥ saḥ āvaraṇasya eva na astitām avagamayati na anupalabdheḥ iti anupalabdheḥ bhāvāt āvaraṇam eva na asti iti anupalabdheḥ anupalaṃbha asaṃbhavaḥ jñāna vikalpānām ca bhāva abhāva saṃvedanāt adhyātmam 
NM_12,2.645.93	 jñāna vikalpāḥ pratīti prakārāḥ teṣām bhāva abhāvau prati prāṇi saṃvedyau bhavataḥ asti me jñānam iti evam sarvaḥ pratyakṣa anumāna āgama jñāna anipramāṇa phalāni smaraṇa saṃśaya ādi jñānāni ca pramāṇa phalāni anubhavati iti sāceyam āvaraṇa anupalabdhiḥ upalabdhi vat adhyātmam saṃvedyate na upalabhe śabdasya āvaraṇam mṛdam iva mūla udaka ādeḥ iti tat evam bāhya padārtha bhāva abhāva vat āntara jñāna bhāva abhāvayoḥ api pratyakṣa tvāt aparyanuyogaḥ ayam anupalabdheḥ anupalambhāt āvaraṇam asti śabdasya iti tasmāt prāk uccāraṇāt asan= eva śabdaḥ iti siddham anitya samaḥsādharmyāt tulya dharma upapatteḥ sarva anitya tva prasaṅgāt anitya samaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.94–12,2.645.95	 sarva bhāva anitya tva prasaṅgena pratyavasthānam anitya samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ anityena ghaṭena sādharmyam asti śabdasya iti yadi tasya anitya tvam ucyate tarhi sarva bhāvānām api ghaṭena kim api sādharmyam asti iti sarve eva anityāḥ syuḥ aviśeṣa sanaiveyam jātiḥ iti ced na tatra hi sattā abhiyogāt sarva bhāvānām aviśeṣaḥ āpāditaḥ iha tu ghaṭa sādharmyāt eva anitya tvam āpādyataiti udbhāvana bhaṅgi bhedāt ca jāti nānātvam iti asakṛt uktam 
NM_12,2.645.96–12,2.645.98	 atra uttaram sādharmyāt api asiddheḥ pratiṣedha asiddhiḥ pratiṣedhya sādharmyāt atiprasaṅgam āpādayataḥ hi etat vivakṣitam bhavati ghaṭa sādharmyāt asiddhiḥ anitya tvasya iti yadi ca ghaṭa sādharmyāt anitya tvasya asiddhiḥ tarhi tāvakasya asya pratiṣedha vākyasya api asiddhiḥ pratiṣedhya vākya sādharmyāt asti hi pratiṣedha vākyasya pratiṣedhya vākyena sādharmyam pratijña ādi ava yava yogi tvam iti kiṃca dṛṣṭānte sādhya sādhana bhāvena pratijñātasya dharmasya hetu tvāt tasya cobhayathā bhāva anna viśeṣaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.99	 na hi sādharmya mātram sādhanam bhavati api tu dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇī avadhṛta sāmarbhyam sādharmyam vaidharmyam vā tathāvidham ced sarva bhāvānām asti bhavatuteṣām api anitya tvam kaḥ dveṣaḥ na asti ced kaḥ ayam atiprasaṅgaḥ na hi dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi prajñāta sāmarthyam sādharmyam ubhayathā bhavati pakṣa antaraṃspṛśati tena sādharmya viśeṣasya hetu tvāt tasya ca sarvatra asaṃbhavāt na sarva anitya tvam aviśeṣa samāyām ca jātau yat samādhānam uktam tat iha api vaktavyam iti nitya samaḥ nityam anitya bhāvāt anitye nitya tva upapatteḥ nisya samaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.100	 anitya vā ākhya sādhya dharma svarūpa vikalpanena śabda nitya vā āpādanaṃnitya samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāte hi jāti vādī vikalpayati kim idam anitya tvam śabdasya nityam atha anityam iti yadi tāvat anityam tatha kadācid pracyaveta tad pracyuteḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ atha nityam anitya tvam tarhi dharmasya nitya tvāt tasya ca nirādhārasya anupapatteḥ tad āśrayasya śabdasya api nitya tvam anitya tve hi śabde vinā aṣṭetat ādhāraḥ dharmaḥ kva varteta iti 
NM_12,2.645.101–12,2.645.102	 asya uttaram pratiṣedhye nityam anitya bhāvāt anitya tva upapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anitya tvasya bhāvaḥ ced ucyate tat anityaḥ eva asau= uktaḥ bhavati anitya tva upapatteḥ ca tat pratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate nityam anitya tvam śabdasya iti ca bravīṣi nityatām ca tad yogāt asya upapādayasi iti mahān ayam āyuṣmataḥ bhramaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.103–12,2.645.104	 atha niradhikaraṇaḥ dharmaḥ katham syāt iti tat ucyate anitya tvam hināma nirodhaḥ pradhvaṃsaḥ abhāvaḥ iti anarthāntaram anitya tvāt abhāvaḥ ititu vyavahāra mātram sā ca iyam anitya tā śabda avacchinnāḥ na śabda adhikaraṇāḥ naghaṭā bhāvaḥ ghaṭa āśritaḥ bhavitum arhati bhāva svabhāvāḥ hi dharmāḥ dharma āśritā abhavanti na abhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ tu āśritaḥ api na pratiyogi āśritaḥ bhavati kintu artha antara vṛttiḥ bhū pradeśaḥ iva ghaṭa abhāvaḥ iti nitya anitya tva virodhāt ca nitya tvam anitya tvam ca ekatra dharmiṇi virudhyete tat katham abhidhīyate nityam anitya tvasya bhāvān nityaḥ śabda eti kārya samaḥ prayatna kārya aneka tvāt kārya samaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.105	 prayatna kārya nānā tva upanyāsena pratyavasthānam kārya samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt iti ukte aparaḥ āha prayatnasya hi kārya t vaidham upalabdham kiṃcid asat eva prayatnena nirvartyate yathā ghaṭa ādi kiṃcid sa deva āvaraṇa vyapanayana ādinā prayatnena abhivyajyate yathā mṛd antaritam udaka ādi evam prayatna kārya nānā tvāt kiṃprayatnena avidyamānaḥ śabdaḥ nirvartyate dhaṭa vat uta vidyamānaḥ eva abhivyajyatemṛd antarita salila vat iti saṃśayaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.106–12,2.645.107	 na ca iyam saṃśaya samā jātiḥ hetu artha vikalpanena atra pratyavasthānāt tatra hi niravayava tu a ādi ākāśa dharma upanyāsena saṃśayaḥ āpāditaḥ iha tu sādhana vādī ukta prayatna anantarīyaka tva hetu artha nirūpaṇena iti udbhāvanā prakāra bhedaḥ ca jātīnām vaicitrya kāraṇam iti uktam eva atra uttaram kārya anya tve prayatna ahetu tvam anupalabdhi kāraṇa anupapatteḥ 
NM_12,2.645.108	 yadi api prayatna kārya anyatvam upalabhyate tathā api prakṛte śabde prayatnasya abhivyakta avahetutvam na prayatnataḥ śabdam abhivyanakti kintva bhūta prādurbhāvam eva vidhatte kasmāt anupalabdhi kāraṇa anupapatteḥ yatra hi sataḥ padārthasya pratyatnaḥ abhivyakti hetuḥ tatra tasya sataḥ salila ādeḥ anupalabdhi kāraṇam asti mṛdādi vya vadhānam tat apoham ācaratā prayatnena tad abhivyaktiḥ saṃpādyate śabdasya tu na kiṃcid anupalabdhi nibandhanam vyavadhāna ādi saṃbhavati iti varṇitam atas tasya asataḥ eva ātma lābha nimittam uccāraṇa ādi prayatnaḥ na sataḥ abhivyakti nimittam tasmāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti siddham 
NM_12,2.645.109–12,2.645.110	 tat evam anena catur viśatividha jāti udāharaṇa pratisamādhāna upadeśa vartmanā śabda anitya tva sādhake parakīyam upālambha jātam evaṃprāyam akhilam apākṛtam āmra seka pitṛ tarpaṇa nyāyena bhavati bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa ṣaṭpakṣī vivaraṇam idam aparam idānīm upadiśyate catur viśatau= api jāti vādinā prayuktā asumūla sādhana vādī vispaṣṭa anumāna udanta parīkṣaṇa purassaram sadeva uttaram yathā upadiṣṭam abhidadhīta na tu jāti prayoga anukāri duruttara ālāpa cāpalena ṣaṣ pakṣīṃ pravartayet tasyām hi prastutāyām ubhayoḥ api vādi prativādinoḥ a siddhiḥ asat vāci tvāt katham punar ṣaṣ pakṣī pravartate iti tat patham darśayitum āha pratiṣedhe hi samānaḥ doṣaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.111–12,2.645.113	 sthāpanā hetu vādinā prathama pakṣa sthena sthāpanā hetuḥ prayuktaḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt iti tatas jāti vādī dvitīya pakṣa sthaḥ prayatna kārya aneka tvāt iti prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam abhivyaṅgye api śabde bhavati iti hetoḥ anaikāntika tvam āha tad adhunā tṛtīya pakṣa sthaḥ sthāpanā hetu vādī yadi yathā upadiṣṭam āvaraṇa anupalabdhi kramam anusṛtya viśeṣam upadarśayan anaikāntika tām uddharati tatas tāvati eva paryavasyati kathā iti caturtha ādi pakṣa avasara virahāt na avatarati eva ṣaṭpakṣī 
NM_12,2.645.114	 yadi tu tam kramam apahāya eva tṛtīya pakṣa sthaḥ asau vadati hetoḥ ced anaikāntika tvam udbhāvayasi anaikāntika tvāt asādhakaḥ syāt iti nanu ayam tāvakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ api anaikāntikaḥ kiṃcid pratiṣedhati kiṃcid na iti hetossādhaka tvam pratiṣedhati na svarūpam iti atas eva ittham pratiṣedhasya anaikāntika tvāt saḥ apihi nābhi vyakti pakṣam eva sādhayet utpatti pakṣe api prayatna sāphalya upapatteḥ ubhayatra api ca viśeṣa hetoḥ anapadeśāt evam anaikāntika tvam abhihitavati sādhana vādini bhavati pratiṣaidha vādinaḥ api vacana avasaraḥ iti avatarati ṣaṭpakṣī 
NM_12,2.645.115–12,2.645.116	 sa hi caturtha pakṣa sthaḥ eva vadati pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe tad pratiṣedha doṣavat doṣaḥ vividhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ iha ucyate na vyādhātaḥ prakṛta saṅgatera bhāvāt yaḥ ayam pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ anaikāntika tva doṣaḥ ucyate sa pratiṣedha pratiṣedhe api bhavat prayukte samānaḥ saḥ api hi pūrvavat anaikāntika eva iti tatas paṃcamam pakṣam abalambya mūla sādhana vādī mata anujñām udbhāvayati 
NM_12,2.645.117–12,2.645.118	 sā ca pratiṣedham sa doṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe samāna doṣa prasaṃgomata anujñā pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti samudbhāvitam doṣam anuddhṛtya tam pratiṣedhaṃsa doṣam abhyupetya mad ukte pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe samāna doṣa prasaṅgam āpāda yata stematā anujñā nigraha sthānam bhavati coraḥ bhavān iti ukte abhiyuktena cauryam ātmanaḥ nirākaraṇīyam na tu bhavān api coraḥ iti paraḥ pratipattavyaḥ iti 
NM_12,2.645.119	 evam paṃcama pakṣa sthe mūla sādhana vādini kathitavati paraḥ ṣaṣṭham pakṣam āsthāya punar abhidhatte yadi sva pakṣa doṣān uddharaṇa purassara para pakṣa doṣa āpādana upanata mata anujñā nigraha sthāna pātram aham ādiśye hanta tarhi tava api tat eva nigraha sthānam avatarati tvam api evam akārṣīḥ tathā hi dvitīya pakṣa sthena mayā prayatna kārya aneka tvāt iti yat anaikāntika tvam udbhāvitam tad anuddhṛtya eva epratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti mayi eva pratīpam āpāditam tat evam tvattaā iva śikṣitvā aham api caturtha pakṣa sthaḥ tathā eva tvayi doṣam arpitavān iti mamaced matā anujñā prathamataram tava asau bhavet iti 
NM_12,2.645.120–12,2.645.121	 tat etat āha sva pakṣa lakṣaṇa apekṣā upapatti upasaṃhāra hetu nirdeśe para pakṣa doṣa abhyupagamāt samānaḥ doṣaḥ sva pakṣaḥ mūla sādhanavādyuktaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tad lakṣaṇaḥ tat samutthānaḥ tad viṣayaḥ prayatna kārya aneka tvāt iti pratiṣedhaḥ tam apekṣamāṇaḥ tam anuddhṛtya anujñāya pravṛttaḥ pratiṣedhe apisamānaḥ doṣaḥ iti upapadyamānaḥ para pakṣe anaikāntika tva doṣa upasaṃhāraḥ tasya ca hetu nirdeśaḥ iti ayam anaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti tasmin sati para pakṣa kathita anaikāntika tva doṣa abhyupagamāt tad anuddharaṇena tasya eva pratīpa doṣa udbhāvanāt samānaḥ mata anujñā doṣaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhaḥ pakṣaḥ ṣaṣ pakṣyām pakṣa vivecanam 
NM_12,2.645.122–12,2.645.123	 sā iyam ṣaṣ pakṣī tasyām prathama tṛtīya paṃcamāḥ sthāpanā hetu vādinaḥ dvitīya vaturtha ṣaṣṭhāḥ pratiṣedha vādinaḥ ete ca sādhya sādhaka tayā parīkṣyamāṇāḥ paunarukti amata anujñā ādi doṣa apahata tvāt anyatarasya api vādinaḥ sādhya siddhaye na prakalpante tathā hi caturtha ṣaṣṭhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ artha aviśeṣāt punarukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ caturthe pakṣe parasya samāna doṣa tvam ucyate ṣaṣṭhe api tathā eva samānaḥ tṛtīya paṃcamayoḥ tṛtīye pakṣe parokṣam samāna doṣa tvam abhyupagamyate paṃcame api mata anujñām udbhāvayatā tad aṅgīkṛtam eva bhavati tṛtīya caturthayoḥ ca para ukta doṣān uddharaṇāt tu mata anujñā ityā evam ṣaṣ pakṣyām ubhayoḥ asiddhiḥ tasmāt sat uttaraiḥ eva doṣa cikitsā sādhīyasī na asat uttaraiḥ ṣaṣ pakṣī prasaṅgāt iti ṣaṣ pakṣyām viśrāntau kāraṇam 
NM_12,2.645.124	 nanu ! asat uttara kathane api katham ṣaṣ pakṣyām eva virāmaḥ śatapakṣī sahasra pakṣī vā katham na pravartate kaḥ atra niyamaḥ iti ced ucyate iyati eva nivartate vacana avakāśaḥ iti na ananta pakṣa tā saṃbhavati tathā hi pūrva uttara pakṣa vādinau tāvat sādhana dūṣaṇa vādinau bhavataḥ eva kaḥ atra vicāraḥ tatra sthāpanā hetu vādinā tāvat prathamam sva pakṣa sādhane abhihite dūṣaṇa vādinā ca tatra dūṣaṇe varṇite tṛtīye vacasi vartamānaḥ sādhana vādī samyak ni itya upakramamāṇaḥ tad dūṣaṇam uddhartum śaknuyāt na vā iti tasyām eva daśāyām prāṅvivāka āyattaḥ nirṇayaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.125	 asat uttara upanyāse tu tṛtīya vacasā tena kṛte dūṣaṇa vādī api labdha avakāśaḥ tatas eva śikṣitvā caturthe vacasi vartamānaḥ tad pratīpam yojayati tatas sthāpanā hetu vādī pratīpa yojana āyāma phalāyām duruttarāyām samavyaya phalāyāṃa śakyakriyāyām ca nirudyogaḥ kiṃcid abhinavam dūṣaṇam utprekṣya paṃcame vacasi sthitaḥ mata anujñām āha 
NM_12,2.645.126	 tatas tām api para pakṣam anativartamānām paśyan pratiṣedha vādī ṣaṣṭhevacasi sthitvā tām tad pakṣaḥ eva yojayati iti evam vṛtte dūṣaṇa antara asaṃbhavāt pratīpa yojane ca bhagna rasa tvāt tūṣṇīm eva asitum ucitam iti tāvatī eva bhavati vacana viratiḥ na śata sahasra ādi pakṣa prasaṅgaḥ pravartate iti atas ṣaṣ pakṣīm eva darśitavān ācāryaḥ sa ca antevāsinam bodhayitum evam upāḥ diśadanena pathā pravarteta bhavān anyena mā pravartiṣṭā iti ṣaṣ pakṣī upadeśa phalam vācyam uttaram atas niravadyaṃjāti vādinam api prati tajjñaiḥ kaśmala uttara girā na tu kāryā pakṣa ṣaṭka parikalpana goṣṭhī yādṛś yajñaḥ baliḥ api tathā iti evam ādāya buddhauyaḥ tu brūyāt kaluṣam aphalaḥ tasya śuddhaḥ api hetuḥ ṣaṣ pakṣa ādi prasaraṇa parimlāna kāntiḥ na buddhiṃśaktaḥ sva arthe janayitum asau= agrataḥ prāśnikānām jāti parīkṣā upasaṃhāraḥ iti idam vyākhyātam nija saraṇi sāṅkarya rahitaṃsvarūpam jātīnām sphuṭam iha caturviśatividham amūṣām tattva jñaḥ para viracitānām parihṛtausvayam ca upanyāse na hi sadasi saṃmuhyati naraḥ 
NM_12,2.645.127–12,2.645.129	 iti jāti parīkṣā nigraha sthāna parikṣā jāti anantaram nigraha sthāna uddeśāt tad lakṣaṇa pratipādana artham āha vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ ca nigraha sthānam nigrahaḥ parājayaḥ tasya sthānam āśrayaḥ kāraṇam iti arthaḥ kiṃca parājaya nimittam vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ ca viparītāḥ kutsitā garhaṇīyā pratipattiḥ vipratipattiḥ sādhana ābhāse sādhana buddhiḥ dūṣaṇa ābhāset ūṣaṇa buddhiḥ apratipattiḥ tu ārambha viṣaye anārambhaḥ ārambhasya viṣayaḥ sādhane dūṣaṇam dūṣaṇe ca uddhāraḥ tayoḥ akaraṇam apratipattiḥ jalpe parājaya kāraṇe 
NM_12,2.645.130	 dvidhā hi vādaḥ parājīyate yathākartavyam anārabhamāṇaḥ viparītam vā apratipādyamānaḥ atas eva na karma karaṇayoḥ nigraham ādiśanti na hitābhyām kiṃcid aparāddham sva viṣaye prayujyamānayoḥ sāmarthyān apāyāt kartā tu pramādyan aprayojyam prayuṃjānaḥ prayojyam aprayuṃjānaḥ vā nigraham arhati prāyeṇa ca atattva vādinaḥ nigṛhyāḥ bhavanti 
NM_12,2.645.131–12,2.645.132	 tattva vādī api kadācana jalpe vitaṇḍāyām vā samyak sādhanam api apadiśya prativādi pratipādita dūṣaṇa ābhāsa nirākaraṇa saraṇim anuguṇām apaśyan nigṛhyataā iva atas eva ca bhāṣya kṛta uktam tattva vādi nam atattva vādinam ca abhiplavante nigraha sthānāni iti asamāsa karaṇam aneka nigraha sthāna bheda avarodha artham atas eva anantaram āha tad vikalpāt jāti nigraha sthāna bahu tvam 
NM_12,2.645.133	 tat iti sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānasya vipratipatti apratipattyoḥ ca parāmarśaḥ nānā kalpaḥ vikalpaḥ prakāra bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthāna prakārasya bahu tvāt jāti bahutvam tat vyākhyātam vipratipatti apratipatti prakāra bahu tvāt nigraha sthāna bahu tvam nigraha sthāna vibhāgaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.134	 tat dvāviṃśatidhā vibhajya daśaṃyati pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñāntaram pratijñā virodhaḥ pratijñāsannyāsaḥ hetu antaram artha antaram nirarthakam avijñāta arthakam apārtha kamaprāpta kālaṃnyūnam adhikam punaruktam ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepaḥ matā anujñā paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam niranuyojya anuyogaḥ apasiddhāntohetvābhāsāḥ ca nigraha sthānāni 
NM_12,2.645.135–12,2.645.136	 atra ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepaḥ paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam iti apratipattyā saṅgṛhītāni śeṣāṇi vipratipattyā punaruktam adhikam iti asamāsa karaṇena vipratipattyā eva vā abhimatam kim asa māsa kliṣṭa kalpanayā sā api hi kutsitā eva pratipattiḥ yat punaruktam adhikam vā prayujyate iti asaṅkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā ca dvāviṃśati bheda saṅkīrtanam avāntara bhedaiḥ tu jāti vat ānantyam eva teṣām iti dharma kīrteḥ ākṣepaḥ atra kīrtiḥ āha dvāviṃśatidhā nigraha sthānāni vibhajyante teṣām ca prati padam idānīm viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni varṇyante iti na mṛṣyāmahe kutas asādhana aṅga vacanam adoṣa udbhāvanam dvayoḥ nigraha sthānam anyat tu na yuktam iti na iṣyate 
NM_12,2.645.137	 vādinā siṣā dhayiṣita pakṣa siddhaye sādhanam abhidheyam sa ced asādhana aṅgam brūyāt nigṛhyeta prativādinā api vādi ukte sādhane dūṣaṇam udbhāvanīyam sa ced adoṣam eva doṣa tvena udbhāvayet nigṛhyeta te eva dvayoḥ vādi prativādinoḥ nigraha sthāne atas anyathā nigraha karaṇam anyāyyam eva pratijñāhāni ādiṣu tad prabhedeṣu ca pratipadam ayukta tām darśayiṣyate kati= chātra śiśu pralāpa prāyāṇi nigraha sthānāni nirdiṣṭāni tādṛṃśi śāstre lakṣyanta eti paramam apratiṣṭhānam dharma kīrti ākṣepasya samādhānam 
NM_12,2.645.138–12,2.645.139	 atra ucyate saṃkṣepa vivakṣayā dve eva nigraha sthāne iti vayam api kiṃna uktavantaḥ vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ ca nigraha sthānam iti etat casāmānya lakṣaṇam akhila bheda saṅgraha kṣamam bhavati na bhavat uktam tathā hi uttara apratibhānena vādinoḥ anyataraḥ parājīyate na vā na parājīyate iti katham ucyate tat kim mūkaḥ eva jitvā gacchatu nigṛhyate ced kim anena aparāddham na adoṣaḥ udbhāvitaḥ vipratipatya pratipatti ossarva antarbhāvaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.140	 atha prasajya pratiṣedhena udbhāvanā bhāvaḥ eva vyākhyāyate tarhi dūṣaṇa ābhāsa udbhāvanam anumatam syāt atha doṣa an udbhāvanam ādau vyākhyāya punar adoṣa udbhāvanam āvṛttya paryudāsena varṇyate hanta tarhi te eva ete vipratipatti apratipattī ukte syātām doṣa an udbhāvanam apratipattiḥ viparīta doṣa udbhāvanam vipratipattiḥ 
NM_12,2.645.141	 evam asādhana aṅga vacanam api vikalpanīyam prasajya pratiṣedha vṛttya sādhana aṅgasya avacanam ced sā iyam apratipattiḥ paryudāsa vṛttyā sādhana aṅgāt anyat ced vacanam sā iyam vipratipattiḥ atas śabda antareṇa akṣa pāda pādebhyaeva śikṣitvā tat eva nigraha sthāna dvayam anena śloka dvayena nibaddham na punar abhinavam alpam api kiṃcid utprekṣitam iti nigraha sthāna vyavasthā api na yuktā 
NM_12,2.645.142	 na ca yathā saṃkhya niyamena dvayoḥ dve nigraha sthāne varṇanīye api tu yathāsaṃbhavam ubhayoḥ api yathāvasaram tad tad nigraha sthānam ādeṣṭavyam dvāviṃśati bheda tvaṃca nigraha sthānānām asaṅkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā kathyate na niyamāya iti uktam eva paraspara visadṛśam ca lakṣaṇam eṣām idānīm upadiśyate eva tatra evaca ayukta tvam eṣām bāliśa pralāpa kalpa tvam vā parākriyate eva iti alam ati prasaṅgena pratijñāhāniḥ 
NM_12,2.645.143–12,2.645.145	 evam sāmānya lakṣaṇam vibhāgam ca abhidhāya viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni āha pratidṛṣṭānta dharma anujñā sva dṛṣṭānte pratijñā hāniḥ pratijñā siddhaye vādinā sādhane abhihite tatra prativādinā ca dūṣaṇa iudbhāvite tṛtīye vacasi tu vartamānaḥ vādī yadi pratidṛṣṭānta dharmaṃsu adṛṣṭānte anujānāti tat asya pratijñā hīyate iti pratijñā hāniḥ nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati tat yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ukte paraāha sāmānyam aindriyakam api nityam dṛṣṭam iti anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ iti 
NM_12,2.645.146	 tatra sādhata vādi āha sāmānyam aindriyakam nityam tarhi tathā eva ghaṭaḥ api nityaḥ astu iti ayam asya evaṃvadataḥ bhramaḥ kila nitya anitya pakṣa vṛttiḥ anaikāntikaḥ bhavati hetuḥ ghaṭasya tu nityatāyām ekasmin= itya pakṣaḥ eva vṛtteḥ anaikāntika tām eṣa vijahyāt iti tat evam asya bruvat pratijñā hāniḥ bhavati ghaṭasya hi nitya tve tad dṛṣṭānta balāt eva śabdaḥ api nityaḥ syāt iti dharma kīrti ākṣepaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.147–12,2.645.148	 atra kīrtiḥ āha pratijñā eva tāvat asādhana aṅga vacanam iti tad abhidhānaṃnigraha sthānam bhavitum arhati na tad hāniḥ na ca hāniḥ api asti yadi nāma ghaṭasya dṛṣṭantīkṛtasya pratidṛṣṭānta dharmam nitya tvamayam abhyupaiti kim iyatā śabda anitya tva pratijñām avajahāti api ca hetvābhāsāḥ api nigraha sthāna varge gaṇitāḥ eva sa ca ayam anaikāntika hetvābhāsa prayogāt eva parājīyate na pratijñā ahā anyā iti tasya aviṣaya antaram vaktavyam ākṣepasya samādhānam 
NM_12,2.645.149–12,2.645.150	 atra ucyate pratijñāyāḥ tāvat asādhana aṅga vacana tā na asti iti avayava lakṣaṇe narṇītam etat pratijñā asiddhi arthaḥ eva sarva vādinām prayāsaḥ anirdiṣṭāca sā sādhayitum aśakyā eva iti na tad vacanam asādhana aṅga vacanam laukikeṣu api ṛṇa ādāna ādi vivāda padeṣu pratijñā ahānim eva mukhyam parājaya kāraṇam āhuḥ yathā aaha nāradaḥ sāraḥ tu vyavahārāṇām pratijñā samudāhṛtā tad hānau hīyate vādī taran= tām uttaraḥ bhavet iti pratidṛṣṭānta dharmam ca sva dṛṣṭānte abhyupagacchan utsṛjati eva pratijñām nitya tvam hi sāmānya vat ghaṭasya api sahate tadṛṣṭānta balena śabde apisiṣā dhayiṣati iti nūnam idānīm nitya tvam eva ghaṭa dharmaḥ śabde siddhyet iti kathaṃtad anitya tva pratijñā asya na hīyate anaikāntika udbhāvanam na alam 
NM_12,2.645.151	 yat tu uktam hetvābhāsa prayogaḥ eva nigraha nimittam na pratijñāhāniḥ iti syāt etat evam yadi dvitīye vacasi vyavasthitena prativādinā vyabhicāra udbhāvanayā pratyavasthitaḥ vādī tāvatī eva viramet sa tu tṛtīye vacasivartamānaḥ tad uddharaṇa buddhyā tathāvidham abhidhatte yena pratijñām jahāti atas ca vyabhicāra pariharaṇa lobha abhihita pratidṛṣṭānta dharma abhyanujña vacana upanata tad artha pratijñā ahāni nibandha naḥ eva asya nigrahaḥ yuktaḥ na hetvābhāsa prayoga kṛtaḥ iti ayam eva mukhyaḥ pratijñā hāneḥ viṣayaḥ pratijñā antaram pratijñāta artha pratiṣedhe dharme vikalpāt tad artha nirdeśaḥ pratijña antaram 
NM_12,2.645.152–12,2.645.153	 pratijñāta artha pratiṣedhe pareṇa kṛte tatra eva dharmiṇi dharma antaram sādhanīya vādinaḥ pratisā antaram mabhidadhataḥ nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt iti ukte pūrvavat sāmānyena vyabhicāra udbhāvanayā pratyavasthitaḥ āha sāmānyam aindriyakam yat nityam tat yuktam tat hi sarva gatam asarva gataḥ tu śabdaḥ iti naḥ darśanam iti saḥ ayaṃa nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pūrva pratijñātaḥ anyam asarva gataḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāṃkurvan pratijñā antareṇa nigṛhītaḥ bhavati dharma kīrti ākṣepaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.154–12,2.645.155	 atra āha na idam aprastuta pratijñā antara karaṇam api tu para udbhāvita vyabhicāra nirākaraṇa viśeṣa utpādanam etat uktam bhavati asarva gata tve satya aindriyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tat idam asarva gata tva pratijñā siddhi artham upāttam katham nigraha sthānam yaḥ himī māṃsakam prati anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti uktavān tena kṛtaka tvam asiddham iti upālabdhaḥ kṛtaka tva siddhaye yateta sa kim kṛtaka tva pratijña antara karaṇāt nigṛhyeta 
NM_12,2.645.156–12,2.645.157	 yaḥ tu pūrva pratijñām avadhīrya tat anaupayikam akasmāt eva pratijñā antaram ārabheta sa tadā unmattaḥ eva bhavet na ca unmatta pralāpānām śāstre lakṣaṇa karaṇam yuktam spaṣṭe ca nigraha hetau hetvābhāsa abhidhāne saṃbhavati kim iti pratijñā antaram nigraha sthānam ucyate iti akṣepasya samādhānam atra ucyate pratijñā siddhaye hetu dṛṣṭāntau prayoktavyau na punar pratijñāntaram karaṇīyam iti sthitiḥ iha ca yaḥ hetuḥ anena upāttaḥ tasmin pareṇa anaikāntikīkṛte sati na tad parihāra prakāram anuguṇa mayam āsthitavān api tu asarva gata tva pratijñām anyām ārūḍhaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.158	 nanu ! viśeṣaṇam etat aneka antika tva parihāra artham na pratijñāntaram iti uktam na asiddha tvāt siddham hi viśeṣaṇam bhavati nitya tva vādinam ca prati śabdasya asarva gata tvam asiddham sādhyate ced tarhi pratijñā antaram eva idam hetu ādi avayava vailakṣaṇyāt pratijñā lakṣaṇasya ca sādhya nirdeśasya upapatteḥ anaikāntika tva parihṛtaye hi hetu viśeṣaṇam siddham vācyam na tu dharmi viśeṣaṇam sādhyam ca iti hetvābhāsa tā api asya na yuktā 
NM_12,2.645.159	 anyatara asiddhe tu hetvābhāse tad samarthanam prakrama anurūpam eva iti na pratijñā antaram nigraha sthānam bhavati iha tu anaikāntika tva parihārāya yatamānaḥ mārgam anuguṇam apaśyan skhalitaḥ iti nigṛhyate na ca hetu udādaraṇa ādi prayoga nipuṇa mateḥ api bhramāt evaṃvidham abhidhānam na saṃbhavati na ca pratijñā mātreṇa siddhim icchan= evam bravīti api tu vyabhicāram parijihīrṣan= iti na api asya asaṃbaddha tvam 
NM_12,2.645.160	 na ca ayam unmatta pralāpaḥ eva prastuta anuguṇya buddhyā prayogāt api caa nityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt iti ubhayāsiddhaḥ nāma hetvābhāsaḥ bhavadbhiḥ apiśāstre lakṣitaḥ eva saḥ unmatta pralāpaḥ na bhavati ! yathā udāhṛtam tat pratijñā antaram unmatta pralāpaḥ iti apūrvaḥ eṣa bhikṣoḥ sva darśane rāgaḥ para darśane dveṣaḥ vā kaḥ hi nāma śiśuḥ api śabde cākṣuṣa tām brūyāt idam tu saṃbhavati eva abhidhānam kevalam hetu viśeṣaṇe siddhe ca vaktavye bhramāt dharmi viśeṣaṇam sādhyam ca ayam uktavān iti nigṛhyate 
NM_12,2.645.161–12,2.645.162	 tṛtīye vacasi sthitaḥ ca evam asau= uktavān iti nimitta antaram idam asya nigrahenirūpitam dvitīyaḥ eva tu vacasi kathā viratau hetvābhāsa prayogādeva nigraham āpnuyāt iti pratijñā hāni prastāvaḥ eva uktam pratijñā virodhaḥ pratijñā hetvaḥ virodhaḥ pratijñā virodhaḥ yatra pratijñā hetunā viruddhayate hetuḥ vā pratijñayā saḥ pratijñāvirodhaḥ nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam iti pratijñā rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antarasya anupalabdheḥ iti hetuḥ saḥ ayam pratijñā hetvaḥ virodhaḥ yadi guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam na tarhi rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antarasya anumalabdhiḥ atha rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antarasya anupalabdhiḥ na tarhi guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam guṇa vyatirikta ca dravyam ca rūpa ādi vyatiriktasya anupaladheḥ iti yāhatam dharma kīrti ākṣepaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.163	 atra āha na idam pratijñā hetvoḥ virodha udāharaṇam bhavatum arhati hetoḥ asaṃbhavāt saṃbhavan hi hetuḥ pratijñāyāḥ viruṇaddhi tayā vā viruddhyate ihatu upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdhiḥ na samasti eva rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antarasya pṛthaktvena upalabdhi yogyatva anupapatteḥ saṃbhavan= api ca evaṃvidhe viṣaye pratijñā virodhe hetuḥ na dvayīm doṣa jātim ativartate viruddha tvam asiddha tvam vā guṇa vyatirikta dravya vādinaḥ hi bhedena agrahaṇam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ siddha tve vā asādhya viparyaya sādhanāt viruddhaḥ iti atas hetvābhāsa grahaṇena gata artha tvātna pṛthak vaktavyam idam nigraha sthānam udāharaṇa antarasya api asādhu tvam 
NM_12,2.645.164	 yat anyat anyaiḥ udāharaṇam abhāṇi nityaḥ śabdaḥ sarvasya anitya tvāt iti tat api asādhu vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntasya anena prakāreṇa kuśikṣitaiḥ abhidhānāt tathā hi sarva śabdaḥ atra sa avayava vacanaḥ iti niravayava tvam hetuḥ vivakṣitaḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt iti tatra vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya abhāve hetoḥ abhāvam pradarśayatā vaktavyam nityaḥ śabdaḥ anitya sarva tvāt sāvayava tvāt iti saḥ ayam aśikṣita vaidharmya dṛṣṭāṃta pradarśana prakramaiḥ viparyayeṇa vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva kathitaḥ sarvasya anisya tvāt iti tat uktam sa hi duṣṭa antaḥ eva uktaḥ vaidharmyeṇa su śikṣitaiḥ 
NM_12,2.645.165–12,2.645.166	 iti tasmāt na idam api pratijñā hetu virodha udāharaṇam iti dharma kīrti dūṣaṇa parihāraḥ atra ucyate yat uktam hetoḥ asaṃbhavān na idam nigraha sthānam iti tat acāru paṃcami anta nirdiṣṭasya hetoḥ pradarśita tvāt niravadya hetu abhāvāt tuyadi tat asaṃbhavaḥ ucyate tarhi hetvābhāsa vyākaraṇam api akaraṇīyam bhavet puruṣa buddhi pramāda nibandhana hetu prayogaḥ tu tathāvidham api abhidhānam saṃbhavati eva hetvābhāsa nigraha sthānayoḥ vailakṣaṇyam 
NM_12,2.645.167	 yappunar abhyadhāyi saṃbhavan= api hetuḥ ayam asiddha viruddhayoḥ anyatarobhavet na dūṣaṇa antaram iti tatra brūmaḥ satyam etat kintu hetu svarūpa nirūpaṇa avasare sa yadi tad gata doṣa adoṣa darśanāt viruddha tā tasya abhidhīyate yathā bhavadbhiḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti viruddha hetau varṇitekvacid siddha sādhya tva dṛṣṭānta hīna tā ādi doṣa antara saṃbhave tad avadhīraṇayā viruddha tvam eva darśitam yathā vā hetvābhāsa lakṣaṇe kathitam asmābhiḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt iti asya anaikāntika tva doṣe sati api prathamatarama siddha tā eva hṛdaya patham avatarati tena asiddhaḥ ayam ucyate na savyabhicāraḥ iti evam iha api hetu guṇa doṣa vicāre kriyamāṇe viruddha tā ādi hetvābhāsa tā asi akathyate 
NM_12,2.645.168	 yadā tu para artha anumāna vākyasya paṃcāvayavasya para matena vā vyavayavasya paraspara anvita padārtha samudāya ātmā vākya arthaḥ cintyate tatra itaretara vyāhata artha vādinoḥ pratijñā hetu padayoḥ asaṃsargāt tad virodha eva jhaṭiti manasi viparivartate iti saḥ eva nigraha nimittam bhavitum arhati yatas itaretara virodhinam ananvitā artham am idadhati vākye api vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ vā bhavet iti adaḥ eva nigraha sthānam viruddha pratijñā virodhayoḥ viśeṣaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.169–12,2.645.171	 api ca sādhya viparyaya sādhakaḥ eva viruddha hetuḥ ucyate yaḥ pratijñām eva bādhate iha tu pratijñayā hetuḥ vā adhyate pratijñā vā hetunā iti vikalpyamāna tvāt nigraha sthāna antaram eva idam ittham asya eva udāharaṇasya upapatteḥ udāharaṇa antara nirūpaṇam vṛthā aṭāṭyā eva bhāṭṭa ukta udāharaṇam bhāṭṭauḥ tu bhavadīyam nirālambana sādhanam pratijñā virodha udāharaṇam varṇitam nirālambanāḥ sarve pratyayāḥ pratyaya tvāt iti yatas pratyaya tva hetu grāhaka jñāna sālambana tve tena eva eṣā pratijñā viruddhadhyate tad nirālambanatvetu hetu abhāvaḥ eva syāt iti tat uktam vispaṣṭaḥ ca akṣapāda uktaḥ virodhaḥ hetu sādhyayoḥ yama dṛṣṭavā paraiḥ uktam adūṣaṇam idam kila iti 
NM_12,2.645.172–12,2.645.174	 tat sarvathā sulabha udāharaṇam idam pratijñā hetu virodha ākhyam nigraha sthānam iti sthitiḥ pratijñā saṃnyāsaḥ pakṣa pratiṣedhe pratijñāta artha apanayanam pratijñāsannyāsaḥ pakṣa sādhane pareṇa dūṣite tad uddhāraṇā śaktyā pratijñām eva nihnuvānasyapratijñāsannyāsaḥ nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt iti ukte tathā eva sāmānyena anaikāntika tāyām uddhāṭitāyām yat pratibravīti kaḥ evam āhānityaḥ śabdaḥ iti saḥ ayam evaṃbruvan pratijñāsannyāsāt parājīyate pratijñā saṃnyāse dharma kīrti ākṣepaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.175–12,2.645.176	 atra āha atisthūlaḥ khalu ayam pramādaḥ kaḥ hi nāma prativādī prāśnika sannidhāne pratijñām kṛtvā tadā eva teṣām eva abhraṣṭa saṃskārāṇām purataḥa pasmāraka ādi anupapluta matiḥ tām eva nihnuvīta api ca dyūta parājita paṇa rahita śaṭha kitava vat udāsīnaḥ pratijñām ajahat api hetau= anaikāntike kim asau na nigṛhyate na hi pratijñāyāḥ tyāga atyāgautadīyayoḥ nigraha anigrahayoḥ prayojakau api tu hetu guṇa doṣau= eva sa cāyam sādhana vyabhicārāt eva anitya pakṣaḥ parājīyate iti alam sannyāsena iti dharma kīrti ākṣepa parihāraḥ 
NM_12,2.645.177–12,2.645.178	 atra ucyate para udbhāvita hetu anaikāntika tva dūṣaṇa uddharaṇa raṇa raṇaka taralita mateḥ bhavet api ayam pramādaḥ evam hi asau vadati mayā uktam saṃyoga viyoga vyaṅgyaḥ śabdaḥ na bhavati na tu anityaḥ iti ayam āśayaḥ tu evaṃdataḥ kila saṃyoga vibhāga anabhivyaṅgya tve mayā pakṣīkṛte sāmānyena vyabhicāraḥ na bhaviṣyati iti tat api hi tādṛśam eva sva āśraya vyaṅgya tvāt iti muhyataḥ na ati sthūlam amum īdṛśam pramādam pratipannasi abhavati eva nigraha hetuḥ apramādinoḥ tu nigrahaḥ nāma na asti eva kaścid ihaloke para loke vā 
NM_12,2.645.179	 yat tu tadīyayoḥ pratijñā tyāga atyāgayoḥ anaikāntika tvena eva asau nigṛhyataiti syāt etat evam yadi vyabhicāra udbhāvana samanantaram asau tūṣṇīm eva āsīta tathāvidham tu bruvāṇaḥ tasya eva parājaya hetoḥ sannikṛṣṭa tvāt tena eva nigṛhītā ubhavati na anaikāntika prayogeṇa iti hetu antaram aviśeṣa ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchataḥ hetu antaram 
NM_12,2.645.180	 aviśeṣa abhihite hetau pratiṣiddhe tad viśeṣaṇam abhidadhataḥ hetu antaraṃnāma nigraha sthānam bhavati yathā sāṃkhyasya itthaṃvadataḥ eka prakṛti idam vyaktamparimāṇāt ghaṭa ādi vat iti dvividham ca vikāreṣu dṛṣṭam iyattā lakṣaṇam aṅkura ādeḥ phala antarasya caturaśratā ca ghaṭa ādeḥ mṛd pūrvakasya tat etat parimitam nikāra jātam eka prakṛtikam dṛṣṭam iti atas sarvam idam eka prakṛti bhavitum arhati yā ca sā ekā prakṛtiḥ tat pradhānam iti 
NM_12,2.645.181	 asya hetoḥ vyabhicāraḥ nānā prakṛtīnām api pariṇāma darśanāt iti tad parijihīrṣayā viśeṣaṇam āha samanvayāt iti sukha duḥkha moha samanvitaṃhi sarvam vyaktam parimitam dṛśyate iti tasya prakṛti antara rūpa samanvaya abhāvāt eka prakṛtika tvām iti tat idam hetu antaram nigraha sthānam prāk uktā viśeṣaṇa hetoḥ svayam eva hetu tva amarṣaṇāt iti anaikāntikāt hetu antarasya viśeṣaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.182	 atra āha kim ayam dagdhaḥ dahyate mṛtaḥ vā māryate anaikāntika hetu upanyāsena eva khalu ayam tapasvī nigṛhītaḥ eva asādhana aṅga vacanāt iti kṛtaṃhetu antarākhya nigraha sthāna antara udīraṇena iti atra ucyate yuktam eva tad dvitīye vacasi kathā samāptau yathā tu bhavān āha yadā tu vyabhicāra nirākaraṇāya viśeṣaṇam aparam adhika madhunā abhidhātum pravṛttaḥ tadā tad upādānāt eva nigṛhyate iti piṣṭapeṣaṇam saṃprati eva ayam iṣyate puruṣa śakti parīkṣā ātmake cajalpe nigraha sthānam idam vāde tu viśuddha āśaya tayā vastuni parīkṣyamāṇe viśeṣaṇa antara upādāne api tad vicāraḥ prastotavyaḥ na nigrahaḥ kāryaḥ iti abhiyuktāḥ artha antaramprakṛtāt arthāt apratisaṃbaddha artham artha antaram 
NM_12,2.645.183–12,2.645.184	 prakṛtāt arthāt artha antaram tat anaupayikam abhidadhataḥ arthāntaram nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati yathā kaścid vaiyākaraṇa viṭaḥ sphoṭa ātmānam śabdam cetasi nidhāya tat nitya tva siddhaye nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt iti abhidhitsurā iva durita karma ādibhiḥ anaikāntika tām āśaṅka mānaḥ arthāntaram nāma nigraha sthānam jigamiṣuḥ tatra eva vākya śeṣa= chāyayā uttiṣṭhati nityaḥ śabdaḥ niradhayavatvāt iti vayam pāṇinīyāḥ pratipannoḥ ye bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ chātrāḥ iti kaḥpunar bhagavān pāṇiniḥ iti yena akṣara samāmnāyam adhigamya maheśvarāt kṛtsnam vyākaraṇam proktam ācāryaḥ nassa pāṇiniḥ 
NM_12,2.645.185–12,2.645.187	 kaḥ punar maheśvaraḥ yatas akṣara samāmnāyam adhijagāma pāṇiniḥ iti ati udbhaṭa jaṭā jūṭa koṭi grathita candramāḥ viśva sthiti bhava dhvaṃsa hetuḥ ekaḥ maheśvaraḥ api ca acintya veṣa ābharaṇasya tad ktaḥya dṛcchayā yasya niśāsu tāṇḍavam sa bhasma bhaktīni bibharti maulina akṛta aṃjaliḥ pāda rajāṃsi vāsavaḥ kīdṛśam punar tāṇḍavam tanoti khaṇḍaparaśuḥ iti itthaṃcārī kramaḥ yasmin ittham ca kara vartanāḥ ittham yatra kaṭi= chedāḥ daṇḍa pādāḥ tathā īdṛśāḥ 
NM_12,2.645.188–12,2.645.189	 iti ekaikam upadeśayan utthāya nṛtyati tat etat artha antaram nigraha sthānam asādhana aṅgam iti kīrtinā api anumoditam dvayoḥ api ca vādi prativādinoḥ prakṛta an anuguṇam abhidadhatoḥ bhavati adaḥ nigraha sthānam yathākramam ekasya sādhanam anavadyam apaśyataḥ dvitīyasya dūṣaṇam iti nirarthakam varṇa krama nirdeśa vat nirarthakam 
NM_12,2.645.190	 abhidheya rahita varṇa ānupūrvī prayoga mātram nirarthakam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati anityaḥ śabdaḥ kacaṭatapānām gaja ḍadaba tvāt ghajhaḍha dhama vat iti evaṃprakāram idam api vādi prativādinoḥ prakṛta an anuguṇam abhidadhatoḥ bhavati adonigraha sthānam yathākramam sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca yathā uvitam abhidhātum ajānatoḥ pūrvavat ubhayoḥ api nigraha sthānam nirarthaka nigraha sthāna ākṣepaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.191–12,2.645.192	 atra āha saḥ ayam unmatta pralāpam eva śāstre lakṣayitum upakrāntaḥ na hi anunmattānām īdṛṃśī akṣarāṇi mukhāt nirgacchanti īdṛśām ca nirdeśe kapola vāditra kakṣyā abhitāḍana ādīni api kāmam śāstre nirdiśyantām api ca varṇa krama nirdeśa vat iti matupāḥ nirdeśaḥ eṣa sūtre vaditivati prayogaḥ vā matuppakṣe sarvam varṇa krama nirdeśa yuktam nigraha sthānam bhavet iti hasta saṃjñā ādibhiḥ idānīm udgrāhiṇikāḥ prastūyeran 
NM_12,2.645.193–12,2.645.194	 atha anarthakakram asiderśa yuktam iti vyākhyāyate tathā api niyama anupapattiḥ na hi artha rahita varṇa uccāraṇam eva prakṛta anupayogāt nirarthakam eva varṇa krama nirdeśasya api ca kvacid prakaraṇe sārthaka tā dṛśyate eva pratyāhāra vat vati pakṣe tu bhavati divapradarśanam etat kintu artha antareṇa eva gata artha tvāt pṛthaṅana vaktavyam ukta ākṣepa samādhānam 
NM_12,2.645.195	 atra ucyate matupāḥ vatinā vā abhidheya śūnya tva mātram atra vivakṣitam abhidheya śūnyam vacaḥ nirarthakam iti uktam iti bhavati eṣaḥ eva ca artha antarāt asya viśeṣaḥ tatra abhidheyasya bhāve api prakṛta anupayogaḥ ihatu abhidheyam eva na asti iti yatra kvacid prakaraṇa vaśena varṇa krama nirveśasya api sārthaka tā na tat iha udāharaṇam 
NM_12,2.645.196–12,2.645.197	 udāharaṇam yadi sphuṭam pṛcchasi na kupyasi ced tat bhavadīyam sarvam eva vacanam iha udāharaṇam saugata darśane śabdānām artha asaṃsparśi tvāt sva lakṣaṇe teṣām apravṛtteḥ apohasya ca ati tuccha tvāt sarvam tad abhidhānenararthakam bauddhāssarve api na dūpyāḥ atas eva ca unmatta pralāpinaḥ śākī abhikṣavaḥ api pariśuddha vṛtta yaḥ para loka yāthārthya darśinaḥ śauca ācāra vyavahāreṣu abāhyāḥ mahāntaḥ vidvāṃsaḥ teka āmam artha śūnyam api kathayantaḥ na unmattā bhavitum arhanti evam anyasya arpi prajñā pramādāt kacaṭata pādi vyāharataḥ na unmatta tā 
NM_12,2.645.198–12,2.645.199	 yacya uktam īdṛśām gaṇane kā pariniṣṭhā iti tat parihṛtam asakṛta saṅkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā dvāviṃśati bheda tvam āśritam iti kapola vādana ādīni punar akadhā svabhāva tvāt acintyāni eva yasya ca asmin kathā prasaṅge gaṇḍa vāditra ādi cetasi sphurati tasya anyat ati jaghanyam api hṛdayam avataret iti alam kaśmala goṣṭhyā iti avijñāta artham parṣat prativādibhyām tris abhihitam api avijñātam avijñāta artham 
NM_12,2.645.200–12,2.645.201	 yat sādhana vārkya dūṣaṇa vākyam vā tris abhihitam parṣadā prativādinā navijñāyate kliṣṭa śabda prayogam aprasiddha prayogam atidruta uccarita minyā ivaṃprakāram avijñāta artham nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati asāmarthya saṃvaraṇāyaca dhūrtaiḥ idam āśrīyate nirarthaka avijñāta arthayoḥ viśeṣaḥ atra āha artha asaṃpratyayasya samāna tvāt kaḥ asya nirarthakāt bhedaḥ atha prakṛta upayoga yogyam artham asau vadati tadā parṣad prativādinā uḥ amedha avitā kāmaṃbhavet na tu viduṣaḥ vaktum vivadataḥ parājayaḥ bhavitum arhati 
NM_12,2.645.202–12,2.645.203	 kiṃkṛtaḥ ca eṣa tris uccāraṇa niyamaḥ kim rāja ājñayā uta svākyena iti na vidmaḥ atra ucyate nirarthake sarveṇa sarva artha śūnyatā iha tu bhavan= api arthaḥ na avagamyate drutatara uccāraṇa ādi vyatikara vaśāt iti katham aviśeṣaḥ tatra ca kalpyate nūnam asāmarthyam ātmīyam āvarītu manāḥ evam abhidhatte na hisamarthaḥ vidvān vispaṣṭam na vakti iti tris ami dhāna niyame viśeṣaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.204	 tri tva niyamaḥ api na veda vacana nara pati śāsana nibandhanaḥ kintu vastu sthiti upanataḥ eva yatas sakṛt dvis api abhihitam api anavadhāna ādinā na gṛhītam itisaṃbhāvyate tris tu yat uktam na jñāyate tatra vaktuḥ eva jāḍyam aneka prāśnika ādi samāje kathitam avaśyam kena api avagamyeta sarveḥ anavagamāt tuvaktā eva nigṛhyate caturdhā paṃcadhā vā abhidhāne tu iṣyamāṇe niravadhitā abhidhānasya prasajyate iti yuktaḥ tris vaṃcana niyamaḥ iti apārthampaurvā parya ādi yāgāt apratisaṃbaddha artham apārthakam 
NM_12,2.645.205–12,2.645.206	 pūrva apara asaṅga tapada kadambaka uccāraṇāt apratiṣṭhita vākya artham apārthakam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati tat yathā daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṣ apūpā kuṇḍam ajājirna palala piṇḍaḥ kumāryāḥ caitrasya pitā pratiśīnaḥ iti dharma kīrtyā aṃkṣepaḥ samādhānam ca atra āha apratisaṃbaddhavat eva asaṃbaddha vākyam asaṃbaddha prakaraṇam ca nigraha sthāna antaram kasmāt na uktam etena eva gata artha tvāt iti ced yadi evam anarthakena eva gata artha tvāt apārthakam api pṛthaṅana vaktavyam atra ucyate nirarthake napadārthaḥ na vākya arthaḥ kevalam varṇāḥ eva śuṣkāḥ uccāryante artha antare api samanvita padārthe vyavasthāpita vākya artham anupakṛtam tu ucyate iha tu padārtha saṃpratyaye api tad anvayā saṃbhavena vākya artha anavasāyaḥ iti spaṣṭaḥ bhedaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.207–12,2.645.208	 prakṛta vivāda āspadībhūte vastuni kaḥ vā viśeṣaḥ iti ced uktam atra saṃkṣepa vivakṣāyām dve eva nigraha sthāne asaṃkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā tudvāviṃśati bheda tvam prakṛta vastu siddhiḥ tu dvāviṃśatau= api tulyā eva yat tu asaṃbaddha vākyam asaṃbaddha prakaraṇam ca pṛthak upasaṃkhyeyam iti tat na apratisaṃbaddha padārthena eva tad saṃgrahāt yadi tu asaṃbaddha vākyam asaṃbaddha prakaraṇam ca avaśyam vaktavyam tat yuktam eva bhavadīyam śāstram tathā hivaibhāṣikāṇām asti bāhyaḥ arthaḥ sa ca pratyakṣaḥ sautra antikānām ca san= api asau= anumeyaḥ yoga ācārāṇām sa ākāram jñānam eva na bāhyaḥ arthaḥ sa ca pratyakṣaḥ mādhyamikānām ākāra śūnyam svaccham jñāna mātram eva iti evam itaretarān anvita vākya prakaraṇam idam aśeṣam eva śākya śāstram āha ca daśa dāḍima vākyasya bauddha śāstrasya ca īdṛśaḥ anyasya ca api abaddhasya pratiṣṭhā kena labhyate aprāpta kālam avayava viparyāsa vacanam aprāpta kālam 
NM_12,2.645.209–12,2.645.210	 pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamana vacana kramam ati laṅghya avayava viparyāsena prayujyamānam anumāna vākyam aprāpta kālam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati padānām prayoga krame dharma kīrtyā aṃkṣepaḥ atra āha na hi padānām vākyeṣu niyataḥ kramaḥ kaścid asti niyata kramakāḥ hi varṇāḥ padatām āpadyante iti yuktam tad antareṇa tad arthān avagamāt na hi ghaṭaḥ iti ukte ghaṭa avagatiḥ bhaṃvati vākyeṣu tu devadatta ! gāṃśuklām abhyāja daṇḍena daṇḍena śuklām gām abhyāja devadatta! iti krama antareṇa api tathā eva artha pratipatteḥ kim krameṇa anumāna vākye tu paṃca avayavāḥ iti etat eva tāvat prathamam asāṃpratam pratijña ādi ava yavānām asādhāna aṅga vacana tvāt tatra teṣām paṃca avayavānām api prayogaḥ prayoge api ca kramaḥ vivakṣitaḥ tad ullaṅghanam ca nigraha sthānam iti mahatī mūrkha prakriyā iti nyāya ābayaveṣu kramaḥ niyataḥ 
NM_12,2.645.211–12,2.645.212	 atra ucyate vākya antareṣu krama vivakṣā bhavatu mā vā bhūt na anenanaḥ prayojanam anumāna vākye tu ārthaḥ kramaḥ balāt āpatati sva pratipatti anusāreṇa para pratipateḥ utpādanāt sva pratipattau ca dharmi darśana tad gata hetu dharma avadhāraṇa pratibandha smaraṇa parāmarśa jñāna sādhya niścayānām krameṇa darśanāt param prati tathā eva tad abhidhānam kartavyam iti sa vistaram avayava lakṣaṇaṃnirṇitam etat asādhana aṅga tvacana tvam api pratijña ādi avayavānām tatra eva nirastam atas kramasya iha yukti yukta tvāt tavatikramaḥ bhavati eva nigraha sthānam nyūnam hīnam anyatamena api avathavena nyūnam paṃca avayave vākye prayoktavye sthite tad anyatamena api avayavena hīnam prayuṃjānasya nyūnam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati nyūnasya adoṣa tvākṣepaḥ samādhānam ca 
NM_12,2.645.213	 atra āha pratijña ādi ava yava jātam asādhana aṅga vacanam iti atas tad anabhidadhatona nigrahaḥ pratyuta vadataḥ nigrahaḥ yuktaḥ iti atra ucyate anantaram eva etat parihṛtam vistarataḥ ca avayava lakṣaṇe tathā hi śrotuḥ ākāṅkṣā nivṛttaye anumāna vākyam prayujyate iti prathamam tad ākāṅkṣā viṣayaḥ sādhya dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī pradarśyate tatas kāraṇa ākāṅkṣāyām hetu vacanam abhidhīyate kva asya pratibandhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti bubhutsāyām udāharaṇam upapādyate ittha meṣa siddha pratibandhaḥ hetuḥ dharmiṇi bhavet na vā iti śaṅkāyām upanaya vacanam uccāryate tad anantaram sarva avayavānām ekatra upasaṃhārāya nigamanam prayujyata eti anyatamasya aprayogāt nigraha arha tā bhavati eva iti alam atra eva vastuni pade paveka laha prastāvanena iti adhikam hetu udāharaṇa adhikam adhikam 
NM_12,2.645.214–12,2.645.215	 ekena eva hetunā dṛṣṭāntena vā pratipādite arthe hetu antaram dṛṣṭānta antaram vā aprayuṃjānasya adhikam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati etat ca vāde tāvat vīta rāga kathā ātmake vastu nirṇaya phale na iṣyate eva jalpe api niyama abhyupagamena vat ataḥ vādinaḥ idam nigraha sthānam yaḥ hi na mayā āvābhyām vāsādhanam adhikam abhidheyam udāharaṇam vā iti niyamya udgrāhayati saḥ eva tathā anigṛhyate na anyaḥ iti etat ca kīrtinā api evam eva kathitam prapaṃca kathāyām tu na doṣaḥ iti asya doṣa tva tadabhāva pakṣau 
NM_12,2.645.216	 aparaḥ āha niyama abhyupāme api na ayam doṣaḥ pratipatti dra ḍhimne tad abhidhānāt iti tat ayuktam abhyupagata niyama tyāgāt asau nigraha arhaḥ bhavet kaḥ ca ayam pratipatti draḍhimā prathama prayuktasya hi hetoḥ mṛdu pratipatti kāriṇaḥ hetu tvam eva na syāt utpannasya pratyayasya punar utpādanam yuktam tatra na pūrva hetuḥ adra ḍhimne na api uttaraḥ draḍhimne tasmāt niyama abhyupagame adhika abhidhānam doṣaḥ eva 
NM_12,2.645.217–12,2.645.218	 aparam matam akṛta niyamasya api doṣaḥ eva prapaṃca kathāyām api ekena hetunā dṛṣṭāntena vā kṛte nirṇaye dvitīyasya vaiyarthyāt nirṇītasya nirṇaya anupapatteḥ anirṇaya kāriṇaḥ ca prathamasya hetoḥ prayoga anarha tvāt iti punaruktam śabda arthayoḥ punar uccāraṇam punarvacanam anyatra anuvādāt arthāt āpannasya sva kaṇṭhena punarvacanam śabdasya vā arthasya vā abhihitasya punar abhidhānam punaruktam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati anuvādaṃvarjayitvā 
NM_12,2.645.219–12,2.645.221	 śabda punaruktam tāvat yatra pūrva uccāritaḥ eva śabdaḥ punar uccāryate yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya śabdaḥ iti artha punaruktam tu yatra saḥ arthaḥ pūrvam anyena śabdena uktaḥ paryāya antareṇa punar ucyate yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ nirodha dharmakaḥ dhvānaḥ iti yadi api ca śabda punarukte api artha paunaruktyam asti eva tathā api śabda pūrvaka tvāt artha pratyabhijñāyāḥ prathamataram śabda pratyabhijñānāt tat paunaruktyam eva tat ucyate jāti apekṣaḥ ca śabda paunarukti a vyavahāraḥ na vyakti apekṣaḥ kṣaṇaṃbhaṅgi tvāt varṇānām punar prayoga asaṃbhavāt 
NM_12,2.645.222–12,2.645.223	 anuvāde tu paunarukti am a doṣaḥ yathā hetu apadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam iti arthāt āpannasya api sva śabdena punarvacanam bhavati eva punar uktam yathā āasatsu megheṣu vṛṣṭiḥ na bhavati iti ukte arthāt āpadyate satsu bhavati iti tat kim artham sva kaṇṭhena punar ucyate artha prati iti arthaḥ hi śabda prayogaḥ pratīte arthe kim tena iti 
NM_12,2.645.224–12,2.645.225	 etat ca niyama abhyupagame nigraha sthānam veditavyam akṛta niyamasyaṃtu na atīva mahān ayam aparādhaḥ śabda paunaruktyasya doṣa tva āśaṅkā atra āha na artha punaruktāt anyat śabda punaruktam upapadyate śabda sāmye api artha bheda darśanāt smarata giriśam giriśaḥ nagarī yasya asamaradveṣasya kaḥ iva yadīyasya mudā na garīyasyā samasmaradveṣasya iti tasmāt arthataḥ eva paunaruktyam na śabdataḥ 
NM_12,2.645.226–12,2.645.228	 api ca vistara kathāsu kadācana samyak aśravaṇa śaṅkrāyām punar abhidhānaṃ nāma kiyān pramādaḥ arthāt āpannasya ca sva śabdena punarvacanam yadi nigraha sthānam ucyate tarhi pratijñā vacanam eva prathamam nigraha sthānam adhika punaruktayoḥ vā kaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti vaktavyam yādṛśam tādṛśam ca viśeṣa leśam āśritya pṛthak abhidhāne nigraha sthāna bheda parigaṇanam aśakya kriyaṃsyāt anuvādaḥ ced ucyate hetu apadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam iti tatra pratijñā eva tāvat asādhvī tasyāḥ punarvacanam sādhu bhaviṣyati iti keyaṃkathā teṣām doṣa tva samarthanam 
NM_12,2.645.229	 atra ucyate yat uktam artha punaruktāt anyat na śabda punaruktam iti tat evam eva pṛthak nirdeśaḥ tu anayā vivakṣayā yaḥ hi śakti atiśaya cikhyā apayiṣayā sakṛt prayuktaḥ śabdaḥ punar mayā na prayoktavyaḥ iti pratijñāya jalpam pravartayati sa śabda punaruktena api nigṛhyate iti niyamya vādinaḥ eva nigrahāt tatas anyasya samyak aśravaṇa śaṅkayā punar vadataḥ api na doṣaḥ artha ākṣipta kathanam api kṛta niyamasya eva doṣaḥ na anyasya iti 
NM_12,2.645.230–12,2.645.232	 atas eva vāde na nigraha sthānam idam api tu jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ eva vijigīṣu kathayoḥ tayoḥ ca sa prayojana tvam kathā antara tvam ca purā samarthitam eva yat tu pratijña uccāraṇam artha ākṣipta tvāt tad anuvādaḥ ca nigamana vacanam aphalataram iti tad avayava lakṣaṇe vistareṇa samāhitam adhika punaruktayoḥ tu ayam vispaṣṭaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ anyam hetum anyaṃvā dṛṣṭāntam tatra eva sādhye abhidadhat adhika vādī bhavati tam eva hetum dṛṣṭāntam vāpunarcadan punar ukta vādi iti 
NM_12,2.645.233–12,2.645.234	 yat tu evaṃvidha viśeṣa āśrayaṇe parigaṇa nam adhaṭamānam iti tat avāntara viśeṣa vivakṣayā evam eva asaṅkīrṇa udāharaṇa pradarśanāya tu dvāviṃśati nirdeśa aiti uktam ananubhāṣaṇam vijñātasya parṣadā tris abhihitasya api anuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam parṣadā viditasya vādinā tris uccāritasya api yat apratyuccāraṇam tatananubhāṣaṇam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati apratyuccārayan kim āspa daṃdūṣaṇam abhidadhīta 
NM_12,2.645.235–12,2.645.236	 nanu ! yadi ananu bhāṣya api tatra uttaram brūyāt kim iti nigṛhyeta na ca yaḥ anubhāṣitum asamarthaḥ saḥ uttaram api dātum akṣamaḥ bhavati vicitra tvāt puruṣa śaktīnām na etat evam ananubhāṣaṇe tad uttara viṣaya aparijñānāt kvottaram prayujyeta prayuktam vā katham avadhāryeta na ca evam brūmaḥ yāvat kiṃcid vādinā sa vistaram abhidhīyate tad akhila m anyūnā anatiriktam anujjhita kramakam prativādī tathā eva anubhāṣeta iti yaḥ tu samasta anubhāṣaṇam tathā kuryāt api nāma tena sva kauśalam eva kevalaṃmupadarśitam bhavati medhāvi tvam vā na tu evam akurvan pratyaveyāt iti stoka stokam anubhāṣamāṇaḥ tathā eva ca krameṇa dūṣayan na nigraham āpnuyāt iti dharma kīrtyā aṃkṣepaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.237	 atra āha yadi vādī sva pakṣa mādhana vivaraṇa vartmanā bahutaram akṛta kama prakṛta artham upakṣipet tat kim prativādinā sarvam anubhāṣaṇīyam hetu mātram tu anūdya dūṣaṇam udbhāvayataḥ na asya nigrahaḥ yuktaḥ dūṣaṇa viṣayam tuhetu mātram api yaḥ anubhāṣitum akauśalaḥ saḥ uttara viṣaya aparijñānāt uttaram apipratipattum asamarthaḥ eva iti apratibhayā nigṛhyatām kim ananubhāṣaṇena 
NM_12,2.645.238	 api ca tris abhihitasya iti kā iyam paribhāṣā tathā ca vādī para avabodha artham vākyam prayuṃjīta para upadrava artham vā tatra para avabodha arthe vākya īpara avabodhaḥ eva abhidhāna vidhiḥ na dvis tris vā niyamaḥ yāvat kṛtvas prayuktevākye parasya ayabodhaḥ jāyate tāvat kṛtvas prayoktavyam para upadrava artham tuvākya uccāraṇam akṣataḥ eva dharmaḥ ! prāśnikān yathā tathā saṅketena apibrodhayitvā duḥśliṣṭa kaṣṭa śabda prayoga ādi āḍambara viracanayā api āndhyam utpādya parān uparudhyeta iti mahat kaśmalam etat na ca īdṛśam śāstre vyutpādana arham tasmāt bahu kṛtvas api abhidhāya prativādī bodhayitavyaḥ na tu dvis uccāritam apratyuccaran nigṛhītavyaḥ iti ukta ākṣepa samādhānam 
NM_12,2.645.239–12,2.645.240	 atra ucyate na khalu sakṛt eva sakala para viracita vacana saṃdarbha anubhāṣaṇam avilambita kramakam asmābhiḥ api kartavya tayā upadiṣṭam api tu yathocita dūṣaṇa viṣaya anubhāṣaṇa mātram eva yaḥ tu stokam api anubhāṣitum apragalbhaḥ tasya uttara pratibhānam api na asti itiyat ucyate tad asamyak anyat ananubhāṣaṇam anyat uttarā pratibhānam kasyacid aśeṣam anubhāṣitavataḥ api uttara apratibhāna darśanāt tat idam anuttara viṣayānuddha ūṣaṇam nigraha sthānam ucyate na uttara apratibhānam uttara apratibhānam anantaram vakṣyate 
NM_12,2.645.241	 yat tu tris uccāraṇa paribhāṣā kutastyeti vikalpitam tad avijñāta artha nāmni nigraha sthāne prativihitam vīta rāga kathā ātmake vāde śiṣṭa ādi bhiḥ saha kriyamāṇe kāmam astu para avabodha avadhi vākya uccāraṇam jalpe tuvijigīṣu kathāyām puruṣa śakti parīkṣaṇāt avaśyam uccāraṇa niyamaḥ āśrayaṇīyaḥ tatra sakṛt vā dvis vā abhihitasya agrahaṇam anavadhāna ādinā api saṃbhavan nanigrahāya kalpate tris abhihitasya tu sarvaiḥ agrahaṇe vaktuḥ eva aparādhaḥ anyaiḥ gṛhītasya prativādinā tu agrahaṇe tasya nigrahaḥ vāra trayāt ūrdhvam api abhidhāne tu āśrīyamāṇe jalpa ādau kathā samāptiḥ eva na syāt chātra śālāhi asau bhavet na udgrāhiṇikā bhūmiḥ iti ajñānam avijñānam ca ajñānam 
NM_12,2.645.242–12,2.645.244	 pariṣadā vijñātasya api vādi vākyasya prativādinā yat avijñānam tatajñānam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati avidita uttara viṣayaḥ hi kva uttaraṃbrūyāt iti ajñānam apratibhā iti na anayoḥ viśeṣam paśyāmaḥ atra ucyate bhinna viṣaya tvāt adoṣaḥ uttara viṣaya apratipattiḥ ajñānam uttara apratipattiḥ tu apratibhā iti nanu ! uttara viṣarya yaḥ na jānāti saḥ uttaram api na jānāti eva mā evam uttara viṣayam jānan= api kiṃcid uttaram na jānāti iti loka dṛṣṭam etat evam tarhi ananubhāṣaṇena gata artham ajñānam ajñāte hi parakīye vākya arthetat anubhāṣaṇe sāmarthya abhāva darśanāt santi hi kecid ye anubhāṣitum aśaknuvantaḥ patrikā ādi likhitam tadā āvedayanti iti evam trayāṇām api ca na paunaruktyam uttara viṣaya apratipattiḥ ajñānam pratipattau= api tat apratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam anubhāṣite api uttarā pratipattiḥ apratibhā iti 
NM_12,2.645.245	 nanu ! yadi ajñāna sāmye api viṣaya bhedam āśritya nigraha sthāna nānā tvam ityam abhidhīyate tarhi ajñāna prakāra vaicitryāt bheda antarāṇi api vaktavyāni iti uktam atra sāra saṃgraha vivakṣayā dve eva nigraha sthāne vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ ca iti itaretara visadṛśa udāharaṇa diś pradarśanāya dvāviṃśati bheda tvam ucyate avāntara viśeṣaiḥ tu tadānantyam abhyupagamyate eva tathā ca dvāviṃśati varga īhetvābhāsāḥ ca iti paṭhitam te ca sva rūpeṇa eva tāvat paṃca savyabhicāra viruddha prakaraṇa sama sādhya sama atīta kālāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ iti avāntara bhedāḥ cateṣām atibahavaḥ santi eva iha tu ekam eva tad nigraha sthānam ādiṣṭam hetvābhāsāḥ ca yathā uktāḥ iti tasmāt ittham samāsa vyāsa varṇanāt alam pade pade paryanuyogena iti apratibhā uttarasya apratipattiḥ apratibhā 
NM_12,2.645.246–12,2.645.247	 para pakṣe gṛhīte api tasmin= uttara apratibhānam apratibhā nāma prativādinaḥ nigraha sthānam bhavati ajñāna ādibhyaḥ bhinna tā asya darśitā eva kīrtiḥ api ca etat anumanyate eva nigraha sthānam nanu ! uttaram apratipadyamānaḥ sadasi prativādī katham āsīta yat kiṃcid vikattha mānaḥ tat yathā hṛd puṇḍarīka vikasat sakala anavadya vidyā avadāta vadanaḥ kva janaḥ asmad ādiḥ kva ayam vaṭuḥ katipaya akṣara leśa lipta jihvā anvitaḥ katham anena saha abhidadhmaḥ dāna ārdra gandha gaja kumbha kapāṭa bhedi bhīma sphurat nakha śikhā śikharaḥ kva siṃhaḥ kva amī samīraṇa vidhūta pūrāṇa parṇa pāta udbhavat bhaya vilola dṛśaḥ kuraṅgāḥ 
NM_12,2.645.248–12,2.645.249	 ityādi yat vā tat vā pralapan= āste vikṣepaḥ kārya vyāsaṃgāt kathā vicchedaḥ vikṣepaḥ udgrāhaṇikām upakramya vā tat grāhayitavyam mayā iti pratiśratya vā abhimukham prativādini sannihiteṣu prāśnikeṣu kārya vyāsaṅgam vyapadiśati idaṃme karaṇīyam apahīyate gacchāmi iti abhidhāya kathām vicchinatti yaḥ sa vikṣepeṇa parājīyate anyatara nigraha antā hikathā bhavati sa catthaṃkathām kurvan ātmanā eva ātmānam nigṛhṇāti pratiśyāyena me kaṇṭha uparodhaḥudapādi padam api vaktum na yujyate jananī me jīvitam jahāti sma tām śmaśāna bhuvam prāpayya vahnisāt karomi iti vikṣepasya adoṣa tva āśaṅkā 
NM_12,2.645.250–12,2.645.251	 atra āha yadi tāvat paramārthataḥ eva mātṛmarāṇa ādi kāryaṃmasya upasthitam tat kim iti tapasvī parājīyate udgrāhaṇikā ajitaḥ mā bhūvam iti kim asau mṛtām mātaram api mā dhākṣīt iti mahat subhāṣitam iti pīnasa avaruddha sthāna karaṇaḥ vā katham vācam udīrayatu atha asāmarthya sthaganāya vitatham api kathayati tathāvidham asau kārya vyāsaṅgam tarhi satyaṃnigṛhyate na tu vikṣepeṇa kintu anyena eva vādī tāvat druta kartavya vyāja vyapadeśāt artha antara gamana ādinā nigṛhyate prativādī tu apratibhayā eva iti atiprasaṅgaḥ ca evaṃprakāraṇām nirdeśe bhavet iti ukta ākṣepa samādhānam 
NM_12,2.645.252–12,2.645.253	 atra ucyate kathām upakramya pratijñām vā hetum abhidhāya tad vivaraṇa saraṇimiṣam abalambya kiṃcid artha antaram upanyasyati yat tat artha antaram udāhṛtam ādau= eva iha tu kathā pūrva raṅge kathāyām vā kim api karaṇīya nibham abhidhāya sa bhayam apasarati sadasaḥ iti katham iva tad tulya tā bhavati apratibhayā api śruta pūrva pakṣaḥ parājīyate iha tu pūrva pakṣam eva naśṛṇoti vā na karoti vā prathamam eva palāyate iti mahān viśeṣaḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ tu asakṛt parākṛtaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.254	 yat tu hetvābhāseṣu antar bhāvam asya kīrtiḥ akīrtayat tat atīva subhāṣitam kva hetvābhāsaḥ ! kva kārya vyāsaṅgaḥ ! saṃpradhāraṇā eva ramaṇīyeyam ahetavau hetu vat avabhāsamānāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ kim asya kārya vyāsaṅgasya ahetoḥ hetu vat ābhāsanam kīrtinā dṛṣṭam iti param naḥ kutūhalam mata anujñā su apakṣe doṣa abhyupagamāt para pakṣe doṣa prasaṃgaḥ mata anujñā 
NM_12,2.645.255–12,2.645.256	 sva dakṣe parāpādita doṣam anuddhṛtya abhyupagamya tam eva para pakṣe pratīpam āpādayataḥ para ma tā anujñānāt mata anujñā nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati yathā cauraḥ bhavān puruṣa tvāt prasiddha caura vat iti ukte sati āha bhavān apicauraḥ puruṣa tvāt iti saḥ ayam evam vadan ātmanaḥ para āpāditam doṣam abhyupagatavān iti mata anujñayā nigṛhyate mata anujñāyāḥ doṣa tva śaṃkā samādhānam ca atra āha anaikāntike hetau pareṇa ukteḥ tad udbhāvanam anena prakāreṇa prativādī karoti iti kim iti nigṛhyate vādyā iva hetvābhāsa prayogāt nigṛhyate iti 
NM_12,2.645.257	 atra ucyate uktam ādau= eva sva pakṣe doṣam anuddhṛtya iti evam hi tena vaktavyam anaikāntikaḥ ayam hetuḥ acaure api puruṣa tvasya darśanāt iti evam hi sa doṣaḥ uddhṛtaḥ bhavati evam tu anabhidhāya bhavān api coraḥ puruṣa tvāt iti vadan anujānāti eva para matam atas anaikāntika tvevaktavye tad udbhāvanā anukramam avadhīrya atiprasaṅgam āpādayat nigraha arhaḥ bhavaṣi eva iti vādinaḥ ca anaikāntika hetu prayoge api tad anudbhāvanā anna parājayaḥ prativādinaḥ eva hi idam sannikṛṣṭam nigraha sthānam iti paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam nigraha prāptasya anigrahaḥ paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam 
NM_12,2.645.258–12,2.645.259	 paryanuyojyaḥ nāma nigraha upapattyā codanīyaḥ idam te nigraha sthānam upanatam atas nigṛhītaḥ asi iti evam vacanīyaḥ te yaḥ upekṣate na anuyuṅkte sa paryanuyojya upekṣaṇāt nigṛhyate dharma kīrti ākṣepa ! atra āha kaḥ kasya idam nigraha sthānam āpādayati kim paryanuyojyaḥ uta tad upekṣakaḥ upekṣakaḥ tāvat asya paryanuyojyatām eva na jānāti jānan vākatham enam upekṣeta  upekṣya vā kim ātmanaḥ eva nigraha sthānam udbhāvayan= evam ācaṣṭāṃeṣa paryanuyojyaḥ api mayā upekṣitaḥ iti nigṛhītaḥ asmi iti paryanuyojyaḥ apikatham ātmīyam avadyam prakāśayet idam me dūṣaṇam tat ca bhavatā na udbhāvitam atas bhavān jitaḥ iti sa khalu evam abhidadhat amedhyam pāṇau nidhāya paraṃkalaṅkayitu kāmaḥ param kalaṅkayan= eva ātma kalaṅakam anubhavati eva iti 
NM_12,2.645.260–12,2.645.261	 api ca na idam nigraha sthāna antaram apadiśyate kintva pratibhā eva iti tathā hi yadi tāvat uttara pākṣikaḥ pūrva pākṣikam sādhana ābhāsam avyācakṣāṇam upekṣeta tatra dūṣaṇam na udbhāvayet tad uttara apratipattyā na nigṛhyate na paryanuyojya upekṣaṇena vastutas tu dvayoḥ api tatra jaya parājaya nirdhāraṇam anupapannam ekasya sādhana ābhāsa va ādi tvāt itarasya ca tad uttara apratibhānāt 
NM_12,2.645.262–12,2.645.263	 atha pūrva pākṣikaḥ dūṣaṇa ābhāsa vādinam doṣa prāptam uttara pākṣikam na nigṛhṇāti tathā api tasya duruttara apratibhā eva na ca anyatarasya api jayaḥ parājayaḥ vā nirdhāryate ekasya dūṣaṇa ābhāsa va ādi tvāt itarasya ca tad anudbhāvanāt ukta ākṣepa samādhānam atra ucyate na apratibhāyāḥ samyak sādhana viṣaya tvāt samyak sādhane ca prayukte tad uttarasya apratipattiḥ apratibhā bhavati sādhana ābhāse tu prayukte tad ābhāsatānudbhāvanāt paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam bhavati atra tusādhana ābhāsa vādī paryanuyojyaḥ saḥ upekṣitaḥ tatra samyak sādhana vādītu aparyanuyojyaḥ eva iti viśeṣaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.264–12,2.645.265	 yat tu vastu vṛttena na kasyacid api jayaḥ parājayaḥ vā iti tat evam evakintu jalpe puruṣa śakti parīkṣāyām idam nigraha sthānam ucyate tad udbhāvayitā api yat vikalpitaḥ tatra api ucyate pūrva pākṣikeṇa sādhana ābhāse prayukte uttara pākṣikeṇa tasmin= tathā tvena anudbhāvite prāśnikānām apṛṣṭānām vaktum avasara abhāvāt saḥ eva sādhana ābhāsa vādī kadācid vaiyātyāt evaṃbrūyāt mayā asya śaktim jijñāsamānena sādhana ābhāsa prayogaḥ kṛtaḥ eṣa tumūrkhaḥ tam na jānāti iti tadā katham na nigṛhyate etena dūṣaṇa ābhāsava ādī api vyākhyātaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.266–12,2.645.267	 athavā ubhaya abhyarthitāḥ sabhā pati niyuktāḥ vā prāśnikāḥ tathā kathayantaḥ nigṛhṇanti eva paryanuyojya upekṣiṇam sādhana ābhāsa vādinaḥ hi dhūrta tayā tad abhidhānam samyak sādhanam ajānataḥ artha saṃśayāt vā saṃbhavati uttara pākṣikasya tu tad anudbhāvanam mohāt eva iti saḥ eva parājīyate niranuyojya anuyogaḥanigraha sthāne nigraha sthāna abhiyogaḥ niranuyojya anuyogaḥ anujjhita yathā ucita kramam upapanna vādinam apramādi nam anigraha aham api nigṛhītaḥ asi iti yaḥ brūyāt saḥ eva abhūta doṣa udbhāvanāt nigṛhyate dharma kīrti ākṣepaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.268	 atra āha yadi tāvat uttara pākṣikaḥ pūrva pākṣikam aduṣṭa sādhana vādinam abhūtaiḥ eva doṣaiḥ abhiyuṅkte tathā sati bhūta doṣa udbhāvanasya uttarasya apratipatteḥapratibhayā eva sa nigṛhyatām kim niranuyojya anuyoga ākhya nūtana nigraha sthāna parājīyate bhūta doṣa abhiyoga pakṣe tu pūrva pākṣikaḥ eva sādhana ābhāsa yogātanu yojya eva khalu asau na niranuyojya anuyogasya viṣayaḥ bhavitum arhati kathanena ukta ākṣepa samādhānam 
NM_12,2.645.269–12,2.645.270	 atra ucyate aho nu khalu ayam tapasvī paryudāsasya prasajya pratiṣedhasya ca viśeṣam apaśyan= atimātram muhyati bhūta doṣa apratibhānam anyat anyat ca abhūta doṣa pratibhānam ekatra apratipattiḥ itaratra viparīta pratipattiḥ tatra bhūta doṣa apratipattiḥ apratibhā abhūta doṣa pratipattiḥ ananuyojya anuyogaḥ api ca asādhana aṅga vacanam adoṣa udbhāvanam ca yat bhavatā nigraha sthānam ākhyātam tatra kathyate 
NM_12,2.645.271	 tatra prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ eva kevalam āśriyamāṇe hetvābhāsāḥ apina nigraha sthāne bhaveyuḥ sādhanaṅgasya anabhidhānam maukyam eva kevalaṃnigraha sthānam bhavet tasmāt asādhana aṅga vacanam adīṣa udbhāvanam api paryudāsa vyākhyāna arha bhavati eva tatas ca bhūta doṣa anudbhāvanam apratibhā abhuta doṣa udbhāvanam ca niranuyojya anuyogaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.272–12,2.645.273	 atha abhūta doṣa udbhāvane api bhūta doṣa apratibhānam asti eva iti tat eva astu nigraha sthānam iti ucyate tarhi mūka tvam eva ekam nigraha sthānam syāt asādhana aṅga vacane api evam vaktum śakya tvāt iti uktam eva apasiddhāntar siddhāntam abhyupetya aniyamāt kathā prasaṅgaḥ aprasiddhāntaḥ yaḥ kaṃcana prathamam siddhāntam abhyupagamya kathām upakramate tathā pravṛttaḥ ca siṣā dhayiṣita artha samarthana rabhasena dūṣaṇa uddharaṇa śraddhayā vā siddhānta viruddham abhidhatte saḥ apasiddhāntena parājoyate tat yathā sāṃkhyaḥ prativādi sannidhāne na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ 
NM_12,2.645.274	 iti sva siddhāntam prathamam pratijñāya pradhāna siddhaye sādhana prayogam karoti vyaktam vikāra jātam eka prakṛti samanvaya darśanāt mṛd anvitāḥ himṛd vikārāḥ kuṇḍa piṭhara śarāva prabhṛtayaḥ eka prakṛtikāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ evam asya api gava aśvādi vikāra jātasya sukha duḥkha moha anvaya darśanāt tad ātmaka eka prakṛti prabhava tvena bhavitavyam 
NM_12,2.645.275	 evam uktavān asau naiyāyikena anuyujyate atha kā prakṛtiḥ nāma kā cadikṛtiḥ iti avidita prakṛti vikṛti svarūpaḥ hi katham vikṛtīnām eka prakṛti tvam eka tvam jānīyāt iti evam anuyuktaḥ kāpilaḥ āha yasya avasthitasya dharma antara nivṛttau dharma antaram pravartate sā prakṛtiḥ yat tad dharma antaram pravartate sā vikṛtiḥ iti 
NM_12,2.645.276–12,2.645.279	 saḥ ayam evam vadan prāc abhyupagata sada sannirodha prabhava abhāva siddhānta viruddha abhidhānāt apasiddhāntena nigṛhyate yadi pūrva dharma nirodhe dharma antara prādurbhāvaḥ tadā na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ iti sva siddhāntaḥ hīyete atha siddhāntaḥ na tyajyate tarhi prakṛti vikāra aniścayāt hetu asiddhau sādhya abhāvaḥ prasajyate iti ukta aprasiddha antasyāt oṣa tva āśaṅkā atra āha hetu prayogam kṛtavati kapile naiyāyikaḥ tad asiddha tā udbhāvanayā pratyavatiṣṭhatām prakṛti vikṛti svarūpa praśnasya kaḥ avasaraḥ tat idam artha antara gamanam asya bhavet evam pṛcchataḥ artha antara gamanam sva granthe nigraha sthān aucyate atha ca adhunā tena eva vyavahniyate iti kaḥ ayam nayaḥ 
NM_12,2.645.280	 yadi tu sāṃkhya matam nirācikīrṣitam tat asiddha tā eva hetoḥ udbhāvyatām prakṛti anvayasya vikāreṣu asaṃbhavāt iti vikārāḥ hi pravṛtti nivṛtti dharmakāḥ na ca evaṃprakāram avyaktam avyakta dharma anvaye hi vikārāṇām pravutti nivṛtti ātmaka tvam hīyeta iti evam asiddha tvāt hetoḥ hetvābhāsa prayogāt eva sāṃkhyaḥ nigṛhīta eti na nigraha sthāna antaram apasiddhāntaḥ iti tasya doṣa tva samarthanam 
NM_12,2.645.281^1	 atra ucyate satyam asiddhaḥ bhavatu ayam kāpila kalpitaḥ hetuḥ prakṛti vikṛti praśna krameṇa api tat asiddha tvam avadhārayitum śakyataḥ eva kintu hetu rūpe avadhārite tad dūṣaṇam abhidhānīyam anavadhāritasya dūṣayitum aśakya tvāt iti tad praśnaḥ na artha antara gamanam praśna uttaram eva bhāṣamāṇaḥ parāmarśeni kaṭatara parisphura dapa siddhānta abhidhāna nibandhana nigraha antara viṣaya tām pratipanna eti hetvābhāsa vartmani na dūram gamyate kvacid api para nigrahasya hetauhṛdaya patham prathamam kila avatīrṇe aparam api na kāraṇam vicintyaṃkim iva phalam khalu piṣṭa peṣaṇasya hetvābhāsa rūpa nigraha sthānam hetvābhāsāḥ ca yathā uktāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ tu pūrva ukta lakṣaṇaiḥ eva lakṣitāḥ nigraha sthāna tām yānti yathā uktāḥ iti atas abravīt pramāṇasya prameya tvam prameyasya pramāṇatā yathā lakṣaṇa bhedena na tathā eteṣu dṛśyate bhedena uktāḥ kimartham te iti nigaditā pūrvam eva atra yuktiḥ vāde hi ete prayojyāḥ praguṇanaya vidā tattva śuddhim vidhātum 
NM_12,2.645.281^2	 eteṣām dharma kīrteḥ api ca na vimatiḥ nigraha sthāna tāyāṃ ittham dvāviṃśatiḥ naḥ gurubhiḥ abhihitāḥ nigraha sthāna bhedāḥ grantha upasaṃhāraḥ iti evam sūtra kāra āgamam anusara tā anujjhatā bhāṣya bhūmiṃsthāne sthāne pareṣām matam atula gati kṣiṇvatā tārkikāṇām kāṃcid vākya artha carcām api viracayatā anukrameṇa avatīrṇā nirṇītaḥ sve nibandhe nipuṇam iha mayā ṣoḍaśā ete padārthāḥ nyāya udgāra gabhīra nirmala girā gaurīpatiḥ toṣitaḥvāde yena kirīṭinā iva samare devaḥ kirāta ākṛtiḥ prāpta udāra varaḥ tatassa jayati jñāna amṛta prārthanā namra aneka mahā ṛṣi mastaka valat pādaḥ akṣapādaḥ muniḥ vādeṣu ātta jayaḥ jayantaḥ iti yaḥ khyātaḥ sa tām agraṇīḥ anvarthaḥ nava vṛtti kāraḥ iti yam śaṃsanti nāmnā budhāḥ sūnuḥ vyāpta digantarasya yaśasā candrasya candra tviṣā cakre candra kalā ardha cūḍa caraṇa dhyāyī sa dhanyām kṛtim namaḥ śaśikalā koṭi kalpyamāna aṅkura śriye prapanna jana saṃkalpa kalpavṛkṣāya śambhave
